headline: ‘Tagadzirira’ . . . bhora ngaritambwe.
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino kunhandare dzinosanganisira National Sports Stadium muHarare, Mandava Stadium (Zvishavane) neBabourfields (Bulawayo) uko zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League zvichatatsurana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   Iyi ichave mitambo yekutanga yezvikwata izvi kubva pakamiswa mitambo yose munaKurume gore rapera nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevarairidzi vezvikwata zvakasiyana avo vakarakidza mufaro mukuru nekudzoka kwenhabvu.   Murairidzi weFC Platimun, shasha dzePSL, Norman Mapeza anoti nguva yanga yareba vatambi vakangogara.    Mapeza   “Isu semakore ese tinotambira kuti tihwine uye iye zvino tiri kushanda nesimba kuti tigohwina. Asi tiri kutanga patsva nekuti takashandura zvakawanda kuchikwata chedu, vamwe vatambi vakaenda kukauya vamwe. Saka tichafamba nebhora nekuti tinoziva kuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinoda kusvika patiri,” anodaro Mapedza. FC Platinum kana kuti Pure Platinum Play iri muboka reGroup 4 rine zvikwata zvinoti Ngezi Platinum, Triangle neWhahwa. Murairidzi weDynamos FC – Tonderai “Stanza” Ndiraya – anoti nhabvu yadzoka panguva yakanaka chose. Anoti DeMbare yagara inozivikanwa sechikwata chikuru saka mwaka uno vanoda kurakidza nyika yose kuburikidza nekuhwina mikombe yakawanda.   “Zita rekungoti Dynamos chete ihombe uye zvakawanda zvinotarisirwa kubva kwatiri. Saka isu sechikwata tinovimbisa kuti tichashanda nesimba kuti mwaka uno vatsigiri vedu vagofara tahwina mikombe yakasiyana.   “Asi sezvo tange tave nenguva ndefu takangogara, tinokumbira kuvatsigiri vedu kuti ngavatipe nguva kana tikakundikana tinenge takundikana sezvo vakomana vachiri nengura. Asi ndinofara hangu nekuti tiri kutangirana zvikwata zvose sezvo tose tange takagara nguva ndefu,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare yakaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti CAPS United, Henrentals, Harare City neZPC Kariba. Iri ndiro rega boka rine zvikwata zvitanhatu sezvo mamwe ese ane zvikwata zvina.   Kuchiti kuBulawayo, murairidzi weChicken Inn — Joey “Mafero” Antipas — anoti chikwata chake hachisati chambohwina Chibuku Super Cup saka vacharwa semvumba gore rino kuti vatore mukombe uyu. Mafero akatungamira maGamecocks mugore ra2015 kuhwina mukombe wePSL.   “Kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza uye tiri kutanga nemukombe weChibuku uyo tisati tambohwina sechikwata saka mwaka uno ticharwa semvumba kuti tiuhwine,” anodaro MaGamecocks ari muboka reGroup 2 rine zvikwata zvinoti Bulawayo City, Bulawayo Chiefs neHighlanders.   KuManicaland, murairidzi wechikwata chichangopinda muPSL cheCranborne Bullets — Nesbert “Yabo” Saruchera — anoti ino ndiyo nguva chikwata chavo yange yakamirira.   “Nguva yatange takamirira yazosvika manje, tange takamirira kwenguva ndefu saka tiri kufara uye takagadzirira kusangana nezvimwe zvikwata tigovarakidza kuti isu tauya tichipisa.   “Mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup, vamwe vari muboka redu ngavazive kuti isu tatobudirira kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu. Hatina kupinda kuzozadzikisa mazita kwete asi tinoda kutaridza nyika kuti nhabvu iyi tinotoiziva,” anodaro Saruchera.   MATCH DAY 1 GROUP 1 Caps United FC v Yadah FC Harare City FC v ZPC Kariba FC Herentals FC v Dynamos FC GROUP 2 Bulawayo City FC v Chicken Inn FC; Bulawayo Chiefs FC v Highlanders FC GROUP 3 Tenax FC v Black Rhinos FC Manica Diamonds FC v Cranborne Bullets FC GROUP 4 Ngezi Platinum Stars FC v Triangle United FC

headline: Nhabvu yevechidiki yosimudzirwa
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa munhabvu – Godfrey ‘Goda’ Moyo naBeavan Chikaka – vobatana mukusimudzira vatambi vechidiki izvo zviri kuvaona vachirairidza chikwata chePrime Rangers Soccer Academy.   Goda, sekuzivikanwa kwaanonyanya kuitwa munhabvu, akatambira zvikwata zvinoti Motor Action, Lengthens neShooting Stars kuchiti Chikaka akatambira CAPS United, Highlanders, Zimbabwe Saints, Black Rhinos neTafic yekuBotswana.   Vatambi vaviri ava vose pavange vave kunosendeka shangu dzavo dzenhabvu vakasangana kuPrime Rangers FC iyo yaikwikwidza muDivision One uko kunove kwavave kurairidza iye zvino vachibika vatambi vemangwana. Kuchikwata ichi, varairidzi vaviri ava vari kushanda nezvikwata zvemapoka anoti Under-11, 12 ne21.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo radarika pamhemberero dzePrime Rangers Academy apo vaipa mibairo kuvatambi vavo vakadadisa mugore ra2021, Goda anoti akabatana naChikaka nechinangwa chekubika vatambi vechidiki kuti vagokwanisa kusimukira mumutambo uyu.   “Nhabvu yedu kuti ibudirire tisvike kure, tinofanira kubika vechidiki zvakasimba nekudaro ndiko saka ini naChikaka takabatana kuchikwata chePrime Rangers Academy. Ruzivo rwatakawana munhabvu tiri kurwupawo kune vechidiki kuti vagokwanisa kudarika padanho ratakasvika isu,” anodaro Goda.   Anoti nerutsigiro rwavari kuwana kubva kumutungamiri wePrime Rangers, Samuel Horonga, vari kuona chiyedza chikuru zvekuti vane vatambi vakawanda avo vanofunga kuti vanogona kuenda kunotambira kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa nekuEurope mune remangwana.   “Chishuwo chemutambi wese wenhabvu wemazuva ano kunotambira padanho repamusoro kuEurope kana kuSouth Africa chaiko. Tine vatambi avo tinofunga kuti vanogona kusvika padanho iri zvekuti vakaramba vakangozvininipisa chete vanosvika kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Chikaka anotiwo chikwata chavo gore rino chichakwikwidza muligi reUnder-21 Challenge League izvo vanovimba kuti zvichabatsira vatambi vavo kuti vagoonekwa nezvikwata zvikuru zvemuno nezvekunze.   “Mwaka uno tiri kuzokwikwidza muUnder-21 Challenge League umo tinovimba kuti muchabatsira vatambi vedu vagoonekwa nezvikwata zvizhinji.   “Ligi iri rakakosha nekuti ndipo panovhurirwa mikana yevatambi vazhinji yekusimukira mumutambo uyu. Masvondo adarika, takakwikwidza kumutambo wekupedzisira wegore uyo takasvika mufainari, matambiro atakaita akafadza zvikuru zvekuti tiri kutarisira kutanga kweChallenge League,” anodaro Chikaka.   Mumutambo weUnder-21 Challenge League, Prime Rangers ichakwikwidza nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Friendly Academy neBN Academy kutanga munaKukadzi.

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzofara neKusashaya kweVanhu neCovid-19 muMazuva Manomwe Adarika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 224, sezvo pasina munhu akafa nedenda iri. Izvi zvinoreva kuti kwemazuva manomwe, hapana munhu afa munyika neCovid-19, chiitiko chiri kutambirwa nenyanzvi mune zvehutano dzichiti ichi chiratidzo chekuti matanho ekurwisana nechirwere ichi ari kutorwa nenyika ari kushanda. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika hwakakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevatatu, kana kuti 7 633 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 35, vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 32 vagara vari munyika, vaviri vakadoka kubva kuSouth Africa kuchiti mumwe chete ari akadzoka munyika kubva kuNamibia. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kucovid-19 kusvika nemusi weChina vanonzi vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nemumwe, kana kuti 5 841. Huwandu hwevanhu vachiri kurwara neCovid-19 hwakakwira kuenda pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevasere, kana kuti 1 568.

headline: Dambudziko Rekushaya Mari muMabhanga Roenderera Mberi muNyika
text: Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vanhuwo zvavo munyika vari kushora zvikuru vemabhanga uye vemuzvitoro nekuvabhadharisa mari dzemitero kwavari kuita kuti vatore mari dzavo mumabhanga kana kuwana mari muzvitoro. Vanhu vanoti kunze kwekupedza nguva yakareba vari mumitsetse, vave kubhadhara mari inosvika madhora makumi maviri pakutora mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora yavanofanirwa kunge vachitora nemadhora matatu chete. Vanhu ava vanoti vave kumanikidzwa kutora mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora mukati memazuva gumi sezvo vari kukwanisa kutora zana remadhora chete pazuva kubva mumabhanga uye pose pavanotora mari iyi vanobhadhariswa mari. Vezvitoro vanonziwo vari kumanikidza vanhu kuti vatenge zvavanenge vasiri kuda kuti vakwanisewo kuwana mari. Mukuru weBankers Association of Zimbabwe Dr. Charity Jinya vanoti vemabhanga havana zvavangaite pamitero iyi nekuti vashandi vawo vanenge vawandirwawo nebasa. Asi vanhu vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vave kupedza nguva yakareba yavanofanirwa kunge vachishanda vakaforera mari. Kunyangwe zvazvo mukuru webhanga renyika VaJohn Mangudya vakati mabhanga ape vanhu mari inosvika chiuru chemadhora pazuva, Amai Esther Samson vati chino nyanyovashungurudza kutadza kupiwa mari yakatemerwa iyi. “Kubvira last week tichingotora mari tichipiwa ma$200. Ndasvika na 7am kuzopiwa $200 iyoyo kuma past 3 pm kuno apa unenge wanzwa nenzara. Izvozvi ndatozotenga nartjie apo ndiro randadya pano. Tiri kuswera pano nenzara. Mari iri kunetsa” Amai Samson vanodaro. Mumwe zvakare ange akaforera mari pabhanga reCABS ndaVaMagodo Bangwayo, avo vati vari kurasikirwa nenguva yekunge vachibata mabasa panguva iyo vanhu vazhinji vari kurarama nekubata mabasa emaoko nekuda kwekusawanikwa kwemabasa. “Cash iri kunetsa, unogona kumira panapa 3 hours uchinzi mari hapana. Ndasvika kuma 11am asi ndiri kutobva kuwana mari ikozvino. Queue yanga yakasvika ukoko, vachimbopinza six six, kusvika vaapa 15 kusvika tazonzi tese kuma past 3 pm,” VaBangwayo vadaro. VaJack Kavero vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kumichina kana kuti maATM vanhu havasi kukwanisa kutora mari sezvo musina mari. Vatiwo mumabhanga vari kungoudzwa kuti hakuna mari. Vati zvinovashungurudza zvikuru kuti vanobuda ziya kushanda vobudazve ziya kutora mari yavo kubhanga. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomirira varairidzi reZimbabwe Teachers Association, Zimta, rati dambudziko remari kumabhanga riri kukanganisawo zvikuru mashandiro evarairidzi, sezvo vari kuzomanikidzwa kupedza nguva vari mumitsetse vachiedza kutora mari. Mukuru weZimta, VaSifiso Ndlovu vati nemhaka yekuti mabhanga haasi kukwanisa kupa vanhu mari dzavanoda pazuva, varairidzi vazhinji vari kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti pamwe nemitero yepavanogara. “Varairidzi vari kutarisira kutambira mari dzavo dzemihoro mangwana, ndinoona vazhinji vavo vachi kundikana kudzokera kumabasa kwavo vatadza kuwana mari dzavo.” VaNdlovu vati vane hurongwa hwekumbogara pasi nevatungamiri vezvemari kuti vanzwe kuti dambudziko iri richapera riini. Vanoti nyika inofanirwawo kusimbisa kurudziro yekuti vanhu vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga sezviri kuitwa mune dzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza. “Tinofanirwa kusiyana netsika yekungoshandisa mari chete, toshandisawo zvimwe zvakaita sema credit card kana digital money,” VaNdlovu vadaro. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeKwese TV Inopihwa Rezenisi Kuti Itepfenyure paDandemutande
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kupihwa kwemarezenisi matatu ekutepfenyura padandemutande kuKwese TV neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe asi richiti chinodihwa kusunungura masaisai kuti vanhu vakwanise kutepfenyura mateverevhizheni pamwe nemaredhiyoemumatunhu. Kambani yeEconet, muridzi weKwese TV, yakazivisa neChina kuti yainge yapihwa marezenisi matatu ekutepfeunyura padandemutande. Nhengo yebhodhi remaTrustees eMISA Zimbabwe, VaChris Chinaka, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vachitambire zvose zvinovandzudza kufambiswa kwemashoko, BAZ haisati yatanga kuburitsa marezenisi avanonyanyoda. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati marezenisi apihwa Kwese TV ndeemakambani anoita zvemabhizimisi uye ivo vanoda marezenisi eFrequency Modulation ayo anoita kuti veruzhinji vawane mashoko nemutengo uri pasi. Vatiwo ivo marezenisi apihwa Kwese TV anodhura zvakanyaya sezvo achiita madhora zviuru makumi mashanu pagore uye rezenesi racho rinoti zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemari inenge yawanikwa nekambani yacho, zviendeswe kuBAZ pagore rega rega. VaMoyo vati chinodiwa kusunungura mitemo yezvekutepfenyura kuti pavhurwe mateverevhizheni nemaredhiyo akawanda munyika. VaChinaka vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende ivandudzwe mabasa enhau nekutepfenyura vachiti izvi ndizvo zvisumudzira mabasa ebudiriro munyika. Vatiwo hurumende haifaniri kuona sekuti iri kuitira vatapi venhau dzvene vachiti ibasa rehurumende kuona kuti vanhu vawana mashoko nenhau dzavanoda. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEconet panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Hatinawo kunzwa kubva kune vBAZ kuti makambani mangani akanyorera kuti apihwe marezenisi akaita seakapihwa kuKwese TV. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vokurudzirwa Kuzadzikisa Zvavanotaura paKufambisa Mari
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudy,a neChishanu vakaparura hurongwa hwavo hwepagore hwekushandiswa kwemari. Kunyange nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzakawanda dziri kutambira hurongwa uyu, vakawanda vanoti panoda garwa rakajeka kuitira kuti hupfumi hugadzirike. Chinangwa chaVaMangudya ndechekusimbaradza dhora remunyika range roramba richishaya simba. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vachiti Zimbabwe ikazvipira inokwanisa kubuda mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, vamwe vanoti nyika inenge huku yemurombo inokandirira mazai mumuti. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi inodzidzisa paDurban University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti pane zvakanaka nezvekaipa pane zvakaparurwa nmaVaMangudya. VaMugano vati hurongwa hwavo hwekusimbaradza musika wekutengeswa kwemari wakanaka sezvo uchiunza kugadzikana munyika. Asi vati havatenderane nehurongwa hwekuomesera makambani enharembozha anoitawo mamwe mabasa anoitwa nemabhanga akaita seEconent neNet One kuti asashande semabhanga achiwanisa vanhu mari. Vati kushomeka kwemari munyika uye kushaya simba kwedhora remunyika kunopa kuti zviomere veruzhinji. Vatiwo vari kumamisha vapinda panguva yakaoma Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti vanotambira hurongwa hwekuomesera makambani enharembozha vachiti ange okurudzira kutengeswa kwemari pamukoto zvange zvokanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi VaMuponda vatiwo zvakakosha kusimbaradza nyaya yekurima senzira yekusimbaradza hupfumi vachiti nyika iri kupedza mari yekunze yakawanda ichitenga zvinhu zvinogona kurimwa kana kugadzirwa munyika. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvepfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti hurongwa hwakaparurwa naVaMangudya hwakanaka vachiti zvikashanda zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu iderere asi ndokunge hurumende yasimbaradza nyaya yekugadzira zvinhu zvekutengesa kunze kwenyika. VaBhoroma vatiwo pane zvimwe zvinoda kuitwa kuti vanhu vave nechivimbo nehurongwa hweRBZ uhu vachiti chitsvambe chiri kbhanga iri kuti riratidze kuti rinoshandisa mari yekunze zvisina huori. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nematambudziko makukutu munyaya dzezvehupfumi kusanganisira kushaikwa kwemari, magetsi, mvura nezvimwe. Matambudziko aya awedzerwawo nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19 icho charura pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inovharwa kweMasvondo Matatu Kutanga neMuvhuro
text: Zimbabwe inoti ichange isingachabvumidze vanhu kubuda mudzimba dzavo kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro senzira yekuyedza kumisa kupararira kwaita chirwere cheCoronavirus pasi rose. Vachitaura neChishanu manheru pamusoro pematanho atorwa nehurumende yavo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vanhu vachange vachigara kudzimba dzavo kwemasvondo matatu kutanga neMuvhuro senzira yekudzivirira chirwere chiri kuita chamurambamhuru chichibata vanhu pasi rose. Chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu ezviuru kubva zvachaputika kuChina gore rapera, uye vanhu vanodarika makumi mana ezviuru, vafa pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba, uyo akashaya neMuvhuro muZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vati vashandi vemuzvipatara pamwe nevashandi vehurumende ndivo chete vachange vachibvumidzwa kuenda kumabasa avo. VaMnangagwa vati vose vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vachange vasingabvumirwe kuita izvi kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe, zvitoro zvichange zvichivhurwa kwemaawa mana pazuva; madutavanhu ose achange asingabvumidzwe kutakura vanhu kunze kweZupco chete. Zvitoro zvinobvumidzwa kuvhura ndezviya zvinotengesa chikafu, mishonga nemamwe mabhizinisi akakosha kuvanhu muhupenyu hwavo nguva dzose. VaMnangagwa vati mauto nemapurisa achange achifamba achiona kuti vanhu vagara kudzimba dzavo. Zimbabwe yakavhara miganhu yayo nemusi weMuvhuro, uye ikabhana kuungana kwevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu. Vanhu vashanu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba, uyo akavigwa nemusi weChipiri.

headline: Zim ine tarenda: Songani
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neVestri yekuIceland — Silas Songani — anoti vatambi vemuZimbabwe vane tarenda rinonwisa mvura uye anoshuvira kuona vakawanda vachitambira kuEurope.   Songani pari zvino ari munyika akamirira kudzokera kuIceland uko mwaka mutsva wenhabvu uchazotanga munaChivabvu.   Nhabvu yekuIceland inotanga munaChivabvu, yakasiyana nekune dzimwe nyika dzekuEurope sezvo kunyika iyi panguva ino kunenge kuchitonhora zvikuru.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Songani anoti munyika muno mune vatambi vakawanda vane tarenda rekutamba nhabvu.   “MuZimbabwe tine vatambi vakawanda vanotamba nhabvu zvinonwisa mvura zvekuti vanotokwana kuzvikwata zvakawanda zviri kuEurope. Asi nekuda kwezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA pamwe neCAF, zviri kutidzorera kumashure, dai nyaya iyi yagadziriswa nekuchimbidza.   “Sevatambi venhabvu, tikanotambirawo kunze kwenyika ndipo patinowanawo mari yekuchengeta nemhuri dzedu.   Muno zvikwata zvishoma zvinobhadhara, ndiko saka mutambi wese wenhabvu achishuvira kuenda kunze kwenyika.   “Manje kana takavharirwa sezvatakaitwa izvi, vatambi vakawanda vanopedzisira vaora mwoyo nekuti vakomana vanenge vane nzara, vamwe vavo vozopedzisira vamedzwa nezvinodhaka.   “Ngatikoshesei hupenyu neremangwana revatambi venhabvu,” anodaro.   Songani ave makore anodarika manomwe achitambira nhabvu yake kuEurope uko akambotambira kuDenmark kwenguva refu ari kuzvikwata zvakaita seSønderjyskE, Sydvest 05 neElverum.   Anoti vamiriri vevatambi vemuno ngavave vanhu vakavimbika vanomirira kodzero dzavo vovatsvagira zvikwata chaizvo zvekutambira kwete kukoshesa mari.   Songani anoti vatambi vazhinji tarenda ravo rakakanganiswa nevamiriri vavo avo vaivavimbisa zvinhu zvakawanda zvisina kuzoitika.   “Vamiriri vevatambi venhabvu ngavasanyepere vapfana nekuvavimbisa zvinhu zvisipo nekuti vanokonzeresa kuti vasvike pakuramwa nhabvu nekuda kwenhema dzavo zhinji.   “Mutambi wenhabvu munhu anoda kuraramisa mhuri yake nekuchengeta vabereki vake, asi manje kana muchivanyepera munenge muchitouraya remangwana rake.   “Ini ndakaita rombo rakanaka rekuti ndakashanda naMore Moyo mumiriri wangu uyo aikoshesa remangwana rangu.   Kune vaimbouya kwandiri vachindivimbisa zvinhu zvakawanda, asi ndakaramba ndakamira panaMoyo nekuti ndinoziva kwandakabva naye,” anodaro.   Songani kunyangwe hake akatambira kuEurope kwemakore akawanda, mutambi uyu haana kunyatsowana mukana wakakura wekutambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors sezvo akangokwanisa kutamba ka11 chete.   “Mutambi wenhabvu ishuviro yake kutambira nyika yake mitambo yakawanda, ini ndakakomborerwa kuti ndakatambira nyika yangu ka11 asi ndaidawo chaizvo kuitambira kakawanda.   “Varairidzi vairairidza chikwata chenyika ndivo vanoziva kuti sei vasina kundishevedza kakawanda uyewo ini handina daka nazvo nekuti pakupedzisira sechizvarwa chemuno, ndinoda kuona nyika yangu ichibudirira mumutambo wenhabvu ichisvika kure,” anodaro.   Songani anoenderera achiti: “Kana tave kutenderwa kutamba nhabvu senyika, ndichashanda nesimba kuti ndishevedzwe ndizotambira nyika yangu zvekare.”   Mutambi uyu anorumbidza zvikuru Norman Mapeza uyo waakashanda naye kuFC Platinum panguva yaakambodzoka kuzotambira nhabvu yake muno achibva kuDenmark asati aenda kuIceland.   Anoti Mapeza akamubika patsva zvekuti akashamisika kunzwa kuti atengwa neVestri yekuIceland.   “Mapeza ndinomurumbidza zvikuru nekuti akandibika patsva izvo zvakazozarura mukana wekuti ndiende kuIceland. Iye Mapeza pachake akatoshamisika kuti ndave kudzokera kuEurope akandikurudzira kuti ndishandise mukana uyu nemazvo wandakawana apo ndakatengwa neVestri,” anodaro.   Songani, uyo akambotambira Harare City neFC Platinum, ave nemakore 33 ekuberekwa uye anoti ave kutanga kuita gadziriro dzekusendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba nhabvu.   Anoti kana akasiya kutamba nhabvu, anoda kuzoita zvesports management.   “Nekugara kwandaita kuEurope, ndave kuzivana nevanhu vakawanda ikoko saka ndinoda kuvhurira mikana vatambi vakawanda vagouya kuzotambirawo nhabvu yavo kuEurope.   “Mikana yandakawana, ndinoda kuti vamwe vaiwanewo zvibatsire kuti nhabvu yedu munyika isimukire,” anodaro.

headline: Vakawanda muNyika Voisa Tarisiro paHurumende Ichaumbwa naVaMnangagwa
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka nekukurumidza munyika zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa VaEmmerson Mnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika mutsva. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vanoti dambudziko guru ranga ratarisana nenyika hutongi hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, hwavanoti veruzhinji kusanganisira dzimwe nyika, vainge vasisina chivimbo nahwo. Kunyange vashandi vemumakanzuru akawanda vainge vasisatambire mari dzemihoro, vanhu vachitadza kuwana mari dzavo kumabhangi ukuwo vashandi vehurumende vainge vasisazive zuva ravanotambira mari yavo zvairatidza kuti hurumende yakangaisina hurongwa hwekupedza matambudziko munyika nechimbichimbi. Mumwe mushandi wekanzuru yeKariba, VaFish Mucheza, avo vanoti vave negore nemwedzi mitatu vasingatambire, vane tarisiro yekuti vave kuzohora nekuda kwehutungamiri hutsva. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaPanashe Tsomondo, avo vane bhizinisi rekutengesa midziyo yekuvakisa, vanoti vari kutarisira kupera kwedambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari kumabhangi. Mumwe mugari wekuAlaska VaEdmore Mazarure vanotiwo vanhu vachanyatsoona kusiyana kwaVaMnangagwa naVaMugabe nekufambiswa kwesarudzo munyika. VaMazarure vanoti nyika ine nhorowondo yekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo nekudaro vanhu vakawanda vakatarisira shanduko pamabatirwo esarudzo, kubvira mukutsvaga rutsigiro, kana kuti ku campaigner, kusvika mukuburitswa kwezvinenge zvabuda musarudzo, kana kuti ma results. Vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika muChinhoyi VaJohn Marava vanoti vanhu vave netariro yakakura munaVaMnangagwa nekuti ivo nemauto vakakwanisa kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro izvo zvaidiwa neveruzhinji munyika zvinova zvakatadza kuitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika akaita seMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMarava vanoti kuperera kwaVaMnangagwa mubasa rekushandura hurumende kuchatanga kuonekwa pavachasarudza makurukota avo svondo rino. Nekuda kwekuparara kwezvinhu zvakawanda munyika zvinosanganisira hupfumi hwenyika, kushayikwa kwemabasa,kuparara kwezvivakwa nemigwagwa pamwe nenzara yanga yatekeshera munyika, vamwe vanoti VaMunangagwa vane mutoro wakakura nyika isati yaenda kusarudzo gore rinouya. Asi vamwe vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kupihwa mukana sezvo vatanga basa ravo zvakanaka nekushamwaridzana nenyika dzaivengwa naVaMugabe dzakaita seBritain neAmerica uye vanozivikanwa kuti vakatungamira chirongwa chemaguta, che Command Agriculture, zvakanaka gore rapera, izvo zvakapa varimi vakawanda goho rakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeChinhoyi Yotsamwisa Vatyairi veDzimotokari
text: Vazhinji vataura neStudio7 muChinhoyi vanoti nguva dzakawanda vanosungirwa kusapaka motokari zvakanaka vachiti panenge pasina mitsetse yakajeka pavanopaka motokari dzavo. Mumwe anetsana nemapurisa nhasi ndiMuzvare Agnes Chiwoko avo vanogara nekushanda kuSouth Africa. Muzvare Chiwoko vati pavamisa motokari yavo panga pasina mitsetse yanga yakajeka izvo zvaita kuti vabhadhariswe madhora makumi mashanu nematatu. Muzvare Chiwoko vati vashandi vekanzuru vari kuita huori vachiti vanoda kusunga motokari dzine manhamba ekune dzimwe nyika kuitira kuti vapihwe mari yechioko muhomwe. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari inotakura veruzhinji, VaTom Mbire, vati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadzirisa pekumisa motokari vasati vaita shave rekutora mari. VaAndrew Chisi vatiwo nzvimbo dzekumisa motokari iduku zvakanyanya uye mutsetse yacho haiwoneke vachiti nguva yavanopihwa kuti vamise motokari dzavo ipfupi padhora rimwechete paawa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeChinhoyi, VaTichaona Mlauzi, vati mapurisa ari kunzi ndeekanzuru haasi, vakati kanzuru yakapa basa iri kukambani yakazvimirira yeClina Investment. Asi VaMlauzi vati vachaongorora zvichemo zvevanhu sezvo kubata basa kwakaipa kwekambani iyi kuchisvibisa zita rekanzuru. Hatina kunzwa divi rekambani yeClina Investment sezvo mukuru wavo, VaBrian Michels, vanga vasinga davire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance neZanu PF Dzotatsurana paNyaya yeSarudzo neKuvandudzwa kweMitemo
text: Nyika yave kuziva kuti sarudzo dzekutsiva nhengo dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzuru dzakadzingwa kana kushaya, dzema by-election, dzave kuzoitwa muna Kurume wegore rinouya zvichitevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nezuro nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachitaura vari kumusangano wePolitiburo yebato ravo reZanu PF. Asi VaMnangagwa vakabuda pachena kuti hapanazve kuvandudzwa kuchaitwa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo, vachiti mudunhu reSADC rose Zimbabwe yakaisa kare mitemo yose ine chekuita nesarudzo mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Ukuwo, mamwe mapato anopikisa anosanganisira reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, anga achiti hurumende yakanga isingade kuita sarudzo dzema by-elections idzi ichihwanda nedenda reCOVID-19. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC-Alliance, Muzvare Ellen Shiriyedenga, vanoti sebato vagarawo vachiti mitemo yakawanda inobata sarudzo inofanirwa kuvandudzwa sezvakakurudzirwa nemasangano pamwe nemapoka akaongorora sarudzo dza2018 munyika. Muzvare Shiriyedenga vanotiwo zvakare komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo munyika yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inofanirwa kunge yakazvimirira pasina kupindira kwehurumende kana bato reZanu PF sezvavanoti zviri kuitika pari zvino. Asi mumwe wevechidiki veZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaAlex Gakanje, vanoti zvese zviri kutaurwa nemapato anopikisa kusanganisira MDC Alliance izvi kutungana kwembudzi sezvo zviri kubva kumapato ari kutya kupinda musarudzo nekuziva kuti anokundwa neZanu PF. VaGakanje vanoti hapana asingazive kuti sarudzo dzema by-election dzakamanikidzwa kusendekwa parutivi nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, vachiti Zimbabwe haifanirwe kumanikidzwa kuita sarudzo ichiisa hupenyu hwevanhu panjodzi sezviri kuonekwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita masarudzo, uko denda reCovid-19 rakakwira. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi, VanaChiremba, naVanaMukoti Voramwa Mabasa
text: Sangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ rinoti nhengo dzaro zhinji hadzina kuenda kumabasa nhasi zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti varairidzi vasaende kumabasa vachitsutsumwa kuhurumende nemari dzemihoro. ARTUZ inoti nhengo dzayo dzakawanda nhasi dzaswera dzichidziya mushana kudzimba dzisiri pabasa zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti nhengo dzaro dziramwe mabasa kubva nhasi kusvika neChishanu nepamusana pekushomeka kwemari dzemihoro dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende. Sachigaro weARTUZ mudunhu reHarare, VaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vasina kuenda kumabasa nhasi vanodarika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vatiwo vachatora matanho akasimbarara kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve isiri kuda kuvabhadhara nemadhora ekuAmerica. Zvichakadai, mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri kuGoromonzi mudunhu reMashonaland East, Amai Tinotenda Kahari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nhuna dzevarairidzi nekukasika kuitira kuti vana vasarasikirwe nedzidzo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri werimwe sangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatangawo kuramwa mabasa svondo rinouya. VaZhou vati sePTUZ vachataurawo nevemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi vose vehurumende kuti vaite muonerapamwe sechuma chemuzukuru. Mutungamiri weZIMTA VaRichard Gundani vanotiwo havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavhima vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti hurumende haikwanise kubhadhara varairidzi nemari yekunze kana kuvawedzera maRTGS parizvino. Vati zvakawanda zvine chekuita nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro yevashandi vehurumende tibvunze kugurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube avo vatisina kukwanisa kubata panharembozha yavo. Mutauriri weHealth Apex Council VaPanganai Chivese vanoti vanachiremba, vanamukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vatotanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro. Vati vashandi vakawirirana kuenda kumabasa kaviri pazuva asi vachiita zvekuchinjana. Vayambira kuti hurumende ikasagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo havasi kuenda kubasa vose svondo rinouya. Vati health Services Board iyo tisina kubata yati hurumende yakanzwa chichemo chavo uye iri kuyedza kuchigadzirisa. Sangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasipasi anofanira kutambiriswa mazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiwedzerwa mutengo muyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaTrump Voraswa neMamwe Maseneta eBato Ravo
text: Zvinhu hazvina kumirira zvakanaka kumutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, zvichitevera mashoko nezviri kuitwa nevanhu vebato ravo, reRepublican Party, muparamende yeAmerica. Bepanhau reNew York Times rinoti mutungamiri wenhengo dzedare reSenate, dze Republican Party, VaMitch Mcconnell, vaudza bepanhau iri kuti VaTrump vakapara mhosva dzinofanirwa kutongwa. Svondo rapera, vatsigiri vaVaTrump vakapinda zvechisimba mudare reCongress yeAmerica vakapwanya misuwo, mahwindo, matafura nemacheya vachitsvaka mutevedzeri waVaTrump, VaMike Pence, pamwe chete nenhengo dzeparamende idzo dzakazvivharira mune dzimwe dzimba dzikavanda pasi pamatafura. Vamamwe vatsigiri vaVaTrump vanoti zvinotaurwa nemukuru wavo zvekuti sarudzo dzakabirwa ndezvechokwadi. Imwe nhengo yedare reSenate, Amai Liz Cheney, vakati nhasi Chitatu, vachavhota kuti VaTrump vatongwe neparamende pamusoro pemhosva dzavanonzi vakapara mukukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vakonzere mhirizhonga paCapital Hill nemusi weChitatu pakafa vanhu vashanu. VaTrump vari kuramba vachiti vakabirwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika kunyange hazvo matare edzimhosva makumi matanhatu akarasa zvichemo zvaVaTrump achiti hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti sarudzo yakabirwa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vari mugari wemu Washington D.C. Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato raVaTrump sezvo makambani mazhinji abuda pachena achiti haachapi mari kunhengo dzebato iri dzakakwikwidza kuti VaJoe Biden vakasarudzwa nevanhu pasina kubirirwa kwakaitwa. Makambani eSocial Media mazhinji, anosanganisa Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Google nemamwe akavhara kuti VaTrump vasashandisa madandemutande awo. Doctor Guni vanoti mapurisa ari kushanda zvine simba kuitira kuti pakugadzwa nemusi weChitatu kwaVa Biden, pasave nebongozozo serakaonekwa svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vofarira Hurongwa Hunokweretesa Mari Midziyo Ichiitwa Chibatiso
text: Vemabhizinesi madiki nemamwe achiri kusimukira vanoti vari kufara nechirongwa chebhanga guru renyika chekuti vakwanise kukwereta mari vachishandisa midziyo yavo sechibatiso. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wezuva rimwe chete wapindwa nevamabhizinesi madiki uyo waitirwa kwaMutare. Vachitaura mushure memusangano uyu, mumwe muzvinabhizinesi, VaSondon Mugaradzoko, vati danho riri kutorwa nebhanga guru renyika richishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Association of Micro Finance Institutions, Zamfi, richabatsira zvikuru, sezvo mabhanga mazhinji achiomesera mabhizinesi madiki kana achida kukwereta mari kumabhanga aya. Mumwe apindawo mumusangano uyu, VaPeter Mavhiri, vatiwo kushandiswa kwezvipfuyo kunopa kuti vekumaruwa vakwanise kukwereta sezvo vasina maTitle Deeds pazvivakwa zvavo. Mukuru we Zamfi, Va Godfrey Chitambo, vanoti sangano ravo, iro rine nhengo zana neshanu, rakatanga hurongwa uhu mushure mekunge raona matambudziko ari kusangana nevemabhizinesi madiki ekuti vawane mari yekusimudzira mabasa avo apo vanenge vasina zvibatiso zvinodikanwa. Mumiriri webhanga guru renyika pamusangano uyu, Amai Grace Chiromo, vati kurerutsa kuwanikwa kwezvikwereti kuchapa budiriro munyika. Vatiwo vari mushishi kuti pave nemutemo wekutambira zvibatiso zvitsva izvi kuitira kuti zvicherechedzwe pazvibvumirano zvekukweretesana. Vanhu vangangosvika makumi manomwe vapinda mumusangano uyu, uye mumwe musangano wakadai uchaitwa kuMasvingo neBulawayo svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Take Money orongera Munoz
text: SHASHA yetsiva yeWorld Boxing Council (WBC) Female Super-bantamweight – Kudakwashe ‘Take Money’ Chiwandire – oenda kuSouth Africa kunosimbaradza gadziriro dzemutambo waakatarisana nawo naZulina Munoz wekuMexico.   Svondo radarika, Take Money akapihwa rutsigiro nekambani yeKGK Logistics iyo iri kumubhadharira mari yendege kuenda kuSouth Africa nepekugara panguva yaanenge achiita gadziriro dzake kunyika iyi.   Take Money naMunoz vari kutarisirwa kurwa nemusi wa27 Nyamavhuvhu kuHarare International Conference Centre (HICC).   Chiwandire anoti rubatsiro rwaakapihwa rwekuti aende kuSouth Africa kunoita gadziriro dzake ruchabatsira zvikuru uye ndokupa chivimbiso chekuti achashanda nesimba kuti agochengetedza bhande rake.   “Handina neremuromo, asi kungotenda chete masangano ese ari kuuya achindibatsira mugadziriro dzangu ndakatarisana nemutambo wangu mukuru uri kutevera naZulina Munoz.   “Zvakandikoshera zvikuru kuona ndichirangarirwa uye ndinofara chaizvo nekuti kusimudzirwa kwemwanasikana.   Saka ndinopa kutenda kukuru nerutsigiro urwu, dai zvikaramba zvakadaro.   “Ndinovimbisa kuti ndichashanda nesimba kuti bhande rangu randinaro rirambe riri muno risabude, mureza wenyika yedu yeZimbabwe urambe uchisimudzirwa,” anodaro Take Money.   Murairidzi pamwe namaneja wake – Clyde Musonda – anoti vakaronga mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda iyo Chiwandire achanotamba kuSouth Africa nevatambi veko izvo zvichamubatsira zvikuru mugadziriro dzake.   Anoti kuenda naChiwandire kunze kwenyika kunoita gadziriro kunopa mutambi uyu nguva yekuti angofunge zvegadziriro dzake pasina zvimwe zvinomukanganisa.   “Tangosarirwa nemwedzi mumwe chete kuti mutambo uchisvika. Saka zvakakosha kuti nguva yatiri ino Take Money anyatsoita gadziriro dzake munzvimbo yakasununguka isina chinomukanganisa.   “Naizvozvo tinotenda hama dzedu dzatibatsira kuti tigoenda kuSouth Africa uko tichanoita gadziriro dzedu kusvika tidzoke kuzosangana naMunoz. Takaronga mitambo yakawanda ichaona Take Money achisangana nevatambi vetsiva vekuSouth Africa vakasiyana izvo zvichibatsira gadziriro dzake.   “Munoz tinomuziva kuti ishasha asi isu tichamurakidzawo kuti Chiwandire ishashawo zvekare uye bhande redu harisi kuzobva muno, richasara muno,” anodaro Musonda.   Chiwandire akahwina bhande reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight mushure mekukunda Cathrine Phiri wekuZambia mwedzi yadarika.   Izvi zvakabva zvaona vatambi vakawanda vekunyika dzakasiyana vachida kusangana naye kusvika iye nechikwata chake vazosarudza Munoz.   Akakunda Munoz, anenge ave kukwanisa kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu opihwa mukana wekurwira bhande reWBC Super Bantamweight Gold iro rina Yamileth Mercado wekuMexico zvakare.

headline: Vane Vana Matsi Vonetsekena neZvikwanisiro
text: Vabereki vane vana vane hurema hwekusanzwa kana kuti matsi vari kukurudzira bazi rezvehutano kuti rivabatsire nezvikwanisiro, kana kuti hearing aids, kuitira kuti vana vavo vakwanisewo kudzidza sevamwe vana muzvikoro pasina dambudziko. Vabereki vakawanda vanoti kuongororwa kwevanhu vane hurema hwekusanzwa kunodhura zvokuti vazhinji vavo havakwanise kuendesa vana vavo kunaana chiremba kuti vanorapwa hurwere uhwu husati hwakomba. Amai Tsitsi Nlabati vekuMasvingo vanoti mwana wavo, uyo anemakore mapfumbamwe, anonzwira kure mazwi anotaurwa zvokuti vakashaya mari yokutenga ma hearing aids izvo zviri kudzosera kumashure budiriro yehupenyu hwemwana wavo. Amai Nlabati vanoti vakavimbiswa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano kuti mwana wavo aisafanira kuenda kuzvikoro zvinodzidza vana vanorarama nehurema nokuti vainge vaine chivimbo chekuti mwana aizokwanisa kuita zvakanaka kana akatengerwa ma hearing aids. Baba Kizito Chirenje vekuMurombedzi, kwaZvimba vanoti vane dambudziko zvakare remwana wavo uyo akambotengerwa ma hearing aids neimwe hama yavo yakambogara mhiri yemakungwa asi akadimburwa dimburwa kaviri kose nevamwe vana vaida kuziva kuti chii chaaipfekera munzeve. Baba Chirenje vanoti hama yavo yakadzoka kumusha nokudaro havachakwanisa kuwana mamwe ma hearing aid nokuti anonzi anotengwa nemari yekuAmerica iyo vasingakwanisi kuwana. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvehutano muparamende, Dr Ruth Labode, vanoti bazi rehutano harina mari yokutengera mwana wese mahearing aids nokudaro vabereki ava vanofanira kubatsirwa nemadhona ayo anopemha mari kunze kwenyika. Dr Labode vanoti hurumende yakaomerwa panguva ino zvokuti iri kutoshayawo mari yokutenga mishonga ine mitengo iri pasi pasi inofanira kubatsira varwere muzvipatara. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutauro wemaoko mubazi rezvehutano, Amai Cecilia Nleya, vanoti pane chirongwa chokuti mwana wese anozvarwa atange kuongororwa kana paine hurema waanenge ainahwo kuitira kuti vazokwanisa kubatsira vana ava pavanenge vachikura zvinoenderana nekuremara kwavo. Asi Dr Labode vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vana ivava kana vawanikwa vaine hurema hwakadaro, hapana zvakanyanya zvinokwanisika kuitwa kuvana ava nokuti mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika haana kumira zvakanaka. Tsvagurudzo yakaitwa nebazi rehutano inoratidza kuti pavanhu miriyoni imwe chete yevanhu vanorarama nehurema hwakasiyana siyana, pakaonekwa kuti vanhu zviuri zana nemakumi maviri, vanhu vasinganzwe kana kutaura. Zimbabwe yakasaina chibvumirano cheUnited Nations Conventions on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities mugore 2013, asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo pamwe nehutano dzinoti zviga zveUnited Nations izvi hazvisati zvaiswa mumitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zec Inovhara Mahofisi Ayo kweMasvondo Maviri Zvichitevera Kubatwa neCovid-19 kweVanhu Vakawanda Kusanganisira Vashandi Vayo
text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, inoti iri kuvhara mahofisi ayo kwemasvondo maviri kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro unouya zvichitevera kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19, kusanganisirawo vamwe vashandi veZec. Muchiziviso chayo kune veruzhinji sachigaro weZec, Justice Priscilla Chigumba, vati mahofisi avo ese munyika achavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Amai Chigumba vati danho ravatora rakanangana nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZec, VaUtoile Silaigwana, vaudza Studio7 kuti danho iri rakanangana nekuchengetedza vashandi vekomisheni pamwe nevavhoti. Vati komisheni haisi kuvhara mahofisi zvachose uye paichavhura mwedzi unouya, munhu wese anokodzera kuvhota anofanira kunyoresa. Vati vashandi vekomisheni yavo vachange vachishanda vari kumba vachiita basa ravo semazuva ose. Asi mutungamiriri weDemocratic Party, Dr Wurayayi Zembe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zec inofanira kushandisa michina yechizvinozvino kuitira kuti vanhu varambe vachinyoresa kuvhota kunyange kuine denda reCovid-19. Asi VaSilaigwana vati Zec ine tarisiro yekushandisawo michina yechizvino zvino pakunyoresa vanhu kuti vavhote, asi pari zvino mutemo hauvabvumidze kuita izvi. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reResource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibhunu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho ratorwa neZec rakanaka, asi vakati Zec inofanirawo kutaura nevamwe isati yatora matanho akadai. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vati nyaya dzesarudzo dzinoda kuti vanhu vashande pamwe kunyange kuine Covid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubato reZanu PF sezvo mushandi mukuru muchikamu chekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Zec iri kushorwa nenyaya yekutadza kuita sarudzo dzema by-elections panguva iyo dzimwe nyika dziri kuita sarudzo asi pachitevedzwa mitemo inobata chirwere cheCovid-19. Zec pachayo inoti inokwanisa kuita sarudzo idzi nguva ipi zvayo asi yakabatwa nemutemo wehurumende wekudzivirira Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Vatori veNhau Vocherechedza Zuva reKuremekedzwa kweKodzero Dzavo Vachiti muZimbabwe Vari Kushungurudzwa
text: Vatori venhau neMuvhuro vakacherechedza zuva rekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzavo kana kuti World Press Freedom Day vachichema chema kuti makore makumi matatu mushure mechibvumirano chekuWindoek Declaration vachiri kushanda vakamanikidzika munyika. Mumwe mutori wenhau, VaEliah Ntali vaudza Studio 7 kuti chibvumirano chakaitwa kunyika yeNamibia muWindhoek, chinozivikanwa nekuti Windhoek Declaration chinokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka hachisati chazadzikiswa munyika vachipa muenzaniso wekusungwa nekumbunyikidzwa kwevatori venhau. Mumwe mutori wenhau John Cassim atsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti pakapidigurwa hurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe nemauto muna 2017, zvinhu zvakamboita nani pakapinda VaEmmerson Mnangagwa panyanga asi iko zvino hazvichisina kumira zvakanaka. Mukuru we Media Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe kana kuti Misa-Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vatiwo basa rekutapwa kwenhau harisi kufamba zvakanaka vachitiwo vatapi venhau vari kushungurudzwa, kusungwa uye kune dzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica vari kuurayiwa. VaMoyo vatiwo panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 vatapi venhau vanofanirwa kupiwa zvinovadzivirira pavanenge varikubasa vakarumbidza hurumende yeZimbabwe nekutenda kuisa vatori venhau pavanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba. VaMoyo vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuisa mitemo inokurudzira kufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka vakatiwo mitemo irikuda kuiswa yakadai seCybersecurity and data protection Bill inodzorera shure kufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka Mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations (ZACRAS), Muzvare Vivenne Marara vakurudzirawo hurumende nevatori venhau kuti vawanise veruzhinji ruzivo rwakakwana kuti vatore matanho akakosha muhupenyu vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. Vatori venhau vemuZimbabwe vanotiwo chirwere cheCovid-19 chasiya vazhinji vavo vave parumananzombe sezvo mamwe makambani enhau onetsekana kubhadhara vashandi. Mugwaro ravo rekucherechedza WPFD, Amnesty International yatiwo kumabudazuva nekuchamhembe kweAfrica vatori venhau vari kumbunyikidzwa izvo zvosanganawo nedenda reCovid-19 . Amnesty International yati Zimbabwe irikushungurudzawo vatori venhau kuburikidza nekusungwa pamwe nekukanganiswa pakushanda. Mumwe mutori wenhau wekuManicaland, Sydney Saize akasungwa mugovera achiita basa rake. Asi hurumende iri kuramba mashoko ekuti iri kushungurudza vatori venhau ichiti iri kutoisa mitemo yekurerutsira vatori venhau. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane mitemo yakawanda yadzikwa kurerutsira vatori venhau. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau, rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti hurumende inofanira kumisa tsika yekumbunyikidza kodzero dzevatori venhau sezvo zvichikanganisa nyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. Zuva reWorld Press Freedom Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa 3 Chivabvu gore rega rega uye gore rino ririkucherechedzwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukosha kwekuburitswa kwemashoko kuruzhinji kana kuti “information as a public good." No media source currently available

headline: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voratidzira neKurara neKuswera muAfrica Unity Square
text: Nhengo dzemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Occupy Africa Unity Square Movement neZimbabwe Women in Politics Alliance, dzakabatana nevamwe vana veZimbabwe, dziri kurara pamwe nekuswera muAfrica Unity Square dzichiratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Muzvare Tendayi Lynnette Mudehwe vanoti vari kurara pamwe nekuswera munzvimbo iyi senzira yekuratidzira kusafara kwevana veZimbabwe nezvavanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekusateerera vanhu. “Tiri kuda kutaura nyaya dzatinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe igadzirise nekukurumidza, zvakaita senyaya dzeupfumi, matongerwo enyika pamwe nekurarama kwevanhu,” Muzvare Mudehwe vanodaro. Vanoti vakaona kuti nyaya yekuratidzira zvezuva rimwe chete hainyatsoburitsi zvinyunyuto zvavo, saka vakafunga zvekuti vangogarira panzvimbo kwemazuva aya. “Takasarudza mazuva gumi nematanhatu kuitira kuti zvinangane nezuva rakakosha munhoroondo yeSouth Africa neAfrica yose, reDay of the African Child, apo tinocherechedza mwana weAfrica,” vanowedzera Muzvare Mudehwe. Vanoti vakatanga kurara munzvimbo iyi usiku hwemusi weChipiri uye havasati vasangana nematambudziko kubva kumapurisa, asi vanoti vanotarisira kuti vanogona kuzokanganiswa. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVari Kufa neCovid-19 Hwoderara Asi Nyanzvi Dzinoti Haisi Nguva yeKupemberera
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchiderera, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasarivare nekuti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvakare zvine hukasha. Nemusi weChina mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano Dr Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachitevedzera kurudziro iri kupihwa yekuzvidzivirira nekupfeka mamamasiki, kugeza maoko, kusaita magungano nezvimwe. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Heath, VaItai Rusike, vatsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti vanhu vanofanira kuramba vakangwarira kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 3,7million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nezvitanhatu zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 96, 732. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 3, 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. North Africa ine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni nemanomwe kana kuti 107 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana nemakumi manomwe nechimwe kana kuti 471 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 27 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 2,3 million. Vapora pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu ana kuti 60 million. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshushikana neKuwanda kweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text:
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStuduio7 kuChiredzi vanoti huwandu huri kubudiswa hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 kwemazuva mana apfuura huri kuvatyisa sezvo guta iri raramba riri roga rine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe maguta mudunhu rose reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMasvingo dziri kubuda dzisina kana munhu
mumwe chete anobatwa nechirwere ichi panoongororwa vanhu zuva nezuva. Musi wechipiri 8 Chikumi pavanhu gumi nemumwe vakawanikwa vaine
chirwere ichi mudunhu rose reMasvingo, vapfumbamwe vaiva vekuChiredzi
vaviri vari vemudhorobha reMasvingo. Musi weChitatu 9 Chikumi, pavanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa neCovid-19 mudunhu rose, vese vaiva vekuChiredzi uye nezuro musi wa 10 Chikumi, vanhu vapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vose ndeve kuChiredzi.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTsvovani, VaMalcom Mugodzwa, vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo.

Mumwewo mugari wemumusha wekwa Zava, VaTiyani Chauke, vanofunga kuti guta ravo riri pedyo nemazambuko ekuenda kunyika dze South Africa neMozambique uko vagari vanobira zvisiri pamutemo nekudaro vanogona
kuuya nechirwere ichi.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Nyasha Sigauke vachiti ivo hurumende
inofanira kuona kuti vanochengetedza mitemo vapinda mumisha
yemudhorobah iri kuitirakuti vanhu vatevedzere zvisungo zvekuti chirwere
ichi chaisapararire.

Hurumende yati iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kuri kuita chirwere ichi
muChiredzi kunyange hazvo kusati kwave nemunhu arasikirwa nehupenyu.

Mukuru webasa mubazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vanoti hurumende iri kuita tsvakurudzo yekuti ione kuti chi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwechirwere ichi muChiredzi. Asi mutauriri wekomiti yeCovid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati kukwira uku kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kubva kwakasiyana siyana vachinotsvaga mabasa ekukohwa nzimbe muminda yeTongaart Hullert nevamwe varimi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yese, uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere munyika yose vave zviuru makumi matatu
nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, 39 496. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, 1 626. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri vakaibawa nhomba
yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevavviri 690 452. Vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemamkumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete 4 991 vakabaiwa homba yepiri nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa
vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiiri pa zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumambawe nezvipfumamwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 399 054. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, 60%,
zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere
cheCovid-19. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iine chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuchanetsa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutadza kubayiwa nhomba yekutanga munzvimbo dzakawanda, sezvo nhomba idzi dziri kushaikwa mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yeAmerica yazivisa kuti ichabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 inotangira pamamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora kusvika pazana nemakumi
mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Kusapa Bazi rezveHutano Mari KweMakore Akawanda Kunonzi Kwopa Kuti Kurwisa Coronavirus Kunetse.
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yasvitsa makore makumi mana yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvaburitswa pachena nenyaya yechirwere checoronavirus. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 kusanganisira nyanzvi munezvehutano vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Pepukai Shava vanoti kunyangwe haazvo nyika yakakwanisa kuvaka zvipatara mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere, zvipatara izvi zvangove midhuri isisina zvinhu zvakakosha zvekushandisa. Mutungamiri webato reLabour Economists African Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kusimudzira nyaya dzezvehutano munyika zvopa kuti kana kurwisa chirwere checoronavirus kunetsa nekuti zvipatara hazvina zvikwanisiro zvakaita semichina yekubatsira vanhu kufema kana varwarisa. Vatiwo zvingabatsire kana nyika ikaisa mutemo unosungira kuti vatungamiriri vehurumende varapwe munyika vakati izvi zvinogona kubatsira kusimudzirwa kwezvipatara munyika. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaKudzai Kwangwari avo vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo zviripowo zvakagonekwa nenyika mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere vati kune zvizhinjiwo zvichiri kuda kuzadzikiswa vakati izvi zvinosanganisirawo nyaya yehutano. Munyori musangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo mumakore ekutanga Zimbabwe ichangosungunuka, hurumende yakamboedza kusimudzira zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano kusanganisira kuvaka makirinika. Asi vanoti makore makumi maviri apfuura, Zimbabwe yatadza kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya yezvehutano kuburikidza nekusapiwa mari yakawanda kubazi rezvehutano. VaMatara vati kunyangwe hazvo nyika dzemuAfrica dzakanyorerana pasi chibvumirano cheAbuja Declaration icho chinosungira hurumende kuti iise zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvemari yebhajeti yenyika kune zvehutano, Zimbabwe haina gore rayakambozadzikisa zvinotarisirwa izvi. VaMatara vanotiwo kusaisa mari yakakwana kubazi rezvehutano zvinobudawo kunyangwe panguva ino nyika iri kurwisa chirwere cheCOVID-19 vachiti bazi rezvehutano rakatora nguva kuwana mari chirwere chapinda munyika izvo zvakaita kuti zvizhinji zvaidiwa kushandiswa zvibve kune masangano ekunze kwete kuhurumende. Vanomirira Chinhoyi mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeMDC Doctor Peter Matarutse vanoti kunyangwe hazvo nyika yakakwanisa kudzivirira zvirwere zvakaita se Kwashiorkor, T.B nezvimwewo kuondomoka kwehupfumi munyika kwasiya zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehutano. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano Dr Obadiah Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaEnergy Mutodi vati hurumende iri kuyedza napose painogona kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano. Nyaya yechirwere checoronavirus iri kuburitsa pachena kuti zvinhu munyanya dzezvehutano zvaderera uye zvipatara zvizhinji hazvina zvikwanisiro uye midhuri yacho yave kuondomoka. No media source currently available

headline: Dai nhabvu yachidzoka: Mugadza
text: MURAIRIDZI weHarare City Queens neMighty Warriors Under-20, Rosemary Mugadza, anoti asuwa zvikuru kurairidza mutambo wenhabvu yevanhukadzi zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Mugadza anoti chishuwo chake ndechekuti kudai mariro ezvinhu adzikama maringe nechirwere ichi kuitira kuti mitambo ichitanga kuitwa zvakare.   “Zvinhu zvese zvakamira panguva ino uye isu tiri mune zvemitambo tiri kuchema kunyanya nekuti mutambo uyu ndiwo unotiraramisa hupenyu hwedu.   “Zvese takungozvisiira mumaoko aMwari nekuti ndivo vane mhinduro yezvinhu zvese uye vachatitungamira muhupenyu hwedu kusvika takunda chirwere ichi.  Tave kuda kudzokera kuhupenyu hwedu hwekare hwatange tajaira,” anodaro Mugadza.   Mugadza, uyo anozivikanwa nekumbotambira zvikwata zvakaita seZimbabwe Saints Ladies neHighlanders Royals, anoti ari kupota achitarisa vatambi vezvikwata zvake zviviri — Mighty Warriors U20 neHarare City Queens — achida kuziva kuti vari kugara sei uye kuti vari kumboitawo here gadziriro vega kudzimba dzavo.   Anoti vatambi vechidiki vechisikana venhabvu vakasiyana nevakomana nekuti kana vari kudzimba kuita gadziriro kunonetsa sezvo vanenge vave kumboita mabasa epamba.   “Vasikana kana vave kudzimba kuita gadziriro kwacho kunonetsa nekuti vanenge vakumboita mabasa epamba vachinzi zvenhabvu izvo imbosiyana nazvo tozozviona kana yatanga.  Manje mutambi wenhabvu haadi izvozvo anofanirwa kugara achigadzirira nguva nenguva.   “Saka tinenge tichikurukura navo paWhatsApp tichivaudza zvekuti vaite vari kudzimba kwavo kana vapedza havo kuita mabasa epamba,” anodaro.   Chikwata chemaMighty Warriors U20 change chichifanirwa kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwikwi eWorld Cup kuCosta Rica gore rinotevera asi mitambo iyi yakambomiswa nesangano reCAF nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Zimbabwe Yoramba Kuti Yakatumira Mauto kuMozambique Kunorwisa Vanotsigira ISIS
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko vanick mangwana vari kuramba runyerekupe rwekuti Zimbabwe yakatumira mauto kuMozambique kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero vachitsigira chikwata cheIslamic State kana kuti ISIS. Vanopfurikidza mwero ava vari mudunhu reCao Delgado pedyo nemuganhu wenyika yeTanzania. Vanhu vanodarika churu chimwe chete vafa muMozambique nekuda kwehondo iyi. Nemusi weChishanu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanova sachigaro webazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika dzemuSADC kana kuti SADC Organ on Politics and Defense vakaenda kunoita hurukuro nemutungamiri weMozambique VaFilipe Nyusi nezvekusagadzikana kwenyika iyi. Asi VaMangwana vari kuramba mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe yakatotumira mauto. ​Vanoti kana Zimbabwe ichida kuita izvi mune remangwana inotoita pasi peSADC. No media source currently available Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato rinopikisa reMDC VaInnocent Gonese vanova gweta vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa havakwanise kuita zano ndega vachitumira mauto kune imwe nyika vasina kusuma dare reparamende uye kana vakaita fungira mumoyo rwendo rwembwa vanofanira kusuma dare iri nechimbichimbi. No media source currently available

headline: Tinogona kutora ‘coach’ wekunze: ZIFA
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu yemuno reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) rinoti rinogona kugadza mumwezve murairidzi wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors wekunze kana wemuno kuti agotsiva Zdrvako “Loga” Logarusic uyo akadzingwa basa kutanga kwesvondo rino.   Zvichitevera kudzinga kwavakaita Loga basa, ZIFA iri pakati pekutsvaga murairidzi wekutsiva chizvarwa chekunyika yeCroatia ichi, icho chakakwanisa kurairidza mitambo 14 chete yemaWarriors ndokuhwinha mumwe chete.   Pari zvino ZIFA ichambogadza murairidzi anongofanobata chigaro ichi kwekanguva kadiki uyo vachapa basa rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo yemwedzi unotevera apo achange achirwirira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar World Cup. Mutungamiriri weZifa – Felton Kamambo – anoti ZIFA yatanga basa rekutsvaga murairidzi anotsiva Loga.   “Zvichitevera kupesana kwatakaita naLoga, veruzhinji vangade kuziva kuti tinogona kugadza mumwe murairidzi wemaWarriors anove chizvarwa chekunze kwenyika asi hunge kana ane magwaro akakwana uye akatifadza patinoita hurukuro naye.   “Iye zvino tave kushambadza basa iri tichitsvaga murairidzi mutsva anouya kuzotungamira chikwata chedu. “Saka basa iri tinogona kungopa chero murairidzi, angave wemuno kana wekunze anenge atifadza ane zvatiri kutsvaga ndiye achapinda panyanga,” anodaro Kamambo.   ZIFA yainge yambovimbisa kuzivisa murairidzi achafanobata chigaro ichi musi weChipiri svondo rino usati wadarika asi haina kuzoita saizvozvo.   Mumitambo 14 iyo Loga akarairidza maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mumwe chete, ndokuita mangange mishanu uye ndokukundwa misere.   Zvisinei, asiya maWarriors abudirira kuenda kumitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iyo ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuCameroon. Asi, asiyawo chikwata chenyika ichi chiri pasi muGroup G murwendo rwekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World Cup apo chiine chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo miviri yachatamba kusvika pari zvino.   Mwedzi unotevera, maWarriors achasangana neGhana mumitambo miviri yakatevedzena yekurwira kuenda kuQatar iyo vanofanirwa kuhwina kuti varambe vaine mukana.

headline: ‘Joshua, Wilder votyanana’
text: akapa chikwata chaDeontay Wilder kusvika pakupera kwevhiki rino kuti mutambi wavo agorwa naAnthony Joshua kana kuti osiyana nazvo voronga zvavo mumwe mutambo naAlexander Povetkin muna Gunyana. Hurukuro dziri kuitwa dzekuronga mutambo uyu pakati pevatambi vaviri ava – Joshua naWilder – avo vasati vambokundwa muboka reheavyweight.   Baba vaHearn, Barry, akatombosangana nevamiriri vaWilder Shelly Finkel kuNew York masvondo adarika kuti vapedzise hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu waJoshua uyo ane mabhande eIBF, WBA neWBO kuti asangane naWilder uyo ane bhande reWBC.   Asi iye zvino Hearn (Jnr) anoti mukana wekuti mutambo uyu uitwe gore rino mudiki sezvo vave kutarisira kuti Joshua arwe naPovetkin muna Gunyana.   Izvi zvinoreva kuti mutambo waJoshua naWilder, uyo uchaburitsa mutambi mumwe achazobata mabhande mana makuru mutsiva, uchambomirwa kuitwa kusvika muna Kukadzi 2019.   Hearn anoti, “Baba vangu vakasangana naShelly uye vave kugara vachikurukura. Vakasangana svondo radarika musi weChishanu, uye vakatitumira mashoko padandemutande musi weMuvhuro mangwanani saka tiri kuvapindura. “Ndinofunga kuti tichazvigadzirisa asi WBA iri kugara ichitibvunza zuva nezuva kuti tave papi uye isu tiri kugara tichiwedzera mazuva ehurukuro acho.” – Sportmail Boxing

headline: Sikandar odzoka kuzc
text: MUTAMBI wecricket, Sikandar Raza, akasarudzwa kuti agove muchikwata cheZimbabwe Cricket icho chichaenda kunokwikwidza neBangladesh mumitambo mitatu yeone day international uye nemiviri yetest match.   Asi achange asiri muchikwata chemaChevrons icho chiri kuSouth Africa kunokwikwidza mumitambo yakasiyana iri kutanga svondo rino musi weSvondo.   Shasha iyi yange isina kusarudzwa kuti iende kunomirira maChevrons zvichitevera nyaya dzake dzekondirakiti dzainetsa, asi zvakazogadziriswa apo pakaitwa hurukuro pakati pake neZimbabwe Cricket contracts committee svondo rino.   Raza akatsanangura mamiriro aive akaita nyaya yake uye akakumbira ruregerero ndokuzvipira kumirira Zimbabwe mumitambo inotevera.   Apo maChevrons akasimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa kare kunokwikwidza mumitambo mitatu yeODI iyo ichange ichitambirwa kuKimberley uye neyeTwenty20, vanosarudza chikwata ichi vakaronga kuti vamusiye asi vachizomusarudza pakuenda kuBangladesh.    “Ndine mufaro mukuru nezvakaitika izvi uye ndinopa kutenda kuZC iyo yakwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzangu.   “Ndinoda kusiyana nenyaya iyi ndotanga kuita zvekuti nditambe cricket yangu kwete kufunga zvakawanda,” anodaro Raza.   Akafanobata chigaro chamanaging director weZC –  Givemore Makoni – anoti anotambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka kwaRaza muchikwata ichi.   “Tine mufaro mukuru kuti takakwanisa kuwirirana naSikandar uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vedu vepamusoro. Tinomutambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka muchikwata chedu uye tinovimba kuti patichaenda naye kuBangladesh nemimwe mitambo achatibatsira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Masvondo adarika, Raza akabuda pachena kuti akange asiri kuzotambira maChevrons kumitambo yeSouth Africa neBangladesh zvichitevera kusapihwa kondirakiti itsva neZC izvo akatumira pandemutande rake retwitter.

headline: pe yakahwapura mukombe
text: CHIKORO chePrince Edward ndicho chakahwapura mukombe wemakwikwi eDairyboard Rugby Schools Festival ayo akaitirwa muHarare svondo rapera.   Prince Edward yakakunda Churchill Boys 16-10 mufainari yainakidza kukunda ngoma kurira.   Tawanda Jimu – uyo anove Dairyboard Rugby Schools Festival Tournament director – anoti makwikwi aya akakosha sezvo vachiashandisa kutsvaga nyanzvi dzemangwana dzichazomirira nyika pamwe nezvikwata zvikuru zvemutambo uyu.   Anoti makwishu egore rino akarakidza kuti mutambo werugby wakura zvikuru uye uri kutambwa muzvikoro, vachitarisa zvikwata zvakawanda zvakauya kuzokwikwidza zvevakomana nevasikana.   “Tichiongorora zvikwata zvese zvakauya, takazviona kuti mutambo uyu uri kuramba uchikura uye uchisimudzira vatambi pamwe nezvikwata zvakawanda.   “Zvimwe zvikwata zvaizviona sezvikuru iye zvino zvave kuzviona zvega kuti hazvingohwine dambe nekuti zvimwe zvekumamisha chaizvo zvaitozvikunda zvichitamba rugby yepamusoro, inonwisa mvura,” anodaro Jimu.   Anoenderera mberi achiti mutambo uyu uripo pakupa mukana kuvatambi verugby kubva kuzvikoro zvakasiyana kuti vagosimukire kusvika padanho rave naTendai “The Beast” Mtawarira uyo anotambira maSpringboks eSouth Africa.   “Chishuvo chedu kuti titsvage mumwe Beast kuburikidza nemutambo uyu ndiko saka uchiitwa gore negore kuti vatambi ava vawane mukana wekusvika kure.   “Tinoziva kuti kuburikidza nemutambo uyu ndipo vamwe vatambi vanoonekwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana izvo zvinozovapa mukana wekuzvitambira,” anodaro.

headline: Korera Inonzi Yauraya Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVasere muHarare Chete
text: Vanhu makumi maviri nevasere vanonzi vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari zvino muguta reHarare chete, sekutaura kwevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Clemence Duri. Ukuwo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwava kudarika zviuru zvina munyika yose. “Tiri kugutsikana nemafambiro ari kuita zvinhu nekuti vanhu vese vari kuisa misoro pamwe chete. Tiri kuedza kubata pamwe chete neshamwari dzedu nesuwo veHarare City Council tiri kuedza kuita zvatinogona,” Dr Duri vaudza Studio7. “Hongu, hatingagoni kuzviita zvese asi unonyatsona kuti vanhu vane chido chekuti chirwere ichi chipedzwe zvachose.” Dr Duri vanoti kunyange hazvo vachigutsikana nebasa riri kuitwa mukurwisana nechirwere ichi, vari kukumbira vanhu nemasangano ekunze kuti vabatsire mukurwisa chirwere ichi. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati veruzhinji vanofanirwawo kubatsira nemari yekurwisa chirwere ichi. Korera yagara ichinetsa muZimbabwe. Muna 1993 ku muna 2003, korera yakabatwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru makumo manomwe. Muna 2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe ndiyo chete nyika yawirwa nedambudziko rekorera rakaipisisa kudarika dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai eWomen of Dominion International Osendeka Musangano wePagore Nekuda kweCoronavirus
text: Sangano reWomen of Dominion International rinoti harisi kuita musangano waro wepagore gore rino nekuda kwechirwere che coronavirus. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Pastor Marvelous Ndhlovu, vanoti madzimai anobva munyika dzakasiyanasiyana anga achitarisirwa kusangana ku Los Angeles mudunhu reCalifornia muna Chikumi asi nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vanhu vasaungana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwe coronavirus, vaona zvakakosha ] kuti musangano wavo usaitwa. Pastor Ndhlovu vanoti sezvo mamwe madzimai achibva kunze kweAmerica, miganhu yenyika dzakawanda yakavharwa pari zvino zvekuti kana dai zvinhu zvakazogadzikana panenge pasisina nguva yekuti madzimai aya agadzirire. "Ndinoda kutenda Mwari nekuwana mukana wekutsanangura kuti gore rino takaona zvakakodzera kuti tisaita musangano wedu weWomen of Dominion watanga tichifanirwa kuita muna June, June 25 kusvika 28 tiri kuLos Angeles, California. "Saka takazogara sedare takakanzura musangano iwoyo. Gore rino tanga tichi celebrator nine years dzekunge tiri Women of Dominion, kubva patakatanga tichitanga kusangana gore ra2012." Pastor Ndhlovu vanoti chakanyanyoita kuti vakanzure musangano wegore rino zvikonzero zvakati wandeyi, chekutanga chiri chechirwere che coronavirus. "Patakatarisa nekunyatsoongorora, uyezve nekunyanyonzwisisa nezvatiri kunzwa nema forecast takaona kuti izvo musangano iwoyo uchanetsa kuti ubudirire, uye zvinogona kuti strainer isusu vanotungamirira Women of Dominion nevano attender as well. "Dambudzo rekutanga tichiziva kuti tose coronavirus yaka affecter even kubva vanhu kumabasa. Even kuLos Angeles kwatiri kuenda it's one of the cities iri kunzi ichaita ma cases akawanda, saka kuti June tifokasite kuti zvinhu zvinenge zvave nani panguva iyoyo in that city nemaonero edu uye nekunzwa pamweya, hatina kuona kunge zviri zvinhu zvakanga zvakanakira musangano wedu," vanodaro Pastor Ndhlovu. Women of Dominion International yave nemakore mapfumbamwe yaumbwa uye inobatanidza madzimai anobva kuZimbabwe ari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana mukurarama mushoko raMwari. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidziso Pamusoro peCOVID-19 Kune Vachadzidzisa Veruzhinji Yotambirwa neMufaro
text: Bazi rezvehutano neMuvhuro rakazivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 135, kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu ane vasere kana kuti 5 308. Bazi iri rakati vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika neMuvhuro vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvitatu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 3 848, izvo zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1 325 vari ivo vachine chirwere ichi munyika yose. Mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika, bazi rezvehutano rakabatana nesangano reUnited Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) riri kupa zvidzidzo kuvanhu vachazonodzidzisawo vamwe pamusoro pemabatirwo anofanirwa kuitwa Covid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei kuti chisapararira. Zvidzidzo izvi zviri kuitirwa kuDomboshawa, uye vari kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanozotarisirwa kunodzidzisawo vamwe vari mune zvehutano mumapoka avo, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe munharaunda dzavagere. Bazi iri razivisa kuburikidza neTiwtter kuti vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanhu vabva kubazi rezvehutano, kumapurisa nemauto, uyewo vamwe vabva kumasangano akazvimirira. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vadzidzisi uhwu hwakakosha zvikuru sezvo huchizobatsira kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere ichi izokwanisa kupararira nenyika yose. VaRusike vakurudzirawo kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 iwandire pamwe nekupararira kunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji pamwe nekumaruwa, uko vanoti veruzhinji vanenge vari kuratidza kuti havasi kuteerera kurudziro dzebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation dzekuti vazvivhare miromo nemhino, kugeza maoko, pamwe nekusiya mukaha pakati pavo nevamwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri neimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe negumi nezvisere, kana kuti 21 918 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 774, 700. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19, avo vadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi mana nezvina, kana kuti 5, 444, 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe, kana kuti 170, 000. MuAfrica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvisere, kana kuti 1,128 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vashaya vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu nemazana masere, kana kuti 25, 800. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi mana nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 846, 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, kana kuti 590, 000 vabatwa nacho. Vanhu vafa nechiwere ichi muSoiuth Africa vadarika zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11, 900.

headline: Hurumende Inobhadhara Chikwereti Chayo kuZESA
text: Hurumende inoti yabhadhara chikwereti chayo chemagetsi kumbani yemagetsi yeZESA uyewo yabhadharwa chikwereti cheZESA kukambani yemagetsi yeESKOM yekuSouth Africa. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rinoona nezvemamhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vati hurumende yabhadhara chikwereti chayo chemamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora kuZESA uyewo yapa kambani iyi mamwe mamiriyoni makuma maviri emadhora ekuti kambani iyi ivandudze basa rekugaya magetsi. Vatiwo vabhadhara chikwereti cheZESA kuESKOM chemamiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica. Vati izvi zvichabatsira kuti nyika ideredze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemagetsi munyika iro raita kuti nyika igove magetsi kana kuti loadshedding. VaChasi vatiwo veruzhinji, makambani nemakanzuru vanofanira kubhadhara magetsi. Vatiwo nyaya yemagetsi inofanira kubatanidza vanhu munyika kuona kuti vogadzirisa sei dambudziko rekushomeka kwemagetsi. Vachitaurawo mushure medare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati dare remakurukota ratambira danho rakatorwa nebazi rezvemari svondo rino rekudzora dhora remuno rikati danho iri richaunza kugadzikana munyika munyaya dzehupfumi. Pavabvunzwa nezvekuti vanhu vane maNostro Foreign Currency Account nevaya vanotumirwa mari nemakambani akaita Western Union nemamwe, vachawana mari yavo here kana kuti vachamanikidzwa kuitengesa kumabhanga, Amai Mutsvangwa vati vanhu ava vacharamba vachiwana mari dzavo ari madhora ekuAmerica, mapaunzi nedzimwe mari dzekunze. Asi kunyange hazvo Amai Mutsvangwa vati dare remakurukota ratambira gwaro reStatutory Instrument 142, masangano evashandi pamwe nevemabhizimisi audza hurumende kuti mutemo uyu unofanira kubviswa sezvo wakaitwa pasina kuwirirana sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo weTNF. Masangano aya atuma gurukota rezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, kuti vaendese nyaya iyi kudare remakurukota svondo rinouya kuti mutemo uyu ubviswe. Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions inoti vashandi vacharamwa mabasa kana izvi zvikasaitika. Mutemo uyu, uyo wakaburitswa nemusi weMuvhuro wave pamberi pekomiti yeparamende yeParliamentary Legal Committee iyo inoongorora kuti mitemo haipikisane nebumbiro remutemo here kana kuti kwete. Rimwe gweta risina kuda kudomwa nezita raudza Studio7 kuti rinoona nesekuti mutemo uyo hauna kunyorwa zvakajeka uye zviri pachena kuti hurumende ine vanhu kana makambani ainoda kubata pachishandiswa mutemo uyu. Zvichakadai nhengo dzeparamende nhasi dzati nyaya yekuzvidza paramende kuri kuitwa nemakurukota ehurumende iri kuenderera mberi yave kunganganisa mashandiro eparamende. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo, Amai Priscillar Misihairambwi Mushonga, vaudza mutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate VaJacob Mudenda, kuti makomiti ave kutadza kuita basa rawo nekuti makurukota ehurumende pamwe nevanyori vemapazi ehurumende havawanike, sezvo vanenge vasipo nguva dzese. Amai Mushonga vati zviri pachena kuti zvose zvinotaurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, hazvisi kuitwa nekuti makurukota avo nevanyori vawo havana basa ravari kuita. Vati nekuda kwazvovo vave kuda kuita musangano wemasachigaro emakomiti eparamende nemutungamiriri wenyika. Advocate Mudenda vatambira chikumbiro chaAmai Mushonga uye vaudza mukuru webasa rehurumende muparamende zvakare vari gurukota rezvemitemo neparamende, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, kuti varonge musangano nemutungamiri wenyika. Chitatu chega chega vatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika, makurukota ehurumende nevatevedzeri vavo vanosungirwa kuenda kuparamende kunopindura mibvunzo kubva kunhengo dzeparamende asi vazhinji vavo havaendi. No media source currently available

headline: Vatambi vaita ngura: Siyachitema
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenetball cheGlow Petroleum Queens – Perpetau Siyachitema – anoti kugara nguva refu vatambi vemutambo uyu vakangogara kwava kuona vazhinji vachiusiya, kuita ngura kana kutsvaga mamwe mabasa anovararamisa.   Kubva pakatanga kumiswa mitambo gore radarika nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, mutambo wenetball hauna kuzombopihwa mvumo yekutambwa zvekare izvo sekutaura kwaSiyachitema, zvava kuita kuti vamwe vatambi vaore moyo vachifunga kuti mutambo uyu hauchdzoke uye vamwe vave kuita mamwe mabasa kana zvedzimba.   “Denda iri chokwadi rakanganisa zvakawanda chaizvo nekuti vatambi vazhinji havachina shungu nemutambo uyu nekuti havachazive kuti uchadzoka here kana kuti kwete.   “Kubva gore radarika taingoita gadziriro vamwe vari kudzimba dzavo, zvino munhu anosvika pakuneta nekungoita gadziriro dzake mutambo usingadzoke.   Kuburikidza nekugara ikoko, vamwe vave kusimba miviri yavo, vamwe vave kuita pamuviri zvekuti kuzotamba netball kunozonetsa pamberi apo. “Kudai denda iri rachipera kuitira kuti upenyu hwedu nevatambi huchiendekawo nekuti ndipo panoraramira vatambi vazhinji,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Shasha iyi inoti iri kuzvishingisa ndokuudza vatambi vake kuti vasaore moyo uye vagare vachiita gadziriro dzavo kuitira kuti miviri yavo igare yakasimba.   “Pakatanga Covid-19 gore radarika, vatambi vaiita gadziriro vari kudzimba dzavo uye mazuva ose ndaigadzira mavhidhiyo ndovatumira ezvandinenge ndichida kuti vadzidze ivo vozonditumira vachizviita, asi vamwe vakasvika pakuneta nekuti vanenge vave kubvunza kuti toramba tichifondokerei iwo mutambo wacho usiri kudzoka. Vanenge vachitoti zviri nani kuita zvimwe.   “Ini semurairidzi wavo, handikwanise kuvaudza izvozvo kuti zororai, ndinongovati garai muchingoita gadziriro kusvika pazvinenge zvakanaka, hapana anoziva kuti zvinonaka rinhi,” anodaro.   Siyachitema ndiye akatungamira chikwata chemaGems chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yeWorld Cup 2019 apo chakanokwikwidza kuEngland uye kubva kumutambo uyu, akasvika achisendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba ndokutanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   Chikwata chemaGems gore rinotevera chinofanirwa kutanga kurwira kuenda kumutambo we2023 World Cup uyo unofanirwa kuzotambirwa kuSouth Africa.   Achitaura, Siyachitema anoti kana netball ikasapihwa mvumo yekuti ichitanga kutambwa, zvinogona kuremera chikwata chemaGems gore rinotevera kusarudza vatambi vanochimirira pakurwira tikiti rekuenda kuSouth Africa sezvo vatambi vazhinji vanenge vava nengura yekugara vasingatambe kwenguva refu.   “Zvino zvino takatarisana nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup, zvino kana tisiri kutamba zvinogona kuzoremera chikwata chenyika.   “Mitambo iri kutofanirwa kutanga kutambwa nekuchimbidza kuti vatambi vagare vakagwinya uye vanosarudza chikwata chenyika vatange kuongorora vatambi. Patakabva kuWorld Cup yekupedzisira, vatambi vakaita seni, Pauline Jani naJoice Takaidza takabva tasendeka kutambira maGems, saka pane gwanza guru rinofanira kuvharwa.   Kana mitambo isiri kutambwa hameno kuti vanotitsiva sei,” anodaro Siyachitema.

headline: ‘Hupenyu hwevatambi hwoendeka’
text: MURAIRIDZI weTriangle United kana kuti Sugar Sugar Boys, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kuri kuona hupenyu hwevatambi vakawanda huchitanga kuendeka sezvo vazhinji vange vakakanganisika nekugara kudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nekuda kweCovid-19, gore ra2020 nhabvu yePremier Soccer League (PSL) haina kumbotambwa sezvo mitambo yose yakambomiswa.   Izvi zvakaona vamwe vatambi venhabvu vachikwangwaya sezvo vachirarama nemutambo uyu. Asi zvichitevera kudzoka kwenhabvu mwedzi wadarika, zvikwata zvemuPSL zviri kutatsurana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   “Kugara kumba kwange kwakaoma uye hupenyu hwevatambi vazhinji hwakambokanganisika nekungogara nekuti mari yange isisauye.   “Mutambi wenhabvu kana akangogara mari haiuye, kune mari yakaita seyemabhonasi iyo inouya kana chikwata chahwina. Mari iyi inobatsira vatambi saka yaisauya sezvo nhabvu yange isiri kutambwa. “Asi kudzoka kwaita nhabvu kwave kusunungura zvakawanda uye hupenyu hwevatambi hwave kusimukira manje,” anodaro Mangwiro.   Mangwiro mumwe wevarairidzi vashoma vakakwanisa kuhwina mukombe weChibuku Super Cup uyo akahwapura mugore ra2018 izvo zvakazoona chikwata chake chichikwikwidza mumutambo weCAF Confederations Cup muna2019.   Mwaka uno, chikwata chake hachina kutanga zvakanaka mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakaitwa mitambo miviri yekutanga 3-1 neNgezi Platinum Stars uye 2-1 neFC Platinum.   Mangwiro anoti vakatanga zvakashata asi vari kushanda nesimba kuti vadzoke mumutambo uyu uye vagohwina zvekare.   “Kuti uhwine mikombe yenhabvu inotoda kushandirwa zvakasimba saka isu tiri kushanda nesimba kuti tigohwina.   “Ndinobvuma kuti hatina kutanga zvakanaka asi chandinoziva ndechekuti tichiri nemimwe mitambo iyo ticharwa semvumba kuti tisabude mumutambo uyu.   Mitambo yedu yekutanga yakatirakidz kuti tange tichiri nengura. Asi, tine mimwe yatichatamba ndinoziva tichahwina uye togadzirisa pange pachikanganisika. Saka tiri kufanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe kuti tihwine,” anodaro Mangwiro.

headline: Kunyoresa Kuvhota Kwokonzera Mutauro Munyika
