text: Sachigaro wesangano rinotungamira nyaya dzesarudzo reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti vanhu vachatanga kunyoresa kuvhota kuti vave pagwaro idzva rinoshandisa michina yechizvino zvino, kana kuti Biometric Voter Registration, nemusi weMuvhuro. Asi musi uyu, dare repamusoro reHigh Court rinenge richizeyawo nyaya yekuti zviri kuitwa neZEC zviri pamutemo here kana kuti kwete. Bato reMDC-T rakaendesa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mutevedzeri wavo, vanove zvekare gurukota rezvemitemo, vaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye ZEC, kumatare richiti zvavari kuita munyaya dzesarudzo, kusanganisira nyaya yekutanga kunyoresa vavhoti, hazvisi pamutemo. Mamwe masangano, akaita seZimbabwe Election Support Network, aburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau nhasi achikurudzira hurumende kuti ivandudze mitemo yesarudzo kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. Sangano iri rati nyaya dzekutyora kodzero dzevanhu munguva yesarudzo, kusanganisira kuvaita kafiramberi nekuvatyisidzira, dzinofanira kumira. Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano akawanda akazvimirira munyika, Crisis In Zimbabwe Coalition, yaburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau richiti harisi kufara kuti ZEC haisi kunyatsoshandawo nemasangano akazvimirira oga muzvirongwa zvayo. Sangano iri ratiwo nenyaya yekushaya dzidziso yakakwana yezvekunyoresa kuvhota, sarudzo idzi dzichangoita sedzimwe dzakaitwa kare dzisina kutambirwa nemapato anopikisa. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakati nemasikati eMuvhuro dare rinenge rozeya kuti zviri kuitwa neZEC zviri pamutemo here. No media source currently available

headline: VaGari vemuManicaland Vanoti Vanoda Chouviri paZvicherwa Zviri muDunhu Ravo
text: Sangano reSouthern Eastern Trade Information and Negotiations Institute, SEATINI rinoti vagari vemunharaunda dzinoshandira makambani ekunze anenge asainirana zvibvumirano nehurumende zvekuita mabasa muno vanofanirwa kunge vaine chekuita pazvibvumirano izvi. Mashoko aya abuda pamusangano waitwa nhasi maMutare apo zvabuda pachena kuti vagari vazhinji vanozosangana nematambudziko nekuda kwekuti zvibvumirano zvinenge zvaitwa hazvineyi nemagariro avo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekuongorora mafambiro emabasa musangano reSEATINI VaAdmire Mutizwa vati ichokwadi kuti vagary havana chouviri chavari kuwana kubva kuzviwanikwa munharaudza mune zvicherwa vachipa muenzaniso mangoda ari maMarange ayo vagary vanoti haapna pundutso yaaunza munharaunda mavo. “Saka zvatiri kuita kunouku ndezvekuti tiri kukurudzira kuti vagari vaparticipate maringe nekutsvagwa kuri kuita makambani ekunze, takaona pahurumende yedu itsva kuti iri kuti Zimbabwe is Open for Business zvinoreveyi kumunhu, an ordinary person, sekwaChiadzwa pane makambani akamina madiamond mari ichibuda asi hapana chavakawana saka tiri kuti zvinorevei kwavari kana zvichinzi Zimbabwe is open for business.” VaMutizwa vanoti kurudziro yavari kuita kumatunhu ose munyika ndeyekuti inzwi revagari rinzwikwewo panyaya dzebudiriro. “Chechipiri tiri kuda kukurudzira voice revagari vemunzvimbo maeerano nedevelopment, transparence and accountability, macitizens vakaita participate pakutsvagwa kwemari tinovimba kuti macitizens edu anowana zvinovabatsira munzvimbo dzavanenge vari pamusoro pemabasa anenge oitwa nemakani ekunze aya.” Muzvare Mildred Muzanechita mugari wemaMutare uye ange ari pamusangano wanhasi anoti dzidziso iripo inobatsira kuvhura pfungwa kuvagari venharaunda dzakasiyana-siyana pamusoro pezvinosungirwa kuitwa kana makambani achinge apihwa basa rekuchera zvicherwa munharaunda mavo. “Musangano uyu wabatsira pakuti tinenge tave kuziva zvatinoda basa risati raitwa sekuti venharaunda tiwanirwe pekushanda, kumacommunities sevekuPenhalonga uye Bocha, infrastructure development vanofanirwa zvakare kubatsirika nazvo. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Mainvestor aya kana achiuya muno muZimbabwe tinge tiine benefit ichasara nesu kana vachinge vazopedza mabasa avo mumacommunities matinogara.” Mumwe mugari wemaMutare VaAnndy Ziyera avo vapindawo mumusangano vanoti sekutaura kwakaita mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mazuva mashoma apfuura kuti inzwi revanhu inzwi ramwari zvido zvavo zvinofanirwa kuremekedzwa zvimwechetewo nekuti pakuuya kwemabhizinesi muno vange vachipawo pfungwa dzavo. “Vanhu ndivo nyika saka inzwi revanhu ndiro inzwi raMwari vakadaro VaMnangagwa, naizvozvo panoitwa mainvestments ese vanhu vanofanirwa kunge nechekuitawo, FDI haifanirwi kuuraya local investment uye tinotarisira kuti itobatsira local investment yacho.” Vanotizve, “Tinoziva kuti tairima cotton muno but yakatourayiwa neizvozvo tave kuimporta cotton kana maSkipper muno anobva kuChina saka tinodawo equal treatment.” Musangano uyu wakapindwa nevagari vanobva kunzvimbo dzinocherwa zviwanikwa dzakaita sePenhalonga, Marange uye Chimanimani. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanenge Vakundwa Ngavabvume Kukundwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti vanhu vanenge vakundwa musarudzo vanofanirwa kubvuma kukundwa voshanda nekupembera nevanenge vakakunda kuitira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo. Vachitaura nhasi muBanket apo vanga vachitsvaira marara mumusha unogara veruzhinji weKuwadzana, VaMnangagwa vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuwirirana munyika, uye kuti kana munhu akundwa musarudzo, haafanirwe kuita zvemhirizhonga asi kuti anofanirwa kupembera nevakakunda kuti munyika muve nerunyararo. VaMnangagwa vati kana munhu akundwa anofanirwa kusiya zvinenge zvamukundisa zvemhirizhonga, uyo anenge akunda sezvavakaita, oramba achiita zvinoita kuti arambe achikunda. VaMnangagwa vati bato ravo reZanu PF rinokunda nokudaro richaramba richiita zvinokundisa zvekuenda kunonzwa zvichemo zvevanhu nekuzvigadzirisa sezvavakaita zvekuunza mabhazi anobhadharwa mari shoma yekufambisa. Kunyange VaMnangagwa vasina kudoma bato nezita, vazhinji vanoti ibato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ranga richitaurwa. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati bato ravo harisi kuzobva pachokwadi chekuti VaMnangagwa vakabirira sarudzo izvo vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yakabvuma nekuchinja zvakabuda musarudzo katatu. Panyaya yehutsanana VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichaisa mutemo wekuti motokari dzose dzinotakura veruzhinji zvikuru mabhazi dzive nemabhini ekurasira marara sezvo zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanenge vari mudzimotokari vanorasa marara nepamahwindo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuBanket asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti kuchenesa nzvimbo hakufanirwe kumirira zuva rinotsvaira mutungamiri wenyika sezviri kuitika muBanket umo makatsvairwa nezuro nekuti VaMnangagwa vari kuuya. VaMnangangwa, avo vasvika muBanket nguva dza 8 manganani dzavanga vachitarisirwa, vaudza vanhu kuti vakurumidza nekuti vari kuenda kuAdis Ababa, KuEthiopia nhasi kumusangano weAfrican Union. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende IYosimbaradza Kuti ZUPCO Ndiyo Yega Ine Mvumo Yekutakura Vanhu
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota Amai Marian Chombo vanoti kambani yemabhazi, yeZimbabwe United Passenger Company (ZUPCO) ndiyo yega yakapihwa mvumo yekutakura vanhu mumaguta. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwevanhu vakawanda munyika nerimwe sangano rinomirira vanotakura vanhu nezvinhu, reZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors (ZUDCO) kuti kambani yeZUPCO yaremerwa nemutoro. Mutungamiri weZUDCO, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vanoti hurumende haisi kuda kunzwa zvichemo zvevanhu vari kunetseka nekushaya zvinovatakura kuenda nekudzoka kumabasa. VaMaguramhinga vanoti sangano ravo ririkuramba richikumbira hurumende kuti iite musangano nevanotakura vanhu kuti zvinonetsa mativi ose zvikurukurwe uye kuti hurumende ikwanise kubatsira mukugadziriswa kwedambudziko iri sezvainofanirwa kuita. Vachipindura chikumbiro cheZUDCO ichi , Amai MaChombo, vanoti kana hurumende yatura gwara nemutemo hazvigoni kungozvisendeka parutivi.  No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeHarareYoronga Kuwanisa Vanhu Mvura Munguva Dzakasiyana
text: Kanzuru yeHarare yazivisa kuti ichatanga kugovera mvura nguva dzakasiyana nekuda kwekuderera kwemvura pamwe nekuwanda kwetsvina munyanza yeLake Chivero. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti yatarisana nematambudziko akawanda munyanza iyi zvekuti ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura mwedzi uno sezvo isisakwanise kuti mugari wese muguta awane mvura yakachena. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa pachigayo chemvura cheMorton Jaffrey Water Works, VaPaul Chabata, vati mvura iri mudhamu yasviba zvakaipisisa nekuda kwetsvina inobva kuHarare nezvimbo dzakatenderedza guta iri izvo zvave kuita kuti kanzuru ishandise mari yakawanda pakuchenesa mvura iyi. Vatiwo tsvina iyi inokonzerwawo nevanhu vanoredza hove zvisina mvumo mudhamu yave kukanganisa kanzuru pakupomba mvura. Mabharani mukuru wekanzuru, Engineer Hosiah Chisangno, vati vari kukurudzira vagari kuchengetedza mvura uye kanzuru yavo ichatanga kugovera vanhu mvura kutanga mwedzi uno. Vatiwo kunzuru ichavhara chigayo cheMorton Jaffrey mukupera kwesvondo kuitira kuti vabvise tsvina irimo uye izvi zvichawedzera huwandu hwemvura kubva pa 360 mega litres kusvika pa 450 mega litres pazuva. Vagari vemuHarare vanoshandisa 800 mega litres muchando ne1200 mega litres panguva yezhizha pazuva rega rega. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano reCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti havabvumirani nematanho ari kuda kutorwa nekanzuru ekugovera mvura vachiti zvichaita kuti vagari vabatwe nezvirwere. VaMudzingwa vati kanzuru inofanira kutora mvura kubva kune mamwe madhamu akaita seDarwendale kuti mvura ikwanire munhu wese. Muzvina bhizimisi vashanda padhamu iri kwenguva yakareba, VaGarry Stafford, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuzara kwejecha mudhamu kuri kukonzerwa nekurimwa kuri kuitwa mumatoro nedzimwe nzvimbo muHarare nenzvimbo dzakatenderedza guta uye zvakakosha kuti zvisaitwe kuti dhamu reChivero risaparare. Vati dhamu iri range rakadzika mamita makumi maviri nemasere asi pari zvino rakadzika mamita gumi nemasere chete sezvo razara jecha. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemvura dzinoti tsvina yakawanda iri kupinda muLake Chivero iri kukonzerwa nekanzuru yeHarare iyo iri kutadza kugadzirisa mapombi anotakura tsvina. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuendeswa kwetsvina isina kuiswa mishonga inodzora hukasha hwetsvina munzizi dzakaita seMukuvisi neManyame kuri kuwedzerawo kuipa kwemvura yemuLake Chivero. Muna Kurume 2015 kanzuru yeHarare yakawanikwa nematare edzimhosva iine mhosva yekudira siweji muna Mukuvisi isina kucheneswa sezvinodiwa nemutemo ikafaindiswa zviuru zana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Kanzuru yeHarare yakabatwa nemhosva yekutyora mutemo weEnvironmental Management Act kuburikidza nekudira tsvina munzizi dzinoti Mukuvisi, Marimba, Ruwa neNyatsime, nzizi dzine mvura inopedzisira yapinda muLake Chivero. Nyanzvi mukuvakwa kwemaguta dzinoti guta reHarare rakavakirwa panzvimbo isina kunaka sezvo riri munzvimbo inofamba nemvura inopinda muLake Chivero, izvo zvinoita kuti mvura iyi isvibe zvakanyanya. Pari zvino guta reHarare rinoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu emadhora semari yekutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura pamwedzi wega wega. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yePSL yamiswa
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League razivisa kuti mitambo yose yePSL ye”match day two” iyo yange ichitambwa svondo rino yambomiswa zvichitevera kusauya kwaita varidzi vepembe kuzoridza mune mimwe mitambo yange ichifanirwa kutambwa nhasi.   Pachinyorwa chabva kuPSL, chamangwiza wePSL, Kennedy Ndebele, anoti kusabatika kwaita varidzi vepembe mumitambo yanhasi kwavatuma kumisa mitambo yose ye”match day two” nechinangwa chekuedza kuita tsvakurudzo kuti zvafamba sei.   “Tinoziva kumiswa kwemitambo yose yematch day two izvo zvakonzerwa nekusauya kubasa kwaita varidzi vepembe kumitambo yakasiyana.   “Asi kune vamwe vaenda kunhandare vachida kunoridza asi havana kuzokwanisa kuenderera mberi sezvo vamwe vazongoregedza mitambo yave kuda kutanga.   “Tamboedza kuita hurukuro neZIFA Referees Committee kuti tinzwisise kuti zviri kufamba sei, asi hapana chabuda.   “Tinovimba kuti zvichagadzirika nekukasika,” anodaro Ndebele.   Kusabatika kwevaridzi vepembe kumitambo yanhasi vamwe vanoti zvakonzerwa nekumbomiswa kwaita basa bhodhi reZIFA nhasi neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC).

headline: VaMthuli Ncube Voendeswa kuMatare neNyaya yeKukwidza Mutero
text: Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuHarare, VaArnold Mutsondi, vaendesa gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube, kumatare vachiti mutemo wavo wavakadzika wekuwedzera mutero hausi pamutemo uye hautarisirwe munyika ine hutongo hwejekerere. VaNcube vakati vanhu vatange kubhadhara masendi maviri padhora roga roga pavanoshandisa makadhi avo ekubhengi kubva pamasendi mashanu pachero mari yavanenge vachitumira kana kushandisa. VaMutsondi vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurumende iri kuda kuomesera vanhu vasina mhaka nekuti yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko remari. Gweta raVaMutsondi, VaAlex Majachani, vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaNcube kutyora bumbiro remutemo wenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reNCA Rokwirira VaMugabe Dare
text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, rinoti ratuma magweta aro kuti akwire kudare repamusoro soro reConstitutional Court, achimisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kugadza vatevedzeri vavo vaviri richiti zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri webato iri, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti bumbiro remitemo idzva rinoti VaMugabe vaifanirwa kunge vakadoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri sarudzo dzichangopera, kwete kuzozviita kwapera gore sarudzo dzaitwa. VaChivasa vanoti bato ravo riri kutevera Sixth Schedule paragraph 14 sub-paragraph iyo vanoti inoti VaMugabe vaifanirwa kudoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri pasina kunonoka. Imwe nyaya inonzi naVaChivasa iri mugwaro ravo riri kuenda kudare ndeyekuti hutungamiri hwenyika hwaVaMugabe nevatevedzeri vavo vaviri hahunawo munhukadzi sezvinotarisirwa munyika ine vanhukadzi vakawanda kudarika vanhurume. VaChivasa vanoti magweta avo eMbidzo, Muchadehama and Makoni achaendesa mapepa aya chekutanga neChishanu mangwanani. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kutoresa mhiko VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe naVaPelekezela Mphoko sevatevedzeri vavo vaviri. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo inodzidzisa paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti nyaya yeNCA inonakidza kutevera. Vanoti chikamu chemutemo chiri kushandiswa nebato iri nechinonzi chakashandiswawo naVaMugabe zvinonetsa kunyatsonzwisisa asi vanoti dare repamusorosoro iri rinogonawo kuramba kutambira nyaya iyi. Zvichakadaro, bato reMDC T rinotiwo riri kuronga kuroverera VaMugabe nemhosva yekutyora bumbiro remitemo nekudzinga kwavakaita mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Joice Mujuru, kubva pachigaro richishandisa nhengo dzaro mudare reparamende. Mutauriri webato iri, VaObert Gutu, vaudza bepanhau reNewsDay kuti VaMugabe vakazvidza bumbiro renyika nekudzinga kwavakaita Amai Mujuru, vachiti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika anofanirwa kudzingwa chete pachiteverwa bumbiro renyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vatambi VeTeam Zimbabwe 2016 Paralympic Vodzokera Kumusha Vasina Menduru
text: Vatambi vemuZimbabwe vema2016 Paralympic Games vari kudzoka kumusha vari maoko chete. Mutori wedu wenhau dzemitambo. Vatambi vaviri vanga vasara kukwikwidza mumakundano aya ve Mixed Four, Margaret Bangajena, Michelle Garnet, Jesicca Davies na Previous Wiri nezuro vakapedza vari pachinhanho chekugumisira mugungano ravo. Vatambi ava vakatevera Laina Sithole uyo neMugovera akatadza kusvika mufainari ye 100 metres T35 ayo aive makundano ake ega aaikwikwidza. Sezvakaitawo chikwata cheZimbabwe kubva kumaOlympic Games chisina menduru, chikwata ichi chiri kudzokawo chisina kana menduru imwechete. Mumitambo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League chikwata cheHighlanders chiri mumafaro makuru mushure mekudzokorora kurova Dynamos 2-1mumutambo wanga wakaoma muBarbiurfields Stadium nezuro. Aka kave kechipiri Highlanders ichi kunda Dynamos mwaka uno wenhabvu mumitambo yeligi, kanove kechipiri zvekare mukati memakore gumi Bosso ichikwanisa kukunda Dembare. Kukunda uku kwasiya Bosso yasara nemapoinzi gumi pasi pechikwata chiri kutungamira cheFC Platinum icho chakarova How Mine 1-0 munhandare yeMandava. Mutsigiri weBosso VaDannboy Hamandishe vanoti vangadai vakakunda nezvibodzwa zvakawanda asi zvakangodaro varatidza kuti vanhu vakuru. Mumwe wavo VaTichaona Jecha vanoti murairidzi wawave naye ibanga chairo vachiti zvinhu zvasanduka. Kugona Kunenge Kudada yave nemapoinzi makumi mana nemasere kubva mumitambo makumi maviri nemitatu. Asi Bosso yave nemapoinzi matanhatu pamusoro peDynamos iyo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu yave kuratidza kuti yabuda mumakwikwi emukombe weligi. Asi Makepekepe aramba arimo muhondo yeligi mushure mekurova Chicken Inn 1-0. Kunyange hazvo chikwata ichi chaibaka moto hachina kukwanisa kunwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kunze kwechimwechete chakabva kuna Leonard Tsipa. Chikwata chemaGreen Machine chakatamba zvine mutsindo zvekuti mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi Charles Muroyiwa anoti vanoisa mari muchikwata ichi vanotsvaga neshungu nematambiro aya. Asi maGreen Machine ari kuramba aiine poindi imwechete pasi peFC Platinum iyo yakarova How Mine. Musi mumwechete iwoyo, Hwange neZPC Kariba dzakaita mangange 1-1. Ngezi yakadambura Bulawayo City 1-0, Tsholotsholo ikakunda Border Strikers 1-0 asi Chapungu yakanwisa zviviri pakukunda Harare City 2-1. No media source currently available

headline: Mvura Yonetsa Vagari vekwaGutu kuMasvingo
text:
Vagari vakawanda kwaMpandawana kwaGutu vanoti vari kutyira kubatwa nezvirwere zvakaita seCholera sezvo vave nemasvondo anodarika matatu vasina mvura mudzimba dzavo zvichinzi mushina unopomba mvura wakafa. Vagari vanoti vakaudzwa nebazi reZinwa rinovapa mvura kuti kune mishina yakafa kudhamu rinopombwa mvura asi havafari nenguva yareba yatorwa dambudziko iri risina kugadziriswa. Vagari vemumisha yeve ruzhinji yakaita seku Hwiru nekuGona vanoti nekushomeka kwemvura vave kushandisa mvura yemumatsime asina kuvharwa pamwe nezvikova iyo iri kukanganisa hutano hwavo. Sachigaro wesangano rinomiririra vagari reGutu United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaLloyd Mufudze, vanoti vagari vazhinji vave kugara vachinzwa midumbu nekushandisa mvura yakasviba yemumatsime.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weGona, VaTafunga Mamombe, vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kwenguva refu kwave kutyorwa kodzero dzavo. VaMamombe vati vakaudzwa kuti mushina uchagadziriswa nekukurumidza asi nanhasi chabuda hapana. Vamwe vagari vari kupomera kanzuru yeGutu, mhosva yekusaita hany’a nedambudziko ravo nekusunda bazi reZinwa kuti rigadzirise dambudziko iri. Asi mukuru webasa mukanzuru yekwaGutu, VaAlexender Mutembwa, vaudza Stduio 7 parunhare kuti dambudziko iri riri kuZinwa, ivo havana simba rekuvamhanyisa kuti vagadzirise. Kanzura veward 34 maMupandawana, VaBernard Chimwango, vanoti vakambozama kutaura ne Zinwa kuti igadzirise zviri kunetsa, asi bazi iri riri kuisa zvitanda munzeve.

Asi mutaururi weZinwa, VaTsungirai Shoriwa, vati vane hurombo nekutadza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, asi vati riri kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi. Vagari vanoti dambudziko remvura rinotyirwa kuti ringango wedzera kupararira kweChirwere cheCovid-19 icho chinokurudzirwa kushandiswa kwemvura yakakwanda uye yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Bato Rinopikisa reCCC Roparura Gwaro Raro Rine Zvarinoti Zvigadziriswe Sarudzo Dzisati Dzaitwa
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change, CCC rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, nhasi riri kuparura gwaro raro rinonzi PRE-ELECTION PACT ON ELECTORAL REFORMS, kana kuti PREPARE, iro rine zvinhu zvinomwe zvarinoti zvinofanirwa kutanga zvavandudzwa sarudzo dza 2023 dzisati dzaitwa. s Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vanoti mutungamiri webato ravo, VaNelson Chamisa, vakatara gore rino ra 2022 segore rekuti mitemo inobata sarudzo ivandudzwe kuitira kuti sarudzo dza 2023 dzitambirike nemapoka ose achakwikwidza. Muzvare Mahere vanoti zviri mugwaro ravo zvinomwe zvavanoda kuona zvichivandudzwa zvinoti wese mwana weZimbabwe ari kunze kwenyika kana mujeri apiwe kodzero yake yekuvhota sezviri mubumbiro remitemo, gwaro revavhoti riongororwe, chetatu, zvabuda musarudzo zviziviswe paine nguva. Chechina vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, ishandirwe nevanhu vasina kwavakarerekera, kwete kungozara mauto nenhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Chechishanu Muzvare Mahere vanoti bato ravo riri kuda kuti mashandiro emasangano enhau ari pasi pehurumende avandudzwe kuitira kupa mukana kumapato anopikisa. Chechitanhatu vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuvhota vakasununguka, uye chechinomwe vachiti vanoda kuti nhengo dzemapato anopikisa dzisangoshungurudzwa misangano yadzo ichivhiringidzwa nekurambidzwa nemapurisa kana nenhengo dzebato riri kutonga. Bato iri rinoti rakoka mapoka ose ane chekuita nesarudzo munyika anosanganisira masangano akazviomirira, venhau, vamiriri veparamende, makanzura, vamiriri vedzimwe nyika pamwe nemapazi ehurumende neZEC kuti vange varipo pakuparurwa kwegwaro ravo iri. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMTA Inoti Nhengo Dzayo Hadzichakwanisa Kuramba Dzichienda Kumabasa
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, re Zimbabwe Teachers Association (ZIMTA), rabatanawo nemamwe masangano evarairidzi pakuzivisa kuti nhengo dzaro hadzichakwanisa kuramba dzichienda kumabasa sezvo dzisisina mari dzekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichange dzichienda kumabasa kaviri chete pasvondo, Muvhuro neChishanu. VaGundani vanoti danho ratorwa nesangano ravo rinotsinhira danho rakaziviswa nesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, re APEX Council, rekuti vashandi vehurumende vakanga vasisakwanise kuramba vachienda kumabasa mazuva ose. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi vakaudza Studio 7 neSvondo kuti hurumende yakasununguka kuramba ichiita hurukuro nevashandi vayo pamusoro pemihoro yavo. Masangano anomiririra varairidzi, e Propgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe neAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ndemamwe masangano evarairidzi akatozivisa kare kuti nhengo dzawo dzakanga dzisisakwanise kuramba dzichienda kumabasa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzave kutangidza kuratidzira vhiki yega yega kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richatangidza kudzidzisa nekubatsira vana vechikoro pa nzvimbo dzavachazivisa asi kwete muzvikoro. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi re zvedzidzo kuti izvi zvichibvumidzwa here nemitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: NAAZ yotumira shangwiti kuNigeria
text: SANGANO reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ) rinoti rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo kuti rigotumira shangwiti dzerelay kunokwikwidza kumujaho weMoC relays (4×100) uyo uchaitirwa kuLagos kuNigeria svondo rino.   NAAZ yakashevedzwa kumutambo uyu neThe Athletics Federation of Nigeria (AFN) uye chikwata cheZimbabwe chinofanirwa kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu chino chichigadzirira mujaho uyu uchamhanywa musi weMugovera neSvondo.   Mutungamiri weNAAZ — Tendai Tagara — anoti sangano ravo richiri rakamira mhinduro kubva kuHurumende uye kunzwa kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu kuti vagotumira matikiti endege nemaVisa evamhanyi vavo vavachatumira.   “Takangomirira kunzwa kubva kuHurumende yedu kuti tozvifambisa sei parwendo urwu uye kubva kuAFN nevakotsveri vemutambo uyu vekuNigeria avo vakatidana kuti tiende kunokwikwidza. Mujaho uyu uchashanda mukurwira zvekare tikiti rekuenda kumaOlympics saka tiri kuukoshesa zvakanyanya. Kana tapihwa mvumo, chikwata chedu chinofanira kunge chave kuNigeria musi weChishanu, choswera chakazorora chiriko nekuti musi weMugovera chinenge chakatobvondoka kumujaho uhu,” anodaro Tagara.   Anoti iye zvino havasati vaziva kuti ndevapi vatambi vavachasarudza kuti vapinde muchikwata ichi sezvo vari kumbomirira mvumo yekuenda ndipo vozotanga kudoma vatambi vekutakura.   “Pari zvino hatisati tave nechikwata asi vatinogona kutumira ndevari kurwira kuenda kumaOlympics vanosanganisira Ngoni Makusha, Chengetai Mapaya, Kundai Maguranyanga, Tinotenda Matienda nevamwe vari kurwira kuenda kuIAAF World championships,” anodaro Tagara.

headline: Ongororo Yoratidza Kuti Vanhu Vari Kutarisira Mutungamiri Anovawanisa Mabasa
text: Ongororo yaitwa neAfrobarometer inoti rutsigiro rweveruzhinji kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, rwuri kudzikira kana zvichienzaniswa neimwe ongororo yavakaita masvondo mashoma adarika. Vachizivisa zvakabuda muongororo yavo, mukuru anoona nezvekutsvakiridza musangano reMass Public Opinion Institute iro rakaita tsvagiriridzo iyi richishanda nesangano reAfrobarometer Institute of Justice and Reconciliation, VaStephen Ndoma, vati huwandu hwevanhu vakati vachavotera VaMnangagwa musarudzo dzemwedzi uno hwaderera kubva pakaitwa ongororo yekutanga. Ongororo iyi inotiwo panyaya yevanhu vari kutarisira mukana wekuwana mabasa, vanhu vakawanda vanoti izvi zvinoitika chete kana mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vari ivo vari panyanga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo uye vachiwanzotaura vakarere kubatika reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vati zvaburitswa neAfrobarometer zvinoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa vane rutsigiro kudarika mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vati zvakabuda muongororo yeAfrobarometer iyi zvinoratidza kuti sarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru dzichapindwa rwepiri pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa. VaNdoma vati ongororo yavo yakabiritsawo zvakare kuti ruzhinji rwuri kutyira kuti vari muchiuto havazotambire zviri zveveruzhinji mushure mesarudzo. Vatiwo vakaona zvakare kuti vanhu vane chitsama havasi kuziva kuti magwaro anoratidza kuti munhu akanyoresa kuvhota haasi kuzoshandiswa musi wesarudzo uye vazhinji vakataurwa navo vakati vanotyawo mhirizhonga ine chekuita nesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC T Inoti Hurongwa Hwayo hweKuratidzira kwaMutare Hwoitwa neMusi weChina, 23 Chikumi
text: Bato reMDC T rinoti hurongwa hwaro hwekuti nhengo dzaro dzifore dzichiratidzira muguta reMutare mudunhu reManicaland, hwave kuzoitwa nemusi weChina svondo rino, kwete neMugovera sezvakanga zvamboziviswa. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu vanoti izvi zvaitwa nekuda kwemhinduro yavawana kubva kumapurisa, ayo vanoti avazivisa kuti zuva reMugovera rakanga rakumbirwa kare nebato reZanu PF kuti riite hurongwa hwaro. “Mapurisa akazivisa hutungamiri hwebato redi hwedunhu reManicaland svondo rapera kuti Saturday 25 haichaita nekuti Zanu PF yakanga yavazivisa kare nemusi wa 8 June kuti ine hurongwa hwayo, ndofunga hwekupa vechidiki ma stand here,” vaGutu vanodaro. VaGutu vanoti sebato rinoziva maitiro emapurisa pamwe nebato reZanu PF, harioni paine dambudziko pakushandurwa kwemazuva uku, sezvo richigara rakagadzirira. Bato reMDC- T rinoti riri kuratidzira kusafara nemamiriro ezvehupfumi, zvichionekwa nekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda zvichisiya vanhu vakawanda vasina mabasa. Bato iri rinoti nyaya yehuwori hwebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF ndiyo yakonzerawo kuti zvinhu zviomere vakawanda munyika. MDC inoti vanhu vekuManicaland vanofanira kuratidzirawo nenyaya yekutsakatika kwemari yemangoda akacherwa mudunhu ravo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vakataura vega kuti mari yakabva kumangoda inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yainge yatsakatika. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Voronga Kuzivisa Hurumende neDanho reKuda Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Varairidzi vari pasi pemubatanidzwa mutsva weFederation of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU) vanoti vari kuronga kusvitsa kuhurumende neChitatu tsamba yekuzivisa nezvekuronga kuramwa mabasa panovhurwa zvikoro mwedzi unouya. Masangano evaraidzi mashanu anoti Zimbabwe Teachers Association (ZIMTA), Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ), Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ), Professional Educators’ Union of Zimbabwe (PEUZ), neZimbabwe National Teachers’ Union (ZINATU), akabatana akaumba mubatanidzwa unonzi Federation of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU) senzira yekurwira kodzero dzavo. Varairidzi ava vanoti zvichemo zvavo hazvisi kunyanyonzwikwa kana vakaenda kunhaurirano sevashandi vehurumende pasi Apex Council, iyo inomirira vashandi vehurumende vose, izvo zvakaita kuti vade kuzvimirira voga. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti vakaita zvose zvinotarisirwa mukuedza kuti vataurirane nehurumende, asi hapana chinoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutirimuka. Vanotiwo hurongwa hwekuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanise kuita hurukuro dzemihoro, kana kuti collective bargaining, hunonzi hwakapasiswa nedare remakurukota inzira yehurumende yekuda kuedza kunyaradza varairidzi pamwe nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vari kurwira kuti vapiwe kodzero yavo iyi, iyo iri mubumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available

headline: ARTUZ Inocherechedza Zuva reInternational Day of Decent Work Ichikurudzira Kuti Vashandi Vabatwe Zvine Hunhu muMabasa
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti kodzero yekuti munhu wese ashande basa rine hunhu inofanirwa kusimudzirwa uye kuwanikwa nemunhu wese. Kurudziro iyi inouya apo nhengo dzesangano iri dzabatana nevamwe vashandi pasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekushanda kune hunhu pasi rose, kana kuti International Day of Decent Work. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti senzira yekucherechedza zuva iri, sesangano vakwanisawo kukurudzira kuhurumende kuti sevashandi vapiwewo mihoro yakaringana inoita kuti vakwanise kurarama, uye vari pamudyandigere vawaniswe mari dzinovararamisawo. VaMasaraure vanotiwo vakwanisa kuungana vachirechedza zuva iri vari mudunhu reMashonaland East vanhu vachiita nhaurirano dzekuti zvii zvingaitwe kuti vashandi vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available Gurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanotiwo sehurumende havana kucherechedza zuva iri zviri pamutemo, asi vacharicherechedza pavachaparura munguva pfupi iri kutevera chirongwa chavari kuumba chekuti vashandi vange vari pamabasa ane hunhu, che Decent Work Program. No media source currently available Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, munyori mukuru wesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi pasi rose, reInernational Trade Unions Confederation, ITUC, Amai Sharan Burrow, vati gwaro reITUC regore ra2022 rakaratidza kuti nyika dzakawanda dziri kutyora kodzero dzevashandi, kusanganisira sarudzo dzekuita hurukuro dzemihoro kuburikidza nedzihurumende dzichinyima vashandi mukana. ITUC inoti kubva mugore ra 2005, zvinoburitswa nevashandi mumabasa zvakakwira nezvikamu makumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 37 percent, asi vashandi vachinyimwa zvehupfumi zvinowanikwa kubva mazviri kunyange hazvo vari ivo vanogadzira zvinhu zvinotarisirwa nehupfumi hwedzinyika pamwe nevagari. “Apo vashandi vane masangano anovamirira vari kuenderera mberi nekurwisana nekudzvinyirirwa kwemihoro pasi rose, tinoshandisare zuva reWorld Day for Decent Work iri kukurudzira dzihurumende kuti dzitonge dzichitevera zvinodiwa nevanhu, kwete kuramba dzichimora hupfumi kubva muvanhu dzichipa kumakambani,” Amai Burrow vakadaro. ITUC yakati mitengo yemhando dzemoto, zvekudya uye zvimwe zvinodiwa nevanhu zuva nezuva iri kukwirta nemutowo uri kuisa mamiriyoni evashandi muhurombo, uku vachiudzwa nedzimwe dzihurumende, nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nevemabhanga kuti kukwidza mihoro kuti vakwanise kurwisana nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, kana kuti inflation, hazvitambirike. MuAfrica, nyika mbiri dzinoti Egypt neEswatini ndidzo dziri panyika gumi pasi rose rinonzi sesangano reITUC dzinobatwa vashandi zvakaipisisa pasi rose mugore rino ra2022.

headline: Munhu Mumwe Anofa muHarare neChirwere cheTyphoid
text: Munhu mumwe chete anonzi akafa nechirwere che typhoid, vamwe makumi maviri nevatatu vachinzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pakatanga kuonekwa chirwere ichi muHarare mwedzi wapera. Munhu mumwe chete anonzi akafa nechirwere che typhoid, vamwe makumi maviri nevatatu vachinzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pakatanga kuonekwa chirwere ichi muHarare mwedzi wapera. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kunyange hazvo kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvose zvainokwanisa mukudzivirira kupararira pamwe nekupedza chirwere ichi, iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kwehuvandu hwevanhu vabatwa nacho. “Sekanzuru tinoti tine hurombo nekurasikirwa kwehupenyu kwakaitwa nemugari akashaya uyu, uye kuramba huwandu hwevanhu huchikwira,” VaChideme vanodaro. Chirwere ichi chakatanga kuonekwa mwedzi wapera mumisha inogara veruzhinji inoti Glen Norah, Glen View, Budiriro, Hatfield neHopley, uye chinokonzerwa nekunwa mvura isina kuchena kanawo kudya chikafu chine tsvina. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti idzidzise veruzhinji nezvenzira dzavanofanirwa kutevera kuti chirwere ichi chisaramba chichipararira, uye mapoka ose ekanzuru akatotanga kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwacho. Vanoti matanho atorwa nekanzuru yavo anosanganisira kugadzirira zvakakwana kwemapazi ekanzuru akaita serekutakurwa kwemarara pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yekunwa yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: MaChevrons omirira Sri Lanka
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) chemaChevrons chichasangana necheSri Lanka mumitambo miviri yeTest Match Series ichatambirwa kuHarare Sports Club mwedzi uno.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko musi wa19 uye uchizopera musi wa23 Ndira kozoti wechipiri uchizotanga musi wa27 uchipera musi wa31 Ndira.   Murairidzi wemaChevrons, Lalchand Rajput, anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru kumutambo uyu.   “Sri Lanka chikwata chikuru mumutambo uyu uye change chichitamba zvepamusoro kwenguva refu. Saka ndiri kutarisira zvikuru mumutambo weTest match uyu. Kwatiri kutanga patsva uye zvakatinakira kutanga nemutambo uyu wakakura sezvo unoburitsa zvipo zviri muvatambi vedu,” anodaro.   Chikwata chemaChevrons chiri kupinda mukembi svondo rino umo chichatanga kuita gadziriro dzacho.   MaChevrons akapedzisira kukwikwidza mumutambo wetest mugore ra2018 apo akasangana neBangladesh, kuBangladesh.   Rajput anoti ane chivimbo chikuru kuti chikwata chake chichatamba zvinonwisa mvura chiri pamusha.   “Tinowanzotamba zvakanaka tiri pamusha saka tine chivimbo chikuru kuti tichatamba zvinogutsa uye zvinofadza. Vatambi vedu vange vachitamba mitambo yakasiyana-siyana saka tinofanirwa kutamba zvepamusoro. Hatina hedu kutamba mitambo yakawanda asi ndinoziva vatambi vari kutarisira zvikuru mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Sri Lanka yakapedzisira kutamba nemaChevrons mumitambo yeTest match mugore ra2016 ndokuhwina mitambo yose iri miviri.   Zvakadaro, ZC yakazivisa svondo rino kuti Sean Williams ndiye achange ari kaputeni wechikwata ichi mumitambo yeTest match kozoti Chamu Chibhabha achambofanobatawo chigaro chehukaputeni mumitambo yeOne Day International neTwenty20 series.   Vaviri ava vakatsiva Hamilton Masakadza uyo akasendeka kutamba mutambo uyu gore radarika.   Masakadza ave director of cricket kuZC uye ndiye akakurudzira bhodhi reZC kuti rikwidziridze vatambi vaviri ava kuvagadza pazvigaro izvi.

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vonyunyuta neKusabuda Pachena kweHurumende Panyaya yeBhonasi
text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti ranyorera kugurukota idzva rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Priscah Mupfumira richikumbira kuitaa musangano wechimbichimbi pakati pevashandi vehurumende nehurumende kuti vajekeserwe nezvenyaya yemari dzebhonasi. Danho resangano iri rinotevera kupesana kwemashoko kwarinoti kuri kubva kuhurumende, zvichitevera kusiyana kwemazuva ari kunzi ndiwo achabhadharwa vashandi mari dzavo dzemabhonasi. Svondo rapera vaive mutevedzeri vegurukota rezvevashandi, VaTongai Muzenda vakabuda vachizivisa kuti hurumende yaizobhadhara vashandi vayo vasati vapiwa mabhonasi mwedzi unouya. VaMuzenda vakabva vadzingwa basa neSvondo nemutungamiri wenyika VaRpbert Mugabe. Asi bepanhau reChronicle rinoti Amai Mupfumira vakavimbisa kuti vamwe vashandi vachapiwa mari dzavo mwedzi uno, vanenge vasara vopiwa mwedzi unouya. Asi munyori mukuru wePTUZ VaRaymond Majongwe vanoti hurumende haina zvairi kuita kuti ifambise mashoko aya nenzira kwayo, kunze kwekuzviona mumapepanhau. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti nekuda kwekushaiwa mari yaizopa vashandi vayo mari dzemabhonasi nezvikamu zvikamu. Mauto nemapurisa vanonzi vakatopiwa kare mari dzavo muna Mbudzi. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Amai Mupfumira kanawo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Asi VaMajongwe vanoti nhengo dzavo dzicharamwa mabasa temu inouya muna 2015 kana nyaya iyi isina kugadziriswa nekukasika. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti iri kutatarika kuwana mari inoikwanira sezvo iri kuwana mari shoma iri kupinda muhomwe yayo, iyo iri kubva yangoperera kumari dzemihoro yevashandi vayo. No media source currently available VaChinamasa vakatozivisa kuti hurumende ichagumura vamwe vashandi basa nekuti haina mari yekuvabhadhara.

headline: PTUZ Yoramwa Mabasa Kutanga neChishanu
text: Rimwe remasangano anomirira vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzichatanga kuramwa mabasa mangwana richiti mari iri kutambiriswa vadzidzisi ishoma zvikuru. Izvi zvouyawo panguva iyo sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions richiti riri kuenderera mberi nekuronga kuratidzira munyika yose. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatanga kuregedza kuenda kubasa neChishanu vachiti hurumende yaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve pachikumbiro chavo chekuti iwedzere vadzidzisi mari dzemihoro dzine musoro. VaZhou vati sangano ravo rinoda kuti hurumende ivape mari inoita madhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica kana yakaringana nemari iyi ari maRTGS, kubhadharirwa mari dzechikoro dzevana vatatu pamudzidzisi wega-wega uye kupihwa masitendi ekuti vadzidzisi vakwanise kuvaka dzimba dzekugara. Danho ratorwa nePTUZ rekutanga kusaenda kubasa mangwana rinouyawo apo mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vachiti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatangawo kurega kuenda kubasa neMuvhuro uye havasi kutambira zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvekurerutsa raramo yavo zvavapihwa nehurumende. Munyori musangano rinomirira vashandi vari mune zvehutano reHealth Apex, VaEdwick Nhema, vanotiwo sezvo hurumende ichiti ine imwe mari yakasara pabhajeti renyika, inofanira kuvapa mari iyi kuitira kuti vakwanise kurarama. ZCTU inotiwo iri kuenderera mberi nekuronga kuratidzira kwakasimba munyika yose. Munyori mukuru muZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vati sangano ravo riri pakati pekunzwa pfungwa dzemasangano akawanda nezvenyaya yekuratidzira iyi vachiti kuratidzira uku kunogona kuitwa kubva svondo rinouya zvichienda mberi. Danho riri kutorwa neZCTU iri rinouyawo panguva iyo hutungamiri hweZCTU huchiti huri kutyisidzirwa nepamusana pehurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti hurumende iri kunzwa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo uye vati vari kutsvaga nzira dzekuti nhuna dzevashandi dzingagadziriswa sei kubudikidza nekutaurirana pakati pavo sehurumende nevashandi pasi peTripartite Negotiating Forum.

headline: Mapurisa Anorambidza Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Kufora Vachinyunyuta neKushungurudzwa neMapurisa
text: Mapurisa muHarare nhasi anonzi anyima mvumo yekufora kunhengo dzesangano revanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, idzo dzanga dzichida kuratidzira kwadzinoti hutsinye hwemapurisa zvichitevera kushaya kwemumwe wavo ari muhusungwa. VaTafadzwa Hilton Tamangani vakashaya vari muhusungwa kuHarare Remand Prison mushure mekusungwa pamwechete nevamwe gumi vanotengesera mumigwagwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova mupurisa. Mukuru wesangano reVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vakanga vakanyorera mapurisa neMuvhuro svondo rapera vachiazivisa nezvehurongwa hwavo hwekuda kuratidzira uhwu. Asi vanoti vazoshamisika vachiwana mhinduro inovaudza kuti tsamba yavo yakanga isiri kuwirirana nezvinodiwa nechikamu 25 chemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act (POSA) (Chapter 11:17), nekudaro vakanga vasingafanirwe kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira uku. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Asi vaWadzayi vanoti vari kupikisa danho remapurisa iri kuburikidza nekumhanyira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Inoti Haina Hurongwa hweKuumba Hurumende yeMubatanidzwa neMDC Alliance
text: Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti parizvino bato ravo harina hurongwa hwekuita hurumende nemubatanidzwa nebato reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti mukova wavo hwakavurika kuita nhaurirano naVaChamisa. Asi VaChamisa avo vakarambawo zvehurumende yemubatanidzwa vanoti hakuna munhu kubva kuhurumende kana bato reZanu-PF akauya kuzotaura navo zviri pamutemo nenyaya yenhaurirano. No media source currently available

headline: VaMwonzora Vanoti Ndivo Vave paNyanga Sezvo Vachiti Vakakunda Zvine Mutsindo
text: VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vakasarudzwa zviri pachena kutsiva mushakabva Morgan Tsvangirai semutungamiri webato reMDCT pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yakaitwa nemusi weSvondo. VaMwonzora vakakunda Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaElias Mudzuri pamwe naVaMorgan Komichi pakongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsiva mushakabvu Tsvangirai. VaMwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakakunda zviri pachena kunyange vakakundwa ava vari kugunun’una kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye Muzvare Khupe vachiti vambomisa VaMwonzora basa. Asi Amai Khupe vakaudza vatori husiku hweSvondo kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka vachiti VaMwonzora vakashandisa chikiribidi kuti vakunde musarudzo idzi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa neumwe wevaikwikwidza musarudzo idzi VaElias Mudzuri avo vatiwo mhirizhonga nekusavhota zvakanaka kwevanhu vaifanira kuvhota zvinhu zvisingatarisirwe mubato rakaita seravo. VaMudzuri vati havasi kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzanezuro vachiti chavekudikanwa ndechekuti vagare pasi sehutungamiri hwebato kuti vaone kuti votora matanho api. Mibvunzo yatatumira Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vakakwidza musarudzo idzi VaMorgen Komichi yanga isati yapindurwa. Zvichakadaro, VaMwonzora vati vatotanga basa rekuumba musangano wavo kubva zvino zvichienda mberi vakati zviri kutaurwa nevakakundwa musarudzo zvinhu zvisina musoro. Tichiri panyaya iyi, nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muMDC Alliance, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kongiresi yakaitwa neMDCT haisi pamutemo sezvo vachiti paive nevanhu vashoma panevanofanira kunge varipo. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muMDCT vanoti kusafamba zvakanaka kunonzi kwakaita kongiresi yebato iri kunogona kusiya bato iri ratsemuka zvakare. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Votenderwa Kuita Musangano Mushure Mekunge Vati Havachateereri Mapurisa
text: Mapurisa azotenda kupa mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC VaNelson Chamisa mvumo yekuti vataure kunyika hurongwa hwavanoti hwekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika kuStoddart Hall kuMbare. Bato iri rinoti hurongwa uhu hunonzi MDC’s Agenda 2020. Mapurisa azodududza mushure mekunga VaChamisa vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti vainge vaneta nekurambidzwa kuita misangano nemapurisa nekudaro vainge voenderera mberi pasina kusuma mapurisa aya. VaChamisa vaida kuparura hurongwa hwavo uyu nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera asi mapurisa akati ainge asingakwanise kuvapa mvumo achiti ainge ari kumboona kuti vana vechikoro vadzokera kuzvikoro zvavo pasina njodzi. Asi veMDC vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo mapurisa asinei nenyaya dzekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Vachitaura neStudio 7, mutevedzeri wemutauri webato iri VaLuke Tamborinyoka vati vawana tsamba kubva kumapurisa ichivazivisa kuti vaenderere mberi nehurongwa hwavo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemurongi wemabasa mubato iri vaAmos Chibaya. VaTamborinyoka vawedzerawo vati nekuoma kwakaita zvinhu munyika, VaChamisa vachange vachitsanangurira veruzhinji kuti bato ravo ririkuti chii nekutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji. Mumwe mutengesi wemumugwagwa VaDhobha Moyowatidhi vati zvakakosha kuti VaChamisa vaite hurukuro nevanhu. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute VaBekezela Gumbo vati MDC sebato rinopikisa inofanira kuratidza nyika kuti zvi zvaingaite zvakasiyana nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZanu-PF. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko VaEnergy Mutodi vati kana MDC yabvumidzwa kuita musangano wavo nemapurisa hapana angazvirambidza. Asi VaMutodi vati hapana bato rinopikisa rinokwanisa kutaura gwara renyika sezvo risina masimba ekuvandudza zvinhu Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi tsamba yabva kumapurisa iri mumaoko eStudio 7 inoti veMDC havafanire kufora vachienda kana kubva kugungano iri, kuparadza midziyo uye kutevedzera nguva yakatarwa. Gore rapera muna Mbudzi, vamwe vatsigiri veMDC vakakuvara zvakaipisisa mushure mekurohwa nemapurisa apo aida kuvarambidza kunzwa mashoko avaChamisa kunyika pasi pedingindira rekuti Hope of the Nation Address. Mapurisa gore rapera airambidzawo MDC MDC kuratidzira mune mamwe maguta munyika

headline: Ambassador Thomas Vanoti America Yakagadzirira Kushanda neZimbabwe
text: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe VaHarry Thomas vanoti nyaya yehuori uye kutonga nedemo ndiyo yapa Zimbabwe kuti iyende kumawere kwete nyaya yezvirango. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaHarry Thomas, vanoti nyaya yehuori uye kutonga nedemo ndiyo yapa Zimbabwe kuti iyende kumawere kwete nyaya yezvirango. Muhurukuro yavaita neStudio 7, VaThomas vati zvirango zvakatemerwa vanhu vashoma shoma uye America iri kudyidzana nevanhu vasiri pazvirango. Vatiwo chiri kupa kuti Zimbabwe isakwereteswe mari nenyika uye mabhanga akaita seIMF neWorld Bank inyaya yekutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti. VaThomas vatiwo America iri kubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe nechikafu uye mishonga pamwe nekudzidzisa vechidiki vemuzimbabwe. Vanotiwo vari kuvaka muzinda mukuru muzimbabwe urikuunza mabasa kuzvizvarwa zvezimbabwe. Mumiriri weAmerica uyu akurudzirawo Zimbabwe kuti isimbaradze nyaya yehutongo hwejekerere zvinosanganisa kusimbaradza kutsvaga murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaItai Dzamara uye kuita kuti bumbiro remutemo riyananiswe nemimwe mitemo. VaThomas vanoti zvizhinji zvavari kutaura zvido zvevana veZimbabwe kwete zveAmerica. Chipangamazano musangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition kuchambembe kweAfrica, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe izadzikise zvido zvevana vayo kwete kuda kungonongedza zvigunwe kune vekunze. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF kuBritain, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti zvirango zveAmerica zvauraya nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinombosendeka Mutongo Waro paChikumbiro chaVaHlalo Vakadzingwa muMDC-T
text: Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. Mumwe mutongi wedare reHigh Court muBulawayo anoti achazivisa munguva inotevera mutongo wake pachikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare iri naVaMatson Hlalo, avo vakadzingwa mubato reMDC-T pamwe nekubviswa pachigaro chekuve seneta weMzilikazi anomirira bato iri. Mushure mekunzwa neChishanu kubva kumagweta aVaHlalo pamwe neMDC-T, mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Nokhuthula Moyo, vati vachazozivisa mutongo wavo munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaHlalo vakakwidza chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi kana kuti Urgent Application kudare reHigh Court munguva pfupi yapfuura vachida kuti dare iri rimbosendeka parutivi nyaya yekudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yedare reseneti uyewo kudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yeMDC-T. Muchikumbiro chavo VaHlalo vakatiwo vanoda kuti dare rimbomisa bato reMDC-T kudoma mumwe munhu achavatsiva pahuseneta kusvika nyaya yavo yapera kunzwikwa nedare. VaHlalo, avo vari kumiririrwa naVaGodfrey Nyoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotarisira kuti dare richatambira chikumbiro chavo. Pavabvunzwa kuti havafunge here kuti hazvina zvazvinonyanyobatsira kuti vaendese nyaya iri pakati pavo nebato ravo kumatare, VaHlalo vati zvakakosha kuti bato rakaita seMDC-T iro rinoti rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, riremekedzee mutemo. VaHlalo vati bato reMDC-T harina kutevedzera gwara rebumbiro remitemo yaro pakuvadzinga kwavakaita. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. VaMwonzora vati VaHlalo vakapiwa mikana yose yange iripo yekuti vagadzirise nhunha dzavo vachitevedzera gwara rebato reMDC-T asi vakaramba kuita izvi, vachitiwo bato reMDC-T rinotarisra kuti nhengo dzaro dzitevedzere gwara remusangano. VaMwonzora vati kunyange zvavo vasingakwanise kutaurira dare zvekuita, nyaya yaVaHlalo haifanirwe kutemesa dare musoro nekuti kune nyaya dzakawanda dzakaitika dzakafanana naidzodzo vachipa muenzaniso wekudzingwa muparamende kwevaimbove munyoro mukuru webato reMDC-T, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vane chitsama mushure mekunge vadzingwa mubato reMDC-T. Kusawirirana pakati paVaHlalo nebato reMDC-T kwakatanga mushure mekunge VaHlalo vaenda kumatare vachitsvaga kuti VaGift Banda vabviswe pakuve sachigaro weMDC-T weBulawayo Province, vachiti sarudzo dzehusachigaro idzi dzaive dzisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Asi bato reMDC-T rakatsigira kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda rikati VaHlalo vaifanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo vachishandisa gwara rebato reMDC-T kwete kuenda kumatare edzimhosva. VaHlalo vachiri kupikisa kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda mumatare. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika pakati paVaHlalo neMDC-T kuri kukonzerwa nekurwira masimba kuri kuitika mubato iri mudunhu reBulawayo. VaHlalo vanonzi havadiwi nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri we MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozane Khupe, avo vanonzi vari kutsigira Va Banda. VaHlalo vanonzi vari kutsigirwa nevamwe vakuru vebato muBulawayo, avo vanonzi hvasi kutsigira zviri kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoparura Hurongwa Hwekupa Vana Nhomba yeMhetamakumbo
text: Zvichitevera kutanga kupararira kwechirwere chemhetamakumbo kune dzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, Zimbabwe nhasi yaparura hurongwa hwekupa vana nhomba yePoriyo kana kuti National Polio Vaccination Campaign. Chirongwa ichi chiri kutanga zviri pamutemo mangwana chopera musi wa 30 mwedzi uno. Chinangwa chebazi rezvehutano ndechekupa vana zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 95% pavana mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu nemazana masere kana kuti 2, 556, 800 vari pasi pemakore mashanu. Vachiparura chirongwa ichi muHarare nhasi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vaudza vatori venhau kuti chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa pachiitwa mushandira pamwe nenyika ddzinoti Zambia, Tanzania, Malawi neMozambique. Chirwere cheporiyo chakatobata vana kuMalawi nekuMozambique. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati vane chivimbo chekuti vachapa vana vakwanda nhomba iyi sezvo vari kufamba mudzimba. VaMujiri vanoti vachapa mushonga kunyange kune vana vakambopihwa sezvo dzokororo iine simba. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vanoti nyaya yenhomba yekudzivirira mhetamakumbo inofanirwa kushambadzirwa zvakakwana nyika yose kuti pasawanikwe mwana anotadza kupihwa mushonga. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemumwe chiremba uye vari mumiriri weChinhoyi mudare reparamende Dr Peter Matarutse. Sezvo chirongwa chekudzivirira mhetamakumbo chiri kuitwa munyika dzose dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr George Kambondo vanoti vari kushanda pamwechete nevehutano munyika yeZambia kuti vana vose vanenge vachidarika nepamuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi vadonhedzerwe mushonga. Zviratidzo zvekutimwana abata chirwere ichi zvinosanganisira kupindwa nechando, kuneta, kurutsa, kuoma kana kurwaziwa mutsipa uye kurwadziwa maoko nemakumbo. Nyika yakapedzisira kuita chirwere chemhetamakumbo mugore ra1998 uye ikanzi haina chirwere ichi zvachose mugore ra2005 nebazi guru reWorld Health Organisation. Chirongwa chechipiri chekudzivirira chirwere chemhetamakumbo chichaitwa kubva musiwa 1 kusvika musiwa 4 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVashandi kuChamhembe kweAfrica Roshora VaMnangagwa neKusungwa Nhengo dzeZCTU
text: Rimwe sangano revashandi kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Trade Union Coordination Council (SATUCC) rashora zvikuru mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nekusungwa kwakaitwa vakuru nenhengo dzesangamo reZimbabwe Conress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU nemusi weChina. VeZCTU ava vaida kuratidzira kusafararira mutero we kubatira vanhu masendi maviri padhora rega rega kana vachitenga zvinhu nekadhi pamari iri pasi pemadhora gumi. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri VaAustin Muneku mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vashora zvikuru VaMnangagwa avo vati pavakasarudzwa vakavimbisa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nevashandi asi havasi kuita saizvozvo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMnangagwa VaGeoerge Charamba. Asi munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti zviri pachena kuti hapana zvakawanda zvakasiyana pakati pevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe naVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Yomakidza Vapoteri Kudzokera Kumusha Kwavo
text: Hurumende yeBotswana inoti ichaita musenga bere kune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvo zviri muhupoteri munyika iyi kana zvikasasarudza kunyoresa kuti zvidzoserwe kumusha musi wa31 Zvita usati wapera. Asi hurongwa hweBotswana uhwu hwuri kushoropodzwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevapoteri avo vanoti vakatiza mhirizhonga nekumbunyikidzwa munyika nenhengo dzebato rinotonga reZANU PF. Mudzidzisi wemitemo paGaborone University College of Law and Professional Studies, VaCharles Kungwengwe, vanoti danho iri rinoratidza kuti hurumende yeBotswana hairemedzi zvisungo zvakaitwa nesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rose, reUnited Nations. Sangano rinochengetedza kodzero dzevapoteri pasi rose reUnited Nations High Commissioner of Refugees rakasunga kuti hakuna nyika inofanirwa kumanikidza kudzosera vapoteri kwavakatiza kana paine kuratidza kuti hupenyu hwavo huri munjodzi nokuda kwezvematongerwo enyika kana chii zvacho. Chisungo ichi chakaitwa musi wa23 Nyamavhuvhu 1977 chichitsigira chimwe chisungo che United Nations Convention chakaitwa muna 1951. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevapoteri uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paUniversity of Botswana, VaTakudzwa Matambo, vashoropodza danho reBotswana vachiti vapoteri ava vanogona kukwidza nyaya yavo kumatare edzimhosva vachipikisa zviri kuitwa neBotswana. Mukokeri wesangano remubatanidzwa wemapato anorwira kodzero dzevashandi muBotswana, reBotswana Federation of Trade Unions, VaGadzani Mhotsa, vanoti hurumende yeBotswana yatora danho iri isana kutsanangurira veruzhinji kuti yakaongorora here mamiriro ezvinhu muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Mutauriri wevari muhupoteri muBotswana, VaBhekimpilo Weza, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende yeBotswana haisi kuda kuteerera nhunha dzeavo vakatiza mhirizhonga yakaitika munyika mushure mesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa muna 2008. Vapoteri vari muBotswana vazhinji vakatiza kuZimbabwe muna 2008, vazhinji vavo vachiti vatsigiri veMDC vakatiza misha yavo mushure mekurayirwa hama dzavo mumhirizhonga yakaitika mugore iri. Mukuru anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevapoteri muhurumende yeBotswana, Amai Gloria Letlhage, vanoti Botswana iri kuita hurongwa uhu zviri pamutemo asi varamba kutsanangura kuti sei vachidaro. Asi Botswana inoti mupoteri anenge asina kuzvipira kudzokera ega kumusha kwake panopera gore rino, anozoita zvekumakidzwa kudzoserwa kuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa neVamwe Vakapidugura Hurumende Havana Kukokwa kuMusangano naVaBiden Uri Kutanga neChipiri
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nemusi weChipiri muWashington DC vari kuparura musangano wekudyidzana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kana kuti US-Africa leaders’ summit. Kunyangwe hazvo vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakawanda vakakokwa kumusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga havana kukokwa nenyaya dzezvirango zvavakatemerwa vachipomerwa mhosva dzekutonga nedemo. Vamwe vatungamiri vasina kukokwa nekuda kwekupidigura hurumende nechisimba vanosanganisira veSudan, Mali, Burkina Faso neGuinea avo vakambomiswa kuva nhengo dzesangano reAfrican Union. Vatungamiri makumi mana nevashanu ndivo vakakokwa kumusangano uyu. Zimbabwe inenge yakamirirwa negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe VaFrederick Shava.  Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vainge vakokwa vanonzi havachakwanise kuenda kuAmerica. VaRamaphosa vakatarisana nemhosva huru yavari kupomerwa yekuita zvehuwori vamwe vachiti vanofanira kumanikidzwa kusiya basa. Pane kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe nenyaya yezvirango iyi. Zimbabwe inoti zvapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Asi America inoti huwori nekutadza kutungamira ndiko kwapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunange kumawere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Commerce, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha kuAmerica iyo yave kusaririra munyaya dzezvekudyidzana neAfrica zvapa mukana wakakura kuRussia neChina. Asi hurumende yeAmerica inoramba kuti kuda kukwikwidzana neChina neRussia ndicho chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzonetsa neNyaya yeMishonga yeChivanhu
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kungwarira kusashandisa mishonga inenge isina kubva kuna vana chiremba vakadzidzira kuita basa rekupa vanhu mishonga inorapa zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana. Kurudziro iyi inouya mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vava kushandisa mishonga yechivanhu sezvo vari kutadza kuwana mishonga zvichitevera mari yekunze yavasina, iyo iri kudiwa nezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Mumwe chiremba anoshanda nekiriniki yePublic Medical Services International, Dr Sydney Mukonoweshuro, vari kukurudzira zvikuru vanorwara neHigh Blood Pressure pamwe nechirwere cheshuga kuti vasashandisa mishonga yechivanhu isina kuongororwa, sezvo mishonga iyi ichikwanisa kuwedzera kuvhiringa hupenyu hwemurwere. Kunyange hazvo munyika musina mari yekunze, Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti hazvina kunaka zviri kuitwa nezvitoro zvemishonga zvinoomesera vakwegura nekuvabhadharisa madhora ekuAmerica. Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuumba homwe yemari inotenga mishonga yeshuga nokuti murwere haafanirwe kupedza mazuva maviri asina kupihwa mushonga we insulin. Asi maonero aDoctor Mukunoweshuro anopesana zvikuru nemaonero aSister Yulittah Chirawu, avo vanoshanda neNature Is The Pharmarcy, iyo iri pasi pechita cheLittle Children of Our Blessed Lady. Sister Chirawu vanoti mishonga yema herbs iri kubatsira zvikuru varwere veshuga nezvimwe zvirere zvakasiyana siyana. Sister Chirawu, avo vakadzidzira kushandiswa kwema herbs kuBritain, vanoti donzvo rekereke yavo yeRoman Catholic, nderekubatsira vanhu vanoshaya, zvikuru madzimai kuitira kuti varapwe zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana vachibhadhara mari shoma. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti zvakakosha kuti munhu ane chirwere cheshuga apote achinwa mishonga nguva dzose, kuitira kuti asawedzere kuvhiringa hutano hwake. Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti sezvo munyika muine dambudziko remari yekunze, zvakakosha panguva ino kuti hama dziri kunze kwenyika dzibatsire hama dziri kumusha nekudzitengera mishonga inogona kushandiswa kwemwedzi mitatu, kana kudzitumira mari yekunze. Masangano anoshanda munyaya dzehutano muZimbabwe ari kukurudzirawo kuti zvirwere zveshuga ne BP, zvirapwewo pachena sezvinoitwa zvimwe zvirwere. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebazi rezvehutano pakurudziro iri kuitwa iyi. Asi vachitaura nguva pfupi yapfuura pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vakati bazi ravo rakanzi richapihwa chidimbu chemari yarakanga rakumbira yebhiriyoni imwechete nemazana matatu emamiriyoni emadhora mubhajeti regore rinouya. VaGwinji vakati izvi zvichatadzisa bazi ravo kuita basa raro nemazvo, uye kutadza kuwanisa mishonga kuvanhu vanoshaya. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva pavanhu gumi, ane chirwere cheshuga muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinoreva kuti zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvevanhu vemuZimbabwe, vane chirwere cheshuga. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Yopemha Imwe Mari Yekubatsira Vanhu Mamiriyoni Mana muZimbabwe
text: Bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvechikafu reWorld Health Organization raisa chikumbiro cheimwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemana kana kuti US$204 million yekubatsira vanhu mamiriyoni mana vemuZimbabwe vatarisana nenzara. Nzara iyi iri kukonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura, kukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu uye chirwere cheCovid-19 chapa kuti vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa. Nyaya yekuoma kwezvinhu iri kuuya hayo apo gurukoota rezvemari Muzvinafund Mthuli Ncube vari kuti mitengo yezvinhu iri kudzika. WFP inoti mwedzi yakaomesesa iri kutanga ikozvino kusvika muna Kurume gore rinouya apo vanhu vanenge votanga kukohwa. Vanhu vari kutarisirwa kuti vanenge vatarisana nenzara mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti 6,9 million. Huwandu uhu hunosanganisirawo vanhu mamiriyomi maviri nezvuru mazana matatu mumadhorobha vatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Mumiriri weWFP muZimbabwe Amai Francesca Erdelmann vanoti mari iyi ikasawanikwa nechimbi chimbi vanhu mamiriyoni mana vanoyaura nenzara zvisina mukare akamboona. Ongororo yakaitwa nehurumende nemamwe masangano inonzi ZIMVAC inoti vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7,6 million vakatarisana nenzara munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoti Vashandi Vayo Vakabaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Ndivo Chete Vachabvumidzwa kuMabasa
text: Hurumende inonzi yakasunga neChipiri kuti vashandi vose vehurumende vachabvumidzwa kuenda kumabasa chete kana vachinge vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 ichiti vakapiwa nguva yakareba yekuti vakwanise kubaiwa. Izvi zvakaziviswa negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota muHarare. Vemakereke vanonziwo vave kubvumidzwa kupinza chidimbu chepakati chenhengo dzekereke dzavo kana chete vatendi ava vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mamwe makungano akaita semichato nendufu anonzi vanhu vanobvumidzwa kuungana vachiri pazana sezvo zvichinzi zvinonetsa kuona kuti vanhu vari kuungana vakabaiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo hurumende yabvumidzawo kutanga kwemitambo yose, uye nguva dzemitambo dzakaiswa pakati penguva dza 6 dzemangwanani nenguva dza 8 dzemanheru kuitira kupa mukana vanoenda kumabasa. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChipiri kuti vanhu vanomwe (7) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu mazana mana negumi nevasere (418) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina zvine mazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu kana kuti (4 550). Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga hwakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nemazana masere ane gumi nevanomwe kana kuti (126 817). Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi hwakawanikwa mumatunhu anoti Mashonaland East, Midlands, Matabeleland South neMasvingo, uko kwakwawanikwa vana vechikoro vakawanda vaine Covid-19. Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neChipiri, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamirioni maviri ane zviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti (2, million 873,893). Vakanga vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vakanga vave miriyoni imwe chete, ine zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti (1,926,247). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Vanhu Vobvumidzwa Kupinza Munyika Pachena Zvinhu Zvine Mutengo we$200 Chete
text: Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40%. Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika munyaya dzezveupfumi kunonzi kuri kupa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvirambe zvichipinza munyika zvekudya nezvimwe zvekushandisa zuva nezuva kubva kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBotswana. Izvi zvinoitika kunyange hazvo paine mutemo weStatutory Instrument 64, uyo unorambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu zvine huwandu munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, reIntrenational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti kunyange hazvo paine mutemo uyu, vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra, vari pamuganhu weBeitbridge vane zvimwe zvavari kubvumidza kupinzwa munyika. VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvinokosha madhora mazana maviri chete pamunhu, ndizvo zvinobvumidzwa kupinda munyika pasina mutero. Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40 %. Asi VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvakaita sezvekuvakisa, mabhara nezvimwe zvihombe hazvisi kubvumidzwa munyika pasi pemutemo weSI 64 uyu. Vanotiwo mitsetse yevanhu vanoda kupinda muZimbabwe pabhodha reBeitbridge, zvikuru kudivi reSouth Africa, hapachina sezvo South Africa yakawedzera vashandi. Asi vanoti vari kufamba vari kusangana nematambudziko ekukwidzwa kwemari dzekubhadhara kumabhazi, vachiti semuenzaniso, kubva ku Johannesburg kunosvika kuHarare vanhu vari kubhadhariswa mari inosvika marhandi mazana masere. No media source currently available

headline: VaMohadi Vokuridziva Vanhu Kuti Vasimbaradze Kuzvidzivirira Kubva kuCoronavirus
text: Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi nemusi weChina vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa chirwere checovid19 icho chiri kubata vanhu vakawanda munyika nepasi rose. VaMohadi vanova sachigaro wekomiti yekurwisa chirwere ichi kana kuti Covid 19 Taskforce vainge vaine mamwe makurukota ehurumende vachishanyira kuChinhoyi University of Technology (CUT) vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vapfeke zvekuzvidzivirira muromo nemhuno kana kuti maface masks. VaMohadi vati chirwere cheCovid-19 chakaita kuti vanhu vamuke nekushandisa ruzivo rwavainarwo kupedza matambudziko ari munyika kusanganisira zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira hutachiona hwecoronavirus. Asi mumwe mushandi anogadzira maface masks paCUT asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti mari yavari kuhoreswa ishoma zvikuru zvichienzaniswa neyavari kuwana kana vatengesa zvavanenge vagadzira. Mushandi uyu anoti vari kupihwa mari zvichienderana nekuti vagadzira maface masks mangani achiti mari yakawanda yaakatambira madhora zviuru zvishanu-ZWL$5 000 asi anoti vakambotambira ZWL$300. CUT iri kugadzira maface masks zviuru zvitatu pazuva zvinovapa madhora zviuru mazana matanhatu pamwedzi ZWL$600 000 sezvo face mask imwechete ichitengeswa nemadhora makumi mashanu. Panyaya yekuti sei paCUT paine maface masks nemasanitizer akawanda zvimwe zvipatara zvichiti hazvina zvinhu izvi, mutauriri weCUT VaMusekiwa Tapera vanoti akatengwa kari akamirira kuzotorwa. VaTapera vatadza kuti taurira kuti vakambopihwa marii nehurumende yekutanga kugadzira zvikwanisiro zvinoderedza kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaHlatshwayo vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti vamwe vana nevarikunyoresa bvunzo vari kushaya maface masks asi achigadzirwa muzvikoro. VaHlatshwayo vanotiwo zviri kuitika mukutenga zvikwanisiro zvinoratidza kuti huori hwatekeshera muhurumende. Vamwe vapinda musangano wanhasi vanoti hazvina kujeka kuti ndiani chaiye ari kuwana mari pakutengeswa kwezvikwanisiro zviri kugadzirwa muzvikoro kana zvichitadza kupanana zvikwanisiro. No media source currently available

headline: Zim yochema Shaya
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa munhabvu, varairidzi nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu vochema zvikuru zvichitevera kushaika kwakaita George “Mastermind” Shaya nemusi weChipiri svondo rino.   Shaya, uyo ange ave nemakore 77 okuberekwa, ange ave nenguva ndefu achisimbirwa nemuviri wake izvo zvakaona achidamburwa gumbo rekurudyi mugore ra2019 mushure mekutambudzwa nechirwere chepasi petsoka chinozivikanwa nekuti “gangrene”.   Achinyora paFacebook, aimbove mubati wepagedhi weDynamos FC — Japhet “Shortcat” Mparutsa — anoti akawaniswa mukana wekutamba muchikwata chimwechete naShaya uyo waakaona hunyanzvi hwake kunyangwe hazvo panguva iyi Shaya ange ave pedyo nekusendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba nhabvu.   “Ndaive nemakore 18 pandakabva kuHarare Hospital Football Club ndichienda kuDynamos mugore ra1981. Panguva iyi, Mudhara George, sekumushevedza kwataimuita, ange ave pedyo nekusiya nhabvu. Vatambi vekumutsiva vange vatotsvagwa avo vaive Steve Kwashi pamwechete naJuly “Jujuju” Sharara. “Vaviri ava vaive neshangu huru dzekupfeka. Vakaedzawo zvavo asi kutaura chokwadi kwaingova naGeorge Shaya mumwechete. Murume uyu aidadisa uye ange asingatsivike. Hakuna mumwe aitamba saye,” anodaro Mparutsa.   Imwe shasha yakambotambira Dynamos zvekare — Taurai Mangwiro — anoti nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaika kwaShaya uyo akaita kuti vatambi vazhinji vade nhabvu. “Ndichikura ndaiziva kuti kuna George Shaya uye hakuna munhu aisingamuzive nekuti mudhara tarenda vaive naro uye vaigona zvikuru.   “Tarwadziswa zvikuru nekusiiwa kwataitwa namudhara wedu. Zororai murugare mudhara Shaya,” anodaro Mangwiro.   Mutambi wenhabvu, Hardlife Zvirekwi, anoti rufu rwaShaya rwamubata sezvo aidzidza zvakawanda kubva kwaari.   “Nhoroondo yenhabvu yemuZimbabwe hatikwanise kutaura nezvayo tichisiya zita raShaya. Kana munhu ukakwanisa kuhwinwa mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu, zvinofanirwa kurumbidzwa zvikuru nekuti panenge pabatwa basa. Ini ndakahwinawo mubairo uyu kamwechete uye ndoziva kuti kuuhwina unenge washanda nesimba chaizvo. Manje Shaya akauhwina kashanu izvo zvinotaridza hunyanzvi hwaaive naho mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Zvirekwi.   Achinyorawo paFacebook, shasha yekutsigira nhabvu ine mukurumbira — Chris “Romario” Musekiwa — anoti nyika yose yarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaika kwaShaya.   “Kuti azopihwa zita rekuti Mastermind yange iri nyaya yehunyanzvi hwake hwaaiita munhabvu, akaita kuti vatambi vazhinji vade mutambo uyu uye ndiye ega mutambi akakwanisa kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu.   “Tine hurombo kumhuri yake, madzisahwira ake uye vatsigiri venhabvu vose nekurasikirwa kwataita naShaya.   “Tinoda kuti mhuri yake izive kuti tiri kuchema nayo panguva ino inorwadza,” anodaro Romario. Zvakadai, chikwata cheDynamos FC chakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) chichikumbira kuti Shaya apihwe chiremerera chekuva gamba renyika.   Pachinyorwa chakaiswa padandemutande reDeMbare, chikwata ichi chinoti Shaya anokodzera kuve gamba renyika kuburikidza nebasa guru raakabata mumutambo wenhabvu.

headline: Vakarwira Rusununguko Vokurudzirwa Kurapwa Pfungwa
text: Apo nyika iri kugadzirira kupemberera kusvitsa makore makumi matatau neshanu nyika yawana kuzvitonga neMugovera, imwe nyanzvi yezvirwere zvepfungwa inoti pane vamwe vanhu vakawanda vakarwira rusununguko vasina kuwana rubatsiro rwekuvhenekwa pfungwa dzavo kuti vaonekwe kana vaine zvirwere zvinosaririra mupfungwa mushure mehondo kana tsaona. Nyanzvi yezvirwere zvepfungwa mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Sekayi Nyiwatiwa, vanoti dambudziko rezvirwere zvepfungwa zvinokonzerwa nezvakasangana nemunhu muhondo kana kuti mutsaona, Post Traumatic Stress Disaorder, PTSD, zviri kuwanda munyika. Dr Nyiwatiwa, avo vanoshanda kuchipatara che Parirenyatwa kubazi rezvepfungwa, vanoti zvirwere izvi zvinowanikwa muvanhu vakasiyana siyana kusanganisira vamwe vaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti asi vazhinji vevanhu ava havazivi kuti vanofanirwa kurapwa kuitira kuti dambudziko rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa ripere. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti ruzhinji rwevanhu vakarwa muhondo yeChimurenga pavakadzoka, havana kuwana rubatsiro rwunofanirwa kupihwa kuvanhu vanenge vasangana nezvinotyisa, kana zvinosiya pfungwa dzavo dzisina kugadzikana. Kunyange hazvo makore makumi matatu nemashanu apfuura, Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti vose vanonetsekana nepfungwa vanofanirwa kuenda kunoona vana mazvikokota, kana kuenda kuzvipatara zviri pedyo navo vobatsirwa. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti munhu ane PTSD anoonekwa nekuvhunduka apo anorangarira zvakaitika kare, kushaya hope, kubuda dikita kana akarara, pamwe nekutaura ega nezvimwewo. Sangano reUnited Nations Commission for Refugees rinoti chirwere ichi chinobata mamiriyoni nemariyoni evanhu vanobva muhondo pasi rose. Vaimbove murwiri werusununguko, uye vari nhengo yeparamende, Amai Irene Zindi, vanoti ivo neruzhinji rwevamwe vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko pavakadzoka kubva kuhondo havana kuenda kunotariswa kuti vakange vane chirwere ichi here. Amai Zindi, avo vaizivikanwa muhondo nezita rekuti "Jilly Flamingo," vanoti vane zvizhinji zvavakaona muhondo zvinovashaisa hope pari zvino. Vanoti vanga vasingazive kuti ichi chinogana kunge chiri chirwere. Amai Zindi vanoti zvanga zvisiri nyore kuva muhondo uye vamwe vavo vazhinji vari kutambura pari zvino zvekuti havasi kufunga zvekuenda kunotsvaga rubatsiro rwekurapwa zvirerwe zvepfungwa. Hurumende yakaita chirongwa chekupodza maronda kuburikidza nekubhadhara munhu kukuvara kwaakaita muhondo, pasi pechirongwa che War Victims Compensation Fund. Asi chirongwa ichi chakapedzwa mari nevanhu vasingakodzero sezvo vazhinji vakanyepa kukuvara kwavo mushure mekuongororwa namuchakabvu Dr Chenjerai Hunzvi, avo vakabvuma pamberi pekomisheni yakaferefeta huori hwakaitwa muchirongwa ichi, kuti pazuva vaigona kuongoorora vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri. Chirongwa ichi chakabastira vamwe varwiri verusununguko asi mari zvinji inonzi yakadyiwa nevakuru vakuru munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, avo vanosanganisira mukuru wemapurisa, Va Augustine Chihuri, pamwe nehanzvadzi yemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, muchakabvu Reward Marufu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzepfungwa dzinoti hukasha hunoburitswa nema War Vets dzimwe nguva, muratidzo mukuru wekuti vamwe vavo vanoda kurapwa nana chiremba kuitira kuti vagare zvakanaka nevamwe muhupenyu. Vaimbove varwiri verusununguko vazhinji vanoti havasi kuona chavakarwira muhondo sezvo vamwe vavo vari kunonga svosve nemuromo, uye vamwe vaine zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinovashungurudza zuva nezuva hurumende pasina chairi kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Orova Madzibaba VeShanduko, Uko Zanu-PF Ichinzi Yoshungurudza veCCC
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti munyika maberekera ingwe zvichitevera kushungurudzwa kuri kuita nhengo dzaro kwasara vhiki rimwe chete kuti nyika iende kusarudzo. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburitsa padandemutande raro reTwitter kuti VaGodfrey Chidhawu Karembera nhengo yebato reCitizens Coalition for Change (CCC) vanozivikanwa nekuti Madzibaba veShanduko varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa kukamba yeHarare Central. ZLHR inotiwo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekusazvibata zvakanaka paruzhinji vachinzi vanga vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere VaNelson Chamisa veCCC. Bazi rezvekubuditswa kwemashoko ratiwo padandemutande retwitwer pari kuitwa tsvakurudzo nezvenyaya yekusabatwa zvakanaka kwaVakarembera vari mumaoko emapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ari kuongorora nyaya yekuti VaKarembera varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa uye imwe nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vange vachitsvaga rutsigiro zvisina mvumo yemapurisa nekunzwiwo vatuka mapurisa pavange vachida kusungwa. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vatiwoimwe nhengo yavo Amai Thokozile Dube varikuda kutsvaka chigaro chehukanzura kuUmzingwane ward 20 avkarara vachishungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Mune imwewo nyaya, Bato reZanu PF rinoti rinoda kukunda sarudzo zvakachena uye ishuviro yavo kuti mapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika akwanise kutsvaka rutsigiro murunyararo. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare, vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika mubato reZanu PF, VaMike Bimha vati bato reZanu PF rinoda kuti mapato ese avachakwikwidzana nawo musarudzo vatsvake rutsigiro vakasununguka huye kusina mhirizhonga. VaBimha vakakurudzira mapurisa kuti aite basa nemazvo mukuferefeta nyaya dzine chekuita nemhirizhonga. Vatiwo bato reZanu PF ririkushandisa sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa munaKurume sechiyero kuona kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zviri kutsigirwa here. Vaenderera mberi vachiti bato ravo ratotangawo kupa ruzivo kune avo vachange vari panzvimbo dzekuvhoterwa kana kuti mapolling agents. Asi Muzvare Mahere vati muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo Zanu-PF ichingotaura chete kuti haidi mhirizhonga asi nekune rimwe divi ichiipesvedzera. Nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika VaSydicks Muradzikwa vatiwo mamwe mapato munyika haasi kupiwa mukana wekutsvaka rutsigiro. Sarudzo dzemaby-elections dzirikutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa26 Kurume.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoparura Chirongwa Chekubatsira Vanoshandisa Zvinodhaka Pachena
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzaparura chirongwa chekuongorora pachena zvinodhaka mumiviri memunhu kuyedza kupedza dambudziko ratekeshera munyika rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi Abused Substances Diagnostics & Manangement Project chichapa vanhu zvikwanisiro kana kuti (test kits) ekuona mhando yezvinodhaka zvinenge zvashandiswa. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, vaFanwell Dzoma vanoshanda kubazi rinoona nezvevashandi uye vataura vakamiririra mushandirapamwe wemapazi ehurumende mukuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka kana kuti Inter-ministerial Taskforce on Drug and Substance Abuse varumbidza zvikuru chirongwa chaparurwa ichi. VaDzoma vati ongororo yakaitwa munyika irikuratidza kuti zvikamu zvinodarika makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana zvevechidiki chirikushandisa zvinodhaka. Vachange vachitungamirira chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vari mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vati chakanakira chirongwa ichi ndechekuti munhu anozviongorora ega. VaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakamboshandisawo zvinodhaka vakazovamba sangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Pamumvuri rinobatsirawo vanoshandisa zvinodhaka varumbidzawo chirongwa ichi. Muzvare Chengeto Nyanzira vanoshanda nekambani yeFaStep inova kambani ichange ichiwanisa zvekuongoreresa zvinodhaka izvi vati vanhu vachazviongorora vachishandisa weti yavo. Pasi pechirongwa ichi pachaitwawo dzidziso yekukurudzira vanhu kuti vasashandise zvinodhaka izvio zvinozokanganisa hupenyu hwavo vamwe vachifa kana kupenga. Masangano akasiyana siyana abatana muchirongwa ichi anosanganisira hurumende, University of Zimbabwe Health Sciences, Zimbabwe College of Pathology, FaStep, Pamumvuri nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Politburo yeZanu-PF Yozeya Nyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Bato reZanu-PF nemusi weChitatu rakaita musangano waro wePolitburo richizeya nyaya dzezvekuratidzira kuri kuitwa munyika uye nyaya yehupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere.
