Vane ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato iri riri kuda kusimbaradza mapurisa kuti amise kuratidzira munyika kuri kutungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa. Bato iri range richitarisirwawo kuzeyawo nyaya yekudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo mubato, gadziriro munyaya dzekurima uye kugadzira sarudzo dzekuNorton ne Chimanimani West kune nhengo dzebato iri dzakadzingwa uye kuBikita West kuna VaMunyaradzi Kereke vari kupika jere mushure mekubata mwana mudiki chibharo. NeChishanu bato iri richaita musangano weCentral komiti kuzeya nyaya idzi zvekare. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF VaIgnatious Chombo vati mutungamiri webato iri VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vanenge vari sachigaro mumisangano miviri iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaJoy Mabenge vanoti havaone Zanu-PF ichibuda nemazano anovaka nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vane Hama Dziri kuKuwait Voshushikana neKubatwa Kwadziri Kuitwa seNhapwa
text: Vamwe ambuya vane muzukuru akaenda kunotsvaga basa kuKuwait vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nemagariro ari kuita muzukuru wavo mushure mekunge pabuda mashoko ekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaenda kunyika iyi zviri kubatwa senhapwa. Ambuya ava vasina kuda kudomwa nezita asi vati vanoda kunzi Amai Ndoro vanoti muzukuru wavo ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe uye iye nevamwe vasikana vemuHarare vakanyeperwa kuti kwakange kuine mabasa kuKuwait asi vave kubatwa sevaranda. "Tirikushushikana sezvo tisina kana ruzivo kuti muzukuru aripi uye hapana arikuda kubuda pachena kuti zvirikufamba seyi kuKuwait ikoko. Tinongonzwa kuti kuri kudiwa mari inosvika $3 000 nemasponsor akapinza muzukuru wedu basa kuti akwanise kuregererwa kuti adzoke kumusha," Ambuya Ndoro vaudza Studio7. Muzukuru waAmbuya Ndoro mumwe wechitsama chemadzimai nevanasikana vakanyeperwa kuti vaizowana mafuro manyoro kuKuwait uko vakange vanzi vachapihwa mari svinu uye vachashanda mumahotera izvo zvisina kuzoitika. "Zvirikunyanya kurwadza ndezvekuti hatisati tawana mukana wekutaura nemuzukuru wedu kubvira pa Easter uye tinonzwa kuti akabviswa paaimboshanda mushure mekunge vana amai vake vamhan'ara kumapurisa muno muZimbabwe nezvange zvichiitika kuKuwait." Vakaenderera mberi vachiti, "Kunyangwe zvazvo pane makoronyera akamiswa pamberi pedare achipomherwa mhosva yekunyepera madzimai nevanasikana kuti kwange kune mabasa akanaka vanhu ava vakabhadhariswa mari dzechibatiso uye vari panze pari zvino izvo zviri kutirwadza,"Ambuya Ndoro vakadaro. Vamwe vasikana vakakwanisa kutiza kwavaishanda vakawana rubatsiro kubva kumuzinda we Zimbabwe uri muKuwait asi parizvino vakawanda vacho havana mari dzekutenga matikiti ekufambisa. Ambuya Ndoro vanoti kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakagadza Ministerial Committee yekutarisa zvirikuitika kuKuwait vanoda kuti vabereki vemadzimai nevana sikana ava vasangane negungano iri kuitira kuti vature nhunha dzavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhurumende asi vamwe vashandi vekumuzinda weZimbabwe uri muKuwait vangavasingade kuzivikanwa vakati dambudziko iri rakadzika midzi munyika iyi uye vari kushanda nevavo vanenge vakwanisa kubata hofisi yavo. Ambuya Ndoro vanoti shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti makoronyera emuZimbabwe nevari kuKuwait vavharirwe muchizarira uye kuti vanasikana nemadzimai vanoda kudzokera kumusha vadzoswe nechimbi chimbi. "Nyaya dzekuti panofanirwa kubhadharwa mari kumasponsor inofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti avo vanenge vachida kudzoka kumusha vadzoswe pachena," Ambuya Ndoro vakaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yave Kumbomira Kupa Vanhu Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko nekutepfenyura, Dr Chris Mushowe, vanoti hurumende inogona kumbomira kupa marezenezi ekutepfenyura kumaredhiyo zvichitevera kutadza kuenda pamhepo kwemarhedhiyo matanhatu pamaredhioyo masere akapihwa marezeni muna 2013. VaMushowe vakaudza nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mudare reparamende nemusi weChina kuti zvinhu zvakaoma munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye zviri kubatawo vemaredhiyo uye vanofunga kuti zvingave nane kuzotanga kupa marezenisi kana zvinhu zvagadzikana munyaya dzeehupfumi. VaMushowe vati pane vemaredhiyo masere vakapihwa marezenisi muna 2013, maviri chete anoti Diamond FM yekwaMutare yeZimpapers ne Ya FM yeRay of Hope yekuZvishavane ndidzo dzega dzakakwanisa kuenda pamhepo. Mutemo unosungira kuti redhiyo ienda pamhepo mukati megore nemwedzi misere yapihwa rezenesi. Kana izvi zvikasaitika rezensi rinobva ratorwa. Maredhiyo station anoti Faya FM yekuGweru ne Gogogoi FM yekuMasvingo eAB Communications, Breeze FM yeku Victoria Falls neSkyz Metro FM yekuBulawayo ekambani yeFairtalk Communications pamwe ne Nyaminyami FM yekuKariba neKE100.4E yemuHarare ekambani yeKingston ndiwo asati aenda pamhepo uye VaMushowe vati achatorerwa marezenisi mwedzi miviri inotevera kana akasaenda pamhepo. Vanoona nezvekutepfenyura musangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe Chapter muzvare Kholiwe Nyoni Majama vanoiti zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende hazvina kunaka uye uye Zimbabwe Broadcasting Authority ingadai yakaongorora kuti makambani aya ane mari here isati yaapa marezenesi. Vanotiwo mari yakabhadhariswa makambani neveBAZ yemadhora zviuru zvinomwe kuti apihwe marezenisi yakawandisa zvikuru. Mukuru weMediaCentre, VaEnerst Mudzengi vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti izvi zvinoratidza pachena kuti vanhu kana kuti makambani akapihwa marezenisi ange asingakodzeri. Kana nhengo dzeparamende dzatiwo dzakashamiswa kuti kambani yakaita seKingstons ingapihwe rezenesi rekutepfenyura asi iyo ichitoomerwa nebasa rekutengesa mabhuku. Zvichakadai VaMushowe vati hurumende ichapa marezenisi emaredhiyo ekumatunhu kana kuti macommunity radido stations kana chirongwa cheDigitilisation chichinge chapera. Chirongwa ichi chaifanirwa kunge chakapera muna Kurume gore rino uye chakatadza kupera nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemari. Gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa vakaudzawo komiti iyi kuti hurumende haina mari yekuita chirongwa ichi uye havazivi kuti mari yacho vachaiwana rini. Vati pari zvino hurumende ine chikwereti chemamiriyoni makumi maviri kukambani iri kuita chirongwa ichi uye iri kutsvaga mari yekubhadhara kambani iyi. Muzvare Majama Nyoni vanoti mashoko aVaMushowe anoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haisikuda kupa marezensi enhepfenyuro dzematunhu. Chirongwa cheDigitilisation chinoita kuti nyika ikwanise kuva nhenhepfenyuro dzemaredhiro neterevhizheni dzakawanda. Zimbabwe inoda mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora kuita chirongwa ichi asi nyanzvi dzinoti mari yacho ichawedzera kana chirongwa ichi chikasaitwa nekukasika. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa Roburitsa Huori paKutsvaga Rutsigiro muSarudzo
text: Sangano re Anti-corruption Trust of Southern Africa (ACT-Southern Africa) rakabuditsa gwaro rinoburitsa pachena kubiridzirwa kwarinoti kuri kuitwa sarudzo nevamwe vari kukwidza. Zvinonzi vamwe vari kushandisa zvekudya, zvicherwa uye dzimotokari mukuyedza kutenga mavhoti. Mukuru we sangano re Anti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa VaAlouis Munyaradzi Chaumba vanoti kutengwa kwemavhoti kwanyanya ku dunhu reKwekwe uko kwavanoti zviri kuitwa pachena chena nevamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dziri kuuya. Vati kune mumwe wevanoita zve kuchera goridhe ane mukurumbira ari kutengera hutungamiriri dzimotokari iri nzira yekuvatenga nayo kuti awane rutsigiro. Kunonzi kune vazhinji vari kugara mudzimba dzekuroja vakavimbiswa kubhadharirwa mari dzerendi. Vamwewo vakabatsirwa kunobvuta migodhi ye goridhe zvine chisimba kumugodhi weGlobe & Phoenix uri mu Kwekwe makare. Vechidiki vanonzi vari kushandisirwa doro nezvimwe zvinodhaka kuti vateverere vari kuda kutsigirwa musarudzo dziri kuuya idzi. Mumwe anoshandawoi naVaChaumba, VaObert Chinhamo vakatiwo izvi zvinowanzokonzera nyonga nyonga nekurwisana kana vadhakwa zvoshaya chazvinobatsira. Sangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa rinoti harizorori kuongorora nekumhan’ara zvose zviri kuitika.

headline: Vorwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka nemitambo
text: MURAIRIDZI wenhabvu yevechidiki arizve sachigaro weMbare Junior League, Stanley Kavayi, obatana nekereke yeRoyal Assembly International Ministries mukusimudzira vechidiki kuburikidza nemitambo nechinangwa chekurwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka.   Kavayi ari kushanda naProphet Emmanuel Ngoshi vechechi iyi uye vaviri ava vari kuronga mitambo inosanganisira nhabvu, netball, volleyball nebasketball senzira yekusimudzira matarenda evechidiki pamwe nekuvaendesa kuchikoro.   Kavayi, uyo anotungamira nekurairidza chikwata cheReal Stars Mbare, anoti kutorwa kwezvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri zvakadai semutoriro, gukamakafela, crystal merth, mbanje nebronco kuri kukanganisa vechidiki zvakanyanya. Anoti dambudziko iri rapambirawo kuvanasikana sezvo vamwe vavo vave kutora zvinodhaka izvo zviri kukanganisa remangwana ravo apo vanozosvika pakupihwa pamuviri votadza kuenderera mberi nedzidzo.   “Tine vechidiki vakawanda avo ramangwana ravo riri kukanganisika zvikuru nekuda kwekutorwa kwezvinodhaka nezvimwe zvakasiyana. Vechidiki vakangosiiwa vasina zvekuita vari vega vanofuririka vopedzisira vave kutora zvinodhaka. Ipapo hupenyu hwavo hunoenda mudondo saka takabatana naProphet Ngoshi donzvo riri rekuti tiwanire vechidiki ava zvekuita tivabvise mukatsika kekutora zvinodhaka hupenyu hwavo hufambire mberi zvakanaka.   “Tiri kushanda nevasikana zvekare nekuti hatidi kuvasiya, tinoda kuti vawaniswe mikana seinongopihwa vanakomana. Vanasikana vazhinji vari kusiira chikoro panzira vapihwa pamuviri, saka tiri kuvasimudzira mune zvemitambo kuti vambosiye zvekufunga zvebonde izvo zvinoita kuti vapihwe pamuviri nguva isati yakwana,” anodaro.   Kavayi anoti vari kushanda zvekare nevaimbi vane mukurumbira vakaita saBaba Harare, Peter Moyo naMai Titi avo vanoshevedza vachidzidzisa vechidiki ava.   “Vaimbi vane izwi rine simba saka tinovashevedza nguva nenguva vachiuya kuzotaura nevatambi vechidiki vachivakurudzira kuti vagare hupenyu hwakachena, zvinobatsira mukurwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka,” anodaro Kavayi.   Prophet Ngoshi vanoti danho iri vari kuritora nechinangwa chekuvaka vechidiki kuti remangwana ravo rive rakajeka.   “Zvinodhaka zviri kukanganisa vechidiki uye zvinorwadza kuona vachikanganiswa matarenda avainavo nekuda kwezvinodhaka. Saka donzvo redu kuvaka matarenda evanakomana nevanasikana kuti vaite zvemitambo tivabvise kune zvinodhaka zvinokanganisa zvakaita semutoriro, guka, crystal merth nezvimwe zvakawanda.   “Vana vakatanga kutamba mitambo, pfungwa dzekutora zvinodhaka hadzimbouye uye hupenyu hwavo hunotodzoredzeka zvakanaka,” vanodaro Prophet Ngoshi.

headline: America Yoramba Ichirwisa Kumanikidzwa kweVanhu Kuita Mabasa Avasingade Kuita
text: Sechiratidzo chekuti hurumende yeAmerica yakazvipira kurwisa kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingade kune dzimwe nyika, bazi rezvekudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika, rakaburitswa gwaro rechimakumi maviri rekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vanoendeswa kudzimwe nyika vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingade, kana kuti 20th Annual Trafficking in Persons Report, kana kuti TIP Report, musi wa 25 Chikumi. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwegwaro iri, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaMike Pompeo, vakati kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachiendeswa kune dzimwe nyika, kunosanganisira kuitiswa mabasa epabonde pamwe nekushanda mamwe mabasa munhu achimanikidzwa, uye izvi zviri kuramba zvichiitika pasi rose. “Pane zvanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu vari kumanikidzwa kuita mabasa avasingade uye kuitiswa mabasa epabonde pasi rose. Kudzikisira hunhu hwevanhu zvakadaro hazvitambirwe, tose takasikwa tiri mufananidzo yaMwari. Mabasa akadai ndeehutsinye.” Gore rapera, mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakamisa rumwe rubatsiro kudzihurumende gumi neshanu idzo dziri mugwaro re 2019 Tip Report. Muna Ndira gore rino, VaTrump vakati America yakanga yadira mari inoita mazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora mukurwisa kumanikidzwa kwevanhu kuita mabasa epabonde pamwe nemamwe mabasa avanenge vasingadi kuita. VaPompeo vakataura pamusoro pemabasa akaitwa neAmerica mukurwisa maitiro akaipa aya sezviri mugwaro re 2020 TIP Report. “Nyika makumi maviri nembiri dzakasimudzirwa gore rino, gumi nenhatu dziri nyika dzemu Sub-Saharan Africa.” Gwaro reTIP Report rinoburitswawo pachena nyika dzinotsigira kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu vachinoitiswa mabasa avasingadi idzo dziri pachinhambo yechitatu. Nyika idzi dzinosanganisira China, uko bato re Chinese Communist Party pamwe nemakambani ehurumende izvo zvinomanikidza zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi kushanda munzvimbo dzakashata muhurongwa hwenyika iyi hweBelt and Road, uko verudzi vechi Uighurs nemamwe marudzi madiki echiMuslim vari kumanikidzwa kuita mabasa avasingadi kuita muXinjiang nedzimwe nzvimbo. Mu Cuba, hupfumi hwehurumende yaVaCastro hunobva muhurongwa hwezvehutano. Pane vanhu vekuCuba vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu vanoshanda munyaya dzehutano munyika makumi matanhatu pasi rose. Madhokotera mazhinji ekuCuba ari munyika idzi anoti ari kumanikidzwa kushanda muhurongwa uhu. Nyika dzakawanda dzinotambira madhokotera aya kuti ashande munyika idzi, kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti vashandi vezvehutano ava vanenge vamanikidzwa kunoshanda kunyika idzi, vachibatirwa magwaro avo ekufambisa, kusajekeswa kwezvibvumirano zvavo zvekushanda kunze kwenyika, uye kubhadharwa kwehurumende yeCuba nenyika idzi, madhokotera aya asingabhadharwe. “Tinotora zvakadzama nyaya dzekumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu nedzihurumende dzavo,” vakadaro VaPompeo. “Ibasa redzihurumende kuchengetedza kodzero dzezvizvarwa zvenyika, kwete kumbunyikidza kodzero idzi. America haife yakabatana nenyika dzinomanikidza zvizvarwa zvadzo kuita zvisingadiwe nezvizvarwa izvi.” No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti Kutadza Kutungamira Kwapa Kuti Africa Isarire Shure
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vanoti nyaya yekutadza kutungamirwa kwenyika yapa kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzitadze kuzadzikisa tarisiro yemagamba akaita savanamuchakabvu, Kwame Nkrumah, Julius Nyerere nevamwe vakatungamira mukurwisa hutongi hwevasveta simba. VaChamisa vataura mashoko ayo kuStudio 7 pazuva rekupemberera kuumbwa kwesangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dzemuAfrica weOrganization of African Unity rave kuzivikanwa nekuti African Union. Vati kuti Africa ikwanise kubudirira, inofanira kuve nehutongo hwejekerere ichiremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kwete kuti mauto apote achitungamira nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. VaChamisa vatiwo zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzigare pasi dzione kuti dzingagadzirise sei matambudziko aunza hurombo mudunhu rine zviwanikwa nezvimwe zvinokwanisa kusimudzira magariro evanhu kana vachitaura nezwi rimwe chete. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Votadza Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 yeKutanga Ichinzi Yapera
text:
Vanhu vakawanda vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga mudunhu reMashonaland West vari kutadza kubaiwa zvichinzi hakuna nhomba yekutanga asi vanhu vachikwanisa kubayiwa nhomba yechipiri chete. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vachida kubayiwa nhomba muChinhoyi nhasi, VaTendayi Masakasa, vati vanzi vadzoke svondo rinouya sezvo kuri kungobayiwa nhomba yepiri chete.

Mumwe chiremba ari kuona nezvekubayiwa nhomba mudunhu reMakonde, Dr Paradzai Mudzengerere, vabvuma kuti pane dambudziko rekushaikwa
kwedzimwe mhomba asi vati zviri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kunobayiwa
nhomba kunzvimbo dzisiri dzavakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dr Madzengerere vati vave kupa nhomba yeSinopharm chete munzvimbo
dziri kubayirwa vanhu sezvo nhomba iyi iripo yakawanda kudarika dzimwe
nhomba. Dr Mudzengerere vakurudzira vanhu kuti vanobayiwa nhomba yepiri
kunzvimbo yavakambobayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dambudziko riri kuMashonaland West rinonziwo riri kuwanikwa kumamwe matunhu ari munyika. Svondo rapera, mukuru anoona nezvehutano muBulawayo, Dr Welcome Mlilo, vakaudza bepanhau reThe Chronocle kuti dunhu ravo rakanga richitarisana nekushomeka kwenhomba dzeCovid-19 zvekuti vakanga vachibaya chete vabiyiwa nhomba kepiri. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa zveCovid-19 National Task Force, Dr Agnes Mahobva, vati vakuru vezvehutano mumatunhu vari kuongorora nezvenyaya yekushaikwa kwenhomba mudzimwe nzvimbo sezvo vakatanga kuzvinzwa pama dandemutande. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance,Dr Henry Madzorera, vati kudzoserwa kwevanhu vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba zviri kuratidza kusarongeka kwehurumende munyaya yekutenga nekupa matunhu
nhomba dzinokwanirana.

Hurumende inoti mava nenhomba dzinodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana manomwe ezviuru idzo dzinosanganisira Sinopharm, Sinovac nedzimwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti nyika iri kutarisira dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 500 000 kubva kuChina mwedzi uno. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika
pari zvino vave chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 1594 zvichitevera kufa wevanhu vaviri nezuro. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe chete kana kuti 38 961, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu gumi nevanomwe nezuro. Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvishanu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere kana kuti 675 678. Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvina zvinemazana mana kana kuti 344 400. Izvi zvinoreva kuri nhomba dzashandiswa munyika yose dzasvika pamiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru makumi maviri nemakumi manomwe nesere, kana kuti 1 020 078. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika
mamiriyoni gumi, 10 million, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva
muzana, 60%, zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira
kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Hurumende Yoendesa Mberi Musangano neveMabhizmisi weKuzeya Mutemo Wayo paMitengo
text: Musangano wange uchifanira kuitwa nemusi weChitatu pakati pehurumende nemasangano anomirira vemabhizimisi uchikokerwa nebazi rezvemari nesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers (CZR) unonzi wambosendekwa parutivi kusvika svondo rinouya. Izvi zvaitwa kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekudzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi kana kuti Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Financial Laws Amendment) Regulations 127 of 2021. Mutemo wakadzikwa mukupera kwesvondo rapera uyu unomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo unoendererana newepamusika wemari weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, foreign exchange rate kwete pamukoto. Pakangodzikwa mutemo uyu zvimwe zvinhu zvakabva zvawedzerwa mutengo uku vamwe vemabhizimisi vachiti havachadi kutambira madhora ekuAmerica kunyangwe hurumende iri kuti ngaashandiswe asi nemutengo wepamusika weRBZ kana kuti foreign exchange auction. Mhute yaputira nyika panyaya dzezvehupfumi iyi yapa kuti padaidzirwe musangano wechimbi chimbi uyu. Asi mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vati musangano wekuzeya mamiriro ezvinhu wasendekwa parutivi nekuti hurumende yati inoda nguva yekumboona kuti mutemo uyu uri kushanda sei. Gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, uye mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari, VaClemence Chidawu, vange vachitarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMangudya avo takatumirawo mibvunzo yavasati vapindura. Asi mumashoko padandemutande reTwitter RBZ inoti danho nho iri harisi rekuda kuomesera vemabhizimisi asi kuti kuunza kugadzikana pamusika nekumisa huori kune vemakambani vanowana mari kubhanga guru renyika nemutengo uri pasi asi vodhurisa zvinhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotiwo mutemo uyu hauna kunyanya kuipa nekuti unodzikamisa dhora remunyika neku kuti vatengi vasaomeserwe sezvo vamwe vemabhizimisi vari kuwana mari kuRBZ vari kubatira vanhu. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vane maonero akasiyana vachiti havasi vose vari kuwana mari kuRBZ uye bhanga iri riri kutatarika kupa vanenge vanzi vapihwe mari dzacho nenguva. Pasi pemutemo uyu, vanenge vawana mari pamusika wemari weRBZ voishandisa zvisizvo vanonzi vachabhadhairiswa miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora uye vemabhanga vanonzi vanoita zvehuori kupa makambani matsamba ekuti vawane mari pamusika weRBZ vanonzi vachabhadhariswa mamiriyoni mashanu sechirango. Vemabhizimisi vanonzi vanoramba kutambira dhora remuZimbabwe vachabhadhariswa mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu kana kuti 50 000. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Vave Kungorapa Vari Kurwarisa neKushaya Zvikwanisiro
text: Vanachiremba vakuru avo vakaratidzira nemusi weChitatu kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa mabasa vanoti vari kurapa vanhu varikurwarisisa chete sezvo vachiti hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Zvichakadai, kuramwa mabasa uku kunonzi kwapararirawo kune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende muHarare. Vanachiremba vakuru vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti hapana chine musoro chakabuda mumusangano wavakaita negurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo. Mumwe wavanachiremba vakuru vepachipatara cheParirenyatwa, Doctor David Chimuka, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino vari kungorapa varwere vari kurwarisisa muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa michina yekushandisa pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Mumwe chiremba wepaParirenyatwa, Doctor Shingai Chiurunge, vati vave kungopa varwere mapepa ekuti vakwanise kunotenga mishonga yekuti varapwe kana kuti ma prescription sezvo muzvipatara zvehurumende musina mishonga iyi. Vamwe vanachiremba vekune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende zvakaita seHarare General Hospital neChitungwiza General Hospital vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havachakwanisiwo kuita basa ravo sezvo vakatarisana nematambudziko akafanana neanachiremba vekuParirenytwa. Vamwe vanachiremba vepa Harare General Hospital vakati vave kungorapawo varwere vari kurwarisisa sezviri kungoitwa paParirenyatwa vachiti bandiko reIntensive Care Unit, kana kuti ICU, iro ranga rave nemasvondo akati kuti risingashande, ratovhurwa neChina kuitira kuti anachiremba vakuru vakwanise kurapa varwere varikurwarisisa chete. Anachiremba ava vanoti kunyange hazvo vavhura bandiko reICU iri, vari kusangana zvakare nematambudziko ekushayikwa kwemimwe michina pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo riri kuyedza pose parinogona napo kuti ritsvage mari yekutenga mishonga yekupa varwere pamwe nekugadzirisa mimwe michina inonzi yakafa kuti anachiremba vakwanise kuishandisa. VaMoyo vakatiwo dambudziko ravainaro sehurumende nderekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga zvimwe zviri kudiwa nanachiremba ava kunyange hazvo vati vari mubishi rekuedza kuti vataure nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika VaJohn Mangudya kuti bazi rezvehutano rikwanise kupihwa mari yekunze kuti vatenge zviri kudiwa izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Zim Cricket yotarisira kuna Houghton
text: ZIMBABWE Cricket inoti iri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kumurairidzi mutsva wemaChevrons – Dave Houghton – uyo akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi svondo radarika.   Houghton akatsiva Lalchand Rajput zvichitevera kupihwa kwaakaitwa chigaro chitsva chatechnical director.   Givemore Makoni anove managing director weZC anoti Houghton inyanzvi yecricket muZimbabwe nekudaro chikwata chemaChevrons chichange chiri mumaoko akanaka.   Aka kachange kari kechipiri Houghton achiraidza maChevrons uye akambochitambira chikwata ichi ari kaputeni asati atanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   “Dave Houghton igamba recricket munyika yedu uye anoziva zvinodiwa kuti mutambo uyu usimukire zvikuru. Saka takamupa basa iri nechinangwa chekuti asimudzire mutambo uyu sezvo tange tadzikira.   “Munhu akatambira maChevrons ari mutungamiri wevatambi ndokuzorairidza chikwata ichi zvekare makore ayo chaitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro-soro. Saka tinotarisira zvikuru kwaari uye tinovimba kuti achasimudzira zvekare matambiro echikwata chedu,” anodaro Makoni.    Givemore Makoni   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwake, Houghton ari kutarisirwa kutungamira maChevrons mumutambo we2022 ICC Men’s T20 World Cup Global Qualifier B wekurwira kuenda kuICC 2022 T20 World Cup uyo uchatambirwa kuAustralia munaGumiguru gore rino.   Mutambo wekurwira kuenda kumakwishu aya uchatambirwa muno mwedzi unotevera uye uchange uine zvikwata zvisere. MaChevrons ari muboka rekutanga rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Jersey, Indonesia neUnited States of America kuchiti rimwe boka rine zvikwata zvinoti Hong Kong, Netherlands, Papua New Guinea neUganda.   Muboka rega-rega muchabuda zvikwata zviviri izvo zvichaenda kumasemi-final.   Zvikwata zvinohwina musemi-final ndizvo zvichabudirira kuenda kuAustralia.

headline: Dare reHigh Court Rinobvuma Chikumbiro chevana vaMushakabvu Mugabe Chekuti Vapikise Kufukunyurwa kweMutumbi Wavo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court nemusi weChina rakabvuma chikumbiro chevana vevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe chekuti vapikise mutongo wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe unovigwa kunovigwa magamba enyika kuHeroes Acre. Vachipa mutongo wavo kuburikidza negwaro, vatongi vedare repamusoro vanoti Justice Fatima Maxwell naJustice Amy Tsanga vakawirirana kuti vana vaVaMugabe vanoti Bona Mutsahuni Mugabe, Tinotenda Robert Mugabe Jnr. naBellarmine Chatunga vane kodzero pamutemo kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba wekuti mutumbi wababa vavo ufukunyurwe kwavakavigwa kumusha kwavo kwaZvimba kuti vanovigwa kumarinda anovigwa magamba kuHeroes Acre kuHarare. Vana vaVaMugabe vainge vapikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba kudare ramejasitiriti muChinhoyi asi mutongi Amai Ruth Moyo vainge varasa chikumbiro ichi vachiti vana ava havakwanise kupikisa mutongo waMambo Zvimba sezvo vainge vasiri ivo vainge vaendeswa kudare raMambo asi Amai vavo Grace Mugabe. Asi dare repamusoro iri rakati vana ava vane kodzero yakazara. Rimwe remagweta evana vaVaMugabe, VaFungai Chimwamurombe vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutongo uyu unopa vana ava kodzero yekupikisa mutongo waMambo. VaChimwamurombe vati vave kutonyorera Mejasitiri Moyo nezvemutongo wedare repamusoro uyu kuti vavape zuva richanzwikwa nyaya iyi. Mutauriri wemhuri yekwaMugabe ari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaLeo Mugabe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vapirwa nezvemutongo uyu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Mambo Zvimba kuti tinzwewo divi ravo pamutongo uyu sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. Nyaya yenzvimbo yekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe yakanetsa kubva pavakafa makore maviri apera kusvika nhasi. Vamwe vanoti dai varega mutumbi wevaive mutungamiri wenyika ava wazorora murugare.

headline: VaJuly Moyo Votarisirwa Kupa Rekupedzisira Pakuti Harare Yokwereta Here Mari Inodarika Bhiriyoni yemuNyika
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vave kutarisirwa kupa rekupedzisira pachikumbiro chekanzuru yeHarare chekuti ikwanise kupihwa mukana wekukwereta mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana emunyika. Nyaya iyi yaunza kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru nemasangano anomirira vagari. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya wemuHarare VaStewart Mtizwa vebato reMDC- Alliance vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvinodiwa pamutemo vakaendesa kuhofisi yaVaMoyo chikumbiro chavo pamwe nezvakataurwa nevagari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMoyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. VaMtizwa vaatti kanzuru yavo haikwanise kuita mabasa makuru kana vakasapihwa mvumo yekukwereta mari iyi. Vagari vainge vapihwa kusvika musi wa 7 Kubvumbi kuti vape pfungwa dzavo uye vakawanda vari kutsika madziro. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revagari reHarare Residents Trust vaPrecious Shumba varamba zviri kutaurwa naVaMtizwa. Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare vaMichael Chideme vatiwo zvakakosha kuti kanzuru ikwereteswe mari iyi.nekuti izvi ndizvo zvinoiutwawo nemakanzuru ose pasi rino kana vachida kuita mabasa makuru. Izvi zvapikiswa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reCombined Harare Residents Association VaReuben Akili vati kanzuru haibude pachena kuti yawana marii pazvirongwa zvakafanana nekubhadhariswa kwevanhu mari dzekumbosiya motokari muguta reHarare. Pamutemo, kana kanzuru ichida kukwereta mari inofanira kutanga yagara yobuda nechisungo chinozotambirwa nameya. Kanzuru inozozivisa vanhu kuburikidza nekushambadzira mumapepanhau uye vanhu vane mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vapindure. Kana izvi zvapera chikumburo uye zvinenge zvataurwa nevanhu zvinozoendeswa kugurukota rezvematunhu kuti rione kuti kanzuru yebvumidzwa here kana kuti kwete kukwereta mari. No media source currently available

headline: Hupfu Hwowedzedzerwa Mutengo Zvakanyanya
text: Mutengo wehupfu hwakwira zvakanyanya mushure mekunge gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vabvisa mari yange ichibhadharwa nehurumende kuti chibage chinotengeswa kuGrain Marketing Board kana kuti GMB chinge chakaderera mutengo. VaNcube vakazivisa nezvedanho iri pavakaparura hurongwa hwavo hwekushandiswa kwemari kana kuti bhajeti regore rinouya. Kunyangwe hazvo vemuzvitoro vange vatowedzera mutengo nemadhora makumi matatu, veGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe GMAZ vanoti vachaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti vaone kuti voita sei nenyaya yemutengo. Mutauriri weGMAZ VaGarikai Chaunza vaudza Studio 7 kuti ivo havatare mitengo yehupfu sezvo ravo basa riri rekugaya chete chibage chavanenge vatenga kuGMB. No media source currently available Kuwedzerwa kwemutengo hwehupfu kuri kuuya apo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa yapa kuti masangano anopa rubatsiro aparure hurongwa hwekupa vanhu vemumadhorobha vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri chikafu. Kumaruwa vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu vakatarisanawo nenzara.

headline: Vakawanda Vokurudzira Kuti VaTomana Vasiye Basa
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika kusanganisira mapato anopikisa vave kukurudzira kuti muchuchisi mukuru wenyika, VaJohannes Tomana vasiye basa mushure mekuwanikwa kwavo nedare reConstitutional Court vaine mhosva yekuzvidza matare. VaTomana vakapiwa mutongo wekugara mujeri kwemazuva makumi matatu, mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekuramba kuti mumiriri weBikita West muparamende VaMunyaradzi kereke pamwe nemuzvinabhizimusi Amai Jane Mutasa vatongwe. Dare iri rakazosendeka parutivi mutongo uyu richipa VaTomana mazuva gumi ekuti vatevedzere mutongo uyu vachipa mvumo yekuti vaviri ava vatongwe, kutadza kwavo kuita izvi vokandwa mujeri kwemazuva ambosendekwa pautivi aya, uye rezinesi ravo rehugweta rokanzurwa. VaKereke vari kupomerwa mhosva yekubhinya mwanasikana wehama yavo aive nemakore gumi nerimwe muna 2010, ukuwo Amai Mutasa vachipomerwawo mhosva yekuba makadhi ekufonesa ekambani yeTelecel anokosha $1.7 million mugore rimwechetero ra2010. VaTomana ndivo vakanga vakwira kudare reConstitutional Court vachida kuti vapiwe masimba ekuita basa ravo vakasununguka pasina anopindira. Mutauriri webato reMDC T VaObert Gutu vanoti bato ravo riri kukurudzira kuti VaTomana vasiye basa sezvo izvi zvichi svibisa zita ravo pamwe nehofisi yemuchuchisimukuru. Vanoti vari kutarisirawo kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe vaumbe dare rinoongorora nyaya yaVaTomana iyi. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF uye vachiongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGoodson Nguni vanoti VaTomana havamanikidzwi kusiya basa nenyaya iyi sezvo vasina kuramba kutevera zviri kudiwa nedare. Vanoti danho rekuenda kwavo kuConstitutional Court raive rekuti vajekeserwe chete kuti vanoshanda sei. VaNguni vanorambawo mashoko ekuti VaTomana vairamba kuchuchisa panyaya dzevanhu vaviri ava zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voshaya Anorapa muZvipata zveHurumende Vakoti naVanaChiremba Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasvika mazuva makumi matatu nematatu vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa haichakwani kuti vaende kumabasa pasina kana tarisiro yekuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa. Zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende zvabva zvaita manyama amire nerongo zvopa kuti vamwe varwere vadzoserwe kumba vasina kurapwa. Zvinhu muzvipatara zviri kutarisirwa kutonyanyoipa sezvo sangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Health Doctors Association vakatozivisa kuti kana nyaya dzemari nekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba vadiki nevakati dzikasagadziriswa naivo vachapindawo mukuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iri Dr Aaron Musara vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. Dr Musara vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vakazivisa hurumende nezvedanho ravo rekuda kukanda mapadza pasi kuburikidza nemagwaro avakanyorera mapazi akasiyana siyana hapana mhinduro yavati vawana. Vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende havasi kuenda kumabasa uye vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018 pamwe nekuvapa zvekushandisa kuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere kana vari pamabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurukuro nehurumende kutungana kwembudzi. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti ZHDA Dr Tapiwa Mungofa vatiwo kusagadziriswa kwenyaya dzevashandi vezvehutano nehurumende kwave kusiya varwere vasina anovarapa. VaMungofa vatiwo panguva iyo vana mukoti vakaramwa mabasa dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dzave kumba senzira yekudzivirira kutapurirwa chirwere cheCOVID-19 inonzi pachirungu Self quarantine. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya yekugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vezvehutano sezvo vakafanobata chigaro chagurukota rezvehutano Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira vanga vasingadaviri nharembozha yavo. Asi vhiki rapera, VaMurwira vakazivisa kuti vanga vatanga hurukuro nana mukoti. Mutevedzeri wavo VaJohn Mangwiro vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vanga vakabatikana nekudaro vange vasingakwanise kutaura. Sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vatiwo vange vari mumusangano unechekuita nedenda reCOVID-19 nekudaro vanga vasingakwanisi kutaura nesu. Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinotiwo kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yevakoti kuti vadzokere kumabasa uyewo kudzivirira vana chiremba kuti vasaenderera mberi kuzvigokera moto muziso kunyanya panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCOVID-19 iro rauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu kusvika parizvino. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbawe Zvofarira Kuvhurwa kweBhodha neBotswana Svondo Rinouya
text: Varidzi vemabhazi anofamba pakati peHarare neGaborone nemamwe maguta ari munyika dzakatenderedza Zimbabwe vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa neBotswana rekuti vatange kushanda musi wa1 Zvita. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwevanhu nezvinhu uye kufambiswa kwemashoko muBotswana, VaThulaganyo Segokgo vaivisa nezvedanho iri vachitaura nevatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro. VaSegokgo vazivisa kuti rimwe remabhodha mashanu ari kuvhurwa zvizere kubva musi wa1 Zvita ndere Plumtre-Ramokgwebana iro rinoshandiswa zvikuru nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Botswana yakavhara mabhodha ayo nenyika dzakaitenderedza muna Kubvumbi gore rino senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCovid-19. Kuvharwa kwemabhodha uku kwakakanda ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe mukanwa mamupere sezvo zvichirarama nekutenga zvinhu kunyika dzakatenderedza Zimbabwe zvichinotengesa kumusha. Mukuru kukambani yeMangongongo Logistics ine mabhazi anobva mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana achienda kuHarare VaMartin Vumbani vati bhizimisi range radzokera kumashure zvakanyanya nekuvharwa kwemabhodha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinotyaira kukambani imwe cheteyo VaThompson Moyo vatsinhira mashoko aya. Kunyange hazvo vachigamuchira kuvhurwa kwemabhodha nemaoko maviri, VaMoyo vaenderera mberi vachiti vachatenda maruva vadya chakata nokuti zvinoda kutevedza kuti kusaparadzirwa hutachiwana hhweCovid-19 hazvisi nyore kuzadzikisa. Vachitsigira mashoko aVaMoyo, VaThomas Muzavazi vaudza Studio 7 kuti dai nyika dziri mudunhu reSADC dzataurirana kuti vanhu vasabhadhariswe mari zhinji pakuvhenekwa hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Vafambi vanotarisirwa kuva nechitambi chinoratidza kuti havana chirwere cheCOVID-19 uye kutewedzera zvinodikanwa kuti hutachiwana husapararire kusanganisira kupfeka maface mask, kugeza maoko nguva dzose uye kusaungana kwenguva refu. Vakuru mubazi rezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu muZimbabwe vakatozivisa dare reparamende kuti havana zvimwe zvikwanisiro zvekuona kuti vanhu havapinde here pamabhodha nemapepa ekunyeba vachiti vanoda mari yekutenga michina yechizvinozvino. No media source currently available

headline: Telecel Zimbabwe Yoronga Kuendesa Hurumende kuMatare eKunze
text: Kambani yeTelecel Zimbabwe yapa hurumende mwedzi mitanhatu yekugadzirisa nyaya yekukanzurirwa kwayo rezinesi nehurumende. Kambani iyi inoti izvi zvikakundikana inenge yokwira kudare re International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes riri muWashington DC rine hukama hwakasimba neWorld Bank. Telecel Zimbabwe yakanyorera tsamba mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, gurukota rezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaSupa MaMushowe, uye mukuru we Potraz, VaBaxton Sirewu. Telecel Zimbabwe yakakanzurirwa rezenisi ichipomerwa mhosva yekusatevedzera mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema unoti makambani ekunze anofanira kupa zvikamu makumi mashanu nechimwe kubva muzana kuvatema vemunyika. Izvi zvinonzi zvapawo kuti VaMandiwanzira vaite musangano nevamiriri vekune dzimwe nyika vachitsanangura mamiriro akaita zvinhu muTelecel Zimbabwe. Zimbabwe yave nenhoroondo yekuendeswa kumatare ekunze ichipomerwa mhosva dzekutyora zvibvumirano zvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye kutyora mitemo yayo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMandiwanzira kuti tinzwe zviri kuitika. Muzvibabhizimisi vachishanda nesangano reResource Exploitation Watch, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti Telecel Zimbabwe haifanire kumhanyira kumatare ekunze isina kupedza emunyika. No media source currently available Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vari kunetsekana zvikuru nenyaya yekuti vashandi vanogona kurasikirwa nemabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCoronavirus Vosvika Mazana Matatu neMakumi Masere neManomwe
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika yose hwasvika pamazana matatu nemakumi masere nemanomwe kana kuti 387. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vave makumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 54. Vanhu vavhenekwa kusvika parizvino vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemakumi mapfumbabwe kana kuti 59, 000. Vanhu vakawanda vobatwa nechirwere ichi vari kubva kuSouth Africa. Vanhu vose vari kubva kune dzimwe nyika vari kumbonzi vagare vakachengetedzwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vasatapurirwa vamwe chirwere kana vainacho. Asi vamwe vanhu vave kutiza kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu vachiti hadzina kushambidzika. Izvi zvapa kuti vamwe vakaita sekambani yePerch Media vari kufamba vachidzidzisa vanhu vapindewo mumaruva vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vamhan’arire vanhu vanenge vatiza ava. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, Blessing Zulu weStudio 7 abata mukuru wePerch Media VaCollen Magobeya. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemaviri kana kuti 242,000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muafrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana kana kuti 6,244. Vapora vanodarika zviuru zana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 109,000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 7,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi matatu nemana kana kuti 434, 000.  Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zvinomwe kana kuti 3, 7 million.

headline: Nakamba Otarisana neNguva Yakaoma muEPL
text: Mutambi weZimbabwe ane mukurumbira Marvelous Nakamba atarisana nemasvondo mashanu akaomesesa muhupenyu hwake munhabvu, panguva iyo Knowledge Musona ar ikutsvagawo basa. Nakamba uyo anotambira Aston Villa muEnglish Premier League atarisana nemutoro mukuru wekuedza kupunyutsa chikwata chake icho chatarisana nehondo yekuti chisabude muEPL. Hupenyu hweAston Villa mugungano iri huri patambo sezvo chikwata ichi chiri pachinhanho chegumi nepfumbamwe, mugungano rine zvikwata makumi maviri. Zvikwata zvitatu zvepasi ndizvo zvichabuda muEPL pachapera mitambo iyo ichatambwa kubva musi wa 17 Chikumi kusvika 25 Chikunguru. Aston Villa ine mitambo neLiverpool, Chelsea, Man U, Arsenal, Sheffield United neWolves, idzo dzirikurwira zvinzvimbo zvekumiririra England muEurope gore rinouya. Mune mimwe mitambo, Aston Villa irikusangana neNewcastle, Everton, West Ham ne Crystal Palace, idzo dzisinganyanyo vhundutsa. Stewart Murisa uyo akambotambira, Caps United, Dynamos neHighlanders, anoti ane chivimbo chekuti Aston Villa inorarama sezvo isina kunyanyosiyana pamapoinzi nezvikwata zvakati wandei. Bournemouth, Watford neWest Ham, dzine mapoinzi makumi maviri nemanomwe, mapoinzi maviri chete pamusoro peAston Villa. Norwich iyo iri pasi pasi ine mapoinzi makumi maviri nerimwechete. Asi Nakamba haasiriye ega ari panguva yakaoma sezvo kaputeni wemaWarriors, Knowledge Musona asati awana chikwata chekutambira. Chikwata chake cheAnderlecht chazivisa kuti Musona haasisina nzvimbo muchikwata ichi vachiti ivo ngaatsvage basa kune imwe kambani. Anderlecht yanga yamboendesa Musona kuAS Eupen uko akanwisa zvibodzwa zviviri asi chibvumirano chavo chakapera. Mashoko arikufamba anoti Eupen yacho, pamwe neKaiser Chiefs neMamelodi Sundowns dzekuSouth Africa, dzirikumudawo, asi zvichienderana nekuti Anderlecht yacho irikuda marii pakumutengesa. Musona naNakamba varikudiwa vaine pfungwa dzakagadzikana, apo Zimbabwe iri kusimudzira rwendo rwe 2021 Africa Cup of Nations ne 2022 World Cup. MuWorld Cup, Zimbabwe iri mugungano rimwechete neGhana, Ethiopia neSouth Africa umo muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTakudzwa Mushinga vanofunga kuti Zimbabwe ikakunda mumitambo yese yepamusha inobudirira. Asi mutsigiri weCaps United VaPhillip Regede vanoti makundano maviri aya arikuda gadziriro yakasimba. Zifa yave nemari kubva kuFIFA yekurongera maWarriors mitambo yekuedzana masimba ine mitsindo nedzimwe nyika Mumakwikwi eNations Cup Zimbabwe irikusangana neBotswana, Zambia neAlgeria, iyo ine mukombe uyu. Parizvino, Zimbabwe iri pachinho chechipi nemapoinzi mana, mapoinzi maviri pasi peAlgeria iyo irikutungamira gungano iri. Botswana ine poindi imwechete asi Zambia haina kana poindi imwechete zvayo. Asi mitambo iyi yakambomiswa pari zvino nekuda kwechirwere checoronavirus kunyangwe dzimwe nyika dzatanga kutamba nhabvu dzakaita seGermany. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokundikana Kuzadzikisa Zvayakazvitarira neZvaitarisirwa neWHO paNyaya yeNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Zimbabwe iyo yave nenhomba dzinodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu kana kuti 16 million ichiri kutatarika kubaya vanhu nhomba sezviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda dzemuAfrica. Vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana ndivo vabayiwa nhomba mbiri munyika kusvika parizvino kunyangwe chinangwa chehurumende chaive chekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vange vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 mukupera kwegore rapera. Asi kunyangwe Zimbabwe isati yasvitsa huwandu uhu, yatangawo kubaya vamwe nhomba kechitatu. Nhomba yeCovid-19 yakatanga kubayiwa muZimbabwe musi wa 17 Mbudzi gore rapera. Nhomba dziri kubayiwa munyika dzinoti Sputnik V yekuRusssia pamwe nedzekuChina dzinoti Sinopharm neSinovac, Covaxin yekuIndia uye Janssen yeJohnson and Johnson dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe. Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachiri kuzengurira kubayiwa nhomba, mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti, nhomba inobatsira nekuti. Zimbabwe haina kungokundikana pane zvayainge yazvitarira chete pakubaya nhomba yeCovud-19 asi pane zvimwe zvainge zvatarwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization kana kuti WHO. WHO yainge yatiwo yainge iine chivimbo chekuti panopera gore ra2021, nyika dzemuAfrica dzinenge dzabaya vanhu vadzo zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana nhomba. A si nyika shoma shoma dzisingadarike gumi kusanganisira, Seychelles, Mauritius, Morrocco, Rwanda neBotswana chete kuchamhembe kweAfrica ndidzo dzakwanisa kuita izvi. MuAfrica yose, vanhu zvikamu zviviri nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 2, 5% ndivo vabayiwa nhomba zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 60% kubva kunyika dzakabudirira. Kunyangwe hazvo nyanzvi munyika nekunze dziri kuti zvave pachena kuti vanenge vabayiwa nhomba kaviri kana katatu vane mukana wakakura wekuti vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasafe, vanhu vashoma zvikuru vemuAfrica havana kubayiwa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vamwe vachiri kutya kutivanogona kutadza kuita mbereko vamwe vachiti chitendero hachivabvumidze zvose izvi zviri kutenderedzwa pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana pasi rose. Vamwe vanhu vari kushaya chivimbo nenhomba vachiti vamwe vakabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri kana nhatu vari kungorwara. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Sangweme vatiwo kushanduka kwechirwere kana kuti virus ndiko kunopa kuti chiiuye nedzimwe mhando chobata vakabayiwa nhomba ava. Ko huurumende yeZimbabwe ingaite sei kuti vanhu vakawanda vabayiwe nhomba? Tabvunza mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kunyengetedza vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba. Nhomba muAfrica dziri kuuyawo kuburikidza nesangano reAfrican Union pasi pechirongwa chinonzi Vaccine Acquisition Trust kana kuti AVAT nechimwe cheWorld Health Organization chinonzi COVAX. Asi munyika dzakaita seNigeria, Malawi neSouth Sudan, dzimwe nhomba dzakapiswa sezvo mazuva akatarwa kuti dzinge dzashandiswa ainge adarika dzichiri mumatura. African Union iri kuchema chema kuti dzimwe nhomba dziri kuita zvekuraswa kuAfrica. Sangano iri rinotiwo chimwe chiri kupa kuti zvinetse kubaya vanhu nhomba inyaya yekuti dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica hadzina zvimwe zvinodiwa mukushandiswa mukubaya nhomba zvakaita semafacemask, donje nemotokari dzekutakurisa nhomba kuendesa kune mamwe matunhu kanawo mafiriji ekuchengetera dzimwe nhomba. Sangano reTony Blair Institute for Global Change rinoti nhomba dzinosvika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana dziri muAfrica hadzina kushandiswa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Mukuru weAfrica Centres for Disease Control VaJohn Nkengasonga vanoti dzimwe nyika hadzisiwo kana kutouya kuzotora mishonga kumatura avo. Asiwo vakawanda vanoti nyika dzakabudirira ndidzo dzakonzera dambudziko kunyanya nekusada kubatsira dzevarombo nenhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Mazana Mana neMakumi Matanhatu neVaviri (462) Vakafa neCovid-19 Mumazuva Manomwe Chete
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera hwave zviuru zviviri nezana nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti 2,185. Mumazuva manomwe adarika chete, vanhu mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 462 vakafa zvichienzaniswa nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwekana kuti 267 vakafa munguva imwe chete svondo rapera. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 1, 445 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera. Izvi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi masere nemaviri zvine mazana matanhatu negumi nevatatu kana kuti 82, 613. Vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevana vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mashanu nechimwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 51, 923. Vanhu vachiri kurwara zviuru makumi maviri nemasere zvine zana nevaviri kana kuti 28, 102. Pavanhu ava mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere kana kuti 798 ndivo vari muzvipatara kunyangwe chipatara cheInyathi chisina kuzivisa huwandu hwevari kurawara. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo Nzvimbo dziri kupararira chirwere ichi zvinotyisa dzinoti Chegutu, Hurungwe, Sanyati, kuMashonaland West, kochiti Guruve, Mazowe kuMashonaland Central, Marondera, Murewa kuMashonaland East, Bikita neMasvingo, nemuHarare, kuchizotiwo Northern Suburbs, Nkulumane, Emakhandeni kuBulawayo uye Kwekwe mudunhu reMidlands. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri ne mashavashanu kana kuti 1, 132 05 vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga kudzivirira Covid-19. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nepfumbamwe kana kuti 639, 389. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti chinangwa chehurumende ikozvino ndechekuona kuti vanhu vakawanda vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vati vachatora vanachiremba nevakoti kubva kumauto nemapurisa. No media source currently available Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano varizve munyori munyaya dzezvehutano mubato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vati vanhu vanofanira kuziva kuti kudzivirira Covid-19 kunotanga naivo nekutevedzera kurudziro iri kupihwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano zvikuru kupfeka zvivhara muromo nemhuno. No media source currently available

headline: WARRIOR AFCON 2019: DeMbare 0, Bosso 0
text: ZVIKWATA zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders hazvina kana mutambi mumwechete akasarudzwa kuti anotambira maWarriors kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) pamwechete neCosafa Cup izvo zvasiyana nakare apo zvaibura vatambi vakawanda vaive shasha vaitambira chikwata chenyika ichi.   Kubva kare, DeMbare neBosso ndizvo zvaive zvikwata zvikuru muZimbabwe asi parizvino zvinotaridza kuti masamba asiyana sezvo matambiro ezvikwata izvi muPremier Soccer League adzikira zvikuru.   Kune zvimwe zvikwata izvo zvainonekwa sezvidiki zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Semuenzaniso, Herentals FC ine mutambi wayo Richard Hachiro ari muchikwata chemaWarriors,  Yadah Stars ina Leeroy Mavhunga kozoti Chapungu ina Talbert Shumba neFC Platinum ina Lawrence Mhlanga.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevakuru veBosso neDeMbare pamusoro pekudzikira kwaita zvikwata izvi munyaya dzenhabvu.   Sachigaro weHighlanders – Kenneth Mhlophe – anoti ivo sechikwata vari panguva yekuvaka izvo vakatanga gore radarika.   Anoti chikwata chavo ndicho chimwe chine vatambi vechidiki muPSL saka makore anotevera vanogona kubura vatambi vakawanda vachazotambira maWarriors.   “Isu tiri panguva yekuvaka zvakatanga gore radarika, izvi zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese, vatambi vedu vachiri vechidiki.   “Kutaura kuno tine vatambi vaviri vakashevedzwa kuchikwata chemaUnder-23 saka zvinorakidza kuti tiri kufamba negwara chairo,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti Prince Dube – uyo akashavedzwa kumaU-23 – ane ramangwana rakanaka.   “Tina Prince Dube, mutambi ane tarenda rinonwisa mvura. Akaenda kuSouth Africa akanokanganiswa ikoko sezvo aisatambiswa asi akadzoka tiri kumubika patsva, gore rinotevera muchamuona ari kumaWarriors.   “Iye zvino ari kumaU-23, kutoshevedzwa ikoko kunorakidza kuti varairidzi vemaYoung Warriors vanozviziva kuti ane tarenda rinodadisa,” anodaro Mhlophe.   Maneja weDeMbare – Richard Chihoro – anoti chikwata chavo gore rino chakavakwa patsva saka vatambi vavo vachiri kumbodzidzana.   “Zvamunongoziva isu gore rino takatenga vatambi vatsva saka vange vachiri kumbodzidzana, mukatarisa matambiro atiri kuita vave kuita vachibatana, vachigona uye vachisimuka.   “Zvinonetsa kuti vangotanga nekupinda musquad asi tinoziva kuti munguva inotevera kuDeMbare kuchabva vatambi vakawanda vachienda kumaWarriors. Hazviite kuti kushaye vatambi vanobva kuDeMbare vachienda kumaWarriors, kana chikwata chedu changobatana vakawanda vachaenda,” anodaro Chihoro.   Paakabvunzwa neKwayedza kuti pavatambi vari muchikwata chavo parizvino ndevapi vaanofungira kuti vanogona kukwana kumaWarriors, Chihoro anoti, “Parizvino kutaura chokwadi hapana mutambi watinaye anokwana kumaWarriors.”   Zvakadai, nemusi weMugovera uno maWarriors achatanga kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe wavo weCosafa Cup apo achasangana nechikwata chichapedza chiri pamusoro muboka reGroup A kuDurban, kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa chiri kushandisa makwishu aya segadziro dzemutambo weAfcon uyo uchatanga nemusi wa21 Chikumi apo maWarriors achasangana neEgypt.   Mumakwishu ekupedzisira eAfcon ayo akaitirwa kuGabon mugore ra2017, DeMbare yaive nevatambi vaviri vaive muchikwata chemaWarriors vaiti Tatenda Mkuruva uyo aive mubati wepagedhi naElisha Muroiwa uyo aivhara bhora pamwechete naCosta Nhamoinesu.   Bosso yakapedzisira kuita vatambi vakapinda muchikwata chemaWarriors mugore ra2017 apo paiva naPrince Dube naHonest Moyo avo vakatakurwa naMhofu kuenda kuCosafa Cup. Muchikwata ichi maive zvakare naOcean Mushure weDynamos uyo akatamba zvainwisa mvura.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Zimbabwe Ngaitaurirane neBhanga Guru Repasi Rose
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi inoshanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe haina chimwe chekuita kunze kwekutaurirana nebhanga guru rinokweretesa mari reWorld Bank mkuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chemari inopfuura bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Mashoko aVaKanyenze anotsinhirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti. Vaviri ava vanoti pasina rubatsiro nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inoramba iri zviroto. VaKanyenze vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutaurirana zvakare nesangano rinokweretesa pasi rose reInternational Monetary Fund. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti zvekunze kwenyika zvinodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvipfumbamwe zvemadhora.

headline: Vashandi veNRZ neMhuri Dzavo Vorara paMahofisi eKambani Yavo muHarare Vachiratidzira
text: Vashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe muHarare vari pakuramwa mabasa vanonzi vaungana nemhuri dzavo kumahofisi ekambani iyi ekuLochnivar, kuRugare vachiti havachina kwekugara, vamwe vachiti vakaburitswa mudzimba dzavairoja. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi veNRZ reZimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers’ Union, ZARWU, VaKamurai Moyo vanoti madzimai evashandi ava nevana vavo vakabatana nevarume vavo kubva neChishanu chapfuura vachirara pamwe nekuswera panze pemahofisi ekambani iyi. Vanonzi vari kuda kuti NRZ ibhadhare mari dzavo dzemihoro dzemwedzi gumi nemishanu dzavasati varipwa, uyewo dzekubatsirika nekufamba dzavasati varipwa kwemwedzi mishanu. “Vashandi havana zvimwe zvavaikwanisa kuita kunze kwekuenda kunogara pakambani iyi sezvo pari ipo chete pavasingabhadhare rendhi,” vanodaro VaMoyo. Vanoti chimwe chakanyanya kutsamwisa vashandi idanho ravanoti rakatorwa nekambani yavo rekuenda kudare rinoona nezvemabasa ichida kuti vashandi vatsanangure zvikonzero zvavari kuramwira mabasa. “Panzvimbo yekuti vashandi vakwire ivo kumatare, kambani ndiyo yave kumhan’ara, zvakafanana nekuti munhu anenge akurova ndiye futi anomhanya kuno kukwirira kumatare,” VaMoyo vanodaro. Mutauriri weNRZ VaFanuel Masikati vatenda kuti vashandi vari pakuramwa mabasa uye vari kurara pamahofisi ekambani yavo muHarare. VaMasikati vaudza Studio 7 kuti kambani yavo ine chido kwazvo chekuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo asi mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzeupfumi ndiwo ari kuvatadzisa kuzadzisa chido ichi. Vati bhizimusi rekutakura vanhu pamwe nezvinhu iro rinosiraramisa NRZ mazuva ano rakadzikira zvikuru, vakati nhaurirano pakati pevashandi nevashandirwi dziri kuenderera mberi. Vashandi veNRZ muHarare, Mutare, Gweru neBulawayo vari kuramwa mabasa kubva svondo rapera vachida kubhadharwa mari dzavo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: ZESN Inoti Mauto Haafaniri Kushandiswa Munyaya dzeSarudzo
text: Mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rinomirira dunhu reMasvingo, VaJosiah Hungwe, pamwe chete nechipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaChris Mutsvangwa, ekuti bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF richashandisa mauto mukutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rinouya, ari kushorwa zvikuru neveruzhinji. Mumwe wevari kushoropodza mashoko aya ndisachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, VaAndrew Makoni. VaMakoni vanoti zvekushandisa mauto mukutsvaga rutsigiro hazvisi pamutemo, uye pane mimwe mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo inofanirwa kuvandudzwa kana nyika ichida kuita sarudzo dzakachena uye dzisina mutauro gore rinouya. “Kuti sarudzo yegore rinouya iitwe zvakanaka, tinofanira kuve ne voters’ roll itsva, munoziva kuti pane chirongwa cheBVR chirikuitwa nguva ino, chinonzi chingangopamidzirwa mazuva, saka tinofanira kuva tine voters’ roll itsva uyezve tinofanira kuvatagadzirisa mitemo inechokuita nesarudzo uye nemitemo inongombundikidza kodzero dzevanhu,” VaMakoni vanodaro. Vanoti kana vanoita zvematongerwo enyika vaine chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu, nguva yacho ichiripo yekuzvigadzirisa. Panyaya yasachigaro weZimbabwe Election Commission, ZEC, VaMakoni vanoti havasati vanzwa kuti sachigaro uyu achadomwa riini asi vanokuridzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kuwana sachigaro weZEC vachiti pane basa rakawanda rinofanira kuitwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vaviri Vofa neCovid-19 Kusanganisira Mumwe Mukuru weChikoro kuMasvingo
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vafa nechirwere ichi. Munhu mumwe chete akafa kuManicaland neMasvingo. Bepanhau reThe Masvingo Mirror rinoti akashaya mudunhu iri mukuru wechikoro cheMukaro High Amai Pauline Dzapasi avo vakashaya neChishanu vakavigwa neSvondo. Varairidzi vose vapachikoro ichi vanzi vambondogara pavo voga pasina mhuri pachityirwa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vana vechikoro avo vakavhara neChishanu vanziwo vari kuongororwa. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo Dr Amadeu Shamu vakatenda kuti Amai Dzapasi vakashaya mushure mekurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo. Vakawanda vacho vari muHarare uye matunhu ose ane vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro kunze kwekuMashonaland West. Izvi zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwave pazvuru gumi nezviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 12, 325. Vanhu pora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru gumi zvine nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 10, 024 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mana vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave churu chimwe chete chine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 1,981. Asi kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vari kurwara nekufa nechirwere ichi, mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbawe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19 zvopa kuti vakawanda vavo varware. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemasere zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 58,762. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirowo rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nematanmhatu ane zvuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 76,7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 317,000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe nezvuru mazana masere kana kuti 17,8 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Paramende Inoti VaChiwenga Havana Simba reKumisa Sarudzo
text: Danho rehurumende rekumbomisa kuitwa kwesarudzo dzemaby-elections riri kukonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo uye vesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission kana kuti ZHRC vachibatana nemamwe masangano vachikurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti sarudzo idzi dzaitwa sezviri kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seMalawi neTanzania. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga vanovazve gurukota rezvehutano vakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi wekumisa kuitwa kwesarudzo kana kuti Statutory Instrument, ( SI 225A /2020 of the Public Health COVID-19 prevention, Containment and Treatment) (Amendment) Regulations 2020, No. 4.). Asi paramende inoti uku kutyora bumbiro remitemo. ZHRC inoti kudzingwa kwemakanzura nenhengo dzeparamende kuri kusiya vanhu vakawanda vasina anovamiririra zvopa kuti vasawane zvavanotarisira kuhurumende nemakanzuru. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaChiwenga neZimbabwe Electoral Commission vakatoendeswa kumatare nevari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi nemamwe masangano vachinzi vari kutyora mutemo nekusaita sarudzo idzi. VaChiwenga vakati sarudzo dzamiswa nenyaya yekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vaudza Studio 7 kuti havachakwanise kutaura sezvo nyaya yave kumatare. Mutauriri webato reNCA VaMaddock Chivasa vati vanotambira danho rekumiswa kwesarudzo. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatywayo vati uku kutyora mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Vanobviswa neMapurisa muHarare
text: Mapurisa pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru yeHarare vadzinga zvechisimba vanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa pakati peguta reHarare zvichitevera kurudziro yakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mukupera kwesvondo. Mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru yeHarare vadzinga mumigwagwa avo vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa zvaita kuti vatengesi ava vaswere vachiita hwekiti negonzo mukati padhorobha. Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwagwa, Amai Maidei Chimuka, vati pane vanotengesera mumigwagwa varohwa zvakaipisisa vakakuvara uye vamwe vavo vanonzi vasungwa. VaMike Muvadi vati havadi kuenda kunotengesera zvinhu kunzvimbo dziri kunze kwedhorobha kwavari kunzi nekanzura vanoshandira. VaGwinyai Gandanzara, avo vanotegesawo mbatya, vati kurudziro yakaitwa naVaMugabe pakupera kwesvondo yekuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vabude mudhorobha inoratidza kuti VaMugabe havana hany’a nehupenyu hwevanhu. Zvichakadai, nhengo yeboka reTajamuka, VaDenford Ngadziore, vati vachashanda zvakasimba nevanotengesera mumigwagwa kuti vasarambe vachishungurudzwa nemapurisa pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru. Munyori muboka revechidiki reMDC-T, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vati bongozozo raitwa nemapurisa iri inzira yehurumende yekukanganisa vanhu kunyoresa kwavari kuita sevavhoti pakati pedhorobha sezvo vachiti bato ravo rine vatsigiri vakawanda mumadhorobha mazhinji. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanofanira kutengesera munzvimbo dzakatarwa dzavanenge vachibhadhara mitero kwete kuti vanhu vangomera kunge hohwa pakati pedhorobha. No media source currently available

headline: Asensio orambira kuMadrid
text: (22) acharamba ari kuReal Madrid mwaka unotevera, semashoko akabva kumumiriri wake.   Mutambi uyu ange achinzi ari kudiwa neLiverpool mushure mekunge angotamba mitambo 11 yaakatanga kubva pa38 mwaka wadarika kuLa Liga.   Achipindura apo ari World Cup kuRussia nenyika yake mushure mekunge abvunzwa nevatori venhau nezvekuenda kuLiverpool, Asensio anoti, “Kana World Cup yapera, ndipo ndichataura nezvenyaya idzodzo. Izvezvi ndiri kungofunga zvekusarudzwa kuzotambira nyika yangu.”   Kunyangwe mashoko aya achitenderera, mumiriri wake Horacio Gaggioli akasimbisa kuti haasi kuzobva kuSantiago Bernabeu pari zvino.   “Marco haasi kuzobva, acharamba ari neReal Madrid,” Gaggioli akaudza Calciomercato.   “Ari kuramba achisimukira nguva dzese. Mwaka unotevera, ndinofunga kuti achave mutambi mukuru weMadrid.”   Asensio ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kubva zvaakaenda kuchikwata ichi icho chine mukombe weChampions League mugore ra2014 uye akamboenda kune zvimwe zvinosanganisira Mallorca neEspanyol nechikwereti. — SportsMail football

headline: VaChamisa Vanotaura Zvakadzama Pamusoro peChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vaita musangano padandemudande vachitenda vanhu vose vari kushanda panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kupanga mazano nenyanzvi kuitira kuti ipedze denda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vati chirwere cheCovid-19 chinoda kuti vana veZimbabwe vaite muonerapamwe kuitira kuti vakwanise kukunda chirwere ichi. VaChamisa vati bato ravo rinotenda zvikuru zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika izvo zviri kubatsira kusimudzira zvipatara zvemunyika apo nyika yakatarisana nechirwere chedzihwa mupengo ichi. VaChamisa vatiwo havaoni zvine huchenjeri kuvhara nyika yese vakati vanoona sekuti zvingabatsire zvakanyanya kana kukaitwa tsvakurudzo kwoonekwa kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chakawandira nzvimbo dzipi, kovharwa idzodzo. VaChamisa vati hurumende inofanirwa kutanga zvirongwa zvekuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari mumajere pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vanopara mhosva diki vapihwa mitongo isingavaise mumajeri senzira yekudzivirira kuapararira kwechirwere ichi mumajeri umo vanhu vari kugara vakamanikidzana. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vari kutambura panguva ino vachiti vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vanorarama nekuzvishandira nekudaro kuvharwa kwenyika kuri kuvasiya vari parumananzombe. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iite tsvakurudzo dzakazara vanhu vasati vatanga kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe muongoroi wezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda nesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vati mashoko ataurwa naVaChamisa ekubatana nekuitwa kwetsvakurudzo pasati patorwa matanho ekudzivirira chirwere ichi akakosha. VaDhliwayo vatsigirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti panguva ino nyika iri panguva ye National Lockdown, vanhu vawaniswe rubatsiro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende nemashoko aVaChamisa aya sezvo nharembozha dzemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi vachitaura kunyika neMugovera, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vanhu vashande pamwe chete kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisawo rubatsiro rwavakati rwuchange rwuchipihwa veruzhinji, asi havana kutaura kuti rubatsiro urwu rwuchapiwa vanhu rinhi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzarumbidza zvaitwa naVaChamisa zvekushandisa dandemutande reFacebook kutaura neveruzhinji dzichiti izvi zvinoita kuti vanhu vasaungane munguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19. Mashoko aVaChamisa ndeekutanga gore rino vachitura mashoko kunyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa Yopa Magwaro Vakanga Vanyimwa Zviuru Gumi neZviviri
text: Sangano re Global Zimbabwe Forum rinoti riri kufara zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nehurumende yemu South Africa rekuwedzera mazuva ekuti vanhu vaende kunotora magwaro anovapa mvumo yekugara nekushanda vari munyika iyi. Magwaro aya ari kupihwa pasi pechirongwa che Zimbabwe Special Permit (ZSP) kusvika musi wa 31 Ndira gore rinouya. Hurumende yeSouth Africa inoti vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri vakambenge vanyimwa magwaro vava kupihwa magwaro aya kunze kwevanhu makumi maviri nevashanu. Sachigaro wesangano re Global Zimbabwe Forum, Va Solomon Chikowero, vanoti kuwedzerwa kwenguva yaphiwa vanhu kuchabatsira zvikuru sezvo vakambenge vanyimwa pakutanga vava kupihwa magwaro aya mushure meongororo itsva yakaitwa. "Tiri kufadzwa nedanho iri sezvo takaita misangano nebazi rehurumende rinoita nezvemapepa aya kutanga kwemwedzi uno tichivazivisa kuti zvange zvakakosha kuti vawedzere mazuva ekuti vanhu vapihwe mapepa aya uye kuti vawongorore zvakare avo vavange vanyima kuti vawaniswe mukana mutsva saka," Va Chikowero vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri vorumbidza Nakamba
text: Villa vari kurumbidza zvikuru chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe Marvelous Nakamba padandemutande reTwitter zvichitevera kutamba kwaakaita zvinodakadza svondo radarika apo chikwata chake chakaita mangange 2-2 neBurnley kuVilla Park.   Rakange risiri zuva rekufara reAston Villa iyo mwaka uno yarasa zvibodzwa zvisere zvayainge ichifanirwa kuwana muPremier League.   Asi Nakamba ari kurakidza kuti mutambi wepamusoro izvo zvakaona murairidzi wechikwata chake ichi, Deam Smith, achimutenga nemari inosvika 11 miriyoni paunzi.   Mumutambo wavo neBurnley, Nakamba  akatamba zvemhando yepamusoro.   Kubva paakatengwa neAston Villa mwaka uno achibva kuClub Brugge yekuBelgium, Nakamba akwanisa kutamba mitambo mina kuchikwata ichi iyo inoti mitatu yemuEnglish Premier League kozoti mumwechete mumakwishu eCarabao Leagu Cup uyo wakave mutambo wake wekutanga.   Chikwata chake parizvino muEPL chatamba mitambo minomwe asi Nakamba haana kukwanisa kutamba yose sezvo akambenge akakuvara apo aitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations uyo wakaitirwa kuEgypt nguva yadarika.   Asi kubva apora, Nakamba ari kurakidza kuti arovera hoko muchikwata chaSmith zvichitevera kutamba kwaaita mitambo mitatu yadarika.   Izvi zvamuona zvakare achigarisa pabhenji vamwe vatambi vakaita saDouglas Luiz chizvarwa chekuBrazil uyo aimbotambira Manchester City naHenri Lansbury chizvarwa chemuEngland uyo akambotambira Arsenal.   Ane bhora kunyangwe asina, Nakamba anorakidza kuti mutambi wepamusoro.   Mashoko anotevera ndiwo mamwe ezvakataurwa nevatsigiri veAston Villa padandemutande reTwitter.       Si R   @Sprawlsy   Zviri pachena handina kufara nezvabuda mumutambo uyu, asi regai nditi ndinofarira zvandiri kuona pana Nakamba????#avfc       Gav ??   @gavlarAVFC   Chandakatora kubva pamutambo wedu, Marvellous Nakamba ari kukurumidza kuita mumwe wevatambi vandinofarira #avfc       Tom King   @thomasavfc12   Nakamba ange asiri kubatika nhasi – HITC Sport

headline: Zifa yoronga kudzoka kwenhabvu
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti riri kushanda siku nesikati kuti nhabvu ichidzoswe kutanga kwemwedzi unotevera (Kubvumbi) zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwakaitwa matanho ekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 neHurumende svondo rino.   Muhurukuro, mutungamiri weZifa — Felton Kamambo — anoti sangano ravo rakatotanga kare gadziriro dzekudzosa mutambo uyu izvo zvange zvichivaona vachiongorora nhandare dzose dzenhabvu dziri munyika.    Anoti chasara pari zvino kuti vachipihwa mvumo neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) yekuti nhabvu ichitanga kutambwa.   “Isu takatotanga kare gadziriro dzekuti mutambo uyu udzoswe nekuongorora nhandare dzose dzenhabvu dziri munyika. Tichiri kuenderera mberi nekuongorora kuti nhandare dzedu dziri munyika dzakamira sei kuitira kuti tigare takagadzirira.   “Saka iye zvino takamirira kupihwa mvumo neSRC kuti tichitange kuronga mitambo ichitambwe,” anodaro Kamambo.   Anoti seZifa, vakanga vaine chivimbo chekuti nhabvu itange muna Kurume asi hazvichakwanisike saka vave kutarisira kuna Kubvumbi.   “Taida chaizvo kuti nhabvu itange mwedzi uno asi hazvichakwanisike, tave kutarisira mwedzi unotevera. Takamirira kunzwa kubva kuSRC kuti toita sei.    “Tiri kupedzisa gadziriro dzose kuitira kuti tikapihwa mvumo yekuti nhabvu ichitanga pasawanikwe chikoneso chinoita kuti isatambwe,” anodaro.   Kamambo anoti sangano ravo rakaudza hutungamiri hwemaligi ose ari muno anosanganisira Premier Soccer League, Division One neTwo kuti vavanyorere vachivazisa zvikwata zvichakwanisa kukwikwidza mumwaka wegore rino.   “Takati kumaligi ose ngavatizivise zvikwata zvichange zvichikwikwidza kuitira kuti patinotanga kuronga mafambiro anoita mitambo yegore rino tinge tichiziva kuti pachange pane zvikwata zvipi uye kuti zvitiitire nyore pakuita hurongwa hwacho,” anodaro Kamambo.   Kutanga mwaka wegore rino kana nhabvu ikatanga kutambwa, Kamambo anoti Zifa ndiyo ichange yave kubhadhara varidzi vepembe izvo zvakasiyana nezvaiitwa kare sezvo vaibhadharwa nezvikwata zvinenge zvichitamba.   “Gore rino tinoda kuti zvikwata zvisanyanyoremerwa saka isu seZifa takazvipira kubhadhara varidzi vepembe kutanga mwaka uno, zvikwata hazvichabhadhare zvega varidzi vepembe,” anodaro Kamambo.

headline: Kanzuru yeHarare Yobhadharisa Mitero Ichishandisa Madhora ekuAmerica
text: Kanzuru yeHarare yatanga kubhadharisa vagari mari yemvura nemimwe mitero nemadhora ekuAmerica zvichitevera kupihwa kwayakaitwa mvumo yekuita izvi nehurumende. Sangano rinomirira maguta nemadhorobha munyka reUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, kana kuti UCAZ, ranyorerawo kuhurumende richtsvaga mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorobha ese munyika abhadharise vagari mari nemadhora ekuAmerica. Hurumende yakapa kanzuru yeHarare mvumo yekubhadharisa vagari nemakambani vachishandia madhora ekuAmerica kutanga mwedzi uno. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichaeil Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasingakwanise mari yekunze vacharamba vachishandisa mari yemuno, asi inenge yakatarwa ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Mamwe maguta akaita seMasvingo, Kwekwe neRedcliff akaitawo zvisungo zvekuti vanokwanisa vabhadhare mitero vachishandisa madhora ekuAmerica. Mutungamiriri weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakare mari meya weGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatonyorera kugurukota rinoona nezvemadhorobha nematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vachikumbira mvumo yekuti maguta nemadhorabha ese munyika makumi matatu nemaviri abvimidzwe kubhadharisa mitero nemvura nemadhorobha ekuAmerica. VaMakombe vati maguta nemadhorobha ange ave kutatarika kuita basa ravo sezvo vese vanovatengesera zvinhu zvekushandisa zvakaita semishonga yekuchenesa mvura vave kutengesa nemari yekunze. Vati kubhadharisa mari yekunze kunoita kuti makanzuru akwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka asingapedzi nguva ari mumitsetse yekutsvaga mari yekunze kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Association, VaPrecious Shumba, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotambira danho rekubhadharisa mitero nemari yekunze vachiti zvinoita kuti makunzuru aya asagare achishandura mitero nekuda kwekushaya simba kunogara kuchiita mari yemuno. VaShumba vaenderera mberi vachiti danho iri rinoita kuti maguta nemadhorobha asagare achikumbira mari kuReserve Banj nehurumende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rreCommunity Water Alliance, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, vaudza Studio 7 kunyange hazvo iri riri danho rakanaka uye richikwanisa kuvandudza mabasa emakanzuru, dambudziko guru nderekuti vagari nevashandi vakawanda munyika vari kutambira mari yemuno, izvo zvichanetsa kuti vawane mari yekunze iyi. Mukuru wesangano reMasvingo United Residents and Ratepayers Association, VaAnoziva Muguti, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rekushandisa mari yekunze rakanaka chose uye chinofadza ndechekuti vasingawane marii iyi havasi kumanikidzwa kubhadhara nemari yekunze, sezvo vachibhadhariswa mari yemunyika asi yakatarwa nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaJuly Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Mumwe mushandi mukuru mubazi ravo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti VaMoyo vachapindurachikumbiro cheUCAZ, nguva ipi zvayo kubva pari zvino. Hurumende yadzika mutemo unobvumidza vemabhizimisi bhadharisa vatengi nemari yekunze neyemuno, kana kuti Dual Pricing System, asi haina kunge yapa makanzuru mvumo yekuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikana neKukwira kweHuwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 65, vakabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu vana vakafa nacho kuBulawayo pavanhu chiuru nezana rine makumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 1123 ,vakavhenekwa nemusi weChina. Dunhu reBulawayo, iro ratarisana nedambudziko rekuve nevanhu vakawandisa vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi, rine vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 31 vakabatwa vaine chirwere, kuchitiwo dunhu reMashonaland West rine vanhu gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13. Matabeleland North ine vanhu vashanu, vana kuManicaland, vana kuMashonaland Central nevamwe vana kuMashonaland East, Matabeleland South vaviri, kuchitiwo matunhu anoti Midlands neMasvingo aine munhu mumwe chete padunhu. Dunhu reHarare harina munhu akabatwa aine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose vave zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemakumi mana nevatanhatu, kana kuti 9 046, kuchitiwo vanhu vapora vave zviuru zvisere nezana rine makumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 8 195. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nyika yose vave mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 586. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachitungamira sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira zvakare kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi, zvikuru kumatunhu ari kuchamhembe kwenyika. Pave nekutyirwawo kuti chirwere ichi chinogona kusazokwanisa kurwiswa kana kudzivirirwa kana hurumende yakaenderera mberi nekuvhura miganho yenyika musi wa 01 Zvita sezvakayavimbisa pachitariswa kuti vanhu vazhinji vanenge vopinda nekubuda muSouth Africa, iyo inove nyika ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica yose. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukuru anoona nezvekurwisana neCovid-19, Doctor Agnes mahomva kuti tinzwe nezvematanho avari kutora mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Portia Manangazira, vati vanga vari mumusangano vakati tivabate neMugovera. Asi VaRusike vanoti zviri kuonekwa kuBulawayo mucherechedzo wemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika ekuti vanhu havachakoshesa kuzvichengetedza kubva kuchirwere ichi kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo wairambidza vanhu kufambafamba uye pakabviswa mapurisa nemauto vaimanikidza mutemo wekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki nekutevedzera zvimwe zvose zvinokurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano. Vanoti chitsvambe chave kune vanhu pachavo kuti vaone kuti vachengetedza hutano hwavo sezvo vari kuona kuti vanhu vakawanda havachina shungu nekutyira kuti chirwere chingangovabatawo, vachiti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuziva kuti chirwere chichiriko. VaRusike vanoti chimwe chinogona kunge chiri kukanganisa mabasa ekurwisana nechirwere ichi kushaikwa kwemvura yekugeza maoko munzvimbo nemaguta zvakawanda, uye vari kukurudzira makanzuru pamwe nehurumende kuti vaone kuti vawanisa vanhu mvura yekushandisa kuzvishambidza. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 Inobata Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Zvina neMazana Masere
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vakanga vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika vaive vasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana masere negumi nevasere, kana kuti 4 818.
