Vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose vachiri zana nevana kana kuti 104, uye vapona vasvika kuchiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevana, kana kuti 1 544. Vanhu vanoita makumi manomwe, kana kuti 70, ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 1 795 vakavhenekwa pachishandiswa nzira ye Polymerase Chain Reaction kana kuti PCR. Vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vagara vari munyika vasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC yakazivisawo nezuro kuburikidza nedandemutande reTwitter kuti vashandi vayo makumi matatau vakabatwa ne Covid-19. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZBC pamusoro pevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 ava. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano vari chiremba, Doctor Gilson Mandigo, vanoti vari kuona kuti pave nemusiyano mukuru pahuwandu hwevanhu vave kubatwa nekushaya nechirwere ichi, zvichienzaniswa nepakatanga chirwere ichi kuwanikwa munyika sezvo vanhu vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vari vanhu vagara vari munyika, kwete vari kubva kunze kwenyika. Doctor Mandigo vanoti zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kusimbisa nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: VeMuzvitoro Voramba Kutambira Makadhi ekuBhanga
text: Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti havasi kufara nezvave kuitwa nevezvimwe zvitoro zvekunzi vatenge nemari chaiyo pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu kwetese kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinonzi zvakumanikidza vatengi kuti vashandise mari kutenga zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita semafuta kwete kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana dzimwe nzira dzakaita seEcocash. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Takudzwa Dzumbunu vati dambudziko iri rafararira nezvitoro zvakawanda zvavanoti zviri kukonzera kuti vashaye zvekuita sezvo vanhu vazhinji vanga vorarama nekushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana kubhadhara neEcocash sezvo mari dziri kushyaikwa kumabhanga. Asi Amai Winnet Bhasera vanoti ivo semunhu ave pamudyandigere zviri kuvawomera kuti vanzi vasashandise makadhi ekubhanga pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu muzvitoro vachiti havakwanise kuswera vakamira pamitsetse yekumbhanga kuti vakwanise kuwanisa mari yekutenga zvavanenge vachida. Asi Muzvare Kudzai Chaparadza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo iri riri dambudziko kuvatengi, vezvitoro vanenge vachidawo kubhadhara vashandi nemari yacho saka zvakakoshawo kuti veruzhinji vashandise musvo wemari pakutenga. Vaenderera mberi vachiti makambani anogadzira zvinhu akaita semafuta anodawo mari yekutenga kubva kunze kwenyika zvaanoshandisa mukugadzira zvinhu. Vamwe vakuru munezvimwe zvitoro zvashanyirwa neStudio 7 varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti havabvumidzwe kutaura pamhepo nevakuru vavo. Kunyangwe hazvo varamba kutaura, zvinyorwa zvanga zvakanamatidzwa muzvitoro izvi zvanga zvichiti vanhu vanofanira kutenga nemari chaiyo kwete makadhi sezvo kwavanohodha kuchidiwa musvo wemari. Umwe mushandi pane imwe kambani inogadzira mafuta iri muHarare uyo aramba kudomwa nezita ati imwe yemichina yavanoshandisa pakusvina mafuta inoda kutengerwa zvinhu kana kuti ma parts kubva kunze kwenyika saka zviri kuvatorera nguva yakareba kuti vawane mvumo yekuburitsa mari iyi kubva kubhanga guru renyika reRBZ. Kubva pakatanga kunetsa kushayikwa mari kumabhanga, RBZ yakabva yatora danho rekuti vese vanoda kutenga zvinhu kunze vanofanira kutanga vapihwa mvumo neRBZ. Zvichakadai, tsvangiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 yaburitsa pachena kuti zvimwe zviteshi zvinotengesa mafuta edzimotokari zvavekuti munhu awedzere imwe mari pamusoro kana achishandisa kadhi rekubhanga pakutenga mafuta emotokari. Vashandi pane chimwe chiteshi chepeturu chiri pakati pedhorobha vati chikonzero chiri kuita kuti vaite izvi ndechekuti vanobatirwa mari kubhanga kana voda kutora mari iyi zvavati zvinoita kuti varuze mari yakawanda kana vasingawedzere mari shomanana pamusoro pemari yakatarwa kuti vatengese nayo mafuta edzimotokari. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevasangano rinomirira vatengi reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Mufundisi Oramba Ari Mutirongo Mushure Mekutadza Kuunganidza Mari yeChibatiso
text: Pastor Patrick Phillip Mugadza, avo vakasungwa neChishanu chapfuura mushure mekuratidzira kuVictoria Falls, vachiri muhusungwa mushure mekukundikana kuunganidza mari yechibatiso yakatarwa nedare. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti kuVictoria Falls, Amai Lindiwe Maphosa, neChipiri vakazotara madhora mazana mashanu semari inofanirwa kubhadharwa naVaMugadza kuti vakwanise kutongwa vari kunze. Pastor Mugadza, vanove mukuru weRemnant Church iri kuKariba, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvisina maturo kana kuti criminal nuisance, vachinzi vakatyora Section 46 of Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act Chapter 9:23. Mfundisi ava vakasungwa mushure mekunge varatidzira kumusangano wepagore weZanu PF vaine chinyorwa chakanzi “Mr President The People Are Suffering, Proverbs 21.13”. Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro riri kumirira mufundisi uyu, rinoshora zvikuru kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzaPastor Mugadza. Mutauriri wesangano iri, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti bumbiro remitemo idzva rinobvumidza munhu kuita sezvakaitwa naPastor Mugadza pamwe naVaItai Dzamara, avo vaikurudzirawo VaMugabe kuti vasiye chigaro. VaMafunda vanoti gweta riri kumirira Pastor Mugadza, VaThulani Nkala veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vave kuronga kukwira kumatare makuru kuti atarisisewo nezvenyaya iyi. VaDzamara vairatidzirawo vari muAfrica Unity Square vachikurudzira kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa vachiti vari kutadza kutonga. Asi vakazotsakatika mushure mekupambwa nevanhu vasingazivikanwi musi wa 9 Kurume wegore rino. Pastor Mugadza vakanzi vadzoke zvakare kudare nemusi wa 5 Ndira 2016. No media source currently available

headline: Pivac ave panyanga
text: ndiye akasarudzwa kuti azotsive Warren Gatland semurairidzi weWales gore rinotevera pachapera mutambo weWorld Cup.   Pivac ange achiita basa rimwe chete kuScarlets kubva mugore ra2014 izvo zvakamuona achiitungamirira kuhwina mukombe weGuinness PRO12 zvikabatsira chikwata chake kupinda musemi-fainari yeChampions Cup mumwaka mumwe chete uyu.   Shasha iyi – iyo yaimbove mupurisa kunyika yake yeNew Zealand – akakunda vamwe vanoti Dave Rennie naScott Robinson kupinda pachigaro ichi icho chichazosiiwa naGatland gore rinotevera pachapera mutambo weWorld 2019 Japan. Pivac acharamba achitungamirira maScarlets kusvika kupera kwemwaka we2018-19   Achazove pasi peWRU muna Chikunguru 2019, Gatland apedza kutungamira Wales kuWorld Cup. — SportMails rugby

headline: VaKenyatta naVaOdinga Vovimbisa Kugadzirisa Makakatanwa Avo MuKenya
text: Mutungamiri weKenya VaUhuru Kenyatta vaita musangano nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa munyika iyi, VaRaila Odinga, mukuedza kwevatungamiri vaviri ava kutsvaga nzira dzekupedza gakava munyika iyi. Mutungamiri weKenya VaUhuru Kenyatta vaita musangano nemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa munyika iyi, VaRaila Odinga, mukuedza kwevatungamiri vaviri ava kutsvaga nzira dzekupedza nadzo gakava rakakonzerwa nezvakabuda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzakaitwa gore rapera. VaOdinga Vaipikisa zvakabuda musarudzo idzi, mushure mekunge VaKenyatta vanzi ndivo vakanga vakunda sarudzo dzekutanga, idzo dzakazonzi dzaive dzisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Izvi zvakazoita kuti dzidzokororwe, asi VaOdinga vakaramba kupinda musarudzo dzepiri idzi vachiti pane zvavaida kuti zvitange zvagadziriswa, izvo zvakazoita kuti VaKenyatta vapinde voga vachibva vakunda zvakare. Izvi zvanga zvakonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika iyi, uye kuurayiwa kwevanhu vanodarika chiuru. Kusangano kwetungamiri vaviri ava ndekekutanga kubva pakaitwa sarudzo idzi, uye vaudza vatori venhau kuti vachashanda pamwechete kuti nyika yavo iende mberi murunyararo. “Tave kutanga nhaurirano dzekutsvakurudza chakanyanya kuita kuti tive nemaonero akasiyana azokonzera kuti tive nekusawirirana pakati pedu,” VaKenyatta vadaro. "Yakwana nguva yekuti tigadzirise zviri kuita kuti tisawirirane,” VaOdinga vatsinhirawo mashoko aVaKenyatta aya. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kugadzirisa makakatanwa pakati pevatungamiri vaviri ava kwakaoma sezvo nyika yavo ichinetseka zvikuru nenyaya yemarudzi. Asi mumwe anoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaPromise Sande, vatiwo dai vanoita zvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe vaonawo gwara iri, vadzidzawo kuti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiriri vemapato anopikisana vaise zvido zvevanhu pamberi pekupokana kwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai Ourayiwa neMatombo Aidhuurwa neLarfage Cement
text: Mumwe mudzimai Amai Shupikai Chitsina vakashaya musi wa 15 Nyamavhuvhu pedyo nemugodhi unodhuurwa matombo nekambani yelafarge papurazi repangoula pedyo neguta reharare mushure mekutemwa nedombo rainge radhuurwa nekambani yainge yapihwa basa neLafarge Cement. Amai Chitsina avo vainge vari mumba mavo vakabva vashaya uye imwe hama yavo yakakuvara mushure mekutemwa nematombo aya. Mumwe mukuru anoona nezvekudyidzana nevanhu mukambani iyi VaTawanda Njerere vaudza Studio 7 kuti itumire tsambambozha nemibvunzo vachivimbisa kuti vachapindura. Asi hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kana gurukota rezvezvicherwa VaWinston Chitando sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resources Governance VaFarai Maguwu vane vamwe musangano ravo vakashanyira mhuri yamuchakabvu Chitsina vanoti vari kushushikana nerufu urwu. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voparura Hurongwa hweGwaro Idzva reVavhoti kuState House
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChina vari kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekutanga kwekunyorwa kwegwaro revavhoti kuState House. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rita Makarau vaudza Studio 7 kuti pavachabva kuState House vachaenda kuHarare International Conference Centre. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa naVaMugabe mashoko akaburitswa naVaMugabe ekuti hurongwa uhu hutange zviri pamutemo kubva musi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa 1 Ndira gore rinouya. VaMugabe vakaburitsa hurongwa uhu mugwaro rehurumende regovernment gazette. Amai Makarau vati vamwe vanhu vachazotanga kunyoreswa zviri pamutemo kana michina yose yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota yebiometric voter registration. Parizvino michina yakauya inosvika mazana mana uye iri kushandiswa mukudzidzisa vanhu avo vachanodzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu nezvenyaya yekuvhota. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovimbiswa neChina Nhomba yeChirwere cheCovid-19
text: China yazivisa kuti Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzichatanga kuwana rubatsiro rwemajekiseni enhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 pasi pechirongwa chayo chekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira kuti dziwane mishonga iyi. Izvi zvaziviswa nemutauriri webazi rekuChina rinoona nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaWang Wenbin, avo vati mishonga iyi yakagadzirwa munyika mavo uye zvavari kuita izvi kuzadzisa chitsiidzo chaikaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika yavo, VaXI Jingpin. China yatiwo ichabatsira zvekare dzimwe nyika dzichiri kubudirira makumi matatu nesere pachikamu chinotevera uye ichapinda muchirongwa cheWorld Health Organisations cheCOVAX. Nyika iyi inotiwo mishonga yakaita seichapihwa Zimbabwe iyo yakagadzirwa nekambani yeSinopham neSinovac, yakatoendeswa kunyika dzakaita seUnited Arab Emirates, Brazil neChile. VaWenbin vati nyika dzepasi rese dzinofanira kubatana mukurwisa Covid-19 vachiti China icharamba ichibatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira nedzinotambura nemishonga. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nyika dzakabudirira dzichaita zvimwezvo kuitira kuti munhu wese awane mushonga wekudzivirira Covid-19. Muchiziviso chavo, VaWenbin havana kuzivisa kuti Zimbabwe ichawana mishonga yakawanda zvakadii pasi pechirongwa ichi. Dzimwe nyika dzichawanda rubatsiro neZimbabwe in Pakistan, Brunei, Nepal, Philippines, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos, Sri Lanka, Mongolia, Palestine, Belarus, Siera Leone neEquatorial Guinea. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kudivi rehurumende sezvo mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa edenda reCovid-19 mumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vange vakabatikana panguva yataenda pamhepo. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners Association of Zimbabwe, Dr Johannes Marisa, vati zvaitwa neChina zvakanaka nekuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inogona kunge isina mari yekutenga mishonga inokwanira munhu wese. Vati mabatirwe ari kuitwa vanhu nehutachiwana hweCovid-19 anoratidza kuti mishonga yenhomba iyi ndiyo yakakosha pakubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vakazvipira kushanda nehurumende mukudzidzisa vakoti vevamwe kuti mishonga iyi inoshandiswa sei. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvitange kugadzirira nzvimbo dzekuchengetera mishonga iyi sezvo ichinzi inofanira kuchengetedzwa panotonhora. Zvichakadai, vaimbove nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, VaPrince Dubeko Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo zviri kuitwa neChina zvakanaka, zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisati yazivisa veruzhinji kuti hurongwa hwayo pakutenga nekupa vanhu mishonga yeCovid-19 hwakamira sei. VaSibanda vatiwo hapana kuchejeka pakushandiswa kwezvinhu zvinenge zvapihwa pachena nedzimwe nyika. Mashoko eChina anouuya apo hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti masangano anopa rubatsiro ari kubatsira nyika nemari inoita mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemana emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica kurwisana neCovid-19 pamwe nezvirwere zvakaita seBP neDiabetes. Mari iyi inosanganisira mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe nemadhora ekuAmerica yakabva kuGlobal Fund iyo yave kutoshandiswa kutenga zvekudzivirira varapi kana kuti Personal Protective Equipment, mishonga pamwe nezvinoshandiswa kuongorora hutachiwana hweCovid-19. Hurumende pachayo inoti ine mamiriyoni zana emadhora ekuAmerica ekutenga mishonga yekudzivirira Covid-19 munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nenshanu, kana kuti US$15 million. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rotonga Kuti Makurukota Ataurire Ruzhinji nezveMabhizimisi Avainawo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rinoti gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi nemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende, VaPrince Machaya vakatyora bumbiro remitemo nekutadza kwavakaita kudzika mutemo unosungira vakuru-vakuru muhurumende kubuditsa pachena hupfumi hwavo. Izvi zvinotevera chikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare nenhengo yeparamende inomirira Harare North, VaAllan Rusty Markham kuti bumbiro remutemo ritevedzerwe. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaJacob Manzunzu, nezuro vakatura mutongo wekuti VaZiyambi naVaMachaya havana kudzika mutemo unosungira vakuru-vakuru muhurumende kuti vaburitse pachena hupfumi zvavakati zvinopesana nezvavanosungirwa kunge vakaIta zviri mubumbiro remitemo renyika. Pasi pechikamu 198 (a) chebumbiro remitemo, paramende inofanira kudzika mutemo unoona kuti vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vaburitsa hupfumi hwavo pachena nguva nenguva nekutara zviga zvinofanira kuetevdzerwa nemakambani ehurumende pamwe nekurangwa kwevanenge vatyora mutemo uyu. Nokudaro, VaManzunzu vakapa VaZiyambi naVaMachaya mwedzi mitatu yekuona kuti mutemo uyu wadzikwa. VaMarkham vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nemutongo uyu. VaManzunzu vakati zviri mubumbiro remitemo zvinofanira kuzadziswa uye hazvifanire kutora nguva kuzviita nekudaro vakakurudzira VaZiyambi naVaMachaya kuti vatore matanho ekuti mutemo unobata nyaya iyi wadzikwa. Mumiririri weHighfield West muparamende uye vari nhengo yekomiti yePublic Accounts mudare iri, VaHappymore Chidziva, vati chinhu chakakosha zvikuru kuti mutemo uyu udzikwe vachiti izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru mukurwisana nehuori uhwo hunonzi hwatambarara serunyemba munyika. Mukuru wesangano reTransparency International Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Chikumbu, vati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti vatungamiri vavo vari kuwana sei mari dzavo kuti pasaite huori. Vanokokera bato reZanu-PF mudare reparamende VaPupurai Togarepi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutemo unofanira kutevedzerwa asi vakati zvakakosha kuti nekune vamwe vemabhizimisi zviitwe kuti vasaite huori. VaMachaya vati titaure naVaZiyambi nezvenyaya iyi asi VaZiyambi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo uye vanga vasati vapiundura mibvunzo yatavatumira kuti tinzwe kuti vachapikisa mutongo uyu here kana kuti kwete uye kuti matanho api avachatora. Asi pakunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi, vaviri ava vakaudza dare kuti kudzikwa kwemutemo uyu hachisi chinhu chinofanirwa kuitwa naivo chete vachiti vedare reparamende nedare remakurukota ehurumende vanofanirawo kuunzwa kudare kuti vazvipindurire sezvo vane chekuita nekudzikwa kwemutemo uyu. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, sezvo vari kuRwanda kwavari kupinda mumwe musangano vachimirira paramende.  No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havadzokeri kuBasa Kusvika Hurumende Yagadzirisa Zvichemo Zvavo
text: Apo kuramwa mabasa kwaana chiremba kwasvitsa masvondo maviri nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vana chiremba vamboratidzira kwekanguva kadiki pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals. Studio7 yasvika pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, UBH, kuratidzira uku kuchangopera. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti kuratidzira uku yange iri nzira yekuyeuchidza hurumende kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvaana chiremba. Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende munyika yose. Vati kunyange zvakadaro, vana chiremba vadiki havazi kuzodzokera shure panyaya yekuramwa mabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo, sezvo vati pave nenguva vachiudzwa kuti zvichemo zvavo zvichagadziriswa asi pasina chinobuda. Mumwe mukoti mukuru paUBH uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kutaura pamhepo sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatapi venhau, ati vanhu vari kungorapwa pachipatara apa ndevaye vanenge vachirwara zvakaipisisa, sezvo vana chiremba vakawanda kunyanya vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo, vari kuramwa mabasa. PaRichard Morris Hospital, chinove chikamu cheUBH panorapwa vanhu maziso, vamwe vanhu vange vauya kuzorapwa vange vachiudzwa kuti vadzokere kumba sezvo panga pasina vana chiremba vanga vachikwanisa kuvaona. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 paMpilo Central Hospital, chimwezve chipatara chikuru muBulawayo, yaratidzawo kuti kuchikamu chechipatara ichi chinorapa vanhu vachibva kumba - kana kuti Outpatients Department - kwange kusina vanhu. Chiremba mukuru paMpilo, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vari kungokwanisawo kurapa vanhu vari kurwara zvakaipisisa, zvinhu hazvina kunyanya kuipa sezvo vana chiremba vakuru nevamwe vanoshanda vachibva kunze, kana kuti consultants, vari kushanda semazuva ose. Dr Solwayo Ngwenya vabvuma mashoko ekuti vana mukoti vanonzi vari kuda kutanga kuramwawo mabasa mangwana, asi vakurudzira vana chiremba pamwe naana mukoti kuti vakoshese varwere sezvinotarisirwa mubasa ravo. Studio7 haina nkukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, kanawo kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirenyatwa. Vana chiremba naana mukoti vanogara vachiramwa mabasa nguva nenguva vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pemashandiro avo uye mari shoma yavanowana. Nekune rimwe divi hurumende inogarawo ichichema nerekuti haina mari. Asi Fortune Moyo, mumwe mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, ndemumwe wevanhu vanoti matambudziko ana chiremba pamwe nemamwe ane chekuita nezvehutano munyika anogona kugadziriswa, kana hurumende ikakoshesa nyaya yehutano munyika sezvainofanirwa kuita. Kunze kwemari yavanohora, zvimwe zvezvichemo zvaana chiremba ava zvinosanganisira nyaya yekushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa muzvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yoronga Kuratidzira muHarare Svondo Rinouya
text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance unoti uri kuzoratidzira muHarare nemusi weChitatu svondo rinouya uchinyunyuta nemabatirwo awunoti ari kuitwa gadziriro yesarudzo nekomisheni yezvesarudzo ye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC. Mubatanidzwa uyu unoti ZEC haisi kubuda pachena panyaya yegwaro remazita evavhoti uye nyaya yekudhindwa nekuchengetedzwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa. Asi ZEC inoti iri kungozorwa mafuta enguruve yaisina kudya ichiti zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisahazvikwanisike. Munyori mukuru weMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa VaGouglas Mwonzora, vanove zvakare munyori mukuru weMDC Alliance, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachafora kubva kuAfrica Unity Square kuenda kumahofisi eZEC nekudzoka. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemunyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa muMDC-T VaAmos Chibaya avo vanoti chavari kungoda chete ndechekuti ZEC ivazivise kuti mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa kupi uye achachengetedzwa kupi uye nani. VaChibaya vanoti hapana sarudzo dzinoitwa munyika kana pasina gwaro revavhoti rakachena uye pasina kugadziriswa nyaya yekuti mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa nani. No media source currently available

headline: Malawi yapinda mu’Round of 16′
text: APO maWarriors ari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo weAFCON, zvimwe zvikwata zvainge zviri muboka rimwe chete nechikwata chenyika ichi reGroup B zvinoti Malawi, Guinea neSenegal zvose zvabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 yemakwikwi aya.   Malawi yabudirira kuenda muRound of 16 zvichitevera kukunda kwayakaita Zimbabwe apo yakahwina 2-1 nemusi weChishanu svondo radarika uye nekuita mangange 0-0 neSenegal mumutambo uyo yakapotsa nepadiki yahwina apo yakazonyimwa pena mushure mekupindira kweVideo Assistant Referee (VAR).   CAF yazivisa nezvekubudirira kweMalawi kuenda kuRound of 16 apo yanyora padandemutande rayo reTwitter ichiti, “Nhoroondo. Chikwata cheMalawi chabudirira kuenda ku#TotalEnergiesAFCON knockout stages kekutanga munhoroondo yacho. Izuva rakakosha zvikuru kunyika yose.”   MaWarriors – ayo akapedza ari pasi muboka rawo – ane zvibodzwa zvitatu uye ari kutarisirwa kusvika munyika achibva kuCameroon.

headline: VaMugabe Votaura paKutoreswa Mhiko kwaVaLungu vekuZambia
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia VaEdgar Lungu vakatoreswa mhiko nemusi weChipiri mushure mesarudzo dzakaitwa mwedzi wapera. VaLungu vakatora mhiko kunhandare yeHeroes Stadium muLusaka. Asi vemapato anopikisa vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa uye VaLungu vaishandisa mhirizhonga. Valungu vanoti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vashoma shoma vakange vari kuZambia. VaMugabe ndivo vakataura vakamirira vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica. VaMugabe vati nyika dzine hutongo hwejekerere hadzidi vanhu vanoda kushandisa mhirizhonga kutora masimba. Vakatiwo Zambia yainge yabuda pachena kuti sarudzo ndidzo dzinofanira kushandiswa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuMulungushi University of Zambia VaShakespeare Hamauswa vanoti mashoko aVaMugabe akatambirwa zvakasiyana muZambia vamwe vachiti vainge vabaya dede nemukanwa asi vamwe vachishora vachiti makudo ndemamwe zvikuru vachitarisa nyaya yemhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health Ropa Dzidziso Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Mukuru wesangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti sangano ravo riri kushanda mumatunhu akawanda emunyika richidzidzisa vanoita zvehutano munharaunda pamwe vechidiki pamusoro pekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo matunhu anoti Bulawayo, Matabeleland North neMatabeleland South ari kusangana nedambudziko rekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere kubva mwedzi wapera. VaRusike vanotiwo sangano ravo riri kushandawo mumatunhu anoti Manicaland, Masvingo neMidlands, uko vari kubatana nanambuya hutano mukupa dzidziso kuti veruzhinji vazive nzira dzekudzvirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health riri kukwanisa kupinda mumaruwa kuburikidza nemabhasikoro arakapiwa nesangano reWorld Bicycle Relief. Asi vanoti kuti nyika ibudirire kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, hurumende pamwe nemakanzuru zvinofanirwa kuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura kayachena yekushandisa kugeza maoko pamwe nekuzvishambidza, uyewo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vachengetedze mitemo yakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation. Asi VaRusike vanoti kana hurumende yakazofunga kutora matanhu ekurambidza veruzhinji kufambafamba, haifanirwe kubva yavhara nyika yose sezvakamboitika pakutanga, sezvo vazhinji vevanhu munyika vachirarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Hurumende Iri Kutenga Mishina Yakafa Kubva kuIndia
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti mimwe michina yakatengwa nehurumende haisi kushanda zvachose izvo zvoodza moyo yavanachiremba vachiti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mimwe mishina isiri kushanda zvakanaka iyi yakatengwa kuIndia. Vanachiremba vanoti hurumende iri kungorova bembera ichitaura nezvekuti vanoda mari yemihoro asi ivo vachitiwo vakaudza vakuru mubazi rezvehutano kuti havana zvikwanisiro zvakaita semichina nemishonga nekudaro kunyangwe vakadzokera kubasa hakuna zvinenge zvichiitwa. Vachipindura panyaya yekuti hurumende iri kutenga michina yakafa, sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vakaudza studio 7 kuti iendese mibvunzo kumunyori mubazi rezvehutano Dr Agnes Mahomva avo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Vanachiremba vave nemwedzi mitatu vachiramwa mabasa.  No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveHutano Roongorora Vanhu Vakabva Kunyika Dzine Chirwere cheCoronavirus
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe vakabva kunyika dzakabatwa vanhu chirwere che coronavirus vari kumboongororwa munyika kusvika musi wa7 Kukadzi kuti vaonekwe kuti havana kutapurirwa chirwere ichi here. Vanhu ava vakasvika munyika pakati pa25 na28 Ndira, unove mwedzi uno, vachibva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzabatwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi, kusanganisira China, uko kwachakatangira. Chirwere ichi chauraya vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi manomwe kuChina kwakare uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu vabatwa nacho kusvika pari nhasi munyika iyi. Kunze kweChina, chirwere ichi chawanikwawo kunyika dzinosvika gumi nesere dzinosanganisira America, France, Germany, Japan neVietnam. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanoona zviri zvinhu zvakanaka zvekudzivirira vanhu kuti chirwere ichi chisapararira. Doctor Madzorera vanotiwo vanoona zvakakodzera kuti vanhu vari kutarisiswa ava vange vachimbogara vari kudzimba dzavo vachiongororwa sezvo pasati pave nemunhu abatwa nechirwere. Vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu mune zveupfumi, Zimbabwe haizokwanise kuita sedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzinonzi dzakatovaka zvipatara zvekuchengetera vanhu vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Ngatichitarisai AFCON’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu iri mubati wepagedhi weRio Tinto nemaWarriors — Raphael Phiri — inoti yave nguva yekutanga kuvaka chikwata chakasimba chichanomirira nyika kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) kuCameroon gore rinotevera.   Zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa maWarriors neGhana mumitambo miviri yadarika, inoti 3-1 kuGhana ne1-0 muno nemusi weChipiri, mukana wemaWarriors wekuramba vachirwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup wakabva wapera.   Chikwata chenyika ichi pari zvino changokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kubva mumitambo mina zvekuti kunyangwe chikahwina mitambo miviri yasara, hapana zvazvichashandura.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Phiri anoti murairidzi wemaWarriors — Norman Mapeza — anofanirwa kushandisa mitambo miviri yasara yechikwata chake muboka reGroup G, iyo ichatambwa munaMbudzi, neSouth Africa uye neEthiopia kugadzirira kuenda kuCameroon.   “Isu senyika zvekufunga kuenda kuWorld Cup zvichiri kure nesu nekuti hatisati tambotora mikombe mikuru yakaita seAFCON asi tinofunga zvekuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Ngatitange tambotsviriridza muno muAfrica nekunetsa kuAFCON pamwe nekukunda zvikwata zvikuru zvakaita seGhana, ndiko kuti tigotange kufunga zveWorld Cup nekuti uko kunoenda shasha. Taenda kuAFCON kakawanda chaizvo asi hapana zvatamboita zvinobatika taenda ikoko.   “Kazhinji tinogara tichingochema-chema tichiti hatiwane mitambo yehushamwari yekugadzirira, miviri yasara ngatiishandise kuita gadziriro dzedu nekuvaka chikwata chedu,” anodaro Phiri. Jimmy Cliff, sezita raPhiri remadunhurirwa iro aizivikanwa naro munhabvu, anoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata chemaWarrioirs chivakwe patsva chiine vatambi vechidiki.   Anoti vatambi vakaita saBrendan Galloway naJordan Zemura vachiri vadiki uye remangwana ravo rakajeka.   “Tine vatambi vakawanda vechidiki, ngavashevedzwe chikwata chemaWarriors chovakwa kubva pavatambi ava. Ngatisangorambe tichingoshevedza madhara chete nekuti vapera, pave kudiwa vechidiki kuti vatakure chikwata ichi kuenda mberi,” anodaro Phiri.   Kubva asendeka shangu dzenhabvu, Phiri ave kuita basa rekurairidza mutambo uyu izvo zvakamuona achirairidza zvikwata zvinosanganisira Golden Valley iyo yaikwikwidza muDivision One.   Pari zvino akavamba chikwata chake cheEiffel Flats United icho chiri kukwikwidza muDivision Two. Zvakadaro, sachigaro wesangano reFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anotsinhira mashoko aPhiri achiti maWarriors anofanirwa kushandisa mitambo miviri yasara kuvaka chikwata chichaenda kuAFCON.   “Yave nguva yekutanga gadziriro dzekuenda kuAFCON, mitambo miviri yasara ngaishandiswe kuvaka chikwata chedu chakasimba.   “Zifa ngaipe Norman Mapeza rutsigiro rwose kuti avake chikwata chake chakasimba. Iye zvino haisi nguva yekungoshandura-shandura varairidzi pose pose, tinoda kuti pave nemurairidzi wavanopa kana kondirakiti yemakore mashanu anyatsoshanda kuvaka chikwata chakasimba chaicho,” anodaro Chimedza.

headline: ‘Vatambi vetsiva changamukai’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mutsiva — Alfonso “Mosquito” Zvenyika — anoti kusadzidza kuri kukonzeresa kuti vatambi vazhinji vemutambo uyu vabirwe mari dzavo nemapuromota nemamaneja vosara vasina chinhu.   Mosquito anoti vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana vanofanirwa kukoshesa nyaya yefundo.   “Vatambi vezhinji vetsiva havana kudzidza saka izvi zviri kukonzera kuti vabirwe mari uye hapana chavari kuita muhupenyu hwavo. Vari kuitisa vamwe vanhu mari, kunyanya mamaneja nemapuromota avo.   “Mutambi anoudzwa kuti pamari ngatiite 50-50, iye mutambi pa50 perecent yake ndipo pachabva yekuti abhandare kuBoxing Board of Control uye azobhadhare zvakare murairidzi wake nekugym kwaanenge achishandira saka anosara asisina chainacho asi maneja akanuna                         zvake. Ndipo paye munhu paanozosendeka magirovhosi ake etsiva anenge asisina chinhu nekuti mari aingobirwa,” anodaro.   Mosquito anoti mamaneja nemapuromota etsiva vanofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira vatambi.   “Tikatarisa kunze kwenyika kuEurope, mutambi wetsiva anenge ane chikwata chikuru chaanoshanda nacho chichimubatsira mubasa                rake. Chikwata ichi chinoshanda mabasa akasiyana ekusimudzira mutambi uyu.   “Manje muno tiri kuona zvakasiyana nekuti unonzwa maneja achiti mutambi uyu ndewangu, ndini ndoshanda naye chete.    Ihwohwo humbimbindoga nekuti unenge uchitadzisa mutambi wako kusimukira mumutambo uyu. Isu chatiri kungoda kuona vatambi vose vachisimukira chete, nyika yedu yorumbidzwa kana vatambi vahwina,” anodaro Mosquito.   Zvichitevera kupihwa mvumo kwakaita mitambo yose kuti ichidzoka, Mosquito anoti zvave kubatsira kuti vatambi vazhinji, avo hupenyu hwavo hwange hwakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19, vachisimuka vagowana cheuviri muhupenyu hwavo.   “Covid-19 yakavhiringa zvizhinji mumutambo wedu, vatambi vandinawo ipfuti chaidzo asi kumbopedza nguva vakagara kwakadzorera basa rose ratange tichiita                     kumashure.   “Asi iye zvino tave nemufaro kuti tavhurirwa, tapihwa mvumo yekuti mitambo ichitanga, zvave kubatsira kuti tichienderera mberi nebasa,” anodaro Mosquito.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Zviri paMutemo 2018 Agricutural Show
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura Harare Agricultural Show zviri pamutemo vachiti zvirongwa zveCommand Agriculture nePresidential Input Scheme hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira zvirongwa izvi sezvo zviri kubatsira nyika kuwana chikafau chakakwana. Vati zvirongwa izvi zvaita kuti nyika iite goho rakawandisa uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichizvitsigira. Vati kubudira kweCommand Agriculture kwakaita kuti ivandudzwe kusanganisira zvimwe zvirimwa zvakaita segorosi, zvipfuyo zvakaita semombe pamwe nehove. Vati zvirongwa izvi hazvisi zvematongerwo enyika sezvinotaurwa nemapato anopikisa munyika uye hurumende yavo icharamba ichitsigira chirongwa ichi. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo inotsigira Harare Agricultural Show pamwe nezvirongwa zvayo zvakaita semusangano wayakaita svondo rino wevarimi nemabhizimisi. Vati mashoo emamwe matunhu munyika yose anofanira kudzidza kubva kuHarare Agricultural Show uyewo vati vachakurudzira hurumende dzematunhu dzichaumbwa pasi pehurumende kuti dzikoshese zvirongwa zvevarimi. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo makambani akazvimirira kuti atsigire mabasa ekurima kuitira kuti nyika ikwanise kutengesa zvirimwa zvayo kunze sezvayaiita kare. Mukuru weZimbabwe Agricultural Society, varongi veHarare Agricultural Show, VaNgoni Kudenga, vati chirongwa chavo chakabudira zvikuru gore rino uye huwandu hwevairatidzira zvirimwa hwakakwira nezvikamu gumi nezvina kubva muzana kana zvichienzaniswa negore rapfuura. Vatiwo ivo nekomiti yavo vari kuzeya pfungwa dzakapihwa nevamwe kuti Harare Agricultural Show isandurwe kuve National Agricultural Show sezvo ichipindwa nevarimi nemakambani kubva mumatunhu ese munyika. Mutungamiriri weGrain Millers Association, GMA, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti makambani ari musangano ravo ave kutotsigira varimi nechekare. Pashoo yegore rino GMA ndiyo yapa mubairo wezviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu emadhora kukambani yeGushungo Dairy iyo yatora mubairo wekutanga pachikamu chevarimi vanochengeta mombe. Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority yatora mubairo wekuita basa rayo zvakanaka. Mukuru wekambani iyi, VaFulton Mangwanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara chose nekukunda kwavaita. Kambani yeSeedco ndiyo yawana mubairo wekutanga pamakambani ese airatidzira gore rino kozotiwo Zimbabwe Broadcasting Cooperation ndiyo yawana mubairo pamakambani ese ezvenhau akapinda pashoo yegore rino. Varimi vahwina mibairo inosanganisira dzimotokari, mari nematirakita. No media source currently available

headline: Nhabvu yePSL yodzoka
text: Ndooka   ZVIKWATA zvose zvinokwikwidza muPremier Soccer League (PSL) zviri pakati pekunyoresa vatambi vazvo segadziriro yekudzoka kwemitambo yeCastle Premiership.   Mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa nemusi wa12 na13 Kukadzi zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa munaZvita gore radarika nekuda kwezororo reKirisimasi uye kupa mukana kuchikwata chenyika chemaWarriors kuti chigadzirire kuenda kunokwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) kuCameroon uko chakadzoka mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti mitambo yeCastle Premiership ichasimudzira masvondo anotevera.   “Hurongwa hwekudzoka kwemitambo yePSL huri kufamba mugwara uye kutaura kuno zvikwata zviri kunyoresa vatambi vazvo.   “Kana tapedza, mitambo inenge yave kusimudzira uye iri kutarisirwa kutanga musi wa12 na13 Kukadzi mazuva ayo atagara takazivisa kuti ndiwo mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa,” anodaro Bare.   Zvisinei, mitambo iyi paichadzoka, mizhinji yacho inogona kukanganiswa nekunaya kuri kuita mvura uye izvi zvinotevera yambiro yakapihwa nebazi rinoona nezvemamiriro ekunze reMeteorogical Services Department (MSD) yekuti munyika muri kutarisirwa kunaya mvuya yakawanda kwenguva ndefu.   Bare anoti PSL ichabatana nemamwe masangano anoona nezvenhabvu mumazuva anotevera vachitenderera kunhandare dzakasiyana vachiongorora mamiriro akaita nhandare idzi.   “Nguva yatiri tinoziva kuti ndeyekunaya kwemvura saka mimwe mitambo inogona kukanganiswa nekudaro tichange tichiona mafambiro anenge achiita mitambo yacho.   “Zvagara hazvo kuti patichasimudzira nhabvu ndipo kubva kare paitanga mitambo yePSL asi kungoti apa chete tichangoti kurumidzei zvishoma. Asi mumazuva anotevera tichatenderera tichiongorora nhandare dzedu tichiona kuti dzakagadzirwa zvakadii uye dzinokwanisa here kutambirwa mitambo panguva ino yatiri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakadaro, pakamiswa mitambo yePSL munaZvita, zvikwata zvakawanda zvange zvatamba mitambo mitatu uye zvimwe miviri.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata cheManica Diamonds chichitungamira palogo zvichitevera kuhwina kwachakaita mitambo yacho yose iri mitatu chiine zvibodzwa zvipfumbamwe.   Manica Diamonds iri kuteverwa neNgezi Platinum iyo, kubva pamitambo yayo mitatu, yakakwanisa kuhwina miviri ndokuita mangange mumwe chete uye ine zvibodzwa zvisere.   FC Platinum, iyo yakatora zvakare mukombe wePSL mwaka wadarika, ndiyo yakagara pechitatu iine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu izvo yakawana kubva mumitambo miviri.   Pechina pakagarwa neTriangle United iyo ine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kubva mumitambo mitatu. Triangle yakahwina mitambo miviri ndokukundwa mumwe chete.   Kune rimwe divi, Bulawayo City ndiyo yakasenga iri pasi pelogo sezvo yangokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo mitatu yayatamba.   Chikwata ichi chakakundwa mumitambo miviri uye ndokuita mangange 3-3 neWhawha.

headline: VaNkosana Moyo Vanoti Huori, Kwete Zvirango, Ndizvo Zvauraya Nyika
text: Mutungamiri webato ronopikisa reAlliance for the People's Agenda kana kuti APA, Doctor Nkosana Moyo, vanoti nyaya yehuori kwete zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika ndiyo yakonzera kuti nyika ipinde mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Doctor Moyo, avo vari kufamba vachisangana nevanhu pakutsvaga rutsigiro vasingaite misangano mukuru, vanoti vari kufara nezvavari kuita uye vanofunga kuti vachakunda musarudzo. VaMoyo vanotiwo havana hurongwa hwekubatana nemamwe mapato sezvo vachiti zviri kuvanhu veZimbabwe kuti vasarudze mutungamiri wavanoda kwete kuti vatungamiri vemapato vapanane zvigaro. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reConstitutional Court Ropa Mutongo Waro neChishanu paChikumbiro chaVaChamisa
text: Nyaya yekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yatanga kunzwikwa mudare re Constitutional Court. Magweta emutungamiri we MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, aswera achikweshana pfungwa nemagweta ari kumirira mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Achisvitsa humboo mudare, magweta aVaChamisa achitungamirwa naAdvocate Thabani Mpofu, ati zviri pachena kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakavhota nevakanyoresa kuvhota hazvisi kupindirana. Magweta aya aroverera Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, nyaya yekuti yakatadza kubata zvakanaka sarudzo, uye pane dzimwe nguva, yakaisa mavhoti aifanirwa kupihwa VaChamisa kuna VaMnangagwa. Ukuwo magweta aVaMnangagwa achitungamirwa naVaItai Uriri, audza dare kuti hapana humboo huri mudare hunoratidza kuti Zec yakaisa mavhoti kuna VaMnangagwa. Magweta aya atiwo humboo huri kupihwa nemagweta aVaChamisa hauna kodzero yekunge huchibvumidzwa kupinda mudare. VaUriri vatiwo magwaro akapihwa VaMnangagwa akasvika kwavari nguva yakatarwa nemutemo yapfuura. Asi magweta aVaChamisa ati paakaisa magwaro awo mudare akasangana nedambudziko sezvo chikonzi chisina kuita basa racho remazvo. Vati sezvo dare richivharwa na 4 dzemasikati, havana kukwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwematare kuitira kuti magwaro asvike nenguva kwayo. Asi VaUriri varamba vakasimba nerekuti mutemo unoti magwaro aya anofanirwa kusvitswa kumunhu aendeswa kumatare mukati memazuva manomwe, uye mazuva manomwe aya hapana pakanzi mazuva ezororo nekupera kwesvondo haaverengwe pamazuva manomwe akatarwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vati dare rinofanirwa kuona kuti mazuva anotarwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika munyaya dzekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika atevedzwa pakatariswa zvinoreva bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Gweta re Zec, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vati hapana huchapupu hunoratidza kuti pane nhamba dzevanhu vakavhota vakaiswa pavanhu vakavhotera VaMnangagwa. Vatiwo huwandu hwezvakakanganiswa neZec hauna kukura zvekuti hungachinja danho rakatorwa neZec rekuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi. Mukuru wevatongi vematare, VaLuke Malaba, vati dare richapa mutongo waro neChishanu. No media source currently available

headline: "Munodei paMuchato weDhongi neBere"-VaKasukuwere paNyaya yeKutyisidzirwa neRufu
text: Mubato reZanu-PF mapinda zinyekenyeke zvichitevera mashoko ekuti vamwe vakuru vebato iri vari muchikwata chinonzi Generation 40 kana kuti G40 vavekutumirwa mashoko ekuti vanogona kupfuudzwa pambozhanhare dzavo. Vanonzi vatumirwa mashoko aya vanosanganisa gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo, gurukota rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema VaPatrick Zhuwawo uye vanomirira Harare South mudare reparamende VaShadreck Mashayamombe. Bepanhau reNewsday ndiro rakatanga kuburitsa nyaya yekuti pane vakuru mubato reZanu-PF vainge vatumirwa mashoko ekuti vanogona kuitwa kafiramberi nemunhu asiri kuzivikana. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitwa nemusi weSvondo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati vange vasati vapirwa nyaya iyi. VaMoyo havana kudaira nharembozha yavo. VaZhuwawo vati havasati vatarisa nharembozha yavo kuti pane mashoko akadai here sezvo paine vanhu vakawanda vari kuvatumira mashoko ekuvakorokotedza nekudomwa kuva gurukota. Asi VaKasukuwere havana kuda kutaura zviri kuitika vachiti Studio 7 igare kuAmerica kwede kuda kutaura zviri munyika. Tabatawo VaMashayamombe asi zvakona n’anga murapwa achida vachiti havana kusununguka kutaura parunhare. Mumusangano weZanu-PF hamuna kugadzikana sezvo pari kufungidzirwa kuti paita kunetsana kwakanyanya panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vari kunzi vakwegura. Pakuvigwa kwegamba renyika VaSikhanyiso Ndlovu kumarinda eHeroes Acre neMugovera nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzakawirasanawo. Nyaya yekunetsana muZanu-PF iyi inonzi yave kukanganisa nhaurirano nemapato anopikisa idzo dzinonzi dzakatanga kuitwa kuGhana dzichitarisirwa kuitwa zvekare kuVictoria Falls neChina. Mapato anopikisa arikuramba kuti nhaurirano idzi dzakananganana nekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Zanu-PF nekune rimwe divi iri kutoramba kuti pane nhaurirano dziripo. Zanu-PF haina kubvira yagadzikana kubva zvayakadzinga vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika amai Joyce Mujuru nevamwe vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro nechisimba. Asi amai Mujuru nevamwe vakadzingwa mubato vari kuramba nyaya yekuti vaida kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro vachiti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. No media source currently available

headline: Magweta eVeritas Anoti ZEC Inofanira Kuudza Mapato Anopikisa Ari Kudhinda Magwaro ekuVhotesa
text: Magweta anoshanda nesangano reVeritas iro rinoongorora mitemo inenge iri mudare reparamende anoti bumbiro remutemo rinosungira sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo reZimbabwe electoral commission kuti risume mapato anopikisa kuti magwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers ari kudhindwa kupi kuti nyaya dzesarudzo munyika dzisaite mutauro. ZEC inoti sezvo nguva yekuita sarudzo yave pedyo, yave kutsvaga vanodhinda mapepa aya nechimbi chimbi. Asi vanopikisa vange vachiti vanoda kuti zviitwe pajekerere pachikokwa makambani akawanda kuti sarudzo dzisabirirwe. Mutemo unosungirawo ZEC kuti isume mapato ari kukwikwidza huwandu hwemapepa anenge adhindwa uye anenge aendeswa kunzvimbo yose yekuvhotera. Veritas inoti hapana chinokanganisa ZEC kuti izivise vanopikisa kuti kambani yavakasarudza kudhidha mapepa ndeipi uye kukoka a nhumwa kunoona kunenge kudindwa mapepa acho. Mutungamiri wenyika vaemmerson mnangagwa vave kutarisirwa chero nguva kudoma zuva resarudzo sezvo senate iri kutarisirwa svondo rino kutambira bhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehumhizha mumichina yekuvhotesa kana kuti BVR Doctor Samuel Chindaro vanoti kubirira sarudzo dzeBVR kunogona kuti netsei asi mitemo inodzikwa nemapato inogona kukanganisa jekerere musarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Dr Mahomva Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19 Apo Vakawanda Vobatwa neChirwere Ichi Zvakare
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vari kukurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabayiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire zvakanyanya munyika. Dr Mahomva vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti ongororo dzose dziri kuitwa munyika nekunze dziri kuratidza kuti vakabayiwa nhomba vane mukana wakakura wekurarama kunyangwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti mhando yeCovid-19 inopararira zvakanyanya yeomicron yave kutotenderera munyika. Nemusi weSvondo, bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 701. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 523 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine makumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 139, 046. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nemana zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 3 874 694 vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nemana zvine makumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 2 884 045. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupefra kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana.

headline: ‘Tave kuda Afcon’
text: . Chiyangwa otaura nezvekuhwinha kuCosaf   MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Phillip Chiyangwa, anoti hapana chinotadzisa maWarriors kuhwina mukombe weAfcon zvichitevera kutora kwakaita chikwata ichi mukombe weCosafa svondo rapera.   Zimbabwe yakasimudza mukombe weCosafa apo yakakunda Zambia 4-2 mufainari yemutambo uyu kuPolokwane, kuSouth Africa. Chiyangwa anoti maWarriors munguva pfupi inotevera achange ave kuita gadziriro dzemutambo weAfcon apo achasangana neCongo kuStade Municipal deKintele kuBrazzaville muna Gunyana.   “Zvikwata zvizhinji zvemuAfrica takazvikunda saka hapana chinotitadzisa kuti tirwire mukombe weAfcon, tinozviita uye tichazviita, Afcon ndiyo yatave kuda.   “Asi chikuru ndechekuti titange tabudirira kuenda kumutambo uyu muna Gunyana,” anodaro.   Anoti maWarriors ave kukodzerawo kukwikwidza muWorld Cup.

headline: Hurumende Yozadza Mapurisa Mumigwagwa neKuda Kumisa Kuratidzira
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaIgnatius Chombo vanoti mapurisa achange akadirwa munyika yose neChitatu apo pakatarisirwa kuti veruzhinji vacharamwa mabasa zvakare sezviri kukurudzirwa nemamwe mapoka. Zvichakadaro, mapurisa neChipiri akasunga Mufundisi Evan Mawarire, avo vanove mumwe wevari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasaende kumabasa nemusi weChitatu. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChipiri, VaChombo vati mapurisa achange akagadzirira zvakakwana kuchengetedza runyararo munyika pahurongwa hwemazuva maviri hwekusaenda kumabasa huri kurongwa nemamwe masangano. VaChombo vati kunyange hazvo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine nhuna dzazvo nehurumende, pane nzira dziri pamutemo dzazvinofanira kutevedzera vachiti mapurisa achasunga vese vachakonzera mhirizhonga pakuramwa mabasa uku. VaChombo, avo vanga vakatsigirwa negurukota rinowona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaSydney Sekeramayi pamwe negurukota rinowona nezvevasori, VaKembo Mohadi, vati hurumende haisi kuzopinza mauto mumigwagwa vachiti mapurisa ari munyika akakwana kuti achengetedze runyararo. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti sei mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nehurumende yavo vasiri kutevedzera zviri kutaurwa neveruzhinji zvekuti vabve pachigaro, VaChombo vati VaMugabe havana kwavari kuenda sezvo vachiti vakapihwa masimba ekutungamira nyika neveruzhinji musarudzo dzemuna 2013. VaChombo vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuri kuda kuitwa kubva musi weChitatu kuri kurongwa nehurumende dzekunze idzo dziri kuda kuti hurumende yaVaMugabe ibve pachigaro kunyange hazvo hurumende dzekunze idzi dzichiti hadzineyi nehurongwa uhwu. Zvichakadai, gweta riri kumirira Mufundisi Mawarire, VaHarrison Nkomo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare manheru ano vari kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central Police Station kuti VaMawarire vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira kuti munyika musagadzikanane. Tichiri panyaya iyi, sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu re Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburista mashoko ekuti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekusungwa kuri kuitwa vanhu vari kuronga nyaya yekuramwa mabasa mangwana. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende uyo aramba kudomwa nezita anoti vatowirirana nevamwe vavo kuti havasi kuzoenda kumabasa kwemazuva maviri ari kutevera zvisinei nekurudziro yaVaChombo yekuti vanhu vasateerere kurudziro yekurambwa mabasa iyi. Svondo rapera vashandi vazhinji munyika vakateerera kurudziro yekusaenda kumabasa iyi, danho rinonzi nevamwe ndiro riri kutyiwa zvakare nehurumende kuti vanhu vachatora pamazuva maviri ari kukurudzirwa kuti vanhu vasaenda kumabasa aya. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotsvaga Rubatsiro rwe$188m Ichabatsira Vakawirwa neMatambudziko
text: Zimbabwe iri kutsvaga rubatsiro rwemariu inodarika zana nemakumi masere emamiriyoni emadhora. Mari iyi ndetekubatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu emvura. Izvi zvaziviswa nevakasanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, pamusangano wavaita nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nesangano reUnited Nations Development Program, vemabhangi pamwe nevemakambani akazvimirira VaMphoko vati vamiriri ava nemakambani aya vanoziva dambudziko rakawirwa neZimbabwe uye hurumende yavo iri kuda rubatsiro rwemhando yese. Vatiwo hurumende ichaedza nepainogona napo kuona kuti mari yese ichabviswa ichaenda kunobatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. VaMphoko vati mari yese iri $188m yavari kutsvaga ichange ichibatwa neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe uye vese vanenge vabvisa mari yavo vanogona kupihwa humbowo hwekuti mari yavo yakashanda sei. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vati hurumende ichiri kuongorora kuti mari iri kudiwa imarii, asi vati vakawana $188 million, mari iyi inogona kubatsira zvakanyanya. Vatiwo musangano weSouthern Africa Development Community uchangobva mukuitwa wakaratidza kuti mashafamu akaparadza zvinhu zvakawanda muZimbabwe kudarika zvakaitika munyika dziri mudunhu rese. Mukuru weUNDP muZimbabwe, VaBishaw Parajuli, vati vatambira chikumbiro chehurumende uye vari kushanda nehurumende yeZimbabwe mukubatsira vese vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti pane rubatsiro rwave kutopinda munyika. Mumiriri weChina muZimbabwe, VaHuang Ping, vati chikamu cheRed Cross chekunyika kwavo chakabvisa rubatsiro rwezviuru zvishanu zvemadhora uyewo vashandi vemuZimbabwe vanobva kuChina vakabvisa zviuru gumi zvemadhora zvekubatsira vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu. Rumwe rubatsirwo rwematende, mishonga nezvimwe zvasvika munyika neMuvhuro kubva kuJapan. Namibia yazivisawo kuti iri kuunza rubatsirwo rwechikafu runosanganisira magaba ehove miriyoni. Mukutanga kwemwedzi kwaKurume, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati dambudziko remafashamu idambudziko renyika yese izvo zvinoita kuti hurumende ikwanise kutsvaga rubatsiro kunze. Pane vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vakatofa munyika yese uye nemafashamu, ukuwo mhuri dzinodarika zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu dzakaparadzirwa misha yadzo, zvikoro, mabhiriji nemakirinika zvikaparadzwawo munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Ndiyani Achatora Mukombe waSoccer Star Gore Rino
text: Vasarudzi veCastle Soccer Star of the Year vaungana muHarare vachisarudza vatambi gumi nemumwe chete vari kurwira kutora mukombe mukuru uyu. Vatambi Ocean Mushure naChristian Epoupa veDynamos, Dominic Chungwa we Caps United, Rodwell Chinyengetere weFC Platinum naClement Matawu weChicken Inn - vapinda pavatambi gumi nemumwechete vari kurwira kutora mukombe weCastle Soccer Star of the Year wemwaka uno. NgezI Platinum Stars ndiyo ine vatambi vakawanda pavatambi vasarudzwa ava vanoti Terence Dzvukamanja, Tichaona Mabvura, na Quadr Amini. Vamwe vakwanisa kupinda pavatambi gumi nemumwechete ava ndiDominic Chungwa naDevon Chafa veCaps United. Chicken Inn ina Moses Jackson naClement Matawu uyo akaita mukurumbira achitambira Motor Action nekutora mukombe waSoccer Star uyu muna 2006. Soccer Stars of the Year pamwe nemurairidzi Coach of the Year, vachaziviswa pamwe nekupihwa mibairo yavo pamabiko ekupera kwegore achaitwa nevePremier Soccer League vakabatana nevanovapa mari veDelta Beverages. Norman Mapeza weFC Platinum,na Lloyd Mutasa weDynamos ndivo vari kutarisirwa kurwira mukombe weCoach of the Year. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeKuendeswa kweMasimba kuMatunhu Inotsviriridza paMusangano weStudio 7 kuBulawayo
text: Nyaya yekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu yakatsviriridza pamusangano wakaitwa muBulawayo neChishanu manheru, vamwe vagari vachitsutsumwa zvikuru nekwavanoti kusarangarirwa nehurumende kwematunhu ekuMatabeleland. Pamusangano uyu, uyo wakaitwa nenhepfenyuro yeStudio 7 yakabatana neMedia Centre, pakaita makakatanwa makuru pamusoro pekuti chii chaizvo chinoreva kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu. Asi vanhu vakawanda vaive pamusangano uyu vakaratidza pachena kuti havazi kufara nenyaya yekuparara kwemaindasitiri muguta reBulawayo pamwe nekusarira kumashure munyaya dzebudiriro kwavakati kuri kuita matunhu eMatabeleland. VaNqobizitha Dube, vanove mudzidzisi muzvidzidzo zvehupfumi uye vari mumwe wevatauri pamusangano uyu, vakati hazvishamise kuti nyaya yekuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu inokonzera makakatanwa sezvo ichibata raramo yeveruzhinji. VaDube vakati zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vabvumirane gwara kana nzira yakajeka yekuti izvi zvichaitwa nenzira ipi. Takunda Madzana mumwe wechidiki vaive pamusangano uyu. Takunda akati haabvumirane nepfungwa yekuti hupfumi hugovanwe kuchishandiswa huwandu hwevanhu vari mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana, achitiwo maonero ake ndeekuti kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu haizi nyaya inofanirwa kunetsa. Vamwe vanhu vaive pamusangano uyu vakati nyaya yekuti kune vanhu vakawanda vanogara munzvimbo dzavasingabvi, humbimbindoga pamwe nehuwori kunyanya hunoitwa nevezvematongerwo enyika ndezvimwe zvinhu zvinokonzera kusarira kumashure kwematunhu ari munyika. Asi mutevedzeri wameya weguta reBulawayo VaTinashe Kambarami, avo vaivewo pamusangano uyu, vakati vanhu vemuZimbabwe havafanirwe kuitirana rusarura kuchishandiswa nyaya yerudzi kana kuti munhu anobva kupi, vachitiwo matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji munyika akangofanana. VaKambarami vakabvuma kuti huwori idambudziko guru munyika asi vakati kana kuchitariswa makanzura, pave nemitemo yakajeka inobatsira kudzivirira nyaya yehuwori. Mutauriri webato reZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, avo vaivepowo pamusangano uyu, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kuendeswa kwemasimba kumatunhu kunogona kubatsira kupedza matambudziko everuzhinji munyika, asi vakati havazi kugutsikana nenzira iri kutorwa nehurumende mukuti danho iri rizadzikiswe. Musangano uyu waive wekupedzisira muchikamu chemisangano yakaitwa neStudio 7 ichishanda nesangano reMedia Centre munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika senzira yekunzwa mafungiro everuzhinji panyaya dzebudiriro nezvimwe zvinovabata mumararamiro avo zuva nezuva. Misangano iyi yaiitwa nerutsigiro rwemuzinda wenyika yeAmerica muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Yoshushikana neDambudziko reZimbabwe
text: Chikwata chesangano reInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, icho chiri munyika kuzoongorora mashandiro echirongwa chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika chinoti chinobvumirana nehurumende kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe haugoni kusimukira pasina rubatsiro rwemari kubva kumasangana akaita neIMF, World Bank nemamwe. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nenhengo dzedare reparemende dziri mukomiti inoona zvemari, mukuru wechikwata ichi, VaDomenico Fanizza, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nemasangano aya nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti hupfumi hwayo hufambire mberi. Vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika vachiti makore akawanda nyika isina rubatsiro kubva kunze anoita kuti zvinhu zviome munyika. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo, zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iite zvese zvakabvumiranwa pachirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program sezvo chiri icho chinhanho chekutanga mukugadzirisa hukama hwayo nemabhanga ekunze pamwe nenyika dzinopa rubatsiro. Chirongwa ichi chinosungira kuti Zimbabwe ibate mari zvakajeka, ishandure mashandiro emabhanga pamwe nebanga guru renyika. Zimbabwe inosungirwawo kujekesa mutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema. Vati kunyange hazvo izvi zvakaoma kuita, zvinofanirwa kuitwa kana nyika ichida kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika nemasangano akaita seIMF. Asi VaFanizza vati zvinofadza kuti Zimbabwe inenge iri kutora gwara rakanaka pachirongwa ichi sezvo pane zveshanduka pamafambisirwo ari kuitwa hupfumi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo pane zvashanduka hurumende ichiri kusangana nematambudziko akawanda ayo anogona kuvhiringa hurumende nekuitadzisa kuzadzikisa chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program. Imwe yenyanzvi idzi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rehomwe yehurumende sezvo iine vashandi vehurumende vakawandisa, kusashandiswa zvakanaka kwemari yehurumende pamwe nekusajeka kwemutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema. VaMuchiwa vanoti izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinogona kuvhiringa chirongwa ichi. Pabvunzwa VaFanizza kuti sei IMF isiri kubatsira Zimbabwe sezvairi kuita Greece iyo iri kutatarikawo munyaya dzehupfumi, VaFanizza vati vanobatsira nyika dzine zvikwereti, uye vanokwanisa kubatsira Zimbabwe chete kana pachinge pave newirirano pakuti ichabhadhara chikwereti chayo sei. IMF iri kubatsira Zimbabwe kugadzirisa hupfumi hwayo pamwe nezvikwereti zvayo kuitira kuti ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. VaFanizza vati izvi zvichaitika chete kana chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program chabudirira muZimbabwe. Chikwereti cheZimbabwe chemukati menyika nekunze chave kudarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora.

headline: Vakawanda Vofarira Kudzikiswa Kwaitwa Mitengo yeDhata
text: Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutambira nemufaro danho rakatorwa negurukota rehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwamashoko, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo wekushandisa internet panharembozha kwaive kwaitwa namakambni enharembozha. Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda avo vaive varatidza kusafara kwavo vachishandisa Facebook, Twitter neWhatsapp, vadzokera zvakare painternet vachiratidza kufara kwavo nedanho ratorwa naVaMandiwanzira iri. Vamwe vataura neStudio 7 vatiwo vari kufara vachiti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vakataura nezwi rimwe chete pane zvinhu zvinenge zvichivanetsa, hurumende inogona kuvateerera. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vanoti vari kufara nedanho rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo yedhata. Asi Muzvare Moyo vanoti mitengo iyi yange isingafanirwe kuve yakakwidzwa kubvira pekutanga kuchitariswa kuti mitengo yeinternet muZimbabwe yagara iri pamusoro. VaMandiwanzira vakazivisa nezvekumisa kukwidza kwemitengo yedhata uku nemusi weChina mushure mekunge veruzhinji varatidza kusafara kwavo. Mumashoko avo, VaMandiwanzira, avo vaive vamboti havaikwanisa kupindira munyaya iyi sezvo vari pazororo, vakazivisa kuti mushure mekutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, pamwe nePotraz, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti kukwidzwa kwemitengo iyi kumbomiswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna Amai Mupfumira kana kubva kuPotraz. Asi Potraz yaburitsawo mashoko ekuti yamisa danho rekukwidza mitengo yeinternet. Vamwe vanhuwo vakawanda vange vachishora kambani yeEconet iyo inonzi ndiyo yaive yauya nezano rekukwidzwa kwemitengo uku uye inova iyo yaive yakwidza mitengo iyi zvakanyanyisa uye nechimbi-chimbi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuEconet panyaya iyi asi kambani iyi yazivisawo kuti yave kudzokera kumitemgo yakare. Mumwe anotengesa airtime uyo angoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo ati kukwidzwa kwemitengo kwaive kwaitwa uku kwange kwave kukanganisa basa rake nevamwewo vanotengesa airtime saiye. Mutungamiri wekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vati danho ratorwa nehurumende rinoratidza masimba evanhu kana vakataura nenzwi rimwe chete. VaNigel Gambanga avo vanoshanda nebepanhau repainternet rinonyora pamusoro pezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, vanoti ichokwadi kuti makambni enharembozha ari kudurirwa nekuwanisa vanhu internet vachitiwo vanowona mitengo ichizokwidzwa zvekare asi zvisina kunyanya sezvange zvaitwa pari zvino. Gore rakapera Potraz yakakonzerazve mutauro apo yakatora danho rekuti makambani enharembozha asaite zvirongwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvekuderedza mitengo

headline: Hurumende Yoramba Ichizvicherera Gomba neKuramba Ichikwereta Mari
text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuramba ichienderera mberi nekukwereta mari yekushandisa munyika kana kuti domestic debt. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo bhanga reIMF nereWorld Bank akayambira kuti kuita izvi kuchapa kuti nyika itadze kubuda mumadhaka mairi. Kunyange hazvo gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vari kuti hurumende hakuna zvimwe zvaingaite kunze kwekukwereta mari kuita mabasa ayo, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zviri kuitwa izvi kukokera mhepo wakasenga mamera mutswanda. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi vachitungamira bato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti nyaya yehurumende yekuramba ichikwereta mari iri kudzosera zvikuru chirongwa chekugadzirisa hupfumi uho huri kutatarika. VaBiti vati mari yakweretwa munyika yave kusvika mabhiriyoni matanhatu emadhora. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Free State muSouth Africa, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, vanoti vanowirirana naVaBiti vachiti mari inokweretwa inofanira kushandiswa pazvinhu zvinobatsira nyika zvakaita semigwagwa, zvipatara, magwenya emagetsi nezvimwe. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, VaTinashe Gumbo, vanoti nyaya yezvikwereti inofanira kunyatsodorongodzwa kuti paonekwe kuti imarii chaiyo yakakweretwa nekuti parizvino hazvina kujeka kuti chikwereti chakamira sei. Vaimbotungamira ZIMCODD kwemakore gumi uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, vanotiwo mari isati yatanga kudzoserwa inofanira kuzivakanwa kuti chii chayakatenga. International Monetary Fund inoti Zimbabwe ikaramba ichikwereta mari munyika zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichikwira zvichapa kuti inflation yemunyika ikwirewo zvakanyanya. Asi nesarudzo dziri kuitwa gore rinouya VaBiti vanoti havaone nyaya yekukweretwa kwemari ichimira. Zimbabwe iri kutatarikawo kubhadhara chimwe chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank chinosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu emadhora. Kunyangwe hazvo VaChinamasa vainge vati vawana mari yekubhadhara chikwereti ichi uye vainge vatotenderana neWorld Bank neIMF, mabhanga aya anoti hapana chatenderanwa . Nyaya yekusabhadhara zvikwereti iri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kukwereteswa mari nevamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano rePlatform for Youth Development Robatsira Mhuri Dziri Kuda Kubviswa kuChipinge
text:
Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevechidiki pamwe nebudiriro yematunhu, rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, riri mushishi kubatsira vagari vemudunhu reChipinge rose vanonzi vakatarisana nekubviswa munzvimbo dzavagere.

Mukuru wesangano iri, Claris Madhuku, vanoti vagari vanodarika zviuru zvishanu mumatunhu eChipinge anosanganisira Munyokowere, Ndiyadzo, Beacon, Chibuwe, neKondo vakapiwa matsamba akabva kubazi rezveminda vachipiwa mazuva manomwe chete ekuti vange vabva munzvimbo dzavagere.

VaMadhuku vanoti mhuri idzi dzakatanga kugara mumatunhu aya mumakore ekuma 1950, zvekuti vanotove nemasabhuku nemadzishe avo, zvekuti vari kutokatyamadzwa kuti vave kubviswa munzvimbo dzavo nehurumende yevatema.

Vanotiwo sangano ravo riri kubatsira vagari nekuvadzidzisa kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Vanoti vakasvitsa nyaya iyi kumakomisheni anomirira kodzero dzevanhu eZimbabwe Human Rights Commission neNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission kuti apindirewo mugakava iri.

Asi VaMadhuku vanoti vamiriri vehurumende vakavazivisa kuti hurumende iri kutarisa nyaya iyi sezvo panga paine hurongwa hwekuona kuti vanhu vakapiwa sei minda senzira yekugadzirisa nyaya yeminda. Vanoti vari kushandawo nekanzuru yeChipinge pakutsvaga nzira dzekupedza gakava iri.

VaMadhuku vanoti bumbiro remitemo rinoti kana munhu achibviswa paagere, anofanirwa kutanga aratidzwa paari kunogariswa, kwete kuti munhu anongonzi ibva asiri kuziva kwaari kuenda.

Vanoti tsakurudzo yavo inoratidza kuti pane makambani ari kuda kupiwa minda iyi kuti arime rudzi rwenzungu rwe macadamia pamwe nemabhanana. No media source currently available

headline: Kushandiswa Zvakanyanya kweZvinodhaka Kunonzi Kwawedzera Zvakanyanyisa Dambudziko reChirwere chePfungwa muHarare
text: Kushandiswa zvakanyanya kwezvinodhaka nevanhu kunonzi nemukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare kwawedzera zvakanyanyisa dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare VaInnocent Hove vanoti nekuda kwekuwedzera kwedambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa zvakakosha kuti vanhu vapihwe dzidziso. VaHove vakataura mashoko aya paiitwa mhemberero dzekucherechedza dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa nemusi weChitatu. Pasi rose, United Nations inoti zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa10 Gumiguru asi zvakanonoka kuitwa nedunhu reHarare. Amai Betty Zephania vanova mumwe wevakaronga mhemberero idzi vachishanda kubazi rinoona nezvehutano vatsigira vachiti dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa idambudziko ririkukura. Amai Zephania vati vazhinji vari kutamburawo nezvirwere zvepfungwa izvi varikushandisa zvinodhaka vachiti munhu wese arikufanirwa kushanda kuona kuti dambudziko iri rapedzwa. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaFarai Gutu vati vechidiki vanoda kudzidziswa kuti zvinodhaka zvine njodzi. Mumwe aishandisa zvinodhaka akakwanisa kuzobuda mazviri aona kuti zvinokuvadza, ndiVaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakazotanga sangano rakazvimiririra rinobatsira avo vanoda kusiya zvinodhaka. Vati kushandisa zvinodhaka kunokanganisa hupenyu hwevanhu vachiti zvakakoshawo kuti vanhu vazive kwekuwana rubatsiro kana vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Kutanga kwegore rino mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti gore rino igore rekurwisa dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Vechidiki ndivo vanonzi vari kunyanyoshandisa zvinodhaka izvi zvakaita semutoriro, krango, mbanje, mishonga yechikosoro yakaita seHistalix kana bronco nezvimwewo. Mhemberero dzegore rino dzakaitwa paine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshora Hurumende Iri Kuda Kuomesera Vashandisi veMadandemutande
text: No media source currently available Nyanzvi dzinoti hurumende inogona kuvhara madandemutande kana kushungurudza vanoashandisa sekuvimbisa kwayakaita asi izvi zvinosvibisa chimiro chenyika pamwe nekuti irasikirwe nebhizimisi rakwanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemashoko nematongerwo enyika dzinoti veruzhinji vanofanira kutora mashoko ehurumende zvakadzama sezvo hurumende ichikwanisa kuita zvairi kutaura. Mudzidzisi wezvekutapwa kwenhau pachikoro cheChristian College of Southern Africa, VaDonald Mukota, vanoti pane dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatombovhara madandemutande kana kusunga vanoashandisa, saka zvinogona kuitika muZimbabwe. Asi vanoti izvi handizvo zvingaite kuti vanhu vatadze kushandisa madandemutande. Asi vanotiwo vanhu vanofanira kushandisa madandemutande mune zvakanaka. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti hazvibatsiri kuvhara madandemutande uye kana hurumende yaita izvi, inenge yaratidza pachena kuti haidi hutongo hwejekerere. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti zvekuvhara madandemutande zvinoitwa nehurumende dzine hudzvanyiriri uye dzine zvadzinoda kuvanza. Vanoti zvinoda mari yakawanda chose kuvhara madandemutande uye hurumende dzisina mari dzakaita seyeZimbabwe dzinogona kunetsekana kuita izvi. Asi vanoti Zimbabwe inogona kuwana rubatsiro rwekuita izvi kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuronga kuomesera vanhu vanoshandisa madandemutande iyo iri iyo nzira yave kushandiswa neveruzhinji kufambisa mashoko pamwe nekunzwa nhau kubva mukati nekunze kwenyika. Muzvare Majama Nyoni, avo vachangobva kumusangano we Forum on Internet Freedom in Africa wakaitirwa kuSouth Africa svondo rapfuura, vati zvakabuda pamusangano uyu zvinoratidza kuti nyika inorasikirwa nemari yakawanda chose kana madandemutande akavharwa kana kuvhiringwa. Sangano reCollaboration on International ICT Policy for East and South Africa rinoti kuvharwa kwemadandemutande kwakaita kuti nyika dzeSub Saharan Africa dzirasikirwe nemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora.

headline: Vatsigiri vemaWarriors Vofara neGadziriro yeMakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup
text: Chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kuratiza kuti chiri munzira yakajeka apo chakananga kumakwikwi e2017 Africa Cup of Nations. Chikwata ichi nezuro chakadambura maTaifa Stars ekuTanzania 3-0 mumutambo wekuenzana masimba, izvo zvirikugutsa veruzhinji kuti maWarriors achanokwikwidza zvine mutsindo kuAFCON. Vanhu havana kuuya kunhandare sezvaitarisirwa asi vashoma vacho vaivemo vakanakidzwa nematambiro echikwata chavo icho chakawana zvibodzwa kubva kuna Knowledge Musona, Nyasha Mushekwi pamwe naMathew Rusike. Zvakabuda pamutabo uyu zvakakosha kumaWarriors kwete mugadziriro yavo yeNations Cup chete asi muma Fifa World rankings zvekare sezvo veFifa vanoshandisa mitambo yakadai kugadzira mamiriro ezvikwata muhurongwa hwepasi rese. Mutsigiri weDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti zvakaitika neTanzania zvinobatsira kutyisidzira zvikwata zvanga zvichitarisira Zimbabwe pasi kuma Africa Cup of Nations vachiwedzera ivo kuti ikozvino Zimbabwe iri kuenda kuGabon iinechiremera. Aimbotambira maWarriors neCaps United Alois Bunjira anoti kukunda kwemaWarriors zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru achiti ivo semaonero ake tarenda rakazara muchikwata chenyika ichi. Mutsigiri weCaps United VaShingirai Mthombeni varikudada nemaitiro emaWarriors vachiti ivo dai varamba vakadai kusvikira pachapera maAfrica Cup of Nations finals. Mutambo weTanzania wauya svondo rimwechete maWarriors achangobva kukunda Zambia 1-0. Asi Bunjira anoti pachine zviviri kana zvitatu zvinoda kugadziriswa maWarriors asati ave kurota zvekutora mukombe wemuAfrica. Pamusoro pevatambi vakabva kunze kwenyika, murairidzi wemaWarriors Kalisto Pasuwa akashandisawo vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvemuno vakaita saHardlife Zvirekwi weCaps United, Teenage Hadebe weChicken Inn pamwe na Tatenda Mukuruva weDynamos, avo arikuongorora kuti angaende navo here kuma fainari. Pasuwa anoti ari kuda mimwe mitambo miviri kana mitatu yekuedzana masimba kuti akwanise kugadzira chikwata chakasimba icho achaenda nacho kuGabon. Mutungamiri weZifa VaPhillip Chiyangwa vakavimbisa mitambo nezvikwata zvine mukurumbira muAfrica zvakaita seEgypt neIvory Coast maWarriors asati asimuka kuenda kumaAfrica Cup of Nations. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vanoti zveZIFA kutenda maruva wadya chakata.

headline: Mumwe Mwana Ofa neChirwere cheTyphoid kuMbare
text: Apo vamwe vanhu vange vari kufara pazororo rekisimusi, imwe mhuri yekuMbare yakafirwa nemwasikana wayo uyo ano fungudzirwa kuti akarwara netyphoid kwenguva pfupi. Vagari vemumusha uyu munzvimbo yeNational vanoti tsvina kana kuti sewage iri kuyerera nepadzimba dzavo iri kupa kuti vatyire hupenyu hwavo. Vagari vemuMbare vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti musikana uyu ange akabuda zvinofadza pabvunzo dzake dzeGrade 7 aine 4 units uye kunyange hazvo kanzuru yeHarare yati iri kuongorora kuti chii chakanzozera kufa kwake, vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vati kubuda kwemasiweji achierera mudzimba dzavo ndiko kwakonzera kufa kwemwana uyu. Vagari vakawanda mumigwagwa inoti 8th na 9th vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yeHarare yange isiri kuterera zvichemo zvavo zvekuti vazogadzira mapaipi emasewage akaputika uye vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo iyi vakatoendeswa kuchipatara vachirwara nemanyoka. Mumwe mugari wemuna 9th uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti kufa kwemwana uyu kwarwadza vanhu vakawanda. Ambuya Anne Marry Karimushanje vanoti mumusha weMbare maita dambudziko guru remasuweji ari kupitika mudzimba zvekutoti vave kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachafa nezvirwere zvemanyoka. Tinashe Karise uyo ane tuckshop yake munzvimbo iyi audza Studio 7 kuti seweji iri kuerera pese yave kukanganisa bhizimisi rake uye nhunzi dzave kuzara mutuckshop make. Mugwaro ravaburitsa kuvatori venhau, mutauriri weHarare City Council, VaMichael Chideme, vati kanzuru iri kuongorora rufu rwemwana uyu uye vatsinhirawo kuti hanzvidzi yake pamwe nevamwe vanhu vane chitsama kubva munzvimbo iyi vari muchipatara uye vari kufungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid. Vatiwo pane vanhu makumi matatu kubva munzvimbo iyi vakatorapwa sezvo vaifunguidzirwa kuti vane typhoid. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Proper Chonzi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mufi ange achiratidzika kunge ane typhoid asi kanzuru haisati yave nehumbowo hwekuti ange aine typhoid here kana kuti kwete. Dr Chonzi vati zvinokonzera typhoid zvinozikanwa uye kanzuru iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutakurwa kwemarara nemasiweji senzira yekudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaChideme vatiwo kanzuru yatanga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanhu pamusoro pezvirwere zvetyphoid necholera pamwe nekukosha kwehutsanana. Kanzuru yeHarare yakazivisa muna Mbudzi kuti yakatarisira kuti zvirwere zvemanyoka zvichawanda panotanga kunaya mvura uye yakati vese vanenge vachirwara nezvirwere izvi vacharapwa pachena. Bazi reCentres for Disease Control rinoona nezvehutano muAmerica rinoti kudzivirira chirwere chetyphoid vanhu vanofanira kubhoirisa chikafu kana mvura, kubika chikafu, kuchimenya kana kutorega kudya muchirungu, “Boil it, cook it, peel it or forget it.”

headline: ZEC Inoti Vanhu Vatanga Kuongorora Mazita Avo Mugwaro reVavhoti
text: Apo kwasara mazuva matanhatu kuti chirongwa chekuongorora gwaro rine mazita evakanyoresa kuvhota chipere, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inoti vanhu vasingasvike miriyoni imwe chete ndivo vakwanisa kuongorora gwaro iri kusvika pari zvino.\n\nPadandemutande rayo, ZEC inoti kusvika nezuro munyika mose vanhu vanopfuura zviuru mazana manomwe ndivo vange vakwanisa kuongorora gwaro rine mazita evakanyoresa kuti vagovhota. ZEC inotiwo yakakwanisa kutumira maSMS kunharembozha dzevanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri. Pakapera chirongwa cheBVR mop up muna Kurume kune vanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana vaive vanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Dunhu reBulawayo nderimwe rematunhu ane vanhu vashoma kana kwakatariswa vanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota mumatunhu ose emunyika. Mukuru weZEC muBulawayo District Amai Sithembiso Khupe vanoti kusvika nezuro vanhu vanopfuura zviuru gumi nezvinomwe ndivo vaive vakwanisa kuongorora mazita avo mugwaro revakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Amai Khupe vanoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakatumirwa maSMS panharembozha dzavo, zvakakosha kuti vaende vanoongorora gwaro rine mazita evakanyoresa kuvhota nekuti zvinotumirwa panharembozha zvinogona kuve zvisiri izvo kana kuti zvisina kukwana. Vanotiwo kuenda kunoongorora gwaro iri pachezvavo kunobatsirawo vakanyoresa kuti vagare vaziva nzvimbo yavachanovhotera. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network Amai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava vanoti sangano ravo riri kugutsikana nekufamba kuri kuita chirongwa chekuongorora gwaro revakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota uye vanotendawo ZEC nekukwanisa kutumira maSMS kune vamwe vanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Chirongwa chekuongorora gwaro revakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chiri kuitwawo pamwe nechirongwa cheBVR mop up munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika mose senzira yekupa mukana kuvanhu vakawanda vanokodzera asi vange vasati vakwanisa kunyoresa kuvhota. Chirongwa ichi chakatanga musi wa19 mwedzi uno uye chiri kupera musi wa29 chinove Chipiri chesvondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: America Inobatsira Dzimwe Nyika neMushonga weNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Pamusangano wakaitwa nenyika dzakabudirira dzeG7, nyika idzi dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nenhomba yeCovid-19. Nhomba idzi, pamwe chete nezvakavimbiswa kubva muna Kukadzi 2021, zvichasvitsa rubatsiro rwemushonga rwese urwu pabhirioni remadhora mugore riri kuuya, America ichibatsira nehafu yemushonga iyi. Mugwaro ravakabudisa, vatungamiri venyika dzeG7 vakati chinhu chekutanga chavanoda kuitira dzimwe nyika dzepasi rose kuona kuti mushonga wakanaka uye unoshanda uwanikwe nenyika dziri kubudirira sezvo kubaiwa nhomba kwavanhu vose pasi pano chiri chinhu chakanakira vagari vose pasi pano. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakafara nekuzvipira kwakabvumiranwa uku, zvikurusei sezvo kwakauya mushure mekutaura kwavo kuti America ichatenga mishonga yePfizer/BioNTech inoita zviuru mazana mashanu kuti ipiwe kunyika dzinoita zana. Sekutaura kwakaita VaBiden, America iri kutenga mushonga wekupa dzimwe nyika unopfuura wakambotengwa nenyika ipi zvayo. VaBiden vakati, “Zviuru mazana mashanu zvemushonga wenhomba uyu zvichatanga kuendeswa kunyika dzakasiyana siyana mumwedzi waNyamavhuvhu gore rino. Zviuru mazana maviri zvemushonga uyu zvichaendeswa kuned zimwe nyika gore rino, uye zviuru mazana matatu zvichaendeswa mumwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga mugore ra2022.” Kuzvipira kweAmerica kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemishonga yenhomba yePfizer inoita zviuru mamirioni mazana mashanu kuri kuwedzerwa pamusoro pe mishonga inoita mamirioni makumi masere akavimbiswa dzimwe nyika naVaJoe Biden, avo vakazvipiravo kubatsira nemari inoita mabhirioni maviri emadhora eku America ekubatsira sangano rinobatsira dzimwe nyika mukuwana mushonga wenhomba. Chivimbiso chakaitwa nenyika dzeG7 chinoratidza kuti kubva muna 2020, nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemabhirioni maviri emushonga wenhomba. Nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipiravo kubatsira dzimwe nyika mukugadzira mushonga wenhomba munyika dzayo dzichishanda neQuad Vaccine Partnership yeAmerica, Australia, India neJapan. VaBiden vanoti zviri pachena kuti nyika dzeG7 dzinobvumirana kuti zvadzakavimbisa izvi hazvisi izvo zvese zvadzichaita, vachiti kubatsira uku kuchaenderera mberi kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa, PSL vokandirana nyoka mhenyu
text: Sangano rinoona nez- venhabvu muno reZimba- bwe Football Association rokandirana nyoka mhenyu nerePremier Soccer League pamusoro penyaya yekuti mitambo yePSL ichatanga riinhi zvichitevera mashoko akabva kuConfederation of African Football (CAF) ekuti nhandare dzemuno hadzina kukodzera kutambirwa nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze.
