Svondo radarika, CAF yakabuda pachena kuti muZimbabwe hamuna nhandare kana imwechete yavanoona yakakodzera kuti itambirwe nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze.   Izvi zvinoreva kuti mutambo wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations 2020 neAlgeria uchatambirwa kunze kwenyika.   Hurumende parizvino iri mushishi yekuona kuti nhandare dzinosanganisira National Sports Stadium iri muHarare neBarbourfields kuBulawayo dzagadziriswa.   Kazhinji mitambo yePSL inotanga kupera kwemwedzi waKurume asi parizvino mamiriro ezvinhu haana kujeka zvichitevera mashoko akabva kuCAF aya.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL Kudzai Bare anoti nyaya yenhandare iyi yakakomba asi zvose zvinoitwa neZifa.    Kudzai Bare   Anoti Zifa ndiyo inoongorora nhandare dzese dzemuno uye yovazivisa dzinokodzera kutambirwa nhabvu nezvikwata.   “Isu zvose zvenhandare tinozvisiira mumaoko eZifa ndiyo inoongorora nhandare dzese dziri muno dzinoda kushandiswa nezvikwata zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muPSL votizivisa dzavanenge vaona dzakakodzera kutambirwa nhabvu.   “Isu tinozongotevedzera zvavanenge vatiudza, saka zvimwe zvese zvizere zvekuti nhandare dzedu dzinokwanisa here kutambirwa nhabvu yePSL munotozvinzwa kuZifa,” anodaro.   Achibvuzwa neKwayedza kuti mitambo yePSL inogona kutanga rinhi, Bare anoti izvi zvichazoziviswa mushure memusangano wavo wepagore weAnnual General Meeting (AGM) kupera kwesvondo rino.   “Tichagara pasi sesangano uye tichaita musangano wedu wekutanga wegore mukuru weAGM kupera kwesvondo rino apo ticharonga kuti mitambo inotanga rinhi. Asi, tichange tichishanda neZifa tichinzwa kubva kwavari kuti nhandare dzinoita ndedzipi kuti mitambo itange,” anodaro Bare.   Mutauriri weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela anoti nyaya dzenhandare yemitambo yePSL zvinozivikanwa nevePSL.   Mushure mekunge Kwayedza yamuudza kuti PSL iri kutiwo zvenhandare zviri mumaoko avo, anoti vachagara pasi kupera kwesvondo rino kuti vagoronga kuti nhandare dzokushandisa dzedzipi.   “Zviri mumaoko ePSL inzwai kubva kwavari. Isu tichazogara hedu pasi kupera wesvondo rino toona kuti nhau iyi ichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Gwesela.

headline: Bhodhi Idzva reZimra Rinogadzwa Richitungamirwa naVaCallisto Jokonya
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakazivisa neChitatu mazita evanhu vatanhatu vachange vari mubhodhi idzva reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra. VaNcube vakati sachigaro webhodhi iri vachange vari muzvinabhizimisi ane mukurumbira, VaCallisto Jokonya, mutevedzeri wavo ari Amai Josephine Matambo. Dzimwe nhengo dzebhodhi iri ndiVaGeorge Guvamatanga, VaIsaac Kwesu, Memory Nguwi naDoctor Morris Mpofu. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga vachitengesa reInternational Crossborder Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange havo vachiremekedza VaJokonya semunhu anoziva zvemabhizimisi, VaJokonya havangakwanisi kupedza huori huri kuZimra nekuti huori uhu hunobva kumusoro soro kwehurumende kunove iko kunofanirwa kutanga kugadziriswa. VaJokonya vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vari kunze kwenyika uye havakwanisi kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

headline: IOM Inoti Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Mazana Maviri Vakadzokera Kumusha neKuda kweKukanganiswa kweHupfumi neCovid-19 Munyika Dzavagere
text: Sangano rinoona nezvekufamba kwevanhu kubva mune imwe nyika vachienda mune imwe, reInternational Organisation for Migration (IOM) rinoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mazana maviri ezviuru zvadzokera kumusha kubva zvatanga denda reCovid-19 muna Kukadzi 2020 zvichitevera kuoma kwehupenyu munyika dzazvange zvaenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro. Sangano iri rinoti richishanda pamwechete nebazi rezvehutano uye nemamwe masangano, vakakwanisa kubatsira vanhu vane chitsama kuburikidza nekuvawanisa hunyanzvi mune zvekurima, mari pamwe nezvimwe zvinodiwa muhupenyu hwemunhu kuitira kuti vakwanise kusimukira. Asi IOM inoyambira kuti kana vanhu ava vakasawana rubatsiro nekukasika, vakawanda vavo vachanyura mumatambudziko akadzama kudarika avari kutarisana nawo pari zvino, izvo zvinozotuma vamwe kuti vatsvage nzira dzekurarama nadzo dzisiri pamutemo kana kuti vabude zvakare munyika vachishandisa dzimwe nzira. Studio 7 yaedza kubata gurukota rezvemabasa nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Professor Paul Mavima, asi vati vanga vari mudare reparamende vachiti vaizopindura mibvunzo yedu kana vasununguka. Asi sachigaro vesangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, reAfrican Diaspora Forum, Doctor Vusumuzi Sibanda, vanoti havafungi kuti huwandu hwevanhu huri kutaurwa neIOM ndehwe vanhu vakadzokera kumusha nekuti vakanga vaomerwa nehupenyu. Doctor Sibanda vanoti vanhu vakawanda vanogona kunge vakashandisa mukana wekumbodzokera Covid-19 kuti vasanetseke kupinda munyika, asi vachizobuda zvakare vachishandisa dzimwe nzira. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti VaMnangagwa Ngavaite Zvavari Kutaura Kwete Kuperera Mukutaura Chete
text: Mumwe mukuru muhurumende yeAmerica anoti kunyange hazvo mutungamiri weZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutaura mashoko akanaka nekuvimbisa kuita zvakanaka, zvakakosha kuti vachitanga kuita zvavari kuvimbisa kuitira kuti vakwanise kudyidzana nekugara nenyika dzepasi rese zvakanaka. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica, Ambassador Matthew T Harrington, vataura mashoko aya vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kuvatapi venhau vemuAfrica pachiitiko chekupa mubairo kumakambani akabudirira mumabhizimisi eAwards for Corporate Excellence. VaHarrington vati nyika dzese pasi rose, kusanganisira America, dzakatarisa Zimbabwe nemaziso matsvuku zvichitevera kushanduka kwakaita hurumende muZimbabwe. Vati Zimbabwe ine mukana mukuru wekuchinja gwara rayaifamba naro mumakore makumi matatu apfuura. Vati America inotarisira kudyidzana neZimbabwe zvekare sezvavaita kare. Vati kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vari kutaura mashoko akanaka chinokosheswa nenyika yavo kuita zvinhu izvi kwete kungotaura chete. Ambassador Harrington vati panodiwa kushanduka munyaya dzehupfumu nematongerwo enyika kuti America nenyika dzepasi rose dzigutsikane nekutanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe zvakare. Hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inoti inoda kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rese. Nemusi weMumvuro, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakaparura hurongwa hwekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekuti nyika ichabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo sei kumabhanga epasi rese akaita seWorld Bank, African Development Bank nemamwe. Vakatiwo vachatauririrana nenyika dzese dzakakweretwa neZimbabwe kuti vatange kudzidzana nadzo zvekare. Kusabhadhara zvikwereti ndezvimwe zvange zvave kuita kuti Zimbabwe isemwe nenyika dzepasi rese. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti VaMbeki Mutengesi, Ngavakumbire Ruregerero
text: Mutungamiri we MDCT, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vapomera neChitatu vaimbova mutungamiri we South Africa, Va Thabo Mbeki, mhosva yokushanda pamwe chete nemutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, mukubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2002. VaTsvangirai vatiwo Va Mbeki vanoziva zvakaitika pasarudzo dzemuna 2008 idzo dzakazokonzera kuti pawumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa mushure mekunge VaTsvangirai vakunda VaMugabe musarudzo idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo pa Harvest House zvichitevera kubuda kwakaita gwaro revatongi vematare edzimhosva veku South Africa, reJudicial Observer Mission, iro rakange richiongorora sarudzo dzemuna 2002, Va Tsvangirai vapomera hurumende yeSouth Africa yaiva pasi paVa Mbeki mhosva yekushanda neZanu PF mukudzvanyirira zvido zvevana veZimbabwe. Zvichitevera sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzemuna 2002, Va Tsvangirai vakaenda kumatare vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakange dzabirirwa naVaMugabe, asi kusvika pari zvino matare haasati atura mutongo panyaya iyi. Nekune rumwe rutivi, bepanhau reku South Africa rakaenda kumatare richida kuti gwaro revaongorori ve South Africa ava ribuditswe pachena asi rakazobuda nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera mushure mekunge matare epamusoro soro munyika iyi ati gwaro iri riburitswe. Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakanga yapikisa kuburitswa kwegwaro iri. VaTsvangirai vaendererera mberi vachiti pakaitwa musangano wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa muguta guru re Zambia re Lusaka muna Kubvumbi 2008, Va Mbeki vakataurawo zvakare kuti mu Zimbabwe maizoitwa sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzechipiri, kana kuti presidential runoff, kunyange hazvo zvakange zvabuda musarudzo zvakange zvisati zvave kuzivikanwa. Vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti Va Mbeki vakange vachiziva zvose zvakanga zvichiitwa neZanu PF pakange pakapfimbikwa zvakange zvabuda musarudzo izvo zvakatora nguva inodarika mwedzi mumwe chete zvisati zvaziviswa kune veruzhinji. Zvichakadai, mukuru wesangano rinoongorora nyaya dzekufambiswa kwesarudzo munyika re Election Resource Centre, Va Tawanda Chimhini, vanoti hurumende ye South Africa inofanira kukumbira ruregerero panyaya iyi kuvana veZimbabwe. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende ye South Africa panyaya iyi. Gwaro re Judicial Observer Mission iri rinotiwo sarudzo dzemuna 2002 hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye rinoti pakange pane mhirizhonga yakanyanyisa yakavhiringa hupenyu hwenhengo dze MDC, vatungamiri vebato iri vakasungwa pamberi pesarudzo uyewo kuti gwaro revavhoti rakanga risiri mumawoko e MDC. Kunyange hazvo pakaitwa dzimwe sarudzo kubva muna 2002, MDC-T ichiri kungochema nenyaya dzimwe chetedzo uye kusvika pari zvino bato iri rinoti harisati rave negwaro revavhoti. Va Tsvangirai vati kubva muna 2000 pakaitwa sarudzo dzeparamende, Zimbabwe haisati yamboita sarudzo dziri pachena. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai vati kusawirirana kuri kuitika mu Zanu PF kunoratidza kuti Va Mugabe havasisina nguva yakareba vari muhutongi. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko emudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vari kukurudzira kuti mutevedzeri wemurume wavo mubato nemuhurumende, Amai Joice Mujuru, vasiye chigaro chavo vachivapomera mhosva dzehuori, kusagona basa pamwe nekuronga zvekubvisa Va Mugabe pachigaro zvechisimba. Kunyange hazvo vachiti gakava riri mu Zanu PF harinei nebato ravo, chinovarwadza sebato ndechekuti veruzhinji ndivo vari kutambura uku vari muhurumende vachiswera vachirwira masimba. Asi Amai Mujuru vari kuramba mhosva dzose dzavari kupomerwa vachiti mawoko avo akachena semukaka uye vanoti vakatokwidza nyaya iyi kumagweta avo nepamusana pekusvibiswa kwavanoti kuri kuitwa zita ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeHarare Yovandudza Mashandiro eMamwe Makirinika Ayo
text: Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, hurumende, nemamwe makambani yatanga chirongwa chekusimudzira mamwe makirinika ayo kuti ave zvipatara zvepamusoro izvo zvichaderedza huwandu hwevarwere vanoenda kuzvipatara zvikuru zveHarare Hospital pamwe neParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. Chirongwa ichi chatanga pakinirika yeMabvuku iyo iri kuvandudzwa kuti ive nemibhedha yekuchengetera varwere kusanganisira madzimai akazvitakura, madhokotera anovhoiya vanhu, kutora maX-Ray nemaScan nezvimwe zvizhinji zvinoitwa kuzvipatara zvikuru zvakaita seHarare neParirenyatwa. Mukuru anoona nezvemabasa ehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti kanzuru yakaona zvakakodzera kuti isumudzire makirinika kuti ave zvipatara kuti vanhu vakwanise kurapwa munzvimbo dzavanogara kwete kutora nguva vachienda kuzvipatara zveHarare kana Parirenyatwa. Harare haina chipatara chiripamusoro pemakirinika nekudaro makirinika ayo anoendesa varwere kuzvipatara zveHarare kana Parirenyatwa izvo zvinofanira kunge zvichitora varwere kubva kuzvipatara zvematunhu pana kuti maprovincial nemadistrict hospitals. VaChonzi vanoti kirinika yeMabvuku yatotanga kuita zvinoitwa kuzvipatara zvepamusoro uye panopera mwedzi uno kirinika iyi inenge yafanana nezvipatara zvemumatunhu. Gurukota rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwakanaka kwevana, Dr David Parirenyatwa, avo vakashanyira kirinika yeMabvuku vakati zvirikuitwa nekanzuru zvakanaka chose uye ichi chirongwa chinofanira kuitwa kuBuluwayo nemamwe madhorobha. Kuvandudzwa kwekirinika yeMabvuku kuchatora mari ingangosvika miriyoni yemadhora uye mari iyi yakaunganidzwa nekanzuru, masangano anoshanda akazvimirira akaita seZimHealth neHighLife Foundation pamwe neLarfage Cement. VaChonzi vanoti chipatara ichi chichange chave kushanda kwezuva rese chiinana chiremba nguva dzese uye bazi rezvehutano pamwe nechikoro chana chiremba kuUniversity of Zimbabwe vachabatsirana nanamazvikokota munyaya dzehutano zvekuti panenge pasisina chikonzero chekuendesa varwere kuHarare kana kuParirenyatwa. VaEmmanuel Gasa vesangano reAIDS and Arts Foundation iro rinoshandira munharaunda yeMabvuku vanoti zvaitwa nekanzuru kurerutsira varwere munzvimbo iyi. Dr Chonzi vanoti makirinika eHighfields , Kuwadzana neHatcliffe achasimudzira kuve zvipatara pachirongwa chekanzuru chekuvandudza nekusimudzira mabasa ehutano muguta reHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kuongorora Zvakaitika muKanzuru yeBulawayo
text: Meya veguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vanoti bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu ravazivisa kuti richatuma chikwata chevanhu kuBulawayo kunoongorora zvakaitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo, zvinosanganisira kumiswa basa kwakange kwaitwa munyori weguta, VaChristopher Dube, nemutevedzeri wameya, VaTinashe Kambarami, pavakambofanobata chinzvimbo chameya. VaMguni vati zvichawanikwa nevaongorori ava zvichabudiswa nehurumende mumavhiki mashoma arikutevera. MuBulawayo makamboita kusagadzikana pakati pemarudzi kusvika meya, pamwe chete nebato reMDC rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, rapindira. Asi nyanzvi mukurongwa kwemaguta, VaPrince Sibanda, vanoti bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu harifanirwi kupindira munyaya iyi zvachose, vachiti nyaya iyi inofanirwa kugadziriswa nekanzuru yeBulawayo. VaSibanda vanoti havanzwisisi kuti sei hurumende ichida kupindira munyaya dzekanzuru iyo kanzuru isati yashandisa mapazi ayo ese mukugadzirisa nyaya iyi.

headline: Vashandi Voramba Kunyengedzwa neMasitendi eHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council raramba mashoko ari kunzi akataurwa negurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, ekuti vashandi vakawanda vari kuda kupiwa masitendi semuripo wemari dzavo dzemabhonasi egore rapera, pane kuti vapiwe iri mari. Sachigaro weApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti semaziviro avo vashandi vari kuda kupiwa mabhonasi avo iri mari nekuti sangano ravo rine humwe hurongwa hwekutsvagira nhengo dzaro masitendi ekuvakira dzimba richishanda nebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Amai Alexander vanorambawo mashoko ekuti vatungamiri vemasangano evashandi vehurumende ndivo vari kurasisa vashandi panyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira svondo rino vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hofisi yavo iri kutambira vashandi vakawanda chose vari kuda kunzwisisa nezvehurongwa hwemasitendi uhwu. Vanonzi vakatiwo ongororo yekunzwa pamire vashandi panyaya iyi iri kuitwa nebazi ravo inoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwuri kuda nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba pane mari. Amai Alexander vanoti vamiriri vemasangano ose evashandi vehurumende vachasangana neMuvhuro svondo rinouya kuti varovane masoro padanho rekutora vachienda mberi. Musangano wanga wakatarisirwa kuitwa neMuvhuro svondo rinouya pakati pevashandi nevamiriri vehurumende unonzi wambosendekwa zvakare parutivi, danho rinonzi riri kutowedzera hukasha wkevashandi. Studio7 yakundikana kubata Amai Mupfumira kuti tinzwe pavamire pari nhasi. Asi Amai Alexander vanoti havaone vashandi vachitadza kutora matanho kana pasina chagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: Covid yakanganisa karate
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Karate Union rinoti kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yakasiyana nekuda kweCovid-19 kwave kukonzeresa kuti vamwe vechidiki varase hunhu sezvo vachiswera vachingodzengerera mumigwagwa.   Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZKU, Shihan Tawanda Mufundisi anoti hupenyu hwevatambi vekarate vazhinji hwakakanganiswa zvikuru sezvo vachirarama kuburikidza nemutambo uyu.     Anoti mitambo yakaita sekarate inobatsira vechidiki kuti vagone kuzvibata muhupenyu hwavo uye kuvafundisa kuti vasiyane nezvinodhaka.   “Tine vechidiki vakawanda vatange tichishanda navo tichifundisa karate asi iye zvino tave kuvatyira nekuti kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo uye kuvharwa kwemagym vave kuswera vachingodzungaira mumigwagwa.   “Mitambo iyi yaishandiswa senzira yekubatsira vechidiki kuti vabve mumigwagwa vasaswere vachingomberereka nekuti ndipo vanopedzisira vave kufurirana kuita zvenhando, mongoziva vechidiki kana vakaswera vasina zvekuita panoitwa mabasa makuru ipapo,” anodaro Shihan Mufundisi.   Anoenderera mberi achiti sesangano, vakanyorera kuHurumende vachikumbira mvumo yekuti vavhure madojo vatange kuita gadziriro dzavo dzekarate asi vasingaronge mitambo.   Anoti mutambi wekarate anofanirwa kugara achiita gadziriro dzake nguva nenguva sezvo mutambo uyu uchidzidzisa kuzvibata uye kuzvininipisa.   “Mutambi wekarate anofanirwa kugara ari mudojo achiita gadziriro dzake, mutambo uyu unobatsira zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kuzvibata chaiko.   “Isu vamwe tairarama kuburikidza nekukwikwidza uye kumbopihwa mabasa ekushanda ekuchengetedza vanhu asi zvese zvakaenda mudondo nekuti coronavirus yakauya, shuwa yakatiurayira basa,” anodaro.

headline: Zimbabwe Ine Vanhu Vana Vafa, Uye Makumi Maviri neVasere Vabatwa neCovid-19
text: Huwandu hevanhu vabatwa neCoronavirus huchiri pamakumi maviri nevasere, uye vakashaya nechirwere vava vana. Zimbabwe yaongorora vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi mapfumbamwe. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kusvika nezuro, Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawanda vabatwa neCoronavirus ichiteverwa neBulawayo. MuHarare mune vanhu gumi nevaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye muBulawayo mune vanhu gumi. KuMashonaland East kune vanhu vana kozoti matunhu eMatabelelalnd North neMashonaland West ane munhu mumwe akabatwa neCoronavirus. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano kuti pane vanhu vangani vaongororwa nhasi uye kuti zvii zvabuda muongorora iyi. Bazi rezvehutano rinozivisa zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzayo manheru ega ega uye izvi zvinoitwa tabva pamhepo. Zvichakadai, varimi vefodya nhasi vazivisa kuti vanofara chose nedanho ratorwa nehurumende rekutora basa ravo pamwe nekutengesa fodya sebasa rakakosha panguva ino apo nyika yakavharwa senzira yekudzvirira kupararira kweCoronavirus vachiti izvi zvichaita kuti vatengese fodya yavo pasina kunetsana kana kuvhiringidza nemapurisa kana vamwe vanochengetedza mutemo. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi vefodya munyika, reZimbabwe Tobacco Assocciation, VaRodney Ambrose, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimrira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudzaStduio 7 danho rehurumende rakanaka chose sezvo fodya yakakosha pahupfumi hwenyika nekuti rinounza mari yekunze. VaAmbrose vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzatogadzirira kutengesa fodya vachiti vangomirira chete kuti bhanga guru renyika rigadzirise nyaya yekuti vachabhadharwa sei. Misika yefodya yaifanira kuvhurwa svondo rino asi izvi zvakambomiswa kuitira kuti pagadziriswe nyaya yekuti varimi vachabhadharwa sei. Murimi wefodya kuNyabira pedyo neHarare, Amai Helen Shumba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatogadzirira kutengesa fodya yavo. VaKuchera vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vabude pachena nekukasika kuti varimi vanobhadharwa sei kuitira kuti misika yefodya ivhurwe kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze nekukasika. Gore rapfuura pakamboita mutauro, pakavhurwa misika yefodya varimi vachiramba kutengesa fodya yavo mushure mekunge hurumende yaputsa chibvumirano chayainge yaita nevarimi chekuti vaizobhadharwa nemadhora ekuAmerica. Mukuru wekambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya munyika, yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, Dr Andrew Matibiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti RBZ inotarisirwa kuita musangano nevarimimangwana kuitira kuti vabude nechisungo chekuti varimi vachabhadharwa sei misika isati yavhurwa. VaMatibiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti mangwana chaiwo vari kutanga zvidzidzo zvekudzisa varimi zvavanotarisirwa kuita pakuendesa fodya kumisika nekuita pamisika kudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. Zvimwe zvezvinhu ndezvekuti motokari dzinotakura fodya kuendesa kumisaka dzinobvimidzwa vanhu vaviri chete uye kuti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nematanhatu havabvumidzwe pamisika yefodya. Gore rino panenge pasina bhanga pamisika yefodya uye varimi vese vachaenda kumisika vachange vachiongororwa nekuita zvese zvinotarisirwa nebazi rezvehutano neWorld Health Organisation kudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. TIMB iri kukurudzira vanotenga fodya kuti vatenge fodya munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika senzira yekuderedza huwandu hwevarimi vanoenda kuHarare kuzotengesa fodya yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Morocco yatevera Senegal ku’Round of 16′
text: MOROCCO nhasi manheru ano yatevera Senegal panyika dzemuAfrica kupinda mu’Round of 16′ zvichitevera kukunda kwayaita Canada 2-1 mumutambo we2022 FIFA World Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kuQatar.   MaAtlas Lions ange ari muGroup F umo akasangana neCroatian, Belgium neCanada.   Mumutambo wekutanga, Morocco yakaita mangange 0-0 neCroatia, ndokuzokunda Belgium 2-0 uye Canada iyo yayaradzika 2-1 ndokupedza iine zvibodzwa zvipfumbabwe.   Yabva yaita nhoroondo yekupedza iri pamusoro peGroup F ndokubva yanyora nhoroondo yekuita chikwata chega chemuAfrica chekupedza chiri pamusoro muboka rayo uye chisina kumbokundwa mumitambo kana mumwe chete.   Iye zvino MaAtlas Lions amirira kuona kuti achasangana nechikwata chipi kuRound of 16.

headline: Warriors muna 2021 . . . • Pamitambo 15 vakakunda 1 • Vasimuka kuenda kuAFCON
text: GORE ra2021 rakaona chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chichitamba mitambo 15 uye zvakarakidza kuti chadzikira zvikuru sezvo chakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete.   Gore richitanga, maWarriors airairidzwa naZdravko “Loga” Logarusic uyo akarairidza mitambo 14 kubva paakagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi kusvika azodzingwa basa munaGunyana.   Loga paaitungamira maWarriors, akangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete uye akaita mangange mishanu ndokukundwa misere.   Asi tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors gore ra2021, akatamba 15 yemakwikwi anosanganisira African Nations Championship (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) Qualifiers, Cosafa Cup neyekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup kuQatar.   Pamitambo iyi, maWarriors akangohwina kamwe chete apo akakunda Botswana 1-0 kunhandare yeFrancistown Stadium kunyika iyi mumutambo weAFCON wekurwira kuenda kuCameroon, ndokuita mangange mitambo mina uye ndokukundwa ka10. Tichitarisa mitambo yakatambwa nemaWarriors, tichitanga neyeCHAN iyo yakatambwa munaNdira, akatamba mitambo mitatu ndokukundwa yese – 1-0 neCameroon, 3-1 neBurkina Faso uye 1-0 neMali.   Mitambo yaitevevera yakatambwa munaKurume yaive miviri yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON iyo yakaona maWarriors achikunda Botswana 1-0 panove ndipo akabva ahwina tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu. Mutambo wekupedzisira muboka ravo chikwata chenyika ichi chakakundwa 2-0 neZambia.   MunaChikunguru, maWarriors akaenda kumutambo weCosafa Cup kuSouth Africa uko akanotamba mitambo mina akakwanisa kuita mangange miviri 0-0 neMozambique, 2-2 neMalawi asi ndokukundwa miviri 2-0 neNamibia uye 2-1 neSenegal. Achibva kuCosafa, maWarriors akatamba mitambo mitanhatu yekurwira kuenda ku2022 Qatar World cup apo angokwanisa kuita mangange miviri ndokukundwa mina.   Panguva iyi, ndipo pakadzingwa Loga basa ndokutsiviwa naNorman Mapeza uyo ari kutungamira maWarriors kuAFCON pari zvino.   Pamitamo iyi, maWarriors akaita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium uye 1-1 zvekare munyika muno neEthiopia, ndokuzokundwa mimwe mina inoti 3-1 neGhana kuGhana, 1-0 neGhana muno, 1-0 neEthiopia kuBahir Dar kuEthiopia ne1-0 neBafana Bafana kuFNB Stadium.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza maonero ake pamusoro pematambiro emaWarriors aya, maneja wechikwata ichi — Wellington Mpandare — anoti haakwanise kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi uye varairidzi ndivo vanofanirwa kunge vachitaura nezvazvo.   “Ndiro basa revarairidzi iroro, mofanira kuvabvunza kuti vakazvifambisa sei. Asi, tinoziva kuti mitambo mizhinji yakatambwa 2021 akairairidza wacho haasisipo,” anodaro Mpandare.   Chikwata chemaWarriors chakasimuka nemusi weChitatu chakananga kuCameroon uko chiri kunoita gadziriro dzekutanga kwemutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations nemusi wa9 Ndira.

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano dzoshushikana neKuderera kweVanhu Vari Kubaiwa Nhomba yeTatu yeCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu (16) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nezana nemakumi maviri (1,121) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvishanu zvine zana nevasere (5 108), ukuwo vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga vava zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ane zana nemakumi manomwe nevasere (220 178). Vanhu vapora kubva kuCovid-19 vakasviika pazviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe (191 000). Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neChina, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni mana ane zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe (4,153,879). Vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vave mamiriyoni matatu, ane zviuru zana nemakumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevashanu, (3,169,785). Vabaiwa nhomba yetatu kubva zvayatanga kubaiwa musi wa Zvita 27, 2021, vakasvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu nevatatu (1,503), huwandu hunonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano hahufadzi. Nyanzvi yezvehutano vari mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurumende nemasangano akazvimirira vanofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba mukupa dzidziso kune veruzhinji pamusoro penhomba iyi, uye kukurudzira kuti vaende kunobaiwa nhomba yetatu iyi. Vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vapinde muvanhu vachibaya nhomba idzi kana nyika ichida kusvitsa huwandu hwainotarisira kubaya, kwete kumirira kuti vanhu vaende kuzvipatara nenzvimbo dziri kubairwa veruzhinji. VaRusike vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19, vakwegura pamwe nevagara vaine zvirwere zvavanazvo vaende kunobaiwa nhomba yetatu iyi, vachiti inobatsira kuwedzera simba renhomba mbiri dzekutanga. Studio 7 yaedza kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusoro penhomba yetatu iyi asi vati havasi munyika. Tatadza kubata vavati titaure navi, Amai Joyleen Chimonyo sezvo nhare yavo yanga isingabatiki. No media source currently available

headline: FC Platinum Yotatsurana neEsperance muCaf Champions League
text: Vatsigiri venhabvu munyika vane mukana wekuona chikwata chine mukurumbira muAfrica uye chine mukombe weCAF Champions league cheEsperance icho chiri kutamba neFC Platinum mangwana kuBarbourfields Stadium kuBulawayo. Esperance yakasimudzamukombe weCAF Champions katatu uku FC Platinum yakapinda mumini League kekutanga iri kutatarika zvakasimba ichikwanisa kungoita mapoinzi maviri chete pamitambo mishanu zvichireva kuti ndiyo iri pasi muGroup B. Esperance ndiyo iri pamusoro mugungano iine mapoinzi gumi nerimwe. FC Platinum yakatobuda mumakwikwi aya kare zvekuti changosara kungobudawo nechiremera nekukunda chikwata chine mukurumbira ichi. Pamusoro pemikombe mitatu yeCaf Champions League, Esperance yakambotora zvekare mukombe weAfrica Super Cup pamwe neweCaf Confederation Cup. Payakapedzisira kutamba mumakundano aya kuSouth Africa, FC Platinum yakaita rombo rakaipa apo yakakandwa chibodzwa, mutambo wave kupera vakatungamira 2-1, mutambo uyu ndokupera uri mangange Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi Muzvare Olivia Mushipe vanoti FC Platinum ikatamba sezvayakaita neOrlando Pirates kuOrlando Stadium masvondo maviri apfuura inokwanisa kudonhedza gomo guru remuAfrica iri. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum haifanire kuvhundutsirwa nemazita nekuti zvikwata zvakaita seEsperance zvinoroveka. Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi vaMaxwell Mufandaedza vanoti vachitarisa matambiro avakaita kuTunisia, negadziriro yavaita ikozvino, varikuona chikwata chavo chichikunda, vachitiurira zvibodzwa. Asi FC Platinum inennge isina vatambi vatatu mumutambo uyu nekuda kwemacards avakapihwa, vatatu ava vanoti Gift Bello, Elvis Moyo naKelvin Madzongwe. Pavakatambira kuTunis, FC Platinum yakarohwa 2-0 mumutambo uyo vakatambisa mikana yakawandisa. UEFA Champions Mune mamwe makwikwi ange akatarisirwa nevakawanda eUEFA Champions league, draw yemaquater finals yemutambo uyu yakamira yakadai Ajax vs Juventus Liverpool vs Porto Tottenham vs Manchester City Manchester United vs Barcelona No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Mamombe Vanonzi Havasi Kunzwa Zvakanaka Mujeri Mavari kuChikurubi
text: Mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, avo vari mujeri reChikurubui mushure mekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kaviri nematare, vanonzi havasi kunzwa zvakanaka. Muzvare Mamombe nemutevedzeri wasachigaro mubato revechidiki reMDC Alliance Youth Assembly, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo ine chekuita neCovid-19 vachinzi vainge vataura nevatori venhau panze pedare ramejastiriti muHarare. Asi vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti vari kuishamisika kuti sei vamwe kubato riri kutonga reZanu-PF vari kuita misangano vasiri kusungwa. Masangano akaita seAmnesty International neHuman Rights Watch ari kupomera hurumende mhosva yekushandisa denda reCovid-19 kudzvinyirira vanopikisa. Asi gurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanot mutemo hautarise kuti wabuda mumba maani. Majeri emuZimbabwe anogara akazarisa zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano zvinoisa vasungwa munjodzi. Svondo rapera vasungwa zviuru zvitatu vakaregererwa nemutungamiri wenyika senzira yekupemberera zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Asi sezvo mumajeri mainge muine vasungwa zviuru makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22 000 kwete zviuru gumi nezvinomwe kana kuti 17 000 zvinotarisirwa, achiri akazarisa. Hatina kukwanisa kubatawo mutauriri wevemajere, Superintendent Meya Khanyezi, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Munyori anoona nezvemagariro evanhu muMDC Alliance, Muzvare Maureen Kademaunga, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuna Muzvare Mamombe. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yavaita naBlessing Zulu weStudio7. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzonwa Mushonga Unodzivirira Korera
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzapihwa mishonga yekudzivirira korera senzira yekukurudzira kuti vaparidze kunzvimbo dzavo nyaya yekudzivirira chirwere chekorera. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapurirana mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vaudza Studio7, kuti vafara chose kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichida kuziva pamusoro pekorera nezvimwe zvirwere zvemudumbu. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzichavabatsira kusvitsa mharidzo yavo kumachechi anorambidza nhengo dzawo kuti dzinwe mishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere. Imwe nhengo yeparamende zvakare vari sachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Tabitah Khumalo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachakurudzira vanhu munharaunda dzavo kuti vaitewo sazvavaita nhasi. Mumiriri weMbizo, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vatiwo vatora mushonga senzira yekukurudzira vanhu vemunzvimbo kuti vazvidzivirire kukorera. Nynzvi munyaya dzehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vamwe mushonga wekudzivirira korera, uyo uri kupihwa pachena. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere chekorera icho chinorapika nyore. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mapfumamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa muBulawayo Vozeya reMangwana Ravo
text: Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo vanoti vanoda kuti kanzuru iwedzere nguva yayakavapa yekuti vabve pane imwe nzvimbo yavari kutengesera kuitira kuti vawane nguva yakakwana yekuenda kunzvimbo itsva dzavanofanirwa kutengesera vari. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa nevamwe vevanotengesa paGodini. Vanhu ava vakapiwa kusvika pakupera kwemwedzi uno kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi apo pari kuda kuvakirwa nzvimbo inenge iine zvitoro nemahofisi ichange ichinzi EGodini Mall. Kambani inofanirwa kuvaka nzvimbo iyi inofanirwa kutanga basa musi wa 1 Kurume, svondo rinouya. Murongi wemabasa muBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaVincent Donga, vanoti vaita musangano nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo vachiiudza kuti vanoda kuwedzerwa mazuva. Mumwe wevanotengesa paGodini, Amai Sekai Ndlovu, vabvuma kuti kanzuru yaive yavaudza kuti vanofanirwa kubva panzvimbo iyi uye kuti vakaudzwa nzvimbo itsva kwavari kufanirwa kunotengesera vari. Asi vati vane kushushikana nekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vave nenguva vachitengesera ipapo uyewo havana chokwadi chekuti kwavanonzi vaende kwacho vachange vachiwana vanhu vanovatenga vakawanda here sevavaichiwana paGodini. Munyori mukuru weBulawayo Upcoming Traders Association, VaDumisani Ncube, vatsigira kuti vanotengesera paGodini vanoda kuwedzerwa nguva yekubva panzvimbo iyi nekuti vakanonoka kuudzwa kuti vanofanirwa kubva. Vati sezvo kutengesa kuri iko kunopa raramo kuvanhu ava, kubviswa kwavo hakufanirwe kuti kuitwe zvechimbi-chimbi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wekanzuru, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, kana kubva kuna meya, VaMartin Moyo, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi kanzuru yakazivisa gore rakapera nezvekuvakwa kweGodini Mall uye kuti vanotengesa vari panzvimbo iyi vaizofanirwa kubva. Kana yapera kuvakwa EGodini Mall inonzi ichavewo nenzvimbo itsva yevanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana. Nzvimbo yeEGodini Mall inotarisira kuvakwa nemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Mamiriro enhabvu yeZim
text: Kubva nyika ino yawana kuzvitonga zvizere mugore ra1980, vatambi vazhinji venhabvu vakawana mukana wekunotambira kunyika dziri kuEurope nekumwe kwakasiyana kana zvichienzaniswa neapo Zimbabwe yaive isati yawana rusununguko.   Pari zvino vatambi vanodarika 23 vari kutambira nhabvu yavo kuzvikwata zvakasiyana zvekuEurope kunyika dzinoti England, France, Spain, Slovakia, Germany, Czech Republic, Croatia, Norway neTurkey. Asi Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, Freddy Mukwesha — uyo aitambira Dynamos — ndiye akaita wekutanga kuenda kuEurope apo akanotambira chikwata cheSporting Braga chekuPortugal. Nerimwe divi, Zimbabwe ichiwana kuzvitonga zvizere, Bruce “Jungleman” Grobbelaar ndiye akaita wekutanga kutambira kuEurope apo aitambira chikwata cheCrewe Alexandra mumwaka wa1979-1980 nechikwereti kubva kuVancouver Whitecaps yekuCanada.   Grobbelaar akazoita mukurumbira gore raitevera apo akatengwa neLiverpool akatambira chikwata ichi kusvika muna1994.     Akahwina mikombe yakawanda inosanganisira UEFA Champions League, FA Cup (3), League Cup (3), FA Charity Shield (4) neFootball League Super league (1).    Moses “Razorman” Chunga akazoita wechipiri kubva muZimbabwe kuenda kuEurope mugore ra1987 apo akatengwa nechikwata chekuBelgium cheEendracht Aalast achibva kuDynamos FC.    Chunga pavatambi vese kubva muZimbabwe ndiye ane nhorowondo yekuita mutambi wekutanga akatambira nhabvu muPremier Soccer League achibva ananga kuEurope asina kumbobvira aenda kune zvimwe zvikwata.    Bambo, sezita rake remadunhurirwa, akambopotsa atengwa neNottingham Forest yekuEngland asi mukana uyu wakazoramba kubuda zvichinzi akatadza kuterera apo aienda kunozama raki rake. Akabva ndokuenda  Eendracht Aalast uko akanogadzira zita rake zvekuti nanhasi achiri kupihwa ruremekedzo rukuru ikoko.   Vatambi vemuZimbabwe vari kutambira kuEurope parizvino vanosanganisira Marvelous Nakamba uyo ari kuAston Villa kuEngland. Nakamba akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvinoti Vitesse yekuNetherlands, Club Brugge nekuBelgium uye neNancy yekuFrance.     KuEngland ndiko kune vamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Tendayi Darikwa uyo anotambira Nottingham Forest. Darikwa akazvarirwa kunyika iyi akakurira ikoko.   Koti kaputeni wemaWarriors, Knowledge Musona iye zvino ari kutambira chikwata cheEupene chekuBelgium nechikwereti kubva kuAnderlecht. Musona akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvizhinji zvemuEurope izvo zvakambomuona achitambira kuGermany kuzvikwata zve1899 Hoffenheim neAugsburg achizoenda kuBelgium uko akatambira KV Oostende, Anderlecht, Lokeren neEupene yaari kutambira.   KuFrance kune vatambi vaviri Marshall Munetsi uyo ari kuReims muFrench Ligue naTino Kadewere anotambira Le Havre uko ari kuzunza mambure zvisina mukare akamboona.   Mwaka unotevera Kadewere achange achitambira Olympique Lyon iyo yakabhadhara mari zhinji kutenga mutambi uyu ndokumudzosera kuLe Havre nechikwereti kusvika mwaka wegore rino wapera.   KuTurkey kuna Teenage Hadebe uyo ari mumwaka wake wekutanga achitambira Yeni Malatyaspor uko akaenda achibva Kaizer Chiefs yekuSouth Africa.     Kozoti kuCzech Republic, Costa Nhamoinesu ari mumwaka wake wechinomwe kuchikwata cheSpart Praha uko akaenda achibva Zaglebie Lubin yekuPoland.    Zvakadai, vamwe vatambi vemuno vakatambira kuEurope kare ndiWillard Mashinkila Khumalo, Madinda Ndlovu naTito Paketh.    Vatatu ava vaitambira Highlanders vese vakaenda kuGermany mugore ra1989 kuchikwata cheEmsdetten 05 ndokuita vekutanga kubva muno kunotambira nhabvu yavo kunyika iyi.   Mugore ra1991, Peter Ndlovu akabva aita wechitatu apo akatengwa neCoventry City yekuEngland achibva kuHighlanders achiri nemakore 18 ekuberekwa.    Nsukuzonke, sezita raNdlovu remadunhurirwa, akazotambira zvikwata zvakawanda zvekuEngland zvinosanganisira Birmingham City, Huddersfield Town neSheffield United uye aizivikanwa achizunza mambure.    Gore rimwechetewo iri, Agent ‘Ajira’ Sawu akabva kuZimbabwe Saints akaenda kuCypus kunotambira APOP Kinyras Peyias kunyangwe hake asina kunyanyogara.     Ajira akazonyanyoita mukurumbira paakaenda kuSwitzerland uko akanotambira zvikwata zvinoti SC Kriens, FC Lucerne, Young Boys, FC Basel neFC Wil achizobva achienda kuChina.   Gore raitevera 1992, aimbove mutambi weZimbabwe Saints, Henry Bull Mckop akateverawo kuGermany achienda kuchikwata cheBonner SC.   Achibva kuGermany, akananga kuEngland achinotambira Bristol City akazoenda kuShelbourne kuIreland uye akatambira kuAustria zvekare.    Aimbove murairidzi wemaWarriors neFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza mugore ra1993 ndipo paakatanga kuenda kuEurope nekuenda kuPoland uko akanotambira chikwata cheSokol Pniew.     Muchina wemajuzi akazonyanya kuita mukurumbira kutanga gore raitevera apo akatengwa nechikwata cheGalatasaray chekuTurkey ndokuita mutambi wemuno wekutanga kutambira kunyika iyi.     Mapeza akazotambira zvikwata zvakawanda zvekunyika iyi kusvika gore ra2003 apo paakazodzoka kumusha achisvika achitambira CAPS United.

headline: Zim yotamba nePakistan
text: Chikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chakatanga gadziriro dzekusangana nePakistan izvo zvichaona zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichitamba mitambo miviri yeTest match series nemitatu yeTwenty20 International Series (T20I).   Mukushi wemashoko kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) — Darlington Majonga — anoti maChevrons achatamba nePakistan musi wa17 Kubvumbi na21 Kubvumbi mutambo weT20I.   Zvikwata izvi zvichazotatsurana zvekare musi wa23 na25 Kubvumbi.   Kana mitambo yeT20I yapera, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichabandana mumitambo yetest match series apo mutambo wekutanga uriko musi wa29 Kubvumbi uchizopera musi wa3 Chivabvu kozoti wechipiri uchatanga musi wa7 Chivabvu uchipera musi wa11 Chivabvu.   “Pakistan iri kutarisirwa munyika musi wa17 Kubvumbi apo ichauya kuzosangana neZimbabwe mumitambo miviri yetest match nemitatu yeTwenty20 International games,” anodaro Majonga. Mitambo yezvikwata zviviri izvi yose ichatambirwa paHarare Sports Club munhandare isina vatsigiri senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Majonga anoti mitemo yemunyika muno neWorld Health Organization (WHO) yekudzivirira Covid-19 ichitevedzwa pamitambo iyi.   “Mitambo iyi ichitambirwa pasi pechirongwa chebio-secure bubble zvinoreva kuti vatambi, varairidzi nevose vari kuona nezvemitambo iyi vachagara kure neveruzhinji uye hapana vatsigiri vachatenderwa kusvika pedyo navo.   “Apo mitambo inenge ichitambwa, vatambi vose vachange vachivhenekwa kuti havana here kubatira denda reCovid-19, koti mazuva ose nhandare dzichafafaidzwa kuitira kuuraya hutachiona,” anodaro Majonga.   Mutambo wemaChevrons nePakistan uyu unotevera mumwe wechikwata chenyika ichi neAfghanistan uyo wakatambirwa kuUnited Arab Emirates nguva yadarika.

headline: Chess yotambwa padandemutande
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Chess Federation (ZCF) rinoti riri pakati pekuronga kuti mutambo uyu uitwe kuburikidza nedandemutande munyika muno zvichitevera kunyuka kepiri kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutauriri weZCF, Thabo Elisha, anoti vane hurongwa hwekuti chess itambwe kuburikidza nedandemutande kumapurovhinzi akasiyana enyika sezvo pari zvino vanhu vasiri kutenderwa kuungana nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19.   Elisha anoti vakadzidza kubva kumutambo weInternational Chess Federation Online Olympiad, uyo wakaitwa gore rapera, izvo zvakaona vatambi vemuno vachikwikwidza mumutambo uyu padandemutambe.   Anoti chess haina basa nekuti vanhu vaungane izvo zvagara zvisiri kutodiwa pasi pemitemo yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Chess mutambo wakasiyana nemimwe mitambo nekuti haina basa nekuti vanhu vaungana here kana kuti kwete uye vanhu havambofe vakagumhana, vanenge vachingokwikwidza pabhodhi remutambo uyu. “Saka zvinogona kurongeka kuti mitambo yacho itambwe padandemutande vatambi vari kudzimba dzavo.   “Mwedzi yadarika, tine vatambi vedu vakakwikwidza mumutambo weInternational Chess Federation Online Olympiad saka isu ndiro gwara ratiri kuda kufamba narowo,” anodaro Elisha.   Apo vachiri kuronga kudzosa mutambo uyu, Elisha anoti mumasvondo maviri anotevera ndipo vachange vave negwara chairo ravachafamba naro.   “Iye zvino tiri pakati pekuronga kuti tozvifambisa sei sezvo izvi tiri kutotangawo kuzviunza muno,” anodaro Elisha.

headline: Tiri pa’tight’: Dynamos
text: CHIKWATA cheDynamos chinoti kunyangwe zviite sei hachife chakabuda muligi reCastle Premiership zvisinei nekuti parizvino chiri panguva yakaoma apo chiri kuswedera pedyo nekuburitswa kuti chiende kunokwikwidza kuDivision One.   Mwaka wegore rino hausi kufamba zvakanaka kuchikwata ichi icho chinozivikanwa sechikuru munyika yese panyaya dzenhabvu sezvo chiine mikombe yakawanda yachakahwina yeligi nemimwe.   Asi matambiro ari kuita DeMbare mwaka uno haasi kugutsa zvaita kuti chive chimwe chezvikwata zvave kurwira kuti chisaburitswe muCastle Premiership.   Maneja weDynamos – Richard Chihoro – anotsidza kuti kunyangwe zviite sei DeMbare kana kuti Glamour Boys haife yakaburitswa muCastle Premiership uye ichatosunga dzisimbe mumitambo yayo yasara kuti ipone.   “Izvozvo manje ndizvo zvisingambofe zvakaitika. Kukutaurirai pachokwadi, Dynamos hapana kwainoenda, chinodiwa chete kuti tigadzirise pari kukanganisika chete.   “Tinofanirwa kungotaura nevakomana kuti vagadzirise pari kukanganisika chete tigosimukira. Rangarirai kuti ichi chikwata ndicho chakapedza chiri pechipiri mwaka wadarika nevatambi vachinacho, asi pane vashoma vakaita saChristian Epoupa vakazobva uye vamwe ndivo vari kutamba saka zvinogadzirika. Hatibude ipapo ndinoramba,” anodaro Chihoro.   Dynamos yasarirwa nemitambo misere kuti mwaka wa2018 upere uye pamitambo yose iyi iri kufanirwa kuhwina mina kuti isaburitswe muligi iri.    Mumitambo iyi, ichasangana nezvikwata zvinoti CAPS UNITED, Bulawayo Chiefs, FC Platinum, Black Rhinos, Herentals, Triangle United, Mutare City neNichrut.   Achibvuzwa kuti nhabvu yemuno ingazonakidze here kana Dynamos isisimo muPSL, Chihoro anoti,  “Hatingafunge nezvazvo nekuti hapana kwatiri kuenda, tiri kudzoka, gore rino range risiri redu chete.”   Kwayedza yakaitawo hurukuro nemukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela, ichida kunzwa kuti kana Dynamos ikaburitswa muCastle Premiership zvinokanganisa nhabvu yemuno here, iye ndokuti, “Hatisi n’anga kuno kuZifa, hatisi anagodobori, hatizive zvichaitika. Saka ngatitange taona kuti mwaka uchapera sei, tozotangira ipapo. Kana chikwata chichikwikwidza muPSL zvinorakidza kuti chikuru saka zvese zvinofanirwa kurwa kuti zvirambe zvirimo, kana chinenge chakurirwa munochiona nekuburitswa,” anodaro Gwesela.   Mutungamiri wevatsigiri veDynamos, Benjamin Munzira, anoti iye zvino yave nguva yekuti munhu wese anozviti anoda chikwata ichi achitsigire kuti morari yevatambi isimukire vagorwa semvumba varambe vari muPSL.    Anoti pakagara chikwata chavo pakashata chaizvo uye hachifanirwe kuve chiri ipapo.   “Iyi haisiriyo DeMbare yatinoziva, payave pakaoma, patambo chaipo inofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti isimuke. Handizvo zvatinoitarisira kuti ive ichiita, saka zvinotoda kuti tibatane tose tinoti tinoda chikwata ichi chisimuke kubva pachiri.   “Vatambi vacho vari kuda kusimudzirwa saka zvinotoda isu vatsigiri tibatane tiwane zvatinovaitira kuvafadza kuti vasadzikire, shuwa iyi handiyo DeMbare yatinoziva,” anodaro Munzira.    Shasha pakutsigira nhabvu Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa anoti haatombode kufunga nezvekuburitswa kweDynamos muCastle Premiership achiti vamwe varairidzi vakamboirairidza kare vakaita saSunday Chidzambwa, Kalisto Pasuwa uye Moses Chunga ngavauye vabatsire Lloyd Mutasa mumitambo yasara kuti chikwata chake chisaburitswe muPSL.   Anoti pave kudiwa mushandirapamwe nekuti pachimire hapana kunaka uye hapasipo panotarisirwa kuti chinge chiri.   “Shasha dzakambotambira chikwata ichi uye vamwe vakambochirairidza vakaita saMhofu Chidzambwa naPasuwa ngavabatsire Mutasa nekuti basa iri harichade ari ega, zvave kutoda kubatsirana kuti basa rifambe mitambo yese yasara ihwiniwe chikwata chigare muPSL machakakodzera,” anodaro Romario.

headline: Zim yateya South Africa
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket A chiri mushishi kuita gadziriro dzekusangana necheSouth Africa A mumitambo mina yeOne Day International nemiviri yeTest Match iyo ichatambirwa kuHarare Sports Club.   Mitambo iyi ichatambwa nemusi wa29 na31 Chivabvu uye 2 na4 Chikumi kozoti yeTest Match ichatanga musi wa7 Chikumi ichizopera musi wa10 Chikumi.   Mutambo wechipiri weTest Match uchatanga musi wa13 Chikumi uchizopera 16 Chikumi uye uchitambirwa kuTakashinga Sports Club.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket, ZC Director of Cricket, Hamilton Masakadza, anoti mitambo yose iyi ichatambwa isina vatsigiri sezvo nyika ichiri pakati pekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti ane mufaro mukuru kuti chikwata ichi chave kudzoka kuzotamba mutambo uyu sezvo zvichibatsira vatambi vazhinji kusimukira.   “Kukosha kweZimbabwe A hakufanirwe kutarisirwa pasi saka tinofara kuti vakomana vadzoka uye vave kutamba mutambo uyu.   “Kutamba cricket padanho iri kuchabatsira vatambi vedu kuwana mikana yakasiyana. “Tinotenda zvikuru kuSouth Africa iyo yakabvuma kutumira chikwata chavo kunosangana nesu, isuwo tiri kutarisira mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi,” anodaro.   Chikwata cheZimbabwe A chakapedzisira kutamba cricket mugore ra2017 apo chakaenda kunosangana neUnited Arab Emirates kunyika iyi.

headline: Herentals yorongera FC Platinum
text: MURAIRIDZI weHerentals FC, Kumbirai Mutiwekuziva, anoti chikwata chake chakagadzirira kusangana neFC Platinum svondo rinouya apo vachaumburudzana mumutambo weCastle Premiership neChibuku Super Cup semi-final.   FC Platinum neHerentals zvichabandana svondo rino nemusi weMugovera kunhandare yeMandava Stadium kuZvishavane mumutambo wePSL.   Mutiwekuziva anoti svondo rino vachashandisa mutambo wavo wekutanga neFC Platinum kuongorora matambiro echikwata ichi apo vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru weChibuku Super Cup svondo rinotevera uyo anoti ndiwo wavari kukoshesa.   “Isu mutambo wakanyanya kutikoshera pane miviri yatakatarisana nayo neFC Platinum ndeweChibuku Super Cup nekuti tinoda kupinda mufainari tigohwina mukombe uyu.   Hatisati tambopinda mufainari yemutambo uyu saka ticharwa semvumba kuti tihwine.   “Saka svondo rino, tichashandisa mutambo wedu kuongorora FC Platinum matambiro ainenge ichiita uye patinenge takanganisa tinozopagadzirisa svondo rinotevera,” anodaro Mutiwekuziva.   Mumutambo wekutanga wePSL wakatambwa nezvikwata zviviri izvi mwaka uno, Herentals yakakunda FC Platinum 1-0 kuNational Sports Stadium.   Mutiwekuziva anoti vanoziva kuti Platinum vanogona kuikunda sei saka havasi kutya kusangana nayo.   “Platinum mumutambo wePSL takairadzika muNational Sports Stadium panguva apo yaipisa ichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura saka hatinyanye kuitya nekuti tinoziva kuti toikunda sei,” anodaro.   Kuchiti murairidzi weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza anoti mitambo yakatarisana nechikwata chake yakakosha zvikuru asi panguva ino ari kunyanya kufunga nezvemutambo weMugovera.    Norman Mapeza   “Isu mutambo watinowanzokufunga ndeuyo watinenge takatarisana nawo svondo iroro, asi tiri kushanda zvedu nesimba kuti tigokunda mumitambo miviri yatakatarisana nayo neHerentals.   “Herentals mwaka uno iri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye kusvika kwayaita kusemi-final yeChibuku Super Cup kunorakidza kuti vari kuziva zvavanoita, saka tinotofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti tikunde mumitambo yedu miviri yatichasangana navo,” anodaro Mapeza.   Zvakadaro, mune mimwe mitambo yePSL iriko svondo rino, kuBulawayo kuchange kuine mitambo yeBulawayo derby miviri apo wekutanga uchaona Bulawayo Chiefs ichisangana neBulawayo City musi weMugovera kuLuveve kuchiti musi weSvondo Chicken Inn ichitatsurana neHighlanders kuBarboufields.   Dynamos ichange iri pamusha paNational Sports Stadium apo ichasangana neWhaWha nemusi weSvondo kuchiti CAPS United iri kunanga kuVengere kwaRusape kunosangana neCranborne Bullets.

headline: Mapurisa muSouth Africa, Anopinda muMafekitari Achisunga Vashandi veKunze
text: Mapurisa akabatana nevashandi vebazi rezvekupinda nekubuda munyika pamwe nevebazi rezvevashandi apinda mumamwe mafekitari ari munzvimbo yeIndustria muJohannesburg achisunga vashandi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika vari muSouth Africa vasina magwaro anovabvumidza kugara nekushanda munyika iyi. Dandemutande reTwitter rehurumende yeSouth Africa razivisa nezvedanho iri kuburikidza nemavhidhiyo nemifananidzo zvanga zvichiratidza zvaswera zvichitora matanho. Dandemutande iri rinotiwo vemakambani vawanikwa vaine mhosva yekutyora mutemo wezvevashandi nemabasa pamwe nekushanda zvakanaka mumakambani, uye vanga vachibva vasungwawo vachibhadhariswa mafaindi. Sangano reAfrican Diaspora Forum rinonzi raswerawo riri mushishi kuedza kubatsira vasungwa ava, avo vanonzi vaendeswa kukamba yeLindela. Pataenda pamhepo sangano iri ranga richiti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinosvika zana nemakumi mashanu zvasungwa muzviitiko izvi. Bazi rezvemukati menyika muSouth Africa razivisa kuti vasungwa vose ava vachadzoserwa kunyika dzavo. Hamusi muSouth Africa chete muri kusangana zvizvarwa zvezimbabwe nematambudziko ekudzoserwa kumusha, sezvo izvi zvichinzi zviri kuitikawo muBotswana. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapazi ehurumende yeSouth Africa izvi ndizvo zvaiitwa nehurumende yevachena munguva yehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri. VaMavhinga vanoti chikuru chiri kukonzera kuti vabvakure vashande vasina magwaro kunonoka kwebazi rezvemukati menyika kuwanisa vanhu vanenge vanyorera kuti vabatsirwe, uye nehuwori. Vanoti chiri kukanganwikwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa ndechekuti guta rakaita seJohannesburg rakavakwa nevabvakure vaishanda mumigodhi munguva yechirongwa cheWitwatersrand Native Labour Association (WNLA), icho chinonyanyozivikanwa seWenela. VaMavhinga vanoti panofanirwa kugarwa pasi nenyika dzemugungano reSADC kuitira kuti dzitsvage nzira dzinobatsira vanhu, kwete kutevera miganho yavanoti yakadzikwa nevachena. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Obatwa Chibharo neKubirwa Zvowedzerwa Nekushomeka kweMabhazi eZUPCO
text: Sangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa makombi mumigwagwa nechinangwa chekuda kuvamanikidza kuti vaite mushandirapamwe nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO rave kuisa hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda munjodzi. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwemadzimai ari kubatwa chibharo uye kubirwa zvakanyanya kwevanhu nevanhu vane motokari dzinozivikanwa nekuti mishikashika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mapurisa anoti vanhu havafanire kukwira motokari dzemushikashika idzi uye havafanire kutakura mari yakawanda. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi mumashoko kuvatori vanhu vanotiwo muHarare ndimo manyanya nyaya dzekubatwa chibharo kwemadzimai uye kubirwa kwevanhu. Motokari dziri kushandiswa nematsotsi aya dzinosanganisira maHonda Fit nemaToyota Wish, vanhu vari kubirwa mari nenharembozha. Vanhu vakawanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi eZUPCO mashoma nekudaro vanozogumisira vakwira chero motokari. Mutungamiri wePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi mashoma zvosiya vanhu vokwira motokari dzematsotsi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemusi weSvondo vakatora matanho akaomarara mukuyedza kurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chatekeshera pasi rose Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti South Africa kutanga nemusi weChitatu inenge yave kuvhara mimwe miganhu yayo uyo kurambidza kushanyira kana kutambira vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi dzinosanganisira Italy, Iran, South Korea, Iran, Spain, Germany, US, Britain ne China. Zvikoro zviri kuvharwawo musi uyu uye vanhu vari kurambidzwa kuungana kusanganisirawo kumiswa kwemitambo. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kubatwa mumambure ezviri kuitwa kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaOffice Jaka, avo vanobva kuKwekwe, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti South Africa ichakwanisa kupedza dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo riri basa guru. Asi va Jaka vanoti varikunyanyo shungurudzika zvikuru, nevana vavo vaviri varikuita zvidzidzo zveElectrical Engineering kuChina. VaEmmanuel Mboti vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo zvaitwa naVaRamaphosa zvakanaka, vichakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kumiswa kwemitambo kuchakanganisa kurarama kwevakawanda. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidiki, chinogara muSouth Africa, VaMunyaradzi Mukanyiwa, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko ataurwa naVaMbote. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokandwa Pakati peNyika Dziri Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Rimwe sangano rekuEurope raisa Zimbabwe pakati penyika dzisiri kukoshesa hutongi hwejekerere munguva yeCovid 19 izvo zviri kutsinhirwawo nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Sangano rekuSweden reInternational Institute for Democracy and Electoral Assistance, kana kuti International IDEA, rinoti Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika dzisiri kukoshesa hutongi hwejekerere munguva ino yedenda redzihwamupengo reCovid 19. Dzimwe nyika dzaiswa muchikwata ichi nesangano iri dzinosanganisira Algeria, Bangladesh, Cambodia, China, Cuba, Egypt pamwe neSaudi Arabia, Sachigaro wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe pamwe nekuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaGolden Maunganidze, vati kusungwa kwakaitwa vatori venhau vakawanda munyika vachinzi vatyora mitemo inobata nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chedzihwamupengo kana kuti Covid 19 Containment Regulations kunoratidza chokwadi chekuti hutongi hwejekerere hausi kukosheswa munyika. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakaita saVaPride Mkono vanoti kusaitwa kwesarudzo dzechipiri dzekutsiva makanzura nenhengo dzeparamende dzakabviswa pazvigaro zvavo kana avo vakafa kwakaitawo kuti zvido zveveruzhinji zvisazadzikiswe ukuwo hurumende ichiti kuita sarudzo idzi kwaizowedzera mukana wekuti vanhu vatapurirane chirwere cheCovid 19 icho chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose kusanganisira muZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaOstallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuMatabeleland South uku kwavari kufamba naVaNelson Chamisa vachionana sevatsigiri vavo kuti vanowirirana negwaro iri sezvo VaChamisa vanga vasiri kubvumidzwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo munguva yeCovid 19 asi mutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachingoita madiro aJojina kuita misangano nenhengo dzebato ravo. VaSizba vatiwo mhirizhonga ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika iri kuitika munyika pari kuitwa misangano naVaChamisa pamwe nekusungwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzebato ravo nguva yapfuura kunoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende pamusoro pegwaro re International IDEA iri sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, vanga vasati vapindurawo mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo. Asi VaMangwana vakamboudza Studio 7 munguva pfupi yadarika panyaya yekusungwa kwenhengo dzebato rinopikisa kuti mutemo hautarise kuti munhu abuda mumba maani vachiti anenge afungidzirwa kuti apara mhosva anonomira nenyaya dzake mumatare ochenurwanematare aya kana kubatwa nemhosva. Pavakapinda panyanga vachitora mhiko muna Mbudzi 2017, VaMnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo ichaita zvose zvainokwanisa zvinosanganisira kukoshesa kodzero dzevanhu kuitira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekere. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheKorera Chonetsa muHarare
text: Hurumende inoti chirwere chekorera chauraya vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemakumi matanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika pari zvino. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekusangana kwemapazi akasiyana-siyana ehurumende, gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vati zvinosuwisa kuti nyika iri kurasikirwa nehupenyu hwevanhu nekuda kwezvirwere zvinorapika zvakaita sekorera. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana senzira yekupedza chirwere ichi, icho chanetsa mumisha inogara veruzhinji muHarare yakaita seGlen View, Budiriro neGlen Norah. VaMoyo vati kunyange hazvo kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaitawo seBuhera neMasvingo kwabatwa vanhu nekorera,tsvakiridzo dzavakaita dzinoratidza kuti vanhu ava vakabva muBudiriro neGlenview muHarare. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kuendesa mvura yakachena kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko, kudzidzisa veruzhinji hutsanana pamwe nekubvisa vatengesi vemumigwagwakuGlenview nekuBudiriro. VaMoyo vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police ndovachange vachibvisa vatengesi mumigwagwa vachiti mapurisa ekanzuru akatadza kuita izvi. VaMoyo vabvumawo kuti hutachiona hwekorera huriko hauchaurayiki nemishonga yekutanga first line antibiotic drugs. Vatiwo mishonga inodiwa kurapa chirwere ichi inodhura. Kunyange hazvo kune dzimwe nzvimbo kuri kurapwa chirwere ichi kuri kunzi hakuna mishonga yakakwana, VaMoyo vati pari zvino vanayo mishonga. Hurumende neChipiri yakatara korera sedambudziko guru rawira nyika. Zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende, mapurisa abva azivisawo kuti hapana misangano kana ma rally achaitwa muguta reHarare zvichitevera dambudziko rekorera. Zimbabwe inogara ichinetseka kurwisa dambudziko rezvirwere zvekorera neTyphoid nekuda kwemvura isina kuchena inoshandiswa nevagari pamwe nekuputika kwemvura dzetsvina kunyanya kumisha inogara veruzhinji. Pamusangano uyu, kanzuru yatiwo haina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana zvekuti igadzire nechimbichimbi kunenge kwaputika mvura dzetsvina idzi. Sangano reZimbabwe Doctor’s for Human Rights rinoti hurumende inofanirwa kuisa musoro pamwe chete kuitira kuti igadzirisa dambudziko rezvirwere zvemudumbu zvinoputika gore negore. Munyori musangano iri, VaEvans Masitara, vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vakurumidze kuenda kuchipatara kana vakafungidzira kuti vane chirwere ichi huye kuti vanhu vabike zvekudya zvakanaka. Mugore ra2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere chekorera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti chirwere chekorera hachifanirwe kunge chichinetsa mukore uno sezvo chichikwanisa kudzivirirwa kuburikidza nekuita hutsanana pamwe nekunwa mvura yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, Voshanyira Zimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vasvika munyika umo vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumisangano neChina wekuchanyorerana zvibvumirano nemumwe wavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Makurokata enyika mbiri idzi anowona nezvekudyidzana kwenyika vaita misangano yavo neChitatu vachigadzirira musangano mukuru wevatungamiri wenyika mbiri idzi uchaitwa neChina. Mashoko aburitswa anoti VaMnangagwa naVaMasisi vachanyorerana chibvumirano chekukweretesa mari makambani emuZimbabwe sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe. Asi mashoko ari kubva kuBotswana anoti hapana mari ichapihwa Zimbabwe sezvo zvakambenge zvawirirana pakutanga, zvashanduka. Munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaGaeimelwe Goitsemang, vaudza nhepfenyuro ye Yarona FM kuti chibvumirano chakanga chaitwa neZimbabwe nenyika yavo chekuti Botswana ikweretese Zimbabwe mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, hachisipo. Mari iyi yaifanirwa kushandiswa mukuvandudza kucherwa kwemangoda kuitira kuti nyika iwane mari kubva mumangoda ayo ari muminda yekwaMarange. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vanoti misangano yakadai yakakosha mukugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe neBotswana. VaKanyenze vanoti zvichabuda mumusangano pakati pevatungamiri vaviri ava zvinokwanisa kujekesa hudzamu hwekudyidzana nekugarisana kweZimbabwe neBotswana sezvo vatungamiri venyika mbiri idzi vachiri vatsva vose. No media source currently available

headline: Vasungwa Vodzidziswa Kurima Fodya kuBanket
text: Vasungwa nevakange vari muhusungwa vanosvika gumi nevatanhatu vepajeri rekuBanket, Mashonaland West vakaita zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya vakapiwa zvitupa. Mumwe wevakapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya pamhemberero yakaitwa svondo rino ndiVaMathias Mushambe vanogara kuMutorashanga. VaMushangwe avo vakagara mujeri kwemakore matanhatu mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutsika munhu nemotokari vanoti zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya zvakavayamura sezvo vave murimi wefodya anemukurumbira. VaMushangwe vanoti vave kutopinza vamwe vanhu basa mumunda wavo wefodya. Mumwe musungwa akapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya ndiVaWebster Tafadzwa Mubayiwa vekuDomboshava avo vakaburitswa mujeri mushure mekuregererwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe mwedzi wapera vanoti varikutarisira kupiwa chidimbu chemunda kuti vagoratidza hunyanzvi hwavo hwekurima fodya. VaMubayiwa vanoti vanofara nekuburitswa mujeri vasati vapedza makore avakakatarirwa pamwe nekudzidziswa kurima fodya izvo vanoti zvichavayamura mukurarama. VaMushambe vanoti parizvino vave kutodzidzisawo vamwe vari munharaunda mavagere kurima fodya. Mutevedzeri wemukuru weZimbabwe Prison and Correctional Services (ZPCS) VaMoses Chihobvu vanoti kuti musungwa akwanise kupinda muchirongwa chekudzidziswa kurima fodya anofanirwa kunge aine chido nekudzidzira kurima fodya. VaChihobvu vanoti vanodzidzisa vasungwa vanenge vasarirwa negore rimwe chete kuti vabude muhusungwa. VaChihobvu vanoti dai hurumende yakwanisa kupa vasungwa ava mabasa kana vabuda sezvo vaveneruzivo. Asi mukuru mubazi rePublic Service Commission Amai Muchada vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike sezvo hurumende yakamira kupinza vanhu mabasa. Vasungwa vakapihwa zvitupa zvekurima fodya kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi muna 2008 vanosvika zana namakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe.

headline: Hurumende, Vana Chiremba Vanotadza Zvakare Kuwirirana
text: Vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vasangano nevamiriri vehurumende kuti vaedze kugadzirisa dambudziko rekuramwa mabasa iro rave nemazuvagumi nemashanu. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association, Dr. Edgar Munatsi vanoti musangano uyu, semimwe misangano yanga ichiitwa mumasvondo adarika ose aya, hauna chawaburitsa zvakare. Vanoti hurumende yazivisa kuti haikwanise kuvabhadhara mari yavari kuda pavanoshanda usiku, kana kuti on-call allowances, sezvo isina mari, asi inokwanisa kuvapa iri pasi pane yavari kuda, danho ravanoti varamba kutambira Dr. Munatsi vamboshevedzwawo nevakuru vemapurisa, avo vanoti vanga vachida kunzwisisa nezvekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba navanamukoti uku. Dr. Munatsi vanoti musangano wavo nevakuru vemapurisa uyu wafamba zvakanaka, uye panga pasina kutyisidzirana. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano revagari vekuChitungwiza, reChitungwiza Residents' Trust, rinoti richatora matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva kana hurumende pamwechete neHealth Services Board vakasagadzirisa matambudziko ari muzvipatara nekukasika. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaMarvelous Kumalo vanoti kusagadziriswa kwematambudziko aya kutyora kodzero dzevanhu mukuwaniswa kwavo hutano, sezviri mubumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available

headline: Vakadzingwa kuKitsiyatota Vochema naAmai Mugabe Vachiti Vakavarasisa
text: Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muBindura kuvanhu vakadzingwa panzvimbo yeKitsiyatota paikorokozwa goridhe inyaya yainge iri mudariro neChishanu paBindura Univeristy pamusangano werunyararo we Internation Africa Peace and Security Education Conference wakarongwa ne Bradford University nesangano reFriedrich Ebert Stiftung. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vaichera goridhe vakadzingwa nemapurisa panzvimbo yeKitsiyatota mwedzi wapera. Vamwe vakataura pamusangano wepaBindura uyu vakayambira kuti zvinhu zvinogona kusagadzikana zvakanaka muguta reBindura sezvo vamwe vanhu vakadzingwa nemapurisa vakasiiwa pamhene. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nesangano reZimbabwe Informal Sectors Organization, ZISO, iro rinoti riri kushushikana kuti vanhu vakasara vasina chouviri. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, negurukota idzva rezvezviwanikwa, Amai Oppah Muchinguru Kashiri, vakambovimisa vanhu ava mukupera kwegore rapera kuti hurumende ichavapa matsamba ekushanda zviri pamutemo pasi pechirongwa chekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Vanhu ava vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vabhadhara mari inosvika madhora mazana maviri pamunhu kuti vaite mishandira pamwe asi vanenge vakasungirira mari pagumbo rengwe. ZISO inoti kuungana muBindura kwaita vanhu ava nepamusana pekushaya mari yebhazi yekudzokera kwavakabva, kuchapa kuti vamwe vanhu vatange kuita zvekuba nemamwe mabasa asiri pamutemo. Goridhe raicherwa pamugodhi uyu rinonzi raitengeswa kuvanhu vanobva kuChina nekuFidelity Printers. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemabhizimisi madiki neepakati, Amai Stembiso Nyoni, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingadairwe. Mumwe mudzidzisi paBindura University, VaObediah Dodo, avo vakaita ongororo paKitsiyatota vanoti vezvematongerwo enyika vari kushandisa vechidiki munguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro vozovasiya pamhene kana sarudzo dzapera. No media source currently available

headline: Young Igwe osimudzira maboozer
text: ZVIKWATA zvitanhatu zvenhabvu yemaboozer zvichasangana svondo rino nemusi weMugovera paPrince Edward School, muHarare apo zvichatatsurana pamutambo wePeter Moyo at 29 Tournament.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa nemuimbi wemusambo weSungura – Peter ‘Dhewa’ Moyo – uyo anove nerudo nenhabvu zvikuru sezvo akambotambira zvikwata zvakadai seLancashire Steel Juniors nevatambi vanosanganisira Dennis Dauda.   Mutambo uyu uchange uri wekupemberera kusvitsa makore 29 okuberekwa kwaYoung Igwe sezita remadunhurirwa raMoyo pamwe nekusimudzira nhabvu yemaboozer.   “Nhabvu yechiboozer vazhinji vanoiona seyezvidhakwa chete, asi yakakosha zvikuru sezvo ichitibatsira kuvaka nekuchengetedza miviri yedu.   “Kana vanhu vakura, kazhinji nguva yekuvaka muviri tinenge tisina saka ndiri kuda kusimudzira mitambo yemaboozer iyi iite mukurumbira itambwe nezvikwata zvakawanda.   “Hongu, ndinoziva kuti zvikwata zvakawanda zviriko zvinotamba nhabvu yemaboozer zvichikwikwidza asi ini ndiri kuda kuisimudzira iite mukurumbira,” anodaro.   Moyo achatambawo mumutambo uyu sezvo chikwata chake chaanotambira cheLimpopo FC chichange chiri chimwe chezvichakwikwidza.   “Ini ndiri kutambawo musi wacho sezvo chikwata changu Limpopo FC chiri kuzokwikwidzawo. Ndichange ndichirakidzawo tarenda rangu,” anodaro Moyo.   Zvikwata zvichahwina pamutambo uyu zvichawaniswa mibairo yakasiyana-siyana inosanganisira mikombe nemenduru.

headline: NDINI CHIBABA: KAMAMBO
text: MUTuNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) — Felton Kamambo — anoti ndiye “Chibaba” chenhabvu yemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa anotonga kuCosafa kwake uko anotungamirawo.   Achitaura svondo radarika muHarare apo Zifa yaizivisa nyika kuti chizvarwa chekuCroatia, Zdravko Logarusic, ndiye ave murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors, Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake ndiro rinotonga zvenhabvu yemuno.   “Tisu tiri panyanga, tisu zvibaba zvenhabvu zvemuno uye Philip Chiyangwa ndiye chibaba chekuCosafa, ipapo panzwisisei. Saka muno zvese zvine chekuita nenhabvu zvinotodarika nepatiri isu uye tisu tinopasisa kuti zviite,” anodaro Kamambo.   Kubva Kamambo akapinda panyanga mugore ra2018 apo akunda Chiyangwa pasarudzo dzemutungamiri weZifa, pagara pachingotenderera mashoko ekuti vaviri ava vakarimirana muganhu. Vamwewo ndivo vaiti Chiyangwa aikonzera nyonga-nyonga yaiitika mubhodhi raKamambo nguva yadarika izvo zvakazoona Zifa ichimutemera zvirango pamwechete naOmega Sibanda uyo aive mutevedzeri wake kuti vasava nechekuita nezvenhabvu yemuno.   Zifa yakasvika padanho rekutombonyorera kuCosafa kuti Chiyangwa abviswe pachigaro chekutungamirira sangano iri.   Kamambo anoti bhodhi rake harichadi kupedza nguva richinetsana nevanhu pamusoro penyaya dzekutungana kwembudzi.   Anoti iye zvino yasvika nguva yekubatanidza vanhu vese kuburikidza nenhabvu nekudaro Zifa yakabviswa zvirango zvavainge vatemera Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Takagara pasi sebhodhi uye takazviona zvakakodzera kuti tiregerere Chiyangwa naSibanda.   “Tabvisa zvirango zvese zvatainge takavatemera, saka tichienda mberi chikuru kuti nhabvu yedu ibudirire pane kuswera tichinetsana zvisina                            basa.   “Toda kuti bhora redu rinakidze ndizvo chete zvatinoda kwete zvimwe zvese,” anodaro Kamambo.   Zvakadaro, Logarusic — uyo akamborairidza Sudan — akapihwa basa guru rekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo inosanganisira Africa Cup of Nations 2021 ne2022 World Cup.

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yatenga Nhomba yeCovid-19 Mamiriyoni Makumi Maviri Asi Vari Kuda Kubayiwa Vashoma
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti richiri nechivimbo chekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vange vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 munyika mukupera kwemwedzi unouya kuti intyatsoshande zvakanaka kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vanoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuwana nhomba dzinosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri zvichitreva kuti inokwanisa kubayiwa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi vari kudiwa nehurumende. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti havasati vadududza pachinangwa chavo chekuti vabaye vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupera kwemwedzi unouya. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kudzika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine mutsindo kechina kana vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti vari kushushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa nhomba parizvino. Dr Enoch Mayida vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vari munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Medical Association mudunhu remashonaland vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba sezvo chirwere ichi chichiramba chichishanduka. MuAfrica, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chegumi panyayaya yekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19. Pamusoro pane Sychelles ichiteverwa neMauritius neMorroco. Botswana ndiyo iri pamberi kuchamhembe kweAfrica iri pachidanho chechipfumbamwe, South Africa iri pachidanho chegumi nerimwe. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mamamiriyoni mazana mana kana kuti 7, 4 billion vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabayiwanhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi mana kana kuti 440 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakanyanya muAfrica vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vanofanira kubayiwa nhomba, Africa ine vanhu bhiriyoni imwe chete nemamiriyoni zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 billion. Asi vanhu vabayiwa nhomba Africa parizvino vadarika zvishoma zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana chete kana kuti 6, 06% zvinoreva kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vanhu vafa muAfrica vanosvika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemasere kana kuti 220, 958. Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rose reWorld Health Organization rinoti chirwere ichi chatodzoka zvine mutsindo kana kuti fiurth wave kuEurope zvikuru kunyika dzakaita seGermany, Britain, Russia neFrance. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano munyika idzi dzinoti vasina kubayiwa nhomba ndivo vapa kuti chirwere ichi chitange kuita mutema rege wembada. Sezvo nyaya dzekushanyirana dzatanga, pane mukana wekuti chirwere ichi chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya muAfrica mune vanhu vashoma vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19.

headline: Vakawanda Vopesana Pakupa Vana Vasati Vabvazera Maparitsi eKuronga Mhuri
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kupesana panyaya yekuti vana vasati vabvazera mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri pamwe nemishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde. Masarira, vanoti sangano ravo rakaendesa nyunyuto dzaro kuparamende senzira yekutsvaga nzira dzekuchengetedza hutano hwevechidiki ava. Amai Debra Mwase vanoshanda nesangano re Katswe Sisterhood vanoti nyaya iyi inofanira kuongororwa zvakadzama nokuti vana vari kuita zvepabonde vachiri vadiki zvokuti panofanirwa kuwanikwa nzira yokuvadzivirira kunjodzi yezvirwere zvepaponde zvinotapuriranwa. Nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Chido Dziva – Chikwari, vanoti panofanirwa kuwanikwa nzira dzokubatsira vechidiki ava. Mufundisi Mazvarirashe Mabugu vanotenderana nevabereki vari kupikisa danho rekuda kuisa mutemo unobvumidza vana ava kutora mapiritsi okuronga mhuri vachiti ndiko kuparara kuchaita rudzi rwamangwana. Nyazvi yehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti havakurudzire vana vasati vasvitsa makore gumi nemasere kuti vaite zvepabonde nokuti zvinowedzera mukana wokusangana nezvirwere zvakasiyana zvikuru gomarara repamuromo wechibereko. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti vana ngavarairwe kuti vagare vari mugwara rakarurama zvinozoita kuti varambe vachiendera mberi nechikoro sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzinenge dzakangoteya pakubudirira mudzidzo dzavo. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano Dr Justice Mudavanhu vanoti gomarara repamuromo wechibereko ndiro rakanyanyisa kuwanda muvarapwi. Asi vanoti rinokwanisa kurapwa zvokutopera kana madzimai akakurumidza kuenda kunoongororwa kuzvipatara nemakiriniki. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti vana vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakore makuni maviri nemana munyika vari kutapurirwa zvirwere zvepabonde zvinenge gomarara repamuromo wechibereko iro rinozobatwa kazhinji risingachakwanisike kurapika nokuti rinenge rapararira kunhengo dzakakosha dzinoita kuti munhu ararame. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotadza Kubhadhara Mabhonasi a2016
text: Makurukota ehurumende anosanganisira rezvevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, nere zvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, pamwe nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe VaJohn Mangudya, vasangana nemasangano evashandi vehurumende kuti vazeye nyaya yemabhonasi egore rapera.. Asi vapinda mumusangano uyu vati zvabuda pachena kuti hurumende haina mari yacho. Mukuru wesangano reZIMTA, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zvinhu zvitatu zvaunzwa nehurumende zvikarambwa nevashandi. Chekutanga hurumende yange yati inoda kupa vashandi mastands semuripo. Chechipiri hurumende yati inoda kupa vashandi ma bonds anopihwa vemabhizimisi asi pasina kujeka kuti zvinofamba sei. Chekupedzisira vazoti vanokwanisa kupa vashandi zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana asi ichibhadharwa kwenguva yakareba. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakambozivisa kuti mari iyi hapana. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati vanoda kuti mari iyi itsvagwe. Nenyaya yekusawirirana uku, rimwe sangano revarairidzi reRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rati rave kuronga kuratidzira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vachinamasa kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi sachigaro wesangano revashandi, reAPEX Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vati mumwe musangano uchaitwa musi wa 20 Kukadzi asi havasi kufara nezviri kurongwa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: MaWarriors 9 vane Covid-19
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) razivisa kuti rambomisa gadziriro dzechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors dzekuenda kumakwikwi eAfrican Nations Championship (CHAN) zvichitevera kubatwa kwakaita vatambi vacho vapfumbamwe nechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muchinyorwa chakatumirwa neZifa, competitions manager ari zvekare mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti vatambi vose vemaWarriors vainge vakasarudzwa kupinda muchikwata chaZdravko Logarusic nemusi weMuvhuro vakaongororwa pavakadzoka kubva kuzororo reKirisimasi zvikaonekwa kuti vapfumbamwe vavo vane chirwere ichi.   “Tichitevedzera mitemo, vatambi vose nevaraidzi vacho vakavhenekwa nemusi weMuvhuro (28 Zvita) vachibva kuzororo reKirisimasi ndokuonekwa kuti vapfumbamwe vavo vane Covid-19,” anodaro. Gwesela anoenderera mberi achiti vose vaonekwa kuti vane denda iri vaziviswa uye vave kutevedzera mitemo yeWorld Health Organisation (WHO) vachimbogara kwavo voga.   Kunyangwe zvazvo vatambi vane chirwere ichi vasina kudomwa nemazita, Gwesela anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chicharamba chiri mukembi asi chisingaite gadziriro.   Mitambo yeCHAN, iyo iri kutambirwa kuCameroon, ichatanga musi wa16 Ndira 2021 uye maWarriors ari muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Burkina Faso, Cameroon neMalawi.   Zvichakadai, kuMalawi, chikwata cheNyasa Bullets icho chinorairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa kusvika pari zvino vatambi vacho 11 vabatwa vaine Covid-19.

headline: Vashandi veKanzuru yeChitungwiza Vovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Kanzuru yeChitungwoza inoti vashandi vayo vanomwe vakabatwa neCovid-19, uye vamwe makumi maviri nemumwe vari pavo vega mushure mekusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, Doctor Tonderai Kasu, vanoti izvi zvawedzera kuderera kwehuwandu hwevashandi veboka ravo rezvehutano zvekuti kanzuru yavo yamanikidzwa kuvhara kiriniki yayo yeSaint Mary’s. Dr Kasu vanoti mushandi mumwechete akatofa neCovid-19 mushure mekunge awanikwa aine chirwere ichi. Vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vaigara vachichemachema kuti havana zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwewre ichi zvakakwana, asi Doctor Kasu vanoti kanzuru yavo yanga ichiedza napose painogona napo kuti zvikwanisiro izvi zviwanikwe. Doctor Kasu vanoti kunyange hazvo vavhara kiriniki yeSaint Mary’s, ichange ichingobatsira varwere vanenge vachida kubatsirwa zvechimbichimbi chete, asi vamwe vose vanofanirwa kuenda kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzinenge dzakavhurwa vonobatsirwa ikoko. No media source currently available

headline: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
text: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo.
