Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. No media source currently available Asi mutambo uri pamuromo pevazhinji ndeuyo uri kuSouth Africa apo chikwata cheChicken Inn chiri kutarisira kudimbura muswe chikwata chemaBrazilains icho chiri kuparadza zvimwe zvikwata. Mutambi ane mukurmbira muZimbabwe, asi achitambira Memelodi Sundowns, Khama Billiart, achenge ari mumutambo uyu kunyange hazvo asina kupinda mune wekutanga nekukuvara. Chicken Inn yakakuanda 1-0 mumutambo iwoyu asi muteveri wenhabvu, VaLesvison Ndudzi, vanoti ikozvino maGamecocks anofanira kungwarira Billiart Vachitarisa matambiro akaita maGamecocks mumutambo wekutanga, muongorori wezvemitambo ane mukurumbira, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vanoti havasi kunyanyotyira Chicken Inn. Vatsigiri vechikwata cheHighlanders vanogara muSouth Africa vanosvika zviuru zviviri vavimbisa kuti vachange vari munhandare vachikuzirira Chicken Inn. Chimwe chikwata chemuZimbabwe cheHarare City chiri kuMadagascar uko chiri kusangana neAS Adema kwete muCaf Champions League, asi muCaf Confederation Cup. Harare City iri kutingamira 3-2 kubva mumutambo wekutanga zvekuti murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti haasi kuona vachinetseka kukunda mumutambo wechipiri uyu. Mutambo wekugumisira uchange uri muRufaro Stadium umo Dynamos iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo wekota fainari yeZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge. Kunyange hazvo mune manyukunyuku muchikwata ichi, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba mumutambo wehushamwari zvekuti uyu ndiwo mutambo ucharatudza kusimba kwacho. Mutambo uyu wauya mumusha macho musina kumira zvakanaka mushure mekunge murairdzi wacho, Jorge Silva wekuBrazil, nezuro akarova mutori wemifananidzo yepaterevhizheni yeZimbabwe Braodcasting Corporation. Svondo rapera, Silva zvekare akakandirana makobvu nematete nemurairdzi wevabati vepagedhe wechikwata ichi, Gif Muzadzi, izvo zvave kuitisa mibvunzo mumabatiro ebasa rake. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vari kutarisira kuti chikwata cheChicken Inn pamwe necheHarare City zvichavasiya vachipemberera pachapera mitambo yavo.

headline: MaSoccer star aripi?. . . vamwe votambura, vamwe zviri kufaya
text: KUPERA kwemwaka wega-wega wenhabvu makore ese kunopihwa mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kumutambi anenge atamba zvinonwisa mvura kudarika vamwe vose.   Vatambi vakagashidzwa mubairo uyu vanosanganisira George Shaya, Shacy Tauro, Moses Chunga, Peter Ndlovu, Wilfried Mugeyi naAgent Sawu uye vamwe vachingobva kuhwina mubairo uyu vakabva vawana mukana wekuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika.   Asi makore adarika, vamwe vatambi vakahwina mubairo uyu vakakundikana kusvika kure mumutambo uyu. Mubvunzo unouya pakadai ndewekuti saka vanosarudza mutambi anozogachidzwa mubairo uyu vanovhotera mutambi chaiye here kana kuti kungosarudza wavanenge vachida?   Ongororo kubva mugore ra2010, inotaridza kuti vatambi vanoti Charles Sibanda (2010), Washington Arubi (2011), Denver Mukamba (2012), Tawanda Muparati (2013), Dennis Dauda (2014), Danny Phiri (2015), Hardlife Zvirekwi (2016) naRodwell Chingetere (2017) vakahwina mubairo uyu.   Pavatambi ava, vatatu chete vanoti Arubi, Mukamba naPhiri ndivo vakakwanisa kutengwa nezvikwata zvekuSouth Africa, asi Mukamba akadzoka mushure mekanguva kadiki. Charles Sibanda (2010)

headline: Vanyori Vakawanda Vanoti Zvinyorwa Zvavo Zviri Kushandiswa Pasina Muripo
text: Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Book Fair chiri kuitika muHarare hurumende ichikurudzirwa kuti ipedze dambudziko rekubiwa kwepfungwa dzevanyori mumabhuku, kupedza huori munyaya dzekutengesa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo kuitira kuti mabhuku abhadhare vose vane chekuita nekunyorwa, kudhindwa pamwe nekutengeswa kwemabhuku. Vanyori, vanodhinda, vanotengesa mabhuku pamwe nevadzidzisi vari kuwirirana kuti hurumende haina kupedza dambudziko rekudhindiswa nekutengeswa kwemabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori ane mukurumbira, Musayemura Zimunya, anoti huori hwakanyanyisa munyika zvekuti mapurisa nevezvematongerwo enyika vanodhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Zimunya anoti vanhu vanoonekwa vachitengesa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo vanenge vatumwa nevakuru vekumapurisa nekumapazi ehurumende. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemukuru weZimbabwe International Book Fair, ZIBF, VaBlazio Tafireyi, vanoti tsvakiridzo yavakaita inoratidza kuti mapurisa nevezvematongerwo enyika ndivo vevamwe vari kuita basa rekudhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. Zimunya anoti zvikoro ndizvo zviri pamberi mukutyora mutemo wekudhindisa mabhuku zvisiri pamutemo. VaTafireyi vanoti kunyange vakaendesa vanhu vakawanda kumatare edzimhosva nemari inosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu hapana chakabuda kumatare sezvo vachinzi vabhadhare mari yefaindi inosvika madhora makumi maviri. Vachivhura musika wemabhuku neChitatu, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaLazarus Dokora, vati vemuzvikoro vanofanirwa kushanda vasingatyore mutemo wemabhuku. Vanotengesa mabhuku vanoti mabhuku avo haasi kutengwa sezvo vakawanda vave kutenga mabhuku pamikoto. Mukuru weInnov8, VaPeace Muwani, avo vanotengesa mabhuku, vanoti rimwe dambudziko ravari kusangana naro nderekuti vanodhinda mabhuku vave kutengesa vega mabhuku senzira yekuita mari yakawanda. Musika wemabhuku wavhurwa kuruzhinji rwevanhu nhasi uye uchange wakavhurwa kusvika neMugovera. Mangwana rinenge riri zuva rekuratidzira mabhuku kuvanhu uye kusangana kwevaverengi vemabhuku nevanyori . Gore rino musika wemabhuku uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rinoti: Making the Book Pay. No media source currently available

headline: Hurombo Hwopa Kuti Vashandi Vafambe neTsoka kuChinhoyi
text: Vashandi vakawanda vave kufamba netsoka kuenda kumabasa pamwe nekudzokera kumba Vachiti mari yavanotambira ishoma vamwe vachiti vave nemwedzi yakawanda vasati vatambira mari kwavanosevenza. Vashandi vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti zvinhu zvavekuvaomera zvekuti vave kuona kukwira motokari vachienda kumabasa kugarika. Mumwe mushandi anosevenzera kambani yeNational Social Security Authority (NSSA) VaGift Muchemeyi vanoti vanoona zviri nani kufamba netsoka kuenda kubasa mari yacho vozotenga sadza remashereni mashanu . Motokari dzinotakura vanhu kubva kumarukisheni kuenda kumabasa dzakadzikisa mari yekufambisa kusvika pamasendi makumi maviri nemashanu. VaMuchemeyi vanoti zviri nani kufamba mutunhu wemakiromita gumi pazuva ivo vachizokwanisa kudya sadza remutengo wakaderera. Mumwe mushandi anoda kudanwa nezita rekuti Shinga Mushandi anoti avekufamba kuenda kubasa nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari yaanotambira. Mushandi anoti zviri nani kuti mhuri yake irarame nepashoma paanowana iye achifamba zvake kuenda kubasa. Mushandi anoti kufamba kuenda kubasa ndiyo yatovetsika yake kwemakore maviri apera. Mumwe mushandi wekanzuru yeChinhoyi VaCrispen Chitakatira vanoti vave nemwedzi mishanu vasati vatambira uye vanoti kukwira motokari kuenda kubasa zvave kutotorwa sechinhu chinoitwa nevashandi vanotambira mari yakawanda. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari dzinotakura vanhu kuenda kumabasa VaLameck Mushipe vanoti vavekuwana mari shoma pazuva zvichienzaniswa neyavaimbowana nguva yakare. VaMushipe vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nevanhu vavekufamba netsoka kuenda mukati meguta. VaMushipe vanoti nguva yakare vaikwanisa kuwana madhora makumi maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi matatu emadhora pazuva asi mazuva ano vanototenda kana vakawana madhora gumi pazuva. Asi vanoona nezvehutano chiremba Maynard Kuchwa vanoti kunyange vanhu vachitsutsumwa kufamba netsoka kuenda kumabasa vanoti zvakavanakira hutano hwavo sezvo kufamba kunoita kuti muviri ugwinye. Zvichakadaro vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi havana kuteerera kurudziro yanga iriko nemusi weChitatu yekusaenda kumabasa. Makambani, zvitoro nemabhangi zvanga zvakavhura. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru dzeChitungwiza neHarare Dzoenderera Mberi Dzichiputsa Zvivakwa Zvisiri paMutemo
text: Makanzuru eHarare neChitungwiza nhasi aenderera mberi nekupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo achiti zvivakwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Panguva yanga ichiitika izvi, dare repamusoro reHigh Court ranga richinzwa chikumbiro chekuti kupwanywa kwezvivakwa izvi kumiswe. Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda pamwechete nemapurisa nhasi yapwanya zvivakwa zvevanotengesera mumigwagwa pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa motokari kuMbudzi round-about ukuwo kanzuru yeChitungwiza ichipwanyawo zvimwe zvivakwa zvakadai mudhorobha iri. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vati sangano ravo rarwadziwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nekanzuru yeHarare. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 kuti kanzuru yavo haisi kuzoramba yakapeta maoko vanhu vachiita madiro aJojina muguta ravo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alive Kuveya, vati kanzuru yemudhorobha ravo yakabvira nezuro kupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo. Muzvare Kuveya vatiwo chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti vamwe vari kupwayirwa zvivakwa zvavo ivo vachibhadhara mitero kukanzuru vachiti pari zvino havachazive chekubata sevagari. Meya wedhorobha reChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vati zviri kuitwa izvi hazvisi kuitwa nekanzuru iri yoga vachiti chirongwa ichi chirongwa chiri kuitwa nemapazi ehurumende akawanda. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti itange yatarisa raramo yevanhu pakatariswa kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwete kuti imhanyire kutorera veruzhinji chingwa chiri pamuromo. Panguva yanga ichipwanya zvivakwa zviri muHarare neChitungwiza, dare repamusoro iro ranga richifanira kunzwa chikumbiro cheChitrest chekuti kupwanywa kuri kuitwa zvivakwa izvi kumbomiswa rati richazonzwa chikumbiro ichi nemusi weChina. VaTafadzwa Muguti, vanove Provincial Development Coordinator wedunhu reHarare vakaburitsa mashoko nezuro vachiti chirongwa chekupwanya zvivakwa zviri kushanda zviri kunzwe kwemutemo chichaitwa muHarare, Chitungwiza neRuwa senzira yekuchenesa dunhu reHarare. Zvichakdai, rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association, raburitsa mashoko richikurudzira hurumende kuti isiye makanzuru aite zvisungo zvawo ega kwete kuaudza zvekuita. Pakamboitwa chirongwa chakadai muna 2005 icho chaidaidzwa kuti Operation Murambatsvina, nhume yeUnited Nations, Amai Anna Kajumulo Tibaijuka, vakati chirongwa ichi chakasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) vasina pekugara uye zvekudya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanoda Kusvika Mamiriyoni Zana Vange Vatovhota Musarudzo dzemuAmerica Vakawanda neKutya Covid-19
text: Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu kana kuti 96 million vakatovhota kare musarudzo dzemuAmerica sezvo matunhu akawanda achibvumidza kuti vanhu vavhote vachiita zvekutumira vhoti yavo kana kuti mail in ballot kuitira kurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kune vamwe vakaita semauto vanenge vari kunze kenyika. Vamwe vanokwanisawo kukurumidza kunovhota zuva rakatarwa risati rasvika. Musi wa 3 Mbudzi kana kwapera makore mana ndiwo zuva rekuvhota riri pamutemo. Mumwe wevakatovhota kare musarudzo idzi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muMaryland VaTaka Kapikinyu vanoti mushure mekuvhota vakaziviswa kuti vhoti yavo yainge yatambirwa yangomirirwa kuitwa. No media source currently available Vari kwikwidzana gore rino mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump vebato remaRepublicans uye VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats. Kunze kwekuti ndiyani achange otungamira nyika yeAmerica, pane dzimwe sarudzo dzakakosha zvikuru mumatongerwo enyika dzinova dzedare reSenate. Parizvino bato remaRepublicans ndiro rine nhengo dzakawanda dzinosvika makumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti 53. MaDemocrats ane nhengo makumi mana nenomwe kana kuti 47. Rwendo rwuno matunhu makumi matatu nemashanu ndiwo ari kuita sarudzo dzesenate sezvo dzisingaitwe panguva imwechete. Asi kana mapato maviri aya akakwanisa ose kuwana zvigaro makumi mashanu kana kuti 50-50 zvinoreva kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika ndiye anenge aine vhoti yakakosha nekudaro ndokusaka paine makwikwi akasimba pakati paVaTrump naVaBiden. Rimwe dunhu rakakosha musarudzo idzi ndereNorth Carolina. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu iri VaEsau Mavindidze vanova zvekare mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica, reZimbabwe Diaspora Network North America vanoti kunyangwe dunhu ravo rakarerekera kumaDemocrats rwendo rwuno, zviri kuratidza kuti pane makwikwi akasimba pakati paVaBiden naVaTrump. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuBikita Votambira neMufaro Kupindira kweZACC muKuferefeta Huwori muKanzuru Yavo
text: Vamwe vagari vekuBikita mudunhu reMasvingo vanoti vari kutambira nemufaro mashoko ekuti komisheni inorwisana nehuwori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, (ZACC), yakatanga kuferefeta nyaya dzehuwori hungadai hwakaitika mukanzuru yavo. Vagari ava vanoti nyaya idzi dzinosanganisira kutengwa kwezvikakarara zvemotokari dzevakuru vakuru apo vagari vasiri kuwana zvakakwana. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vari kufara kuti eZACC yakatopinda mudunhu ravo kuti itarisise nezvehuori uhu honotsoropodzwa nevagari avo vari kuchema-chemawo nekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemabasa mukanzuru iyi. Mutauriri wesangano revagari reBikita Residents and Rate Payers Association kana kuti Birra, VaMark Mutengani ,vanoti vanotenda nekuuya kweZACC vachiti inofanira kubudisa pachena huori huri kuitwa mukanzuru iyi. ZACC ino uya apo sangano reBIRRA rakanyora gwaro renyunyuto kwairi pamwe nekudare reParamende mwedzi mitatu yapfuura. Mugwaro iri, vagari vainyuyuta kuti kanzuru yakatengera vakakuru vayo zvikakarara zvemotakari dzema GD 6 nhanhatu dzichiita mari inosvika zviuru makumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$40 000 pamotokari imwechete. Kanzuru inonzi yakatengazve chikarara chemotokari yerudzi rweLand Cruiser yemunyori wekanzuru, VaPeter Chibi, yaiita zviuru zana nemakumi mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$140 000. Motokari dzese idzi dzinonzi dzakaita zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi masere zvemadhora ekuAmerica $380 000. Mumwe mugari wemuBikita, VaStruggle Nyahunda, vati vanotarisira kuti ZACC ichaita basa rayo nemazvo. Mutauriri weZACC, Commissioner Thandiwe Mlobane, vatenda kuti vakatotanga kuferefeta kanzuru yeBikita asi vati vange vasingakwanisi kutipa zvizere sezvo vange vari parufu. Munyori wekanzuru yeBikita, VaChibi, vatenda kuti ZACC yakauya kubasa kwavo vachiferefeta nyaya iyi vachiti asi ivo hapana huwori hwavakaita sezvo zvose zvakaitwa pamutemo. Vanoongorora nezvekutongwa kwematunhu vakazvimirira muMasvingo, VaArchibold Madida, vanoti ZACC inofanira kupinda mumakanzuru akawanda mudunhu reMasvingo sezvo muine huwori hwakanyanya. Kunze kweZACC, kanzuru yeBikita iri kuferefetwawo negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, avo vakati zvakaitwa izvi hazvisi pamutemo. Vachitaura nebepanhau reMasvingo Mirror, VaMoyo vakati bazi ravo rakatotanga kuferefetawo nyaya iyi vakavimbisa kuti anenge abatwa nemhosva anosangana nemutongo wake zviri pamutemo. Kanzuru iyi iri kupomwerwawo huwori hwekucheresa zvibhorani zvina nemari inosvika madhora ekuAmerica zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu, kana kuti US$36,000.00. Kanzuru iyi yakacheresa chibhorani chimwe nemari inotangira pazviuru zvitanhatu kusvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica US$6 000.00 ne US$9,000.00 apo kucheresa chibhorani chimwe chete chakadzika mamita makumi mana kuchiwanzoita chiuru chimwe chete nemazana maviri emadhora ekuAmarica, kana kuti US$1, 200.00. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yoronga Kusarudza Mutevedzeri waMeya weChitungwiza
text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti richaenderera mberi nekusarudza mutevedzeri wameya weChitungwiza richiti kudomwa kwemutevedzeri wameya kwakaitwa negurukota rematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, hakusi pamutemo. VaMoyo vakadoma nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKiven Mutimbanyoka, semutevedzeri wameya kutanga kwesvondo rino uye meya veChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vakatozivisa makanzura ese edhorobha iri nezvedanho iri. Asi munyori anoona nezvematunhu muMDC Alliance, VaSesil Zvidzai, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa naVaMoyo zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiti makanzura ndiwo achagara pasi achisarudza mutevedzeri wameya. Asi VaMoyo vakati kanzuru yeChitungwiza yainge yatadza kusarudza mutevedzeri wameya mukati menguva inotarisirwa kuita izvi ndosaka vakadoma VaMutimbanyoka vachishandisa mitemo yenyika inovapa simba rekuita izvi. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trusts, Muzvare Alice Dian Kuvheya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakashamiswa nzvikuru nemaitiro aVaMoyo. Asi mukuru wesangano reHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vaudza Studio 7kutikanzuru yeChitungwiza yakatadza kuita basa rayo vachiti ingadai yakasarudza mutevedzeri wameya gore rapfuura zvichitevera kudzingwa kwevaive mutevedzeri wameya nemamwe makanzuru. Kunyange hazvo mutevedzeri wameya akadzingwa basa musi wa4 Mbudzi gore rapfuura, munyori weChitungwiza akazivisa kuti chinzvimbo ichi chakange chisisina munhu musi wa18 Nyamavhuvhu nekudaro kanzuru ine mazuva makumi matatu kubva musi uyu kuti isarudze munhu anotora chnzvimbo izvi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMoyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Pari zvino kanzuru yeChitungiwza ine makanzura makumi maviri, gumi nematanhatu eMDC Alliance nemana eZanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Chingwa Chotarisirwa Kushomeka Zvakanyanya Mushure Mekunge Hurumende Yadzikisa Mutengo
text: Mutungamiri weBakers Association of Zimbabwe, rimwe sangano revanobika chigwa VaWellington Peyama vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti chingwa chidzikiswe kubva pamadhora maviri nemakumi matatu nemashanu kuenda padhora nemakumi masere rinoshanda chete kana bhanga reRBZ richikwanisa kuvapa mari yekuAmerica kuti varitenge pamukoto zvopa kuti vatatarike. Kudzikiswa kwechingwa nehurumende kuri kutarisirwa kutokonzera kushaikwa kwacho kunzvimbo dzakawanda sezvo vanobika chingwa vatodzikisa huwandu hwacho nekushaikwa kwedhora rekuAmerica. Gurukota rezvemaindustry VaNqobizitha Ndlovu vanoti hurumende ichabatsira vanobika chingwa nemari yekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Voramba Kufanotambira Zana reMadhora, Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende atobuda pachena kare kuti nhengo dzawo hadzisi kuzotambira zana remadhora rinonzi nehurumende ichapa kuvashandi vayo nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuti vawane chekufanoshandisa pavanenge vakamirira mihoro yavo yaChikumi, iyo ichauya mwedzi. Mutungamiri wesangano reProfessional Educators Union of Zimbabwe, VaWilson Makanyaire vanoti sangano ravo rimwe remasangano ane nhengo dzaramba kutambira mari iyi, vachiti ichi chituko chaicho kuvarairidzi. “Nhasi musangano wataita kuMarondera wekunzwa pfungwa dzevarairidzi unoratidza kuti havasi kuzotambira mari iyi. Varairidzi vari kuti kana hurumende ichida kutipa mari ngaitipe mihoro yedu yese yakakwana mwedzi uno,” VaMakanyaire vanodaro. Vanoti sangano ravo rasunga kuti varairidzi vapinde mukuramwa mabasa kana vasina kutambira mihoro yavo panosvika musi wa 1 Chikunguru. “Zvatiri kukumbira kuvarairidzi ndezvekuti zvisineyi kuti uri wesangano ripi, ngatibataneyi maoko tipinde mukuratidzira, tipinde mukuramwa mabasa nekuti ndiwo mutauro unoteererwa nemushandirwi,” vanodaro VaMakanyaire. No media source currently available Iri danho ratsigirwa nerimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, iro rinoti nhengo dzaro dzarambawo kutambira hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu. Mutungamiri wesangano iri VaTakavafira Zhou vanoti zana remadhora iri imari isina zvainovabatsira sezvo ichiperera kumabhanga. “Varairidzi vane zvikwereti kumabhanga saka mari iyi inobva yangobatwa ikoko isati yasvika kwavari. Kana vakaitambira mari yacho vachienda kumabasa, ko mhuri dzavo dzinosara dzichidyeyi?” VaZhou vanobvunza. VaZhou vanoti nhengo dzavo hadzisi kuzoenda kumabasa kubva musi wa 1 mwedzi unouya kusvika dzapiwa mihoro yadzo yakakwana. Vanoti vari kukurudzira vashandi vose vehurumende kuti vaende kumusangano wevashandi uchaitwa muHarare neMugovera, apo pachapiwa mukana vose vanoda kutaura zvavanofunga. No media source currently available Sangano reRural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe rakaudzawo Studio 7 kare kuti harisi kuzotambira zana remadhora iri, sezvo zvichiratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hany’a nevashandi vayo. Munyori mukuru weRural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VasRobson Chere vakati nhengo dzavo dzichatora matanho ekuramwa mabasa kana dzisina kupiwa mihoro yadzo yaChikumi muna Chikumi, kwete muna Chikunguru sezviri kurongwa nehurumende. Ukuwo sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, Zimta rakaudzawo bepanhau reHerald kuti kunyange richiri kunzwa pfungwa dzenhengo dzaro pamusoro penyaya iyi, varairidzi vari kudya magaka mambishi sezvo vari kuramba kutambira mari isina kwainovasvitsa.

headline: Gweta raDiego Maradona Rinoti Harisi Kufara neMafiro Aakaita
text: Gweta reshasha yenhabvu yakashaya neChitatu Diego Maradona, VaMatias Morla mumashoko kuvatori venhau neChina vakati panofanira kuongororwa mafiro ake nekuti zvakatora maminetsi makumi matatu kuti ambulance iuye kuzomubatsira mushure mekurwara nemoyo. Gweta iri rinoti Maradona aifanira kuve aine vachengeti panguva dzose sezvo ainge achangobva kuvhiyiwa muhuropi munonzi mainge muine ropa rainge ragwamba asi anonzi ainge asina aimutarisa kwemaawa gumi nemaviri. Argentina nemusi weChina yakatara mazuva matatu ekuchema Maradona uye ari kuchemerwa kumuzinda wemutungamiri wenyika uko kune zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zviri kuonekana nemutumbi wake. Maradona akatungamira Argentina mukusimudza mukombe weWorld Cup muna 1986 uye vamwe vanoti panyaya dzenhabvu hapana aisvika paari.

headline: America neIran Dzopesana paNyaya yeZimbabwe paZuva Rekupemberera Kuzvitonga Kuzere
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yakatumira mashoko ekukorokotedza mhuri yeZimbabwe kwete kuvatungamiri wenyika Vaemmerson Mnangangwa pazuva rekupemberera kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakakurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo renyika. Vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti muZimbabwe muitwe nhaurirano kuti muve nekubatana sezvakarwirwa nyika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti hayo America inofanira kubvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri venyika vachipomerwa mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Asi mumashoko avo pazuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere kwezimbabwe, mutungamiri wenyika yeIran VaHassan Rouhani vakakorokotedza VaMnangagwa vachishorawo nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe. vakati zvirango izvo zvinofanira kubviswa. Iran yakatemerwawo zvirango neAmerica ichipomerwa mhosva yekuda kugadzira chombo chenuclear.

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai Oparura Bato Idzva reZveMatongerwo eNyika
text: Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi wekuHwange, Amai Elisabeth Valerio, nhasi vaparura bato ravo rezvematongerwo enyika muHarare vachikurudzira nyika dzekunze kuti dzione kuti sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzaitwa zviri pachena. Vachitaura pavaparura bato ravo nhasi ravari kudaidza kuti United Zimbabwe Alliance, Amai Valerio, avo vane kambani inoita nezvemhuka kuHwange, vati hwaro hwesarudzo hunofanira kuvandudzwa sarudzo dzegore rinouya dzisati dzaitwa kuitira kuti sarudzo idzi dzigoitwa mune zvakanaka. Vatiwo nyika dzekunze dzinofanira kupindira munyaya dzesarudzo idzi kuitira kuti sarudzo dzigoitwa zviri pachena vachiti vane tarisiro yekukunda musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Vaendererera mberi vachitiwo bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba munzvimbo ina dzariri kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-election kutsvaga nhengo dzeparamende vachiti vari kutarisira kukunda munzvimbo idzi. Bato iri riri kukwikwidza munzvimbo dzinoti Kuwadzana East, Harare East, Mbizo pamwe neKwekwe Central. VaValerio, avo vanoti aka ndekekutanga kupinda munezvematongerwo enyika, vavimbisa kuti vana vese vedzidzo yepasi kana kuti parimary vachange vachidzidza mahara kana bato ravo rikakunda musarudzo degore rinouya. Vati donzvo rebato ravo nderekuvaka nyika yavanoti yawondongwa nehurumende yeZanu PF vakati havasi kuzomirira kutanga vapinda muhutongi kuti vaite izvi. Vati panopera gore rino vachange vavhura makambani makumi matatu zvichaita kuti veruzhinji, zvikurusei vechidiki nemadzimai, vawane mabasa. Amai Valerio vati kana bato ravo rikapinda panyanga richaita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutizira kune dzimwe nyika kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro zvidzoke sezvo vachiti munyika muchange mave nehuchi nemukaka vagadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Amai Zvanyadza Mutsigwa vanogara mumusha weDzivarasekwa muno muHarare vati vafara nemashoko aturwa naAmai Valerio pakuparura kwavaita bato ravo reUnited Zimbabwe Alliance kana kuti UZA. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemtongerwo, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati hapana chakaipa kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika awande munyika vachiti ndizvo zvinoratidza kuti nyika yakasununguka. Asi VaMukundu vati kunyukanyuka kunoita mapato ezvematongerwo enyika kana patarisanwa nesarudzo zvinopa mukana wekuti mapato anopikisa apatsanure mavhoti. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, paramende pamwe nemakanzuru gore rinouya uye Amai Valerio, avo vati vachatora vanhu vese vachishanda navo zvisinei nekuti vanga vari kumapato api, vati pachaitwa sarudzo idzi vachange vaita gadziriro dzakakwana vachiti bato ravo richakwikwidza zvigaro zvose.

headline: VanaChiremba Vari Kuramwa Mabasa Vanotadza Kuwirirana neHurumende
text: Hurumende ichimiririrwa nemapazi ezvehutano nemari neMuvhuro yakaita hurukuro navanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa asi zvinonzi hapana kuwirirana zvapa kuti vanachiremba vati vacharamba vachiramwa mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Dr Prince Butau vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuri kuenderera mberi sezvo pasina kuwirirana nehurumende pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvinosanganisa kushomeka kwemishonga, zvikwanisiro uye kusawedzerwa kwemari dzavanotambira. Hurumende, kuburikidza neboka reHealth Services Board, yavimbisa kuti mishonga ichawanikwa muzvipatara paine tarisiro yekuti zvicharerutsa dambudziko. Musangano uyu unonzi waudzwawo kuti hurumende iri kuwedzera mari inoita mamiriyoni gumi emadhora yekuti pakwanise kupinzwa vamwe vashandi vezvehutano mumapoka ane dambudziko rekushomeka kwevane hunyanzvi kutanga musi wa 01 Ndira 2019. Hurumende inonzi yakawanisawo mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora, iyo inonzi yakanga yasara pamari yehomwe yeHealth Workers Vehicle Loan Scheme, yekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakwereteswe mari yekutenga dzimotokari vasingazobhadhariswa mitero yekupinza motokari idzi munyika kubva musi wa 01 Ndira 2019 zvakare. Zvinonziwo hurumende yakaisa hurongwa hwekuti vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vakamisirwa mihoro yavo yemuna Zvita 2018 vakwanise kuwaniswa mihoro yemuna Ndira 2019 kana vakanyorera kumapoka avanoshandira. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuMasvingo Vopomera Mauto neMapurisa Mhosva yeKutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu
text: Vamiriri vemapato anopikisa vari kupomera mapurisa nemauto mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mashoko aya akabuda pamusangano wakakokerwa neNational Transitional Justice Working Group, musi weChishanu paMasvingo Civic Center. Vemasangano akazvimirira vakati mapazi ehurumende ari kutadza basa raanofanira kuita rekuchengetedza runyararo nenyaya yekuti vari kutsigira nekushandiswa nemusangano weZanu PF. Vanokokera mabasa musangano reNational Transitional Justice Working Group VaDzikamai Bere vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuunza kupodzwa kwemaronda munyika uye kugadzirira kudzokazve National Peace and Reconciliation Commission iyo yakambomiswa nehurumende ichida kukwenenzverwa. Mutauriri we MDCT muMasvingo VaSimon Mupindu ndemumwe wevanhu vakashoropodza mapazi ehurumende. “Mapazi edu senyika ari kurasika zvakanyanya nenyaya yekuti vanofamba nebato rinotonga pane kuti vaite basa vakazvimirira. Havachagoni kuchengetedza runyararo kuvanhu vavanofanira kuchengetedza saka vari kukanganisa bumbiro remutemo.” Mapazi akanyanya kushorwa anoti, mapurisa, masoja, vasori pamwe chete ne madzishe ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva nyekutyora bumbiro remutemo. Muzvare Hilda Sibanda, mutungamiriri weRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe vanoti mapurisa eZRP ari pamberi pakukonzera mhirizhonga. “Isu semusangano tinoona sekuti ndiwo anotonyanyokuwedzera mhirizhonga semufananidzo we mapurisa kuNorton aitorova vanhu vari kudivi rerimwe bato iro riri kutonga.” VaJefreson Chitando veZimbabwe People First vakashoropodza mauto vachiti vari kushungurudza vanhu. “Tinoona kuti bumbiro renyika riri kubvorongwa ne masoja ayo ari kufamba achishungurudza vanhu uye varikufamba vachimanikidza vanhu kuti vavhotere musangano we Zanu PF saka isu toona sekuti ndizvo zvakashata.” Vanoongorora zvematongerwe enyika Dr Takavafira Zhou avo vanotungamirawo sangano rePTUZ vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vakati mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kukundikana ndee matare edzimhosva pamwe nemadzishe. “Vematare kana vaita basa ravo vapa kutonga kwavo vanoshoropodzwa saka vamwe vakutotsigira bato apowo madzishe kumaruzevha vanogova chikafu vachinyima avo vekumapato anopikisa saka izvi zvinoda kudzivirirwa kuti mapazi akadai akurudzire runyararo munyika.” Asi vaimirira Zanu PF pamusangano uyu, VaDaniel Shumba vanova nhengo yeparamende ye Masvingo Urban, vakaramba kuti musangano we Zanu PF unoshandisa mapazi ehurumende kunkonzera mhirizhonga. “Toda kugadzira kuti dai ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwaziva chokwadi pane kungoita ruzha pasina ruzivo, mapazi aya anofanira kutsigirwa nehurumende kana yadaro inokanganiswa nevekunze kwenyika vanoda kubvisa hurumende pachigaro chekutonga.” Asi vemasangano akazvimiririra vanoti vatungamiriri ve mauto, mapurisa pamwe nemadzishe vanogara vachitaura kuti vanotsigira mutungamiriri we Zanu PF VaRobert Mugabe nokudaro izvi zvinoita kuti vazotumwa kuita zvakaipa kuvatsigiri vemapato anopikisa. Vakatizve mhirizhonga iri kuitika munyika ichikonzerwa nemapurisa nemauto inoratidza kuti sarudzo dzekusarudza mutungamiriri wenyika muna 2018 dzinogona kuona mhirizhonga yakawanda nekudeuka kweropa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba kanawo vatauriri vemauto.

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Votarisirwa Kutura Mashoko avo kuMhuri yeZimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kutura mashoko avo kumhuri yeZimbabwe kana kuti State of The Nation Address, SONA, neChipiri masikati mudare reparamende. Asi bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti nhengo dzaro dzeparamende dzichatora matanho ekuratidzira panguva iyo VaMnangagwa vachange vachitaura sezvo bato iri risinga vacherechedze semutungamiri wenyika. Mutauriri webato reMDC, VaDaniel Molokele vanoti bato ravo richiri kutsvaga nzira dzekuratidzira nadzo, sezvakamboita munguva dzapfuura apo mutungamiri wenyika vaitaura kuparamende, dzinosanganisira kubuda mudare. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, vari mumiriri weBulilima West muparamende, VaDingimuzi Phuti, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kana nhengo dzeMDC dzakabuda muparamende VaMnangagwa vachitaura ndidzo dzinenge dzarasikirwa zvikuru. VaPhuti vati mutungamiri wenyika vari kutarisirwawo kuzivisa nyika pamusoro pematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende yavo ekugadzirisa nyaya dzezveupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vokurudzira Vatsigiri Kunyoresa Kuitira Kuti Vazovhotere MDC-T Zvine Mutsindo Muna 2018
text: Mutungamiri MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti vatsigiri vebato ravo vanofanirwa kuziva kuti zviuya zviri pemberi vobvisa Zanu PF kuburikidza nekuvhotera MDC-T zvine mutsindo musarudzo dza 2018. VaTsvangirai vakaudza vatsigiri vavo kuMakoni West nezuro kuti vanosungirwa kuramba vakabatana vachizonovhota vakawanda kuitira kudzivirira kubiridzirwa kunoitwa neZanu PF munguva yesarudzo. No media source currently available VaTsvangirai vakati vatsigiri vavo vanofanirwa kunyoresa kunovhota nguva dzose. Vakatiwo kana bato ravo richiita misangano, vatsigiri vanofanirwa kuenda kumisangano iyi nevana vavo vasvitsa makore ekuti vanenge vave kukodzera kuzovhota. VaTsvangirai vakati zvakavakoshera sebato kuti varwire kodzero dzevanhu vose munyika kuitira kupedza matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji anosanganisira kushayikwa kwemabasa, chikafu uye hurwere. Mutungamiriri weMDC akatiwo vaya vanoti vanhu vasina kurwira rusununguko rweZimbabwe havafanirwe kutonga nyika, vari kudivi rakashata renhoroondo yenyika. VaTsvangirai vakati hurumende yeZanu PF yakundikana kuwanira vanhu mabasa mamiriyoni maviri sekuvimbisa kwayakaita panguva yesarudzo asi avinoshamisa kuti yakwanisa kupedza kwemabasa kuvanhu mamiriyoni maviri kuburikidza nekuvhara kuri kuita makambani. VaTsvangirai vakati nzara iri muvanhu iri kuburitsa kutadza kutonga kwehurumende yeZanu PF, iyo vanoti haina mazano ekupedza nzara yakatarisana neruzhinji munyika. VaTsvangirai vakati rwendobato ravo richakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018, asi panguva imwe cheteyo vachiramba vakaomesa musoro kuti kutange kwave nekuvandudzwa kwemitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo.

headline: Madzimai Odzidziswa Kubatsira Madzimai Akazvitakura
text: Mukuedza kuderedza kufa kwemadzimai akazvitakura pamwe nekuchengetedza hutano hwevagari vekumaruwa, mamwe masangano akazvimirira ave kudzidzisa madzimai kuchengetedzwa kwehutano kuitira kuti vazodzidzisawo vavakagarisana navo kumaruwa. Mumwe wemadzimai akadzidziswa basa iri kuitira kuti azobatsirawo mamwe madzimai, ndiAmai Rena Round, avo vanogara mubhuku rekwaMambondiani kuDora mudunhu reManicaland. Amai Round, avo vanopinda chechi yemapostori isingabvumidzi nhengo dzayo kuenda kuzvipatara, vanoti chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsira zvikuru nharaunda yavo sezvo pari zvino vamwe vanhu vaisaziva mikova yezvipatara vave kukoshesa kuenda kuzvipatara. Amai Round vanotiwo kunyange hazvo makore mashoma apfuura vaive nedambudzo remadzimai akawanda aifa vakazvitakura, vanoti dambudzo iri rave kugadzirisika sezvo vari kudzidzisana kukosha kwekunyoresa kana mudzimai abata pamuviri, uye kuita izvi nguva ichipo. Madzimai aya ari kubatsirwa nemari inobva ku IM Swedish Development Partner. Sangano reDiocese of Mutare Community Care Programme rinoti rakakwanisa kudzidzisa madzimai makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu, ayo anoshanda mumawadhi maviri, Ward 11 neWard 35. Madzimai aya ndiwo anodzidzisa vagari vemunzvimbo iyi inonzi ine vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri ezviuru vazhinji vacho vari mapostori. VaPeter Mashonganyika vanoshanda ne Diocese of Mutare Community Care Program, uye mumwe wevanodzidzisa madzimai aya zvehutano. VaMashonganyika vanoti vari kufadzwa zvikuru nechirongwa ichi sezvo ndufu dzaderera munzvimbo yavanoshandira iyi. KuChipinge, chirongwa chekudzidzisa madzimai aya chiri kuitwa nesangano rakazvimiririra rinonzi Community Organisation for Poverty Alleviation in Zimbabwe. Sangano iri rakadzidzisawo vagari vekuChipinge Ward 17 ne Ward 18 vanosvika makumi masere nevatatu Mumwe wevari kudzidzisa madzimai kuChipinge, Amai Sarah Mafondora, vanoti kuburikidza nedzidzo yaveko, vanhu vakawanda vava kuziva nzira dzekuchengetedza hutano. VaWitmore Masengu vanoshnada neIM Swedish Development Partner. VaMasengu vanoti tsvagiridzo yavakaita kudunhu reManicaland muna 2014 yakaratidza kuti kwange kuine vakadzi vakawanda vaifa vakazvitakura, uye zvirwere zvepabonde kumadzimai aya zvaive zvakawanda. VaMasengu vanotiwo vanhurume vazhinji kunzvimbo iyi vaive vasina hany’a nehutano hwemadzimai avo kunyanya vakazvitakura izvo zvakapa sangano ravo kuti ribatsire nemari yekuti vagari venzvimbo idzi vawaniswe dzidziso yezveutano. No media source currently available

headline: Hatina kutenga Mahachi: Chicken Inn
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn — Joey “Mafero” Antipas — okurudzira Kudakwashe Mahachi kuti agadzirise nyaya dzake idzo dzakamumomotera uye ndokuti chikwata chake hachisi kutarisira kumutenga sezviri kutenderera pamadandemudande eSocial Media.   Mahachi akamiswa kutamba nhabvu nechikwata chake cheSupersport United chekuSouth Africa nekuda kwenyaya yaari kupomerwa yekunzi akapisa mwanakomana wake nemvura izvo zvakaona achikuvara kusvika pakudamburwa gumbo.   Nyaya iyi iri kumatare edzimhosva pamwe nedzimwe dzichiri kuferefetwa nemapurisa.   Mafero anoti Mahachi mutambi wepamusoro wekuti zvikwata zvakawanda zvinogona kumutenga, asi panguva ino anofanirwa kumbogadzirisa nyaya dziri kukanganisa hupenyu hwake.   “Isu hatisi kutarisira kutenga Kuda Mahachi sezviri kutaurwa nevanhu. Tinoyemura kuti mutambi ane tarenda guru zvekuti zvikwata zvakawanda zvinogona kumutenga. Asi, panguva ino ini ndinomukurudzira kuti ngaambogadzirise nyaya dzehupenyu hwake.   “Nyaya dzaakatarisana nadzo ihuru chaizvo saka ngaaise pfungwa dzake ikoko. Isu seChicken Inn hatisi kuda kumutenga,” anodaro Mafero.   Zvakadai, kubva patanga mitambo yePremier Soccer League mwaka uno, chikwata chaMafero ndicho chiri kutungamira apo mwaka wa2022 wave muchikamu chechipiri.    Joey Antipas   Mafero anoti chikwata chake chiri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura nekuda kwekuti chakasimba zvikuru izvo zvachiona chichitungamira palogo kwenguva refu.   Asi anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vake var[1]ambe vachitamba nhabvu yepamusoro uye vakazvininipisa sezvo rwendo rwePSL ruchiri rurefu.   “Tine chikwata chakasimba chiri kutamba zvinonwisa mvura saka zvakakosha kuti tirambe tichitamba nhabvu yepamusoro tiwane mukana wekuhwina mukombe wePSL. Ndinoziva kuti pachiri negomo guru rekukwira ratakatarisana naro asi tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba uye takaz vininipis a pamitambo inenge ichiuya,” anodaro Mafero.   Nemusi weMugovera svondo rino, Chicken Inn ichange iri pamusha panhandare yeLuveve apo ichasangana neFC Platinum mumutambo unotarisirwa kunge uchi[1]nakidza kukunda ngoma kurira.   Mumutambo wekutanga wezvikwata zviviri izvi, uyo wakatambirwa kuMandava, FC Platinum yakahwina 2-1. Svondo radarika, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaive kwaMutare uko kwakaona Chicken Inn ichizvambura Cranborne Bullets 4-1 kuchiti FC Platinum yakakunda Tenax 2-0.   Mutambowazvo wesvondo rino uchange uchibuda paZTN Prime.   Mune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino, Harare City ichange iri pamusha apo ichasangana neCAPS United nemusi weMugovera, kuchiti DeMbare ichange iri pamusha zvakare ichatatsurana neTriangle United musi weSvondo rino.   KuBaobab Stadium kuchaona Ngezi Platinum ichisangana neHighlanders nemusi weSvondo unove mumwe yemitambo ichabuda pa ZTN Prime.

headline: Joshua ndomurikita: Tyson Fury
text: anoti ane idi rekuti anokwanisa kukunda Anthony Joshua uyo ane bhande reWorld Heavyweight.   Nhaurwa dzehupenyu hwake uye nedzimwe dzakasiyana dzakaona Fury achimbomira kukwikwidza mutsiva kubva mugore ra2015 apo paakakunda Wladimir Klitschko ndokumutorera mabhande eWBA, IBF neWBO ayo ave naJoshua ose.   Fury achatanga kukwikwidza muna Chikumi uye shasha iyi haisati yambokundwa mutsiva.   Anotarisirwa kukwikwidza kuManchester Arena nemutambi asati ave kuzivikanwa uye kana apedza naye anogona kuzorwa naJoshua.   Paakabvunzwa kuti anofunga kuti anokunda Joshua here, Fury akaudza ITV Good Morning Britain kuti, “Hongu ndinozviziva, dai ndisingazvizive ndisina kumbogara pano ndichitaura zvatiri kutaura izvi. Ndingadai ndiri kuSpain uko ndichinwa hangu Sangria kana zvimwe.   “Hongu, ndozviziva kuti ndozviita nekuti ndinofunga kuti tarenda retsiva ndinaro, ndinofamba nenzira chaiyo uye ndinokwanisa kumisidzana nemutambi akaita saye zvakanaka. Ane simba zvake uye haarwisike naye zviri nyore asi haazosvike pandiri, ini ndave kumberi zvangu.   “Ndinodada hangu naye nezvaaita mumutambo uyu, uye mucherechedzo wakanaka zvikuru kune vamwe vatambi vari kusimukira. Asi ngaachangetedze mabhande ese nekuti ndiri kumuvinga kuzomubvutira manje-manje. Munhu wese mutsiva anoziva shasha chaiyo.” – SportsMail Boxing

headline: Zanu PF Inoita Sarudzo dzeKutsvaga Hutungamiri hweMatunhu
text: Sarudzo dzebato reZanu PF dzekutsvaga vatungamiriri vematunhu dzaitwa nhasi mumatunhu ose emunyika, uye zvizhinji zvabuda musarudzo idzi zvihaziviswa mangwana. Munzvimbo dzakawanda muHarare dzinosanganisira Mbare neHopley vanhu vatanga kuvhota mangwanani sezvange zvakarongwa. Asi kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaita seMufakose vanhu vatanga kuvhota panguva dzekuma3 masikati zvekuti kusvika pari zvino vachiri kuverenga zvabuda musarudzo. Amai Lisa Makoni, vanove sachigaro wemadzimai muMaurice Nyagumbo district kuHarare South Constituency, vaudza Studio7 kuti sarudzo dzafamba zvakanaka munzvimbo mavo. Vachitaura mushure mekuvhota paStodart Hall kuMbare, mutevedzeri weWomen’s League muMbare 1 District, Ambuya Garise, vati sarudzo dzekutsvaga hutungamiriri hutsva hwedunhu ravo dzafamba zvakanaka kunyange hazvo pange paine vakawanda vari kuda zvigaro. Vamwewo ambuya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara kuti sarudzo dzabuda zvakanaka uye vati vachagara paStodart Hall kudzamara zvabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa. Murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvichemo zvavange vanzwa kusvika pari zvino ndezvekuti kune dzimwe nzvimbo vanhu vanooka kutanga kuvhota. Vati vange vakamirira kunzwa zvizere kubva kumatunhu ese munyika. VaBimha vatiwo vanotarisira kuti kuverengwa kwemavhoti kunopera mangwana. Kunyange hazvo sarudzo idzi dzichinzi dzafamba zvakanaka, vamwe vakabuda musarudzo idzi vati vaityityidzirwa. VaaLazarus Dokora vekuMashonaland Centra vanoti vakabuda musarudzo idzi sezvo zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Nhasi, VaAbia Mujere vazivisa kuti havachapinda musarudzo, asi havana kupa zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti. KuMashonaland East, VaOzias Bvute, vakarambidzwa kukukwidza zvisina tsarukano kunyange hazvo zita ravo raimbenge ratambirwa nePolitiburo. VaBimha vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanenge vatyityidzirwa vanofanira kumhan’ara kubato kuti vanenge vaita izvi vatorerwe matanho. Mune makwikwi anotyisa muZanu PF zvekuti pamatunhu ese munyika, VaLarry Mavhima, ndivo vega vakashaya anovakwikwidza pachinzvimbo chasachigaro wedunhu reMidlands. MuHarare mune vanhu vashanu vari kuda chigaro ichi vanoti, VaChris Chuchu, VaGoodwills Masimirembwa,VaGodwin Gomwe, VaJason Pasade naVaBoniface Karoro. No media source currently available

headline: Murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors nhasi: ZIFA
text: MUTUNGAMIRI wesangano reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) – Felton Kamambo – anoti murairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors ari kugadzwa nhasi kuti ambofanobata chigaro chakasiiwa naZdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic mushure mekunge vapedza kuita hurukuro naye.   Zvichitevera kudzinga kwavakaita basa Loga nemusi weSvondo, Kamambo audza Kwayedza kuti vari mushishi kuita hurukuro nevarairidzi vachitsvaga anombofanobata basa iri kwekanguva kadiki.   “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro iye zvino nevarairidzi vakasiyana apo tiri kutsvaga wekufanopa basa iri. Asi nhasi tichazivisa kuti ndiani murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors.   “Handisati ndave kukwanisa kutaura zita rake iye zvino kuti ndiyani sezvo tichiri pakati pekutaurirana, saka kana tawirirana tozozivisa nyika yose.   “Murairidzi uyu toda kuti zvizivikanwe kuti achange akafanobata chigaro ichi, apo isu tichitsvaga watichazopa basa iri kuti agotsive Loga,” anodaro Kamambo.   Loga akadzingwa basa musi weSvondo wadarika mushure mekunge atadza basa. Akarairidza maWarriors mitambo 14 ndokukundwa misere, akaita mangange mishanu ndokungohwina mumwe chete.

headline: Botswana Yovandudza Mapirwo eZvizvarwa Zvekune Dzimwe Nyika Magwaro
text: Mukutanga kwemwedzi waGunyana, mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vakazivisa kuti hurumende yavo ichavandudza kupihwa kwemagwaro ekugara nekushanda kuzvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji zvange zvave pedyo nekutakura mikwende yazvo zvakananga kumusha sezvo Botswana yakambenge yadzika mitemo inoomesera vekune dzimwe nyika. VaMisheck Chivhembe, avo vane makore makumi matatu nemaviri, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu muBotswana ava nani kupinda makore apfuura. Mashoko aVaChivhembe atsinhirwa nachimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaMorris Nyamandwe, avo vanoshanda mabasa emaoko muGaborone. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaNkululeko Dube, vanoti havazive kuti vangatenda sei VaMasisi nedanho ravakatora. VaDube vanoti kusapihwa magwaro nehurumende kwakanga kwoita kuti vafunge kuenda kuSouth Africa uko zvizvarwa zvinobva kune dzimwe nyika zvinooneswa ndondo nevanhu venyika iyi. Apo Botswana yaitungamirwa naVaSeretse Khama Ian Khama, zvakanga zvisiri nyore kuti magwaro ekushanda nekugara munyika iyi abude. Machinjiro ezvinhu aya afadza mumwe muzvinabhizimisi mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaPatrick Matenge, vanoti zvakaitwa neBotswana zvinhu zvakanakira mabhizimisi emunyika iyi. Kunyange hazvo kusina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana, huwandu hwazvo hunofungidzirwa kuti hunodarika vanhu vemunyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvikoro mitambo yaondongwa
text: SANGANO reNational Association of School Heads (NASH) rinoti vana vanotamba mitambo yakasiyana muzvikoro vakanganiswa zvikuru kusimukira kwezvipo zvavo kubvira pakanyuka chirwere cheCovid-19 kekutanga munyika muno gore rapera sezvo mitambo iyi isiri kuitwa.   Mutungamiri weNASH – Arthur Maphosa – anoti mitambo yemuzvikoro inorongwa nesangano ravo kwemakore akawanda inobatsira kusimudzira vana munyaya dzemitambo izvo zviri kuona vamwe vachinokwikwidza kunze kwenyika kumitambo yakaita seConfederation of Schools Sports Association of Sourthen Africa (COSSASA).   Maphosa anoti kuvepo kweCovid-19 kwaita kuti vechidiki varasikirwe nemitambo iyi. “Zvinorwadza kuti remangwana revana vedu muzvikoro riri kutokanganiswa, makore maviri aya hatina mitambo yatambwa muzvikoro, vana vazhinji vatorasikirwa ipapo.   “Tiri kuchema nguva dzose kuti dai denda iri rachipera uye dai tapihwa mikana yekuti tironge mitambo yevana nekuti tinofanira kuvarongera remangwana ravo nekuti vakaregererwa rinoenda mudondo,” anodaro Maphosa.   Makore ose, NASH inoronga mitambo mikuru inosanganisira Copa Coca Cola yenhabvu kuchiti Stella Netball under 17.   Mitambo miviri iyi inozivikanwa ichibika shasha dzakawanda dzakaita mukurumbira pasi rose mumutambo wenhabvu nenetball.   Vatambi venhabvu vane mukurumbira vakaita saPeter Ndlovu, Knowledge Musona naKhama Billiat vakadarika nemumutambo weCopa Coca Cola.   Kozoti kunetball, vatambi vechikwata chenyika cheGems vanosanganisira Sharon Bwanali naFelistas Kwangwa vakapfuura nemuchirongwa cheStella Under 17 netball tournament.   “Chikwata chenyika chemaGems chiye chakaenda kuLiverpool kuWorld Cup mugore ra2019, vasikana vazhinji vaive muchikwata ichi vakapfura nemumaoko edu. Zvakare tinofara tichiona kuti vave kutorarama nemutambo uyu uye vachitambira zvikwata zvikuru zvenetball, zvimwe chetezvo kunhabvu. Saka mitambo iyi yakakosha, tikagarisa isingatambwe vana vakawanda vanorasikirwa nemikana mizhinji,” anodaro Maphosa.

headline: Hurumende Yoendeswazve kuDare Kuti Iripe Zvaiputswa neMapurisa kuMazowe Vachinzi Vaitumwa naAmai Mugabe
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika VaObert Mpofu, mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga nemamwe mapurisa ekuMazowe vari kutarisirwa kubhadharazve imwe mari yakawanda semuripo kuvamwe vagari vepurazi reArnold Farm iro raizivikanwawo nekuti Manzou mushure mekunge vagari ava vaputsirwa midziyo yavo nemapurisa ayo aiti aitumwa nevaive mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe. Svondo rapera dare rekuBindura rakati vamwe vagari vakaendesa nyaya yavo kudare iri vapihwe mari inosvika zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora semuripo. Vagari ava vakatora purazi iri panguva yehondo yeminda muna 2000 asi mumakore apfuura vange vonetsana naAmai Mugabe vaiti vanodawo purazi iri kuti vachengete mhuka. Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomirira vagari ava reArnold Farm Residents Association VaInnocent Dube vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzorega kuenda kumatare kusvika varipwa zvose zvavakaparadzirwa. Asi vati kuti vawane mari kubva kuhurumende vachatotenda maruva vadya chakata nekuti hurumende inombotsika madziro pakubhadhara zvikwereti. No media source currently available Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights riri kubatsira vagari ava nemagweta VaKumbirai Mafunda vati vari kufara zvikuru nemitongo iri kubva kumatare. No media source currently available

headline: Monalisa okunga tsiva
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai — Monalisa “Queen Monalisa” Sibanda — inoti yadzoka mugym umo iri kuita gadziriro dzekurwira kuchengetedza bhande rayo reWomen International Boxing Association (WIBA) World Inter-continental light-weight iro yakahwina mugore ra2019.   Monalisa akahwapura bhande iri mushure mekukunda Joice Awino wekuKenya uye aifanirwa kunge akarwira kurichengetedza kare asi izvi hazvina kukwanisika zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muhurukuro svondo rino, Monalisa anoti Covid-19 yakakanganisa hurongwa hwake hwa2020 hwekurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake.   “Ndadzoka manje, ndiri mushishi kugadzirira kuti ndigorwira bhande rangu, zvange zvakaoma kungogara mutambo wandinodisisa tisiri kuwana mukana wekuutamba.   “Asi kudzoka kwemitambo nekupihwa kwatakaita mikana yekuti tigokwikwidza zvave nechiedza kwatiri isu vari mune zvemitambo. Dai pasina iyo Covid-19 ndakatorwa kare asi zvose zvange zvakangomiswa nekuda kwedenda iri,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi iye zvino yave kufanirwa kuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake musi wa10 Chikunguru asi pari zvino hapasati pazivikanwa kuti achatatsurana nemutambi upi.   Anoti hutungamiriri hwetsiva huri mushishi kumutsvagira mutambi wekuzosangana naye saka ari kugara akagadzirira kuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake.   “Iye zvino pachiri kutsvagwa mutambi wandichazosangana naye, hapasati pazivikanwa kuti ndicharwa nani nekuti mazuvaano nekuda kweCovid-19 panotombotanga paongororwa kuti mutambi ari kubva kunyika ipi sezvo dzimwe nyika dziri muboka redzinoonekwa sedzinopisa nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Zvakafanana nekuti ini chaiye mutambo uyu ndinoda kuutambira muno asi zvikakona ndinenge ndakutonzi ndiende kunorwira kuTanzania uko kwange kusina lockdown kana kumiswa mitambo nekuda kweCovid-19,” anodaro Monalisa.   Anoti anotenda zvikuru vakotsveri vake nevamwe vatsigiri vakamira naye panguva iyo mitambo yakange isiri kutambwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Ndine hama dzakawanda dzakanditsigira zvinhu zvakaoma, vashoma vanonzwisisa isu vatambi vetsiva vechidzimai. Saka ndinopa kutenda kune avo vange vachimira neni,” anodaro Monalisa.

headline: Mapurisa neMasoja Orambidza Vanhu Kufamba Famba Munyika
text: Mapurisa nemasoja ange achirambidza vanhu vakawanda kupinda mumadhorobha akawanda munyika uye vamwe vanhu vange vapinda mumadhorobha aya vange vachiudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo. Nhasi mapurisa nemasoja ange akadzika maroadblock pamigwagwa yose inopinda mumaguta achipa chete mvumo vanhu vanobvumirwa nehurumende kushanda munguva ino yeNational Lockdown. Vanga vasina mvumo vanga vachiudzwa kuti vadzokere kudzaimba dzavo, uye varemekedze mutemo we curfew wakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChipiri. Izvi ndizvo zvaitikawo mumaguta nemadhorobha akasiyana-siyana munyika kusanganisira Chinhoyi, Gweru, Kadoma, Mutare neMasvingo. Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Tapfuma Machakaire, vati shoko rekuti curfew rinounza ndangariro dzakaipa sezvo mudunhu reMatebeleland makamboitwa curfew munguva yeGukurahundi, iyo yakasiya vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri vauraiwa nemauto eFifth Brigade mumatunhu eMatabeleland nedzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMidlands. Asi nhengo yeCentral Committeee yeZanu PF, VaJospeh Tshuma, vati havawone chakapia pakuve necurfew. Vati vanhu vanofanirwa kudzidza kudzidza kubva kunyika dzakaita seItaly, Spain, Brazil neAmerica uko zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zviri kufanechirwere cheCovid-19. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vati mapurisa nevechiuto havafanirwe kutyora kodzero dzevanhu panguva yakadai. VaKika vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kusiya tsika yekutonga nyika nekuisa zviga izvo vati zvinotyora bumbiro remutemo yenyika. Kurambidzwa kupinda mumaguta kuri kuitwa vanhu kunonzi kuri kuvhiringa vanhu vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa. Mumwe anotengesera muBulawayo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Mushapo ati vanhu vanozvishandira vange vachirambudzwa kupinda muguta. MuBulawayo Studio 7 yaona vamwe vanorarama nekuchinja mari mumigwagwa pamwe nevanotengesa pamusika wemunaFifth Street vachiita hwekatsi nagonzo nemapurisa ayo ange ari pamabhasikoro, nemamwe ange ari pamabhiza achitenderera achiudza vanhu ava kuti vadzokere kumba. Amai Medeline Mari avo vanoraramawo nekutengesa vati mutemo we curfew uchaita kuti veruzhinji vafe nenzara. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vati hurumende ine tsika yekungodzika mitemo pasina kunyatsofungisisa nezvainobatsira. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa kana vechiuto panyaya iyi.Studio7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi VaMnangagwa vakazivisa neChipiri kuti mauto nemapurisa achange ari mumigwagwa achiona kuti mitemo yeNational Lockdown yatevedzerwa nemunhu wese sezvo nyika iri kuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika zviuru zviviri nemakumi matatu nevana, uye chauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu muZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa havana kuzivisa kuti curfew iyi ichapera riini? Hurumende yakavharisa zvikoro zvose zvepamusoro soro kudzamara zvinhu zvanaka munyika munyaya dzeCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: National Aids Council Yobatsira Vagari vemuBulawayo Pachena
text: Vamwe vanhu vanogara kunze kweguta reBulawayo nemusi weChina vakaongororwa ropa, chirwere cheshuga, maziso nezvimwe pachena pasi pechirongwa cheNational Aids Council. Chirongwa ichi chakaitwa kunzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka Primary School kunze kweguta reBulawayo pasi pechirongwa cheNational AIDS Council chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe ropa ravo. Mukuru weLuveve District Aids Awareness Committee Amai Priscilla Mac-Isaac vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa ichi chaitwa neNAC ichishanda nemamwe masangano akasiyana-siyana, uye chakanangana nevanhu vanoonekwa vari panjodzi yekutapurirwa hutachiwana hweHIV. Vamwe vevanhu vakauya kuchirongwa ichi vakakwanisa kuongororwa ropa ravo pamwe nezvimwe vakati vakafara nechirongwa ichi sezvo chakaunzwa kwavari. Mumwe wevanhu vakabatsirwa ndemumwe wevechidiki anonzi Thomas Nyoni uyo ati anoziva kuti zvakakosha kuti munhu azive kuti ropa rake rine hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Asi ati vanhu vakawanda vemunharaunda yenzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka vanotadza kuita izvi nekuti vanoshaya mari yekuenda kuzvipatara zviri pedyo. Izvi zvakatsigirwawo nemumwe musikana uyo angoda kudeedzwa nezita rekuti Patience. Muzvare Margaret Mucheki avo vati vakabatwa nechirwere chemaziso chinonzi glaucoma vati vafarawo kuti vakwanisa kutariswa maziso avo pachena. Amai Mac-Isaac vati veNAC vave kugara vachiita zvirongwa zvekuenda muvanhu senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vazive pavamire mairirano nehutachiwana hweHIV/ Aids. Pachirongwa ichi painge paine mamwe masanganowo akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira veZimbabwe National Family Planning Council avo vange vachidzidziswawo nezvekuronga mhuri kuchishandiswa nzira dzekudzivirira kubata pamuviri dzakasiyana-siyana. Mamwe masangano akadai seJustice for Children Trust neChildline vange varipowo vachidzisa vanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzevana uye nezvekudzivirira kushungurudzwa kwevana. No media source currently available

headline: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Zvotevedzerawo Kurudziro yeKudzivirira Covid-19 muMabasa
text: Nyika dzakawanda pasi rose, idzo dzakambenge dzambovhara senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, dzakatanga kubvumidza kuvhurwa zvishoma zvishoma kwemakambani akasiyanasiyana paine kurudziro yekuti vashandi nevashandirwi vatevedzere mitemo yakatarwa inodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Matanho aya akaonawo vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana vachidzokerawo kumabasa kwavo vachiedzawo chose kuti vatevere mitemo yehutano hwakanaka mumabasa mavanoshanda, inosanganisira kupfeka nhumbi dzinodzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere, kugeza maoko nesipo uye kusiya mikaha pakati pavo. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chakaitawo rombo rakanaka rekudzokera kubasa ndaVaPhainos Chikunda, avo vari kuPort Elizabeth, kuSouth Africa. VaChikunda vanoti kubva pavakadzokera kubasa, sevashandi vari kutora matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation ekuona kuti vazviidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19, kungave kubasa kana kumba. Vanoti pavanosvika pabasa mangwanani oga oga vanovhenekwa kuona kuti havasi kupisa miviri here, vogeza maoko nesipo uye kuzora maoko avo mushonga unouraya hutachiwana. Vanotiwo mushandi wese anenge akavhara muromo nemhino, vachivhenekwa zvakare vave pabasa. Vamwe vari kunze vari kuunganidzawo mari nezvekudya zvekubatsira zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kutambura munguva ino yeCovid-19 zvisati zvakwanisa kudzokera kumabasa. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kuitikawo muSouth Africa umo vanhu vakabatana kubatsira vari kushaya. VaChikunda vanotiwo munyika iyi mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda chose zvisati zvadzokera kumabasa, izvo zviri kuita kuti vakawanda vanonge svosve nemuromo. Asi vanoti zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pamwe nevemakereke nevemamwe masangano anobatsira vari kuedza kuunganidza rubatsiro pamwe nezvekudya zvekubatsira vari kutambura ava, vamwe vachitobatsirwa kubhadhara mari dzepekugara. Chinonzi chiri kunyanya kunetsa ndechekuti hurumende yeSouth Africa haisi kubatsira vasiri zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mugabe Vokurudzira Murume Wavo Kudzinga Amai Mujuru
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakurudzira murume wavo uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, kuti vadzinge basa mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vavari kupomera mhosva yekuronga zvekubvisa Va Mugabe pachigaro vachishandisa chisimba. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita neMuvhuro nevadzidzi vemuzvikori zvepamusoro soro pamwe nevatsigiri ve Zanu PF, Amai Mugabe vakurudzira VaMugabe kuti vadzinge basa Amai Mujuru avo vavave nenguva vachiti vanofanira kusiya basa. Zvichitevera mashoko akabuda mubepanhau re Sunday Mail neSvondo ekuti Amai Mujuru vaironga zvekuuraya VaMugabe, Amai Mugabe vati vane humbowo hwevhidhiyo inoburitsa pachena kuti Amai Mujuru vairongawo kuvauraya ivo pachezvavo. Vati Amai Mujuru vari kupihwa mari nehurumende dzekunze yavari kushandisa muhurongwa hwekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo Vaenderera mberi vachiti nekuda kweizvi, Amai Mujuru vanofanirwa kusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende. Vatiwo kubva zvavakagadzwa semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, hapana chavakaita chinoratidza kuti vaimirira zvido zvemadzimai munyika. Vatiwo vachashanda zvakasimba kuti makurukota ese ehurumende pamwe nevatevedzeri vaVa Mugabe vachasarudzwa pakongiresi ye Zanu PF vanogona kuvadzingisa zvakare kana vasiri kuita zvinhu nemazvo. Tabata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi vakati vari mumusangano vachatifonera kana vapedza zvavari kuita. Asi mashoko avakaburitsa nezuro anoti havana chavanoziva nezvenyaya dziri kutaurwa mazuvano naAmai Mugabe pamwe nevamwe vari muZanu PF avo vari kuvapomera mhosva yehuori, kusagona basa pamwe nekutengesa kune venyika dzekunze. Vanoti vakatosvitsa nyaya iyi kumagweta avo kuti atore matanho pamusana pekusvibiswa kuri kuitwa zita ravo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wesangano re Zimbabwe Congress of Students iro rinobuda pachena kuti rinotsigira Zanu PF, Va Leopold Chakanyuka, vaudza vanhu vanga vari pamusangano uyu kuti gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Olivia Muchena, pamwe negurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, Va Francis Nhema, vanofanira kusiya mabasa avo nhasi chaiye vachipomera vaviri ava mhosva yekusakoshesa zvido pamwe nezvirongwa zvevechidiki pamwe nevadziddzi. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vati vanhu vese vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru vachatorerwa matanho akaomarara mu Zanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Mutongo weDare Unomanikidza Hurumende Kudzika Mutemo Unotara Mashandiro eMakurukota neVatevedzeri veMutungamiri weNyika Wotambirwa neMufaro
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court neChitatu rakapa mutongo wekuti gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi pamwe negweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya, vange vabuda nemutemo unotara mitemo inofanirwa kuteverwa nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, makurukota pamwe nevatevedzeri vemakurukota mukuita mabasa avo kana vari muhofisi, kana kuti Code of Conduct. Vachipa mutongo wavo, mutongi weHigh Court Justice David Mangota vakapa vaviri ava mazuva makumi mana nemashanu (45) ekuti vange vabuda nebhiri iri uye ringe raendeswa kudare remakurukota. Mutongo uyu unotevera matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva akatorwa nemumwe mudzidzi wezvemitemo wepachikoro chepamusorosoro cheZimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University, ZEGU, Nyasha Chirima, uyo aida kuti dare rimanikidze VaZiyambi pamwe naVaMachaya kuti vabude nebhiri iri sezvinokurudzirwa nechikamu 106 (3) chebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vakamanikidzwa kusiya basa mushure mekunge nyaya dzavo dzehupombwe dzaburitswa mumadandemutande. Svondo rapera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakadzinga basa vaive mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima, VaDouglas Karoro, mushure mekunge vapomerwa nyaya dzehuwori. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaZiyambi Ziyambi sezvo vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo. Takundikanawo kubata VaMachaya kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda nesangano reAll Hands on Justice, VaKennedy Masiye, vanoti mutongo uyu mutongo wakanaka kwazvo uye wanga watononokesa. VaMasiye vanoti havaoni zvavo pachizotorwa matanho ekuti pange pave nemutemo uyu nekukasika, kunyange hazvo uri mutongo uri kuendesa zvinhu mugwara rakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Hama neShamwari dzaVaItai Dzamara Dzoratidzira
text: Munin’ina waVaItai Dzamara, mutori wenhau anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akapambwa gore rapera, VaPatson Dzamara neshamwari dzavo kusanganisa VaKumbirai Mafunda vanova sachigaro wesangano reMISA-Zimbabwe vachishandawo nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vakaratidzira murunyararo neChitatu muAfrica Unity Square muHarare. VaPatson Dzamara vakasvika makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa nemusi weChitatu asi vakabva vatora mukana uyu kuti varatidzire. VaPatson Dzamara vakanyora paFacebook peji yavo kuti vaipemberera zuva ravo rekuberekwa asi vasina mufaro mumoyo. “Nhasi ndasvitsa makore makumi matatu uye ndinoda kutenda Mwari nechipo chehupenyu. Apo ndinenge ndichipemberera zuva rekuzvarwa kwangu, mufaro wangu uri kukundwa nekudzimbikana kwekutsakatika kwakaita Itai Dzamara. Asi ndine chivimbo chekuti Mwari vachandipa mukana wekusangana nemukoma wangu pasi pano. Ndinovimbisa kuita zvose zvandinogona kuzadzikisa zvido zvemusiki, zvenyika yangu uye zvepasi rino kubatsira vamwe. Ndokunzwisisa kwangu kuda nyika yako nehutungamiri.” VaDzamara vakapambwa muna Kurume kuGlen View apo vaigerwa. Mapurisa akanzi nedare repamusoro atsvage VaDzamara asi kusvika parizvino vanoti hapana humbowo hwekuti aripi. Asi magweta nehama dzavo vanoti mapurisa haasi kutsvaga VaDzamara nemwoyo wose. VaDzamara nevamwe vavo vairatidzira muAfrica Unity Square vachikurudzira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vaende pamudyandigere nekuti vainge vakundikana basa.

headline: Mutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaNguema, Votarisirwa Kusangana naVaMugabe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeEquatorial Guinea VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo vakasangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pavakazeya nyaya dzekusimbaradza kudyidyana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yekuMalabo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau paState House nezuro manheru mushure memusangano wavakaita nemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea, VaTheodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hapana zvitsva zvavakazeya naVaMbasogo munhaurirano dzavakaita kunze kwekungosimbaradza hukama hwagara huripo pakati peZimbabwe neEquatorial Guinea vasati vatora matomhu kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMbasogo vakaudzawo vatori venhau kuti kudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe nehurumende yavo kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvisinei nekuti Zimbabwe yave nemutungamiri mutsva. VaMbasogo, avo vaitaura vachiturikirwa, vakati hurumende yavo iri kutsigira zvirongwa zviri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa zvakanangana nebudiriro yenyika. Vachiturikirwa, VaNguema vakati parwendo rwuno vakanga vasina zvitsva zvavakauya kuzotaura asi kungosimbaradza kudyidzana kwagara kwagara kuripo kuitira kuti vasimudzire nyika dzavo dzose dziri mbiri. Zvichakadai, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kuita musangano naVaMugabe, avo vavaidyidzana navo zvikuru vasati vatorerwa masimba ehutongi naVaMnangagwa zvakakonzera kuti pasave nekuwirana pakati paVaMugabe naVaMnangagwa. Musangano uyu wakatarisirwa kuitirwa kumba kwaVaMugabe kuBlue Roof kuBorrowdale mangwanani ano. Zvichakadai, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukushanya kwemutungamiri weEquatorial Guinea vanoti VaMbasogo vatumwa nemashoko kuna VaMugabe abva kuna VaMnangagwa ane chekuita nekuti VaMugabe naVaMnangagwa vayanane pakubvutirana kwavakaita masimba. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaMalvern Mkudu, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti havaone VaMbasogo vachikwanisa kuita mutongi gava pakati pevaviri ava. VaMugabe naVaMbasogo vane hushamwari hunobvira kure uye VaMbasogo vakambobatsirwa naVaMugabe masoja emuno paakabata ndege yaiva nevanhu vainge vakatakura zvombo zvekunopidigurisa hurumende yaVaNguema kuMalabo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reRevolutionary Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaTjenesani Ntungagwa. Vapedza kusangana naVaMugabe, VaMbasogo vakatarisirwa kusangana zvakare naVaMnangagwa vasati vaoneka kudzokera kunyika kwavo nhasi wakare. Kupinda munyika kwakaita VaMbasogo nezuro kwakananganawo nekusvitsa chidimbu chepakati chegore kubva pakagadzwa VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika munaMbudzi gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Makumi Maviri neZvishanu Vonyoresa kuVhota
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vanyoreswa kuvhota kumatunhu akasiyana siyana kubva zvakaparurwa chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti muna Gunyana hwapfuura zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu. Vatiwo sangano ravo rave mubishi kuunza munyika mimwe michina yose inodiwa kuti vaumbe gwaro idzva revavhoti iri. NeChipiri svondo rinouya, ZEC inenge yopinda mumatunhu akawanda vachinyoresa vavhoti uye nhasi vaparura hurongwa hwekuzivisa vanhu nezvinenge zvoitwa svondo rinouya. Amai Makarau vanoti mukati memavhiki maviri vanenge vave nemuchina wekuvheneka minyoro yemimwe kana kuti mafinger prints kuona kuti hapana munhu anoresa kaviri.

headline: Hurumende Yoramba Kuti VaNgarivhume Vabuditswe Mujeri reChikurubi Umo Vonyimwa Chikafu
text: Mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare VaTrynos Utahwashe vave kutarisirwa nemusi weChishanu kuti vape mutongo wavo wekuti mutungamiri webato rinopikisa retransform Zimbabwe VaJacob Ngarivhume vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso here kana kuti kwete. Nyaya yaVaNgarivhume yange iri mudare zvekare nhasi gweta ravo VaMoses Nkomo vachikumbira kuti vaburitswe mujeri reChikurubi Maximum Prison sezvo kuratidzira kwavanonzi vaironga musi wa 31 Chikunguru kwakadarika pasina kana mhirizhonga. Dare iri nerepamuso akambormba kupa VaNgarivhume mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso asi VaNkomo vakumbira kuti vabviswe madhora zviuru zvishanu semari yechibatiso pamwe nekuti vagare kumba kwavo kuWaterfalls kwavakasungirwa uye kuti vaende kunozviratidza kamwechete pasvondo kumapurisa. Asi muchuchusi wehurumende VaMichael Reza vapikisa kupiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso uku vachiti kunyangwe hazvo musi wa31 Chikunguru wakapfuura pane boka rakaumbwa rinonzi July 31 Movement ravanoti rinogona kuda kuramba richikurudzira kuti mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabviswe pachigaro. VaNkomo vaudza vatori venhau kuti mutongo uchapihwa svondo rino. Vatiwo zvisinei nemutongo wakapiwa nedare svondo rapera wekuti VaNgarivhume vawaniswe zvekudya pamwe nekushanyirwa vari kujeri reChikurubi, izvi hazvisi kuitwa vachiti vekujeri vakati vaNgarivhume ngavaite zvekudya zvekutenga pamadandemutande izvo vati zvinoda mari yakawanda. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaMarufu Mandevere vati hazvina kunaka kuti vemajere vasatevedzere zvinenge zvataurwa nedare vachiti kuzvidza dare. VaNgarivhume vakasungwa mwedzi wapera pamwe nemutori wenhau VaHopewell Chin’ono vachipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira. Asi vaviri ava vanoti kuratidzira ikodzero iri mubumbiro remitemo.

headline: Vashandi veChitungwiza Vakamiswa Mabasa Vasina Kupiwa Mihoro Yavo Voronga Kukwira kuMatare
text: Vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matatu vakamiswa basa svondo rapera vaungana pamahofisi ekanzuru iyi vachida kuti vapiwe mari dzemihoro dzavanoti vakanga vasina kupiwa kwemwedzi inonzi ingada kusvika kumakumi matatu. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi veChitungwiza, Reverend Ephraim Katsina vanoti kanzuru yakapotsa pakutanga yamisa vashandi ava mabasa isati yavabhadhara mari dzavo dzayakanga isati yavapa. Reverend Katsina vanoti vaedza kuita musangano nemunyori mukuru wekanzuru yeChitungwiza VaGeorge Makunde asi hapana chinobatika chabuda mumusangano uyu. Vanoti vachasangana zvakare neChipiri, kukundikana kuwirirana votora matanho ekuenda kumatare edzimhosva, uye kusanganawo negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, vaSaviour Kasukuwere. “Tinoda kunzwa kubva kuna minisita kuti vakatendera here kuti kanzuru imise vashandi ava mabasa,” vanodaro Reverend Katsina Nemusi weChina svondo rapera kanzuru yakamisa vashandi ava mabasa ichi shandisa mutongo weSupreme Court wakabuda muna Chikunguru, kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakanga vasaina bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wezvevashandi kuti uve mutemo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaMakunde kanawo meya weChitungwiza VaPhilip Mutoti kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Varume neVakadzi Vokurudzirwa Kupota Vachivheneka Mazamu Kudzivirira Gomarara
text: Hurumende nhasi yakurudzira vatori venhau kuti vaongororwe gomarara pazammu ichiti izvi zvino batsirawo kuti vanyore nezvenyaya dzemagomarara zvine hudzamu. Bazi rinoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko rabatana nemakambani anoita zvehutano akaita sePremier Service Medical Aid Society PSMAS pamwe ne MedPoint mukudzidzisa pamwe nekuongorora chirwere chegomarara kuvatori venhau · Gurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vati hurumende inokoshesa zvikuru hutano hwakanaka munyika. Vachitaurawo mushure mekuongororwa gomarara remazamu, mutevedzeri wavo, VaKindness Paradza vakurudzirawo vanhurume kuti vaongororwe gomarara iri sezvo risingangobate madzimai. Mumwe wevaongororwa ndiBridget Madzimure anoshanda kuZimbabwe Broadcasting Cooperation (ZBC) uyo ati afara zvakanyanya nekuwana mukana wekuongororwa pachena. Nyanzvi munezvikuongorora zvirwere zvemagomarara VaLyman Khumbula zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaongororwe vachiti vazhinji vari kuzobatwa gomarara radzika midzi. Gomarara rezamu ndiro rinonzi rinoteverera gomarara remuromo wechibereko mukuraya madzimai. Mwedzi waGumiguru ndiwo unocherechedzwa chirwere chegomarara remazamu gore negore. No media source currently available

headline: Kusagadzirisa Zvipatara Ndiko Kunonzi Kwakapa Kuti VaMugabe neVamwe Vatungamiri veAfrica Vafire Kunze
text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika muchakabvu Robert Mugabe vakashaya kuSingapore vachirapwa chirwere chegomarara muna 2018 vari kurangarirwa zvakasiyana nevana veZimbabwe nevekunze. VaMugabe vakaita sevamwe vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanoenda kunorapwa nekufira kunze kwenyika dzavo vanosanganisira vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia, VaMichael Sata vakafira kuLondon, vaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi zvekare VaLevy Mwanawasa vakashaikira kuFrance, mutungamiri wehurumende yeEthiopia VaMeles Zenawi vakashaikira kuBelgium, VaOmar Bongo vekuGabon vakashaikira kuSpain nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paFriends University kuKansas Dr Moses Rumano vaudza Studio 7 kuti veruzhinji vanorangarira VaMugabe zvakasiyana siyana sezvo kune rimwe divi vane mabasa avakabata akasimudzira nyika senyaya yedzidzo nenyaya yekupa ivhu kuvatema kunyengwe hazvo chirongwa ichi chisina kunyatso itwa zvakanaka. Kune rimwe divi vanorangarirwa semutongi aitonga nedemo uye asina kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakadayi sezvipatara nehupfumi hwenyika zvakazokonzera kuti vasarapwe munyika nevana vavakapa dzidziso yepamusoro, "Zvinosiririsa kuti VaMugabe vakazoshaikira kuSingapore, dai vakange vakagadzirisa zvipatara panguva yehutongi hwavo vakarapirwa munyika vachipepwa nevana vevhu avo vakapa dzidzo yakanaka asi ikazoparadzwa nehuwori nehutongi husiri wejeketrere," Dr Rumano vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available Vamwe vemhuri yavo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Grace Mugabe nevana vavo vari kuSingapore kwakashaikira VaMugabe parizvino vachivarangarira.

headline: Makobvu neMatete Okandiranwa Muparamende neNyaya yaVaDzamara
text: Muparamende makandiranwa makobvu nematete nhengo dzeparamende dzichibvunza gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara. VaMnangagwa, avo vanova zvakare mutevedzeri wekutanga wemutungamiri wenyika, vati vari kushushukanawo nekushaikwa kwaVaDzamara. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandiswa zvakadzama pakuranga vakapamba VaDzamara. Mutauriri vemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vanoti vari kuferefeta nyaya iyi. Pamboita runyerekupe rwekuti VaDzamara vange vari mumaoko emapurisa kuHarare Central Police Station. Asi gweta raVaDzamara, VaCharles Kwaramba, vati mapurisa avaudza kuti vachiri mubishi kutsvaga VaDzamara. VaDzamara vakapambwa neMuvhuro muGlen View nevanhu vaive mumotokari yemhando yeIsuzu. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Zvekare
text: Sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association ranyora tsamba kuhurumende richiizivisa kuti vanachiremba vari kuzombomira kuenda kubasa sezvo mari dzavo dzisisakwane. Vanachiremba vanoti mitengo yezvinhu zvose yawedzerwa asi mari yavo yemihoro isina kuwedzerwa. Vanachiremba ava vanoti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira munhaurirano dzemari dzavanotambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba iri, Doctor Peter Magombeyi, vanoti basa vanoda asi zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo zvekuti havachakwanisi kuenda kubasa nekuomerwa nezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Okurudzira Vanhu Kugara Kumba neMugovera
text: Mapato mana makuru anopikisa akurudzira neChishanu veruzhinji munyika kuti vacherechedze zuva rakawana nyika kuzvitonga neMugovera vari kudzimba dzavo achiti haazi kuzopinda mumhemberero dzakarongwa nehurmende yeZanu PF sezvo bato iri richishandisa mukana uyu kunyomba vamwe. No media source currently available Mapato aya anoti MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Mavambo Kusile Dawn, ZAPU neNational Consitutional Assembly anoti zvinosuwisa kuti vammwe vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vave kushungurudza vamwe vavo vechitema. Vachiverenga mashoko emapato ayo pachiitiko chapindwa naVaTsvangirai nemukuru weMKD VaSimba Makoni, munyori kukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati hapana chekupemberera sesvo vanhu vari kuyaura nenhamo nenzara. Vatiwo mapato avo azvipira kushanda pamwe chete kuti asunungure vanhu kubva kuhutongi hweZanu PF. Vakurudzira vanhu kuti vacherechedza zuva iri mudzvimba dzavo sezvo pasina chikonzero chekuenda kumhemberero dzinorongwa neZanu PF mumatunhu akasisyana siyana munyika. VaTsvangirai vati vaimbosienda kumhemberero idzi apo vaive muhurumende yemubatanidzwa asi vakazowona kuti hazvibatsiri sezvo vainyombwa pamhemberero idzi. Mutauririri weNCA, VaMaddock Chivasa,vati kutambura kuri kuita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichenda kunze kwenyika uko zviri kushungurudzwa sezviri kuitika kuSouth Africa pari zvino kunoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hanya nezvido zveveruzhinji. Asi bato ReZanu PF rinoti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munyika uye richaita mhemberero kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare apo mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanotarisirwa kutaura. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanoti mhemberero idzi dzichaitwa pasi pedingindira rinosimbaradza kubatana, runyararo pamwe nekuzvida seznyika. Makurukota ematunhu anotarisirwawo kutaura mashoka aVaMugabe mumatunhu ese munyika.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Choshura Mare neKurima Bindu muSouth Africa
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muSouth Africa chiri kushura mare nekurima miriwo yendudzi dzakasiyanasiyana, izvo zvave kuchipa raramo yachakanga chisingatarisire muhupenyu hwacho mushure mekumboomerwa nezvinhu munyika iyi. VaLeonie Kuchakanya, avo vane makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa, vanoti vakafunga kutamba nevhu mushure mekunge vaona kuti zviroto zvemafuro manyoro vari muSouth Africa zvakanga zvisiri kubereka michero. VaKuchakanya, avo vanobva kuMasvingo asi vakakurira mumusha weOld Highfield muHarare, vanoti pavakapinda munyika iyi vaive netarisiro yepamusoro sevakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe, asi izvi handizvo zvakaitika, izvo zvakazoita kuti vashande mabasa akawanda asi hazvina kugadzirisa matambudziko avo. Vaona kuti zvinhu zviri kuramba kubatana, vanoti vakazofunga kuedza mamwe mabhindauko izvo zvakazoita kuti muna 2016 vatsvage nzvimbo yekurima muPretoria, uko vakawana gombo ravakatotanga kugobora voga. Mushure memakore mashanu, VaKuchakanya vanoti vave kudya cheziya ravo sezvo vave mumwe wevarimi vepamusoro vari kuwanisa vanhu muriwo wendudzi dzinosanganisira makabheji, tsunga, hanyanisi, matomati nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vanoti vanhu vanotenga zvirimwa zvavo vanobva muPretoria nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza, kusanganisirawo neguta reJohannesburg, uko vakawanda vanobva vachinohodha zvekuzotengesawo mberi. Asi VaKuchakanya vanoti hausi mutserendende nguva dzose mubasa ravo sezvo vari kusangana nedambudziko guru rembavha dziri kuvashanyira dzichifunga kuti vari kuchengeta mari mumba. Vanotiwo munguva ino yechirimo vanosangana nedambudziko remvura, izvo zvinoita kuti vade kuisa bhohoro kana mukana wacho wawanikwa. Vanokurudzirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvishande nesimba kunyange munguva yekuomerwa, pane kuti zvitsvage ruramo kuburikidza nekuita mabasa erima. No media source currently available

headline: Chin'ono Oramba Ari Mutirongo Kusvika Musi wa 7 Nyamavhuvhu
text: Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Hopewell Chin’ono, anyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti atongwe achibva kumba kwake. Chin’ono, uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga musi wa31 Chikunguru, anzi adzoke kudare musi wa7 Nyamavhuvhu. Vachipa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaChin’ono, mutongi wedare, VaNgoni Nduna, vati kana Chin’ono akapihwa mukana wekubhara mari yechibatiso anogona kuramba achikurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire nechisimba achishandisa dandemutande rake reTwitter. Vati veruzhinji havazovimbinematare kana akamuburitsa kuti atongwe achibva kumba nekuti izvi zvinogona kuisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji munjodzi sezvo zuva rekuratidzira racho risati rasvika. Vati padandemutande rake reTwitter, Chin’ono akanyora kuti sarudzo pamwe nematare hazviunze shanduko munyika uye akaisa mashoko pa Twitter yake ekukurudzira kuti veruzhinji varatidzire nechisimba.
