Gweta guru raChin’ono, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vanga vaudza dare kuti Chin’ono munhu ane kodzero yekupihwa wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, asi VaNduna varamba kuzvitambira vakapa mutongo wanga wakurudzirwa nevachuchisi vwhurumende. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaDoug Coltart, vanyora paTwitter yavo kuti vachapikisa mudare repamusoro mutongo wapihwa Chin’ono wekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso Chin’ono ari kuramba nyaya yaari kupomerwa achiti iye chake akangoburitsa mashoko ari kutaurwa nevarongi vekuratidzira kwemusi wa31 Chikunguru, veTransform Zimbabwe. Chin’ono akasungwa pamwe chete nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume. VaNgarivhume, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva imwe chete naChin’ono, vakanyimwawo mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nemusi weChina uye nyaya yavo ichaenderera mberi musi wa14 Nyamavhuvhu. Mune imwewo nyaya, meya veHarare, VaHebert Gomba, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa hosifi yavo zvisiri pamutemo apo vanonzi vakanyora tsamba vachiti vamwe vanhu vapihwe masitendi, vanyimwawo mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitirakuti nyaya yavo itongwe vachibva kumba. Mutongi wedare, Amai Bianca Makwande, vati vanobvumirana nevachuchusi kuti kana vakabatwa nemhosva, VaGomba vanogona kukandwa mujeri kwenguva yakareba. Rimwe remagweta aVaGomba, VaHarrision Nkomo, vati chimwe chikonzero chaita kuti VaGomba vanyimwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inyaya yekuti vanzi vanogona kukanganisa vafakazi. VaNkomo vati vave kuenda kudare repamusoro kunotsvaga mutongo wekuti VaGomba vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Bato raVaGomba reMDC Alliance raratidza kusafara nemabatirwo akaitwa VaGomba pavakasungwa. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere, vati havasi kufara zvachose nemasungirwo akaitwa VaGomba. Vatiwo havakwanisi kutaura zvakawanda sezvo nyaya ichiri mumatare. VaGomba vakasungwa nemusi weMuvhuro vakazounzwa kudare neChina. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kuitira Kuti Mari Iri Kunze Zvisiri paMutemo Idzoke
text: Bhanga guru renyika razivisa neChitata kuti pane matanho ari kutorwa kudzora mari dzakabudiswa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo, uye imwe yemari yacho yakatodzoka munyika. No media source currently available Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti dzinotyira kuti hurumende ichatadza kudzora mari yese yakabuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mari iyi yakaburitswa nevanhu vane chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura muHarare mushure mekubuda kwenyaya yekuti pane zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvaichengeta mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe emadhora mubanga reHSBC kuSwitzerland, iro riri kunzi raishanda richityora mitemo yekufambiswa kwemari zvakanaka pasi rose, mukuru weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vati hurumende iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti mari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemitemo yadzorwa munyika. VaMangudya vati patori nehurongwa hwekudzora mari idzi, uye dzimwe dzemari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemutemo, dzatova munyika. VaMangudya vazivisa kuti mamiriyoni zana emadhora ange iri kunze kwenyika zviri kunze kwemutemo yakatodza zvichitevera zvisungo zvebhanga ravo zvekuregerera nekupa mukana kune avo vari kuchengeta mari kunze zvisiri pamutemo kuti vaidzore. Vati mamiririyoni makumi matanhatu nemasere emari iyi akatodzoka uye bhanga ravo riri kuramba richitaura nevanhu nemakambani anochengeta mari zviri kunze kwemutemo kuti adzore mari iyi. Asi varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya yeHSBC vachiti pari zvino vachiri kuongorora kwakabva mari yevanhu vanonzi vaichengeta mari kubhanga iri. Pasi pemutemo zvizvarwa zvemuno zvinoshanda kunze kwenyika zvinobvumidzwa kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika. Asi mutemo haubvumidze kuti vanoshandira munyika kana vemabhizimisi emuZimbabwe vachengetedze mari kunze kwenyika vasina kupihwa mvumo neRBZ. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vakamboshanda kubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati mari iyi ichanentsa kudzoka kwayo. Vati izvi zvaiitwa nevakuru vakuru muhurumende nemunyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye hapana anokwanisa kuti vadzore mari idzi. Vatiwo panofanira kudzikwa mitemo inopa masimba kubhanga guru renyika kuitira kuti rinongorore mapindiro nemabudiro emari munyika. Vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzehufpumi uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinotoda kuti veRBZ kuti vasunge dzisimbe kuti mari iyi idzoke kumusha. Asi VaMangudya vati vane mari dzichiri kunze vanosanganisira vaye vasina kuunza mari mushure mekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, vakatanga kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika vasina mvumo yeRBZ pamwe nevaya vaiita bhizimisi munyika asi vachinochengeta mari yavo kunze kwenyika. VaMangudya vati pave nezvizvarwa zvakawanda zvemuZimbabwe zvinogara kunze kwenyika uye zvizhinji zvavo zvave kutumira mari kumusha. Vati mari inotomirwa nezvizvarwa zviri kunze kwenyika yakakwira kusvika pa$840 million gore rapfuura, kubva pa$790 million muna 2013.

headline: Mari Inonzi neCCZ Inodiwa neMhuri paMwedzi Inonzi Inotambirwa neVashandi Vashoma Kwazvo
text: Sangano reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinoti kusvika musi wa 09 Chikumi, unove mwedzi uno, mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu yaida madhora emunyika zviuru makumi mana nemazana matanhatu ane makumi masere nemaviri, kana kuti RTGS$40 682.84, kuti ikwanise kurarama. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mari iyoyo iri kutaurwa neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe yatove pasi kwazvo pachitariswa kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. VaMutasa vanoti iyo mari yacho yaidiwa nemhuri kuti irarame hakuna mushandi ari kuitambira sezvo vashandi vari kupiwa mihoro iri pasi kwazvo isina chaichatenga. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, avo vanoti mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu yave kutoda mari inoita madhora zviuru zvishanu pamwedzi kuti ikwanise kurara nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezviinhu. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vanorarama nekutengesa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanotiwo dambudziko rekushaya mari inokwanira mhuri ratonyanya munyika nekuda kwekuti vazhinji vave kuzvishandira. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti mari yakataurwa neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe inoratidza kuti mutengo wekurarama muZimbabwe uri kuramba uchikwira, zvikuru mushure mekudzikwa kwemutemo weStatutory Instrument 127. Doctor Chitambara vanotiwo mihoro iri kutambirwa nevashandi vakawanda mumapoka mazhinji iri kure kwazvo pachitariswa mari inonzi inodiwa nemhuri yevanhu vatanhatu iyi. Vanoti semuenzaniso, vashandi vemuboka rezvekurima vari kutambira madhora zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu kana kuti RTGS$3 696.00 pamwedzi, kuchitiwo vari muboka remachira vachitambira madhora zviuru gumi nezitatu pamwedzi, (RTGS$13 000.00), vari mukuvaka vachinziwo vari kutambira madhora zviuru zvisere, kana kuti RTGS$8 000.00. Doctor Chitambara vanoti mari iyi ishoma zvikuru pane inonzi neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe inodiwa kuti mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu vararame iyi. Saka dambudziko iri ringagadziriswa sei? VaShamuyarira vanoti chasara chinofanirwa kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe kubatana kwevashandi pamwe nevarimi voenda kuhurumende, kwete nnechinangwa chekuibvisa pachigaro, asi kuti vagare pasi vataurirane vese voisa misoro pamwechete. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, kuti tinzwewo kuti vanoti kudii namararamiro anonzi ari kuita vashandi aya sezvo vanga vasiiri kudaira nharembozha yavo, uye vanga vasati vapindura mubvunzo wedu pataenda pamhepo. Nhaurirano dzemihoro pakati pevashandi nevashandirwi kusanganisirawo vashandi vehurumende, dzinonziwo nevashandi hadzisi kuburitsa chimuko sezvo dzisina kwadziri kuenda. Nekuda kwaizvozvo, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti vashandi vacharamba vachinoga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

headline: MaUnder-19 oenda kuWorld Cup
text: ZIMBABWE Cricket (ZC) yakadoma chikwata chemadzimai cheUnder-19 chichanokwikwidza kumutambo weInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Under-19 Women’s T20 World Cup kuSouth Africa.   Mutambo weICC Under-19 Women’s World Cup uchatanga nemusi wa14 Ndira uye uchizopera nemusi wa29 Ndira.   Zimbabwe yakaiswa muboka reGroup B rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti England, Pakistan neRwanda.   Muchinyorwa, ZC inoti chikwata chakasarudzwa naTrevor Phiri kuenda kumutambo uyu chichatungamirirwa naKelis Ndlovu uyo anove kaputeni.   Ndlovu mumwe wevatambi vecricket vechidzimai vari kusimukira munyika uye nguva pfupi yadarika, akambonomirira Zimbabwe achitambira chikwata chevakuru.   Izvi zvakamuona achitamba mumutambo weICC Women’s T20 World Cup Qualier 2022 kuUnited Arab Emirates munaGunyana gore radarika.   Kumutambo weUnder-19 World Cup, kuchange kuine zvikwata 16 izvo zvakaiswa mumapoka mana ezvikwata zvina.   Muboka rega-rega, muchabuda zvikwata zviviri zvichazonokwikwidza kuSuper Six League zvichirwira kupinda mufainari yemutambo uyu.   Zimbabwe mumutambo wekutanga ichasangana neEngland nemusi wa15 Ndira, yozosangana neRwanda nemusi wa17 Ndira uye mutambo wekupedzisira wemuboka iri ichatatsurana nePakistan nemusi wa19 Ndira.   Chikwata cheZimbabwe chichaenda kuWorld Cup kuSouth Africa chine vatambi vanotevera: Kelis Ndhlovu (kaputeni), Kelly Ndiraya, Kay Ndiraya, Adel Zimunhu, Natasha Mutomba, Vimbai Mutungwindu, Danielle Meikle, Tawananyasha Marumani, Michelle Mavunga, Olinda Chare, Kudzai Chigora, Betty Mangachena, Chipo Moyo, Faith Ndhlalambi naRukudzo Mwakayeni.

headline: Mutemo weBritain Unorambidza Vanobva kuZimbabwe Unonzi Unobata Vashanyi Chete.
text: Gweta vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF kuBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende yeBritain rekumborambidza vanhu vanobva kuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica rakangonangana nevanhu vanenge vachida kushanyira nyika iyi, kwete vanenge vaine magwaro ekugara pamwe nekushanda muBritain. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvagara zviine mabasa azvo kana kudzidza muBritain, uye zvine magwaro ekuzvarwa enyika mbiri idzi zvakabatwa nemutemo uyu zviri kunze kweBritain zvinokwanisa kudzokera zvisina dambudziko kana zvichingokwanisa kuzadzisa zvinodiwa nemiutemo wekudzivirira kuparadzirwa kweCovid-19. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakazivisa kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti hurumende yawo yakadzika mutemo unomborambidza vashanyi vanobva kuZimbabwe pamwe nedzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica kupinda muBritain, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata zvakasimba dunhu reSADC, kusanganisirawo neZimbabwe. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvichiri kunze kweBritain zviri kuda kunzwisisa nekujekeserwa pamusoro pemutemo uyu. Asi vanoti danho ratorwa neBritain iri rakanaka chose sezvo rcihidzivirira kupararira kwedenda ranetsa pasi rose iri. No media source currently available

headline: Kudomwa kweMagamba eNyika Kokonzera Mutauro
text: Munyika mune makakatanwa akasimba panyaya yekuti muimbi ane mukurumbira, Comrade Chinx, igamba here kana kuti kwete. Bato reZanu-PF rakati igamba rehondo kana kuti liberation war hero nekudaro haakwanise kuvigwa pamarinda eHeroes Acre nuHarare. Asi vemhuri uye vesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vanoti Chinx aive gamba. Kunyange hazvo mhuri yaChinx yainge yakumbira kuti Politburo yeZanu PF izeye nyaya iyi zvakare, mutauriri webato reZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vati hapana kudududza pachisungo chakaitwa. Izvi zvasiya vanhu vakawanda vaine mibvunzo pamusoro pezvinoreva gamba renyika chairo, uye kuti ndiyani anofanira kunge achisarudza magamba aya sezvo kuvigwa kwemagamba aya kuchishandiswa mari yehurumende inobhadharwa mitero nevanhu kwete mari yeZanu-PF. Nhengo yeZanu-PF ichimirira Chikanga-Dangamvura mudare reparamende VaEsau Mupfumi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havaone chakaipa pakusarudzwa, kwemagamba nebato ravo. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti masarudzirwo ari kuitwa magamba haana kunaka. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vanoita VaJonathan Moyo Gurukota reDzidzo yePamusoro
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neMuvhuro vakavandudza zvishoma dare ravo remakurukota vachibvisa VaJonathan Moyo kubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, vachivaita gurukota rinoona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro. Vanga vari gurukota redzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vava gurukota rezvemvura nezviwanikwa. Vatora basa ranga richiitwa naVaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vava gurukota idzva rezvematunhu, vachitora basa ranga richiitwa naVaIgnatius Chombo. VaChombo vava gurukota rezvemukati menyika, vachitora basa ranga richiitwa naVaKembo Mohadi, avo vatora basa raiitwa nevakadzingwa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, avo vanga vari gurukota rezvevasori. Brigadier General Ambrose Mutinhiri vave kutora chigaro chaVa Joel Biggie Matiza chekuva gurukota rezvedunhu reMashonaland East. VaMatiza havana rimwe basa idzva ravapihwa. Amai Nyasha Chikwinya ndivo vava gurukota rezvemadzimai. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, ndivo vari kufanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko zvichitevera kubviswa kwaVaMoyo. Amai Mupfumira vanoti vachabata chigaro ichi kusvika VaMugabe vatoresa gurukota idzva mhiko. No media source currently available Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zvaiitwa naVaMugabe kungopedzera hoko padehwe retsindi sezvo dare ravo remakurukota risina njere dzekunyukura nyika mumadhaka mairi. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, vanotiwo VaMoyo kwavaenda kuchavapa mukana wekuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzedzidzo, vachitiwo hapana zvavanotarisira zvitsva kuhurongwa hwaitwa naVaMugabe. VaRuhanya vanoti munhu anofanirwa kuvandudzwa ndivo VaMugabe pachavo, kwete zvavari kuita pamakurukota avo.. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozengurira Kudzinga Vashandi Vayo Vasati Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 seZvayanga Yavimbisa
text: Vashandi vakawanda vehurumende vasati vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 neMuvhuro vakaenda kubasa zvisinei nemutemo wechimbi chimbi wehurumende wekuti vange vasati vabayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa 15 Gumiguru vamire kuenda kubasa vachinziwo havasi kuzotambiriswa mari dzemihoro Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende haisi kuzodududza padanho iri kunyangwe ichitambira zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vasati vabayiwa. Vati vanogara kunzvimbo dzisati dzasvika nhomba vanofanira kunge vabayiwa musi wa 31 Zvita usati wadarika. Vayambira vari kutsika madziro kuti vachadzingwa basa. Asi mutauriri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Conferderation of Public Sector Trade Union, VaGibson Mushangu vati hurumende haifanire kuita zano ndega panyaya iyi vachiti havasi kuziviswa kuti zvii zviri kuitwa kuvashandi. VaMushangu vati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabaiwe nhomba kuti vazvidzivirira kubva kuCovid-19, hurumende inofanirawo kukoshesa kuwedzera vashandi mari dzemihoro. Mutungamiriri we Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 vati kunyangwe hazvo vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzibayiwe nhomba, parizvino vari kukurudzira nhengo dzisina kubayiwa kuti dziende kumabasa vachitiwo hurumende haisi kutarisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzisina kuenda asi vakadzikurudzira kuti dziende kubasa mangwana. VaZhou vati pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zviri kuita kuti varairidzi vasabaiwe nhomba. VaZhou vati sekuziva kwavo, varairidzi vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu chete ndivo vega vabaiwa nhomba mbiri uye varairidzi vanodarika zviuru zana havasati vatambo baiwa nhomba yekutanga. Mutauriri mubazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati bazi rehutano ndiro rinoziva kuti varairidzi vangana vakabaiwa nhomba asi vakati zvikamu makumi mapfumbabwe kubva muzana zvevarairidzi vese munyika zviri kuenda kubasa. Sangano guru revashandi reZCTU rakaenda kumatare richiti kumanikidza vashandi kubayiwa nhomba kutyora bumbiro remutemo asi nyaya iyi yakanzi haisi nechimbi chinbi nematare. Hurumende yakaburitsa mutemo wekuti vanhu vabayiwe kuburikidza negwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette.

headline: Vadhomeni Vanoti Hurumende Haisi Kukoshesa Mabasa Avo
text: Sangano rinomirira vanoshanda mubazi rezvekurima, re Zimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA), rinoti vashandi vebazi iri, zvikuru sei vadhomeni, vanofanirwa kupiwa mari yerubatsiro, kana kuti ‘risk allowance’, panguva ino yekurwisana necoronavirus sezvo basa ravo richivamanikidza kusangana nekushanda nevanhu vakasiyana siyana. Munyori mukuru weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvo hurumende yakapa varairidzi mari yekubatsirikana panguva iyi, haifanirwi kusarudza vashandi vainobatsira, naizvozvo hurumende inofanirwa kuziva kuti vadhomeni vanodavo rubatsiro rwakadai. VaZhou vati sangano ravo harisikufara nemabatirwo arikuitwa nyaya yezvimidhudhudhu zvinofanirwa kushandiswa nevadhomeni, vachiti vadhomeni vazhinji vari kushaya mari yokuenda kumahofisi eCMED kunotora zvimidhudhudhu izvi. VaZhou vati pane zvizhinji zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa mubazi iri, vachiti vanokurudzira hurumende kuti itarisise nekugadzirisa zvirikuitika mubazi iri kuti vashandi vaite basa ravo zvakanaka. Tatadza kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi iri, VaGibson Chijarira, sezvo mharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwi. Tichienda pamhepo, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. No media source currently available

headline: VaGumbo Vopomerwa Dzimwe Mhosva neZaac
text: Gurukota muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Va Joram Gumbo, vanonzi havana kumiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva sezvange zvakatarisirwa zvichitevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa neMuvhuro neZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, Zaac. Asi VaGumbo vambosvika havo kumatare edzimhosva kwechinguva, ndokubva vadzoserwa zvakare kumahofisi eZaac. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kugweta raVaGumbo, VaSelby Hwacha, kuti nyaya iyi iri kufamba seyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muZaac vaudza Studio7 kuti VaGumbo vari kupomerwa dzimwe mhosva pamusoro pemhosva dzavakasungirwa neMuvhuro. Vatiwo ichokwadi kuti VaGumbo havana kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva sezvo pamuka dzimwe mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. VaGumbo vakasungwa neZaac vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori panguva iyo vaive gurukota rezvekufambiswa kwezvinhu munyika. VaGumbo vanonzi vakaita zvehuori apo vakashandisa imba yehanzvadzi yavo, Mavis Gumbo, kuti ishandiswe semahofisi ekambani yeZimbabwe Airways, iyo vanonzi vakaita kuti iumbwe muna 2012 apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. VaGumbo vanonziwo vakanyorera bhanga guru renyika musi wa 10 Nyamavhuvhu 2017 vachiriudza kuti rikweretese kambani yeZimbabwe Airways mari inoita miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora ekuAmerica. Musi wa 21 Nyamavhuvhu 2017, VaGumbo vanonzi vakazivisa kuti mari yakanga yabva kubhanga guru renyika ishandiswe mukubhadhara rendi yemba yaMuzvare Gumbo, uye imwe yacho kuti ishandiswe mukuvakiridza imba iyi. Hurumende inoti zvakare musi wa 12 Gunyana 2017, kambani yeZimbabwe Airways yakaisa mari inoita miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora ekuAmerica mubhanga rekambani yeMaclaten Holdings, inova kambani yemwanasikana waMuzvare Mavis Moyo, Clara Rachel Mudzami. Hurumende inoti zvakaitwa naVaGumbo zvaive kunze kwemutemo, uye zvisingatarisirwe kuitwa nemunhu mukuru muhurumende.

headline: VaBiti Vanoti Kudzika Mutemo weKutara Mitengo Kunoratidza Kuti Njuga dzeHupfumi Dzoremera VaMthuli Ncube
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, avo vakambove gurukota rezvemari, vanoti mutemo wechimbi chimbi wakadzikwa nehurumende wekutara mitengo yezvinhu munongedzo wekuti Zimbabwe yatadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mashoko aya anopesana nezviri kutaurwa negurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vakaudza vanoita zvekushanyirwa kwenyika svondo rapera kuti hupfumi hwagadzikana uye mutemo uyu unobatsira kuzvisimbaradza. Svondo rapera hurumende yakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi kana kuti Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Financial Laws Amendment) Regulations 127 of 2021 unosungira vemabhizimisi vose kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica wepamusika weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Foreign Currency Auction kwete pamukoto. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau masangano anomirira vemabhizimisi akaita seZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries neEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe anoti mutemo uyu uri kuomesera vemabhizimisi vakawanda sezvo vasiri kukwanisa kuwana mari pamusika weRBZ uyu. VaBiti vanoti vanowiriranawo neveZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vakakwira kudare repamusoro nemusi weChina vachipikisa mutemo mutsva uyu vachiri unotyora bumbiro remutemo. No media source currently available Ko masimba ekuti mutungamiri wenyika adzike mitemo zvechimbi chimbi pasina kuenda kudare reparamende unoshanda sei chaizvo? Gweta VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka avo vanombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye vakasarudzwawo nemusi weChina kuva sachigaro webhodhi rePetrotrade rinoona nezvemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari vanoti hapana chakaipa pamutemo uyu sezvo uchishandiswawo nenyika dzakawanda dzakaita seAmerica sezvo kuenda kudare reparamende kuchigona kutora nguva. No media source currently available  .

headline: Mbatya Tsaru Dzorambidzwa Kupinda Munyika
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamassa, vaparura hurongwa hwavo hwekuongorora mashandiro ari kuita hupfumi kana kuti mid term fiscal policy review. No media source currently available Mukuparura chirongwa ichi, VaChinamasa vanoti vatora matanho akawanda akanangana nekusimudzira maindasitiri nekuwezdera mari yehurumende. Vchitura muparamende hurongwa hwepakati pegore hwemafambisirwo emari, VaChimanasa vati kunyange hazvo paine mitero yakakura pashangu nembatya tsaru, zvinhu zvange zviri kuramba zvichipinzwa munyika uye zvava kukanganisa maindasitiri emuno. Vati kutanga mwedzi unouya, zvinhu izvi zvinenge zvisisabvumidzwe kupinda munyika, uye zvikabatwa zvichatorwa nekuparadzwa. Vatiwo zvinhu zvakaita semafuta nesipo hazvichabvumidzwe kupinda munyika, sezvo nyika iri kuzvigadzira. Vati mbatya zhinji idzi dzinounza zvirwere munyika. VaChinamasa vawedzera mitero yemotokari tsaru dzinotengwa kunze kwenyika kana kuti surtax charge kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. Mari iyi inobhadharwa pamusoro peimwe yeduty inove zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri ichasandura mutemo kuti machechi anoita mabasa ekutsvaga mari kana kuti profit abhadhare mutero kana kuti tax. Asi vati mari yechegumi nezvipo haisi kuzobhadhariswa mutero. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kushishakana nenyaya yekuti mari zhinji yairi kuwana iri kuenda mukubhadhara vashandi nekudaro dare remakurukota rakatora danho rekuti mari inoenda kuvashandi inofanira kuderedzwa kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti kurumende iwane mari yekushandisa mumabasa ebudiriro. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutongo wakapihwa nedare repamusoro reSupreme Court unopa vashandirwi samba rekudzinga vashandi mushure mekuvapa chiziviso chemwedzi mutatu chete wakauya panguva iyo hurumende yange iri kuronga kuvandudza mitemo yevashandi kuti inakire vashandi nevashandirwi. Vati kuvandudzwa kwemutemo wevashandi kunofanira kuitwa pachitarisirwa kuti unofanira kupa mukana wekuti makambani akawanise kushanda zvakanaka vachiti pari zvino makambani akawanda ane zvikwereti zvemari yevashandi izvo zvinoatadzisa kuita basa nemazvo. Vapa semuenzaniso kambani yeZiscosteel iyo vati kunyange yakavhara makore akati kuti apfuura, mari dzevashandi dziri kuramba dzichiwedzera. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hausi kuita zvakanaka uye izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti mabasa ekurima haasi kufamba zvakanaka uyewo maindasitiri haasikuita zvakanaka sezvo zvichidhura kuita bhizimisi munyika nekuda kwekudhura kwemari, nekudhura kwezvinhu zvakaita semagetsi nemvura. VaChinamasa vatiwo nekuda kwekusashanda zvakanaka kwehupfumi, hurumende yave kutarisira kuwana $3.6 billion gore rino kubva pane $3.9 billion yavange vachitarisira. VaChinamasa vati hurumende pamwe nevanhu vanofanira kuchinja maitiro avo kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubudirire. Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vemabhizimisi reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti matanho atorwa naVaChinamasa ekuchengetedza maindasitiri emuno akanaka chose uye vanoatsgira. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende ideredze mari inoenda kuvashandi vachiti izvi zvinoipa mukana wekuita zvirongwa zvebudiriro. Mukuru weConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vatiwo vanotsigirawo matanho atorwa naVaChinamasa. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, pamwe nemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanga vari muparamende vachinzwa VaChinamasa vachitaura

headline: Hurumende Yotatarika Kutenga Mafuta eKufambisa Motokari
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo makambani anotenga mafuta edzimotokari ari kuti ari kutadza kuwana mari kubva kubhanga guru renyika rereserve bank of Zimbabwe. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemhando dzemoto VaPatson Mbiriri vanoti hurumende iri kuita chipatapa kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuti munyika musaite dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Izvi kumwana weZimbabwe inenge yave nhamo yechikwepa kuti uku chakarumwa uku chinotsva. Parizvino vanhu vari kuswera vakamira mumitsetse kutsvaga mari kumabhanga. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Dangamvura-Chikanga mudare reparamende uye vaine mabhazi VaEsau Mupfumi vanoti vanhu vekuManicaland vanenge vange vogara havo vachienda kunotenga mafuta kuMozambique uko mutengo wacho wakaderera. VaMupfumi vati havo zvinonetsa kuziva kuti mafuta aya haakanganise here dzimotokari. Vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti hurumende ichagadzirisa dambudziko iri risati rakomba. Mutungamiri weconfederation of Zimbabwe industries VaBusisa Moyo vanoti dambudziko iri rikasagadziriswa zvichaomera vemabhizmisi. Vatiwo pane makambani akawanda achatatarika sezvo achishandisawo mafuta aya. Vakawanda vari kushamisikawo kuti sei zimbabwe iri kutatarika nekushaya mafuta edzimotokari iyo iine kambani yemafuta enzimbe yeGreen Fuel? Vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto VaElton Mangoma vave kutungamira bato reRDZ vanoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yakanganisa chirongwa ichi. Ko chii chingaitwe nehurumende kuti dambudziko iri ripere? VaMangoma vanoti hurumende yaVaMugabe yaremerwa nemutoro wekutungamira nyika. Nyaya yekushomeka kwemafuta iyi hachisi chinhu chitsva muZimbabwe. Kubva muna 2000 pachine kambani yehurumende yenoczim zvinhu zvainetsa zvichikonzerwa kunnyaya nenyaya yehuori nekushomeka kwemari yekunze. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti dambudziko iri rikasagadzirwa nechimbichimbi hupfumi hwenyika hunogwadama.

headline: Vagari Voita Maonero Akasiyana Pane Zviri Kuitika muBulawayo
text: Vagari vemuBulawayo vari kuita maonero akasiyana siyana panyaya yezviri kuitika mukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo, vamwe vachiti zviri kukonzerwa nehuwori, vamwe vachiti zviri kukonzerwa nerusarura rudzi. Mutauro unotyisa wakasimudza musoro zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nemutevedzeri wameya weguta iri, VaTinashe Kambarami, rekumisa basa munyori weguta, VaChristopher Dube, masvondo mashoma apfuura vachivapomera mhosva dzakati kuti. Izvi zvakapa kuti vamwe vatsigira vaVaDube, vabude pachena vachishora VaKambarami, vamwe vachiti sezvo VaKambarami vari muShona, vaifanirwa kubva mukanzuru yeguta, vachiti verudzi rweNdebele chete ndivo vanofanira kupinda mukanzuru iyi. Izvi zvakaita kuti zvinhu zvishate vanhu vakawanda vachisimudzira nyaya yerusarura rudzi, asi vamwe vachiti dambudziko reguta raikonzerwa nehuori huri mukanzuru. Meya weguta, VaSolomon Mguni, vakazopindira vachimisa kumiswa basa kwaVaDube, asi vakati nyaya iri kupomerwa VaDube inofanirwa kuferefetwa nemazvo. Mutungamiri wesangano reHabakkuk Trust, iro rinoshanda mukuvaka runyararo muvanhu, VaDumisani Nkomo, vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti nyaya yerusarurarudzi yakasimudzwa nemakakatanwa aya, ine chekuita nekusagadziriswa zvizere kwenyaya yeGukurahundi, uyewo kusarira kumashure kunonzi kwakaita matunhu eMatabeleland. Mudzidzisi wezvekuvakwa kwerunyararo nebudiriro, VaDonwell Dube, vachitaura semuongorori akazvimirira, vanoti panoda kunyatsoitwa tsvakurudzo yakakwana yekuti makakatanwa ari kuitika aya, ari kunyatsokonzerwa nei, vachitiwo nhoroondo yekuve nezvichemo zvisingagadziriswi nehurumende, zvinhu zvinogona kuve zvimwe zvezvikonzero. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, boka remadzimai eMDC emudunhu reBulawayo, rakashora kwarakati kukurudzirwa kwekupesana kwevanhu pachishandiswa marudzi kuri kuitwa muguta iri. Mukuru weAffirmative Action Group muBulawayo, VaReginald Shoko, vanoti sangano ravo rave nenguva richitaura nezvehuwori hwavanoti hwave nenguva huchiitika. Asi VaShoko vanoti vanoshora zvikuru nyaya yekupatsanurwa kwemarudzi. Mufundisi, uye vari mukuru wechikwata chinonzi Save Bulawayo Campaign, icho chakaita musangano nezuro waikurudzira kuti makanzura eBulawayo abviswe, kugadzwe komishini, VaAnglistone Sibanda, vanoti havakurudziri nyaya yerusarurarudzi. Mukuru weBulawayo Progressive Residents Association, VaAmbrose Sibindi, vanotiwo zviri kuitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo hazvinei nerusarurarudzi, asi kuti huwori uri pachena. VaSibindi vanoti zvakakosha kuti makanzuru asati asarudzwa, vave vanhu vanoziikanwa hunhu hwavo munzvimbo dzavanogara. VaSibindi vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vagari vasarudze zvine huchenjeri makanzura avo kuitira kudzivirira huwori, kana kutadza kuita basa nemazvo. Vanhu vane chitsama vakataura pamusangano wanezuro vakaratidzawo kusafara nekutadza kuita basa nemazvo kuri kuitwa nekanzuru iyi, izvo vakati zviri kukonzerwa nehuwori. Mumwe mugari akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo vakati vanoda kuti pave nekomishini vachiti pave nenguva yakareba makanzura eguta reBulawayo achinongedzwa munyaya dzehuwori. Vakambove mutevedzeri wameya weBulawayo, VaGift Banda, vakambomiswa basa vachinenedzerwa huwori, asi vakazochenurwa nedare reHigh Court. Vaimbove murwiri wehondo yerusununguko pasi peboka reZIPRA, VaLinganiso Nyathi, vanoti nyaya yehuwori haifanirwi kuve inopinza zverusarurarudzi mukati. Vachinyora paTwitter, mumwe wevatevedzeri veMDC, VaWelshman Ncube, vayambira vagari vemuBulawayo kuti vasaite pfungwa yekuda kuve nekomisheni muguta, vachiti izvi zvinogona kudzorera kumashure budiriro yeguta. Svondo rapera, hurumende yakatumira komisheni yevanhu vashanu kuti iite ongororo yezviri kuitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo. Komisheni iyi yakapedza basa rayo nezuro uye zvakabuda zvinotarisirwa kuturwa munguva pfupi inotevera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo emaguta dzinoti kuuyiswa kwekomisheni kuti ifambise mabasa eguta reBulawayo, zvakafanana nekuisa kanzuru iyi mumaoko eZanu PF sezvakamboitika munguva yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakadoma makomisheni ekuti aiite basa mumaknzuru aive pasi peMDC mushure mekunze makanzuru aya apomerwa nyaya dzehuori. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzezveMatongerwo eNyika Dzopesana paMaonero Adzo Pane Zviri Kukonzera Mhirizhonga muNyika
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika inoti kusamira kwezvinhu zvakanaka munyika kuri kuitika iye zvino kuri kukonzerwa nekunonoka kwehurumende kugadzirisa zvinhu, izvo zvave kuita kuti vana veZimbabwe vanyunyute. Izvi zvinotevera mhirizhonga yaitika muHarare yakonzerwa nevemakombi vanga vachinyunyuta nekuwanda kwemapurisa mumigwagwa, vanonzi vanenge vachida chioko muhomwe. Kutaridzira nemhirizhonga izvi zvinouya mazuva mashoma nyika yasangana nekumwe kuratidzira kukuru kwakaitika kuBeitbridge neChishanu chapfuura, vanhu vachinyunyuta nemutemo unorambidza vanhu kupinza zvinhu munyika. VaCharles Mutasa, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira vanoti hurumende yakarara nezamu mumukanwa payakaregerera zvinhu zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzekuwondomoka kweupfumi, izvo zvoita kuti imukirwe nevana vayo. “Hurumende yedu yakaregerera zvinhu nekuti kana wakaona kuti kunetsa kwemari mumabhanga, hakuna kungotanga, asi kuti zvinhu zvakaitika munguva hombe,” VaMutasa vanodaro. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari sachigaro weZanu PF kuUnited Kingdom, VaNick Mangwana vanoti hurumende iri kuziva nezvematambudziko ose aya, uye iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise zvinhu. “Hurumende iri kuziva matambudziko ose aya, uye iri kuita zvose zvainogona kugadzirisa zvinhu. Chainokumbira chete ndechekuti vanhu vaipe nguva yekugadzirisa zvinhu,” VaMangwana vanoti zvinhu zvichanaka kubva muna Gunyana, vachiti kuuraya midziyo kuri kuitwa nevanhu vari kuratidzira hakuna zvakunobatsira. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Haisi Kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe Imwe Mari Kudzamara Yabhadhara Zvimwe Zvikwereti
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund kana kuti IMF rinoti harisi kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe mari sezvo iine zvikwereti zvakawanda kunze zvairi kukundikana kubhadhara. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica chairi kutadza kubhadhara kuWorld Bank, African Development Bank, European Investment Bank neParis Club. IMF yakatura mashoko aya kuvatori venhau nemusi weChipiri mushure mekupedza mwedzi ichiongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Izvi zvakaitwa kuburikidza nemadandemutande nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19. IMF inoti kuti Zimbabwe, yave nemakore makumi isina kukwereteswa mari nebhanga iri ikwereteswe mari, inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti kana kutenderana nevayakakwereta kuti yobhadhara sei chikwereti ichi. IMF. Kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19 sedzimwe nyika. IMF inoti inotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana gore rino. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise zvimwe zviri kukurudzirwa neIMF kuitira kuti isimudzire hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Votarisirwa Kuburitsa Hurongwa hweMari
text: Gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Panonetsa Mangudya, vachaburitsa gwaro remashandiro avanotarisira kuita nyaya dzemari munyika, kana kuti Monetary Policy Statement. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti gwaro raVaMangudya rinofanirwa kuratidza gwara rekutevera mari yeZimbabwe isati yadzoswa kuti itsive yekunze kwenyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti nguva yekudzora dhora reZimbabwe haisati yasvika. Imwe yenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nezvemari uye vachishanda nePercycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistance Gwanyanya, vanoti nguva yekuita dhora remuZimbabwe haisati yasvika. VaGwanyanya vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kushandisa mari yekunze pari zvino uye hurumende inofanirwa kusapindira mubasa re Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe sezvo zvematongerwo enyika zvisingagone kutungamira mashandiro anoita mabhanga. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti havasi kufara nemashandiro ari kuitwa nemabhanga emunyika, vachiti mabhanga haasi kupihwa mukana wekuita mabasa awo akasununguka. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuMabvuku-Tafara Vochenesa Misha neKutsvaira Marara
text: Nekuona dambudziko remarara aita makomo nemakomo, kanzuru yeguta reHarare isiri kukwanisa kuatakura, vagari vekuMabvuku neTafara vari kutarisirwa kuchenesa musha wavo neChitatu kuburikidza nekutsvaira pamwe nekuchengetedza marara. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari kanzura weWard 21, VaBarnabas Ndira, vanoti vachabatana nekambani inogadzira simende yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited, iyo yaizivakanwa kare seCirlce Cement, pamwe nekanzuru yeguta reHarare. VaNdira vanoti vagari vachapa simba ravo, kambani yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited yopawo zvekushandisa zvakaita sembatya dzinodzivirira tsvina pamwe nemabhini ekuisira marara, kanzuru ichizobatsirawo nemotokari dzekutakurisa marara aya. Kanzuru yeHarare iri kutatarika kuti ikwanise kutakura marara munzvimbo dzakawanda, izvo zvave kupa kuti vagari vaite hurongwa hwekuchenesa nzvimbo dzavo voga. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vekambani yeLafarge Cement Zimbabwe Limited kanawo kanzuru kuti tinzwewo kubva kwavari. Asi Kanzura Ndira vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga kuti vabatane nevamwe mukushambidza musha wavo. “Mwedzi yapera iyi taibatana nevakaita sevedzichechi pamwe nemasangano evagari anoti reCombined Harare Residents Association neHarare Residents Trust. Mwedzi wapera tabatana neAnglican Church, saka aka hakasi kekutanga uye kupedzisira,” vanodaro VaNdira, vanova munin'ina wamuchakabvu Tonderai Ndira, avo vakapondwa munguva yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika muna 2008. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Take Money’ onosimbisa mbabvu kuSA
text: SHASHA yetsiva yeWorld Boxing Council Super Bantamweight – Kudakwashe Memory “Take Money” Chiwandire – ari kusimuka akananga kuSouth Africa nemusi weMuvhuro uko achanogara masvondo maviri achiita gadziriro dzemutambo wake naZulina Munoz wekuMexico uyo ari kuda bhande rake.   Vatambi vaviri ava vacharwira bhande iri reWBC nemusi wa27 mwedzi uno kuHarare International Conference Centre.   Maneja waChiwandire ari zvakare murairidzi wake, Clyde Musonda anoti mwedzi uno wakakosha zvikuru kuna Chiwandire pamwe nemhuri yose yeZimbabwe sezvo achiti achanyora nhoroondo nekukunda Munoz.   “Tiri kuenda kuSouth Africa kwemasvondo maviri uko tichanosimbaradza gadziriro dzedu dzekusangana naMunoz. Mwedzi watapinda uno waNyamavhuvhu mukuru kwatiri nekuti tiri kuda chaizvo kuti bhande iri rirambe riri muno uye tiri kuvimbisa kuti richaramba riri muno.   “KuSouth Africa tiri kunosimbaradza gadziriro dzedu sezvo pasara mavhiki mashoma kuti mutambo wedu naMunoz uchisvika. Saka tichanotamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda (sparring) nevatambi vekuSouth Africa iyo ichabatsira Take Money mugadziriro dzake,” anodaro Musonda.   Take Money akakwisa kuhwina mutambo uyu apo achasangana naMunoz, anobva apihwa mukana wekurwira bhande reWBC Super Bantamweight Gold iro rina Yamileth Mercado wekuMexico zvekare. Akahwinha bhande reWBC Super Bantamweight Interim mwedzi yadarika zvichitevera kukunda kwaakaita Catherine Phiri wekuZambia.   Kuhwina kwaakaita bhande iri kwave kumuzarurira mikana muupenyu hwake.

headline: Chirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19 Chakapinda muZuva Retatu Panguva Iyo EU Ichiti Ichawanisa Zimbabwe Imwe Nhomba
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu kuti kusvika nenguva dzeina dzemasikati, vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19 vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevana, kana kuti 2 074, vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nyika yose. Izvi zvakaitika apo chirongwa chekubaya nyika yose chakapinda muzuva retatu. Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti vanhu vasere vakafa kana kuti 8, uye vamwe makumi mashanu kana kuti 50, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nemazana masere nevana, kana kuti 1 804, vakavhenekwa. Vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154, vakanga vari muchipatara pakupera kwezuva musi weChipiri. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 nyika yose hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhtatu, kana kuti 35 960, kuchitiwo vanhu vafa kubva patanga chirwere ichi nyika yose vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mashanu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 456. Zvichakadaro, sangano reEuropean Union rinoti Zimbabwe munguva pfupi inotevera iri kutarisirwa kuwana nhomba inodarika miriyoni imwe chete kana kuti 1, 152 million, pasi pechirongwa che Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations, kana kuti COVAX. Izvi zvakabuda padandemutande reTwitter reEU. Chirongwa cheCOVAX chinotungamirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization richibatsirwa nemasangano akasiyanasiyana, kunyanya reEuropean Union, uye chakanangana nekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira. Pari zvino Zimbabwe yakapihwa nhomba zviuru mazana maviri, kana kuti 200 000, kubva kuChina, iyo yakatanga kubayiwa muHarare svondo rapera uye mamwe matunhu kutanga neMuvhuro. China yakazivisa neChitatu kuti ichapa Zimbabwe imwe nhomba zviuru mazana maviri. Zimbabwe inoti yakatenga imwe nhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu kubva kuChina inosvika mukupera kwemwedzi uno. Asi vakuru mubazi rezvehutano vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanhu vari kuuya kuzobayiwa vachiri vashoma. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Brighton Chireka vanoti vanotenda bazi rezvehutano nedanho rayakatora rekuti vashandi vezvehutano vave pakati pevanhu vakatanga kubaiwa nhomba munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Linda Masarira Voendeswa kuChipatara
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu Amai Linda Masarira avo vakapedza mazuva makumi masere vari kujere reChikurubi mushure mekusungwa vachiratidzira zvisiri pamutemo vakaendeswa kuchipatara muHarare husiku hweChipiri mushure mekunge vatanga kurwara. Kumbogara mujeri uu kunonzi nevamwe ndiko kwopa kuti Muzavre Masarira varware. Shamwari yaMuzvare Masarira, VaOstallos Siziba avo vakambovharirwawo kuChikurubi vanoti vakakatyamadzwa nehurwere uhu sezvo vainge vaswera navo vachinzwa zvakanaka muswere wose. VaSiziba vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti Muzvare Masarira vachiri kuongororwa navanachiremba asi vanoti parizvino zvinoratidza kuti chipfuva chavo hachina kumira zvakanaka. VaNqobizitha Mlambo vanoti Muzvare Masarira vanogona kunge vakatapurirwa chirwere vari mujeri reChikurubi iro risina kumira zvakanaka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogaroshoropodza majeri emunyika vachiti haana hutsanana pamwe nezvekudya zvakanaka. Muna 2011 dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzakashanyira majeri mashanu emuno dzikabuditsa gwaro rairatidza kuti kumajeri hakuna mvura yakachena, zvekushandisa zvakakwana pamwechete nezvekudya zvinovaka muviri. Vasati vapinda muchipatara Muxvare Masarira vakaudza Studio 7 kuti dambudziko rimwe guru riri kuChikurubi nderezvekudya sezvo vanhu vachidya zvisina kukodzera. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Havasati Vaita Musangano naVanachiremba neVakoti Vari Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika varizve gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, pamwe nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, VaJasper Chimedza, havasati vaita musangano nevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba avo vave nemwedzi miviri vachiramwa mabasa. Vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti vari kuda kuwedzerrwa mari uye kuti vawaniswe zvikwanisiro muzvipatara. Asi vachitaura nezvekudomwa kwaVaChiwenga nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera, munyori mukuru mudare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakati mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, vaida kuti VaChiwenga vatange basa nechimbi chimbire kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa mubazi rezvehutano munguva iyo nyika yatarisana nedambudziko reCovid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaChiwenga kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi tabata munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Doctor, Aaron Musara, avo vanoti hakuna musangano wati waitwa. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vati hakuna chavati vanzwa kuvakuru mubazi rezvehutano nezvekugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: ZIBAWU Inoti Standard Bank Haina Chido cheKusimudzira Nyika
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga, re Zimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, rinoti Standard Bank iri kuvhara mabhanga ayo mumaguta madiki akaita se Hwange, Chiredzi, Chinhoyi nemamwe, nekuti bhanga iri haridi kubatsira Zimbabwe kuti ibudirire. Mashoko aya anotevera mashoko ebhanga iri ekuti riri kuvhara mabhanga aro mumaguta madiki nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzehupfumi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vavo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa nepamusoro pemaitiro ebhanga iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reStandard Bank. No media source currently available

headline: Caps United Inosimudza Mukombe weCastle Premier Soccer League
text: Chikwata cheCaps United ndicho chasimudza mukombe weCastle Premier Soccer League mushure mekurova chikwata cheChapungu 1-0 kuAscot Stadium kuGweru. Chikwata cheFC Platinum icho change chichifema chiri mugotsi meCaps United hachina kuwana mukombe kunyangwe hacho charova Tsolotsho 3-0. Aka ndekechishanu munhoroondo yemakwikwi aya Caps United ichisimudza mukombe wePSL. Caps yakambozviita muuna 1979, 1996, 2004, 2005. Makororokoto kuCaps United kubva kuStudio 7

headline: Chikwata chakasimba: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI wemaWarriors — Norman Mapeza — anoti chikwata chake chiri kufanirwa kurwa semvumba musi weMugovera apo chiri kusangana neGhana mumutambo wemuGroup G wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eQatar 2022 World Cup gore rinotevera.   MaWarriors anotofanirwa kuhwina mutambo uyu kuti arambe ane mukana wekubudirira kuenda kuQatar sezvo kusvika pari zvino angokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kubva mumitambo miviri yaatamba.   Mumutambo wavo wekutanga, Warriors akaita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa ndokuzokundwa wechipiri neEthopia unove mutambo uyo wakazoona sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZifa richidzinga basa Zdravko “Loga” Logarusic aive murairidzi wechikwata ichi.   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Mapeza kuti atsive Loga, Mapeza anoti chiremerera chikuru chaakapihwa kurairidza nyika yake nekudaro zvakakosha kuti varwe vamire. Achitaura nemusi weChipiri vasati vasimuka vakananga kuGhana, Mapeza akati zvakakosha kuti vagowana zvibodzwa zvizere kuAccra.   “Munhabvu, nguva dzose tinotambira kuhwina saka tiri kufanira kubata basa sebasa kuGhana nekuti nyika iri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kwatiri.   “Mutambo uyu wakatikoshera saka tichazama nepatinokwanisa kuunza zvibodzwa zvose nekuti tinoziva kuti hapana asingade kuhwina. Isu tinototamba mitambo yedu tichida kuhwina,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo maWarriors ari kusangana neGhana kuAccra, achange ane vatambi vanotambira kuEngland vanoti Marvelous Nakamba weAston Villa, Jordan Zemura weAFC Bournemouth naTendayi Darikwa weWigan Athletic avo vakambokundikana kuuya kuzotamba mitambo yeSouth Africa neEthopia nekuda kwekuti Zimbabwe yakaiswa muboka rered list renyika dzinonzi dzine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere cheCovid-19.   Vatambi ava vachangokwanisa kutamba mutambo wekuGhana chete asi havazokwanise kuzouya kuzotamba wemuno uyo uchasangana maWarriors neThe Black Stars svondo rinotevera musi weChipiri.   “Zvinofadza kuti kuGhana tichange tine chikwata chakasimba, tiine vatambi vedu vose saka tinofanira kubata basa sebasa. Mitambo yadarika, tange tichitamba takashota tisina vamwe vatambi vedu, apa tichange tinavo kuGhana uko tinofanirwa kubva nezvibodzwa.   “Mumutambo wekunoku ndiwo vatambi vekuEngland vasiri kutenderwa kuuya, asi zvakangonakawo nekuti iyo Ghana ine vayo vatambi vanotambira kuEngland vachatadzawo kuuya kuno,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo maWarriors achatatsurana nemaBlack Stars, achange achishuvira kuti mutambo weSouth Africa neEthopia ugopera ari mangange kuitira kuti mukana wavo wekuenda kuQatar urambe uripo.

headline: Musangano weInternational AIDS Conference Wotanga muSouth Africa
text: Musangano wemazuva mashanu weInternational Aids Conference wakatanga muDurban South Africane musi weMuvhuro uye uchapera nemusi weChishanu. Musangano uyu uri kuzeya nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS uye kuti potsvagwa sei mari yekuita izvi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo. VaRamaphosa vakurudzira nyika dzepasi rino nemasangano akazvipira kuti vabatane mukurwisa denda iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vari pamusangani uyu vanosanganisa munyori mukuru weUnited Nation VaBan Ki Moon, vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica, muimbi Elton John uye Nevanzi wamambo kana kuti Prince Harry vekuBritain. Musangano uyu wakarongwa nesangano reInternational Aids Society uye unounza pamwe chete nyanzvi dzinosvika zviuru gumi nenomwe kubva kunyika dzose dzepasi rino. Nyanzvi idzi dzinenge dzichiisa misoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kurwisa denda iri iro rauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu mumakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Vari kutungamira Zimbabwe kumusangano uyu igurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa avo vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuda kuvhara maburi ose angaite kuti vanhu vatsva vatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kumusangano uyu zvinosanganisirawo VaDaniel Molokele vanova mukuru wesangano reAIDS Accountability International avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichabatsirikana nekuve pamusangano uyu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nasachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Network for Positive Women Amai Martha Tolana vati kunze kwekunzwa zviri kuitwa nevamwe, nyika ichagovawo zvairi kuita. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti rinoda kupedza mukondombera panosvika gore ra2030 uye panguva imwe cheteyo richiwanirawo vanhu mushonga. Asi UN inoti pachine mutambo sezvo paine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu vari kurarama nehutachiona pasi rose, vakawanda vari muAfrica. Vanhu vakawanda vanonziwo vari kutapurirwa chirwere ichi zvikuru kuNorth Africa, Middle East nekuRussia. KuRussia kunonzi nyaya iri kupa kuti chirwere chipararire kuramba kutambira nyaya dzechingochani. Asi vakawanda vanoita zvechingochani ava vanonzi vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvakanyanya. VaMolokele vanoti Zimbabwe inarowo dambudziko rekusada kupinza ngochani muzvirongwa zvayo. Imwe nyaya iri kupa kuti kurwisa chirwere ichi kunetse inyaya yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica nevanobatsira vave kusunga homwe. Muna Kubvumbi 2001 nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatenderana kuAbuja, Nigeria kuti mumabhajeti adzo dziise mari inosvika zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana kunyaya dzezvehutano. Asi zvinonzi nyika imwe chete chete ndiyo yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvido zveAbuja Declaration. VaMolokela vanoti izvi zvapa kuti kurwisa denda iri kunetse. Amai Martha Tolana vanotendawo kuti kushaya mari kuri kupa kupa kuti zvinhu zvikone n’anga murapwa achida. Kutapuriranwa kwechirwere muZimbabwe kwakadzika kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo Zimbabwe isina mari yakakwana yekubatsira vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechishanu panyika dziri pamusoro soro muAfrica pachitariswa nyaya dzekupararira kwemukondombera. Vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana vari kurarama nehutachiona muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vatyairi veMagonyeti vekuZimbabwe Votambura Vari kuRwanda Mushure meKutadza Kubhadharwa Mari Dzavo kweMwedzi Inodarika Miviri
text: Vamwe vatyairi vemagonyeti makumi mana vanobva kuZimbabwe vanoti vari kunonga svosve nemuromo vari kuRwanda nepamuganhu weTanzania neZambia mushure mekupererwa namari vari pamabasa uye kambani yakavapa basa isiri kuda kuvapa mihoro yavo. Vatyairi ava vanoti vakaenda kuRwanda mushure mekunge vawana basa rekutakura zvinhu kubva ku Mt. Hampden muHarare vachienda nazvo kuKigali, guta guru reRwanda. Vanoti vakapinzwa basa nekambani yeSimba Logistics yekuTanzania ichishanda pamwechete neimwe kambani yemuZimbabwe inonzi Ceva Logistics.uko rekuti vatakure michina kubva pakavakirwa paramende itsva yeZimbabwe. Pamotokari dzakapiwa basa idzi panonzi paive nesere dzekuTanzania asi vatyairi ava vanofunga kuti vamwe vavo vekuTanzania ava vanogona kunge vakatopiwa mari dzavo kare. Vamwe vatyairi vataura neStudio 7 vanoti zvibvumirano zvavakanga vanyorerana nekambani yeSimba Logistics chaguma kushanda musi wa 17 Gumiguru uye vazhinji vavo vakangopiwa zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvemari yezvibvumirano zvavo, vachinzi zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvakasara vaizopiwa wasvitsa zvinhu zvavakatakura. Asi mari yavakapihwa yakatopera sezvo vave nemwedzi yakawanda vabva kumba uye vachizvitengera chikafu pamwe nemvura yekushandisa zuva nezuva. .Vamwe vachiri pamuganhu weTanzani neZambia vanoti vari kusangana nedambudziko rekutadza kuwana mvumo yekuti vapfuurire mberi nerwendo rwavo kunyange hazvo vachiti kambani yakavapa basa yakanga yakavavimbisa kuti havaizosangana nedambudziko. Vatyairi ava vanoti havasi kukwanisa kushandisa mazita avo sezvo vari kutyira kuzodzingwa mabasa pamwe nekunyimwa mari dzavo dzasara pabasa ravari kuita. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuma kambani maviri aya sezvo ange asinga kudaira nhare dzawo. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata muzinda weZimbabwe muRwanda kuti tinzwewo kana uine matanho auro kutora ekuedza kubatsira vatyairi ava. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Makambani Opindawo Muhurongwa hweKutenga Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vemabhizinesi vaparura chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba vachishanda pamwe chete nehurumende nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vemabhizinesi vaparura chirongwa chinonzi Business Preparedness, Prevention and Response to Covid -19 kana kuti BPPRI kuti vabatsirane nehurumende kudzikisa huwandu hwevanobatwa neCovid-19 kuburikidzanekutenga nhomba nezvimwe zvekushandisa muzvipatara kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwechirongwa ichi nhasi muHarare, sachigaro weBPPRI, Amai Getrude Mashonganyika, vati vemabhizimusi vanoda kuti dambudziko reCovid-19 ripere kuitira kuti mabhizinesi avo abudirire izvo zvakavasunda kuti vatengewo nhomba dzeCovid-19 kuitira kuti nyika ikurumidze kuva nehuwandu hunotarisirwa hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba munyika yose, kana kuti herd immunity. Kambani yeCIMAS ndiyo ichange ichitungamirira vemabhizimusi muchirongwa chekutengwa kwenhomba idzi. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, sachigaro weCimas, Amai Emma Fundira, vatiwo chinangwa chavo ndechekuti vanhu vakawanda vazvidzivirire kuchirwere chinouraya ichi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezveutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vatiwo vafadzwa zvikuru nekubatana kwemabhizimusi nehurumende mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 VaMangwiro vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti makambani aya achapawo veruzhinji, kunyanya kunzvimbo dzakasarira shure, ruzivo pamusoro pezvakanakira kubaiwa kwenhomba. VaMangwiro vatiwo hurumende yakasarudza kushandisa nhomba yeSinopharm neSinovac nedzimwewo nekuti ndidzo dzinogona kuchengetedzeka zvakanaka munyika. CIMAS inoti vemabhizimusi vakaisa madhora ekuAmerica miriyoni imwe chete kutsigira chirongwa chekutengwa kwenhomba. Nezuro, vanhu zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana matatu nemakumi mana nevashanu, 17 345, vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matatu nemakumi masere nezvisere nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete, 388 21. Vanhu zvuru zvitanhatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 6 729, vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yepiri pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, 69 992. Zimbabwe iri kushandisa mishonga yeSinovac neSinopharm kubaya vanhu, kunyange hazvo World Health Organization ichiti haisati yapa mishonga iyi chitambi chekuti ishandiswe kuruzhinji rwevanhu. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoudza Muzvare Mamombe, Muzvare Chimbiri naMuzvare Marova Kuti Vaise Mapasipoti Avo Mumaoko eDare
text: Dare ramejasitiriti ratura mutongo wekuti mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, nevamwe vavo vaviri, vasvitse magwaro avo ekufambisa kudare. Vatatu ava, avo vanoti vakatochwa vari muhusungwa, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika yeCovid-19 Regulations. Vachitura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chakasvitswa nehurumende chekuti zvakaturwa nedare pachikumbiro chevatatu ava zvivandudzwe, mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guriro, vati Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Murova, vasvitse mapasipoti avo panokwana nguva dza 4 neChitatu masikati. Vanziwo vadzoke kudare musi wa13 Nyamavhuvhu apo pakatarisirwa kuenderera mberi kwenyaya yavari kupomerwa. Vatatu ava vakange vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso uye kuti vazvipire kumapurisa kamwe chete mukati memasvondo maviri, asi vachuchisi vehurumende vakadzoka kudare kuti izvi zvivandudzwe vachiti vakawana runyerekupe rwekuti vatatu ava vanga vachida kutiza munyika. Amai Guriro vati zvakakosha kuti vatatu ava vamirire kutongwa kwavo nokudaro vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vabvume chikumbiro chehurumende. Gweta revatatu ava, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro kuitira kuti vadzoserwe mapasipoti avo vachiti hapana mhosva yavanganzi vangatize kutongwa kwayo. Zvichakadai, baba vaMuzvare Marova, VaRunesu George Marova, vati vari kushungurudzika zvikuru nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa mwana wavo pamwe chete nevamwe vaakasungwa ainavo. Baba vaMuzvare Chimbiri, VaHenry Chimbiri, vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nemapurisa ari kuramba achishanyira mwana wavo nevamwe vari kuchipatara kwavari kunyange hazvo vatatu ava vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nematare pamhosva yavari kupomerwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti vakasungwa mwedzi wapera pa roadblock mushure mekuratidzira kunonzi kwakaitwa nevechidiki veMDC Alliance mumusha weWarren Park. Kunyange hazvo bepanhau reHerald nemamwe masangano enhau akaburitsa kuti vatatu ava vaive mumaoko emapurisa, mapurisa akazobuda achiramba mashoko aya mushure mekunge vatatu ava vazowanikwa kuBindura vachiti vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende. Parizvino, vatatu ava vari kugara muchipatara vachirapwa zvichitevera kutochwa kwavanoti vakaitwa uku. Asi hurumende kuburikidza negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, inoti ichiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai ekuHwande Oratidzira muHarare Achinyunyuta kuHurumende
text: Madzimai evashandi vekuHwange Colliery vari kuronga kuratidzira neChina muHarare vachinyunyuta nekusapindira kwehurumende mukugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevashandi vepakambani inoshandira varume vavo. Madzimai ekuHwange ave nemazuva anodarika zana achiratidzira senzira yekutsutsuma kusabhadharwa kwevarume vavo kwemakore mashanu apfuura. Kuratidzira uku kuchange kuchitsigirwa nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development. Muzvare Janet Zhou, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, vati vacharatidzira serutsigiro kumadzimai ekuHwange, uye kuti hurumende ione kuti pane dambudziko rinoda kugadzirwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvezvicherwa, Amai Fanny Chirisa, vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisi kubuda pachena panyaya yekusabhadharwa kwevashandi vepakambani iyi, kunyange hazvo hurumende ine zvikamu zvakawanda zvehupfumi mukambani iyi. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemadzimai, Amai Priscilla Misihairambwi Mushonga, vanotiwo semadzimai ari mudare reparamende vanofanirwa kunyara nekuregerera madzimai aya achiratidzira kwenguva ndefu vasina kupindira munyaya iyi. Kambani yeHwange Colliery inonzi ine mari dzeveshandi dzinopfuura mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora. Vachibvunzwa mudare reparamende nezvemadzimai ari kuratidzira aya kuHwange Colliery, gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Petronella Kagonye, vati madzimai aya ari kushandiswa nevanhu vari mune zvematongerwo enyika. Amai Kagonye vati sehurumende vakagadzirisa nyaya dzezvevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda muAfrica Votarisira kuMorocco paMutambo neFrance Nhasi
text: Vatsigiri vemutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe vane chivimbo kuti Morocco inorova France manheru ano nekupinda mufainari ye2022 World Cup. Nhasi kune makuwerere pakati pechikwata cheMorocco icho chiri kushura mare kuWorld Cup nechikwata chakapedzisira kutora mukombe uyu cheFrance. Veruzhinji munyika kusanganisira muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaLawrence Hwekwete vane chivimbo kuti Morocco inokunda France mumutambo uyu. Chikwata chinokuda apa chiri kusangana neArgentina iyo yakarova Croatia 3-0 nezvibodzwa zvakanwiswa naLionel Messi nezviviri naJulian Alvarez. Mukunwisa nezuro, Messi ave nezvibodzwa zvakaenzana mumakwikwi aya naKylian Mbappe wekuFrance. Vaviri ava vanwisa zvibodzwa zvishanu. Argentina yakapedzisira kusimudza mukombe uyu muna 1986 ichitingamirwa namushakavu Diego Maradona kuMexico. Mbappe ari kupinda munhandare manheru ano mumutambo wakatarisirwa zvikuru nevakawanda neMorocco. Mutambo uyu uri kutambirwa munhandare yeAl Bayt Stadium. Kunze kwaMbappe, maAtlas Lions anofanira kungwarirawo Olivier Giroud uyo ari kurovawo mambure. Asi Morocco iri kurumbidzwa nenyanzvi nekuti yakasunga kumashure neutare zviri kupa kuti nyika dzakawanda dzikundikane kuinwisa. Murairidzi weMoroccco, Walid Regragui ari kurumbidzwa nevakawanda nemarongero ake etsoro yemutambo zvapa kuti ave murairidzi wekutanga kutungamira nyika yemuAfrica kusvika kumazemi-finals eWorld Cup. Morocco iri kutarisira kuna Hakim Ziyech, Achraf Hakimi nevamwe. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaFarai Kambamura vanoti varikuonawo Morocco ichibudirira mumutambo uyu. Vanoita zvematongerwo enyika VaNixon Nyikadzino avo vanozivikanwa nezita rekuti Cde Mao vanoti Morocco ndizvo. Chikwata chinokundwa nhasi pakati peFrance neMorocco hachisi kubva chadzokera kumusha asi chichatamba neCroatia nemusi weMugovera kuona kuti ndeipi nyika inopedza makundano aya iri pachidanho chechitatu. Fainari yeWorld Cup 2022 iriko musi wesvondo, 18 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: VaDzvokora Vokurudzira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kuti Vabatsire Mukugadzirisa Zvinhu Kumusha
text: Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvakawanda zvinoramba zviine shuviro yekuti zvinhu kumusha zvichanaka nerimwe zuva. Asi pahuwandu hwazvo, zvimwe ndizvo zviri kubatawo nepazvinogona napo mukuedza kuti hutongi hwejechetere huri kutarisirwa nevakawanda huitike nekukasika. Mumwe wevari kushanda mukugadzirisa ramangwana rinotarisirwa iri ndaVaTawanda Dzvokora, avo vanozviti Chief Svosve. Vanoti hapana chinombonakidza pakugara kunze kwenyika. “Ini ndiri munhu wekumusha, saka ndinoramba ndichitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichanaka chete, asi kwete nekuti vanhu vari kumusha chete ndivo vanofanirwa kushanda asi kuti kana nesuwo tiri mu diaspora,” vanodaro VaDzvokora. VaDzvokora, avo vaimbove murairidzi vakambodzidzisawo munyika yeBotswana vasati vasunga twavo nemhuri yavo vakananga kuUnited States of America kudunhu reNorth Dakota uko kwavakasvikopinda munyaya dzemhando dzemoto vachisiya zvekubata choko. “Ndagara mu diaspora kwe 15 years, 10 ndiri kuBotswana then five ndiri muno umu, asi pfungwa dzinenge dzingori kumusha nekuti muno tiri musango. Saka kare vakuru vaiti kunonzi kutetereka.” VaDzvokora, avo vane makore makumi mana nemashanu ekuberekwa, ndivo zvakare mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato rinopikisa hurumende reZimbabwe First iro rinotungamirwa naVaMaxwell Zeb Shumba. Ndivo zvakare munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, kana kuti NERA, vachimirira bato ravo reZim First, uyo uri kurwira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vanofanirwa kuitawo pavo mukuwedzera kuti zvinhu zvikasike. Kumusha vanoti vari kubatsirawo nekutumira mbatya, chikafu nezvimwe zvakadaro kuburikidza nechechi yavo yeZimbabwe Methodist Church. “Gore rega rega tinotumira munhu kumusha anonogovera zvinhu zvatinenge taunganidza pamwe nekutenga,” VaDzvokora vanodaro. Vanoti vari kutenga dzimba kumusha senzira yekuunganidza nayo hupfumi uye pari zvino vari kuvaka imba yekuti vari parwendo vanogona kurara kana kuti lodge kuChinhoyi. No media source currently available

headline: Munyori Mukuru weUnited Nations Oshora Kuputika kweChinofungidzirwa Kuti Chombo muZimbabwe
text: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekuputika kwakaita chinofungidzirwa kuti chombo kana girinendi kuWhite City Sports Stadium kuBulawayo nemusi weMugovera rakapotsa rauraya mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatevedzeri vavo vaviri VaConstantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi avo vanonzi vakakuvara. VaGuterres vakurudzira kuti vane chekuita nekuputika uku vanofanira kusungwa voendeswa kumatare uye vakati vari kushuvira kuti vakakuvara vapore nekukurumidza. Vanhu vanosvika makumi mana nemapfumbamwe vakakuvara. Mapurisa ari kuenderera mberi achiferefeta nyaya iyi uye hapana ati asungwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati kana paine vane humbowo vanofanira kufonera matikitivha eCID Bulawayo panumber dzinoti 0292-71568, Bulawayo Central Police – 0292-72515 or CID headquarters – 0242-709134, kana National Complaints desk on 0242-703631, or WhatsApp number 0712800197 kana kumapurisa ari pedyo navo. Zvichakadaro, sangano remubatanidzwa wemakerereke yeZimbabwe Council of Churches (ZCC) vakumbira vemakereke kuti vabatane mukunamata uye kutsanya kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo murunyararo. Mizinda yekunze yakaita seEgypt, America, Britain neRussia yashorawo zvikuru zvakaitika muZimbabwe. VeSADC ne African Union vashorawo chiitiko ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti munyori mukuru weUnited Nations aifanira kubuda pachena kuti aya mabasa evanopfurikidza mwero. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weTogo Anovhura ZITF Vanorwira Kodzero Vachinyunyuta
text: Mutungamiri we Togo, VaFaure Gnassingbe, vavhura Zimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, zviri pamutemo muBulawayo vachikurudzira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti varambe vakashinga kunyange hazvo vakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzekunze. Mutungamiri we Togo, VaFaure Gnassingbe, vavhura Zimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, zviri pamutemo muBulawayo vachikurudzira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti varambe vakashinga kunyange hazvo vakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzekunze. Vati nyika yavo yeTogo yakambotemerwawo zvirango pane imwe nguva. VaGnassingbe vange vachifamba nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Nyika dzinosvika gumi nepfumbamwe dzange dzichiratidzira kumusika mukuru uyu, uye dzinosanganisira, Russia, Botswana, Cyprus, China, Ethiopia ne Germany. Mutungamiri weTogo akurudzirawo Zimbabwe nenyika dzemuAfrica kuti dzikoshese kukwenenzvera zvigadzirwa zvadzinotengesa kuti dzikwanisewo kubudirira. VaGnassingbe vapawo mibayiro kumakambani anonzi akagona kushongeza zvinhu anosanganisira yaVaMugabe yeAlpha Omega Dairy, Delta Corporation, bazi rezvekurima, redzidzo, nemamwe. Asi havasi vanhu vose vari kufara munyika nekuuya kwaVaGnassinbe avo vanonzi nevanopikisa munyika mavo vanotonga nedemo. Mutungamiri weTogo uyu akasiirwa chigaro nababa vake Va Gnassingbé Eyadéma avo vakatora simba vachishandisa mauto muna 1967. Vakatonga nyika iyi kusvika vafa muna 2005. Mauto akabva agadza VaFaure Gnassingbe pachigaro nechisimba kunyange hazvo mutauriri wedare reparamende uyo aive kunze kwenyika, aifanirwa kumbobata matomu pamutemo. Nyika dzekumavirira dzakazomanikidza VaGnassingbe kuita sarudzo asi vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vakafa mukurwisana musarudzo dzinonzi nevanopikisa dzakabirirwa. Mutungamiri weTogo uyu akarambawo nyaya yekuti atonge matemu maviri sezvaidiwa nevamwe munyika iyi. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaJoey Bimha, vanoti Zimbabwe senyika yaona zvakakodzera kuti mutungamiri weTogo avhure zviri pamutemo chirongwa cheZITF. No media source currently available  Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vaimboshanda kumuzinda weZimbabwe kuEthiopia, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti muitiro waVaMugabe hauna kusiyana naVa Gnassingbe, izvo zvakapa kuti vavakoke. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera neVakoti Voshanda Hana Dzichirova Vachityira Kubatwa neCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 hwava kupa kuti vashandi vanobatsira vanhu vanenge vachirwara nedenda iri, vapindwe nekutya, vachityira kuti vanogona kupinzwawo munjodzi nechirwere ichi, icho chava kuita chamurambamhuru munyika. Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vave kusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi nguva dzose pavanenhge varipabasa sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vanenge vachibatwa nechirwere ichi huru kuramba huchikwira Mumwe mushandi wezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMD Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati vari kusiririswa zvikuru nehuwandu hweavo vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati vashandi vezvehutano vanotoda kubatsirwa mukugadzikana kwepfungwa nekuti zvavari kuona vari pabasa zvinotyisa. VaMadzorera, avo vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, vatiwo apo vashandi vezvehutano vanenge vodzokera kumba, vanenge vakutyirawo kutapurira mhuri dzavo kana vachinge vabatwa nedenda iri asi risati rabuda pachena. Asi VaMadzorera vati sevashandi vezvehutano varikutorawo matanho ekuderedza njodzi iyi sezvo riri basa ravo rekubetsera vanenge vachirwara Mumwe mukoti anoshanda muguta reHarare, VaSimbarashe James Tafirenyika, avo vanotungamira Zimbabwe Urban and Rural Council Nurse Worker’s Union, vati zvinhu zvinotyisa zvakanyanya kuenda kubasa. Asi vati kubaiwa kwavakaitwa nhomba kwakadzikamisa hana yavo. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vapiwe zvekushandisa zvakakwana kuitira kuti vasabatwe neCovid-19 apo vanenge vachibetsera veruzhinji. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vese vapiwe zvekufambisa kuitira kuti vasasangane neveruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaGodknows Homwe, vati vashandi vezvehutano vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro sezvo vari kubata basa rakakosha huye rinotyisa. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pazviuru zviviri nemazana masere nevapfumbamwe 2809. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe nezana nemakumi maviri,91,120 , zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevashanu 2705 nezuro wakare. Kusvika nezuro, hurumende inoti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vakange vave miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana maviri makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mana nevaviri, 1 292, 642 Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nezvitanhatunemazana maserenemakumi matatu, 656 830. Huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzanhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhutu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshaya Chikafu paRujeko Isolation Center kuMasvingo
text:
Hurumende iri kukandirana nyoka mhenyu nekanzuru yeMasvingo panyaya yekuti ndiyani anofanirwa kupa chikafu varwere veCOVID-19 vakachengetwa paRujeko Isolation Center. Hama dzevanhu vari kugara paRujeko Isolation Center dzinoti varwere vari panzvimbo iyi havasi kuwana chikafu nguva dzose, zvokuti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuipa svondo rino. Nzvimbo iyi inotakura vanhu gumi, uye yakapihwa hurumende nekanzuru yeMasvingo pasi pehirongwa chehurumende chekuchengeta vanhu vanenge varwarisa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe mugari ane hama yake pachipatara apa ada kuzivikanwa nekunzi Baba Gari, nekutyira kuti hama yavo inozopinzwa panguva yakaoma, vati
varwere vari kuchema chema kuti vave nemazuva vasingapuhwi chikafu, uye hama dzevarwere ava dzisingabvumidzwi kuigira hama dzavo chikafu Mukuru webazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vati ivo
havasi kuziva kuti sei chikafu chiri kushaikwa nekuti chinofanaira
kubva kukanzuru sezvo iri iyo yakapa hurumende nzvimbo iyi.

Asi meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati harisi basa rekanzuru yavo kupa varwere chikafu sezvo varwere ava vari mumaoko ehurumende. VaMaboke vati kubva pavakapa nzvimbo iyi kuhurumende, hurumende ndiyo yanga ichipa varwere ava chikafu chichibva kuchipatara chikuru cheMasvingo General Hospital.

Hama dzevarwere ava dzinoti hurumende inofanirwa kugara pasi nekanzuru dambudziko iri rogadziriswa sezvo varwere ava vachida chikafu chinovalka muviri panguva iyo vanenge vari kurwara. Mumwe mugari wemuMasvingo ane hama iri paRujeko Isolation Center, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, ati dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika nekuti hupenyu hwevarwere huri kuiswa panguva yakaoma. Kushaikwa kwechikafu uku kuri kuitika panguva iyo vanhu mazana maviri nevanomwe vakatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro mudunhu reMasvingo chete. Hurumende inoti vanhu makumi masere nemumwe chete, 81 vakafa munyika ne chirwere che Covid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zviviri nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, 2 089 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvitatu nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete, 3,421, uye vvabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nezvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 105,656. Vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe nemazana matatu nemakumi
manomwe nemumwe chete, 31,371 vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamirioni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 1,593,656. Vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro vaive zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 17,247 izvo zvakasvitsa vabaiya nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu ane mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, 730,378. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika mese kana
kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda
reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votyira Hutano Hwavo Sezvo Kanzuru yeHarare Yoronga Kuvhara Mvura
text: Kanzuru yeHarare inoti ichatanga chirongwa chekumbomira kupa vagari mvura mamwe mazuva sezvo yave shoma mumadhamu. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzinonzi dzichatora mazuva mashanu dzisingawane mvura izvo zvoita kuti vagari uye vana chiremba vatyire kuti zvirwere zvinogona kupararira. Dambudziko iri riri kuwanikwa nemakanzuru eBulawayo neChitungwiza. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati nyaya yekushaya mvura kwemamwe mazuva imviro mviro yekutanga kwekupararira kwezvirwere zvakaita setyphoid. Vagari vemumusha wevazhinji weWarren Park vanoti vagara vachinetseka kuwana mvura uye vave kutokatyamadzwa kuti danho idzva rokuvhara mvura rinorevei. Muzvare Shandurai Zireva anoti madzimai nevanasikana ndivo vanoiswa parumananzombe zvakanyanya nekushomeka kwemvura. VaDonald Mavhudzi mumwe mugari wemuHarare vatiwo kanzura inofanirwa kutsvaka nzira dzekuzadzikisa kodzero yekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena iri mubumbiro remutemo. Amai Cecelia Mhondiwa vachema chemawo vakati sevanhukadzi kushaikwa kwemvura kuri kuvakonzeresa hurombo sezvo nguva zhinji vanenge votsvaka mvura pachinzvimbo chekubata mabasa emaoko. Vati kanzura inofanirwa kutsvaka nzira dzekuwanisa vanhu mvura. Hapana kuwiriran kuti chii chichaitwa mazuva anenge achishaikwa mvura. Vagari vanoti kanzuru inofanira kuunza motokari dzinotakura mvura kumisha yevanhu. Asi mutauriri weHarare City Council VaMichael Chideme vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuchereredza mvura. Vanotungamira sangano reCombined Harare Residents Association VaMfundo Mlilo vanoti hurumende nekanzuru vanofanira kutenda kuti mutoro wekuwanira vanhu mvura wavaremera kuti vape masangano ekunze mukana wekubatsira. Kumisha mizhinji inogara vanhu muHarare, zvibhorani zvishoma zviriko zvakaiswa nemasangano akazvimiririra asi nekuda kwekuwandirwa nekushandiswa zvakanyanya, zvibhorani izvi zvinofa nguva zhinji uye hakuna anogadzira. Muna 2009 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu vakashaya nekuda kwechirwere cheCholera. Vana vakawanda vanombofa nezvirwere zvemanyoka. Vana chiremba vakawanda vari kuchema chema kuti kuzvipatara zvakawanda hakuna mishonga nekudaro pakaita zvirwere zvinogona kupararira nekukurumidza. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vopika kuti Vachaenderera Mberi neKuramwa Mabasa Panovhurwa Zvikoro
text: Sangano re Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti hurongwa hwekuratidzira nekuramwa mabasa kwevadzidzisi huri kuenderera mberi neChipiri panovhurwa zvikoro, sezvavakazivisa, kunze kwekunge hurumende yauya nezvibvumirano zvinotambirika pamusoro pezvinyunyuto zvevarairidzi. Zvinyunyuto izvi zvinonzi zvinosanganisira kuda kuti vawedzerwe mari, kubvumidzwa kuti vaende pazororo, kubviswa kwezvematongerwo enyika muzvikoro, uye kudzorerwa kwemari dzinopiwa varairidzi kana vachiita mamwe mabasa ari pamusoro pekudzidzisa kwavanoita. Hurumende yakatozivisa kuti ichatora matanho ekudzinga mabasa vose varairidzi vachapinda mukuramwa mabasa kuri kukurudzirwa uku. Asi mutungamiriri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti havabvumi kuvhundutsirwa nekutyisidzirwa sezvo bumbiro remitemo richivabvumidza kuita izvi. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti ichaita musangano neMuvhuro nevamiriri vesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, wekuzeya nezvezvichemo zvevashandi vehurumende. Asi mamwe masangano evarairidzi, anosanganisira PTUZ neZIMTA, anoti akabuda muApex Council akaumba sangano reFederation Of Zimbabwe Educators’ Unions (FOZEU), kuitira kuti vazvimirire mukurwira zvichemo zvavo sevarairidzi. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo nguva yareba vadzidzisi vachitambura uye vachiedza kusvitsa zvichemo zvavo kuhurumende asi pasina chinobuda. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Vanoviga Magamba Matatu paHeroes Acre
text: Vakafananobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantine Chiwenga, varadzika magamba matatu ehondo yerusununguko vachiudza nyika kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chave nehukasha hwakanyanya. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vaive gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vaive kurugukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoe Biggie Matiza, pamwe nevaive mukuru wemajeri, VaParadzai Zimondi, avo vavigwa semagamba ehondo. Vachiviga vatatu ava paHeroes Acre, VaChiwenga vati aka ndekekutanga izvi zvichiitika uye zvakonzerwa nedenda reCovid-19. Vati zvinosuwisa kuti vaviga mamwe magamba nhasi mushure mekuradzika mamwe magamba maviri nguva pfupi yapfuura anoti, VaMorton Malianga, pamwe nevaive gurukota redunhu reManicaland, Amai Ellen Gwardzimba, avo vakshaya mushure mekubatwawo neCovid-19. VaChiwenga vati Covid-19 yavadzidzisa kuti munhu wese anofa sezvo iri kuuraya varombo nevapfumi. Vati zvava kuda kuti vanhu vose vabatane mukurwisa denda iri kuti Zimbabwe ikunde chirwere ichi. VaChiwenga vati magamba matatu aya kashanda zvakasimba kuti veruzhinji vave neraramo yakanaka kubva muna 1980 kusvika pakushaya kwavo. Vatsanangura VaMoyo semunhu aidadisa kushanda naye vakati kunyange vakabuda muchiuto, vakaramba vachiita basa guru rekugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika. Vatiwo VaZimondi vakavandudza nekusimudzira majeri munyika. VaChiwenga vatiwo VaMatiza vange vari kuita basa guru rekugadzirisa migwagwa nenhandare munyika. VaMoyo vakashaya musi wa21 Ndira, VaMatiza naVaZimondi vakashaya musi wa22 Ndira. Kunyange hazvo mitemo weWorld Health Organisation uchiti vanofan neCovid-vanofanira kuvigwa mukati memazuva matatu, vatatu ava vachengetwa mazuva aya adarika. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vatii mutemo unofanira kutevedzwa zvisinei kuti munhu igamba here kana kuti kwete.
