Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 pajekerere. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzivisa veruzhinji kuti mishonga ichashandiswa ichange ichibva kumakambani api uye kutsanangurira vanhu kuti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba iyi huchange hwakamira sei. Zvichakadai, vatori venhau vese vaenda kuHeroes Acre vaongororwa paHeroes Acre pakare kuti vane hutachiwana hweCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: Godobori rosimudzira karate
text: CHIREMBA wechivanhu wemuguta reHarare, Sekuru Tasvu, avo kumusha vanobva kuMukumbura, kuMt Darwin, vosimudzira vechidiki mumutambo wekarate.   “Ini ndichikura kumusha kwangu kuMukumbura ndaifarira zvetsiva kana kuti mhanda nekudaro ndauya kuno kuHarare, ndinopinda mumitambo iyi yekarate netsiva ndichinzwa matambudziko akatarisana nevechidiki ava.   “Ndava kusvitsa makore maviri ndichibatsira vatambi vekarate. Izvozvi ndine vakomana vatatu vaiva vashaya mari yekukwira ndege kuenda kuJapan, ndakavatengera matikiti ekuenda nekudzoka uye kuvabatsira nemari yekudya nepekunogara,” vanodaro Sekuru Tasvu.   Vanoti vanofara nekuda kwechikwata chevakomana ava sezvo mumwe wavo akanouya nemenduru.   “Munguva pfupi yadarika, ndakaendesa chimwe chikwata cheKarate kunyika yeSouth Africa, ndikavabatsira nemari yekukwira mabhazi nepekunorara nekudya kusvikira vadzoka,” vanodaro Sekuru Tasvu.   Sensei Malvern Chomusora (37), uyo ane Black Belt Second Dun mumutambo wekarate weKyokshin, mumwe wevatambi vakabatsirwa kuenda kuJapan naSekuru Tasvu uko anoti kwaikwikwidzwa nenyanzvi dzakabva kunyika makumi maviri neimwe dzepasi rino.   “Takasarudzwa kuno kuti tinomirira mutambo wekarate kuJapan pamutambo unoitwa gore rogaroga. Musi wa9 Mbudzi wasvika pataifanirwa kunge tichienda, mari yakashaika kusvikira Sekuru Tasvu vakazopindira ndokutenga matikiti endege uye ndokubatsira nezvimwe zvaidiwa ikoko.   Tine mumwe chete akazotadza kukwira ndege nekuda kwemitemo ine chekuita nekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19, asi zvose zvainge zvabhadharwa,” anodaro Sensei Chomusora.    Sekuru Tasvu   Anoti vakakwikwidza mumutambo weHeavy Weight Category ndokutora nhamba yechitatu apo vakapihwa menduru yebhuronzi.   “Ndinonyanya kutenda Sekuru Tasvu nekutambanudza kwavo ruoko uyewo tine vamwe vakadai seBoss CAG Buses naVaMangena vakabatsirawo murwendo urwu.   “Tinotarisira kuti mweya wakadai ucharamba uchipinda mune vakawanda kuti vasimudzire mutambo wedu wekarate nemimwe yakasiyana muno,” anodaro Sensei Chomusora.

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pagumi nevasere kana kuti 18 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vashanu vashaya. Vanhu vatatu vakafa vari munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana vamwe vaviri vakafa vari munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vaabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevashanu kana kuti 985. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu vatatu nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa uye mumwe akachitapurirwa munyika. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemasere kana kuti 288 ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevatatu 183, Mashonaland Central ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanova gumi nemumwe. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere kana kuti 88 000. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa kwechirwere checoronavirus huri kuramba huchiwedzera, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vave nemazuva makumi maviri nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakaudza dare resenate kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuita hurukuro nevashandi vayo vari kuramwa kuita mabasa. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti vari kusangana Muvhuro uno neveHealth Services Board vanoona nezvemari dzinotamburiswa vashandi vemuzvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Onetsana neVanotengesera Mumigwagwa yeGuta reHarare
text: Vanotengesa mumigwagwa varwisana nemapurisa ekanzuru neZimbabwe Republic Police ayo ange achida kuvabvisa mumigwagwa nechisimba uye pakuvara mapurisa nevanotengesa vane chitsama mukurwisana uku. Vanotengesera mumigwagwa varwisawo mapurisa vachiatema nematombo. Mapurisa ekanzuru neZimbabwe Republic Police ange achitenderera neguta achisunga nekutora zvinhu zvevanotengesa mumigwagwa kubva mangwanani izvo zvazotsamwisa vazhinji vatanga kurwisa mapurisa panguva dzekuma12 masikati. Zvitoro zvakawanda nemabhanga mumigwagwa yakaita saFirst, Jason Moyo, George Silundika naAngwa avhara apo mapurisa ange ave kurwisana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa. Veruzhinji vakurira mapurisa ayo apinda mumarori awo akatiza ndokuzodzoka chinguvana ave nezvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pamwe nemotokari dzine mvura inovava. Muparurisa anodzivirira nyonganyonga azokokwawo kuzopedza mvongamupopoto yange yave muguta. Meya veHarare, VaHebert Gomba, vaudza vatori venhau kuti kanzuru haisi kurwisana nevanotengesa mumigwagwa uye iri kutaurirana navo kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakatarwa kuti vatengesere. Asi vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vari kuona kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa vaenda kunzvimbo dzavanofanira kutengesera. Vati mangwana chaiwo vachaita musangano nevanhu ava kuti vazeye nyaya iyi. Munyori mutsva weguta reHarare, VaHosia Chisango, avo vawana basa iri nhasi vatiwo vanhu vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisingaite uye kubvira pavakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa vanhu mumigwagwa, guta rachena. Vati chirongwa ichi chicharamba chichienderera mberi kudzamara dambudziko rekorera rapera muguta. Vaviri ava vatiwo zvichitevera kubuda kwekorera muguta pamwe nezvakaitwa nehurumende kuti yave State of Emergency, zvimwe zviri kuitwa muguta zviri kuitwa nehurumende uye vati ivo havazive kuti zvinhu zviri kutorerwa vanhu zviri kuendeswa kupi. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa reVendor Initiative for Socio-Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane nhengo dzesangano ravo nhatu dzakuvara munyonga nyonga yanhasi. VaWadzayi vatiwo vashamisika zvikuru nekuita kwemapurisa sezvo paine musangano wavachaita mangwana nekanzuru nevese vane chekuita nenyaya iyi. VaWadzayi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakaudza hurumende kuti nyaya yekubvisa vanhu mumigwagwa nechimbi chimbi haiite uye kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare pasi voita nhaurirano nechinangwa chekuti munhu wese akwanisa kuita basa rake akasununguka. Hurumende yakamisa mabasa ekutengesera mumigwagwa mumadhorobha ese munyika senzira yekudzivirira chirwere chekokera icho chinokonzerwa netsvina. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Zvakanyanya Vadzidzi Vakawanda Munyika
text:
Huwandu hwevadzidzi vari kuramba vachibatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 horamba huchikwira kuMasvingo nemamwe matunhu. Izvi zvinotevera kubudiswa kwemashoko evana vakabatwa nedenda iri
nezuro mudunhu Masvingo ayo anoti vana makumi matanhatu nevashanu
vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro muzvikoro zvitanhatu. Bazi revehutano rinoti mwana mumwe chete akabatwa paMashoko High nevana makumi maviri paChinorumba High kuBikita, vana vatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi paGutu High, vana makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa paMushayavanu High uye paDeure High pakabatwa vana gumi nevatanhatu. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Joyce Mhungu, vati vave kutyira hupenyu hwevana vavo uye kukanganisika kwedzidzo muvana nenyaya yedenda iri. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Entrance Takaedza, vati huremende yakamhanyira kuvhura zvikoro isina kugadzirira kudzivirirwa kwedenda iri zvakanaka muzvikoro.

Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati dambudziko iri ratekeshera muzvikoro zvose zviri munyika. Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende
yakange yakagadzirira asi kuti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vakauya vane chirwere ichi muzvikoro. Mutauriri weProvincial Covid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers
Irimayi, vati panodiwa zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vana mirawo
yekudzivirira denda iri muzvikoro kuti ridzikire.

Vamwe vabereki vanoti vava kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachatadza kugadzirira kunyora bvunzo dzavo, kana kutotadza kunyora bvunzo idzi nepamusana pekurwara nedenda reCovid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vapfumbamwe vakashaya nedenda reCovid-19 nezuro munyika yose, uye vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu 285 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu, uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nevasere, 127, 368. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika vave mamirioni maviri
nezviuru mazana mapufumbamwe nezvisere nemazana mashanu ane gumi nevana, 2 908 514. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nechiuru chimwe chete nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi masere nevanomwe, 2,001
987. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti iri kuda kubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19

headline: South Africa neAmerica Dzoronga Kudzika Mitemo Inochengetedza Mabasa eZvizvarwa Zvadzo
text: Bato reANC muSouth Africa rinonzi riri kuronga kuti padzikwe mutemo unoderedza huwandu hwevanhu vekunze vanenge vachishanda munyika iyi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro, munyori mukuru webato reANC, VaGwede Mantashe, vanonzi vakati bato ravo rakabuda nechisungo chekuti zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa hazvingarambi zvichitorerwa mabasa nevekunze. Bato iri rinonzi richazeya zvakare nyaya yekutorwa kwemabasa nevekunze iyi kumusangano waro mukuru uchaitwa muna Zvita gore rino, uko kunotarisirwa kuti hurongwa hwekuti pave nemutemo wakadai hunogona pasiswa zvisina dambudziko. Kana mutemo uyu ukabudirira, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinonzi zvinogona kurasikirwa nemabasa, zvikuru mumakambani anoita zvekuvaka, zvekubika zvekudya pamwe nemumapurazi. Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Muzvare Diana Zimbudzana, vanoti havazivi kuti chiri kukurudzirwa neANC chitsva chii, sezvo pagara paine mutemo nechekare wekuti makambani anosungirwa kupinza vekunze vangani mabasa. Zvichakadaro, mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vazivisa nezvebhiri remutemo uri kuronga kudzikwa, uyo uchaderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda vachizogara munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. Mukutanga kwegore rino maseneta maviri anoti VaTom Cotton naVaDavid Pardue vakaparura mutemo unogona kudimura huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda vachigara kubva pamiriyoni imwe chete kuenda pamazana mashanu ezviuru pagore roga-roga. Bhiri iri, iro risati rapinda mudare reseneti, riri kukurudzirawo kuderedzwa kwemhuri dzemunhu anopinda muAmerica semushandi, kumisa chirongwa chekuhwinhisa vanhu mavhiza ekunogara muAmerica che diversity visa lottery, uyewo kuomesa nzira dzekuwana nadzo mvumo yekushanda kuburikidza ne “green card”. No media source currently available

headline: Argentina yaMessi yatiza neWorld Cup
text: ARGENTINA ndiyo shasha dzepasi rese zvichitevera kukunda kwayaita France 4-2 kumapena mumutambo we2022 FIFA World Cup uyo watambwa manheru ano kunyika yeQatar.   Mutambo uyu, uyo wange uchinakidza kukunda ngoma kurira, wange wapera uri mangange 3-3.   Uyu ndiwo wangu uri mutambo wekupedzisira waLionel Messi achitambira nyika yake sezvo akati panopera mutambo wefainari ari kubva asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira Argentina.   Mumutambo wanhasi, Messi anwisa kaviri kuchiti Kylian Mbappe weFrance akanda katatu achidzosa chikwata chake mumutambo uyu.   Mbappe ndiye abva ahwina golden boot kuWorld Cup sezvo anwisa kasere kumitambo iyi.   France, iyo yange iine vatambi vayo vazhinji vane madzinza ekuAfrica, ndiyo yange iine mukombe uyu mushure mekuutora muna2018.

headline: Hurumende neVashandi Vayo Votadza Kuwirirana paNyaya yeMihoro
text: Musangano pakati pevamiriri vehurumende nevamiriri vevashandi vehurumende weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo wanga wakatarisirwa nevakawanda kuti uchaburitsa chimuko, unonzi hauna chawaburitsa mushure mekunge vashandi varamba mari yanga yaiswa patafura nehurumende. Zvinonzi hurumende yanga yati inokwanisa kuwedzera vashandi vayo mihoro nemadhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamunhu iri mari yemaRTGS, iyo inonzi yarambwa nevamiriri vevashandi ava. Hurumende inonzi yati inokwanisa kuwedzera mari idzi nemari inoita zana nemakumi masere emamiroyoni emari yeRTGS semari ichawedzerwa kubva muna Chikunguru kusvika panopera gore muna Zvita. Izvi zvinosiya mushandi mumwe chete achiwedzerwa nemaRTGS makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamwedzi wega wega. Vashandi vari munhaurirano idzi vanga vachimirira nemasangano avo vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu nezvipfumbamwe, kunynage hazvo mamwe masangano akaita seProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe asina kupinda mumusangano uyu. Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, neMuvhuro vakazivisa nyika kuti hurumende yaizozivisa neChipiri nezvemari yairi kuda kuwedzera nayo vashandi vayo, avo vari kuchema kuti vave kukwangwaya nenhamo. Pari zvino mushandi wepasi muhurumende anonzi ari kutambira mari inosvika madhora mazana mana nemakumi matatu yemaRTGS pamwedzi. Vashandi vari kuchema kuti mari yavo haichatenge chinhu sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichikwira panguva iyo mihoro yavo isina kwairi kuenda. Sachigaro vesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vashandi vapinda mumusangano uyu vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichapa mushandi wepasi mari inoita RTGS$4750.00 pamwedzi. Amai Alexander vanoti vashandi vehurumende vakatovazivisa kare kuti kana pasina chabuda kubva mumusangano uyu, vanofanirwa kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwavakange vanahwo muna Kurume hwekukanda mapadza pasi. Vanoti sevashandi, vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichadzoka kwavari svondo rino risati rapera, uye ivo vachasanganawo seApex Council nemusi weChitatu kuti vapire nhengo dzavo zvabuda mumusangano uyu pamwe nekuti varonge gwara rekutora kuenda mberi. No media source currently available

headline: ‘80% yevatambi veZim vanonwa Bronco’
text: MURAIRIDZI weBulawayo City, Philani ‘Beefy’ Ncube, otaura mashoko anokatyamadza zvikuru ekuti chikamu che80 percent chevatambi venhabvu vanotora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri, kunyanya Broncleer.   Ncube akataura izvi pamutambo wakaona chikwata chake chichisangana neHighlanders apo vakahwina 1-0, achiti  mumwe mutambi wemuchikwata ichi aive akadhakwa, ndokuti, “Ndinoziva kuti ichokwadi anotora zvinodhaka”.   “Regai ndikuudzei, 80 percent yevatambi vemuZimbabwe vanotora zvinodhaka. Handichataure mazita, asi patakatamba neHighlanders, pange pane mutambi mumwe chete wemuchikwata chavo ange akatodhakwa. Aingovata. Saka ndinotoziva kuti anotora zvinodhaka. Ipapo wonzwa vamwe vachiti murairidzi ngaadzingwe basa,” anodaro Ncube uyo anotaura zvaanoda akasununguka uye achizivikanwa kuti haatsengi mazwi ake.   Anoti dambudziko guru nderekuti vamwe vatsigiri ndivo vane mhosva yekutengesa zvinodhaka izvi zvisingatenderwi mumuviri kuvatambi.   Anoti kutorwa kwezvinodhaka kwakazonyanya kuwedzerwa nekuuya kwakaita denda reCovid-19.   “Dambudziko guru nderekuti vamwe vatsigiri ndivo vanotengesera vakomana zvinodhaka izvi. Asi ndivo vanhu vanezenge vave kuti Mandla Mpofu, Joey Antipas kana Beefy ngaaende,” anodaro Ncube.   Anoti matambiro ave kuita chikwata chake mwaka uno, izvo zvaona Amakhosi ichitora zvibodzwa zvina mumitambo miviri yadarika, inyaya yekugadzirisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka.   “Chandakaudza vakomana ndechekuti vanofanirwa kuzvisunda vega. Ndakavaudza kuti vasiyane nezvinodhaka votanga kuvimba nezvavanoita. Vechidiki ava vari kuzvikanganisa nekutora zvinodhaka. Zvinosiririsa nekuti mangwana varairidzi tisu tozopomerwa mhosva.   “Asi chokwadi vari kutungamira vatambi ava vanofanirwa kugara navo pasi vokurukura nhau dzine chekuita nekutorwa kwezvinodhaka,” anodaro.   Ncube anoenderera mberi achiti, “Mwaka usati watanga, PSL inofanirwa kuunza vanamazvikokota vodzidzisa vakomana kuti kune hupenyu mberi Covid-19 yapera. Iyi inyaya isina kumbobatwa-batwa kusvika nanhasi chaiye.   “Vakomana vange vachitora zvinodhaka senzira yehupenyu hwavo. Nyaya yekutora zvinodhaka iyi ichavakanganisa mwedzi mina inotevera. PSL neFootballers Union of Zimbabwe vanofanirwa kutora matanho nyaya yacho isati yaenderera mberi. Ndokuzivisa kuti vakomana ava vanogona kupasa kuvhenekwa Covid-19 kwete kutariswa zvinodhaka. Chimwe chinorwadza ndechekuti kana kuvatambi vechidiki zvatozara.”   Nyanzvi yezveutano kuZimbabwe Olympic Committee arizve chiremba wemaWarriors, Nick Munyonga, anoti hurongwa huripo hwekurwisa kutorwa kwezvinodhaka, asi kushaikwa kwemari ndiro dambudziko.   “Muchaona kuti senyika tinoita ongororo yekuvheneka vatambi kakawanda kuburikidza nerutsigiro runobva kugurukota rezvemitambo uye neWorld Anti-doping pamitambo yakasiyana kana zvikwata zvichigadzirira kunokwikwidza.   “Takanyorera kuPSL tikavapa mabhajeti kuti pagoitwa zvirongwa zvekuvheneka vatambi. Tinoitisa zvidzidzo munyika yese. Zvirongwa zviripo hazvo asi kwete zvepamusoro nekuda kwenhau yemari.   “Kuvheneka munhu mumwe chete panodiwa US$500, kusanganisira mari yekufambisa. Saka imari yakawanda, asi tinoziva kuti gurukota redu riri kuedza kugadzira bhajeti kuburikidza neZOC,” anodaro Mushonga uyo anove zvekare sachigaro weAfrica Zone V1 Region Anti-doping.

headline: World Cup: Makochi 7 varova pasi
text: VARAIRIDZI venhabvu vanomwe venyika dzakabuda mumakwikwi eFIFA Qatar 2022 World Cup vakatosiya basa zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa zvikwata zvavo.   Apo mitambo yeWorld Cup yegore rino yasvika pamasemi-final iyo ichaona zvikwata zvinoti Argentina ichisangana neCroatia uye France ichitamba neMorocco, varairidzi vanomwe vaive kumutambo uyu vakatosiya basa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita zvikwata zvavo kuQatar.   Murairidzi weMexico – Gerardo “Tata” Martino – ndiye akaita wekutanga “kurova pasi” pakaburitswa chikwata chake icho chakatadza kubuda muboka racho muGroup C umo maive nezvikwata zvinoti Argentina, Poland neSaudi Arabia.   Argentina bedzi ndiyo yasara muGroup C.   Martino akateverwa naRoberto Martinez uyo airairidza Belgium akasiyawo basa kuchikwata chemaRed Devils apo chakatadza kubuda muboka racho reGroup F umo maive nezvikwata zvinoti Morocco, Croatia neCanada.   Morocco neCroatia dzichirimo kubva muGroup F.    Roberto Martinez   Belgium ichienda kumutambo weWorld Cup, chikwata ichi pasi rose chaive chakagara pachidanho chechipiri panyika dzinotamba nhabvu, asi kuWorld Cup yakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe, ikakundwa mumwe 2-0 neMorocco ndokuzoita mangange 0-0 neCroatia izvo zvakaona ichidzokera kumusha. Pakapera mutambo weCroatia, Martinez akazivisa kuti haasi kuzoenderera mberi ari murairidzi wenyika iyi.   Aive murairidzi weGhana – Otto Addo – akaita murairidzi wechitatu kusiya basa rake zvichitevera kutadza kubudirira kwakaita maBlack Stars kubuda muboka ravo muGroup H.    Otto Addo   Ado akataura kuti ari kusiya basa iri kuti adzokere kuGermany kunoshanda basa rake iro ange achiita kuchikwata cheBorussia Dortmund sa“talent coach”.   Ado akataura achiti aive ane chitsidzo chekuti World Cup painopera aizosiya basa rekurairidza Ghana kunyangwe ikasimudza mukombe uyu.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita Korea Republic muRound of 16 neBrazil mumutambo uyo yakakundwa 4-1, murairidzi weKorea Republic, Paulo Bento akabva akandawo mapfumo pasi.    Paulo Bento   Paulo Bento achisiya basa, Luis Enrique akabva amutevera uyo akadzingwa neSpain zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaita La Roja neMorocco.   La Roja yakaburitswa nemaAtlas Lions mumapena sezvo mutambo wezvikwata zviviri wainge wapera uri mangange 0-0.   Enrique akabva atsiviwa naLuis de la Fuente uyo ange achirairidza chikwata cheSpain Under-21.    Luis Enique   Enrique achingodzingwa, akabva ateverwa naTite weBrazil uyo akasiya basa maawa maviri chikwata chake chaburitswa muquarter-final yemutambo weWorld Cup neCroatia.   Chikwata chemaSamba Boys chaitarisirwa zvakawanda kuQatar sezvo change chizere nevatambi vane mukurumbira, asi chakadzorerwa kumusha neCroatia izvo zvakatuma Tite kusiya basa.    Tite   Murairidzi wechinomwe kusiya basa ndiLouis van Gaal uyo ange achiraidza Netherlands.    Louis van Gaal   Van Gaal akasiya mushure mekunge chikwata chake chaburitswa muquarter-final neArgentina uye akabva atotsiviwa naRonald Koeman uyo akamborairidza chikwata ichi kare.

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa, Vana veChikoro Makumi Matatu neVana (34) Vachibatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 691. Vanhu makumi matanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye pavanhu ava pane vane vechikoro makumi matatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Pavana ava makumi maviri vari kuMatabelaland South, gumi nevana vari kuMasvingo. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid 19 vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mana nemasere ane mazana matanhatu negumi kana kuti 3 408 610. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2 669 749. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda,

headline: Varairidzi Vanombomisa Kuramwa Mabasa Mushure meMusangano neHurumende
text: Varairidzi vanga vachiramwa mabasa vachida kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo zvemihoro nemari nekubatsirikana, vanoti vambomisa kuramwa mabasa uku mushure mekuvimbiswa nehurumende kuti iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera musangano wechimbichimbi waitwa nevamiriri vevaraidzi vemasangano ose evarairidzi negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima masikati. Nhengo yerimwe remasangano apinda mumusangano uyu, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaAbiot Moyo, avo vanomirira varairidzi vakaremara, vanoti masangano ose awirirana kuti vambopa hurumende mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu, ivo vachimbomisawo kuramwa mabasa uku. VaMoyo vanoti vari kutarisira kusangana zvakare nevamiriri vehurumende pakati pesvondo rino. Vanotiwo hurumende yavavimbisa kuti vose vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa havasi kuzotorerwa matanho sezvakanga zvamboziviswa neboka reCivil Service Commission, iyo yakanga yazivisa kuti vose vakaramwa mabasa vaizobatirwa mari dzemazuva avasina kushanda. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata Muzvinafundo Mavhima kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Guta reHarare Rotarisira Mibhedha Inodarika Mazana Matanhatu Ichashndiswa neVarwere veCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti kutanga svondo rinouya dunhu reHarare richange rave nemibhedha mitsva inodarika mazana matanhatu muzvipatara zveveruzhinji, uye mibhedha makumi mana nemiviri ichange iri mibhedha yevaye vanorwara zvakanyanya kana kuti vanenge vaiswa muchikamu cheIntensive Care Unit, (ICU). Izvi zvaziviswa nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, mushure mekushanyira zvimwe zvipatara zvichange zvichirapa varwere veCovid-19, zvakaita seParirenyatwa, Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Diseases Hospital. VaMangwiro, avo vange vaine gurukota redunhu reHarare, VaOliver Chidhau, vati vari kufara chose negadziriro iri kuitwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa icho chichange chave chipatara chikuru chinorapa Covid-19 munyika yose. VaMangwiiro vati pane zvinhu zvishomanana zvakatengwa kuSouth Africa zviri kusvika mukupera kwesvondo uye svondo rinouya, chipatara ichi chinenge chave kutambira varwere veCovid 19. Parirenyatwa ichange iine mibhedha mazana mana nemakumi mashanu uye makumi maviri nemisere inenge iri yeICU. Wilkins, iyo iri kurapa varwere veCovid 19, ine mibhedha makumi matanhatu nemumwe chete, mishanu iri yeICU. Kana ichinge yapera kugadzirwa, Beatrice ichange yave nemibhedha makumi masere, gumi iri yeICU. Dr Mangwiro vati chinofadza ndechekuti kuParirenyatwa neWilkims michina inobatsira varwere kufema kana kumaVentilators, atoveko. PaParirenyatwa vashandi vange vari mushishi rekugadzira mipanda kuchikamu cheCovid-19 uye zvinhu zvizhinji zvatove muWard. Vakuru vepachipatara ichi vati pane zvavakamirira kubva kuSouth Africa zvekuisa mumaTheatres nemaLabaoratories zvekuti svondo rinouuya chipatara ichi chinenge chave kurapa pamwe nekuvheneka hutachiwana hweCoronavirus, Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Proper Chonzi, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo chipatara chavo cheWilkins chave kukwanisa kurapa varwere veCovid -19, vachiri kuda zvekushandisa zvakawanda. Pavanhu vese makumi matatu nevanomwe vakakabatwa neCovid 19, makumi mashanu vakarapwa paWilkins, uye pavana vakafa, vaviri vakafira pachipatara ichi. Pari zvino paWilkins pane murwere mumwe weCovid 19 ari pachipatara ichi. Gurukota redunhu reHarare , VaOliver Chidhau, vati vangafara chose kana pakava nemibhedha inodarika chiuru yakamirira varwere beCovid -19 chete mudunhu ravo rese. Kunyange hazvo zvipatara zviri kuhadzirwa kuti zvikwanise kurapa Covid-19, Dr Mangwiro vati kana chirwere ichi chikaparira zvakanyanya, vachashandisa nhandare dzenhabvu nemimwe mitambo, nezvivakwa zvakaita semachechi kurapira varwere veCovid-19. Zimbabwe, senyika dzakawanda pasi rose, yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwe corona virus, uhwo hunokonzera chirwere che Covid-19. Kusvika pari zvino, chirwere ichi, icho chakatanga kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana nemazana mana ezviuru, uye chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Vaimbove Varwiri veRusununguko Vokumbira Veruzhinji Ruregerero
text: Vamwe vevaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vakumbira ruregerero kuruzhinji rwavanhu vavakatyorera kodzero dzavo muzimbabwe, vachiti kubva nhasi zvichienda mberi, havasi kuzobvuma kushandiswa nevezvematongerwo enyika, sezvavakaitwa nebato reZanu PF. Mashoko aya abuda apo vaimbove varwiri vehondo ava vanga vachiparura boka idzva rinokurudzira runyararo munyika rinonzi War Veterans Peace Initiative Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, vaimbove varwiri vehondo ava, avo vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe National War Veterans Association, ZNLWVA, vanoti munyika hamuna runyararo izvo zvinotadzisa budiriro mukati menyika. Munyori mukuru muboka idzva reWar Veterans Peace Intiative, VaZvakanyorwa Wilbert Sadomba, vati zvinosuwisa kuti makore makumi matatu nemanomwe nyika yawana kuzvitonga, muZimbabwe machine mweya wehondo nemhirizhonga, uye vamwe vavo vachiri kushandiswa kuita zvemhirizhonga. VaSadomba vati izvi ndozvapa kuti vapinde muhurongwa hwekuvaka hwaro hwerusununguko VaSadomba, avo vari muchikwata chinotsigira VaChris Mutsvangwa, sachigaro weZNLWVA, vati apo nyika yakatarisana nesarudzo dza2018, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvofanirwa kubatana mukurwisa mhirizhonga kuitira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye murunyararo. VaSadomba vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti munyika machine vanhu vasingadi runyararo, vane zvavanowana nemhirizhonga Vachipa muenzaniso waSaul wemubhaibheri, sachigaro weboka rerunyararo iri, VaWilfred Marimo, vati sevarwi verusununguko vanokumbira kuregererwa neruzhinji pane zvavanopomerwa uye zvakaitwa nevamwe vavo vaimbunyikidza veruzhinji. VaMarimo vati vanotarisira kushanda nemasangano akasiyana siyana mukuparidza shoko rerusununguko. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, VaTinashe Muzamhindo, vanoti zviri kuirwa nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko zvinoratidza kuti vava kuonawo zvavaitadza uye danho ravatora rekukumbira ruregerero rinoita kuti vabatane nevamwe mukurwira kodzero dzemunhu wese. Sangano reZimbabwe National War Veterans Association rine zvikwata zviri kurwira masimba, chimwe chikwata chichitungamirwa naVaPatrick Nyaruwata, chimwe naVaMutsvangwa. Makatanwa aya panyaya yehutungamiri ari mumatare edzimhosva, kunyange hazvo paine mutongo wekuti chikwata chaVaMutsvangwa ndicho chinocherechedzwa nemutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Zim shasha yeIKF Africa Champions
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Korfball chakasimudza mureza wenyika kuZambia uko chakahwina mukombe weInternational Korfball Federation (IKF) Africa Champions ndokuwana tikiti rekunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup iyo ichatambirwa kuChinese Taipei gore rinotevera.   Achitaura vachangodzoka kubva kuZambia, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Korfball Association arizve mutungamiri weIKF Africa – Tarirai Chadebah – anoti chikwata chavo chine mufaro mukuru nekukunda kwachakaita.   Kuhwina kwavakaita kuZambia kunoreva kuti Zimbabwe pari zvino ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yese mumutambo wekorfball. Africa ichange ichamirirwa neZimbabwe neMorocco iyo yakahwina mutambo werimwe boka reNorthern Region.   “Senyika, tiri kufara kuti takakunda kuZambia ndokuhwina tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup ichatambwa gore rinotevera kuChinese Taipei.   “Kuhwina tikiti iri pamwe chete neMorocco kunoreva kuti senyika tiri kufamba mugwara chairo uye tiri kuziva zvatiri kuita. Saka tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba kuti tirambe tichisimukira mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.   Anoti chikwata chavo hachisi kumbozvipa nguva yekuzorora nekuti vanoda kubva vatotanga gadziriro dzeWorld Cup izvozvi.   “Tinoziva kuti patinoenda kuWorld Cup tinotarisirwa pasi asi isu tinoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu tigovarakidza kuti tiri shashawo.   “Saka hatina nguva yekuzorora, takangobva kuZambia ndokusvika takutotanga kuronga rwendo rwedu rwekuenda kuChinese Taipei kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Chadebah.

headline: ARTUZ Inopedza Kongiresi Yayo Ichiti Kushandira Mahara Kwete
text: Kongiresi yeAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, yapetwa muGweru sangano iri richibuda nezvisungo zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kusadzokere kubasa kwevarairidzi panovhurwa zvikoro svondo rinouya. Musangano uyu wasarudza vatungamiri vatsva vana kuti vave vamwe vevatungamiri vatanhatu vanoumba National Executive Council yesangano iri. VaObert Masaraure vanoramba vari mutungamiri wesangano iri, ukuwo VaRobson Chere, vari munyori mukuru mushure mekunge vaviri ava vasarudzwa pasina avakwikwidza. Aitwa mutevedzeri waVaMasaraure, ndiMuzvare Gaudencia Mandiopera; ukuwo vasarudzwa kuva mutevedzeri waVaChere, ndiVaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa. Asarudzwa kuvamutauriri weArtuz ndiVaNation Mudzitirwa, ukuwo Muzvare Brenda Musavengana vaitwa mubati wehomwe. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, avo vange vari munyarikani pamusangano uyu, vakorokotedza ARTUZ nekukwanisa kuita kongiresi yayo zvisinei nekuoma kwakaita zvimhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vose munyika vabatane kuti vakwanise kubuda mumatambudziko avari. VaMasaraure vabvuma kuti kubatana kwakakosha vakati sangano ravo richaramba richiedza kushanda nemamwe masangamo kuti kubatana uku kuvepo. VaChere vaudza Studio7 kuti chimwe chezvisungo zvabuda ndechekuti varairidzi havazi kuzodzokera kuzvikoro pazvinivhurwa asi vati izvi hazvirevi kuti vari kuramwa mabasa. Vamwe varairidzi vange vari pamusangano uyu vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotsigira zvizere zvisungo zvabuda izvi. Muzvare Mary Mupatsi, avo vanodzidzisa kuSilobela, vati varairidzi vekumaruwa vari kurarama hupenyu hwakaoma. Sangano reARTUZ rakavambwa mugore ra2014, uye kongiresi inotevera ichaitwa mushure memakore mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovaxin Konetsa Vanhu Vakawanda muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovaxin vanoti vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba kuti vabayiwe nhomba yepiri. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti kabhodhoro kamwe chete kenhomba iyi, kanofanirwa kushandiswa kubaya vanhu gumi kana kachinge kavhurwa. Izvi zvabuda mutsvagiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 mushure mekunge yanzwa kuti pave nedambudziko guru rekuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin. Izvi zviri kuitika munzvimbo zhinji munyika yose. Mumwe wevanhu vakamirira kubayiwa nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin, Amai Simbiso Sinyoro,vati vaifanirwa kubayiwa nhomba iyi musi wa30 Chikumi, asi izvi hazvisati zvaitika. Amai Sinyoro vati kunyange hazvo vakawana kune nhomba iyi kuchipatara kuMbare vakaudzwa kunzi vanofanirwa kumirira kuti vanhu vatange vasvika gumi kuti vabayiwe nhomba iyi. Mumwe mukoti anobaya nhomba ataura neStudio 7 asina kuda kubuda pamhepo atiwo nhomba yavanayo yeCovaxin haigoni kuvhurwa kana pasina vanhu vakakwana vekubaya nhomba iyi. Mukoti uyu ati vanonyora mazita evanhu vozovazivisa kuti vauye kuzobayiwa musi wakati kana vanhu ava vakwana gumiAtsanangurawo kuti vanonyora vanhu mazita vozovazivisa kana vakwana gumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vachimiririra Chinhoyi mudare reNational Assembly, VaPeter Mataruse, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kumboshaikwa kwemishonga uku kunogona kuzokanganisa mashandiro akanaka enhomba. VaMataruse vatiwo zvekudzosera vanhu vambouya kuzobaiwa vasina kuwana nhomba zvinokonzerawo kuti vamwe vaore moyo vobva varega zvachose kubayiwa nhomba iyi. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati pan homba dzakadai, zvipatara zvinofanirwa kuzivisa veruzhinji mazuva ekuenda kunobayiwa nhomba kuitira kuti vagare vakagadzirira. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo ranga risati rawana zvinyunyuto zvekuti vari kuda nhomba yeCovaxin vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba vasati vabayiwa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kutambira nhomba dzeCovaxin zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, 35 000, kubva kuIndia muna Chivabvu, uye yakava nyika yemuAfria kutanga kushandisa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe ine mhando ina dzenhomba yeCovid-19 dzinoti Sinovax, Sinopharm, Sputnik V neCovaxin. Hurumende inoti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga kusvika nezuro vakanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvivatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe 793,077, uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezvisere nezana nemakumi matatu nevatatu, 568,133. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika. Hurumende yakazivisawo nezuro kuti vanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu mazana masere nevapfumbamwe, 809, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevasere (1878) . Vanhu vabatwa neCovid -19 munyika yose vava zviuru makumi mashanu nezvina nemazana mana ane nemakumi manomwe nevana, 54, 474. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichizivisa zvayawana nhasi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Voteerera Kurudziro yeHurumende yeKufamba Vakapfeka "maMask"
text: Vanhu vakawanda vateerera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti vapfeke zvidziviriro ka kuti mamask asi vamwe vachishora hurumende nekutadza kuvapa zvinhu izvi pachena sezvinoitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika munguva yesarudzo zvekupa vanhu nhumbi. Amai Sithembile Kawocha avo vanga vakavhara muromo nemhuno yavo nedhuku ravo rakasakara vanoti kupfeka mask chinhu chakanaka mukudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus asi vanoti hurumende ingadai yakapa vanhu vose mamask aya pachena. Amai Kawocha avo vanoita basa rekutenga nekutengesa vanoti havana mari yekutenga chidziviriro chinokurudzirwa navanachiremba sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi Amai Tafadzwa Karonga. VaMunesu Munesu vanoti zvidziviriro zvinokurudzirwa zviri kudhura nekudaro vakagadzira chavo vega. VaMunesu vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kupfekera mapurisa asi kuchengetedza hutano hwavo. Kurudziro yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamask yakabva yaita kuti mitengo yacho ikwire zvakanyanya. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti mamask ari kutengeswa nemari inobva padhora rimwechete kusvika pamadhora mashanu ekuAmerica. VaJeremiah Maruza vanoti chimwe chiri kunetsa ndechekuti mamaski haasi kuwanikwa uye paanowanikwa anenge achidhurira vakawanda. Vamwe vanhu vanoti mari dzemafaindi kune munhu anowanikwa asina kupfeka mask iyo inobva pamadhora mazana mashanu kusvika pamadhora zvuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu-ZWL$36 000-kana kugara mujeri kwegore kana kuti faindi nekugara mujeri yakawandisa. Mutori wenhau webepa reMirrior VaDennis Kagonye vanoti kupfeka masiki kwakanaka zvikuru asi vanoti mutongo wekusapfeka masiki wakanyanya. Gweta reMISA Zimbabwe Muzvare Nompilo Simanje vanoti mutemo uyu hauna kunyatsojeka uye unogona kuisa vanhu munjodzi. Vanotiwo Zimbabwe inokoshesa zvemitemo inoomesera vanhu kwete kushanda navo kuti vagadzirise matambudziko avanenge vatarisana nawo. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti mutongo wakatarwa nehurumende wakanyanya vachiti hurumende inenge yave kuda kutsvaka mari sezvo dzemitero dzave shoma panguva ino yekuti vanhu vari kunzi vagare mudzimba. Dr Madzorera vanoti mamask anonyanya kushanda kana munhu wese akaapfeka . Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidzawo kuti mapurisa anga asinei nevanhu vanga vasina kupfeka mamasiki mumaguta. Vamwe vezvitoro zvikuru zvakaita seOK, TM, Gain neMetro Peech vanga vasinga bvumire vanhu vanga vasina mamask kupinda muzvitoro zvavo asi change chichishamisa ndechekuti vatengi vange vachizobvisa mamask kana vave mukati vachitenga. Vashandi vemuzvitoro vange vakabvisawo mamask avo. Hurumende yakawedzera mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemasvondo maviri kusvika musi wa17 Chivabvu ichibva yaisa mitemo inosanganisira kupfekwa kwemamask nemunhu wese anenge achifamba paruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoti muZimbabwe Hamuna Runyararo
text: Nyika dzepasi rose dzacherechedza zuva rerunyararo pasi rose, kana kuti International Day of Peace. Asi vakawanda vanoti hapana runyararo muZimbabwe nekuda kwezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Vakawanda vanoti munyika hamuna runyararo nekuda kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kufa kwevanhu vakawanda nechirwere chekorera, kushaya mari kumabhangi, kutadza kutenga zvekudya nekuda kwemitengo yakakwira, pamwe nekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwakaitwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaClifford Jabangwe vanoti hapana runyararo munyika panguva ino apo mapurisa ari kuswera achitandanisa vanhu vanotengesa zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa. VaJabangwe vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kushungurudzwa mupfungwa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaPassmore Nyakureba, vanoti runyararo zvinoreva kugadzikana kwezvinhu mupfungwa nemanzwiro evanhu kana vachirarama munyika. VaNyakureba vanoti vanhu vakawanda hapana chavanopemberera zuva rerunyararo ivo vachirara mumitsetse yemabhangi vachitsvaka mari, vechidiki vasina mabasa uye kuzvipatara vanhu vachifa nekushaya mishonga. Vamwe vagarii vanoti kuurayiwa kwevanhu nemasoja vachiratidzira muHarare mwedzi wapera mucherechedzo wekuti munyika hamuna runyararo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaLangton Mubaiwa, vanoti munyika mune runyararo. VaMubaiwa vanoti zviri kuita mapurisa zvekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa idanho rekuisa runyararo munyika. Chiyero chenyika dzine runyararo cheGlobal Peace Index 2018 chinoratidza kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzakawanda hadzina runyararo rwakakwana sezvinotarisirwa. Global Peace Index 2018 inoratidza kuti Iceland nedzimwe nyika dzakaita seNew Zealand, Austria, Portugal neDenmark ndidzo dziri pamusoro kuve nerunyararo pasi rose. Syria ndiyo inonzi ine mhirizhonga yakawanda pasi rose pamwe nenyika dzakaita seAfghanistan, South Sudan, Iraq pamwe neSomalia. Zuva reInternational Day of Peace rinocherechedzwa musi waGunyana 21 gore rega rega, uye gore rino ndereche makumi manomwe kubva pakatarwa zuva iri kuti richerechedzwe nenyika dzose zdiri muUnited Nations. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Vanoti Mamasiki Ashandiswa Asabatwabatwa Kunze Kwekuarasa
text: Zvichitevera kutaurwa pachena kwekuti vamwe vanhu vari kunhonga zvinoshandiswa kuvhara mhuno nemiromo, mamasiki, (face masks) anoshandiswa nevanhu mukudzivirira chirwere che coronavirus, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rakurudzira vanhu paTwitter paro kuti vanhu vachekecheke mamasiki avashandisa vasati vaarasa kuitira kuti vamwe vanhu vasaanhonga vachiawacha kuti vazoatengesa zvekare. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti vamwe vanhu varikufamba vachinhonga mamasiki akasviba awa, vachiawacha vachizoatengesera kuvanhu zvekare. PaTweeter pavo, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vatore mamasiki avo avashandisa vachiachekacheka vasati vamarasa kudzivirira kuti vamwe vanhu vasazoanonga vachiatengesa zvekare. Asi vamwe vanachiremba vanoti bazi rehurumende rezvehutano ririkukurudzira vanhu kuita zvinovapinza munjodzi dzehutano, vachiti mamasiki ashandiswa anenge ave tsvina isingafanirwi kubatwa asi inofanirwa kuraswa isina kubatwa nemaoko kunyange nemuridzi wayo. Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoshanda mudunhu reNorth Carolina, muAmerica, vanoti kana ‘face mask” yashandiswa, haifanirwi kubwatwa kunze nemuridziwayo asi achiibata zvakanaka uye akachenjera paanoirasa nekuti ndiyo yakabata nekutakura hutachiona hwese hwange huchida kupinda mumuviri wake. Dr Ranga vati kana iri masiki yako unogona kuibata zvakanaka, pakuiwacha nepakuiwomesa kuti ugoishandisa zvekare, iwe muridzi wayo. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakawanda vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana vanhu vakawanda munyika vakabaiwa nhomba yeCovid -19, zvinoderedza njodzi yedenda iri iro ranetsa pasi rose. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vatiwo vanhu vakabaiwa vakawanda zvinoderedza kufamba kwechirwere ichi. VaMadzorera vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumnde izivisewo veruzhinji mashandiro ari kuita nhomba munyika vachiti izvi zvikazivikanwa neveruzhinji zvinobatsirawo mukuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoenda kunobaiwa nhomba idzi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano sezvo takundikana kubata mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano , Doctor John Mangwiro, pamwe nemutauriri webazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu nezuro, uye vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana negumi nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanunevasere(119 508), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemakumi manomwe nevatatu, (4 073). Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave pamamiriyoni mavirinezvuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana(2 013340). Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezvuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe(1 179 687). No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende yeBritain Inoburitsa Gwaro Rinonan'anidza Mamiriro eZvinhu muZimbabwe
text: Hurumende yeBritain neMuvhuro yaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kwainoti kusagadzikana kwezvinhu muZimbabwe munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, kodzero dzevanhu, zveupfumi, mabhizimusi nehuwori. Nyika iyi yayambira kuti nekuda kwezvikonzero izvi, kuita bhizimusi muZimbabwe kune matambudziko nezvimhingamipinyi zvakawanda. Mune zvematongerwo enyika, gwaro reBritain iri rinoti kubva nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980, Zimbabwe ingori pasi pehutongi hweZanu PF uye nyika iri kutarisira kuita dzimwe sarudzo muna 2023. Munyaya yezvehupfumi, Britain inoti Zimbabwe iri kuramba ichisangana nematambudziko anosanganisirawo kushaikwa kwerubatsiro rwunopiwa vanhu vanotambura. Gwaro iri rinotiwo kunyange hazvo goho rakanaka pamwe nekumuka kwehupfumi hwenyika mushure meCovid-19 zvichigona kumborerutsa matambudziko aya, hurongwa hwemuono uri kure weremangwana mune zvemabhizimusi ndihwo hunodiwa. Gwaro reBritain iri rinotiwo Zimbabwe ine nhoroondo yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, izvo zvakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vemauto vana vaiswe pazvirango musi wa 01 Kukadzi zvichitevera kuurayiwa nemauto kwevanhu vairatidzira muna 2018. Zvimwe zviri kusimudzwa mugwaro iri inyaya yechioko muhomwe nehuwori uhwo Britain inoti hwatekeshera zvakazoita kuti itemere muzvinabhizimusi VaKudakwashe Tagwirei zvirango. Gwaro iri rinotarisawo kusagadzikana kwezvemabhizimusi munyika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, avo vari kumusangano weSADC kuMalawi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaCharles Mutasa, vanoti hapana zvitsva zviri mugwaro reBritain iri, sezvo mapoka akawanda anoongorora zvematongerwo enyika agara achisimudza nyaya idzi. Asi VaMutasa vanoti nyaya dzose idzi dzinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti zvinhu zvikane muZimbabwe, vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kuteerera zvinyunyuto zvevanhu zvinosanganisira nyaya yekusaitwa kwesarudzo yema by-election, kugadzirisa nyaya yehuwori, uye kusiyana netsika yekushungurudza vanoonekwa sevanopesana nehurumende pamaonero. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweMadzimai Akazvitakura Ari Kuonekwa neNyanzvi Hwokwira
text: Madzimai akazvitakura muZimbabwe anonzi ave kukoshesa kuenda kune vezveutano kunoongororwa nhumbu dzavo inonzi pachirungu Antenatal Care visits zvichienzaniswa nemakore akare. Mumwe chiremba, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti madzimai akazvitakura vave vachinoonekwa nguva nenguva kuitira kuti kana pane zvinonetsa zvigadziriswe. VaNyamande vatiwo madzimai akazvitakura ari kunoongororwa sezvinotarisirwa asiwo vakati pachine mamwe madzimai anononoka kunyoresa pamuviri kana vasinganoongororwi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naDr Nicholas Wazadza avo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti madzimai akazvitakura apote achinoongororwa vachiti izvi zvinodzikisa hupenyu hwemadzidzimai nevana hunorasika. Mumwe mukuru musangano rinoshanda nemadzimai munyaya dzehutano oasi rose, reUnited Nations Population Fund, Amai Abigail Musemberi, vati madzimai mazhinji ava kukwanisa kunoonekwa kana vabata pamuviri. Amai Musemburi vati zvimwe zvezvipingaidzo zviri kutadzisa kuenda kwemadzimai akazvitakura kunoongororwa inyaya yemufambo unenge uripo. Madzimai aitarisirwa kunovhenekwa pamuviri kana kusvika vabatsirwa asi sangano reWorld Health Organisation rakakwidza kuti madzimai achive achishanyira zvipatara kasere pavanenge vakazvitakura. Amai Musemburi vanoti vachiri kuongorora kuti madzimai ari kuzvigona here ikana kuti kwete zvekuonekwa kasere apo anenge aine pamuviri. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC T Dzopikisa kuMatare Kudomwa kweVatevedzeri veMutungamiri weBato naVaTsvangirai
text: Nhengo mbiri dzebato reMDC T, dzinoti VaPatson Murimoga naVaGeorge Rice dzaendesa mutungamiri webato iri VaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe nebato reMDC T kumatare edzimhosva dzichipikisa kudoma kwavakaita VaElias Mudzuri pamwe naVaNelson Chamisa sevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato iri. Mumagwaro asvitswa kudare repamusoro reHigh Court muHarare nhasi nemagweta eMugiya and Macharaga Law chambers, ayo ari mumaoko eStudio 7, vaviri ava vari kuti ivo mutungamiri webato haana masimba ekudoma vatevedzeri vake sezvo masimba aya ari muvanhu. VaMurimoga naVaRice vanotiwo mubumbiro remitemo yeMDC T hamuna chikamu ichocho chinopa VaTsvangirai masimba akadaro, asi kuti vatevedzeri vanofanirwa kudomwa nevanhu. Gweta riri kumirira varume vaviri ava, VaZivanai Macharaga vanoti vatosvitsa mapepa ekudare aya kunaVatsvangirai pamwe nebato reMDC T, uye vose vari mumapepa ekudare aya vane mazuva gumi ekuti vapikise nyaya iyi. Vamwe vakwirirwa kudare ndaVaChamisa naVaMudzuri, pamwechete naSachigaro weMDC T. VaTsvangirai svondo rapera vakadoma VaMudzuri naVaChamisa sevamwe vatevedzeri vavo pamusoro paMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, avo vagara vari ivo mutevedzeri webato nechakare. VaTsvangirai vakaudzawo vatori venhau kuti bumbiro ravo remitemo rinovapa masimba ekuita izvi. Gweta raVaTsvangirai, VaInnocent Chagonda vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vawana mukana wekuvhura nekuverenga mapepa aya, vakati tivabate nemusi weChshanu. No media source currently available

headline: ‘GEMS TAVE KUMBERI’
text: uyo ange ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHarare SHASHA yemutambo wenetball inotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems — Adelaide Thandeka Muskwe — uyo aive kuLiverpool uko aimirira nyika kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup, anoti ave kumberi kwehanzvadzi yake, Admiral, uyo anotambira nhabvu maWarriors.   MaGems akanyora nhoroondo yekuve chikwata chekutanga chenetball chakanokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uye ndokutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akakunda zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Sri Lanka, Barbados neNorthern Ireland.   Adelaide naAdmiral mapatya uye vose vakaberekerwa muno ndokuzoenda kunogara kuEngland uko kwavakakurira.   Mukukura kwavo, Adelaide aitamba netball kozoti Admiral ari mutambi wenhabvu. Admiral iye zvino anotambira Leicester City inove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muEngland.   Muchinda uyu haana kuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt asi akambotamba mumakwikwi eCosafa Castle Cup kuSouth Africa nguva yadarika.   Adelaide anotambirawo chikwata cheSeven Stars kuEngland uye anoti ari kunzwa manyuku-nyuku nekuwaniswa kwaakaita mukana wekumirira nyika kumutambo weVitality World Cup.   Adelaide anoti anogara achitsigira hanzvadzi yake kumitambo yake yenhabvu uye akafara zvikuru kuona Admiral achiuyawo kuzomutsigira apo maGems aikweshana neNew Zealand.   Admiral pamwe nevabereki vavo vaive muchaunga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera pamberi vachitsigira Adelaide pamwe nemaGems apo aitamba neNew Zealand mumutambo uyo akakundwa 36-79.   “Hanzvadzi yangu ndiyo ine mukurumbira asi ndinonzwa mufaro chaizvo kumuona achiuya kuzonditsigira mumitambo yangu.   “Ini kubva kare ndogara ndiri kunhandare dzakasiyana ndichimuona achitamba nhabvu saka tinotsigirana tese mitambo yedu uye vabereki vedu havashaikwe kumitambo yedu, saka ndinonzwa kufara ndichiona kuti rutsigiro tinarwo. Isu maGems tave kumberi nekuti takakwanisa kukwikwidza kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup,” anodaro Adelaide.   Zvakadai, chikwata chemaGems chakapedza makwishu aya chiri pechisere zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakazoitwa mitambo yacho miviri yekupedzisira apo wekutanga chakakundwa 43-59 neMalawi kozoti 58-47 neUganda.

headline: ‘Fifa yativhiringa’
text: MUBATI wepagedhi wemaWarriors neMichigan Stars yekuUnited States of America – Tatenda ‘Marshall’ Mkuruva – ari kutsutsumwa kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFifa zvadzosera kumashure zvakanyanya kusimukira kwevatambi vechidiki.   Achinyora papeji rake reFacebook, Mkuruva anoti vatambi venhabvu vechidiki vakawanda vane chido chekusimudzira matarenda avo kuburikidza nekuwaniswa mikana yekunotambira kunze kwenyika kumaligi akaita sekuEurope nekuAmerica asi izvi hazvisi kukwanisika pari zvino nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFifa.   Mkuruva anoti yave nguva yekuti hutungamiri hwenhabvu nevese vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vagare pasi vataurirane kuti mamiriro ezvinhu aya agadziriswe.   “Vatambi venhabvu vari kurasikirwa nenguva nemikana yekuti vaonekwe pasi rese kuti vafambire mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Senyika, tinosvika kure sei munyaya dzenhabvu kana remangwana revechidiki riri kukanganisika nezvinhu zvinogona kugadzirisika nyore?” anodaro Mkuruva.   Zimbabwe pari zvino haisi kukwanisa kukwikwidza mumitambo yenhabvu nedzimwe nyika nekuda kwezvirango zvayakatemerwa neFifa pamwe neCAF.   Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa basa kwakaitwa mutungamiriri weZifa, Felton Kamambo, pamwe chete nebhodhi raaitungamira neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) vachipomerwa mhosva yekusaita basa ravo nemazvo.   Kamambo akabva atsiviwa naGift Banda uyo aive mutevedzeri wake asi ainge ambomiswa basa zvakare naKamambo.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza nguva pfupi yadarika, Banda anoti bhodhi ravo rine chivimbo chikuru chekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFifa pamwe chete neCAF zvichabviswa.   Anoti pari zvino vari pakati pekuita hurukuro nemasangano maviri aya vachionesana gwara rekufamba naro.   Banda anotiwo zvirango izvi zviri kuvapa mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu zvakawanda zvainge zvakakanganisika munhabvu yemuno, kusanganisira nhandare idzo dzinofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti dzisvike padanho rinotenderwa kuti dzigotambirwa mitambo mikuru.   “Hakuna nyika inopihwa zvirango zvoramba zviripo, zvinotobva chete.   Saka isu neFifa neCAF tiri kuita hurukuro uye ticharamba tichiita hurukuro tichionesana navo patinenge tasvika panyaya iri kunetsa munhabvu yedu yemuno.   “Zvirango izvi zvatipawo mukana wekuti tigadzirise zvange zvakakanganisika zvakawanda munhabvu yedu,” anodaro Banda.

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havasi Kuzoita Basa Kusvika Zvinonetsa Zvagadziriswa
text: Vana chiremba vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara huye havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Vana chiremba vaudza vatori venhau kuti zvinovasuwisa zvakanyanya kuti vasvitsa mazuva gumi nemaviri vasiri kuenda kubasa uku hurumende isiri kumboedza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Elias Muzoremba, vati vanoshungurudzika zvikuru vachishanda muzvipatara zvisina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana. Vatiwo muzvipatara zvehurumende hamuna mishonga izvo zvinoita kuti kunyange vakaona varwere, havana zvavanokwanisa kuvabetsera nazvo. VaMuzoremba vatiwo vanachiremba vazhinji havasi pamabasa kunyange hazvo gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza makurukota ehurumede neChipiri kuti vana chiremba vashoma ndovari kuramwa mabasa. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Asssociation, VaMthabisi Anele Bhebhe, vati zvinosuwisa kuti matambudziko avari kuchema nawo vanogarotaura nezvawo gore negore asi hurumende haisi kuagadzirisa. VaBhebhe vati vana chiremba vekumatunhu vabatanawo nana chiremba vanga vari pakuramwa mabasa. VaBhebhe vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvekushandisa muzvipatara pamwe nekuona kuti vanachiremba vararamawo hupenyu hwakanaka. Vana chirembawo vari kuti mari dzemihoro dzavari kuwana hadzikwani uye vanoda kuti hurumende ivabhadharewo nemari yekuAmerica. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro mushure medare remakurukota ehurumende kuti havasi kuzobhadhara vana chiremba nemari yekunze. VaMoyo vakatiwo vakaita hurukuro nana chiremba uye vakati vazhinji vari kumabasa izvo zvarambwa nanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vagare Mudzimba Asi Vakawanda Vachiti Havana Chekudya
text: Apo vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kuti vatange kugara mumba kutanga mangwana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa chirwere sezvo parizvino vanhu vari kuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe Dr Alex Gasasira vati vatambira kurudziro yekuti vanhu vambogara mumba nekuti zvinopa kuti vannhu vasatapurirane chirwere. Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Aaron Musara vati huwandu hwevanhu varikubatwa nechirwere ichi hunoratidza pachena kuti zvinhu hazvisisina kumira zvakanaka. VaMusara vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatevedzere kurudziro dzavanachiremba kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Vanhu vanhu vasaende pane magungano, vapfeke mamask zvakanaka vakavhara mhuno nemuromo uyewo kugeza maoko nguva dzose. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatiwo danho rakatorwa nehurumende reLockdown rakakosha zvikuru vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi munyika kunopa kuti ruzhinji rufambe zvakanyanya izvo zvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Labode vati kunyangwe hazvo Lockdown ichikanganisa mararamiro evanhu, kudzivirira kurambopararira kwechirwere kwakakosha vachitiwo kuvhurwa kwemuganhu pakati peSouth Africa neZimbabwe kunogona kuriko kwakonzera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zviri pachena kuti hurumende yamomoterwa. VaMadzorera vati hurumende haina mari yekuongorora zvakanyanya vakati chakakosha panguva ino kuti munhu wega wega azvigarire kumba kuchengetedza hutano. Asi Muzvare Joylene Nyachuru mumwe mugari weku Glenview vati kuisa nyika mulockdown vanhu vasina chouviri hakuna zvakunobatsira. VaChristopher Gohori mumwezve mugari wemuHarare vatiwo pasina kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura muHarare, vanhu kunyanya kumisha inogara vazhinji vacharamba vachiungana pazvibhorani sezvo vasingakwanisi kugara vasina mvura. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita chirwere cheCovid-19 No media source currently available , vanhu vanenge vokurudzirwa kugara mumba kana kuti Lockdown kutanga mangwana. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti kubva neChipiri, mamwe makambani anenge asingachashandi uyewo rakatorambidza magungano kusara kwevanenge vachienda kurufu asi vasingadarike makumi matatu. Vanhu vanenge vasisabvumidzwe kuenda kune mamwe maguta.

headline: Vanhu Vashoma Vanonyoresa Kuvhota Mukati meMazuva Maviri
text: Komisheni inotungamira sarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yazivisa kuti vanhu vadarika zvishoma zviuru gumi nezvina vakakwanisa kunyoresa kuvhota mukati memazuva maviri anoti 10 Ndira na 11 Ndira 2018. ZEC inoti kusvika pakupera kwezuva nemusi weChina vanhu vakanga vanyoresa vose kubva pakatanga chirongwa muna Gumiguru gore rapera vakanga vasvika pa 4 893 793, kubva pa 4 879 482 vakanga vanyoresa pakapetwa chirongwa ichi muna Zvita wegore rapera. Sachigaro veZimbwabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, VaAndrew Makoni, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vanyoresa kuvhota mumazuva maviri aya hunoita sekunge hushoma, asi panofanirwa kutariswawo kuti chirongwa ichi ndechekupa mukana kune vaya vakakundikana kunyoresa muchoringwa chekutanga nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Asi VaMakoni vanoti ZEC inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko anonzi achiri kusangana nevamwe, zvikuru vaya vainzi vane vabereki vekunze kwenyika, akaita semagwaro ekuberekwa, vachiti vekumahofisi ekwamabharani mukuru vanofanirwa kunge vachiwanikwawo pedyo nenzvimbo dziri kunyoreserwa kuvhota idzi. Chimwe chavati chiri kutadzisa kufamba zvakanaka kwechirongwa ichi inyaya yekuti nzvimbo dzekunyoresa kuvhota dziri kunzi nevamwe dzave kure, izvo zviri kuodza mwoyo yevamwe vakawanda. Vamwe vari kunyunyuta kuti zvinhu zvichakangovaomera kubva pazvirongwa zvegore rapera vanhu vakaremara, avo vanoti vachiri kungosangana nematambudziko avaisangana nawo. Imwe nhengo yesangano reNational Council of Disabled Persons of Zimbabwe, Amai Farai Cherera, vanoti vakaremara vakawanda vari kukundikana kunyoresa sezvo nzvimbo dziri kunyoreserwa zhinji dzacho dzisina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vakwanise kupinda kunonyoresa. Vanoti zvimwe zviri kuvatadzisa kunyoresa kushaikwa kwevanoturikira kana vanotaura nemutauro wemaoko pane vasingakwanise kutaura, uyewo zvinyorwa zvevasingaoni. No media source currently available

headline: NSSA Yobatsira Vakuvari, Asi Vari paMudyandigere Votsamwiswa neMari Dzavari Kupihwa
text: Apo vanhu vari kutambira mari yemudyandigere vari kuramba vachichema-chema kuti mari yacho ishoma, gurukota rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kuvatapi venhau pamusoro pekuti mari inotambirwa nevanhu vari pamudyandigere ichawedzerwa riinhi, Amai Mupfumira vati bazi reNSSA riri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira, avo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko cheOpen Day yeNSSA Workers’ Compensation Rehabilitation Centre, vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vagokwanisa kuvewo vachibhadhara mari kuNSSA kuti vagozokwanisawo kuwana mari yemudyandigere kana vakwegura. Pari zvino vanhu vari pamudyandigere vanotambira madhora makumi mana pamwedzi uye hurumende yaive yati ichawedzera mari iyi kuti isave iri pasi pezana remadhora kubva muna Kurume wegore rino, asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Amai Mupfumira vati kubvira muna Kubvumbi wegore rino NSSA yakatanga hurongwa hwekubatsira nemari pakuviga nhengo dzeNSSA dzinenge dzafa. NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inzvimbo inorapa vanhu vanenge vakuvara vari pamabasa uye nzvimbo iyi ine mimwe michina yechizvino-zvino isingawanikwe kune zvimwe zvipatara. Mukuru weNSSA, Muzvare Liz Chitiga, vabvuma kuti vanhu vakawanda havazive nezvenzvimbo iyi, asi vati kambani yavo ine hurongwa hwekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kurapiwa panzvimbo. Mumwe wevanhu vakarapwa paNSSA Rehabilitation Centre ndiVaZuze Nzerere avo vakakuvara vari mumugodhi mavaishanda. VaNzerere, avo vasisakwanise kufamba vega, vati vakarapwa vakadzidziswawo mabasa ekusona uye vanofara kuti kambani yavaishandira yakavadzorera pabasa. Panguva imwe chete NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inokwanisa kuve nevanhu makumi manomwe vanenge vachirapwa vachigarapo. Nzvimbo iyi, iyo iri pedyo nechipatara chikuru cheMpilo yakavhurwa mugore ra1971. No media source currently available

headline: ‘HAKUNA MAWARRIORS AKADARO’
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chakaenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) egore rino ndicho chakatamba zvinonyadzisa kudarika zvimwe zvikwata zvose zvakamboenda kumutambo uyu makore adarika sezvo chakanwisa chibodzwa chimwechete pamitambo yacho mitatu yachakatamba.   Zvikuru zvaitarisirwa kubva kuchikwata ichi asi chakangodzoka ari maoko chete murwendo rwekuEgypt uko kwainge kuzere nemakakatanwa pakati pevatambi vemaWarriors – avo vairairidzwa naSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzmbwa – nehutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) pamusoro penyaya yemari nezvimwe zvakasiyana.   Vatambi vemaWarriors pavaive kuEgypt vakamboranwa kutamba mitambo yavo vachiti vaida kubhadharwa mari yavo.   Kumakwishu aya — ayo ari kuenderera mberi kuEgypt —  maWarrrios akangonwisa kamwechete chinova chibodzwa chakanwiswa naKhama Billiat pamutambo wavo wechipiri uyo vakaita mangange 1-1 neUganda.   Mimwe mitambo miviri, maWarriors akakundwa 1-0 neEgypt kozoti 4-0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Muongororo yakaitwa neKwayedza svondo rino, zvakaonekwa kuti pazvikwata zvina zvakaenda kumakwishu eAfcon zvichimirira Zimbabwe mumakore anoti 2006, 2004, 2017 ne2019 chegore rino ndicho chakatamba zvinonyadzisa.   Mugore ra2004 – iro raive rekutanga maWarriors achibudirira kuenda kumakwishu eAfcon ayo akaitirwa kuTunisia — chikwata chenyika ichi chairairidzwa naChidzambwa uye chaive muboka reGroup C nezvikwata zvinoti Egypt, Cameroon neAlgeria.   MaWarriors akakwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwechete apo akakunda Algeria 2-1 uye akazokundwa mimwe miviri apo akarohwa 2-1 neEgypt kozoti 5-3 neCameroon.   Kumakwishu aya, maWarriors akakwanisa kunwisa katanhatu iwo ndokunwiswa nezvimwe zvikwata kanokwana kasere.   Afcon yaitevera ya2006 yakaitirwa kuEgypt, maWarriors aitungamirwa naCharles Muhlauri uye aive muboka raive nezvikwata zvinoti Nigeria, Senegal neGhana.   Kumakwishu aya, maWarriors akakwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwechete apo akakunda Ghana 2-1 asi ndokukundwa mimwe miviri – 2-0 neSenegal kozoti 2-0 zvakare neNigeria.   Mugore ra2006 iri, chikwata chaMuhlauri chakakwanisa kunwisa kaviri mumitambo mitatu yachakatamba uye icho chikanwiswa kashanu nezvimwe zvikwata zvaive muboka rimwechete nacho.   MaWarriors akazombomira kukwikwidza kumakwishu aya ndokuzodzokera mugore ra2017 kuGabon apo airairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa.   Chikwata chaPasuwa chaitungamirirwa naWillard Katsande ari kaputeni uye chaive muboka reGroup B rezvikwata zvaiti Senegal, Tunisia neAlgeria.   MaWarriors panguva iyi haana kumbohwinha mutambo mumwechete zvawo sezvo akaita mangange  2-2 neAlgeria mumutambo wawo wekutanga ndokuzokundwa mimwe miviri yaitevera, 2-0 neSenegal uye 4-2 neTunisia.  Gore iri, chikwata ichi chakakwanisa kunwisa kana icho ndokunwiswa kasere nezvimwe zvikwata zvaive muboka iri.   Chikwata cha2017 chaive nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Knowledge Musona, Billiat, Danny ‘Deco’ Phiri, Nyasha Mushekwi, Teenage Hadebe, Kudakwashe Mahachi, Evans Rusike, Lawrence Mhlanga naMarvelous Nakamba avo vanove vaive zvakare muchikwata chegore rino.   Vatsigiri venhabvu vakaita hurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino vari kudya magaka mambishi vachiti matambiro akaitwa nemaWarriors kuAfcon rwendo rwuno anonzwisa hasha.    Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa   Munyori mukuru wesangano reFriends of the Warriors — Zivanai Muwashu — anoti vatambi ava vakarakidza kuti havana nyika pamwoyo asi chavanongoda imari chete.   “Hatisi kufara nezvatakaona kuCairo, shuwa ndizvo zvavakaendera here ikoko kunonyadzisa nyika yese? Dai vange vasingade zvemaWarriros vasina kumbobvira vaenda vakagara kumusha, paitsvagwa vamwe vaienda.   “Shuwa kutishoresa zvakadaro, Khama Billiat mukatarisa aitamba ega nhabvu kumakwishu aya, vamwe vatinoti ndivo kaputeni wedu kupotsa ega gedhe, aiwa zvinonyadzisa izvi,” anodaro Muwashu.   Mutsigiri wenhabvu ane mukurumbira Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa anoti hazvina kunaka chose kuti vatambi vasvike pakuramba kutamba nhabvu nekuda kwemari.   Anoti mune ramangwana Zifa inofanirwa kugadzirisa nhau idzi kuti zvakaitika kuEgypt zvisadzokorodzwe.   “Hazvina kunaka zvakaitika kuti Zifa inozotanga kutsvaga mari nguva yapera yekupa kune vatambi vemaWarriors. Mari ngaitsvagwe nguva iripo kuti vatambi vasazorambe kutamba izvo zvakazoitika, iye zvino zvakazokanganisa murairidzi basa rake. Vanhu iye zvino vave kuti ngaadzingwe basa asi havachatarise zvimwe zvikonzero zviitika kumakwishu aya. Asi Zifa ndiyo inoziva kuti ichiri kumuda here kana kuti vomudzinga.   “Zvakaitika zvakatodarika saka ngatichitange kugadzirira mitambo inotevera tione kuti togadzirisa papi pakanganisika. Vakomana kutamba vakatamba zvavo asi kumberi uko hapana zvavaiita.   “DRC takaidherera ndiko saka takazozvamburwa, Elvis Chipezese (mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors) hapana hake zvaaikwanisa kuita nekuti chikwata cheDRC chaiuya kunge nyuchi. Tinopa sando kuna Billiat akatamba zvinofadza mumitambo yose,” anodaro.

headline: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Cristiano adzingwa neMan United
text: CHIKWATA cheManchester United chazivisa kuti vasiyana naCristiano Ronaldo mushure mekunge vabvumirana.   Pachinyorwa chabva kuManchester United, yazivisa kuti mutambi uyu abva.   “Cristiano ave kubva kuManchester United izvezvi mushure mekunge tabvumirana naye.   “Tinoda kumutenda nebasa raakaita kaviri kaatambira chikwata chino,” yadaro Manchester United.   Kudzingwa kwaRonaldo kunotevera kushuropodza kwaakaita chikwata ichi svondo radarika pamwe chete nemurairidzi wacho Erik ten Haag uyo waakati haamuremekedze.   “Handina ruremekedzo nemurairidzi wangu nekuti iye haandiremekedzewo. Ukasandiremekedza neniwo handikuremekedze.   “Manchester United iri kusarira kumashure zvikuru, pandakabva pekutanga ndikadzoka hapana chamboshanduka, zvinhu zvingori zvimwe chete.   “Pane vanhu vari muchikwata vasiri kundida kuno, hazvina kutanga nhasi kubva gore radarika chairo,” akadaro Ronaldo.

headline: Zanu-PF Yotanga Musangano wePagore kuGoromonzi
text: Musangano wepagore weZanu-PF uri kutanga mangwana uchipera musi wesvondo pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi panosvika gore ra2030 kana kuti ‘Mod­ernise, Mech­a­nise and Grow the Econ­omy To­wards Vi­sion 2030’. Vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvinomwe vari kutarisirwa pamusangano uyu. Asi kunyangwe hazvo sarudzo dziriko muna 2023, matunhu akawanda ebato iri atotanga kuti achatsvagira mutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri webato iri VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vakwikwidze zvakare musarudzo idzi. Munyori anoona nezvevechidiki muZanu-PF VaPupurai Togarepi vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti vaite chisungo chekuti vati VaMnangagwa ndivo vavanoda kuti varambe vari panyanga nekuti bato ravo nderechimurenga rinotungamirwa nemunhu mumwe chete panguva imwe chete. No media source currently available Asi mutungamiri wevechidiki muMDC Youth League VaObey Sithole vanoti zviri kuitwa neZanu-PF hazvina nematuro ose sezvo vachiri vati VaMnangagwa havana chavari kuita chine musoro kusimudzira nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Munyika Vocherechedza Zuva Ravo reVashandi Vakaomerwa
text: Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, ZCTU, rinoti gore rino vashandi vari kucherechedza zuva ravo revashandi mangwana zvinhu zvakavaomera kudarika mamwe makore ose aya. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo vanoti gore rino vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu asi mihoro yavo isina kwairi kuenda. Vanotiwo chimwe chakanyanya kuomesera vashandi kuvharwa kwemakambani pamwe nekushaikwa kwemabasa kune vanga vasiri kushanda. ZCTU inoti ichacherechedza zuva revashandi iri munzvimbo makumi maviri neimwe munyika yose, asi gungano guru richange riri kunhandare yeDizvarasekwa muHarare. Dingindira resangano iri gore rino, iro rinoti “We are at a Crossroads! Unite, Fight Neoliberalism and Austerity,” riri kukurudzira vashandi kuti vabatane, varwise kuraswa kwetsika dzavo pamwe nekudzikwa kwemitemo inovaomesera, zvikuru mune zveupfumi. No media source currently available Asi munyori werimwe sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Industrial Revolution Worker's Federation, VaPascoe Ekemu Chakanetsa, vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu, sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuti vashandi vasaungana zvavo gore rino. VaChakanetsa vanoti sangano ravo rine huron gwa hwekusangana nehurumende mushure mezuva revashandi, kana zvabudirira vozozivisa vashandi zvinenge zvabuda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voramba Kuti Typhoid Iri Kudzikira muNyika
text: Sangano ranachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti chirwere chemanyoka cheTyphoid chadzikira, humbowo hunoratidza kuti chirwere ichi chakateshera muguta reHarare nenzvimbo zhinji munyika. Vachitaura mushure mekuenda kuchipatara cheBeatrice Infecttious Hospital muHarare uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vanfungidzirwa kuti vanetyphoid, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kanzuru yeHarare pamwe nebazi ravo vakamisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vakati pavanhu makumi mashanu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid kuchipatara ichi vazhinji vacho vaibva kuMbare uko kwashaya mwana ane makore gumi nematatu nechirwere ichi musi weKimusi. Asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights Dr Evans Masitara vati pane vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vari kubatwa neTyphoid muHarare nedzimwe nzvimbo munyika. VaMasitara vati vanhu vakawanda vari kuenda kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira uye vane humbowo hwekuti nyaya yetyphoid haizi kutaurwa nemazvo nebazi rezvehutano. Vanotiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chinokwanisa kudzivirirwa uyewo vati vese vari kubata nezvirwere zvemanyoka vanofanira kuendesa kanzuru yeHarare nedzimwe dziri munzvimbo dzavanogara kumatare kuti varapwe pachena vachiti makunzuru ndiwo anebasa rekuona kuti vanhu vawana mvura yakachena uyewo kuti marara atakurwa. Asi mutauririri we kanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kurapa vanhu vese vane zvirwere zvemayoka pachena. Humbowo kubva kubazi rezvehutano hunoratidzawo kuti mwedzi uno chete pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vakabatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka munyika yese uye pane vanhu vana vakatofa nekuda kwezvirwere izvi munyika yese. Zvirwere izvi zvakwanda kuMashonaland Central neManicaland kozotiwo Mashonaland West, Harare neBulawayo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamukoti Vanoramba Mari Yanga Yauya neHurumende Vachiti Ishoma, Vanovimbisa Kuramba Vari paMabasa
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga kwasvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu ane vatatu, kana kuti 7 453. Asi huwandu hwevanhu vanga vafa kusvika pazuva iri hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 222, sezvo pakanga pasina akafa. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika yose vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 5 635. Vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu vakapora kuchirwere ichi izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vachine chirwere ichi hwaderera kuenda pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 596. Vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 969 ndivo vakavhenekwa kana vaine chirwere ichi, vanhu makumi maviri nevana vakawanikwa vainacho. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chasiya vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvishanu, kana kuti 905 000 vafa pasi rose. MuAmerica vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nemazana matatu ezviuru, kana kuti 6.300 million vabatwa neCovid-19, vamwe vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe kana, kuti 191 000 vafa. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti, avo vakadzokera kubasa kutanga kwesvondo rino mushure mekuramwa mabasa kwenguva ingada kusvika kumwedzi mitatu, vanonzi varamba kutambira zvanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende mukuedza kwayo kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo. Hurumende inonzi yanga ichida kuvapa zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemihoro yavo, asi vashandi vanonzi varamba kutambira mari iyi vachiti haigadzirise matambudziko avo Vashandi vanonzi vazivisawo hurumende kuti vari kudawo kuti vapiwe imwe yemari yemihoro yavo iri mumadhora ekuAmerica. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano ravanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kuramba kutambira kwaita vanamukoti mari iyi hakurevi kuti vave kudzokera zvakare mukuramwa mabasa. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vakadzokera kumabasa mushure mechikumbiro chakaitwa negurukota rezvehutano idzva uye vari mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakati vari kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vemuzvipatara. VaDongo vanoti vamiriri vehurumende munhaurirano vakavavimbisa kuti zvipatara zvichawaniswa zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanoti vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dziende kumabasa, asi dzisazvipinza munjodzi kuburikidza nekushanda zvisina mhatya dzinodzivirira kutapurira chirwere, kana kuti PPEs. No media source currently available

headline: Murume Akambotiza kuWilkins Anowanikwa Asina Coronavirus
text: Chizvarwa chekuThailand chekumbokatiza muchipatara cheWilkins muHarare neSvondo kwachaifanirwa kuongororwa kana chiine coronavirus chinonzi chazoongororwa neChipiri chawanikwa chisina hutachiwana uhwu. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeguta reHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi, zvabuda muongororo yaitwa iyi zvinoratidza kuti murume uyu haana chirwere ichi, izvo zvaita kuti abva aregwa achienda kumba kwake. Murume uyu anonzi adzoka ega kuchipatara ichi mushure mekutsvagwa nemapurisa achishaikwa. Murume uyu anonzi akabva kuThailand mazuva makumi maviri adarika akaitwa ongororo ye coronavirus pakupinda kwaakaita munyika, izvo zvakaratidza kuti muviri wake waidziya zvakanyanya. Izvi zvinonzi zvakazoita kuti aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital, uko akazongotsakatika. Hapana ati awanikwa aine chirwere ichi muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo paine vanhu vanoVanhu vana muSouth Africa vanonzi vakawanikwa vaine hutachiwana hwecoronavirus neMuvhuro, izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vave nechirwere ichi pavanomwe munyika iyi. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari ivo munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti panofanirwa kutorwa matanho akasimba ekuchengetedza vanenge vafungidzirwa kuti vangave nehutachiwana hwechirwere ichi, vachiti zvakaitika paWilkins Hospital hazvifanirwe kodzokororwa nekuti zvinoisa ruzhinji rwevanhu munjodzi. Doctor Madzorera vanoti bazi rezvehutano rinofanirwawo kushambadza zvakasimba nezvechirwere ichi, uyewo kuisa nhare mumatunhu ose emunyika ekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kufona chero nguva vachitaura pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vari kukurudzirawo kuti pave navanautsanana vanofamba vachiongorora vanhu kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete, pane kumirira kuti munhu anofungidzira kuti ane chirwere ichi aende iye kuchipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive Varwiri veHondo yeRusununguko Vapfumbamwe Vange Vari Muhusungwa Voregererwa
text: Gweta riri kumirira vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vapfumbamwe vange vari muhusungwa, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vanoti vsungwa ava vazoregedzwa vahienda kudzimba dzavo nhasi mambakwedza kunyangwe hazvo vange vambonzi vachamiswa pamberi pedare. VaSaurombe vanoti zvinhu zvinokatyamadza kuti vaive varwiri verusununguko vanobatwa nekuseri kweruoko zvakadayi panguva ino yeCovid-19. VaSaurombe vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakanga zvichiitwa nevanhu ava zvakange zviri pamutemo sezvo vakange vachida kunyatsonzwa zvizere pamusoro pemari dzavanopihwa idzo vanoti dzishoma.    Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Quantam Global Reseach Inoti Mitemo yeZiimbabwe Yokanganisa Hurongwa hweKukwezva veMabhizimisi veKunze
text: Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reQuantam Global Research Lab iro rinoongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika dzemuAfrica panyaya yekukwezva vekunze vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika iri kuratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri kutatarika kuti ikwanise kukwezva vekunze ava. Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube chizvarwa cheZimbabwe ndivo chipangamazano sangano reQuantum Global Research Lab iri. Izvi zvakabuda muongororo inonzi Africa Investment Index 2018. Nyika dzinonzi dziri kuita zvinounza budiro dzinosanganisa Morocco, Egypt, Algeria, Botswana neCote d’ivore, South Africa, Ethiopia, Zambia, Kenya neSenegal. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechimakumi mana nemashanu panyika makumi mashanu neina dzemuAfrica dziri kutatarika kukwezva vekunze. Dzimwe nyika dzisiri kuita zviri nani dzakafanana neZimbabwe dzinosanganisa Central African Republic, Liberia, Somalia, Eritrea, Equatorial Guinea, Gambia, Sierra Leone, Guinea uye Sao Tome and Principe. Ongororo iyi yakaburitswa kumucheto wemusangano wevakuru wemabhizimisi wakaendwa masvondo apfuura nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Global Quantum yakambobatsirawo VaMnangagwa kusangana nevamwe vakuru vemabhizimisi kubva kuSwitzerland kumucheto wemusangano wekuDavos muna Ndira. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mitemo yayo kuti ikwezve vekunze. No media source currently available

headline: EU Yoshushikana neHurutungamiri hweNyika yeZimbabwe
