text: Mumiriri wenyika dzemuEurope muZimbabwe,VaPhillipe Van Damme vanoti nyaya dzehuwori dziri kubuda mumapenhau munyika pamwe nekutadza kuita shanduko munyaya dzehupfumi sezvakabvumiranwa kumusangano wakaitwa kuLima, Peru gore rapera zviri kupa chimiro chakaipa kunyika pamwe nekutadzisa vekunze kuzotanga mabhizimizi muZimbabwe. Vachitaura pachirongwa chekucherechedza makore maviri vatanga basa muZimbabwe change chakarongwa neve263 Chat muHarare nemusi weChishanu, VaVan Damme vanoti mwedzi mishomanana yapfuura yaona mapepanhau achiburitsa nyaya dzehuwori mumapazi akawanda ehurumende asi pasina vanhu vari kusungwa kana kutora matanho ekuongorora nyaya idzi. Makukurukota ehurumende anoti VaJonathan Moyo vedzidzo yepamusoro nemutevedzeri wavo VaGodfrey Gandawa vanonzi vakashandisa mari inodarika mazana mana ezviuru zvemadhora zvisina mwero uye kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvehuwori yakada kuvasunga yakarambidzwa kuita izvi nemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika,VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMphoko vakaburitsawo muhusungwa kuAvondale muHarare vakuru vakuru vekambani yeZimbabwe National Road Authority vanosanganisira VaDavison Norupiri avo vaipomrewa mhosva yekuba mazana matanhutu ezvuru zvemadhora. Gurukota rezvemando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge varikupomerwawo nyaya dzehuwori vachinzi vakamanikidza kambani yeZESA kupa basa kuna muzvinabhizimisi Wicknell Chivhayo zvechikiribidi. VaVan Damme vatiwo pasi pechibvumirano cheLima hurumende yainge yavimbisa kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuInternational Monetary Fund nekuWorld Bank mwedzi wapfuura usati waperi asi izvi hazvisati zvaitika. Vatiwo hurumende yakavimbisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuwori asi huwori huri kutowedzera. Vati zvese izvi zvinoita kuti vekunze vasauye munyika kuzotanga mabhizimisi pamwe nekusimudzira hupfumi. Vati nyika dzeEU dzicharamba dzichibatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzenzara, hutano nemabasa ebudiriro asi vakati rutsigiro rwakawanda ruchauya chete kana hurumende yagadzirisa zvayakatidza, kutevedza mutemo pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Svondo rino vemabhizimisi vemuno vaichemachemawo pamusangano weNational Economic Consultative Forum kuti hurumende inongotaura chete nezvekuti iri kutora matanho ekugadzirisa hupfumi asi pasina zvairi kuita. VaMisheck Gondo vesangano reNational Assocition of Youth Organisations vati maonero aVaVan Damme akafanana nemaonero avo uye zviri pachena kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutadza kuita zvayakavimbisa. Mumwewo wechidiki, Thembinkosi Rushwaya uyo akasungwa nguva pfupi yapfuura mushure mekuratizira paUniversity of Zimbabwe pamberi pemutungamiriri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe audza Studio 7 kuti pachinzvimbo chekugadzirisa zvinhu hurumende iri kuwedzera kuparadza hupfumi pamwe nekushungurudza veruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo EU yakabvisa zvirango zvehupfumi kuZimbabwe, vakawanda vapinda mumusangano uyu vanoti kutyorwa kwekodzerp dzevanhu kuri kotowezedzera zvichitevera danho rakatorwe neEU. VaVan Damme vati mukati megore rapfuura sangano iri pamwe nenyiak dzeEU vashandisa mari inodarika zana remamiriyoni emadhora munyaya dzechikafu nehutano. Vanotiwo mukati menguva imwe cheteyo, nyika idzi dzashandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora mumabasa ekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena pamwe nemamwe mabasa ebudiriro. VaVan Damme vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuwedzera rubatsiro munyaya dzehupfumi, budiriro nezvimwe kana hurumende yeZimbabwe ikatevedza chitsidzo chayo cheLima pamwe nekutevedza mutemo, kuvandudza mitemo yavo yemabhizimisi pamwe nekurmekedza kodzero dzenhu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaChris Mushowe kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera neVakoti Votanga Kuramwa Mabasa neKushaya Zvekuzvidzivirira kuCoronavirus
text: Vanachiremba navana mukoti munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa kunyangwe nyika yatarisana nechirwere chouraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose cheCoronavirus. Vanachiremba navanamukoti ava vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuvapa zvekushandisa kuti vazvidzivire kutapurirwa zvirwere zvakaita seCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano, iri mumaoko eStudio 7, vanamukoti kuburikidza nesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association vati vakasuma bazi rezvehutano mazuva maviri apfuura kut vanoda zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCoronavirus, mvura muzvipatara uye mari yekushanda kwavachaita nguva yakareba vachirapa vane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano nevakuru vezvipatara zvehurumende munyika, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Tawanda Zvakada, vatiwo nhengo dzavo hadzichakwanise kuramba dzichishanda kutanga nhasi sezvo dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira. Vati vakaita musangano nehurumende neMuvhuro nezvenyaya iyi asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chabuda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kana munyori mubazi ravo, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Kusvika pari zvino hurumende inoti vanhu vatatu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika uye mumwe chete, mutori wenhau, Zororo Makamba, akashaya vakavigwa neChipiri. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vatenda kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro muzvipatara nechimbi chimbi uye vakanda mapadza pasi.. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoshora Mashoko aVaMudarikwa veZanu PF
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko anonzi akataurwa nemumiriri weUzumba muparamende, VaSimbaneuta Mudarikwa vebato reZanu PF, ekuti dunhu ravo harina nzvimbo yemapato anopikisa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aVaMudarikwa aya anokonzeresa mhirizhonga sezvo dunhu ravo reUzumba, kusanganisira Mashonaland East yose, ragara richizivikanwa nenyaya dzemhirizhonga. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamabiko ekupemberera kuparurwa kwehurongwa hwemadiridziro kuMudzi, VaMudarikwa vanonzi vakati bato ravo richawana mavhoti zviuru makumi masere mudunhu mavo, vakawedzera vachiti mapato anopikisa achangowana mavhoti ari pasi pemapepa ekuvhotesa akakanganiswa kana kuti ma spoilt ballot papers. Asi VaMudarikwa varamba mashoko avari kupomerwa ekukurudzira mhirizhonga, vachiti bato reMDC-T ndiro rinotori pamberi panyaya dzemhirizhonga. Vanotiwo pahuwandu hwemavhoti achawanikwa neZanu PF, vari kureva kuti vanhu mudunhu ravo vari kuberekana vachiwanda. No media source currently available

headline: Senator Hlalo Vanodzingwa muMDC-T
text: Bato reMDC-T rinoti radzinga seneta Matson Hlalo mushure mekunetsana kunotyisa kunonzi kuri kuitika mubato iri mudunhu reBulawayo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato iri kuBulawayo VaFelix Magalela Mafa Sibanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti National Executive Council yebato iri yakadzinga VaHlalo nenyaya yehunhubu. VaSibanda vanoti VaHlalo vakapihwa tsamba yekudzingwa mubato nemusi weChina. VaSibanda vanoti VaHlao vakapihwa mukana wekuuya kuzozvichenura kudare reNational Couuncil asi vakaramba. VaHlalo vanzi vachadzingwawo kuva nhengo yedare resenate. No media source currently available Sezvo Studio 7 ichitema isina divi rainorerekera yabatawo VaHlalo avo vati mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato iri Muzvare thokozane Khupe ndivo vari kutungamira mabasa ekuvadzinga mubato. Vati havasi kuzotambira kudzingwa uku vachiti hakusi kutevera bumbiro remutemo webato. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Kuratidzira Kwayo Kuri Kuenderera Mberi neMusi weChishanu
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo hwekuratidzira nemusi weChishanu, kunyange hazvo isati yanzwa kubva kumapurisa. MDC yakazivisa mapurisa svondo rapera kuti ichapinda mukuratidzira uku sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Asi bato iri rinoti kusapindura kwemapurisa hakusi kuzotadzisa hurongwa hwekuratidzira uhu, sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika ichiripa kodzero yekuratidzira. MDC inoti iri kuratidzira sezvo isiri kufara nehutongi hwemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo bato iri rinoti haricherechedzi kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa gore rapera. Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, rakazivisa gore rapera kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakanga vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Asi MDC yakapikisa izvi mudare reConstitutional Court, iro rakapa mutongo waitambira zvakanga zvaziviswa musarudzo dzegore rapera nasachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba. Asi MDC inoti VaMnangagwa vari kutadza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, izvo zviri kupa kuti nyika ishaye magetsi, mafuta edzimotokari, uye kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu mazuva ose. Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti kuratidzira kwavo kuchaitwa murunyararo sezvo vagara vari bato rinoremekedza mitemo yenyika. VaChibaya vanoti zvisineyi kuti havasati vawana mhinduro kubva kumapurisa, kuratidzira kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi nemusi weChishanu. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti MDC inogara yakati ichaita ratidziro murunyararo asi ichizopedzisira yaita mhirizhonga. VaMutodi vanotiwo sebato reZanu PF riri kutonga, vari kuzviziva kuti MDC iri kuratidzira kuitira kuti VaMnangagwa vabviswe pachigaro. “Vakuru vari kuti vachange vari mberi mekuratidzira uku ndinovayambira kuti vasazoyeuka bako vanaiwa,” vadaro VaMutodi. Asi VaChibaya vanoti vari kuzviziva kuti Zanu PF iri kugadzira zvipfeko zveMDC zvichapihwa vanhu kuti vazovhiringa kuratidzira kwakarongwa nebato ravo. Senzira yekuti izvi zvisaitike, VaChibaya vanoti vachange vaine nhengo dzebato ravo dzichachengetedza runyararo, uye pakaita nhubu dzinoda kukonzera mhirizhonga, vachadzibata vachidziisa mumaoko emapurisa. Muna Ndira, sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemazuva matatu. Asi vanhu vakapinda mumigwagwa iyi vachiratidzira. Kuratidzira uku kwakapedzisira kwaita mhirizhonga iyo yakaona vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri vachifa mushure mekupfurwa nemabara epfuti. Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna Ndira, pane vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vaive nemaronda airatidza kuti akakonzerwa nesimbi nezvimwe zvombo zvinocheka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mumazuva matatu akadaidzirwa neZCTU kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo, vakaona mapurisa achishandisa zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pavanhu vairatidzira vasina zvombo, uye vakaonawo masoja aive nepfuti dzemhando yeAK-47. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vodzokera kuMusha neMugovera
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva mashanu ku China vachiita misangano mumatunhu madiki ari ku Hangzhou uko kwaitirwa musangano we Zimbabwe- China Business Forum. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva mashanu ku China vachiita misangano mumatunhu madiki ari ku Hangzhou uko kwaitirwa musangano we Zimbabwe- China Business Forum. Uyu musangano waitwa nevemabhizinesi nemakurukota ehurumende yeku China navana muzvinabhizinesi nemakurukota ehurumende vekuZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa, avo vari kutarisirwa kudzoka kusvika kumusha neMugovera, vanonzi vakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvinomwe nehurumende pamwe nemakambani ekuChina. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti zvibvumirano izvi hazvina zvazvinoreva kana pasina chinobuda mazviri. Muongorori wezvebudiriro, uye vachidzidzisa pa Africa University, Doctor Iris Shiripinda vanoti kunyorana zvibvumirano chinhu chisinganetsi nekuti kuwirirana zvamunoda kuitirirana asi kuzochizadzisa rimwe basa rinoda kuti vanhu vacherechedze zvese zvavanenge vawirirana kuitirana sezviri muchisungo chavo Doctor Shiripinda vanoti ruzhinji rwenyika harwufaniri kungopemberera kutaurwa kwe zvibvumirano, asi kuti vaone kuti nekufamba kwenguva zvazogonekwa kuzadziswa ndezvipi. Vanoti rwendo rwaVaMnangagwa nderwekunovhima saka mhemberero inoda kuzouya kana vazoona zvabuda murwendo urwu. Vatiwo zvinoda kuti vatungamiriri venyika vatarise zvinogona kuitika kwete kutaura zvisingagoneki kune ve kuChina ava kuti zvibvumirano izvi zvisazoperere ku hope chete. No media source currently available

headline: VeMabhizimisi Voramba Kudzikisa Mitengo Sezviri Kudiwa neHurumende
text: Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakapa kurudziro yekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda zvinodyiwa nevanhu idzikiswe kusvika payaive musi wa25 kurume, izvi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Mitengo yezvinhu haisi kudzika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vamwe vakuru veConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries kana Zimabwe National Chamber of Commerce tinzwe divi ravo. Asi gurukota rezvemaindustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushushikana nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu vakati pamisangano yavakaita nevamwe vemabhizimisi vakatenderana kuti mitengo yezvinhu idzikiswe. Vatenda havo kuti vemabhizimisi varik kuti vari kuremerwawo nezvinhu kunyanya mari yekunze yekutenga zvinhu. No media source currently available Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanodzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University vanoti zvekuda kutara mitengo yezvinhu hazvishande uye zvichatopa kuti zvinhu zvishaikwe muzvitoro. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Ogunun'una neMitero Yobhadhariswa Mumamwe Matunhu
text: Mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimiriri kana kuti maNGO’s anoti haasi kufara nemari yavari kubhadhariswa nemakanzuru kuti vashande munzvimbo dziri pasi pemakanzuru. Imwe yemakanzuru mudunhu reMashonaland West, yeMakonde yakazivisa nezuro kuti masangano ose anoda kushanda munzvimbo mavo vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora zana ekuAmerica uye vagara vachishanda vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora makumi mashanu pamusoro pekuwana gwaro rinovabvumira kushanda kana kuti Memorandum Of Understanding-MOU. Vanoshanda mukanzuru yeMakonde mubazi rinodyidzana nemasangano akazvimirira Amai Geytta Moyo vanobvuma kuti vose vanoda kushandira munzvimbo iri pasi pekanzuru yavo inosanganisa Chinhoyi, Mhangura neMakonde vanofanirwa kubhadhara mari iyi vasati vatanga kuita mabasa avanenge vakabvumirana navo. Sachigaro weZimRights mudunhu reMashonaland West VaAdrian Zarimba vanoti havasi kufara nedanho ratorwa nekanzuru yeMakonde vachiti hazvisi pamutemo. Makanzuru ekunemamwe mutunhu makuru akaita seMidlands anonzi ari kubhadharisawo mari dzekushanda munzvimbo asi dzinenge dzichingodaidzwa nemazita akasiyana. Nhengo yerimwe sangano rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa zvemunzvimbo asina kuda kuzivikanwa nezita anoti zviri kuita makanzuru hazvisi pamutemo. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika avo vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti kunyange maMOU ari kudiwa nemakanzuru haasi pamutemo uye mari dziri kutaurwa hazvisi pamutemo zvakare. VaKika vanoti mari dziri kudiwa nemakanzuru inzira yekutsvaka mari zvisiri pamutemo. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance VaFarai Maguwu vanoti mamwe makanzuru ari kubhadharisa masangano akazvimirira nechinangwa chekuda kuti varegere kushanda. Asi mamwe makanzuru akaita seBindura anoti vanongoda wirirano yeMOU chete kuti sangano rishande munzvimbo yavo. Gurukota redunhu reMidlands VaLarry Mavima vakamboudza Studio 7 kuti munyika mune masangano akazvimirira oga akawandisa vachiti ngavaende kuUkraine kune vanhu vanoda ruyamure sezvo kuine hondo. Kunyange mubatanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimiririra weNational Association of Non Governmental Organisation-NANGO- richiti pane masangano anosvika chiuru chimwechete akanyoresa nesangano ravo, VaMavhima vakati masangano akazvimiririra ega zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu kana kuti 36 000 arikushanda munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akawanda Oshora Hurumende neKudzinga VanaMukoti Mabasa
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti yakanga yadzinga basa vanamukoti vose vari pakuramwa mabasa, sangano rinomirira vanamukoti, re Zimbabwe Nurses Association rakakurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzisavhundutsirwe, uye kuti hapana chati chashanduka. Sangano iri rakaburitsa gwaro nezuro richizivisa nhengo dzaro kuti rakaona mashoko akabva kumutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, ekuti vadzingwa mabasa, asi richiti nhengo dzaro dzakapinzwa basa neHealth Services Board pasi pezvibvumirano zvavakanyorerana nevashandi. Zimbabwe Nurses Association inotiwo nhengo dzayo hadzisati dzatambira matsamba ekumiswa mabasa kwadzo, uye mari inonzi navachiwenga yakaiswa parutivi kuti vagobhadharwa inoita mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora, imari yemisaridzirwa yavaifanirwa kunge vanamukoti vakabhadharwa muna 2010. Sangano iri rinoti rakasununguka kuenderera mberi nenhaurirano, uye razivisa Health Services Board kuti risazadzise zviri mutsamba yavachiwenga iyi nenguva dza 4:00pm masikati anhasi musi wa 19 Kubvumbi 2018, richiti kukundikana kwazvo vanamukoti vanozoenda kudare repamusoro kuti nyaya yekuchengetedza kodzero dzavo inzwikwe nechimbichimbi. Gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa vakaudzawo nhepfenyuro yeZBC nezuro manheru kuti vanamukoti vakadzingwa mabasa ava vakasununguka kunyorera zvakare vachitsvaga mabasa. Asi mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti havaoni hurumende ichienderera mberi nedanho rekudzinga vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe iyo isina dzimwe nzira dzekuzadzisa nadzo basa ravo. Dr Nyamande vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kunzwisisa zvichemo zvavanamukoti nekukasika kuitira kuti nyika ienderere mberi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mamwe masangano akaita sezimbabwe congress of trade unions, Zimbabwe Yadzoka/Mayibuye IZimbabwe, Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti PTUZ, Federation of Zimbabwe Educators Unions kana kuti FOZEU ari kushorawo zvikuru danho rehurumende rekudzinga vanamukoti basa. ZCTU inoti iri kuronga kuratidzira kwakasimba yakabatana nemamwe masangano. Doctor Takavafira Zhou vePTUZ vanoti hunhu hwakaitwa nehurumende hautarisirwe zvachose munyika ine rusununguko. Doctor Victor Chimhutu ve Zimbabwe Yadzoka /Mayibuye IZimbabwe vatiwo sangano ravo rinotsigirana navana mukoti mukuramwa kwavo mabasa uye vachamira navo pamwechete nemasangano achamira mukurwisana nemaitiro ehurumende aya. No media source currently available

headline: ‘NHABVU HAIDI MAKAKATANWA’
text: AIMBOVE mubati wepagedhi weDynamos FC nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors — Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi — anoti kuti nhabvu yemuno isimukire ibve mumadhaka mairi pari zvino, vanhu vanofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kwete kuita “zvekudhonzerana”.   Kubvira makore adarika, nhabvu yemuno haina kumbosimuka sezvaitarisirwa nevazhinji nekuda kwezvikonzero zvinosanganisira kusabatana kuripo mumasangano anotungamira pamwe chete nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu.   Izvi ndizvo Umbro anoti zviri kukonzera kuti nhabvu yemuno isaririre kumashure. Anoti munhu wese ane chekuita nenhabvu anofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekushanda mumutambo uyu uye pfungwa dzake dzokosheswa.   “Chakuvadza nhabvu yedu inhau yekudhonzerana kuri kuitika chete, hakuna chimwe chinhu.   “Ngatibatanei tishande pamwe chete nekuti chinhu chinofanira kuhwina pakupera kwezuva inhabvu yedu. Hazvina basa kuti uyu mutsigiri wenhabvu here, uyu ane mari here kana kuti kwete, asi tikakoshesana tese sezvatiri tinokunda chete uye nhabvu yedu inosimukira.   “Kana tiri kurwisana hapana zvatinenge tichiita nekuti mhedzisiro tese tichangochema sezvatiri kuita iye zvino. Nhabvu yedu yakamira izvo zviri kukanganisa vechidiki,” anodaro.   Umbro anoenderera mberi achiti: “Tikatarisa iye zvino patave nhabvu yedu tiri kusarira kumashure zvakanyanya izvo zvakazokonzerwa nezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF, zvave kuita kuti nyika dzatainge tasiya panyaya yebudiriro panhabvu dzave kutotibata uye dzimwe dzatotidarika.   “Saka ngatibatane tishande kuti zvirango izvi zvibve nekuti ndezvimwe zvauraya nhabvu yedu. Vana vedu vaomerwa havachazive kuti remangwana ravo richazovei munhabvu.”    Gift ‘Umbro’ Muzadzi   Mwedzi watiri uno ndeweWorld Cup iyo iri kutambirwa kunyika yeQatar uye Africa iri kumirirwa nenyika shanu kumutambo uyu dzinoti Ghana, Cameroon, Senegal, Tunisia neMorroco.   Umbro anoti nyika shanu idzi dziri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kumutambo uyu uye ari kudzitsigira.   Asi anoti shuviro yake rimwe remazuva kuzoona maWarriors achinokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.   “Ini sechizvarwa chese chemuno chinofarira nhabvu, ndinoda kuonawo nyika yangu ichienda kuWorld Cup, nyika dzese dzinotoda kuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Ukaona wakwanisa kuenda kunotamba kuWorld Cup unenge watamba nhabvu yepamusoro. Saka ngatirongekei muno tigokwanisawo kuenda kumakwishu aya,” anodaro.   Mwaka wenhabvu wemuno uchangodarika, Umbro ange achishanda kuchikwata cheDynamos FC ari mumwe wevatevedzeri vaTonderayi Ndiraya.   Anoti vatsigiri venhabvu havachanyatsouya kuzotsigira zvikwata zvavo sezvavaiita kare uye zviri kukonzerwawo nekudhura kuri kuita kupinda munhandare.   “Nhabvu kuti inakidze, inofanirwa kunge ine vatsigiri, asi manje mazuva ano nhandare hadzichanyatsozare sezvaiitika kare. Nhau yandiri kuona hombe ndeyekuti kupinda munhandare kuri kudhuriswa zvakanyanya saka vatsigiri vari kutadza kuwana mari yacho.   “Saka zviri nani kunzi mari yekupindisa munhandare iendeswe paUS$1 chairo zvekuti kana nhandare ikazara nevanhu 50 000, imari yakawanda inoenda kuzvikwata zvemuno pane kunzi bhora ronzi US$3 kana US$5 mopinda vanhu vashoma munhandare.   “Nhabvu mazuva ano yave bhizimisi, ende zvakakosha kugona kuziva bhizimisi racho muite mari,” anodaro.   Umbro anobva kuMalawi asi akazvarirwa muZimbabwe ndokukurira muno. Kana vari muno, ndivanaHungwe asi kuMalawi ndivanaMbewe.   Kumusha kwavo muno kwakabva baba vake ndekwaLandas, kwaChihota.   Zita rekuti Umbro akaripihwa neshamwari dzake dzaakakura nadzo dzinoti Norman Mapeza, Lloyd Chitembwe naAlois Bunjira panguva iyo vese vaitambira Darryn T.   Anoti panguva iyo vaitambira chikwata cheUnder 14 cheDarryn T, akasonerwa juzi naambuya vake avo aigara navo.   Juzi iri ndiro raaiuya achitambisa nhabvu saka rimwe zuva akazosonerera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi iri izvo zvakanakidza shamwari dzake ndokubva vamupa zita remadunhurirwa iri.   “Tichikura kuDarryn T, ndaiita gadziriro dzangu ndakapfeka juzi randakasonerwa naambuya vangu. Saka chikwata chevakuru chaive nemayunifomu eUmbro aibva kuUK, rimwe zuva ndakauya ndakasonera zita rekuti Umbro pajuzi rangu iri shamwari dzangu dzikanakidzwa nazvo ndokutanga kundishevedza kuti Umbro. Kubva ipapo, zita rakabva ratongogara kusvika nhasi.   “Umbro iyoyo yaive yakanaka uye iniwo ndaiida chaizvo,” anodaro Umbro.

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Mamiriyoni Matanhatu (6M) Vafa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
text: Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga kupararira pasi rose muna 2019. MuAmerica chete vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhatu nechimwe kana kuti 961 000 vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba vakawanda ndivo vari kunzi vari kufa zvakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu. Vanhu makumi manomwe vanonzi vari kurwara neCovid-19 vari muzvipatara zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCcovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 5 399.

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vochema Chema neKushungurudzwa neMapurisa
text: Apo nyika ichiri mukucherechedza mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekudzivirira mhirizhonga inechekuita nekuti uri munhukadzi kana munhurume, vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa kunyanya madzimai vari kuchema chema nekwavanoti kushungurudzwa vachidzingirirwa nemapurisa Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe ANOTENGESA Mumugwagwa Amai Anna Moyowashe vati zvinotuma madzimai kutengesera mumigwagwa kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi. Vati vakawana chouviri kukutenegesa zinhu kwavanoita zvinogona kuderedza dambudziko remhirizhonga mudzimba. Vaenderera mberi vachiti chinopa kuti vatengesere pese pese inyaya yekutsvaka pavanokwanisa kuwana vatengi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naAmai Otilia Chikandira avo vati mhirizhonga iri kunyanyokonzerwa nehurombo nekuti mhuri dzinenge dzisina chekubata.Vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vatengese vakasununguka. Mumwewo munhurume anotengesera mumugwagwa, VaAngirayi Moyowatidhii vatiwo kudzingirirwa nemapurisa kunopa kuti vaende kumba vari maoko chete zvinokwanisa kuwedzera dambudziko remhirizhonga mudzimba. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaInnocent Ruwende vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe zvazvo vanotengesa mumugwagwa varikuchema chema nekugaroita hwakiti negonzo nemapurisa kusanganisira ekanzuru vati vatengesi vanofanirwa kutevedzera mitemo yekanzuru. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vatiwo basa ravo nderekuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera mitemo. Vamwe vanotengesa mumigwagwa vanokuvara mushure mekurowa nemapurisa kana kuti vachitiza uye vamwe vanotsikwa nekuurayiwa nemotokari dzemushika shika dzinenge dzichitandaniswa nemapurisa. Mazuva gumi nematanhatu ekudzivirira mhirizhonga inechekuita nekuti uri munhukadzi kana munhurume anotanga kucherechedzwa musi wa 25 Mbudzi kusvika musi was 10 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: Haye osendeka tsiva
text: (37) ari kutarisirwa kusendeka magirovhosi ake etsiva izvo zvichamuona achizorora kubva mumutambo uyo waatamba kwemakore anodarika 16. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ange achibva kuruzhinji ekuti shasha iyi ngaichisiya tsiva.Haye akataura padandemutande reTwitter svondo rino kuti ramagwana rake acharizivisa nekuchimbidza uye SportsMail iri kuziva kuti akaronga kuti achisiya mutambo uyu zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa kaviri kakatevedzana naTony Bellew.   Vazhinji vanoti shasha iyi yaifanirwa kuve yakasiya tsiva paakakundwa naBellew pekutanga gore radarika, apo paakakuvara gumbo rake, uye kuzorikitwa kwaakaitwa zvakare mwedzi uno ndiko kwave kumutuma kuti achisiya mutambo uyu izvo zvakarakidza kuti haasisiriye mutambi waaive kare apo akahwina bhande reWBA heavyweight mugore ra2009.   Mabhande aakahwina mumakore masere ekutanga mumutambo uyu acharangarirwa zvikuru mumakore anotevera sezvo Haye akave mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vepamusoro kwemakore akawanda. Asi anoteverwa nenyaya dzakawanda dzinosvibisa zita rake kubva pakunyepera kutyoka chigumwe zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa naWladimir Klitschko uye kurwa naDereck Chisora pamberi pevatori venhau (press conference) zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaitwa Chisora naVitali Klitschko mugore ra2019. – SportsMail boxing

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vanongosva Hurumende Kuti Vatange Zvakare Nhaurirano dzeNJNC
text: Vashandi vehurumende vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Service Trade Unions, iro raimbonzi APEX Council, vakanyorera kuhurumende vachikurudzira kuti nhaurirano dzemihoro, dzeNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, dzimutsiridzwe. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti chikonzero chikuru chaita kuti vanyorere kuhurumende vachiiyeuchidza nezvenhaurirano dzemihoro idzi inyaya yekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinodiwa nemunhu zuva nezuva iri kungokwira, asi mihoro yevashandi vehurumende isina kwairi kuenda. "Takanyorera hurumende tsamba musi wa 02 mwedzi uno tichivarangaridza kuti tarirai tava mugore idzva rava nemasandukiro aro ekurarama. saka tinotarisirawo kuti tinge tichisangana tichiita hurukuro nekutika isu nyaya yedu yemihoro ndeyekungoti nguva nenguva tagara pasi tichikurukura." VaMushangu vanoti zvavari kuda sevashandi vehurumende hazvirambe zvichichinja, uye hazvisi zvinhu zvakawanda, kunze kwekungoti hurumende idzose mihoro yavo pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, dzinove madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica pamwedzi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Joyce orongera Fury
text: muboka reheavyweight, Joe Joyce, anoti anoda kurwa naTyson Fury munaKukadzi kana shasha yeWBC ikatadza kuwirirana naDillian White uyo waanofanirwa kusangana naye.   Joyce mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira zvikuru izvo zvamuona asati ambokundwa muboka iri uye akakunda Danile Dubois gore radarika naCarlos Takam gore rino.   Ishamwari yaFury uye vanombotamba mitambo yehushamwari vachigadzirira mitambo yavo yakasiyana.   Asi anoti izvozvo hazvimutadzise kuti vasangane vachirwira mabhande akasiyana. Joyce anoti akazvipira kuti mitambo yavo vari vaviri irongwe.   WBC yakaramba kutaura kuti Whyte ndiye anofanirwa kurwa naFury sezvo vachiri vakamirira kunzwa kudare reBoxing Board of Control. Whyte ndiye ange akamirira kurwira bhande iri kwenguva ndefu, kwemazuva anodarika 1,000 ariye mutambi anotaurwa nebhodhi rinotungamirira tsiva kuti arirwire. Saka akasvika pakukwidza nyaya iyi kumusoro kuti apihwe mukana wake. Asi kana akakundikana, Joyce akagadzirira kuti vasangane.   Anobvuma hake kuti anoremekedza Fury asi ndokumukurudzira kuti amurangarirewo. Akanyora padandemutande paTwitter kuti, ‘Ndine ruremekedzo rukuru kunaTyson Fury seshamwari yangu uye semutambi wetsiva. Asi, ndakasununguka kusvika munaKukadzi. Ngatizviite!”.   ‘The Juggernaut’, sezita rake remadunhurirwa uyo anonzi ndiye ari pamusoro pevamawe vatambi vese neWBO uye ari pechipiri kuWBC, ari kuda chaizvo kuramba achizvirakidza kuti ishasha mumutambo uyu waari kusimukira.   Svondo radarika akanyora paTwitter kuti, “Mukana wangu uchauya! Ingori nyaya yenguva chete, asi ichasvika.” – SportsMail.

headline: Loga marara: Grobbelaar
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu ichitambira maWarriors nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Highlanders neLiverpool — Bruce “Jungleman” Grobbelaar — inoti Zdravko “Loga” Logarusic, uyo ari kutungamirira chikwata chenyika, murairidzi nhando pane vose vakamborairidza maWarriors.   Achitaura pachirongwa chaAlois Bunjira cheZim Soccernet, icho anoita hurukuro neshasha dzaakambotamba nadzo nhabvu, Jungleman anoti anoda chaizvo kudzoka kuzoshanda nemaWarriors sezvo pari zvino ari kutambisirwa nguva yawo naLoga.   Kusvika pari zvino, Loga arairidza maWarriors mumitambo 14 apo akangokwanisa kuhwina mumwechete, ndokuita mangange mimwe mishanu uye ndokukundwa misere. Nemusi weChipiri chino, maWarriors akakundwa 2-1 neEthiopia mumutambo wekurwira kuenda ku2022 World Cup.   Jungleman anoti matambiro ari kuita maWarriors anoratidza kuti Loga hapana zvaanoziva. “Ndinoda chaizvo kudzoka kuzoshanda nemaWarriors izvozvi, asi pane mumwe munhu aripo ari kuita basa iri. Asi mumaziso angu, muchinda uyu hapana zviri kuzivikanwa, arairidza mitambo inopfuura 12 akahwina mumwechete akaita mangange mishanu uye mimwe yese kurohwa chete, zvoratidza kuti ndiye murairidzi nhando pane vose vakambotungamira chikwata chenyika yedu.   “Nhoroondo yemitambo yaarairidza inotaura zvakawanda,” anodaro Jungleman.   Anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chiripo pari zvino chizere netarenda rinonwisa mvura zvekuti vanogona kusvika padanho rechikwata chakamboita mukurumbira che“The Dream Team” icho chaakatambirawo nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Peter Ndlovu apo vairairidzwa naReinhard Fabisch.   “Chikwata chatinacho iye zvino chine tarenda rinodadisa rinonwisa mvura uye vanogona kusvika padanho ratakasvika isu seDream Team. Vanofanirwa kungobikwa chete vorakidzwa gwara chairo rekufamba naro.   “Tine vatambi vakawanda vari kutambira kunyika dzeEurope, saka murairidzi wedu anofanirwa kuvabata vose ovakurudzira kuti vauye kuzotambira maWarriors uye ovazivisa zvakanakira kutambira nyika yavo.   “Ini ndikapihwa basa iri nhasi, chekutanga kubata vatambi vose ndovakurudzira kuti huyai kumusha mutambire nyika yenyu,” anodaro Jungleman.   Jungleman anoti matambiro ari kuita maWarriors anoratidza kuti Loga hapana zvaanoziva.

headline: Huwandu hweVana Vanotapurirwa HIV paKuzvarwa Hwoderera
text: Hurumende inoti madzimai zviuru makumi manomwe ndivo chete vakabatwa vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS gore rino. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nezvekutapuriranwa kweHIV kubva kuna amai kuenda kuvana, kana kuti Prevention of Mother To Child Transmission, PMTCT, Dr Nyikadzino Mahachi, vanoti pamadzimai aya, vana vanosvika zvikamu zvipfumbamwe kubva muzana ndivo vakatapurirwa chirwere cheHIV naamai vavo. Hurumende inoti uyu munongedzo wekuti zvirongwa zvawo zvekudzivirira kutapurirwa kwechirwere ichi kuvana huri kushanda. Chirongwa ichi chakaparurwa muna 2001 nehurumende ichishanda nemasangano akazvimirira. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera veMDC-T, vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinofadza uye chinangwa ndechekuti pasave kana nemwana mumwe anotapurirwa hutachiona naamai vake. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Ozara Mudhorobha reChitungwiza Kudzivirira Vanhu Kuratidzira
text: Mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga-nyonga nemusi weChishanu akapinda Chitungwiza uye ange ari panzvimbo zhinji dzemabhizimisi mudhorobha iri zvisinei nekuti mapato anopikisa pasi pesangano reNational Electoral Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA ange amisa kuratidzira kwaange akaronga mudhorbha iri.Mapuerisa Papinda Studio 7 mudhorobha iri panguva dzekuma9 mangwanani, mapurisa anodzvirira nyonga nyonga ange atozara mumusha weChitungwiza uye motokari dzinodira mvura inovava kana kuti maWater Canons dzange dzakamira mumisha mizhinji yakaita sekwaChigovanyika pamwe nekuSt Marys. Mune mimwe misha yakaita seZengeza, kwaSeke pamwe nepaMakoni mapurisa ange aine tsvimbo nezvombo zvehondo ange achitenderera izvi zvavhundutsa vakawanda. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, VaMarvelous Khumalo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kupinda kwemapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyonga mumusha weChitungiwza kwatadzisa vanhu vakawanda kuenda kubasa kuHarare sezvo vanhu vaange vachifunga kuti muHarare mange makazarawo mapurisa. VaKhumalo vanotiwo kana vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vakanganiswawo nhasi. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muChitungwiza VaBernard Mazhindu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashamisika kuti mapurisa auuya muChitungwiza akawanda zvinotyisa zvisinei nekuti NERA yange yamisa kuratidzira kwange kwakarongwa nhasi. VaMazhindu vanoti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kushushikana zvikuru kuti mapurisa ave kurambidza vanhu kuratidzira kutsutsumwa kwavo. Mumwe mugari wemuChitungwiza, VaCollin Kunaka vanoti vashamisika nekuita kwemapurisa uye vanoti vatadza kuita zvavange vachida kuita vakatya mapurisa. VeNERA vanoti vambomisa kuratidzira vachiti vari kuda kutsvaga nzira dzekuti kuratidzira kwavo kungaite mutsindo sei. Vanotiwo nhengo dzavo dzakawanda dziri kusungwa uye mari yechibatiso iri kudiwa nematare yakawandisisa. Sachigaro wekomiti yeNERA inoona nezvemutemo VaDouglas Mwonzora vaudza Studio 7 kupinda kwemapurisa muChitungwiza kunoratidza kuoma moyo kwemapurisa. Vatiwo vafara chose kuti mapurisa nhasi ashandisa mari yawo kuenda kuChitungiwza kunyange hazvo pasina zvange zvichiitika ikoko. Zvichakadai muHarare mapurisa ange akawanda mumigwagwa semazuva ose kunyange hazvo pasina kuratidzira kwaitika. Kubvira pakatanga veNERA kuratidzira mapurisa ave kugara ari mumumigwagwa zuva nezuva sezvo ari kufungidzira kuti vanhu vanogona kuratidzira nguva ipi zvayo. VeNERA vanoti vacharamba vachiratidzira kudzamara hurumende yavandudza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Mumimiriri weNkulumane VaThamsanqa Mahlangu Vanoshaya
text: Vaimbova mutevedzeri wegurukota rinooona nezvevechidiki uye vari mumiriri weNkulumane muparamende vari nhengo yeMDC T, VaThamsanqa Mahlangu vakashaya neMuvhuro. Mutauriri weMDCT, VaObert Gutu vakazivisa kushaya kwaVaMahlangu avo vati vanga vachirwara nechirwere chegomarara. Mashoko abuditswa naVaGutu anoti VaMahlangu vakashayika mambakwedza uye vati bato ravo rarasikirwa zvikuru nemumwe wevanhu vakavamba musangano weMDC muna 1999. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa muMDC-T VaAbednico Bhebhe vati bato ravo rarasikirwa negamba. Mashoko aVaBhebhe atsinhirwawo nevamwe vaimbova nhengo yeparamende VaFelix Magalela-Mafa. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano mudunhu reHarare muMDCT, VaRhino Mashaya vati kushayika kwaita VaMahlangu kwavarwadza zvikuru vachiti chanyanyovarwadza ndechekuti VaMahlangu vange vasati vapedza rwendo rwavo rwekuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere. Muzvare Yvonne Musarurwa avo vakashanda naVaMahlangu muboka revechidiki muMDC reYouth Assembly, vati gwanza rasiiwa naVaMahlangu richanetsa kuvhara. Imwe nhengo yeMDC yakapinda muparamende mushure mekudomwa nebato iri pasi peProportional Representation, Muzvare Susan Mutsunga vati vachasuwa basa ranga richibatwa naVaMahlangu muparamende pamwe nemubato ravo. VaMahlangu avo vakaberekwa musi wa27 Kubvumbi muna 1971 vakamboita mutungamiri weboka revechidiki mu MDC-T kwemakore mashanu zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa pakongiresi yebato iri kuBulawayo muna 2011. Vakazodomwa nemutungamiri weMDCT, VaMorgan Tsvangirai kuti vave mutevetedzeri wegurukota rinowona nezvevechidiki muhurumende yamubatanidzwa. Vakazotsiviwa pachinzvimbo ichi naVaTongai Matutu. Vasiya mudzimai Brenda Zaranyika nevanakomana vaviri vanoti Munyaradzi naZibusiso. Vanhu vakaungana panhamba 15053 Nkulumane 12 muBulawayo uye hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwavo hwanga husati hwaziviswa. No media source currently available

headline: Egpyt Yotatsurana neSenegal Mufainari yeAfcon
text: Makwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup 2021 ari kutarisirwa nhasi kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo nemutambo wefainari pakati peEgypt neSenegal. Mutambo uye wakamirirwa nevakawanda sezvo paine vatambi vane mukurumbira vanoti Mo Salah anotambira Egypt neLiverpool uye Sadio Mane anotambira Senegal neLiverpool zvekareuye Edouard Mendy mubati wepagedhi weSenegal neChelsea ari kushura mare pasi rose nekuva mangoyi wemhando yepamusoro. Egypt yasimudza mukombe uyu kanomwe, Senegal haisati yambouhwina. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvemitambo VaBrian Musekiwa vemuMaryland America vanoti vanoona sekuti Senegal yavanoti ine vatambi vakawanda vepamusoro ichakunda Ehypt 2-1. Nezuro Cameroon yakakunda Burkina Faso 5-3 mumapenalties mushure mekuita mangange 3-3 pakurwira chidanho chechitatu kumakwikwi aya. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidziso yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yokurudzirwa Kupihwa Veruzhinji
text: Mukuru wesangano riri kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 rePerch Media, VaCollen Magobeya, vanoti vapedza kubayiwa nhomba dzavo mbiri vachiti semunhu anoshanda neveruzhinji zvinovabatsira kuti vasatapurirwa kana kutapurira vamwe chirwere. VaMagobeya vanoti havo dzidziso ichiri kudiwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nezvenhomba iyi kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisadzoke zvakare zvine hukasha. Zimbabwe ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi. Asi vanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi kusvika pari zvino vachiri vashoma zvichienzaniswa nevanotarisirwa kunge vabayiwa. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, tabata VaMagobeya. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Danho reEU reKudyidzana Zvakare neZimbabwe Rakakosha
text: Mushure memakore anodarika gumi pasina kudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe nesangano reEuropean Union, EU, misuwo yakazozarurwa nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rino apo sangano iri rakapa Zimbabwe mari inosvika $267 million. Sangano re EU rakanga rakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango mushure mekunge hurumende yatanga kubvuta mapurazi kubva kuvachena pamwe nekubiridzirwa kwesarudzo dzakaitwa muna 2002. Mari yakabviswa nesangano iri inonzi ichabatsira munyaya dzehutano, budiriro mune zvekurima pamwe nehutongo hwakanaka. Munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa hurumende yakaumba chikwata chevanhu vatatu vaiti VaPatirck Chinamasa veZanu PF, VaElton Mangoma vaimirira MDC T, naAmai Priscillah Misihairambwi, veMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, icho chakapihwa basa rekukurudzira EU nedzimwe nyika kuti dzibvise zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Sangano iri rakazobvisa vanhu nemakambani vaive pazvirango asi zvakasarira pamutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, nekambani yeZimbabwe Defence Industries. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti European Union yakaona zvakakosha kuti itange zvakare kudyidzana neZimbabwe sezvo pasina zvayakaburitsa kubva muzvirango zvayo. Asi mukuru wesangano revechidiki reYouth in Democracy Initiative of Zimbabwe, VaSydney Chisi, vanoti EU yakanga yaona kutambura kuri kuramba kuchiita vana veZimbabwe pasi pehutongo hweZanu PF, izvo zvakaita kuti sangano iri ribvise zvirango uye kutanga kupa rubatsiro. Chikwata chevemabhizimusi vekunyika dzekumawirira dzinosanganisira Britain neFrance chakanga chiri munyika mazuva mashoma apfuura chichiitawo hurukuro dzekutsvaga kumutsiridza hukama nehurumende yaVaMugabe. No media source currently available

headline: Ticharonga Cosafa patsva: Destombes
text: SANGANO reCouncil of Southern Africa Football Association (Cosafa) – iro rinoronga Cosafa Cup – rinoti mitambo yegore rino ichadzoserwa kumashure nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakakonzera kuti nhabvu imbomira kutambwa kunyika dzakawanda dzepasi rose.   Mitambo yeCosafa Cup yegore rino yange ichifanirwa kutambwa munaChikumi kuDurban, kuSouth Africa.   Asi muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, munyori mukuru weCosafa, Sue Destombes anoti mazuva achatambwa mutambo uyu gore rino achatariswa patsva sezvo pari zvino vanhu vasati vava kutenderwa  kufamba kuenda kune dzimwe nyika nekuda kwecoronavirus.   “Sekuziva kwemunhu wose, chirwere cheCovid-19 chavhiringidza zvakawanda pasi rose. Saka nekuda kwaizvozvo, mazuva achatambwa Cosafa Cup 2020 achasandurwa.   “Cosafa Cup inotambwa panguva iyo mitambo yePSL inenge yapera, saka nekudaro tichamirira kuti mitambo iyi igopera uye hatizive kuti lockdown iyi ichapera rinhi zvekare kuti miganho yenyika inovhurwa rinhi kuti vanhu vagofamba kuenda kune dzimwe nyika,” anodaro Destombes.   Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzichange dzichitarisirwa kuenda kunokwikwidza kuCosafa Cup uko iine nhoroondo yekuva nyika yakahwina mukombe uyu kakawanda kudarika dzimwe nyika.   Kutaura kuno chikwata ichi chakwanisa kuhwina mukombe uyu katanhatu uye chakapedzisira kuusimudza mugore ra2018.   Gorerakadarika mukombe uyu wakahwinwa neZambia.

headline: Boka rePlatform of Concerned Citizens, PCC, Roronga Musangano weKuzeya Mamiriro eZVinhu Munyika
text: Vatungamiri vemapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika vari kutarisirwa kusangana nemusi weChina muHarare kumusangano wekuzeya matambudziko ari munyika pamwe nekutsvaga nzira dzingashandiswa kuti paumbwe hurumende ichafanobata matomu, kana kuti National Transitional Authority. Vamwe vari kutarisirwa kupinda musangano uri kukokerwa nePlatform of Concerned Citizens (PCC) uyu vamiriri vemasangano akazvimirira, vadzidzi, vechidiki pamwe nemadzimai. Mumwe wevari kuronga musangano uyu, Doctor Ibbo Mandaza vanoti chinangwa chemusangano wavo ndechekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. "Musangano wacho tadaidzira kuti tione kuti maZimbabweans senyika vanoti chiinenyaya ye crisis yatatarisana nayo senyika yeZimbabwe. Ndo main purpose yedu yemusangano wemusi weChina," Doctor Mandaza vanodaro. Vanoti nyaya yekuti ndiani achatora masimba kana VaMugabe vachinge vasiya chigaro iri kunetsa, saka boka ravo riri kuda kudzivirira mhere nekuurayana kuburikidza nekuumbwa kwe National Transitional Authority. "Inenge iri nguva yekuti makore maviri or 18 months,vanhu vagara pasi vaine National Transitional Authority yevanhu vasiri ma politicians asi vanhu vakanangana nekuti nyika ipore." Vanoti kusvika pari zvino vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vazivisa kuti vachange vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira VaTendai Biti vePeople’s Democtratic Party, VaDumiso Dumiso Dabengwa vebato reZapu pamwe naVaSimba Makoni veMavambo/Kusile/Dawn. Asi Doctor Mandaza vanoti havasati vanzwa kubva kumapato anoti MDC T yaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Zimbabwe People First yaAmai Joice Mujuru, pamwe neZanu PF inotungamirirwa naVaRobert Mugabe. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harisi kukwanisa kuve pamusangano uyu sezvo pari zvino riri kumbonangana nekurwisa kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe riri pasi pemubatanidzwa weNERA. Ukuwo mutauriri weZimbabwe People First, VaJealousy Mawarire vatiwo mutungamiri webato ravo Amai Mujuru havakwanisi kunge vari pamusangano uyu nemusi weChina sezvo vachisimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa zuva iroro kumusangano wavari kuronga kuita neMugovera. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi reZanu PF kana VaMugabe vachabudirira kunge varipo pamusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Nhumwa yeUN, VaClement Voule, Vanoita Musangano naVaMudenda
text: Nhumwa yeUnited Nations munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, VaClement Voule, yasangana nemutauri weNational Assembly pamwe nemasachigaro emakomiti ose eparamende vakazeya nyaya dzakasiyana siyana dzinosanganisira kuvandudzwa kwemitemo yesarudzo, kodzero dzevanhu, pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika. Kunyange hazvo VaVoule varamba kutaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano uyu, mutauriri weparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vati vaudza VaVoule nechikwata chavo kuti hurumende inoita zvinhu zvayo zvese pachena ndosaka vakakokwa kuzozvionera pamhuno sefodya. VaMudenda vati vazeya zviri kuitwa neparamende mukushandura mitemo inoona nezvesarudzo nehupfumi. VaMudenda vati VaVoule nechikwata chavo vange vachidawo kuziva zviri kuitwa neparamende mukuona kuti zvakataurwa neMotlanthe Commission pamwe nemasangano nenyika dzakauya kuzoongorora sarudzo zvatevedzwa here. Asi VaMudenda vati hapana zvataurwa panyaya dzekupambwa kuri kuitwa vanhu munyika. VaVoule avo vari munyika kwemazuva gumi, vachasangana nemakurukota ehurumende, pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira akawanda munzvimbo zvinji munyika. Sachigaro wesangano reChurches and Civic Society Forum, Reverend Anglistone Sibanda, vaudza Studio7 kuti kushanya kwaVaVoule kwakakosha chose sezvo kuchaburitsa pachena zvese zviri kuitika munyika. Vati vanovimba kuti masangano ese achawana mukana wekutaura naVaVoule. Asi vamwe vakaita semukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana zvizhinji zvavanotarisira kubva parwendo rwaVaVoule. VaRuhanya vati pane dzimwe nhumwa dzeUN dzakamboshana munyika panguva yeMurambatsvina asi hapana chakashanduka. VaVoule vari munyika mushure mekukokwa nehurumende kuti vazoongorora kuti zvinhu zvakamiraa sei munyika panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nezvimwe. Vange vakamirira bazi rezvemutemo pamusangano wanhasi vati VaVoule ndivo chete panyanzvi nhanhatu dzinoona zvakasiyana siyana muUN dzakakokwa nehurumende kuti dzione kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika. VaVoule nechikwata chavo vari munyika panguva iyo vanachiremba navanamukoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiratidza kusafara nekupambwa kwakaitwa vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Peter Magombeyi. Vashandi vemuzvipatara ava vari kuti vachadzokera kubasa kana Dr. Magombeyi vawanikwa vari vapenyu. Hurumende inoti iri kushushikana nekupambwa kwakaitwa Dr. Magombeyi, panguva iyo nhumwa dzeUN dziri muZimbabwe. Gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti kupambwa kwaDr. Magombeyi kunogona kunge kwakaitwa nevamwe vanhu vasiri muhurumende, vaine chinangwa chekusvibisa chimiro chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Asi mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti ibasa rehurumende kuona kuti yaferefeta zvakadzama, kuitira kuti vakapamba Dr. Magombeyi vaniswe pamberi pematare edzimhosva vachitongwa nenyaya dzekutyora mitemo yenyika, pamwe nekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Tambai bhora vakomana’
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors chiri kupinda muhondo nhasi na3pm masikati apo chichasangana necheSenegal mumutambo wacho wekutanga weTotal Energy Africa Cup of Nations 2021.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri muboka rimwe chete reGroup B umo mune zvimwe zvinoti Malawi neGuinea.   Mutungamiri weFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti mutambo watsvuka ropa.   “Sevatsigiri venhabvu, tiri kufara zvikuru mutambo watange takamirira wasvika. Tinoti kumaWarriors basa ngaribatwe, musavhundutsirwe nemazita evatambi veSenegal. Isu titoriwo shasha uye kuti tive kumutambo uyu tinotorakidza kuti tiri nyanzviwo.   “Gore rino, kekutanga tinoda kuona chikwata chedu chichibudirira kubuda muboka racho chichifambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Asi tiri ipapo, tiri kukurudzira vatsigiri kuti ngaticherechedze mutemo, ngatisaungane asi tione mutambo uyu tiri kudzimba dzedu,” anodaro Chimedza.   Kuchiti mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu ane mukurumbira – Adomsi Mukwasi – anoti maWarriors anotofanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe mumutambo uyu.   “Isu tiri kuti hatinei nemazita evatambi vari muchikwata cheSenegal, basa ngaribatwe maWarriors. Go Warriors Go, tinemi muhondo, Senegal ngairadzikwe pasi,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, uyo akasimuka nezuro akananga kuCameroon kunotsigira maWarriors kumutambo uyu, anoti chikwata ichi chinoda rutsigiro rwakasimba.   “Vakomana vedu tinavo, ishuviro yedu kuti vabate basa sebasa. Gore rino, tinotarisira kuti ngavabude muboka ravo timbosvika kure kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mutambo uyu uchange uri wechina maWarriors achisangana neSenegal uye pamitambo mitatu yadarika, chikwata chenyika ichi chakakundwa yose.   Kumutambo weAFCON, maWarriors akasangana neSenegal kaviri, ndokukundwa 2-0 mumitambo yose.   Zvakadaro, sangano reCAF rakazivisa kuti Senegal ichange isina vatambi vayo vane chitsama vanosanganisira Edourd Mendy weChelsea, Kalidou Koulibaly weNapoli naNampalys Mendy weLeicester City sezvo vakabatwa nedenda reCovid-19.

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vopinda muKupera kweSvondo Vasina Mvura
text: Vagari veguta reHarare nematunhu akapoteredza vari kukurudzirwa nekanzuru yavo kuti vachereredze mvura yakawanda sezvo vachapinda mukupera kwesvondo vasina mvura sezvo kanzuru iri kuvandudza michina inochenesa mvura paMorton Jaffray Water Works. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti misha yakawanda muHarare, Ruwa neNorton ichange isina mvura kubva nenguva dza 8 manheru anhasi kusvika nenguva dza 8 dzemangwanani emusi weMuvhuro, asi musha weKuwadzana Extension uchange usina mvura kusvika musi wa 7 mwedzi unouya. VaChideme vanoti hapana chikuru chakanyanya kusiyana nedzimwe nguva dzagara kanzuru yavo ichi vhara mvura pavanenge vachi gadzira michina kana kuvandudza michina yavo pamwe nepombi dzemvura. Asi vanoti rwendo rwuno musiyano uripo ndewekuti chete pombi dzakawanda dziri muvhu dzave kuputika, chinove chiratidzo chekuti mvura yave kufamba mupombi idzi yawanda kuburikidza nekugadzirwa kwemichina inopomba mvura iyi. “Vagari tiri kuvakurudzira kuti vachengetedze mvura parutivi yekushandisa pamazuva maviri atinenge takavhara mvura. KuKuwadzana Extension tichaendesa ma bowser,” VaChideme vanodaro. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Muchakabvu Mandela kuMusangano weNelson Mandela Peace Summit
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, Va Emerson Mnangagwa, vapinda neMuvhuro mumusangano we Nelson Mandela Peace Summit uyo waitirwa mu New York kumucheto kwemisangano yeUnited Nations Annual General Assembly, UNGA, iri kuitwa muguta iri svondo rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, Va Mnangagwa varumbidza mabasa akaitwa naVaMandela mumazuva avo vachiti pasi rose harikanganwi zvakasiya zvaitwa naVaMandela panyika vachiri vapenyu. Va Mnangagwa vati vanhu havafaniri kungotaura mabasa aVaMandela vasingazadzisi nekuita zvido zvavo. VaMnangagwa vati VaMandela, avo vakava mutungamiri weSouth Africa wechitema wekutanga, munhu akagara mujeri kwemakore akawanda achirwira rusununguko rwemunhu wese wemuSouth Africa. Vamwe vanga vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira mutungamiri weSouth Africa, Va Cyrl Rhamaphosa, shirikadzi yaVaMandela, Amai Graca Machel. VaMnangagwa vakasanaganawo nemusi weSvondo nezvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe zvinogara mu America ne kuCanada umo vakataura nezvehurongwa hwehurumende yavo uye kukumbira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika kuti vadzoke kumusha kuzobatsira mukusimudzira nyika vazoisawo ruoko mubudiriro nematongerwo enyika ye Zimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kutaura pamberi pemusangano mukuru uchaitwa nemusi weChitatu. Uyu musangano wekutanga waVaMnangagwa vachitaura semutungamiri wenyika. Kwemakore anodarika makumi matatu nemanomwe, vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vaitaura pamusangano wepagore weUNGA. Nguva zhinji VaMugabe vaitora mukana uyu kunyomba America neBritain nemadzisahwira adzo vachiti nyika idzi dzaipindira mumatongerwo enyika muZimbabwe dziine chinangwa chekuvabvisa pachigaro. Asi VaMugabe vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto avo, achitungamirwa nemunhu wavakagadza pachigaro chemukuro wemauto ose, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vaswera Vachizvifambira Zvavo muKwekwe Yakavharwa neMugovera
text:
Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri. Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri.

Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakatara kuti lockdown iyi itange nezuro manheru, zvitoro nemamwe mabhizimisi zvange zvakavhurwa uye veruzhinji vange vachiita mabasa avo semazuva ose kusanganisira kutengesa pamisika nekuchinja mari mumigwagwa, vamwewo vari mumitsetse pamabhangi.

Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti muguta iri muchave nelockdown
kwemasvondo maviri kutanga nezuro manheru zvichitevera kuwanikwa kweimwe mhando yechirwere cheCovid iyo yakauraya mumwe muzvinabhizmisi mudhorobha reRedcliff svondo rapera mushure mekunge ashanya kuIndia.

Vamwe vagari vemuKwekwe vataura neStuio 7 vati vanotyira kuti kungove
nelockdown munzvimbo iyi chete hakuna zvakunonyanyobatsira vamwewo
vachiti vanoona danho iri richibatsira.

Mumwe mugari, Parti Ngozo, anove mutapi wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ati maonero ake ndeekuti dai nyika yose yaiswa mulockdown sezvo mhando yechirwere cheCovid yekuIndia iyi ichiratidza kuti ine hukasha hwakasimba.

Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, Muzvare Nyarai Ndawana, avo vanove mukuru wesangano reZichea mudunhu reMidlands, vati veruzhinji vanonzwisisa chose kukosha kwekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 asi vati nekuda kwekutambura vakawanda vanozotadza kutevedzera zvimwe zvezvinodiwa vachitsvaga zvinoraramisa mhuri dzavo.

Meya weguta reKwekwe, Amai Angeline Kasipo, avo vanovewo
muzvinabhizimisi vane nzvimbo inoitirwa michato nezvimwe, vati
kunyange hazvo lockdown ichigona kuvhiringidza mararamiro evanhu, vane chokwadi chekuti veruzhinji vanonzwisisa kukosha kwedanho rekuve
nelockdown.

Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuKwekwe, VaFreddy Kapuya, avo vanove mumiriri weMhondoro Ngezi mudare paramende vari mubato reZanu PF, vati vanotambirawo danho rekuve nelockdown vachiti kukoshesa hutano hweveruzhinji ndicho chinhu chikuru.

Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vahigarawo muKwekwe, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati danho rekuti muKwekwe muve nelockdown rakanaka.  Asi Dr Madzorera vati danho iri rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nemamwe matanho akasimba anosanganisira kusimudzira ongororo yeveruzhinji kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Muchizivisa chavo nezuro, gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakatiwo mabhawa ose haasi kubvumidzwa kuvhura munguva yelockdown, uye michato nekunamata vanhu vakaungana, zvava kurambidzwawo kwemasvondo maviri.  VaChiwenga vakatiwo vanenge vafirwa vanofanirwa kunge vaine munhu abva kubazi rezvehutano, uye vanhu vanoungana parufu havafanirwe kudarika makumi matatu. Vanhu vanopfuura nemuguta reKwekwe vari kukurudzirwa zvikuru kusamira muguta iri kwenguva yakareba. VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichaenderera mberi nedzidziso yechirwere cheCovid-19, kucheneswa kwezvitoro nenzvimbo dzose dzinopindwa neveruzhinji.

Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende isimudzire kubaiwa kweveruzhinji nhomba senzira yekubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, 9 369, vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nezvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 624 665.

Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, avo vanove zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chauraya vanhu munyika yose vanosvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 1 586, uye kubata vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 38 664. Pasi rose, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu, 166 million, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru, 3, 460 000 vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Vanofadzwa neZviratidzwa zveMabasa muHarare
text: Vamiriri vedzimwe nyika, masangano ekunze akaita seEuropean Union neInternational Monetary Fund pamwe nevakuru vakuru muhurumende neChishanu vabatana nevechidiki pazviratidzwa apo nyika dzino darika makumi maviri dzange dzichi ratidza nekutsanangura mikana yedzidzo nemabhizimisi inowanikwa nevechidiki munyika idzi. Pazviratidzwa izvi paitwawo nhaurirano pamusoro pezvingaitwe nehurumende, pamwe nemasangano ekunze pakuvanduza kana kuwedzera mikana yevechidiki munyaya dzemabhizimisi pamwe nekuti vawane mabasa. Vamwe vataura panhaurirano idzi vanosanganisira vamiriri veEuropean Union, International Monetary Fund, Britain neweDemocratic Republic of Congo muZimbabwe nevamwe avo vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende ipe mukana kune vechidiki muzvirongwa zvayo sezvo remangwana riri mavari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvhupfumi, VaAshok Chakara vati pari zvino remangwana revechidiki harina kumira zvakanaka sezvo vasina mabasa uye hurumende isiri kuvapinza muzvirongwa zvayo. Mumwe wechidiki wemuHarare Denford Ngadziore ati anowirirana nemashoko aVaChakara. Blesssing Makovera uyo anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chemuHarare anoti adzidza zvakawanda pazviratidzwa izvi. Shamwari yaBlessing, Hilary atiwo ave neruzivo rwekuti anoita sei kana achida kunodzidza kunze kwenyika. Mumwe wevakaronga zviratidzwa izvi, VaMisheck Gondo,vati zviratidzwa izvi, izvo vati zvinonzi space, zvichange zvave kuitwa gore rega rega uye chinangwa chazvo kupa mikana kune vechidiki munyaya dzedzidzo nemabhizimisi. Nyika dzakawanda kubva kumativi mana kusanganisira America, Britain, Japan, France neIndonesia dzange dziri pazviratidzwa izvi. Nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzezvehupfumi, vechidiki vakawanda vari kunonga svosve nemuromo muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vasingaone Vopomera Kanzuru yeHarare Mhosva yeKutyora Kodzero Dzavo
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vasingaone vapa chikumbiro kukanzuru yeguta iri chekuti vawane mashoko pamusoro pezvirongwa zvainoita. Mushamarari uye vasinaone VaLiberty Mkhululi Lupahla vanoti vasingaone havasi kuwana mashoko pamusoro pemisangano yekanzuru nezviziviso nekuti zvinyorwa zvacho zvakagadzirirwa vanoona chete, "Ngatizivei kuti vanhu vasingaone vagari vemumaguta semunhu wese muZimbabwe." Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Saka zvinhu zvakakodzera kuti pese panoumbwa hurongwa hwakakosha zvizivikanwe nemunhu wese." VaLupahla vanoti vasingaone vane kodzero yekuva mukati mehurongwa hweguta sezvakangoitawo vamwe, "Asi muchaona kuti ma budgets acho anenge akanyorwa ne print kwete braille kana kutaurwawo zvazvo nenzira inonzwikwa neveruzhinji." Vatizve, "Zvinonetsa nekuti vakaremara vanenge vachida kunzwawo hurongwa hweguta ravo sevanhu vanobhadhara mitero yakasiyana siyana. Saka kana ma budgets achiitwa ivo vasingazive zvinoti netsei nekuti vanoitwa sevana vadiki" VaAbraham Mateta igweta uye vasingaone vanoti dambudziko rekubatwa nekuseri kweruoko rinopera chete kana vakaremara vane hunyanzvi vakapinzwa mabasa mukanzuru. "Kana pane vanomiririra kodzero dzevakaremara mukanzuru vanezenge vachiona kuti vanhu vasingaone vanodawo runyoro rwe braille pamwe nekugadzira zvimwe zvishambadzo nemashoko zvinozobatsira vasingaone." VaMateta vanoti kanzuru iri kutyora mutemo wenyika pamwe nekodzero dzakatenderanwa nenyika dzepasi rose kana kuti Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities pakushayisa vasingaone mukana wekuti vawane mashoko. "Vemakanzuru vanofanira kuziva kuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinotaura kuti muhurongwa hwebudiriro zvishuwo zvevakaremara zvinofanira kunge riri rimwe dingindira rinofanira kutarisiswa." Muzvinafundo Tafara Marazi vepa University of Zimbabwe vanotungamirira sangano revasingaone reVisually-Impaired Persons Support vanotiwo vasingaone vane hunyanzvi hwekugadzira mutauro we braille vanofanira kuwaniswa mukana mukanzuru, "Vamwe vedu vane hunyanzvi vari kutopemha mudzinzira." Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Dai zvaiita vanhu vakadaro vawaniswa mukana wekugadzira braille toraramawo hupenyu hunoraramwa nevamwe hwekuwana mashoko." Meya veguta reHarare vaJacob Mafume vatambira mashoko evasingaone vakati kanzuru ichatora matanho nekukurumidza ekuzvigadzirisa, "Ichokwadi kuti zvinyorwa zvedu hazvibude muzvinyorwa zvebraille." Vawedzera vachiti, " Zvimwe zvinhu zvinenge zvichida kuti munhu uzviwerengere. Tichaedza nepese patinogona kuti tizvigadzirise.: .

headline: Gadziriro dze2024 Paris Olympics dzatanga
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Olympic Committee (ZOC) ratanga gadziriro dzemitambo ye2024 Paris Summer Olympics izvo zvakaona richagadza Ringisai Kudzanai Hillario Mapondera kuve Chef De Mission (CdM) wechikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe.   MaSummer Olympics aya achaitwa kuFrance kubva munaChikunguru achizopera munaNyamavhuvhu muna2024 uye Zimbabwe inotarisirwa kutumira shasha dzemitambo yakasiyana kunokwikwidza kumitambo iyi.   Muchinyorwa, ZOC yakazivisa nezvekugadzwa kwaMapondera zvichitevera tsvakurudzo yaikaitwa pavanhu vakawanda vaida basa iri.   Mapondera ane basa guru rekutungamira chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe kuenda kumitambo iyi uye achaona pamusoro pezvose zvinodiwa nevatambi nevaraidzi.   “Basa raCdM rinotanga ari kumaOlympics uye nepanopera mitambo yemaOlympics iyi.   “Izvi zviri mugwara rechirongwa cheZOC cheAthletes Development and Support Overall Goal chekuona kuti chikwata cheZimbabwe chatsigirwa chaizvo uye vatambi vagadzirira nemazvo kuti vagonokwikwidza zvakanaka kumitambo mikuru yepasi rese kusvika mugore ra2025,” inodaro ZOC.   Kumitambo ye2024 Paris Olympics, Zimbabwe inotarisirwa kutumira vatambi vakawanda zvichitevera vatambi vashoma avo vakanomirira nyika kumitambo yekupedzisira ye2020 Summer Olympics.   Mitambo iyi yakazoitwa gore radarika sezvo yakange yamiswa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19 iro rakaona mitambo ichimiswa pasi rose muna2019.   Kumitambo ya2020, Zimbabwe yainge ine vatambi vashanu vaiti Ngoni Makusha wemujaho wekumhanya, Scott Vincent anotamba gorofu, Donata Katai anotuhwina, Peter Weltzar anotuhwina zvekare naPeter Purcell-Gilpin werowing.

headline: Kurwisana Pakati peMauto eUkraine neRussia Kunonzwikwa muGuta Guru reUkraine reKyiv
text: Kuputika kwemabhambu pamwe nekurira kwepfuti kunonzi kwanga kuchinzwikwa neMugovera muguta guru reUkraine, reKyiv, apo mauto eRussia nemauto eUkraine akanga achirwira kuti guta guru iri rive pasi pavo. Vakuru veguta reKyiv vanonzi vadzika mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu kubva nenguva dza 5 manheru kusvika nenguva dza 8 mangwanani ezuva rinotevera. Vakuru muhurumende yeUkraine vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi kuti zvibatsire kudzivirira guta reKyiv kubva kumauto eRussia. Kamba yemauto iri muguta guru iri yarwiswa asi mauto eUkraine anoti kurwiswa uku kwadzivirirwa. Chimwe chivakwa chemuturikidzwa chiri muguta guru iri charwiswawo mambakwedza. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muUkraine rati chivakwa ichi charohwa nechombo cheRussia. Mumwe mushandi anonunura vanhu munjodzi audza sangano renhau Associated Press kuti vanhu vatanhatu vakuvadzwa mukurwiswa nechombo chemuchadenga uku. Mifananidzo yepamavhidhiyo inoratidza kuti chivakwa ichi chaparadzwa zvakanyanya , zvikuru mumipanda yepamusoro. Mutungamiri weUkraine, VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy vakanga vayambira kuti kurwiswa kweKyiv kwaizowedzerwa neMugovera, vakati guta guru iri raida kudzivirirwa vachiti havangarasikirwi naro. VaZelenskyy vanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter kuti vataura nemutungamiri weFrance VaEmmanuel Macron, vachiti zvombo nezvikwanisiro kubva kune vavanodyidzana navo zviri munzira kuenda kuUkraine. Ukuwo, gurukota rezvekudyidana nedzimwe nyika muRussia rati mauto eRussia atora guta riri kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumabvazuva kweUkraine reMelitopol. Vakuru vakuru muAmerica pamwe nenyika dzekumawirira vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eRussia hwekufora achipinda muKyiv nemamwe maguta senzira yekudimura nekuparadza hurumende yeUkraine hunenge hwadzikira mutsindo. MuKyiv, VaZelenskyy vasarudza kukurudzira nyika yavo, vachiramba runyerekupe rwekuti vatiza guta iri vachisimbisa kuti ivo nevamwe vakuru vehurumende vachirimo vose vachidzivirira rusununguko rwavo nenyika yavo.

headline: VaBhasikiti Voruma Nzeve VaMugabe Zviri Kuitwa naAmai Mahofa kuNuanetsi Ranch
text: Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMasvingo, VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, vanoti vanyora tsamba kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachinyuyuta kuti vakatora chigaro chavo, Amai Shuvai Mahofa, vari kushanda nemumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaBilly Rautenbach, kuti vabvise vanhu kuNuanetsi Ranch kuitira kuti VaRautenbach vatange bhizimisi rekugadzira mafuta enzimbe panzvimbo iyi. No media source currently available Amai Mahofa vakaudza Studio7 svondo rapera kuti mhuri zviuru makumi maviri dzichabviswa kuNuanetsi Ranch dzichiendeswa kumapurazi manomwe akatsvagwa nehurumende. Asi nzvimbo yakagariswa vanhu patsva iyi yagara iine mutauro nekuti kambani yeDevelopment Trust of Zimbabwe yakavambwa nevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, avo vakatenga purazi iri. VaRautenbach vanonzi vakanyorerana pasi chibvumnirano chekushanda nekambani iyi mukuumba kambani ye Zimbabwe Bio Energy. Asi pange pachikandiranwa makobvu nematete pakati pekambani iyi nehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaRautenbach sezvo munhu adaira nharembozha yavo ati vachazofona. Asi havana kuita izvi pataenda kumhepo. Amai Mahofa vati vange vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru we Development Trust of Zimbabwe, VaCharles Madonko, vanoti hurumende haineyi neminda iri pasi pekambani yavo, sezvo minda iyi yakatengwa kare. No media source currently available

headline: Vekumaruaa Vazhinji Vorarama neZvikwereti Sezzvo Hupfumi hweNyika Hwaenda kuMawere
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment Committee (ZIMVAC) muongororo yaro yakanzi 2016 Rural Livelihoods Assessment Surveys rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari mumaruwa huri kutambura nezvikwereti nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu hwakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekushaya chikafu. Ongororo iyi inoti vazhinji vari mumaruva vari kutengesa midziyo nezvipfuyo zvavo senzira yekutsvaga raramo. Nzvimbo dziri kunyanya kutarisana nedambudziko iri dzinosanganisira Matabeleland South ne North, Masvingo, ne Manicaland. Zvikwereti zvakawanda zvinonzi zvange zviri zvekubhadhara mari dzezvikoro nechikafu. Gurukota rinooona nezvemagariro evanhu Amai Prisca Mupfumira vakaudza bepanhau re Herald kuti vari kushanda nematunhu akasiyana siyana kuti vawedzere huwandu hwevari kuwana chikafu kubva kuhurumende. Vamwe Amai vekwaChivi Gogo Matizorofa vanoti ichokwadi kuti vakawanda mumaruwa vari kurarama nezvikwereti. "Ichokwadi zvinhu zvaooma kuno kwaChivi tinotokwereta zvekudya kuzvitoro mwedzi woga woga zvinosvika pa$40 tozopota tichidzosera asi zviri kuramba zvichiwedzera kuoma," Gogo Matizorofa vaudza Studio 7. Gogo Matizorofa vanoti vane vazukuru gumi nepiri nevana vavo vari pamusha sezvo varikushaya mabasa sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwuri kuramba uchienda kumawere zvinoreva kuti ivo ndivo vanofanirwa kupa mhuri yese zvekudya. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kusanaya kwemvura mudunhu iri nekutsva kwakaita zvirimwa ndiko kuri kuwedzera dambudziko rekukwereta mumaruwa. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hapana Chichabuda Mukushanya kuZimbabwe kweNhumwa yeUnited Nations
text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti vari kukatyamadzwa zvikuru kuona kuti gwaro rabudiswa nehurumende pamusoro pevanhu vachasangana nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, hapana mapato anopikisa kana masangano akazvimirira. Amai Alena Douhan vari muZimbabwe mavari kutarisirwa kuongorora nyaya dzezvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakuru mubato reZanu-PF, pamwe chete nemabhizimisi avanodyidzana navo. Amai Douhan vachitarisirwawo kuongorora nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Gwaro rakabudiswa nehurumende rinoratidza kuti Amai Douhan vachangosangana nemakurukota ehurumende, vakuru veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission naJustice Luke Malaba. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College, kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti havaoni kuti rwendo rwaAmai Douhan pane zvaruchabudisa sezvo United Nations pachayo isina simba rekubvisa zvirango izvi, vachiti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa neAmerica, pamwe nemadzisahwira ayo, anosanganisa Britain nedzimwe nyika muEuropean Union. Vanoti chingabatsira vakatemerwa zvirango ndechekuti vataure nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi, vachiti panoenda VaMnangagwa kuBritain apa, vanogona kutaura nehurumende yeko, vachiratidza chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti Amai Douhan vanozikanwa zvikuru pamusoro peongororo dzavanoita munyika dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu, dzakaita seVenezuela, vachiti izvi zvinogona kukonzera kuti vakatemerwa zvirango muZimbabwe vasawana mukana wekumbotererwa nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanosangana neVechidiki veBato Ravo reZanu-PF
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChitatu vakasangana nevatungamiri vevechidiki vebato ravo muHarare vakati boka revechidiki iri harisi kunyatsoonekwa mashandiro aro panyaya dzekukwezva vechidiki kuti vave nechekuita mune mamiriro ezveupfumi hwenyika. VaMnangagwa, avo vapinda musangano veNational Assembly yevechidiki ava, vatiwo vechidiki ava ndivo vanofanirwa kudzivirira pamwe nekusimudzira gwara remusangano weZanu PF. Vatiwo vakatambira chikumbiro chevechidiki chekuti bazi roga roga rive neboka rinoona nezvezvido zvevechidiki, vachiti vachagara pasi kuti vazeye nezvechikumbiro ichi. Munyori anoona nezvevechidiki kuZanu PF, VaPupurai Togarepi vanoti musangano uyu wanga wakakoshera vechidiki zvakanyanya sezvo uchivapa mukana wekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika. VaTogarepi vanotiwo zvabuda mumusangano uyu zvichatakurwa nevechidiki vodzokera nazvo kumatunhu kwavo uko vachanozvishandisa mukusimudzira musangano wavo pamwe nenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHupfumi Dzozeya Kurudziro yeRBZ Yekuti Mari yeMunyika Ishandiswe Zvakanyanya
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kurudziro yagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, yekuti vanhu vashandise mari yemunyika zvakanyanya ipfungwa yakanaka chose, asi izvi zvinoshanda chete kana mari yemunyika iyi iine huremu hunounza chivimbo muvanhu. Vachitaura kumusangano wavakaita nevemabhizimusi svondo rapera, VaMangudya vakati kushandiswa kwemari yekunze munyika kwakaonekwa muna 2008 kuti hakukudze hupfumi hwenyika kunze kwekungodzikamisa chete mitengo yezvinhu. Vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vemunyika vanofanirwa kuve nechivimbo nemari yemunyika kuitira kuti itambirike. Izvi zvinotsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti chivimbo nemari yemunyika chinofanirwa kutangira kuhurumende, iyo vanoti iri kutara mitengo yezvinhu kusanganisira mari dzinoripirwa pama Toll gate nemari yekunze. Vaimbotungamira sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa vanotiwo mari yemunyika inofanirwa kuzvishambadza yoga, kwete kuti iite zvekushambadzwa naVaNgudya sevanoshambadza mbatya dzekupfeka kana zvekudya. VaMutasa vanotiwo nyaya hombe yaita kuti mari yemunyika ipere simba inyaya yehuwori, zvikuru kumusika wemari yekunze, uko vanoti vamwe vari kutenga mari yekunze nemutengo wepasi vozoitengesa pamusika mutema nemari iri pamusoro. Asi pane chakaipa here kuti nyika ishandise mari yekunze? Doctor Chitambara vanoti kushandiswa kwemari yekunze hakuna kuipa sezvo kuchibatsira kuti hurumende isarambi ichidhinda mari sezvo isingazokwanisi kudhinda mari yekunze iyi. Asi vanoti mari yemunyika inokwanisa kutambirika chete kana nyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation, yadzikamiswa. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimusi, vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotsinhira pfungwa yekuti vanhu vaite chivimbo nemari yemunyika. VaMuponda vanoti izvi zvinogadziriswa chete kuburikidza nekuti nyika itengese zvigadzirwa zvayo kunze uyewo ichideredza zvainotengawo kunze. VaMangudya vakati nyaya ye inflation vachaigadzirisa kuburikidza nesimbisa kushandiswa kwemari yemunyika, pamwechete nekukasika kuwanisa vanenge vahwinha pamusika wemari yekunze mari dzavo mukati memasvondo maviri senzira yekuti mari yekunze iwande mumabhizimusi. Asi nyanzvi dzezvehupfumi idzi dzinoti kunze kwekunge hurumende yatora matanho amasimba kurwisana nehuwori, hupfumi hwenyika hunogadzirisika chete kuburikidza nekudzorwa kwemari yekunze kuti ishande munyika, kana kuti dollarization. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vanofa neCOVID-19 paNguva Iyo Huwandu hweVari Kuwanikwa Vaine Denda Hwakwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano razivisa neChipiri mangwanani kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neMuvhuro neCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vakawanikwa vaine denda iri Muvhuro wakare hwakakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 2 555. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu vafa neCovid-19 vave pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi matatu, kana kuti 4 713, kuchitiwo vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 kubva patanga chirwere ichi munyika vakasvika pazviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe namazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 141 601. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nezvitatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu, kana kuti 3,882 255 vakanga vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira COVID-19 pakupera kwezuva neMuvhuro. Vamwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu, kana kuti 2,892 366, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri sezvinokurudzirwa. Huwandu hwevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 uhwu huri kukwira kubva pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 523, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri nemusi weSvondo, kuchitiwo neMugovera vanhu chiuru nemakumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 082, vakawanikwawo vaine Covid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti hutachiwana hweOmicron hwakanga hwawanikwa munyika pavanhu makumi mashanu vakavhenekwa kuMasvingo. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira hutano hwakanaka munharaunda, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti havasi kushamisika nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 mazuvano sezvo paine kuvarairwa kweveruzhinji kwakanyanya. VaRusike vanoti nekupinda munyika kwehutachiwana hweOmicron, veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera nzira dzekudzivirira nadzo kupararira kweCovid-19, dzakaita sekugeza maoko, kupfeka mamasiki, kugara madaranganwa pamwe nekusaenda munzvimbo dzakawanda vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari kuChivi Voparura Zvirongwa Zvinosimudzira Dunhu Ravo
text: Nechinangwa chekuendesa mberi chirongwa che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio-Economic Transformation, Zim-Asset mumaruwa mavagere, vagari vedunhu reChivi kuMasvingo vari kuparurawo neMugovera hurongwa hwavo hwakanangana nekusimudzira dunhu ravo. No media source currently available Sachigaro weChivi Rural District Council, uye vari kanzura we Ward 31, VaKiller Zivhu, vanoti vanenge vakaungana pamusha pavo apo vanenge vachiparura zvirongwa zvakawanda. Vati zvirongwa izvi zvinosanganisira chibage chakarimwa chichabatsira vane nzara, mombe dzichapiwa kumadzishe kuti vagozorimira nherera nechirikadzi, pamwewo nehove dzavari kupfuya. VaZivhu vanoti vachatorawo mukana uyu kukurudzira vagari vemunharaunda yavo vari mumaguta kuti vavake kumamisha kwavanobva.

headline: Vanachiremba Voenderera Mberi Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Kusaenda kubasa kwavanachiremba munyika kwapinda muzuva retatu kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kupa vashandi mari yekubatsirikana yavakawirirana inosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana yemari yavo yemuhoro inonzi inosvika mazana matanhatu emadhora emaRTGS. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro. No media source currently available Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Peter Magombeyi, vati kusaenda kwavo kubasa kuri kuenderera mberi. No media source currently available Vanachiremba vanoti vari kuda mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvisere pamwedzi kana kuti inenge ichifambirana nedhora rekuAmerica pakutengeswa kwaro kumabhanga. Vamwe vanamukoti vari pabasa vataura neStudio7 asi varamba kutaura mazita avo sezvo vasingatenderwe kutaura nevatori venhau vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende uye varwere vakawanda vasiri kunyanya kurwara vari kudzoserwa kumba. Vati vanachiremba vakuru varipo vave kuremerwa nebasa zvekuti mumazuva mashoma vanenge votoda kubatsirwa nevechiuto.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshushikana Zvichitevera Kufa kweVanhu Vane Covid-19 Zvisingazivikanwe Kuti Vane Chirwere Ichi
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti hadzikurudzire kuti vanhu vazivikanwe kuti vanga vaine chirwere cheCOVID-19 mushure mekunge munhu afa sezviri kuitika munyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti izvi zvinodziviririka chete kana hurumende ikaongorora vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vese vanenge varwara. Magwaro anobudiswa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 anoratidza kuti kune vanhu vanozozivikanwa kuti vanga vaine hutachiona hwechirwere ichi ivo vanhu vacho vatoshaya. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati kufa kwevanhu vasati vazivikanwa kuti vari kunetsekana neyi zvinhu zvinoisa vashandi vezvehutano panjodzi. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomiririra vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio7 kuti sesangano vanogarokurudzira hurumende kuti iise zvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvayo zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vaongorore munhu wese zvake anotsvaka rubatsiro munyaya yezvehutano zvisinei nekuti anoratidza kuti ane chirwere cheCOVID-19 here kana kwete. VaDongo vanoti sevashandi vezvehutano vanonetsekanawo nevanhu vanozobatwa chirwere ichi ivo vatoshaya. VaDongo vanoti kusavapo kwezvinoshandiswa kuti vana mukoti vazvidzivirire kuri kuisa nhengo dzavo dzakawanda panjodzi. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti vakoti vari kubatwa nehutachiona vari pabasa vari kuwanda.
