Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kuongorora vanhu vakawanda kuti vane chirwere here kana kuti kwete ndiyo chete yekuti hurumende idzivirire kufa kwevanhu vakawanda pamwe nekupararira kwehutachiona hweCoronavirusm uhwo hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu ava vanenge vaongororwa vachiri vapenyu asi vanofa vasati vaziva zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzinenge dzaitwa. VaMangwiro vati izvi zvinoitika sezvo nyika isina michina inobudisa ongororo idzi chiripocho. Vachibvunzwa kuti izvi hazviisi here hutano hwevashandi vehutano panjodzi, VaMangwiro vati vashandi ava vari kutora varwere vese vanouya kuzvipatara sevanhu vane COVID-19 kusvika zvinenge zvabuda muongororo zvazivikanwa nekudaro vanenge vakapfeka zvekudzivirira. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti vashandi vanenge vakapfeka zvekuzvidzivirira, vashandi vezvehutano, kusanganisira VaDongo, vanoti izvi hazvisi izvo zviri kuitika muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa izvi zviri zvishoma zvakanyanya. VaDongo vanoti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro imwe yenyaya dziri kupa kuti vashandi vezvehutano varambe kuenda kubasa. Sangano ravana chiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association rakazivisa hurumende svondo rino kuti inofanirwa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muzvipatara, kutadza kwayo vanenge voramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri veZanu PF Vofadzwa neKugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa
text: Vamwe vatsigiri vebato reZanu-PF vanogara kuTynawald North, musha uri pedyo neMt. Hampden muHarare vanoti vari kufara zvikuru nekutoreswa mhiko kwakaitwa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neSvondo kuti vatungamire nyika kwemakore mashanu anotevera. Muhurukuro yakaitwa nevagari vemunzvimbo iyi neStudio 7, vakawanda vakaratidza kufara kukuru nenyaya yekugadzwa zviri pamutemo kwaVaMnangagwa. Amai Grace Mukonori mutsigiri webato iri vakaita zvokusvetuka vachitamba nemufaro vachipembedza chiitiko ichi. Vanoti vane chokwadi chokuti vechidiki vave kuzowana mabasa kubudikidza nehutungamiri hwaVaMnangagwa. Amai Mukonori vakaendera mberi vachiti vanhu ngavagamuchire zviripo nekuti Vatungamiri vanobva kuna Mwari. Amai Auxillia Mudhonga vanobva kuChirumhanzu vanoti vakawanda vainge vari kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium vakaratidza kufara zvikuru naVaMnangagwa . Baba Abel Mukonor, murwiri wehondo yerusununguko vanotiwo i kugadzwa kwakaitwa VaMnangagwa kwakapedza gakava raivapo mushure mokunge mutungamiri weMDC Alliance vakwira kumatare vachiti sarudzo dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro. Vamwe vanhu vainge vachiimba vachiridza mumhanzi mudzimba dzavo kufarira chiitiko. Asi kune vamwewo vange vachiratidza kusuwa kwakanyanyisa sezvo vachitsigira VaChamisa avo vakakwikwidza vakamirira MDC Alliance. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vowedzera Dr Mangudya Mamwe Makore Mashanu Vari Gavhuna weRBZ
text: Mukuru wedare remakurukota Doctor Misheck Sibanda vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vawedzera nemakore mashanu temu yagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau VaSibanda vati izvi zvakatanga musi wa 1 Chivabvu mwedzi uno. Izvi zvaitwa pasi pemutemo weReserve Bank Act. VaMangudya vakatora chigaro ichi kubva kuna VaGideon Gono muna 2014. VaMangudya vakamboshanda kuRBZ kwemakore gumi senyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi kusvika muna 1996 vasati vaenda kunoshanda kubhanga reAfrican Export-Import Bank kana kuti Afrexim.

headline: Musangano weKuzeya Matambudziko eNyika weZimbabwe National Agreement Platfrom Unoitwa muHarare
text: Musangano wekuzeya matambudziko akatarisana nenyika wanga uchiunganidza mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisa, vedzisvondo, vashandi pamwe nevadzidzi wanga uchifanirwa kuitwa muHarare mangwanani eChishanu wakazononoka zvikuru mushure mekunge mapurisa ambourambidza achiti haana vanhu vakakwana vanokwanisa kuchengetedza runyararo. Musangano uyu wanga wakarongwa pasi pegungano reZimbabwe National Agreement Platform uchitungamirwa naBishop Ancelimo Magaya. Bishop Magaya vanoti vazoenda kumatare edzimhosva kuti vakwanise kupiwa gwaro rinovapa mvumo yekuita musangano uyu vasingambunyikidzw nemapurisa, inove kodzero yavo pasi pebumbiro remitemo idzva, iro rinopa munhu wese kodzero yekutaura zvaanoda kana kuungana. Mapato apinda musangano uyu, anosanganisira reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, pamwe nechikwata chePeople First icho chinonzi chinotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru, iro svondo rapera vakabatana nevamwe vose ava mukusaina gwaro reNational Electoral Reform Agreement. Asi chikwata chePeople First hachina kuzopinda musangano uyu nezvikonzero zvisati zvazivikanwa. Gwaro iri rinomanikidza hurumende kuti itange yavandudza mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo, sarudzo dza 2018 dzisati dzaitwa. Bishop Magaya vanoti mapurisa akavapawo chimwe chikonzero chekuti vakanga vasina kuzivisa huwandu hwevanhu vachapinda musangano uyu. Vanoti vanhu vazopinda musangano uyu vanogona kudarika chiuru, sezvo vamwe vanga vatoparara panguva yavazopiwa gwaro rekumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoiswa Munyika Dzine Huori
text: Sangano re Transparency International raburitsa gwaro raro rinoburitsa nyika dziri pamusoro munyaya dzehuori. Nyanzvi dzinoti Transparency International inoshandisa chikero chinobva pa zero kusvika pa 100, nyika inenge iine zero ichionekwa senyika ine huori hwakanyanyisa, iyo inenge iine 100 score, ichinzi inyika yakachena. Ongororo yakaitwa inoisa Zimbabwe pa 22 score, uye iri panhamba 157 kubva panyika zana nemakumi masere. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa murimwe sangano rinorwisana nehuwori re Anti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaMunyaradzi Alois Chaumba, vanoti chiri kunetsa muZimbabwe ndechekuti hurumende haina kuzvipira kurwisana nehuwori hwayakatarisa nayo. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Ndinoda kutambira maGems’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball ari kusimukira wepachikoro cheMpopoma High School, kuBulawayo anoti shuviro yake kuzotambira chikwata chenyika chemaGems mune neramangwana.   Zvichitevera kudadisa kwakaita chikwata chemaGems kumakwishu eVitality World Cup ayo akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva pfupi yadarika, mutambo uyu wave kuteverwa nevanhu vakawanda avo vanosanganisira Nicole Ayanda Muzanenhamo (17).   Nguva pfupi yadarika, Muzanenhamo akavhoterwa kuve Player of the Tournament kumakwikwi eStella Netball Tournament ayo akaitirwa kuGweru.     Mutambo uyu wakazohwinwa nePamushana High School iyo yakakunda Chibi mufainari.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Muzanenhamo anoti maGems akapa shungu kuvatambi venetball vari kusimukira.   “MaGems akatifadza nyika yose uye isu sevasikana vechidiki vari kusimukira mumutambo uyu zvinotituma kuti tishande nesimba sezvo tichiona kuti mberi uko kune chiedza chakanaka.   “Ini remangwana rangu ndinoda kuzotambira maGems uye ndizvo ndiri kutoshanda ndakatarisa nekuti zvinouya nemikana yakawanda yakasiyana,” anodaro Muzanenhamo.   Kasikana aka kanoti kanoyemura zvikuru mutambi wemaGems – Felistus Kwanga – uyo akakurira kuBulawayo uye aive muchikwata chemaGems chakaenda kuLiverpool.   “Ndinotevera chaizvo Felistus Kwanga, ndinomutora sasisi vangu saka ndinoda kusvika paasvika mumutambo uyu.   “Kwanga akapfuura nemumitambo yakasiyana kusanganisira Stella Tea U17 Tournament, iniwo ndikaitambawo saka ndiri kuona kuti ndiri kufamba mugwara chairo,” anodaro Muzanenhamo.   Parizvino Muzanenhamo ari kutambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvenetball kuBulawayo.

headline: VaChamisa Vovimbisa Huchi neMukaka Kana Vakasarudzwa seMutungamiri weNyika
text: Mutungamiri we MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vavimbisa vanhu veku Hwedza kuMashonaland East kuti kana vakasarudzwa semutungamiri wenyika, vachasimudzira dunhu reHwedza kuitira kuti vagari vemudunhu iri vasatambudzike sezvavari kuita pari zvino. Vachitaura kuvanhu vakawanda vaungana kumaruwa ekuHwedza, VaChamisa vatora mukana uyu kutenda mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri wavo, Va Constantino Chiwenga, nebasa guru ravakaita mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika. Asi VaChamisa vaudza vaviri ava kuti vachisiira matomu kune vechidiki vanokwanisa kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. VaChamisa vaudzawo vagari vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa nyaya dzemari kuitira kuti munyika musashandiswe ma bond notes. VaChamisa, avo vanogara vakataura nyaya yemigwagwa vachiti ichagadzirwa kuita kunge spaghetti, vatiwo vachasimbaradza nyaya dzekurima kumaruwa kuitira kuti vanhu vave nehupenyu hwakanaka. Vati hurumende yavo ichawanisa varimi vese matarakita kuitira kuti vasashandise mombe pakurima. VaChamisa, avo vari pamakakatanwa nemutungamiri9 weimwe MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, panyaya yekuti ndiyani chaiye mutungamiri weMDC-T zvichitevera kushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai muna Kukadzi gore rino, vatora mukana wemusangano wekuHwedza uyu kuudza madzimai kuti hurumende yavo ichasimudzira hupenyu hwevanhukadzi sezvo vari musimboti wenyika. VaChamisa vapedza kutaura vachivimbisa vanhu vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa zvipatara nemakiriniki kuitira kuti vanhu varapwe nyore. Dunhu reMashonaland East rinoziivakanwa zvikuru nekuvhotera Zanu PF munguva dzesarudzo. Musarudzo yemutungamiri yakaitwa muna 2013, VaRobert Mugabe veZanu PF vakawana mavhoti 320,719, ukuwo VaMorgan Tsvangirai veMDC vakawana mavhoti 90,165. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti MDC Alliance inofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba kuti ikunde VaMnangagwa veZanu PF musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vorega Kunotora Mari Dzavo dzeMudyandigere
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzemudyandigere kana kuti Insurance and Pension Commission-IPEC, inoti kune mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe isati yatorwa nevanhu vakaenda pamudyandigere. Vachitaura nhasi muChinhoyi pamusangano waitwa nekomisheni iyi nevanochengeta mari inobhadharwa nevashandi yemudyandigere mukuru anoona nezvekudyidzana mukomisheni VaLlyod Gumbo vanoti vari kushushikana nekusatorwa kwemari yakawanda zvakadaro. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi inofanirwa kubhadharwa kuvanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana mashanu. VaGumbo vakurudzira vose vakambobhadhara mari yemudyandigere asi vasina kuzoitora kuti vaende kwavaibhadhara mari kana kukambani dzavaishandira vanobvunza nekuti mari iyi hapana munhu anogona kuitora kunze kwemuridzi wayo chete. Mumwe mushandi apinda mumusangano wanhasi VaPrince Mpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dziri kupihwa vanhu ishoma zvichienzaniswa nemari yavanenge vabhadhara uye vanopihwa mari isisina huremu. VaMpala vanoti mari dzemudyandigere dzakabhadharwa iri mari yekuAmerica dzinofanirwa kubhadharwa dzichishaswa reti (rate) inenge ichishandiswa nguva iyoyo yeInterbank rate Gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Sekai Nzenza vakatenda kuti mari dziri kutambirwa nevashandi dzishoma uye vakati vanoda kuita hurukuro negurukota rezvemari muzvinmafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti mari idzi dziwedzerwe. Mumwe mukuru weKomisheni iyi VaJosphat Kakwere vanoti vashandi vanofanirwa kutaurira mhuri dzavo kuti vari kubhadhara mari yemudyandigere kwete kuvanza sezvinoita vakawanda. VaGumbo vanoti mari iyi ikagara makore mashanu iri muPension Fund isati yatorwa inozoendeswa muGuardian Fund uko inogara kwemakore makumi matatu yakamirira kutorwa nemuridzi wayo.

headline: Hurumende yoKurudzirwa Kurapa Zvirwere zveGomarara Pachena
text: Veruzhinji vari kuchema-chema kuti dai hurumende yaita kuti chirwere chegomarara chirapwe pasina muripo, uye kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira zvekumaruwa kuiswe michina inoongorora magomarara akasiyana-siyana. Apo nyika iri pakati pekuchema vaive mutungamiriri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vakafawo nechirwere chegomarara, veruzhinji vanoti hurumende ikasakoshesa chirwere ichi sezvakaitwa chirwere cheHIV/ AIDS, vanhu vakawanda vacharasikirwa nehupenyu. Amai Thandaza Mhlanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ione kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvarapa chirwere chegomarara pachena sezvo chopedza vanhu vakawanda. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Fortune Moyo avo vawedzerawo vakati pamusoro pekurapwa pachena hurumende inofanirwa kuita dzidziso dzakasimba zvakanyanya kuti veruzhinji vazive nezvechirwere chegomarara. Muzvare Moyo vati zvinosuwisa kuti nguva zhinji vanhu vanobatwa chirwere ichi chakomba. Muzvare Petronella Furusa vakurudzirawo kuti hurumende itsvage mari yakangonangana nekurwisa chirwere chegomarara. Vati kuchengetedza hutano hweveruzhinji hurumende inofanirwa kutora matanho yowona kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira kumamisha zvawaniswa michina nemishonga inoongorora gomarara kuti veruzhinji vapote vachitariswa. Munguva shoma yapfuura, sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezveutano mudare reparamende, Amai Ruth Labode vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite dzidziso nezvechirwere chegomarara sezvakaitwa kuneHIV/AIDS. Amai Labode vakati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti chirwere chegomarara chikakurumidza kubatwa chinorapika. Cancer Registry inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa negomarara huri kuramba huchikwira. Chirwere chegomarara ichi chinoda mari yakawanda kuti munhu arapwe, uye veruzhinji vanoti havaikwanisi kuwana mari dzinodiwa idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvobatsira Mushure Mekufa kweZvimwe Mazana Maviri muBotswana Gore Rapera
text: Mushure mekufa kwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mazana maviri nezvirwere zvakasiyana siyana kubva kuBotswana, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi zviri musangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana zvakaumba komiti yekukurudzirana kuti kana munhu arwara atsvage rubatsiro nekukasika kubva kune vamwe kana kukurumidza kuenda kuchipatara pane kuzoenda kuchipatara chirwere chakomba. Gore rapera, muzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana unoti wakagadzira mapepa ekudzosera kumusha mitumbi zana nemakumi manomwe nemitatu kana kuti 173 yezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvainge zvafa uye mimwe makumi matanhatu nemitanhatu yezvainge zvafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Ndufu idzi dzakapa kuti nhengo dzesangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana dziise musoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kuti vanhu vabude pachena nehurwere hwavo kuti vatsvagirwe rubatsiro. Vakavamba uye vanotungamira sangano reAll Zimbos in Botswana amai Portia Muzondo vanotivakarasikirwa nenhengo dzesangano ravo makumi matnhatu gore rapera. Mukuru wekomiti itsva yekubatsirana pahurwere vachishanda sechipangamazano mune rimwe sangano rakazvimirira muBotswana, Muzvare Bithea Mthetwa vanoti ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe rwuri kunonoka kuenda kuzvipatara. Muzvare Mthetwa vanoti vachashandisa madandemutande kukurudzirana kunorapwa. Muzvare Hazvinei Makwanise vanova nhengo yesangano iri vanoti mwana asingacheme anofira mumbereko Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanhu vakafanira kugara vachizvivhenekesa zvirwere zvakafanana nechemukondombera, chegomarara, blood pressure necheshuga sezvo zvichikwanisa kurapwa zvisati zvakomba. Chipangamazano munezvematongerwo enyika nehupfumi pamuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaFrancis Chimina vatiwo vakagadzirira kubatsirawo zvizvarwa zvenyika zvinenge zvawirwa nematambudziko. Nekuda kwekuoma kwehupenyu munyika uye kudawo mafuro manyoro, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakaendawo kunogara kuBotswana nedzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza asi dzimwe nguva zvinhu zvinoomera vamwe vanozoguma vofa nekushaya anobatsira zviri kupa kuti vamwe vaumbe masangano ekubatsirana sezvo kutsva kwendebvu varume vanodzimurana.

headline: Tanganda Half Marathon yoitwa
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino kwaMutare uko shangwaiti dzekumhanya, kusanganisira dzinotarisirwa kubva kunyika dzekunze dzakadai seSpain, dzichakwikwidza mumujaho weAnnual Tanganda Half Marathon.   Shasha dzemarathon dzinodarika 700 dziri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumujaho wegore rino uye dzinosanganisira Misheck Sithole – uyo akahwina mujaho wevarume naRudo Mhonderwa akahwina kuvanhukdzi gore radarika.   Operations manager wekambani yeTanganda Tea, iyo iri kukotsvera mujaho uyu – Farai Garayi – anoti vari kutarisira dzimwe shasha dzekumhanya dzichabva kunze kwenyika.   “Gore rega rega tiri kugara tichitambira nhare kubva kunze kwenyika dzeshasha dzinomhanya marathon dzinoda kuuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu. Izvi zviri kurakidza kuti mujaho uyu uri kukura uye unofarirwa zvikuru.   “Saka isu sekambani tinovimbisa kuti makore anotevera ticharamba tichingoronga mujaho uyu,” anodaro Garayi.   Anoti gore rino kuri kuuya shangwiti dzemarathon dziri kubva kuSpain kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu.   “Kutaura kwandiri kuita kuno uku pane vanomhanya vekuSpain vakatonyoresa kuti vari kuuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu, zvinorakidza kuti wave mukuru uye unoteverwa pasi rose,” anodaro.   Shasha yemujaho wewiricheya Edmund Makutya – uyo anove kaputeni weTeam Zimbabwe – anoti mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wakakosha chaizvo sezvo uchivabatsira mukuita gadziriro dzavo apo vanozoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika.   “Mujaho uyu wakatinakira isu nekuti tinogara tichienda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika saka tinoushandisa kuita gadziriro dzedu ndosaka tichiukoshesa uye tichienda gore negore kunokwikwidza,” anodaro Makutya.   Mujaho uyu wakareba makiromita 21 uye unomhanywa muMvuma road uchizoperera paMutare Sports Club.

headline: Mari Itsva Yotarisirwa Munyika Mukati meMasvondo Maviri
text: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Gavhuna webhanga iri, zvakare vari sachigaro vekomiti yebhanga iri inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari, yeMonetary Policy Committee, Dr John Mangudya, vati mari iyi inosanganisira madhora maviri emakoini nemadhora mashanu ebepa ichange yave mumabhanga mukati memasvondo maviri ari kutevera. Vachitaura mumushure memusangano wekutanga weMonetary Policy Committee, VaMangudya vati komiti yavo haisi kufara kuti mumaabhanga hamuna mari inokwanira munhu wese ndosaka vatora danho rekuunza mari itsva. VaMangudya vatiwo vari kuwedzera mari pamusika wemari yekunze kana kuti Interbank Rate vachiti matanho aya achederedza mitengo yezvinhu. VaMangudya vatiwo pane mari yakawanda isina zvairi kushandiswa yakangogara mumabhanga uye komiti yavo yatora danho rekuti mari iyi ishandiswe pakurima pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pamari yose iri mumabhanga munyika, mabhirioni gumi nemapfumbwamwe emadhora, makambani makumi mashanu chete ndiwo ane zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, RBZ yakavhara maAccounts emakambani akaita se Sakunda, Croco neAccess Finance achinzi aishandisa mari zvisina tsarukanao uye afaingudzirwa kuti ndiwo aiita zvekutenga nekutengesa mari pamusika mutema. Sachigaro vesangano rinomirira mabhanga munyika, reBankers Association of Zimbabwe, VaWebster Rusere, vati semaonero avo, Monetary Policy Committee yabuda nematanho akanaka chose. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rekuwedzera mari mumabhanga rakanaka chose asi sezvo vanhu vange vatambura nekutengeserwa mari nemakoronyera. Vaenderera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti bhanga guru renyika ritorewo matanho anoshaisa makoronyera anotengesa mari mukana wekuramba achiomesera vanhu. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti nyika inofranirwa kungwarira kuti munyika musawanzwe, akana kudhinda mari inodarika hupfumi hwenyika, sezvo izvi zvichikonzera kuparara zvakanyanya kwesimba remari munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Vagara Vari Munyika Hwoshusha Nyanzvi dzeZvehutano
text: Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vasina nhoroondo yekubuda munyika vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 kunonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano chinhu chinofanirwa kuvhundutsa hurumende pamwe neveruzhinji kuti patorwe matanho nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ebazi rezvehutano akabuda nemusi weChina ekuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pachiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri, kana kuti 1 362 pakupera kwezuva. Bazi iri rinoti huwandu uhwu hwakakwira zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 273, vaine chirwere ichi, mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 260, vari vanhu vagara vanga vari munyika, gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13, vari vanhu vakadzoka munyika kubva kunze. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika hwakakwira kusvika pamakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 23, uye vapora vave mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevashanu, kana kuti 425. Vanhu vakaongororwa kana vaine chirwere ichi nemusi weChina vaisvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1 551. Dunhu rinonzi rine vanhu vakawandisa vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi idunhu reBulawayo, iro rine vanhu vanosvika mazana mana negumi nevapfumbamwe, 419, richiteverwa neHarare ine vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 389. Pave nekutyirwa kuti sezvo guta reBulawayo riine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa vaine chirwere ichi, rinogona kunge risina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuchengeta vanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine Covid-19 ava. Asi zvipatara zviviri zvakagadzurudzwa mazuva apera aya kuti zvitambire varwere veCovid-19 zvinoti Thorngrove ne Ekusileni, zvinonzi zvatanga kushanda. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematatu nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 13.8 million vabatwa pasi rose, vafa vachidarika mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe ezviuru kana kuti 590 000. MuAmerica chete, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3.5 million vabatwa nacho uye vafa vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvisere kana kuti 138 000. South Africa, iyo inove ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica vane Covid-19, uye iri muvakidzani weZimbabwe, yave nevanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nezvina kana kuti 324 000 vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muSouth Africa vasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 4 669. Vazhinji vevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine covid-19 vachibva kunze kwenyika vari kubva kuSouth Africa. Doctor Gilson Mandigo, avo vari muHarare, vanoti havasi vose vari kubva kunyika iyi vari kupinda nepamiganho iri pamutemo, sezvo kuine vamwe vari kusvetuka muganhu vachipinda munyika vasina kuvhenekwa. Vanoti izvi ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zviri kuwedzera dambudziko iri munyika sezvo hurumende isingazokwanisa kuziva kuti apinda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo ndeupi. Doctor Mandigo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa mutemo wekusafambafamba, zvikuru kurambida vanhu vanobva mumatunhu ane dambudziko guru rechirwere ichi kuti vasashanyira dzimwe nzvimbo. Hurumende iri kukurudzirwawo kuti iwedzere kuvhenekwa kwevanhu vagara vari munyika, zvikuru vari kumaruwa, uko kunoshanyirwa nevakawanda vanobva mumadhorobha nemaguta ane vanhu vari kubatwa vaine chirwere che covid-19. Vanotiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuita bandiko ravo kuburikidza nekupfeka zvekuvhara miromo nemhino kana kuti ma mask, kugeza maoko avo nesipo pamwe nekukoshesa nyaya yesiya mikaha pakati pavo uye kusangoungana. Doctor Mandigo vari kukurudzirawo hurumende kuti kana yodzamisa mutemo wekurambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu iisewo mukana wekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuwana chekudya, vachiti panogona kuzoguma pave nedambudziko rekufa kwevanhu nenzara, kwete necovid-19. Asi vanoti mitengo yezvekuvhara miromo nemhino iri pamusoro zvakanyanya muzvitoro zviri kutengesa, vakati dai pawanikwa zvinokwanisa kuwachwa kana zvashandiswa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasarasikirwa nemari yakawanda.  No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vorangarira Magamba Vachiti Hurumende Yavo Haisi Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatungamira nyika mukurangarira zuva remagamba vachiramba kuti hurumende yavo iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi vanopikisa vanoti munyika maberekera ingwe zvapa kuti vanhu vanodarika makumi matatu vatize misha yavo. Mhemberero idzi ndedzechimakumi mana kubva nyika zvayawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Vachitaura kuState House pazuva rekurangarira magamba enyika, VaMnangagwa vati pane vanhu vari kuda kusvibisa nyika vachishanda nehurumende dzekunze. Zimbabwe inocherechedza zuva remagamba muvhiki rechipiri raNyamavhuvhu gore roga roga vanhu vachienda kunoungana kumarinda eHeroes Acre kunoradzikwa magamba muHarare uye kunovigwa magamba ematunhu mumativi mana enyika. Asi rwendo rwuno kwangoenda VaMnangagwa nevamwe vatungamiri kunoisa maruva sezvo pari kutyirwa kupararira kwchirwere checoronavirus kana vanhu vakaungana. VaMnangagwa vati vari kucherechedza magamba ose kubva kuChimurenga chekutanga kusvika chechipiri vachivimbisa kuvaka chimwe chiumbwa chaGeneral Mtshane Khumalo vaitungamira mauto aMambo Lobenguka muna 1893. Vanoti ichi chiremekedzo sechakapiwa Mbuya Nehanda vane chiubwa chiri kuvakwa muHarare. Vati Magamba ose aya ainge akazvipira zvikuru. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti hapana chekupemberera kana vanhu zvikuru nhengo dzebato ravo dzichisungwa nekutyorerwa kodzero dzavo sezvaiitwa pahutongi hwaIan Smith munguva yeRhosedia. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development VaClaris Madhuku vanoti zuva remagamba rakasiyana nemamwe makore sezvo riri kupembererwa vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vashaya asi hama dzavo dzichiti vasaradzikwe paHeroes Acre. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda neZimbabwe Democracy Institute Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya vanoti zuva remagamba rakakosha asi rinokanganiswa nevanotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoti nzvimbo inovigwa magamba icharamba ichikosheswa zvisinei kuti magamba akaita saVaMugabe akaramba kuvigwa ikoko. Vatiwo kunyange munhu akapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba anokwanisa kuvigwa kwaanoda kana kunodiwa nemhuri yake sezvakaitwa Oliver Mtukudzi uye Muzvinafundo Phineas Makhurane. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vanoti Vanoda Kutambiriswa Madhora ekuAmerica
text:
Varairidzi vakawanda vanoti mari yavapihwa nhasi nehurumende yekuti vayamurike ishoma zvikuru vachiti chavari kuda imari yavaitambira iri yemadhora ekuAmerica. Mumwe mudzidzisi wekwaChiendambuya kwaRusape, VaFambayi Fambayi, vati mari iyi ishoma zvikuru sezvo pasina zvainokwanisa kutenga.

Sachigaro werimwe sangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati kunyange mari iyi ikabatanidzwa nemari dzemihoro yavo haidarike madhora zviuru zvishanu zvinodiwa kuti mhuri yevanhu vashanu vararame pamwedzi.

Munyori mukuru weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRaymond Majongwe, vati wochiri kunetsa ndechekuti mari iyi haina kubuda munhaurirano uye ishoma zvekuti hairaramise vadzidzisi vari
kukwangwaya nenhamo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vati mari yawedzerwa yakafanana nemutero wembwa. Vati vadzidzisi vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa mari kuti idarike madhora zviuru gumi nezvishanu kuti vararame sevanhu.

Hurumende inoti yafanopa vadzidzisi mari iyi kuti vafanobatsirikana apo vanenge vachiita nhaurirano munyaya dzemari yemihoro. Mune imwewo nyaya, vadzidzi vakawanda vapfekedzwa nguwani dzedzidzo vari kumba kana kuti virtual nekuda kwekutyirwa kuti vakaungana pachikoro cheChinhoyi University of Technology sezvavanogaroita makore ese, vano paradzira chirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe aswera akapfeka nhumbi dzedzidzo nhasi ari kumba ndiMuzvare Vimbainashe Chitauro avo vati vaishuwira kupemberera zuva ranhasi vari kuchikoro nevamwe. Muzvare Chitauro vati vatadza kuona zvanga zvichiitwa kuchikoro sezvo vanga vasina mabhanduru ekuvhura madandemutande.  Asi mumwe wevakanzi vange vari pachikoro nhasi nekuti vakaita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro, VaIgnatius Sakala, vati mufaro wavo mushoma sezvo vamwe vavakadzidza navo vatadza kunge vari pachikoro. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vapfekedza vadzidzi vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, asi vazvinji vavo vanga vari kudzimba dzavo vachiona zvanga nzvichiitika padandemutande. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chopona Nepasaka reShumba kuSouth Africa Mushure Mekutemwa neDemo
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaImmanuel Zinja vanoti vanotenda Mwari kuti vachiri vapenyu mushure mekuda kupondwa kwavakaitwa kunzvimbo yeBredasdorp kuWestern Cape mavhiki apfura nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa zvainge zvapihwa mvumo yekuratidzira murunyararo nemapurisa asi zvikazotanga mhirizhonga. VaZinja vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakapona nepaburi retsono mushure mekutemwa nedemo mumusoro nemhomho yevairatidzira ichiti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvidzokere kumusha kwazvo sezvo zvainge zvotorera zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa mabasa. VaZinja vanoti vakaenda kuSouth Africa mugore ra 2014 umo vange vachiita basa rekutema huni vakazotora mudzimai wavo kuti auye kuzogara vano. Vanoti mudzimai wavo uyu akazvitakura parizvino. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vamwe vana vavo vari kuZimbabwe uye vari kutsvaga rubatsiro rwekuti vadzokere kumusha sezvo basa rakapera uye vave kurwara.

headline: Vashandi , Vashandirwi Vopesana paBhiri Richavandudza Mutemo weMabasa neVashandi
text: Gweta riri kumirira vashandi veZuva Petroleum vakadzingwa basa, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti vanotambira nemaoko maviri bhiri rehurumende iro riri kuda kuvandudza mutemo wevashandi nemabasa. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kununura vashandi vanodarika makumi maviri ezviuru avo vanonzi varasikirwa nemabasa kusvika pari nhasi zvichitevera mutongo wakapiwa nedare reSupreme Court mwedzi wapera. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kupinda mudare reparamende nemusi we Chipiri, rozonzwikwazve mudare reseneti nemusi weChina. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanozotarisirwa kuisa runyoro rwavo pabhiri iri chero nguva kubva nemusi weChishanu kuti uve mutemo. Kana rave mutemo, bhiri iri rinotarisirwa kubatsira vashandi vakadzingwa mabasa vakaenda vasina chekupukutisa dikita, kuti vakwanise kupiwa mihoro yemasvondo maviri pamagore roga-roga ravakagara pabasa. Muzvinafundo Madhuku, avo vanotungamirawo bato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, vanoti chakangoipa chete pabhiri iri ndechekuti riri kuda kuti vashandi vakamiswa mabasa vapiwe mari shoma kana pachitariswa zvavakaitira makambani akavamisa mabasa aya. “Mutemo wakanaka chose,” Muzvinafundo Madhuku vanodaro. “Ndizvo zvatagara tichifunga kuti mutemo wedu unofanirwa kuita.” No media source currently available Asi mukuru wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vanoti bhiri iri ramhanyiswa zvakanyanya pasina kutarisiswawo huipi hwaro, izvo zvichaita kuti vanoda kusima mari dzavo munyika vasauye. “Handizvo zvakataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe pazuva rekucherechedza magamba,” vanodaro VaMufukare. “Tinofunga kuti pane zvizhinji zvaifanirwa kutanga zvatariswa kuitira kukwezva vanoda kupinda munyika.” No media source currently available

headline: VaPatrick Chinamasa Vanoti Hapana Kudzokera Kumashure paNyaya yeMabond Notes
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti hapana kudzokera kumashure pachirongwa chekuparura mari yemabond notes mwedzi uno. VaChinamasa vataura mashoko aya kumucheto wemisangano yepagore ye International Monetary Fund ne World Bank muWashington DC, muAmerica. Vanoti chirongwa chekuparura mabond notes chiri kuenderera mberi kupera kwemwedzi uno. "Chirongwa chema bond notes chiri kuenderera mberi munyika uye chichabatsira kuti avo vanoita zvekutengese zvirimwa nezvimwewo kunze kwenyika kuti vawanewo mibairo yemabasa avanenge vachiita pakuunza mari yekunze munyika," VaChinamasa vaudza Studio 7. VaChinamasa nagavhuna weRBZ VaJohn Mangudya ndivo vari kutungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe. VaChinamasa naVaMangudya neChipiri vakapinda mumusangano wemakurokota ezvemari emuAfrica wakaitwa nesangano re Macroeconomic And Financial Management Institute Of Eastern And Southern Africa (MEMFMI) apo vakaudza Studio 7 kuti varikushushikana nekuratidzira kurikuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica sezvo zviri kukanganisa mimwe misangano yavo. "Zviri kundishungurudza ndezve kuti unowona zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichiratidzira kunzvimbo dzatinoenda kunoshava rubatsiro izvo zviri kuti katyamadza kuti seyi vana vedu vari ivo varikuda kuti nyika isawane rubatsiro," VaChinamasa vaudza Studio 7. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza zvese zvainokwanisa kuti pasawane mushandi wehurumende anowanikwa achishaya muhoro wake pane nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Danho reHurumende reKumira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Yetatau Parizvino Rotambirwa neImwe Nyanzvi
text: Vaimbova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vanowirira nedanho rehurumende rekuti pari zvino imbosimbaradza hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba dzeCovid-19 mbiri pasati pabayiwa nhomba nhatu sezvave kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seAmerica. Nyika dzakabudirira dziri kubaya nhomba yetatu kune vakwegura nevanoshanda muzvipata sezvo zviri kunzi zvinobatsira masoja emuviri. Dr Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotenderabna nezvakataurwa panhepfenyuro ino nemukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agnes Mahomva kuti vakoshese kubaya vanhu nhomba kaviri parizvino. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri negumi nevana zvine mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe kana kuti 3 214, 477 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwea vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 472, 859. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshande sezvinotarisirwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vaviri vakafa neMugovera nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 4, 657. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemaviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 132,333.

headline: Kurudziro yaVaChombo Yekudzinga Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Yotsviriridza
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti kutengeswa kwezvinhu mumigwagwa zvisina kurongeka dziko kuri kukonzera dambudziko remarara muguta reHarare nemamwe maguta. Vanhu ava vanotiwo izvi zviri kukonzerawo zvirwere sezvo marara ari kungorasirwa pose pose. Mashoko everuzhinji aya anotevera mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaIgatius Chombo, ekuti vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa vanofanirwa kubviswa nekukasika. Asi veruzhinji vanoti hurumende yaVaChombo ndiyo honzeri sezvo iri kukundikana kuwanisa vanhu mabasa uye yakaregerera vanhu ava vachiita pamadiro kubva kare. Vachitaura mukupera kwesvondo pamusangano wepagore wemameya pamwe nemasachigaro emakanzuru wechimakumi manomwe nenhatu (73rd Urban Councils Association of Zimbabwe), wakaitirwa kuBulawayo, VaChombo vanonzi vakati panofanirwa kutorwa matanho nechimbichimbi ekuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vange vachibviswa sezvo vari kukanganisa nyaya dzehutano uye nzvimbo dzinogara vanhu. Studio7 yakundikana kubata VaChombo panyaya iyi. Asi meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, avo vakapindawo musangano uyu, vabvuma kuti ichokwadi kuti VaChombo vakataura mashoko aya. VaManyenyeni vanoti dzimwe nguva mabatirwo anoitwa zvitengeswa zvinosanganisira zvekudya, anotyora mitemo yekutengeswa kwezvekudya. Vanoti dzimwe nguva vanotengesa zvinhu ava vanotiza mapurisa vachipedzisira voviga zvinhu zvavo zvinosanganisira zvekudya munzvimbo dzisina kukodzera dzakaita semumigero inorasa mvura. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi Vanoshaya Vamwe Vachiparadzirwa Misha neMafashamu eMvura
text: Mhuri dzakawanda kuMashonaland Central, Mashonaland West, Manicaland, Midlands neMatabeleland North dzasara dzisina misha mushure mekunge yakukurwa nemafashamu emvura anotyisa asati amboonekwa mumatunhu aya kwenguva yakareba. Vanhu gumi vanonzi varasikirwa nehupenyu kusvika parizvino. Zvipfuyo, minda, mabhiriji nemigwagwa zviri kuparadzwawo nemafashamu emzvura aya. Civil Protection Unit iyo yakazivisa kuti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu ekubatsira vanhu vanenge vawirwa nematambudziko akadai iri mubishi kuyedza kubatira vanhu ava ichibatsirana nemamwe mapazi ehurumende akaita sevemauto emuchadenga nevamwe. Mukuru weCivil Protection Unit VaMadzudzo Pawadyira vati vari kukwanisa kununura vanhu vange vavhiringidzwa nemvura iyi asi vakati titaure negurukota rezvematunhu VaIgnatious Chombo. Nyaya dzekubatsira vanhu vanenge vapinda mumatambudziko akadai dziri kubazi raVaChombo. Asi Vachombo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari pazororo asi vakatiwo titaure nevakafanobata matomu mubazi ravo VaJoseph Made avo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Mumiriri weMakonde mudare reparamende VaKindness Paradza vanove nhengo yeZanu-PF vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mudunhu ravo uye misha yakawanda yaparadzwa nemafashamu emvura aya. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoti Nyaya yeKuri Kudhindwa Magwaro eKuvhotesa Inzwikwe Chimbichimbi
text: Dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa rinogadziriswa gwaro rekuvhotera pamwe ne ink ichashandiswa pakuvhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaPisirayi Kwenda, vatura mutongo uyu panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri wePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, VaTendai Biti, pamwe nemutauuriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vachiti inzwikwe musi wa 30 mwedzi uno usati wadarika. VaBiti naVaMafume vakaenda kudare repamusoro vachida kuti komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, iise pajekerere nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa pamwe ne ink ichanyikwa zvigunwe nevanhu vanenge vavhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. Gweta raVaBiti naVaMafume panyaya iyi, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vaudza dare kuti nyaya iyi inofanira kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatotara zuva resarudzo uye vachakwikwidza musarudzo idzi vachitarisirwa kusvitsa mazita avo kudare rinotambira mazita evachada kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi re nomination court neChina. Mumapepa ari pamberi pedare, VaBiti naVaMafume vanoti kutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa kunofanira kuitwa zviri pachena kuitira makambani ose anokwanisa kutengesera ZEC bepa iri awane mukana wakaenzana uye zvinhu zvichiitwa zviri pachena kwete zvakaitwa neZEC kuti yakangofuma yave kutaura kuti bepa iri richabva kune imwe kambani iri kuSouth Africa yaisiri kubudira veruzhinji pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pachena. Gweta reZEC, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vabvuma kuti nyaya iya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi pasina kupikisana naVaBamu. Zvichakadai, mapato mazhinji ari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino aswera achimhanya-mhanya kuti aendesa mapepa awo ku nomination court iyo ichagara mangwana mumatunhu ose emunyika mangwana. No media source currently available Zvichakadai, matare awanawo vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vasina mhosva pamhosva yavanga vachipomerwa yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Josephine Sande, vatura mutongo wekuti vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo, havana mhosva yavakapara. Mutongi wedare ati makasha embumburu dzakashandiswa dzakawanikwa kumba kwaVaKasukuwere pamwe nekuboorwa kwemadziro pamwe nekupwanyika kwakaitwa mahwindo emba yavo kwakakonzerwa nekuridzwa kwakaitwa pfuti munguva yeOperation Restore Legacy zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa, zvinoratidza kuti hupenyu hwaVaKasukuwere hwakange hwave panjodzi. Mutongi wedare aenderera mberi achiti nehupfumi huna VaKasukuwere uye semunhu anofamba nepasipoti yevanhu vanoremekedzwa, kana kuti diplomatic passport, hazvaikodzera kuti VaKasukuwere vangobuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo pasina chikonzero chakati tsvikiti. VaKasukuwere vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaKasukuwere ndevamwe vemakurukota ehurumende akatiza munyika pakaitwa chirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy nemasoja achitungamirwa nemukuru wawo panguva iyi, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekunge VaMugabe vapidigurwa. VaKasukuwere vakazodzoka munyika mwedzi wapera mushure mekupedza mwedzi mitanhatu vari kunze kwenyika kwavakaenda muhupoteri. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voita Musangano weChimbichimbi neMutungamiri weMalaysia
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChishanu vakasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeMalaysia VaNajib Razak kumusangano wavakangoenda zvechimbi chimbi. Izvi zviri kunzi nevamwe vakuru vehurumende zvakonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi zvapa kuti vaende kunosunza. VaMugabe vakasimuka munyika neChina vachiperekedzwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaJoram Gumbo nevamwe vakuru muhurumende yavo. VaMugabe vakapedzisira kuenda kuMalaysia pachine mutungamiri wehurumende wenyika iyi wavaidyidzana naye VaMahathir Mohamad. Mazuva ano VaMugabe vanowanzoenda kuMalaysia vachienda kunorapwa. Vatungamiri vekuMalaysia vatenda kuti VaMugabe vari munyika iyi asi havana zvizhinji zvavataura mezverwendo urwu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti zviri pachena kuti VaMugabe vave kutsvaga uta nemugate sezvo hupfumi hwaenda kumawere. Zimbabwe yaimbenge iine hushamwari hwebhande nebhurugwa neChina asi mazuva ano panenge paita zinyeke nyeke. No media source currently available

headline: Murairidzi weMorocco Walid Regragui Opinda Munhoroondo yeWorld Cup
text: Murairidzi wechikwata cheMorocco, Walid Regragui nezuro akapinda munhoroondo yekuva murairidzi wekutanga kubva muAfrica akakwanisa kusvika kumakotafainari emutambo weWorld Cup. Izvi zvakatevera kurova kwakaita Morocco nyika yeSpain 3-0 mumapenereti mushure mekunge nyika idzi dzaita mangange 0-0 kumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup kuQatar. Murairidzi kubva muAfrica akatanga kusvika muchikamu chechipiri kana kuti Round of 16 ndiStephen Keshi wekuNigeria muna 2014. Asi varairidzi vekunze vakapinda mumakotafainari vanoti Valeri Nepomniach wekuRussia airairidza Cameroon muna 1990. Chikwata cheCameroon ichi chainge chine vatambi vakaita saFrancois Oman-Biyik Roger Miller naCyrille Makanaky. Muna 2002, Bruno Metsu wekuFrance akaita zvimwe chete nechikwata cheSenegal chainge chine vatambi vakaita seEl hadji Diouf. Ainge apedzisira kusvika mumakotafainari nenyika yemuAfrica ndi Milovan Rajevac akatungamira Ghana muna 2010. Ghana ndiyo yaive nemukana mukuru wekupinda mumasemifainari asi yakaburitswa mushure mekunge Luis Suareze weUruguay abata bhora rainge rave kugohwa mutambo wave kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo nemaoko. Ghana yakabva yatadza kunwisa penereti ichibva yazodyiwa mumapenereti akatevera. Mumakwikwi aya, nyika dzose dzemuAfrica dzakakwikwidza dzainge dziine varairidzi kubva kunyika dzemuAfrica.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanofanira Kutenda Mauto Akavaisa Panyanga
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kunyange hazvo VaEmmerson Mnangangwa vaikodzera kuva mutungamiri webato ravo reZanu PF pamwe nehurumende nekuda kwehukuru hwavo, mukana uyu wakanga wapedzwa kutanga kwemwedzi uno apo vakadzingwa zvese muhurumende nemubato. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kutenda mauto nekuvadzora pamwe nekuvagadza pachigaro chekutungamiri nyika. Pakadzingwa VaMnangagwa, vamwe vakaona sekuti VaMnangagwa vakange vaparara munyaya dzematongerwe enyika. Zvichitevera kudzingwa muhurumende, VaMnangagwa vakambonopotera kuSouth Africa asi vakanyora tsamba vachiti vaizodzoka munyika mukati menguva pfupi kuzotonga, Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vachidzidzisa pachikoro cheSokusi University, VaTinashe Muzamindo, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti pange pagara paine hurongwa hwekuti VaMnangagwa vatore chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Vati kuita kwemauto kunoratidza kuti vanga vakaronga nechakare uye change chasara inguva chete. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hazvina kuvashamisa kuti mauto akatsigira VaMnangagwa pakurwisana kwaitika mubato reZanu PF. Vati chikwata cheG40 change chisina vanhu vakaenda kuhondo vanga vari pamusoro, nekudaro mauto akaita zvaakataura kare kuti haazotsigira munhu asina kuenda kuhondo kuti atonge Zimbabwe. VaGwede vanoti mauto haana kufara nekudzingwa kwaVaMnangagwa uye zvange zvave pachena kuti Amai Grace Mugabe, kana mumwe wavo muchikwata cheG40, ndiye atozotungamira nyika sezvo VaMugabe vakwegura. Vati izvi ndizvo zvakazoita kuti mauto atange Operation Restore Legacy apo akasunga nhengo dzechikwata cheG40 pamwe nekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro. Ukuwo bato rakabva radzora VaMnangagwa ndokuvadoma semutungamiri waro pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi VaGwede naVaMuzamindo vanoti kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vari kufara nekuenda kwaVaMugabe, vanofanira kuziva kuti mauto anogona kutadza kutambiraa zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kana pakakunda munhu asina kurwa muhondo sekutaura kwawo. VaGwede vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri venyika vabviswe nesarudzo. Muna 2008, bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rakakunda musarudzo dzeparamende nemutungamiriri wenyika asi mauto akaramba kuti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro izvo zvakazoita kuti paumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Vakawanda vanoti vanotyira kuti mauto achapindira zvakare musarudzo kana VaMnangagwa nebato ravo vakakundwa gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri kuAmerica Chotaura Pamusoro peKugara Kwacho kuZimbabwe Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Vakuru vakati gonzo mhini gara mumhango chemudzimu chikuwaniremo. Izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTinashe Tsokodayi, mushure mekunge vashanya kumusha panguva imwechete denda reCovid-19 rakapindawo munyika. VaTsokodayi, avo vanogara muVirginia muAmerica, vanoti pavakaenda kumusha muna Kukadzi wegore rino, havana kumbobvira vafunga kuti vaizogara kwemwedzi minomwe. Asi nekuda kwekuti nyika yakazovharwa muna Kurume wakare nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 mushure mekunge hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, VaTsokodayi vakazongozvipira kugarako kusvika zvinhu zvanaka. VaTsokodayi vanoti vanoona sekunge hurumende yeZimbabwe yakaita zvose zvaikodzera kuti iite kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, izvo vanoti zvinogona kunge zvakaita kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere ichi huderere. Vanoti vaifanirwa kudzoka kuAmerica musi wa20 Kurume asi vakaona zvakakosha kuti varambe vari muZimbabwe senzira yekuzvidzivirira ivo pamwe nehama dzavo dziri kuAmerica, sezvo vaityira kuti vaizogona kubatira chirwere ichi murwendo rwavo, uyewo kuti vambotanga vanzwisisa nezvechirwere ichi. "Ndakaona kuti izvoni ndakafamba nguva yeCovid kwandaisvika ikoko I was a potential risk yekuti ndi spuredhe as I had a feeling yekuti Covid yakawanda yanga ichibatwa nevanhu in transit mundege imomo, saka ndakangoita decision yekuti ndimbomira ku traveller," VaTsokodayi vanodaro. Vanoti vakazokwanisa kubuda munyika kutanga kwaGumiguru, mushure mekunge hurumende yavhura zvakare nhandare dzendege dzose dzemunyika. Semutemo uri munyika dzose, vakasungirwa kutanga vawana gwaro rinoratidza kuti vakavhenekwa Covid-19 vakawanikwa vasina chirwere mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri kuti vakwanise kukwira ndege. VaTsokodayi vanoti havana kusangana nedambudziko pakupinda muAmerica, asi vakatara kuti vachange vachigara kwavo vega kwemazuva gumi nemana, kunyange hazvo dunhu ravo risina mutemo iwowo. No media source currently available

headline: Simba, Chegutu Pirates zvakaumburudzana
text: Ndooka   SACHIGARO weZifa Northern Region Division One, Martin Kweza, oshora zvikuru mhirizhonga yakaitika kunhandare yeWadzanai kuShamva svondo radarika izvo zvakaona vatambi veSimba Bhora FC neChegutu Pirates vachirwa mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament.   Zvimbokoma izvi zvakaitika mushure mekunge Simba Bhora yatungamira mumutambo uyu watambwa maminitsi masere izvo zvakazoona Constantine Tinapi weSimba Bhora naLewis Milanzi weChegutu Pirates vese vachipihwa makadhi matsvuku (red card) kuti vabude mumutambo uyu mushure mekunge varwisana.   Mutambo uyu wakazohwinwa neSimba Bhora 4-0. Achitaura pamusoro pechiitiko ichi, Kweza anoti nhabvu haizi hondo nekudaro vatambi vanofanirwa kutamba zvakanaka uye vachigamuchira zvinenge zvabuda mumutambo kwete kurwisana.   “Hatitarisire kuona vatambi vachirwa munhandare sezvatakaona zvichiitika izvi. Nhabvu haisi hondo, tinoda hunhu hwakanaka nguva dzose,” anodaro Kweza.   Anoti vachagara pasi vozeya nyaya iyi uye vatambi vose vakarwa vachavatemera zvirango zvekubhadhara faindi yemari inotangira paUS$$100 kusvika paUS$200.   “Nyaya iyi tichanyatsoizeya zvakasimba uye vanenge vabatwa nemhosva tichavabadharisa faindi yemari inobvira paUS$100 kusvika US$200,” anodaro Kweza.   Zvakadai, mune mumwe mutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament wakatambwa svondo radarika, Herentals Under-20 yakakunda Black Mambas 4-3 kumapena zvichitevera kupera kwawakaita uri mangange 1-1.   NeMugovera svondo rino, chinenge chakachaya kuBaobab Stadium uko Golden Eagles ichabandana neNgezi U19 muquarter-final yeAxis Solutions Super Cup kuchiti musi weSvondo kuTrojan Mine kuBindura kunenge kusingadanwe anonzwa apo Commando Bullets ichasangana neTrojan Stars.

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, Vove Pakati peVatungamiri veDzimwe Nyika Vari KuBritain paKuvigwa kwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nemudzimai wavo Amai Jill Biden vari muLondon kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri, avo vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa nhasi kuKing George VI Memorial Chapel. VaBiden, avo vakasvika kuBritain neMugovera, nezuro vanyorawo mashoko avo enyaradzo mubhuku rekuchema Mambokadzi. VaBiden ndemumwe wevatungamiri venyika dzakawanda vachange vari parufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri pamwe nemadzimabo anobvawo kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kumirirwa kurufu urwu negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, sezvo ivo VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kunge vachienda kuNew York svondo rino kumusangano weUnited Nations Genreal Assembly, UNGA. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti kuvepo kwaVaBiden kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri pamwe nekuradzikwa kwavo zvinoratidza kukosha kwehukama hwaivepo pakati paMambokadzi neAmerica, uye kudyidza kweBritain neAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Nziyo Dzoshandiswa Kukwezva Vechidiki Kuti Vanyorese Kuvhota Muna 2023
text: Rimwe sangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira kuChitungwiza rinoti rabatana nevamwe vaimbi mukutsikisa nziyo dzinokurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota musarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2023. Sangano reChitungwiza Community Development Network rinoti rakaona zvakakodzera kuti vechidiki vanyorese kuvhota musarudzo dzemuna 2023 richiti vechidiki ndivo vachiri kutarisira zvakawanda muhupenyu saka vanofanira kusarudza kuti ramangwana ravo richange rakamira sei kuburikidza nekuvhotera hutungamiriri hwavanoda musarudzo idzi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaAdmire Mutize, vanoti vakaona kuti vechidiki vazhinji vanotevera zvikuru mimhanzi yemusambo weZimDancehall vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vashandise musambo uyu kuvakurudzira kuti vanyorese mazita avo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dziri kuuya. VaMutize vanoti pari zvino vakatoburitsa dambarefu rine nziyo gumi dziri kukurudzira vechidiki kuti vabude nehuwandu hwavo vanonyoresa sevavhoti. VaMutize vanotiwo chimwe chakaita kuti vashandise mimhanzi inyaya yekuti vanhu vazhinji havadi kubuda pachena kuti vanoita zvematongerwo enyika saka nokudaro vanoti mimhanzi inosvitsa shoko ravo muchinyararire kuvanhu vakawanda. Vamwe vaimbi vari muchirongwa ichi vanosanganisira Nomatter Mandaza uyo anozivikanwa mumusambo weZimDancehall nezita rekuti “Lady Sky”. Lady Sky anoti vaimbi vechisikana vari kusanganawo nematambudziko ekushungurudzwa nevechidiki vanoshandisa zvinodhaka panguva yavanenge vachitsikisa mimhanzi yavo yekukurudzira vechidiki kuti vavhote. Mumwe muimbi, Jairos Makoni, uyo anoshanda zvakare semutsikisi wemimhanzi anoti denda reCovid 19 riri kuvatadzisa sevaimbi kuimba pajekerere vachikurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Kunyange hazvo vaimbi ava vari kuitawo pavanogona napo kukurudzira vechidiki kuti vanyorese kuvhota, munyori mupurovhinzi yeHarare muboka revechidiki muMDC Alliance, VaDenford Ngadziore, vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yakavhara nzvimbo dzakawanda dzinonyoreswa kuvhota. VaNgadziore vanoti vachatora matanho akakura kwazvo kuti ZEC inyorese vanhu sevavhoti. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZEC, VaUtoile Silaigwana, vati tivatumire mibvunzo asi vanga vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. ZEC yakamboburitsa mashoko ichiti iri kushushikana zvikuru kuti vanhu vazhinji havasi kuenda kumahofisi avo kunonyoresa sevavhoti. MDC Alliance inoti iri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanyorese kuvhota ichiti iri kutarisira vanhu mamiriyoni matanhatu kuti vavhotere bato rayo ukuwo Zanu PF iri kutendererawo nenyika yose ichikurudzira vanhu kunyoresa kuvhota, ichiti iri kutarisirawo kuti ivhoterwe nevanhu mamiriyoni mashanu musarudzo dzemuna 2023. No media source currently available

headline: Vanofamba neMabhazi neMakombi Votyira Kutapurirwa Coronavirus
text: Veruzhinji vanofamba nemabhazi pamwe nemakombi anotakura veruzhinji vanoti kumanikidzana kwavanenge vakaita mumabhazi kuri kuvapinza panjodzi yekubatira chirwere cheCoronavirus icho chakatekeshera munyika dzakawanda pasi rose. Kunyange hazvo chirwere ichi chichinzi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe, hurumende inoti iri kuita gadzirio yakasimba kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasatapurirane chirwere ichi kana chikazopinda munyika. Pamusika weMbare panga paine vanhu vashoma nhasi vanga vachikwira mabhazi anoenda nzendo refu pamwe nemaZupco anoenda mumisha inogara veruzhinji muno mudhorobha reHarare. Vamwe vevanga vachikwira mabhazi eZupco, Amai Sinikiwe Nyamadzawo, vati kumanikidzana kwavanenge vakaita mumabhazi, vamwe vakamira mumabhazi umu vasina pekugara kuri kuvaisa panjodzi yekubata chirwere che Coronavirius sezvo vanhu vanenge vachingofemerana vasina zvekuvharisa miromo kana mhino dzavo, kana kuti ma mask. Amai Nyamadzawo vati chimwewo chinonetsa ndechekuti pazviteshi zvinokwirirwa maZupco nemakombi hapana kushambidzika sezvo pasina zvekugezesa uye mumabhazi nemumakombi aya hamuna mishonga yekupfapfaidza zvinoita kuti vasazobatira zvirwere. Mumwewo anga achikwira mabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa paRoadport, Amai Acqueline Augustine, avo vati vanogara kuKuwadzana, vati mabhazi anoenda nzendo refu arinani pakuzara zvavanoti zvonoderedza mikana yekutapurirana zvizverwe zvakaita seche Coronavirus. Asi mumwe mutyairi wemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa, VaTonderai Kusekwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vari kuramba vachienda kuSouth Africa misi nenguva sezvo vanhu vazhinji vari kuedza kutsvaga zvingararamisa mhuri dzavo mhiri kwaLimpopo. VaKusekwa vati huwandu hwevanhu vavari kutakura kuenda kuSouth Africa nemabhazi hwadzikira kubva pakapinda chirwere che Coronavirus muSouth Africa vachiti vanokurudzira vose vavanenge vakatakura kuti vageze maoko pavanopinda mumabhazi avo pamwe nepavanosvika pamiganhu yenyika. Munyori mukuru musangano reUnited Commuter Operators of Zimbabwe, VaSimbarashe Ngarande, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushanda zvakasimba kuti vatsvage nzira dzekuti vanofamba nemotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji vashandise mari yebepa kana ma coins pakufamba senzira yekuderedza mukana wekuti vasatapurirane zvirwere zvakaita seche Covid-19. Munyori anowona nezvekutakurwa kwezvimhu mubato reMDC uye vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Kwekwe Central, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vakurudzira hurumende kuti ipe dzidziso yezvehutano kuvatyairi vemabhazi nekuvapa zvinovadzivirira mukutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hweCoronavirus. VaChikwinya vati hurumende inofanira kutora matanho akasimba kuti vose vanopinda nepamiganhu yenyika vavhenekwa vose. Munyori mukuru mubato rinopikisa reAfrican Development Party, VaBryn Negomo Murape, vakurudzirawo kuti mabhazi anotakura veruzhinji ange achipfapfaidzwa nguva dzose nemishonga uye vemabhazi vange vaine zvikwanisiro zvekuti vanokwira mabhazi vange vachishandisa munyaya dzehutsanana. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, kuti tinzwe kuti matanho ari kutorwa nebazi ravo ndeapi kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanofamba nemabhazi nemakombi vasabatwe nezvirwere zvakaita secheCoronavirus kana chichinge chazopinda munyika. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vati hurumende iri kuedza nepose painogona napo kupa vanhu dzidziso yekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere che Coronavirus uye iri kusimbaradzawo nyaya dzekuvhenekwa kwevanhu vanopinda munyika vachishandisa nhandare dzendege pamwe nemiganhu yenyika. Zvichakadai, mashoko aburitswa nemutauriri wekambani yendege ye South African Airways, VaTlali Tlali, anoti kambani iyi yakanzura kufamba kwendege dzayo kuenda kune dzimwe pasi rose kusanganisira Zimbabwe kubva mangwana kusvika mukupera kwaChivabvu uye kambani iyi yati ndege dzayo dzichange dzichibhururuka muSouth Africa chete zvichitevera matanho akatorwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa ekuedza kurwisana nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weCivil Aviation Authority of Zimbabwe, Amai Anna Hungwe, kuti tizive kuti pane dzimwe ndenge dzakanzura kumhara muZimbabwe here sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi mashoko atiri kutambira anoti ndege yeEmirates yakagumisira kupinda muZimbabwe nezuro, ukuwo Rwanda Air inonzi yatanga nhasi kusapinda muZimbabwe nepamusana pekutyira chirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yozeya Mhinduro dzeVashandirwi Vari Kutsigira Kumakidzwa kweVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo ,vanoti ivo nemagweta avo vatanga kuzeya mhinduro dzemapazi nemakambani ehurumende apindura panyaya yavakakwidza kumatare yekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo kuita izvi kuchityora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Vakaendeswa kumatare ava vanonzi vakati vashandi vasina kubayiwea nhomba vamire kuuuya kubasa. Vakaendeswa kumatare vanosanganisira gurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima; gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya; makambani anoti ZIMNAT Insurance, Zimbabwe National Road Administration (ZINARA), TelOne, Windmill, SEEDCO Zimbabwe nechikoro cheManicaland State University. Mukupindura zvakaturwa neZCTU kumatare, VaMachaya vati havazivi kuti sei ivo negurukota rezvevashandi vakapinzwa munyaya iyi nekuti handivo vanoudza vashandi kana makambani zvekuita panyaya dzakadai. VaMavima vaudza Studio7 kuti vakamboyedza kuti vataurirane neZCTU asi zvakaramba asi vachiti zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Kambani yeTelOne inoti nyaya iyi haifanire kunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi ichiti ZCTU yakatora mavhiki matatu kuiendesa kumatare zvinoratidza kuti hayaifunga kuti yakakosha zvekunzwikwa nechimbi chimbi.

headline: Vanopikisa Voshora Dare reMakurukota raVaMnangagwa Rizere Varume Chete
text: Mapato anopikisa anoti haasi kutambira nemufaro dare remakurukota rakadomwa nemusi weChina nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Makurukota aya ari kutarisirwa kutoreswa mhiko neMuvhuro. VaMnangagwa vakadoma dare remakurukota makumi maviri nevaviri, uye riine vanhukadzi vatatu chete vari mudare iri. VaMnangagwa vakadomawo makurukota ematunhu gumi zvichireva kuti makurukota pasi pehurumende yavo anenge ari makumi matatu nevaviri, kunyange hazvo makurukota anomirira matunhu asingapinde mudare remakurukota. Vakadzi vatatu vari mudare remakurukota ndiAmai Sithembiso Nyoni, gurukota rezvemadzimai nevechidiki; Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, gurukota rezvemamiririro ekunze uye Amai Priscah Mupfumira, gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika. Vanhukadzi vatatu vakaitwa makurukota ematunhu vanoti Amai Angeline Masuku (Bulawayo); Amai Rutendo Chikukwa (Harare), uye Amai Monica Mutsvangwa (Manicaland). Mapato anopikisa anoti VaMngangwa vaifanira kunge vakaremekedza zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika zvinovasungira kuti vaone kuti zvinzvimbo zvevanhukadzi zvawedzerwa muhurumende. Mutungamiri wechimwe ckwata chePeople's Democratic Party, PDP, Amai Lucia Matibenga, vanoti vakagara vazviona kare kuti VaMnangagwa munhu weZanu PF nokudaro havatarisiri kuona kushanduko inobva kumunhu weZanu PF. Chimwe chikwata che PDP chinotungamirwa naVaTendai Biti. Amai Matibenga vanoti vanhukadzi vacharemekedzwa zvido zvavo kana veruzhinji vakabvisa Zanu PF musarudzo dzegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance Unoita Musangano Wekutanga muHarare
text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, waita musangano wawo wekutanga mumusha weEpworth muHarare, uyo unonzi wapindwa nemazana evatsigiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. Mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa, VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti vatora mukana uyu kutsanangurira vatsigiri vavo vapinda mumusangano uyu pamusoro pehurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wakatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rino. Vangarivhume vanoti nyaya huru yavaudza vatsigiri vavo ndeyekuvandudzwa kunofanirwa kuitwa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo idzo sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. VaNgarivhume vanoti zvavanyunyuta nazvo nedezvekusachinja maitiro kweZanu PF muzvinhu zvakaita sekuwaniswa kwemapato ose mikana yakaenzana panhepfenyuro dzehurumende. “Saka tati isusu zvimwe zvezvinhu zvatichagara tichipusha, kana kuti tichirwa kuti tiite hondo yekuti zvinhu izvozvo zvirongeke, zvigadzirisike,” vanodaro VaNgarivhume. Musangano uyu unonzi wapindwa nevatungamiri vemapato ari muMDC Alliance ose kunze kwemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vanonzi vanga vakamirirwa nevatevedzeri vavo VaElias Mudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri werimwe bato reMDC, VaWelshman Ncube vanonzi havanawo kukwanisa kunge vari pamusangano uyu, asi vachinzi vanga vakamirirwawo nemutevedzeri wavo, VaEdwin Mushoriwa. VaTsvangirai ndivo vachamirira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Vozivisa Nyika Yavo Nezve Kuurayiwa kweMutungamiri weAl Quaida
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nezuro vakati America yainge yauraya mutungamiri wechikwata chinopfurikidza mwero cheAl Qaida, Ayman al Zawahri. Al Zawhri akaberekerwa kuEgypyt. Chikwata cheAl Qaida ndicho chakapamba ndege ndokuparadza zvivakwa muNew York, Pentagon nePennsylvania musi wa 11 Gunyana 2001 kukafa vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe. VaBiden vakati mushure mekutsvaga Al Zawhri kwemakore akawanda, vasori vemuAmerica vakazoziva kuti ainge ave kugara muKabul, Afghanistan nevamwe vepedyo vemhuri yake. VaBiden vanoti Al Zawahri akaurayiwa ari oga kunyangwe mumba maainge ari mainge muine vamwe vanhu. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muNew York muzvare Savanna Madamombe, vanoti chiitiko ichi chichabatsira kupodza maronda evanhu vazhinji vakarasikirwa nehama neshamwari muguta iri mugore ra 2011. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuzivisa Nyika Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuwanikwa Vaine Omicron Variant
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushushikana nekusabuda pachena kwehurumende pahuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa vaine mhando itsva yeCovid-19, yeOmicron Variant. Kushushikana uku kunotevera kuzivisa kwayakaita hurumende svondo rapera kuti vanhu makumi mashanu vaive vabatwa nemando yeOmicron munyika asi haina kuzoramba ichizivisa nezvehuwandu uhu izvo zviri kuita kuti vamwe vati pane zviri kuvanzwa pamusoro penyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari chiremba anoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite tsvakurudzo nekuzivisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nemhando yeOmicron vachiti izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru pakurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Dr Ranga vati kunyange hazvo zvichidhura kuti paitwe ongororo yekuziva kuti mhando yechirwere cheCovid iri kutekeshera munyika ndeipi, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende iwane mari yekuve nezvikwanisiro zvekuita izvi. Dr Norman Matara, avo vanove munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, vatiwo matanho akatorwa nehurumende mushure mekuveko kwemhando yeOmicron ndeechimbi-chimbi uye haana humboo hwescience hunoratidza kuti anobatsira. Vatiwo hurumende inodzoka yozvivhiringidza pachayo nekuramba ichiita zvimwe zvirongwa zvinoonekwa sezvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru wezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyik, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haisi kukwanisa kugara ichipa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nemhando yeOmicron munyika. Asi vati vari mushishi kuongorora hutachiwana uhu kubva kumatunhu ose enyika vakati vachazivisa zvinenge zvawanikwa munguva pfupi inotevera. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vamwe vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri, 4 720, uye vabatwa munyika yose nechirwere ichi vavazviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevasere, 150 628. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nezana nemakumi mana nemumwe chete, 2 926 141, uye vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vari mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu, 3 907 860. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakuda Kusunga VaMnangagwa, VaChiwenga naVaMohadi Omiswa Pamberi Pedare
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reIdeal Party Zimbabwe, VaTinashe Jonasi, vamiswa pamberi pedare nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pasi pemutemo weCriminal Law Codification Reform Act. Mapurisa anoti VaJonasi vakati VaMnangagwa vakambouraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nekudaro hapana munhu anofanira kupa huchapupu achivatsigira padzimwe mhosva dzavanenge vachipomerwa. VaJonasi vanonziwo vainge vachironga kusunga VaMnangagwa, nevatevedzeri vavo, General Constantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi apo vakasungwa pa Jameson Hotel nemusi weMuvhuro. Asi vaJonasi vari kuramba mhosva idzi, vachitiwo pavainzi vakataura mashoko aya yainge iri nguva yesarudzo uye VaMnangagawa vainge vangori mutungamiri webato reZanu-PF chete kwete mutungamiri wenyika. Vanotiwo chikamu chavari kutongwa nacho hachisi pamutemo. Pavamira mberi pedare, VaJonasi vaudzwa nemutongi, Amai Rumbidzai Mugwagwa, kuti havasi kuzoregwa achienda kumba kusvika nyaya yavo yatongwa nedare. Gweta raVaJonasi, Amai Nontokozo Dube, vanoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vati vanenge vari kudare redzimhosva magwana mangwanani vachisvitsa mapepa echikumbiro chekuti VaJonasi vapiwe mukana wekubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaJonasi vari kuRemand Prison, muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhanga Maviri muZimbabwe Anobviswa paZvirango Zvakatemerwa neAmerica
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisa mabhanga maviri anoti reAgribank nere International Development Bank of Zimbabwe pazvirango zvakatemerwa makambani nevamwe vari muhurumende yeZanu-PF kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisa mabhanga maviri anoti reAgribank nere International Development Bank of Zimbabwe pazvirango zvakatemerwa makambani nevamwe vari muhurumende yeZanu-PF kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Bazi rinona nezvemari muAmerica re U.S Treasury Department neChina rakati munhu anenge oda kuita bhizimisi nemabhanga maviri aya haachafanire kutanga akumbira rezinesi kuhurumende yeAmerica. America, ichatungamirwa naVaGoerge Walker Bush, yakatemera mamwe makambani nenhengo dzeZanu-PF zvirango muna 2003 ichivapomera mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Zvirango izvi zvinowedzerwa nguva gore rega, uye pakapinda VaBarack Obama mukutonga, vakaramba vachizvichengetedza vachiti zvichabviswa chete kana hurumende yeZanu PF yava kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemitemo yenyika. Asi Zanu-PF inoti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika mushure mekunge hurumende yagovera ivhu kuvatema. Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisawo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvange zvakatemerwa zvirango kusanganisa nhengo dzeZanu-PF nhatu dzakashaya dzinosanganisa vaive sachigaro webato iri mudunhu reHarare, VaAmos Midzi, vaiva nhengo yePolitburo VaStanley Sakupwanya uye VaSikhanyiso Duke Ndlovu, vaive gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko. Mudzimai waVaNdlovu amai Rose Jaele Ndlovu uye vamwe vanonzi Amai Nalinee Taveeesin vekuThailand vakabviswawo pavanhu vainge vatemerwa zvirango mushure mekunyora tsamba vachizvichenura. Amai Nalinee vaive gurukota kuThailand vakatemerwa zvirango muna 2008 nekudyidzana kwavo naVaMugabe. Asi vairamba kuti vanodyidzana naVaMugabe vachiti vainge vozorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya vachiti vaingozivawo VaMugabe. Mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo uye zvinofanira kubviswa zvose kwete muzvidimbu. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti America haifanire kubvisa ziso rayo pahurumende yeZimbabwe zvikuru panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu.  No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, Votarisirwa Kukunda Musarudzo?
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira mapato manomwe. Sarudzo iyi iri kuonekwa nevakawanda sesarudzo ichanakidza zvikuru. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti VaChamisa vane nhoroondo yehutungamiriri kubvira vari mudzidzi. VaRuhanya vanoti kuwaniswa kwaVaChamisa zvigaro zvakasiyana siyana mubato reMDC T pamwe nemumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance kunoratidza kuti vane hutungamiri hwakanaka. VaRuhanya vanoti nyika zhinji dziri kusarudza vatungamiriri vechidiki. VaRuhanya vanoti kana kukaitwa sarudzo dzejekerere, vanoona VaChamisa vachikunda musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Bekezela Gumbo, vanoti vanoona VaChamisa vari munhu akanaka kusarudzwa semutungamiri nekuti havana rutsugiro rwemauto semutungamiriri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaGumbo vanoti kusava nerutsigiro rwemauto zvinoita kuti vanhu vave vakasununguka munyika. Asiwo VaGumbo vanoti VaChamisa vari kutadza kuumbiridza bato ravo reMDC sezvo vamwe vanhu vaive vari mubato iri vari kupesana naVaChamisa, vamwe vachipinda musarudzo vakazvimirira mushure mekusawirirana nemaitiro aVaChamisa. Gweta huye vari murwiri wekodzero musangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti VaChamisa vane chaunga chevatsigiri. Asiwo vanoti dai vari chipangamazano chaVaChamisa, vangadai vakavakurudzira kuenda kunosarudzwa kutungamirira bato kukongiresi pamwe nekuti varemekedze kodzero dzevanhu nekuratidza kuti havadi mhirizhonga. Nhengo yeparamende yeMutare Central, VaInnocent Gonese, vanova nhengo yeMDC vanotiwo hutungamiri hwaVaChamisa hwakanaka zvikuru sezvo vachida ramangwana renyika rakanaka. Sangano ravana chipangamazano reAfrobarometer rakaburitsa gwaro mwedzi wapera richiti dai sarudzo dzakaitwa munguva yarakaita tsvakiridzo, VaMnangagwa vangadai vakakunda musarudzo iyi, asi zvisina mutsindo, zvaizoita kuti paitwe imwe sarudzo, kana kuti run off, pakati paVaChamisa naVaMnangagwa. Asi veruzhinji vanoti zviri pachena kuti sarudzo dzikaitwa nemazvo, VaChamisa vanogona kukunda VaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Tinoda kushaina: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum Norman Mapeza anoti ane chishuviro chekuti chikwata chake chive chimwe chezvikuru muAfrica nekudaro vacharwa semvumba apo vari kusangana nedzimwe shasha mumutambo weChampions League.Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, yakabudirira kupinda mumini-league reChampions League uye yakaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Orlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa, Esperance of Tunisia (shasha dzeChampions League) neHoroya yekuGuinea.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga FC Platinum ichikwikwidza mumini-league iyi sezvo kare yaingoburitswa kumaprelimaninary round rekurwira kuenda kumini-league.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Mapeza anoti chikwata chake chiri pachiri nekuti chakashanda nesimba uye chinoda kuve chikuru muAfrica.   “Kunzi unzi uri chikwata chihombe unofanirwa kusangana nezvimwe zvihombe, saka ndizvo zvatiri kutarisira kuona zvichiitika.   “Zvinhu zvatange tichishandira kwemakore akawanda tichimbokundikana, asi tavemo, tinofanirwa kungotenda.   “Zvose tichangozvisiya mumaoko aMwari, ndiye anoziva ramangwana redu kuti rakamira sei uye ndiye achatitungamira mumitambo yedu yose,” anodaro Mapeza.   Mumutambo wekutanga weFC Platinum, chikwata ichi chichasangana neOrland Pirates musi wa11 Ndira kuZvishavane mumutambo uyo inofanirwa kuhwina kuitira kuti itange zvine mutsindo kana ichida kubudirira kufambira mberi mumakwishu aya.   Zvakadai, Mapeza anoti mwaka wegore ra2019 shuviro yechikwata chake kuti chipinde muboka rezvimwe zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders kuburikidza nekuhwinha mukombe weCastle Premiership katatu kakatevedzana.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuZimbabwe, zvikwata zviviri chete zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders ndizvo zvakakwanisa kuhwina mukombe weligi makore matatu akatevedzana.   Dynamos yakazviita kaviri kekutanga kubva mugore ra1980 kusvika 1983 uye ikazozviita zvakare kubva 2011 kusvika 2014 apo yairairidzwa naKallisto Pasuwa kozoti Highlanders yakazvikwanisa kubva 1999 kusvika 2002.   “Isu tinotambira nhabvu kuhwina uye ndizvo tichangoita mwaka mutsva unotevera.   “Asi zvose tinongozvisiira mumaoko aMwari ndivo vanoziva uye ndivo vanotungamira. Hatikwanise kuronga zvepano pasi, Mwari ndivo vanotirongera.   “Asi isu chikuru kuti tirwe kuchengetedza mukombe wedu chete,” anodaro Mapeza.

headline: Bato reCCC Rinoti Mutumbi weNhengo Yaro, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, Wawanikwa Wakakandwa muTsime kuNyatsime.
text: Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti mutumbi wemunhukadzi waburitswa nemapurisa kubva mune rimwe tsime kuNyatsime kuChitungwiza waonekwa kuti ndewenhengo yaro, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, avo vakatsakatika musi wa 24 Chivabvu unove mwedzi wapera. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioer Paul Nyathi, avo vazivisa vatori venhau kuburikidza negwaro ravaburitsa kuti pane mutumbi wakachekwachekwa wawanikwa wakakandwa mutsime papurazi reDenota Farm riri pasi peBeatrice. VaNyathi vati mutumbi uyu watanga kuonekwa naAmai Linnah Mukandi (57), vanove amai vemurume ari kufungidzirwa kuti ndiye akaponda Muzvare Ali, Pius Jamba. Vatiwo mapurisa azivisa mhuri yaMuzvare Ali, uye vari mushishi kuti vanyatsoongorora nekuzivisisa nezvemutumbi uyu. VaNyathi vayambirawo vezvematongerwo enyika kuti vasakanganisa kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi vachitiwo vari mushishi kutsvaga Jamba. Kanzura vekuChitungwiza vari nhengo yebato reCitizen’s Coalition for Change, VaMusa Makweza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mutumbi waburitswa mutsime uyu ndewaMuzvare Ali. VaMakweza vati sezvo zvinhu izvi zvaitika kumadeuka kwezuva, vanga vasati vagara pasi sebato kuti varonge matanho ekutora. Mutauriri webato reCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter vachiti boka ravo rezvekuchengetedzwa kwebato pamwe nehutungamiri hwavo muChitungwiza vari kushanda pamwe nemapurisa, uye vave kumirira gwaro riri pamutemo rinobva kumapurisa pamusoro pekushaya kwaMuzvare Ali. Kutsakatika kwaMuzvare Ali kunonzi nevamwe kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika, asi mapurisa achiti Muzvare Ali vakazvuzvurudzwa nemumwe wavo wavaimbofambidzana naye, Pius Jamba, kubva pane imwe nzvimbo inotandarirwa makare muNyatsime mushure mekunge vanetsana uye hapana akazovaona zvakare. Gweta riri kumirira mhuri yekwaAli panyaya iyi, uye vari mumiriri weSt. Mary’s muparamende, VaJob Sikhala, vatiwo timbopa nguva kune mapurisa vaite basa ravovachitiwo tizovabata pashure. No media source currently available

headline: Hurukuro dzeRunyararo Pakati peRussia neUkraine Dzotarisirwa Kutangazve muTurkey
text: Nhaurirano dzeRusssia neUkraine dziri kutarisirwa kutanga svondo rino muTurkey apo hondo pakati penyika mbiri idzi yapinda musvondo rechishanu. Mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodomyr Zelenskyy vanoti rusungunuko rwenyika yavo yose rwakakosha munhaurirano idzi vachiramba zviri kutaurwa neRussia kuti itore mamwe matunhu enyika yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika yeTurkey VaRecep Tayyip Erdogan vakatotaura parunhare memutungamiri weRussia VaVladimir Putin vachikurudzira kuti vambokanda zvombo pasi. United Nations inoti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vamanikidzwa kuenda muhupoterei muUkraine nekuda kwehondo iyi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakadzokorora zvakare kuti nyika yavo haisikuda kupidigura hurumende yeRussia mushre mekunge mutungamiti wenyika VaJoe Biden vati VaPutin havafanire kuramba vari pachigaro zvichitevera kurwisa kwavari kuita Ukraine. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Mashocha vari muAmerica vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona Russia ichibvuma kuita nhaurirano dzekupedza hondo sezvo zvirango zvakaomarara zvayakatemerwa zvichigona kukanganisa hupfumi hwavo zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Baba neMwana Vokonzera Mutauro nekuHwina Makwikwi ekwaTM Supermarkets kuChinhoyi
text: Kuhwina makwikwi eTM Bonanza promotion kwababa nemwana ane makore mashanu kokonzeresa mutauro muChinhoyi vamwe vachiti vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. VaClifton Mandla nemwana wavo Clinton ane makore mashanu ndivo vakahwina mibairo mukuru yeTM Bonanza promotion yakaitwa muChinhoyi neMugovera. Clinton akahwina mubairo mukuru wemari inosvika zviuru gumi, baba vake avo vanogaro vachihwina mibairo pachitoro cheTM muChinhoyi vakahwina zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora. Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga wekuti vahwine kana kuti vanorotswa. Amai Sobangile Kamudyariwa mumwe wevanofunga kuti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. Amai Kamudyariwa vanoti chimwe chinoshamisa ndechekuti VaMandla vari kuhwina pamakwikwi echitoro chimwechete izvo vanofunga kuti pane chitsotsi chirikuitwa nevashandi veTM. Asi VaMandla vanoti hapana mushonga wavanoshandisa vachiti vanohwina nekuti vanopinda mumakwiwi ose anoitika muzvitoro. VaMandla vanoramba kuti vanohwina makwiwi anoitwa muchitoro cheTM chete vachiti vanohwina makwiwi emunezvimwe zvitoro. VaMandla vakambohwina mamwe madhora zviuru zvishanu mugore ra2016, gore rakapera vakahwina firiji mumakwiwi ekwaTM Bonanza promotion. Vanoti mari yavahwina vachaishandisa kuvaka imba panzvimbo yavakatenga mushure mukuhwina mari yekutanga uye vanoti vacharamba vachipinda mumakwikwi ekwaTM nemunezvimwe zvitoro.
