Kunyange hazvo mutemo unoona nezvekupinda mumakwikwi usingabvimire kuti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere vapinde mumakwikwi, chitoro cheTM chakaiswa panguva yakaomwa sezvo vainge vasina kunyora kuti makwikwi aya ayipindwa nevanhu vane makore mangani. Mukuru anoona nezvekushambadzirwa muzvitoro zvekwaTM Muzvare Paida Moyo vanoti vakaona kukanganisa uku Clinton atohwina vakatya kusamupa mubairo wake sezvo vaizoendeswa kumatare. Muzvare Moyo vanoti zvekuhwinisa mwana mudiki hazvichaitika zvakare. Zvitoro zvakawanda zvave kuita makwiwi ekuwanisa mibairo kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvakawanda nechinangwa chekuhwina mibairo. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Ngapaitwe Hurukuro paNyaya yeMitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti panofanira kuitwa musangano wechimbi chimbi weTNF kuzeya nyaya yemitengo yezvinhu yoramba yoita chamurambamhuru. Mitengo yezvinhu zvekudya uye michova yakawedzerwa zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma adarika. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende sezvo gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vati vange vachangopinda munyika kubva kuAmerica nekudaro vange vachida kumbotura befu. Mutungamiri weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe Doctor Israel Murefu vati vange vakabatikana vakati tigozovafonera. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Zvinhu Mumigwagwa Voisa Zvipikiri Munzeve Dzavo
text: Vatengesi vemumigwagwa vari kushoropodza zvikuru kanzuru yeHarare iyo vanoti yakavaudza kuti ichashandisa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kuvadzinga mumigwagwa mavanotengesera. Senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheTyphoid, kanzuru yeHarare neChipiri yakapa vanotengesera zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa mazuva maviri kuti vamire kuita izvi. Kunyange hazvo mazuva aya apfuura, vatengesi ava havasati vabuda mumigwagwa uye vanoti havasi kuzobuda. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri we Sangano re Zimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, ZCIEA, iro rinomirira vanobata mabasa emaoko, Amai Olivia Songere, vashora zvikuru kanzuru nekuda kushandisa huturu pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau. Mumwe mutengesi, VaGivus Maririmba, vashoropodzawo kanzuru yeHarare nekupomera vatengesi vemumigwagwa kuti ndivo vari kukonzoresa kuti hutachiona hwetyphoid hwupararire. VaMaririmba vatiwo kutengesa mumigwagwa kuri kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemabasa VaMaririmba vashorawo mitemo inoshandiswa nemakanzuru iyo yavati ndeyehudzvanyiriri yaishandiswa nehurumende yavachena. Mukuru wesangano reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanotiwo kupomerana mhosva hakusiko kunopedza dambudziko rezvirwere zvemudumbu. VaShumba vari kukurudzira kanzuru kuti iterese mitero vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mari yainenge yawana, yoshandiswa mukuchenesa nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru ye Harare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru ichazenge ichibatsirwa nemapurisa kubvisa nechisimba vatengesi vari kurambira mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzisi VekuMaruwa Vanoti vaveKushungurudzwa neVasori VeCIO
text: Sangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, rinoti raudza magweta aro kuti vafambise nyaya yekutyisidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori veCIO. Mukuru weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti pane varume vatatu vanozivikanwa varikutyisidzira nhengo dze sangano ravo uye vachitaura pachena kuti vari kuzoparadza sangano iri. “Chekutanga vanoti kuendesa kwatakaita Zanu-PF kumatare edzimhosva kuti iregere kushandisa vana, maticha nezvinhu zvezvikoro." Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Chepiri vanochema nesu kuti makaendeserei ZEC kumatare edzimhosva uye, chechitatu, vanoti takaenderei kuConstitutional Court nenyaya yevadzidzisi,” VaMasaraure vakaudza Studio 7. Zvichakadaro, ARTUZ yaburitsawo gwaro ichiti inomira pamwe chete nevarairidzi veku Swaziland avo vari kunetsana nehurumende yavo pamusoro pemari yemuhoro. No media source currently available

headline: HATITYE EGYPT: ZIM
text: VATAMBI vechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors vanoti vagadzirira zvikuru mutambo wavo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) apo vachatatsurana neEgypt nemusi weChishanu chino.   MaWarriors ndiwo achavhurira makwikwi aya apo ari kusangana neEgypt mumutambo wekutanga uyo uchatanga na10pm.   Kwayedza svondo rino yakaita hurukuro nevatambi vemaWarriors vakasiyana avo vanoti vagadzirira mutambo uyu. Knox Mutizwa – uyo anove mutambi wemaWarriors neLamontville Golden Arrows yekuSouth Africa – anoti zvikwata zvese zviri kukwikwidza kuAfcon zvinofanirwa kuvhunduka chikwata chavo.   “Gore rino takatodya nduru, zvikwata zvese zviri kuAfcon ngazvitodedera nekuti isu takatosimbisisa.   “Chikwata chedu chakasimba zvikuru uye tine vatambi vakawanda vane tarenda vari kutambira zvikwata zvekunze kwenyika saka tinotokwanawo pamamonya ipapo,” anodaro Mutizwa.   Kubva maWarriors paakatanga kukwikwidza kuAfcon mugore ra2004, chikwata ichi hachisati chambobuda muboka rachinenge rapinzwa. Asi, Mutizwa anoti zvinhu zviri kushanduka gore rino sezvo shuviro yavo iri yekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro kuti vagosvika kure mumutambo uyu.   “Takwikwidza makore akawanda kuAfcon asi tichingoburitswa mutambo uyu uchangotanga saka gore rino zvinofanirwa kushanduka.   “MaWarriors rwendo runo ndiwo chikwata vazhinji vachange vachitaura nezvacho chete nguva dzose nekuti takagadzirira. Chimwe chinhu zita handiro rinotamba nhabvu saka zvekuti Mohamed Salah hatizvitarise izvo isu Khama Billiat naKnowledge Musona, Tino Kadewere naNyasha Mushekwi vese avo tinavo vatambi vepamusoro,” anodaro.   Gore radarika, Mutizwa akanwisa chibodzwa chakanetsa zvikuru mumutambo weAbsa Premiership wechikwata chake neMaritzburg United uye chibodzwa ichi chakasvika pakuvhoterwa kuve Goal of the Month mumwaka waNyamavhuvhu 2018 iye ndokupihwa mubairo. Anoti kana akawana mukana wekutamba kuAfcon anoda kudzokorodza zvaakaita kuSouth Africa nekunwisa chibodzwa chinohwina mubairo weGoal of the Tournament.   “Mukana ukauya kuAfcon ndinoda kuita zvinorova sezvandakaita kuSouth Africa pamutambo wechikwata changu neMaritzburg United. Ndoda kuuhwina mubairo weGoal of the Tournament, zvandakaita kuSouth Africa.   “Kana zvikaitika ndingafare zvikuru, asi chikuru kwandiri kuhwina sechikwata mikombe mikuru yakaita seAfcon iyo tiri kuenda kunorwira. Hapana chinoramba uye kana kutitadzisa, zvese zvinogona kuitika,” anodaro Mutizwa.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naTendayi Darikwa uyo anotambirawo zvakare Nottingham Forest yekuEngland achiti vagadzirira kubata basa sebasa.   “Afcon inoonekwa pasi rese wena, yakakosha zvikuru uye inoteverwa nekuti vatambi vazhinji vane mukurumbira vanouya kuzokwikwidza kumakwishu aya saka tinofanirwa kunge takagadzirira kuti tibate basa.   “Isu chedu chete tinofanirwa kutamba sechikwata uye hatifanirwe kutarisa zvinoitwa nevamwe vatambi.   “Isu ngatingoita basa redu chete ratakafambira,” anodaro Darikwa.   Thabani Kamusoko – uyo anotambira nhabvu yake kuTanzania – anoti anozviziva kuti maWarriors ari muboka rakaoma zvikuru asi vanofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti vafambire mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Ndinoziva hangu kuti tiri muboka rakaoma zvikuru asi tikashanda nesimba tinosvika kure uye isu chatiri kuda kusvika kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   MaWarriors ari muboka reGroup A nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Egypt, Uganda neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Zvakadai, Hurumende yakatoumba komiti yekutsigira chikwata chenyika ichi nemari yeWarriors Fund Raising  Committee.   Mutungamiriri wenyika President Mnangagwa vakadoma komiti iyi nechinangwa chekuti iunganidze mari ichashandiswa nemaWarriors mumakwikwi aya.

headline: Hurumende Yobvumidza Kutengwa kweZvinhu Kunze kweNyika
text: Hurumende yambomisa mutemo unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvimwe zvinhu uye inoti makambani nevanhuwo zvavo vave kubvumidzwa kutenga zvinhu zvange zvichirambidzwa kupinda munyika zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa nekuzora, floor nezvimwe. Vachitaura pamusangano wavanoita nevatori venhau mushure medare remakurukota svondo rega rega, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati hurumende yatora danho iri nechinangwa chekuda kuona kuti vanhu vawana chikafu pamwe nekugara zvakanaka pamwe nekutenga zvinhu nemutengo uri pasi. Amai Mutsvangwa izvi hazvirevi kuti hurumende haichatsigira makambani emunhu uye vati izvi zvicharamba zviripo kudzamara zvinhu zvagadzikana munyika. Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvave kukwanisa kutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika ndezvinoti, bhinzi, fotireza, mabhara, mishonga yekurimisa, mazenge, ice cream, jam, dovi, shuga, mushonga wekuporisha shangu, pamwe nesipo. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti zvinhu zviwande muzvitoro kuitira kuti mitengo yezvinhu idzike. Vati danho iri rakananganawo nekugadzirisa kusamira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri nemabhizimisi umo mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwira zuva nezuva. Vanongoorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kut danho ratorwa nehurumende richagadzirisa nyaya yemitengo munyika. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira maindasitiri, reConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo danho ratorwa nehurumende richikwanisa kuti zvinhiu zviwande munyika, mitengo yezvinhu haisi kuzodzikira. Vatiwo mitengo yezvinhu ichatokwira zvakanyanya sezvo vanhu nemakambani vachatsvaga mari yekunotenga kunze pamusika mutema izvo zvinozoitawo kuti vatengese zvinhu zvavo nemitengo iri pamusoro soro. VaJabangwe vati zviri nani kuti hurumende irambe ichitsigira makambani emuno nemari. Vati hurumende yakaderedza huwandu hwemari yekunze hwainopa kumakambani muna Nyamavhuvhu izvo zvakatanga kukonzera kushomeka pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Varimi Votadziswa Kurima Minda Yavo kuMashonaland West neVari Kuchera Goridhe
text: Vamwe varimi mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti vave kutadza kurima minda yavakapihwa nehurumende nekuda kwevanhu vari kuchera goridhe muminda yavo. Varimi ava, avo vakapihwa minda pasi pechirongwa chehurumende chekuwanisa ivhu kuruzhinji rwevanhu vanoti nguva dzakawanda vave kuwana minda yavo yavakucherwa nevanhu vanochera zvicherwa vasina mvumo kana kuti makorokoza, avo vanenge vachitsvaga goridhe. Varimi ava vanoti haasi makorokoza chete ari kuchera minda yavo, kunyange vanochera goridhe zviri pamutemo vanongokaruka vauya nemagwaro anovapa mvumo yekuchera muminda yavo zviri pamutemo. Mumwe mugari wekuMakonde akachererwa mumunda make ndiAmai Mary Nyabadza. Amai Nyabadza vanoti hurumende ingadai isina kupa vanhu minda munzvimbo dzizere zvicherwa nekuti vave kutotadza kurima. Vanoti vanochera zvicherwa ava vanoita zvemhirizhonga kana munhu akada kuvarambidza. Mumwe murimi akachererwa mumunda make, VaReason Dandawa, vanotiwo vanochera goridhe vanoita madiro ajojina uye vanoita zvemhirizhonga. VaDandawa vanoti chikamu chinoti anochera zvicherwa anoonekwa seakakosha kudarika murimi mumaziso emutemo chinofanirwa kuvandudzwa. Mumwe murimi akapindirwawo mumunda make emahekiteya makumi masere kwaZvimba nevanochera goridhe, VaGerald Mashiri, vanoti vakapindirwa nevanhu vatanhatu vari kuchera goridhe vasina kuvapa mvumo. VaMashiri vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa murimi mukana wekutanga wekuti achere goridhe riri mumunda make. VaMashiri vanoti vanochera goridhe ava vanosiya vasina kuvhara makomba vachiti bazi rinoona nezvemigodhi pamwe nezvicherwa ndiro riri kuita zvehuwori zvekupa vanochera ava marezinesi pasina gwaro rekuti murimi abvuma here kana kuti kwete. Sachigaro weboka remadzimai anoita zvekuchera zvicherwa, Muzvare Chiedza Chipangura, vanoti gakava remurimi nemucheri rinofanirwa kupedzwa nekukurumidza nemukuru webazi rezvemigodhi nezvhicherwa wedunhu zviri pamutemo. Muzvare Chipangura vanoti zvikatora nguva rinenge rave dambudziko rehuwori. Panyaya yevacheri vari kurambira paminda, Muzvare Chiedza vanoti dambudziko rine vamwe varimi nderekuti vanoda kurambira nzvimbo asi ivo vasingacheri zvicherwa vachida kungorima chete. Mukuru webazi rezvemigodhi nezvicherwa mudunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Sibongubuhle Mpindiwa, vanobvuma kuti pane nyaya dzine chitsama dzekusawirirana kwevarimi nevanochera zvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe, asi vachiti nyaya dzacho dzinongosiyana nenzvimbo. Amai Mpindiwa vanoti rimwe dambudziko rinoita varimi kufunga kuti zvicherwa zvinenge zviri muminda mavo ndezvavo vachiti izvi hazvisi izvo nekuti zvicherwa ndezvehurumende iyo inopa bvumo kune wose anenge akumbira bvumo yekuchera. Amai Mpindiwa vanoti nzvimbo yose munyika inogona kupihwa mvumo yekuti icherwe zvicherwa kusanganisira nzvimbo dzehurumende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvicherwa vachishanda vakazvimiririra, VaGeorge Mugani, vanoti mutemo unopa mucheri wezvicherwa mvumo yekuchera zvicherwa kunyange pamunda wemumwe munhu sezvo mvumo yekurima iri pamasendimita makumi matatu kubva pamsoro kudzika pasi chete, zvichireva kuti kubva panogumira masendimita makumi matatu aya zvichidzika, pasi pose hapachisiri pake, asi panenge pave pehurumende. Panyaya yemutemo wemigodhi nezvirimwa VaMugani vanoti mutemo uri kuvandudzwa kuchengetedza murimi sezvo pave nemutemo wekuti mucheri wezvicherwa anofanirwa kupihwa mvumo nemurimi kana aine mahekiteya ari pasi pezana. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti dambudziko iri rakatekeshera mumatunhu madiki ose muMashonaland West anoti Hurungwe, Makonde, Zvimba, Norton, Chegutu, Kadoma pamwe neMhondoro, uye rinowanikwawo mune mamwe matunhu ose emunyika ane zvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe. No media source currently available

headline: MaPlatinum obandana
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeMandava Stadium, kuZvishavane uko FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum Stars zvichabandana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup final.   Rwendo rwekusvika pafainari iyi rwange ruri rurefu sezvo pakatanga mutambo uyu munaChivabvu, wakambomiswa mitambo iri pakati pekutambwa munaChikumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutambo uyu mukuru sezvo uchiuya netikiti rekuzokwikwidza mumitambo yemuAfrica yaCAF Confederations Cup.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvose zvakambohwina mukombe weChibuku Super Cup final kare saka zvichange zvichirwira kuti zvigousimudza kechipiri.   FC Platinum yakahwina mukombe uyu muna2014 apo yakakunda Harare City mufainari 3-1 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 1-1.   Kuchiti mugore ra2016, Ngezi yakazvambaradza FC Platinum 3-1 ndokuhwina mukombe uyu mumutambo wakatambirwa kuBaobab Stadium.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaive muboka rimwe chete reGroup 4 umo maive nezvimwe zvinoti Triangle United neWhawha FC. Mubati wepagedhi weFC Platinum arizve kaputeni, Petros Mhari, anoti zvinofadza zvikuru kutamba mumutambo mukuru wefainari.   Mhari, uyo aive muchikwata cheFC Platinum chakahwina mukombe uyu mugore ra2014 necha2016 icho chakazvamburwa neNgezi, anoti mitambo yefainari haisi nyore sezvo zvikwata zvese zvinenge zvichida kuhwina.   “Mitambo yefainari yose yakaoma zvikuru nekuti zvikwata zvinopindamo zvinenge zvabva kure uye zvese zvinoda kuhwina. “Asi isu sechikwata kusvika patave kurakidza kuti takabva kure naizvozvo zvinofadza zvikuru uye tichashanda nesimba kuti tigohwina mutambo uyu uyo tinoziva kuti unenge wakaoma.   “Hatifanire kutarisira pasi Ngezi nekuti chikwata chikuru chatinoziva chinogona uye takambosangana nacho kare mufainari chikambotikunda. Saka mutambo uyu uchange wakaomarara zvikuru. Chikuru isu sechikwata chatiri kutarisira kuhwina mutambo wemusi weSvondo, zvimwe zvese tinozotarisa zvichazotevera,” anodaro Mhari.   Kuchitiwo nekune rimwe divi, murairidzi weMadamburo – sezita remadunhurirwa reNgezi Platinum Stars – Rodwell Dhlakama, ari kunyunyuta zvikuru nekufamba kwakanyanya kwakaita chikwata chake apo chakatarisana nemutambo.   Chikwata ichi chakaenda kuBulawayo chichida kunosangana neHighlanders mumutambo usina kuzoenderera mberi nekuda kwevaridzi vepembe vakamboramwa basa, ndokuzouya kuHarare kuzotamba semi-final yemutambo uyu neHighlanders uyo chakahwina.   Vachipedza, vakabva vadzokera kuBulawayo zvakare kumutambo wePremier Soccer League neHighlanders uyo wakapera uri mangange 0-0. Dhlakama anoti mutambo wavo wekupedzisira wakaona vatambi vazhinji vakaita saWellington Taderera, Keith Murera, Ariel Makopa naNelson Chadya vachikuvara izvo zviri kudzosera gadziriro dzavo kumashure.   “Rwendo rwedu kusvika pamutambo uyu rwange ruri rurefu kunyangwe zvazvo tiri kugadzirira hedu. Asi, gadziriro dzedu dzakadzorerwa kumashure nekuda kwekukuvara kwakaita vatambi vedu vazhinji. Tiri kuvatarisa kusvika musi weSvondo kuti vanenge vave papi sezvo vakatikoshera.   “Asi hatitye hedu kupinda mumutambo uyu nekuti nhandare yacho tave kuiziva sezvo tatambira mitambo yedu mizhinji ikoko saka tichanorwa semvumba.   “Mutambo uyu uchange wakakosha nekuti unenge uine vatsigiri sezvo pataitamba mitambo yemuboka redu vatsigiri vange vasingatenderwi kupinda munhandare nekuda kwemitemo ine chekuita nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19,” anodaro Dhlakama.   Chikwata chichahwina mukombe uyu gore rino chinopihwa mari inosvika US$75 000 uye chinenge chakundwa chichiwana US$50 000.

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugwinyisa Muviri Kuti Vasarwarisa Vakabatwa neCovid-19
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kugara vakagwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti kana vachinge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vave nemukana mukuru wekupora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare vachiita zvirongwa zvekugwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti vave nehutano hwakanaka. Kugwinyisa muviri uku kunogona kuitwa nenzira dzakawanda, idzo dzinosanganisira kuita zvemitambo, kumhanya, pamwe nekufamba zvinoitakuti vabude, unova mucherechedzo wekuti huwandu hwemafuta ari mumuviri, hunenge huchideredzwa. Mumwe mudzidzisi wepachikoro chemapusoro soro, Doctor Tendai Charity Nhenga, vanoti pavakarwara nedenda reCovid 19 gore rino, vakapiwa mubhedha kwaMutare uko kwavakaona vanhu vaiva vapihwawo mibhedha vakange vaine miviri yakakurisa zvikuru. Doctor Nhenga vanoti pavakaziva nezvedenda iri gore rakapera, vakatanga kuita zvokufamba vachigwinyisa muviri wavo. Vanoti vane chokwadi kuti kusimbisa kwavaiita nyama dzavo kwakabatsira zvikuru mukupora kwavo. Doctor Nhenga vanoti mudzinza ravo mune vanhu vane mhumhu mukuru, pamwe nehuremu husingawirirane nehurefu hwavo. Vanoti vazhinji vevanhu ava vanorwara nezvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure izvo zvinoita kuti vadhererwe nezvirwere zvakawanda, zvinosanganisira Covid-19. Mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kugara vachigwinyisa miviri yavo kuburikidza nekuita mitambo kana mabasa anoita kuti vabude dikita. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti kubudisa dikita mumuviri kunoita kuti tsinga dzinoendesa mweya kumapapu, dzigare dzakavhurika. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti paongorora yavakaita kuEpworth nemuHarare, zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu ava vaisaziva kuti denda reCovid 19 rinokwanisa kuparadzirwawo nevanhu vasina zvinoratidza kuti vane denda iri, asi vainaro, izvo vanoti zviri kuita kuti denda iri ripararire zvakanyanyisa. Sangano reDiabetic Association of Zimbabwe rinoti nepamusana pekuti vanhu vakawanda havaongororwi chirwere cheshuga, ndizvo zviri kukwidzawo matenda emoyo, hupofu, nekugurwa kwemakumbo zvokuti Covid 19 ikabata vanhu vakadai vasiri kutora mishonga, inokwanisa kuvauraya. Ongororo yakaitwawo zvakare nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva muvanhu gumi munyika, ane chirwere cheshuga. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupinda munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ichichenjedza veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwre cheshuga nokuti zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanonyanya kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid 19, vanhu vane zvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure, uye nguva zhinji, vari vanhu vanenge vasiri pamishonga. Asi Dr Madavanhu vanoti chirongwa ichi chakambomiswa nekuda kwemitemo yakatarwa nebazi rehutano iyo isingabvumidze kuungana kwevanhu munguva ino yekurwisa Covid 19.

headline: Ndinotenda vatsigiri: Holloway
text: akatenda Conor McGregor nevatsigiri vemutambo weMMA nemashoko esimbaradzo avaimutumira zvichitevera kubuda kwaakaita mumutambo weUFC 226.   Shasha yeFeatherweight iyi ange achifanirwa kurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake svondo rino apo aitarisirwa kurwa naBrian Ortega mumutambo mukuru.   Asi haacharwe nekuda kwehutano hwake sezvo ange achinzwa dzungu, kunyangwe hazvo mutambi uyu asati anyatsoudzwa kuti chii chaizvo chiri kumukanganisa.   McGregor, uyo akakunda Holloway apo vaviri ava vakasangana mugore ra2013, akatumira shasha iyi inozivikanwa se145-pound king mashoko paTwitter.   Chizvarwa chekuIrish ichi chakanyora kuti, “Pfungwa dzangu uye rukudzo ndinorupa kuna145lb champion Max ‘Blessed’ Holloway”.   Zvakarakidza kuti Holloway akatenda zvikuru nerutsigiro rwaakawana izvo zvakazomutuma kutenda vatsigiri vake paInstagram ndokuvatumira mashoko aya.   “Ndizvo zviripo uye ndizvo zvatave kutoita. Rukudzo rukuru kunaOrtega nechikwata chake. Ndinokutendai mese vatinoshanda navo nekukoshesa hutano hwangu.   “Ndiri kukuonai mese. Kune vatsigiri ndinoziva kuti rwendo urwu runorwadza harwo asi ndinoziva kuti chikwata change chiri kushanda nesimba panyaya yacho.   “Chandinokwanisa kutaura inyaya yekuti ndine hurombo hukuru uye ndinovimba kuti ndichadzoka zvakasimba mumutambo uyu manje-manje, handisati ndapera ndicho chokwadi,” anodaro. — SportsMail UFC

headline: HATITYE SRI LANKA: GEMS
text: ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHARARE KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems — Perpetual Siyachitema — anoti vacharwa semvumba uye vanoda kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup ayo ari kuitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti maGems achatamba nemwoyo wose kuti vagohwina mitambo yavo vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvikuru zviri kumakwishu aya.   MaGems ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Australia — iyo inove shasha ine mukombe wenetball — Sri Lanka neNorthen Ireland.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko musi weChishanu chino apo chichasangana neSri Lanka kunhandare yeM&S Bank Arena kuLiverpool Court Two.   Mushure mezvo, maGems achazosangana neAustralia musi weMugovera ozopedzisira neNorthen Ireland musi weSvondo.   Siyachitema anoti kubva zvavakasvika kuEngland, vange vachiongorora mitambo yeSri Lanka iyo yavachasangana navo mumutambo wekutanga ndokuona kuti vatambi vayo varefu zvikuru kusiyana navo sezvo vakati pfupikei.   “Takaongorora chikwata cheSri Lanka, chine vatambi varefu zvikuru kudarika isu asi murairidzi wedu akatsvaga nzira dzekuti tinogona kuvakunda sei.   “Zvekureba kwavo hatisi kuzozvitarisa uye hazvireve kuti vachatikunda, isu ticharwa semvumba mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Isu senyika pasi rese tiri pechi13 pakutamba netball saka kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup tiri kuda kurwa zvakasimba totamba sechikwata kuti tirpedze tiri mutop 8.”   Achitaura pamusoro perutsigiro rwavakawana kubva kumakambani akasiyana anosanganisira Simbisa Brands, Econet, National Foods nemamwe, Siyachitema anoti zvakavasimudzira morari yavo uye zvave kuvatuma kuti vashande nesimba kumakwishu aya.   “Tinotenda zvikuru makambani ese akatibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu rureruke kuenda kumakwishu aya, zvaisava nyore kudai vasipo saka tinotenda zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwatawana rwaunza mufaro kwatiri isu vanasikana veZimbabwe uye zvave kutituma kuti titambe nesimba kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Pazvikwata zvese zvemuAfrica, maGems ari kumakwishu aya nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti South Africa, Uganda neMalawi.   Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti vasikana vemaGems vacharwa vamire mumitambo yavo.   Kubva kare, zvikwata zvizhinji zvaikwikwidza kumakwishu epasi rose akasiyana hazvina kumbobvira zvauya nemukombe izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa nechikwata chemaGolden Girls icho chakahwina menduru yegoridhe kumaOlympics mugore ra1980.   Asi, Chipandu anoti rwendo rwuno zviri kuzoshanduka.   “Chandinovimbisa ndechekuti hatisi kungoburitswa mumutambo uyu uchangotanga, izvo kwete bodo.   “Vasikana vachatamba kusvika kumagumo uye ndinokuvimbisai kuti tichaunza mufaro mukuru kunyika yedu kubva kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Chipandu.

headline: Caps United Inoti Inoda Kutevera Tsoka dzeMamelodi Sundowns
text:
Mumusha weCaps United hamusi kudaidzwa anonzwa nemhemberero. Mhemberero iri kuenderera mberi mumusha weCaps United mushure mekunge chikwata ichi chakatora mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League kwapera makore gumi nerimwechete vachikundikana. Muridzi weCaps United VaFarai Jere vanoti vatotanga kutsvaga mari yekutamba mumakundano emuAfrica egore rinouya eCaf Champions League. VaJere vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuita zvakaitwa neMamelodi Sundowns yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu gore rino. Vatsigiri vechikwata ichi havasi kudaidzwa vachinzwa nemufaro mushure mekutora mukombe wakakosha uyu mumwe wavo VaFadzai Muchichwa vachiti nguva yanga yarebesa vasina kumbofara. Caps United yakapedza iine mapoinzi makumi matanhatu nematatu, maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum mushure mekurova Chapungu 1-0 mumutambo wavo wekugumisira kuAscot Stadium nemugovera. Mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaMisheck Mwayera vanoti varikufara zvikuru nezvakaitika izvi mushure memakore anodarika gumi vchitatarika Murairidzi wemaGreen Machina Lloyd Chitembwe anoti nguva yakadai inofadza zvikuru zvekuti ari kufara kuve mumwe wemhuri iri kupemberera kubudirira kwavo. Chitembwe ndiye aimbova mutambi wekutanga weCaps United kutora mukombe weLigi achirairidza chikwata ichi. Cricket Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaChevrons nemusi weSvondo chakadamburwa neSri Lanka nemawiketsi matanhatu mufainari yeTri-Series iyo yaisanganisirawo West Indies Chikwata ichi chakanyadzisa zvikuru zvekuti mutambi wavo aive nemaranzi akawanda, Tarisai Musakanda, akakwanisa kukanda makumi matatu nematanhatu chete. ushure mekushandisa vatambi vavo vese, Zimbabwe yakakwanisa maranzi zana nemakumi matanhatu (160) ayo asina kutorera Sri Lanka nguva kudarika. Vashanyi veSri Lanka ava vakasvitsa maranzi zana nemakumi matanhatu nemana (164) vakasara vachiri nemawiketsi matanhatu mumaoko. Izvi zvirikuratidza kuti murairidzi mutsva wemaChevrons, Heath Streak ane mutoro mukuru mukuedza kuvandudza chikwata chake. Embed



share







Nyaya Ina Michael Kariati


by VOA

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kusambunyikidza Kodzero dzeVana Vanozvarwa Nesikarudzi Mbiri Dzakasiyana
text: Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira mhuri kuti dzitsvagire vana vanozvarwa vaine sikarudzi mbiri yechirumene neyechidzimai kana kuti intersex kuti vatsvagire vana ava rubatsiro nekukukurumidza kuti vakwanisewo kugara hupenyu sevamwe pasina kutya. Mukuru werime sangano rinomirira kodzero dzevane masikarudzi maviri reIntersex Community Trust of Zimbabwe, Amai Tsitsi Ndambambi vanoti varikushanda nevanhu makumi mana, vanosanganisira vana vacheche avo vakazvarwa vaine nhengo mbiri dzakasiyana. Vanotungamira rimwe sangano rekodzero dzevanhu ava reTransSmart, Amai Gumisai Bonzo vatsinhirawo vachiti vakatanga kushanda nemaIntersex mushure mokunge avo vaimbove Senator wekuBuhera, muchakabvu Rejoyce Timire vakazivisa nezvemhuri dzaiva nevana vakazvarwa vaine sikarudzi mbiri vazhinji vacho vanosarurwa. Amai Bonzo vapa mufananidzo wemwanakomana akatovhiringika pfugwa nokuti akararama hupenyu hwekuvharirwa mumba, uye akambosekwa naana mukoti vaisanzwisisa nezvedambudziko iri izvo zvakatozotadzisa kuti aenderere mberi nekurapwa mamwe matenda aimunetsa kuchipatara chemudunhu reBuhera. Vaenderera mberi vachitiwo dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano hadzisi kunzwisisawo enzvedambudziko iri. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Norman Matara vati kunyangwe vasati vasangana nemunhu ane dambudziko iri, nyaya iyi inokwanisa kugadziriswa nekuvhiya pobviswa imwe nhengo kazhinji inenge isina kunyatsokura zvakakwana. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vaudza Studio 7 kuti oparesheni iyi inotora nguva yakareba uye inodhura. Doctor Labode vanoti panotangwa paitwa ongororo dzakawandisa oparesheni iyi isati yaitwa vakatiwo vanhu vane sikarudzi mbiri hadzisi ngochani sokufunga kunoitwa a nevamwe vanhu. Ongoro yakaitwa pasi rose nesangano reUnited Nations zvakaonekwa kuti mwana mumwechecte kubva muchiuru chimwechete, anozvarwa aine nhengo mbiri dzesikarudzi dzachirume nechidzimai.

headline: Makambani Akawanda Okundikana Kuvhura Gore Rino Mamwe Achivharwa?
text: Gore rino rinonzi harina kutanga zvakanaka mumakambani akawanda munyika sezvo mamwe akakundikana kuvhura kana kuti akaderedza huwandu hwevashandi kubva pakatanga gore rino ra2015. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi vemumabhanga reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mabhanga gore rapera chete akarasikirwa nevashandi chiuru chimwe chete kubva muvashandi zviuru zvitanhatu zvaive zviri pamabasa. VaMutasa vanoti gore rino chete vashandi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vatorasikirwa nemabasa zvichitevera kuvhara kwebhanga reAllied Bank. Sangano iri rinotiwo kana nhaurirano dzekuedza kuponesa rimwe bhanga dziri kuitwa dzikakundikana mukati memazuva gumi ari kutevera, zvinenge zvoreva kuti vamwe vashandi zana nemakumi matatu vanenge vorasikirwa nemabasa avo zvakare. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanotiwo dambudziko rekurasikirwa kwevanhu nemabasa harina kubata mabhanga chete asi kuti rakabata makambani ose ari kutatarika. VaChitambara vanoti dambudziko guru ndere kushaikwa kwemari iri kutenderera munyika, uye kusajeka kwemitemo yezvemabhizimusi. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinotiwo hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo yemabasa huri kuda kuitwa nehurumende huchatoita kuti vashandi vakawanda varasikirwe nebasa sezvo huchipa vashandirwi masimba ekupinza kana kuburitsa munhu basa paanodira. No media source currently available

headline: Ongororo Yakaitwa neHofisi yaAmai Chiri Inoti Makanzuru Ari Kutadza Kuita Mabasa Awo neMazvo
text: Mukuru wehofisi yaComptroller and Auditor- General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vanoti makanzuru emaguta nemadhorobha akawanda munyika haasi kuita basa nemazvo akaita sekutakura marara nekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Gwaro rakaburitswa nehofisi iyi rinoratidza kuti makunzuru akawanda munyika ari kuita basa asingatevedze mitemo inobata mashandiro emakanzuru aya. Gwaro iri rinoitwo pamusoro pekusatevedza mitemo, makanzuru aya ari kutadza kuita basa nemazvo. GWaro iri rinoti kanzuru yeChitungwiza iri kungopa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba nemabhizimisi pasina mvura, migwagwa nezvimwe zvinodiwa kuvepo nzvimbo isati yavakwa. Kanzuru yeMasvingo inonzi inogaya 30 megalitres dzemvura pazuva asi guta iri richida 48 mega litres pazuva. Kanzuru yeMutare inonzi haiendesi kubhanga mari yese yainowana uye kuGweru makanzura anonzi haasati abhadhara masitendi aakapihwa nemutengo uri pasi pasi kunyange hazvo aisungirwa kunge akabhadhara masitendi aya. Zvimwewo zvakawonekwa inyaya yekuti midziyo inenge yatengwa nemakunzuru inotora gore kana kudarika isati yaendeswa kumakanzuru aya. Sachigaro weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakarre vari meya veGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero aAuditor-General, asi vakati zvimwe zvacho zvakatogadziriswa. Asi VaMakombe vati nyaya yekupa vanhu mvura yakakwana nekutakura marara inonetsa kugadzirisa nekuti havasi kuwana rutsigro rwakakwana kubva kuhurumende. Vati mafuta emotokari dzekutakura marara anotengeswa nemari yekunze asi ivo vachibhadharisa mitero nemari yemunyika. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vakapihwa mvumo yekuti vagari vanoda vabhadhare mitero nemari yekunze, hakuna vari kuita izvi nekuti simba remari yekunze rakadzikira mumabhanga kana zvichienzaniswa nepamukoto. Vati nekuda kwaizvo vanhu vanochinja mari yavo pamukoto vobhadhara mitero kumakunzuru nemari yema RTGS. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira vagari vemuMasvingo, Amai Rumbidzao Mugurupira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro raAG raburitsa pachena zvavanogaro taura kuti hapana chinobatika chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuratidza kuti vari kubhadhara mitero. Sachigrao veHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuvandudza bumbiro remitemo yenyika kuitira kuti makanzuru akwanise kushanda akasanunguka. Vati pari zvino pane kupindira kunoitwa nehurumencde uko kunokanganisa makunzuru aya. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Vachitaura mushure mekutambira mabhajeti emakanzuru aya gore rino vasina kuaderedza, VaMoyo vakati vainge vaita izvi nekuti vaida kuti makanzuru aya awane mari yekuti akwanise kuita mabasa akaita sekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nekutakura marara nguva dzose. VaMoyo vakatiwo vanotarisira kuti makanzuru achashandisa mari dzekuvandudzwa kwematunhu kana kuti Devolution kusimudzira magariro evanhu. Asi VaMakombe vati makanzuru akatomirira mari idzi nemaziso matsvuku kubva kuhurumende, sezvo asati apihwa mari idzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaChombo Vanosungwa neZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission
text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaIgnatius Chombo, vamiswa pamberi pedare zvakare neChina vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita huori pamwe nekutambira chiokomuhomwe. VaChombo vakasungwa neChitatu neZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, vachipomerwa mhosva kuita zvehuori apo vaive gurukota rezvematunhu. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaEdmore Nyazamba, vaudza dare kuti VaChombo vakaita huori pakugariswa kwakaitwa vanhu pane rimwe purazi pasi pechirongwa chehurumende cheOperation Garikai/Hlalani kuhle. Va Nyazamba vati VaChombo vakatambirawo chiokomuhomwe pakutengeswa kweimwe imba kuNorton. Gweta raVaChombo, VaLovemore Madhuku, vatsinhira zvataurwa mudare naVaNyazamba pamhosva dziri kupomerwa VaChombo. "VaChombo vakasungirwa nyaya ine chekuita nechirongwa che Garikayi pazviri kunzi vakaita zvehuori. Hurumende iri kuti pane zvavakaita zvisiri pamutemo maererano nenzvimbo yakazogariswa vanhu," VaMadhuku vadaro. VaMadhuku vakumbirawo dare kuti VaChombo vatongwe vachibva kumba pasi pe mari yechibatiso yavakabvisa pamhosva yekutanga muchikumbiro chavakasvitsa kudare repamusoro. Mutongi wedare, Amai Rumbidzai Mugwagwa, vati VaChombo vadzoke kudare musi wa8 Ndira. VaChombo vakapambwa nemasoja pakapindira masoja munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. Vakazomiswa mudare mushure memazuva akati kuti vave kupomerwa mhosva dzekuita huori pamwe nekushandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo. Pari zvino Va Chombo vari kuzvipira kumapurisa katatu pazuva mushure mekusiya magwaro emba yavo pamwe nepasipoti yavo kudare. No media source currently available

headline: Chivandire onorwa kuZambia
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Kudakwashe “Take Money” Chivandire, osimbaradza gadziriro dzake dzemutambo uyo uchamuona achizosangana naCathrine Phiri wekuZambia apo vacharwira bhande reWorld Boxing Council (WBC) super-bantam weight iro risina munhu pari zvino.   Vatambi vaviri ava vachasangana nemusi wa29 Ndira uye Chivandire ari kuita gadziriro dzake akatarisana nemutambo uyu.   Maneja waChivandire, Clyde Musonda, uyo anovazve murairidzi wake, anoti vave kusimbaradza gadziriro dzaChivandire kutanga musi wa3 Ndira.   “Take Money haana kumbobvira awana zororo, zvekuti paKirisimasi chaipo tange tichishanda naye tichigadzirira mutambo wake watakatarisana nawo. Mazuva anoita kunge achiri kure asi chokwadi ndechekuti hapasisina nguva.   “Mutambo uyu mukuru kuna Chivandire uye tiri kuda kuti ahwine bhande iri aite mutambi wetsiva wekutanga kubata bhande guru seiri kubva muZimbabwe,” anodaro.   Musonda anoti Chivandire ange achiita gadziriro dzake achibva kumba asi kutanga nemusi wa3 Ndira, achange ave kugara ega achisimbaradza gadziriro idzi asingasangane neveruzhinji kusvika azoenda kuZambia kumutambo uyu.   Anoti vari kutora danho iri nechinangwa chekudzivirira kuti mutambi uyu asatapurirwe chirwere cheCovid-19 uyezve nekuti pfungwa dzake dzinge dzichingofunga nezvemutambo wake chete.   “Kutanga svondo rinotevera, Kuda achabva kumba kwake achinogara paachange achiita gadziriro dzake. Hatidi kuti asangane neveruzhinji achifamba paanenge achiuya kuzoita gadziriro dzake. Achazongobva chete musi waanoenda kuZambia, iye zvino tiri kumbomuvharira toshanda naye tichinyatsomubika zvakasimba,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Mutambi Takaidza otarisa mberi
text: SHASHA yenetball inotambira maGems uye neOlympic Dam yekuAustralia – Joice Takaidza – anoti vatambi vemutambo uyu vemuno vanofanirwa kuzvibata kana vachida kusvika kure.   Takaidza – uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakaita rombo rakanaka rekuwana mukana wekutambira kunze kwenyika pamwechete naAdelaide Thandeka Muskwe uyo anotambira Seven Stars yekuEngland – anoti kuzvibata kwakakosha zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   “Kuzvibata kunodiwa, hapana kwaunoenda kana usina kuzvibata uye zvese zvinotariswa kwese kwaunoenda kunogadzirira mitambo.   “Saka ndinoti kune vamwe vatambi vemaGems rambai muchizvibata muchiziva basa renyu,” anodaro Takaidza.   Shasha iyi ichatanga kutamba netball, yakambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Gathsmine, Renaissance neZDF Queens uye nechikwata chenyika ichi.   Asi akazosiya mutambo uyu paakaenda kunogara kunyika yeAustralia nemurume wake uko akange awana basa. Takaidza anoti aive asingade zvekuramba achitamba netball asi murume wake ndiye akazotaurira vanhu kubasa kwake kuti mudzimai wake inyanzvi chaiyo yemutambo uyu zvakazoita kuti atange kutamba zvakare.   “Pandakaenda kuAustralia, ndakamboda kuhwanda ndisingade kuzivikanwa kuti ndinotamba netball asi murume wangu ndiye akazoudza vanhu kubasa kwake kuti ndaitambira nyika yangu, ndokutanga kudzoka kwandakaita mumutambo uyu. Mwanasikana wangu ane makore 11 okuberekwa anonzi Tatenda akatanga kurakidzawo rudo rwemutambo uyu saka ndakaona kuti ndinofanirwa kuramba ndichitamba uye ndichimudzidzisawo kuti asimukire.   “Zvinonakidza kuti auye achindiona ndichitamba uye iniwo ndoenda kunomuonawo achitamba, kuAustralia anotamba netball nebasketball. Ishasha muchikwata cheAustralia Under-13 chebasketball apa iye ane makore 11 chete ekuberekwa,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Shuviro yangu kuti nditambe imwe World Cup uye ndiri kuzozviita mugore ra2023 nekuti ndichiri kuzvinzwa kuti zvichirimo mandiri. Kunze uku kwanaka kutambira nekuti pakaita mutemo mutsva unenge wauya ndimi munotanga kuziviswa kana kudzidziswa nezvazvo saka kunotibatsira kukura sevatambi. Saka ndinoti kune vamwe vemaGems shandai nesimba mugouya kuzotambirawo kunze kwenyika nekuti kunokubatsirai kukura sevatambi.”

headline: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVakapondwa muNguva yeGukurahundi Vosungwa paZuva reKubatana kweZanu PF nePF Zapu
text: Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoto vanhu vatatu vesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevane hama dzakafa kana kukuvadzwa munguva yeGukurahundi reIbhetshu Likazulu vacharara mujeri nhasi. ZLHR yanyora padandemutande rayo reTwitter kuti vatatu ava vasungwa pedyo nechiumbwa chamushakabvu Joshua Nkomo vakanzi vatyora weCrimina; Code vachinzi vainge vachida kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo. Vange vakatakura chinyorwa chakanzu, “The power of the memory & seeking justice & healing enf Genocide off Gukurahundi” Mapurisa ange afumobata jongwe muromo achirambidza vanhu kuungana pedyo nechiumbwa ichi. VaMbuso Fuzwayo, munyori mukuru wesangano reIbhetshu Likazulu vatenda kuti vanhu vatatu vasungwa pachirongwa chavo chanhasi ichi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Asi mumwe mukuru wemapurisa ange achitungamira chiwakata chemapurisa chamisa chiitiko ichi uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Inspector Dube ati ange asingadi kuti vanhu vaungane nekuti hurongwa hwange huchida kuitwa uhu hwange husina kubvumidzwa nemapurisa. Studio 7 yaona gwaro rinoratidza kuti veIbhetshu Likazulu vakanyorera mapurisa sezvinodiwa pamutemo asi vakarambidzwa kuti vasaite gungano iri. Vanhuwo zvavo nevamwe vange vachida kutorwa mifananidzo pachiumbwa chamushakabvu Nkomo pamwe nevatori venhau vange vachiita basa ravo vanosanganisira veStudio 7, vaudzwa nemapurisa aya kuti vabve panzvimbo iyi zvisinei kuti vange vaine magwaro avo ekuita basa, zvinove zvashorwa nemumwe mutori wenhau Lulu Brenda Harris uyo anoshandira bepanhau repadandemutande reCITE. Mutungamiri wesangano reZINASU VaBenoni Ncube avo vati vange vauya kuzopa rutsigiro rwavo pachiitiko ichi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvaitwa nemapurisa zvinoratidza kuti hurumende haizi kuzadzikisa zvainoreva panyaya yeGukurahundi. Munyori webato reZAPU mudunhu reBulawayo avo vakarwawo hondo yerusununguko vari pasi pemauto eZIPRA VaVivian Siziba vatiwo zvaitwa nemapurisa zvinoratidza kuti hapana kubatana kwechokwadi munyika. Asi vachitaura munguva pfupi yapfuura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vati ivo nehurumende yavo vaive vazvipira kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. Nyaya yekurambidza vanhu murunyararo iri kushorwa neAfrican Commission On Human and People’s Rights negungano reUnited Nations. Masangano aya anoti kuratidzira murunyararo ikodzero iri mubumbiro remutemo wenyika uye Zimbabwe yakanyorerana nenyika dzepasi rino zvibvumirano zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeKutemerwa Zvirango neBritain kweVanodzivirira Nyika Yokonzera Mutauro
text: Mumavhiki maviri anotevera, sangano reEuropean Union riri kutarisirwa kuti rizeye zvekare nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vari kutarisirwawo mukutanga kwaKurume kuti vazeyewo zvakare kuti vowedzera here kana kuti kwete zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi semunongedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka, hurumende yeBritain yakatemera zvirango gurukota rezvevasori, VaOwen Ncube, mukuru wevasori, VaIsaac Moyo, vaive mutungamiri wemauto ePresidential Guard uye vave mumiriri weZimbabwe kuTanzania, VaAnselem Sanyatwe, pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa, VaGodwin Matanga. Vana ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuva nechekuita nekupfurwa kwevanhu gumi nevanomwe vairatidzira kukwira kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari muna 2019. Asi zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru ava zvinoshanda here uye zvii zvingaitwe kuti zvibviswe? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vatungamiri venyika vanofanira kugadzirisa hukama nevanhu vemuZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuremekedza kodzero dzavo. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF vakambotungamira bato rinopikisa reDARE, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti Britain haina kodzero yekutemera Zimbabwe zvirango nekuti haisi iyo United Nations. No media source currently available

headline: Mutori weNhau, Tawanda Gudhlanga, Ashaya nehirwere cheCovid-19
text: Vatori venhau munyika voita misodzi pamatama zvakare zvichitevera kushaya kwemumwe wavo, uyo anonzi atorwa nedenda reCovid 19. Pasina kana mazuva akawanda vatori venhau vabva kuradzika mumwe wavo, muzvinambiri munyaya dzekutora nhau, Sandra Nyaira, uyo akamboshandira Studio7 kwemakore gumi nemaviri, mumwe mutori wenhau ange ane mukurumbira munyika, Tawanda Gudhlanga, ashaya zvakare nechirwere che Covid 19 nhasi mangwanani. Kushaya kwaGudhlanga kwaziviswa neshamwari yake, Nigel Nyamutumbu, padandemutande rake eTwitter nhasi mangwanani. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vatori venhau munyika, reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaMichael Chideme, vati vatori venhau varwadziwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaGudhlanga misodzi yavo yekuchema Nyaira, isati yambowoma. Munyori musangano reYoung Journalists Association of Zimbabwe, VaLeopold Munhende, vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti isawanze misangano inoita kuti vatori venhau vange varipo vachiti hurumende yave kufanira ushandisa humhizha hwechimanjemanje kuitira kuderedza mikana yekuti vatori venhau vasangane nevari muhurumende senzira yekuderedza mikana yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid 19. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, havana kunge vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira uye mutevedzeri wavo VaKindness Paradza vati titaure nemunyori mubazi ravo VaNick Mangwana avo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi VaMangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti varwadziwa nekufa kwaGudhlanga vakati chiri kunyanyorwadza ndechekuti nyika iri kuramba ichirasikirwa nevatori venhau vane mukurumbira. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube vaburitsa mashoko ekuti vachatura hurongwa hweMid Term Budget and Economic Review svon do rinouya vachishandisa humhizha hwechimanje-manje nechikonzero chekupararira kwedenda reCovid 19. Mutungamiri weMedia Istitute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, avo varatidzawo kushushikana nekufa kwaGudhlanga, vatiwo dai makambani enhau aonawo kuti vatapi venhau vanovashandira vave vashoma munzvimbo dzavanoshandira uye vane zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kuchirwere cheCovid 19. Mupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, VaBarnabas Thondlana vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vabaiwe nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid 19 uye kuti vashandire kudzimba dzavo. Gudhlanga, uyo ange ave nemakore makumi mana nerimwe chete ekuberekwa, ange ave maneja wenhepfenyuro yeYaFM kuZvishavane. Gudhlanga akamboshandira makambani enhau anoti ZBC-TV achitepfenyura chirongwa chinonzi Business Forum, uye akashandirawo nhepfenyuro yeClassic263 pamwe neSport FM. Muna 2017, Gudhlanga akapihwa mubayiro wekuva munhu akakunda vamwe vese munyika pakutepfenyura parhedhiyo mumakundano eNational Arts Merit Awards. Kusvika pari zvino, vatori nenhau vashanu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachakapinda munyika. Vatori venhau ava vanoti Zororo Makamba, uyo akave wekutanga kutorwa nechirwere ichi, aive munyori mukuru weZUJ, Foster Dongozi, mutapi wenhau weZBC, Janet Munyaka, Sandra Nyaira pamwe naGudhlanga. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi yeHutano hwePfungwa Yokurudzira Kutsigirwa kweVarwere vePfungwa neVehukama
text: Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa inoti zvakakosha chose kuti vanhu vane dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa vapiwe rutsigiro nevanhu vari pedyo navo kuitira kuvabatsira kuti vakwanise kurarama munharaunda dzavagere. Doctor William Guri, avo vanoshanda neboka rezvehutano hwepfungwa kuvana vadiki kuBritain, vanoti basa ravo ndere kupa rutsigiro muzvikoro, kuvana, kuvadzidzisi nekuvabereki, nechinangwa chekuti vana vakwanise kuwana rutsigiro vachiri vadiki kuitira kuti vazokura vakasimba muhutano hwavo hwepfungwa. Doctor Guri vanoti basa rehutano hwepfungwa rinogona kuonekwa nevamwe sebasa risina kukosha, asi ibasa rakaskosha kwazvo rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nedzihurumende pamwe neveruzhinji. Vanoti pane zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti munhu arware nepfungwa, zvinosanganisira kuomerwa nehupenyu, hurwere hweshuramatongo hweHIV/AIDS, kana kushaya basa chaiko. Doctor Guri vanotiwo ongororo dzavari kusanganawo nadzo dziri kuratidza kuti chirwere chiriko iye zvino ichi che Covid-19, chiri kukonzerawo zvakare kuti vanhu vakanganiswe hutano hwepfungwa kuburikidza nekugara vanhu vakavharirwa mudzimba vasingasangane nevamwe kungava kumabasa, kunzvimbo dzekudyira, kana kumitambo. Vanotiwo murwere weCovid-19 kana akasashanyirwa kuchipatara nehama neshamwari, anogona kukanganisika pfungwa zvakare. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoti Vanoda Ruzivo Pamusoro peNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vagari vemuHarare vakawanda vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti kwave nenhomba yokudzivirira chirwere cheCovid 19, vazhinji vavo vanoti havasi kunyatsonzwisisa nezvemushonga uyu. Mumwe mugari wemuguta, VaAlbert Mwaengepi, vanoti kunynage hazvo gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakapaiwa chibaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm veruzhinji vachizviona, kutambirika kwenhomba iyi kuchanetsa muvanhu vakawanda munyika. Mutori wenhau, Henry Munjanja,anotiwo haasi kuzobaiwa nhomba iyi nechikonzero chokuti mushonga uyu wakangoerekana wamhara nendege pasina kana chenjedzo yokudzidzisa kana kuzivisa veruzhinji kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda sei. Asi nhengo yesangano reThe Aids and Arts Fondation, VaEmmaunel Gasa, vanoti vari kufara chaizvo nenyaya yenhomba yeCovid 19 yave munyika. Asi VaGasa vanoti zvainge zvakanaka zvikuru dai nhomba iyi yakatanga yaongororwa nenyanzvi dzehutano dzemunyika isati yabaiwa veruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wekuArdbernie, Amai Nakisai Murenje, vanoti vakakurudzirwa nehama neshamwari dziri mhiri kwemakungwa avo vakatobaiwa nhomba dzokudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19, asi vanoti kutambirika kwenhomba yeSinopharm munyika kuchanetsa kana hurumende isina kupa veruzhinji mashoko akakwana ezvemashandiro emushonga uyu. Asi mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Robert Mudyiradima, vanoti pane hurongwa hwekushambadzira zvakadzama chirongwa chenhomba yeSinopharm kumativi mana enyika. Zimbabwe yakagamuchira neMuvhuro wapfuura nhomba dzinosvika mazana maviri ezviuru dzayakapihwa neChina pachena kuitira kuti ibaye vanhu kuitira kuti vazvidzivirire kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Zimbabwe iri kutarisira kuwana mwedzi unouya imwe nhomba inosvika mazana matanhatu ezviuru iyo yakatenga kukambani yekuChina ye Sinopharm. Hurumende inoti inotarisira kubaya vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeEconet Group Yotungamira Mukubatsira Vakawirwa neTsaona yeCyclone Idai
text: Kambani yenharembozha, yeEconet Group, inoti yatumirawo michina yechizvinozvino, yema drone, pamwe nezvikopokopo nezvikepe kuti zvibatsire mukutsvagwa kwevanhu vakashaya mutsaona yedutumupengo Cyclone Idai pamwe nevachiri vapenyu kuManicaland. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muEconet Group, VaFungai Mandiveyi, vanoti kambani yavo yakakwanisawo zvakare kubatsira nemabhokisi ekuvigisa vafi anosvika makumi mashanu, pamusoro pezvimwe zvakawanda zvairi kubatsira nazvo mutsaona yemafashamu iyi, zvinosanganisira mari. "Ma drone tagara tichiashandisa mubasa redu kuona kuti michina yedu yakamira zvakanaka here kana kuti yave kuda kugadziriswa. Asi takaona kuti tinogona kuashandisawo mukutsvaga vakapona mutsaona iyi. Ma drone ari nani pane zvikopokopo nedzimwe nguva nekuti anogona kupinda pasingakwanisi kupindwa nechikopokopo, uye anogona kubhururuka ari pasi chaizvo." VaMandiveyi vanoti kambani yavo iri kurwisawo kuti masaisai awanikwe munzvimbo idzi kuburikidza nekugadzira michina yavo yakarohwa nedutumupengo iri. Vanoti vari kubatsirawo nekupa makadhi ekufonesa kana kuti air time kuvanhu vari mumapoka akasiyanasiyana vari kushanda mukubatsira kutsvagwa kwevanhu, kuvhura migwagwa, nemamwe mabasa. Econet ine vanhu vari kubatsira vakawanda, uye yakatovhura muzinda wayo wekusvikira rubatsiro uyo uri maMutare. Vamwe vevari kubatsira ndavanachiremba. Kambani iyi yazivisawo kuti yabatana neAir Zimbabwe mukutakurwa kwerubatsiro kubva kuvanhu vari kuVictoria Falls neBulawayo kuenda kuHarare uko rubatsiro urwu rwunozorongedzwa rwusati rwananga kwaMutare kwarwunozosusukidzwa kuenda kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata zvehandball hutu kuZambia
text: ZVIKWATA zviviri zvemutambo wehandball mumapoka anoti Under18 ne21 svondo rino zvakaenda kuLusaka, kuZambia uko zviri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yeAfrica Zone 6 International Handball Federation Challenge Trophy.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwira matikiti ekuzoenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo mikuru yevechidiki ichaitirwa kuMacedonia kozoti yevakuru iyo ichaitirwa kuSpain gore rino.   Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Handball Association, Edson Chirowodza, anoti zvikwata zvavo zvicharwa sebvumba kuti zvigokwanisa kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Uyu mukana mukuru wezvikwata zvedu kuti zvigoenda kunokwikwidza kuEurope zvakamirira Africa, saka takagadzirira nepatinokwanisa napo kuti tigohwina.   “Tinovimba zvikuru kuti svondo rino ticharwa semvumba tigosimudza mukombe nekuti hakuna zvimwe zvatiri kutsvaga kunze kwekuhwina chete,” anodaro Chirowodza.   Mutambo uyu une zvikwata zvisere izvo zvakaiswa mumapoka maviri anoti Group A neB uye chikwata cheZimbabwe chevechidiki cheU19 chakaiswa muboka rine zvimwe zvinosanganisira Madagascar, Lesotho neSeychelles kozoti chevakuru chiri muGroup A zvakare umo mune Madagascar, South Africa neSwaziland.

headline: Vashandi Vanoti Vari Kubatwa Kwiyo paChirongwa cheGEMS
text: Zvichitevera kuparurwa kwehomwe yevashandi vehurumende yekuchengeta mari, yeGovernment Employees Mutual Savings Fund (GEMS), iyo yakaumbwa muna Kukadzi gore rapfuura, vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanoti havasi kufara nezvakaitwa nehurumende pamusoro penyaya iyi. Hurumende inoti homwe iyi ichange ichipindwa nevashandi vanoda zvavo uye vashandi ava vachange vachibatirwa zvikamu zviviri nezviga zvishanu kubva muzana, kana kuti 2.5% yemuhoro mwedzi wega wega. Hurumende inoti chinangwa chehomwe iyi ndechekubatsira vashandi vachiri pamabasa neavo vave pamudyandigere. Asi rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) rinoti vashandi havana kuudzwa zvakakwana kana kubvunzwa pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. Sangano iri rinotiwo harifari nemabatiro anoitwa mari dzevashandi nehurumende. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti vashandi vaifanirwa kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo pachirongwa ichi chisati chaumbwa. VaMasarure vanotiwo panotanga chirongwa ichi, mushandi wese anobatirwa mari inoenda kuhomwe iyi. Kana achida kuramba ari nhengo anongozvisiya zvakadaro. Asi kana mushandi asingadi kuva muchirongwa ichi, anomanikidzwa kunyorera kuhomwe iyi achiti haasi kuti kupinda muchiri panguva iyo mari yake inenge ichibatwa nehurumende kudzamara homwe iyi yamubvisa muchirongwa ichi. Tatadza kubata gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, uye vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo, asi taita hurukuro naVaMasaraure. No media source currently available

headline: VaTemba Mliswa Vochengetedzwa neMapurisa kuEsigodini
text: Mutungamiri wesangano reYouth Advocacy for Reform and Democracy kana kuti YARD VaTemba Mliswa vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa kuEsigodini, kuMatabeleland South mushure memusangano wavange varonga. Zvinonzi VaMliswa vasungwa pamwe chete nevamwe vechidiki vesangano ravo vanosvika makumi maviri apo vange vachiita musangano. Kanzura weZanu-PF munzvimbo iyi, VaPatson Sibanda havana kufara nemusangano uyu zvapa kuti vadaidze mapurisa uye vechidiki veZanu-PF. Mutauriri weYARD VaTinotenda Mhungu vaudza VaSibanda kuti pasi pebumbiro remutemo vane kodzero yekuita misangano murunyararo uye vayedza kuvaratidza bumbiro remutemo iri. Asi vati VaSibanda vati havanei nebumbiro remutemo iri sezvo iyi iri nzvimbo yavanotonga. Kuchegetedzwa kwaVaMliswa uku kunouya zuva rimwe chete mushure mekunge vabatana nezviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri veMDC-T zvakaratidzira muguta guru reBulawayo nemusi weMugovera zvichiti hazvisi kufara nematongero emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Pakuratidzira uku, VaMliswa vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vabvunze Zanu-PF kuti mari yemangoda inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yakaendepi. VaMugabe mbune ndivo vakaudza nyika kuti mari iyi yainge yatsakatika. VaMliswa vakati mari iyi ikasawanikwa ichashandiswa musarudzo dza2018 neZanu-PF. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mapurisa ekuEsigodini kanawo mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba sezvo nhare dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa.

headline: Hazard asendeka shangu
text: asendeka shangu dzekutambira nyika yake yeBelgium.   Mutambi uyu (31) akasarudza kusatambira nyika yake apo ichange ichirwira kuenda kumutambo we2024 European Championships uye ne2026 World Cup.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita chikwata chake kuWorld Cup kuQatar, Hazard asiya mushure mekutambira nyika yake kwemakore 14 apo ave kutarisira kumutsiridza hupenyu hwake hwenhabvu kuReal Madrid.   “Nhasi ndavhura chimwe chikamu. Ndokutendai nerudo,” Hazard anonyora paInstagram.   “Ndokutendai nerutsigiro rwenyu. Ndinokutendai nenguva yemafaro atakave navo kubva gore ra2008.   “Nhasi ndasarudza kusiya kutambira nyika yangu. Chikwata chitsva chevechidiki chagadzirira. Ndichakusuwai zvikuru.”   Bepanhau rekuBelgium Het Laastest Nieuws rakanyora kuti Hazard akange akurukura nevamwe vaanotamba navo nhabvu kuti anoda kusiya kutambira nyika yake kubva pavakaburitswa kuWorld Cup neCroatia.   Mazuva matanhatu akatevera, Hazard haana kushandura pfungwa dzake sezvo akabva azivisa vanhu 27.2 miriyoni vanomutevera paInstagram.   Matambiro ake muchikwata cheBelgium ange adzikira izvo zvakaona mutambo waakapedzisira kutambira nyika yake kuWorld Cup achipinzwa kwatambwa maminitsi anodarika 87 wave kunopera.   Akatanga kutambira Belgium aine makore 17 okuberekwa mugore ra2008 apo vakatamba neLuxembourg nemusi wa19 Mbudzi, 2008.   Mutambi uyu, uyo aimbove kuChelsea, akakwanisa kutambira nyika yake ka126, ndokunwisa ka33 uye achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka36.   Hazard akatungamira Belgium ari kaputeni mumitambo 56. – SportsMail Football

headline: ZRP Inoti Mari Yayakapihwa muBhajeti naVaNcube Haikwane Kutenga Pfuti, Hutsi Hunokatyidza neZvimwe
text: Mubhajeti risati ratambirwa nedare reparamende kana kuti budget proposal ravakatura vhiki rapera, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakapa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kana kuti ZRP mari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emunyika kana kuti 60 billion dollars ekuita mabasa. Asi vakuru vemapurisa vanoti kuti vakwanise kuita zvavanotarisirwa kuita, vanoda mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 580 billion yemunyika.  Mumwe mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa achiona nezvevashandi, Deputy Commissioner General (Human Resources) VaElliot Ngirandi, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti ZRP mari yavari kunzi vapihwe kana bhajeti rikatambirwa nedare iri ishoma zvikuru pane zvavange vachitarisira.  Semuenzaniso, vatiwo vaida mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri emadhora kana kuti 420 billion pamabasa akasiyana siyana akafanana nekutenga zvombo, motokari nezvimwe zvikwanisiro asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri emadhora emunyika chete kaba kuti 12, 6 billion. VaNgirandi vati vaida mari inosvika makumi mashanu emabhiriyoni kana kuti 50 billion doallrs kuti vakwanise kuendesa mapurisa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana siyana. Vati mapurisa anoenda kubasa asina mari yekubatsirikana kana kuti maallowances vakatiwo mapurisa ari kushandisa mbozhanhare dzavo pachinhambo chekushandisa zviovha zvepabasa. VaNgirandi vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vane vanenge vari muhusungwa kuzvitokisi havawani chekafu. Vatiwo kana zvipatara nemakirinika zveeZRP hazvina mishonga uyewo vaida mabhiriyoni matanhatu ekutenga mishonga asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni maviri chete pabhajeti regore rinouuya. VaNgirandi vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende kubva kukomiti inoona nezvemukati menyika nekomoti yeSeneti inoona nezverunyararo munyika kuti vataure negurukota rezvemari kuti riwedzere mapurisa mari . Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vavimbisa nhengo dzeparamende kuti munyika hamusi kuzoita nyonga nyonga nekuda kwekuti ZRP yakapihwa mari shoma vachiti vakatoudza mutungamiriri wenyika nezvenyaya iyi. Vakumbirawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitaure nebazi rezvemari kuti ripeZRP mvumo yekushandisa mari yefaindi nedzimwe dzainowa vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti mmapurisa awane mari yekushandisa yakakwana.  Zvichakadai mukuru mubazi reCivil Registry, Registrar General, VaHenry Machiri, vaudzawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti bazi ravo harina kuwana mari yaraida mubhajeti vachiti vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi reimwe kana kuti 1, 1 billion chete asi ivo vaida zana remabhiriyoni emadhora kana kuti 100 billion dollars.  VaMachiri vati vashandi vebazi ravo vakatoresa vanhu zvitupa mumatunhu ese munyika pasi pechirongwa cheNational Mobile Registration gore rino havasti vabhadhra. Varatidzawo kusafara nenyaya yekuti havana kupihwa mari yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota zvakare kana Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ichinge yapedzeda kutara miganhu yenzvimbo dzekuvhotera gore rinouya kana kuti Delimitation. VaNhepera vatiwo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kwakashosha uye vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende dzione zvadzingaiite kuti mari yekuita izvi iwanike. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekudzvirirwa kwenyika, VaAlbert Nguluvhe pamwe nasachigaro wekomiti inoona nezverunyararo, VaDavid Parirenyatwa vaudza VaNhepera nevamwe kuti vataure zvinhu zvakakosha zvavanoda kuti zviwedzera mari vachiti zviri pachena kuti hapana mari yakawanda yekupa kuzvirongwa zvese zvabazi ravo.  Pari zvino mapazi ese ehurumende ari kusangana nemakomiti eparamende achitaura kuti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yakawanda zvakadii paramende isati yapasa bhajeti re4.5 trilllion rakaturwa svondo rapfuura. Mapazi ehurumende ainge achida mari inosvika matrillion masere nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 8,7 trillion.

headline: Sangano Rakazvimirira reCOTRAD Rombomiswa Kushanda neHurumende
text: Hurumende yambomisa sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reCommunity Tolerance and Reconciliation Development Trust kuita basa mudunhu reMasvingo ichiti inoda kuongorora kuti inemagwaro ari pamutemo here kuti inge ichishanda munyika. Ve Cotrad vanoti izvi zvine zvematongerwe enyika mukati sezvo sangano ravo ruchita basa rekurwira kodzero dzevanhu uye range richiteverwa kubva muna ndira pakamboita ratidziro yakavharisa nyika. Vachitaura ne Studio 7 VaBrighton Ramusi mushandi weCotrad vati vagamuchira tsamba kubva kuna mudzviti wedunhu reMasvingo VaRay Hove ichivaudza kuti vambomire basa. VaRamusi, avo vakambosungwa nevamwe vashandi vesangano iri muna Ndira vanoti hurumende yagara isingafaire basa ravanoita. Vatiwo zviri kuratidza kuti hurumende iripo haina hutongi hwejekere sezvo ichida kuvhara mikana yekushanda kumasangano anodzidzisa vanhu zvekodzero dzavo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri VaZivanai Muzorodzi vati kumiswa kushanda kwavaitwa kuchakanganisa zvikuru vashandi vavo. VaRamusi vaenderera mberi vachiti nyaya yemagwaro haisiriyo yavari kurambidzirwa sezvo vane gwaro re Notarial Deed of Trust ravakanyoresa kuhurumende muna 2012 rine nhamba dzinoti MA1050/2012. Vanoti uku kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzavo sezvo vachipomerwa mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwe enyika uye vachinzi vanotsigira bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaRamusi vati havasi kuzopeta maoko kodzero dzavo dzichi mbunyikidzwa nekudaro vachaendesa hurumende kumatare. VaHove varamba kutipa chikonzero chavamisira Cotrad basa parunhare vachiti vange vakabatikana apowo gurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira vati vange vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi. Vati tizovafonere asi havana kuzobatika panharembozha yavo. Vanoona nezve matongerwe enyika vakazvimirira VaMasimba Gonese, vati hurumende yatotanga kushungurudza masangano ainofunga kuti anovapikisa. Vati uku ndiko kutanga kwekuvharwa kwemasangano akazvimirira sekuzadzikisa mashoko akataurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuMwenezi. Hurumende inopomera masangano akazvimirira mhosva yekushanda nemapato anopikisa kuda kuipidigure nechisimba. Mugore ra 2013 hurumende yakambovharisa masangano akazvimirira makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe mudunhu reMasvingo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kuremekedza Kodzero dzeVanhu Isati Yatambirwa Kuva Nhengo yeCommonwealth
text: Chikwata chesangano reCommonwealth icho chiri munyika kuongorora kuti Zimbabwe yodzorwa musangano iri here kana kuti kwete, chiri kusangana nehurumende, mapato anopikisa nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika dzinoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nehutongi hwejekerere kuti kuti itambirwe zvakare muCommonwealth. Chikwata chenyika dziri mugungano reCommonwealth chiri munyika chiri kuenderera mberi nehurukuro nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana. Vataura neStudio 7 vakawanda vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti Zimbabwe idzorwere mugungano iri asi inofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. VaTabani Mlambo avo vanogara kuChipinge East, ndemumwe ane muonero uyu. Mukururu wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum iro raita hurukuro nechikwata ichi, Doctor Musa Kika vati vanotsigira kudzokera kweZimbabwe muCommonwelath asi.. Dr Kika vaudza Studio 7 kuti havashamisiki kuti nhengo gumi dzeCitizens Coalition for Change idzo dzange dzave nemwedzi mishanu dzichinyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyanya yadziri kupomerwa yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime dzapihwa mukana uyu nhasi nekuda kwekuti chikwata cheCommonwealth chiri munyika. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haipindire panyaya dzinenge dziri kumatare. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaErnest Mudzengi vati zvakakosha kuti vatori venhau vashande vakasungunuka Commonwealth isati ambundira Zimbabwe. Pari zvino chikwatai ichi chiri kuita musangano neZanu PF uye chiri kutarisirwa kuita hurukuro nemapato eMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora neCCC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWitness Dube, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rinoda chose kuti Zimbabwe ipinde muCommonwealth nekuti iri kurasikirwa zvikuru. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vati bato ravo richazivisa veruzhinhi parimire munguva inotevera. Mukuru mubazi reZanu-PF rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vat Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana kwenyika zvakare vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe ingona kudzorwa muCommonwealth kana pakatariswa nzira dzakashandiswa pakapinda dzimwe nyika dzakaita sana Rwanda. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutungamiriri wechikwata cheCommonwealth Muzvinafundo Luis Franschesci. Asi vachitaura mumusangano wavaakaita negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe, VaFrederick Shava nezuro vakati vachaedza nepavanogona kubatsira Zimbabwe kudzoka muCommonwealth. VaShava vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo asi Studio 7 ine hurukuro yayakaita nemutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba nezvenyaya iyi yatichakupai muzvikamu zvinotevera. VaCharamba vanoti donzvo reZimbabwe ndseekudyidzana nenyika dzose. Vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaburitsa Zimbabwe muCommonwealth mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yambomiswa kuve nhengo yesangano iri ichipomerw mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu muna 2003. Asi zvichitevera kupidigurwa kwehurumende yaVaMugabe, VaMangagwa vakaisa chikumbiro kusangano iri kuti Zimbabwe idzoke izvo zvazoita kuti Commonwealth itumire chikwata ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika Dzozvipira Kuderedza Zvinosvibisa Mweya weKufema
text: Musangano wezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze wechimakumi maviri nenhanhatu kana kuti Cope26 wakapinda muzuva retatu nemusi weChitatu vatungamiri venyika dzakanyanya kutarisana nekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze dzinoti Nigeria, Madagascar neBarbados vachitaura. Musangano unokokerwa neUnited Nations uyu uri kuitirwa kuGlasgow, Scotland. Asi neChipiri vatungamiri venyika zana vari kumusangano uyu kusanganisira VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaJoe Biden vekuAmerica, VaBoris Johnson, Britain vakatsidza kuzvipira kuti nyika dzavo dzidzikisa zvakanyanya zvinosvibisa mweya wekufema zvakaita semethane inobuda pakudhonza mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, kutema miti nezvimwe. VaBiden vakavimbisa kudzikisa methane iyi nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana panosvika gore ra2030. Asi vakashora vatungamiri veChina neRussia nekusaenda kumusangano uyu. Nyanzvi mubazi rezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Climate Mitigation Department VaLawrence Mashungu vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumiara zvakanaka nekuda kwekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Vane Makore Gumi neMatanhatu Vave Kukwanisa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Bazi rinoona nezvehutano razkaivisa kuti vechidiki vari pakati pemakore gumi nematanhatu negumi nemanomwe vave kukwanisa kuti vatange kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yemhando yeSinovac. Mugwaro ravo kuvatori venhau bazi rezvehutano rinoti danho iri rakatorwa mushure meongororo dzakaitwa uye nekurudziro kubva kusangano reZimbabwe Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe. Hurumende inoti yazivisa matunhu ose, zvikoro zvepamusoro, pamwe nenzvimbo dzinobayirwa nhomba kuti dzichitange kubaya nhomba vana vemazera aya. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vazhinji havasati vanzwa nezveongororo yakaitwa iyi asi vachiti havo idanho rakanaka chose. Vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ibudise zvakabuda muongoro iyi kuti vashandi mune zvehutano vaite basa vakasununguka uyevo kuti vezvehutano vakwanise kukurudzira vana ava kuti vabaiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.

headline: Vakawanda Vopesana Maonero Pane Zviri Kuitika Kuna VaMugabe
text: Kunyange hazvo mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, pamwe nemutauriri webato ravo reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakaramba mashoko aya vachiti ndeemanyepo, pane vamwe munyika vanooona sekuti pane chokwadi mumashoko aya. Apo bato reZanu PF pamwe nehurumende vari kuramba runyerekupe rwekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kurwara zvakaipisisa vari kune imwe nyika yekumabvazuva, veruzhinji munyika vane maonera akasiyana vamwe vachiti mashoko aya ndeemanyepo sezvo achigaro taurwa nguva ino gore rega rega apo VaMugabe vanenge vari pazororo. Asi vamwe vanoti anogona kunge ari echokwadi sezvo VaMugabe vave mukweguri. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, pamwe nemutauriri webato ravo reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakaramba mashoko aya vachiti ndeemanyepo, pane vamwe munyika vanooona sekuti pane chokwadi mumashoko aya. VaMilton Phiri, avo vanogara kuRugare muHarare, vanoti kunyange hazvo mashoko aya achigaro taurwa panguva ino gore rega mukati memakore mana apfuura, vanoona sekuti izvi zviri kuitika nekuti ndizvo zviri kutarisira veruzhinji. Vamwewo vakaitasaAmai Betty Machana vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vasingashuvire kuti munhu arware, vanhu vemuZimbabwe vatambura zvekuti vamwe vave kufariria runyerekupe urwu. Amai Melody Garaipasi vekuChitungwiza vanoti kunyanage hazvo iyi iri nyaya inogarotaurwa nezvayo nguva nenguva, inyaya inokonzerwa nekuti hurumende neZanu PF haibudi pachena panyaya yezororo raVaMugabe. Vanotiwo hapana chikonzero chekuti mutungamiriri wenyika aende kuzororo muchihwande vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinokonzera kuti vanhu vataure zvese zvese kunyange zvisiri zvechokwadi. Asi murairidzi wezvekutapwa kwenhau pachikoro cheHarare Polytechnic, VaWellington Gadzikwa, vanoti zvese izvi ndezvemanyepo uye zviri kukonzerwa nevanyori venhau vanoita basa ravo zvisina mwero. Vanoti vatori venhau vanofanira kutanga vabvunzurudza pamwe nekutsvaga chokwadi vasati vanyora nyaya dzavo vachiti zvakaitika izvi zvinoratidza kuti basa harina kuitwa nemazvo. Vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti veruzhinji vasavimbe nezvinobuda mumapenhau anonyora manyepo. VaTyson Mwale vanoti vanobvumirana neVaGadzikwa asi vanoti kuramba nyaya iyi ichingobuda kune zvakunoreva. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaFortune Gwaze, vanoti pari zvino vanotora mashoko aya semanyepo uye vanoti vachatanga kuabvuma kana VaMugabe vakatadza kudzoka kubasa kupera kwemwedzi uno sezvakatarisirwa. VaMugabe vakaenda kuzororo musi wa15 Zvita uye vatevedzeri vavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa naVaPhelekhezela Mphoko, vari kuchinjana kubata chinzvimbo chavo. VaGwaze vanot havawoni pane chakaipa pane izvi sezvo mahofisi aVaMugabe akazivisa kuti izvi ndizvo zvichaitika uye pasina zvakawanda zvinoitika kana VaMugabe vasipo. Misangano mikuru yebato reZanu PF pamwe newemakurukota ehurumende weCabinet, haiitwe kana VaMugabe vasipo uye vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vatevedzeri vaVaMugabe havana simba. Vatiwo izvi zvinoratidzwo kuti VaMugabe ndivo vanoita zvese mubato nemuhurumende, zvokuti kana vasipo hapana chinofamba.

headline: Vakuru Vakuru muBazi rezveHutano Votungamira Kubayiwa Nhomba muBulawayo
text:
Chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba inodzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 kwevakoti, vanachiremba nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara chakatanga munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika kusanganisira muBulawayo nemusi weMuvhuro. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga ndivo vakaparura chirongwa ichi nemusi weChina muHarare.

Mudunhu vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba pazvipatara zvakaita seUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, kana kuti UBH, Mpilo, Ingutsheni uye neMater Dei.

Mukuru weHealth Services Board Dr Paulinus Sikhosana ndivo vakatanga kubaiwa vachiteverwa nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chemukuru weUBH Dr Narcissus Dzvanga pamwe nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chaProvincial Medical Director wedunhu reBulawayo Dr Welcome Mlilo. Gurukota redunhu reBulawayo Amai Judith Ncube vange varipowo pachiitiko ichi semunyarikani.

Dr Dzvanga vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chipatara chavo cheUBH chakapiwa nhomba dzinosvika chiuru nemazana manomwe idzo vati dzinokwana kubaya vashandi vose vari pachipatara ichi. Vakakurudzira vashandi vezvehutano pamwe neveruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhambo iyi.

VaElijah Maouranga avo vanoshanda vachibatsira vakoti paIngutsheni Hospital ndemumwe wevashandi vepachipatara ichi vatanga kubaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMapuranga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona zvakakosha kuti ivo semunhu anoshanda mune zvehutano vabaiwe nhomba iyi, uye vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasatye kubaiwa.

Vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutauriri weMpilo Hospital Sister Sanelisiwe Nyamandi, vati kunyange havo ivo vange vasati vabaiwa vanotambira kuvepo kwenhomba yeCovid-19 sechinhu chakakosha zvikuru pakudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

Pane zvikwata zvina zvine vanhu vashanu zviri kubaya vanhu nhomba mudunhu reBulawayo uye zvikwata zviviri zvichange zviri paUBH nepaMpilo kozotiwo zvimwe zviviri zvichange zvichifamba munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira makiriniki ekanzuru zvichibaya vanhu. Chikamu chekutanga ichi chinotarisirwa kupera mukati memazuva gumi, uye vanenge vabaiwa vanozobaiwazve mushure memazuva makumi maviri nemasere.

Dunhu reBulawayo rakawana nhomba zviuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana maviri uye Dr Mlilo vati tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti pane vashandi vanopfuura zviuru zvitanhatu vachabaiwa nhomba iyi mudunhu iri.

Kuparurwa kwechirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kunouya mushure mekunge nyika yapihwa pachena nhomba zviuru mazana maviri kubva kunyika yeChina.

Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vabvuma parunhare kuti chirongwa ichi chatanga munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika asi vati vange vasingakwanise kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vabaiwa pazuva ranhasi sezvo vange vastai vave neruzivo urwu. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kutevedzera Bumbiro reMitemo Zvizere Kana Yoita Sarudzo Dzayo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo nesarudzo dzinoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kuita sarudzo dzakachena chete kana ikatevedza bumbiro remitemo yaro uye kana mauto akasapindira munyaya dzesarudzo nedzematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wakarongwa neZimbabwe Democracy Institute kana kuti (ZDI wekuzeya kuti chii chingaitwa kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena muna 2023, mukuru weSAPES Trust, VaIbbo Mandaza, vati kunze kwekuteedza bumbiro pamwe nekudzorera mauto kumabharaki hapana chimwe chingaitwe kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzisingakipikiswe. Vati kunyange hazvo vamwe vachiti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa chikuru chiri kuita kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzinopikiswa nguva nenguva inyaya yekupindira kwemauto panyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Vati mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuona kuti bumbiro remitemo ratevedzwa uye kuti mauto adzokera kumabharaki. VaMandaza vati hapana chikonzero chekuti mapato anopikisa apinde musarudzo kana bumbiro risingatevedzwi uye kana masoja akaramba achipindira munyaya dzematongerwo enyika sezvo bato reZanu PF richingokunda musarudzo idzi. VaMandaza vati bato reZanu PF rinoshandisa mauto uye range riri kuruza sarudzo dzese kubva muna2 000 asi richabatsirwa kuramba iri panyanga nemauto. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutauriri webato rinopikisa reNational Patriotic Front, VaJelousy Mawarire, avo vati mauto pachawo akabuda pachena apo akabvisa vaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, muna Mbudzi 2017. Vachitaurawo pamusangano wanhasi, mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, vabvumirana naMuzvinafundo Mandaza vachiti Zanu PF haigoni kukunda musarudzo kana ikasashandisa mauto. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remauto kana kubva kugurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kuita. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, varamba mashoko VaMandaza ekuti bato ravo range richikundikana musarudzo kubva muna 2000 vachiti kunongova kutaura kwevavengi. VaMugwadi vatiwo manyepo kuti mauto anobatsira Zanu PF musarudzo vachiti mauto anopindira chete kana pachinge paita mhirizhonga. VaMandaza vatiwo mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuunganidza mari yemaAgents, kuona kuti vanhu vanyoresa kuvhota pamwe nekudzivirira vhoti panguva yesarudzo. Asi VaMawarire vati mapato anopikisa anokwanisa kukunda chero pasina shanduko yaitika. Mumwe mushandi mukuru muZDI, VaBekezela Gumbo, vati musangano wanhasi waburitsa pachena kuti kunyange mutemo wesarudzo ukasandurwa, zvakakoshawo kuti bumbiro ritevedzwe uye kuti mauto asapindire musarudzo. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza musangano webato ravo wePolitiburo svondo rapfuura kuti Zimbabwe yakatoisa zvese zvinodiwa neSADC kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye vakati vaye vanochema kuti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa havasi kubuda pachena kuti ndezvipi chaizvo zvavari kuda. Asi izvi zviri kurambwa nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira avo vanoti VaMnangagwa vanoziva zvese zvinodiwa kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoshanyira Glen View Yanetseka neKorera
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashanyira musha weGlen View uko kwapararira chirwere chekorera panguya iyo hurumende ichiti iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora achashandiswa mukurwisa nechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevatsigiri veZanu PF vanga vaungana pachipatara pamwe nevana vechikoro vanga vachibva kuchikoro pavaenda kunoona vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera mumusha unogara veruzhinji muGlen View. Vachitaura pazvitoro zveTichagarika zviri mumusha weGlen View mushure mekushanyira chipatara cheGlen View Polyclinic uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vakati kuti vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo ichabatsira kanzuru yeHarare mukutakurwa kwemarara, kugadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina pamwe nekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chipere muHarare uye chisarambe chichipararira kune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kunze kweHarare. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vagare vakashambidzika pose pavari kuti vasatapurirane chirwere ichi. Meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, avo vanga varipowo pashanywa naVaMnangagwa, vati sekanzuru vari kuedza pose pavanogona napo kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira. VaGomba vati pane zvibhorani zviviri zvavatovhrara zviri muGlen View zvange zvave kukonzera kupararira kwechirwere chekorera.
