Mugari wekuGlen View, Amai Mascelyn Chibweya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira pombi idzo dzanga dzave kusanganisa mvura yekunwa pamwe netsvina kana kuti masuweji. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, VaJoe Kadzviti, vati zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvingadai zvakafa dai pasina kumhanyidzana kuri kuitwa nevemasangano akazvimirira, vemabhizimusi, kanzuru pamwe nehurumende mukurwisana nechirwere ichi icho chapfunya chisero muHarare. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaparura homwe yavari kukumbira kuti izadzwe nemari neveruzhinji yakanangana nekurrwisa chirwere chekorera. VaNcube vati hurumende iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhati emadhora ichashandiswa mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vanoti pane vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari nhasi uye huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kudzikira. Chirwere chekorera chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoti Yakagadzirira Kutaurirana neEthiopia paNyaya Yekudzoserwa kwaMengistu Akatongerwa Rufu neHumhondi
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaFrederick Shava vanoti Zimbabwe yakagadzirira kutaura neEthiopia panyaya yevaive mutungamiri wenyika wenyika iyi Mengistu Haile Mariam uyo akatongerwa rufu nenyaya dzekuponda vanhu. aShava vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe yakagadzirira kutaura neEthiopia ikaite zvinotarisirwa munyaya dzekudyidzana kwenyika. Mengistu akapotera muZimbabwe muna 1991 mushure mekutungamira Ethiopia kwemakore gumi nemana. Mauto ake aizivikanwa nekuti Derg akwanikwa aine mhosva dzekuponda vanopikisa pamwe nehama dzavo. Muna 2008, dare remuEthiopia rakatongera Mengistu rufu richimupomera mhosva dzekuponda zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Asi Zimbabwe haina kuratidza chido chekuti adzokere kuEthiopia kunyangwe ainge abatwa nemhosva idzi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaKennedy Masiye vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe iyo isingadi kuisa ruoko rwayo pazvibvumirano zvinorambidza kuitwa kwevanhu kafiramberi uye zvimwe zvekuendesa vanpara mhosva dzehondo kumatare kana kuti kuti International Criminal Court inoratidza kuti haina kuzvipira kuomesera vanoponda vakaita saMengistu.

headline: MDC Alliance Yoshora VaKazembe paNyaya yeKupambwa kweVechidki veBato Iri
text: Bato reMDC Alliance nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vashora zvikuru gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, avo vanoti ongororo yavari kuita inoratidza kuti madzimai echidiki eMDC matatu haana kupambwa nekuti havana kumbosvika paroad block yavanoti vakasungirwa kuWarren Park. VaKazembe vakudza vatori venhau muHarare neChina kuti mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe; mutevedzeri wasachigaro wevechidiki, Muzvare Cecilia Marova; pamwe naMuzvare Netsai Marova vanova mutevedzeri wemurongi wemabasa vaifamba famba muHarare panguva dzavaiti vainge vapambwa. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vati VaKazembe vari kuyedza kuhwanda nemunwe. Vati aka hakasi kekutanga izvi zvichiitika nekuti pakapambwa kana Muzvare Jestina Mukuko hurumende yairamba kuti vainge vapambwa uye kusvika pari zvino, hapana ari kuziva kuti VaItai Dzamara vakapambwa makore mashanu apfuura varipi. Vatiwo hapana kana akasungwa pamauto akapomerwa mhosva yekupfuura vanhu mudhorobha reHarare muna 2018 kunyange hazvo pakaitwa ongororo yekuti vakapara mhosva ava vasungwe.

headline: ZCTU Yokurudzira Vashandi Kuti Vasaenda Kumabasa Kutanga Muvhuro
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti riri kukurudzira vashandi pamwe nevanozvibatira mabasa emaoko kuti vasaenda kumabasa kutanga neMuvhuro senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nekuoma kwaita hupenyu. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti zvichitevera tsvakurudzo yavakaita kubva kune mapoka akasiyanasiyana, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vakurudzirire vanhu kuti vasaenda kumabasa kwemazuva matatu. VaMutasa vanoti vashandi vamanikidzwa kutora danho iri zvichitevera kukwidzwa kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera usiku. VaMutasa vanoti vashandi vari kutarisana nematambudziko makukutu ekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu zuva nezuva asi mihoro yavo isiri kukwirawo. Vanoti kuwedzerwa kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa kwatonyanyowedzera matambudziko evashandi vemuZimbabwe, vangave vakabairwa zvitupa kana vanozvishandira voga. VaMutasa vanoti vanga vakanga vakokwa nehurumende kuti vasangane nehurumende pamwe nevashandirwi neMuvhuro pasi pegungano reTripartite Negotiating Forum, asi mushure mekukwidzwa kwemafuta ekufambisa sangano ravo harichakwanisa kupinda mumusangano uyu. Vanoti vachazotarisa dzimwe nzira dzekutora panopera mazuva matatu ekusaenda kumabasa.

headline: PANE NYAYA: MAFERO . . .uku ndiri kumaWarriors, Chicken Inn
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors Joey “Mafero” Antipas anoti mabasa maviri aya ari kumupedza simba, asi acharamba achishingirira kuti agobudirira maari ose.   Mafero anoti anoda kutora mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri munhorowondo yeGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn.   Muchinda uyu akambofanogadzwa kuve murairidzi wemaWarriors nesangano reZifa apo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita.   “Zvinhu zvakaoma kuita mabasa maviri, kurairidza Chicken Inn muligi kozoti maWarriors chikwata chenyika. Zvakaoma asi unofanirwa kushanduka nekuchimbidza paunenge wave kuenda kune rimwe basa.   “Zviri kundipedza simba rakawanda asi ndinoramba ndichishanda nesimba nekuti ndiri kuda chaizvo kubudirira mumabasa maviri ese aya,” anodaro Mafero.   Parizvino Chicken Inn iri pechipiri palog ichitevera CAPS United.   Nerimwewo divi, Mafero mumasvondo anotevera achange achitungamira maWarriors apo achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo achazoitirwa kuCameroon.   Sezvo kondirakiti yake ichapera musi wa31 Zvita, Mafero anoti haasati aziva kuti acharamba ari panyanga here.   “Parizvino ndichiri kumboshanda, tichagara pasi tozokurukura toona kuti zvichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Mafero

headline: ZEC Yotanga Chirongwa Kunyoresa Vanhu Vachavhota Pachishandiswa BVR
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vatara kuti kutanga svondo rinouya nemusi wa14 Gunyana kusvika musi wa15 Ndira 2018, Zimbabwe Elections Commission, ZEC, inofanira kutanga kuumba gwaro idzva revavhoti kana kuti biometric voters roll. VaMugabe vaita izvi kuburikidza negwaro rezvisiviso zvehurumende kana kuti “government gazette”. Izvi ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa pasi pemutemo wesarudzo kana kuti Electoral Act, gwaro idzva risati raparurwa. Asi vachitaura neStudio7, sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vati hazvireve kuti vanobva vatanga kunyoresa vanhu musi wa14 Gunyana sezvo vachiri vakamirira mimwe michina yekunyoresa vanhu. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati vari kufara nezvaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika sezvo vakagara vayambira ZEC kuti kuda kutanga kunyoresa vanhu pasina kuteverwa mutemo kwaizokonzera mutauro. No media source currently available

headline: Mbappe, Messi vorwira Golden Boot
text: MUTAMBI weFrance – Kylian Mbappe – naLionel Messi weArgentina ndivo vari kutungamira pakurwira mubairo weGolden Boot kumutambo weFIFA 2022 World Cup Qatar sezvo vese vanwisa kashanu.   Mumitambo mishanu yaatambira ‘Les Blues’ kuWorld Cup, Mbappe akwanisa kunwisa kashanu kuchiti Messi anwisa kashanu zvakare mumitambo mitanhatu yaatambira Argentina.   Vaviri ava vari kuteverwa nevatambi vaviri vanoti Olivier Giroud weFrance uyo akwanisa kunwiswa kana pamwe chete naJulian Alvarez weArgentina  anwisawo kana zvakare.   Rwendo rwekurwira mubairo uyu rwasarira pavatambi vana ava sezvo zvikwata zvavo zvichirimo mumakwikwi eWorld Cup kuQatar.    Olivier Giroud   Vamwe vatambi vanomwe vakatobva kumutambo uyu nenyika dzavo vainge vakwanisa kunwisa katatu-katatu.   Vatambi ava ndiBukayo Saka naMarcus Rashford veEngland, Cody Gapko (Netherlands), Richarlison (Brazil), Enner Valencia (Ecuador), Alvaro Morata (Spain) naGoncalo Ramos (Portugal).

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Mazana Mapfumbamwe Vokumbira Kuvhenekwa Coronavirus
text: Zimbabwe neChitatu yakapinda muzuva retatu nyika yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chabata vanhu vasere, uye kuuraya munhu mumwe chete. Bazi rezvehutano muZimbabwe rinoti pane vanhu vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe ne gumi nevashanu vakachaya nhare kwariri vachifungidzira kuti vane chirwere cheCoronavirus kubva musi wa 28 mwedzi wapera. Vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kufona panhamba dzinoti 2-0-1-9 kana vachifungidzira kuti vabata chirwere ichi. Asi pane vakakwanisa kuongororwa vakaonekwa vaine chirwere ichi vanomwe vanonzi vari kunzwa zviri nani. Chirwere ichi, icho chakatanga kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana masere nemakumi masere ezviuru pasi rose, uye kuuraya vanhu zviuru makumi mana nezvina. Italy ndiyo iri kutungamira pakufirwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezviviri; Spain ichifirwawo nevanhu vanopfuura zviuru zvipfumbamwe, ichiteverwa ne America, iyo yarasikirwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina, ukuwo China iine vanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu ane gumi nevaviri vafa nechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vari kuyambira kuti nyika yavo inogona kurasikirwa nehupenyu hwevanhu vanogona kusvika pamazana maviri nemakumi mana ezviuru. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mu America vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nezvishanu. Mukuru wezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti vanenge vasingakwanise kupora vari kumba vanoendeswa kuWilkins Hospital neBeatrice Infectious Unit muHarare, kanawo kuti Thorngrove kuBulawayo.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Huori neMitemo Isina Kujeka Zvodzosera Nyika Kumashure paNyaya yeZvicherwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti chido chavo ndechekuti zvicherwa zviunze mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri panosvika gore ra2023. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya svondo rapera pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano chekuchera lithium pakati pekambani yekuChina ye Zhejing Hayou Cobalt neyekuAustralia inonzi Prospect Resources Limited. Kambani yekuChina yakabhadhara mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti US422 million. Mugodhi weLithium uyu unonzi Arcadia Mine. Ko Zimbabwe yakakomborerwa nezvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe, Lithium, koromo, mangoda, platinum nezvimwe ingakwanise kuona chouviri sei pazviri uye nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinooona sei chibvumirano chitsva ichi? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti chibvumirano ichi chakakosha asi vanoda kuita zvechioko muhomwe ndivo vanopa kuti vanhu vasade kupinda munyika kuzotanga mabhizimisi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoshanda nesangano eeLabour and Economic Development Research Institute avo vatiwo zvinorwadza kuti nyika haina zvakawanda zvairi kuwana mukutengesa zvivanikwa vakati panoda kuumbwa masangano ekuti pasaitwe huori. Vatiwo makambani akawanda anochera zvicherwa ari kunzi ambomira kubhadhara mitero zvopa kuti nyika inyanye kurasikirwa nemari. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAnti Corruption Trust of Southern Afica VaAlois Chaumba vanoti zvakakosha kuti pazvibvumirano zvakadai, hurumende inyatsobude pachena kuti zvinofamba sei pazvibvumirano zvakadai kumisa nyaya dzehuori. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kukurudzira vekunze kuti vakwenenzvere zvicherwa zvavo munyika kuti nyika iwane mari yakawanda nekuvamba mabasa. Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuita chibvumirano chakadai nekamabani yeZimplats kuti ikwenenzvere chiwanikwa ichi munyika kuti nyika iwane chouviri. Asi izvi zvave nemakore akawanda zvichiyedza kuitwa kubva mushakabvu Robert Mugabe vachiri mutungamiri wenyika. Sezvo Zimbabwe iri makara asionane nedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzakatemera vatungamiri venyika zvirango, makambani ekuChina akawanda ndivo ave kuchera zviwanikwa munyika zvinosanganisira mangoda kwaMarange nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Britain Inoti Inoshuvira Sarudzo Dzakachena muZimbabwe
text:
Mumiriri weBritain muZimbabwe Amai Catriona Laing vanoti nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti muZimbabwe muve nesarudzo dzakachena dzinotambirwa nevanhu vose vachiti Britain iri kutarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti hurumende ichawana sei michina yeBiometric Voter Registration. Vati nyika yavo inonzwisisa kuchema-chema kwemapato anopikisa panyaya yekuti michina iyi inofanirwa kuwanikwa nenzira yakajeka.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 parutivi pechiitiko chekukumikidzwa zviri pamutemo kwembatya nemimwe midziyo inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto muBulawayo nemusi weMuvhuro Ambassador Laing vati nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti Zimbabwe itevedzere hwaro hwesarudzo hwenyika dzeSADC uyewo kuti iteerere zvakataurwa nevesangano reAfrican Union kuti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti munyika muve nesarudzo dzakachena.

Amai Laing vati hururmende yeBritain haingakwanise kupindira padanho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti ndiyo ichatenga michina inoshandiswa pakuita Biometric Voter Registration asi vati muzinda wavo uri kutevera wakatarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti izvi zvichaitwa nenzira yakajeka. Amai Laing vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko chekukumikidzwa kwembatya nemichina inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto kukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nevesangano reOperation Florian rinove sangano rekuBritain rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega mukubatsira vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana-siyana munya dzekurwisa moto.

Ambaasador Laing vatenda vaShephard Ndlovu vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe asi vachishanda vari kuBritain avo vakabatsira kuti hukama pakati pekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nesangano reoperation Florian huvepo. Vati kunyange hazvo hukama pakati pehurumende yeZimbabwe neyeBritain huchimbonetsa rubatsiro rwakapiwa nesangano reOperation Florian hunoratidza kusimba kunoramba kwakaita hukama pakati pevanhu venyika mbiri idzi.


Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yakatanga hukama nesangano reOperation Florian mugore ra2009 uye kubvira muna 2011 kusvika pari zvino, kanzuru iyi yawana motokari gumi dzekurwisa moto uye vashandi vayo vachidzidziswawo nezvekurwisa moto.

VaMartin Moyo meya weguta reBulawayo vati rubatsiro rwavari kuwana kubva kusangano reoperation Florian rwakakosha zvikuru kuchitariswa dambudziko rekushikwa kwemari munyika vachitiwo rubatsiro urwu runoita kuti guta ravo rifambirane nemamwe maguta pasi rose munyaya dzekurwisa moto.

Pasi pehukama hwesangano reOpertaion Florian kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yave kushanda nemamwe makanzuru emamwe madhorobha uye kwemavhiki maviri apfuura, vamwe vashandi vezvemoto vemakanzuru aya vange vachiita zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana zvine chekuita nekudzivirira moto.

VaKhumbulani Ndlovu avo vanove Leading Fire Officer muguta reBulawayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nezvidzidzo zvaawana uye vave neshungu dzekushandisa zvavakadzidza kuti vabatsire vagari vemuBulawayo.

Rubatsiro rwawanikwa nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kusvika pari zvino rwakakosha madhora anopfuura mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Vashandirwi Vasangomisa Vashandi Mabasa
text: Danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekusimbisa nyaya yekuti makambani asangomisa vashandi mabasa pamadiro asina kuratidza kuhurumende kuti azama zvose zvingatarisirwa kuti aite asati atora danho iri, riri kutambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevashandi. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira vanoti kunyange hazvo pasina zvitsva zvaiswa nehurumende, zvakakosha zvikuru kuti iratidze rutsigiro rwayo, zvikuru panguva iyo vashandi vari kurasikirwa nemabasa zvakanyanya. Gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Priscah Mupfumira vakati makambani anenge achida kumisa vashandi nekuda kwekuomerwa anofanirwa kutora matanho akaita sekudimura mari dzinotambirwa nevamwe vakuru-vakuru kuti dziende kumihoro yevashandi asati afunga zvekuderedza huwandu hwevashandi. Makambani anonzi anofanirwa kutanga aendesa chikumbiro chekumisa vashandi mabasa ku bhodhi rinoona nezvekumiswa mabasa, riri pasi pebazi rezvevashandi nemabasa, reRetrenchment Board, iro rinozotambira kana kuramba chikumbiro ichi. Asi vaimbowe mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, VaCalisto Jokonya vanotiwo semaziviro avo, makambani mazhinji ari kutevedzera mutemo wekumisa vanhu mabasa uyu. Vanotiwo makambani mazhinji akatedza zvose zvekudimura mari dzemihoro yevashandi vepamusoro asati asvika pakumbomisa vepasi ava mabasa. VaShamuyarira vanoti vari kunyanya kutyora mutemo vachingomisa vanhu mabasa pamadiro ndevaya vari mune zvematongerwo enyika, avo vati vari kushandisa zvinzvimbo zvavo kuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voomerwa neKushaikwa neKudhura kweMishonga
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nekushaikwa uye kudhura kuri kuita mishonga zvopa kuti hupenyu hwevarwere vakawanda huve munjodzi. Zvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvinonzi zvasara nemishonga yakakosha isingadarike mazuva gumi. Vanotengesa nekugadzira mishonga vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa mari yakakwana yekunze yekutenga mishonga kubva kuIndia neSouth Africa kunyanya. Sachigaro wePharmaceutical Manufacturers Association of Zimbabwe ,VaEmmanuel Mujuru, vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yekushaya mari vachiti vanoda mamiriyoni maviri emadhora asi vari kuwana zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naMuzvare Emily Nyathi vanotengesa mishonga muHarare. Amai Nyathi vati nyaya iyi yave nenguva ingatosvika makore maviri isina kugadziriswa. Hurumende inoti iri kuyedza kutsvaga mari yekubatsira mukutenga mushonga uye nemusi weChina yakapa vanotenga mishonga mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zviviri mushure mekunge yambovapa mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvisere svondo rapera. Asi chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti mari iyi idonwe remvura mugwenga. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naAmai Nyathi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vasara nemishonga inokwana mazuva gumi chete. Matambudziko aya ndemamwe kuParirenyatwa, Harare Hospital, UBH nezvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vatendawo kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemishonga. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vave kutopotera kumaporofita nekun’anga Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati vave kutoita mapiritsi ekudimbura nepakati kuti vakwanise kutombowana chekunwa pazuva. Vamwewo vanoti vave kutopona nekuenda kunyika dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa kunotsvaga mishonga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurumende inofanira kumutsiridza makambani anogadzira mushonga kuti varerutse dambudziko iri. Mari zhinji yeZimbabwe inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana inobva kumasangano akazvimirira akaita seUnited Nations Children’s Fund, Global Fund neUS Presidents Emmergency Plan for Aids Relief neDepartment for International Development yekuBritain. Pharmaceutical Society of Zimbabwe inogadzira mishonga inoti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu kuti itange kushanda zvakanaka. VePharmaceutical Wholesalers Association vanoti nekuda kwechikwereti chemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu, havachapihwe mishonga kwavaitenga. Vanoti pamwedzi vanoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni masere. No media source currently available

headline: VaMzembi Vopinda Misangano muWashington DC yeKukwezva Vashanyi
text: Gurukota rezve kushanya nekushanyirwa kwenyika, VaWalter Mzembi, vanoti vari pamusangano we US-Africa Business Summit uyo uri kuitirwa muWashington vachiyedza kukwezva vanoita zvemabhizimusi ekushanyira nyika kuti vaende kuZimbabwe. ​VaMzembi vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vanoshanyira nyika vachibva kuAmerica hwakawanda kukunda dzimwe nyika, vanoti vanoda kuti hurambe huchikwira. Musangano uyu wakatanga neChipiri uye uchapera neChishanu. VaMzembi vachangobva kukundwa mumakwikwi ekutsvaga munyori mukuru musangano re United Nations World Tourism Organisation akaitwa kuSpain. Asi vanoti izvi hazvisi kuvadzora kumashure sezvo vakadzidza zvikuru kubva kumakwikwi aya. "Tichange tichizeya nedzimwe nyika dzinosanganisira vana muzvina bhisinesi vemu America pamusoro pekuti vangawedzere seyi huwandu hwevanoshanya munyika," VaMzembi vaudza Studio 7. VaMzembi vaenderera mberi vachiti vane zvirongwa zvakawanda zvavari kuda kuti vana muzvinabhisinesi vemuAmerica vaite vakabatana neZimbabwe mukuedza kuvandudza nyaya yekushanya nekushanyirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovimbisa Kugadzikana Mune zveMafuta Panguva iyo Magetsi ave Kunetsa muNyika
text: Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanoti zvinhu zvave kuzogadzikana munyaya dzemafuta edzimotokari zvichitevera kuibva kwemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica yakapiwa makambani anopinza mafuta munyika kana kuti ma 'letters of credit'. Doctor Gumbo vanoti kubva kupera kwesvondo rapera kusvika pari zvino, motokari dzinotakura mafuta dziri mubishi kumhanya nemafuta dzichidira mumagaraji emunyika. Asi vanoti sezvo munyika manga mave negaha nechekare, zvinoda kanguva kakati kuti kuti vakwanise kudzora zvinhu pazvinofanirwa kunge zviri. Ukuwo, vamwe vedzimotokari vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvisati zvave kuratidza shanduko, sezvo mitsetse ichiri kuwanikwa munyika yose. Zvichakadaro, kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company yazivisa nezvehurongwa hwekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi pane dzimwe nguva senzira yekuchengetedza magetsi mashoma ari kuwanikwa munyika. Kumbodzimwa kwemagetsi uku kuchaitwa munyika yose panguva dzatarwa nekambani iyi. Kambani yemagetsi iyi inoti yamanikidzwa kutora danho iri nekuda kwekuderera zvakanyanya kwemvura kudhamu rinogaiwa magetsi reKariba, pamwe nekudzikira kwemagetsi ari kugaiwa kugwenya remarasha reHwange Power Station. Kambani iyi yatiwo rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzera kushaikwa kwemagetsi anokwana nderekushomeka kwemagetsi ari kutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika, zvikuru kuMozambique. Magetsi achadzimwa kubva nenguva dzeshanu mangwanani kusvika nenguva dzegumi mangwanani, kuchizotiwo kubva nenguva dzeshanu manheru kusvika nenguva dzegumi usiku. Doctor Gumbo vanoti hurumende iri kugadzirisa dambudziko remagetsi iri kuburikidza nekupa marezinesi kwayakaita kumakambani makumi matatu nemana anoshandisa simba rezuva kuti awanise nyika magetsi, uye kugadziriswa kuri kuitwa magwenya ekuHwange. No media source currently available Asi mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vagari havasi kufara nenyaya yekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi iyi sezvo vanenge vakatobhadhara kare magetsi emwedzi wese. VaShumba vanotiwo nyika haisati yave nezvikwanisiro zvekuti magetsi ezuva ave iwo nhungamiri munyaya dzemhando dzemoto, izvo zvichaita kuti ruzhinji rwuomerwe zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinowana Pator Mawarire Vasina Mhosva
text:
Dare rapamusoro reHigh Court ratura mutongo wekuti Mufundisi Evan Mawarire, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidgura hurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kubudikidza nekuratidzira kwakaitika gore rapera, havana mhosva. 

Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Muzvare Priscilla Chigumba, vatura mutongo wekuti VaMawarire havana mhosva yavakapara nokudaro vave munhu akasununguka.

Muzvare Chigumba vati hapana humbowo hwakajeka hwakasvitswa kudare nemagweta ehurumende pamwe nevafakazi panyaya iyi hunoratidza kuti VaMawarire vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vabvise hurumende yaVaMugabe pachigaro vachiti mavhidhiyo ose akaratidzwa dare anoratidza kuti VaMawarire vakurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira murunyararo vachiti izvi zvinobvumidzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika.

Mutongi atiwo hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vanhu vakaita zvemhirizhonga pakuratidzirwa kwakaitwa kwemazuva maviri gore rapera kwaidaizwa kuti Shutdown Zimbabwe vakanga vakurudzirwa naVaMawarire kuti vaite mhirizhonga iyi.

Gweta raVaMawarire, VaHarrison Nkomo, vanoti vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare.

VaMawarire vanoti havafainira kunge vakatombomiswa mudare kubva pekutanga. VaMawarire vakasungwa gore rapera mushure mekuratidzira kwakatambirwa nevanhu vakawanda kusanganisira chikwata che Tajamuka. Zvichakadai, dare repamusoro rakatarisirwawo kutura mutongo nhasi wekuti ma aliens obvumirwa kunyoresa kuvhota here musarudzo dzegore rinouya kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: ZOC yotaura nezvemaOlympics
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Olympic Committee (ZOC) rinoti parizvino munhu mumwechete anokwikwidza mumutambo weRowing ndiye akwanisa kubudirira kunomirira nyika kumitambo ye2020 Tokyo Summer Olympics iyo ichaitirwa kuJapan munaChikumi.   Mitambo iyi yaifanirwa kuitwa gore radarika asi ndokuzomiswa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Chamangwiza weZOC — Stephen Mudawarima — anoti kuderera kwevatambi vachanomirira nyika kumitambo yemaSummer Olympics yegore rino kwakanyanya uye kuri kukonzerwa nekunyuka kweCovid-19 zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo yose.   “Kutaura kuno tangove nemutambo mumwe chete weRowing wabudirira kuenda kumaOlympics achaitwa gore rino.   Sangano reZimbabwe Rowing Association ndiro richazotizivisa kuti ndiani achazoenda kunomirira nyika kuJapan achiita Rowing.   “Covid-19 ndiyo yakakanganisa zvakawanda, ndiyo yaita kuti huwandu hwevatambi vedu vachaenda kumitambo iyi yemaOlympics hunyanye kudzikira kudaro,” anodaro Mudawarima.   Mudawarima anoti pane vatambi vanomhanya mijaho yemarathon nevanotuhwina vari kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze kwenyika vachirwira kuenda kumakwikwi ekuJapan aya. Shasha dzemujaho wemarathon dzichanokwikwidza kuRome, kuItaly uko kuri kuitwa mijaho yekurwira kuenda kuTokyo kozoita dzekutuhwina dziri kuSouth Africa uko dziri kuzamawo mhanza yadzo.   “Svondo rino, tiri kutumira shangwiti dzekumhanya dzemarathon kuRome, Italy uko vachanorwirawo tikiti ravo rekuenda kuJapan kozoti kuSouth Africa kutaura kuno kune vari kuzamawo vanotuhwina. “Asi chatinoziva ndechekuti gore rino tichange tine nhengo shoma chaizvo dzichanomirira nyika kumutambo uyu,” anodaro Mudawarima.   KumaOlympics akaitwa muna2016 kuBrazil, Zimbabwe yakatumira vatambi vemitambo yakawanda vanosanganisira maMighty Warriors ayo akabva anyora nhorowondo yekuve chikwata chenhabvu chekutanga kubva munyika muno kunokwikwidza kumitambo iyi.   Panguva iyi — Dr Kirsty Coventry, avo pari zvino vave gurukota revechidiki, mitambo nezvekutandara — vakakwikwidzawo kumitambo iyi ndokunyora nhorowondo yekuve shasha kubva muZimbabwe kuhwina menduru dzakawanda kumaOlympics mumutambo wekutuhwinha.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika Zvoita Bishi Kuenda Kumusha Kuzororo
text: Kwasara svondo rimwe chete kuti Kisimusi isvike, izvo zvave kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviite chipatapata zvichipinda munyika kubva munyika yazvigere dzakasiyana siyana. Miganhu yenyika inonzi yatotanga kuona huwandu hwevanhu vari kupinda munyika, zvikuru vari kubva kuSouth Africa vachishandisa muganhu weBeitbridge. Bepanhau reChronicle rinoti bazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, ratowedzera huwandu hwevashandi vepamuganho uyu nekuisa vamwe makumi masere vabva kune mimwe miganhu isiri kunyanya kuwandirwa nevanhu. Mitsetse yevanhu nedzimotokari zviri kuda kupinda munyika inonzi iri kuramba ichikura zuva nezuva. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesera kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vemabhazi vatokwidzawo mari dzinobhadharwa nevafambi nezvikamu zviri pakati pemakumi mashanu kubva muzana nezana kubva muzana, zvichienderana nekuti rwendo rwacho rwunogumira kupi. VaJuru vanotiwo vanotambira nemufaro danho reZIMRA rekuwedzera vashandi paBeitbridge, asi vanoti handizvo zvinopedza dambudziko rekunonoka kufamba kwevanhu. VaJuru vanoti chinofanirwa kuitwa neZIMRA kutenga michina mitsva yekushandisa kurerutsa basa revashandi vepamiganhu yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weRopa Woderedzwa Mushure Mekupindira kweHurumende
text: Sangano reNational Blood Services kana kuti rinoti mari yavakawana kutanga kwegore rino kubva kuhurumende yakavabatsira kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa pamwe nekuti madzimai akazvitakura vano batsirirwa muzvipatara zvehurumende vawane ropa iri pachena. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano iri, Muzvare Esther Masunda, vati NBS yakawana mari inoita mamiriyoni mana nemazana manomwe emadhora. Muzvare Masunda vati mari iyi ndiyo yakaita kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa kusvika pamadhora makumi mashanu papaindi imwe yeropa kubva pamadhora makumi masere muna Zvita. Amai Masunda vati nekuda kwekudzika kwemitengo iyi vanhu vazhinji vave kukwanisawo kutenga ropa iri huye sesangango vari kutsvaga nzira dzekusimudzira huwandu hweropa ravanotengesa. NBS ine mizinda mishanu inotengeserwa ropa inoti Harare, Bulawayo, Masvingo, Gweru neMutare. Muzvare Masunda vanoti nekuda kwemari yavakawana iyi vave kutsvakawo nzira dzekuti vawedzere mizinda inotengeserwa ropa iyi kuti veruzhinji vawanire ropa iri pedyo navo. Munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji vanga vasiri kukwanisa kutenga ropa izvo zvinova zvakasunda hurumende kuti ibatsire nemari. VaGwinji vanoti muono webazi rezvehutano ndewekuti mune remangwana ropa riwaniswe vanhu pachena. Vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti panozopera gore rino mutengo uye wadzika kusvika pamadhora gumi chete papaindi imwechete. Sangano reNBS rinowana ropa pachena kubva kune vanobatsira asi vanoti kucheneswa nekuchengetedzwa kweropa iri kunoda mari zhinji uye havagoni kuderedza mitengo kusvika vawana anenge achivabatsira nemari. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voita Musangano kuChikomba neMugovera
text: Mapurisa anonzi azivisa bato re MDC-T kuti harikwanise kuita musangano nevatsigiri varo ku Chikomba mudunhu reMashonaland East neMugovera sezvo Zanu PF iine hurongwa hwayo mudunhu iri musi uyu. No media source currently available Mutauriri weMDC-T, Va Obert Gutu, vanoti vakazivisa mapurisa kuti mutungamiri webato ravo,Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vanoda kuita musangano nevatsigiri vavo, asi mapurisa akati havakwanisi kuita izvi. Va Gutu vashora mapurisa vachiti ari kushandiswa ne Zanu PF vachirega kuita basa ravo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vatora danho sebato rekuti Va Tsvangirai vaenderere mberi nemusangano zvisinei nemhinduro yemapurisa vachiti mapurisa haana kodzero yekuvarambidza kuita musangano uyu pasi pemutemo we Public Order and Security Act. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vati havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti havasati vakwanisa kutaura nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu re Mashonaland East kuti vanzwe kuti nyaya iyi yakamira sei. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland East, Inspector Clemence Mabweazara, vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachigarowanzotaura vachitsigira Zanu PF, Va Goodson Nguni, vanoti MDC-T yakashanda kwazvo kuti pave nebumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika saka nokudaro vati Va Tsvangirai nebato ravo vanofanirwa kuwanikwa vachitevedzera mutemo. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo uye vari mudzidzisi pa University of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Charity Manyeruke, avo vashora danho ratorwa ne MDC-T iri vachiti uku kuzvidza vanochengetedza mutemo nerunyararo munyika. Asi pasi pemitemo yenyika, mapurisa haana mvumo yekurambidza mapato kuita misangano yayo, kunze kwekuti mapurisa anogona kuti anenge akawandirwa nebasa musi uyu, kana kuti nzvimbo inenge ichida kushandiswa, inenge ichishandiswawo nemamwe masangano.

headline: Zifa rongekai: zikeeper
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors — Edmore ‘Zikeeper’ Sibanda — anoti sangano rinotungamirira nhabvu remuno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) harina kurongeka zvachose zvichitevera kusazadzikisa kwarakaita zvarakange ravimbisa vatambi vechikwata chenyika ichi apo vakaenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt nguva yadarika.   Zikeeper aive muchikwata chemaWarriors chakanokwikwidza kuAfcon icho chakashoropodzwa zvikuru nevatsigiri venhabvu uye nevanoongorora mutambo uyu zvichitevera kuramba kwavaimboita kutamba vachiti vanoda kutanga vapihwa mugove wavo wemari neZifa izvo vainge vakavimbiswa.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Zikeeper anoti Zifa haina kurongeka sezvo yakange yakavavimbisa kuzovabhadhara mari dzavo vasati vatamba mitambo yavo izvo yakakundikana kuzadzikisa.   “Munoziva zvinozongonzi isu tinokara mari asi isu tinenge tine makondirakiti atinosainiswa nayo Zifa yacho.   “Ivo ndivo vanogadzira makondirakiti acho isu tongonzi iyo chisaina saka unobva washaya kuti isu tinenge takanganisa papi chaipo sezvo isu taingotevedzera izvo zvavainge vati tiite.   “Zvinorakidza kuti havana kurongeka uye havazive zvavari kuita sesangano,” anodaro Zikeeper.   Shasha iyi ndiyo yakabata bhora mutambo wekutanga wemaWarriors uyo vakakundwa 1-0 neEgypt apo akatamba zvainwisa mvura asi haana kuzoupedza sezvo akazobuda mushure mekunge akuvara ndokutsiviwa naElvis Chipezeze.   Mumutambo wechipiri, uyo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neUganda, George Chigova ndiye aive mubati wepagedhi.   Kozoti mumutambo wekupedzisira — uyo maWarriors akazozvamburwa 4-0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo – Chipezeze ndiye aive pamambure uye akashoropodzwa zvikuru zvichitevera kukundwa kwavakaitwa sezvo vamwe vaiti akatengesa mutambo uyu.   Asi, Zikeeper anoramba kuti Chipezeze akatengesa mutambo uyu.   “Munoziva, vanhu iye zvino vanoda kuzongoti heee Chipezeze akatidyisa mutambo uya wekupedzisira weDRC asi havazive zvaiitika kumashure.   “Havazvizive kuti akarara kuma2 am ari mumusangano nevatungamiri veZifa tichida kuti mari ibude. Panguva iyo aifanirwa kunge akazorora achigadzirira zvemutambo, manje haana kuwana zororo rakakwana,” anodaro Zikeeper.   Zvakadai, mutambi uyu gore radarika aitambira Witbank Spurs yekuSouth Africa muNational First Division asi yakapedza iri pasi ndokuburitswa muligi iri.   Pakapera mwaka wegore radarika, ndipo pakabva papererawo kondirakiti yake uye iye zvino ari mushishi kutsvaga chimwe chikwata chekutambira.   “Kondirakiti yangu yakapera gore radarika kuWitbank Spurs saka iye zvino vamiriri vangu vari mushishi kunditsvagira chimwe chikwata chekutambira nekudaro ndakangomirira kunzwa kuti ndezvipi zvavandiwanira.   “Ndichiri mupfana chaiye uye ndine makore akawanda ekuramba ndichitamba nhabvu yepamusoro,” anodaro Zikeeper.

headline: Torres hutu kuJapan
text: weAtletico Madrid neLiverpool — Fernando Torres — obuda pachena kuti ari kuenda kuJapan kunotambira Sagan Tosu mwaka unotevera.   Chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi change chichidiwa nezvikwata zvekuUnited States neAustralia, asi akataura nevatori venhau kuti ari kuenda kuAsia.   Torres akazivisa kuti ange achishevedzwa nezvikwata zvakawanda asi akafunga kutevera shamwari yake, Andres Iniesta, kuJapan.   “Ndange ndichidiwa nezvikwata zvekuFrance, Germany nezvimwe zviri muSpain,” anodaro.   “Asi ndange ndisingade kutambira chimwe chikwata chemuEurope ini nekuti ndakawana zvose zvandaida nechikwata changu Atletico.   “Ndichange ndine shamwari yangu futi kuno Andres. Saka tiri kufara tose nemukana uyu wauya kwatiri.”   Iniesta naLukas Podolski vese vanotambira muVissel Kobe uye Sagan Tosu ichange ichisangana navo mumutambo weJ1 League mwaka unotevera.   Torres akabva kuchikwata chake chaakakurira cheAtletico Madrid uko akatamba mitambo 45 ndokuhwina mukombe weEuropa League.   Mutambi uyu akambotambira Liverpool uye ari kuenda kuchikwata icho chakapedza mwaka wadarika chakagara pechisere palog.   “Ndiri kutotanga svondo rinotevera, ndinovimba kuti ndichatanga zvakanaka nechikwata changu chitsva uye ndigotamba mitambo yakawanda nekunwisa,” anodaro Torres.   “Ndinovimba kutanga kutamba musi wa21. Ndinovimba ndichave kuno kwemakore akawanda uye zvichange zvichienderana nekuti ndiri kutamba sei.” — SportsMail Football

headline: SADC Troika Inoti Mozambique Ngaibatsirwe Izvozvi
text:
Nyika dzinoumba bazi rerinoona nezverunyararo nekudzivirirwa kwenyika
dziri mudunhu reSouthern African Development Community, SADC Troika- nhasi dzabuda nechisunga chekuti paitwe musangano wechimbichimbi mwedzi uno usati wapera wekuzeya matanho angatorwe kumisa hondo iri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado muMozambique. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasangana ndokukurukura nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzinoumba SADC Double Troika iyo ine mutungamiri weMozambique, VaFilipe Jacinto Nyusi, sasachigaro wayo, Dr Lazarus Chakwena vekuMalawi, VaHusseini Ali Mwinyi vekuTanzania pamwe nevatungamiri venyika dzinoumba bazi reOrgan on Politics, Defence and Security Cooperation vanoti sachigaro VaMokgweetsi Masisi vekuBotswana naVaCyril Ramaphosa vekuSouth Africa. VaMwinyi vanga vakamirira mutungamiri wavo, Amai Samia Saluhu Hassan, avo vange vasiri pamusangano uyu. Mugwaro razivisa zvabuda mumusangano uyu munyori weSADC, VaStergomena Lawrence Tax, vazivisa kuti vatungamiri venyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekuurayiwa kuri kuitwa vanhuwo zvavo, madzimai nevana nevanopfurikidza mwero veAl Shabab. VaTax vati nekudaro musangano weDouble Troika wati paitwe musangano
wechimbichimbi weOrgan Troika Summit musi wa29 Kubvumbi uyo uchazeya matanho achatorwa kumisa hondo iri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero ava. Gweta uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe
kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati vanga vachitarisira kuti musangano uyu ubude nechisungo chakajeka chekuyamura Mozambique kwete kunonokera wavari kuita vanhu vachifa.

VaMavhinga vati ongororo yavakaita yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu
vakawanda vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nevapanduki veAl Shabab pamwe nemauto eMozambique.

VaMavhinga vati chimwe chinoshamisa ndechekuti Mozambique
haisi kubuda pachena kuti inoda ruyamuro rwedzimwe nyika here kana kuti kwete asi zvichioneka pachena kuti mauto ayo haana simba rekukunda vapanduki ava.

Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvellous Khumalo, vati
havasi kunyatsofara nezvabuda mumusangano wanhasi nekuti SADC iri kunonoka kupindiria panguva iyo vanhu vari kufa.

Izvi zvatsigirwa negweta rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu munyika
yeZambia VaMuleta Kapatiso avo vanoti pamutemo nyika dzinosungirwa
kuyamura imwe nekukurumidza kana yave kurwiswa nevapanduki.

Mumwe mugari wemuMozambique, Amai Nzira De Deus, vati madzimai
nevanasikana vari kubatwa chibharo mazuva ose. Stuio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa zvimwe zvabuda mumusangano wanhasi kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi pane mashoko ekuti SADC yawiriranawo kuti ipe Mozambique rubatsiro rwezvikwanisiro izvozvi panguva iyo mumwe musangano uri kurongwa kuitwa. Sangano reUnited Nations vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi , 670 000, vanonzi vakatiza misha yavo mudunhu reCabo Delgado, vachityira hupenyu hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Soro Rozeya Gakava Pakati paVaChamisa naAmai Khupe
text: Dare repamusoro-soro reSupreme Court nhasi ranzwa chikumbiro chemutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, chekuti mutongo wakaturwa nedare repamusoro reHigh Court wekuti kusarudzwa kwavo semutungamiri webato ravo hakuna kufambiswa zvakanaka usendekwe parutivi. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro chavo kudare, gweta raVaChamisa, Advocate Thabani Mpofu, vati mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi vachiti harisi basa rematare kusarudzira bato rezvematongerwo enyika hutungamiri. VaMpofu vaudza dare kuti komiti yepamusoro-soro muMDC pakati pemakongiresi yeNational Council yakatora danho rekugadza VaChamisa semutungamiri weMDC zvichitevera kufa kwavaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMpofu vati komiti iyi ndiyo ine masimba ekuita izvi ndokusaka zvakaitwa uye vati VaChamisa naVaElias Mudzuri vakagadzwa naVaTsvangirai sevatevedzeri kunyangwe zvazvo paiva naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe zvichiitwa VaTsvangirai vachishandisa masimba avaive nawo ari mubumbiro reMDC. Zvataurwa naVaMpofu zvatsinhirwa nemunyori anoona nezvesarudzo muMDC yaVaChamisa, VaJacob Mafume, avo vanga vari mudare. Gweta riri kumiririra Muzvare Khupe panyaya iyi, VaLovemore Madhuku, vaudzawo dare kuti pasi pebumbiro remitemo reMDC hazvikwanisike kuti pave nevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato vaviri kana vatatu sezvo vachiti bumbiro iri riri pachena kuti panofanira kunge paine mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato mumwechete. VaMadhuku vati Muzvare Khupe ndivo vaifanira kufanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC pakamirirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi yekutsvaga mutungamiri webato zvichitevera kufa kwakaita VaTsvangirai. VaMadhuku vaenderera mberi vachiti kudomwa kwaVaChamisa naVaMudzuri kuti vave vatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai kwaive kunze kwemutemo. Vaenderera mberi kudaidzirwa kwaitwa musangano weNational Council wakagadza VaChamisa semutungamiri webato kwaiva kunze kwemutemo sezvo vachiti bumbiro reMDC riri pachena kuti misangano yechimbichimbi yekomiti iyi inokwanisa kushevedzerwa nemutungamiri webato chete kana mutevedzeri wake. Zvichakadai, dare reSupreme Court iro range riine vatongi vatatu vanoti VaPaddington Garwe, Amai Antonia Guvava naVaBharat Patel, rati richazotura mutongo waro muzuva rarisina kutara. Nyaya iyi isati yapinda mudare, mapurisa anorwisa mhirizhonga ayo anga akapakatira zvombo arambidza vatsigiri veMDC vanga vauya kuzonzwa nyaya iyi kupinda mudare ndokuvadzinga pamatare apa izvo zvashorwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaChamisa, Amai Lynette Karenyi Kore. Nyaya iyi yakaunzwa kumatare neimwe nhengo yeMDC yekuGokwe, VaElias Mashavira, avo vaiti VaChamisa havana kusarudzwa kuti vatungamire bato zviri pachena izvo zvakatambirwa nedare High Court. Asi VaChamisa vakazokwidza nyaya iyi kudare reSuupreme Court vachiti mutongo wedare reHigh Court unofanira kusendekwa parutivi. No media source currently available

headline: Portugal yadzinga Santos wekunetsana naCR7
text: MURAIRIDZI wePortugal, Fernando Santos, aita wechisere kudzingwa basa kuWorld Cup zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita nyika iyi mumutambo uyu neMorocco.   Chinyorwa chakabva kuFootball Association of Portugal chinoti: “Changa chiri chiremerera kuve nemurairidzi akaita saFernando Santos achirairidza nyika yedu.   “FPF inotenda Fernando Santos nechikwata chake nebasa ravakabata mumakore masere uye tine kutenda kwakadzika kunobva kuzvizvarwa zvePortugal. FPF yatanga basa rekutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wenyika yedu.”   Santos ange arairidza Portugal kwemakore masere uye akaita wekutanga kuhwina mukombe mukuru apo akatungamira Portugal kutora European Championship mugore ra2016.   Akazotungamira zvakare chikwata ichi kuhwina mukombe weUEFA Nations League muna2019.   Ari kuWorld Cup kuQatar, Santos anonzi akatsamwisana naCristiano Ronaldo izvo zvakamuona achisiya mutambi uyu mumutambo wavo weRound of 16 neSwitzerland uyo vakahwina 6-1.   Vamwe varairidzi vakadzingwa basa kana kusiya vachangobva kuWorld Cup vanosanganisira Gerardo ‘Tata’ Martino weMexico, Tite (Brazil), Luis Enrique (Spain), Otto Addo (Ghana), Roberto Martinez (Belgium), Louis van Gaal (Netherlands) naPaulo Bento (Korea Republic).

headline: VaBiden Vanokunda VaTrump Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica
text: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica zvichitevera kukunda kwavaita mudunhu rePennsylvania.  VaBiden, avo vane makore makumi manomwe nemasere ekuberekwa, vatora zvigaro zvose makumi maviri zve electoral college zvemudunhu rePennsylvania ndokuita zvigaro zvinodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe vachidarika zvigaro zvinodiwa kuti munhu adomwe semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaBiden vakunda mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, VaDonald Trump, avo vakabuda pachena kuti vari kupikisa mumatare maverengerwo akaitwa mavhoti mumamwe matunhu emuAmerica.  VaBiden vachaitwa mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu apo vachagadzwa zviri pamutemo muna Ndira gore rinouya. Kukunda kwaVaBiden kunoreva kuti mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vari kupinda munhoroondo yekuva mudzimai wekutanga, uye ari mutema, kuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munhoroondo yeAmerica yemakore mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana.  VaBiden vakashanda vari mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna Ndira 2017, apo pakatoreswa VaTrump mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika mushure mekukunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo yakaitwa muna Mbudzi 2016. VaBiden vakashandawo senhengo yedare Senate kwemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paDeVry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvanga zviri pachena kuti VaBiden vachakunda musarudzo iyi. Asi VaMasocha vanoti VaBiden vane mutoro mukuru wekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika zvavati zvakavhiringwa naVaTrump. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vodomwa seMunyarikani weWHO Anomirira Zvirwere Zvisingatapuriranwe muAfrica
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakadomwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO, semunyarikani achange akamirira Africa munyaya dzezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe, kana kuti non communicable diseases. VaMugabe, avo vane makore makumi mapfumbamwe nematu, vakadomwa mazuva maviri apfuura pamusangano uri kuitirwa ku Uruguay. VaMugabe vakaenda kumusangano uyu vachiperekedzwa negurukota nezvekunze, VaWalter Mzembi, gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, pamwe nemamwe makurokota ehurumende. Vachitaura vari kuUruguay, VaMzembi vaudza Studio7 kuti ichokwadi kuti VaMugabe vadomwa semunyarikani izvo zviri kufadza nyika. "Ichokwadi VaMugabe vawana ruremekedzo rwekuve, WHO Ambassador for NCD's, Africa," VaMzembi vaudza Studio7. VaMugabe vachange vari pachinzvimbo ichi kwemakore maviri, uye basa iri haribhadharwe mari. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushamiswa nezvaitwa neWHO zvekudoma mutungamiri ari kukundikana kugadzirisa nyaya dzehutano munyika make izvo zviri kupa kuti vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe varapwe kunze kwenyika. VaMugabe pachavo vanogara vachibuda munyika vachinorapwa kuSingapore.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chotambira neMufaro Mukuru Basa kuUnited Nations
text: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaBan Ki-moon masvondo mashoma akapera vakadoma chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Dr. Fadzai Gwaradzimba semutevedzeri wavo anowona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenjodzi. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji nezve dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica nepasi rose zvakapembera nedanho rakatorwa naVa Ban iri. Amai Gwaradzimba vava nemakore makumi maviri nemashanu vachishanda ne United Nations. Vakadzidza kuPlumtree ndokuwana degree ravo rekutanga rezvematongerwo enyika kana kuti Bachelor of Political Science ne Public Administration kuUniversity yeZimbabwe pakutara nzira yavo yekushanda musangano guru repasi rose iri. Amai Gwaradzimba, avo vane makore makumi matanhatu nemaviri ekuberekwa, vakamboshanda kumapazi akasiyana siyana eUnited Nations anosanganisira UN Development Programme vakashandirawo munyika dzinosanganisira Somalia, Gambia, Barbados nemuNew York muAmerica. Vaudza VOA Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nebasa guru ravakapihwa naVaBan uye kucherechedzwa kwavakaitwa. “Ndiri kufara zvikuru. Handina kumbobvira ndakazvifungira kuti nerimwe zuva ndichange ndiri padanho rakadai repamusorosoro,” vadaro Amai Gwaradzimba. Vakadzidza kuUsher kuPlumtree ndokuzoita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro kuUniversity of Zimbabwe vasati vaenda kuAmerica uko vakazoita zvimwe zvidzidzo zvepamusorosoro kuzvikoro zvikuru zveJohn Hopkins University neOregon. Mai Gwaradzimba ndichiremba wekudzidza munyaya dzekudzidza nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kana kuti Doctor of Philosophy in International Relations. Vanoti baba vavo ndivo vakavakurudzira kudzidza kuti vasvike pavari ipapo pari nhasi. “Baba vangu vakati ndiri murombo asi nhaka yangu yandinokupa injere dzako saka ukashanda nesimba unowana nhaka yako,” vadaro Amai Gwaradzimba. “Ndakakura ndichiti ndinoda kuzova poet kana kunyora mabhuku. Handina kumboti kana ndakura ndinozoda kuita mai, zvakazongoitikawo," vaenderera mberi Amai Gwaradzimba. "Handina kumboziva kuti ndaiva mukadzi nekuti taipihwa mikana yakayenzana, ndakatozozviona zvedambudziko remadzimai ndabuda kumba ndakunoshanda.” Vati vane chido chekubatsira vechidiki vachiri kusimukira kuti vavadzidzise zvinodiwa kuitwa kuti munhu awone zvishuwo zvake zvichizadziswa. No media source currently available

headline: Ndiri kuenda kuAfcon: Chigova
text: MUBATI wepagedhi wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors nePolokwane City yekuSouth Africa, George Chigova, anoti akarwadziwa zvikuru nekutadza kuenda kwaakaita kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) gore rakadarika nekudaro ari kushanda nesimba kuti agoenda kumakwishu aya gore rinotevera kuCameroon.   Mumutambo weAfcon 2017 uyo wakaitirwa kuGabon, Tatenda Mkuruva ndiye akasarudzwa kubatira maWarriors naKalisto Pasuwa uyo aive murairidzi wechikwata chenyika ichi panguva iyi. Asi kuzobva kwaPasuwa kuchiuya Norman Mapeza, Chigova ndiye akabva ashevedzwa kuzobatira maWarriors uye Sunday Chidzambwa – uyo akazotsiva Mapeza – akauya ndokuvimbawo naChigova.   Saka mutambi uyu ane mukana mukuru wekuve mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors gore rinotevera kuCameroon asi hunge chikwata chenyika ichi chakabudirira kuenda kumutambo uyu.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rapera apo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neDemocratic Republic of Congo kuNational Sports Stadium, Chigova anoti, “Handizvivanze, Afcon yekupedzisira ndakarwadziwa kusashevedzwa kuti ndiende kunomiririra nyika yangu, asi zvakadarika. Iye zvino ndine mukana wekuenda gore rinotevera asi hunge ndikaramba ndichishanda nesimba. Hatizive zvichaitika kubva iye zvino nepachapera mwaka, pamwe murairidzi anogona kusarudza mumwe mubati wepagedhi kuti aende saka ini ndinofanirwa kuramba ndichishanda nesimba,” anodaro.   Anoti iye zvino ari kufanirwa kuramba achishanda nesimba.   “Hazvizivikanwe kuti achange ari panyanga ndiani, chandinofanirwa kuita chete kushanda nesimba kuti ndisarudzwe. Mutambi unogona kutamba mitambo yekurwira kuenda kumakwishu aya asi wozobatiswa pasi pachikwata chinosarudzwa kuenda kunokwikwidza. Saka ndiri kufanirwa kuramba ndichishanda nesimba kuti ndishevedzwe ndigoenda kumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu – uyo ave nemakore akawanda achigara kuSouth Africa uko atambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira SuperSport United nePolokwane City – anoti hupenyu kunyika iyi hwakamunakira.  Anoti kuSouth Africa kungori kubasa chete kwaari kushanda kuti awane hupenyu hwakanaka sezvo hapana imwe nyika inodarika Zimbabwe.   “Hongu kuSouth Africa tinoenda, kubasa uye tiri kugara hupenyu hwakanaka asi chokwadi ndangariro dzedu dzinogara dziri kumusha kwedu kwatakabva.   “Zvakakosha kuti tiende kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa kunoshanda ikoko uye zvese zvatinenge tashanda todzoka kuzosimudzira hama dzedu muno,” anodaro.

headline: MaGems otarira mberi
text: MUTUNGAMIRI wevatambi vechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Felisitus Kwangwa, anoti gadziriro dzekuenda kuWorld Cup gore rinotevera dzinotanga iko zvino sezvo vanoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu.   MaGems akadadisa nyika zvekare svondo radarika zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita tikiti rekuenda kuNetball World Cup 2023 iyo ichatambirwa kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chiri kudzokera kumakwishu aya uko chakamboenda mugore ra2019 kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Kwangwa anoti zvinhu zvinofadza kutungamirira nyika yake kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku kupihwa chiremerera ichi chekutungamira nyika yangu kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “2019 ndaivepo zvekare ndiri mutevedzeri waPerpetua Siyachitema saka kupihwa mukana wekutungamirira nyika yangu chiremerera chikuru uye ndinotenda.   “Sechikwata, ndinovimba kuti tichanotamba zvinonwisa mvura kuWorld Cup nekuti takambokuenda uye tave kuziva zvinodiwa kuti tigohwina,” anodaro.   Kwangwa, uyo anotambira chikwata cheSurrey Storm kuEngland, anoti murwendo rwavo kuenda kuWorld Cup vanoda kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda sezvo ichibatsira zvakanyanya mugadziriro dzavo.   “Kutanga iko zvino tinofanirwa kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda yekugadzirira iyo ichatibatsira zvikuru patichaenda kuSouth Africa.   “Mitambo yehushamwari yakakosha, ndiyo yega nzira ichatibatsira mugadziriro dzedu,” anodaro Kwangwa.   MaGems akabudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup zvichitevera kupedza kwaakaita ari pechitatu mumitambo yeAfrica Qualifiers yakatambirwa kuSouth Africa svondo radarika.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakapedza chiri kumashure kweSouth Africa neMalawi.   Kumitambo iyi, maGems akatamba mitanhatu ndokuhwina mina uye akakundwa miviri neSouth Africa neMalawi ndokuhwina menduru yebhuronzi.   Dunhu reAfrica kuWorld Cup richange rakamirirwa neZimbabwe, South Africa neMalawi.

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweVabva Kure Kwoenderera Mberi muSouth Africa
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zviri kuenderera mberi zvichityidzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvekune dzimwe nyika muzvipatara nemumisha inogara vazhinji. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, neChipiri vakashora zvikuru vamwe vanhu vemuSouth Africa vari kuratidzira pane zvimwe zvipatara, vachidzivirira kuti vabvakure varapiwe. VaRamaphosa vakaudza dare reparamende kuti maitiro aya anokonzera kuvengwa nekurwiswa kwevabvakure uye haasi pamutemo. Vakati South Africa inyika ine hutongo hwejekerere asi ine dambudziko revabvakure vane magwaro ekugara munyika iyi nevasina, vachiti kuvhundutsira nekushungurudza vabvakure vose hakubvumidzwi nemutemo wenyika. . Chikwta chinonzi Operation Dudula chiri kuratidzira pachipatara che Kalafong, muguta reAtteridgerville riri pedyo neguta re Pretoria, chichirambidza kupinda muchipatara kwevarwere vasiri zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Asi VaRamaphosa vakati mapurisa ari kurwisa kupedza nekumisa vabvakure vari muSouth Africa zvisiri pamutemo, vachiti zviri kuitwa nevanhu veOperation Dudula hazvienderani nezvinangwa zvehutongo hwe jekerere, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa havavengi vabvakure uye vanovatambira zvakanaka. Vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti VaRamaphosa vakamanikidzwa kutaura izvi zvichitevera mabasa esangano reOperation Dudula. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti nyaya iyi inogona kupedzwa nenhaurirano pakati pehurumende yeSouth Africa nehurumende yeZimbabwe, pamwe nemapato anopikisa nevamwe vane chekuita nezve magariro evanhu mu Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Tsiva mberi, mari mumashure-Musonda
text: MURAIRIDZI wetsiva ane mukurumbira arizve nyanzvi yekuronga mitambo uyu, Clyde Musonda, anoti vatambi pakutanga havafanire kutungamidza mari asi kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Musonda anoti chinodiwa mumutambo wetsiva kuti munhu atange agadzira zita rake, zvemari zvozotevera.   “Tsiva pari zvino haina mari, vatsigirri chaivo hakuna. Asi vatambi tinovakurudzira kuti ngavasatungamidza mari sezvo chikuru kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   “Zita ndiro rakakosha nekuti ukahwina mitambo yakawanda uchirwira nzungu, mitambo ine mari inotanga kuuya uye kana mapuromota ekunze anotanga kukutsvaga voda kushanda newe nekuti vanenge vaona chiedza chakanaka pauri,” anodaro Musonda.   Musonda pari zvino ari kurairidza vatambi vatanhatu muchikwata chake cheDeltaforce Boxing Academy achitsigirwa neGypsite Sports Promotions.   Pavatambi vatanhatu ava, vana ndevemuZimbabwe nevaviri vekuMalawi.   VemuZimbabwe ndiTinashe “Chairman” Madziwana uyo anova shasha ine bhande reZimbabwe National Super Bantamweight, Collin Nyamambisha anorwa muboka reheavyweight, Simon Madanhire naTinashe Mutodza kuchizoti vatambi vekuMalawi ndiAnisha Bashil naIsreal Kamwamba.

headline: Kuramba Nyika Yoenda kuMawere Kochemedza Vakawanda
text: Kwapera makore maviri sarudzo dza2013 dzaitwa, idzo dzinonzi nevamwe dzakatsvairwa nebato reZanu PF, vamwe vachiti aive mahumbwe, mamiriro ezvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi anonzi ari kuramba achienda kumawere. Ruzhinji rwevanhu ndirwo rwunonzi rwuri kuramba rwuchitsikirirwa nekurwisana kuri kuita nzou, dzinove vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Mapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika anonzi ari kupedza nguva achitevera zvinhu zvisina maturo pamwe nekunakurirana nyoka mhenyu. Izvi zvinonzi nevamwe zvinoramba zvakaisa nyika parumananzombe, paine kutyirwa kunzi matambudziko ari muZimbabwe anogonawo kukanganisa dunhu rose rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Vamwewo ndivo vanoti vezvematongerwo enyika vari kungotsvaga kuzvisimudzira vachishandisa varombo, sezvo vasina zvavari kuita zvinoonekwa kunyange vari muhurumende kana kuti kwete. Mutauriri webato reMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF ndiyo yawondonga nyika nekuda kwehutongo hwayo hwehumbimbindonga, pamwe nekutadza kuwanisa vanhu mamiriyoni maviri mabasa akavimbiswa neZanu PF pasarudzo dzemuna 2013. VaGutu, avo vaive muhurumende yemubatanidzwa apo bato ravo rakabatana neZanu PF kuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa, varambawo kuti bato ravo rakakundikana kuvandudza zvinhu parakapinda muhurumende, asi kutoti rakafumura huwori hwarinoti hwaiitwa neZanu PF. Ukuwo, Zanu PF iri kungoramba yakabatira panyaya yezvirango zvainoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumawirira, izvo inoti ndizvo zvagwadamisa nyika nemabvi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaMorris Ngwenya, vanoti hapana asingazivi kuti zvirango zvakakumbirwa nebato reMDC ndizvo zvatadzisa nyika kuti isimuke. VaNgwenya vanoti MDC T yakatadza kugadzirisa zvinhu munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa sezvo nhengo dzayo dzakafarira kuwana zvigaro, dzikakanganwa kumirira vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Ndasuwa bhora: Figgy
text: MUTAMBI weMighty Warriors neBlack Rhinos Queens, Felistas Muzongondi,  anoti asuwa zvikuru mutambo wenhabvu.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kubvira muna Kurume gore rino.   Mitambo yakatanga kuitwa munyika muno nguva yadarika apo maWarriors akasangana neAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations Cameroon 2021.   Mutambo uyu wakatambwa pasina vatsigiri sezvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yekurwisa Covid-19.   Figgy, sezita remadunhurirwa raMuzongondi, anoti akaita rombo rakanaka rekupinda basa kuZimbabwe National Army (ZNA) pamwe nekuve mutambi wenhabvu.   Muzongondi anoti kuva nerimwe basa kuri kumubatsira zvikuru sezvo ange achikwanisa kuwana raramo panguva yelockdown asi asuwa nhabvu unove mutambo waanodisisa.   “Kubva nyika yakaenda palockdown tange tichienda kumabasa, ndizvo zvange zvichitiraramisa muhupenyu hwedu nemhuri dzedu. Semutambi wenhabvu wemuZimbabwe zvakakosha chaizvo kuita rimwe basa uye mamwe mabhindauko anounza mari nekuti anokubatsira muhupenyu hwako pane dzimwe dzenguva. Kana usina zvimwe zvekuita ndipo paye zvinhu zvinooma,” anodaro.   Muzongondi anoenderera mberi achiti, “Chokwadi ndechekuti nhabvu ndaisuwa zvikuru, ndinonzwa manyukunyuku ndichitamba ndiri munhandare asi iye zvino chakakosha hupenyu hwevanhu uye hwedu tose pamberi.”   Figgy achagara ari munhorowondo yenhabvu yemaMighty Warriors sezvo ndiye ane chiremerera chekuva kaputeni wekutanga wechikwata chenyika kuchitungamirira kuenda kumakwikwi eRio de Janeiro Brazil 2016 Olympics.   Pari zvino zvikwata zvizhinji zvevarume zvakapihwa mvumo yekutanga kuita gadziriro dzavo asi hunge kana vatambi vacho uye hutungamiri hwaongororwa denda reCovid-19.

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vashanu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1, 501. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 48 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu ane makumi namomwe nemumwe kana kuti 36, 471. Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemana ane gumi nemumwe kana kuti 34 011. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 959. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji kusanganisira vatori venhau nevanochengetedza majeri vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 36, 359. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vanoti chinangwa chehurumende ndechekuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi vabayiwe nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

headline: Vari Kunze Voshaya Vimbiso Yakadzama Kuitira Kuti Vadzoke Kumusha
text: Vanhu vemuZimbabwe vane mabhizimisi muSouth Africa vanoti havasi vose vachatambira mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvidzokere kumusha kundosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika sezvo pasina zvakajeka zvinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yava nyika inoremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese. Vazhinji vane mabhizimisi muSouth Africa vanoti dambudziko guru nderekuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa haizi kuvimbisa zvakadzama kuti vari kunze vakadzoka kumusha, vachazokwanisa here kuzovhura mabhizimisi matsva kana kushanda nehurumende murunyararo. Sachigaaro wemabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe achiri kusimukira muSouth Africa yeZimbusinessLink Forum SA, VaMarshal General Sankara, avo vane nguva refu vachigara muSouth Africa, vanoti hapana shanduko yati yaitika mu Zimbabwe inokodzera kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzikwanise kudzokera kumusha. Muzvinabhizinesi ane makambani akawanda muSouth Africa, VaAustin Moyo, avo vanova zvakare munyarikani musangano re Diaspora Care Forum, vanoti mashoko aVaMnangagwa ekuti vanhu vadzoke kumusha, hapana zvaanoreva nekuti kumusha hakuna mabasa kana mari uyewo hurumende yavo haizombokwanisa kugutsa mhuri yeZimbabwe iri munyika kana vose vari kunze kenyika. VaGarai Madziva, avo vanobva kwaRusape, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vangangode kudzokera kumusha asi matambudziko akaita sekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga, kuipa kwemigwagwa, ndiko kuri kunyanyokonzera kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe iri kunze kwenyika isafarira kudzokera kumusha. Vanoti panguva yose yavanoshanyira kumusha, kushaikwa kwemari hakunyanye kuvatambudza nekuti vanenge vakagadzirira nguva dzose. VaMadziva vanoti pari zvino ivo nemhuri yavo havangakwanise kudzokera kumusha. Vazhinji vatakurukura navo varatidza kuti havasi kuzokurumidza kudzokera kumusha vamwe nekuda kwekudhura kwezvinhu muzvitoro, kushaikwa kwemabasa nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Tsigirai Emery: Mkhitaryan
text: anoti anofunga kuti sitayera yekutamba nhabvu yaUnai Emery ichabhadhara zvikuru kuArsenal uye anokurudzira vatsigiri vechikwata ichi kuti vatsigire murairidzi wavo mutsva uyu.   Chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi chakakundwa mitambo yacho miviri yekutanga agadzwa pachigaro chinopisa zvichitevera kutsiva kwaakaita Arsene Wenger mwaka uno.   MaGunners akakundwa 2-0 neshasha dzePremier League, Manchester City, mumutambo wekutanga ndokuzokundwa unotevera 3-2 neChelsea musi weMugovera, kunyangwe akambomira-mira akanwisa kaviri.   Mkhitaryan anoti Emery anoda nguva yekuronga tsoro dzake muchikwata ichi sezvo ari kuedza kushandura mashandiro aiitwa naWenger uyo akarairidza Arsenal kwemakore 22.   “Hazvina kunyanyosiyana asi pane zvimwe zvakangosiyana hazvo nekuti vanhu vaviri ava vakasiyana uye vari kutamba kana kufunga nezvimwe zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   “Emery akachengeta mafungiro aWenger asi ari kuvaka zvimwe zvitsva. Anoziva kuti anogona kuunza zvimwe zvinhu zvitsva kuchikwata chino. Hazvisi nyore nekuti zvinoda nguva chete.   “Tinofanirwa kuramba tichishanda nesimba nekuti tine murairidzi mutsva, mafungiro matsva uye tinoda kutamba nenzira yakasiyana sepanguva yaWenger,” anodaro. – Sportsmail Football

headline: Sudan Yotora Rwendo rweZimbabwe Pakupidigura Hurumende
text: Mutungamiri weSudan, Va Omar al-Bashir, vabviswa neChina zvine chisimba nemauto avo pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kweSudan, uye vari mutevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaAwad Mohamed Ahmed Ibn Auf, ndivo vazivisa veruzhinji panhepfenyuro yehurumende, vakatiwo mauto achange achitonga nyika iyi kwemakore maviri. Vazivisawo kumiswa kwekushandiswa kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika, uye kuumbwa kwekanzuro yemauto ichange ichifambisa zvinhu kwemakore maviri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzine maonero akasiyana panyaya yekuti kupidigurwa kwehurumende yeSudan mushure mekunge vanhu varatidzira kwemwedzi mina. Maonero akasiyana ari kuuya panyaya yekuti zvaitika muSudan zvakafanana here kana kuti kwete nezvakaitika muZimbabwe muna 2017 apo vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakamanikidzwawo kusiya chigaro nemauto. VaMugabe naVa Al Bashir vange vatungamira nyika dzavo kwemakore akawanda vachishorwa kuti vaisaita sarudzo dzakajeka. Mumwe mutungamiri wenyika yemuAfrica ainge atongawo kwenguva yakareba, VaAbdelaziz Bouteflika vekuAlgeria, vakamanikidzwawo kusiya basa mavhiki apfuura mushure mekupinda panyanga muna 1999. VaAl Bashir vakatanga kutungamira muna 1989. Vakawanda vari kubvunzawo kuti African Union ine meno here ekugadzirisa matambudziko enyika dziri mugungano iri. African Union inoti iri kuisa maziso ayo pane zviri kuitika muSudan zvichitevera kupindira kwaita mauto munyaya dzematongerwo enyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda neTrust Africa muZimbabwe, VaBriggs Bomba, vanoti hapana chakanyanya kusiyana pakupidigurwa kwehurumende yaVaMugabe neyaVaAl Bashir. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru weCenter for Natural Resources Govervance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti pane musiyano uripo pakuti muSudan vanhu ndivo vakatungamira kuratidzira asi muZimbabwe mauto. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voziya neNzara Sezvo Hurumende Isina Mari yeChikafu Mubhajeti Rayo
text: Kunyange hazvo nyaya yekuwanisa vanhu chikafu iri kodzero yevanhu mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, izvi handizvo zviri kuitika munyika sezvo hurumende isina kuisa mari yakakwana parutivi yekuwanisa vanhu zvekudya mubhajeti ra2016 ramirira kutambirwa nedare reparamende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya yechikafu munyika sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuziya nenzara huri kuramba huchikwira nemamiriro akaita hupfumi uye kunze sezvo mvura isiri kunaya zvakanaka. Sangano reWorld Food Program rinoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu vakatarisana nenzara munyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoongorora nyaya dzechikafu dzinoti nemamiriro aita zvinhu mumadhorobha, huwandu uhu hwawedzera zvakanyanya. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutaura neStudio 7 kubva kumatunhu ose enyika vari kugunun’una kuti vave kunonga svosve nemuromo. Masangano anopa rubatsiro ari kutatarika kuwana mari yekubatsira Zimbabwe kuti itengere vanoshaya chikafu uye pave kutotarisirwa kuti hurumende ibatsire vanhu vayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti hurumende iri kungovimba kuti ichabatsirwa nevekunze asi izvi hazvina njere. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLiberal Solutions, vanoti hurumende yakavhiringidza hurongwa hwekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzira Kushandiswa Magwenya eZuva
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika, zvikuru sei nekushaikwa kwemagetsi pamusoro pemamwe matambudziko agara akatarisanawo nenyika. Kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Suppy Authority, ZESA, yakatozivisa vagari kuti vachange vachishaiwa magetsi munguva dzayakatara, dzingangosvika maawa manomwe pazuva, asi vazhinji vari kutaura neStudio 7 vanoti magetsi munzvimbo dzavanogara ari kudzimwa kwenguva dzinotodarika maawa makumi maviri pazuva. Vamwe vanototi vave nemazuva matatu vasina magetsi. Mukuedza kurerutsa dambudziko iri, gurukota rehurumende VaSamuel Undenge neChitatu vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vachinyanya kushandisa moto wezuva, kana kuti solar energy seimwe nzira yekuwana nayo magetsi sezvo emvura ave kunetsa. Asi vamwe vanoti kurudziro yehurumende iyi haina zvainoreva sezvo pasina hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vangawana sei magetsi ezuva aya kana hurumende isina kuvapa zvekushandisa zvacho. Mvura mudhamu reKariba, uko kunogaiwa magetsi, inonzi yadzikira zvakanyanya izvo zvoita kuti itadze kutenderedza magwenya anozogaya magetsi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti dambudziko rose iri riri kubva pakuti hurumende iri kukundina kuona matambudziko achiri kure. VaMaguwu vanoti dai hurumende yakachenjera ingadai yakaita kuti matunhu ose azvibikire oga magetsi awo, sezvo aine madhamu asina zvaari kuita. “Muchitaura Masvingo kunana Lake Mutirikwi, Manicaland kunana Osborne Dam, saka hurumende yedu ihurumende isingatarisi mangwana,” vanodaro VaMaguwu. Vanotiwo nyika inokwanisa kubata moto wezuva ichishandisa kuita magetsi, sezviri kuitwa nenyika dzakawanda dzisina magetsi anogayiwa nemvura. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemoto wezuva, vachishanda nekambani ye Exempla Solar Systems iri kuBulawayo, VaTendai Mukucha vanoti izano rakanaka riri kukurudzirwa nehurumende rekuti vanhu vatange kushandisa zvakanyanya moto wezuva. Asi VaMukucha vanoti dambudziko riri pakuti vanhu vese vanokwanisa here kuzowana zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa kuti munhu awane magetsi e solar. Vanoti vanofara nedanho ratorwa nehurumende sezvo zvichireva kuti kana yakurudzira kushandiswa kwemoto wezuva, naivovo zvinovasimudzira. “Asi takatarisa kuhurumende, tinenge takatarisawo matanho anotibatsira sevano provider equipment,” vanodaro VaMukucha. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kutengera Vashandi vemuZvipatara Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
text: Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti chimwe chave kupa kuti chirwere checoronavirus chipararire zvakanyanya munyika inyaya yekuti vakoti navanachiremba havana zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kutapurirwa chirwere ichi kana kuti maPPE. VaDongo vanoti vave nenguva yakareba vachikumbira kuti vawane zvikwanisiro zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. No media source currently available Kubva zvakatanga kupararira chirwere ichi munyika muna Kurume, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika mazana matau nemakumi maviri nevatatu. Vakoti vanoti zvekupfeka vave kutozviona kumarinda eHeroes Acre sepakashaya gamba renyika VaPerrance Shiri avo vakaradzikwa nemusi weChina.

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neIMF Apo Makambani Otadza Kubhadara Mitero kuZIMRA
text: Nyaya yekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika inenge yoramba ichinetsa zvichitevera mashoko eZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, ekuti iri kutadza kuunganidza mari yemitero yavange vachitarisira kubva kuvanhu nemakambani. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari muridzi wekambani yeManagement Solutions, VaLuxon Zembe, avo vaimbova mutungamiri weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, vanoti vanhu vose vanofanira kutsigira zviri kuitwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, zvekuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi vachishanda neIMF. Zimbabwe pari zvino haisi kupihwa zvikwereti nenyika uye mabhanga ekunze nepamusana pekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mamwe makurukota ehurumende kusanganisira rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwawo, pamwe rezvevakarwa hondo, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vange vachishora VaChinamasa zvikuru vachiti vari kurasika nekuda kuumba hukama neIMF neWorld Bank. Mari dzemitero inobatwa nehurumende dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende, kugadzira migwagwa, zvikoro, magwenya emagetsi, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa. Mukati memwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga kwegore rino, ZIMRA yakawana mari inosvika US$1,66 billion asi iyo yaitarisira mari inosvika US$1,76 billion. Sachigaro webhodhi reZIMRA, Amai Willia Bonyongwe, mumashoko avo mugwaro rezvemamiriro emari yemitero, vanobvuma kuti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwapa kuti makambani akawanda atadze kubhadhara mitero. Vanotiwo vakayedza kupa makambani nguva yakareba yekubhadhara zvikwereti vachiyambira kuomesera vari kuramba kubhadhara mari dzemitero vachiviga mari kuti ZIMRA isaone zviri kuitika, asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida . Makambani ane zvikwereti kuZIMRA zvemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZIMRA, VaGershom Pasi, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Upenyu mberi, mitambo mumashure: PSL
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League rinoti harizive kuti nhabvu ichatambwa here mwaka uno wa2020 sezvo iye zvino isiri nguva yekufunga zvemutambo, asi kuchengetedza utano neupenyu hwevanhu.   Kare mwaka wenhabvu unozivikanwa uchitanga kupera kwaKurume kana kutanga kwaKubvumbi.   Asi mitambo yegore rino yakambomiswa senzira yekutevedzera gwara rakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika President Mnangagwa rekuti vanhu vose vasaungane uye vagare kudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kutapurirana nekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chinokonzerwa neutachiona hunodaidzwa kuti coronavirus.   Zvichitevera kuwedzerwa kwakaita mazuva e“lockdown” nemutungamiri wenyika svondo rino, mutauriri wePSL, Kudzai Bare anoti ino haisi nguva yekumbofunga zvekuti nhabvu inotanga riinhi sezvo vanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uye vamwe vachifa nacho.   “Isu tiri kutevedzera danho rakatorwa nemutungamiri wenyika President Emmerson Mnangagwa rinoti vanhu vasaungane uye vagare kudzimba dzavo senzira yekuderedza kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus.   “Vanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi saka zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vagare vakachengetedzeka nguva dzose kuitira kuti Covid-19 isapararire. Isu sePSL, hatikwanise kutaura nezvekutanga kwenhabvu iye zvino nemamiriro akaita nyika nekuda kwecoronavirus, chikuru kuti vanhu vachengetedzeke nguva dzose,” anodaro.   Anoenderera achiti kana chirwere ichi chapera, ndipo pavachazoronga kuti nhabvu inotanga here uye vanenge vachitarisa nepanenge pava nenguva.   “Kana lockdown yapera uye pava nehumboo hwekuti chirwere checoronavirus hakuchisina, ndipo tinotanga kuronga kuti mitambo ichitanga, asiwo tichatarisa kuti gore rinenge rafamba zvakadii.   “Iye zvino tinongokurudzira vanhu kuti ngavange vakachengetedzeka nguva dzose vari mumba, vasafunge zvenhabvu. Upenyu ndihwo hwakakosha nguva dzose,” anodaro.   Zviri kuitwa nePSL izvi ndizvo zviri kumamwe masangano enhabvu pasi rose uko mitambo yakamira kutambwa.

headline: Sangano reThe National Age Network of Zimbabwe Rocherechedza Zuva reHutano Richitarisa Hutano hweVakwegura
text: Sangano rinoona nezvekukwegura kwevanhu munyika, reNational Age Network Zimbabwe, nhasi riri kucherechedza zuva rehutano pasi rose, reWorld Health Day. Zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa7 Kubvumbi pasi rose, asi sangano iri rakasarudza kuricherechedza musi wa 13 Kubvumbi, kumahofisi esangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO, ari kuNewlands, muHarare. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaMarck Chikanza, vanoti vachatorawo mukana wekucherechedza zuva iri vachiparurawo gwaro rakanangana nehutano hwevanhu vakwegura, uye kupemberera kusvitsa makore makumi manomwe kwesangano reWorld Health Organisation. Vanoti gwaro ravachaparura iri rakabuda mushure mekushanda kwavakaita pasi pechirongwa chinonzi “Better Health for Older People in Africa” munyika ina dzinoti Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Ethiopia, neTanzania. “Shure kwekudarozvo, takabva taona zvakakosha izvo kuti tiite iyo inonzi National Health and Aging Strategy. Muno muZimbabwe takaiti National Health Aging Strategy,” Vanodaro VaChikanza. Vanoti vakaronga kutandadza vanhu nemitambo yakasiyanasiyana, inosanganisira mhanzi kubva Salvation Army Band. VaChikanza vanotiwo vakakoka vanhu vakawanda, masangano akazvimirira, pamwe nemapoka ehurumende kumhemberero dzavo idzi. Sangano reNational Age Network of Zimbabwe, mubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira anokwana kuita gumi nemaviri, uye mubatanidzwa uyu wakaumbwa muna 2012 uchitarisa mararamiro nemashandiro aiita vanhu vakwegura, zvikuru mumapurazi. Mubatanidzwa uyu unoshandawo zvakare nemapoka maviri ehurumende, anoti rinoona nezvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe, riri pasi pebazi rezvehutano, pamwe neboka rezvekurima, reAgritex, iro riri pasi pebazi rezvekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvoita Manyama Amire Nerongo kuChipatara cheMplilo
text: Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo abvuma kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara ichi zvichitevera danho ravana chiremba vakuru munyika rekukanda mapadza pasi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo VaLeonard Mabande vati pana vana chiremba vadiki makumi mashanu nemumwe vadzingwa basa pachipatara ichi kusvika pari zvino. Chipatara cheMpilo icho chinove ndicho chipatara chikuru chechipiri munyika china vanachiremba mazana maviri nevana uye VaMabande vati kudzingwa kwavana chiremba vadiki kuri kuita kuti zvinhu zviome. Asi vati vari kuedza nepose pavanogona kuti vabatsire varwere vachiti vari kubatsirwawo nemadhokotera echiuto asi havana kukwanisa kutaura kuti vangani. Vamwe varwere vange vachiuya kuzvikamu zvevanorapwa vachibva kumba zveOutpatients neCasualty vange vachidzorerwa kumba nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana chiremba. Mumwe wevanhu vakadai ndiVaJohn Ndlovu avo vati vanonzwa musana asi vaudzwa kunzi vadzokere kumba nekuti pachipatara pange pasina vana chiremba. VaNdlovu vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals pange paine varwerewo vakawanda kuzvikamu zveOutpatients neCasualty uye vamwe vange vachidzokera kumba vasina kukwanisa kuonekwa navana chiremba. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemukuru wechipatara ichi Amai Nonhlanhla Ndlovu sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Mumwe murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti Sithole ange aine mwana wake uyo ave nenguva achirwara. Ati nekuda kwekusave pabasa kwavana chiremba anomboenda nemwana wake uyu kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira asi ati haangakwanise kuita izvi nguva nenguva. Akurudzirawo kuti hurumende naana chiremba vataurirarane vanzwisisane. Dr Tawanda Zvakada avo vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kuti hadzisi kuzotsvaga basa kuhurumende zvekare sezviri kukurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: Justice Chigumba Vanodomwa Kuva Sachigaro Mutsva weZEC
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vadoma mutongi wedare redzimhosva repamusoro, Justice Priscilla Chigumba, kuve sachigaro mutsva weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. Munyori mudare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vazivisa Justice Chigumba mutsamba yavanyora neChitatu kuti vachagadzwa zviri pamutemo sasachigaro weZEC neChina mangwanani kuState House. Studio7 ndiyo yakatanga kuburitsa nyaya yekudomwa kwanga kwakatarisirwa Justice Chigumba munyaya yatakaburitsa musi wa 26 Ndira.
