Justice Chigumba vari kutora basa rakasiiwa naAmai Rita Makarau, avo vakasiya chigaro ichi muna Zvita gore rapera paine mashoko ekuti vakasiiswa basa iri sezvo vanga vakarerekera kuchikwa cheGeneration 40 icho chainetsana nechikwata cheTeam Lacoste mukurwira simba muZanu PF. Team Lacoste inotsigira VaMnangagwa, ukuwo G40 ichinzi yaitsigira mudzimai wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Justice Chigumba vakatora mhiko yekuva mutongi wedare repamusoro muna 2012.

headline: Muzvare Nyagomo Vokurudzira Vari Kunze Kunonyoresa Kuvhota
text: Mutungamiri werimwe remapato anopikisa, reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, vanoti bato ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakapoteredza nyika vadzokere kumusha kunonyoresa kuti vazokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Muzvare Nyagomo vanoti vari kuita izvi munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mozambique, Botswana neZambia. "Isusu tiri kunyanya kuisa simba rakawanda muSouth Africa, mune vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vatinoziva kuti vanokwanisa kuenda kumba vachino register kuti vavhote. Saka tiri kuita voters education ne awareness kuti vazive kuti sei vachifanira kuti vano register izvozvi, chero vakanga vaka register kubva muna 1980," Muzvare Nyagomo vanodaro. Muzvare Nyagomo, avo vari kuManchester kuBritain, vanoti hapana imwe nzira yekuti vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kupinda musarudzo kunze kwekutoenda kumusha kunonyoresa, sezvo Zimbwbwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yakatozivisa kare kuti haina mari yekuti ikwanise kunyoresa vese vari kunze kwenyika vari munyika dzavari kugara. Bato reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe riri mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe, weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, NERA. Mapato ari mumibatanidzwa yeNERA neCODE ari muSouth Africa pari zvino munhaurirano dzinonzi dzakanangana nekuedza kuumba mubatanidzwa pakati pemapoka maviri aya. No media source currently available

headline: Kuteresa Makambani Ane Minda Munyika Kotambirwa neNyanzvi
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvekurima dzinoti dzinotambira danho rakatorwa nedare remakurukota rekuti makambani makuru ane minda munyika abhadhare mitero. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti makambani aya akanzi anofanirwa kubhadhara madhora gumi pahekita pagore kubvira muna Ndira wegore rino. Danho iri rinozi richabatsira hurumende kuti iunganidze mari yekushandisa mubudiriro pamwe nekubhadhara varimi vechichena vakatorerwa minda. Danho iri rinotevera rimwe rakadai rakaziviswa zvakare nehurumende mwedzi mishoma yadarika rekuti varimi vakagariswa patsva pamwe nevekumaruwa, vanonzi ma A1 ne A2, vabhadharewo mitero. Vekumaruwa vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora mashanu kuchitiwo vemapurazi madiki vachibhadhara madhora gumi nemashanu pagore. Asi imwe nyanzvimune zvekurima, VaBernard Manyadza, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti zvakakoshawo zvikuru kuti patariswe kuti munhu ari kushandisa ivhu iri ari kuwanawo cheuviri here kubva mariri. VaManyadza vanotiwo havatambiri pfungwa yekuti varimi vatsva kana vekumaruwa vahwandirwe nehurumende mukubvisiswa mari yekubhadhara vachena, avo vakatobuda munyika, vazhinji vacho vachinzi vave kurima vari kuZambia, kunove kwave kutengwa chibage neZimbabwe. Asi mumwe murimi mukuru, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo havaoni varimi vachiita dambudziko rekukundikana kubhadhara mitero iyi, sezvo iri pasi zvikuru, uye vagara vachiibhadhara. VaChirumhanzu vanoti havaoni hurumende iri iyo ine dambudziko kana hurongwa uhwu hwakasabudirira, sezvo paine zvipangamazano zvinoipa mazano nekunyora zvekuti itevere. Mamwe makambani makuru ari kurima munyika, anosanganisira yeTongaat Hulett, anonzi ane minda mikuru kwazvo, izvo zvinogona kuti azoguma obhadhara mari dzinodarika miriyoni yemadhora pagore. No media source currently available

headline: Muzongondi iNo. 1 . . . Zvibodzwa 41 mumwaka . . . ‘Ndinoda kuita saChunga’
text: FELISTAS “Figo” Muzongondi (33) – uyo akaita mukurumbira wekunwisa zvibodzwa 41 gore rakapera munhabvu yevasikana achitambira chikwata cheBlack Rhinos Queens – anoti kutamba kwake nhabvu ruremekedzo rukuru rwaanopa kuvabereki vake.   Vabereki vemutambi uyu vakashaika.  Munhoroondo yomuno, Figo akapotsa nezvibodzwa zvishanu bedzi kuti asvike pa46 izvo zvakanwiswa naMoses “Bambo” Chunga mugore ra1986.   Pose paanonwisa, Muzongondi anotambanudza maoko ake akatarira kumakore achitambirira.   Anoti izvi anozviitira kuremekedza vabereki vake avo vaanoti vanenge vachimuona vari kumatenga.   “Pose pandinopinda munhandare ndichinotamba nhabvu, ndinozviita ndiine chisimbiso chokuti ndiri kutambira vabereki vangu avo vakashaika kare kare,” anodaro Figo.   Amai vake vakashaika muna2003, baba vake ndokuzotevera 2007 vachisiya Muzongondi – uyo ava kushandira Zimbabwe Defence Forces – nemadzikoma ake maviri nevanin’ina vaviri zvakare.   Kunyangwe akatora mukombe wekunwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda munhabvu yevanhukadzi munyika yose, Figo anoti anobatikana mumwoyo nokurangarira vabereki vake.   “Pavakashaika, vakatisiya tichingova vana toga. Vamwe vangu vanouya kuzonditsigira kazhinji pandinotamba, asi ndinongoshuvira kuti kudai nevabereki vangu varipowo,” anodaro Muzongondi.   Mutambi uyu akatanga kutamba nhabvu mugore ra2001 paNdarama High School, kuMasvingo, uko kunova ndiko kwaakapihwa zita remadunhurirwa rokuti Figo – zvichibva pazita reshasha yenhabvu yekunyika yePortugal, Luis Figo uyo akaita mukurumbira achitambira nyika yake nechikwata chekuSpain cheBarcelona.   Anoti zita iri akaripihwa pamusana pekugona nhabvu kuita sekunge mukomana.   Mugore ra2008, akatanga kutambira chikwata cheCyclone Queens, kuMbare, ndokuzobvako oenda kuMwenzana Queens muna2014.   Muna2016, akasiya ndokunotambira Black Rhinos Queens apo akazodaidzwa kuchikwata chenyika chemaMighty Warriors uko kwaakanoita mukurumbira nezvidobi zvake munhabvu.   “Kazhinji pose pandinotamba kumaMighty Warriors, ndinombodonhedza misodzi ndichirangarira kuti dai Mwari akapawo vabereki vangu mazuva panyika ekundiona ndichitambira Zimbabwe.   “Vazhinji vakazotanga kuziva nezvangu pandakatanga kutamba muchikwata chemaMighty Warriors asi nhabvu ndakatanga kuitamba ndichiri kuchikoro,” anodaro Figo.   Muzongondi – uyo ava nemukurumbira wakanyanya pakuzunguza mambure – anokurudzira vatambi venhabvu vechisikana kuti vazvibate kana vachida kubudirira.   “Kunyangwe ukava mutambi ane mukurumbira, ukasangozvibata uye ukashaya hunhu, hauna kure kwaunosvika.   “Ukava nehunhu, zvoreva zvakare kuti unogona kutamba nevamwe zvakanaka, iya yatinoti ‘team work’. Iyi ndiyo yakakosha munhabvu.”   Figo anoti pakubudirira kwake, anotenda chikwata chaanotamba nacho chinova ndicho chinoita kuti kugona kwake kuonekere.   “Mibairo yose yandinowana ndinopa kutenda kuchikwata chandinotamba nacho nokuti ndivo vanoita kuti kugona kwangu kuonekwe. Kunyangwe zvichiratidza kushingaira kwangu, asi mutambo uyu ndewechikwata,” anodaro Figo.   Kugadzirira ramangwana rake, Muzongondi anoti ava kuita zvidzidzo zvekuti awane magwaro ekurairidza vatambi nhabvu.   Anoti kunyangwe achiri kutarisira kutamba kwemakore anotevera, munhabvu munosanganikwa netsaona dzinosanganisira kukuvara naizvozvo anofanira kugara akagadzirira. Nerudo rwaainarwo nemutambo wenhabvu, Figo anoti kana azosvika panguva yokuti haachatambi munhandare, achaita zvokurairidza mutambo uyu.   “Nhabvu ndiyo upenyu hwangu, naizvozvo kana nguva yokutamba yadarika, ndichaita zvokurairidza,” anodaro.   “Ndinorangarira gore ra2010 apo takatamba fainari yeCosafa tichikwikwidzana nechikwata cheSouth Africa munhandare yeRufaro, muHarare, ndakademba kuti dai upenyu hwaitengwa, ndainotenga hwevabereki vangu kuti vaone kudadisa kwandakaita zuva iroro.   “Taisirakashwa neSouth Africa nguva dzose asi musi uyu takaita sungano sechikwata kuti taida kuvaratidza kuti hatikundwi munyika medu.   “Tichipinda munhandare, taiva tizere neuturu hwekuda kugohwesa, naizvozvo vasikana veSouth Africa takavapa nguva yakaoma tikavakwapaidza 3-0.   “Kunyangwe musi uyu ndisina kunwisa, asi ndakatamba nemwoyo wose uye tiine donzvo rimwe chete sechikwata tikabudirira,” anodaro Muzongondi.   Figo anoti gore rino anoda kutamba nekugohwesa kudarika gore rakapera.   Shuviro yake ndeyekudarika zvibodzwa zvaChunga zvemugore ra1986 iro rinova ndiro raakaberekwa.   Kubva 1986 kudzimara zvino, hakuna mutambi wenhabvu muno ati anwisa zvibodzwa sezvakaitwa naBambo mumwaka mumwe chete. Muzongondi ndiye bedzi ari pedyo nezvibodzwa 41 zvegore rapera.   Figo anoona kuberekwa kwake mugore ra1986 sokunge zvine chirevo muupenyu hwake zvinova ndizvo zvaanofunga kuti zvakaita kuti atambe nhabvu.   “Kusangana kwemakore aya – ekubarwa kwake nekunwisa kwaChunga – kwandiri haisi tsaona, zvinoreva kuti gore irori rakakosha zvikuru kwandiri.   “Naizvozvo ndoda kugohwesa kudarika zvakaitwa naBambo mugore irori,” anodaro.

headline: ZVIBHAKERA ZVANDIRERA: MONALISA
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Monalisa “Queen of the Jungle” Sibanda, anoti hakuna chisingapere, naizvozvo vanhu ngavasanyanye kutya sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chichapera neimwe nguva.   Sibanda anotiwo mutambo wetsiva wakanaka uye kana ari iye, zvinhu zvabhadhara nekuti ari kurarama kubva mukukanda zvimbokoma zvematsenganzungu.   Vanhu vari mune zvemitambo vakawanda vakakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19 sezvo mitambo mizhinji yakambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere ichi pasi rose izvo zvakonzera matambudziko makuru uye kushushikana kune vari mune zvemitambo.   Asi muhurukuro naQueen of the Jungle, anoti zvinhu zvose zvinoitika pasi pano zvine chirevo uye Mwari vachagadzirisa zvose zvigonaka.   “Zvinhu zvose zvinoitika pasi pano zvine chirevo, hazvingoitike. Matambudziko aya achapera uye Mwari vachatitungamirira kusvika zvanaka.   “Zvinonzi chisingapere chinoshura, saka iyo coronavirus (Covid-19) yatishungurudza iyi ichasvikawo pakupera,” anodaro.   Sibanda anozivikanwa ari iye mumwe wemadzimai kubva muZimbabwe vakaita mukurumbira achitamba tsiva izvo zvakamuona achitamba mitambo 25 muboka reamatuer akaihwina yose. Akazokwirira ndokutanga kukwikwidza muboka reprofessional achirwa muJunior weight akatamba mitambo 17 umo akahwina misere uye nemabhande anosanganisira reWorld International Boxing Association (WIBA), World Intercontinental Champion iro akahwina gore radarika kuNairobi, Kenya.   Shasha iyi haina kuenda kure nechikoro asi inoti ine mufaro mukuru muupenyu hwayo nekuti mutambo wetsiva wakaichengeta zvikuru uye nanhasi uchiri kungoira- ramisa.   “Tsiva ndiwo upenyu hwangu, kubva kare uye kusvika nanhasi mutambo uyu wandichengeta zvikuru. Ndinongotenda Mwari vakandipa chipo ichi nekuti handitombokwanise kuverenga ndikazvipedza zvose zvandakawana kuburikidza netsiva,” anodaro Sibanda.   Queen of the Jungle akakomborerwa nevanakomana vatatu uye vose vari kutevera mumatsimba ake ekutamba tsiva uye mukuru wacho ane makore 16 ekuberekwa ave kutokwikwidza muboka reamatuer.

headline: Zimbabwe Yotenga Gorosi Kubva kuGermany neCanada
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe rakazivisa kuti riri kuunza gorosi kubva kuCanada neGermany kuitira kuti munyika musashaikwe chingwa sezvo gorosi rave shoma munyika. Izvi zvinoitika panguva iyo mutemo wechingwa uri kunzi wave kukwira kubva padhora rimwe chete kuenda padhora nemasendi gumi nekuda kwekushaikwa kwegorosi munyika nekukwirawo kwezvimwe zvinodiwa pakugadzirwa kwechingwa. Sachigaro veGrain Millers Association Zimbabwe, VaTadzwa Musarara, vaudza vatapi venhau nhasi kuti gorosi rave shoma chaizvo munyika uye mamwe makambani anoita zvekugaya gorosi akatomira basa izvo zvakazoita kuti vatenge gorozi kubva kuCananda neGermany. VaMusarara vatenda banga reReserve Bank nekuvapa chimwe chikamu chemari yekunze kuti vabhadhare gorosi iri uye vati bhanga iri rinotarisirwa kubhadhara mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora zvasara kumakambani akavatengesera gorosi aya kuitira kuti richitange kupinda munyika. Vanoti pane chikepe chine zviuru makumi matatu zvegorosi chakatomira kuBeira uye vachatanga kutakura gorosi iri kana RBZ yabhadhara mari mangwana. VaMusarara vati kunyange hazvo nyika ichida matani anodarika zviuru makumi matatu egorosi, vari kuunza gorosi shoma rinokwanisa kutakurwa nezvikepe zvinosvika paBeira. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu munyika huri kuramba huchikwira izvi zvinoita kuti chikafu chavanoda kudya chiwande. VaMusarara vatiwo kunyange nyika ikarima gorosi rakawanda sei, icharamba ichitenga gorosi rekunze sezvo pakubika chingwa pachishandiswa zvikamu makumi matatau kubva muzana zvegorosi remuno chete. Vati zvimwe zvikamu zvegorosi remuno zvinoshandiswa kugadzira furawa inogadzira mabhisikitis nezvimwe. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti nyika inoramba ichiita dambudziko rezvinhu zvakaita segorosi kana chingwa asi iyo hurumende ichagara ichipa vanhu mbeu, zvekurimisa, matarakita nguva nenguva. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, vakaudzawo bepanhau reHerald kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti hurumende ichaedza napose painogona kuona kuti gorosi rekubika chingwa rawanikwa munyika. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yoita Misangano Yekurangarira VaMorgan Tsvangirai neMugovera
text: Mukurangarira vaimbove mutungamiri webato reMDC, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, bato iri rinoti richange richiita misangano mumatunhu ose mangwana, Mugovera. Munyori mukuru webato iri, VaCharlton Hwende, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vebato ravo vachaendeswa kumatunhu akasiyana siyana kunotaura nevanhu. Vatiwo musangano wemu Harare uchaitwa nemusi weChitatu paAmbassador Hotel, apo mutungamiri webato iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vachange vachitaura pamwe chete nemukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, avo vakamboshanda naVaTsvangirai kuZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions. VaHwende vati iyi misangano yekurangarira vaTsvangirai naizvozvo mapurisa haana chikonzero chekunetsana nevanhu vachaunganira. VaMorgan Tsvangirai vakashaya musi wa 14 Kukadzi, 2018. No media source currently available

headline: MaGems Otendwa neKusimudza Mureza weNyika
text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems nhasi chapedza rwendo rwacho rweNetball 2019 Vitality World Cup chiri pachinhanho chechisere. New Zealand yakakunda Australia 52- kwa 51 ichibva yasimudza mukombe uyu.  Chikwata ichi nezuro chakarohwa neUganda 58-47 mumutambo wavo wekugumisira we2019 Vitality World Cup ndokupedza chiri pachinhanho chechisere mumakundano aive nezvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu zvaive zvakaungana muLiverpool, England, kubva musi wa 12 Chikunguru.  Izvi zvinotevera kurohwa kwavakaitwa zvekare neNew Zealand, Malawi, Jamaica,nhasi neUganda, izvo zvavadzorera shure mumakwikwi avakashura mare zvaive zvisingatarisirwe.  MaGems ari kudzoka kumusha misoro yavo iri mudenga mushure mekupedza vari pachinhanho chechipiri nekuenda munharaunda yechipiri kubva mugungano raive rakaoma nezvikwata zvinoti Australia, Northern Ireland neSri Lanka.  Vakatungamira chikwata ichi Amai Letitia Chipandu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kudada nechikwata chemaGems.  Studio 7 yabatawo mumwe mutambi wechikwata chemaGems Ndaizivei Madzikangava  Muteveri wezvemitambo VaTinashe Museti vanoti vasikana ava vanofanira kutendwa zvakasimba nezvavakaita kuLiverpool, kwete nemari chete.  Kaputeni wechikwata ichi Perpetual Siyachitema anoti aka kaive kekutanga kuenda kumakundano aya zvekuti vave kutarisira kuenda kuWorld Cup inotevera uko varikutarisira kunokwikwidza zvinemutsindo kutora mukombe.  MaGems arikutarisirwa kusvika akamirirwa nechaunga panhandare yendege yeRobert Mugabe International Airport mushure mekuita zvaive zvisingafungirwe nevakawanda kwete muZimbabwe chete asi pasi rese.  Vanotevera mitambo vanoti chikwata ichi chinofanira kusiiwa chakabatana kudaro chichigadzirira kurwira nzvimbo yekuenda kumakundano e2023 ayo achaitirwa muSouth Africa.  Tombotarisa zvakabuda mumitambo yeCastele Premier Soccer League yakatambwa nezuro, Dynamos neCaps United dzakaita mangange 1-1 mumutambo weHarare Derby uyo wakatambirwa muRufaro Stadium.  Mutambo uyu wakaunganidza chaunga chinotyisa icho change chichida zvakasiyana vamwe vari veMakepekepe vamwe vari veDembare nevamwewo vezvikwata zvanga zvisingatambe nhasi.  Asi mukugumisira zvikwata izvi zvagovana mapoinzi ndokusiya Makepekepe achiri pachinhanho chechitatu, Dembare iri pachinzvimbo chegumi.  FC Platinum ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pemakundano aya nepoindi imwechete pamusoro peChicken Inn mushure mekurova Chapungu 1-0 muManndava Stadium nezuro.  Mimwe mitambo yanga iriko neSvondo yakapera seizvi….  Manica Diamonds 1 Highlanders 1 TelOne 0 Mushowani 2  Mitambo yeMugovera yakapera seizvi…  FC Platinum 1 Chapungu 0 Ngezi Platinum 2 Black Rhinos 0 Chicken Inn 2 Bulawayo Chiefs 0 ZPC Kariba 0 Triangle 0 Herentals 2 Hwange 2 Yadah 1 Harare City 1  Kwatambwa mitambo gumi nemishanu, zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro-soro ndeizvi..  FC Platinum 31 points Chicken Inn 29 points Caps United 27 points Black Rhinos 24 points   No media source currently available

headline: Murairidzi weHighlanders Ochema Chema neMamiriro eNhandare yeRufaro Stadium
text: Murairidzi wechikwata cheHighlanders Henrik Pieter de Jongh anoti nhandare yenhabvu ine mukurumbira yeRufaro Stadium haikodzere kutambirwa nhabvu yepamusoro soro yeCastle Lager Premieer Soccer League. Izvi zvinotevera mangange e1-1 akaita chikwata chake neDynamos muRufaro Stadium nezuro. Vakanwisa zvibodzwa izvi ndiTinashe Mukande kuHighlanders kuchizoti Evans katema weDynamos. Asi De Jongh ari kuchema nenhandare yeRufaro Stadium. Mangange aya asiya Highlanders iri pachidanho chechinomwe nemapoinzi makumi mana yakaenzana neDynamos iyo iri pachinhanho chechisere kwasara mitambo mishanu chete kuti makundano aya asvike kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Zvikwata zvine mukurumbira izvi zviri mapoinzi gumi nerimwechete pasi peCaps United iyo irikutungamira makwikwi aya kunyange hazvo yakarohwa 2-0 neTelOne muAscot Stadium nezuro zvekare. Murairidzi weDynamos Tonderai Ndiraya anoti vatambi vake vachiri vadiki asi vadzidza zvakawanda mwaka uno zvekuti avekutarisira kuzotsvaga vamwe vatambi vashoma kubva kune zvimwe zvikwata achisimbisa chikwata ichi kuti chizokwanisa kurwira mukombe gore rinouya. Mangange ne Highlanders ave echipfumbamwe akateverana asi Ndiraya ari kuyemura vatambi vake kuti havasati vakundwa kana mumutambo mumwechete pamitambo yeligi gumi neminomwe yapfuura. Asi mumwe mutsigiri mukuru weDembare VaMichael Chindowa avo vanozivikanwa kunzi "Chuchu" vanoti chikwata chavo chinoda kugadziriswa zvakasimba. FC Platinum iri kuramba iri pachidanho chechipiri nemapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe mushure mekurohwa pamusha zvaive zvisingafungirwe 1-0 neBulawayo Chiefs. Chicken Inn iyo iri pachinhanho cheechitatu haina kutamba sezvo yaifanira kusangana neTrinagle iyo yaive nemutambo weCaf Confederation Cup ne FC Madhibou iyo vakakunda 3-2 asi ndokubuda mumakwikwi aya 4-3 mushure mekurohwa 2-0 mumutambo wekutanga.  Mimwe mitambo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yakapera seizvi…  Yadah 1 Chapungu 0 ZPC Kariba 1 Black Rhinos 0 Hwange 1 Mushowani 0 Ngezi Platinum 1 Manica Diamonds 0 Herentals 0 Harare City 0  Zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro soro ndeizvi Caps United 51 points FC Platinum 49 points Chicken Inn 46 points ZPC Kariba 45 points  Zvikwata zvina zviri pasi petafura ndeizvi…  Herentals 31 points Hwange 31 points Mushowani 30 points Yadah 28 points  Zvichakadaro, vePremier Soccer League nhasi vatora nguva ino kuita mubatanidzwa wezvikwata wemasemi fainari eChibuku Super Cup iyo yamira seizvi…  ZPC Kariba v Highlanders Harare City or Triangle v Ngezi Platinum Stars  Rugby Mhemberero ichiri kuenderera mberi muZimbabwe mushure mekunge chikwata cheSouth Africa chemaSpringboks chakatora mukombe we 2019 World Cup varova England 32-12. Kune veruzhinji munyika, kukunda kweSouth Africa kukundawo kweZimbabwe sezvo mutambi Tendai ‘The beast’ Mtawarira akaberekerwa muZimbabwe. Muhurukuro yaakamboita neStudio 7 Mtawarira akati chaive chido chake kusimudza mukombe uyu asati aenda pamudyandigere. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu Muzvare Jestina Mushore vanoti vari kufara nezvakaitika izvi vachiti chishuwiro chavo chave chekuti Zimbabwe ibudirirewo kuenda kuWorld Cup inotevera iyo ichaitwa muna 2023. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaFarai Kambamura vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kudzidza kubva kune zvakaitika izvi kuti rimwe gore isvikewo pachidanho chakadai. VaKambamura vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kurongeka kuti isarasikirwe nevatambi vakaita saMtawarira nevamwe vakaita saKennedy Tsimba uyo akapedzisirawo ave kutambira maSpringboks zvekare panzvimbo yemaSables. Aimbotambira Old Hararians Tendai ‘The Bulldog’ Chaza anoti kukunda kweSouth Africa kunosimudzirawo mutambo uyu muZimbabwe sezvo vatambi vemuno vachada kunotambira zvikwata zvekuSouth Africa, izvo zvinokwanisa kuzobatsira maSables. Aka kave kechipiri South Africa ichitora mukombe weWorld Cup uyu mushure mekuita zvimwe chetezvo muna 1995 apo makundano aya akaitirwa munyika yavo. Zimbabwe yakapedzisira kuenda kuRugby World Cup muna 1991 apo mushakabvu Richard Tsimba akaita mukurumbira unotyisa. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Joice Mujuru Vokurudzirwa Kuzvichenura Pane Zvakaitika Vachiri muZanu PF
text: Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Edgar Gweshe, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kuzvichenura panyaya yekubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo pamwe nekutyora kwekodzero. Veruzhinji vanoti bato idzva reZimbabwe People First iro riri kufanotungamirwa nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, rinofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti rikwanise kubvisa hurumende yeZanu PF iyo yave nemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu iri muhutongi. Veruzhinji vataura neStudio 7 muHarare vanoti Amai Mujuru, avo vakaparura bato ravo re Zimbabwe People First nezuro, vanofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti vakwanise kukurira Zanu PF musarudzo dzemuna 2018. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiVa Beven Chihuri avo vanogara mumusha weMabvuku muno muHarare. VaChihuri vanoti Amai Mujuru vane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe. Zvataurwa naVa Chihuri zvatsinhirwa naVa Kudzanai Musenha vanogara kuWestgate. Va Musenha vati Amai Mujuru semunhu anga ari muhurumende kubva pakawana nyika kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980, vave munhu ane rutsigiro rwakakura kwazvo kune vari muchiuto avo vakabuda pachena kuti havadi kutongwa nemunhu asina kurwa muhondo yerusununguko. Mushure mekuparura kwavakaita bato ravo, mumwe mutsigiri weZimbabwe People First, Amai Patience Madzima, vakati Amai Mujuru ndivo vega munhu anobva kubato rinopikisa anogona kuita kuti munyika muve nerunyararo kana Zanu PF ikakundwa musarudzo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Edgar Gweshe, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kuzvichenura panyaya yekubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo pamwe nekutyora kwekodzero. MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti sarudzo dzapfuura dzakabirirwa zvemhango yepamusoro-soro asi VaMugabe nebato ravo vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakaitwa zviri pachena. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reCoalition Against Corruption, Va Terry Mutsvanga, vanoti Amai Mujuru vane dambudziko rekuti vakanga vari muhurumende yeZanu PF yavanoti yashungurudza vanhu kwenguva yakareba. Zvichakadai, mupepeti webepanhau reThe Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, vanoti Amai Mujuru vanofanira kubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa kana vakamira pachokwadi kuti vari kuda kunyurura zvizvarwa kubvamumadhaka azviri. Va Thondlana vanoti Amai Mujuru vakamira vari vega havana mukana wekukunda Zanu PF musarudzo pakatarisirwa mhirizhonga inowanzoitwa munguva dzesarudzo Zanu PF ichishanda pamwechete nevari muchiuto. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato anopikisa akapinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018 asina kubatana zvinopa Zanu PF mukana wakakura kwazvo wekukunda musarudzo idzi. Nyaznvi idzi dzinotiwo mapato anopikisa anofanira kutanga nhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pachine nguva yekuti mapato aya agogadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018 zvakakwana. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai naAmai Mujuru vakabuda pachena kuti nhaurirano idzi hadzisati dzatanga uye VaTsvangirai vakatoudza vatsigiri vavo kuti vagadzirire kupinda musarudzo dzemuna 2018 vakazvimirira sebato reMDC-T. Kunyange hazvo vemapato ese anopikisa hurumende vachiti vakazvipira kubatana pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018, hapana chinobatika chavati vaita panyaya dzenhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yokurudzirwa Kuti Iferefete VaKuda Tagwirei
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kukurudzira kuti paramende iferefete zvakadzama zvakaburitswa nesangano re The Sentry, remu America rinoongorora huori hunoitwa pasi rose, pamusoro pamuzvinabhizinesi, uye ari chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, Va Kudakwashe Tagwirei, avo vanonzi vari kuita zvehuori vachiburitsa munyika mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica nenzira dzisina kujeka vachishandisa makambani avo The Sentry yakaburitsa gwaro rinonzi Shadows and Shell Games – Uncovering an Offshore Business Empire in Zimbabwe, iro rinoratidza kuti VaTagwirei vanoshanda nevakuru vakuru muhurumende kusanganisira mahofisiemutungamiriri wenyika, gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya. Mutsambambozha yakanyorerwa VaTagwirei nemumwe mukuru wekambani yavo iri kunze kwenyika, yeSotic International, Ronelle Sincliar, yakazivisa mazita evanhu vachange vari mumakambani eThe Lighthouse Trust, The Lionaides Trust, The Alcaston Trust, The Amphion Trust neThe Norfolk Trust, muchengetedzi wemakambani aya ari Dr John Mangudya. Asi The Sentry inoti hapana kujeka kuti VaMangudya vane ruzivo nazvo here kana kuti kwete. Asi Dr Mangudya vaudza Studi 7 kuti vakaverengwa gwaro reThe Sentry asi vakati havana zvavanoziva nezvenyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vanoti VaMangudya vanofanirwa kutora matanho ari pachena kana chiri chokwadi chekuti hapana zvavanoziva nemakambani aVaTagwirei, ayo ari kupomerwa nyaya yekuburitsa mari munyika nenzira dzisina kujeka ivo VaMangudya vari ivo mukuru webhanga rinopa mvumo yekuburitswa kwemari munyika. Mumiriri weDzivaresekwa muNational Assembly zvakare vari nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende yePublic Accounts Committee, VaEdwin Mushoriwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti nekuda kwekuti vakuru vakuru muhurumende vanoshanda naVaTagwirei, paramende ndiyo yega yasara inofanira kuongorora mashandiro ari kuita makambani aVaTagwirei nehurumende. VaMushoriwa vati vanoziva kuri nyaya iyi yakaoma asi vakatiwo veruzhinji munyika vanofanira kutaura kana kuita ruzha pamusoro penyaya iyi nekuti ndivo vanorasikirwa apo mari inoburitswa munyika nenzira dzisina kujeka sezvinonzi zviri kuitwa nemakambani aVaTagwirei. VaMushoriwa vati zviri mugwaro reThe Sentry zvinotsigira zvakagara zvichitaurwa nevakawanda munyika uye vati komiti yakatoita imwe ongororo pamusoro peimwe kambanani yaVaTagwirei, yeSakunda Holdings, iyo yakapihwa basa nehurumende zvisina kujeka. VaMushoriwa havana kuda kutaura nezviri muongoro yavakaita kunze kwekuti zvakabuda mungororo yavakaita zvichaburitswa muparamende mwedzi uno. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi uye vari mukuru wezvirongwa musangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Ruben Mbofana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro reThe Sentry rinotyisa sezvo richidoma vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Vati zvave pachena kuti nyika yakabatwa pahuro neVaTagwirei nechikwata chavo uye zvave kutoda ongororo inotungamirwa neparamende kana nematare edzimhosva kuongorora zviri kuitika sezviri kuitwa kuSouth Africa. Vati munhu wese ane chekuita nenyaya iyi anofanira kubvunzurudzwa uye vanowanikwa vaine mhosva voendeswa kumatare zvisinei nezvinzvimbo zvavo muhurumende kana kumapato avo ezvematongerwo enyika. VaMbofana vatiwo vana veZimbabwe vanofanirawo kutora matanho panoitika nyaya dzakadai vachiti ndivo vega vanokwanisa kudzivirira huwori hunoita kuti vatambure mari dzichiburitswa munyika. South Africa yakaumba Zondo Commission kuti iongorore huwori hunozi hwaiitwa nemhuri yekwaGupta iyo inonzi yange yabata vaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma, makurukota avo pamwe nemakambani ehurumende. The Sentry inoti nyika nemasangano ekunze anofanira kuongorora makambani aVaTagwirei muZimbabwe nekunze sezvo ari kuita bhizimisi zvisina kujeka. Intoyambirawo kuti vanoda kuita mabhizinesi muZimbabwe vangwarire kupinda mumabhizinesi anodyidzana nemakambani anonzi ari pasi paVaTagwirei, sezvo achikwanisa kutemerwa zvirango neAmerica sezvakaitwa VaTagwirei neSakunda Holdings yavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vashishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Propser Chitambara, vati havawoni VaTagwirei vachiferefetwa pakatariswa kudyidzana kwavanonzi vanoita nevakuru vakuru munyika. Muimwe tsambambozha inoratidza kuti yakabva kuna VaTagwirei musi wa Chivabvu 31, 2019, ichienda kuvakuru vakuru vemakambani ari pasi paVaTagwirei, VaTagwirei vakanyora vachiti “HE wants that money to be paid after I show him the directors, owners of Sotic documents.” Kunyange hazvo zita remutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, risina kudomwa, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dziri kutevera nyaya idzi dzinoti tsambambozha yaVaTagwirei payakati HE, yaireva His Excellency, izvo zvigona kuburitsa pachena kuti mutungamiri wenyika arimowo mudandemutande remakambani aya ari pasi paVaTagwirei. Kunze kwekuva chipangamazano chaVaMnangagwa, VaTagwirei vanonzi ihama zvakare yemutungamiri wenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Studio7 yakaedza kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvemari, asi gurukota rebazi iri, VaMthuli Ncube, vakanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo. Gwaro reThe Sentry rinoti VaNcube vanoramba kuti bazi ravo rinoziva zviri kuitwa naVaTagwirei. No media source currently available

headline: VaMadhuku Vovimbisa Kuburitsa VaHaruzivishi Mujeri Svondo Rino
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vanova gweta vanoti vane hurongwa hwekuendesa mapepa kudare repamusoro neMuvhuro kuti nhengo yevechidiki yebato reMDC Alliance VaMakomborero Haruzvivishe vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. Muzvinafundo Madhuku vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotarisira kuti VaHaruzivishe vachaburitswa muhusungwa svondo rino. VaHaruzivishe vave nemwedzi mipfumbamwe vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pane imwe mhosva yavaipomerwa asi havana kubuditswa vachinzi vaimwe mhosva yavakanzi nedare ramejastitiri vasapihwe mukana wekubvisa marti yechibatiso. Mhosva dzaVaHaruzivishe dzinosanganisira kuti vanonzi vakaramba kusungwa nemapurisa uye kuti vaida kupamba vashandi vepakambani yeImpala apo vairatidzira nevesangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Union mushure mekupambwa nekurohwa zvakaipisisa kwemumwe mudzidzi VaTawanda Muchehiwa kuBulawayo. Kunyangwe paine mumwe anofungidzirwa kuti musori akabuda pamadandemutande achirova vatori venhau nevadzidzi pakuratidzira kwevadzidzi, haasati asungwa kusvika parizvino. No media source currently available

headline: Ndiyani Achatamba neFrance Mufainari yeWorld Cup-England Kana Croatia?
text: Chikwata cheFrance chapinda mufainari ye 2018 World Cup mushure mekurova Belgium 1-0. . Chibodzwa chakabva kuna Samuel Umtiti zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichangobva kuzororo yemaranjisi chakapinza France mufainari ye 2018 World Cup iyo iriko neSvondo. France yave kusangana nechikwata chichakunda pane imwe semi fainari iriko nhasi manheru pakati peCroatia neEngland. Muteveri weHighlanders, VaSifelani Maphosa vanoti kukunda kwakaita France mumutambo mukuru uyu kunoratidza kuti chikwata ichi chakasimba zvekukwanisa kutora mukombe mukuru uyu.  Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti hapana aitarisira kuti France ingasvike mufainari vachiwedzera ivo kuti payave apa yave kunotora mukombe. Asi kunyange hazvo France yakakunda mumutambo uyu, ivo pachavo vanobvuma kuti izvi hazvina kuuya nyore sezvo Belgium yakarwisa semvumba. Belgium yacho ingadai yakakundawo mumutambo uyu dai yakashandisa mikana yakawandisa yayakawana asi panzvimbo yekurovera mabara mugedhe, yaida kuita bhora rekufamba naro mumambure. Aka kanga kave kechipiri munhoroondo yeBelgium kusvika muma semi fainari eWorld Cup. Asi iyi yave nhorooondo sezvo France yave kutarisira fainari uyezve nekutora World Cup yayo yechipiri mushure mekumboita izvi muna 1998. Mumutambo uriko na 8pm nhasi, weCroatia ne England, Croatia iri kutarisira kuna Luka Modric kuti ikunde England. Croatia ine vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvinoti Barcelona, Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid, Liverpool, Juventus, Inter Milan ne AC Milan.  Ukuwo England iri kutarisira kuna Harry Kane kuti ipinde mufainari neSvondo. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weNational Convergence Platform Unombomiswa
text: Vari kuronga musangano weNational Convergence Platform wekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigare pasi zvizeye matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, Mufundisi Sebastian Bakare, vanoti musangano uyu wava kumbomira kuitwa sezvo vanhu vazhinji vasiri kutambira musangano uyu. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare, Bishop Bakare vati vanhu vazhinji havasi kutambira hurongwa uhwu uhwo hwanga huchifanira kuitwa musi wa 24 Gumiguru, 2015. Mutauriri we National Convergence Platform, Va Vince Museve, vatiwo chimwe chiri kunetsa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigare pasi zvizeye matambudziko azvakatarisana nawo pamwe nekutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa inyaya yemari. Ve National Convergence Platform vave nenguva inokwana gore vachiedza kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviungane. Va Bakare varamba mashoko akabuda mune mamwe mapepanhau ekuti musangano uyu uri kutadza kubudirira nepamusana pekuti vanga vane vatungamiri vavanga vachida kuti vatungamire mubatanidzwa wemapato ezvematongerwo pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018 kana kuti grand coalition. Mutungamiri weProgressive Democratic Party, Va Tendai Biti, pamwe nemutungamiri werimwe boka reMDC, Va Welshman Ncube, vakabuda pachena kuti havadi kuti mutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vatungamirire grand coalition iyi. Asi vamwe vakaita saVa Simba Makoni, vebato reMavambo, Kusile, Dawn vanoti vanhu havafanire kumhanyira kugoverana mhuka yavasati vabata vachiti mapato anofanirwa kuita chirwirangwe kuti abvise hutongo hweZanu PF yavari kupomera mhosva yekuondomora hupfumi hwenyika. Va Museve vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvikaungana kuti zvizeye matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, panogona kubuda gwara razvingatevedzera mukugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Zvichakadai, Va Bakare vati seNational Convergence Platform, vachakoka munhu wese ane chekuita nekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika kusanganisira vari muhurumende, vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, masangano anoshanda akazvimirira neruzhinji rweZimbabwe. VaBakare vati musangano wavari kuda kuti uitwe uyu hausi kuzotarisa kuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika sezvo munhu wese achibatwa nezviri kuitika munyika.

headline: Tajamuka/Sesijikile Yopa Hurumende Mazuva Mashomashoma eKuti Igadzirise Zvinhu
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reTajamuka/Sesijikile, rinoti riri kupa hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa mazuva mashoma-shoma ekuti igadzirise zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika, kukundikana kwayo vanhu vanozopinda mumigwagwa nehuwandu hwavo. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kunonzi kwakaita chingwa kubva pamadhora maviri nemasendi makumi matatu kuenda pamadhora matatu nemasendi makumi mashanu kutanga svondo rino. Mukuru wesangano iri VaPromise Mkwananzi vanoti chinorwadza ndechekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinodiwa nevanhu nguva dzose iri kukwira, asi mihoro isina kwairi kuenda. VaMkwananzi vanoti sangano ravo harisi kuzopa vehurumende mukana wekufema kana vasina kugadzirisa zvinhu nekukasika, vachiti kukundikana vanhu vachaita zvakaonekwa kunanaAlgeria nekuSudan zvekubuda vachipinda mumigwagwa vachishandisa nzira dzine runyararo mukati. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vehurumende kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kutaura neIzwi Rimwe Chete paNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende itaure nezwi rimwe chete panyaya yekubayiwa kwevanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti inopinda munyika riini. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri vavo, uye ari gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakazivisa nyika nezuro, China, kuti vanhu vachabayiwa nhomba iyi pachena sezviri kuitwa kune nyika dzakawanda. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko anopesana ainge ataurwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vakamboti vanhu vachabhadhariswa mari yenhomba, asi vakazobuda vachiti vatori venhau vainge vasina kubata mashoko avo nemazvo. Kunyange hazvo VaNcube vakabuda vachipikisa zvainge zvaburitswa nesangano enhau, pane vhidhiyo iri kuburitsa VaNcube mbune vachiti mushonga uyu uchange uchitengeswa. Asi VaNcube vakazoti nhomba iyi ichapihwa vainoida pachena. Izvi ndizvo zviri kunzi naVaRusike hurumende inofanirwa kutaura neizwi rimwe chete zvikuru panyaya yakakosha kudai. No media source currently available

headline: Hatichazviita zvakare: PSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League inoti ine chivimbo chikuru chekuti varidzi vepembe havapamhe zvekare zvavakaita svondo radarika izvo zvakaona vachiramba kuridza mitambo yePSL ikazosvika pakumiswa. Svondo radarika, vatsigiri venhabvu vakakatyamadzwa zvikuru nechiitiko ichi apo varidzi vepembe vakaramba kunoridza mumitambo yePSL vasingataure chikonzero chacho.   Izvi zvakazoona PSL ichinyorera kuZifa ichibvunza kuti sei zvainge zvaitika, Zifa ndokuvimbisa kuti zvaisazodzokorodzeka zvekare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, mutauriri wePSL — Kudzai Bare — anovimbisa vatsigiri venhabvu kuti mitambo yePSL svondo rino ichatambwa pasina chinokoneso sezvakaitika svondo radarika.   “Chakachaya svondo rino, mitambo yePSL iriko uye hakuna chichakonesa kuti itambwe. “Mushure mekunge nyakanyaka yesvondo radarika yaitika, takanyorera kuZifa tichibvunza kuti sei zvainge zvaitika, ivo vakatipindura vachitivimbisa kuti hazvidzokororwe zvekare.   “Ndiko kusaka makaona kuti svondo radarika takakwanisa kuronga mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup semi-final iyo yakatambwa zvakanaka. Saka svondo rino mitambo iriko,” anodaro.   Bare anoenderera mberi achiti, “Vatsigiri venhabvu tinovakurudzira kuti vasatye, mitambo iriko svondo rino, zvose zvakagadziriswa, varidzi vepembe havambodzokorodze zvavakaita svondo radarika.” Zvakadaro, mumitambo iriko svondo rino, Dynamos ichienda kuChiredzi kunosangana neTriangle United musi weSvondo kuchiti muHarare muchange mune Harare Derby iyo ichaona CAPS United ichisangana neHarare City.   Uyu uchange uri mutambo wekutanga waLloyd Chitembwe achisangana nemaSunshine City Boys ayo aakatiza masvondo adarika achidzokera kumusha kuKepekepe.

headline: Madzishe neMasabhuku Voomesera Vanoda Kunyoresa kuMasvingo
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe nevemasangano akazvimiririra vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nemadzishe nemasabhuku eku Chiredzi, Mwenezi pamwe ne Chivi South, avo vanoti vari kuramba kubatsira vagari munzvimbo idzi kuitira kuti vakwanise kunyoresa. Mashoko ari kubuda anoti madzishe aya ari kunyima vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri vemapato anopikisa matsamba anoratidza pavanogara kuitira kuti vanyorese. Madzishe aya anonziwo ari kumakidza vanhu ava kubvisa chioko muhomwe, vamwe vachibvisiswa zvipfuwo zvakaita sehuku, mbudzi pamwe nekutengeswa doro rendari kuti vazonyorera vagari tsamba dzeuchapupu. Sachigaro we MDC-T muMasvingo, VaJames Gumbi, vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nemasabhuku nemadzishe. VaGumbi vanoti madzishe aya ari kunyanya kushungurudza vatsigiri vavo nekudaro zvinogona kuita kuti vazhinji vasazovhote gore rinouya. Masangano akazvimirira anotiwo ari kutsutsumwa zvikuru nehuori huri kuitwa nemadzishe nemasabhuku hwekubhadharisa vanhu zvipfuwo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano revechidiki, re Community Tolerance, Reconciliation and Development Trust, kana kuti COTRAD, VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanoti madzishe achatadzisa kuti vechidiki vazhinji vanyorese kuvhota nekuti havana zvipfuwo. Asi VaGumbi vati kunyange masabhuku ari kuda zvipfuwo ivo vakaendesa vatsigiri vebato mumawadhi enzvimbo idzi kuti vape vanenge vanyimwa tsamba mafomu eVR9 akasainwa nenhengo dzvavo dzeparamende pamwe nemagweta avo kuti vakwanise kunyoresa. Mamwe masangano akaita seMasvingo Human Rights Trust anoti zviri kuitwa nemadzishe kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dzekuvhota dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kutaura nemukuru wemadzishe nemasabhuku munyika, Mambo Fortune Charumbira, kuti vatipe pfungwa dzavo, vachinzi vari kuSouth Africa nemunhu adaira nhare yavo. Kunyange hazvo kwakabuda mashoko ekuti Masvingo ine vanhu vakawanda vanyoresa kuvhota kupfuura mamwe matunhu munyika, vazhinji vari kunetseka nekunyoresa nezvikonzero zvakawanda. Zvimwe zvacho ndezvekuti chirongwa ichi hachina kushambadzwa zvakakwana zvekuti vanhu vazhinji havana ruzivo rwekuti vanonyoresera panzvimbo dzipi. Kunyoresa munzvimbo dzeMwenezi, Chivi South neChiredzi kuri kupera musi wa Gumiguru 25, 2017. Mushure mezvo chirongwa ichi chinenge chopinda mumamwe matunhu ari muMasvingo.

headline: Vagari vekuMasvingo Vochema neKukwira kweMitengo yeZvekudya
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vochema-chema kuti mitengo yezvinhu, kunyanya chikafu, yakakwira zvisingaiti muzvitoro apo hurumende iri kuti mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika hwaka gadzikana. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vakashamisika svondo rino mitengo yezvikafu zvakaita sehupfu, mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nenyama zvamuka zvakakwira mutarara. Amai Rumbidzai Magomo vemumusha we Mucheke F, vanoti hupenyu huri kuramba huchivaomera nekukwira kwaita mitengo svondo rino. Chisaga chehupfu cinorema makirogiramu gumi chave kuita mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS kubva mumazana mana muchitoro che OK. Apowo kirogiramu imwe chete yenyama, yaiita mazana matatu emadhora eRtgs yave kuita mazana matanhatu emadhora akaraudzira, zvimwe chete nemafuta ekubikisa. Marita maviri aiita zana nemakumi manomwe emadhora ave kuita mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS. Vagari vazhinji vanoti mitengo iri kukwira asi mihoro yavo isiri kukwira nekudaro zvichawedzera kutambura kwavo sezvo kuwana chikafu chakakwana kunenge konetsa. Muzvare Eve Mamombe, vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yechiakafu munyika kwovashaisa hope. Sangano rinomiriria vashandi munyika, reZimbabwe Congress of Trades Unions(ZCTU), rinoti mihoro yakatarwa nehurumende yevashandi vepasi inokwana zvikamu gumi nezviviri kubva muzana pamari inodiwa kushandiswa nemhuri yevanhu vashanu munyika. Sangano rinomirira vatengi munyika reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinotiwo mhuri yevanhu vatanhatu inoda mari inosvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe yemaRTGS apo vashandi vazhinji vachiwana mari isingapfuuri zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emunyika pamwedzi. Mutungamiriri we ZCTU munyika VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo uye vadzorerwa munguva yehutongi hwevapambepfumi. Studio 7 yatadza kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezve maIndasitiri nekutengeserana munyika, Amai Sekai Nzenza vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo. Asi vachitaura mudare reparamende munguva pfupi yapera Amai Nzenza vakati hurumende iri kushushikana nekukwira kwemitengo uye vachashanda nemamwe mapazi ehurumende kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende inogara ichiti zvinhu zvakanaka munyika iyo mitengo ichikwira kudai. VaLovemore Mashinga vanoti ivo nenyaya yekudhura kuri kuita zvinhu vave kutodya kashoma pazuva. Vanoona nezve hupfumi hwenyika vanoti mitengo iri kukwira mumari yemunyika nekuti iri kukwikwidzana ne mari yekunze yakasimba yeku America iyo yave kubvumidzwa kutenga. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yotanga Kutengesa Mapeni Madukuku eGoridhe Kune Veruzhinji.
text: Sekuvimbisa kwarakaita svondo rapera kuti raizodira pamusika mapeni egoridhe e Mosi-oa-Tunya ane mutengo wepasi uye huremu hwepasipasi hwe one tenth ye ounce anosvika zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti 4 500, bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe razivisa kuti mapeni aya ave kuwanikwa pamusika. Bhanga guru iri rati mapeni aya ave kukwanisa kutengwa kubva kumabhanga, kuHomelink, pamwe nezvitoro zveAurex kutanga nChipiri 15 Mbudzi 2022. Izvi zvinotevera kutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe makuru kutanga muna Chikunguru wegore rino pahurongwa hwehurumende neR-B-Z hwekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi inoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Developemnt Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanoona kuuya kwemapeni madikidiki aya kuchipawo mukana kune veruzhinji wekuti vange vachikwanisawo kuchengetedza mari dzavo kuburikidza nemapeni aya. Ukuwo, mukuru werimwe sangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa, reVendors Intiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, VaSamuel Wadzai Mangoma, vanoti hurongwa uhwu hwakanaka chose kana hwakaitwa zvakajeka. Asi vanoti veruzhinji vanotya kuhutambira kana vakacheuka shure vachitarisa zvakamboitika apo hurumende yakadzika zvirongwa zvakazotsvaira nekurovesa mari dzavo dzaive mumabhanga. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru wemumwe mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, weZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, avo vanoti sevashandi, vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunovakwa pamwe nekudzikamiswa nezvigadzirwa zvinobva kumakambani emunyika, kwete kuburikidza vezvirongwa zvakanangana nekudzimura rimi remoto nguva iyoyo chete. VaShamuyarira vanoti zvizhinji zvezvirongwa zvinodzikwa nehurumende izvi zvinogumisira zvatosiya vashandi vave varombo kudarika pazvinenge zvisati zvadzikwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gavhuna veR-B-Z, Doctor John Mangudya kuti tinzwe kuti mapeni aya atambirwa sei neveruzhinji. Asi bhanga guru renyika rakavimbisa kare kuti hurongwa hwemapeni egoridhe uhwu hahuna wahunosiya shure, uye huchasvika nzvimbo dzose dzenyika. R-B-Z inoti kutenga mapeni ndeimwe nzira yekudyara nayo mari yakanangana nemunhu wese. Bhanga iri rinoti kubva muna Chikunguru wegore rino kusvika pari nhasi mapeni anodarika zviuru gumi nechimwe, kana kuti 11 000, anokosha madhora emunyika $11,4 billion atengeswa munyika uye mapeni egoridhe aya akwanisa kutsvaira mari dzanga dzichitenderedzwa pamusika mutema izvo zvadzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekuderedza inflation. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Zvichemo zveVarairidzi Panguva Iyo Vashandi Vayo Vari Kuti Vave Kushanda Mazuva Maviri Chete
text: Vabereki nevadzidzisi vokurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya yemihoro yevashandi vehurumende kusanganisira varairidzi vachiti izvi zvikasaitwa zvinokanganisa zvakanyanya dzidzo yevana. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo rimwe sangano remubatanidzwa wemamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende, reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions (ZCPSTU), iro raimbozivikanwa se Apex Council, rakazivisa neChishanu kuti vashandi vehurumende vese vachange vachizoshanda mazuva maviri chete pasvondo kutanga neMuvhuro unouya. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti mari dzavari kupiwa dzekufambisa dzinongokwana mazuva maviri chete. Nhaurirano pakati pesangano iri nehurumende nemusi weChina hadzina zvadzakabudisa. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzakabvumirana kuti nemari irikupiwa nehurumende vashandi vachange vachienda kubasa mazuva maviri chete, Muvhuro neChipiri kutanga nemusi wemuvhuro. Amai Sandra Gavi, avo vane vana vaviri vari kudzidza pane chimwe chikoro chehurumende muHarare vati kana varairidzi vakabatana nevamwe vashandi kuenda kumabasa mazuva mashoma zvinosiya vana vavo vari munataisireva. Amai Gavi vati nekuda kwekuvharwa kwakamboitwa zvikoro gore rapera, vana vavo vakasarira shure zvakanyanya sezvo vakange vasiri kuita zvidzidzo zvepadandemutande. Mumwe mubereki, VaBanny Manokore, vanotungamirira National Association of School Development Associations and Committes, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoshungurudzika zvakanyanya nekuti panorwa nzou huswa ndihwo hunokuvara. VaManokere vati varairidzi vakaenda kuzvikoro mazuva mashoma pavhiki rega rega vana vechikoro havakwanisi kupedza zvidzidzo zvinotarisirwa zvepagore. VaManokore vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zvinhu dambudziko remari yemihoro yevarairidzi risati radzika midzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa reAlmagamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure vakurudzira hurumende kuti ingopa varairidzi mari yavaiwana muna 2018. VaMasaraure vati nekuda kwedenda ririko reCovid-19 zvakakosha kuti nguva shoma vadzidzi yavari kuzvikoro vadzidze zvakakwana. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vayambirawo vakatiwo injodzi kuendesa varairidzi vasina rufaro kunodzidzisa vachitiwo kunyangwe pamazuva anenge achiendwa kubasa, varairidzi havanodzidzisi nemoyo yese sezvo vanenge vachinetsekana nekuti vorarama sei nemari shoma yemihoro. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havana zvavangataure pamusoro penyaya iyi vakati titaure nebazi rinoona nezvevashandi vehurumende. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rebazi iri, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima. No media source currently available

headline: Mitengo Yotarisirwa Kukwirazve neKuda kweKudhura kweMafuta
text: Nyaya yekushomeka kwemagetsi uye kudhura nekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kwave kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu iwedzerwe panguva iyo vashandi vasiri kuwedzerwa mari. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers Association, VaDenford Mutashu, vayambira vanhu kuti mitengo ichawedzera kukwira kwayo muzvitoro sezvo mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari akawedzerwawo nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMutashu vanotiwo vamwe vemuzvitoro vatoregera kutengesa zvimwe zvinhu nenyaya yekushaikwa kwemagetsi. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaHenry Ruzvidzo, vanotiwo kushaikwa kwemagetsi kwave kuita kuti bhizimisi kunetse. Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaGilbert Muponda, vati makambani anofanira kupihwa masimba ekuti vagadzirise dambudziko remagetsi kuitira kuti varambe vachiita basa. VaMuponda vatiwo mutemo unofanira kuchinjwa mukutengwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma kudai, munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi havasi kuwedzerwa mari vachipa semuenzaniso vashandi vehurumende. VaRuzvidzo vanoti vanoda chose kugadzirisa matambudziko evashandi kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvaita mhidigari. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro, kambani yeEconet yakati yave kuomerwa nekuita basa sezvo mutengo wekuita basa uri kuramba uchiwedzera. Kambani iyi inotiwo mari yemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari yawedzerwa nezvikamu zvinodarika mazana mashanu kubva muzana ukuwo dhora remunyika reRTGS radonha nezvikamu mazana mapfumbamwe kubva muzana kubva muna Ndira. Kambani iyi inoti mari yakawanda yave kupera vachitenga dhiziri kuti vashandise magwenya nekuti magetsi ari kudzimwa kwenguva yakareba dzimwe nguva maawa anodarika gumi nemasere. Kukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu kuri kupawo kuti inflation irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru uye Zimstats yakati yainge yasvika pazvikamu zana nemakumi manomwe nezvishanu kubva muzana mwedzi wapera kunyange hazvo hurumende yainge yati inofanira kunge yasvika pazvikamu zviri pasi pegumi mukupera kwegore. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yoita Sarudzo neSvondo Vamwe Vachigunun'una
text: Sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira Zanu PF musarudzo dzichaitwa, kana kuti primary elections, dziri kuitwa nemusi weSvondo kunyange hazvo paine kugunun’una kwevamwe kuti vakarambidzwa kutsvaga rutsigiro nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi vari kunzi vafambe vose pamwe chete vachitsvaga rutsigiro uye kuratidza kuti vanotsigirawo zvizere mutungamiri webato iri, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti sarudzo idzi dzinoitwa musi mumwe chete.  No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voenderera Mberi Vachiita Misangano kuChina.
text: Mutungamiriri we nyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuenderera mberi nemisangano yavo ku China vachitsvaga nzira dzekusimbaradza kudyidzana kwe China neZimbabwe munyaya ndzehupfumi. VaMnangagwa vasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeChina, VaLi Keqiang. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu Va Li vati vafara kuona VaMnangagwa vachishanyira China. VaMnangagwa vaitawo musangano nasachigaro we National People’s Congress, VaLi Zhanshu. Vaendawo kumarinda anovigwa magamba emu China. VaMnngagwa vapedza zuva ravo nekunoona muzinda we Huawei Communications uko vapihwa mari inoita zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora yekutsigira chirongwa che Presidential Scholarship Fund Muongorori wezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Percycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistence Gwanyanya, vanoti hazvina kuipa kuenda kunze nekupindawo misangano yakawanda yezvehupfumi asi, VaMnangagwa vanofanira kuziva kuti havangadzoki vasina chavakabata kunyika kuti zviratidze kuti mari yose inoshandiswa pakufamba kwavo ine zvairi kuunza munyika. Vatiwo hazvingagoni kusiyanisa zvematongerwo enyika nezvehupfumi sezvinhu zvinofambidzana saka VaMnangagwa vanotobatanidza zvese kana vachifamba nenzendo dzavo kunyika dzekunze semutungamiriri wenyika. VaGwanyanya vatiwo mari yapihwa VaMnangagwa sechipo kuhomwe ye Presidential Scholarship Fund chiratidzo chekuti Huawei iri kusimbisa hukama nekutsveterawo kuti irambe ichiwanawo mikana yebhizinesi munyika . No media source currently available

headline: Human Rights Watch Yokurudzira Kuti Vana Vasashandiswa Mumapurazi eFodya
text: Zimbabwe iri kukurudzirwa nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reHuman Rights Watch, kuti ichengetedze kodzero dzevana vachiri pasi pezera, avo vari kushandiswa muminda yefodya zvisiri pamwero. Sangano iri raparura gwaro reongororo yarakaita pakushandiswa kwevana vadiki mumapurazi efodya munyika. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vari kushandiswa mumapurazi efodya zvinoita kuti muchetura we ‘nicotine’ upinde muganda ravo uchikonzera zvirwere. VaMavhinga vanoti sangano ravo rayambira hurumende pamusoro pezvirwere izvi uye kuti idzike mitemo yakasimba inobatsira vana ava uye vanhu vakuru vari kushanda vasina kupfeka mbatya dzinodzivirira muchetura uyu. “Pane chirwere chikuru chinobva mukubata fodya, ingava nyoro kana yakaoma, kana paya painopiswa chinonzi muchetura we ‘nicotine’. Kana vana vachishanda mumunda vanenge vachinzwa kupera simba, kuda kurutsa, kusvotwa kana kuita sevane nyongo. Ndizvo zvimwe zviratidzo zvekuti pane chirwere ichocho,” VaMavhinga vakaudza Studio 7. “Takaonazve kuti vana nevabereki nevarimi vefodya vazhinji, vange vasingatozivi dambudziko iroro.” VaMavhinga vanoti vakaita hurukuro nehurumende pamusoro penyaya iyi uye vakavimbiswa kuti hurumende ichaedza kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kutanga nekuisa mitemo yakasimba inochengetedza hutano hwevana. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vanoti Mitemo yeHurumende Yopa Kuti Nzara Ipfunye Chisero Mudzimba Dzavo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichibvuma kuti hupfumi hausi kufamba zvakanaka uye kuti veruzhinji havasisina mabasa gore rino yakatora matanhano akawedzera kutambudzika kweveruzhinji akaita sekuvatandanisa mumigwagwa umo vaitengesa kuti vawane raramo pamwe nekuvaputsira dzimba ichiti dzimba idzi dzainge dzavakwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Gore rino hurumende yakapa mvumo kumakanzuru kuti adzinge vanotengesa mumigwagwa zvikuru sei panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe ichiti vaisvibisa maguta nemadhorobha. Asi vanhu ava vanoti makunzuru aya ari kutadza kuvapa nzvimbo dzavano kwana vese sezvo vawanda zvikuru nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemabasa. Izvi zvaita kuti gore ra2015 ripere vashandi vemakanzuru nemapurisa vachiita hwakiti nagonzo nevanotengesa mumigagwa. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa reZimbabwe Informal Sector Organization zvakare vari mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anomiriria vanotengesa mumigwagwa reInformal Economy Coalition, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vanoti kunyange nhengo dzavo dziri kushungurudzwa vacharamba vachitengesa mumigwagwa sezvo pasina zvimwe zvavangaite. VaMkwananzi vanoti nhengo dzemasangano avo dziri kurasikrwa nemari yakawanda chose apo dzinotorerwa zvinhu zvadzo nemakanzuru nemapurisa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya vanoti pane kushungurudza vanhu, makanzuru pamwe nehurumende vanofanira kugadzirisa dambudziko raita kuti vanhu vagume vave mumigwagwa vachitsvaga chouviri. Asi VaPaddington Japajapa avo, vanomirira sangano remabhizimisi reZimbabwe Centre for Business for Opportunities, vanoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vayaura nenhamo havafaniri kurarama nekuita zvinhu zviri kunze kwemutemo. VaJapajapa vanoti sangano ravo rinotsigira vemabhizimisi madiki nevanotengesera mumigwagwa asi rinodawo kuti vatevedze mitemo vachiti zvimwe zvave kutikita mumaguta hazvina kunaka sezvo vanhu vave kutengesera pese pese. V ashorawo danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekurambidza kupinda munyika mbatya neshangu tsaru vachiti izvi ndizvo zvave kuraramisa veruzhinji sezvo makambani anogadzira mbatya akavhara. Imwe nyaya isina kufadza veruzhinji kuputsirwa dzimba dzavo nekanzuru muHarare neChitungwiza nekanzuru vachinzi vainge vadzivaka panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Asi VaManyanya vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti makanzuru anorega vanhu vachivaka nekushandisa mari dzakawanda achimirira kuzoparadza chete. VaManyanyaya vanotiwo masangano anomiriria vagari a anofanirawo kudzidzisa veruzhinji mutemo nematanho anofanira kutedzwa nemunhu asati avaka. Asi VaJapajapa vanoti vanhu havafanira kuvakapa pese pese vachiti dzimwe dzimba dziri kuputswa dzakavakwa panzvimbo dzisingaite dzakaita sepasi petambo dzemagetsi kana nzvimbo dzinofanira kuvakwa zvikoro kana machechi. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vaivaka nechisimba vachishandisa zvematongerwo enyika. Vanongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitika zvese izvi zvakakonzera kutambura kwanyanya sezvo zvakaita kuti vanhu varasikirwe nemari yakawanda. VaKuchera vanoti mhuri zhinji munyika hadzichakwanisa kurarama sedzaiita kare. VaKuchera vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mutemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi kuti vatange mabhizimisi munyika kuti veruzhinji vakakwanise kuchengeta mhuri dzavo. Vanoti mhuri zhinji dzaparira nepasi rese dzichitsvaga raramo uye zvinofungidzirwa pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mamiriyoni matatu zvave kugara kunze kwenyika. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vari kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBritain. No media source currently available

headline: Masoja Opomerwa Mhosva Yekuda Kuita Kafiramberi Vagari Vari Pamamwe Mapurazi ekuChegutu
text: Vamwe vevanhu vakagariswa patsva vanosanganisira vaimbove varwi vehondo yerusununguko vanoti vari kushungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti masoja mumapurazi ari pedyo neChegutu. Vakagariswa patsva ava vanoti masoja ainge akapfeka mbatya dzechiuto uye vaine motokari dzainge dzisina manhamba vakavashungurudza vachiti vabve pamapurazi eDorith neStanley pedyo neChegutu kana kuti vanoitwa kafiramberi. VaLivingstone Nyamadzawo avo vakanga vari muchiuto vanoti masoja mashanu akasvika pamba pavo akavataurira kuti vabve pamunda nekuti vakasabva vaizodzoka kuzovauraya. VaNyamadzawo avo vane tsamba kana kuti Offer Letter yepamunda pavari vanoti masoja aya akati havana basa nevezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vakabvisa vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mumwe mugari VaMathew Paul vanoti masoja akauya kumba kwavo akafanana nevakauraya vanhu vatanhatu muHarare sezvo vainge vasingade kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanaani. VaPaul vanoti mumwe musoja akazvivisa saMuswere Moyo uye vakanomhan’ara kumapurisa emuChegutu. Amai Mairesi Nyirenda vanoti masoja akati pane vanhu vashanu vavari kuda kuuraya nekuda kwenzvimbo yavakagara. Amai Nyirenda vanoti vave kutya kusiya vana vavo vari vega nekuda kwekuita kwemasoja aya. VaNyamadzawo vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo vakambobviswa papurazi ravo gore rapera asi vakadzoserwa nematare. Sachigaro wekomiti yezveminda mudunhu reChegutu VaTariro Tom, vanoti havazive nezvehurongwa hwekubvisa vanhu pavagere sezvo pari kuitwa wongororo yekuti ndiani ane munda uye wakakura sei nedonzvo rekudimura mimwe minda ichipihwa vasina. VaTom vanoti parizvino komiti iyi iri mudunhu reHurungwe vachiti masoja aya ari kuita zvisiri pamutemo. Mumiriri weChegutu muparamende VaDexter Nduna avo vanonzi vaishoropodzwa nemasoja aya vanoti vanhu ava havasi masoja chaiwo sezvo vari kupesana nezviri kukurudzirwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti zvinhu zvese zviitwe pamutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West Inspector Clemence Mabgweazara vati titaure naAmai Charity Charamba avo vanga vasingadavire mbozhanhare yavo sezvo ivo vasingabvumirwe kutaura nyaya dzinechekuita nemasoja kune vatori venhau. Mutauriri wemauto VaEverson Mugwisi vati tivanyorere tsambambozha kuti vaferefete nyaya iyi. Asi pataenda kumhepo vange vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo iyi.

headline: Vagari vemuMasvingo Vanoti Mari yeChirongwa cheKuendesa Masimba Kumatunhu Ngaigadziriswe Dambudziko reMvura
text:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanopfuura chiuru vakanyorera dare reparamende gwaro kuti rikurudzire hurumende kuti iise mutemo wekuti mari yechirongwa chekuendesa masimba kumatunhu kana kuti devolution muMasvingo ishandiswe mukutenga mishina mitsva inopomba mvura sezvo iripo isiri kushanda zvakanaka. Vagari ava vachitungamirirwa nesangano ravo reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kan kuti MURRA, vakasiya gwaro iri kumunyori wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mundenda, vachiti vaneta nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura iro rinogona kupedzwa zvachose kana
pakatengwa ne kuvandudza mishina inopomba mvura kudhamu reMutirikwi.

Vanona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira vanoti danho iri ndiro chete ringapedze dambudziko remvura. Vagari vanoti mari yedevolution iri kuuya iri kuiswa kune zvimwe zvirongwa zvakafanana nekuvandudza mapaipi esuweji nekugadzira migwagwa izvo vanoti hazvina kunyanya kukokosha.
Mumwe mugari akasainawo gwaro iri, Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe vanoti sevagari vane simba rekutaura zvavanoda kuti zviitwe. Mishina iripo iyo yachembra inopomba mvura inosvika mamega litres makumi matatu, ayo anokwana vagari zviuru makumi mana nevashanu pazuva, asi mudhorobha rave nevagari vanopfuura zviuru zana. Vagari zana vanoda mamega litres anosvika makumi mashanu pazuva. Studio 7, yatadza kubata mutauriri wedare VaMundenda avo vange vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kana kupindura tsamba kuti tinzwe divi ravo uye
nezvetsamba iyi. Asi sangano reMURRA raratidza Studio 7, gwaro racho rine chidhindo
chedare reparamende chekutenda kuti rakagamuchirwa. Nhengo yeparamende yeMasvingo Urban, VaJacob Nyokanhete, vebato reMDC-Alliance, vati vanotsigirana nevagari veMasvingo.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo negurukota redunhu reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira, vanozvazve nhengo yeparamende kuMasvingo West, vari vebato reZanu PF vatiwo.
Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti danho rakatorwa nevagari rakanaka, uye sekanzuru vanotsigirana navo vachiti panodiwa mari inosvika mamirioni makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica kuti paitwe chirongwa chekutenga mishina mitsva kuti
dambudziko remvura ripere zvachose. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba veHurumende Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Vanachiremba vanoshandira muzvipatara zvehurumende vanoti vangangokanda mapadza pasi chero nguva mushure mekunge hurumende yakundikana kuzadzisa zvivimbiso zvayakavapa pavakamboramwa mabasa gore rapera. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba ava, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Fortune Nyamande vanoti iri ndiro danho ravanogona chete kutora sezvo hurumende iri kuratidza kusave nehanya nemararamiro avanachiremba. Doctor Nyamande vanoti bazi rezvehutano rinofanirwa kunzwisisa danho ravo kana vakazoramwa mabasa sezvo hupenyu huri kuramba huchiomera vanachiremba. Vanoti hurumende yakanga yavavimbisa kuti ichaita kuti vakwanise kupinza dzimotokari dzavanenge vatenga kubva kunze vasingabhadhariswe mari dzemitero, asi hapana zvati zvaitwa kubva gore rakapera. Vanotiwo zvakare hurumende yakanga yavimbisa kuti ichatarisa nezvechichemo chavo chekuti itarise zvakare nyaya yepekugara, asi chave kuvashamisa ndechekuti mitero yedzimba ndiyo yakatokwidzwa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi Doctor Nyamande vanoti havasati vave nezuva rwekuti vachatanga kuramwa mabasa riini. “Handikwanisi kupa zuva, uye handikwanisi zvakare kutaura kuti ticharatidzira sei asi chandinongoziva ndechekuti zvinhu zvakaramba zvakamira mamiriro azvakaita izvi eeh, vanachiremba tichagara pasi,” vanodaro Doctor Nyamande. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vashandi Mubazi reKurima Vanoti Hurumende Haisi Kuvabata Zvakaenzana.
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi mubazi rezvekurima, reZimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA) rinoti hurumende haisi kubata zvakanaka vanhu vanoshanda mune zvekurima richiti nhengo dzaro dziri kushandiswa dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuCovid-19. Munyori weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vebazi rezvekurima vanoshandira mumaguta akaita se Harare vari kubatsirwa nezvekuzvidzivirira asi avo vanonzi vashande mazuva ose mumaruwa havasi kupiwa zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19. VaZhou vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa hupenyu hwevashandi vose kusvika kuma wadhi emumaruwa. Studio7 yakundikana kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi rezvekurima, VaGibson Chijarira, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Vakawanda Vachinetsekana Kuwana Mari
text: Vabereki vakawanda vanonzi vachakundikana kugadzirira zvakakwana kudzokera kuchikoro kwevana vavo neChipiri pachatanga kotoro yepiri, nekuda kwekunetsa kwemari kumabhanga pamwe nemunyika yose. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti sesangano vatambira mashoko ekuti mitsetse yekutora mari kumabhanga yanga yakareba kudarika mamwe mazuva, uye mamwe mabhanga apererwa nemari. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza kuMazowe asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti azokwanisa kuwana mari yekuti mwana afambise mushure mekumira mumutsetse wepabhanga kwenguva ndefu kwazvo. Mabhanga mashoma asara achipa mari anonzi anga achipa madhora makumi maviri chete pamunhu, mari inonzi nevakawanda haina zvikuru zvainobatsira nazvo. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa pasina zvati zvagadziriswa pane zvinetswa zvekotoro yapera zvinosanganisira hwaro hwedzidzo hutsva, kana kuti curriculum. Doctor Zhou vanoti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vane dambudziko rekuona vanofunga kuti vari kusiiwa kunze panyaya yehwaro hwedzidzo hutsva sezvo pasina zvati zvaitwa zvekuvabatsira kuti vave nemabhuku ekushandisa. Vanotiwo nyaya dzemari dzemihoro dzevarairidzi hadzina kutaurwa nezvadzo, izvo zviri kuita kuti varairidzi vanyunyute zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti VaMugabe Varemerwa neMutoro weKutonga
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakundikana kutonga nekudaro vave kufanira kuchienda pamudyandigere. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaTsvangirai vati tsika yaVaMugabe yekuti hupfumi hwaenda kumawere nenyaya yezvirango uye vanhu vekuChina vave kunzi vari kuita kuti nyika ishomekerwe nemari kutsvaga kweashaya kutsvaga uta mugate. VaTsvangirai vanotiwo hupfumi hwenyika hunokwanisa kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi kana hurumende yakazvipira kugadzirisa zvinhu uye kumira nyaya dzekuita zvehuwori. Vanoti muhurumende yemubatanidzwa vakakwanisa kugadzira zvinhu nechimbi chimbi kunyangwe hazvo hupfumi hwainge hwave kumaziva ndadzoka. Bato reMDC riri kuratidzirawo mumaguta ose enyika richiti harisi kufara nenyaya yehuori uye mabond notes ari kuda kuparurwa nebhanga guru renyika reRBZ. Kumwe kuratidzira kuri kwaMutare nemusi wa 25 Chikumi. No media source currently available

headline: VaDos Santos Varadzikwa Nhasi Vopinda Muchikwata cheVatungamiri veNyika dzemuAfrica Kusanganisira VaMugabe Vakafira Kunyika Dzakabudirira
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabatana nhasi kuLuanda, Angola nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica parufu rwevaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJose Eduardo dos Santos avo vakashayikira kuSpain musi wa 8 Chikunguru. VaDos Santos varadzikwa nhasi pazuva ravangadai vasvitsa makore makumi masere. Vamwe vatungamiri vange vari parufu apa vanosanganisira VaCyril Ramaphosa, South Africa, VaFelix Tshisekedi, DRC, uye mutungamiri wePortugal VaMarcelo Rebelo de Sousa. VaDos Santos vari pakati pevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakafira kunyika dzekumawirira nekumabudazuva vachirapwa sezvo zvipatara zvakawanda munyika dzavo nemuAfrica zvisina zvikwanisiro. Vamwe vatungamiri vakafira kunze vanosanganisira VaRobert Mugabe vakafira kuSingapore, VaLevy Mwanawasa vekuZambia vakafira kuFrance, VaMichael Sata vekuZambia zvekare vakafira kuBritain, VaMeles Zenawi vekuEthiopia vakafira kuBelgium, VaUmaru Musa Yar’Adua vekuNigeria vakafira kuSaudi Arabia. Ko chii chinopa kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanorapwa kunze kana vachinge varwara uye dzimwe nguva kufa vari kunyika dzakabudirira? Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica havaendese mari kumapazi ezvehutano sezvinosungirwa nechibvumirano chavakanyorerana cheAbuja Declaration. Chibvumirano ichi chinokurudzira hurumende kuti dziendese zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti kubazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inoti Vanhu Ngavazive Bato Rakauraya Nyika
text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwenemapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari muMDC Alliance, vanoti kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vachiri kufarira kusiya basa kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanhu havafaniri kukanganwa kuti VaMugabe vaishanda nebato reZanu PF iro rakakonzera nhamo yavari kuona munyika. Vanoti matambudziko evanhu anogona kupera kana Zanu PF yabva pachigaro. Vachitaura mumushure memusangano wenhengo dzekomiti yeMDC Alliance inoona nezvekutsvaga rutsigiro nekuronga musangano, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, zvakare vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC inotungamirwa, naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaMorgen Komichi, vakati kusiya basa kwaVaMugabe hakurevi kuti nhamo yapera. VaKomichi vakati VaMugabe munhu aishanda nebato reZanu PF uye Zimbabwe iri mumatope ayiri nekuda kwebato iri, nekudaro matambudziko ari munyika anogona kupera chete kana Zanu PF yabva pachigaro. VaKomichi vakati kusiya basa kwaVaMugabe kwaka tombovhiringa zvirongwa zveAlliance uyewo kukanganisa kunyoreswa kwevanhu kuvhota. Asi VaKomichi vakati komiti yavo muAlliance yave kuenderera mberi nebasa ichifambisa zvirongwa mumatunhu ese munyika uye tariro yavo ndeyekuti mutungamiriri mutsva wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiita zvavakavimbisa zvekuti nyika ichaita sarudzo dzakachena. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwai,vakati kuenda kwaVaMugabe hakufaniri kudzorera kumashure hondo yekuunza hutongi hwejekekere munyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vakatiwo hapana chakashata kuti vanhu vafarire kuenda kwaVaMugabe vachiti murume uyu ange atambudza vanhu munyika yose. Vakati chakakosha igwara richatorwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa kubva pari zvino. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vanoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakafara zvikuru vakabatana nemasoja mukupembera kuenda kwaVaMugabe, vave kuzviona kuti matambudziko avo achipo. Vati zvinhu hazvigoni kunakaira vanhu nekuti vanhu vese vaishanda naVaMugabe vachipo uye zvinhu zvinogona kuramba zvakaoma munyika. Asi VaMudzengi vanoti VaMnangagwa vane mukna mukuru wekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pamwe nekuti vemapato anopikisa vashaye basa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevakaremera, VaAbrahama Matata, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inogona kuramba ichiwana rutsigiro kubva kune veruzhinji kana ikaita zvido zvevanhu. VaKomichi vanoti komiti yavo iri kufamba mumatunhu ese enyika ichironga misangano yekutsvaga rutsigiro apo iri kugadzirira sarudzo dzegore rinouuya. Pari zvino komiti iyi yakatoenda kumatunhu anoti Matabeleland South, Matabeleland North, Midlands North neMidlands South, Chitungiza neHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeZIBAWU Dzinoratidzira paBhanga reStanbic
text: Nhengo dzeZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union (ZIBAWU) dzaratidzira muHarare pabhanga reStanbic riri muna Samora Machel dzichinyunyuta nekudzvanyirirwa kwadzinoti kuri kuitwa vanhukadzi nebhanga iri. Vashandi vemumabhanga ava vanga vachinyunyuta nekudzingwa kwemumwe mushandi wechidzimai nebhanga reStanbic, Amai Verity Mutsamwira. Amai Mutsamwira vaitungamirira sangano revashandi vekuStanbic. ZIBAWU inoti ndivo vaive mukadzi wekutanga kumiririra vashandi vebhanga. Vachitaura neStudio7 apo vanga vachiratidzira, Amai Bernice Maluleke, avo vanoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi muZIBAWU,vati nhengo dzavo dziri kunyunyuta zvikuru nekumbunyikidzwa kunoitwa kodzero dzemadzimai kubanga reStanbic. Amai Maluluke vanoti Amai Mutsamwira vakadzingwa nekuda kwekuti vaimirira kodzero dzevashandi. Imwe nhengo yeZIBAWU, MuzvareRumbidzai Choto, vati kutsikirirwa kwevanhukadzi pamabasa ndozviri kukonzera kuti vanhukadzi vasawana zvigaro zvepamusoro mumapazi akasiyana-siyana munyika. Muzvare Choto vayambiro bhanga reStanbic vachiti rikasagadzirisa mabatiro ariri kuita vanhukadzi, sangano ravo richaramba richiratidzira. Mutungamiriri weZIBAWU, VaFarai Katsande, vati vanoda kuti bhanga reStanbic ridzosere Amai Mutsamwira pabasa. VaKatsande vapomerawo bhanga iri mhosva yekuramba richidzvanyarira vashandi vakati izvi zvinofanirwa kuchinja sezvo nyika yakasununguka. Vamwe vashandi vebhanga iri varamba kudomwa nemazita vati hutungamiriri hwebanga iri hauremekedzi vanhukadzi uye vanotsikirira vanhukadzi kuti vasawana hutungamiriri kana kusimukira pabasa ravo. Nhengo dzeZIBAWU idzi dzakatozoenda kumatare edzimhosva kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa avarambidza. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebhanga iri sezvo vakuruvebanga iri vanga vasiri mumahofisi avo.

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Pfungwa dzeVashandi Vakawanda
text:
Vamwe vana mukoti nanachiremba vakawanda vanonzi vave kubatwa nedambudziko rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa nekuda kwemashandiro avari kuita munguva ino yekurwisa dambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa nezuro wakapindwa nevagari vemudunhu reMashonaland West. Vachitaira pamusangano uyu, m ukuru anoona nezvehutano hwepfungwa mudunhu reMashonaland West kana kuti Provincial Mental Health Officer, Dr Tichaona Mahachi, vakati vana mukoti navana chiremba vanosvika mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 683 vakarwara nekusagadzikana kwepfungwa uye vamwe vanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mudunhu kubva patanga chirwere ichi gore rapera. Dr Mahachi vakatiwo hurumende iri pakati pekuita dzidziso yakanangana
nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano kuvagadzirira kuti vasavhiringwe hutano
hwepfungwa pavanenge vachiita basa ravo nerutsigiro kubva kubazi
reUnicef.

Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti dambudziko
rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa riri kuitikawo mune mwamwe matunhu. Vati hurumende iri kuita dzidziso kunana mukoti navana chiremba mumatunhu aya. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa huwandu hwevana chiremba nevakoti vari kusangana nedambudziko iri munyika yose. Asi mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland Central, Dr
Cremance Tshuma, vati dambudziko iri harisi mudunhu mavo.

Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vanomwe
vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu
hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana
mashanu ane makumi mashanu, 4,550. Vamwe vanhu mazana mana ane gumi nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvasvitsa vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19
kubva zvachatanga pavanhu zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nazvitanhatu
nemazana masere ane gumi nevanomwe, 126 817.

Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga
yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni maviri ane
zviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 2 873 893. Vabayiwa nhomba dzose dziri mbiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave miriyoni
imwechete ine zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 1 926 247. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu
mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana
kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurukurwa kuMusangano weAfrican Commission kuMauritania
text: Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR, yaudza musangano wekomishini yekodzero dzevanhu muAfrica uri kuitirwa kuMauritania kuti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu zvizhinji sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Mutauriri weZLHR, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nemauto gore rapera zvinofanira kugadziriswa kuitira kuti hurumende idzokere zviri pamutemo. VaMafunda vanoti mitemo yose inodzvanyirira vanhu inofanirwawo kubviswa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. “Tine shungu dzokufarawo kana paitwa zvakanaka asi tinoramba tichichema chema nenyaya dzekugadzira mitemo kuti ienderane mebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Apa ndinoreva mitemo yakaita seElectoral Act, nemitemo yevatori venhau yakaita seAIPPA nePOSA ngaiende,” vadaro VaMafunda. Musangano weAfrican Commission on Human and People’s Rights unopera musi wa 9 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: Vatambi baiwai nhomba: SRC
text: SANGANO reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riri kukurudzira vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti zvigobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi pamwe nekudzoswa kwemitambo nekuchimbidza.   Mitambo yose pari zvino yakambomiswa nekuda kweCovid-19 kunze kweyezvikwata zvenyika chete inosanganisira yeZimbabwe Cricket apo maChevrons ari kubandana neBangladesh mumitambo yeOne Day International, Twenty20 Series neTest match series.   Muchinyorwa, akafanobata chigaro chadirector-general weSRC – Sebastain Garikai – anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vose vaibaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19.   “Kunyanzvi dzemitambo zvakakosha kuti tikoshese chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezviri kuitwa neveruzhinji nekuti zvinobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Kana chirwere ichi chikarwiswa, zvinobatsira zvakare pane zvatiri kuedza kuita mukudzosa mitambo yose, ichidzoka iine vatsigiri asi vari vashoma,” anodaro Garikai.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Tichitarisana nekumiswa kwemitambo yeChibuku Super Cup, zvakaratidza kukosha kwekubaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 nekuti zvikwata zvaive nevanhu vakawanda vakabatwa neCovid-19 ndizvo zvaive nevashomawo vakabaiwa.”   Garikai anoti pari zvino SRC pamwe nemasangano akasiyana vari kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita zvinhu munyika maringe nedenda iri.   “Tiri kuongorora zvose zvinenge zvichiitika kuti todzosa sei mitambo, naizvozvo tichange tichiongorora svondo rega-rega tichiita hurukuro negurukota revechidiki nerezveutano nekurerwa kwevana,” anodaro.
