Garikai anoti pari zvino mitambo yenhabvu haikwanisike kuti idzoke asi hunge kana zvikwata zvemuPSL zvikatevedzera chirongwa chebio-secure bubble izvo zvinoreva kuti vatambi venhabvu, hutungamiri hwemutambo uyu nevaridzi vepembe vanenge vachigara pavo voga kusina veruzhinji.   “Nhabvu pari zvino inogona kudzoka chete kana chirongwa chebio-secure bubble chiri kutevedzerwa izvo zvinoona vatambi venhabvu, vatungamiri vezvikwata nevaridzi vepembe vose vachigara pamwe chete vasingasange neruzhinji. Izvi ndizvo zviri kuitwa nevecricket nerugby, ndiko kusaka mitambo yavo iri kutenderwa kutambwa.   “Tose tinoda kuona kukasika kudzoka kwemitambo. Asi kudzoka kwayo kunofanirwa kunge kuchienderana nesainzi, mitemo yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) nemitemo yeHurumende,” anodaro.

headline: Varairidzi Vokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Ivadzivirire Kubva kuCovid-19 Panovhurwa Zvikoro
text: Masangano evarairidzi, anoti reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, neZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, ari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti panovhurwa zvikoro varairidzi nevadzidzi vanenge vakadzivirirwa kuti vasabatwe nechirwere che coronavirus. Masangano aya ari kukurudzira kuti pave nemichina yekuti vakwanise kuongororwa kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete muzvikoro zvose uye kuti muve nezvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa mukudzivirira chirwere ichi. Masangano aya anoti atora danho iri zvichitevera mashoko ekuti bazi rezvedzidzo rinotarisira kuwana mvumo kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti zvikoro zvivhurwe, asi hapasati pave nenguva chaiyo yekuti zvingavhurwa riini. NeMuvhuro PTUZ yakanyorera kumunyori webazi redzidzo ichipa zvainofunga kuti zvingabatsira mukuenda mberi panyaya yedambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19 nebandiko redzidzo. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti kunyora kwavakaita tsamba iyi kunotevera kukokwa kwavakaitwa nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo kuti vapewo pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pedambudziko iri. Doctor Zhou vanoti kana hurumende yakavhura zvakare zvikoro panguva iyo panenge pasati pave nekujeka kuti nyika iri kuenda mberi here kana kuti kwete mukurwisana nechirwere ichi, inenge yarasika zvikuru. Vanotiwo sezvo vabereki vasiri kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekumbovharwa kwenyika kana kuti lockdown, hurumende inofanirwawo kuita kuti vabhadhare chidimbu chepakati chemari dzechikoro kotoro inouya, sezvo vachiona vabereki vasiri kukwanisa kubhadhara mari dzose. Ukuwo, sangano reZIMTA svondo yapera rakanyorerawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa, richisvitsawo pfungwa dzaro pamusoro pekuti zvikoro zvingadzivirirwa sei kubva ku coronavirus. Zvikoro zvaifanirwa kunge zvichivhurwa musi wa 5 Chivabvu, asi hurumende haisati yatara zuva razvichavhurwa. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti zvikoro zvose zvinenge zviine mvura senzira yekuchengetedza hutsanana munguva ino yedambudziko reCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa chekuChina Hachina Kufa neCoronavirus:Wilkins Hospital
text: Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi varamba mashoko ekuti munyika mune chizvarwa chekuChina chakafa nechirwere checoronavirus. Dr Chonzi vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti chainge chisina chirwere ichi. Chizvarwa chekuChina chechidzimai ichi chakatanga kurwara chiri kwaMutare chichibva chaenda kuna chiremba wacho wekuChina uyo akati chiende kuWest End Clinic. Asi vanachiremba pachipatara apa vakabva varamba kumuona vachibva vati aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital uko akafa ari munzira. Dr Chonzi vanoti kune chimwe chizvarwa chekuItaly chakaendeswa kuchipatara ichi chichiti chairwara asi chakazonzi hachinawo chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vafa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose uye muAfrica chiri kuSouth Africa, Nigeria, Algeria neEgypt. Vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika chiuru zana. No media source currently available

headline: Zvimwe Zvikoro Zvorambidza Vabereki Kushanyira Vana Vavo Pachityirwa Korera
text: Zvimwe zvikoro zvakaita seChinhoyi High mudunhu reMashonaland West zvave kurambidza vabereki vane vana vanodzidza vachigara muzvikoro izvi kushanyira vana vavo kana kuvaigira chikafu senzira yekudziviri kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mumwe wevanochengeta vana vanodzidza vachigara pachikoro cheChinhoyi High asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati hapana mubereki ari kubvumidzwa kuuya pachikoro apa, uye hapana chikafu chekunze chiri kubvumidzwa pachikoro apa. Muchengeti wevana uyu ati pachikoro apa pane dambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvekuti vehutano vakavabvakachira vachiona kuti zvakamira sei pachikoro. Mumwe mubereki, VaSimon Moyo, avo vanga vauya kuzoona mwana wavo vaine zvekudya, vati varambidzwa. Vatiwo vakuru vechikoro vanofanirwa kupatsanura zvekudya zvingangoita korera kwete kurambidza zvekudya zvese zvese nezvinenge zvatengwa muzvitoro. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanotengesa zvinhu muChinhoyi vashoropodza hurongwa hwekanzuru hwekubhadharisa zvimbuzi uye kuti vatengesere pedyo nezvimbuzi. VaKillian Mashoko vati kanzuru inofanirwa kumbomisa kubhadhariswa kwezvimbuzi zviri munzvimbo dzekutandarira mudhorobha. VaMashoko vati kanzuru haifanirwe kupa vanhu pekutengesera pedyo nezvimbuzi izvo vanoti hazvina hutano. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rekanzuru yeChinhoyi panyaya iyi. Hurumende yakambomisa kuungana kwevanhu vakawanda panzvimbo imwechete nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri munyika pari zvino. Chirongwa cheZimbabwe International Book Fair changa chichifanirwa kutanga muHarare neMuvhuro, chakambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere chekorera icho chatekeshera muHarare, zvikuru munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji dzeGlen View neBudiriro. No media source currently available

headline: VaChasi Vanoti Hurukuro neEskom Dzichiri Kuenderera Mberi paNyaya yeMagetsi
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vanoti hurukuro nekambani yeESKOM yekuSouth Africa panyaya dzekuti Zimbabwe itengeserwe magetsi dzichiri kuenderera mberi. VaChasi vaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino South Africa haina magetsi ari kutengesera Zimbabwe. No media source currently available Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kukambani yeESKOM iyo yakaita chikwereti chemari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri emarands mukushanda kwayo kubva gore rapera kusvika muna Kurume gore rino. Kambani iyi yave kurarama nerubatsiro rwairi kupihwa nehurumende yeSouth Africa. Vakuru muESKOM vari kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kubhadhara chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu emadhora ekuAmerica kana ichida kutenga magetsi. Zvichakadaro, makambani mazhinji munyika ari kuti ari kutatarika nenyaya yekushaya magetsi zvopa kuti mamwe avhare kana kuti ati vanhu vashande maawa mashoma husiku panenge paine magetsi. Asi dambudziko iri riri kupa mukanha kune mamwe makambani akaita seZimplow iyo iri kutengesa magwenya emagetsi kana kuti magenerator. Kambani iyi inotiwo yakaita zviri nani gore rino kunyangwe zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. Mukuru mukambani iyi kana kuti Group Chief Executive VaVimbayi Nyakudya vanoti kambani yavo iri kuitawo mari nekutengesa magejo anodonzwa nemombe munyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: China Yotumira Gurukota Rayo Kunoshanya muZimbabwe
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa muChina, General Chang Wanquan, vakapinda munyika neChitatu murwendo rwunonzi nevanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nezvechiuto hwakanangana nekusimbaradza mauto eZimbababwe panguva iyo munyika zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati rwendo urwu rwakakosha zvikuru uye Zimbabwe inotenda China zvakanyanya nekuibatsira kwainoita. Hurumende inoti General Chang vari kuda kuona kuti zvibvumirano zvakanyoreranwa pasi gore rapera pakati peZimbabwe neChina zvazadzikiswa. Asi vakawanda munyika vanoti havana chavari kuona pazvibvumirano izvi sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Kunze kwekutengesera Zimbabwe zvombo zvehondo, China yakavakirawo Zimbabwe muzinda wemauto uye kambani yekunyika iyi yemauto yeAnjin iri pamakambani ange achichera mangoda kuChiyadzwa. Mauto emuZimbabwe ave kunyanya kuzemberana neChina kubva zvakatamerwa nyika zvirango nehurumende dzekumawirira ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaTakura Zhangazha, avo vanoshanda nesangano reVoluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kungoringa kumabuda zuva chete panyaya yekudyidzana asi kuti itarisi kumativi mana ose enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hatizi DeMbare: FC Platinum
text: SHASHA yeCastle Premiership FC Platinum inoti vatsigiri venhabvu kana vaongorori vemutambo uyu  ngavasafananidze chikwata chavo neDynamos iyo yakasvika kufainari yemutambo weCAF Champions League mugore ra1998.   Zvikuru zvange zvichitarisirwa kubva kuFC Platinum gore rino apo yakabudirira kupinda mumagroup-stages eCAF Champions League ayo anozivikanwa semini-league, kekutanga munhorowondo yechikwata ichi.   Asi isati yambosvika kure, FC Platinum yakatoburitswa mumumakwishu aya zvichitevera kutadza kwayakaita kuhwina kana mutambo mumwe chete zvawo muboka rayo muGroup B kubva mumitambo mina yayatamba.   Iye zvino FC Platinum yasarirwa nemitambo miviri chete neOrlando Pirates pamwe neEsperance of Tunisia uye kunyangwe ikaihwina hazvichabatsire chinhu.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuno, chikwata cheDynamos ndicho chega chakakwanisa kuita zvinorova mumutambo uyu izvo zvakachiona chichisvika kufainari mugore ra1996 uye ikazombosvika kumasemi-fainari muna 2007.   Zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira FC Platinum zviri kukundikana kutevera mumatsimba eDeMbare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weFC Platinum – Chido Chizondo – anoti zvikwata hazvifanane uye ivo pavakasvika mumakwishu aya vanofara napo nekuti ndipo pavaishuvira kusvika.   “Musatifananidze neDynamos isu, pedu patakasvika ndipo chaipo pataida kusvika. Chikuru chamunofanirwa kuziva ndechekuti isu tave nemakore 11 tapinda muPremier League saka hamungatienzanise nanaDynamos vagara kwemakore akawanda.   “Tichiri kudzidza uye tinovimba kuti patichadzoka tinogona kusvika pane chimwe chinhanho,” anodaro Chizondo.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti anonzwa sei sezvo chikwata chavo chakatadza kuhwinha kana mutambo mumwe chete, Chizondo anoti,  “Patakatosvika zvakatoringana zvakadaro nekuti isu chataingoda chete kusvika kumagroup-stages emutambo uyu, zvimwe zvese zvaizouya ibhonasi.   “Patakahwina tikiti rekukwikwidza mumakwishu aya takazviudza sechikwata kuti chatinoda kupinda mumagroup-stages ayo anozivikanwa semini-league chete. Saka sechikwata takasvika pataida kusvika, zvimwe zvese hazvisisina basa. Kana tikazodzoka mwaka unotevera tinenge tave kutarisa zvimwe zvatinoda kuti zviitike,” anodaro Chizondo.   Zvisinei, shasha yekuongorora nhabvu ari mutsigiri mukuru wemutambo uyu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, anoti FC Platinum ichiri kudzidza nezvemutambo uyu.   “Champions League ave makata, saka sechikwata munofanirwa kugadzirira zvakasimba.   “Mumaonero angu, FC Platinum iri pakudzidza nezvemutambo uyu saka vanoda kupihwa nguva uye ivo ngavagadzirire sechikwata nekuti zvinosuwisa kuti mumitambo yavatamba votadza kunwisa kamwe chete zvako.   “Ivo sechikwata vanofanirwa kuita vachibvunzawo kune zvimwe zvikwata zvakaita seDynamos kuti vakasvika sei kufainari, vonzwa mazano ayo andinoona kuti anogona kuvabatsira,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mutambo unotevera weFC Platinum mumakwishu aya, ichatamba svondo rinotevera apo iri kunanga kuSouth Africa kunotamba neOrlando Pirates yozopedzisa svondo rinozotevera paichasangana neEsperance muno.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKorera Huri Kuramba Huchikwira
text: Hurumende inoti hwuwandu hwevanhu vafa nevari kubatwa nechirwere chekorera huri kuramba huchikwira. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakati vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vanga vafa nechirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakatiwo huwandu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pavanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe ane makumi matanhatu nevana. VaMoyo vakataura mashoko aya nezuro apo vakange vachitambira rubatsiro rwekurwisa chirwere chekorera. VaMoyo vakati kunyange hazvo huwandu uhwu huri kukwirira, vane tarisiro yekuti hudzike munguva shoma shoma iri kutevera sezvo hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana kupedza chirwere ichi. VaMoyo vakatiwo hurumende iri kumisa kutengeswa kwezvinhu mumigwagwa muguta reHarare rese. Hurumende inoti iri kushanda pamwe chete nemakanzuru kuendesa mvura yakachena kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko rechirwere chekorera. Kambani yenharembozha yeEconet yapa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni gumi emadhora, ukuwo Lotto pasi pe President’s Fund yapawo rubatsiro rwezana rezviuru zvemadhora. Mari iyi ichashandiswa mukurwisa korera. Kambani yedzimotokari yeQuest yapawo bazi rezveutano rhori yekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. No media source currently available

headline: Messi oshuwira World Cup
text: Lionel Messi, anoti anoda chaizvo kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup iyo ichatanga masvondo mashoma ari kutevera kuRussia. Shasha yeBarcelona iyi haasati ambohwina mukombe mukuru achitambira nyika yake uye anoti dai zvaikwanisika aishandura mumwe wemikombe 32 yaakahwina neBarcelona ouhwina nenyika yake.   Kaputeni weArgentina uyu aive muchikwata chakakundwa neGermany mufainari yeWorld Cup mugore ra2014 uye mwaka uno akahwina mikombe yakawanda neBarcelona. Izvi zvakamuona achihwina La Liga uye neCopa del Rey.   “Ndaigona kushandura mukombe mumwe chete neBarcelona, kuushandura kuita wenyika yangu,” Messi akaudza El Trece. “Kuhwina mukombe weArgentina zvinhu zvingave zvikuru kwandiri zvandingayemura.”   Zvisinei, Messi akataura hake kuti chikwata chaJorge Sampaoli hachisi chimwe chezvichatarisirwa kuhwina kuRussia pachatanga makwishu eWorld Cup musi wa14 Chikumi.   “Ndinovimba zvikuru nechikwata chino, tiri kushanda nesimba tese, tine vatambi vane tarenda guru uye tichasvika kure,” anodaro. – SportsMail Football

headline: Vamwe Vashandi veMuzvipatara Vozengurira Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-189 neKuda kweKushaya Ruzivo Rwakakwana
text: Huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vari kubayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina huchiri hushoma zvakanyanya. Kusvika nemusi weMugovera kwange kwabayiwa nhomba vanoshanda muzvipatara zviuru gumi nezvishanu zvine mazana manomwe nevashanu kana kuti 15, 706. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agness Mahomva vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti vamwe vave kutya kubaiwa nhomba nekuda kwemashoko enhema ari kutenderera pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana achikurudzira vanhu kuti vasatambire nhomba iyi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti hapana dzidziso yakakwana nezvenhomba iyi kubva kuhurumende zvopa kuti vamwe vazengurire kubayiwa nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Pastor Mawarire Votarisirwa Kumiswa Pamberi peMatare neMusi weChina
text: Pastor Evan Mawarire, avo vakasungwa muHarare neChitatu, vari kutarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare ramejastiriti muHarare vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Asi mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro rine magweta ari kumirira Pastor Mawarire, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti mufundisi ava vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. Gurukota rinoona nezvevasori VaOwen Ncube vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu vasungwawo nemapurisa kusvika pari zvino, uye mapurisa anoti vanhu vatatu vafa mukuratidzira uku. Asi sangano reAmnesty International rinoti vanhu vasere vafa, ukuwo sangano reHuman Rights Watch richiti vafa vanosvika vashanu. VaMafunda vanoti Pastor mawarire vari kumirirwa nemagweta anosanganisira Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, VaDouglas Coltart, naVaTonderai Bhatasara. Vanotiwo magweta esangano ravo ari kumirira vanhu vakawanda chose vakasungwa mumaguta akasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoiswa Mugungano Rakaoma kuNetball World Cup
text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe chemaGems chaiswa mugungano rakaoma kumakundano e 2019 Netball World Cup. MaGems eZimbabwe aiswa mugungano rimwechete nechikwata chine mukombe uyu Australia, Northern Ireland pamwe ne Sri Lanka mumakwikwi achaitwa kubva musi wa 12 kusvika 21 Chikunguru muLiverpool kuEngland gore rinouya. Asi Zimbabwe haifanire kunyanya kutemwa nemusoro nekuti zvikwata zvitatu kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya ayo ari kuunganidza zvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu. Zimbabwe iri kutanga kurwira mukombe uyu musi wa 13 Chikunguru apo irikusangana neSri Lanka, zuva rimwechete Australia ichangobva kubandana neNorthern Ireland. Sri Lanka ndiyo iri pasi pasi mugungano iri muhurongwa hwenetball pasi rese zvekuti mukuru weZimbabwe Netball Association Muzvare Leticia Chipandu vanofunga kuti vakarova Sri Lanka chete, zvavo zvinenge zvaita. Mumwe mutsigiri wemutambo uyu Muzvare Charity Muzanenhano vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda mumutambo wavo neSri Lanka kuti nzira yavo ichene. Asi mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTichafa Kathumba vanoti Australia chete ndiyo inotyisa mugungano iri. Aka ndiko kekutanga Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kubudirira kuenda kumakundano aya kubvira muna 1963 apo makwikwi aya akavambwa. Zimbabwe yakasvika padanho iri mushure mekupedza iri pachinhanho chechipiri pasi peUganda kuma Africa Netball Championships. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri kumiririra Africa kumakwikwi aya iSouth Africa, Malawi ne Uganda. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Matatu neVashanu Vofa neCovid-19 neMusi weChitatu
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vakashaya nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weChitatau zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe negumi nemumwe kana kuti 3, 7011. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 1, 091 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino vave zana rezviuru negumi nevatatu nemazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nematanhatu kana kuti 113, 526. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 1, 424 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi masere nemaviri zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemana kana kuti 82 994. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mananemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi masere nemakumi matanhatu nematatu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe kana kuti 863, 667. Hurumende inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti ishande zvinotarisrwa

headline: Vanoona neZveKufambiswa kweMari yeHurumende Amai Chiri Vokurudzira Kubatwa Zvakanaka kweMari dzeMitero
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende kana kuti Auditor-General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vanoti hupenyu hwevanhu munyika hunogona kusimuka kana mapazi ehurumene, makambani ayo pamwe nemakanzuru akatevedzera zvavanokururudzira kuti zviitwe mushure mekuongorora mashandisirwe anotwa mari yehurumende. Muhurukuro neStudio 7 Amai Chiri vanoti ongororo dzavanoita pamashandisiro avanoita dzinogona kubatsira chete kana mapazi ehurumende, makambani ayo pamwe nemakanzuro akatevedza gwara rakanaka rekushandisa mari dzehurumende. Vanoti chinangwa chavo pavanotaura nezvekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemari, vanenge vachida kuti zvigadziriswe kuti vanhu vabatsirikane. Ongororo dzinoitwa nemahofisi avo kusanganisira ichangobva kuitwa ya2020, inoratidza kuti mari hadzisi kushandiswa zviri pamutemo, dzimwe hadzizivikanwe kuti dzakasashandiswa sei. Semuenzaniso muna 2020 bazi rezvemati rinonzi rakapa mapazi ehurumende mari dzinodarika zana remabhiriyoni emunyika kana kuti 100 billion Zimbabwe Dollars pasina mvumo yedare reparamende sezvinokurudzirwa. Kanzuru yeHarare yakatadza kutsanangura kuti mari inodarika miriyoni yemadhora ekuAmerica yakawanikwa pakutengeswa kwenzvimbo dzekuvakira yakashandiswa sei. Gore rimwe chetero Auditor General vakaburitswa gwaro rairatidza kuti mari inodarika miyoni yemadhora ekuAmerica iyo yaifanira kupihwa vanotambura, vakaremera pamwe nemhuri dzinotumgamirwa nevana panguva yeCovid-19 dzakapihwa vanhu vasingakodzeri kana vasingazivikamwe nebazi rezvemagariro evanhu. Amai Chiri vanoti zvinoita kuti veruzhinji varasikirwe sezvo variivo vanofanira kubatsirikana nemari idzi. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo zvichitora nguva kuti mapazi ehurumende, makambani ayo nemakanzuru agadzirise zvinhu, vanofara kuti pari zvino pane mamwe mapazi nemakambani ave kugadzirisa zvinhu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, vari kushandandawo neZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission (ZACC) nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandisirwo emari dzehurumende kuona kuti nyaya dzehuwori nekusashandiswa kwemari dzehurumende zvakanaka dzakagadziriswa. ZACC ndeimwewo yakanzi nehofisi yawo haisi kushandisa mari zvakanaka uye yakabvuma mhosva yavo ikati iri kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mapurisa nebazi rezvemari anonziwo haana kufambisa mari zvakanaka nehofisi yaAmai Chiri. Amai Chiri vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti mari dzavo dzemitero kuhurumende, kana kuti maPublic Funds dzinonoshandiswa sei nekudaro vave kudhinda gwaro nemitauro yemuno vachitanga neChishona neNdebele vozoenda kune mimwe mitauro. Vatiwo ishuviro yavo kuti dai vawedzerwa mari kuti vakwanisa kuvhura mahofisi mune mamwe matunhu munyika kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti nyika inorasikirwa nemari yakawanda inofanira kubatsira veruzhinji nekuti hapana chido chekugadzirirsa nyaya dzehuwori kubva kuvatungamiriri venyika ino. Kunyange hazvo Amai Chiri vasina kukwanisa kutaura kuti imarii inorasikrwa nenyika nekuda kwekuda kwehuwori kana kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwemari, Transparency International inoti Zimbabwe inorasikirwa nemari inosvika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerice gore rega rega nekuda kwehuwori. Hofisi yaAuditor-General, inosungirwa nemutemo kuongorora mashandisirwo anoitwa mari nemapazi ehurumende, makambani ayo makomisheni nemakanzuru uye kuti iture gwaro rezvainenge yawana nezvinofanira kuitwa kuparamende.

headline: Dhora remuNyika Roramba Richishaya Simba paMusika weRBZ
text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe yazivisa kuti dhora remunyika riri kuramba richishaya simba pamusika wekutenga nekutengeserana mari wekunze kana kuti RBZ auction rate. RBZ yazivisa izvi padandemutande rayo reTwitter. Nhasi dhora rekuAmerica range richitengwa nemashora mazana makumi matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nemana nezviga zvisere nezvinoraudzira kana kuti 1 US dollar to ZWL654, 8651. Svondo rapera dhora rekuAmerica raitengwa nemadhora zana nemakumi matanhatu nemaumi mana nematanhatu nezvigag zviviri nezvinoraudzira kana kuti 1 US$1To ZWL 646, 2415. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vati RBZ iri kuyedza kuda kuti huremu hwedhora kumusika wayo huenzane nehwepamusika wemukoto uri kutengesa dhora rekuyAmerica nemadhora mazana masere kusvika pamazana mana kana kuti ZWL800 to ZWL 900 asi vati izvi zvichanetsa.

headline: Dzimwe Nyika Dzobatana neVanhu muZimbabwe Mukuvigwa kwaVaTsvangirai
text: Vamiriri vedzimwe nyika muZimbabwe vakwanisa kubatana neruzhinji rweZimbabwe kumusha kwemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vamiri ava vanosanganisira venyika dzinoti America, Britain, Sweden nedzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachidzidzisa paHuddersfield College kuBritain, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu pamwe chete nekuwanda kwevamiriri vedzimwe nyika kunoratidza kuti VaTsvangirai vange vari mutungamiriri anodiwa uye nyika zhinji dzange dzichivaona saivo mutungamiriri weZimbabwe chaiye. Mumwe ange aripo pakuvigwa kwaVaTsvangirai mutungamiri webato rinopikisa muKenya, VaRaila Odinga, avo vanoti vakatanga kuziva VaTsvangirai muna 1993. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Mari Iri Kuda Kupihwa Bazi reHutano Ishoma
text: Mari iri kuda kupihwa bazi rezveutano nekurerwa zvakanaka kwevana pabhajeti regore ra2018, yatambirwa zvakasiya-siyana munyika. Asi vanhu vazhinji vari kunyunyuta kuti ishoma. Bazi iri riri kuda kupiwa mamiriyoni mazana mana nemasere emadhora kubva pamabhiriyoni mashanu nemamiriyoni zana emari yebhajeti. Kunyangwe hazvo mari iyi yawedzera kubva pamamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi masere akapihwa bazi iri gore rino, sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti mari iyi ishoma zvikuru kana pakatariswa zvinodiwa mubazi iri. Munyori musangano reZADHR, Doctor Evans Masitara, vati mari yaiswa kubazi rezveutano ishoma zvikuru. "Mari yapihwa bazi iri iri pasi pezvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti renyika yose sezvakabvumiranwa kuAbuja," vadaro Dr Masitara. Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai muparamende, huye vari mumiririri weMutare Central, VaInnocent Gonese, vatiwo vange vaine tarisiro yekuti hurumende izadzise zvibvumirano zvayakasaina. "Isusu tanga takatarisira kuti hurumende icharemekefza chibvumirano chakaitwa kuAbuja mubhajeti regore rinouya iri'" VaGonese vaudza Studio7. Vachitaura bhajeti risati raitwa, gurukota mubazi rezveutano nekurerwa zvakanaka kwevana, Doctor David Parirenyatwa, vakaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda mari inosvika biriyoni imwechete nemamiriyoni zana emadhora kuitira kuti vafambise mabasa ezveutano zvakanaka. Asi sachigaro wedare remadzishe, Mambo Fortune Charumbira, vati vanogutsikana nemari yapiwa kubazi rezvehutano. VaCharumbira vati mamwe mapazi mana apiwa mari yakawanda kudarika yehutano akakosha kuti vanhu vave nehutano hwakanaka. Bazi rehutano rakatarisana nematambudziko akasiyana siyana anosanganisira vashandi vashoma, kuparara kwezvipatara, kushaikwa kwemishonga nemichina yechimanje manje inoongorora zvirwere huye mari zhinji inoshandiswa mubazi iri inobva kumasangano akazvimiririra. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovimbisa IMF Kudzikisa Bhajeti reVashandi veHurumende
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vavimbisa sangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, re International Monetary Fund, IMF, kuti Zimbabwe ichange yadzikisa mari yebhajeti inobhadharwa vashandi kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nemaviri kubva muzana, kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana panosvika gore ra 2019. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vavimbisa sangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, re International Monetary Fund, IMF, kuti Zimbabwe ichange yadzikisa mari yebhajeti inobhadharwa vashandi kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nezviviri kubva muzana, kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana panosvika gore ra 2019. VaChinamasa vange vachitaura muHarare nemusi weChitatu vaine vakuru vechikwata cheIMF chiri munyika kubva musi wa 24 Kukadzi kusvika musi wa 11 Kurume. Vari kutungamira chikwata ichi, VaDomenico Fanizza, vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvimwe zvayakazvitarira kuti inoda kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, kana iyo IMF yacho, vanotenderana kuti zvimwe zvakavimbiswa neZimbabwe zvekuti ichabhadhara mitero yakaiswa pazvikwereti zvinosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana masere emamiriyoni emadhora muna Kubvumbi kunyika nemabhanga ekunze, zvichanetsa kuzadzisa. Kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti ndiko kwapa kuti Zimbabwe isakwereteswa mari neIMF ne World Bank. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe uye vari chipangamazano chehuruemnde, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvekudzikisa mari inobhadharwa vashandi vehurumende chete hazvina zvazvinobatsira kana hupfumi hwenyika husiri kufamba zvakanaka.

headline: Zimbabwe Yozadzisa Zviga zveUnited Nations?
text: No media source currently available No media source currently available Hurumende inoti Zimbabwe iri kubudirira zvikuru mukurwisa dambudziko reHIV/AIDS uye iri kukwanisa kuzadzikisa zviga zve Millenium Development Goals, MDGs, zvakatarwa neUnited Nations. Mashoko aya ataurwa nemukuru anoona nezve HIV/AIDS ne TB mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Owen Mugurungi, avo vanoti vari kufara nekuderera kwevanhu vari kubatwa neHIV/AIDS uye kuwanikwa kwemishonga nezvime. Zviga zve MDG’s izvi zvakatarwa muna Gunyana 2010 uye zvinofanira kunge zvazadzikiswa panopera gore rino. Chiga chechitanhatu che MDG’s ndechehutano chakanangangana nekurwisa zvirwere zvakaita sse HIV/AIDS, TB nezvimwe. Asi vamwe vanorarama neHIV vanoti nyaya yehupfumi isina kumira zvakana yave kupa kuti zvose zvange zvaitwa nehurumende zvidzokere kumashure. Vanoronga mabasa musangano re International Community of Women Living with HIV in Zimbabwe, Amai Martha Tolana, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi kuitira kuti zviga izvi zvizadziswe. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza dare reparamende muna Zvita pakuparura bhajeti regore rino kuti kubva muna 2011 makambani zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu ainge avharwa, uye vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu vainge varasikirwa nemabasa kusvika pari zvino.

headline: Vakoti Vanoratidzira paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals
text:
Vamwe vakoti vepachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, UBH, varatidzira neChina mangwanani vachiti havazi kufara nemari shoma yavanowana zvisineyi kuti hurumende yakawedzera nezuro mihoro yavo nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana.

Vakoti varatidzira paUBH vanga vachiimba uye vakabata zvinyorwa zvange zvakanyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana, senzira yekuratidza kusafara kwavo nemari shoma yavanoti vari kutambira.

Sachigaro wechikamu chepaUBH chesangano reZimbabwe Nurse Association, ZINA, VaAnthony Majongosi, vati vakoti havafanirwe
kubatwa sevamwe vashandi vose vehurumende vachiti vari kuisa hupenyu
hwavo panjodzi kunyanya panguva ino pavari kushanda kuine chirwere
cheCovid-19.

Sachigaro weZINA mudunhu reBulawayo, VaNicholas Chitore, vati vana
mukoti vari kuzvipira kushanda zvisinei nekuti nguva zhinji vanenge
vasina zvikwanisiro kusanganisira mbatya dzinobatsira kudzivirira kuti
vasawana hutachiwana hwecoronavirus. Asi vati hurumende haizi
kukoshesa kuzvipira kwakadai.

Pavapedza kuratidzira vana mukoti ava vadzokera pabasa asi vakawanda
vavo vange vasingashande. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumukuru weUBH, Amai Nonhlanhla Ndlovu, asi vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti vakoti vepachipatara cheMpilo havazi kukwanisa kuratidzira sevamwe vavo nekuti vakawanda vavo vakapinda pachirongwa chekuti vasasangane nevanhu vakawanda mushure mekunge pachipatara ichi paita vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 mwedzi wapera.

Mune imwewo nyaya, imwe kambani yeProvidence Human Capital inove
chikamu cheInnscor Africa, nemasangano anoti I am 4 Byo Against
Covid-19 neThorngrove Benevolent Community Trust, apa zvipo
zvinosanganisira mafiriji maviri, mbatya dzekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, machira, pamwe nechikafu zvekubatsira mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 mukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo. Mukuru weProvidence Human Capital, Amai Buhle Ndlovu, vati vaona
zvakakodzera kuti kambani yavo iise ruoko rwayo pakubatsira kunyanya
kuchipatara cheThorngrove Hospital.

Meya weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vatenda masangano aya
vakakurudzira veruzhinji kuti varambe vachichengetedza zvinokurudzirwa
nevehutano pakudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus, sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa naho huri kuramba huchikwira. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanoda Kuti Vanhu Vatange Vabaiwe Nhomba Svondo Rino
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti vari kutarisira kuti vanhu vatange kubayiwa vhiki rino nhomba yeCovid-19 yakasvika munyika neMuvhuro mangwanani kubva kuChina. Hurumende inotiwo ine tarisiro yekuti panozopera gore rino vazhinji vanenge vabaiya nhomba senzira yekudzivirira kutapukira kwechirwere ichi. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, VaMnangagwa vakati vari kutarisira kuti vanu vabayiwe nhomba nechimbichimbi kuitira kudzivirira vanhu uye kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutange kusimukira. VaMnangagwa vakatambira zviri pamutemo nhomba iyi kuState House neMuvhuro masikati kubva kumumiriri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vange vakamirira mutungamiri wenyika yavo VaXi Jinping. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vatsinhirawo mashoko aVaMnangagwa vachiti pamusoro penhomba vakapihwawo majekiseni acho vachiti vari kutarisira kuti kubaiwe kwenhomba iyi kutangwe chero vhiki rino. Dr John Mangwiro vati tarisiro yehurumende ndeyekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vange vabaiwa panopera gore rino. Izvi zvatsigirwa nevakasanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano VaRobert Mudyirandima avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende iri kutarisira kubaya huwandu uhwu kuchiri kuitwa hurukuro nemakambani anogadzira nhomba dzeCovid-19. VaMudyirandima vatiwo panenge pachibaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakagadzirwa kuChina iyi, hurumende inenge ichitoita tsvakurudzo yekuti nhomba iyi inoshanda here kumhando dzehutachiona weCovid-19 huri munyika. Vachigamuchira nhomba iyi kuRobert Mugabe International Airport gurukota rezvehutano uyewo vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga varumbidza pamwe nekutenda nyika yeChina. VaChiwenga vatiwo mucherechedzo wehushamwari hwakasimba pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitambidzawo nhomba iyi kunaVaChiwenga, mumiririri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vatiwo Zimbabwe ishamwari yeChina nekudaro havana dambudziko nekubatsira nyika ino pakuiwanisa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Patricia Muchekeza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo, hurumende yatambira nhomba yekutanga yekupiwa pachena vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende itenge mishonga iyi nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera avo vati vanga vakatarisira kuti nhomba yekupiwa iyi ichauya pamwechete nenhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu hurumende yaiti vakatenga. VaMadzorera vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kungwarira kuti vasazosundwe kutenga nhomba yekuChina zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nekuda kwekuti vapiwa zviuru mazana maviri pachena. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Professional Nurses Union VaRobert Chiduku vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vakoti vachiziva nezvekubaya nhomba vanoda rumwe ruzivo nezvenhomba yeCovid-19 zvinosanganisira kuti vaziviswe kuti nhomba iyi ichange ichibaiwa pai huye rutivi rwupi nezviratidzo kana isina kuwirirana nemuviri wemunhu vasati vabaya kana kubayiwa. Vamwe vanga vari kunhandare yendege pasvika nhomba iy vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube, vakasanobata chigaro chegurukota rekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvemishonga kusanganisira veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vari kutarisirwa kuongorora nhomba iyi kuti ndeyechokwadi here kwemazuva maviri isati yatanga kubayiwa vanhu. Vari kutanga kubayiwa vanosanganisira vanachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara, vanoshanda pamiganhu nenhandare dzendege uye vane zvirwere zvinovaisa panjodzi yakakura yekufa nechirwere ichi. Nhomba iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani inonzi Sinopharm inova yehurumende yekuChina inogadzira mishonga. China yakapa mvumo kuti nhomba iyi itange kubayiwa vanhu mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera. Nyika yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi iUnited Arab Emirates ichiteverwa neBahrain. Dzimwe nyika dziri kutenga mushonga uyu dzinosanganisira Singapore, Turkey, Brazil ne Chile. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri va VaTrump Vanoita Mhirizhonga paCapitol Hill
text: Nhengo dzeparamende ye America dzakabudiswa muparamende zvechimbichimbi mushure mekunge mhomho yevatsigiri vemutungamiri we America, VaDonald Trump, yakapinda zvechisimba muparamende panguva iyo nhengo dzedare iri dzakange dzichiverenga mavhoti esarudzo yakapa VaJoe Biden hutongi hwe America pavakakunda VaTrump musarudzo. Mhomho iyi yakapunza mahwindo nemisuwo izvo zvakakonzera kuti nhengo dzose dzeparamende dzitize kana kuvanda kusvika mapurisa asvika. Mumwe munhukadzi akapfurwa akazofira kuchipatara. VaTrump vari kushorwa nekuramba kwavo kubvuma kuti vakakundwa musarudzo uye yekukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti varatidzire vachiramba zvakabuda musarudzo. Meya veguta reWashington D.C. Amai Muriel Bowser, vadzika mutemo unorambidza vanhu kufambafamba pakati pemaawa a 6 o’clock manheru na 6 o’clock mangwanani. Mushure memhirizhonga iyi, makambani eTwitter, Facebook neInstagram akazivisa kuti ave kuvhara mukana waVaTrump wekushandisa madandemutande aya pari zvino, achiti anogona kunyima VaTrump mukana wekushandisa madandemutande aya zvachose. Mugari wemu Washington D.C, Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti zvavaona zvichiitika zvinonyadzisa uye zvasvibisa zita reAmerica zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi veFodya Voshaiswa Mufaro neMutengo weFodya
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakabvisa mutero wezvikamu zviviri kubva muzana weElectronic Transaction Tax pakutengwa kwefodya, varimi vari kunyunyuta kuti mutengo wefodya uri kuramba uri pasi. Asi vemisika yefodya vanoti mitengo yave kukwira kana zvichienzaniswa nemitengo yaivepo pakavhurwa misika iyi svondo rapfuura. Pakavhurwa misika yefodya neChitatui chapfuura, varimi vakawanda vakabvisa fodya yavo pamusika nekuda kwekuti mutengo waive pasi zvakanyanya sezvo vanotenga fodya vaigunun’una kuti vazorasikirwa nemari yakawanda nekuda kwemutero weElectronic Transfer Tax pakutenga fodya. Asi zvichitevera kubviswa kwemutero uyu svondo rino, mitengo yefodya haina kukwira zvakanyaya, izvo zvisiri nkufadza varimi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 pamisika yefodya inoratidza kuti varimi vakawanda vachiri kugunun’una nemitengo iyi. Murimi wekuKazangarare kuKaroi, VaLast Kawani, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoona sekuti mitengo yakaderedzwa nenyaya yekuti madhora ekuAmerica haasisina kufanana huremu nemaRTGS dollars. Mumwe murimi, VaNomore Sakala, avo vataura neStudio7 mushure mekutengesa fodya yavo pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, TSF, vati mutengo wange uri pasi pewavange vakatarisira. Nhasi mutengo wepasi pasi paTSF wange uri dhora rimwe chete pakirogramu kana zvichienzaniswa nemasenzi makumi mashanu pakirogiramu pakavhura misika svondo rapfuura. Kumusika weBoka Tobacco Floor, zvinhu zvange zviri kufamba zvakanaka uye vanoona nekufambiswa kwebasa pamusika uyu, VaMoses Bias, vati vese vanotenga fodya vave kuuya kumusika wavo zvichitevera kugadziriswa kwezvichemo zvavo nehurumende. Vatiwo kuwanda kwevanotenga ndiko kwave kuita kuti mutengo wefodya ukwire pamusika wavo. Mumashoko avo atsigirwa nevamwe vanotenga fodya, VaBias vati mutengo wefodya unenge wakadzikira pamazuva ekutange sezvo varimi vachitengesa mhando yepasi vachiti vanotarisira kuti mitengo iyi ichakirwa zvinofadza varimi. Zvichakadai, varimi vatiwo havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe neTobacco Industiries Markeing Board, vakadzokera kumushure pachibvumirano chavainge vaita chekuti varimi vaizopihwa imwe mari yavo ari madhora ekuAmerica, imwe iri maRTGS. Zvichitevera kuvhurwa kwemisika yefodya, varimi vave kupihwa mari yavo yese ari maRTGS asi vachipihwa mikana wekutenga madhora ekuAmerica kumabhanga avo kana vachida kuita izvi. Gore rapfuura, Zimbabwe yakawanda mari inosvika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerica kubva mukutengesa fodya kunze kwenyika. Asi gore rino mari iyi ichadzikira sezvo imwe fodya yakaparadzwa nezuva uye imwewo iparadzwa neCyclone Idai. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoisa Zvikamu Makumi Manomwe neZvitanhatu Kubva Muzana Patafura
text: Sangano reApex Council, iro rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, rasangana nevamiriri vehurumende pamusangano wekuzeya mihoro yevashandi vehurumende weNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, hurumende ichinzi yaisa patafura zvikamu zvinoita makumi manomwe nezvitanhatu kubva muzana zvekuwedzera nazvo mihoro yevashandi vayo kutanga mwedzi uno. Asi sachigaro veApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vakumbira nguva yekuti vambotanga vanzwa kubva kunhengo dzavanomirira vasati vatambira zvauya zvakapfumbatwa nehurumende izvi. Amai Alexander vanoti mushure mekunan’anidza mari yauya nehurumende iyi, vaona kuti mushandi wepasi anenge otambira mari inoita RTGS$1023.00 pamwedzi, achikwira kubva paRTGS$582.00, iyo vanoti iri pasi zvikuru. Vanoti ivo vashandi vari kuda kuti mushandi wepasi atambiriswe mari inoita $4750.00 RTGS pamwedzi kuti akwanise kurara. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kutarisirwa kusangana zvakare nemusi weChipiri kuti zvione kuti zvapeta here nhaurirano idzi. Mwedzi wapera hurumende yakanga yapa vashandi vayo zvikamu gumi kubva muzana, asi vakaramba kutambira mari iyi vachiti chaive chituko chaicho kuwedzera vashandi nezvikamu zvakadaro. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi., sezvo gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inopikisa Kuti Chikowore naTakawira Vapihwe Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Vatori venhau Frank Chikowore naSamuel Takawira avo vakasungwa neChishanu vachipomerwa mhosva yekuramba kuterera mapurisa vamiswa pamberi pedare ramajisitereti kuMbare nhasi. Asi dare iri rati richapa mutongo nemusi weChipiri svondo rinouuya pachikumbiro chavo chekuti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. Vaviri ava vaendeswa kuHarare Remand Prison uko vachange vari kusvika nemusi weChipiri apo pachanzikwa chikumbiro chavo. Chikowore naTakawira vakasungwa neChishanu vari pabasa kuchipatara chiri kurapwa nhengo dzeMDC nhatu dzinosanganisira mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vachinzi vakatyora mutemo une chekuita nekudzivirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19, Statutory Instrument 83 of 2020. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vaviri ava, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vaudza Studio7 kuti vaviri ava van kodzera kuti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso sezvo vaive pabasa uye vasina kumbopara mhosva. Asi muchuchusi panyaya iyi, VaTerence Mukuze, vapikisa kuti vaviri ava vabhadhare mare yechibatiso. Mushure mekunzwa kubva kumagweta evaviri ava, dare rati richapa mutongo waro nemusi weChipiri pamusoro pechikumbiro chaChikowore naTakawira. Nguva pfupi yapfuura dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo wekuti vatori venhau vanoita basa rakakosha zvikuru pakudzivirira kupararira kwe coronavirus nekudaro vanofanira kuita basa ravo kunyange nyika yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. VaSaurombe vati mutongo weHigh Court uri pachena kuti vatori venhau vanofanira kuregwa vachiita basa ravo. Sachigaro wechikamu chemuHarare cheMedia Institute of Southern Africa –Africa, VaGarikai Chaunza, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti vatapi venhau vari kuramba vachishungurudzwa munyika. Munyori musangano revatapi venhau vechidiki, reYoung Journalists Association, VaLeopold Munhende, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo harisi kufara nezviri kuitika. Baba veimwe nhengo yeMDC iri pachipatara pakasungirwa Chikowore naTakawira, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, VaHenry Chimbiri, avo vakaona vaviri ava vachisungwa vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakaitwa nemapurisa kuda kutyityidzira vamwe vatapi venhau kuti vasaende pachipatara ichi pamwe nekunyora nekutepfenyura nyaya yekushungurudzwa kwenhengo nhengo dzeMDC idzi. Pane vatori venhau vanodarika gumi nevashanuvakabatwa kana kushungurudzwa nemapurisa nemasoja kubvira pakavharwa nyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwe coronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Lady Chevrons hutu kuIndia
text: CHIKWATA checricket chemaLady Chevrons chiri kuIndia uko chiri kuita gadziriro chakatarisana nekuzonokwikwidza kuUnited Arab Emirates (UAE) munaGunyana murwendo rwekurwira kuenda kumutambo weInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Women T20 World Cup 2023.   Mutambo weICC Women T20 World Cup uchaitwa gore rinotevera uye mimwe mitambo yacho ichatambirwa kuSouth Africa. Mutambo wekuUAE uchange uine zvikwata zvisere zvinoti Zimbabwe, UAE, Bangladesh, Thailand, Scotland, Papua New Guinea, Ireland neUnited States of America izvo zvichazorwira matikiti maviri ekuenda kuSouth Africa.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri – Darlington Majonga – anoti maLady Chevrons akaenda kuIndia uko akashevedzwa nesangano reOmtex ICWC Cricket Institute kunotamba mitambo yehushamwari. Mitambi iyi iri kushandiswa nemaLady Chevrons segadziriro dzekuzoenda kuUAE kunorwira tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup kuSouth Africa.   Majonga anoti ZC yakatumira chikwata chevatambi 16 kuIndia icho chiri kutungamirwa naMary-Anne Musonda.   “Chikwata chedu chiri kuIndia uko chichagara kwemazuva 18 uye chakashevedzwa neOmtex ICWC Cricket Institute kuti chizotamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvakasiyana zvekuIndia.   “Mitambo iyi maLady Chevrons ari kuishandisa segadziriro dzavo dzekuzoenda kuUnited Arab Emirates uko achanokwikwidza mumutambo wekurwira kuenda kuICC Women’s T20 World Cup.   “KuIndia, mitambo yavo yese ichatambirwa kunhandare yeNICE Cricket Arena kuBengaluru,” anodaro Majonga.   Zvakadaro, chikwata chevarume chemaChevrons chakahwina tikiti rekuenda kuICC Men’s T20 World Cup iyo ichatambirwa kuAustralia munaGumiguru.   MaChevrons akabudirira kuenda kumutambo uyu pamwe chete neNetherlands iyo yakapedza iri pechipiri mumutambo wakatambirwa kuQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   KuWorld Cup, iyo ichatambirwa kuAustralia, maChevrons akaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Ireland, Scotland neWest Indies.

headline: Hurumende Yoburitsa Bhiri reKuvandudza Chimwe Chikamu cheAIPPA
text: Hurumende nhasi yaburitswa mugwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette rebhiri reMedia Information Bill rekuvandudza chimwe chikamu chemutemo weAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act. Chikamu chiri kuvandudzwa ndechechikamu chegumi kana kuti Section 10:27 kuti chienderane nechikamu chechimakumi matanhatu nembiri kana kuti section 62 chebumbiro remutemo. Chikamu chiri kuvandudzwa ichi chakanangana nekuti vatori venhau vangawane sei mashoko kubva kumapazi ehurumende nemakambani ayo. Munyori mukuru wezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti bhiri iri rinoratidza pachena kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuvandudza mitemo yange ichinzi inodzosera kumashure hutongi hwejekerere nemashandiro evatori venhau. Vati mapazi ehurumende anenge ave nemushandi anenge achishanda nevatori venhau kuvapa zvavanenge vachida zvakakoshera ruzhinji. Asi vamwe vatori venhau vanoti bhiri itsva iri harina kunyanya kusiyana nemutemo weAIPPA. VaMangwana vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Gweta vari nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo yekuburitswa kwenhau VaChris Mhike vanoti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mumwe mutori wenhau anemukurumbira zvikuru vari mupepeti mukuru weZimFact VaChris Chinaka vanoti iri idanho rekutanga asi rwendo rwurefu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weMedia Monitors Zimbabwe Muzvare Patience Zirima. Vatori venhau nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mitemo yeZimbabwe yakaita seAIPA nePOSA haina kusiyana zvakanyanya nemitemo yaishandiswa nehurumende yeRhodesia yakaita seLaw and Order Maintenance Act, Official Secrets Act, Emergence Powers Act, Censorship of Publications Order of 1965. Asi hurumende inoti iri kuyedza kuvandudza zvinhu uye hurumende inofanirawo kuona kut vatori venhau havafukure hapwa zvinokanganisa nyika sematauriro aVaMangwana. Mutemo uyu uchaendeswa kuvanhu wozodzoswa kudare reparamende mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti uve mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: China Inoti Hapana Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chati Chabatwa neCoronavirus
text: China inoti hapana zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuChina kusanganisira zvri kudzidza kunyika zvati zvabatwa neCoronavirus. China inotiwo iri kutora matanho kuitira kuti Zimbabwe isaite munhu anobatwa neCoronavirus. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita negurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, mutevedzeri wemumiriri weChina muZimbabwe, VaZhao Baogang, vati pari zvino havasati vawana shoko rekuti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvawirwa netsaona yeCoronavirus iyi. VaBaogong vati nyika yavo iri kuita zvese zvaingagona kuchengetedza veruzhinji vari munyika yavo. VaBaogang vatiwo mukuedza kuona kuti chirwere cheCoronavirus hachisviki muZinbabwe, vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekunyika yavo kuti zvimbomira kushanyira Zimbabwe. Vatiwo vanenge vauya vari kuvachengetedzwa kwemazuva gumi nemana kuti vasasangana neveruzhinji. VaMoyo vatenda zvikuru matanho ari kutorwa neChina mukuedza kudzivirira kuti Coronavirus isapinde muZimbabwe. VaMoyo vati vari kuwana rubatsiro rwakawanda vakatiwo China yazvipirawo kubatsira Zimbabwe kugadzirisa nzvimbo dzakatarwa kuti vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vachengeterwe. Kusvika pari nhasi, vanhu vanosvika mazana matanhatu varasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kweCoronavirus, uye vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvina vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachaputika muChina gore rapera. Mubati wehomwe musangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti zvakakosha kana China ichigadzirira kubatsira Zimbabwe sezvo isina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehutano. VaMoyo vazivisawo kuti hapana munhu ati abatwa nechirwere ichi mZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. VaMoyo vatiwo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vambomira kuenda kuChina pamwe nekune dzimwe nyika dzakatapurirwa chirwere ichi. Dzimwe dzenyika dzave neCoronavirus dzinosanganisira Malaysia, France, Canada, Belgium, Malaysia, America, Germany, Britain Japan nedzimwewo. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoudzwa Kuti Chinowandiswa Ivhoti Kwete Mifananidzo
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemataongerwo enyika Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya avo vari kushanda neUniversity of Johannesburg vanoti ZEC inofanira kuburitsa gwaro remazita evavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu sezvinodiwa nechirongwa chitsva cheBVR. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti chiso chemunhu hachifanire kuwandiswa asi chinofanira kuwandiswa ivhoti. Mashoko aya anotevera kutsika madziro kuri kuita sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vachiti havasi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo. Zvichakadaro, sangano rinoona nezvemitemo nemashandiro eparamende reVeritas raramba mashoko ari kubuda mubepanhau reHerald kunyanya kuti riri kuda kukanganisa mashandiro esangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC nekuriendesa kumatare edzimhosva richipomera mhosva yekutyora mitemo yesarudzo. Bepanhau iri rinotiwo veVeritas vanoda kusvibisa zita remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Sangano iri ratiwo rakatanga basa rekuti mutemo wesarudzo ugadziriswe muna 2013 pakatambirwa bumbiro remutemo idzva. Asi veVeritas vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo nyaya zhinji vakadzikwidza kumatare VaMnangagwa vasati vatora masimba vachishandisa mauto kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Veritas yati haina bato rematongerwo enyika rainotsigira asi yakurudzira kuti bumbir remutemo richengetedzwe uye kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Sangano iri ratiwo rinoda kuti kana sarudzo dzaitwa mapato asazoenda kumatare achidzipikisa nekuti bumbiro remutemo rinenge risina kuteverwa. Veritas yatiwo pamutemo ZEC inofanira kungotevera mutemo kwete kuda kutara iyo mitemo nekupikisa nyaya dzose dzinenge dzaendeswa kumatare kunyangwe iri risiri basa rayo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu muZimbabwe Vopa Pfungwa Dzavo neKukunda kwaVaTrump muSarudzo dzekuAmerica
text: Kukunda kwaVaDonald Trump musarudzo dzekuAmerica kwatambirwa zvakasiyana siyana muZimbabwe. Vamwe vanoti vange vachida kuti Amai Hillary Clinton vakunde asi vamwe vanoti kukunda kwaVaTrump kuchaunzwa pfungwa dzitsva dzehutongo munyika iyi. VaTrump vebato remaRepublicans vakakwanisa kuzvika mavhoti mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemapfumbamwe ukowo Amai Hillary Clinto vebato remaRepublicans vaine mavhoti mazana maviri ane gumi nemasere. MuAmerica dunhu roga roga rinenge riine mavhoti anonzi Electoral College zvichienderana nehuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vari mudunhu racho. Munhu anotanga kusvika mavhoti mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe ndiye anenge akunda musarudzo. VaTawanda Karombo ndeumwe wevange vachitsigira vaTrump uye vange vaine mufaro mukuru. VaKarombo vati Amai Clinton vange vabata mabasa akawanda ehutungamiriri saka havana chitsva chavaizounza mukutungamirira America. VaOstallos Siziba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vachiita zvidzidzo zveInternational Relations kuUniversity of Zimbabwe vati kukunda kwaVaTrump chinofanirwa kuve chidzidzo kuvatungamiriri vemuAfrica kuti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuve dzejekerere. VaElijah Mutemeri vekuZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe zvazvo vange vachida kuti Amai Clinton vakunde, vati semunhu anoda hutongo rwejekerere vanogutsikana nezvadiwa nevagari vekuAmerica. Vatiwo vane chivimbo chekuti VaTrump havazosiyi Africa ichitambura. Amai Charity Mandishona vaudza Studio 7 kuti vabatikana zvikuru nekukunda kwaVaTrump vakati vange vasingadi VaTrump nekuti vanofunga kuti vane rusaruraganda. Amai Lorraine Sibanda vanotungamirira sangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations vati kukundwa kwaAmai Clinton kunoratidza kuti handinyore kuti vanhukadzi vawane zvigaro zvepamusororo. VaWisborn Malaya vataurawo neStudio 7 vati vakabatira hura mumaoko kuti VaTrump vachaenderera mberi nekuzadzikisa zvavaitaura zvinosanganisira kusada vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika uye kutaririra vanhukadzi pasi Asi VaAlois Mutizira imwe nyanzvi munezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika vati havaoni kudyidzana kweAmerica nedzimwe nyika kuchichinja nekukunda kwaVaTrump. VaTapiwa Mashakada munyori mukuru munyaya dzehupfumi mubato reMDC vashorawo VaTrump vakati vakatyityidzira vavhoti nekuti vacharamba zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kana vachinge vakundwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanodzinga Gurukota reMhando dzeMoto, VaFortune Chasi, Vachiti Vatadza Kuita Basa Ravo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vadzinga basa vanga vari gurukota rinoona nezvemando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vachiti havasi kuita basa ravo sezvavanga vachitarisira. Mumagwaro abudiswa nemunyori mukuru mudare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, VaMnangagwa vati vamisa VaChasi basa nekuti vange vasisiri kubata basa ravo sezvinotarisirwa nehurumende. VaMnangagwa vadoma mumiriri weMuzarabani North mudare reparamende, VaSoda Zhemu, segurukota idzva rezvemhando dzemoto. Kudzingwa basa kwaVaChasi kunoteverawo kumbomiswa basa kwakaitwa sachigaro webhodhi reZESA, VaSydney Gata, pamwe nenhengo dzese dzebhodhi reZesa vachipomerwa nyaya dzehuori. Pavakabvisa bhodhi reZesa, VaMnangagwa vakati komishini inoona nezvehuori iongorore nyaya dzehuori mukambani yeZesa. Panga paine kutatsurana pakati paVaGata naVaChasi. VaChasi vakambenge vambomisa VaGata basa avo vakaramba kutambira izvi vachiti mutungamiriri wenyika akavadoma pabasa iri, ndivo voga vaigona kuvamisa basa. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati vakatyamadzwa nekumiswa basa kwaVaChasi vachiti vange vachivaona semunhu anga ari kugona basa. Vatiwo vanoona sekuti VaChasi vagurisirwa panzira basa rekuedza kugadzirisa huori kukambani yeZESA. Mumwe mutori wenhau webepa repadandemutande reZimbabwe Morning Post, Elias Mambo, uyo akanyora nyaya dzakawanda dzehuori kukambani yeZESA, atiwo anoona sekuti hurumende yarasikirwa nekumisa VaChasi basa. Mambo ati kunetsana kwaVaChasi naVaGata munyaya yekuedza kupedza huori kunogona kuve kwakonzera kumiswa kwavo basa. Vamwewo pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana vatiwo havanzwisisi kuti sei VaChasi vamiswa basa vachiti zvinhu zvange zvave nani munyaya dzekuwanikwa kwemagetsi kwemagetsi munyika. Asi mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabhenge, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvisina kujeka mumagwaro ehurumende kuti sei VaChasi vamiswa basa, vati kana zviine chekuita nekurwisa huori hapana chakaipa. VaMnangagwa vadomawo Dr Anxious Jongwe Masuka kuti vave gurukota rezvekurima mushure mekufa neCOVID-19 kwaVaPerrence Shiri mwedzi wapera. VaMasuka vange vari mukuru we Zimbabwe Agricultural Society, uye vanzi vane hunyanzvi munyaya dzekurima zvichitevera kushanda kwavakaita muzvinzvimbo zvakasiyana siyana zvinosanganisira kurimwa kwefodya. VaChasi vava gurukota rechitatu kudzingwa basa naVaMnangagwa zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwaVaObadiah Moyo mwedzi wapera vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori, uye Amai Prisca Mupfumira gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: VaMwonzora naVaMangwana Vokakazadzana neNyaya yeNhaurirano Pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa
text: Kubva zvatorwa mhiko nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, musi wa26 Nyamavhuvhu, Zimbabwe yaramba yakatarisana nematambudziko makukutu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika. Kuoma kwezvinhu uku kwava kupa kuti vakawanda munyika vakurudzire hurumende nemapato anopikisa kuti vataurirane. Iyi ndiyo kurudziro iri kupihwawo nenyika dzakabudirira dzakaita seAmerica neBritain kuti munyika muve nekugadzikana. VaMnangagwa vakambovimbisa kuti vachaumba hofisi yemukuru webato rinopikisa mudare reparamende asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chati chabuda sezvo zvichinzi Zanu-PF neMDC ave makara asionane. VaMnangagwa vanoti havasi kuda zvekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa sezvakamboitwa pakawama nyika kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980 uye kushanda pamwe kwebato rePF-Zapu neMDC VaMugabe vachiri panyanga. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti naivo havadi hurumende yemubatanidzwa asi hurumende inombobata matomu zvinhu zvichigadziriswa. Asi munyori muMDC, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti MDC kana ichida nhaurirano inofanira kutanga yatenda kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa kuNgwarira Mushonga weCovid Kubva kuRussia
text: Bepanhau reHerald rinoti Zimbabwe neRussia dziri kuronga kudyidzana munyaya yekutsvaga mushonga wekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe . Izvi zvinotevera kupihwa nemusi weSvondo, kweZimbabwe zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus nemishonga neRussia nemumiriri wenyika iyi muZimbabwe VaNikolai Krasilnikov. Vachitambira zvipo izvi, VaMangwiro vakatenda Russia vakati Zimbabwe inoda chose kudyidzana nenyika iyi munyaya dzemishonga. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kungwarira mishonga inobva kuRussia iyo yakazviti yawana nhomba yekurapa Covid-19 inonzi Sputnik-V. Asi nyika dzakawanda dzinosanganisira Germany, France, Spain neAmerica dzinoti nhomba iyi yakangoitwa zvechimbi chimbi pasina kutevedzera zvose zvinodiwa. Bazi reUnited Nations reWorld Health Organization rinotiwo richiri kuda kuongorora mushonga uyu. Russia iri kuti hayo nyika idzi dziri kuita godo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti tinzwe kuti Zimbabwe yakapihwa mushonga upi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kungobvuma mishonga kubva kuRussia pasina kunyatsotsvakurudza nezvemishonga yacho. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yomisa Basa Vamwe Vechidiki
text: Hurumende nemusi weChishanu yakatanga kumisa basa vamwe vechidiki vange vachishanda mumawadhi ekumamisha kana kuti maYouth Officers nechinangwa chekuda kuyedza kuderedza mari iri kushandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende. Nyaya yekumisa vechidiki ava basa yakataurwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthulu Ncube, gore rapera vachiti mari zhinji yehurumende inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana iri kushandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende. Asi pakamboyedza vaive gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kumbomisa vechidiki ava basa vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemamwe makurukota avo vakatsika madziro. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti vechidiki ava vanoshandiswa nebato riri kutonga kutyora kodzero dzevanopikisa. Asi vechidiki ava vanoti vanoita basa rakakosha kukurudzira vechidiki kuzviitira mabasa emaoko. Zvinonzi pawadhi yoga yoga pange paine vechidiki ava vatanhatu asi parizvino pave kusiiwa mumwe chete. Mumashoko aro kuvatori venhau, Bazi rePublic Service Commission rati ramisa vechidiki zviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu. Mumwe wevechidiki ava, VaTakawira Maluku vekuGuruve, vati havasi kufara nekumiswa basa kwevamwe vechidiki. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yotarisirwa Kuparura Svondo Rinouya Mamwe Mapeni Ane Huremu hweGoridhe huDikidiki Zvinonzi Nevamwe Zvichabatsira Vane Mari Shoma
text: Nekuona kubudirira kwarinoti kwakaita zvirongwa zvaro zvekutanga zvekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nekusunga inflation, zvinosanganisira chekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridge, bepanhau reSunday Mail rinoti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, svondo rinouya riri kuwedzera zvakare pamusika mamwe mapeni . Mapeni egoridhe aya, ayo anonzi anenge ane huremu hwegoridhe hwepasipasi, anonzi anenge ari zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti 4 500 . Asi hurongwa uhwu hwagara huchisimudza maonero akasiyanasiyana kunyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, dzimwe dzichihupembedza asi dzimwe dzichihushora. Mumwe wevari kupembedza danho rekutengeswa kwemapeni egoridhe iri ndi Doctor Prosper Chitambara, avo vanoshanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. Doctor Chitambara, vanoti kuparurwa kwemapeni madikidiki aya kuchapawo mukana kune veruzhinji wekuti vange vachikwanisawo kuchengetedza mari dzavo kuburikidza nekutenga mapeni aya. Imwe nyanzi mune zvehupfumi, Doctor Charles Mutasa, vanotiwo kuuya kwemapeni egoridhe kwave kuoneka kubatsira kwawo sezviri kuonekwa pakuderera kwe inflation kwakatika mwedzi wapera. Asi Doctor Mutasa vanoti pachine zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kuitwa kuitira kuti kudzikamiswa kwehupfumi hwenyika kubudirire. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, Muzvare Chenai Mutambasere, vanoti hapana zvikuru zvati zvaonekwa zvati zvaburitswa nekuuya kwemapeni aya. Muzvare Mutambasere vanoti vanhu vanongonzwa kuti kwatengeswa mapeni akawanda zvakati, asi hapana humbowo kunoiswa pajekerere. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe vose vari kuti mapeni egoridhe aya pamwe nemamwe matanho avari kutora akwanisa kudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika nekusunga inflation, zvirongwa zvehurumende zvinoda mari, zvinosanganisira mabhonasi evashandi vayo, zvekurima zvePfumvudza nePresidential Input Scheme, uye sarudzo dzegore rinouya, zvinogona kuisa mudondo hurongwa hwese uhwu. Mapeni ari kutarisirwa kuparurwa svondo rinouya aya anonzi achange achitengeswa nemutengo wemadhora ekuAmerica pamwe nemadhora emunyika zvichienderana nemutengo wegoridhe pamisika yekunze yezuvaro, sezviri kungoitwa pane akaburitswa kare. Gavhuna veRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti kubva muna Chikunguru wegore rino mapeni anodarika zviuru gumi nechimwe, kana kuti 11 000 atengeswa munyika. Zvasarira kuona kuana kuiswa kwemapeni madikidiki aya pamusika kuchaitawo kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuatenga sezvo agara achitengeswa anga achinzi mitengo yawo iri pamusoro zvekuti vakawanda vepasi havakwanise kuwana mari yekutenga. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vave neHukama Hwakasimba naVaMugabe Avo Vari Kurwara Vari kuSingapore
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakaita hurukuro neZBC uye bepanhau reHerald ichaburitswa musi wa 18 Kubvumbi pazuva rekupemberera kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. VaMnangagwa vakati muhurukuro iyi vari kuwirirana zvikuru nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vanoti vari kurapwa kuSingapore parizvino. Vanoti munhu wavanoremekedza zvikuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti VaMugabe naVaMnangagwa vashanda vose kwenguva yakareba nekudaro hazvishamise kuti vanoramba vachidyidzana. No media source currently available Vakatiwo vanhu vanofanira kusungunuka kutaura nyaya yeGukurahundi asi vasingakumbire ruregerero pane zvavanonzi vakaita munguva iyi apo vainge vari gurukota rezvevasori.

headline: Musangano weCODEPA Unopera muBulawayo
text: Vamwe vanoita mabasa emaoko vanoti musangano weCoordination Committee for the Development and Promotion of African Handicraft, CODEPA, wabatsira zvikuru mukushambadza zvavanogadzira, mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vachitiwo zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibatane mukusimudzira mabasa azveigadzirwa zvemaoko. Vachivhura zviri pamutemo musangano weCODEPA VaMudena vati pasi rose mabasa emaoko anowanisa dzimwe nyika mari yakawanda zvikuru. VaMudenda vati nyika dzakadai seChina neIndia idzo dzinotungamira mukuwana mari kubva kumabasa emaoko, dzinokwanisa kuita zvigadirwa zvakawanda panguva imwe chete nekuda kwekushandisa hunyanzvi hwechizvino zvino mukugadzira zvinhu izvi. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende dzenyika dzemuAfrica dziise misoro pamwe chete kuti dziwane nzira dzekusimudzira mabasa emaoko sezvo achikwanisa kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika idzi zvakanyanya. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, gurukota rezvemabhizimisi madiki, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni, vati mari inowanikwa nenyika kubva mukutengeswa kwezvigadzirwa zvinogadzirwa nemaoko yakaderera kubva pamamiriyoni makumi mashanu mugore ra2008, kusvika pamamiriyoni gumi nemashanu muna 2015, vakati izvi zvakakonzerwa nezvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumadokero. Chizvarwa chekuSouth Africa, Muzvare Yolanda Msutwana, vanogadzira zvigadzirwa zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvigaro kubva kumataya emotokari asakara. Muzvare Msutwana vatsinhirawo kukosha kwakaita kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibatane muzvinhu zvakadai sekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika idzi. Kunyange hazvo South Africa isati yave nhengo yeCODEPA, inotarisirwa kuve nhengo yeboka iri munguva pfupi inotevera, uye Amai Lindiwe Zulu vanove gurukota remabhizimisi madiki muSouth Africa vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Amai Rose Vambe avo vanogadzira mbatya dzinoziikanwa dzichinzi ‘African Attire’ ndemumwe wevanhu vanoita zvigadzirwa zvemaoko vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Amai Vambe vati musangano uyu wabatsira zvikuru kusimudzira bhizimisi ravo. VaJustice Dzapasi avo vanogadzira zvivezwa zvakasiyana-siyana, vatiwo musangano uyu wavapa mukana wekudzidza kubva kune vamwewo vekunze nevemuno munyika vanoita basa rakafanana neravo. VaEmmanuel Noko vanoshanda nesangano reHand in Hand Zimbabwe iro rinobatsira vanhu, kunyanya madzimai, vanoita mabasa ezvigadzirwa zvemaoko. VaNoko vati musangano weCODEPA, uyo wasvika kumagumo neChishanu, wavabatsira kuti vazive kuti zvigadzirwa zvemaoko zveingatengeswa kupi. Zimbabwe yapiwa husachigaro hwemubatanidzwa uyu uye Amai Nyoni vachiitwa sachigaro kwegore rinotevera. CODEPA ine nyika makumi maviri nenhanhatu dzemuAfrica, chinangwa chiri chekusimudzira mabasa emaoko. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weSangano reYARD, VaMliswa Vanoburitswa neDare muHusungwa
text: Mukuru wesangano revechidiki reYouth Advocacy for Reform and Democracy, YARD, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vakasungwa neSvondo kuEsigodini mudunhu reMatabeleland South, vakamiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva kuEsigodini kwakare vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Gweta raVaMliswa, VaLizwe Jamela vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti mutongi wedare aona zvakakodzera kuti VaMliswa vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo vasina kubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. “VaMliswa vakasungwa nezuro (Svondo) vaine vamwe vavo 23 vavaifamba navo, vachibva kuBulawayo vakasvika kuEsigodini vakati regai timbotura zvedu mafemo, vavane zvekudya sezvo aive masikati, vachibva vatonzi watove musangano,” VaJamela vanodaro. Vanoti vakabva vasungwa vari makumi maviri nevana vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita musangano vasina kutanga vapiwa mvumo. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa dzimwe nhengo makumi maviri nenhatu dzeYARD idzi dzakazoregwa dzisina mhosva yadzakapomerwa, kukasara VaMliswa, avo vakarara usiku humwechete muchitokisi chemapurisa. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa vanzi vadzoke mudare musi wa 22 Chikumi. Vasati vasungwa, VaMliswa vanonzi vakambonetsana nemumwe kanzura mudunhu iri, VaPatson Sibanda, avo vaiti VaMliswa vakanga vavazvidza zvikuru nekuita musangano mudunhu ravo vasina kutanga vavakumbira mvumo kana kuvazivisa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Ropa paZuva reKucherechedza HIV/AIDS
text: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva reWorld Aids Day nemusi weMugovera kuGlendale. Mazowe, kuMashonaland Central. Mhemberero idzi dzaiitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti Ziva Paumire rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vachenekwe ropa kuti vaonekwe kuti vane hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Vanhu vanokurudzirwawo kuti vaongororwe zvimwe zvirwere zvinosanganisira gomarara, zvirwere zvepabonde, rurindi, shuga kana kuti diabetes nezvimwe zvisina zviratidzo zvinooneka. Mhembero dzekucherechedza zuva iri dzakaitirwa kuGlendale, kuMazowe mudunhu reMashonaland Central nemusi weMugovera, zuva rinocherechedzwa World Aids Day pasi rose, uko kwakaungana zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Gurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo vakaudza gungano iri kuti Zimbabwe ichiri nerwendo rwukuru maringe nekuti vanhu vange vachiziva pavamire. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti pasina kuongororwa hutachiwana hweHIV, munhu haangakwanise kuti awaniswe mishonga yema anti-retroviral, kana kuti ARVs, kuchecheudzwa uye kuti vanaamai vakazvitakura vakwanisewo kudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu kumwana. VaMoyo vakaenderera mberi vachitsanangura nezvedingidira remhemberero yegore rino, iro rakanangana nekuparadzwa kwechirwere ichi, Zimbabwe paichasvika gore ra2030. Vakati chirwere cheHIV chinopera kana dungamunhu akaziva paamire maererano nezvechirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vasina chirwere vagozvichengetedzawo. VaMoyo vakayeuchidza vagari vemudunhu reMashonaland Central kuti vaite zvoutsanana hwepamusoro nokuti chirwere cheCholera chakanyukawo kuMount Darwin mudunhu iroro. Studio 7 yakakwanisa kutaura nevamwe vanhu vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV avo vakataura kuti mishonga yema ARVs, iri kuvabatsira chaizvo. Mumwe wevari kushandisa mishonga iyi ndaAmai Christine Pfidzai. Amai Edna Runeto vakatiwo vakatoroorwa nemunhu asina HIV vakatozvara vana vaviri nokuti vari kunwa mapiritsi aya sekurairwa kwavanoitwa naanachiremba. Amai Joana Kasirori vakati vararama nehutachiwana hweHIV kwemakore anodarika makore makumi maviri zvokuti vatove mukuru wechimwe chikoro muHarare. VaJosephat Chinembiri Tarenyika vati vakambosungwa vakagara mujere vasingawani mishonga, izvo zvakazoita kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kudare reConstitutional Court kuti vakwanise kupiwa mishonga yeHIV vari mujeri. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, avo vakanga vari munyarikani pagungano iri, vakati vari kuyedza nepavanokwanisa kuti pashaike mwana anozvarwa aine hutachiwana hweHIV. Vakayambirawo vanhu vari kutaura kuti vawana mushonga unorapa HIV, vakati hakuna mushonga unodarika maARV ari kupiwa varwere kuzvipatara pari zvino. Amai Mnangangwa vakatiwo hapana mudzimai anofanirwa kuzvara mwana ane hutachiwana hweHIV nokuti hurumende yakaisa matanho ekuti mudzimai wese akazvitakura aongororwe uye agopiwa mishonga yekuti mucheche ari mudumbu asabatira hutachiwana. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols vakudza gungano iri kuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kubva muzana muZimbabwe vari kunwa mishonga yemaARV zvekuti sangano rekuAmerica re President’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief, PEPFAR, rakatowedzera mari inodarika bhirioni rimwechete remadhora ekuAmeica kuti ishandiswe pakurapa vanhu vane hutachiwana munyika muno. Sachigaro weNational Aids Council, NAC, VaEvaristo Marowa vakataurawo kuti Zimbabwe ine tarisiro yekuzadzikisa zvinangwa zve 90-90-90 Global Targets zvekupedzisa HiV neAids mugore ra2030. VaMarowa vakaenderera mberi vachiti izvi zvinokwanisika bedzi kana vanhu vakaziva pavamire. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mana ezviuru, 1, 4million, vari kurarama nehutachiwana hwe HIV uye vari pachirongwa zvakare chekunwa mapiriritsi emaARV. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe, US$77 million, vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV pasi rose uye vanhu mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu, US$35 million, vakatofa nekuda kweHIV pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: NAC Yotsutsumwa neKurambidzwa kweMakondomu muMahotera
text: Vesangano reNational AIDS Council (NAC) vanoti vari kutsutsumwa nenyaya yekuti vemahotera havachabvumidzwa kupa makondomu pachena kuvanhu vanopinda mumahotera avo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweHIV. Izvi zvakamiswa zvichitevera zvichemo zvakapihwa nevanoshanya kubva kunyika dzechitendero chechiMoslem. Mumahotera senzvimbo dzinowanzosasanirwa nevakawanda manga muchiiswa makondomu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwemukondombera. Asi izvi zvakamiswa nguva pfupi yapfuura mushure mekunge vechitendero chechiMuslim vatsutsumwa nazvo. Mumwe mukuru muNAC, VaAmen Mpofu, vanoti izvi zvave kukanganisa mabasa avo ekurwisana neHIV/AIDS. Sachigaro veSupreme Council on Islamic Affairs in Zimbabwe, Sheik Ishmael Duwa, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vechitendero chechiMuslim havafarire zvekuti makondomu aiswe mumahotera vachiti izvi zvange zvave kuitwa nemamwe mahotera muZimbabwe. Vanoti kukurudzira kushandiswa kwemakondumu kukurudzira hupombwe. Sheik Duwa vanoti chitendero chavo chinosungira kuti vanhu vasaite zvechipfambi, vamire nemudiwa mumwe chete uye vasapinda pinda vachiti izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti HIV isapararire zvakanyaya munyika dzechiMuslim. Vanoti kunyange hazvo mahotera mazhinji asisina makondomu, pachine zvekwanda zviri kuitika maari zvisingafadze. Vanotiwo vanozwisiziva basa reNAC asi zvakakosha kuti NAC pamwe nevemahotera vashande nezvitendero zvose pazvirongwa zvavo mubasa ravo kuitira kuti vanhu vese vafare. Asi munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr. Gerald Gwinji, vanoti zvirongwa zveNAC kusanganisira chekupa vanhu makondomu zvakakosha chose mukurwisana neHIV uye zvinofanira kuremekedzwa nevanhu vese. Dr Gwinji vanoti hausi mutemo wehurumende wekuti mahotera asave nemakondomu. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vachisungirwa kushandisa makondomu, makondomu aya haafaniri kuve pose pose mumahotera. Zvichakadai mukuru weZimbabwe Council for Tourism iyo inomirira vane makambani anoona nezvevashandi kusanganisra mahotera, VaTich Hwingwiri, vati sangano ravo rinotsigira zvikuru basa reNational Aids Council uye vakazvipira kuita zvese zvinoita kuti nyika ifambire mberi mukudzivirira zvirwere. Vati handinyaya yevanhu vanobva kunze chete iri kuita kuti vemahotera vasaise makondoimu vachiti mahotera inzvimbo dzinopindwa nemhuri nekudaro haafaniri kuonekwa pese pese. VaHwingwiri vatiwo vanhu havarambidzwe kushandisa makondomu uye mamwe mahotera anotori nezvitoro zvinotengeswa makondomu nezvimwe. Patainda pamhepo tange tisati tanzwa kubva kubazi rezvekushanyirwa kwwenyika kuti Zimbabwe inowana vashanyi vangani kubva kumaMuslim countries pagore. Humbowo kubva kuUNAIDS hunoratidza kuti nyika idzi dzine vanhu vashomanana vanHIV kana zvichienzaniswa nenyika dzemuSub Sahara Africa dzakaita seZimbabwe uko vanhu zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvevanhu vese vaine HIV. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Zuva reKuwanira Vanhu Mvura Yakachena
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChipiri yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza zuva rekuchengetedza mvura kana kuti World Water Day. Dingindira regore rino riri kutarisa nyaya yemvura nemabasa kana kuti “Water and Jobs” Mukuru weHuman Settlement muUnited Nations Habitat Dr Thomas Chiramba vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuchengetedza mvura nekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Muna 1993, bazi reUnited Nations General Assembly rakatara musi wa 22 Kurume wega wega sezuva rekucherechedza kukosha kwemvura muhupenyu hwevanhu. Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaBan Ki Moon vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vakoshese kuchengetedza mvura vakati kunyangwe mvura yakakosha, hapana zvakawanda zviri kuitwa kuichengetedza. Ongororo dzakaitwa dzinoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana makumi masere nematatu havakwanise kuwana mvura yakachena yekushandisa yakachena. United Nations inoti kukura kwedambudziko iri ndiko kwakapa kuti vatare zuva iri kuti ringe richicherechedzwa. Vanhu vanokurudzirwawo kuti vachengetedze nzizi. VaBan vanoti kuti zviga zve 2030 UN Sustainable Development Agenda zvibudirire zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana mvura yakachena. Vanoti kuwana mvura yakachena zvinopa kuti vanhu vasabatwe nezvirwere izvo zvinopa kuti vaite basa vakagwinya. Zvichakadaro, sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights watch rinoti zvakanaka kuti nyika dzitongwe zvakanaka zvinozopa kuti pasave musiyano wakakura pakati pevanowana mvura nevanoshaya. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaikwa kweMari Kwovhiringira Vakawanda Zororo reKisimusi
text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti vanonoka kutenga zvinhu zvekisimusi nekuda kwekusawana mari nenguva uye vamwe vanga vasina nguva nekuda kwemabasa panguva iyo vakawanda vari kushaya mari kumabhangi. Vamwe vagari ava vanoti vakanonoka kuwana mari sezvo vanga vasati vatambira mari dzavo dzemihoro. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende uyo anoshanda mubazi rezvemigwagwa, VaAnanias Jemedza, vanoti vanga vasati vatambira sezvo mari yavo yazoratidza kuti yapinda mubhanga ravo. VaJemedza vanoti nekuda kwekuti vashandi vehurumende vakawanda vatambira muzvitoro makazara uye mitsetse yekumabhangi yakakura. Mumwe mugari, VaChristopher Zembe, avo vatenga zvekudya zvemhuri yavo vanoti vakatadza kutenga zvinhu zvekisimusi zvemhuri yavo sezvo vainge vari kubasa. VaZembe vanoti vapihwa mukana wekutenga sezvo vachazodzoka kubasa musiwa 27 Zvita. VaJemedza vanoti gore rino zvinhu zviri nani sezvo mari dzavo dzauya vasati vatamba kisimusi uye vachiwana mari dzavo kumabhangi kunyange vari kupihwa madhora makumi mashanu pazuva chete. VaJemedza vanoti ane ganda ane nyama hazvienzane neasina. Zvichakadaro, muChinhoyi manga muine mitsetse yakakura pamabhangi akawanda vanhu vachida kutora mari dzavo. Mabhangi akawanda anga achipa vanhu mari inoita madhora makumi mashanu kunyange vakawanda vachti ishoma kushandisa pazororo rekisimusi. VaMacdonald Muzuva vanoti nyaya yemari idambudziko riri kurwadza sezvo vapihwa madhora makumi maviri kubhanga reCBZ. VaMuzuva vanoti vaifanirwa kunge vachienda kumusha asi vachatadza nekushaya mari sezvo vedzimotokari vari kuramba kuti vafambi vashandise Ecocash mukubhadhara. Zvitoro zvakawanda zvinotengesa zvekudya zvakaita seOK neTM zvanga zvakazara nevatengi vanga vachishandisa makadhi kubhadhara asi vatengi vanoti zvinhu zvavo zviri kudhura kudarika kutenga nemari chaiyo. Vamwe vagari vakatumirwa mari nehama neshamwari dziri kunze kwenyika kuburikidza nemakabhani akaita seMukuru vatadza kuwana mari dzavo vachinzi hapana mari.

headline: ZCTU Inotambira Kuvepo kweTNF iri paMutemo
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kuvepo kwemutemo unotara mashandiro eTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti sevashandi vanofara kuti pave nehwaro hwekuti nhaurirano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi nehurumende dzive pamutemo, sezvo kwemakore makumi maviri adarika TNF yanga ichishanda zvisiri pamutemo. Musangano wekutanga weTNF pave nemutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kuitwa nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, apo panotarisirwawo kukurukurwa zvakati wandeyi zvinobata TNF zvakaunganidzwa masvondo maviri adarika pamusangano wakaitwa kuKadoma. VaMoyo vanoti zvimwe zvichakurukurwa zvichabva kukomiti yakaiswa kuti itarise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi uye zvinosanganisira matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura munyika.
