Studio 7 yakundikana kubata divi revashandirwi pamwe nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Votaura Pamusoro peMari Yanetsa Munyika
text: VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Gavhuna webhanga guru munyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vaudza nhengo dzepararamende kuti bhanga ravo nemamwe mabhanga akaunza munyika mari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora kubva muna Ndira kusvika pakutanga kwemwedzi uno, asi izvi zviri kutadza kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Vatiwo nyaya yekuti nyika iri kutenga chibage zvichitevera nzara yakakonzerwa neEl Nino pamwe nekuti vanhu havachina chido chekuchengetera mari dzavo mumabhanga sezvo vari kubhadhariswa mari yakawanda pakushandisa mabhangi. Asi vati zvisinei hazvo bhanga ravo nemamwe vari kuronga kuunza imwe mari munyika kuitira kupedza dambudziko iri. Vatiwo mabhanga matanhatu pamabhanga gumi ari munyika ndiwo chete ari kupinza mari munyika. Vatiwo kutanga kwemwaka wekutengeswa kwefodya kuchaunzawo mari yakawanda munyika. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga uye VaMangudya vati mabhanga anofanira kubhadharisa vanhu mari shoma pavanoshandisa mabhanga pamwe nekuona kuti veruzhinji vasina mabhuku ekubhanga kumabhanga vapihwa mukana wekuvhura maakaunzi aya. Mabhanga mazhinji ari kupa vanhu mazana maviri emadhora kana mari iri pasi pazuva nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari. Zvinhu zvakanaka, mabhanga anopa vanhu zviuru zviviri zvemadhora kana kudarika pazuva. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vasiri kushandisa mari yemuno iyo vanokwanisa kudhinda kana yave shoma mumabhanga, VaMangudya vati nyika haisati yakwanisa kuita zvinodiwa kuti itange kushandisa mari yemuno zvekare. Vati chikuru chichapedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika kugadzira nekutengesa zvinhu zvemuno kunze pamwe nekuumba mitemo inoita kuti vemabhizimisi vekunze vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. Zimbabwe iri kushandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora kutenga zvinhu zvekunze iyo ichitengesa kunze zvinhu zvinokosha mabhiriyoni matatu chete emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: VaMawarire Vanonzi Vabvise Mazana Matatu eMadhora seMari yeChibatiso
text: Asi VaMawarire havana kukwanisa kuburitswa mujeri sezvo mapepa avo ekuburitswa mujeri anga asati aunganidzwa sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Dare reHigh Court rapa Mufundisi Evan Mawarire mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomera yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende yaVaMugabe. VaMawarire, avo vakasungwa svondo rapera panhandare yendege yeHarare International Airport, vanzi vabhadhare mari yechibatiso inoita mazana matatu emadhora, uye kusiya kudare pasipoti yavo. Mutongi wedare, VaClement Phiri, vati VaMawarire vanofanira kuzvipira kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo. Asi VaMawarire havana kukwanisa kuburitswa mujeri sezvo mapepa avo ekuburitswa mujeri anga asati aunganidzwa sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Magweta avo anoti vari kutarisirwa kuburitswa mujeri neChina masikati. VaMawarire vanonzi vakashandisa dandemutande vachikurudzira veruzhinji pasi rose kuti varatidzire kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly wakaitirwa kuNew York gore rapera. Hurumende inoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti VaMawarire vaikurudzira kuti veruzhinji vapandukire hurumende. VaMawarire vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi vachiti chavari kuda chete ndechekuti VaMugabe vachisiya basa vachiti vatadza kutungamira nyika zvakanaka. VaMawarire vakambosungwa gore rapera asi nyaya yavo yakaraswa nedare redzimhosva richiti kodzero dzavo dzainge dzatyora. Vakabuda munyika gore rapera vachiti vari kutyira hupenyu hwavo. Pavakadzoka neChitatu chapfuura, vakabva vasungwa vachingosvika panhandare yendege muHarare. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare repamusoro-soro negurukota rinowona nezvedzidzo yepamusoro, VaJonathan Moyo, yekuti komisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission haina simba rekuvasunga, yapfuudzirwa kumberi nedare sezvo mapepa akakwidzwa kudare nemagweta aVaMoyo anzi anga asina kunyorwa manhamba pamapeji. Nyaya iyi ichadzoka mudare muzuva risina kutarwa nedare. VaMoyo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushandisa mari inodarika zviuru mazana mana zvemadhora kubva muhomwe yeZimbabwe Manpower Development Fund zvine huori mukati. Asi vari kuramba nyaya iyi vachiti vakatora mari iyi vachinopa vanotambura kuTsholotsho pamwe nekutengera madzishe nemasabhuku kunzvimbo iyi mabhasikoro.

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC-T Vanorohwa Zvakaipisisa muHarare
text: Imwe nhengo ye MDC-T yechidiki, Va David Mazibiye, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa neSvondo nevanofungirwa kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF kuMbare uko vaifanirwa kuita musangano wevechidiki webato ravo. Imwe nhengo ye MDC-T yechidiki, Va David Mazibiye, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nezuro nevanofungirwa kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF kuMbare uko vaifanirwa kuita musangano wevechidiki webato ravo. VaMazibiye vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vanodarika gumi vakarohwa mapurisa akatarisa kunyange hazvo bato ravo rakanga rawana mvumo yekuita musangano wavo. "Takarohwa takawanda isu vechidiki ve MDC-T uye vamwe vachiri muchipatara mushure mekukuvara pachiitiko chanezuro. Isu tinofungidzira kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF dzakatirova sezvo vakaita izvi pamberi pemapurisa asina kana kusunga munhu," VaMazibiye vaudza Studio7. "Chakanyanya kutirwadza ndechekuti takange tawana mbumo kubva kumapurisa kuti tiite musangano uyu asi takawana panzvimbo pataida kuitira musangano uyu pakazara nhengo dze Zanu PF dzainge dzichitamba bhora nekunwa doro nekuputa mbanje zvakaita kuti tizive kuti havasi vamwe vekubato kwedu nekuti vekwedu havaite izvi zvisina hunhu," VaMazibiye vaenderera mberi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata bato re Zanu PF kana mapurisa kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTino Mambeu, Voenda Mberi neMabasa eKuisa Magetsi eMhando dzeMoto weZuva neMhepo muSouth Africa
text: Muchikamu chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, tine hurukuro nechizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTino Mambeu, vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzemhando dzemoto wezuva pamwe newemhepo, kana kuti solar and wind energy vachishanda vari muJohannesburg, kuSouth Africa. VaMambeu, vanove mukuru wekambani yeUlwazi Energy Technologies, vanoti vakatanga vachingoisa magetsi emazuva ose aya vasati vapinda mukuteya moto wezuva neunobva mumhepo. Vanoti vanotarisira kuti gore ravanozodzokera kumusha vanonoenderera mberi nekuita basa iri, uye vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti isabhadharisa mitero pamidizyo yemabasa avanenge vachiita vari kunze kwenyika kana vodzokera kumusha nayo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Zvirango Zvokanganisa Zimbabwe Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushanduka kweMamiriro eKunze
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChipiri vakataura pamberi pemusangano wekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Climate Change kuGlasgow, Scotland vachiti Zimbabwe yakazvipira kuita zvose zvinodiwa kuti ideredze kusvibiswa kwemweya wekufema. Asi vakatiwo vari kumbokanganiswa nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika. Vatiwo nyika dzakabudirira dzinofanira kubatsira dzevarombo dzisiri kukanganisa zvakanyanya mamiriro ekunze Vachitaurawo pagungano iri, mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vakakumbira ruregerero nedanho rainge ratorwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika wavakakunda musarudzo VaDonald Trump rekumbobuda muchibvumirano cheParis Agreement chekukurudzira nyika kuti dzitore matanho ekuti mamiriro ekunze asanyanye kushanduka. VaBiden vatiwo nyika dzichiri kubudirira dzinoda mari inosvika zana remabhiriyoni kana kuti US$100 billion pagore mukuderedza nyaya dzekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Vati America ichaparura hurongwa hwemabhiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 billion pagore mukubatsira munyaya dzekugadzirisa mamiriro ekunze. Asi panyaya yezvirango veAmerica neEuropean Union vari kurambawo vakamira semusambangwena vachiti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inofanira kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe yange ichitiwo VaMnangagwa vachasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaBoris Johnson asi pane mashoko ari kubva kuhurumende yeBritain ekuti zvinenge zvakona n’anga sezvo vati vakabatikana havakwanise kutaura naVaMnangagwa. Mukuru musangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vati Zimbabwe inoziva hayo zvinoda kuitwa zvakafana nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Musangano wekuScotland uri kukokerwa neUnited Nations uchapetewa musi wa 12 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Otambira Kuvandudzwa kweGwaro reVavhoti
text: Munyori mukuru weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti bato ravo ranga rava nemakore akawanda richirwira kuti sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commision, ZEC, rishandise biometric voter registration musarudzo. Mamwe mapato anopikisa anoti ari kufara zvikuru nechirongwa chiri kuda kushandiswa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo muZimbabwe chekuti vanhu vavhote mushure mekunyoresa mugwaro revavhoti rechizvino zvino, kana kuti biometric voter’s registration. Munyori mukuru weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti bato ravo ranga rava nemakore akawanda richirwira kuti sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commision, ZEC, rishandise biometric voter registration musarudzo. "Isu seMDC tagara tichingoti tinoda voter registration ye biometric. Zvazvinoreva ndezvekuti vanhu vanosevenzesa zvigunwe zvavo nekuti zviripo ndezvekuti pakusikwa panoitwa munhu naMwari hapana munhu pamaline aya epachigunwe akafanana neeumwe munhu," vanodaro VaMwonzora. No media source currently available VaMwonzora vakurudzira kuti ZEC haifanirwi kungoshandisa nzira iyi pakunyoresa kuvhota asi kuti ienderere mberi nekushandisa hurongwa uhu kunyange pakuvhota vakati izvi zvinogona kubatsira kuti sarudzo muZimbabwe dzisabiririrwe. Vati sebato zvinovafadza nekuti kuchinjwa kwekunyoresa kuvhota kunoreva gwaro revavhoti idzva. "Chatinoda ndechekuti kana munhu achinge aonekwa kuti muvhoti tichisevenzesa chigunwe chake anofanira kubva angovhota achisevenzesa chigunwe ichocho pasina zvekuti yatingati manual yekuti panozotariswa tariswa zvakare pachisevenzeswa maballot papers," VaMwonzora vanowedzera. Mutauriri webato re People's Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vatsigirawo vachiti kushandiswa kwenzira iyimukunyoresa kuvhota ndezvimwe zvingabatsira kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzisina bopoto. "Nyaya yebiometric voters’ roll inyaya yatabvirirra kutaura. Biometric zvinongoreva kuti picture yako, finger print yako, kana eye print yako kana DNA yako inenge yavapo pa voters’ roll saka ukaenda ipapo unokwanisa kuonekwa kuti ndiwe. Izvi zvinotibetsera kuti tizive kuti nanga nananga vavhota, vanodaro VaMafume. VaMafume vatiwo sangano reZEC harifanirwi kugumira kunyoresa vavhoti vachishandisa pabiometric asi kuita zvimwe zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzisabirirwe. Mukuru wesangano rakazvimirira rinoongorora nyaya dzesarudzo reZimbabwe Election Resource Center, VaTawanda Chimhini, varumbidzawo chirongwa ichi vakati zvinoita kuti veruzhinji rwudzorerwe vimbo munyaya dzesarudzo. Asi vati ichi chingorichikamu chezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzive dzakachena. Sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzinogara dzakaita mutauro vamwe vachiti gwaro revavhoti harina kumira zvakanaka, vamwe vachiti riri kushandiswa nehurumende mukubiridzira sarudzo.

headline: VaZuma Votarisirwa muZimbabwe neMusi weChina
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa nemusi weMuvhuro yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaJacob Zuma vari kutarisirwa kupinda muZimbabwe nemusi weChina kuzoita misangano yekudyidzana nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaZuma vachaenda nemakurukota akawanda anosanganisa gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika amai Maite Nkoana-Mashabane, gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika amai Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaRob Davies; gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaMalusi Gigaba, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvino VaDipuo Peters uye gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Mildred Oliphant. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaMike Bimha vanoti vanofunga kuti musangano uyu uchabatsira nyika mbiri idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Pamwe neHurumende Zvoendeswa kuMatare
text:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vaendesa kanzuru yavo, bazi rinoona nezvezvicherwa pamwe nemakambani anochera goridhe mashanu mugomo reTarget Kopje, vachikumbira dare kuti rimisemabasa ekucherwa kwegoridhe sezvo ari kukanganisa dzimba dzavo pamwe nematangi emvura. Sangano reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA), rasvitsa chikumbiro chechimbi chimbi mudare repamusoro richimirirwa naVaPhilip Shumba. VaShumba vaudza Studio7 kuti kunze kwekukanganisa dzimba nekugara zvakanaka kwevagari, vacheri ava vari kuchera pasi pematangi emvura nekudaro anogona kuwondomoka kukaita mashamu emvura vanhu vakarasikirwa nehupenyu mumusha uri pedyo. VaShumba vati pamusoro pezvo makambani mashanu anoti Lions Mining
Syndicate, Lions 2, Brossro, Edwards pamwe neGreat Zimbabwe Mining
Syndicates ari kushandisa mishonga yakaipa inogona kuuraya vanhu ikapinda mumatangi emvura. VaShumba vati vaendesa kanzuru kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa mvumo makambani aya. Vatiwo hurumende yaendeswa kumatare nekuti ndiyo yakapa marezenisi ekuti makambani aya aite basa rawo mumusha wevagari ve Target Kopje
pamwe neHillside. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati havasati vagamuchira
mapepa abva kudare, asi vati chero paachasvika mumaoko avo havasi
kuzopikisa kudare nekuti vakazoona kuti zviri kuitwa nekambani aya
zvinokanganisa vagari nematangi avo emvura. Vakafana kubata chigaro chemukuru webazi rezvicherwa muMasvingo,
VaMarshal Muzira, avo vatambira mapepa ekudare, varamba kutaura
neStduio 7 vachiti tibate munyori mubazi ravo kuHarare sezvo
vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau. Munyori mubazi rezvezvicherwa, VaOnesimo Moyo, vange vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kana kupindura mibvunza yatavatumira. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati vanotarisira kuti dare richapa mutongo unomisa mabasa ekuchera goridhe munzvimbo dzinogara vanhu.

Nyaya iyi inotasisirwa kunzwikwa mudare kana vamhangarirwa vakapikisa
zviri kudiwa nevagari mukati memazuva gumi. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoramba Mashoko eKuti Vanhu Vavhota muSarudzo dzeBy-Election kuChipinge Ward 16 Vanga Vachimanikidzwa Kuratidza Pavavhotera
text: Sarudzo dzema by-elections dzaitwa nhasi kuChipinge Rural District Ward 16 nekuKariba Ward 5, dzinonzi dzafamba zvakanaka kunyange hazvo kuchinzi kwanga kuine huwandu hwevanhu vabatsirwa kuvhota, zvikuru kuChipinge. Zvinonziwo kuChipinge vamwe vanhu vanga vachiudzirwa pekuvhotera uye kuti vatore mifananidzo yemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana vasarudza vavanoda kuratidza kuti vavhotera ani. Asi Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaburitsa mashoko ekuti manyepo kuti vanhu vavhota musarudzo yeWard 16 by-election kuChipinge Rural District vanga vachimanikidzwa kutora mifananidzo yemagwaro ekuvhotesa vachiratidza pavavhotera. Mashoko aburitswa nemukuru wezvesarudzo muZEC, VaUtoile Silaigwana, anoti vashandi veZEC vanoziva chose kuti zviri kunze kwemutemo wesarudzo kuti vanhu vatore mifananidzo panzvimbo dziri kuvhoterwa, kunze kwekunge vatopiwa mvumo. Vanotiwo zviri kunze kwemutemo kuti munhu aratidze paavhotera. Kunyange hazvo paita zvimhingamipinyi zvakadai, vanhu vanonzi vabuda kunovhota vane huwandu zvichienzaniswa nesarudzo dzema by-election dzadarika. Vanga vachitevera sarudzo idzi vari kuChipunge Rural District Ward 5, mukuru vesangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vaudza studio 7 kuti dzafamba murunyararo asi vaona kuti vanhu vanga vachibatsirwa kuvhota vanga vakawandisa. VaMadhuku vatiwo vaona kuti madzimai ndiwo anga akawanda kudarika vanhu vose vavhota. KuKariba, mukuru anoona nezvemabasa musangano rinoongorora sarudzo, reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzose dzaitwa murunyararo, sangano ravo raona kuti vanhu vanga vachinovhota vari muzvikwata zvikwata, zvikuru kuChipinge, kuita sekunge vanga vachiita zvekutinhwa. VaKwikwidzana kuChipinge vanoti Amai Gladys Muposhi veZanu PF, Va Rapheus Sithole veCCC, VaRemeredzai Ziki veNational Constitutional Assembly pamwe naVaZachariah Sigauke vebato re Patriotic Zimbabweans. Vakwikwidzana kuKariba ndaVaKudakwashe mafusire veZanu PF naVaTonderai Chikwati veCCC. Zvabuda musarudzo zvanga zvisati zvaziviswa pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyamutsika, Mhandu hutu nemukombe
text: wemarathon – Caniscious Nyamutsika naCaroline Mhandu – ndivo vakahwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wemakiromita 21 uyo wakaitirwa kwaMutare svondo radarika.   Nyamutsika akahwina mujaho wevarume mushure meawa rimwe chete nemaminitsi mashanu achisiya dzimwe shangwiti dzaitarisirwa kuhwina mumakwishu aya idzo   dzinosanganisira Misheck Sithole uyo akatora mukombe gore radarika.   Achitaura neKwayedza achangobva kuhwina mujaho uyu,  Nyamutsika anoti, “Ndakagara mudenga rechinomwe, ndave nemakore akawanda ndichiuya kuzokwikwidza mumujaho uyu zvichiramba asi gore rino ndezvanguwo.   “Makore maviri adarika, ndange ndichipedza ndiri pechitatu, asi kuramba ndichishingirira ndichishanda nesimba kwazondibatsira zvikuru gore rino uye ndazohwinawo pekupedzisira.”   Shasha iyi inoti yave kutarisira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumujaho weVic Falls Marathon uye Tanganda Half Marathon yauya panguva yakanaka nekuti inomubatsira kugadzirira kuenda kune mamwe makwikwi.   “Mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon unouya panguva yakanakisa chaizvo nekuti unondipa mukana wekugadzirira kunokwikwidza kune mimwe mijaho nekudaro ndinotenda vatungamiriri veTanganda nekutipa mukana uyu. Ndave kutarisira kunokwikwidza kuVic Falls Marathon svondo rinotevera uye ndinoshuvira kuti ndichanokunda nekuti morari yangu yasimuka zvichitevera kuhwina kwandaita,” anodaro.   Mhandu – uyo akahwina mujaho wemadzimai – anoti kushanda nesimba kwaange achiita gore rese ndiko kwakamubatsira kuti ahwine mujaho uyu.   “Tanganda tinoiziva kuti iriko gore negore uye tinogara takaimirira nekudaro zvinoda kuti munhu ugare wakagadzirira saka ini ndinogara ndakaimirira. Ndine mufaro mukuru nekuti ndini ndahwina goridhe gore rino,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, kune mamwe makwikwi, Elford Moyo ndiye akahwina mujaho wewiricheya kechinonwe kakatevedzana.   Shasha iyi yakarakidza hunyanzvi hwayo gore rino nekuramba ichihwinha kunyangwe zvazvo mugwagwa wakaitirwa mujaho uyu weMvuma usisina kunaka sezvo wakazara nemakomba.   “Zvinofadza kuramba ndichihwina, asi mugwagwa wacho hauchaite wave nemakomba akawanda nekudaro tinokumbira kuti nzira yacho igadziriswe tigomhanye zvakanaka,” anodaro.

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinotora Mhiko Dzichivimbisa Kushandira Zvido zveVanhu
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzakakunda musarudzo dzegore rino nhasi dzatora mhiko yekutanga basa dzichivimbisa kuti dzichadzika mitemo inosimudzira magariro everuzhinji munyika pamwe nekuvandudza mitemo yese kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Nhengo zhinji dzeparamende dzaudza Studio7 kuti dzinofara chose nekusarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende uye dzavimbisa kuti dzichaita zvese zvadzaivimbisa vanhu. Mumiri weMazowe South muNational Assembly, VaFortune Chasi veZanu PF, vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mitemo yese ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo. Mumiri weMt Pleasant, VaSamuel Banda veMDC Alliance, vatiwo nyika inofanira kuva nemitemo inobata vanhu vese zvakaenzana zvisine kuti munhu ndewebato ripi. Mumiri weHarare West vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vaudza Studio7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato ese, dzishande pamwe mukudzika mitemo nekuita basa rinobatsira mwana wese weZimbabwe. Mumiriri weGokwe-Nembudziya muNational Assembly, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena veZanu PF, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda kushanda vasingatyityidzirwe nemakurukota ehurumende sezvaiitika muparamende yapfuura. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Chinotimba vekuBuhera South, vanoti vachashanda zvakasimbamukusimudzira vanhu vemudunhu ravo uye vatiwo vanoda kuti Studio7 ichitanga kutepfunyura iri muZimbabwe. Mumiri weGutu North, Amai Yeukai SimbanegaviveZanu PF, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaedza pese pavanongona napo kuti vanhu vemunzvimbo yavo vawane mabasa. Paramende yagara ichionekwa seisina simba uye ichimanikidzwa kuitwa zvese zvese nemutungamiriri wenyika kana makurukota ake. Asi VaSettlement Chikwinyawa veMDC Alliance vachimirira Mbizo vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika rwendo rwuno. Munyori weparamende, VaKennedy Chokuda, vagadza nhengo dzese mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe dzedare reNational Assembly nenhengo makumi masere dzeseneti. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson MNangagwa, vanotarisirwa kudomwa nhengo shanu kudare reseneti uye svondo rapfuura vakatodoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri zvinoreva kuti vasarirwa kudoma nhengo nhatu chete. Matare maviri eparamende aya achagara svondo rinouya kuti asarudze mutauriri weNational Assembly pamwe nemutungamiri wedare reSenate. Pane nzvimbo dzinodarika makumi matatu dzeNational Assembly dziri kupikiswa neMDC Alliance mudare reElectoral Court, zvekuti vari kupikisa ava vakabudirira, vamwe vatoreswa mhiko nhasi vanorasikirwa nenzvimbo dzavo mudare iri, vanenge vanzi vakunda vachitoreswa mhiko yekuti vave nhengo dzedare iri. No media source currently available

headline: Tiri mumadhaka: Mutasa
text: FC – “Lloyd Samaita” Mutasa – anoti pavamire parizvino semaGlamour Boys palog table hapafadze, handipo pavo chaipo uye zvakafanana nekuve mu “madhaka” nekudaro vari mushishi yekugadzirisa mamiriro ezvinhu aya.   Mwaka uno zvinhu hazvisi kunyatsofamba zvakanaka kuchikwata ichi icho chinove chikuru munyaya dzenhabvu muZimbabwe uye parizvino chiri panhamba 10 palog table.   Mamiriro ezvinhu kuDeMbare nguva yadarika akambenge aita manyama amire nerongo izvo zvakamboona Samaita achibviswa pachigaro chekurairidza ndokutsiviwa naBiggie Zuze aive mutevedzeri wake asi ndokuzodzorwa zvakare pasina chinguva zvichitevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa Zuze basa.   Paakadzoka kuzorairidza chikwata ichi zvakare, Samaita akatsidza kuti anoda kushandura zvinhu.   “Sekuziva kwemunhu wese kubva kuvatsigiri kusvika kuvatungamiri vechikwata chino, patiri handipo patinofanirwa kuve tiri, ichi ndicho chokwadi.   “Dynamos inozivikanwa iri chikwata chekumusoro chichirwira mukombe kwete zviri kuitika gore rino.   “Tiri kufanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti tidzorere chikwata pachinofanirwa kuve chiri, pachakakodzera kugara,” anodaro Mutasa.   Apo mwaka wenhabvu wave kumboenda pamid-season break, Mutasa anoti chikwata chake chichagara pasi choongorora kuti chingazvisimbisa sei.   “Tichagara pasi toongorora mafambiro atange tichiita uye toronga kuti togadzirisa sei kuti mwaka wedu utinakire tibve mumadhaka atange tiri kuende kumusoro.   “Chikwata chinoda kusimbiswa asi zvinoda kutanga tagara pasi nevakuru toronga kuti tochisimbisa sei,” anodaro.   Kudzoka kwaMutasa kwakaita mutauro kuvatsigiri vazhinji avo vaida kuziva kuti akambenge abvisirwei pekutanga uye kuti kudzoka kwake kuchashandura zvinhu here kuchikwata ichi?   Zvisinei, Mutasa anoti, “Hatifanirwe kutarira zvakawanda, chikuru kuti tiri kufambisa basa here nemazvo. Chatiri kuda kuhwinisa chikwata chedu kuti chidzokere pachinofanirwa kugara chete, kwete kufunga zvakawanda.”   Zvichitevera kukunda kwakaita chikwata chake Nichrut 2-1 svondo radarika, Mutasa anoti ari kutarisira kuti mumitambo 17 inotevera kuti mwaka wegore rino uchipera, DeMbare inge yahwina mitambo 14 yosimukira kuenda pakanaka.   “Tichitarisa matambiro atakaita mimwe mitambo yedu yadarika, zvaisafadza chose icho ndicho chokwadi.   “Takarasa zvibodzwa zvakawanda saka tiri kutarisira kuti mumitambo inotevera tikahwina 13 kana 14 tinosimuka chaizvo kuenda kumusoro. Saka zvave kuda kuti tishande nesimba sechikwata,” anodaro.

headline: Rimwe Sangano reVarimi Rotsigira Hurongwa hweKubhadhara Vachena Vakatorerwa Minda
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Farmers Union (ZFU), rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti varimi vatema vari mumapurazi akatorerwa vachena vabhadhare mitero ichashandiswa mukuripa vachena ava budiriro dzavakanga vaita pamapurazi avo. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti kubhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro zvakasiya zvaitwa nevachena ava kunopa varimi vechitema ava chiremera chekuti vakabhadhara zvavari kushandisa, kwete kuti vakaita zvekubvuta. “Handiona sekuti chingave chinhu chingaremera vanhu kuti vave ne ownership yakadzika pamusoro peminda yavanenge vachishandisa. Idanho rinokwanisa kuti ritipe chiremera munharaunda yatinogara uyewo nepasi rose kuti vakanga varipo paminda iyoyo vakabhadharwa,” VaZakariya vanodaro. VaZakariya vanoti kubhadhara kwavari kuita mari idzi kuburikidza nemitero iri kubhadhariswa varimi vakagariswa patsva ava hakusi kuti vari kutenga ivhu ravari kurima kwete. “Varimiri vanenge vachibhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro dzakaitwa nevachena ava, kwete kuti tiri kutenga ivhu redu, kwete.” Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yakanga yave kutanga kuita ongororo mumapurazi kuti ione kukosha kwakaita budiriro dzakasiiwa nevachena vakatorerwa mapurazi ava. Vakati izvi ndizvo zvinozovapa ruzivo rwekuti murimi oga oga obhadhara marii, uye murimi wechichena akabviswa papurazi apa anozopiwawo marii. Kutanga muna 2000, vachena vanodarika zviuru zvina vanonzi vakabviswa zvine chisimba pamapurazi avo achipiwa kune vatema, asi minda mizhinji yakararira nekuda kwekushaiwa zvikwanisiro kwevarimi vatsva ava. No media source currently available

headline: PSL yorodza mazino
text: PREMIER Soccer League inoti zvikwata zvine vatsigiri vachabatwa nemhosva yekuita mhirizhonga kumitambo zvichabvisirwa zvibodzwa kana kubhadhariswa faindi inorwadza, pakati pezvimwe zvirango.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino apo mitambo yePSL iri kutarisirwa kudzoka zvichitevera kumbomiswa kwayakaitwa svondo radarika nekuda kwemhirizhonga, mutauriri wePSL, Kudzai Bare anoti kune matanho akawanda avakakurukura nezvawo svondo radarika ayo vari kuendesa kubhodhi ravo iro richagara svondo rino kuti agozeyewa.   Izvi zvinotevera musangano wakaitwa nePSL wekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza mhirizhonga nemapoka anosanganisira mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police, Sports and Recreation Commission, zvikwata zvenhabvu nevaridzi vepembe.   “Tine zvakawanda zvatakakurukura izvo tichapira kubhodhi redu iro richagara pasi pamusangano weAGM. Kana bhodhi rapasisa, tichazozivisa nyika yose kuti ndeapi matanho atichatora.   “Mamwe ematanho aya anosanganisira kubvisira zvibodzwa chikwata chine vatsigiri vanenge vakonzeresa mhirizhonga kana kuchibhadharisa faindi yakasimba. Nyaya yemhirizhonga iyi ihombe saka tiri kushanda zvakasimba kuti tigoipedza nhabvu itambwe munharaunda yakasununguka,” anodaro.   Bare anoti PSL ine basa guru rekubata mukushanda nemapoka akasiyana anosanganisira vatsigiri venhabvu avo vavachaita hurukuro navo yekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza mhirizhonga inoitika kunhandare kuitira kuti mitambo ifambe zvakanaka.   Anoti vanozviziva kuti mamwe ematanho avachatora achabatsira zvakasimba kupedza mhirizhonga sezvo hakuna vatsigiri vanoda kuona chikwata chavo chichibvisirwa zvibodzwa.   “Tichashanda nehutungamiri hwevatsigiri vezvikwata tichionesana panyaya yemhirizhonga iyi.   “Tinoziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vanoda kuona zvikwata zvavo zvichibudirira naizvozvo danho rakadai sekubvisira zvibodzwa chikwata chine vatsigiri vanoita mhirizhonga zvichabatsira sezvo pasina anoda kuona chikwata chake chichibvisirwa zvibodzwa zvichinzi ndiye akonzera mhirizhonga,” anodaro.   PSL, anodaro Bare, ichange ichishandawo zvakanyanya nemapurisa eZRP izvo zvichaona vatsigiri vanenge vabatwa vachiita mhirizhonga vachisungwa uye kutemerwa zvirango zvekusatsika kunhandare dzenhabvu kweupenyu hwose.   “Iyambiro iyi kuvatsigiri venhabvu vanoita mhirizhonga kuti anenge abatwa achasungwa. Isuwo tichamutemera zvirango zvekuti hatidi kumuona achitsika kunhandare dzenhabvu dzemuno.   “Saka kana mutsigiri wenhabvu achida kuramba achiona nhabvu akasununguka, ngaasaite mhirizhonga, ngaangouye atsigire chikwata chake,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakadaro, mumitambo iriko svondo rino, ichaona Dynamos FC ichisangana neHerentals nemusi weSvondo mumutambo uchabuda paterevhizheni itsva ichangoparurwa yeZTN Prime, kuchiti CAPS United iri kunanga kuLuveve uko ichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs.   Musi weMugovera, Highlanders ichange iri kuKariba uko ichatatsurana neZPC Kariba kunhandare yeNyamhunga Stadium.   Harare City ichasangana neBulawayo City nemusi weMugovera mumutambo zvakare uchabuda paZTN Prime.

headline: Mapiritsi eAbacavir Oshomekera Vanorarama neHIV/AIDS?
text: No media source currently available Vamwe vevanorarama neHIV/AIDS vari pamapiritsi anonzi e “second line” vanoti vava kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo mapiritsi e Abacavir ari kunetsa kuwana. Mapiritsi aya anotengwa kubva kunze kwenyika. Mumwe wevanorarama neHIV, Amai Veronica Sikaka, vanoti vakatanga kumwa mapiritsi eAbacavir muna 2010. Vanoti panguva yese iyi yavanga vachimwa mapiritsi aya, vanga vasati vamboita dambudziko rekushaya mishonga yavo. Asi Amai Sikaka, avo vanotorera mapiritsi avo kuChitungwiza, vanoti vave kushungurudzika zvikuru sezvo vari kupiwa mapiritsi emazuva mashoma ipo nguva yese yapfuura vaipiwa mapiritsi emwedzi mitatu. Amai Sikaka vanotiwo kunyange hazvo mapiritsi aya achiwanikwa muzvitoro zvemapiritsi, havakwanisi kuatenga sezvo achidhura kwavari sezvo vari kutotambura kuwana mari yekuti vararame zuva nezuva. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naAmai Rosemary Mhashu vanoraramawo neHIV vachishandisawo mapiritsi mamwewo. Amai Mhashu vanoti nekuda kwekuti vave kupihwa mapiritsi aya ari mashoma, kudzokera dzokera kuchipatara vachinotora mapiritsi kuri kukanganisa raramo yavo sezvo vachirarama nemabasa emaoko. Sachigaro weZimbabwe National Network of People Living with HIV, VaSabastian Chinhaire, vanoti nhengo dzavo zhinji kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana dziri kuchema nekushaikwa kwemapiritsi e “second line.” VaChinhaire vanoti vava kutyira kuti vanhu vakashaya mapiritsi aya, pavanozoanwa, anozotadza kushanda zvakanaka. Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, Muzvare Agnes Muzondo, vanoti sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika richipa kodzero yehutano, hurumende inofanirwa kuwona kuti pawanikwa mari yakakwana yekutenga mishonga inodiwa munyika. Asi munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vakati munyika mune mapiritsi anokwanira vanhu kwemwedzi gumi nemitatu inotevera. VaGwinji vanotiwo dzimwe nguva vanhu vanopihwa mapiritsi emavhiki maviri pachinzvimbo chemwedzi mitatu nekuti mapiritsi anenge asati asvika kunzvimbo dzavo kubva kwaanochengeterwa vachiti asi izvi vari kuzvigadzirisa. Bazi rezveutano rinoti pavanhu vanosvika mirioni imwechete varikumwa mapiritsi emaARV munyika, vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvina ndovari pamapiritsi e “second line”.

headline: ZCTU Yoyambira Hurumende Kuti Iremekedze Zvibvumirano Zvinoitwa muTNF
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti hurumende haisati yapindura chikumbiro chayo chekuti hurumende isiyane nenyaya yekurambidza kushandiswa kwemari yekunze. Sangano iri rinoti kusavimbika kwehurumende kuchapa kuti vashandi vapinde mumigwagwa. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio7 vanoti zviri pachena ku kuti hurumende haisi kuremekedza nyaya dzevashandi pasi pehurongwa hwe Tripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF. VaMoyo vanoti vashandi vanoda chose kutaurirana nehurumende nevashandirwi asi vanoda vanhu vakavimbika. Hurumende yakadzora kushandiswa kwemari yemuno kana kuti Zimbabwe Dollar mwedzi uno pachishandiswa SI 142 izvo zvakashamisa vanhu vakawanda. VaMoyo vanoti havabvumirani neWorld Bank panyaya yavo yekusimudzira Zimbabwe panyaya yekufambisa zvinhu zvakanaka munyaya dzemabhizimisi. VaMoyo vanoti masangano akaita seWorld Bank ne International Monetary Fund masangano anoita zvinhu zvinofadza vatongi kwete veruzhinji. Mukuru wesangano weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedziysai Runhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvichiita sekuti World Bank ne IMF dziri kunakirwa nezviri kuitwa neZimbabwe, masangano aya anoita zvisingafadze veruzhinji. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekesai Nzenza, kuti timwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Asi ZCTU iri kuramba yakatsika madziro ichiti hurumende ikatadza kubuda nehurongwa hunotambirwa nevashandi paichaita musangano wayo wedare remakurukota, vashandi vacharatidzira zvakasimba. ZCTU yakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo muna Ndira kwemazuva matatu. Mumhirizhonga yakaitika mumazuva matatu aya, pane vanhu vakapfurwa vakafa, uye mazana nemazana evanhu vakasungwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaLumumba Vorohwa neKutorwa neMapurisa
text: VaAcie Lumumba avo vakaparura bato ravo rezvematongerwo enyika nemusi weChina rinonzi Viva Zimbabwe vanonzi vasungwa uye kurohwa nevanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa. VaLumumba vakaparura bato ravo iri kuAmbassador Hotel muHarare Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato idzva iri VaAgency Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaLumumba varohwa panze pehotera iyi. "VaLumumba pavangobuda muhotera mavanga vari vabva vangorohwa nevanhu vatisiri kuziva kuti ndivananai." VaGumbo vatiwo VaLumumba vabva vadaidzwa nemapurisa kuHarare Central Police Station. "VaLumumba vadaidzwa kumapurisa vachinzi vange vari kuda kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa. Asi patazoyedza kuvafonera panharembozha yavo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Ikozvino hatisi kuziva kuti vari kupi." VaLumumba pakuparura bato ravo vanonzi vakatukirira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Studio 7 yayedza kutaura naVaLumumba panharembozha yavo asi vange vasiri kudaira.

headline: Osimudzira mureza weZim. . . Chiwenga akapihwa mubairo weFootball BlackList 2019 Award
text: NYANZVI yechidzimai inomiririra vatambi venhabvu vazhinji vanotambira kuEurope, Ellen Chiwenga, akasimudzira mureza wenyika nguva pfupi yadarika apo akahwina mubairo weFootball Blacklist 2019 Award kuEngland.   Chiwenga — uyo ane rezinesi rekushanda achimiririra vatambi venhabvu raakapihwa nesangano reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) — akawanikwa ariye ega mudzimai wekutanga kubva muAfrica kupiwa mubairo weFootball BlackList 2019 Award pamhemberero dzakaitirwa kuLondon nguva pfupi yadarika.   Mudzimai uyu zvakare ane marezinesi akasiyana ekushanda munhabvu anosanganisira Football Association of England License (FA), Association of Football Agents (AFA) neWoman in Football (WIF).   Mubairo weFootball Blacklist Award — uyo unokotsverwa nesangano reFootball Blacklist Organisation — unopihwa kuzvizvarwa zvemuAfrica nezvekuCaribbean Islands avo vanenge vachiita basa guru mukushandura nhabvu munyika yeEngland.   Chiwenga akapihwa mubairo weCommercial Section uyo unove muboka rekushambadza nhabvu pamwe nekuisimudzira.   Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuLondon uko anogara, Chiwenga anoti vanhukadzi vanogona kushanda mubasa rekumirira vatambi venhabvu sezvinoitwa nevanhurume vane mukurumbira vakadai saJorge Mendes naMino Raiola avo vanomirira vatambi venhabvu vakuru pasi rese vanosanganisira Cristiano Ronaldo, David de Gea, Zlatan Ibrahimovic naPaul Pogba.   Mibairo yeFootball Blacklist yakatangwa mugore ra2009 uye Chiwenga ndiye mudzimai wekutanga kubva kuSouthern Africa kuhwina mubairo uyu.   Vamwe vakambohwina mubairo uyu vanosanganisira Yaya Toure wekuCote d’Ivoire, Rio Ferdinand wekuEngland kozoti Rachey Yankey uyo aimbotambira chikwata cheEngland chemadzimai.   “Ndinonzwa kufara nekuremekedzwa kwandaita, zvichibva kune mudzimai wekutanga kuva nerezinesi zviri pamutemo reFifa mune zvemuitambo kuUnited Kindom, Rachel Anderson.   Zvinhu zvinotisimudzirawo nekutipa shungu kuti sevanhukadzi tiite mabasa ayo anonzi ndeevanhurume bedzi,” anodaro Chiwenga.   “Mubairo uyu hauna kusimudzira ini bedzi asi mureza wenyika yeZimbabwe, dunhu reAfrica, vanhukadzi pamwe nevanhukadzi vari mune zvenhabvu munyika dzakasiyana-siyana,” anodaro.   Kushanda kukuru kwaari kuita munhabvu zvakamuona achiremekedzwa kunyika dzakasiyana uye achigadzwa zvigaro zvinosanganisira kuve Global Goodwill Ambassador of Bring Hope Humanitarian Foundation (BHHF) naAmbassador weKarachi FC kunyika yePakistan.   “Shuwiro yangu ndeyekusimudzira nhabvu muAfrica, zvakare ndine chido chekuti dai ndawana mukana wekusimudzira matarenda kunyangwe kwandinobva zvakaita sekuvakwa kwenhandare dzenhabvu, kusimudzira matarenda evana muzvikoro,” anodaro Chiwenga.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Vechidiki vanoda kusimudzirwa, vamwe nekushaya mikana yekuratidza matarenda avo vave kuita zvekunwa nekuputa zvinodhaka.   Isu tiripo pakuvapa mikana yekusimudzira matarenda aya vararame hupenyu hunoyevedza nekuda kwekuti ndivo vatungamiri vemangwana.”

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
text: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kuona World Cup neKudzimwa kweMagetsi
text: Vanhu vakawanda muZimbabwe vari kutadza kuona makundano avanofanira efifa World Cup nenya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi neZESA Saudi Arabia nhasi yashamisa pasi rose nekurova Argentina 2-1 pamutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar muGroup C. Vakawanda vange vachitarisira kuti Argentina ichasimudza mukombe uyu. Asi muZimbabwe vamwe havana kuona mutambo uyu sezvo kwange kusina magetsi. Nzvimbo zakawanda munyika dzatarisana nedambudziko guru remagetsi ari kuenda mangwanani odzoka pakati pehusiku panguva iyo mitambo ye2022 World Cup inenge yapera. Vanoitawo zvekubheja vatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo nzvimbo dzavanotambira dziri kuswera dzakavharwa nekushaya magetsi. Muzvinabhizimisi VaInnocent Mutenha avo vane mabhawa muWarren Park nekuKuwadzana vanoti magetsi avakanganisira basa panguva ino yeWorld Cup. Nemhaka yekushaikwa kwemagetsi uku, vakawanda nezuro vakatadza kuona mutambo weWorld Cup wavaishuwira pakati peSenegal neNetherlands uyo Senegal yakarohwa 2-0. Mutambo weSenegal unotevera uriko neChishanu apo iri kusangana neQatar.MMuongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Qatar inofanira kukunda kana kuti huhwandu hwevanhu vemuQatar mudzinhandare kumakundano aya hunodzikira. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri mugungano rine Qatar neSenegal iEcuador pamwe neNetherlands. Brazil iyo veruzhinji varikutarisira kuti ichatora mukombe uyu iri kupinda munhandare neChina apo iri kusangana neSerbia. Vakawanda kusanganisira mukuru weZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaJoseph Mutawu vanoti mukombe uri kuenda nemaSamba Boys aya. Asi vaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti hapana chikwata chiri pamberi vachiti chimwe cheArgentina, Belgium, France, Germany neNetherlands chinokwanisa kutorawo mukombe uyu. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu anogara kuEngland Admire Muhimeke anoti Argentina kana Germany ndidzo dzinogona kutora mukombe uyu. Panyaya yemagetsi, mutauriri weZesa VaGeorge Manyaya vanoti Zesa haikwanise kubuditsa hurongwa hwenguva dzinodzimwa magetsi nekuti dzimwe nguva kudzima uku kunosangana nekufa kwezvinotakurisa moto wacho. Vanoti veruzhinji vanofanira kujairira kudzimwa kwemagetsi kwenguva refu kuri kuitika uku. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vakawanda munyika vachatadza kuona mitambo yakawanda. Makundano eWorld Cup aya ayo akatanga nezuro achapera musi wa 18 Zvita. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Mabhinya’ ava kuda Graham Potter
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu chekuEngland, cheChelsea chinonzi chiri kuita hurukuro nemurairidzi weBrighton & Hove – Graham Potter – uyo wavanoda kuti agotsiva Thomas Tuchel zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwaakaitwa nezuro.   Varairidzi vakawanda vanosanganisira Zinedine Zidane naMauricio Pochettino vange vachifungidzirwa kuti vanogona kutsiva Tuchel sevarairidzi ve”Chele” kana kuti “Mabhinya”, asi pane mashoko anoti Potter ndiye ari kudiwa neChelsea.   Chikwata cheBrighton & Hove chakatopa Potter mvumo yekuti akurukure neMabhinya uye zvikafamba zvakanaka, anotarisirwa kunge akagara pabhenji reChelsea svondo rino apo ichasangana neFulham.   Kana Chelsea ikaita chibvumirano naPotter, inotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika 12 miriyoni paunzi yekumutenga kubva kuBrighton.

headline: EU Inobatsira Zimbabwe neMamiriyoni Makumi Manomwe eMadhora
text: Sangano reEuropean Union, EU, rapa Zimbabwe mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica semari ichishandiswa mukabatsira kupedza nzara yakatarisana neveruzhinji uye kubatsira munyaya dzehutano nekurima. Izvi zvaziviswa nemumiriri weEU muZimbabwe, VaTimo Okonnen, pamusangano waitwa nechikwata cheEU nechikwata chehurumende yeZimbabwe pamusangano wekuedza kugadzirisa hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU. VaOkonnen vati kuvandudzwa kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, hupfumi pamwe nekupedza huori zvinhu zvakakosha kuitira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika zvakanaka. Mashoko aVaOkonnen anouyawo apo mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakati hapana vekunze vanoda kusima mari yavo munyika isina kugadzikana, uye izere nehuori pamwe nekusachengetedzwa kwemitemo. Nyaya yekuchengetedzwa kwemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu inyaya yanga iri mudariro zvakare pakati hurumende yeZimbabwe neEU nhasi. Zvichakadai, vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, VaJuly Moyo, vati vane chivimbo chekuti zvese zvavanenge vasingawirirane neEU vachasvika pakunzwisisana. Hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira hwakatanga kusamira zvakanaka pakatemerwa zvirango vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vavo vari muZanu PF zvichitevera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Zvichakadai, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti zvirango zvavakatemerwa ivo nevamwe vari muZanu PF zvinofanira kubviswa ichiti zvirango izvi zviri kunze kwemurawo uye zviri kurwadza ruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi veEU pamwe neAmerica dzinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero dzeveruzhinji dzachenegetedzwa zvirango izvi zvisati zvabviswa. No media source currently available

headline: Tauya muPSL zvachose: Samaita
text: MURAIRIDZI weGreen Fuel FC — Lloyd “Samaita” Mutasa — anoti chikwata chake icho chakapinda muCastle Premiership (PSL) kekutanga mwaka uno, hachina kuuya kuzongozadzikisa chete sezvimwe zvikwata asi vanotoda kurwira mikombe yakawanda.   Green Fuel FC yakapinda muPSL mushure mekunge yahwina mukombe weEastern Region Division One uko yaitamba nhabvu inodakadza.   Samaita anoti kare zvikwata zvaiwanzopinda muPSL zvaitarisirwa kuti zvinopinda zvichingodzokera kuDivision One.   Asi anoti chikwata chake maEthanol Boys, sezita remadunhurirwa reGreen Fuel, chauya zvachose muPSL.   “Tauya zvachose, tasiyana nezvimwe zvikwata zviye zvinoti zvikapinda muPSL zvinodzokera kuDivision One pasina chinguva. Isu tinoda kuramba tiri muPSL togorwira mikombe yakawanda.   “Chikwata chedu chine vatambi vakawanda, vamwe vasati vambotambira muPSL vanoda kugadzira mazita avo saka vatori nehukasha hwekuda kurakidza matarenda avo. Tine chivimbo chekuti vachabata basa sebasa,” anodaro.   Samaita anoti akaumba chikwata chine vatambi vasati vambotambira muPSL pamwe chete nevave nenguva vachitamba muleague iri avo vachabatsira kurakidza gwara kune vechidiki vari kusimukira.   “Ukaenda kana kuEurope chaiko, vatambi madhara anotodiwa anenge arimo muzvikwata zvakasiyana nechinangwa chekusimbisa chikwata pamwechete nekurakidza gwara kune vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Samaita.   Kupinda kwakaita Green Fuel FC muPSL chakabva chaita chikwata chekutanga kubva kuChisumbanje kutambira nhabvu yacho league iri.   Samaita anoti kuChisumbanje vatsigiri vamirira kutanga kwenhabvu izvo zvichavapawo mukana wekuona zvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu zvemuno zvakaita seDynamos, Highlanders neCAPS United.   “MuChisumbanje vanhu vari kufara zvikuru, ndekekutanga aka nhabvu yePSL ichiuya uye vamirira kuda kuona chikwata chavo chichitamba nezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu munyika.   “Vamwe vacho havasati vamboona Dynamos, Highlanders, CAPS United neFC Platinum dzichitamba saka kwavari chinhu chikuru kuona zvikwata izvi zvichiuya kuzotambira muChisumbanje.   “Kuno kune vanhu vane mabhizimisi vakawanda, ndiri kutoona kuti vari kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirira mabhizimisi avo nekuti vanoziva kuti nhabvu paichatanga vachaita mari apo panenge pachiuya zvikwata zvakawanda kuzotamba nesu,” anodaro Samaita.   Pari zvino, Green Fuel iri musvondo rayo rechipiri yatanga kuita gadziriro dzemwaka wa2023 uyo unotarisirwa kutanga munaKukadzi.   Vazhinji vanoziva Samaita achitamba nhabvu apo akaita mukurumbira achitambira Tanganda FC yekwaMutare ndokuzoenda kuDynamos uko akanohwina mikombe yakawanda zvikuru.   Achiri kuTanganda, Samaita akatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura izvo zvakaona achishevedzwa kunzi ndiPele wenhabvu wekuTanganda uye kana achifamba muguta reMutare vatsigiri venhabvu vakamuona vanomushevedza kuti Mambo Mutasa wenhabvu.   Samaita anobva muimba yehushe hwekwaMambo Mutasa kuManicaland.   “Tisu taive muchikwata cheTanganda chakatamba muPSL chikahwina mukombe weCastle Cup mugore ra1993. Saka nhasi ndikafamba maMutare ndinenge ndichingoshevedzwa kunzi Mambo Mutasa wenhabvu, rukudzo rwandinopihwa nekuda kwebasa randakabata ndichitambira kuchikwata ichi.   “Kare kwaive nemumwe mutori wenhau akandishevedza kuti ndini Pele weTanganda, saka ndinongotenda kuti ndinoyemurwa nevekwangu kwandakabva,” anodaro.   Vanakomana vaSamaita vaviri, Wisdom naPanashe, vese vakatevera matsimba ake sezvo vanotamba nhabvu.   Wisdom, uyo anotambira Black Rhinos, akambotambira FC Platinum, Dynamos, CAPS United, Motor Action neSenica yekuSlovakia kuchiti Panashe anotambira Manica Diamonds.

headline: MDC Alliance Yokumbira Musangano neZEC
text: Mubatanidzwa unopikisa weMDC Alliance wanyora tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC uchikumbira kuita musangano nekomisheni iyi kuti vazeye nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakanangana nesarudzo, idzo dzasarirwa nemazuva makumi maviri nemashanu chete. Mutsamba yanyorwa naVaJameson Timba, avo vari kumiririra vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa kuZEC, mubatanidzwa uyu unoti uri kuda kuona gwaro richashandiswa pakuvhota uye kuti richachengetedzwa kupi. Mumashoko avo, VaTimba vanotiwo vanodawo gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo re Biometric Voter Registration. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vanoti vakagadzirira kuita musangano nemapato ose ari kukwikwidza musarudzo kuti vazeye zvichemo zvavo. VaChamisa vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vanoti vanyorerarawo kuvatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC neAfrican Union nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti zvichemo zvine mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance zvakakosha asi hapachina nguva yekuti zvigadziriswe sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari Oshaikwa muNyika
text: Pane mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe yasara nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari asara munyika anokwana svondo rimwe chete chete sezvo Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekunze yekupa vemagaraji kuti vatenge mafuta aya. Mune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika, motokari dzakawanda dzange dziri mumutsetse dzichitsvaga mafuta peturu nedhiziri. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa vanhu kwaZvimba, Mashonaland West neMugovera kuti mafuta aya harisi dambudziko. Hurumende yakambozivisawo kuti yainge yawana chikwereti chekutenga mafuta. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti zvinhu zvinenge zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuRBZ panyaya yemari. Vati izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti zvinhu zvinoda mari yekunze zvawandisa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube avo vati mari yave kushomeka sezvo RBZ yave kubhadhara mari dzakawanda kune vanochera goridhe neplatinum. Vamwe vemakambani ekunze akaita seRio Zimbabwe vange voendesa RBZ kumatare idzimhosva nekukundikana kuvapa mari dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vanoti Vanoda Kuwedzerwa Mari Sezvo Zvinhu Zvose Zvave Kudhura
text: Mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda munyika yatanga kukwira zvakanyanya uko vashandi vari kugunun’una kuti havasi kuwedzerwa mari. Mapazi nemakambani akawanda ehurumende akaita seredzidzo, Zimbabwe Energy Authority, Zimbabwe National Road Authority, Zimbabwe Electricity Authority, neZimbabwe Revenue A,uthority, akawedzera mari dzemitero izvo zviri kuitwawo nemakanzuru nevemabhizimisi. Makambani enharembhozha eEconet neNetOne akawedzerawo mari achiti ainge apihwa mvumo nePOTRAZ. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vatenda kuti mushandi ari kutsenga mhandire nemavende uye vanodawo kuwedzera mari dzemihoro. Peturu yakawedzerwa kubva padhora nemasendi makumi maviri nematanhatu kusvika padhora nemasendi makumi matatu parita. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vati vemabhizimisi vave kumanikidzwa kukwidza mitengo nekudhura kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, avo vati kukwira kwemitengo kuchakanganisa zvikuru chido chehurumende chekuti inflation idzike kusvika pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, VaGilbert Muponda, vatiwo kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kuri kukonzerwawo nekuti mabhodha haasati anyatsovhurwa zvopa kuti zvishoma zviri kupinda munyika zvidhure. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuvatengi vachiti zvikoro zvakawedzerwa mari. Asi gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, Dr Sekai Nzenza, vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi kuti hudzikame kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvakaita seNational Development 1 chemakore mashanu. Mutengo wepeturu uri kukwira pasi rose sezvo nyika dzakawanda dzovhura mabhizimisi mushure mekumbovhara nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanoongorora mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari pasi rose veGlobal Petrol Prices.Com vanoti Zimbabwe iri pakati penyika nhatu dzemuAfrica dzinodhura zvakanyanya mafuta aya izvo zvopawo kuti vemabhizimisi vakwidze mitengo yezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kurawara neCovid-19 muNyika Hwowedzera Zvakanyanya
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uho hwainge hwamboderera kusvika pazana nemakumi matanhatu nemana kana kuti 164 musi wa12 Gumiguru hwatanga kuwedzerazve zvakanyanya. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uye vose havana nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zviri kureva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 433. MuBulawayo ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara vanosvika zana negumi nevatanhatu, Harare ine makumi manomwe nemumwe, Matabeleland South ine makumi matanhatu nemumwe, Matabeleland North makumi mashanu nevatanhatu uye dunhu rine vanhu vashoma shoma vari kurwara iMashonaland West ine vanhu vasere. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 8, 786. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 8, 096 mushure mekupora kwevanhu vasere neMugovera. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 257. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemasere ane zana nemana kana kuti 47, 104. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1, 6 million. South Africa ine vanhu vave kusvika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 750 000 vabatwa nechirwere icgi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemana kana kuti 54 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 245, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kuda kusvika mamiriyoni gumi nechimwe kana kuti 11 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9. Asi vapora vachida kusvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati vanhu vanofanira kugara vakangwarira nekuti vakarivara chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha zvochoiita muAmerica, Britain nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: GMAZ Inoti VaMnangagwa Vanoziva nezveNyaya yeMari Inofungidzirwa neParamende Kuti Haina Kufambiswa Zvakanaka
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association kana kuti GMAZ nhasi razivisa paramende kuti rakabatsira Grain Marketing Board nemari yekugadzirisa matura ayo mushure mekunge rakumbirwa kuita izvi nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, panguva yavaive mutevevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika zvakare vari sachigaro wedare remakurukota ainona nezvekuti nyika yawana chikafu chakakwana kana kuti Food Security pachirungu. Avo ndisachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekurima, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena, vachikandirana makobvu nematete nasachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara. VaMusarara, nhasi vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekurima, kuti vakapa kambani yehurumende yeGMB mari yekugadziria matura ayo muna 2016 mushure mekunge vakumbirwa kuita izvi naVaMnangagwa. Vaenderera mberi vakati vakaudzwa naVaMnangagwa kuti chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chaizoburitswa goho rakanaka nekudaro vaida kuti GMB igadzisirise mataura ayo uye vaida kuti sangano ravo ribatsire panyaya iyi. Vati mushure mekutaura naVaMnangagwa, vakazoita mumwe musangano nevaive gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, apo vakazoita chibvumira chekubatsira GMB nemamiriyoni mapfumbamwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Vati vakabvumirana kuti hurumende yaizobhadhara mari iyi nekutengesera sangano ravo chibage nemutengo uri pasi izvo zvinove zvakazoitika. Kunyange hazvo VaMusarara vaburitsa magwaro avati anoratidza kuti mari iyi yakashandiswa kubva kubhanga ravo reMetbank pamwe nevanoongorora mari dzeGMAZ kana kuti auditors veBaker Tilly, GMB yaramba kuti yakawana mari kubva kuGMAZ. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muGMB, VaClemence Guta, vati GMB yakagadzirisa matura ayo nemari yaitengwa chibage nenhengo dzeGMAZ. Panyaya yekuti bazi rezvemari raiziva nezvekubatsira kwakaitwa GMB neGMAZ, VaWadyajena vati paramende yakanyorera kugurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube avo vakataura kuti hapana humbowo rweizvi mubazi ravo uye havana zvavanoziva nezvenyaya iyi. VaWadyajena vati nekuda kwaizvozvo VaNcube vakati hapana humbowo hwavaikwanisa kupa komiti yavo. Komiti yaVaWadyajena yati iri kuenderera mberi nekuongorora nyaya iyi uye inoda kuti GMAZ iendese kuparamende magwaro aya kaita chibvumirano chekubatsira GMB nebazi rezvemari nezvimwe zvingabatsire komiti iyi panyaya iyi. Mune imwewo nyaya, komiti yaVaWadyajena yange ichida kuziva kuti GMAZ yakashandisa sei mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe emadhora ekuAmerica ayakapiwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. VaMusarara vati mari iyi yakashandiswa kutenga gorosi kunze kwenyika. Vati mari iyi haina kupihwa kuGMAZ asi kuti yakapihwa kukambani yeHolbud iyo inove kambani yaiunza gorozi munyika. Asi VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo haina kugutsikana nezvetaurwa naVaMusarara uye vati kuferefetwa kwakaita neparamende kumakmbani akaita seZimbabwe Revenue Authority, kwaratidza kuti GMAZ haina kana kumbotenga gorosi kubva kunze kwenyika asi kuti izvi zvakatoitwa neimwewo kambani inonzi Drostky. VaMusarara vabvuma kuti Drostky ikambani yavo uye VaWadyajena vati komiti yavo iri kuenderera mberi nekuongororo kuti sei Droskty iri iyo yaitenga gorosi kubva kunze kwenyika ichishandisa mari yainge yapihwa GMAZ. Mangwana komiti yaVaWadyajena iri kutarisirwa kushanyira makambani aVaMusarara anoti Drostky neAlpha Grain apo iri kuenderera mberi nekuongororo nyaya iyi. Nyaya iyi yaifanira kunge yakaitwa gore rapfuura asi VaMusarara vakanyorera kumutauriri weparamende VaJacob Mudenda vachiti vaida kuti inzikwe nekomiti inoona nezvekushandisa kwemari yehurumende sezvo vaiona VaWadyajena semunhu aive nedivi raakarerekera. Asi hutungamiriri weparamende hwakagara pasi hukaona zvakakodzera kuti VaMusarara vamire pamberi pekomiti yaVaWadyajena ndokuvatumira masamanisi azovaunza kudare nhasi. VaWadyajena varatidzawo kusafara kuti VaMusarara pamwe nevashandi veGMAZ vaitaura kumapepanhau nezveongororo iyi uye vati kana zvikaitika zvekare vachatongwa nenyaya yekuzvidza dare. VaMusarara avo vauya negweta ravo varambidzwa kushandisa gweta ravo uyewo mutauriri wesangano reGMAZ, VaGarikai Chaunza, avo vange vatora mhiko yekuti vape humbowo vadzingwa mudare vachinzi vange vave kukanganisa komiti iyi. VaChaunza vayambirwawo kuti vacharangwa kana vakaramba vachitaura pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ongororo iyi iri kuenderera mberi uye VaMusarara pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzeGMAZ vanzi vachakokwa zvakare kudare. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Chigumba Vovimbisa Gwaro reVavhoti Mushure Mekudhinda Mazita eVakwikwidzi
text: Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, Justice Priscilla Chigumba, vanoti komisheni yavo ichaburitsa gwaro rine mazita evanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota richashandiswa gore rino mushure mekunge komisheni iyi yaburitsa mazita evachakwikwidza muGovernment Gazette. Mapato anopikisa munyika ari kuchema chema kuti haasati apihwa neZEC gwaro revavhoti richashandiswa musarudzo, asi Justice Chigumba vanoti vachiri kugeza gwaro revavhoti uye gwaro iri richatanga kupihwa kuvanhu vese vari kukwikwidza musarudzo. Justice Chigumba vati panotove negwaro riripo iro rakaongororwa neveruzhinji uye rikashandiswa kuNomination Court. Vati gwaro iri ndiro rave kusukwa pasati paburitswa gwaro rekupedzesera. Amai Chigumba vati dambudziko rekuchema chema riripo nekuti mamwe mapato aida gwaro iri riri muchikamu chekuti rinogona kusandurwa zvekuti raizobuda risina kumira zvakanaka uye vakaona zvisingankodzeri kuvapa Voters Roll iri muchikamu ichi. Vati pari zvino vave kutarisa gwaro revavhoti kubva kumatunhu ese pamwe nevakanyoresa vasati vaburitsa gwaro rekupedzesera. Asi sachigaro verimwe sangano rinoongorora sarudzo, zvakare vari gweta, VaTrust Maanda, vati zviri kuitwa neZEC zviri kunze kwemutemo nekuti gwaro revavhoti rinofanira kunge ravepo zuva resarudzo risati ratombodomwa. VaMaanda vati zvinhu zvakanaka kuti dai ZEC yakangogadzirisa nyaya dzegwaro revavhoti kuitira kuti sarudzo dzisaite mutauro. Zvichakadai, vanhu vaswera vari chipata pata kutenga gwaro revavhoti risati rapepetwa kana kuti provisional Voters’ Roll kubva kuZEC uye vamwe vange vachipihwa ipapo asi vamwe vachinzi vadzoke mukati memazuva maviri. Vanoona nezvesarudzo muMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaHenry Chimbiri, ndemumwe weavo vakwanisa kutenga gwaro revavhoti. Vati vachada kuongorora kuti gwaro iri rinenge rine musiyano upi negwaro rekupedzesera. ZEC inotaririsirwa kuburitsa muGovernment Gazette mazita evanhu vese vachakwikwidza musarudzo nguva ipi zvayo. No media source currently available

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweZvizvarwa zveKunze Zvichirambidzwa Kupinda muZvipatara neChikwata cheOperation Dudula muSouth Africa kwoenderera Mberi
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvinoti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka sezvo nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi dziri kuenderera mberi, kunyange hazvo hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kuti dziri kutaurirana. Nhengo dzechikwata cheOperation Dudula, icho chiri kurwisa kuti zvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvibude munyika iyi, dzaenderera mberi nekurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara nemakiriniki zvehurumende zviri muJohannesburg nemuPretoria. Chikwata ichi changa chakamira pamikova yemakiriniki ari muJohannesburg anosanganisira Hillbrow Community Health Centre, uye chinonzi chakatanga kurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara neMuvhuro apo chakavhara mukova wechipatara chikuru cheKalafong Provincial Tertiary Hospital chiri mudunhu re Gauteng. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reEconomic FreedomFighters (EFF) dzinonzi dzanga dziri pachipatara ichi neChitatu dzakagarira veOperation Dudula ava kuti vasarambidza varwere kupinda muchipatara ichi. Izvi zviri kuuya mushure mekunge mumwe mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reLimpopo, Dr. Phophi Ramathuba svondo rapera vanyadzisa chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chairwara chiri mune chimwe chipatara mudunhu iri vachiti vekunze vari kupedzera vemuSouth Africa mishonga nezvikwanisiro. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende kanawo mapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muPretoria muSouth Africa, Mufundisi Richard Moyo, avo vari kutevera zviri kuitika, vanoti nhau iyi inhau inosiririsa uye kurwadza kuona zviri kuitwa vekunze nezvizvarwa zvaSouth Africa, uchiona kuti vari kushungurudzwa ava vanenge vari varwere kana vari kuperekedza varwere. Mufundisi Moyo vanoti kunyange hazvo mapurisa ari kuzama kubatsira, havaoni ari kuita zvinoita kuti kushungurudzwa uku kumiswe, vachiti vanopa mhosva yose iyi kuhurumende yeSouth Africa, iyo vanoti haisi kumisa chikwata cheOperation Dudula. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kubatsira Munguva yeCovid-19 neMari Yakasara Mubhajeti yeRTG's 9,8 Billion
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vave kuda kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba nekuda kwekupararira zvinotyisa kwoita chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanoti hurumende ine mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 9,8 billion parutivi kana kuti budget surplus zvakonzerwa nekugona kwayo kushandisa mari zvine mwero. Munyori mukuru wesangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, VaWisborn Malaya, vanoti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vari kunetseka uye vanoda rubatsiro. Vati sesangano vari kuyedzawo kubatsira vanhu asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. VaMalaya vati hapana hurongwa huripo kubva kuhurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemagariro evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, sesvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ishandise mari iyi kubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe vasiri kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa panguva iyo vamwe vemabhizimisi vave kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro uye kuwedzera mari dzemba nedzekufambisa. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze, vati vanhu vanoda rubatsiro. Vati izvi zvinokwanisa kuitwa muhurukuro dzeTrripartite Negotiating Forum dzinounza pamwe chete hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite muonero wetwiza vachiti chikuru chinoda kuitwa kuti patengwe nhomba dzakawanda dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kuti vanhu vazokwanise kudzokera kumabasa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti mhando yechirwere cheCovid-19 yopararira munyika iko zvino yeDelta variant inotapuriranwa zviri nyore uye iri kuuraya vanhu vakawandidsa kudarika dzimwe mhando dzose. Mabhanga anokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino akaita seWorld Bank neInternational Monetary Fund anoti hupfumi hwenyika dzepasi rino huri kukanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vave kuda kunonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba nekuda kwekupararira zvinotyisa kwoita chirwere cheCovid-19.  No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoti Sarudzo dzeMakanzuru kuBulilima Dzatanga neNguva Uye Dziri Kufamba Zvakanaka, ZESN Ichiti Yagutsikanawo neGadziriro yeZEC
text: Komisheni inotungamira sarudzo munyika, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inoti sarudzo dzemakanzuru mumawadhi anoti 1, 14 ne 16, kuBulilima dzatanga zvakanaka uye nzvimbo dzose dzekuvhotera dzavhurwa nenguva yakatarwa ya 7 dzemangwanani. Ongororo yaburitswa nguva dzemasikati nesangano reZESN, iro riri kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita sarudzo idzi, inoti sangano iri riri kugutsikana negadziriro yeZEC pamwe nekuvhura nenguva kwaitwa nzvimbo dzekuvhotera. ZESN inotiwo yaona kuti zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa pakuvhota zvanga zvave panzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzose nenguva. ZESN inoti kusvika panguva dzemasikati vanhu makumi mana vanga vabatsirwa kuvhota munzvimbo nhatu dziri kuvhoterwa, makumi matatu nemumwe wavo vari vanhu vasingaoni. Sangano iri rinotiwo vanhu vashoma ndivo vabuda kunovhota musarudzo idzi. Mapato anoti ZANU-PF, Citizens’ Coalition for Change neZAPU ndiwo ane nhengo dziri kukwikwidzana musarudzo idzi.

headline: Dare remuMalawi Rosendeka Zvakabuda Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika
text: Dare re Constitutional Court muMalawi nezuro rakarasa zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa gore rapera muna Chivabvu richiti paive nezvakawanda zvinoratidza kuti sarudzo iyi haina kuitwa nemazvo. Dare iri rakatiwo sarudzo iyi inofanirwa kuitwa zvakare mukati memazuva zana nemakumi mashanu, richiti rinovimba kuti mutongo warakapa uyu hauzoparadzi nyika iyi. Mutongo uyu unotevera nyaya yakakwidzwa nevatungamiri vaviri vemapato anopikisa avo vakanyunyuta vachiti sarudzo iyi yakanga yabiridzirwa nemutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaPeter Mutharika, avo vakasarudzwa zvakare kuve mutungamiri wenyika, vachikunda vaivatevera VaLazarus Chakwera nemavhoti mashomashoma. Mutongo uyu uyu unonzi unogona kupikiswa kudare reSupreme Court. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari mudzidzi paHoward University muWashington D.C, VaCalvin Manduna vanoti mutongo uyu hauna kungonakira vana veMalawi chete, asi kuti wakanakirawo zvizvarwa zvese zvedunhu reSADC, umo munowanzoita vanopikisa vanokwikwidza zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo vachiti dzinenge dzabirirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vobuda Musangano reNhaurirano neHurumende Vachiti Inoita Zano Ndega
text: Masangano anomiririra vashandi vehurumende voti vavekubuda muNational Joint Negotiating Council (NJNC) uko vaisangana nehurumende kukurukura zvinonetsa vashandi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi mushure memusangano wavaita sevamiririri vevashandi, mutevedzeri wemunyori weApex Council, VaGibson Mushangu vati vashandi vatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti hurumende yaingouya nepfungwa dzayo pasina kutaurirana. Nezuro hurumende yakaita musangano nevashandi nenyaya yemari dzavanotambiriswa asi hapana chakabuda sezvo ashandi vari kupomerwa hurumende mhosva yekuvawedzera mari yainoda pasina nhaurirano. Hurumende yakati kutanga musi wa 1 Chikunguru yakawedzera mari dzinotambiriswa vashandi zvakapetwa kaviri asi nemadhora emunyika. Vashandi vari kuti mari iyi haitengichinhu uye vanoda kuti mushandi wepasi apihwe madhora mazana masere nemakumu mana emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$850. VaMushangu vatiwo musangano wanhasi wabvumirana kuti hurumende inofanirwa kubudisa mutirongo vamiririri vevadzidzisi vekumaruwa, vesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) VaObert Masaraure naVaRobson Chere vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuponda nhengo yesangano ravo VaRoy Issa muna 2016. Dare rakamboti vakadonha kubva mukamuri yechinomwe yeJameson Hotel muHarare. VaChere naVaMasaraure vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomera iyi. Vashandi vehurumende vanotiwo vachaenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa sezvavakazivisa mugwaro ravakaendesa kuhurumende musi wa4 mwedzi uno v kuti mushure memazuva gumi nemana vachazenge vachiramwa mabasa sezvo hurumende iri kukundikana kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo. Vashandi vehurumende vatiwo kana hurumende yave kunyatsoda kuita hurukuro nayo vachaunganidza masangano ese anomirira vashandi. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, VaRaymond Majongwe vanova munyori muProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe vati vanokatyamadzwa nezvakaunzwa nehurumende kunhaurirano dzavakaita nezuro. Vachibvunzwa neStudio 7 nezvedanho ratorwa nevashandi vehurumende rekubuda muNJNC, munyori mubazi rinoona nezvevashandi VaSimon Masanga vati hapana chavange vaziviswa nezvenyaya iyi vachitiwo zvinhu zvavasingatarisiri. VaMasanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachambobvunzurudza nezvenyaya iyi vasati vatipa mhinduro yakazara. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvogadzikana Munyika paNyaya yeMitengo Uye Kuwanikwa Kwazvo
text: Sangano ravana chipangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi, reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, rinoti zvinhu zvinenge zvadzokera pazvaive zviri masvondo apera zvichitevera kushaikwa kwezvimwe zvinodiwa nevanhu zuva nezuva, uye kukwira mitengo kwezvimwe. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano iri, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti ongororo yakaitwa nesangano ravo inoratidza kuti zvinhu zvose zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa nemafuta edzimotokari zvakanga zvave kushaikwa pamisika zvave kuwanikwa, kunyange hazvo vamwe vatengesi vasati vadzikisa mitengo. Mitengo yezvinhu izvi yakanga yakwidzwa zvichitevera kushaikwa kwazvo. Semuenzaniso, mafuta edzimotokari akanga akwira nemasendi matatu parita kubva padhora nemasendi makumi matatu nemana kuenda padhora nemasendi makumi matatu nemanomwe. Mafuta ekubikisa anonzi akanga akwirawo zvakanyanya mune zvitoro zvizhinji. Semuenzaniso, marita maviri emafuta akanga otengeswa nemari iri pakati pemadhora mashanu nemadhora matanhatu, kubva pamadhora matatu nemasendi makumi mashanu. Doctor Chitambara vanoti havaoni mitemo iri kudzikwa nehurumende yekutara mitengo yezvinhu ichibatsira. Asi vanoti dambudziko remari richiri kuenderera mberi kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti yakadzika mutemo unosunga vanotengesa mari nevasiri kuisa mari kumabhanga. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voomerwa neHupenyu neKushaya Mabasa
text: Nyaya dzekuvharwa kwemakambani dzinonzi dziri kuramba dzichiwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa munyika, izvo zvinonzi zvave kuita kuti veruzhinji vararame nekutengesa chero chinobatika. Mazuva apera hurumende yakazivisa kuti inogona kuvharisa kambani yenharembozha yeTelecel Zimbabwe, ichiti kambani iyi iri kushanda isina rezinesi. Kana danho iri rikabudirira, izvi zvinenge zvoreva kuti vashandi vanodarika chiuru vanenge vorasikirwa zvakare nemabasa. Mamwe makambani akawanda anosanganisira yeZimpapers, iyo inodhinda mapepanhau ehurumende, anonzi ari mushishi yekumisawo vashandi mabasa. Masvondo maviri apfuura, kanzuru yeChitungwiza yakazivisawo kuti ine hurongwa hwekumisa vashandi vanodarika mazana matanhatu mabasa nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzeupfumi. Kubva kutanga kwegore rino, mabhanga akawanda akaputsika uye vashandi vanodarika chiuru vakarasikirwawo nemabasa. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinoti izvi zvinoreva kuti vose vanhu vari kurasikirwa nemabasa ava vanenge vopinda mukuita mabasa ekuzviriritira, umo mazara nechekare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevashandi uye vachitungamira sangano reConcerned Affiliates of the ZCTU, VaLovemore Matombo, vanoti mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika haachadi kuti vashandi nevashandirwi vabatane pahuro, sezvo iri risiri dambudziko revashandi. VaMatombo vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri panofanirwa kutanga pagadziriswa kuti matambudziko enyika ave upfumi hwenyika. Vanoti izvi zvinogadzirisika chete kana hurumende ikatora danho rekugadzirisakuburikidza nekudzokera kuchibvumirano cheKadoma Declaration, icho chakanyoreranwa mugore ra2001. Mukuru wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare vanotiwo vanobvumirana nemaonero aVaMatombo, sezvo mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika iye zvino asisina kufanana nemamiriro akanga akaita zvinhu mugore ra2001. Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti vashandi vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa mugore rino chete mushure mekuvhara kwemakambani akawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neHIV Vogunun'una Kunzi Vari Kuonekwa seVakatopara Mhaka
text: Nyanzvi dzemitemo dzinoti dziri kushushikana nekuwanda kwenyaya dzinonzi dzine chekuita nekupomerwa dzimhosva kwevanhu vanorarama ne HIV munyika dzakawanda, kusanganisira united states. Izvi zvinonzi zvabuda kumusangano weInternational Aids Conference uri kuitirwa kuDurban, kuSouth Africa. Zvinonzi kunyange hazvo kusina mutemo unozivikanwa unoti imhosva kuti munhu ave neHIV, magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akawanda anonzi ati vanorarama nemukondombera vakawanda vanoonekwa sevanhu vakatopara mhosva. Bazi reU.S Centers for Disease Control and Prevention gore rapera rakazivisa kuti matunhu makumi maviri nemana emuAmerica anoda kuti vanhu vanoziva pavamire panyaya dzeHIV kuti vaudze vavanodana navo. Apo hupfumi hwepasi rose huri kudzikira, hurombo hunonzi hwabatawo vanhu munyika dzakawanda, izvo zvomanikidza madzimai akawanda kupinda mune zvechipfambi kuti vararame. Asi madzimai aya ari kugunin’una kuti vanoonekwa sevanhu vane mhosva, izvo zvinovasiya pamhene mune zvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kubata zvirwere zvepabonde neHIV/Aids.

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Voratidzira muHarare
text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa neChipiri vanopfuura mazana matatu vakaratidzira mu Harareku nyangwe hazvo mapurisa akayedza kuvarambidza kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kudare reparamende. Vairatidzira ava vaipika kuti havasi kuzobvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa mavanoshandira pakati peguta kana hurumende isati yavapa nzvimbo dzekushandira dzakanaka. Varatidziri ava vakatangira kuratidzira pakatarisana nemahofisi ekanzuru yeHarare pana Rezende ndokupinda muna Nelson Mandela vakananga kuparamende apo pavazomiswa nemapurisa panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere kwenguva inokwana awa imwe chete mapurisa achiramba kuti varatidziri ava vaendese gwaro ravo renyunyuto kuparamende. Asi apo mapurisa ainge ari pakati pekurambidza varatidziri kuenderera mberi, mumwe wevanga vachitungamira varatidziri ava, VaJustice Munayi ,vanove munyori mubhodhi rerimwe remasangano anga achiratidzira aya re National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, kana NAVUZ, vakaudza varatidziri ava kuti sevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa havasi kuzofa vakabvuma kubviswa mumigwagwa musi weChishanu uyo wakatarwa nehurumende kuti vange vabva mumigwagwa. Zvakataurwa naVaMunayi zvakatsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weNAVUZ, VaSamuel Wadzai. Mumwe wevanga vachiratidzira ava uye vari nhengo yeMDC-T inomirira Bulawayo East muparamende, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kutanga yagadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa vawane mabasa. Varatidziri ava vakazobvumirana nemapurisa aya ainge akatakura zvombo kuti gwaro renyunyuto ravanga vainaro riendeswe kuparamende nevanhu vana chete uye kuti vamwe vese vasare vakamira panosangana Nelson Mandela na Julius Nyerere pavasara vachiimba zvakaomarara. Kuratidzira uku kunouyawo apo dare repamusoro ranga rabvumidza vanhu ava kuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa ange aramba neMuvhuro kuti vaenderere mberi nekuratidzira nyangwe zvazvo mapurisa akambenge abvuma. Zvichakadaro, sangano re Zimbabwe Informal Sector Organization kana kuti ZISO rasvitsawo gwaro renyunyuto kugurukota rinoona nezvematunhu, VaIgnatious Chombo. Sangano re Ziso riri kuda kuti hurumende isiyane nehurongwa hwayo hwekuda kudzinga vanotengesera mumigwagwa uye kuti igare pasi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu vese ava kuti vawirirane nzira dzokuti nyaya iyi yogadziriswa sei. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi, Vashandirwi neHurumende Votarisirwa Kusangana neChipiri paNyaya yeVashandi Vari kuDzimba Nekuda kweCoronavirus
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rashevedzwa nehurumende kuti vazeye nyaya yekuti vashandi nevashandirwi vangabatwa sei munguva ino yekuvharwa kwemamwe makambani senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere che coronavirus. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hurumende yavashevedza kumusangano neChipiri wekuti ivo sesangano rinomirira vashandi vapewo pfungwa dzavo pakuti vashandi vangabatsirwa sei pamazuva makumi mavbiri nerimwe avanenge vasiri kuenda kumabasa. VaMoyo vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo riri iro rakatanga kuuya nepfungwa yekuti makambani ambovharwa kuitira kudzivirira vashandi kubva kuchirwere ichi, vakazoshamisika votonzwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vozivisa kuti vanhu vagare kudzimba, asi pasina kuziviswa kuti vashandi nevanozvishandira pamwewo nemakambani anenge achitatarika vachabatsirwa sei. Vanoti musangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum wavakapedzisira kuita hauna kubuda nechisungo panyaya iyi nekuda kwekuti chirwere ichi chakanga chisati chapinda munyika panguva iyi. Asi vakanga vawirirana kuti paumbwe chikwata chaizotarisa nezvenyaya iyi, icho chisati chaumbwa kusvika pari nhasi. VaMoyo vanoti vanoona sekunge musangano wemusi weChipiri uyu uchatadza kubudirira sezvo naivo vari kutyawo kufambafamba, kunyange hazvo vachiti mushandi haafanirwe kukanganiswa panguva iyi. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi revashandirwi panyaya iyi. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Doctor Energy Mutodi vanoti vashandirwi vose vanofanirwa kubhadhara vashandi vavo kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe iwayo, kunyange hazvo vari kuti vambonzwa vamwe vari kuti mushandi kana asina kushanda haawane mubhadharo wake. “Tambonzwa vamwe vari kuti no work no payment, saka izvozvo tiri kuti kwete. Hatisi kuda kunzwa mushandirwi anotadza kubhadhara mushandi wake nechikonzero cheCOVID-19,” VaMutodi vanodaro. Vanoti kana ivowo sehurumende, vashandi vavo vari kudzimba zvichireva kuti havafanirwe kutadza kuvabhadhara.
