Panyaya yekuti kune vamwe vari kuti vanogona kufa nenzara panguva yekusaenda kumabasa iyi, Doctor Mutodi vanoti vanhu ava vanofanirwa kuzivisa bazi rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu uyewo mapurisa kuitira kuti vakwanise kuwaniswa rubatsiro rwakakodzera.

headline: MDC Alliance Inodoma VaChamisa Kukwikwidza Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika
text: MDC Alliance yadoma mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, kuti vakwikwidze chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChishanu, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWelshman Ncube, vati vanovimba naVaChamisa, kunyange hazvo muMDC T mune makakatanwa munyaya dzehutungamiri hwebato iri. VaChamisa vati vanonzwa kuzvininipisa zvikuru nebasa guru ravapiwa nemapato avari kushanda nawo. VaChamisa vatiwo MDC Alliance ine zvinhu zvitatu zvairi kuvimbisa vavhoti zvinoti shanduko yakakwana yechokwadi, kuwaniswa kwemikana kuvana veZimbabwe vese pamwe nebudiriro. VaChamisa vakumbirawo ruregerero nemabatirwo akaitwa vatori venhau nevechidiki mubato ravo. Vavimbisa kuti vari kuongorora nyaya iyi vakati havawirirani nekushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau. MDC Alliance ine mapato manomwe anoti MDC T, MDC yaVaNcube, People's Democratic Party, Transform Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe People First, Multi-Racial Democratic Party neZanu Ndonga. No media source currently available

headline: Gatland otarisira kurairidza England
text: (55) ari kutarisira kurairidza England pabasa rake rinotevera mushure mekunge World Cup ichangopera, ombomisa hurongwa hwekudzokera kuNew Zealand kunozorora mugore ra2020.   Shasha iyi iri kutungamira Wales mumutambo weSix Nations wekupedzisira kutanga svondo rino apo vachasangana neFrance kuParis uye ndipo paachataura nezvehurongwa hwake hwekutanga hwemimwe mitambo inotevera.   Gatland anonzi akasununguka kutungamira British & Irish Lions kechitatu kuSouth Africa mugore ra2021.   Asi, anonzi ari kudawo kutungamira chikwata chimwe chete ichi muGallagher Premiership.   “Ndanga ndiri kutarisira kutora mwedzi mishoma ndisipo ndozotanga pakati pa2020, zvimwe ndogona kurairidza zvimwe zvikwata zvemuSuper Rugby kuNew Zealand kana kune mukana wacho,” anodaro.   “Asi ndinozviziva kuti hakuna mabasa akawanda kuNew Zealand. Saka handingafunge zvakanyanya nezvazvo.   “Saka zvinoreva kuti pamwe ndichadzokera kuzorairidza makirabhu muPremiership kana kuti kuFrance kana kuJapan.   “Ndakaita hurukuro nevanhu vakasiyana asi hapana zvinobatika zvati zvavepo kutaura kuno.   “Ndofunga panopera World Cup ndinenge ndisisina basa.” – Sportsmail Rugby

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chodzoka Zvine Hukasha Apo Vakawanda Vamira Kuzvidzivirira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muHarare nemusi weChina zvaunza huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika pamazana matatu ane gumi kana kuti 310. Nemusi weChitatu wakare vanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 164 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vose ava havana nhoroondo yekubuda kunze kwenyika. Izvhi zvave kureva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino hwave zvuru gumi nechimwe zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 11, 522. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 9, 599 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mana nevashanu vapora nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara churu chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu ane gumi nevatatu kana kuti 1, 613. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere ichi chadzoka kechipiri zvine mutsindo kana kuti second wave sezvo huwandu hwacho hwawedzera zvakanyanya. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevarwere kana kuti Community Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti vanhu vakawanda havachaterere kurudziro yekuzvidzivirira kubva kudenda iri zvopa kuti vakawanda vabatwe nechirwere ichi. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana, kana kuti 2,4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemanomwe ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 57, 057. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica yose. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che coronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nematatu ane zvuru mazana manomwe, kana kuti 73, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru mazana matatu ane zvuru zvitatu kana kuti 303, 000 kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 16, 7 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 1, 6 million, asi vapora vachidarikawo mamiriyoni makumi mana nerimwe ane zvuru mazana manomwe. Vanhu vapora pasi rose vave mamiriyoni makumi mana nemanomwe ane zvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 47,3 million. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Vachaongorora Mhirizhonga Yakaitika Paivigwa VaMahlangu
text: Mutungamiri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti bato ravo richaongorora nyaya yekuti pane vamwe vechidiki vebato ravo vakanganisa kuvigwa kwemumiriri weNkulumane muparamende, VaThamsanqa Mahlangu, neMugovera. Vachitaura kekutanga nezvenyaya iyi, VaTsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane mashoko ekuti vamwe vakuru vemusangano vakatengera vechidiki doro kuti varwisane. Asi VaTsvangirai vati chikuru chakaita kuti vasaenda kumarinda eLady Stanley kunoviga mufi inyaya yekuti paive nekunetsana kwakanyanya mumhuri. Kunetsana uku kwakapa kuti VaMhlangu vachemerwe kudzimba nhatu. Pakuvigwa kwavo dzimwe hama dzainge dzisipo. Kunze kwekunetsana kwemhuri, painge paine kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati pevechidiki veMDC vanobva kuNkulumane nekuLuveve. Kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire merongo mubato iri, mutauriri webato, VaObert Gutu, vakaburitsa mashoko ekuti chikuru change chapa kuti VaTsvangirai nevamwe vakutu vebato vasaende kumarinda inyaya yekunetsana kwemhuri. Asi sachigaro webato, VaLovemore Moyo, vakaburitsawo mashoko vachipikisana naVaGutu vachiti kusawirirana mubato kwainge kwapawo kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. No media source currently available

headline: Reina opembedza Sarri
text: anoti aimbove murairidzi wake, Maurizio Sarri, anogona kurairidza zvikwata zvikuru zvichitevera mashoko ari kutenderera ekuti angangotsiva Zinedine Zidane kuReal Madrid. Zidane akaramwa basa rekurairidza Real Madrid svondo radarika mazuva mashanu achangosimudza mukombe weChampions League uyo waakahwina katatu kakatevedzana.   Mutungamiriri weMadrid, Florentino Perez, ave kufanirwa kutsvaga mumwe murairidzi anotsiva chizvarwa chekuFrance ichi uye Sarri zita rake riri kutaurwa nezvaro kunzi anogona kuenda kuzvikwata zvikuru zvakawanda muEurope zvinosanganisira Madrid neChelsea.   Achitaura nebepanhau reAS rekuSpain, Reina anoti, “Tiri vanhu vamwe. Tine hukama hwababa nemwana, ndinomuda zvikuru uye ndichagara nekutenda nezvose zvaakandiitira.   “Ndiye akaita kuti zvose zvaiitika kuNapoli makore matatu adarika zvibudirire, uye anoda nhabvu inonwisa mvura inoyevedza. “Ini ndingatokurudzira zvikwata zvakasiyana kuti zvimutore nekuti ane njere dzenhabvu uye ane ruzivo rwakanyanya rwemutambo uyu.” – Sportsmail Football

headline: Veruzhinji Voyambirwa Kuti Vakoshese Hutsanana Kuitira Kuti Vasa Batwe neTyphoid
text: No media source currently available Veruzhinji vari kuyambirwa kuti vakoshese hutsanana uye kuti vaende kuchipatara kana vakaona vachiita manyoka ane ropa sezvo vangange vane chirwere chetyphoid. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Rutendo Bonde, vanoti dambudziko retyphoid rakatekeshera muGweru. Sangano re Gweru Residents Forum nhasi razivisa kuti pane vanhu vapfumbamwe vakashaya nechirwere ichi, vamwe vanhu mazana matatu vakarapwa chirwereichi. Sangano iri rinoti dambudziko iri riri kuwanda kuMkoba township nzvimbo inogara vazhinji. Dr Bonde vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kukoshesa kugeza michero yavanotenga pamisika uye kuziva pekuchengetedza mvura yakachena kuitira kuti dambudziko iri risavabate. Dr Bonde vanoti panguva iyo dambudziko iri ririkunetsa kunzvimbo dzakadayi seGweru, vanhu vanofanirwa kumbomira kukwazisana uye kuchenjera kutapurirana chirwere chemanyoka ichi pamichato nendufu sezvo vanhu vanenge vasingazive kuti chikafu chavanenge vachudya chinenge chabikwa pakachena uye nehutsanana here. "Dambudziko iri rinokwanisa kuderera kana vanhu vakaita hutsanana uye vakakurumbidza kuenda kuchipatara kana vachinge vawona vava kuita manyoka aneropa nekupisa muviri zvakanyanya," Dr Bonde vaudza Studio7.

headline: Vemitambo rongekai: Coventry
text: GURUKOTA revechidiki, mitambo nekutandara, Kirsty Coventry, vanoti hutungamiri hwemitambo yese hunofanirwa kurongeka uye kugadzira magwaro anoratidza hurongwa hwavo hwemakore gumi anotevera.   Gurukota iri rakataura mashoko aya pamusangano warakaita nevatori venhau dzezvemitambo vanoshanda vari pasi peZimpapers nemusi weChishanu chadarika muguta reHarare.   Musangano uyu wakapindwa zvakare nasachigaro webhodhi reZimpapers, Dr Tommy Sithole, nachamangwiza wekambani iyi VaPikirayi Deketeke.   “Basa randiri kuita kugadzira nzira yemakore 10 anotevera iyo ichabatsira kuti mitambo yedu muno igosimukira zvekuti rimwe gurukota richazonditsiva mune ramangwana rinosvika basa rakagadzirwa kare, ropfuurira mberi.   “Tiri ipapo zvekare, kumitambo yese muno tiri kuvakurudzira kuti ngavagadzire magwaro avo ayo anoratidza kuti mumakore 10 anotevera vachange vachifambisa sei basa ravo,” vanodaro.   Dr Coventry vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Isu tinoda kuona kuti muchafambisa sei basa renyu uye vechidiki muri kuvasimudzira sei nekuti ndivo vatinofanirwa kugadzirira remangwana ravo.”   Vanoti munyika muno mune hutungamiri hwemitambo yakasiyana inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kusvika pari zvino ndiyo isati yave kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo rezvemitambo.   “Kutanga gore rinotevera, vemitambo ipi neipi vachauya vachitsvaga mari kwandiri vasarirwa nemazuva mashoma kuti vaende kumakwikwi akasiyana, havana kana sendi randinovapa, kuratidza kusarongeka ikoko.   Vamwe vanozotanga kumhanya-mhanya kumapepanhau kunotaura kuti ndiri kuvanyima mari.   “Muno munyika mune mitambo inosvika 60 uye 12 chete kutaura kuno ndiyo isiri kutevedza gwaro ratakavapa nekudaro ivavo hatina mari yatinovapa kusvika vagadzirisa zvatinoda.   Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riripo kuvabatsira kuti magwaro avo arongeke,” vanodaro.

headline: Nadal akabuda muCincinnati Masters
text: wetenesi pasi rese, Rafael Nadal (32), akabuda mumutambo weCincinnati Masters sezvo ari kuedza kutanga gadziriro dzake dzekuchengetedza mukombe weUS Open. Nadal – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuSpain – akaumburudza Stefano Tsitsipas wekuGreece achibva ahwina mukombe wake wechi80 ndokubva atora zvakare Rodgers Cup kuToronto musi weSvondo. “Ndine hurombo kukuzivisai kuti handisi kuzotamba kuCincinnati gore rino,” Nadal akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter musi weSvondo. “Hapana chimwe chikonzero kunze kwekuchengetedza hupenyu hwangu uye nekuedza kuramba ndiri mutano sezvandiri kunzwa iye zvino. “Ndine kutenda kukuru kune shamwari yangu Andre Silva, tournament director weCinciannati Tournament, uyo wandakataura naye panharembozha akanzwisisa zvikuru nyaya iripo yandakamutsanangurira.” Kubuda kwaNadal mumutambo uyu kwave kusiya Roger Federer, uyo aive asiko kuToronto, ariye mutambi ari kutarisirwa kuhwina makwishu aya eCincinnati. Makwikwi eUS Open achatanga musi wa27 Nyamavhuvhu, kuFlushing Meadows. — Sportsmail Tennis

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rinoti Kudzingwa Muparamende kwaVaBiti neVamwe neVavo Hakusi paMutemo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rapa mutongo wekuti kudzingwa mudare reparamende kwakaitwa nhengo dzePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, dzakakwikwidza dziri pasi pemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance hakusi pamutemo. Izvi zvave kureva kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, avo vanomirira Harare East, nevamwe vavo vave kudzokera mudare iri kunyange mutongo uyu uchikwanisa kukwikwidzwa mudare repamusoro soro reSupreme Court. Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vakadzinga VaBiti nevamwe vavo vashanu vanoti; VaWillias Madzimure (Kambuzuma), VaSettlement Chikwinya (Mbizo), VaKucaca Ivumile Phulu (Nkulumane), VaSichelesile Mahlangu (Pumula), uye VaRegai Tsunga (Mutasa South). VaMudenda vakavadzinga vachiti vainge vanyorerwa tsamba naVaBenjamin Rukanda vaizviti ndivo munyori mukuru webato rePDP. VaRukanda vaiti VaBiti nevamwe vavo vainge vabuda mubato. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaRukanda kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembosha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vakambomiswa basa sameya weHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vanova nhengo yeMDC Alliance vatenda kuti mutongo uyu wapihwa uye vari kutarisira kuti nhengo dzavo dzidzokere mudare reparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inopihwa $961 Million neIMF
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yatambira mazana mapfumbwamwe nemakumi matanhatu nerimwe emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica (US$961m) kubva kuInternational Monetary Fund (IMF) pasi pechirongwa chesangano iri chekugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika dzepasi rose uhwo hwavhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19. Izvi zvaziviswa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, pamwe nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya. Mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau, vaviri ava vati zvaitwa neIMF izvi zvichasimbisa mari yemuno. Vati mari iyi ichashandiswa zvakajeka kutsigira mabasa ehutano, dzidzo, vanotambura, kusimudzira maindasitiri, mabasa ekurima, kugadzirisa migwagwa nezvimwe. Vati imwe mari yabva kuIMF, iyo yapihwa Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheSpecial Drawing Rights, ichashandiswawo mukurwisa Covid-19, nyaya dzehutano, dzidzo nekubatsira vanotambura nezvimwe ichashandiswa kutenga nhomba. Asi mamwe mapato anopikisa munyika audza Studio 7 kuti VaNcube vanofanira kutsvaga mvumo yekushandisa mari iyi kubva kuparamende. Mumiriri weHatfield muparamende, Dr Tapwia Mashakada veMDC-T, vanove zvekaare gurukota rinoona nezvemari mubato iri vati zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe yawana ruyamuro rwekusimudzira hupfumi hwayo panguva ino yeCovid-19. Vatiwo chinodiwa chakakosha kuti mari iyi ishandiswe pajekerere. Vati dare reparamende rinofanira kuve nechekuita nekushandiswa kwemari iyi. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutevedzeri wemutauririri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti paramende ndiyo inomirira vahu nekudaro ndiyo inofanira kugara pasi kuti mari iyi yoshandiswa sei. Vati vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kubatana mukuona kuti mari iyi yashandiswa zvakanaka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubato reZanu PF sezvo mushandi mukuru mubazi rekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour, Economic Devopment Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Prosper Chitambara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari yabva kuIMF iyi hachisi chikwereti nekudaro inofanira kushandiswa zvine hungwaru. Vatiwo mari iyi inofanirawo kushandiswa panyaya dzekuvandudza mabasa emuvura nekugaya mumagetsi vachiti kana izvi zviripo vekunze vanouya kuzosima mari dzavo munyika. IMF yakapa nyika dzepasi rose mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu emabhiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica kuti dzisambaradze hupfumi hwadzo uhwo hwuri kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19. Mune imwewo nyaya komisheni inoona nezvekushanda kwevatongi vematare munyika, Judicial Service Commission, (JSC),nhasi yaziviisa kuti bvunzo dzekutsvaga vatongi vapfumbamwe vedare repamusoro idzo dzakambomiswa zvichitevera kuvharwa kwenyika nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, dzave kuzoitwa svondo rinouya kutnga musi wa30 Nyamavhvhu kusvika musi wa1 Gunyanya. Pane vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vachapinda mubvunzo idzi vanosanganisira mukuru wevatongi vematare amajisitiriti, kana kuti Chief Magistrate, VaMunamato Mutevedzi. Muchiziviso chayo nhasi, JSC yati bvunzo idzi dzichaitirwa kuhotera yeRainbow Towers. Munguva ino yedenda reCovid-19, JSC inoti haisi kukurudziri veruzhinji kuti vaende kubvunzo idzi ichiti dzichange dzichiburitswa pamadandemutane ayo eFacebook neTwitter uyewo panhepfenyuro yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugara Vakazvichengetedza Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Vanhu makumi mashanu nemumwe chete vakafa nechirwere che Covid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvitatu nemazana masere nevashanu, uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, vava zviuru zana negumi nezvishanu, nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vakanga vava miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana masere negumi nezvinomwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere, 1, 817,598 uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanmhatu nezvitanhatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, 966, 672. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo bazi rezvehutano richazivisa zvarawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekumisa kupararira kwedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti dambudziko reCovid-19 rava kuda mushandira pamwe kuitira kuti denda iri risarambe richienderera mberi. Dr Ranga, avo vanova chiremba anoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuchengetedza mitemo kuitira kuti vasabatwe nechirwere Covid-19. Kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kufara nechirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba, Dr Ranga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuita zvakawanda zvakaita sekubaya vanhu nhomba vakawanda pamwe nekuti nhomba idzi dziwanikwe nyore. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yogadzirira Sarudzo Dzichaitwa Muna Kurume
text: Bato reZanu PF nhasi ratanga kutambira magwaro evanhu vanoda kumirira bato iri musarudzo dze by-elections dzichaitwa muna Kurume. Asi Zanu PF inoti ichatanga yaita dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzemun Kurume. Muchiziviso kunhengo dzebato ravo, murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati Zanu PF ichapinda musarudzo dze by-elections nekudaro vese vanoda kumirira bato vanofanira kuendesa magwaro avo kumahofisi ebato iri mumatunhu avo. VaBimha vati izvi zvinofanira kuitwa kusvika mangwana nenguva dza4 masikati. Vati masichagaro ematunhu anofanira kuendesa mazita evanhu ava kumahofisi echikamu chebato ravo chekuronga musangano kana kuti Commissariat nemusi weMugovera masikati. VaBimha vati bato richazivisa mazita evanhu vanenge vabvumidzwa kuti vamirire bato uye kana pachinge paita vanhu vakawanda vanoda kumirira bato pachinzvimbo chimwe chete, pachaitwa sarudzo dzemaprimary musi wa20 Ndira. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) yakazivisa svondo rapfuura kuti vanoda kupinda musarudzo dze by-elections idzo dzichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume vanofanira kunyoresa kuZEC musi wa26 Ndira. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaBimba sezvo vati vanga vasiri muhovisi. Mumwe wechidiki muZanu PF, VaMunashe Mututsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira chiziviso chebatoi ravo uye vechidiki vachaendesa magwaro avo kuti vapinde musarudzo. Bato reZapu razivisawo kuti richapinda musarudzo idzi nekuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vawane vatungamiriri vanovashandira. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaGift Ostallos Siziba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo ritori mushishi yekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzichaitwa muna Kurume. Asi vati rwendo runo havasi kuita sarudzo dzemaprimary vachiti dzinopesanisa vanhu. Vati vanhu ndivo vanosarudza vanhu vavanoda kuti vavamirire kubva munzvimbo dzavanogara. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaWitness Dube vati vatove pedyo nekupedza kutsvaga vanhu vachamirira bato ravo musarudzo idzi. Asi kunyange hazvo mapato makuru munyika nemamwe ari kuita gadziriro yesarudzo idzi, bato idzva reIdeas Party for Democracy rinoti kupinda musarudzo idzi kutambisa nguva nemari. Mutungamiri webato iri, VaHebert Chamuka, vaudza vatori venhau kuti havasi kupinda musarudzo idzi vachiti vachapinda musarudzo dza2023. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatara 26 Kurume sezuva rekuita sarudzo dzekutsiva vanhu vakadzingwa kana kufa muparamende nemakanzuru. Pane zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere muNational Assembly nezvigaro zana nezvinomwe zvemumakanzuru zvichakwikwidzwa musi wa26 Kurume. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Anoita Mabasa eMaoko Ocherechedza Zuva reMadzimai
text: Madzimai anorarama nekutengesa zvinhu pamwe nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko anobva mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana aungana nhasi muHarare achipemberera pamwe nekurangarira zuva remadzimai, kana kuti International Women’s Day, iro rakacherechedzwa musi wa 8 Kurume pasi rose. Madzimai aungana aya anosanganisira nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, iro rinonzi ndiro raronga musanganu uyu, pamwe neVendors Initiative for Social Economic Transformation, VISET. Imwe nhengo yeVISET yapinda mumhemberero idzi, Muzvare Tariro Munyereyi, vanoti madzimai ataura nezvematambudziko aanosangana nawo mukuita mabasa avo emaoko, zvikuru vanotengesera mumigwagwa. Muzvare Munyereyi vanoti madzimai asunga kuti pave nekudyidza kwakanaka pakati pevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava, makanzuru pamwe nehurumende kuitira kuti vakwanise kushanda pamwechete. Vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kushungurudzwa uye kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo kana vachinge vasungwa, izvo vanoti zvinozosiya vamwe vavo vave kuzvikandira mumaoko emapurisa aya kuti vasashungurudzwa. Vanotiwo panofanirwa kuve nedzidziso yakakwana pamusoro pezvirwere zvakaita seHIV/AIDS mumadzimai nevanasikana vanorarama nekutengesa ava. No media source currently available

headline: ZACC Yovimbisa Kuvhura Mamwe Mahofisi Matatu Kuitira Kurerutsa Mabasa Ayo
text: Komisheni inorwisana nehuwori munyika, yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inoti iri kutarisira kunge yave nemahofisi anoshanda mumatunhu matanhatu emunyika mukupera kwegore rino senzira yekuedza kurerutsa mashandiro ayo. Mashoko aya, ayo ataurwa nemumwe wemakomishina uye vari mutauriri weZACC, VaJohn Makamure, anotevera nyunyuto yabuda muvanhu vanga vari pamusangano waitwa maMutare wekuzeya mashandiro akanaka ekomisheni iyi, kana kuti Draft National Anti-Corruption Strategy. VaTakashinga Mashayahanya mumwe wevagari vemaMutare vange vari pamusangano uyu. VaMashayahanya vanoti sangano reZACC rinosungirwa kuwanzira mimwe yemisangano yaro kumaruwa kune vanhu vakawanda uye nekune mamwe maguta, kwete kungorambira vari kuguta guru reHarare. "Tinoziva kuti ZACC iri kuedza kuita basa rakanaka asi inofanirwa kuonekwa kuti yambosungawo vamwe vanhu vachipika here kwete kungoti kune ZACC pasina asungwa. Tinoda kuti ZACC iwonekwe kwese kumisha, kumaruwa ichiita basa kuti vanambuya nevana vechikoro vazive nezvebasa rayo, kwete kuwandira mumaguta makuru chete." Mumwe wevanga vari pamusangano, VaFarai Matebvu vanoti ZACC iri kuita basa rayo zvakanaka, asi kuti vanovimba kuti kumhan’arwa nekuferefetwa kwedzimhosva kuitwe kwaaawanda, kwete mumaguta makuru chete. "Kumaruwa kunosungirwa kunge kuchisvikwawo nekuti kune nyaya dzehuwori dziri kuitwa ikoko vanhu vasingazivi kwekuenda, saka misangano yekuzivisa vagari zvekuita panenge paitwa huwori ikodzero yemunhu wose kuti ange aine zivo. Misangano yavo veZACC ngaiparadzirwe kwakawanda munyika yose." Asi VaMakamure vanoti itarisiro yavo kuti panopera gore rino ZACC inge yave nemamwe mahofisi mumatunhu anoti Mutare, Masvingo uye Marondera kuwedzera pane mamwe ari MUHarare, Bulawayo nekuGweru. "Tinofanirwa kunge tavhura ma-offices edu kumaprovinces ose emuZimbabwe, gore rino tinovhura anokwanisa kuita six, asi izvezvi tine three aripo, Harare, Gweru neBulawayo, saka ZACC inenge yave mamwe maregions six muZimbabwe kuti vanhu vakwanise kuzouya kurepota nyaya dzehuwolri, kana corruption nekunzwa mamwe maprogram edu atinoita ane chekuita necorruption," VaMakamure vanodaro. VaMakamure vanoti chimwe chechiri kunonotsa kuvepo kwemahofisi aya ndechekushaikwa kwemari yakakwana uye zvishandisiro zvinosanganisira vashandi vakadzidzira mabasa sezvo vachida kubhadharwa zvakaringana nemabasa avo. "Chatinoda kuti tiite ndechekuti mahofisi atiri kuzovhura aya munofanirwa kunge muine nayanzvi ma-officers arimo achikwanisa kupindura nekugadzirisa zvichemo zvekotapusheni; tinenge tichida kuti chinangwa chekuvhura mahofisi aya chinge chichozadzikiswa, by 2021 tinofanirwa kunge tatove kuna-districts akawanda emunyika kujti tipedze huwori." VaMakamure vanoti komisheni yavo iri kugadzirawo zviverengwa zvevanhu vasingaone zveBraille nevamwe vanoshandisa mutauro wemaoko, kana kuti sign language. Musangano wanhasi wapindwa nevemapoka ehurumende akasiyanasiyana uye vemapoka anoshanda akazvimirira akaita seTransparency International Zimbabwe nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yoita Musangano kuCross Dete
text: Mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance waita musangano nevatsigiri wawo kuCross Dete, kudunhu reMatabeleland North, uyo pindwawo nevatungamiri vemapato ose ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. Vachamirira MDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vanonzi vaudza musangano uyu kuti neSvondo vachaedza kuita musangano nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato ravo, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe kuti vaedze kugadzirisa makakatanwa ari pakati pavo. Muzvare Khupe vari kuti ivo ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T kusvika paitwa kongiresi ichazosarudza mutungamiri. Mumwe wevatungamiri vataurawo pamusangano uyu, VaJacob Ngarivhume veTransform Zimbabwe, vanoti vavimbisa vatsigiri vavo kuti mubatanidzwa wavo ndiyo chete nzira ichabatsira kusimudzira dunhu reMatabeleland North, iro vanoti rakasarira shure nekuda kwehutongi hweZanu PF. “Ndavimbisa vanhu zvinhu zviviri. Chekutanga, ndaudza vanhu kuti Alliance ndiyo nzira yatinayo muZimbabwe sebato rinopikisa kuti tikunde pasarudzo dzinotevera, saka tinofanira kuibatisisa uye tinofanira kuwirirana mumubatanidzwa wedu, uye vatsigiri vedu ngavatitsigire kuti tigone kubatana,” vanodaro VaNgarivhume. “Chechipiri, ndaudza vanhu kuti zvinokosha kuti vanhu vazive kuti VaMnangagwa vangavari umwe wevakakonzera matambudziko atange tinawo kubva muna 1980 vachishanda naVaMugabe.” No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Muzvare Khupe vanonzi vasanganawo nevatsigiri vavo kuNkayi, kuMatabeleland North kwakare. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuti zvii zvakurukurwa kumusangano wavo uyu sezvo takundikana kuvabata.

headline: Dare kuBulawayo Rokurudzirwa Kurasa Nyaya yeMutori weNhau Vachuchusi Vachinzi Vakundikana Basa
text:
Magweta ari kumirira mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ega Jeffrey Moyo azivisa dare ramejastiriti muBulawayo nhasi kuti achaita chikumbiro chekuti nyaya yaakatarisana nayo iraswe nekuti muchuchisi haana kubudisa humbowo hwekuti Moyo ane mhosva yaakapara.

Kunzwikwa kwenyaya yaMoyo kwapetwa nhasi, mushure mekunge dare ranzwa humbowo kubva kuna VaAcademy Chinhamora vanove mushandi weZimbabwe. Media Commission, avo vange vari mufakazi wechishanu vakasarudzwa nemuchuchisi kuti vape huchapupu hwavo munyaya iyi.

Mukuvhunzurudzwa kwavaitwa naAmai Beatrice Mtetwa, VaChinhamora vabvuma kuti zvinhu zvisiri pamutemo kuti bazi rekufambiswa kwemashoko rive nechekuita nekunyoreswa kwevatapi venhau vanobva kunze kwenyika, sezvo boka reZMC riri boka rakazvimirira rega pasi pebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi vati izvi zvinhu zvinogara zvichiitwa nekuti ndiwo mashandiro agara aripo pakati peboka ravo nebazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko.

VaChinhamora vabvumawo kuti munhu anenge achida kunyoresa kuboka iri semutapi wenhau kana kubatsira vamwe vanenge vachida kunyoresa, haana zvaangaziva zvakawanda zvine chekuita nemashandiro anoita veboka iri. Kune vafakazi vana vakatopa huchapupu hwavo kudare. Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti muchuchisi VaAcumen Khupe vachadeedza vamwe vafakazi asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Vati, “Tauya takatarisira kuti pane vamwe vafakazi vatatu vachapa huchapupu vanosanganisira akaferefeta nyaya iyi, nemumwe anoshanda kubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, pamwe naivo VaChinhamora.” Amai Mtetwa vaenderta mberi vachiti, “Asi VaChinhamora ndivo chete vazopa huchapupu, mushure mezvo muchuchisi achibva ati anga apeta nyaya yake.” Amai Mtetwa vati maonero avo ndeekuti muchuchisi haana kukwanisa kubudisa pachena kuti Moyo akapara mhosva izvo zvavapa kuti vazivise dare kuti vanoda kukwidza chikumbiro chekuti rirase nyaya iyi."


Mutongi wedare VaMark Nzira vati vachapa mutongo wavo musi wa7 Kurume. Moyo akasungwa muna Kubvumbi gore rapera akazobvumidzwa kubhadhara mari yechibatsio mushure mekugara muchitokisi kwemavhiki anopfuura matatu, achinzi akabatsira vatapi venhau vekuAmerica vaviri Christina Goldbaum naJoao Silva, avo vanoshandira bepanhau reNew York Times kuti
vapinde munyika zvisiri pamutemo.

Vaviri ava vakadzingwa munyika vasina kuwana mukana wekumiswa pamberi pedare pamusoro penyaya iyi.  Moyo anonzi akabatsira vaviri ava achishanda pamwe nemumwe mushandi
weZMC, Thabang Manhika uyo ari kupomerwa mhosva imwe chete, asi ari
kutongwa pachake ega.

Kusungwa kwaMoyo kwakashorwa nemasangano akawanda kusanganisira reCommittee to Protect Journalists iro rakati uyu waive muenzaniso wakaipa wekushungurudzwa kuri kuramba kuchiitwa vatapi venhau munyika.

headline: Veruzhinji Vanoti Hurumende Isabatsira Pachena Makambani Anenge Apfugama
text: Veruzhinji vanoti hurumende haifanirwe kuita tsika yekupa veruzhinji mutoro nekuvatakudza zvikwereti zvemakambani ehurumende. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wekunzwa mafungiro everuzhinji pamusoro peZimababwe Iron and Steel Company (ZISCO) Debt Aasumption Bill waitwa neChina muBulawayo nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari. Kana bhiri rikaitwa mutemo zvinoreva kuti hurumende ndiyo ichange yave kubhadhara chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora chine kambani yeZisco kumakambani akasiyana-siyana kusanganisira vashandi. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo, VaPhakamani Moyo, vati havafari kuti hurumende itore chikwereti ichi vachitiwo pane zvimwe zvakawanda zvakakosha zvinofanirwa kubhadharwa nehurumende kusanganisira kuve nemishonga muzvipatara uye kubhadharira nherera mari yechikoro. Mumwewo mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Florence ati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti maindasitiri munyika amutsurudzwe, hurumende haifanirwe kungotora chikwereti chakadaro pasina kuitwa ongororo yakakwana yekuti kambani yeZisco yakaita chikwereti chakadaro sei. Mumiriri weBinga North mudare reparamende variwo nhengo yekomiti yezvemari, VaPrince Sibanda, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu vakawanda kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzavaenda munyika vane maonero mamwe chete ekuti hurumende haifanirwe kuve iyo inobhadhara zvikwereti zvemakambani ehurumende. VaSibanda vati vanhu vakawanda vanoyeuka nyaya yeReserve Bank Debt Assumption Act apo vanhu vakatsutsumwa nenyaya yekuti hurumende ibhadhare chikwereti cheRBZ icho bhanga iri raive raita richitenga midziyo yakasiyana-siyana yekurimisa iyo yakapiwa vamwe vakuru vakuru mhurumende. VaTapiwa Manyangadze avo vanoshanda neNational Employment Council for the Engineering, Iron and Steel Industry vati vashandi vekambani yeZisco vanofanirwa kubhadharwa mari dzavo dzemihoro. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende yezvemari, VaDavid Chapfika, vati Zisco ikambani yakakoshera nyika zvikuru ndosaka hurumende iri kuda kuita danho rekutora chikwererti chakambani iyi senzira yekuedza kuimutsurudza. Zisco ndeimwe yemakambani makuru aive munyika asi yakawira pasi nepamusana pekutadza kuronga kwevakuru vakuru vekambani, uyewo kupindira kwehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Imwe Zvakare Kambani yekuChina iri muNyika, yeDinson Iron and Steel Company, Yopomerwa Mhosva yeKudzvinyirira Vashandi
text: Pasina masvondo maviri sangano rinomirira vashandi pasi rese reInternational Trade Unions Confederation, (ITUC), radoma kambani yekuChina yeAfrochine sekambani inotyora kodzero dzevanhu zvakanyanya, imwe kambani yekuChina, yeDinson Iron and Steel Company, inonzi iri kudzvinyirira vashandi kuManhize kuMvuma uko iri kuvaka muzinda mukuru wekugadzira simbi munyika. Sangano rinomiriri vashandi vari mukuvaka, reZimbabwe Construction and Allied Trades Workers Union, rinoti rave nenguva richirambidzwa nevakuru-vakuru vekambani iyi vekuChina kuti nhengo dzaro dzishanyire vashandi vekambani iyi, avo vanoti vari kupiwa mihoro iri pasi peyakatarwa pamwe nekurambidzwa kuti vaumbe makomiti anovamirira pazvichemo zvavo. Munyori mukuru musangano iri, VaNicholas Muchapuwa Mazarura, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vave nenguva vachiedza kundoona vashandi vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri kuManhize asi vachirambidzwa kupinda panzvimbo iyi. VaMazarura vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi ava vari kuchemachema nenyaya yekupihwa mihoro iri pasi peino bvumirwa nemutemo, nyaya yekushanda nguva ndefu, pamwe nekurambidzwa kuumba makomiti anovamirira nezvimwe. Vati vashandi ava vari kubhadharwa mari inoita masendi ekuAmerica gumi nerimwe paawa yoga yoga asi ivo vachifanira kupiwa mari isiri pasi pedhora rekuAmerica rine masendi makumi mana paawa. VaMazarura vaenderera mberi vachiti chinosuwisa inyaya yekuti pese pane makambani eku China masangano anomirira vashandi vakaita seravo anorambidzwa kuona vashandi kana kuita misangano nemakambani aya kuti atevedze mitemo yevashandi vemuno. Asi achitaura pamusoro penyaya yekuManhize, mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvevashandi kuGweru uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau, audza Studio 7 kuti kusanzwisisana pakati pevakuru vekambani yeDinson Iron and Steel Company nesangano reZimbabwe Construction and Allied Workers Union kwakagadziriswa uye vanotasira kuti mapoka maviri aya asangane nguva ipi zvayo kubva pari zvino. Pataenda pamhepo kambani iyi yange isati yapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Kana kambani iyi ichinge yave kushanda zvizere, inotasirirwa kupinza basa vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitanhatu. Dison Iron and Steel Company imwe yemakambani ari pasi pekambani huru yekuChina inonzi Tsingshan Holding Group. Imwe kambani iri pasi peTsingshan Holding Group yeAfrochine iyo ine chigayo chekoromu kuChegutu, yakanzi neITUC ndiyo kambani iri pamusoro pakudzvinyirira vashandi muZimbabwe. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, VaJaphet Moyo vanoti kunyange hazvo ITUC yakadoma Afrochine, vashandi vese vemakambani ezvizvarwa zvekuChina vane zvichemo zvakafanana. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvavashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima. Asi Muzvnafundo Mavhima vakamboudza Studio 7 nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti hurumende inotaririsira kuti makambani ese anouya kuzoshanda muZimbabwe anoshanda achitevedza mitemo yevashandi nemimwe. Asi vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona sekuti hurumende haidi kutora matanho nemakambani ekuChina anotyora kodzero dzevashandi nekuti China iri kupa Zimbabwe zvikwereti zvekuita mabasa ebudiriro munyika. Kunze kwemakambani anochera zvicherwa nekugadzira zvinhu zvakaita sesamende, makambani ekuChina ndiwo akapiwa mabasa ekuvandudza nhandare dzendege munyika dzakaita seHarare, Bulawayo neVictoria Falls, kuvaka paramende itsva, kuvandudza magwenya emagetsi kuKariba neHwange nemamwe mabasa akasiya siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Vasina kubaiwa hamupindi: PSL
text: PREMIER SOCCER LEAGUE (PSL) inoti vatsigiri venhabvu vachatanga kutenderwa kupinda munhandare svondo rino mumitambo yeChibuku Super Cup quarter-final uye matiki ekupindisa achatengeserwa kumunhu anenge aburitsa gwaro kana kuti kadhi rinoratidza kuti akabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.   Izvi zvinotevera kupihwa mvumo kwakaitwa vatsigiri 2 000 kuti vaone mutambo uyu.   Mutauriri wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti kutanga svondo rino, vatsigiri vachatenderwa kupinda munhandare kuti vaone mitambo yenhabvu, asi vanofanirwa kunge vakadzivirirwa zvizere kuCovid-19.   Anoti matikiti ekupindisa munhandare achatengeswa kune vakabaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira denda iri mitambo isati yatanga.   Bare anoti PSL ichazivisa nezvenzvimbo dzinenge dzichitengeswa matikiti ekupindisa munhandare.   “Kutanga svondo rino, vatsigiri vachange votenderwa kupinda kuona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba. Asi tinoda kuzivisa kuti kuti mutsigiri akwanise kutenga tikiti rekupindisa munhandare kunoona chikwata chake chichitamba, anofanirwa kutanga aburitsa kadhi rake rinoratidza kuti akabaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 pamwe nemagwaro ake ose akakwana anosanganisira chitupa. Kana usina izvi, haukwanise kutengeserwa tikiti redu.   “Chimwezve, matikiti aya haasi kuzotengeswa musi wemitambo, asi achatengeswa mitambo isati yatambwa nekuti hatidi kuti musi wemitambo kunhandare kuite nyonganyonga pakupinda uye vanhu vozoungana. Munhu anouya netikiti rake osvika achingopinda kana magwaro ake ose aongororwa,” anodaro.   Bare anoti PSL ichange ichishanda nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police (ZRP) nemamwe mapoka anochengetedza runyararo mukuona kuti mitemo iri kuchengetedzwa.   “Tichange tichishanda neZRP nemamwe makambani mukuona kuti mitemo iri kutevedzerwa. Nekuti kune vamwe vangagona kuuya vachida kupinda vasina magwaro akakwana anodiwa.   “Tichangezve tiine vezveutano vachitibatsira kuongorora utano hwevanhu vachipinda munhandare. Isu hatidi kuti nhabvu igokonzeresa kupararira kweCovid-19,” anodaro Bare.   Zvichakadai, mumitambo iriko svondo rino yeChibuku Super Cup iyo ichatambwa musi weMugovera, Chicken Inn ichisangana neNgezi Platinum Stars kuBaobab Stadium mumutambo uchatanga na11:00 dzemangwanani uye masikati nenguva dza15:00 FC Platinum ichatatsurana neHighlanders FC.   Musi weSvondo, munhandare imwe chete iyi, Cranborne Bullets ichisangana neHarare City mangwanani kuchiti Dynamos FC icharovana neBlack Rhinos.

headline: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Judicial Service Commission (JSC) yavhara matare mumadhorobha matanhatu mushure mekunge vashandi vemumatare aya vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19. JSC yavhara matare amajisitireti, kuBindura, Chinhoyi, Kariba, Karoi, Mt Darwin neMutare uko kwavharwawo dare repamusoro. Munyori weJSC, VaWalter Chikwanha, vati vatora danho iri kuti matare aya ambofiritwa nemishonga inodzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19, kuvheneka vashandi pamwe nekuita ongororo yekutsvaga chakapa kuti denda iri ripinde mumatare aya. Vati vanoda kukwidza nyaya dzavo kumatere, magweta nevamwe vanoda rubatsiro kumatare aya vanofanira kubata vatongi vakuru munzvimbo dzavo, Registrar Additional Sheriff kana Assistant Master uye mafoni evanhu ava achaiswa pamatare avharwa aya. VaChikwanha havana kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vakabatwa neCovid 19 kumatare avharwa aya asi vati vari kushanda nebazi rezvehutano kugadzirisa kuti avhurwe uye veruzhinji vachaziviswa kuti matare aya achavhurwa rini. VaChikwanha vati JSC iri kutora matanho ese anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organisation nebazi rezvehutano kudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19 kumatare ose ari kushanda. Vatiwo vave kusimbaradza kupfekwa kwemamasiki, kugeza maoko nekushandisa maSanitizer kuti munhu apinde mumatare. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati mapazi ayo anofanira kuderedza huwandu hwevashandi vanoenda kubasa kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, VaChikwanha vati havagoni kuita izvi nekuti matare anoita basa rakakosha. Gweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kwaMutare, Amai Peggy Tavagadza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu danho ratorwa neJSC rakanaka chose asi rinofanirawo kuitirwa kuvasungwa, mapurisa navose vanoshandisa matare. Vatiwo JSC ngaifambirane nenguva kuti vanhu vatongwe pachishandisa muchina yechizvino zvino vasingasangane nevamwe mumatare. Mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Priivate Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marrisa, vati hurumende inofanira kuvheneka vanhu vakawanda kuti izive huwandu hwevanhu vane denda iri. Vaive gurukota rehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuwanda kuri kuita Covid-19 kunokonzerwa nekuti matanho ekudzivirira denda iri haasi kutevedzwa vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kuwanisa vanhu zvekufambisa vachiti vanhu vari kutapuriranawo denda iri vari mimitsetse yemabhazi. Nezuro vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatanhatu vakabatwa neCovid -19 izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose pazviuru makumi mana nezvitauru nemazana mana nemakumi masere (43, 480 cases). Munhu mumwe chete akafa neCovid-19 nezuro,izvo zvaskavitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa neCovid-19 munyika yosepachiuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbabwe nevaviri, 1 692. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemagumi zvishanu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 715 056 uye vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 451 793. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichaburitsa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanosimuka Kuenda kuDavos kuMusangano weWorld Economic Forum
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasimuka neSvondo manheru vakananga kuSwizterland kumusangano wekuzeya matambudziko akatarisana nepasi rose weWorld Economic Forum, uyo unoitirwa muguta reDavos. Musangano uyu wakatanga neSvondo uye unopera musi weChina svondo rino. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano yepamusorosoro nevatungamiri vedzimwe nyika pamwe nevakuru vezvemabhizimusi emuEurope muhurongwa hwavo hwekuedza kukwezva vemabhizimusi kuti vapinde munyika. Musangano weWorld Economic Forum uyu uri kutarisirwa kupindwa nevatungamiri venyika, vemabhizimusi pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira vanoda kusvika kuzviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu, avo vari kutarisirwa kuzeya nyaya dziri kutambudza pasi rino dzinosanganisira denda reCovid-19, hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusagadzikana kwehupfumi pamwe nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanove nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nekudyidzana kwenyika dzapasi rose, vari zvakare mudzidzisi mukuru wezvemabhizimusi paDevry University muAmerica, vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe nepasi rose Panyaya yekuti VaMnangagwa vane chavanodzoka nacho here kubva kumusangano uyu, Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni paine chinokohwe nekuda kwekuti nhoroondo yeZimbabwe munyaya dzezvikwereti pamwe nekumabatiro ayo enyaya dzezvemabhizimusi nehupfumi zvinogona kuvakanganisa. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoti Zvinhu Zvayo Zvose Zvakachengetedzwa Zvine Hudzamu
text: Mamwe makomishina eZimbabwe Electoral Comission, ZEC, anoti zvose zvine chekuita nekunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota zvakachengetedzwa zvakasimba. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wekuzeya mashandiro evatapi venhau panguva yesarudzo waitwa muBulawayo. Mumwe wemakomishina maviri eZEC ange aripowo pamusangano uyu, Amai Faith Sebata, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu havafanirwe kutyira kuti pane zvingaitwe zvingakonzera kusafamba zvakanaka kana kubiridzirwa kwesarudzo. Amai Sebata vatiwo gwaro rine mazita evanhu vakanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota richacheneswa zvekuti hazvingaite kuti pave nemunhu mumwe chete anogona kunyorwa kakawanda kana kuti anogona kuvhota kanopfuura kamwe chete panguva imwe chete. Pane kushushikana kune vamwe veruzhinji pamusoro pekunonzi kusabuda pachena kweZEC pamusoro pekuti mazita evanhu vakanyoresa kuvhota ari kuchengetwa sei. Vamwe vanoshushikanawo nenyaya yekuti kune vanhu vakawanda vane zvitupa zvine mazuva ekuzvarwa nenumber dzechitupa dzakafanana asi ivo vari vanhu vakasiyana, izvo zvinonzi nevamwe zvinogona kushandiswa seimwe nzira yekubiridzira nayo sarudzo. Parunyerekupe rwekuit mapepa anoshandiswa pakuvhota kana kuti ballot papers akatodhindwa kare, VaDaniel Chigaru, vanovezve mumwe komishina weZEC vati hazvigone kuti mapepa aya adhindwe kana vanhu vanokwikwidza musarudzo vasati vataurwa nenomination court sezvinodiwa nemutemo. Vati ZEC ichataura zvizere panguva yakafanira pamusoro pezvekudhindwa kwemapepa ekuvhotera vakatiwo vatapi venhau pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika anobvumidzwa kuwona panenge podhindwa mapepa aya. Asi mutauriri webato reNational People’s Party, VaJeffryson Chitando, vati ZEC haifanirwe kungotaura chete asi vanofanirwa kuonekwa vachiita zvinhu zvinoita kuti vave nechivimbo chekuti vanoita basa rakanaka. Pamusangano uyu vatapi venhau vachema-chemawo nenyaya yekuti vanonzi vanyorese kuZEC kuti vakwanise kunyora kana kutepfenyura nhau dzine chekuita nesarudzo. Lee Mangena anoshanda neSkyz Metro FM ndemumwe wevatapi venhau ati haawone pane chikonzero chekuti ZEC iite izvi. Zvichakadaro VaDavid Coltart avo vanove gweta uye vari nhengo yebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube vaudza musangano mumwe chete kuti havawone sarudzo dzichikwanisa kuve dzakachena kana nhepfenyuro yehurumende yeZimbabwe Broadcastibg Corporation ichiramba yakarerekera kudivi rebato reZanu PF. VaColtart vati kuita izvi kunotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika vakatiwo kunyange hazvo izvi zvichigona kunetsa zvakakosha kuti vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakwire kumatare kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe. Musangano wemazuva maviri unopera neChina wakarongwa nesangano reZimbabwe Union of Journalists. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Vanotengesa Mafuta Vari Kuita Chitsotsi
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, pamwe negurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwepeturu nedhiziri munyika riri kunyanyokonzerwa nehuwori huri kuitwa nemakambani nemagaraji anotengesa mafuta. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaMangudya vati vanoshamisika zvikuru kuti pane mitsetse yepeturu nedziziri ivo vakapa makambani emafuta munyika magwaro ekubhadhara mafuta aya kana kuti maLetters of Credit anokwana nyika yese. Vati pari zvino vakabhadhara mari inoita mamiriyoni zana negumi nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica, iyo vati inokwanisa kutenga marita mamiriyoni zana nemakumi manomwe emafuta pamwedzi, kunyange hazvo nyika ichida zana nemakumi matatu emamiriyoni emarita emafuta pamwedzi. VaMangudya vati pane humbowo hunoratidza kuti mamiriyoni mashanu emarita ari kubva kumatangi ekuMsasa zuva rega rega, asi mafuta aya haasvike kumagaraji sezvo ari kuendeswa kunze kwenyika. VaMangudya vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti pane chitsotsi chiri kuitwa nemakambani aya. Asi VaMangudya vaudza komiti iyi kuti nyika ine chikwereti chisati chabhadharwa chemari inosvika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kumakambani ekunze anotengesa mafuta anosanganisira Independent Petroleum Group, Glencore, Trafigura, Engen ne Total. Vachipawo humbowo kukomiti iyi, VaChasi vati zviri pachena kuti pane huwori huri kuitwa nemakambani aya uye vari kutora matanho ekupedza zvese izvi. Vatiwo mafuta emotokari emuno ari kutengeswawo kunyika dzakati komberedza sezvo akachipa kudarika kunyika idzi. VaChasi vati Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority inofanira kupihwa simba rekuita basa rayo nemazvo pamwe nekuongorora kuti mafuta anofamba sei kubva kwaonochengeterwa kuMsasa kuenda kumagaraji mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri anotengesa mafuta munyika. VaChasi naVaMangudya vatiwo nyaya yemanyepo pamadandemutande akaita seWhatsApp, Twitter nemamwe ndiwo anokonzerawo kuti vanhu vaite chipatapata chekutenga mafuta vachichengeta mudzimba izvo zvinoita kuti ashaikwe mumagaraji. Vati izvi ndizvo zvakaitika svondo rino apo pakatanga kufambiswa mashoko ekuti mafuta emotokari ainge akwira mutengo asi iwo asina. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vari kuramba kuti mafuta atengeswe nemadhora ekuAmerica, VaMangudya vati hazvigoni kuti hurumende iiite izvi nekuti vanhu vakawanda munyika havawani mari iyi. Vati zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana chete zvevanhu munyika ndizvo zvinowana mari yekunze chete. Pavabvunzwa neimwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaAnele Ndebele, kuti havawoni sekuti nyaya dzekusamira zvakanaka kwematongerwo enyika ndidzo dziri kukanganisa zvinhu munyika, VaChasi vati zviri pachena kuti izvi zviri kuitika munyika zvinokanganisa chimiro chenyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati zviri kuitika zvinoratidza kuti nyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoda kugadziriswa. Zvichakadai, VaChasi vazivisa kuti kushanduka kwemamiririro ekunze kuri kuita kuti mvura irambe ichidzikira kuKariba izvo zvinogona kuti gwenya remagetsi rimire kushanda mukati memwedzi gumi nemina kana izvi zvikaramba zvichiitika. Vatiwo nyaya yekusabhadhara magetsi, kubiwa kwemaTransformer nedzimwe tambo dzemagetsi zviri kutadzisa ZESA kuita basa rayo nemazvo. VaChasi vatiwo bhodhi reZESA pamwe nevakuru vakuru mukambani iyi vange vasiri kufambisa basa nemazvo izvo zvaita kuti kambani iyi isvike pakutadza kugaya magetsi anokwanira nyika. VaChasi vati vachadoma nyanzvi nevanhu vane chimiro chakanaka kupinda mubhodhi reZESA kuti vaburitse kambani iyi mumadhaka mairi.

headline: Jordan Zemura anotambira mari shoma
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu weAFC Bournemouth nemaWarriors eZimbabwe – Jordan Zemura (22) – ndiye ari kutambira mari shoma kuchikwata chake mwaka uno apo chiri kukwikwidza muEnglish Premier League.   Mutsvakurudzo, zvaonekwa kuti Zemura, uyo akasaina chibvumirano chake kuBournemouth achiri kutambira chikwata chevadiki, anotambira mari inosvika £385 pasvondo.   Mari yaanotambira iyi yakaderera zvikuru kana ichienzaniswa nevamwe vatambi vemuchikwata chake vakadai saJefferson Lerma uyo anotambira mari inosvika £55 000 pasvondo.   Tichitarisa mari inotambirwa naZemura, zvinoreva kuti pamwedzi anotambira £1 432 uye mwaka wose achitambira £17 184.   Mari yaanotambira mwaka wose haisvike pane inotambirwa naLerma yepasvondo rimwe chete.   Muchikwata ichi zvekare, vamwe vatambi vakadai saDominic Solanke vanonzi vanotambira mari inosvika £50 000 pasvondo, kuchiti Phillip naLewis Cook vanotambira £40 000 pasvondo pamumwe nemumwe wavo.    Mari dzinotambirwa nevatambi veBournemouth – (spotrac.com)   Asi pane tarisiro yekuti Bournemouth ichatanga kuita hurukuro naZemura munguva inotevera kuti iwedzere kondirakiti yake iyo inotarisirwa kupera gore rinotevera. Mutambi uyu ari kutarisirwa kutamba zvikuru mwaka uno sezvo achidiwa zvakanyanya naScott Parker uyo aimushandisa mwaka wadarika apo vakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEPL.

headline: Huwori, Kusarongeka Zvonzi Ndidzo Honzeri Dzekushaikwa hweHupfu muNyika
text: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika rinonzi nevamwe ratodzika midzi, panguva iyo paine kunakurirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pehurumende nevanogaya upfu, avo vari kunzi vari kunzvengesa upfu, zvikuru hweRoller Meal. Hurumende yakabhadhara kare chidimbu chemari inofanirwa kutengeswa nayo rudzi rwehupfu urwu, ivzo zvinozoita kuti vatengi vahuwane nemutengo uri pasi, asi izvi zvinonzi hazvisi kubatsira sezvo hupfu hwacho huri kuramba huchishaikwaq muzvitoro asi huchiwanikwa kumusika mutema, uko kwahuri kuwanikwa nemari iri pamusoro. Vanogaya upfu vari kupomerwawo mhosva yekuwanza upfu hweNgwerewere, uhwo hunodhura, pachinzvimbo chekuti vagaye hweRoller Meal hunokwaniswa kutengwa nevanhu vose nemutengo uri pasi. Ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika rwunonzi rwave kuswera rwuchifudza zvitoro kuri kumirira kuti rwungangosangana nemotokari dzinodhirivhara upfu, pachinzvimbo chekunge rwuchiita zvinopa pundutso kumhuri pamwe nenyika. Mumwe anoti aswera akagarira upfu ndaAmai Rufaro Chakanyuka vekuGreendale muHarare, avo vanoti vazohuwana asi huchitengeswa nemadhora zana nemakumi mashanu patsapo yemakirogiramu gumi, pane mutengo wakatarwa nehurumende wemadhora makumi manomwe pamakirogiramu gumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu riri kukonzerwa nekusarongeka kwechirongwa chehurumende chekutsigira vanogaya upfu nemari kuitira kuti vagohutengesa nemari iri pasi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo chanyanya kukonzera dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu huwori, uhwo vanoti hwatekeshera munyika. VaChirumhanzu vanoti veruzhinji munyika vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichakasika kutora matanho ekuparadza midzi yehuwori iyi isati yasunga nekusvina nyika yose. Svondo rapera vanogaya upfu vakapomerwa mhosva yekutengesa hwehupfu hwavanofanirwa kutengesera vanhu munyika kuDemocratic Republic of Congo, uko vanonzi vari kutengesa nemari iri pamusoro. Mukupera kwesvondo mapurisa anonzi akapinda mumabhizimusi evanogaya hupfu, uko anonzi akawana upfu hunosvika matani zviuru zvishanu hwakanga hakachengetedzwa, hunofungidzirwa kuti hwaida kuendeswa pamisika mitema. Asi mutauriri wesangano revanogaya hupfu, reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaGarikai Chaunza vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti hapana chinoshamisa kuti vanogaya upfu vawanikwe vaine hupfu, sezvo riri iro basa ravo. VaChaunza vakatiwo vamwe vanogaya hupfu vari kuita dambudziko rekushaya chekutakurisa upfu uhwu kuendesa kune vezvitoro. Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti sangano ravo riri kupinza chibage munyika kubva munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, Mexico, Brazil neThailand. Uganda yakazivisawo kuti ichatengesera Zimbabwe chibage. Asi VaKuchera vanoti panotoda kuti pagadziriswe mitemo yemunyika kuitira kuti zvinhu zvakaita sehupfu zvisashaikwa munyika. Kusvika matambudziko ose, kusanganisira huwori, zvagadziriswa No media source currently available vakawanda vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwehupfu munyika richaramba riripo kunyangwe nyika yakapinza chibage chakawanda zvakadii kubva kunze, nekuti pane vanenge vachiwana cheuviri kubva kumutengeswa kwehupfu pamisika mitema.

headline: Vana Chiremba veHurumende Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Kutanga neChitatu
text: Vamiriri vavanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vaita musangano wechimbichimbi nemunyori mubazi rezvehutano mukutsvaga nzira dzekumisa nadzo kuramwa mabasa kwakaziviswa navanachiremba ava kuti kuchatanga svondo rino. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Edgar Munatsi, vanoti musangano uyu hauna zvikuru zvawaburitsa sezvo pasina kuwiriranwa kuti zvichemo zvavo zvingagadziriswa sei. Nekudaro, Doctor Munatsi vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichaenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa nemusi weChitatu sekuzivisa kwavakaita, kunyange hazvo vachiti vachapa mukana kunhaurirano nehurumende. Vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo zvikuru zvitatu zvinosanganisira nyaya yekurasikirwa nemabasa kwavanachiremba vanenge vapedza zvidzidzo. "Pane nyaya nhatu, asi yakanyanya kukosha yacho ndeyekuti vanachiremba vaenge vapedza zvidzidzo, vachinge vapedza zvidzidzo vanofanirwa kuenda kunoshanda muzvipatara zvekumamisha. Hurumende iri kuti haichakwanisa kuvapa mabasa iwayo. havana mari yekuti vange vachipa vanachiremba muhoro, vanenge vaenda kunoshanda kunzvimbo idzodzo. "Isusu tiri kunyunyuta kuti kana zvakadero hazvo hurumende yachidii kupa vanachiremba matsamba ekuti vashande vakazvimirira kana vasingakwanise kupiwa mabasa nehurumende." Doctor Munatsi vanodaro. Doctor Munatsi vanoti vasvika pakutora danho iri zvichitevera zvakabuda mukunzwa pfungwa dzenhengo dzavo mumazuva mashoma adarika. Vanachiremba vachangopedza zvidzidzo zvavo ava vanoti vari kudawo zvakare kuti mari dzekubatsirikana kana kuti 'on call allowances' dzitangire pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri. Vanoti vanodawo zvakare kuti Health Service Board igadzirise nyaya yavakambowirirana yekuti vanachiremba vehurumende vasabatirwa mitero. Kana vanachiremba vakaramwa mabasa, vanenge vabatana nevehurumende yeKenya, avo vari kuramwawo mabasa kubva muna Zvita wegore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Mbare Junior League yosimudzira vechidiki
text: VECHIDIKI vokurudzirwa kuti vapinde mune zvemitambo nechinangwa chekugadzirira remangwana ravo pane kuswera vachitora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weMbare Junior Football League – Stanley Kavayi – achiti mitambo yakakosha muhupenyu hwevechidiki.   Kavayi, uyo anove murairidzi wenhabvu zvekare, anoti vechidiki vakawanda vane matarenda emitambo yakaita senhabvu, cricket nebasketball asi hupenyu hwavo huri kuenda mudondo nekuda kwezvinodhaka.   Anoti vari kuronga mitambo yakasiyana yekuti vechidiki vatambe.   “Mitambo yakakosha nekuti inobatsira kubika vechidiki nekuvarakidza gwara chairo. SeMbare Junior Football League, tiri kuronga mitambo yenhabvu yekuti vechidiki vatambe nekuti donzvo redu kuvabvisa pedyo nezvinodhaka.   “Kune vechidiki vakawanda vekuti unotoona kuti uyu ane chipo mumitambo asi anozomedzwa nezvinodhaka. Saka isu tiri kuda kuvabata toshanda navo kusvika vakura tovabatsira kuti vagotengwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoti vari kupota vachishevedza varairidzi vezvikwata zvakasiyana avo vanouya vachiongorora mitambo yavo votsvaga vatambi vekutenga.   “Patinotamba mitambo yedu kazhinji panenge pane varairidzi vezvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League (PSL) kana Division One avo vatinoshevedza kuti vauye kuzoona vatambi vakasiyana.   “Kana pakauya varairidzi vakasiyana, ndinoziva kuti zvinopa vatambi manyuku-nyuku ekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro sezvo vanenge vachiziva kuti vane mukana wekutengwa nezvikwata zvikuru,” anodaro Kavayi.   Anoti pachavharwa zvikoro, Mbare Junior Football League icharonga mitambo yakasiyana senzira yekuti vechidiki vawane zvinovavaraidza sezvo vamwe vanogona kufuririka kutora zvinodhaka apo vanenge vakazorora.

headline: Zvikoro Zvogadzira Zvikwanisiro Zvekushandisa Kurwisa Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus hwakaburitswa nehurumende neMuvhuro, hwasvika pavanhu vasere, uye munhu ashaya nechirwere ichi achiri munhu mumwe chete. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira chero nguva apo hurumende ichazivisa zvinenge zvaitika. Pavanhu vasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, vana vanobva kudunhu reMashonaland East, vatatu kuHarare uye mumwe chete kuVictoria Falls. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wensilus Nyamayaro, vanoti zvave kuziviswa manheru ega ega kana pane zvinenge zvashanduka pahuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yakatara mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mana muZimbabwe, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana masere ezviuru pasi rose. Senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika iyo yakatarisana nekushaikwa kwema ventilators anobatsira kufema vanenge varwarisa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi, zvimwe zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinoti zviri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwazvo kugadzira ma ventilators, ma sanitisers nemasiki. Chikono chepamusoro cheHarare Institute of Technology chinoti chiri pakati pekugadzira muchina wekufambisa mhepo mudzimba dzinochengeterwa vanhu vanenge vachirwara nechirwere cheCOVID-19. Ukuwo Chinhoyi University of Technology, CUT, inotiwo iri pakati pekugadzira mamasiki apo kune rumwe rutivi iri kutsvaka zvikwanisiro zvekugadzira ma sanitisers sezvo chikoro ichi chine hunyanzvi hwacho. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muChinhoyi, mutauriri weCUT, VaMusekiwa Tapera, vati vari kugadzira mamasiki senzira yakaonekwa nechikoro ichi yekurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus. VaTapera vati vamwe vana muzvinafundo vari mubishi kuita hurongwa hwekugadzira ma sanitisers. Asi mukuru weCUT, Muzvinafundo Jambwa Simbi, vati basa rekugadzira mamasiki riri kudzoserwa kumashure nekushaikwa kwemagetsi nguva dzakawanda. Zvikoro izvi zviri kutora matanho aya sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzehutano panguva iyo hurumende iri kutatarika kuwanira vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira zvakakwana pavanenge vachirapa varwere vanofungidzirwa kuti vane Coronavirus. Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva repiri vanhu vachigara kudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus, iyo yakatanga kuChina gore rapera, uye kusvika pari zvino, yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe, uyo akashaya svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Vashoma Vovhenekwa Chirwere cheGomarara Rinoita paZamu
text: Kunyange hazvo mwedzi waGumiguru uchizivikanwa nekucherechedza gomarara repazamu, sangano reCancer Association of Zimbabwe rinoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vakauya kuzoongororwa gomarara repazamu hwakawanda kudarika Gumiguru wegore rapera, veruzhinji havasati vonyanyotambira zvekuongororwa. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Anna Zvarehwanashe, vanoti kunyange hazvo vakaongororwa vanoti nguva zhinji zvinonetsa kungoti munhu anoongororwa pasina paanonzwa panorwadza izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaongororwe kana paita zviratidzo zvekuti pangangove negomarara remazamu. Muzvare Zvarehwanashe vatiwo kushomeka kwenzvimbo dzinoongorora gomarara munyika kunoitawo kuti veruzhinji vatadze kunoongororwa nguva nenguva zvirwere zvakadai segomarara repazamu. Kunyange hazvo gomarara repazamu richinyanyouraya vanhukadzi, vanhurume vanobatwawo negomarara iri. Mumwe murume, VaJoseph Murwira, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vachiziva kukosha kwekuongororwa gomarara rezamu, vati vanhurume vazhinji vanozvitora sezvinhu zvedambe. VaMurwira vatsigirawo pfungwa dzaMuzvare Zvarehwanashe kuti kushomeka kwenzvimbo dzinoongorora gomarara ndozvezvimwewo zvinoshaisa varume vazhinji shungu. Mumwe mugari wekumusha weMkoba muguta reGweru, Amai Musa Shumba, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo gomarara repazamu riri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda kunyanya vanhukadzi, vatiwo ruzivo rwechirwere ichi rwuchiri rwushoma. Amai Shumba vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai gomarara remazamu rarapwa pachena. Vachitaura neStudio7 parunhare, mukuru weCancer Association of Zimbabwe, Amai Junior Mavu, vabvuma kuti kumamisha hakuna nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekuti vanhu vaongororwe gomarara repazamu asi vakakurudzira kuti vanhu vaende kuzvipatara zvinenge zviri pedyo navo. Vatiwo muzvirongwa zvavo vachange voita dzidziso kumamisha nezvenyaya yegomarara. Amai Mavu vati muHarare vanhu churu nemazana matanhatu vakaongororwa gomarara rezamu mumwedzi waGumiguru zvichienzaniswa nevanhu churu nemazana mashanu vakaongororwa nguva imwechete gore rapera Sangano reCancer Registry rinoti muna 2014 gomarara repazamu ranga riri gomarara rechitatu mumagomarara akanyanyobata vanhu huye zvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana zvakabatwa negomarara iri mugore rimwero. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoramba Gwaro Riri Kuti Sarudzo dzeBy-Election Dzichaitwa Gore Rinouya Muna Kubvumbi
text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, yaramba mashoko ari mugwaro riri kutenderera pamadandemutande ekuti yakatara musi wa 23 Kubvumbi 2022 sezuva ringangoitwa sarudzo dzema by-elections dzeparamende pamwe nemakanzuru. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo kana kuti Chief Elections Officer veZEC, Va Utoile Silaigwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aya handi echokwadi vakati tibate mutauriri weZEC, Commissioer Kzembe kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi takundikana kuvabata. Gwaro riri kutenderera iri rakanyorwa pabepa reZEC, asi harina kuiswa runyoro kana kuti kusainwa kana kudhindwa neboka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika iri. Asi mamwe masangano pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vanga vatoratidza mufaro mukuru kwazvo nemashoko ekuti sarudzo idzi dzingangoitwa gore rinouya, vachiti kushaikwa kwevamiriri mumatare eparamende pamwe nemumakanzuru kuri kudzorera shure mabasa ebudiriro mumatunhu asina vamiriri. Mabasa ose ane chekuita nesarudzo akambomiswa muna Kurume 2020 senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Matunhu akawanda akasara asina humiriri zvichitevera kudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende nekanzuru nebato reMDC-T dzichinzi dzakasiya bato iri dzichienda kuMDC Alliance, uyewo kushaya kwedzimwe nhengo. Zvigaro makumi maviri nezvisere zveparamende hazvina vamiriri kuchitiwo zvimwe zana nezvishanu zvemakanzuru zvisinawo humiriri. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano re Elections Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanoti dai gwaro iri ranga raburitswa neZEC zviri pamutemo changa chiri chinhu chakanaka chose kuti sarudzo idzi dzichiitwa sezvo kunonoka kwadzo kuri kutotyora kodzero dzevanhu dzavanopiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Isu tadzivirirwa 100pc –  PSL
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti riri kufara zvikuru kuti chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 chiri kugamuchirwa nevatambi nezvikwata zviri pasi payo izvo zvaona vose vabaiwa vachisvika chikamu che99.9 percent.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti vatambi, varairidzi nehutungamiri hwezvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muligi iri vakabaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 izvo zvinove zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvichaita kuti mutambo uyu utambwe vanhu vakasununguka.   Anoti mutambo uyu usati wadzoka, vakanyorerwa nesangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti vatambi vose nezvikwata zvavo, kusanganisira hutungamiri vabaiwe nhomba kuitira kuti mutambo uyu ugodzoka uye ugotambwa vanhu vakachengetedzeka.   “Tiri kugutsikana kuti vatambi nevarairidzi vabaiwa nhomba kusvika pari zvino vanosvika chikamu che99.9 percent. Zvinofadza nekuti vanhu vakaterera, vakatevedzera matanho anodiwa kuti mutambo udzoke ugofamba zvakanaka.   “Kubaiwa majekiseni nekugara vanhu vachivhenekwa Covid-19 mamwe ematanho anotarisirwa kutevedzerwa izvo zvatakapihwa neSRC, saka zvikwata zvakatevedzera zvikabaisa vatambi vazvo nehutungamiri hwacho,” anodaro.   Bare anoti sePSL, vari kushambadza kuvatsigiri venhabvu kuti vaendewo kunobaiwa kuitira kuti zvigobatsira nguva inotevera kana votenderwa kuzonoona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba.   “Tiri kuvakurudzira tichishandisa nzira dzakasiyana dzinosanganisira dandemutande kuparidza shoko rekuti vanobaiwewo nhomba nekuti tinoda kuti vazouya kuzotsigira zvikwata zvavo vakasununguka. Kana vakabaiwa, zvinobatsira kuti vange vakachengetedzeka nekuti hatidi kuti nhabvu izowedzera pakutapurirana denda iri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvichakadaro, Bare anoti PSL ichazivisa svondo rinotevera kuti mitambo yemuno inogona kuenderera mberi here kana kuti ichambomiswa sezvo pachange pane mutambo wenyika wekurwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup.   MaWarriors, ayo ave kurairidzwa naNorman Mapeza, achasangana neGhana mumitambo miviri yakatevedzana yekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Mitambo yemuGroup G iyi iriko nemusi wa9 na12 Gumiguru asi hapasati pajeka kuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup ichambomiswa here kana kuti kwete kuitira kuti Mapeza agowaniswa nguva yekushanda nemaWarriors.   Mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup neChitatu svondo rino mushure mekumbomiswa kwenguva yakareba nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tiri panyaya iyoyo, tinoziva kuti kune mutambo mukuru uchauya saka tichazozivisa svondo rinotevera kuti tichazvifambisa sei. Iye zvino tiri kungofunga nezvemitambo iriko svondo rino chete,” anodaro Bare.

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Chirwere cheShuga neKudya Zvine Hutano
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yatabatana nenyika dzepasi rese kucherechedza zuva rechirwere cheshuga kana kuti World Diabetes Day veruzhinji vachikurudzirwa kuvhenekwa navanachiremba, kudya chikafu chine hutano uye chinoita kuti vasabatwe nedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzashandisa zuva ranhasi kuongorora vanhu pachena pamwe nekuvadzidzisa pamusoro pudenda iri. Mumwe murapi pane chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira muHarare, Amai Fungai Priscillar Gomba vati hirwere cheshuga chiriri kupararira munyika asi munhu anogona kurarama pasina dambudziko kana atavedza dzidziso kubva kunana chiremba. Vanoti zvimwe zvikonzero zvinoita kuti vanhu vabatwe shuga kana kuti diabetes inyaya yekuzvarwa mumhuri ine nhoorondo yechirwere ichi, mararamire anoita munhu nechikafu chaanodya kana kuti kuti Lifestyle pachirungu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kungorora vanhu kuti vane denda iri here pamwe nekuti vangararame sei vasingapinde munjodzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekuongorora zvirwere, VaEdmore Mahureva, vanoti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kuita ongororo dzakaita seHBCa1 yekungoora shuga yemunhu mukati memwedzi mitatu yapfuura uye vaita izvi pachena vachiti zvinobatsira kuti munhu azive pamire nedenda iri. Mutungamiriri wesangano remachiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, re Medical and Dental Private Practitioners Association Dr Johannes Marisa kuti nhasi vange vachibatsirawo vanhu pachena kuti vasafe nedenda iri. Amai Maonei Tiki avo vakabatwa shuga muna Chikumi gore rino uye vakatobviswa gumbo nekuda kwedenda iri vanoti vafara chose neruzivo rwavawana nhasi. Ambuya Agnes Zioni ndevamwe vari kurarama nedenda iri uye vanoti zvakakosha kutevedza dzidziso yanachiremba. Gore rapfuura, shuga yakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 3,400 uye zvinofundidzirwa kuti denda iri rinobata munhu mumwe chete pavanhu gumi pasi rese. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day iro rinocherechedzwa musi 14 Mbudzi, racherechedzwa pasi pendingindira rine chinangwa chekuti vanhu vawane zivo yakakwana kuti vakwanise kurapwa nekuita kurarama nzira dzinoita kuti denda iri risarambe richipararira kana kuti Education to Protect Tomorrow, Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi kana mashoko ehurumende pazuva iri sezvo mutauriri webazi iri VaDonald Mujiri vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu patataenda pamhepo.

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai weChidiki Ofa neCovid-19 muHarare
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mumwe mudzimai wemuHararare ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe okuberekwa akashaya nemusi weMugovera nechirwere cheCovid19. Mudzimai uyu anonzi ainge asina nhoroondo yekuenda kunze kwenyika zvinonzi navanachiremba zvinogona kureva kuti chirwere cheCovid19 chiri kutenderera munharaunda vanhu vasingazvizive. Pave nevanhu vasere vashaya munyika nekuda kwechirwere ichi. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwakwirawo kusvika pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 698. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi manomwe nevatatu nechirwere ichi neMugovera. Pavanhu ava, makumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 55 vakabva kuSouth Africa, vatatu kuBotwana, vamwe vatatu kuMozambique, vaviri kuAmerica mumwe chete kubva kuZambia uye vamwe vasere vakachitapurirwa munyika. Pavanhu vakabatwa nechirwere munyika vaviri ndivo chete vanozivikanwa kuti vakachiwana sei asi patotanga chipatapata chekutsvaga kuti vamwe vatnhatu vakachiwana sei. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika izana nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 181. Vanhu vavhenekewa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 78 000. Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuri kuuya apo vashandi vakawanda vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa ishoma zvikuru. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo sezvo vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatakavatumira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuSouth Africa avo vanodarika zviuru zana zvine makumi masere nemasere kana kuti 188 000, zvinhu zvinogona kuipirawo Zimbabwe. Vafa muSouth Africa vadarika zviuru zvitatu. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mana ane makumi matanhatu nevatatu kana kuti 463, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zviuru gumi nerimwe zvine makumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 11, 086. Vapora vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri ane makumi maviri kana kuti 222,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe ane zviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 11,2 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 129, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2,8 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nerimwe kana kuti 531,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million.

headline: Karate handi kurwa: Chirumhanzu
text: SHASHA yekarate yechidzimai, Grace Chirumhanzu, anoti mutambo uyu unodzidzisa vanhu kuzvibata uye kuzvidzivirira kwete kufamba uchirwisana nevanhu.   Chiramhanzu mumwe wemadzimai vane mukurumbira vari kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kunze kwenyika izvo zvakambomuona achihwina menduru yebhuronzi mugore ra2018 kuScotland.   Anoti kune vamwe vanhu vanotaura kuti ukaroora mudzimai anotamba karate unogona kugara uchirakashwa zvikuru, asi handizvo sezvo mutambo uyu unodzidzisa vanhu kuzvibata, kushinga pamwe nekuzvidzivirira kana vorwiswa nevamwe.   “Karate hazvirevi kuti unofamba uchirwa nevanhu, kwete inotokudzidzisa kuzvibata muhupenyu hwako uye kuzvisimbisa. Kana uchiita mutambo uyu, zvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana hazvimbokubate. Paye patinenge tichikwikwidza munhandare tinenge tichitodzidza zvakawanda.   “Kwatinogara kune nhubu dzakasiyana, mutambo wedu uyu unotidzidzisawo sevanhukadzi kuti tikwanise kuzvidzivirira kana nhubu idzi dzichida kuti vhiringidza,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, Chirumhanzu naRumbidzai Takawira anova imwe shasha yekarate vari kutarisirwa kuenda kunomirira nyika pamwechete nevamwe kuJapan kumakwikwi e2nd So-Kyokushin World Karate Championship 2020 ayo achaitwa munaKubvumbi.   Anoti kuchange kwakaoma zvikuru sezvo kuJapan kuriko kumuzinda wekarate asi vari kugadzirira kunohwina vagotevera mumatsimba aSamson Muripo uyo akahwina mumakwikwi aya kunyika iyi kekutanga mugore ra2018.   “KuJapan ndiko kumuzinda wekarate uye ndiko kwainobikwa, vana vanotokudzwa mumutambo uyu. Saka patiri kuenda kuJapan tinoziva kuti tichasangana neshasha dzakawanda. Asi hatisi kuzozvitarisa izvozvo. Shasha yedu Shihan Samson Muripo avo vanove murairidzi wedu vakanozviita kuJapan kumakwikwi aya saka isu tikagadzirira zvakasimba tinoziva kuti tichanozviitawo,” anodaro.

headline: Mari Yotadzisa Vakawanda Kuenda Kuzororo reEaster
text: Vanhu vakawanda vange vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunotambira zororo reEaster kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana, kunyange hazvo vanga vachichema nerekushaya mari. Kunyange hazvo munyika vanhu vari kunetsekana kutora mari dzavo kumabhanga, change chiri chipata pata paMbare Musika vanhu vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vachinoshanyira hama neshamwari. VaSteven Masocha vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti zororo reEaster richanakidza zvikuru. Asi izvi zvichakundikana sezvo vasina mari yakawanda. Mumwe mudzimai akwanisa kuenda kumusha kwake kuHurungwe, Amai Dorothy Jack, vati mushure mekutadza kuwana mari kubhanga kwavo, vakatozokwereta mari kuti vakwanise kuenda kuzororo. Muzvare Nomatter Chiwenga vatiwo zvange zvakaoma kuti vakwanise kuwana mari nokuti vaimukira husiki kuti vanomira mumitsetse kubhengi kwemazuva akawanda kusvikira mari yavaida yakwana. VaMambo Mandungu Mandedza varatidza kufara kuenda kumusha kwavo kwavakapedzesira kuenda makore masere apfuura. Vati kana vasvika kumusha kwavo vachauraya mombe kuti vafare nemhuri yavo pazororo reEaster iri. Baba Trymore Muvhunza vanoti vana vavo vatadza kuuya kubva kuBuhera nepamusana pekushaya mari. Asi Baba Gibson Chanakira vati vachazoenda kumusha kana zororo rapera sezvo vari mubishi rekutengesa zvinhu zvavo paMbare Musika. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vanhu vakwanisa kuenda kuzororo reEaster, ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 yaratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vatadza kufamba nepamusana pekushaya mari iyo iri kunetsa kutora kumabhanga. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vane Varwere paParirenyatwa Voswerapo Nekuda kweKuoma kweZvinhu
text: Kuwondomoka kwehupfumi munyika kowedzera kutambudzika kwehama dzine varwere muzvipatara zvakadai seParirenyatwa, uko vanachiremba vasiri kuenda kumabasa. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 pachipatara cheParirenyatwa inoratidza kuti veruzhinji vanorwarirwa vari kuswera vari pachipatara ichi vakamirira kuona varwere panguva dzakeona varwere, vachiti zvinhu zvakavaomera kuti vange vachimbodzokera kudzimba vozodzokazve sezvo mari dzekufambisa mumichovha dzakakwidzwa zvakanyanya. Mumwe wevanhu vanoswera pachipatara ichi ndemumwe mudzimai uyo angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Mai Miranzi. Amai Miranzi, avo vane mukoma wavo ari muchipatara, vanoti kana vangouya panguva dzekushanyira murwere dza 6 dzemangwanani, vanozobva pachipatara apa mushure mekuona murwere nenguva dza 6 dzemanheru. Amai Miranzi vanoti vanoswera nenzara. Amai Miranzi vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo vari vanhu vabva zera, vanotofamba netsoka kubva mudhorobha mavanenge vaburukira kuenda kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa. Amai Rumbidzai Shumba vane murwerewo zvakare muParirenyatwa. Amai Shumba vanotsigirawo zvataurwa naAmai Miranzi vachiti kudhura kwemari dzekufambisa ndiko kunovapa kuti vangoswera havo pachipatara apa. Kunyangwe hazvo vane varwere ava vachiswera pachipatara apa, vanotiwo kusavapo kwanachiremba kunowedzera matambudziko avo sezvo hama dzavo dzisiri kurapwa uye vachingowana pasina shanduko. Vanachiremba havasi kuenda kumabasa vachiti havasisina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaende kumabasa avo. Vamwewo amai vada kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Kukuwe vati zvinosuwisa kuti zvavanenge vangosiya varwere vavo vari ndizvo zvavanowana vari. Vemachechi pasi pemubatanidzwa weZimbabwe Christian Heads of Denominations vanotiwo vakanyora gwaro kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachitaridza kushushikana zvikuru nekurambodzikira kwezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. Vachitaura neStudio 7, Reverend Kenneth Mtata veZimbabwe Council of Churches vanoti vemakereke vanoona sekuti kuramboderera kwehupfumi kunokonzera kusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika. Ukuwo, dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kushaya simba kwemari yemunyika ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica pamwe nekudhura kwemitengo yezvinodiwa nemunhu zuva rega rega zvave kusiya mhuri zhinji dzichinyura kupinda muhurombo. No media source currently available

headline: MaLady Chevrons opinda muhondo
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenyika checricket chevanhukadzi chemaLady Chevrons – Adam Chifo – anoti vatambi vake vakagadzirira kurwa semvumba apo vacharwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo yeWorld Cup.   Svondo rino, maLady Chevrons ari kutanga kubandana neThailand munyika muno mumitambo mina yeOne Day International Series uye kana yapera zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichabva zvatanga kutatsurana mumitambo mitatu yeTwenty20 Series.   Achipedza kusangana neThailand, maLady Chevrons achazosimuka akananga kuBotswana munaGunyana uko achanokwikwidza mumutambo weInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Women’s T20 World Cup Africa Qualifier.   Abva kuBotswana, munaMbudzi chikwata chenyika ichi chichange chiri pamusha apo chicharwira tikiti rekuenda kumutambo weICC Women World Cup uyo uriko gore rinotevera kuNew Zealand. Chifo anoti chikwata chake chine basa guru rekubata mumitambo yavakatarisana nayo uye vari kushanda nesimba kuti vagokunda mumitambo iyi yose.   “Tange tichishanda nesimba nguva pfupi yadarika tichigadzirira mitambo yatakatarisana nayo. Tinoda kuenda kumitambo miviri yeWorld Cup.   Asi iye zvino tinombotanga tambopedzerana neThailand iyo tiri kusangana nayo kutanga svondo rino,” anodaro.
