Chikwata chake change chiri mukembi masvondo adarika kubva chakapihwa mvumo nesangano reSports and Recreation Commission kuti chitange gadziriro dzacho dzemitambo iyi uye chiri kugara mubio-secure bubble izvo zviri kutenderwa panguva ino kuti zvikwata zvemitambo yakasiyana zvitevedzere apo nyika iri kurwisa denda reCovid-19.   Bio-secure bubble zvinoreva kuti vatambi, varairidzi nevamwe vose vanenge vachiona nezvemutambo vanogara kwavo voga vasingasangane neveruzhinji nedonzvo rekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. “Tave nevhiki tiri mukembi mubio-secure bubble. Bio-secure bubble inobatsira zvikuru nekuti tinenge tichigara pamwe tichishanda zvakasimba pasina zvimwe zvinotidzorera kumashure basa redu ratinenge tichiita,” anodaro Chifo.   Mutambo wemaLady Chevrons neThailand uchatambirwa kuTakashinga Cricket Club uye uchange usina vatsigiri vanotenderwa kupinda kuzoona zvikwata izvi zvichitatsurana sezvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yekurwisa kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19.

headline: Vagari veKuMasvingo Voronga Kuratidzira neNyaya yeKushaya Mvura Mudzimba
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevagari vemuMasvingo, re Masvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance (MURRA) pamwe nesangano rekodzero dzemadzimai, reWomen’s Coalition of Zimbabwe vanyorera kanzuru yeMasvingo gwaro renyunyuto vachiipa mazuva maviri kuti igadzirise dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura. Vagari ava vanoti vari kuronga kuratidzira kana kanzuru ikakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko ravo. Vagari vemunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji mudhorobha reMasvingo vave nemavhiki matatu vasina mvura mudzimba dzavo mushure mekufa kwepombi inodhonza mvura kubva mudhamu reMutirikwi. Vachitaura ne Studio 7 nhasi vesangano re Murra pamwe neWomens’Coalition vanoti vakagumbuka zvikuru nekuti kanzuru haisi kuratidza kuita chimbi chimbi nekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vati vave kutyira kuti zvirwere zvakaita seCholera neTyphoid zvinogona kubata vagari. Muzvare Eshter Chimanikire vanoona nezve kufambiswa kwemabasa muMurra vanoti vatora danho rekuda kuratidzira nekuti kanzuru iri kutyora kodzero dzevagari dzekuwana mvura nguva dzose. Vagari vazhinji vave kutorarama nekunwa mvura yemumatsime iyo isina kuchena. Kanzuru iri kuyedza kupawo vanhu mvura nemabhauza asi haisikukwana. Vagari vazhinji vanoti vanomukira pakati pehusiku kubata raini pa mabhauza aya ne zvibhorani zvishoma zviri munzvimbo dzavanogara. Muzvare, Joyce Mhungu, sachigaro we Women’s Coalition, mudunhu reMasvingo, vanoti nyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura iri kunyanya kubata madzimai ndosaka vanyorera kanzuru tsamba uye nekubatana nemamwe masangano kuti vazoratidzira kana Kanzuru isina kugadzirisa dambudziko iri muma awa makumi mana nemasere. Asi Meya weMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vanoti yakagadzirisa dambudziko iri vachiti mvura yatotanga kuwanikwa kune dzimwe nzvimbo mudhorobha. Asi vagari vazhinji vanopikisa Meya vachiti munzvimbo dzavo mvura haisati yave kubuda kunyanya vekuRunyararo West, vachiri kungomirira mabhauza nekuenda ku zvibhorani. VaHardlife Tangai nde mumwe mugari ati zviri kutaurwa na Meya hazvisi zvechokwadi. Dhorobha reMasvingo rave kugara richisangana nedambudziko remvura sezvo mishina inopomba mvura ichigara ichingofa. Muna Nyamavhuvhu vagari vakaita mwedzi wose vasina mvura nekusashanda zvakanaka kwemichina iyi.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzopesana naVaMthuli Ncube Mashandisiro Avari Kuita Mari yeNyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hurongwa hwekushandiswa kwemari hwakaturwa muparamende nemusi weChina negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, hadzisi kugutsikana nahwo. Mukuru wesangano ravana chipangamazano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kutaurwa naVaNcube hazvina musoro kana pakatariswa nyaya yekuti mvura haina kunaya zvakanaka mwaka uno pamwe nekutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji munyika. Vachitura hurongwa hwekushandiswa mari pakati pegore, VaNcube vakati vashandi vanotambira mari isingadarike zviuru zvishanu zvemadhara vachange vasisabatirwe mari yemutero. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vati kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaya simba kwemari, hurumende inofanira kubhadhara vashandi nemari yekunze ichitorawo mitero yayo nemari dzekunze. Kunyange hazvo vashandi vachida kubhadharwa nemari yekunze, VaNcube vanogara vakataura kuti homwe yehurumende haina mari yekunze yekuti vakwanise kubhadhara vashandi nemari yekunze. VaNcube vakati mukushandisa kwavakaita mari vakasara nemari inoita mamariyoni mazana masere emadhora. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda nebazi rezvemari, vati mashoko aVaNcube haatambirike pakatariswa huwandu hwemari inofanira kunge yakashandiswa mukurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19. Munyori musangano rinomirira vanachiremba vadiki reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaEmmanuel Masosota, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinovarwadza kuti VaNcube vanotambanudza muromo wavo vachitaura kuti vane mari yakawanda yavakasara nayo muhomwe yavo asi vanachiremba nanamukoti vasina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Mashoko aVaMasosota atsinhirwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidza, Doctor Henry Madzorera. Vachitura gwaro remashandisirwo akaitwa mari nenyika kusvika pakati pegore nemusi weChina muparamende, VaNcube vakati mari yakashandiswa zvakanaka zvekuti hapana chikonzero chekuti pave nekuwedzerwa kwemari mubhajeti renyika kana kuti supplementary budget vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huchaderera gore rino nezvikamu zvina nechidimu kubva muzana nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi vakati hupfumi uhu huchazosimuka nezvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana gore rinouya . Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvehupfumi mubato reZanu PF, VaTafadza Muguti, vati havakwanise kutaura pamusoro pezvakaturwa naVaNcube mu budget review statement vachiti vari kuda kutanga vagara pasi sebato kuti vaongorore mashoko aVaNcube. VaNcube vakati hupfumi hwenyika munyaya dzekurima nekucherwa kwezvicherwa huchaderera zvishomanana gore rinouya kuburikidza nekunonoka kunaya kwemvura pamwe nekushayikwa kwemagetsi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti VaNcube vanogona havo kunge vakada kufadza nyika nekuratidza kuti mari haisi kungoshandiswa zvisina musoro, dambudziko riripo nderekuti VaNcube havangazvirovi dunhu vachiti vakachengetedza mari panguva iyo Zimbabwe isina zvikwanisiro munyaya dzekurwisana neCovid-19, vana mukoti navana chiremba vachiti vari kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo nepamusana pekushaya mari. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuita kwakadai kunoratidza kusarongeka kwehurumende inozviti mudura muzere nechikafu asi vanhu vasina chekudya. Studio7 haina kuykwanisa kunzwa divi raVaNcube panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vatatu vorwira Golden Boot yeUS$6 375
text: MWAKA wenhabvu wa2022 wave pedyo nekusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo uye vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vakavhura maziso vachida kuona kuti ndiani achahwina mubairo mukuru weSoccer Star of the Year neweGolden Boot.   Mukombe wePremier Soccer League wakatohwinwa kare neFC Platinum saka kwasara mibairo inosanganisirawo wevarairidzi weCoach of the Year.   Mwaka uno, mutambi achahwina mubairo weGolden Boot achapihwa US$6 375. Izvi zvakaziviswa namarketing manager wePSL, Rodwell Thabe, svondo radarika.   “Mutambi achahwina Golden Boot mwaka uno achaenda kumba kwake neUS$6 375,” anodaro.   Kusvika pari zvino, zvikwata zvese zvemuPSL zvanwisa ka556 mumitambo 32 yatambwa apo FC Platinum ndiyo iri kutungamira pakunwisa izvo zvaiona ichinwisa ka48. Kuchiti murwendo rwekurwira Golden Boot, mutambi weCAPS United – William Manondo – ndiye ari kutungamira pakurwira mubairo uyu izvo zvamuona achinwisa ka15 mumitambo 32 yatambwa.    Walter Musona   Pasara mitambo miviri chete kuti mitambo yePSL ichipera mwaka uno. Manond o anote ve r w a naWalter Musona weFC Platinum uyo akwanisa kunwisa ka12.    Brian Muza   Kuchiti Brian Muza weChicken Inn, uyo akambotungamira pakunwisa, anofungidzirwawo kuti mumwe wevanogona kuhwina mubairo uyu apo akagara pechitatu sezvo akwanisa kunwisa ka10

headline: NHABVU YORWISA COVID-19
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu izvo zvinokwikwidza muCastle Lager Premiership zvakatora matanho ekubatana nemamwe masangano mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvinosanganisira kupa chenjedzo yedenda iri.   Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nezvimwe zvezvikwata izvi kusanganisira Dynamos, Highlanders neFC Platinum izvo zvinotaura pamusoro pezvirongwa zvazviri kuita munharaunda yazvinobva.   Mukushi wemashoko kuDynamos FC, Tinashe Farawo anoti sechikwata, vari kushanda nevanhu vakasiyana mukupa chenjedzo kuvanhu pamusoro peCovid-19 achiti vatambi veDeMbare vari kuvashandisa kugadzira mavhidhiyo ayo vanotumira vanhu vachivayambira kuti vagare vakachengetedzeka.   “Isu sechikwata, tiri kupa chenjedzo kuvatsigiri vedu kuti ngavagare vakachengetedzeka panguva ino, nekuti chirwere ichi chiri kupararira. Mukudaro, tine mavhidhiyo evatambi vedu vachitaura nezvechirwere ichi ayo tiri kugadzira tichitumira kuvanhu tichivapa yambiro.   “Tiri kushanda zvekare nemasangano akasiyana uye vamwe vanhu vakuru kuti tirwise denda iri uye tibatsire vatsigiri vedu panguva ino,” akadaro Farawo.   Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weHighlanders, Modern Ngwenya anoti Bosso yakabatsira chimwe chipatara chekuBulawayo nemari sedanho rekurwisa coronavirus uye vatambi vavo vari kubika mavhidhiyo ayo ane mashoko ari pamusoro pedenda rabata nekuuraya vanhu vakawandisa pasi rose iri.   “Isu takabatsira chimwe chipatara nemari yekushandisa kutenga zvinodiwa mukurwisa coronavirus. Vatambi veduzve vari kubika mavhidhiyo ayo ane shoko rechenjedzo ayo tiri kutumira kune veruzhinji,” anodaro Ngwenya.   Muhurukuro nemutauriri weFC Platinum, Chido Chizondo anoti sechikwata, vari kuita basa guru munharaunda yeZvishavane nedunhu rose reMidlands kusanganisira kupa chenjedzo uye kupa masanitizers kuti veruzhinji vashandise kubvisa kana kuuraya hutachiona.   “Tine rudo nenharaunda yatinobva saka tiri kuita mabasa akasiyana ekubatsira anosanganisira kupa masanitizers uye kupakura chenjedzo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. “Chokwadi chirwere ichi chiriko uye chiri kuuraya vanhu saka isu sechikwata chevanhu chine vanhu pamoyo, tiri kuita zvose zvatinokwanisa kuti tibatsire vatsigiri vedu panguva ino,” akadaro Chizondo.

headline: Vari Kunze kweNyika Votadza Kuziva reMangwana Ravo muSarudzo
text: Sezvo chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota cheBiometric Voters’ Registration mop-up chiri kupetwa nemusi weChina munyika yose, vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vanoti havachazivi remangwana ravo panyaya yekuti vachapinda here kana kuti kwete musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa gore rino vachivhota vari munyika dzavagere. Mumwe wevari kunze ava ndaAmai Chenaimoyo Mutambasere vesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, avo vari kuLondon kuBritain. Amai Mutambasere vanoti havachaoni hurumende iine chaichavaitira kuti vakwanise kunyoresa kuvhota kuitira kuti vazovhota gore rino, sezvo pachiratidza sekunge pasisina nguva. Asi vanoti zvakangonakawo zvakare kuti vatange vanzwa zvichabuda munyaya yakakwidza kudare reConstitutional Court nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvichimirirwa neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights,yekuti zvibvumidzwe kuvhota zviri munyika dzazvigere. Nyaya iyi yanzi nedare inzwikwe musi wa 14 Kukadzi 2018. Amai Mutambasere vanoti kana dare rakapa mutongo unotsigira kuti vavhote vari nyika dzavari, kana dai vakasakwanisa zvavo kuvhota gore rino, zvinenge zvangovanakira musarudzo dzinouya. Asi dzimwe nyaya mbiri dzakambopinzwawo mumatare dzakafanana naiyoyi hadzina kuunzira vana veZimbabwe vari kunze mufaro, sezvo matare akarasa nyaya idzi, uyewo kupa mutongo usingavafadze. Kunyange hazvo pasati patarwa zuva resarudzo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatoyambira kare kuti sarudzo dzinogona kuitwa mwedzi waChikunguru usati wasvika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvemutemo dzinoti izvi hazvigoni kuitika sezvo bumbiro remitemo richiti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kuitwa chete pakati pa22 Chikunguru na22 Nyamavhuvhu, kunze kwekunge VaMnangagwa vaparadza dare reparamende. Chirongwa che BVR chiri kudzokororwa ichi kana kuti mop-up, chiri kutarisirwa kupetwa neChina, asi vanhu vanonzi vacharamba vachinyoresa kuvhota mune dzimwe nzvimbo mumatunhu avagere. No media source currently available

headline: Zimpapers Netball Queens yotarisa kure
text: CHIKWATA chenetball chekambani huru munyaya dzezvenhau munyika muno cheZimpapers Netball Queens chinoti chine shuviro yekusvika kure mumutambo uyu uye chinoda kuti chizopinda muligi reZimbabwe Netball Association Super League.   Kaputeni wechikwata ichi, Veronica Gwaze, anoti vari kurwa semvumba uye vachiri pakati pekuvaka chikwata chavo.   Chikwata ichi chakavambwa nguva pfupi yadarika uye parizvino chiri kukwikwidza muligi reZIMPAR Netball Social umo mune zvikwata gumi zviri kurwira kusimukira kusvika zvapinda muSuper League.   Kubva yavambwa, Zimpapers Netball Queens yakwanisa kutamba mitambo miviri muZIMPAR Netball Social ndokuhwina yose ichikunda NSSA Queens 37-14 uye ndokukwapaidza IPEC 28-0.   “Tichiri kuvaka sechikwata asi tega tichitarisa matambiro atiri kuita zvinorakidza kuti tiri kufamba mugwara chairo.   “Isu sechikwata shuviro yedu kuti tirambe tichisimukira kusvika tasvika kuZimbabwe Netball Association Super League uye tichakusvika chete,” anodaro Gwaze.   Anoti vatambi vazhinji vari muchikwata chavo  vakambotamba netball vachiri kuchikoro kupuraimari uye matambiro avari kuita anorakidza kuti zvichirimo mavari.   “Vatambi vari muchikwata chedu vazhinji vakatamba netball kupuraimari asi zviri kurakidza kuti zvichirimo. Varairidzi vedu vari kushanda nesu zvakasimba kuti titambe netball yepamusoro yave kutambwa mazuva ano,” anodaro Gwaze.   Nemusi weMugovera unotevera, Zimpapers Netball Queens ichange iri pamusha payo paRoosevelt Girls High, muHarare apo ichasangana neHit Queens.   Chikwata cheZimpapers Netball Queens chakaumbwa nevatambi kubva kumapoka akasiyana eZimpapers.    Coach Taps avo vanova ndivo vari kurairidza chikwata ichi vanoti varikufadzwa nematambiro avarikuita sezvo vasina nguva yakareba vachitamba muligi.    Vanoti zvekare remangwana rechikwata ichi rakajeka chaizvo.

headline: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Kushaya Simba kweMari Kwopa Kuti Vari Pamudyandigere Vaomerwe neHupenyu
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vatenda kuti mari dziri kuwedzerwa vari pamudyandigere neNational Security Authority kana kut NSSA kutanga mwedzi uno hadzikwani nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora asi vachiti havo atsunya arwa. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichaita zvose zvainogona kuona kuti mari iyi hairambe ichishaya simba. Vatiwo vari kutambira mari yepasi vanenge vachiwana mari inosvika madhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chemari chiri pamutemo kwete zviri kuitika pamukoto vakati mari iyi inosvika pamadhora mazana matatu kune vakabatirwa mari dzakati wandei vachiri kushanya. Mari idzi dziri kutangira pamadhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chiri pamutemo kwete mari dzepamukoto. Vari pamudyandigere vane makore akawanda vachichema chema kuti mari kutambiriswa haisi kuvakwanira zvopa kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatendawo kuti mari iyi ishoma zvichinyanya kukonzerwa nekuti dhora remunyika riri kutengeswa nemari inodarika mazana maviri emadhora padhora rekuAmerica kana kuti 1”200. Vatiwo vemabhizimisi vakawanda vanotengesa zvinhu vachishandisa chikero chemaei yepamukoto. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo vari pamudyandigere vachiri vakaomerwa nehupenyu sezvo mari iyi isingakwane kuti vatenge kana mishonga chaiyo kana vave kurwara. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revari pamudyandigere reAssociation of National Social Security Retirees Trust, VaGideon Shoko, vatiwo panotanga kubatwa zvimwe zvirehwa rehwa nevemabhanga mari iyi ishoma. Vatiwo haisvike pane inotarisirwa kuti mhuri irarame pamwedzi kana kuti Poverty Datum Line Vashandi vemumakambani nemuhurumende vanobatirwa mari pamwedzi neNSSA kuti vazopihwe kava vave pamudyandigere kana kuremara vari pabasa. Asi kwemakore vashandi vagara vachichema kuti huori hunotyisa hunoitika muNSSA hunopa kuti itadze kuvapa mari dzekuti vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

headline: Ane nharo ngaauye: Khan
text: anoti hapana chinhu chinomutadzisa kurwa naManny Pacquiao pamwe naKell Brook futi mumwedzi 12 inotevera.   Khan akakwanisa kuzvidzora mumutambo wake naSamuel Vargas wekuColombia svondo radarika ndokuhwina pazvibodzwa, uye mutambo uchangopera Eddie Hearn anove puromota waBrook pamwe naKhan akataura kuti mutambo wevaviri ava unofanirwa kuitika izvezvi kana kuti hauchaitike zvachose.   Khan akaudza PA Sport kuti: “Ndine makore 31, ndichiri mudiki saka nguva ichiripo yekuti mitambo yese miviri iitike. Sei usiri kuitika? Ndinofunga kuti yese miviri mugore rimwe chete inotambika ikabudirira.   “Pacquiao ndiye wandiri kunyanyoda nekuti mukuru pasi rese munyaya dzetsiva uye zita rake rine mukurumbira. Saka kurwa nemunhu akaita saye chiremerera chikuru.   “Mutambo usingazivikanwe kuti unofamba sei uye vanhu vachafunga kuti ndinogona kukundwa naye, asi ndinoziva kuti ndinogona kumushamisa.   “Mutambo waKell Brook, mutambo wandinoziva kuti ndinogona kuhwina zvangu ndakasununguka, ndicho chokwadi. Asi inyaya yekuti pakugadzira zita rangu ndina mazita andinoda kunzi ndinzi ndakakunda. Asi ndingade chaizvo Manny Pacquiao pana Kell Brook. Zita rake iguru chaizvo uye aya ndiwo maonero angu.”   Apo mutambo wake naBrook unenge ndiwo uri kudiwa nevatsigiri vetsiva kuBritain, Khan anofunga kuti anogona kukurudzira Pacquiao kuti auye kuzorwa kunyika iyi asi hunge kana vakamupa zvaanenge achida kuti asimuke.   Akapedza makore matanhatu achishanda nemuFilipino uyu vachirairidzwa vese tsiva naFreddie Roach uye anoti kumuziva kwaanoita —  sezvo vaimborwa mitambo yehushamwari —  zvinomubatsira zvikuru. — SportsMail boxing

headline: VaChamisa Vanodoma VaNcube naVaKomichi seVatevedzeri Vavo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vadoma VaWelshman Ncube pamwe naVaMorgen Komichi, sevatevedzeri vavo. VaNcube naVaKomichi vari kubatana naVaElias Mudzuri kuva vatevedzeri vatatu vaVaChamisa. VaChamisa vasimudzirawo Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo kuva sachigaro vebato, uye mutevedzeri wavo vari VaTendai Biti, avo vanga vari mutungamiri wePeople's Democratic Party. VaJacob Mafume ndivo mutauriri mutsva webato. VaMafume vanga vari mutauriri wePeople's Democratic Party. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vati vakaedza kuti nhaurirano nechikwata cheMDC-T chinotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Asi mutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana kumbobvira paita nhaurirano dzakadai pakati pechikwata chavo nechikwata chaVaChamisa. VaSibanda vati MDCT yaMuzvare Khupe yave kushanda neZanu PF ndosaka vari kuramba kushanda nevamwe vemapato anopikisa. Asi VaGutu vati zviri kutaurwa naVaSibanda izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. VaGutu vatiwo kugadzwa pazvigaro kwakaitwa VaNcube pamwe naVaBiti naMafume, hakusi pamutemo sezvo vachiti zvinzvimbo zvakadai zvinogadzwa vanhu pakongiresi chete. Asi VaMafume vaudza vatori venhau kuti VaChamisa vane masimba mubumbiro ravo remitemo rekuita izvi uye pamusoro pezvo vanoti vakapihwa masimba ekuita izvi nekomiti yepamusorosoro mubato ravo pakati pemakongiresi reNational Council. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemamwe mapato aive mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance akaita seZimbabwe People First neTransform Zimbabwe kuti tinzwe paamire panyaya yekupinda muMDC. Kunyange hazvo tatadza kutaura nemutauriri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJustin Makota, avo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mubato iri vanoti mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vakamirira kuita musangano nehutungamiri hwebato ravo vasati vazivisa kuti votora gwara ripi panyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato ose anopikisa ari munyika akabatana kuita bato rimwe chete ane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekubvisa Zanu PF mumasimba pachaitwa sarudzo dzinotevera. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reSACU Rowanisa Nhengo Dzaro muAmerica Ruzivo Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirirra zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvinogara munharaunda yeD.C, Maryland neVirginia, reSouthern African Community USA, nemusi weSvondo rakakokera hurukuro padandemutande pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekuti veruzhinji vanzwisise pamusoro pedenda iri uye kuti ringabatwa sei. Nhengo yebhodhi reSACU vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sangano ravo rakatora danho iri kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane ruzivo rwuzere pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19, iro rashungurudza pasi rose. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti kuti vanhu vanzwisise kukosha kwenzira dzekudzvirira nadzo pamwe nekurapa denda iri, vakakoka nyanzvi mbiri dzinoti chiremba vari nyanzvi yemishonga yechirungu Dr. Bukhosi Dube vanove chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe, pamwe nemumwe godobori wemishonga yechivanhu anobva kuSouth Africa kuti vatsanangurire veruzhinji pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yaive nevanhu. Vamwe vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vanhu vaakapona kubva kudenda iri avo vakagoverawo kune vamwe nzira dzavakashandisa mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rinoshandawo nemakanzuru pamwe nehurumende dzematunhu mukubatsira zvizvarwa zvekuAfrica muzvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira zvehutano nezvehupfumi. Muzvare Tawonezi vanoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekuita mimwe misangano nenhaurwa pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekupa ruzivo nedzidziso kunhengo dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Makurukota eHurumende Osangana neVashandi Kuti Vazeye Nyaya dzeMari yeMihoro Iyo Yonoka Kuuya
text: Makurukota ehurumende anoti rezvehupfumi, rehutano uye revashandi vehurumende vapinda mumusangano muHarare nevesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council kuti vazeye nyaya dzekunonoka kwemari yemihoro. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rapera kuti ichanonoka kutambirsa vashandi vayo mari izvo zvapa kuti paite ropa rakaipa pakati payo nevashandi ava vamwe vachiti vave kuronga kuratidzira. Nekuda kwekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda munyika gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Prisca Mupfumira vanoti hurumende yave kuwana mari shoma kubva kumutero zvopa kuti itadze kubhadhara vashandi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo munyika. Musangano uyu uri kuenderera mberi parizvino sezvo wanonoka kutanga.

headline: VaMugabe Votanga Kutsvaga Rutsigiro Asi Vamwe Vachitya Kudzoka kweMhirizhonga
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemusi weChishanu vari kutarisirwa kuparura hurongwa hwekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rinouya vachikurudzira vechidiki kuti vaende kunonyoresa kuvhota. Musangano wekutanga pamisangano gumi ichaitwa naVaMugabe mumatunhu ose uri kutanga kuRudhaka Stadium, Marondera. Rwendo rwaVaMugabe urwu rwuri kuuyawo mushure mekunge mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vatendererawo mumatunhu ose enyika vachiita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. Vamwe vari kuitawo misangano yakadai ndiAmai Joice Mujuru webato reNational People’s Party. Asi kutanga kwekutsvaga rutsigiro uku kunonzi nesangano rinoita zveongororo reAfrobarometer kuri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vabatwe nekutya kukuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. Afrobarometer inotiwo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuti havachina chivimbo nesarudzo hurikuramba huchikwira. Nhengo yeMDC-T vachimirira Mkoba mudare reparamende, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti ichokwadi kuti Zanu-PF iri kukonzera mhirizhonga nekuti haina chekuitira vanhu. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF Youth League kuManicaland, VaMubuso Chinguno, vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi uye vanopikisa vanoreva nhema kuti bato ravo rinokurudzira mhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Ngezi Platinum Yoyambira Makepekepe Kuti Ichaiomesera neSvondo
text: Ngezi Platinum Stars yayambira Caps United kuti isapemberere kutora mukombe weligi zvechimbichimbi nekuti munhabvu munhu anofanira kutenda maruva adya chakata. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kusangana muNational Sports Stadium neSvondo mumutambo unogona kupa Caps United mukombe weligi kana kukanganisa zvese zvaitwa nemaGreen Machine gore rese. Caps United iri kuda kukunda mumutambo uyu ichitarisirawo kuti FC Platinum inorohwa kana kuita mangenge neHighlanders kuti itore mukombe. Sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti hazvisi kuzove nyore kuti Caps United itorere mukombe pavari vachiti ivo marovero avakaita Highlanders neFC Platinum ndiwo avari kuzoita maGreen Machine. VaGetiseni vanoti vakagadzirira zvakasimba mutambo nemaGreen Machine vachiwedzera ivo kuti vari kuenderera mberi kugadzirira kusvikira mutambo uyu wapera. Pari zvino, Caps United ndiyo iri pamusoro soro nemapoinzi makumi mashanu nemanomwe, maviri pamusoro peFC Platinum, uyezve matatu kudarika Highlanders. Caps United ikakundwa kana kuita mangange, FC Platinum ikakunda Highlanders, Kugona Kunenge Kudada ndiyo inoenda pamusoro uyezve pedyo nemukombe unokosha $1,2 million. Asi mutsigiri weCaps United VaShingirai Miti vanoti vari kuona Makepekepe ichikunda Ngezi Platinum Stars vachiti ivo nguva yarebesa vasati vabata mukombe weligi. Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League asarwa nemitambo miviri kuti asvike kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino ndeiyi Mugovera Mutare City Rovers v Harare City Sakubva Tsholotsho v Bulawayo City Luveve ZPC Kariba v How Mine Nyamhunga  Svondo Triangle v Dynamos Gibbo Hwange v Chapungu Colliery Chicken Inn v Border Strikers Luveve Zvakamira zvakadai, maMighty Warriors neMugovera ari kupinda munhandare yemuYaounde muCameroon kusangana neBanyana Banyaya yekuSouth Africa mumutambo wavo wekutanga mumakwikwi e2016 Africa Women’s Africa Cup of Nations. Mutambo wekutanga wakakosha zvikuru zvekuti maMighty Warriors anofanira kukunda kunyange hazvo gadziriro yavo yanga isina kumira zvakanaka. Zvikwata izvi zvakasangana mumutambo wekuedzana masimba masvondo maviri apfuura maMighty Warriors akarohwa 3-0. Asi murairidzi wechikwata ichi Shadreck Mhlauzi anoti iyi inhoroondo achiti uyu mutambo mutsva uyezve une zvinangwa zvakasiyana. Kunze kweSouth Africa, maMighty Warriors achatamba zvekare neCameroon pamwe ne Egypt. Zvikwata zviviri kubva mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakundano. No media source currently available

headline: Vabereki Vochema Chema neKumanikidzwa Kutenga Nhumbi dzeVana paChikoro Kuti Vawane Nzvimbo
text: Vabereki vane vana vakawana nzvimbo dzeGrade One neForm One mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasi kufara nekumanikidzwa kutenga maUniforms pazvikoro kuti vapihwe nzvimbo. Vabereki ava vanoti kuti mwana apihwe nzvimbo anofanirwa kubhadhara mari yechikoro pamwe chete neyenhumbi dzechikoro idzo dzinotengeswa pachikoro pacho. Asi vabereki vanoti nhumbi dzechikoro dzinotengeswa pazvikoro dziri kudhura uye hadzina kusimba sezvakaita nhumbi dzechikoro dzinotengeswa kuzvitoro zvakaita seEnBee, Barbours kana Adams. Chiri kunyanya kurwadza vabereki ndechekuti kana munhu asina kubhadhara mari yenhumbi dzechikoro mwana wake anoshaya nzvimbo yechikoro. Mumwe mubereki VaJustin Nyachowe vanoti zvikoro zviri kubira vanhu mari sezvo vari kusanganisa kuwana nzvimbo dzechikoro nekutenga nhumbi dzechikoro dzevana. Mumwe mubereki muzvare Georgina Komoto vane mwana akawana nzvimbo pachikoro cheNemakonde vanoti nhumbi dzinotengeswa kuchikoro hadzina kusimba asi dzinodhura . Muzvare Kamoto vanoti zviri pachena kuti muzvikoro mave kuitwa zvehuori. Asi vamwe vabereki vanoti danho rekutenga nhumbi dzechikoro dzinogadzirwa nekambani imwechete rakanaka sezvo nhumbi dzacho dziine ruvara rwakafanana. VaChristopher Chaita mumwe wevabereki vane maonero akadaro. Mukuru webazi rezvedzidzo mudunhu reMashonaland West VaSylvester Mashayamombe vanoti hausi mutemo wehurumende kuti zvikoro zvitengesere vabereki nhumbi dzevana vechikoro. VaMashayamombe vanoti kutengeswa kwenhumbi dzevana muzvikoro kunofanirwa kurerutsira vabereki kwete kuvaomesera. VaMashayamombe vanoti mutemo wehurumende haumanikidzire mwana kuti apfeke nhumbi dzechikoro kuti adzidze. Pane runyerekupe rwekuti makambani evakuru vakuru vemuhurumende ndiwo ari kusona nhumbi dzevana vechikoro idzo vabereki vari kuti dziri kudhura uye dzisina kusimba. Zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa musi wa 10 Ndira. No media source currently available

headline: Morocco Yosimudza Mureza weAfrica kuWorld Cup
text: Morocco yakashamisa vakawanda nezuro kumakwikwi eWorld Cup ari kuitirwa kuQatar mushure mekurova Belgium 2-0 zvange zvisingatarisirwe nevakawanda. Aka ndekekutanga Morocco ichikunda mumutambo weWorld Cup kekutanga kubva muna 1998. Morocco yave nyika yechipiri yemuAfrica kukundawo kumakwikwi aya zvichitevera kukunda kwakaita Senegal Qatar 3-1. Morocco iri muGroup F pamwe chete neCroatia iyo yakatungamira gungano iri nezvibodzwa zvakawanda mushure mekurova Canada- 4-1. Croatia ine mapoinzi mana, Morocco ine manawo ichiteverwa neBelgium ine poindi imwe chete sezvakangoitawo Canada iyo yabva yabuda mumakwikwi aya. Zvikwata zvise zvasarirwa nemutambo mumwe chete wekupedzisira. Morocco ichatamba neCanada musi wa 1 Zvita ukuwo Belgium ichitamba neCroatia musi wakarewo.

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzokurudzira Veruzhinji Kukoshesa Mitemo Inodzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti hapana munhu akashaya nekuda kweCovid-19 uye vanhu gumi nemumwe, kana kuti 11, ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi kubva pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 535, vakavhenekwa nyika yose. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nedenda iri kubva parapinda munyika gore rapera muna Kurume vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemumwe, kana kuti 36 271. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 1 485, kuchitiwo huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kuCovid-19 hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi matatu nevana, kana kuti 33 834. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19 vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, kana kuti 226, vakabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira hutachiwana hunokonzera Covid-19. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezviviri zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana, kana kuti 32 240. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano pamwe nemapurisa vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vasiri kutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana yakatarwa neW-H-O pamwe nebazi rezvehutano kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo we lockdown svondo rapera. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti lockdown yakabatsira chose kuderedza huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCovid-19. Asi vanoti panofanirwa kuramba paine dzidziso pamusoro penzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri kunyange hazvo mitemo yakanyevenutswa. Svondo rapera mapurisa akazivisa kuti kusvika neChishanu chapfuura vanhu vaidarika zviuru zvishanu vakanga vasungwa kubva musi wa 01 nemhosva yekusapfeka zvivharangozi,kana kuti ma mask, danho rinonzi nemapurisa vari kushushikana naro. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 3,9 million, vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru zana nezvishanu rine mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevaviri, kana kuti 105, 722. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che coronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni zana negumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 116, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti kuti 525, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere ane zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 28, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 2,5 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 66, million. No media source currently available

headline: Musona, Ronaldo dhuma-dhuma
text: AIMBOVE kaputeni wemaWarriors — Knowledge Musona — ane mukana wekusangana naCristiano Ronaldo apo chikwata chake cheAl Tai chichatatsurana necheAl Nassr mumutambo weSaudi Pro League.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasanga neChina svondo rino mumutambo uchatambirwa kunhandare yeAl Nassr yePrince Faisal bin Fahd Stadium kuRiyadh.   Ronaldo akatengwa neAl Nassr svondo rino uye pane fungidziro huru yekuti anogona kutamba mutambo wake wekutanga apo chikwata chake chitsva ichi, icho chinorairidzwa naRudi Garcia, chichange chiri pamusha apo chichasangana neAl Tai.   Pari zvino Al Nassr ndiyo iri kutungamira palog rekuSaudi Arabia iine zvibodzwa 26 kubva mumitambo 11 yayatamba mwaka uno.    Cristiano Ronaldo   Nerimwewo divi, Al Tai yakagara pechinomwe iine zvibodzwa 18 kubva mumitambo 11 yayatambawo mwaka uno.   Musona atamba mitambo yese 11 uye ndokukwanisa kunwisa katatu.   Akanwisa katatu aka (hat-trick) mumutambo mumwe chete apo Al Tai yakakunda Al Khaleej 3-0.   Akapedzisira kunwisa mwedzi wadarika apo Al Tai payakasangana neAL Fateh mumutambo weKing’s Cup uyo wakazopera uri mangange 2-2, ndokuzoenda kumapena uko Al Tai yakakundwa 7-6 zvakaita kuti ibve yazoburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Kuchiti Ronaldo, akaenda kuAl Naasr zvichitevera kudzingwa kwaakaitwa kuManchester United mushure mekunge ashoropodza chikwata ichi pamwe nemurairidzi wacho, Erik ten Hag, uyo waakati haamuremekedze nekuti iye akange asingamuremekedzewo.   United naTen Hag hazvina kutambira mashoko aRonaldo aya zvakanaka ndokubva vamudzingwa kuchikwata ichi apo aigadzirira kuenda kuWorld Cup nenyika yake yePortugal.

headline: America Inoti Zimbabwe Haisi Kuzadzikisa Zvivimbiso zveKuvandudza Nyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
text: Hurumende yeAmerica inoti Zimbabwe haina zvizhinji zvairi kuvandudza munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvingapa kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri vehurumende zvibviswe. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa neChitatu muWashington DC nesangano reCentre for Strategic and International Studies Strategic kana kuti CSISS razeya nyaya yemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika zvikuru nyaya yezvekudya uye zvingaitwe kugadzirisa matambudziko aya. Vachivhura hurukuro iyi, mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica kana kuti Deputy Assistant Secretary of State, Bureau of African Affairs Ambassador Mathew Harrington, vati kunyange hazvo America yakabuda pachena kuti zvii zvainoda kuti zviitwe isati yabvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende, zviri pachena kuti kuvakuru vehurumende yeZimbabwe muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo vari kungotaura kuti vari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu asi pasina chabuda. Vamwe vakataura pamusangano uyu mukuru mubazi rezverubatsiro muZimbabwe mubazi reUSAID, VaJason Taylor. Vamwe vange varipo ndevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoongorora mamiriro ezvekudya musangano reFewsnet, VaPeter Thomas, uye nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari chipangamazano chehurumende, Muzvinafundo Ashok Chakravarti. Muzvinafundo Chakravarti vati zvirango zviri kukonzera matambudziko uye zvinofanira kubviswa. Asi vachipindurawo VaJason vati handi chokwadi kuti Zimbabwe iri kutadza kubudirira nenyaya yemutemo wezvirango weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act kana kuti (ZIDERA) vachiti chiri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kupihwa mari inyaya yekutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti. Panyaya dzezvekudya, VaThomas vati vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. VaTaylor vanoti zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa munyika munogona kusagadzikana vanhu vachiratidzira sezvakaitika muna Ndira pakawedzerwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kunyangwe havo vatenda kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe havadi zvekurwisana zvinopa kuti munyika musadeuke ropa. Mutemo weZIDERA wakadzikwa nedare reCongress remuAmerica iro raipomera vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe mhosva yekutonga nedemo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanomirira Masangano eMitambo Vokumbira Hurumende Kuti Vadzoke Munhandare
text: Masangano anomirira vatambi mumitambo yakasiyana siyana aisa zvikumbiro kuhurumende kuti vatenderwe kuendera mberi nemitambo mushure mekunge mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vati mitambo yose imbomiswa kutanga neMuvhuro senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Muraridzi webasketball Edmore Zivanai Muthetwa anoti ari kushushikana zvikuru nekuti hurumende yakatora danho iri isina kutaurawo navo. Kugunun’una uku kwauya panguva iyo veZimbabwe Cricket neZimbabwe Rugby Union vaisa chikumbiro kuhurumende kuti vatenderwe kuenderera mberi nemitambo. Gwaro rabva kuZimbabwe Cricket riri kukumbira kuti vapedzise mutambo wavo wemazuva mana uripo pakati peZimbabwe A neSouth Africa A uyo wakatanga nesvondo ndokumiswa neMuvhuro. Pamusoro pezvo, Zimbabwe Cricket yakumbira kupihwa mukana wekuti zvikwata zvenyika zvitenderwe kuita gadziriro yemitambo neve kune dzimwe nyika iyo yaive yarongwa kare.  Murairidzi wechikwata chevanhukadzi chemaLady Chevrons Adam Chifo anoti ane chivimbo chekuti chichemo chavo chichanzwikwa vakatarisana nemitambo ye2022 World Cup. Mukuru weZimbabwe Rugby Union VaAaron Jani vazivisawo kuti vakumbirawo mukana wekuti zvikwata zvenyika zvigadzirire makundano eAfrica Cup ayo ariko mwedzi unotevera. Makundano eAfrica Cup ayo arikutirwa kuTunisia ari kushandiswa senzira yekuenda kuWorld Cup. VePremier Soccer League neve Zifa vanonzi vari mubishiwo rekuedza kuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup ienderere mberi. Mutauriri weZFA VaXolisani Gwesela veZifa vanoti vanyorawo tsamba kuSport and Recreation Commission kuti mitambo yenhabvu irambe ichitambwa sezvanga zvichingoitwa masvondo mana apfuura. Anotaura akamirira PSL Muzvare Kudzai Bare vati pasvika nyaya iyi hapasisiri pezera ravo asi reZifa neSRC. Murairidzi weTriangle Taurayi Mangwiro anoti ane chivimbo chekuti mitambo ichaenderera mberi achiwedzera iye kuti panguva ino vatambi vavo vachange vachiita gadziriro vari kudzimba. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaJustice Muzanenhamo vanoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu hurumende yagona kumisa mitambo. Aka kave kechipiri mitambo ichimiswa nehurumende nemhaka yechirwere cheCovid 19 chakatanga kupararira munyik gore rapera.

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatana neWHO neMamwe Masangano Kurwisa Chirwere cheBharaziya
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Muzvinafundo Francisca Mutapi vanoshanda nesangano reTracking Infections To Benefit Africa vari kuScotland vanoti sangano ravo riri kuita ongororo rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano nesangano guru reWorld Health Organisation yekuona kuti chirwere chebharazira chadzoka here munyika uye kuti chingarapwe seyi pachena. Vanoti chirwere ichi chinoratidza nekuita weti kana tsvina ine ropa uye vanenge vaoona izvi vanofanirwa kuenda kunavana chiremba sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika. Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vanonzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi chinokonzerwa nehutachiwona hunogara mumvura ine tsvina. Muzvinafundo Mutapi vanoti pakambenge pane zvirongwa zvekurapa chirwere chebharazia pachena munyika munguva yapfura chakange chakanangana nevana vadiki vemuzvikoro asi chakambomiswa uye chinotarisirwa kutanga gore rinouya. "Kurudziro yedu ndeyekuti pachadaidzirwa nebazi rezvehutano kuti vanhu vauye kuzorapwa denda rebilharzia munguva inotevera vanhu vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika uye chichange chichi rapwa pachena," Muzvinafundo Mutapi vaudza Studio7. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mukuru wezvehutano muguta reHarare VaProsper Chonzi kana mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa . No media source currently available

headline: VaTomana Voridzirwa Pito Vachinzi Vatadza Basa
text: Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Judiciary Service Commission, JSC, inoti gweta guru renyika, VaJohannes Tomana, vanofanira kusiya basa nenyaya yekusatevedzera mitongo yematare epamusoro sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. JSC ina sachigaro uye ari mutongi mukuru wematare, VaGodfrey Chidyausiku, pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzinosanganisira mutongo mutungamiri wedare repamusoro pamwe nevamwe vatongi vedare iri. JSC inoti VaTomana havachakodzere zvachose kuti vave gweta guru rehurumende uye nyaya yekuti vakatopotsa vaendeswa kujeri panyaya yavairamba kuchuchisa nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Kereke, vari kupomwera mhosva yekubata chibharo, munongedzo wekuti munhu asisafanire kuva muhofisi. Studio7 yange yatoudzwa neMuvhuro nevamwe vakuru muhurumende kuti VaMugabe vave mubishi kuumba komiti yekutanga kuferefeta VaTomana uye vakabatwa nemhosva, vanodzingwa basa. Asi VaTomana vatokwira kudare repamusoro vachiti zviri kuitwa neJSC hazvisi pamutemo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaTomana kanawo gweta ravo, VaThabani Mpofu. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo, uye vachidzidzisa mitemo paKent University kuBritain, Doctor Alex Magaisa, vanoti havaoni VaTomana vachipona munyaya yasimudzwa neJSC. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anonzi Atadzisa Vagari vekuChilonga Kuratidzira
text:
Mapurisa ange negurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira, nhasi arambidza vagari vekuChilonga kuratidzira kusafara kwavo nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kuvabvisa munzvimbo iyi kuitira kuti minda yavo ishandiwe semafuro emombe dzemukaka dzekambani yeDendiary.

Vagari ava vange vachipfuura mazana maviri vanga vatanga kuimba
vachiramba neivhu ravo pasvika VaChadzamira pazvitoro zvepaMutomani. Mumwe mugari wekuChilonga,VaBornface Chidowera, vati kuratidzira kwavo kwamiswa nemapurisa vachangotanga.

Izvi zvatsinhirwa naSabhuku Vheremu vekuChilonga, VaLuckson Mavasa,
avo vati kuratidzira kwavo kwamiswa. Vatiwo vaita musangano uyo usina kubuda zvakanaka sezvo vanhu vanga vachipikisana nevamiriri vehurumende.

VaChadzamira vati hapana ratidziro yaitika kana kurambidzwa vanhu,
asi vaita musangano wavo zvakanaka nevagari wekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pachirongwa ichi chirikuda kuitwa nehurumende.

Asi mumwe mugari, Amai Esther Munghomi, vati ratidiziro yaitika
kwenguva diki uye musangano hauna kubuda zvakanaka sezvo ivo
varambidzwa kutaura mushure mekuramba chirongwa ichi. Mutauriri wemapurisa muMasvingo, Inspector Kudakwashe Dhewa, vaudza
Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanga vasati vanzwa mashoko ekuti mapurisa
arambidza vanhu kuratidzira kuChilonga. Hurumende iri kuti haichadi kudzinga vanhu kuChilonga asi vanovafanira
kugarisana nekambani yeDendairy ichapinda munzvimbo mavo yovaitira
budiriro yemadiridziro vowanawo chouviri. Asi vagari vekuChilonga vari kuramba vachiti kambani iyi ikange yauya
inozopedzisira yavadzinga nekudaro vari kuda kubatwa kumeso
nehurumende. Kambani yeDendairy yakavambwa nemhuri yekwaCoetzee muna 2004, pamwe neimwe kambani yekuEurope, Spear Capital, iine zvikamu makumi maviri nezvinomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 27% zvehupfumi muDendairy, iyo yakatanga kushandira kuRedcliff mudunhu reMidlands.

Vakuru vakuru muDendairy vanosanganisira VaAndrew Bradnick, VaNeville Coetzee, Amai Cherly Coeztee naDarly Archibald. VaCoetzee vanonzi murimi wechichena anowirirana zvikuru
nemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yopomera Vari Kunze Mhosva yeKufurira Vari Kumusha Kuti Varatidzire
text: Panonzi pave nekukandirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigere munyika nezvimwe zvigere kunze kwenyika pamusoro pekuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa nebato reMDC, vari munyika, zvikuru veZanu PF, vachiti kuratidzira uku kuri kukuchidzirwa nevari kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo mapurisa munyika yose ari kurambidza kuratidzira uku kuburikidza nekuzara mumigwagwa pamwe chete nemauto akamirira kuparadza vanenge vaungana vachida kuratidzira. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, VaBelieve Gaule, vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vari kufurira hama dzavo kuti dzipandukire hurumende vachidzityisidzira kuti havazotumira zvakare mari kumusha kana vakasapinda mumigwagwa. VaGaule vanoti vari kunze kwenyika vanenge vagere zvavo pamutambarakede, vachishandisa vari kumusha ava. Vamwe ndivo vari kunyora pamadandemutande vachikurudzira vari kunze kwenyika ava kuti vadzoke kumusha munguva dzekuratidzira idzodzo vachibatana navo, kwete kuita vana tinhadzirwe. Asi mumwe wevari kunze kwenyika, vari sachigaro webato reMDC mudunhu reDC-Maryland-Virginia, VaCharles Mutama, vanoti vanogona kunge vari kunzi vari kufurira vari kumusha asi chavari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika. VaMutama, avo vanove zvakare mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy, vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vanokurudzira hama neshamwari dzavo kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira senzira yekugadzirisa zvinhu.  No media source currently available

headline: ‘Mutambo waChiwandire uchiri kurongwa’
text: CHIKWATA chaKudakwashe Memory ‘Take Money’ Chiwandire chinoti chakakumbira mwedzi mumwe chete kuti chipedzise kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo wake naZulina Munoz wekurwira bhande rake reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight.   Take Money ange achifanirwa kurwa naMunoz wekuMexico nemusi weMugovera svondo rino kuHarare International Conference Centre (HICC).   Asi chikwata chake chinoti chakakumbira kuti mutambo uyu upfuudzwe kumberi kuti vawane nguva yekupedzisa kuita gadziriro dzekuuronga.   Maneja waTake Money arizve murairidzi wake, Clyde Musonda, anoti kudivi ravo, gadziriro dzekuti mutambo uyu uitwe hadzisati dzanyatsopera.   Anoti Chiwandire, uyo ange ari kuSouth Africa masvondo adarika achiita gadziriro dzake, akagadzirira kusangana naMunoz asi chakamisa kuti vaviri ava vabandane svondo rino inyaya yekuti pane zviri kuda kugadziriswa mukurongwa kwemutambo uyu.   “Kudivi redu, tange tisati tapedza kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo waTake Money naMunoz. Munoziva kuronga mutambo mukuru wakaita seuyu, panoda zvakawanda saka tichiri kuita gadziriro dzacho.   “Takakumbira mwedzi mumwe chete kuchikwata chaMunoz kuti tipedzise kuita gadziriro dzekuronga mutambo uyu nekuti pane zvakawanda zvange zvichida kugadziriswa.   “Asi tinoda kuti muzive kuti Kuda akagadzirira kurwa, iye zvake kudivi rake ange achiita gadziriro dzake dzichifamba zvakanaka,” anodaro Musonda.   Mutambo wevaviri ava, uyo wakatarisirwa zvikuru nevazhinji, ndiwo uchange uri waChiwandire wekutanga kurwira kuchengetedza bhande rake iri.   Kana akabudirira kuri chengetedza, anenge awaniswa mukana wekurwira bhande reWBC Gold iro rina Yamileth Mercado wekuMexico zvakare.   Chiwandire akahwina bhande rake reWBC Female Interim Super-bantamweight mushure mekukunda Cathrine Phiri wekuZambia mwedzi yadarika.

headline: ZCTU Inoti Mashandiro eZUPCO Ari Kuisa Vanhu Munjodzi yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti nyaya yekukundikana kuita basa kwekambani yeZUPCO kuchapa kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chipararire zvakanyanya sezvo vanhu vari kugara vakaunga vakamirira kutakurwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu havafanire kuungana vakawanda kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chotanga kupararira zvekare zvine mutsindo.Vanhu vakawandisa vanotarisirwa kuungana vanenge vari makumi matatu asi pari parufu chete. Hurumende yakabvisa makombi ose mumugwagwa ichiti vanoda kushanda vanofanira kushanda pasi pekambani yeZUPCO asi vakawanda vacho vanoti kambani iyi haibhadhare. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vemakombi vainge vokonzera njodzi mumigwagwa nekudaro vaifanira kubviswa. Mukuru wekambani yeZUPCO, Engineer Evaristo Madangwa, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti vanoda mabhazi zviuru zviviri kuti vashande zvakanaka asi ikozvino vane mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemaviri chete.Vanotiwo mwedzi uno vari kutarisira mamwe mabhazi kubva kuBelarus. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Voenda Kunobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vachibhadhara Mari
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vava kuona zviri nani kuenda kunobayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 munzvimbo dzinobhadhariswa mari sezvo vasiri kubatsirwa munzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pasina muripo. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weRujeko, VaKnowledge Matumba,vati vakandobayiwa nhomba kuchipatara chisiri chehurumende nekuti vakapedza masvondo maviri vachienda kunomira mumutstse asi vachitadza kubayiwa sezvo zvipatara zvehurumende zviri kubaya vanhu vashoma pazuva. VaMatumba vati kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende hakuna mitsetse uye vanhu vanobhadhariswa mari inosvika madhora maviri ekuAmerica iyo yakatarwa nehurumende. Mumwe mugari, VaJohanes Chihwani, avo vati vakabayiwawo kuchipatara chakazvimiririra vati kunyange kuchibhadhriswa, mari yacho ishoma uye haupedzi nguva yakareba wakamirira kubayiwa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe National Family Planning Council muMasvingo, VaHebert Chikosi, vati vanhu vazhinji vari kuuya kuzobaiwa nesangano ravo senzira yekutiza mitsetse kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira cheCIMAS, chiri kubayawo vanhu muMasvingo asi chinobaya nhengo dzacho dziri pachirongwa chekurapiwa chemedical Aid. Mumwe mushandi ataura ne Studio 7 paCIMAS aramba kudomwa nezita rake nekuti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau ati nhengo dzavo zhinji dziri kubayiwa nyore dzisingabhadariswi. Muridzi weMakurira Private Hospital, Dr Phenias Makurira, vati zvipatara zvakazvimiririra zviri kubetsera hurumende chaizvo kutapudza huwandu hwevanoda kubayiwa nhomba vachiti chipatara chavo chiri kutangawo kubaya vanhu svondo rinouya. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati hurumende inotenda kubatsirwa kwairi kuitwa nevezvipatara zvakazvimirira uye inokurudzira vanhu kuti vaende ikoko senzira yekutapudza huwandu kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuwedzera nzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pamwe nekutenga nhomba dzakawanda. Nezuro vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakafa nechirwe che Covid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanhu vafa pazviuru zvina nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri, 4 220. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 386 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere 122 288. Vanhu vabayiwa nhoba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manonwe nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 2 271 729. Vabiawa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe, 1 427 159. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weMafuta eDzimotokarei Unokwira Zvakare keChipiri Mukati meMazuva Manomwe
text: Boka re Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, razivisa kuti mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari wakwira, peturu ichikwira kuenda pamadhora manomwe nemasendi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe parita rogaroga, kuchitiwo dhiziri richikidzwa kuenda pamadhora manomwe nemasendi gumi nemapfumbamwe parita. Svondo rapera mafuta aya akakwidzwa zvakare peturu ichenda pamadhora matanhatu nemasendi gumi, ukuwo dhiziri richienda pamadhora mashanu ane masendi makumi masere nemana parita. Mutauriri wesangano revemabhazi anotakura vanhu, reChitungwiza Commuter Omnibus Operators Association, VaFarai Muza vanoti iri danho raomesera nhengo dzavo zvakanyanya sezvo dzisiri kukwanisa kuwedzera mari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu vanokwira mabhazi avo nekuda kwekuti vanhu vavanotakura havana kuwedzerwawo mihoro yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga reStandard Chartered Romisa Vamwe Vashandi Basa muZimbabwe
text: Bhanga reStandard Chartered rinoti riri kuzogumura vamwe vashandi sezvo rave kuendesa mamwe mapazi aro zvikuru anoda humhizha kuChina, India neMalaysia. Vanhu makumi maviri vakatomiswa basa pavashandi mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemana vari muZimbabwe. Bhanga iri rakatonyorera vashandi varo chiziviso richitaura nezvenyaya iyi. Mumwe mukuru muStandard Chartered Amai Lillian Hapanyengwi vaudza nhepfenyuro yeBloomberg kuti vamwe vashandi vachatatsvagirwa kumwe kwekuenda. Vanotiwo zvavari kuita zvakanangana nekuderedza mari dzavari kushandisa. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union VaPeter Mutasa vanoti vashandi vakatotanga kumiswa basa gore rapera. Vanoti vanhu ava havasi kunyatsopihwa mari yavo yemudyandigere sezvo hurumende isiri kuvapawo rutsigiro. Vati zvinhu zvinovashungurudza kuti vashandi vemuZimbabwe vari kusiiwa vachinonga svosve nemuromo nevemakambani. No media source currently available

headline: Shumba yeSenegal Ingarume Nhatu dzeEngland Here kuWorld Cup?
text: Chikwata cheSenegal chatarisana nekukunda kana kunyura apo chiri kusangana nemaThree Lions eEngland manheru ano. Chikwata ichi chirikupinda munhandare na9pm manheru mumutambo weRound of 16 chichiziva kuti Africa yese yakamirira kupemberera kurova England. Kukunda mumutambo uyu kunopinza Senegal mumakota fainari emakundano aya uyezve pedyo nekuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muma semi fainari eWorld Cup. Munyori wezvemutambo wenhabvu anogara kuEngland Admire Muhimeke anoti munyika iyi mune manyuku-nyuku anotyisa nezvemutambo uyu. Mutsigiri wenhabvu muZimbabwe VaWisdom Ncube vanotiwo varikuona Senegal ichirohwa nekuti hapana kunyatsowirirana mumatambiro munhandare pavatambi vekumasure nevepakati. Asi veruzhinji muZimbabwe kusanganisira muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaProsper Magoka vanoti Senegal icharatidza kuti ndiyo Shumba chaiyo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Friends Club VaTendai Barnes Zhakata vanoti cheSenegal chinokwanisa kubudirira Chimwe chikwata chemuAfrica, Morocco irikupinda munhandare neChipiri kusangana neSpain. Cameroon, Ghana, neTunisia dzakabuditswa munharaunda yekutanga mumakwikwi aya. Mitambo yeRound of 16 kuWorld Cup uku iri kupera neChipiri svondo rinouya. Parizvino France, Argentina neNetherlands ndidzo dzatove mukota fainari. KuEngland vatambi vari kutarisirwa vanosanganisira Harry Kane, Bukayo Saka, Marcus Rashford nevamwe. KuSenegal mutambi wavo mukuru Sadio Mane akakuvara aso kune vamwe vakaita sa Kalidou Koulibaly, Edouard Mendy, Boulaye Dia nevamwe.

headline: Hurumede Yoronga Mutemo Unoomesera Vari Kutengesa Mari paMukoto
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti mutemo uri kuda kudzikwa nehurumende kudzivirira kufambiswa kwemari zvechikiribidi kana kuti Money Laundering wakanangana nekuzadzikisa zvisungo zvemitemo yepasi rino inodzivirira mabasa evanopfurikidza mwero. VaZiyambi vanoti vatotanga kunyora bhiri remutemo uyu sezvo mutemo uri kushandiswa parizvino wakadzikwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera uchishanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu chete nekuti ndewechimbi chimbi unoitwa nemutungamiri wenyika dare reparamende risati razeya. Mutemo uyu unonzi Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Amendment of the Money Laundering and Proceeds of Crime Act and Exchange Control Act) Regulations. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo dzinotiwo hurumende inenge iri kudawo kushandisa mutemo uyu kusunga vari kuchinja mari pamukoto zvikuru dhora rekuAmerica nemaRTGS. VaZiyambi vanoti kuvhunduka chati kwatara hunge uine katuruke vakayambira vanotengesa mari pamukoto kuti vachakandwa mutirongo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vorasikirwa neMari Vachiyedza Kunotsvaga Mabasa paMuzinda weSouth-Sudan muHarare
text: Vanhu vazhinji nemusi weChipiri vakafambira dhongi rakaora kumuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe kuBelgravia mushure memashoko aifamba pamadandemutande eFacebook neWhatsApp kuti muzinda uyu wange uchizotora vanhu vanoda mabasa kuti vaende kunyika iyi. Nyika yeSouth Sudan haina kugadzikana sezvo muguta guru renyika iyi reJuba muchigara muine hondo. Vari kurwisana muSouth-Sudan ndevanotsigira mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaSalva Kiir nevaimbova mutevedzeri wavo VaRiek Machar. Vakawanda vaenda kumuzinda uyu muHarare vabva vachiridza tsamwa sezvo mashoko ekuti pange pachida kutorwa vanhu kuti vange vachipinda mabasa anzi ndeemanyepo. Asi aka handi kekutanga vanhu vachiita chipata pata chekuenda pamuzinda uyu sezvo vanamukoti vakambonyeperwa kuti kwaita mabasa muna Chikumi vakaendawo kumuzinda uyu. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kunyangwe hurumende yainge yazivisa kuti iri kushanda neSouth-Sudan kutsvagira vanhu mabasa, kusvika parizvino hapana chibvumirano chati chaitwa. Izvi zvakakonzerwawo nekuti pana vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vasina mabasa. Nyaya yekunyeperwa kwavanamukoti yakatozeyiwa mudare reparamende. Mumwe wevanhu vapumha dova vachienda kumuzinda weSouth Sudan ndiVaSamson Chitema avo vati kunyangwe kuSouth Sudan kusina kugadzikana, kuri nani pane kugara muZimbabwe. Muzvare Miriam Mugodhi avo vange vachiratidza kurwadziwa zvikuru pamwe nekushupikana vati vabva kuBulawayo chaiko. Vati vange vatofunga kuti mudzimu wavaona sezvo vaine magwaro anodiwa. . VaPeter Museve avo vakaita zvidzidzo zveMasters vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamiriro aita zvinhu munyika apa kuti vanhu vaende havo kuSouth-Sudan uko kunogara kuchirira pfuti. Studio 7 yataurawo naVaJames Mukomva avo vati havasisina tarisiro yemabasa pasi pehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Kunyangwe zvazvo nyika yeSouth-Sudan ichitevedza tsika dzechiMuslim Mukurru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Dr Pedzisai Ruhanya avvanoongorora magariro evanhu pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika vati vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vacho vanotendera muchiKristu havasisina hanya nekwavanowana mabasa. Dr Ruhanya vati kuoma kwehupenyu munyika kuri kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitsvake mabasa chero kwaamuka. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kudzika mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze nekuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo avo vati vashandi vari pamabasa paerizvino havasi kutambiriswa mari dzemihoro uye makambani akawanda ari kuramba achivharwa. Mutungamiri webato rePDP uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti vanoti zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa nehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vachitsvaga rutsigiro pasarudzo dzemuna 2013, vebato reZanu PF vakavimbisa kuti vachaumba mabasa anosvika mamiriyoni maviri. Asi kusvika pari zvino makambani ari kuramba achivharwa zvichisiya vazhinji kunyangwe vakadzidza vasina chekubata. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanoti nyaya yezvirango ndiyo iri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti VaMugabe ndivo vari kutadza kutungamira zvikuru vachitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuori. Kunyangwe zvazvo Studio 7 isina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wemuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe uyo ange asipo, pamukova wemuzinda uyu pange pakanamirwa mapepa ange achizivisa veruzhinji kuti mashoko aishambadzwa ekuti vaitora vanhu vekunoshanda kunyika yavo ange ari emanyepo. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakanyeperwa kuti kwainge kwaita mabasa kuKuwait neSaudi Arabia asi zvikazoguma zvobatwa senhapwa munyika idzi.  No media source currently available

headline: Bazi reMari Rokokera Musangano weBhajeti ra2019 kuBulawayo
text: Kutanga nemusi weChitatu matare anoti repamusoro reSenate nereHouse of Assembly achapinda mumusangano wekuzeya nyaya yebhajeti regore rinouya uchange ichikokerwa nebazi rezvemari. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa muBulawayo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, bhajeti iri igangaidzwa kumukwenyi mhezi yawawira mudumbu kugurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube. Musangano uyu uri kutanga neChitatu kusvika musi weSvondo, uye nhengo dzose dzedare reparamende dziri kutarisirwa kuti dzinge dziripo. Hurumende pari zvino iri kukwereta mari yakawandisa kuti iyedze kuzadzikisa mabasa ayo. Mari iyi iri kukweretwa munyika nekunze,uye chikwereti ichi chinonzi chava kusvika pamabhiroyoni makumi maviri emadhora. Izvi zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi zviri kupa kuti Zimbabwe ikundikane kubuda mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vanokokera Zanu-PF mudare reparamende, VaPupurai Togarepi, vanoti bato ravo rinoda kuti pazeyiwe nyaya dzekubatsira varombo kunyanya. Panyaya yekuti hurumende iri kushandisa mari yakawandisa, VaTogarepi vati chiri kuda kuitwa chete kuwedzera mari dziri kupinda muhomwe yehurumende. Asi vaive gurukota muhurumende yemubatanidzwa vachiona nezvegwara rehupfumi vari nhengo yeMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vanoti havaone paine chinobuda pabhajeti iri. Masangano evarairidzi anoti ari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mari ichishandisa madhora ekuAmerica sezvo mari yemaRTGS isisina simba. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa nyaya dzehutano. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanotiwo hurumende inofanira kudzikisa mari yairi kushandisa. Vatiwo panofanira kujekeswa kuti VaNcube vachabhadhara sei zvikwereti zvehurumende. Bhajeti iri riri kutarisirwa kuparuwa mwedzi uno ndiro rekutanga richaparurwa naVaNcube uye rakatarisirwa nevanhu vakawanda. VaNcube vakatozivisa kare kuti vanoda kuderedza mari iri kushandiswa nehurumende uye kugumura vamwe vashandi vehurumende basa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Haisi Kubuda Pachena paNyaya yeKutumira Mauto kuSADC
text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Development Community, SADC, ratadza kupinza masoja muMozambique nenguva yarakanga ratara kuti masoja emubatanidzwa uyu ange apinda muMozambique zvichitevera kusagadzikana kuri munyika iyi uko kuri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero. Izvi zvaifanirwa kunge vakatanga nezuro, Chikunguru 15, 2021. Zimbabwe haisi kuda kubuda pachena kuti hurongwa hwayo hwakamira sei panyaya yekuendesa mauto ayo kuMozambique kti anobatsirana nemamwe mauto emunyika dziri muSADC kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado kuMozambique uko kwafiwa nevanhu vakawanda. Studio 7 yave nemazuva maviri ichiedza kunzwa kugurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppa Muchinguri Kashiri, avo vari kuramba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muSADC zvichitevera mashoko aburitswa neMalawi ichiti yatadza kutumira mauto ayo sezvo yabviswa neSADC pamwe nehurumende yeMozambique, panyika dziri kufanirwa kutumira mauto adzo kuMozambique. Zvinonziwo pane kunetsana kuri muSADC zvichitevera danho rakatorwa neRwanda rekutumira mauto ayo chiuru chimwe chete kuMozambique. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirwa kweSouth Africa, Amai Nosizive Nqakula, vati chiri kunetsa kuti SADC itumire mauto kuMozambique inyaya yekuti mutungamirin weMozambique, Va PhillipeNyusi, havasati vasaina gwaro reSADC zvir pamutemo kuitira kuti ibvumidzwe kupinzwa mauto ayo muMozambique. Munyori anoona nezvinoitika kunze kwenyika muMDC Alliance, Muzvare Gladys Hlatshwayo, vati hurumende inofanira kubuda pachena nehurongwa uhwu kunyange hazvo bato ravo riri kutsigira kuti mauto eZimbabwe aende kunobatsira kuMozambique ari pasi peSADC. Asi imwe nhengo yeMDCT inomirira Hatfield muparemende, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vati hurumende inofanira kupihwa nguva yakafanira kuitira kuti masoja eZimbabwe asazononhonga svosve nemuromo kuCalabo Delgado. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati sangano ravo harisi kufara kuti vanhu vari kuramba vachifa kuMozambique iyo SADC ichiramba yakapeta maoko isiri kuendesa mauto kunobatsira Mozambique kurwisa vanopfurikidza mwero. Mibvunzo yatatumirawo munyori weSADC, Doctor Stergomena Lawrence Tax, yanga isati yapindurwa pataenda pamhepo kunyange hazvo vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko musangano iri, Amai Barbara Lope, vange vavimbisawo kuti vachatiudza pamire sangano reSADC panyaya iyi. SADC inoti iri kushushikana zvikuru nekusagadzikana kuri mudunhu reCabo Delgado kuMozambique uko kuri kukonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti vanhu vanodarika mazana masere ezviuru vakatiza misha yavo mudunhu reCabo Delagado, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vava mumhirizhonga iri kuitika mudunhu iri kubva muna 2017 payatanga. No media source currently available

headline: VaZelenskyy Voshanyira America Nhasi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy vari kutarisirwa kushanyira America nhasi vachiita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika iyi VaJoe Biden. VaZelenskyy vari kutarisirwawo kutaura pamberi pematare eSenate neHouse of Representatives akabatana. Aka ndekekutanga Zelenskyy vachibuda munyika mavo kubva muna Kukadzi pakatanga kurwiswa nyika yavo neRussia. VaZelenskyy vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti vari munzira kuenda kuWashington DC. Mumwe mukuru muhurumende yeAmerica ati VaZelenskyy vakakokwa naVaBiden kuti vaite musangano navo, nezvipangamazano zvavo munyaya dzekudzivirirwa kwenyika uye dare remakurukota. Nemusi weChipiri vasati vasimuka kuuya kuAmerica, Zelenskyy vakaenda kuBakhmut iko kunzoni kune kurwisana kunotyisa pakati pemauto avo neRussia. Vakuru muhurumende yeAmerica vanoti VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa kuti vachapa Ukraine zvombo zvekuzvidzivirira nemuchadenga kana kuti "Patriot missile batteries." Mutauriri wehurumende yeRussia VaDmitry Peskov vaudza vatori venhau muRussia kuti kupa Ukraine zvombo iyi kuchapa kuti kupedza hondo kunetse.

headline: VaBarack Obama Voita Nhoroondo neKushanyira Cuba
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica VaBarack Obama nemusi weMuvhuro vakaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyioka yeCuba VaRaul Castro vachitaura nezvekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Rwendo rwaVaObama urwu ndirwo rwekutanga rwemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica mukati memakore makumi mapfumbamwe. America yainge yakatemera Cuba zvirango zvehupfumi kwemakore makumi mashanu nemashanu izvo zvotanga kurerutswa nehurumende yaVaObama. Vachitaura muguta guru reCuba reHavana, mushure memusangano naVaCastro, VaObama vati vari kufara zvikuru nenhaurirano dzoitika pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Asi vatenda kuti pachine kusawirirana panyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere nekodzero dzevanhu. VaCastro vatambira nemufaro danho ratorwa nehurumende yeAmerica yekurerutsa zvinhu panyaya dzekutengeserana. Vatiwo America inofanora kudzora nzvimbo yeGuantanamo Bay iyo inochengeterwa vanopfurikidza mwero neAmerica. VaObama vakatanga vaenda kunoisa maruva pachiumbwa chinorangarira gamba rerusununguko muCuba VaJose Marti pa Plaa of the Revolution. VaObama vakarumbidza zvikuru VaJose Marti nekuzvipira kwavo kusunungura nyika yavo. Murwendo urwu, VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano nevanhu vakawanda muCuba kusanganisa vakuru muhurumende, vechidiki, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu nevamwe. Asi nemusi weSvondo vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu veLadies in White vakasungwa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira pedyo neParqu Gandhi kana kuti Gandhi Park. Vamwe vavo vanonzi vakazosunungurwa asi mutunganiri wesangano iri Amai Berta Soler vanoti vamwe havasi kuzivikanwa kuti varipi. Gweta Doctor Alex Magaisa vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisawo kugadzirisa hukama hwayo neAmerica asi zvinoda kuti vatungamiri venyika vazvipire kuvandudza mashandiro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Mari yeMudyandigere yeNSSA Yowedzerwa Kusvika paMadhora Makumi Matatu ekuAmerica
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti kutanga mwedzi uno mari dziri kutambirwa nevari pamudyandigere dziri kuwedzerwa kusvika pamadhora makumi matatu ekuAmerica kana kuti US$30. VaMavima vati hurumende ine chido chekuti vari pamudyandigere vatambire mari inosvika makumi matanhatu emadhora kana kuti US$60 inokurudzirwa nesangano reInternational Labour Organization mukupera kwegore. No media source currently available Mari iri kuwedzerwa inenge ichipihwa vari pamudyandigere vaibhadhara mari kuNational Social Security Authority kana kuti NSSA nemadhora emunyika ichienzaniswa neyepamusika wemari weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe kana kuti RBZ foreign currency auction. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano reAssociation of National Social Security Retirees VaGideon Shoko vanoti mari iri kutambirwa iyi haikwane sezvo iri pasi zvakanyanya pamari yekuti mhuri irarame. Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency inoti mhuri ine vanhu vashanu inoda mari inodarika zviuru makumi maviri nemasere pamwedzi kana kuti ZW$28, 000. No media source currently available

headline: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, Vanosangana naVaChamisa
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vasangana nemumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vakakurukura zvinhu zvakati wandeyi. Vaviri ava vakurukura nezvesarudzo dzichangobva kuitwa, nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vanoti VaChamisa vafadzwa zvikuru nemukana uyu sezvo vakwanisa kukurukura nezviri kuitika muZimbabwe. Musangano uyu unouya mushure mekunge VaNichols vasangana neChitatu nemutungamiri wenyika uye vakamirira Zanu PFmusarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachizeyawo mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. VaChamisa vari kupikisa kukunda kwaVaMnangagwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, uye dare repamusorosoro riri kutarisirwa kunzwa nyaya yavo musi wa 22 Nyamavhuvhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vakaramwa Mabasa Vobatirwa Mari neHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, rinoti ranyorera tsamba kudare remakurukota richinyunyuta nekubatirwa mari kwaitwa nhengo dzesangano iri. No media source currently available Sangano iri rinoti ranyorerawo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nehutungamiri mubazi rezvehutano richida kuti patorwe matanho echimbichimbi zvichitevera kubatwa kwemari dzavana chiremba vanonzi vakapinda mukuramwa mabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti vanyorerawo zvakare kudare redzimhosva repamusoro vachida kuti rinzwe nyaya yavo yekubatwa kwemari dzemihoro iyi nechimbichimbi. VaNyamande vanoti danho iri richatoita kuti vanachiremba vatadze kuenda kumabasa sezvo vazotambiriswa mari shoma shoma kwazvo. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rino kuti yaizobata mari inoita $264.48 kwemwedzi miviri kuna vanachiremba vakapinda mukuramwa mabasa kwemasvondo matatu. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr Paul Chimedza, vakaudza Studio7 kuti zviri pamutemo kuti munhu anenge aramwa basa haafanirwe kutambiriswa mari yemazuva aanga asiri pabasa. Kuratidzira kwakaitwa navana chiremba kwakavhiringidza kufamba kwemabasa muzvipatara zvehurumende. Dr Nyamande vanoti vaziva nezvekubatirwa mari idzi pavaenda kumabhanga kwavo.

headline: Hama dzaVaLavender Chiwaya Dzinoti Mapurisa Adzirambira Mutumbi weMufi
text:
Paita makakatanwa akaipa pakati pemapurisa nemhuri yenhengo yeMDC Alliance, VaLavender Chiwaya, avo vakawanikwa vakafa neChishanu mangwanani. Makakatanwa aya atanga zvichitevera kutadza kuitwa ongororo yekuti chakakonzera kufa kwaVaChiwaya chii, kana kuti post-mortem neMugovera pachipatara chemuKaroi. Mushure mekutadza kuuya kwachiremba anoongorora mitumbi yevanhu vanenge vafa nedonzvo rekuona chinenge chauraya munhu, pazorongwa kuti mutumbi uyende kuHarare asi pashaikwa motokari inotakura chitunha. Hama dzemufi dzabva dzati zviri nani dzivige hama yadzo, asi mapurisa aramba kutambira izvi achiti ari kutevedza mutemo unobata mavigirwo anoitwa munhu anenge achifungidzirwa kuti akapondwa. Mutauriri wemhuri uye vari mukoma wemufi, VaJohannes Chiwaya, vati
havasi kufara nekurambirwa nemutumbi kuri kuitwa nemapurisa vachiti hapana chichashanduka.

VaChiwaya vati varombo zvekuti havana mari yekutenga zvekudya kana
rufu rwukatora nguva yakareba, uye munguva ino yeCovid-19, vanhu havafanirwe kuungana kwenguva yakareba. Asi mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaIan Kohwera,
vati mapurisa ane kodzero yekuti ongororo iyitwe zvichienderana
nemafiro anenge aita munhu. Danho ratorwa nemapurisa rasiya vanhu vakapatsanurana vamwe vachiti
vanotsigira danho remapurisa kuitira kuti pabude chokwadi kuitira kuti vanhu vasapumhana uroyi sezviri kuitika, asi vamwe vachiti mufi akaurayiwa nekuda kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye hapana chazvinobatsira kumirira ongororo yachiremba. VaChiwaya, avo vanga vari sachigaro weMDC Alliance we Ward 4 muHurungwe, uye vari kanzura, vakawanikwa vakafa neChishanu mangwanani pedyo nepamba pavo muKaroi mudunhu reMashonaland West. Matauriri wemapurisa munyika, VaPaul Nyati, vazivisa kuti mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi, uye ane ruzivo rwezvakaitika manheru eChina apo VaChiwaya vanonzi vakatenga chibage chakagochwa pamwe nezvinodhaka vachibva vaoneka shamwari dzavo vachiti vava kuenda kumba. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Vave Kufa neNzara Vari Mudzimba
text:
Vanhu mudunhu reMashonaland West vane maonero akasiyana zvikuru padanho rehurumende rekuti vagare mudzimba kwemamwe mavhiki maviri senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus. Amai Judith Chikwari avo vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa mbatya vanoti vave kufanenzara mudzimba sezvo vasiri kutengesa kuti vawane zvekudya.

Amai Chikwari vanoti VaMnangagwa vangadai varerutsa nguva dzekuvhura kuti vatenge zvinogona kupa kuti vatenge zvekudya.

Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaTavengwa Kamuchokoto vekuKadoma avo vasingaone vanorarama nekupemha vanoti rwendo rwuno Mwari avaseke sezvo vari kutadza kuwana ruyamuro kunyange kubva kubazi reSocial Welfare. Asi gurukota rinona nezvemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende iri kupa vanhu mazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi kuti vabatsirikane mari inonzi nevamwe ishoma zvikuru. No media source currently available Sachigaro weboka revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe-PTUZ- mudunhu reMashonaland West VaWeston Mutapa vanoti vatambira kuwedzerwa kwemazuva nemufaro sezvo hupenyu hwevadzidzisi nevadzidzi hwanga huri parumananzombe dai vadzokera kuzvikoro
parizvino. VaMutapa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora nguva yavawedzera kuvharwa kwenyika kugadzirira vadzidzisi kuti vawane zvipfeko nemishonga yekuderedza hutachiona hwecoronavirus kana vave kudzokera kumabasa.

Munyori mukuru muboka guru rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union-ZCTU- VaJaphet Moyo vanoti vafarawo dedanho ratorwa naVaMnangagwa sezvo hupenyu hwevanhu hwakakosha kudarika hupfumi vachiti kana munhu afa hapasisina zvekuita.

Asi VaMoyo vanoti havasi kufara nemari inoita madhora mazana maviri ari kupihwa pamunhu kuti vanhu abastirikane nebazi rezvemagariro evanhu panguva iyo nyika inenge yakavharwa vachiti ishoma zvikuru.

Mumiriri weNorton muparamende VaTemba Mliswa vanoti pamusoro pekuwedzera mazuva ekuvhara nyika mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanofanirwa kuona kuti motokari dzose dzinotakura zvinhu kunze kwenyika dzichipfuura nemuno munyika dzimbomira. Vatiwo vashandi vakaita sanamukoti nemapurisa vanoshanda vachisangana nevanhu vangangodaro vaine chirwere cheCoronavirus havafanirwe kushanda vachibva kumba asi kuti vatsvagirwe nzvimbo dzekugara.

VaMnangagwa vakawedzera mazuva nyika yakavharwa kusvika musi wa3 Chivabvu nekuda kwekuti nyika haisati yazadzisa zvinokurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano muUnited Nations reWorld Health Organisations kana kuti WHO-kuti nyika ivhurwe vachiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Boika onanga Germany
text: MUTAMBI wetsiva ane mukurumbira, Brendon ‘Boika’ Denes, ari mushishi kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kuGermany uko ari kutarisirwa kusangana naLaszlo Toti chizvarwa chekuHungary.   Boika, uyo ari kubatsirwa gadziriro dzake naClyde Musonda weDeltaforce Boxing Promotions, anoti uyu mukana mukuru waapihwa wekuramba achisimukira mumutambo wetsiva. Boika mitambo yake inorongwa nesangano reLionheart Boxing Promotions iyo inotungamirirwa naEdward Mendy anove chizvarwa chekuAmerica uye achatatsurana naToti musi wa30 Kubvumbi.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku nemukana uyu wandapihwa wekuti ndiende kuGermany kunosangana naToti. Uyu mutambo mukuru kwandiri uye ndiri kushanda nesimba kuti ndigouhwina sezvo shuviro yangu kuti ndirambe ndichisimukira mumutambo wetsiva.   “Saka ndiri kushanda nesimba ndichibatsirwa mugadziriro dzangu naClyde Musonda uye neveCharles Manyuchi Academy,” anodaro.   Musonda anoti Boika mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira uye vane chipo saka anovimba kuti achanokunda mumutambo wake.   “Boika mutambi akazvibata anoziva zvaanoita saka ndinofara zvikuru kumubatsira mukugadzirira mutambo wake waakatarisana nawo.   “Ari kugadzirira mutambo wake ari mumaoko angu uye ini ndinofara chaizvo kumubatsira nekuti akanohwina senyika tinenge tahwinawo,” anodaro Musonda.   Boika anonyanyokuzivikanwa zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita mabhande eWBF intercontinental super lightweight mugore ra2019 uye akazohwina zvekare bhande reWBC Africa welterweight title gore radarika.

headline: France Yowana Imwe Mhando yeCovid-19 Asi WHO Ichiti Vanhu Vasanyanye Kutya Havo
text: France inoti yakawana imwe mhando itsva yeCovid-19 inonzi IHU iyo ichiri kuongororwa hayo kuti inokonzera hurwere hwakaita sei navanamazvikokota munya dzezvirwere. Mhando yeIHU iyi inonzi yakawanikwa mune munhu ainge ashanyira nyika yeCameroon. Pari zvino, vatambi venhabvu vemunyika nevamwe vemuAfrica vari kuCameroon kumakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup. Asi vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeBloomberg nevamwe vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri, vanoona nezvezvirwere zvitsva musangano reWorld Health Organization, VaAbdi Mahamud, vanoti mhando itsva yeIHU iyi haisi hayo kunyanya kuvavhundutsa sezvo isiri kupararira zvakanyanya kubva zvayakatanga kuonekwa uye vave nenguva vachiiongorora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Saungweme, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of North Georgia muno muAmerica, vari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo chirwere ichi chiri kuramba chichiuya nedzimwe mhando. Muzvinafundo Sangweme vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirwere zvemavirus zvakaita seCovid-19 zvinoramba zvichiuya nedzimwe mhando. dzimwe mhando itsva dzinogona kuuraya vanhu, asi dzimwe dzinenge dzisina simba rakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nevasere. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumu mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete kana kuti 1 591 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Izvi zvakasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri negumi nezvinomwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 217 678. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nemakumi mana nechimwe zvine zana nemakumi mashanu nevasere, kana kuti 4 141 158. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine makumi mashanu nevasere ,kana kuti 3 153 058.
