Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu zvikuru vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakwegura nevari munjodzi yekurawara zvakaipisisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvinomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 7 254. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Basketball yogeda-geda
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chebasketball cheJBC Basketball Club — Addison Chiware — anoti vatambi vakawanda vemutambo uyu vanoda kuziva remangwana ravo zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chiware, uyo akamborairidza chikwata chenyika chebasketball, anoti Covid-19 yakavhiringidza zvakawanda mumutambo uyu zvekuti havachazive kuti vodii kuti udzoswe.   “Vatambi vedu vazhinji vave nemibvunzo yakawanda zvikuru, vanoda kuziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei uye zvichafambiswa sei kuti mutambo uyu udzoswe.   “Vatambi vaitoraramiswa nemutambo uyu uye vamwe vaitoushandisa kuti vagokwanisa kuwana mikana yekuenda kunze kwenyika saka kana usingatambwe mukana wekutengwa nezvikwata zvekunze hapatorina.   “Covid-19 iyi yavhiringa zvakawanda. Saka isu tave kungomirira kuti zvinhu zvinake chete.   “Ndiyo nzira yega inoita kuti zvitifambire uye mutambo uyu udzoke pasina chinokanganisa,” anodaro Chiware.   Gore radarika rave kunopera, zvikwata zvebasketball zvakasiyana zvakange zvave kutanga kuita gadziriro paine tarisiro yekuti mutambo uyu waigona kuzodzoswa asi zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwekunyuka zvakare kweCovid-19.   “Pane patakambotanga kugadzirira tikafunga kuti zvave kuendeka manje asi takabva tadzoserwa shure neCovid-19 yakatanga kunyuka zvekare.   “Izvezvi kana mutambo uyu ukanzi wadzoka zvichatitorera nguva sezvo vatambi vave nenguva huru vasingatambe,” anodaro Chiware.

headline: Dunhu reGauteng Roronga Kudzika Mitemo Inosarura Vabvakure
text: Mukuru wedunhu reGauteng muJohannesburg, VaDavid Makhura, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti nekufamba kwenguva, dunhu ravo richadzika mutemo unorambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kutanga mabhizimisi mudunhu ravo, sezvo izvi zviri kutadzisa zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa, kuti zviwanewo chekubata. VaMakhura vakataura mashoko aya mudare ravo redunhu, apo vakange vachipindura mibvunzo yaibva kune dzimwe nhengo dzedare ravo. Vanoona nezvekodzero dzavanhu vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaMakhura anokonzeresa kuti pave neruvengo pakati pevanobva kunze kwenyika nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muSouth Africa neZimbabwe, VaBrighton Sangore, vanoti mashoko akadai anobata zvizvarwa zvisiri zvemuSouth Africa, agara achitaurwa kwenguva yakareba muSouth Africa. Sachigaro weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko akadai haafanirwe kunge achibva pamuromo pemunhu anonyarikana saVaMakhura. VaMavhinga vanoti mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora kodzero dzevanhu uye handicho chaive chido chevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanotiwo mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora mitemo yenyika, iyo isina rusarura pakuvambwa kwemabhizinesi. VaShumba vanoti kana vekunze vachivhura mabhizimusi muSouth Africa, vanenge vachibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika iyi. VaShumba vanoti VaMakhura vanofanirwa kukumbira ruregerero kuzvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa. VaShumba vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kuita hurukuro nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana, senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa. Mashoko aVaMakhura anouya mushure mokunge zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvapazwa nekupiswa, ukuwo vatyairi vemagonyeti vachimbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo, vamwe vachimanikidzwa kusiya basa nesangano rinozviti All Truck Drivers Foundation. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vafa mumhirizhonga yemuSouth Africa kubva muna Kurume gore rapera, vazhinji vavo vari vatyairi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vofa neCovid-19 Hurumende Ichikurudzirwa Kutevedzera Zvainotaura paNyaya yeKudzivirira Chirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu gumi nevanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemakamumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 090. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 345 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zana rezviuru negumi nepfumbamwe nemazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 119, 853. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 581 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu zvine mazana manomwe negumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 96, 716. Vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 036, 299 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nechimwe kana kuti 1, 198, 381 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kechipiri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti chirwere ichi hachichanyanye kupararira zvakanyanya munzvimbo dzange dzichinzi dziri munjodzi huru richiti izvi zvakakonzerwa nedzidziso iri kupihwa nezvechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera vakawedzera nguva yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemamwe mavhiki maviri vachiti kunyangwe huwandu hwevari kyabtwa nechirwere ichi have kudzikira, huwandu hwevari kufa huchiri hwakawandisa pane zvinotarisirwa. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, munyori anoona nezvehutano mubato reMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti zvekungoti vanhu vagare mudzimba asi vamwe vachienderera mberi vachiunganidza vanhu vachiita zvematongerwo enyika hazvibatsire. Mamwe madzishe nebato reZanu-PF nevamwe vari mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari muPolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti POLAD vari kuenderera mberi nekuita misangano kunyangwe veMDC Alliance nevamwe vasiri mugungano iri vari kurambidzwa kuita misangano yavo nemapurisa achiti ari kuda kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa eKanzuru yeHarare Anotadza Kubvisa Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa
text: Mapurisa ekanzuru amboedza neChipiri kubvisa nechisimba vanotengesera mumigwagwa asi zvakundikana sezvo vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava varamba vakatsika madziro vachiti havana kwavanoenda. No media source currently available Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava re Zimbabwe Informal Sector Organization, ZISO, Va Promise Mkwananzi, vati mapurisa ekanzuru asvika panga pachitengesera vanhu ava paCopa Cabana mu Harare vakaedza kuda kubvisa nechisimba vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru kuitira kuti vanotengesera vari kunzvimbo idzi. Va Mkwananzi vati havasi kuzobvuma kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vabviswe pasina hurongwa hwakati tsvikiti. Vati kanzuru pamwe chete nehurumende vanofanira kuwona kuti vagadzira nzvimbo dzekutengesera dzakanaka uye kuwona zvakare kuti nyaya yekushayikwa kwemabasa yagadziriswa. Mushure mekutadza kubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa, vashandi vekanzuru vazoswera vave kufamba nemotokari vachishevedzera vachikurudzira kuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vakanyoresa muchirongwa chiri kuitwa nekanzuru chekunyoresa vanhu vese vanotengesera mumigwagwa vachitanga kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru kuitira kuti vashande vari kwadziri. Asi vazhinji vevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vanoti havasi kuda kuenda kunzvimbo idzi vachiti hakuna vanhu vanouyako vachitenga uye vanoti nzvimbo idzi hadzina kugadzirwa zvakakwana. Zvichakadai, meya wekanzuru ye Harare, Va Benard Manyenyeni, vati kana vanhu vachibviswa munzvimbo dzavanotengesera vanofanira kubviswa zvine mwero. Pane imwewo nyaya ine chekuita nemafambisirwo ebasa mukanzuru ye Harare, Va Manyenyeni vaudza vatori venhau kuti munyori mukanzuru yavo, Va Tendai Mahachi, avo vakambomiswa basa kuti kanzuru imbovaferefeta, vanofanira kuwunza magwaro anoratidza kuti vakadzoka seyi kubasa mazuva maviri asati adarika. Va Manyennyeni vaudza vatori venhau pa Town House kuti vachasvitsa nyaya yaVa Mahachi kugurukota idzva rrinowona nezvematunhu, Va Saviour Kasukuwere, zvichitevera kudzoka kwakaita Va Mahachi nezuro kubasa kunyange hazvo vakambomiswa basa nekanzuru yavo. Va Kasukuwere vati havasati vaziva mamiriro akaita zvinhu mukanzuru ye Harare sezvo vakatanga basa mubazi iri nezuro.

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzezveHutano Dzotyira Kupararira kweChimbwamupengo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti dziri kutyira zvikuru kuti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chichapararira zvakanyanya zvikuru sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kurumwa nembwa dzisina kubaiwa jekiseni rinodzivirira chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanonzi vari kurumwa svondo rega rega nembwa dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chechimbwamupengo, izvo zvava kutyirwa kuti dambudziko rechirwere ichi, rinogona kuvhiringa hutano hwemunhu vakawanda vanenge varumwa. Imbwa dziri kuruma vanhu idzi dzinonzi dzinenge dzisina kuchengetedzwa mudzimba, zvinopa kuti dziswere dzichizvifambira muguta reHarare. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti kana munhu arumwa nembwa, anofanira kuona muridzi wembwa yamuruma kuitira kuti azive kana yakabaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chinonetsa kurapa zvokuti murwere akanonokerwa kurapwa, anoguma ave kuhukura sembwa kusvikira azofa nokuti anenge anonokerwa kurapwa. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti munhu anofanira kuenda kuchipatara mukati memazuva matatu kubva paanenge arumwa nembwa kuitira kuti majekiseni aanozobaiwa akwanise kushanda kuuraya huturu hwechimbwamupengo. Nyanzvi yezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rehutano, Dr. Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanorumwa nembwa uye zhinji dzacho dzinenge dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Manangazira vanoti pasi rose hakuna munhu akararama mushure mokunge arumwa nembwa ine chimbwamupengo. Sekuru Kamwelo Banda veku Cranborne vanoti zvinoshamisa kuona vanhu vanogara nembwa dzinodarika gumi padzimba dzavo zvinova zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe pamutemo weHarare City Council. Dr. Manangazira vanoti mutemo wePublic Health Act unoraira maguta ose kuti vatevedzere zvakatarwa maererano nehuhwandu hwembwa hunofanirwa kuchengetwa paimba yoga yoga vakati asi mutemo uyu hausi kutevedzerwa. Dr. Manangazira vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere vakarumwa nembwa gore rakapfuura munyika zvikaonekwa kuti chikamu chikuru chembwa idzi dzaiva dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Studio 7 yakaedza kunzwa kubva kumutauriri weHarare, VaMichael Chideme, kuti sei kanzuru yavo isiri kutevedzera mitemo inovasungira kuona kuti imbwa dzemuguta dzabaiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete, asi havana kuda kutaura nezvazvo. Asi VaChideme vanoti munhu wese anosungirwa kuchengetera imbwa dzake pamba pakakomberedzwa nemudhuri uye paine ghedhe rinovharwa kuitira kuti dzisaruma vanhu vanenge vachizvifambira. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yembwa dziri kungomhanya mhanya munzvimbo dzakawanda dzisina muridzi wadzo. Mumwe mushandi wekuZimbabwe Society for The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, uyo akaramba kudomwa nezita rake, sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau, anoti vanhu vazhinji vari kutadza kuchengeta imbwa dzavo nepamusana pekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available

headline: Ndichiri kuzvinzwa: Duduza ‘. . . makore handiwo anotamba nhabvu’
text: KAPUTENI weDynamos FC – Edward “Duduza” Sadomba – anoti makore handiwo anotamba nhabvu uye mwaka uno anoda kurakidza nyika yose kuti tarenda richirimo maari.   Duduza – uyo ane makore 35 okuberekwa – akakatyamadza vatsigiri venhabvu apo akazivisa kuti ave kudzoka kuzotambira DeMbare mushure mekunge apedza makore anodarika 10 achitamba bhora kunyika dzakasiyana dzinosanganisira Mozambique, Sudan, United Arab Emirates neLibya uko akakwanisa kuwana ruzivo rwakadzama rwemutambo uyu.   Achitaura neKwayedza pamusoro pekudzoka kwake kuDeMbare svondo rino, Duduza anoti makore handiwo  anotamba nhabvu.   Anoti mukana waakapihwa kuDynamos achaushandisa kurakidza vatsigiri venhabvu zvaaiita makore ese achitambira kunze kwenyika.   “Nhabvu haitambwe nemakore, tarisai vatambi vakaita saGianluigi Buffon weItaly ane makore 41 ekuberekwa asi nanhasi achiri kudhonza chete. Ini ndichiri kunzwa sekamwana kadiki uye ndiri kunzwa kuti zvichirimo.   “Zvinongodiwa kugona kuzvibata zvakanaka chete,” anodaro.   Chero zvazvo vatambi venhabvu makore ano kana vave nemakore 35 ekuberekwa vanenge vave kutarisirwa kunzi ndiyo nguva yavanosendeka shangu dzangu dzavo, Duduza anoti makumbo ake haasati aneta uye haazive kuti achazorega rinhi kutamba mutambo uyu.   “Chokwadi ndechekuti muviri wangu hausati waneta uye ndikatamba zvakanaka mwaka uno ndinofunga kuti ndinogona kuramba ndichidhonza kwemakore akawanda.   “Chikuru ndechekuti ndigadzirire zvakasimba kuti varairidzi vangu vandipe mukana wekuramba ndichitamba masvondo ese,” anodaro.   Svondo radarika, Duduza akarakidza kuti zvekutamba nhabvu hazvisati zvapera apo akanwisa mumutambo weCharity Challenge Cup pakati peDynamos neCAPS UNITED wakatambirwa kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium. Mumutambo uyu, DeMbare yakahwinha 2-0.   Akapedza mutambo wose achitemesa musoro vatambi veKepekepe izvo zvakarumbidzwa nevatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu vaimuona kekutanga achitambira DeMbare zvichitevera kudzoka kwaaita.   Duduza – uyo aive kuNorth Africa uko aitambira nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira Al Hilal, Al Ahly nezvimwe –  anoti anoda kusimudzira vechidiki kuti vagosvika padanho raakasvika uye vagorarama hupenyu hwaari kurarama kuburikidza nenhabvu.   “Chandakaona mukufamba kwangu kwese kwandakaita nenhabvu ndechekuti kunze uko vanokoshesa mutambo uyu uye vanokoshesa basa ravo. Kana nguva yenhabvu yasvika vanoita zvenhabvu zvavanenge vachibhadharirwa kunzi vaite, havaite zvekutamba vanoita basa nemazvo.   “Ndinoda kupa ruzivo urwu kuvanin’ina vangu kuDynamos kuti vazive kuti kana vachida kusvika padanho randasvika vanotofanirwa kuzvishandira uye vashande nesimba,” anodaro.   Panguva yaaive kunze kwenyika, Duduza akambowana mukana wekutambira chikwata chemaWarriors asi haana kuzokwanisa kuenda kumitambo mikuru yakaita seAfrica Cup of Nations.   Anoti kudzoka kwake kuDynamos achashanda nesimba uye orakidza murairidzi wemaWarriors – Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa – kuti chipo chichiripo kuti agoshevedzwa muchikwata chichaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt.   Duduza ari kuedza kutevera matsimba evatambi vakaita saRoger Milla wekuCameroon uyo akanomirira nyika yake kumutambo weFIFA World Cup 1994 ave nemakore 42 ekuberekwa uye naEl Hadary wekuEgypt akakwanisawo kutambira nyika yake kumutambo we2018 World Cup kuRussia ane makore 45 ekuberekwa.   “Hapana mutambi wenhabvu asingade kumirira nyika yake, ini mukana uyu ukauya ndigafare chaizvo.   “Kana tikabudirira kuenda kumutambo weAfcon, ndingafare chaizvo kana ndikapihwa mukana naMhofu wekumirira nyika yangu,” anodaro Duduza.

headline: Vanhu Vana Vofa Asi Bazi rezveHutano Rinoti Zvinhu Zvave Kuita Zviri Nani
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri kana kuti 5 292. Vanhu mazana maviri negumi nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave mazana maviri ezviuru nemakumi maviri nemasere ane zana nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 228 179. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agness Mahomva vanoti vari kufara kuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kuramba huchidzikira. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 4 239 261 vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemanomwe ane mazanamaviri nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 3 267 253. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu sezvave kukurudzirwa vave zviuru zvina nechimwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 41 986.

headline: ‘Squad yakanaka asi. . .’
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa dzichitambira maWarriors pamwe nevaongorori vemutambo uyu vanoti chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa icho chakasarudzwa kuti chinomirira nyika kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations chakanaka kunyangwe zvazvo vamwe vatambi vakaita saWillard Katsande naCosta Nhamoinesu vaifanira kuvewo muchikwata ichi.   Svondo rino, Mhofu akadoma vatambi 34 avo vachapinda mukembi umo vachatanga gadziriro dzekuenda kumakwishu aya. Mutambo uyu uri kutanga nemusi wa11 Chikumi apo Zimbabwe ichatamba neEgypt, kuCairo.   Lazarus Muhoni – uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chakaendesa maWarriors kumakwishu ekutanga eAFCON mugore ra2004 kuTunisia – anoti chikwata ichi chakanakisa zvikuru asi Mhofu angadai akashevedzawo Katsande sezvo ruzivo rwake rwenhabvu rwaizobatsira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   Katsande ndiye aive kaputeni wemaWarriors kuAFCON yakaitirwa kuGabon uye kugumurwa kwakaita chikwata ichi akabva asendeka shangu dzake achiti anoda kupa vechidiki mukana wekuti vatambewo. Asi pakurwira kuenda kumakwishu egore rino, akamboshevedzwa kamwechete naChidzambwa apo maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Muhoni anoti Katsande aigona kushanda basa guru pakumaka Mohamed Salah weEgypt zvekuti aimushaisa mukana wekuita zvidobi-dobi zvake apo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasangana.   “Willard Katsande ange achidiwa muchikwata ichi nekuti ndiye ega kubva muZimbabwe akasimba bhonzo uye ane ruzivo rwemutambo uyu sezvo akamboenda kuAFCON kare. Mwedzi yadarika, ange achitamba zvinonwisa mvura kuKaizer Chiefs kwake kuSouth Africa saka anokodzera kuve ari muchikwata ichi. Apa tichitarisa mitambo hedu, haina kuchipa nekuti tiri kusangana neshasha chaidzo dzakaita saMohamed Salah. Katsande ndipo paaigona kushanda basa guru kumunyararidza nekuti Katsande haakusiye uchienda,” anodaro.   Anoti vamwe vatambi vari muchikwata ichi vakaita saThabani Kamusoko naDanny Phiri – avo vakasarudzwa kuti vatambe pachinzvimbo chaKatsande – vanogona kubata basa sebasa.   “Asi tichitarisa hedu vamwe vatambi varimo vanofadza zvavo vakaita saThabani Kamusoko uyo ari kutambira kuDRC kana Danny Phiri. Kamusoko ini ndinomufarira, kuDRC ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye muviri wake mukuru ndewenhabvu chaiwo. Zvikwata zvatinenge tichisangana nazvo zvine vatambi vakuru saka tinofanirwawo kuita vedu vakakura kuti zvitibatsire pakuhwina mabhora,” anodaro Muhoni.   Shasha yekuongorora nhabvu Charles “CNN” Mabika anorumbidza chikwata ichi achiti chakagona kubatanidzwa sezvo chiine vechidiki pamwe nevamwe vave nenguva ndefu vachitamba.   Asi, anoti Mhofu angadai akashevedza Nhamoinesu anove mumwe wevatambi vemaWarriors vakuru vane ruzivo rwakanyanya rwenhabvu sezvo ave nemakore akawanda achitambira kuEurope.   Masvondo adarika, Nhamoinesu akabuda pachena kuti asendeka kutambira maWarriors, asi Mabika anoti Mhofu aifanirwa kugara pasi naye omuudza kuti anoda kumutambisa nekuda kweruzivo rwake rwaanarwo rwenhabvu.   “Chikwata chakabatana nekuti chine vechidiki nevakuru, zvinove zvatinoda asi Costa Nhamoinesu ange achidiwa. Nhamoinesu anodirwa ruzivo rwake uye rwaishanda apa nekuti mitambo yedu haina kuchipa. Ndiye wandinoona aigona kudzikamisa vechidiki munhandare kana chabvondoka,” anodaro Mabika.   Aimbove mubati wepagedhi wemaWarriors neDynamos, Japhet ‘ShortCat’ Mparutsa anoti nguva ino ndiyo yekuvaka chikwata chemaWarriors chichazonetsa makore mashanu kana gumi anotevera.   “Tinofanirwa kutarira kumberi kune remangwana redu, tovaka chikwata icho chichatibatira basa kwemakore mashanu kusvika gumi anotevera.   “Dai ndirini ndiri panyanga, ndaitumira vechidiki vane makore ari pasi pe20 ne23 okuberekwa, tovasanganisa nevashanu kana vatanhatu vagara vachitamba muchikwata ichi kuti vabatsire vechidiki avo vanenge vasarudzwa,” anodaro ShortCat.

headline: Vemakereke Voyambira ZEC Kuti Iite Basa Rayo Pachena
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches (ZCC) rinoti ranyorera tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) richiikuridzira kuti iite basa rayo zvakachena. Munyori weZCC, Reverand Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vanoti sangano ravo rinoda kuti ZEC iudze vanhu zvavanoda kuziva uye kuti itsanangure pese panenge pachidiwa kujekeswa. Doctor Mtata vanoti zvakaitika svondo rapera pakuvhota kuBulawayo zvakashatirisa vanhu vazhinji nekuti mapurisa aitaura zvakasiyana neZEC pamusoro pekuvhota kwakaitwa. Doctor Mtata vanotiwo ruzhinji rwevanhu runofanira kuremekedza ZEC nekuti irikuita basa guru uye rinokosha. Vanotiwo sangano ravo harisi kufara nekuona kusawirirana kwevanhu vemapato akasiyana siyana vachiti vanhu vanofanira kupana mikana yekutaura pamusoro pemapato avanotsigira pasina kurwisana. “Patakatanga nyaya yekugadzirira sarudzo iyi, zvinhu zvese zvaiita sekuti zvirikufamba zvakanaka. Kwaiita sekuti vanhu vanonzwisisana. Taifara chaizvo kuti kutaurirana kwataiita nevamapato ezvematongerwo enyika kwakange kuchifamba zvakanaka. Asi mazuva apfuura aya, tinoona kuti kunze kwave kupisa zvishomanana," Doctor Mtata vakaudza Studio7. "Matauriro achinja uye kusagamuchirana kwava kuonekwa uye zvave kuenda zvichioma. Mataurirwo anoitwa Zimbabwe Electoral Commission zvoita sekuti chinhu chisina maturo." No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vonanga kuMaputo kuMusangano weSADC Troika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kusimuka vakananga kuMaputo kumusangano weSADC Double Troika, uyo uri kutarisirwa kuzeya dambudziko rekusagadzikana kwakatarisana nedunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica pamwe nehondo iri mudunhu reCabo Delgado muMozambique. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC inoti VaMnangagwa vachatungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe chichange chichinopinda mumusangano uyu. Mozambique ndiyo ine husachigaro hweSADC Troika pari zvino, uye Malawi ndiyo yave kuzotarisirwa kutora chigaro ichi. SADC iri kutarisirwa kutumira mauto kudunhu reCabo Delgabo kuitira kuti abatsire hurumende yeMozambique kupedza hondo yakakonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero, iyo yasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhhatu vatiza misha yavo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa mavhinga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vabatane nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC kumusangano uyu, asi vatungamiri ava havafanirwe kukanganwawo kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu vavo. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Ndinofara kuti nhabvu yadzoka’
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu wemaWarriors neNAPSA Stars yekuZambia, Dennis Dauda, anoti kugara asingatambe bhora kwange kuchirwadza asi ave kunzwa mufaro sezvo mitambo yekunyika iyi yave kutanga.   Kubva pakamiswa nhabvu pasi rose, kusanganisira kuZambia, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, Dauda ange angogara kunyika iyi.   Muchinda uyu akambobuda pachena kuti kugara pamba kwaimuremera achiti asuwa nhabvu uye mhuri yake iri kuZimbabwe.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino ari kuZambia, Dauda anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kunyika iyi, iyo inotarisirwa kutanga nemusi wa17 Gumiguru, kwaunza mufaro mukuru kwaari sezvo ange asuwa zvikuru mutambo uyu.   “Handidi kunyepa, nhabvu ndange ndaisuwa zvikuru, kuramba ndakangogara kwange kwave kurema. Isu sevatambi venhabvu tinoraramiswa nemutambo uyu saka kana tisingatambe manje hupenyu hwedu hunobva hwatiremera.   “Mitambo yeZambian League iri kutanga musi wa17 Gumiguru saka ndagadzirira kutanga kwayo,” anodaro Dauda.   Pachatanga mitambo yeZambian League yemwaka uno, Dauda anenge ave kutambira chikwata chitsva cheNapsa Stars icho chakamutenga kubva kuLusaka Dynamos.   Anoti ari kutarisira kutanga kutamba nhabvu kuchikwata chake chitsva ichi uye anoshuvira kuhwina mikombe yakawanda nacho.   “Ndave kutanga hupenyu hutsva kuNapsa Stars, shuviro yangu kuhwina mikombe yakawanda,” anodaro.   Dauda, uyo akambohwina mubairo weSoccer of the Year mugore ra2014 apo aitambira ZPC Kariba, anoti shuviro yake ndeye kuzotambira kuEurope mune remangwana.   Anoti acharamba achishanda nesimba kusvikira awana mukana uyu.   Apo paakaita Soccer Star of the Year, akamboenda kumbonozama mhanza yake kuchikwata cheGabala, kuAzerbaijan.   “Mutambi wese wenhabvu shungu dzake kuti rimwe remazuva azotambirawo kuEurope uye iniwo ndini mumwe wacho anozvishuvira. Kana zvikazoitikawo, ndinovimba mukana uchauya kwandiri ndoendawo kuEurope,” anodaro.

headline: Hurumende Unobvuma Kuripa Muzvare Jestina Mukoko
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rakapa mutongo wekuti Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vapihwe mari inosvika zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu zvemadhora semuripo wekupambwa nekushungurudzwa kwavakaitwa vari muhusungwa. Pamari iyi, Muzvare Mukoko vachapihwa mari inosvika chiuru zana imwe inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu ichienda kumagweta avo anove nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Hurumende nemagweta aMuzvare Mukoko akawirirana pamari iyi pamberi pedare. Dare iri rati mari iyi ibhadharwe musi wa31 Gumiguru usati wadarika. Muzvare Mukoko vakapambwa kumba kwavo kuNorton musi wa3 Zvita 2008 vakazoendeswa kumatare musi wa24 Zvita. Vaipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Dare reSupreme Court rakambotara kuti vose vainge vapamba Muzvare Mukoko vaigona kuendeswa kumatare ivo pauzima. Muzvare Mukoko vati kuripwa uku hakubvise bundu riri mumoyo mavo asi zvichabatsira vamwe vanotyorerwa kodzero kuti vazive kuti kwekupotera kuripo. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Hapana Chekupemberea Kuzvitonga Ivo Vasina Chikafu
text: Apo nyika iri kucherechedza neMugovera kusvitsa makore makumi matatu nemashanu yawana kuzvitonga, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe neveruzhinji vanoti hapana chekupemberera sezvo vanhu vazhinj vari kutambura uye hupfumi hwenyika hwadzikira zvakanyanya kudarika zvahwaive huri muna 1980. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Instititute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti Zimbabwe yakawana zvayo kuzvitonga munyaya dzematongerwo enyika asi pane kutambura kukuru munyika sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwadzikira uye kutambura kwanyanya zvikuru munyika. Vanoti semuenzaniso hupfumi hwenyika hwange hwakasimba muna 1980 pane zvahwave nhasi. VaChitambara vanoti kudzikira kwehupfumi kwakakonzerwa nemitemo yehurumende pamwe nemamwe matanho ayakatora akaita sekubhadhara vaimbove varwiri verusununguko izvo zvange zvisina kurongwa mubhajeti remuna 1997, kupindira muhondo yemuDemocratic Republic of Congo, pamwe nezvirongwa zvehupfumi zvakaita seEconomic Structural Adjustment Program icho chakaitwa muna1991 kusvika muna 1995. VaChitambara vanoti zvese izvi nezvimwe zvirongwa zvehurumende zvakaita sekutorwa kweminda zvakasiya hupfumi hwenyika huchidonha izvo zvakakonzera kuvhara kwemakambani, nekurasikirwa kwebasa kwevanhu vakawanda. Vanoti kunyange vashandi vashomanana vasara vari kuwana mihoro iri pasi peyaiwanikwa muna1979 Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga. Mumwe mutapi wenhau anonyora nhau dzemabhizimisi akazvimirira, Tawanda Karombo, anoti hapana chekupemberera nekuti vanhu vave kutotambura kudarika zvavaive pasati pave nkuzvitonga kwevanhu vatema. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaJames Johwa, vanotiwo hapana chekupemberera sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichishata munyika. Vanotiwo zviri pachena kuti kubvira muna 1980, kusvika pari zvino, hurumende iri kukoshesa zvematongerwo enyika isingasimudzire mabasa ehupfumi munyika. Vechidiki vakawanda vanoti vari kushishikana chose kuti havasi kuona rubatsiro rwerusununguko sezvo vari kushaya mabasa kunyange hazvo vakaenda kuchikoro. Mumwe wevechidiki ava ndiVaDenford Ngadziore, munyori wevechidiki mudunhu reHarare mubato reMDC inotungamiririrwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vanoti vanoda chose kushanda vachisimudzira nyika asi vari kushaya mukana nekuti hakuna mabasa. Muzvare Natalie Nyakanyanga, avo vanogara mumusha Braeside muHarare, vanotiwo havana chikonzero chekupemembera sezvo vasina mabasa uye vari kutonetseka nehupenyu. Nyanzvi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaedza napose painoga napo kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzedzidzo nehutano mumakore gumi ekutanga nyika yawana kuzvitonga, haina zvayakaita kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi. Maindasitiri, mabhanga, nemakambani ari kuvhara zvekutoti vanhu vazhinji munyika vave kuzvishandira. Sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, rinoti vanhu vasina mabasa vasvika pazvikamu zvinodarika makumi masere kubva muzana. Mamwe makambani mahombe aive nezviuru nezviuru zvevashandi anosanganisira Shabanie and Mashaba Mines, Ziscosteel, Mhangura Mines nemamwe akawanda. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvekuti nyika yakatomira kushandisa dhora remuno muna 2009 mushure mekunge rarambwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwekushaya simba zvakanyanyisa. VaJohwa vanoti chinodiwa kugadzirisa hupfumi kuita sarudzo dzakajeka, posarudzwa hurumende inoisa zvirongwa zvekukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kuti vazodyara mari dzavo munyika. Zimbabwe inocherechedza neMugovera makore makumi matatu nemashanu yawana kuzvitonga. Asi veruzhinji vanoti zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyika zvekuti kana hurumende chaiyo iri kunetseka kubhadhara vashandi vayo uye yakatozivisa kuti haichakwanisa kubhadhara mari dzemabhonasi kutanga gore rino.

headline: Chirongwa cheKudzidzisa Vachadzidzisa Vamwe Mabayirwo eNhomba yeCovid-19 Chinotanga Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti ratanga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanhu vachadzidzisa vamwe mumatunhu madiki nemakuru (district and provincial trainers) kubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 iyo yakapinda munyika neMuvhuro ichibva kuChina. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti chirongwa ichi chafamba zvakanaka, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana mana vabva kumapoka akasiyanasiyana vawana dzidziso pamusoro pemabairwo enhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vanhu vapinda muchirongwa ichi vanosanganisira vezvehutano vabva kumatunhu maduku nematunhu makuru, mapoka akazvimirira, makanzuru, vekumajeri pamwe nemapurisa. Zvimwe zvinonzi zvadzidziswa vanhu ava zvinosanganisira machengeterwo enhomba, mabairwo, marasirwo ainofanirwa kuzoitwa, kufambiswa kwemashoko pamwe nekuongorora vanenge vabaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMujiri vanoti vadzidziswa ava vanenge votarisirwa kuti kutanga neChitatu kana kuti musi weChina vanenge vototangawo kudzidziva vachazobaya nhomba iyi mumatunhu avo. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano rezvehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vanotambira chirongwa chedzidziso ichi asi vachiti zvinenge zvakanaka kuti vanezenge vachibaya vanhu nhomba iyi vange vaine ruzivo rwakakwana. VaRusike vanotiwo hurumende yaifanirwa kunge yakatanga kare kushanda nevezvehutano ava kubva pakatangwa mabasa ekutsvaga nhomba idzodzi, uyewo vanoti zvakakoshawozvakare kuti veruzhinji vapiwe mukana wekusarudza nhomba yavanoda pane dzose dzave kuwanikwa, kwete kuti vangopiwa iri kubva kuChina chete. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe Rinoti Vanhu Ngavatenge Zviri Kugadzirwa muNyika
text: Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe iro rinokurudzira kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika rinoti kuita izvi kunobatsira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi chakaparurwa muZimbabwe muna 2011 asi change chiri kunetsa kushambadzira nenyaya yekushaya mari. Vachitaura pamazana evanhu, muChinhoyi nemusi weMugovera, mukuru weBuy Zimbabwe Muzvare Letwin Mutasa vakati kutenga zvigadzirwa zvemunyika kunopa kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari ripere sezvo mari yakawanda isingapere nekutenga zvinhu kune dzimwe nyika. Izvi zvakatsigirwa naMeya veChinhoyi VaTest Michaels avo vanga vari munyarikan pagungano iri. VaMichaels vakati Buy Zimbabwe inoita kuti makambani akavharwa avhurwe izvo zvinoita kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Gavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya vanoti nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari uku, nyika ichaparura mabond notes ayo okonzerawo mutauro munyika vamwe vachiti achatoita kuti zvinhu zviende kumawere. Mukoti mukuru pachipatara cheChinhoyi Dr Kirsty Smith vanoti zvekudya zvinorimwa munyika hazvina maGMO ayo anozokonzera zvirwere. Muzvare Shamiso Kachere avo vanogadzira doro nekambani yeMbarure Distillers vanoti hwahwa hunogadzirwa munyika hwakanyorwa zviri mukati (alcohol content) kwete zvemakambani edzimwe nyika vasingataure chokwadi izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vararadze. Kambani yeBuy Zimbabwe yaikuridzira kuti vanhu vashandise zvigadzirwa zvemunyika yakabatana nekambani yeMetro Peech iyo yakapa mubayiro yakawanda kune vakatenga zvinhu zvakagadzirwa munyika mumwedzi mina yapfuura. Nekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda munyika, Zimbabwe yave kutenga zvinhu kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neChina. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kuti chirongwa ichi chishanda, vanogadzira zvinhu munyika vanofanira kugadzira zvinhu zvemhando yepamusoro soro uye zvinhu izvi zvinofanira kutengeswa nemutengo uri nani kwete kudhurisa. No media source currently available

headline: Germany Yoburitswa Mumakwikwi eWorld Cup
text: Germany iyo yakasimudza mukombe weWorld Cup kuBrazil muna 2014 nezuro yakaburitswa muchikamu chekutanga chemakwikwi aya kuRussia mushure mekurohwa 2-0 neSouth Korea muGroup F.  Mune mumwe mutambo muGroup iri, Sweden yakatova Mexico 3-0 asi nyika mbiri idzi dzakabudirira kuenda muchikamu chechipiri. Germany yapinda munhoroondo yezvikwata zvakasimudza mukombe zvozobuditswa muchikamu chekutanga. izvi ndizvo zvakaitwa France, Italy neSpain. Mitambo yenhabvu yeWorld Cup iri kutambirwa kuRussia iri kuenderera mberi nhasi. Pane mumwe mutambo wakatambwa nezuro muGroup E, Brazil 2- Serbia 0, Costa rica 2, Switerland 2. Nhasi muGroup H mitambo iriko yakamira yakadai, Senegal neColumbiA kochizoti Japan nePoland. Muzvikwata zvabudirira mukupinda muzvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu kana kuti Round of 16, France iri kutamba neArgentina musi weMugovera na 4 masikati panguva imwe Uruguay ichitamba nePortugal. Nemusi weSvondo Spain iri kutamba neRussia musi nenguva dza 4 masikati apo Croatia inenge ichitamba ne Denmark. Mumwe mutambo pakati peBrazil neMexico unenge uriko nemusi weMuvhuro.

headline: Vanamukoti Vanosungwa Mushure Mekuedza Kuungana paChipatara cheHarare Hospital
text: Sangano rinomirira vanamukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzasungwa neMuvhuro mushure mekunge dzaedza kuungana pachipatara cheHarare Central Hospital apo dzanga dzichitarisira kuita musangano. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo vanoti vanamukoti ava vanga vachiedza kusangana kuti vazeye matambudziko ari kusangana navanamukoti anosanganisira mihoro, kuramwa mabasa kwavari kuita pamwe nekudzingwa kuri kuitwa vari kuramwa mabasa vari kugara mudzimba dzepachipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vasungwa ava vabva kuzvipatara zvinoti Parirenyatwa, Harare Central neChitungwiza, uye panguva yataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vanzwa kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva ipi, asi vanga vakachengetedzwa pakamba yemapurisa yeMbare. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights razivisa mugwaro raraburitsa kuti vanamukoti vasungwa vanosvika gumi nevatatu, uye vacharara muhusungwa vachitarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare neChipiri. Kusungwa kwavanamukoti ava kunouya panguva iyo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende zvekuBulawayo zvinoti Mpilo, United Bulawayo Hospitals neEngutsheni, varatidzirawo vachinyunyuta kuti hurumende haisati yavapindura zvichemo zvavo. Vanamukoti vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Studio yaedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamusoro penyaya iyi, asi vati vanga vari pane imwe nhare nekudaro vanga vasingakwanise kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vagari vekuTynwald South Vopomora Kanzura Wavo Mhosva yeHuwori
text: Harare Residents Trust, rimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari vemuHarare, rinoti vamwe vanhu vekuTynwald South havasi kufara nenyaya yekutengeserwa kwakaitwa vamwe vemabhizimisi nzvimbo yainge yakatarwa kuti ivakwe chikoro. Vagari ava vanoti kanzura wavo, va Girisoti Mandere, nemumiriri wavo kuparamende, amai Betty Kaseke, nevamwe vashandi veguta reHarare ndivo vevamwe vakabatsira kutengesa nzvimbo iyi vachiita zvehuwori. VaPrecious Shumba, avo vanotungamira Harare Residents Trust, vanoti chirikudiwa nevanhu itsananguro yekuti zvinhu zvakafambiswa sei uye chinyi chirikuitwa kuti nzvimbo dzakatengeswa idzi dzidzoserwe kuvanhu. “MaCouncilors vane basa rekumiririra vanhu vakavasarudza. Councilor Mandere ndivo councilor we Ward 45 umo mune Tynwald South isina chikoro chingabatsira vagari vaimomo kuti vana vavo vaende kuchikoro.” VaShumba vakaenda mberi vachiti, “Mutemo wehurumende unoti munzvimbo dzese dzinogara vanhu, munofanira kuwanikwa nzvimbo dzokudzidzira mukati mema kilometer mashanu. Zvino kana tichitarisa danho re City Of Harare kuti inotora nzvimbo yayakange yati ndeyechikoro ichipa kune vamwe vanhu pasina kushambadzwa kwaitwa kuti pavekuchinjwa mashandisiro enzvimbo idzi, izvi zvinopinza councilor mukati nokuti ndiye anomiririra vanhu mudunhu iri.” VaShumba vakati havasikuona kuti kanzura akataura nyaya iyi sei kuma komiti ekanzuru inoona nezverudzidzo nokuti vanhu vakatora nzvimbo iyi havazaikwanisa vasina tsamba inobva kuna kanzura. No media source currently available Asi vaGirisoti Mandere, kanzura weWard 45 kuKuwadzana Phase 3, vanoti zviri kutaurwa navaShumba ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Vanoti ivo sa kanzura wenzvimbo iyi vanoti nyaya iyi haina chokwadi nokuti hapana wavakapa nzvimbo inotaurwa iyi uye zvese zvakaitwa pachena. “Vanhu ve Harare Residents Trust havana kumbotaura neni pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ndirikutotanga kuzvinzwa izvozvi.” VaMandere vakapamidzazve vachiti hapana akambobatsira vanhu kuti vatenge kana kutora nzvimbo inotaurwa iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Africa Yose Yotarisira kuMorocco
text: Hupenyu hweAfrica mumakundano e2022 World Cup hwasarira mumaoko eMorocco zvichitevera kubuda mumakundano aya kweSenegal, Tunisiia, Cameroon neGhana. Morocco irikutamba zvinodakadza uyezve yakasimudza chivimbo mairi mushure mekurova Belgium neCroatia mukusvika muRound of 16 umu. Asi Spain iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 2010 yakasiyana zvikuru neBelgium iyo isina nhoroondo yakasimba mumakundano aya kana Croatia iyo inongozivikanwa nekupinda kwayakaita mufainari muna 2018 uyezve nemutambi Luca Modric. Asi zvakamira zvakadai, mutsigiri wenhabvu VaChris Gwaze vanoti Morocco yakasimba zvekukwanisa kubudirira mumutambo neSpain uyu. Chimwe chiwata chermuAfrica chakasvika muchikamu chenyika gumi nenhatu cheSenegal chakabuda mumakwikwi aya mushure mekurohwa 3-0 neEngland nezuro. Aimbobatira ZPC Kariba muPSL, Shepard Saizi anoti haasi kushamiswa nekubuda kweSenegal mumakundano aya. Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu VaLameck Jekapu vanoti vakarwadziwa nekubuda kweSenegal pamwechete neCameroon, Ghana, neTunisia, asi vane chivimbo kuti Morocco ichaita mashiripiti. Morocco irikutarisira kusvika mukota fainari kekutanga uyezve kuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muma semi fainari emakundano aya. Asi muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaJustice Muzanenhamo vanoti Africa haifanire kuve nechivimbo chakanyanya mumakundano eWorld Cup aya. Morocco iri kutarisira zvakanyanya kubva kunaAchrag Hakimi uyo akaberekerwa kuSpain anotambira PSG naHakim Ziyech. Spain ine vatambi vane mukurmbira vakaita saPedri, Gavi, Torres nevamwe. Asi chikwata chiri kutarisirwa kutora mukombe uyu Brazil iri kupinda munhandare manheru ano na 9pm neSouth Korea. Veruzhinji vanotevera mutambo uyu vanoti South Korea haimire paBrazil iyo ine vatambi vane mukurumbira vakawandisa vakaita seNeymarVinicius Jnr, Casemiro, Richarlison. South Korea iri kutarisira kubva kuna Son Heung-min. Brazil ikakunda inopinda mumakota fainari emakundano aya. Parizvino, Argentina, England, France, neNetherlands, dzatove mukota fainari kare.

headline: Vagari vekwaChiyadzwa Vakanetsana neVakuru veKambani yeMangoda yeAnjin Vopihwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti maMutare VaLangton Mukwengi neChina vakabhadharisa mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora zviuru zvitatu zveRTGS kuvasungwa makumi maviri nevasere avo vakasungwa nemusi weChipiri apo vairatidzira pakambani yemangoda yeAnjin vachinyunyuta nekusabata vagari ava zvakanaka, uye kukanganisirwa nharaunda yavo nemabasa ekucherwa kwemangoda kuri kuitwa nekambani iyi. VaMukwengi vakaudza vasungwa ava kuti vasakanganisa mabasa ari kuitwa pakambani yeAnji vachiti vasasvika chinhambwe chemamita zana pedyo nayo. Vati vasungwa vagare padzimba dzavo dziri mumagwaro edare uye vasavhiringidza vafakazi panyaya iyi. Vasungwa ava vanzi vadzoke zvakare kudare nemusi wa22 Mbudzi gore rino apo mhosva yavari kupomerwa ichatanga kutongwa. Rimwe remagweta riri kumiririra vasungwa ava VaCosmas Chibaya vaudza Studio 7 vanofara nezvabuda mudare. Izvi zvatsigirwa nerimwe remagweta evasungwa ava VaRichard Ncube vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Environmental Law Association. Vachuchusi venyaya iyi vanoti vasungwa makumi maviri nevasere ava vachitungamirirwa naSabhuku Robert Chiadzwa avo vanemakore makumi mapfumbamwe ekuberekwa vakaputsa hari dzedoro range rabikwa pakugadzirira mhemberero dzekuvhurwa patsva kwekambani yemangoda yeAnjin nemusi wa28 Gumiguru. Vasungwa ava vanonzi zvakare vakaparadza matende epagungano iri vachinyunyuta nekusabatwa zvakanaka kwevashandi vepakambani iyi nevaridzi vayo vekuChina. Vagari ava vanotiwo vanoda kuti vave chikamu chinosvika gumi kubva muzana chevashandi vepaAnjin sezvo kambani iyi iri kuchera munharaunda mavo. Vakuru vekambani yeAnjin vanonzi havana havo kumhan’ara chiitiko ichi kumapurisa vachida kugadzirisana pachavo nevagari, vakavimbisa kudzoka nemusi wa2 Mbudzi kuita musangano vose nechinangwa chekunzwisisana. Mushure mekutadza kuuya kwevakuru veAnjin ava kumusangano uyu sezvange zvarongwa vagari vanosvika mazana mana vakaungana pamba paVaNewman Chiadzwa vatsamwa vakaronga kuratidzira pamuzinda weAnjin vachitungamirirwa naVaNewman Chiadzwa, Sabhuku Robert Chiadzwa uye nava Shadreck Chipise. Vairatidzira ava vainge vaine zvinyorwa zvakanzi, Anjin wauraya zvipfuyo zvedu, wauraya mafuro, madhamu, nzizi neminda yedu yekurima nezvimwewo. Kuratidzira uku kunonzi kwakazoita mhirizhonga pakarohwa vawe vashandi nevaridzi vekambani iyi. Tichiri panyaya dzange dziri kumatare maMutare, mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato reMDC Alliance kuManicaland VaItai Masaka neChitatu vakabvisiswa mari yechibatiso inoita madhora zviuru gumi pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekurova mutsigiri weZanu PF mumusha weChikanga, VaMalcom Masarira vanova sachigaro wevechidiki mu14th District kwaMutare. VaMasaka avo vange vakamirirwa mudare negweta VaDavid Tandiri vakanzi vadzoke kudare zvakare musi wa19 Mbudzi.

headline: Makanzura Akadzingwa Basa kuGweru Oronga Kuendesa VaKasukuwere kuMatare
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, rakamirira makanzura maviri emuGweru, ranyorera tsamba gurukota rezvematunhu richipikisa kudzingwa kwakaitwa makanzura aya. Gweta re Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum riri kumirira makanzura maviri aya, VaTafadzwa Christmas, vanoti VaMoses Marecha naVaAlbert Chirau vakadzingwa basa zvisiri pamutemo, izvo vanoti zvinotyora kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti kunyange hazvo mutemo we Urban Councils Act uchipa simba gurukota rezvematunhu kudzinga makanzura, masimba aya akabviswa mubumbiro idzva remitemo yenyika. VaChristmas vanoti mutemo uripo unosungira kuti paumbwe komiti inoferefeta kukanganisa kunenge kwaitwa nakanzura, kana meya. VaChristmas vanoti kana komiti iyi yawana kanzura kana meya aine mhosva, ndipo panopinda gurukota rezvematunhu richidzinga anenge achipomerwa mhosva, kwete zvakaitwa naVaKasukuwere. VaChristmas vanoti VaKasukuwere vakasatevedzera zviri mutsamba yavanyora, vachaendesa nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro soro vachipikisa kutyorwa kwekodzero dzemakanzura maviri aya. Asi VaKasukuwere vanoti havasi kuzodzosa makanzura aya pabasa uyezve havasi kuzopindura tsamba yakabva kumagweta emakanzura aya. VaKasukuwere vanotiwo vanoda kuvaendesa kumatare vakasununguka kuita izvi. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, vati havasati vawana tsamba yakanyorwa naVaChristmas. Amai Makarau vanoti kudzamara vawana tsamba inovazivisa zviri pamutemo nezve kudzingwa kwemakanzura aya, komisheni yavo icharamba ichiita basa rayo semazuva ose. Makanzura maviri aya ndiwo akatanga kudzingwa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yeuori naVaKasukuwere, avo, svondo rapera, vakambomisa basa makanzura ese kusanganisira meya weguta reGweru, vachivapomera mhosva yehuori pamwe nekushandisa mari yekanzuru zvisiri mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vopora Kubva kuCoronavirus muBulawayo
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi mashanu nevatanhatu kuti 56. Asi vamwe vanhu vashanu kuBulawayo vapora kubva kuhutachiona uhu zvichireva kuti munyika yose vanhu makumi maviri nevatu vapora. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana. Vanhu vari kurwara makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 29. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzeezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekuvheneka vanhu vane chirwere ichi kana kuti matest kits kunoreva kuti vanhu vanoona kunge vari kuparadzira chirwere ichi vasingazive nekuti kue vamwe vanhu vanogona kunge vasingakosore kana kupisa muviri asi vachitapurira chirwere. Gurukuta rinoona nezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo vakatenda kuti nyika yave kupererwa nezvekuvheneka vanhu. Vamwe vakabva kunze kwenyika vachimbochengetwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vanoti vave kunzi vabhadhare mari dzinodarika madhora makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuAmerica kuti vavhenekwe hutachiona uhu. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende haibhadharose vanhu kunze kwekunga huri hurongwa hwavo vega. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba pasina guva yakatarwa harisi kushanda. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zvuru zvitatu nemazana maviri anemakumi mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 3.246. Vapora vanodarika zvuru zvina nezviviri kana kuti 42, 000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5, 3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuamerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vave kuda kusvika pazvuru zana kana kuti 100 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu 300 000 asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. No media source currently available

headline: Makombi neZvitoro Vokwidza Mitengo kuBulawayo
text: Apo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika, vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti vanotengesa mari pamusika mutema ndivo vari kukuchidzira kuti zvinhu zviipisise. Sekune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika zvitoro zvakawanda muguta reBulawayo zvakwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvinowanzoshandiswa nevanhu zuva nezuva kunyanya mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nemukaka. Nekune rimwewo divi zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira chikafu, pamwe nezvimwe zvakadai semishonga nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvange zvakavharwa nechikonzero chinofungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti inyaya yekuda kukwidza mitengo. Vemakombi anoenda kumisha inogara veruzhinji vakwidzawo mari yekufambisa Vamwe vanhu vataura neStudio7 vange vachitsutsumwa zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita mitengo yezvinhu. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndemumwe mudzimai angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Ndlovu avo vati vanoshora vanotenga nekutengesa mari pamusika mutema vachivati ndivo vari kukuchidzira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nemumwe murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti George uyo ati anoshamisika kuti sei hurumende isiri kuda kugadzirisa nyaya yekutengeswa kwemari pamusika mutema. VaReginald Shoko ndivo mukuru mukuru weAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMateleland uye muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira ega. VaShoko vati kunyange hazvo vanotengesa mari mumigwagwa vachibatsira kuwedzera kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi, dambudziko guru inyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda havana chivimbo nehupfumi hwemunyika. VaShoko vatiwo rimwe dambudziko inyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuita humbimbindoga kana kuti mazvake mazvake izvo vati zvinoita kuti matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anetse kugadzirisa. Vamwe vanhu kusanganisira vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF, vanoti vemabhizimisi vari kukwidza mitengo zvenhando senzira yekuda kushoresa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nehurumende yavo. Asi mutauriri webato reZapu VaIphithule Maphosa vaudza Studio7 chinhu chikuru chiri kukonzera kuti zvinhu zvisamira zvakanaka munyika kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti kushaikwa kwemari yekunze ndiko kuri kunyanya kuwedzera matambudziko ari munyika. Mitengo yezvinhu zvakasiyana siyana iri kukwira kubvira svondo rapera apo mukuru webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakatura mamiriro ezvinyu munyaya dzekushandiswa kwemari munyika.

headline: Mapurisa Oparura Chirongwa Chekudzinga Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa, 'veMishikashika' neVana Vasina kweKugara muGuta reHarare
text: Mapurisa aparura chirongwa chekubvisa muguta reHarare mishikashika, vana vanogara mumigwagwa uye vanotengesa zvinhu. Mamwe masangano akaita sePassengers Association of Zimbabwe anoti zvinogona kupinza hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi panenge poitwa hwakiti nagonzo mapurisa achimhanyisa vanhu ava. Mapurisa aabatana neve ZINARA, VID, kanzuru dzeRuwa, Chitungwiza,ye Epworth, neye Harare nevebazi rezvemagariro evanhu muchirongwa ichi. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri we Mapurisa mudunhu re Harare, Assistant Inspector Webster Dzvova, vakazivisa mutsamba yavo nezuro kuruzhinji rwenyika kuti Harare yese ichange ichi mhanyidzana nechirongwa ichi kubva nhasi kusvika mukupera kwesvondo rino. Asi vanotengesa mumigwagwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti havazi kuzotyityidzirwa ne mapurisa kuti varege kushanda. Mukuru wesangano re vanotengesa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation (VISET), VaSamuel Wadzayi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa havabve nekuti nyika haina mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsa kweMari Munyika Kwoita Kuti veMabhanga Vape Musvo weMasendi
text: Kuenderera mberi kwedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kumabhanga emunyika kunonzi kwave kupa kuti mamwe mabhanga ape vanenge vachitora mari dzavo kumabhanga mari dzinosvika zana remadhora pazuva dziri dzemusvo wemasendi gumi. Asi izvi zvinonzi hazvisi kuderedza kureba kwemitsetse kumabhanga, kunyange hazvo mabhanga ari kukwanisa kupa vanhu mari dzemusvo idzi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti chimwe chiri kuwedzera dambudziko remari munyika inyaya yekuti makadhi ekumabhanga haasi kukwanisa kushandiswa kumaruwa, uko vanhu vachiri kuda kushandisa mari chaiyo. Doctor Chitambara vanoti chikuru chiri kuita kuti dambudziko rirambe raita ndambirira sehosha yekurwere kushaya chivimbo munyaya dzezveupfumi hwenyika kuri kuitwa nevanhu. Doctor Chitambara vanoti vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende yarasa ma bond note, yoshandisa mari yeRand yekuSouth Africa, zvimwe dambudziko remari raipera. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vodzokera kuMabasa Avo
text: Rimwe remasangano anomirira vanoita mabasa ekutengesa mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation (VISET) rinoti riri kufara nemafambiro aita zvinhu muHarare nhasi apo nhengo dzaro dzadzokera kumabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaSamuel Wadzai, vanoti pane zvinoda kugadziriswa nemakanzuru nehurumende zvakaita sekuwanikwa kwemvura munzvimbo dzinotengesera veruzhinji nezvikwanisiro zveCovid-19. Vanoti vakatarisira kuti hurumende ichaita zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vatengesi pamusoro penhomba yeCovid-19 iri kubaiwa vamwe pari zvino kuitira kuti vatengesi vemumigwagwa vave nechivimbo nayo. "Tiri kutarisira kuti hurumende itange zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa nezve nhomba irikubaiwa vanhu kutira kuti vazhinji vawane ruvimbo ne nhomba iyi," vadaro VaWadzai. Kudzokera kwevanhu ava mumigwagwa kunotevera kunyevenutswa kwemitemo yeCovid-19 kwakaitwa neMuvhuro nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: MaChevrons hutu kuAustralia
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chakaenda kuAustralia uko chichabandana nemaAussies mumitambo mitatu yeOne Day International yeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kuInternational Cricket Council (ICC) World Cup India 2023.   Zvichitevera kupera kwakaita mutambo wemaChevrons neIndia weODI uyo chikwata chemuno chakakundwa “whitewash”, akabva atonanga kuAustralia kunorwira zvibodzwa zvekuenda kuWorld Cup.   MaChevrons neAustralia achatamba mitambo mitatu kutanga nemusi weSvondo apo wechipiri uchizotambwa svondo rinotevera musi weChitatu uye wekupedzisira uchatambwa musi wa3 Gunyana.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), mukushi wemashoko weZC, Darlington Majonga anoti mutambo uyu wakakosha zvikuru kumaChevrons.   Anoti kana chikwata chenyika chakahwinha mutambo uyu zvibodzwa zvavo zvinoramba zvichiwedzera izvo zvinozovabatsira kubudirira murwendo rwekuenda kuWorld Cup vasingazotambiswe mimwe mitambo.   “Mutambo uyu ndewezvikwata 13 wekurwira kuenda kuICC Men’s Cricket World Cup 2023 iyo ichatambirwa kuIndia,” anodaro.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakaenda nemutambi wacho Blessing Muzarabani uyo akakundikana kutamba neIndia sezvo ainge akakuvara.   Zvisinei, maChevrons achange asina vamwe vatambi vakakosha vanosanganisira Craig Ervine, Tendai Chatara, Wellington Masakadza naMilton Shumba.    Lady Chevrons   Kuchitiwo nerimwe divi, chikwata chemaLady Chevrons chiri kusangana necheSouth Africa cheEmerging Women Team apo chiri kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kuUnited Arab Emirates kumitambo yekurwira kuenda kuICC Women’s T20 World Cup.   ZC yakaumba chikwata chevatambi 15 avo yakatakura kuenda navo kuSouth Africa.   MaLady Chevrons neSouth Africa vachasangana muzuva anoti 28, 29, 31 Nyamavhuvhu uye 2 na3 Gunyana.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti 2017 Richava Gore Rakaoma Zimbabwe Ikasavandudza Zvinhu
text: Gore rapera ra2016 igore range rakaomera vazhinji pamwe nehurumende. Munyika makaita dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari zvakapa kuti bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe riparure mari yemabond notes asi asiri kubatsira kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Hurumende yaitadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo mihoro paine nguva uye nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nematongerwo enyika dzinoti vanhu vanofanira kusunga dzisimbe nekuti 2017 igore richange rakaoma kudarika gore rapfuura. Hupfumi wenyika hauna kukura sezvange zvakatarisirwa uyewo mari yaitarisirwa kuwanikwa nehurumende yakadzikira zvakanyaya mugore richangopfura. Hurumende yakashandisa mari yakwanda kudarika mari yaya kawana izvo zvakaita kuti isare iine chikweretti chemadhora anodarika bhiriyoni. Zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari yehurumende zviri kuenda kumihoro yevashandi izvo zvopa kuti zvinhu zviomere hurumende. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kupinda munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzira muno kana kuti Statutory Instrument 64, nyika iri kuramba ichitenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kudarika zvainotengesa nekuda kwekuti maindasitiri haasi kushanda zvakanaka. Izvi ndezvimwe zvinonzi zvakakonzera kushaikwa kwemari munyika zvikazoita kuti Reserva Bank of Zimbabwe iunze mhando yemari yemaBond Notes muna Mbudzi wegore rapera. Mubhajeti ravo regore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanotarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura nechikamu chimwe nechidimbu kubva muzana (1.7percent) Vanonoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti ramangwana reZimbabwe harina kujeka nekuti zvese zvakakanganisika muna 2016 pamwe nevakazvikanganisa vachiripo uye havana shanduko yavari kuita. Vanoti vano bvumirana nemaonero emasangano akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank ekuti hupfumi hwenyika hucharamba huchidzikira mugore rinouya. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo VaChinamasa vane matanho avakaparura mubhajeti regore rinouuya ekukwezva vekunze kuti vauye kuzosima mari yavo muno pamwe nekusimudzira mabhizimisi havawoni izvi zvichiiitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvekunetsa kwemari. Vanotiwo zvikwereti zveZimbabwe kumasangano akaita se World Bank, African Developement Bank nedzimwe nyika ndizvowo zviri kutadzisa nyika kuwana mari yekusimudzira maindasitiri ayo. VaKuchera vanoti havaoni vemabhanga, masangano nenyika dzekunze vachisunungura homwe nekuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inoratidza kuti haisati yazvipira kuita zvinodiwa kuti ikwanise kutanga kukwereteswa mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vano bvumirana naVaKuchera vachiti kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro rwemari inofanira kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. Vanoti pari zvino Zimbabwe haikwanisi kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvino darika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora nekuti maindasitiri ayo haasi kushanda uyewo n nyaya yehuwori mukutengeswa kwezvicherwa. VaJohwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yemitemo isina kujeka pamwe nemakakatanwa ari mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF ndizvo zvimwe zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hwenyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanotiwo nyaya dzematongerwo enyika asina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvikuru sei muZanu PF ndidzo dziri kuita vekunze vasauye munyika pamwe nekuti mabhizimisi emuno asashande zvakanaka. Vanoti semaonero avo kurwisana muZanu PF kuchaenderera mberi mubato iri gore rinouuya izvo vati zvichavhiringidza hupfumi zvakanyanya. Kunze kweizvi, munyori anoona nezvehupfumi mubato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai vachimirira Hatfield mudare reparamende, Dr Tapiwa Mashakada, vaudza Studio 7 kuti huwori ndiwo humwewo huri kuvhiringa mabasa ezvehupfumi munyika. Vanoti kana nyaya iyi ikasagadziriswa havawoni chinosanduka munyaya dzehupfumi mugore rinouuya. Asi vanomirira rimwe sangano remabhizimisi reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu vanoti vanoona sekuti gore rinouya rinenge rakanaka nekuda kwemitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende zvikuru sei mutemo wekudzivirira zvimwe zvinogadzirwa kunze westatutory instrument 64 pamwe nekushandiswa kwemaBond Notes. Asi vanoti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinofanira kugadziriswa.  Asi VaJohwa naVaKuchera vanoti maBond Notes haana zvanobatsira uyewo hurumende iri kutadza kutobhadhara vashandi vayo zvisinei nekuti pave kushandiswa maBond Notes. VaMashakada vanoti zvinosuwisa kuti vashandi vazhinji vehurumende vakatamba Kisimusi vasina mari dzavo vachiti kana maBond Notes acho haasikuwanikwa. Asi vanomirira Highfield West mudare reparamende VaPsychology Mazivisa veZanu-PF vanoti zvirango ndizvo zviri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi nematongerwo enyika dzinotiwo nyaya yesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 ndiyo ichavhirindidza nyaya dzehupfumi uye vanofunga kuti vakunze nevamabhizimisi vanogona kumirira kusvika sarudzo idzi dzaitwa vasati varonga kuti vasime mari yavo munyika. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yavo inoda chose kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rese pamwe nemasangano akaita seWorld Bank neIMF uye ndosaka yakaumba hwaro hwekuti ingabhadhare zvikwereti zvayo sei kumasangano aya nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 yavhiringa mitambo muzvikoro
text: SANGANO reNational Association of Schools Heads (NASH) riri kuchema kuti gore rino vana vanotamba mitambo yakasiyana vakarasikirwa zvikuru zvichitevera kumbomiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19 izvo zvakavatadzisawo kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika.   NASH ndiyo inotungamira mitambo yose inoitwa muzvikoro uye gore roga-roga inogaroita mitambo inosanganisira Copa Coca Cola neStella Netball Under-17.   Mutungamiri weNASH, VaArthur Maphosa, vanoti gore rino vana vakarasikirwa zvikuru nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Ndinonzwira tsitsi vana vedu vegore rino nekuti ishuviro yemutambi wose wenhabvu, netball kana mimwe mitambo kuti vagofamba nemuchadenga vachienda kunomirira Zimbabwe kumitambo yakasiyana kunze kwenyika.   “Gore rino Covid-19 yakanganisa vana vazhinji, hapana aimbozvifungira kuti zvichasvika pakadai. Makore adarika, kuburikidza neCopa Coca-Cola, vana vange vachienda kunokwikwidza kuKenya.   Mitambo iyi yaiona shasha dzakaita mukurumbira dzichiuya kuzoona pamwe nekurairidza vatambi pamakwikwi aya izvo zvaibatsira mukusimudzira vana,” vanodaro.   Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Gore negore taisienda nevana kumitambo yeCOSSASA yaiitwa kunyika dzakasiyana dzemuSouthern Africa uko kwaikwikwidzwa mijaho yekumhanya, volleyball, nhabvu, netball nemimwe. Izvi zvaibika vana murwendo rwavo mukusimukira mune zvemitambo.”   VaMaphosa vanoti mitambo iyi ndiyo yakabika vatambi vazhinji vave nemukurumbira kusanganisira vemaGems avo vakanokwikwidza kumutambo weVitality Netball World Cup kuLiverpool, kuEngland gore radarika.   “Vasikana vazhinji vakaenda kuLiverpool, kuEngland gore radarika vakapfuura nemumitambo yeNASH Stella under-17 Netball Tournament izvo zvinoratidza kuti yakakosha zvikuru uye inobika vatambi vemangwana,” anodaro.   Zvisinei, VaMaphosa vanoti chikuru panguva ino kuti vanhu vagare vakachengetedzeka kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tongoshuvira kuti kana denda iri rapera tirambe tichishanda pamwe chete nevatsigiri vedu sezvataisiita kare vachidira mari uye vachitibatsira kuronga mutambo yevana yakasiyana,” vanodaro VaMaphosa. Zvakadaro, operations manager weTanganda Tea Company iyo inoronga mitambo yeNASH Stella Tea Under-17 netball tournament, VaFarai Garai vanoti kambani yavo yakazvipira kuti panopera denda reCovid-19 hukama hwavo neNASH hurambe huchienderera mberi.   “Isu takazvipira mubasa redu uye hukama hwedu haumbopera neNASH, ticharamba tichishanda navo mukusimudzira mutambo wenetball nemimwe yatinositsigira inosanganisira mujaho weTanganda Tea half marathon,” anodaro Garai.

headline: Muchatiguta: Masomere
text: MURAIRIDZI weManica Diamond, Luke ‘Vahombe’ Masomere, anoti chikwata chake icho chiri kukwikwidza muCastle Premiership kekutanga gore rino chauya zvachose uye hachina wachinovhunduka.   Mwaka uno, maziso ese achange ari paManica Diamond yekwaMutare iyo yakapinda muCastle Premiership mushure mekunge yatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura kuDivision One izvo zvakatuma hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi kutaura kuti vanoda kuita mukurumbira muAfrica yese.   Asi achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Vahombe – uyo ave kudanwa nezita remadunhurirwa nevatsigiri kuti Dr of Football kana kuti His Excellency – anoti chikwata chake chauya zvachose muPSL.   “Isu sechikwata, chekutanga ndechekuti tauya zvachose uye hapana kwatiri kuenda. Handisi kuda hangu kuvimbisa kuti tichapinda torakasha zvimwe zvikwata kana kuhwina mikombe yakawanda mumwaka wedu wekutanga. Asi zivai kuti isu hatisi kuzongorakashwa sezvinoitwa zvimwe zvikwata zvinenge zvapinda muPSL zvobva zvadzokera kwazvinenge zvabva, kwete.   “Isu tauya kuzogara muno zvachose nekuti muno muPSL ndimo medu matinokodzera kuve tiri,” anodaro.   Chero zvazvo Masomere achiti mwaka uno haadi kuvimbisa kuti vachasimudza mukombe, chikwata chake chatenga vatambi vepamusoro vakawanda vanosanganisira Partson Jaure, Marshall Mudehwe, Peace Makaha naPritchard Mpelele.   Anoti vari kuda kuti vazove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvemuno zvenhabvu uye vozonomirira nyika kunze kumitambo yeCAF Champions League nemimwe.   “Vatungamiriri vechikwata chedu vanoda kuti isu tigove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru zvenhabvu muAfrica,  zvinogoneka kuitika uye ndizvo tiri kushanda kuita saka tiri kuvaka uye munguva pfupi inotevera tichange tave padanho iroro,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi yashandura nhabvu kuManicaland zvekuti vatsigiri venhabvu vemudunhu iri vave kutomushevedza vachimuti ‘His Excellency’ vachimurumbidza nebasa raari kubata kusimudzira nhabvu.   “Handichangonzi Dr of Football chete asi kuno ndave kutoshevedzwa saHis Excellency nekuti vanhu vari kufarira basa randiri kubata rekusimudzira nhabvu.   “Chikwata chedu chaunza mufaro kune vazhinji uye ndiko saka mazita aya erumbidzo ari kungowanda,” anodaro Masomere.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa Mutare City Rovers muCastle Premiership mwaka wadarika, Manica Diamond ndiyo ichange yakamirira guta reMutare muPSL mwaka uno.

headline: Zororo reEaster Rinorangarirwa Gore Rino Vanhu Vasingaungane
text: Vatendi vechiKristu vakawanda pasi rose varangarira zororo reGood Friday vari mudzimba dzavo munyika dzakasiyana siyana nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chapararira pasi rose, kusanganisira muZimbabwe, umo chauraya vanhu vatatu. Vanamati vechiKirisitu vakawanda muZimbabwe vateerera yambiro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekugara mudzimba munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika apo vakawanda vanoti varangarira kufa kwaJesu nekunamata pamwe nekutora chirairo vari mudzimba dzavo. Amai Tsungai Madhuviko vanoti kunyange hazvo vatadza kuungana nevamwe vavo semakore ese nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, vari kunamata vari mumba vachitevedza mitemo yesangano ravo rechipositori yekwaMadzibaba Mwazha. Amai Madhuviko vanoti zvakakosha kutevedzera zviri kutaurwa nevezvehutano kuitira kuti vasarasikirwe nevatendi vafa nechirwere ichi. Mumwe mutenderi, Amai Petronela Nyikadzino, vanoti vakaronga nedzimwe nhengo dzekereke yavo yeHwisiri kuburikidza nedandemutande reWhatsup kuti vachange vachinamata nguva dzakafanana. Mumwe mutendi, VaTonderai Makaya, vanoti chikuru hakusi kunamata vanhu vakaungana, asi kunamata mumweya nemuzvokwadi. VaMakaya vanoti Pasika yaidyiwa nemhuri vari mumba mavo sezvaitika kumhuri dzakawanda nhasi. Mufundisi wekereke yePentacostal Assemblies of Zimbabwe, VaTawanda Munaki, vanoti kunamata hausi mudhuri uye kereke yaJesu inoenderera mberi nekunamata mudzimba vachiti panoungana vanhu vaviri kana vatatu, Jesu vanenge varipo sezvinotaura bhaibheri. Mufundisi Munaki vanoti kuvharwa kwezvivakwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kwapa mukana vafundisi kuti vataure nenhengo dzavo kuburikidza nemadandemutamde eWhatsup, Livestreaming neFacebook. Svondo rakapera, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakayambira vatendi kuti vasaungane vachinamata vachiti achawanikwa achiita izvi achazvionera pamhuno sefodya. Asi vamwe vatendi vanoti danho rekusaungana rinodzorera kutenda kwavo kumashure sezvo vatendi vachikurudzirana kunamata vakawanda. Vatenderi vechiKristu pasi rose vanoremekedza zuva reGood Friday, senzira yekurangarira kuurayiwa kwaJesu Kristu, uyo akafa nemusi weChishanu, akazomuka nemusi weSvondo, zuva rinorangarirwa seEaster Sunday. No media source currently available

headline: MDC T Yoronga Musangano Mukuru weKupeta Gore kuZimbabwe Grounds
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai mangwana vari kutarisirwa kutungamira nhengo dzavo pamusangano mukuru wekuvhara gore uchaitirwa munhandare ine nhoroondo yekurwira rusununguko rwevatema yeZimbabwe Grounds iri mumusha weHighfield. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu ndechekutarisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika pari zvino, pasvika hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pakatarisanwa nesarudzo dza2018, pamwe nekutendawo vana veZimbabwe nekushinga kunyange vari mukati mematambudziko makukutu. VaGutu vanoti zvimwe zvicha kurukurwawo ndezvakaitwa nebato ravo mukati megore rino, zvinosanganisira kuratidzira mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Chipatara cheChegutu Chovharwa Mushure Mekunge Mumwe Anopa Mushonga Ashaya neCovid-19
text:
Chipatara chikuru chemuChegutu chakavharwa nemusi weChina mushure mekubatwa kwevashandi vaviri nechirwere cheCovid-19, mumwe wacho ndokufa nezuro. zvi zvasvita huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pamazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu
reMashonaland West, VaGift Masoja, vazivisa veruzhinji kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara chikuru chemuChegutu neimwe kiriniki iri pedyo zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe mushandi nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro. VaMasoja vati mushandi akashaya uyu munhu aishanda kudivi rinochengetwa mishonga inopihwa varwere vepachipatara ichi. Vati vavhara chipatara ichi kuitira kuti vapfapfaidze mushonga chipatara chose sezvinokurudzirwa nebazi ravo pamwe nesangano reWorld Health Organization. VaMasoja vati bazi ravo riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vave kufamba vasina kupfeka zvinodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vayambira vagari kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chichiripo uye kuti vatevedzere zvose zvinodikanwa zvakaita sekupfeka mamasiki anovhara muromo nemhino pamwe nekugara vanhu vakapatsanurana kana kuti social distancing.

Munguva pfupi yadarika bazi rezvehutano rakambovhara makiriniki anoti Chikonohono muChinhoyi, Madzorera kwaZvimba neChikangwe kuKaroi nekuda kwekuti vamwe vashandi vepamakiriniki aya vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio7 yaona vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi vasina kupfeka mamasiki mumisha inogara veruzhinji, vanhu vanozopfeka mamasiki aya kana vave kupinda muguta. Mumwe wechidiki anga asina kupfeka masiki, VaArthur Changara, vati vanofunga kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chaderera uye mapurisa haachafamba famba mumisha inogara veruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Mishonga yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yosvika neMuvhuro Ichibva kuChina
text: Zimbabwe ichatanga kugamushira mishonga yenhomba yekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina nemusi weMuvhuro unouya uye vamwe vashandi vezvehutano vanoti mushonga uyu unofanira kutanga waongororwa usati hwapihwa kwavari pamwe neveruzhinji. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota wekutanga gore rino, gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati mishonga yava kapihwa pachena neChina pamwe nemimwe yakatengwa nehurumende ichatanga kusvika munyika svondo rinouya nemusi weMuvhuro. Vakatiwo mumwe mushonga unotarisirwa kusvika munyika musi wa1 Kurume uye hurumende ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuvadzirira kuCovid-19 ichitanga nemachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara. Nyanzvi nevashandi vehutano vanoti hurumende iri kutora matanho akanaka pakuunza mishonga iyi asi panofanira kuitwa ongororo yekuti inoshanda zvakanaka here muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti hurumende iri kuvatungamidza pamberi pakutanga kubaiyiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, panofanira kutangwa paitwa ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda muZimbabwe here vasati vabaiwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, zvakare vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanotsigirana naVaDongo vachiti zvakosha kuti hurumende iite ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda zvakadii muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanachiremba, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuongorora mushonga uyu usati watanga kushandiswa kunodzivirira. Asi Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti hurumende ichatevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi panyaya dzemishonga yekudzivirira Covid-19. VaDongo vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vave neruzivo hwekuti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huchafamba sei kana kutanga rini, havawoni sekuti zvinganetse kubaya vanhu sezvo vagara vachibaya vanhu nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Kunze kwemishonga iri kubva kuChina, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisawo kuti hurumende ine hurongwa kwekutenga mishonga yeCovid-19 kubva kuIndia neRusssia. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti Zimbabwe ichatumira ndege kuChina kunotora mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti ipinde munyika musi waKukadzi 15, 2021. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti nhomba dziri kubva kuChina hadzisati dzaitwa ongororo muZimbabwe yekuona kuti inoshanda zvakadii sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji munyika. Ongororo idzi dzinotora mwedzi yakati kuti dzichiitwa pachikwata chevanhu mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti zvinhu zvose zviri mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: Ndadzoka: Pambeni
text: SHASHA yetsiva Peter “The Sniper” Pambeni anoti adzoka mumutambo uyu zvine mutsindo uye anotarisira kuramba achisimukira.   Pambeni nguva pfupi yadarika akahwina bhande reWorld Boxing Organization Africa Lightweight zvichitevera kukunda kwaakaita Albinius “Danny Boy” Felesian wekuNamibia. Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Pambeni anoti akambenge arasika apo akasiya mutambo wetsiva mugore ra2008 ndokuenda kunyika yeSouth Africa kunotsvaga raramo.   Muchinda uyu akagara kuSouth Africa kwemakore anodarika matanhatu asi akazodzingwa kunyika iyi zvakaita kuti adzoke muno zvakare ndokunogara kuEpworth uko kwaakakurira. Anoti hupenyu hwakamuomera zvikuru apo aive kuEpworth uye akazosangana nemumwe aimbove maneja wake mumutambo wetsiva uyo akamutsvagira maneti ndokumupa achiti vatange basa rekuredza hove.   Zvisinei, anoti murume akange amupa maneti uyu akabva anyura mumvura ndokufa izvo zvakamuvhundutsa zvikuru ndokubva arega zvokuredza hove izvi. Pambeni anoti akazosangana zvakare naStalin Mau-Mau uyo akataridza chido chekumusimudzira mumutambo wetsiva ndokutanga kumutsigira.    “Ndakamborasika nekuti nekuda kwevanhu vandaimbofamba navo kare vakatadza kundiraira chaizvo izvo zvakazoita kuti ndiramwe mutambo wetsiva ndokumbobva ndikanogara kunyika yeSouth Africa.   “Ndakazodzoka kuSouth Africa ndikasangana neaimbove maneja wangu ndikamuudza kuti ndave kuda kuita zvetsiva zvakare. Asi pane kuti anditengere magirovhosi etsiva, akanditengera maneti ekuti tiende kunoredza hove dzekuti tipote tichitengesa. Asi patakaenda kuroredza hove iye akabva anyura mumvura saka nekutyira hupenyu hwangu ndakabva ndazvisiya,” anodaro Pambeni.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Ndakazosangana zvakare naVaMau-Mau ndikavaudza kuti ndoda kudzoka mutsiva, kubva ipapo ndiri kushanda navo uye vari kundibatsira. Iye zvino ndave shasha zvakare saka ndinotenda Mwari.”   Parizvino Pambeni ari kugadzirira kurwa nemumwe mutambi wekuSouth Africa nemusi wa12 Gumiguru muHarare. Mutambo uyu uchange uri wekugadzirira mumwe wekuzorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake munaZvita apo acharwa nemutambi achazozivikanwa.   Mau-Mau anoti anoda kuti Pambeni agorwira kuchengetedza bhande rake munyika muno pamberi pevatsigiri vake. Anoti iye zvino haakwanise kutaura kuti achasangana nani sezvo vachiri pakati pekusainirana makondirakiti ekuti vagorwa.   “Pambeni acharwira kuchengetedza bhande rake muno, izvozvo ndovimbisa. Ndiri kushanda nesimba kuti zviitike uye zvichaitika chete.   “Mwedzi unotevera ari kurwa nemutambi wekuMalawi uye munaZvita orwira bhande rake reWBO Africa Lightweight nemutambi watichazokuzivisai kana tangopedza kunyorerana pasi,” anodaro.   Mau-Mau anoti mamaneja evatambi vetsiva anofanira kurwira kodzero dzavo zvizere.   “Moziva zvatinoona vamwe vatambi vetsiva vachiitwa zvinopisa tsitsi, hazvidi kudaro wena. Mutambi shuwa anga ende kuNamibia nebhazi apa achisvika achirwa? Anokundwa nekuti anosvika akaneta. Mamaneja ngavagone kuchengetedza vatambi vavo uye ngavasatungamidze mari nguva dzese. Vatambi vekune dzimwe nyika kana voda kusimukira vanopa mamaneja vemuno mari voenda ikoko nebhazi mutambi anosvika orohwa, mutambi wekuNamibia osimukira vedu vemuno vachidzikira,” anodaro Mau-Mau.

headline: PTUZ Inoti Hurumende Yasarirwa neMazuva Matatu Chete Kuti Varairidzi Varamwe Mabasa
text: Rimwe sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rayambira hurumende kuti yasarirwa nemazuva matatu chete kuti igadzirise zvichemo zvevarairidzi. Izvi zvinotevera mazuva gumi nemana akapiwa hurumende nevashandi vayo ekuti igadzirise zvinhu, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuti vawedzerwe mari dzemihoro, uye kuti vatambiriswe mihoro yavo nemari dzekuAmerica. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti hurumende haidi kuteerera zvichemo zvevarairirdzi asi inoda kusvitsa vashandi pakuramwa mabasa, zvinove izvo zvichaitika kutanga musi weMuvhuro svondo rinouya kana vakasawirirana pakupera kwezuva neChishanu svondo chino. Doctor Zhou vanoti varairidzi vakawanda havana kuenda kumabasa kubva svondo rapera sezvo vakasanganawo nekuratidzira kwemazuva matatu kwakashevedzerwa nesangano reZCTU. Vanoti nhengo dzavo dzakanga dzagara dzisingaende kumabasa mazuva ose sezvo dzakasunga kuti dzichange dzichishanda zuva rimwe chete pasvondo kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Votarisirwa Kutora Mhiko Pasina Ruzhinji neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Pane hurongwa hwekuti vakasarudzwa kutungamira nyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vachatoreswa mhiko musi wa 20 Ndira gore rinouya vanhu vasina kuungana paWashington Mall muguta reWashington DC sezvinoitwa makore ose nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere checoronavirus. Hurongwa uhu hunonzi huchaitwa padandemutande kana kuti Virtual Inauguration. VaBiden vanenge vachitora mhiko semutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu. VaBiden nevamwe vanyarikani vashoma shoma nevanhu vashoma vachatora mhiko pamberi pemukova wedare reparamende kana kuti Congress sechigariro vozofamba nemugwagwa, Pennsylvania Avenue, kuenda kumuzinda weWhite House. Gadziriro yehurongwa uhu yatotanga muWashington DC pachiiswa zvivakwa zvakasiyana siyana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump havasati vatenda kuti vakakundwa sarudzo uye vamwe vanoti vacharegedza kuenda panenge pachitoreswa mhiko VaBiden inova tsika inoremekedzwa pakutambidzana masimba muAmerica. VaTrump vari kufungidzirwa kuti vachaita musangano neveruzhinji musi uyu muchinangwa chekuda kutotanga gadziriro yekukwikwidzazve musarudzo dzemuna 2024. Zvichakadaro VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kudoma vaive mukuru wemauto vari pamudyandigere Retired U.S. Army General Lloyd Austin kuti vave munhu mutema wekutanga kuve gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika.

headline: Vatori veNhau Voyambira Kuti Mitemo Mitsva Iri KUrongwa Isavambunyikidze
text: Sangano reMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe rinoti rinoda kuti mitemo ine chekuita nezvenhau isambunyikidze vatori venhau kuitira kuti vashande vakasununguka nguva dzose. Mashoko aya anouya apo nyika iine hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo inobata kutorwa kwenhau. Pamusangano wayaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChipiri, Media Alliance of Zimbabwe yati kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika dzinofanirwa kuzadziswa. MAZ yati inoshungurudzikana zvikuru nekusungwa, kurohwa pamwe nekuvhiringwa kunoitwa vatapi venhau munyika.
