Gweta rinoshanda neMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe Chapter, VaKuda Hove, vati basa rekutapa nhau harifanirwe kutorwa semhosva uye vanotarisira kuti mitemo mitsva ine chekuita nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko igadzirise dambudziko iri. Hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti ine chido chekubvisa mutemo we Access to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, kuvandudza Broadcasting Services Act nemitemo ine chekuita nezvekushandiswa kwemadandemutande - Cyber Security Laws. Hurumende inoti ichaunza mitemo mitatu mitsva ine chekuita nezvekutapwa kwenhau uye pakatotanga hurukuro. Bazi rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, richitsigirwa nezvipangamazano mukunyorwa kwemitemo mubazi rezvemitemo, riri mubishi rekunyorabhiri rekuvandudza mutemo we Information, Broadcasting Services Ammendment Bill pamwe neZimbabwe Media Commission Bill. VaHove vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti hurumende igadzirise zvavakataura pamusoro pemutemo iyi zvinosanganisira kuti vanhu vanoda kutanga terevhizeni kana radio stations, havafanirwi kupiwa mari pachena anonzi madonations. Vatiwo vari kushushikanawo kuti Zimbabwe Media Commission iri kupiwa masimba ekusungisa vanhu vanenge vakanganisa zvine chekuita nenhau. Vachitaurawo vakamirira zvakare MAZ, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vachigamuchira zviri kuitwa, uye vari kupindawo mumisangano ine chekuita nekuvandudzwa kwemitemo iyi, vakangomirira kuona kuti hurumende ichazadzikisa here zvainovimbisa. Kunyange hazvo tisina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, makurukota ari kuona nezvekunyorwa kwemitemo iyi akazivisa patwitwer svondo rapera kuti vaive vakaungana kuNyanga nevane chekuita nezvekodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka vachikurukura mitemo iyi. Hurumende inotiwo mitemo iyi inofanirwa kuti ifambirane nezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi MAZ inotiwo kuchine mitemo yakawanda inobata vatori venhau nekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka inofanirwa kutariswa. Mitemo iyi inosanganisira Official Secrets Act, Censorship and Entertainment Act, Criminal Law Codification and Reform Act pamwe ne Interception of Communications Act. No media source currently available

headline: Grain Millers Association of Zimbabwe Yoyambira Kukwira kweMutengo weChibage
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe riri kuyambira kuti mitengo yechibage nehupfu ichakwira zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma anotevera sezvo pasina kunyatsowirirana pakati pesangano iri nehurumende panyaya yekutenga chibage kunze kwenyika. Sangano iri rinoti harisi kukwanisa kupihwa mvumo negurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, kuti vatenge chibage kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBrazil. Sangano iri range richitenga chibage kuZambia asi riri kuti riri kukundikana kuti ripinze chibage kubva kuZambia nekuti marori ekutakura chibage ichi mashoma. Sangano iri rinotiwo Zambia yamira kutengesa chibage, asi izvi hazvina kujeka nekuti sangano reMillers Association of Zambia chete ndiro rakapa kurudziro iyi kuhurumende. Asi gurukora rezvekurima munyika iyi, VaGiven Lubinda, vainge vati Zambia ine chibage chakawandisa icho inofanira kutengesa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaLubinda sezvo vadaira nharembozha yavo vati vange vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka. VaMade havanawo kudaira nhare yavo. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvegwara rehurumende, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, avo vanonzi vakanyorerwa tsamba neGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, vati vari pazororo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, havanawo kudaira nharembozha yavo. Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Musarara, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumatura enyika uye pave kuda kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa. Vashorawo VaMade vachiti havasi kuda kutaura navo nezvekugadzirisa dambudziko rekushomeka kwechibage. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai Osiya Murume neVana Achinochengeta Vabereki Vainge Vabatwa neCovid-19
text: Mumwe mudzimai akaratidza hushing muHarare apo akasiya vana nemurume achienda kunochengeta vabereki vake vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Amai Constance Duchess Makoni, vanoti vakanogara kuKuwadzana 6 nevabereki vavo pamwe naambuya vavo, sezvo pakanga pasina munhu aikwanisa kuvachengeta panguva iyo zvinhu zvainge zvisina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. Amai Makoni, avo vakamboshanda semutori wenhau, vanoti mushure mekuona kuti vatatu aiva vainge vakabatwa nedzihwa rakasimba vakaronga kuvaendesa kuti vanovhenekwa kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19, asi baba vavo vakaramba kuita izvi sezvo vaiita sevari nani. Asi vakazobatwa nehurwere zvakasimba. Vanoti vakaedza kuendesa vatatu ava kuzvipatara, asi hapana chipatara chakada kuvatora. Vakayedzawo kutsvaga kutsvaga vakoti vanochengeta varwere vachigara navo pamba pavo, asi pavaingoziva kuti hurwere uhwu hwaiva hweCovid 19 vaibva varamba . Mushure mekushaya vanhu vangabatsira vabereki vavo vanoti vakatora danho guru rokusiya murume wavo nevana kumba vachimocheneta vabereki vavo. Vanoti pavaichengeta vatatu ava, havana kurara kwemazuva matatu aitevedzana, vachiita zvose zvavaiudzwa kuti vape varwere ava, zvaisanganisira kufashaidza mvura yokunatira nezvimwe, uye ivo vachigara kugara vakageza maoko avo nguva dzose, ukuwo vakapfeka mamasiki nguva dzose. Amai Makoni vanoti mbuya vavo, avo vaiva nemakore makumi masere nerimwe ekuberekwa, vakazoshaya mushure memazuva manomwe, chinova chinhu chakavarwadza zvikuru. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano kwemakore akawanda, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vanoti vanoyemura zvikuru hushingi hwaAmai Makoni vachiti vashoma vanhu vanokwanisa kuzvipira kubatsira varwere veCovid 19. Dr Parirenyatwa vanoti sezvo Covid 19 ichinyanya kubata mapapu, kunatira kunofanirwa kuitwa katatu pazuva kuitira kuti dzihwa rinobva kumhino, risadzike zvokunovhara tsinga dzinofamba nemweya unoenda kumapapu. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti vari kunyanya kufa pasi rose nechirwere ichi, vanhu vakwegura vane matenda eshuga nezvirwere zvemoyo. Dr Mudavanhu vanoti Covid 19 hairapike uye vakapa muenzaniso wezvinhu zvekutarisira kumunhu anenge abatwa nechirwere cheCovid 19 zvinenge kupisa muviri, chikosoro chakaoma nekutadza kufema zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeARTUZ Dzombokanda Mapadza Pasi kweMazuva Maviri
text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzinodarika zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana dzatevera kurudziro yaro yekuti dzisaenda kumabasa nhasi nemangwana senzira yekunyunyuta nekusatirimuka kwehurumende panyaya dzemihoro yavo. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti varairidzi vakazivisa hurumende kuti vanoda kubhadharwa mihoro yavo nemari yeku America senzira yekuti vafambidzane nemitengo yezvinhu iyo iri kuramba ichingokwira zvisina mukare akamboona. VaMasaraure vanoti varairidzi vatambira mihoro yavo nhasi asi vashamisika kuwana mari dzavo dziri muma RTGS, dzisiri dzemari yekuAmerica. Vanoti nekuderera kwaita mabhondi achienzaniswa nemari yekuAmerica, varairidzi vazhinji vatambira mari inosvika madhora makumi mashanu ichisanganisira mari dzekubatsirikana. VaMasaraure vanotiwo neMuvhuro vanyora gwaro raenda kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vachivayeuchidza nezvematambudziko ari kusangana nevarairidzi. Mamwe masangano evarairidzi ari kunyunyutawo zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara varairidzi nemari yekuAmerica, achiti achatorawo matanho ekupikisa danho iri. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakupomerwa Mhosva yeKupisa Musha weNhengo yeZanu PF Anomiswa Mudare kwaMutare
text: Imwe nhengo yeMDC Alliance yekuMutasa Central yakasungwa neMugovera, yamiswa neMuvhuro mudare kwaMutare ichipomerwa mhosva yekupisa musha wenhengo yeZanu PF. Asi mutongi wedare ati nyaya iyi ichanzwikwa mangwana. VaOzwell James Chitere vaudzwa nemutongi wedare, VaTendai Mahwe, kuti nyaya yavo ichainzwa mangwana sezvo vange vakabatikana nedzimwe nyaya dzavanga vachifanirwa kutonga. Izvi zvinoreva kuti chikumbiro chaVaChitere chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba, chava kunzwikwa neChipiri. Muchuchisi wedare, VaFletcher Karombe, vati VaChitere vakanzwikwa vachiti vachapisa misha yenhengo dzeZanu PF, mushure mekutaura mashoko aya, musha waAmai Kagweda ndokubva wapiswa svondo rapera. VaChitere vari kumirirwa nemagweta anosanganisira VaRangarirai Mubata, VaBlessing Nyamaropa naAmai Peggy Tavagadza. VaMubata vati kunyange vasiri kufara nekuramba kwaVaChitere vari muhusungwa, vanotarisira kuti mangwana nyaya iyi ichapedzwa sekuvimbisa kwaitwa naVaMahwe. Vakasarudzwa zvakare kumirira Mutasa Central mudare reparamende, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vati havafari nekuona nhengo yavo ichiramba ingori muhusungwa. Papinda nyaya iyi mudare nhasi pamuzinda wedare ramejasitiriti pange pazere nhengo dzeMDC Alliance nedzeZanu PF, pamwe nevaongorori vesarudzo veEuropean Union, America nemamwe masangano akasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotanga Kunyoresa Vanhu Kuti Vavhote Ichienda Pedyo neMisha Yavo
text: Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission ratanga chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti munharaunda dzavagere. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti vanhu vashoma ndivo vange vachinyoresa kuvhota. Pakashanyirwa imwe yenzvimbo dziri kunyoresa vavhoti neStudio 7 paTown House muHarare kwemaawa maviri hakuna akanyoresa kuvhota uye munhu mumwe akuya akanga achida kutarisa kuti zita rakerange richiri mugwaro revavhoti. Mumwe wevechidiki akanyoresa kuvhota akangoda kuzivikanwa nekuti Rumbidzai ati zvamuitira nyore chose kunyoresa sezvo awana pasina vanhu. VaTawanda Magunje vakatiwo vaenda kunonyoresa kumusha weHighfield mushure mekunge vapihwa dzidziso nebato ravo reZanu PF. Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa asina kuda kudomwa nezita akatiwo haana chaange arikuziva nezvenyaya yechirongwa cheZEC chekufamba kunzvimbo dzinowanda vanhu vachinyoresa vavhoti. ZEC iri kuita chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota ichi nyika yese kusvika musi wa28 Kukadzi. Harare nemusi weChipiri yainge iine nzvimbo dzekunyoresa makumi matatu neimwe. Amai Fiona Kurima vanove mukuru weZEC mudunhu reHarare vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe hazvo vange vasina huwandu hwevakanyoresa, pazuva rekutanga kazhinni, vashoma ndivo vanoenda kunonyoresa. Vakatiwo ZEC yakatanga kudzidzisa vanhu nezvekuuya kwechirongwa ichi muHarare nemusi wa30 Ndira. Vakatiwo chirongwa ichi ndechekungonyoresa kuvhota pamwe neavo vanoda kuchinja kwekuvhotera uye havasi kubatsira vanoda kutarisa mazita avo kuti arimo here mugwaro revavhoti. Vatiwo veZEC vachange vachifamba nzvimbo dzakasiya siyana pamazuva akatarwa aya. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZEC Amai Leticia Kazembe kuti tinzwe huwandu hwevanyoresa kuvhota muzuva rekutanga. Asi ZEC inoti vari kunyoresa ava havakwanisi kuvhota musarudzo dzemaby-elections muna Kurume asi vanokwanisa kuvhita muna 2023. No media source currently available

headline: VaMavima Vanoti Hapana Dambudziko paNyaya yeMari Dziri Kutambiriswa Vashandi veHurumende
text: Gurukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, varamba kuti pane dambudziko remari dzemihoro dziri kutambiriswa vashandi vachiti hurumende yaita zvose zvainokwanisa kuti vatambire mari dziri nani. VaMavima vashora zvikuru rimwe sangano revarairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti ARTUZ, vachiti riri kushandidswa sembato nevekunze kuda kukonzera kusagadzikana vashandi vakawanda vehurumende vari kuchema chema kuti mari dzavari kutambira hadzisi kukwana uye vamwe vatotanga kuramwa mabasa. VaMavima vati varairidzi vachangotanga basa vari kutambiriswa mari inosvika pazviuru makumi matatu kana kuti 30 000 RTGS. Sangano reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinoti mhuri yevanhu vatanhatu yave kuda mari inosvika zviru zvina nechimwe zvine mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti RTGS’s 41, 235 pamwedzi kuti ikwanise kurarama zvakanaka. Asi vachipindura mashoko aVaMavima, munyori mukuru musangano reARTUZ, VaRobson Chere, varamba kuti vari kushandiswa nevekunze vachiti iyi hurumende ndiyo iri kushandiswa neInternational Monetary Fund kudzvinyirira vashandi. Vati mari iri kupihwa varairidzi haikwane zvachose.

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reMagamba VaMugabe Vachishora Vanopikisa
text: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva remagamba nemusi weMuvhuro mutungamiriri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe vachishora zvakaitwa nemasoja zvekurova mapurisa nguva pfupi yapfuura vachiti izvi zvinokanganisa mabasa ekuchengetedza nyika. Vachitaura pamarinda eHeroes Acre, VaMugabe vakati vakataura nevakuru-vakuru vemasoja vakavaudza kuti izvi hazvifaniri kuitika zvakare. VaMugabe vatiwo vanoda runyararo sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mukuru webato re Multi Racial Christian Democracts, VaMathias Guchutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMugabe akanaka chose sezvo nyika ichifanira kuva nerunyararo. VaMugabe vakashorawo vamwe varimi vechitema avo vati vave kushanda nevamwe varimi vechichena avo vakambenge vatiza munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika akashorawo vamwe vanhu vemuZimbabwe avo vati vanotsigira zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzakaita seBritain. Vakaenderera mberi vachitiwo hazvigoni kuti nhengo dzebato rinopikisa dziradzikwe panzvimbo inovigwa magamba yeHeroes Acre. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJonstone Chirwai vaudza Studio 7 kuti zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye vanhu vemuZimbabwe vano remekedza magamba kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro emamwe magamba akaita semutungamiriri wenyika VaMugabe. Vatiwo zuva remagamba izuva ravanonyanyorangarira magamba aya asina kudzoka kubva huhondo. Mukuru webato rinopikisa reFreezim Congress, VaJoseph Busha vati zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye magamba ose anofanira kuchengetedzwa nehurumende. Mumashoko avo pazuva remagamba, mutungamiriri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democractic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vati zuva riri rakakosha chose uyewo zvinofadza kuti vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vave kuonawo kuti vakarwira munhu mumwe chete nemhuri yake. Vakaendera mberi vachiti magamba akarwisa hurumende yehudzvanyiriri yeRhodesia asi hapana kana mutsauko uripo pakati payo nehurumende yaVaMugabe. VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vese vanofanira kunyoresa kuti vavhote musarudzo dzegore rinouya kuitira kuti vachengetedze rusununguko rwavo. Vatiwo vechidiki havafanire kubatwa kumeso naVaMugabe pamisangano yavari kuita mumatunhu akasiyana siyana, vachiti vechidiki ava vanofanira kuziva kuti remangwana renyika riri mumaoko mavo. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri KuBritain Zvoronga Kuratidzira Kwakasimba
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuBritain zvine hurongwa hwekuungana zvichiratidzira mukupera kwesvondo pasi pehurongwa huri kutungamirwa nesangano rinorwira hutongo hwejekerere, reFree Zimbabwe Advocacy Group. Sachigaro wesangano iri, VaJoshua Chigwangwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekupa mukana kuvana veZimbabwe wekuti vazivise pasi rose nezve mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemamiriro azvehupfumi. Hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwuri kuitwa pasi pezita rekuti #zimbabweriseupuktour2016, hwakaonawo sangano iri richikoka varwiri vekodzero vanoti Vasten Zvorwadza, Doctor Patson Dzamara, Muzvare Linda Masarira pamwe nePastor Evan Mawarire ve#thisflag. VaqChigwangwa vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwaifanirwa kutanga neMuvhuro wesvondo rino, asi vakasangana nematambudziko akaita kuti hunonoke, akaita sekunonoka kugadziriswa kwemagwaro ekufambisa aPastor Mawarire pamwe neDoctor Dzamara, asi iye zvino zvinhu zvave kufamba zvakanaka. Vanoti pane hurongwa hwekuti Pastor Mawarire vanotaurawo pamisangano yavakakokwa nemasangano anosanganisira Chatham House pamwe neparamende yeBritain. No media source currently available

headline: EU Yobatsiea Vechidiki neMamiriyoni Mashanu eMadhora
text: Sangano reEuropean Union neChishanu razivisa kuti richashandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni mashanu emadhora mumabasa ekusimudzira vechidiki pamwe nekuvapa mukana wekupinda muzvirongwa zvebudiriro munyika. Mugwaro raburitswa nemuzinda wesangano iri muHarare neChishanu, European Union yati mari iyi ichapihwa kumasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, makanzuru pamwe nemakambani akazvimirira kuti ashande nevechidiki kuvapa mukana wekuti vaite mabasa ebudiriro kuti vazvisimudzire mukurarama kwavo. EU inoti panofanira kuve nemikana yakaenzana uye vechidiki vanofanira kupihwa mukana wekushandisa zviwanikwa, kuwaniswa mabasa nemikana yekutangawo mabhizimisi avo. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinofadza kuti apo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika, pane dzimwe nyika dziri kurangarira vechidiki munyika. Mukuru wesanganio reYouth Forum, VaWellington Zindove, vanoti zvinotendwa kuti sangano reEU rinoramba richibatsira vechidiki munyika umo mune kutambura kukuru. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti rubatsiro rweEU rwakanaka chose sezvo rune chinangwa chekubatsira vechidiki avo vakasarira zvikuru muzvirongwa zvebudiriro. Sangano reEU rinoti donzvo guru raro kubatsira kupedza hurombo muZimbabwe uye kuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka, pasina mhirizhonga kana hudzvanyiriri. Kunze kwerubatsiro kune vechidiki, EU inotsigirawo Zimbabwe nekutenga chikafu, mabasa ekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nezvimwe zvakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Vochenesa Guta Ravo reChinhoyi
text: Vechidiki vedzisvondo vari kubatana nekanzuru yeChinhoyi mukuchenesa guta ravo pamwe nenzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji kuitira kuti vadzivirire zvirwere zvinobatwa nekuda kwemvura yakasviba. Vechidiki ava vanosvika makumi mashanu, vachibva kumasangano akasiyana siyana, vakafamba vachinhonga marara pamwe nekubvisa tsvina munofamba nemvura kuti isajenge kana kuyeredza tsvina ichienda munzvimbo munotorwa mvura yekunwa nevamwe vanhu izvo zvinozokonzeresa kuti varware. Mumwe wechidiki, Memory Godzwa, anonamata neApostolic Faith Mission, AFM, anoti apinda muchirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda kuti adzivirire zvirwere muvanhu pamwe nekufa kwezvipuka zvinogara mumvura kana mvura yakasviba. Mumwe wechidiki, Jonathan Manyere, uyo anonamata nechechi yeFaith Ministry mumusha unogara veruzhinji weChikonohono, anoti kuchenesa nharaunda kwevechidiki vedzichechi dzakasiyana vari pamwechete zvinosimbaradza humwe pakati pemachechi. Mukuru wechirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda, VaVisitor Munangi, vanoti vakaona kuti zvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekunaya kwemvura zvinowanda nekunaya kwemvura. Mumwe wevakuru vemubatanidzwa wemachechi, Rev Andrew Chikomo, vanoti danho rakatora machechi rinoratidza pachena kuti machechi havatarise pane zvemweya chete, asi kuti vane hany'a nehutano hwenhengo dzavo. VaMunangi vanoti chirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda mutoro wevanhu vose nekudaro vachakoka vemamwe masangano asiri emachechi pamwe nevana vechikoro kuti vadyare pfungwa yekuita hany'a nekusviba kwenharaunda. VaChikomo vanoti vachatanga kuisa pekurasira marara munzvimbo dzakawanda kuti munhu asafambe akabata marara kwenguva yakareba asati asvika pane bhini. No media source currently available

headline: Mertesacker odemberera Wenger
text: anoti Arsene Wenger achiri nesimba rekuramba achirairidza nhabvu kana akabva kuArsenal pachapera mwaka uno.   Wenger achabva kuEmirates Stadium pachapera mwaka uno izvo zvaakataura svondo radarika achiti achabva kuchikwata ichi chaakarairidza kwemakore 22.   Vanhu vari kuda kuona kuti shasha iyi ichasendeka here kurairidza nhabvu kana kuti achatsvaga chimwe chikwata chekutungamirira.   Svondo radarika, Wenger akataura kuti acharamba achiita mabasa akasiyana mumutambo wenhabvu.   Wenger akataura chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda West Ham 4-1 achiti haana kuneta.   Kaputeni wechikwata chake – Per Mertesacker – anoti anofunga kuti chizvarwa chekuFrance ichi chichiri nezvakawanda zvekuita munhabvu abva kuArsenal.   “Takashamisika ndicho chekutanga, tingangobaikana ndicho chokwadi,” Mertesacker akadaro achitaura nezvemashoko akabva kuna Wenger svondo radarika ekuti achasiya kurairidza Arsenal.   “Unotozviona kuti achiri nezvakawanda maari uye simba rekuti anogona kuramba achirairidza chikwata ichi chiende mberi kana kune zvimwe zvikwata.” – SportsMail Football

headline: VaJob Sikhala Votanga Kutongwa Muna Ndira Gore Rinouya
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vaudzwa nedare redzimhosva kuMasvingo kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa inofanirwa kuenda kunotongwa nedare repamusoro, sezvo vari kupomerwa mhosva huru ine chekuita nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. VaSikhala vakasungwa muna Chikunguru vachipomerwa mhosva yekutaura mashoko anonzi nehurumende aive akanangana nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori anoona nezvemitemo muMDC, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti havana kufara nedanho iri sezvo zvose zviri kuitwa zviriine chinangwa chekushungurudza VaSikhala, avo vanove nhengo inomirira Zengeza West mudare reNational Assembly. VaGonese vanoti vachaenda kudare iri panotanga kunzwikwa nyaya yaVaSikhala vachivatsigira sezvo VaSikhala vasina mhosva yavakapara. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vofa Munjodzi dzeMumigwagwa
text: Mutauriri wemapurisa, Chief Supritendent Paul Nyathi, vanoti vanhu makumi mana nevasere vashaya kubva musi wa 15 Zvita kusvika pari zvino munjodzi dzemumigwagwa. Masvingo ndiyo inonzi ine vanhu vakawandisa vashaya munjodzi dzemumugwagwa vanove gumi nevana. Kune vamwe vanonzi vashaya vakawanda kuMatabeleland South neMidilands. Mapurisa anoti pane njodzi mazana manomwe negumi nemasere dzitika pari zvino zvichienzaniswa nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe. Vanhu vakuwara gore rino vanosvika mazana mashanu zvichienzaniswa nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevana gore rapera. Mapurisa anoti kusatyaira zvakanaka ndiko kwopa kuti njodzi dzirambe dzichiwanda.

headline: Harare Agriculture Show Yotanga
text: Kuratidzirwa kwezvirimwa, mabhizimisi nemamwe mabasa paHarare Agricultural Show kwakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro muHarare vanoronga showa vachikurudzira veruzhinji kupinda muchiitiko ichi kuti vawane mikana yekutanga mabhizimisi pamwe nekusimudzira mabasa ekurima. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Agricultural Society, varongi veHarare Agricultural Show, VaIvan Craig, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti huwandu hwevari kuratidza zvirimwa, mabhizimisi nemabasa hwakakwira nezvikamu gumi nezviviri kubva muzana gore rino uye vanotarisira kuti show yegore rino ichanikidza kudarika gore rapfuura. Vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaende kuHarare Agricultural Show uko vati kunodzidzwa zvakawanda pane nekutandara. VaCraig vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti varimi vakaunza zvipfuwo nembeu dzemhando yepamusoro gore rino. Vatiwo kunze kwekudzidza zvekurima nemabhizimisi, kuchange kuine mafaro nevaimbi vakawanda pamwe nekutandadzwa nevamauto, mapurisa nezvikwata zvakasiyana siyana. Mukutandara imomo veBuy Zimbabwe avo vanokurudzira kugadzirwa nekutengeswa kwezvinhu munyika vanoti vachange vachishambadzawo zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno. Mukuru weBuy Zimbabwe Zimbabwe, VaMunyaradzi Hwengwere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gore rino vachange vachisanganisa mafaro nekupemberera hunyanzvi hwevana vemuZimbabwe. Imwe kambani iri kuratidzira gore rino IFlying Leopard Limited limited iyo inogadzira midziyo inorerutsira vanhu kutakura zvinhu yakaita semabhara anodhonzwa nemabhasikoro. VaDuncan Nyathi vanoti midziyo yavanogadzira inokwanisawo kushandiswa nevanhu vanoita mabhizimisi echidiki vakaita sevanotengesa mumigwagwa. Show yegore rino iyo iri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti Field to Industry: Produce. Connect Develop ichavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChishanu. Varimi nevamabhizimisi vanotarisirwa kubuda nemibairo inosvika zana rezviuru zviuru zvemadhora gore rino. Gore rapfuura vanhu zviuru mazana maviri (200 000) vakapinda muHarare Agricultural Show uye gore rino panotarisirwa kuti pachapinda vanhu zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu. (250 000).

headline: Zifa yokumbira FIFA
text: AKAFANOBATA chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Gift Banda, anoti vakanyorera kuFIFA vachikumbira kuti Zimbabwe idzorwe mumhuri yenhabvu yepasi rose zvichitevera zvirango zvayakatemerwa izvo zvakaona ichiburitswa mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations.   Svondo radarika, sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakazivisa kuti Banda ndiye akafanobata chigaro chemukuru weZifa zvichitevera kumiswa basa kwakaitwa Felton Kamambo achipomerwa mhosva yekuti aive asiri kuita basa rake nemazvo.   Kamambo akamiswa basa pamwe chete neaive mutevedzeri wake, Philemon Machana naBrighton Malandure uyo aive nhengo yebhodhi raaitungamirira.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Banda anoti yakwana nguva yekugadzirisa nhabvu yemuZimbabwe kuti ichisimukira igove nechiremerera chakanaka.   Zvichitevera kugadzwa kwaakaitwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi, Banda anoti bhodhi rake rakatonyorera kuFIFA richikumbira kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvibviswe.   “Takanyorera kuFIFA svondo radarika neChishanu tichivazivisa patasvika panyaya dzenhabvu dzemuno uye tichikumbira kuti zvirango zvavakaisa zvibviswe. Kutaura kuno takamirira kunzwa kubva kuFIFA asi tinoziva kuti tiri kutarisira kugamuchira mashoko anofadza kubva kwavari.   “Hakuna nyika inopihwa zvirango neFIFA zvoramba zviripo zvachose, zvinotobva chete. Saka isu tinovimba kuti muhurukuro dzatiri kuita neFIFA tichasvika apo patichawirirana kuti zvirango zvatakatemerwa zvigobviswa,” anodaro.   Mumwedzi yadarika, vatambi vemaWarriors vakaita saKhama Billiat naKnowledge Musona vakasendeka shangu dzavo dzekutambira chikwata chenyika ichi kuchiti vamwe vanotambira kuEngland vakadai saTendayi Darikwa vange vave kutsvaga zvikonzero zvakasiyana zvekusauya kuzotamba nekuda kwezvinyunyuto zvakare.   Banda anoti anozviziva kuti vatambi vazhinji vane zvinyunyuto nekudaro bhodhi rake richaona kuti ragara pasi nevatambi vose vonzwa zvichemo zvavo pamwe nekuzama kuzvigadzirisa.   “Tiri kutanga patsva kugadzirisa zvinhu zvose zvine chekuita nenhabvu yemuno muZimbabwe.   Chimwe chinhu chikuru chatinoda kuita kugara pasi nevatambi vedu vose vemuno nevekuEurope tonzwa zvinyunyuto zvavo isu toshanda kuzvigadzirisa.   “Vatambi vedu vane chitsama vanotambira nhabvu yavo kunze kwenyika vange vave kusada kuuya nekuda kwezvinyunyuto zvakawanda. Saka tiri kuzvigadzirisa zvose, tozofamba pamwe chete tichifara,” anodaro.   Banda anoti rimwe basa guru riripo pari zvino kuona kuti nhandare dzinotambirwa nhabvu dzagadziriswa dzisvike padanho rinotarisirwa neFIFA neCAF.   “Ino ndiyo nguva yekuti tigadzirise zvinhu zvose tivake patsva nhabvu yedu muno. Dai takanzi titambe mitambo yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON shuwa zvaibuda here tichinotambira kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seZambia, Mozambique neSouth Africa?   “Zvange zvisingambobude, isu tiri kuda kuti mitambo yedu inge ichitambirwa muno. Saka nguva ino ndiyo yekugadzirisa zvose zvange zvakakanganisika zvigotibatsira kuti nhabvu yedu painodzorwa zvinhu zvose zvinge zvakarongeka.   “Vanhu pavanotaura nezvezvikwata zvenyika, vanongofunga maWarriors chete asi tine zvemaUnder-15, 17, 21, 23 nezvimwe zvemazera akasiyana. Saka toda kuti kwese kubva kune vechidiki kunge kwakarongeka,” anodaro Banda.

headline: Vana veChikoro Mazana Matatanhatu neMakumi Mashanu neVasere (658) Vobatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Kubva Zvavhurwa Zvikoro
text: Vana vechikoro mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevasere vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumazuva mapfumbamwe adarika chete. Nemusi weChitatu pavanhu pavanhu mazana matanhatu nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, zana nemakumi manomwe nevashanu vacho vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vavezviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemana nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 234 589. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevasere.

headline: Hurumende Yoshorerwa Chinono paKuvandudza Mitemo Yakaita sePOSA neAIPPA
text: Nyika dzakawanda dzakabudirira dziri kuratidza pachena kuti hadzisi kufara nekukundikana kwehurumende yeZimbabwe kuvandudza mitemo inonzi iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu uye yezvekudyidzana munyaya dzekutengeserana. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter nhasi kuti pavanhu mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu vari muZimbabwe, vanhu zana nemakumi mana chete ndivo vakatongerwa zvirango uye America ichabvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vatungamiri venyika chete kuburikidza nemutemo weZIDERA ndokunge vaunza hutongo hwejekerere. Kushorwa uku kwapa kuti hurumende iite chipatapata kutumira makurukota ayo kuti aite misangano nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika vachitaura nezvemitemo yavanoti vari kuvandudza kusanganisa yakaita sePOSA neAIPPA. Nezuro gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vakasangana nevamiriri veBritain neCanada kumahofisi avo eMunhumutapa. Gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti vari kusangana nevamwe vamiriri vedzimwe nyika ava vachivaudza nezvavari kuita panyaya yekuvandudza mitemo. Vanoti vakatosangana nevamiriri kubva kunyika gumi dzakabudirira. No media source currently available Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vari kuitawo zvimwe chetezvo. Asi vanopikisa nemasangano anoongorora zvemitemo akaita seVeritas vanoti hurumende iri kungobata vekunze kumeso nekuti hakuna zvakawanda zvairi kuvandudza. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vanoti hurumende haina zvairi kuita kuvandudza zvinhu uye vachapikisa mabhiri ose achaunzwa kudare reparamende nekuti anopa hurumende mukana wekuramba ichimbunyikdza vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yotyira Kuti Vashandi Vachagumurwa kuCBZ Vachanonga Svosve neMuromo
text: Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti kusamira zvakanaka kwemitemo yevashandi kwave kupa kuti vashandi vakaita sevave kudzingwa mabasa kuCBZ vamanikidzwe kuenda pamudyandigere vasina chavainacho. CBZ inoti iri kumisa vanhu mabasa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye yave kushandisa michina yakawanda. Mutsamba kuvashandi, mukuru webhanga reCBZ, VaBlessing Mudavanhu, vakati kutanga nezuro kusvika musi wa 18 Chibabvu vashandi vaizozvipira kuenda pamudyandigere asi vakakundikana vaizotanga kumanikidzwa kusiya basa muna Chikumi. Vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu zvakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kushandiswawo kwemichina yechizvino zvino. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumabhanga uye vashandi vari panyanga dzamushore sezvo vachipihwa mari shoma mushure mekumanikidzwa kusiya basa. Vanoti mutemo unofanira kuvandudzwa kuti vashandi vawane chouviri. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers’ Union, VaShepard Ngandu, vatiwo havakwanise kumirira vashandi kana vazvipira voga kusiya basa asi kana vatanga kumanikidzwa vanopindira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri wesangano revemabhanga reBankers’ Association of Zimbabwe, VaRalph Watungwa, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vakatomboyambira kuvatori venhau kuti nekuda kwemichina vashandi vacharasikirwa nemabasa. Gukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachaita musangano nevebazi ravo kuti vazeye zviri kutaurwa nevashandi panyaya yemudyandigere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati panoda mubatira pamwe chuma chemuzukuru vachiti hurumende munguva ino yeCovid-19 inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi nevashandirwi yoona kuti nyika ingabude sei mukanwa mamupere. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati kumiswa kwebasa kwevashandi hakusi kuvashandisa nekuti hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka zviri kukonzerwa nekusagadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vati zvakakosha kuti vashandi vazvisimudzire panyaya yedzidzo yehumhizha nehumhetura sezvo michina yechizvino zvino yave kushandiswa nemabhanga inoda vashandi vashoma. Asi vakuru vanoti havo panomera muswe panonyerekedza nekuti bhanga iri range ravhara mamwe mapazi muHarare anoti Samora Machel, Cripps Road, Highfield, Msasa, Sapphire House uye Belmont kuBulawayo. Mamwe akavharwa anosanganisira, Gutu, Checheche, Gwanda, Nembudziya, Chegutu ne Nyanga. Bhanga iri range richikurudzira vanhu kuti vashandise nharembozha nemasaisai eInternet pazvirongwa zvaro zvinoti CBZ G-Touch, Internet Banking uye kushandisa makadhi. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhanga Otambira Minda seChibatiso
text: Mabhanga emunyika akazivisa neChishanu chapfuura kuti ave kuzotambira sechibatiso chekuti murimi akwerete mari zvibvumirano zvekushandisa minda zvemakore makumi mapfumambwe nemapfumbamwe zvakapiwa kuvarimi vakagariswa patsva nehurumende. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti danho remabhanga iri rakaziviswa svondo rapera nemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira mabhanga emunyika, weBankers Association of Zimbabwe, Doctor Charity Jinya, pavaipindura mubvunzo wainge wabvunzwa negurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, wekuti sei mabhanga achiramba kutambira zvibvumirano izvi, kana kuti ma lease. Kare mabhanga airamba kutambira zvibvumirano izvi sechibatiso achiti hapana chinotsinhira kuti anozopiwa mari dzawo kana murimi akakundikana kubhadhara chikwereti ichi sezvo minda iri yehurumende. Mutungamiri wesangano revarimi reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers Union, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti varimi vanotambira nemufaro shanduko iyi, sezvo zvikwanisiro ranga ragara riri iro dambudziko guru riri kuvatadzisa kushandisa minda zvine pundutso. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Votaura kuMusangano weUnited Nations nezveMinda neKuvandudza IMF
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChishanu vakataura pamusangano weUnited Nations wechishanu muchikamu chechimakumi manomwe kana kuti 5th Plenary meeting, 70th Session, Sustainable Development Summit 2015. VaMugabe vakaudza musangano uyu kuti muZimbabwe hurumende yavo yakapa vanhu minda kuri kuyedza kuvaburitsa munhamo. VaMugabe vakati izvi vakazviita kunyangwe hazvo paine vamwe vaishora chirongwa ichi zvikuru kubva kunyika dzakabudirira. VaMugabe vakati chirongwa chekugovera minda patsva change chabatsira vanhu vakawanda. VaMugabe vakakurudzira nyika dzose dzepasi rino kuti dzibatane kuti dzikwanise kuzadzikisa zviga zveUnited Nations zvekubatsira varombo. VaMugabe vakatiwo mabhanga akaita sereInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank anofanira kuvandudzwa mashandiro avo. VaMugabe vanoti izvi zvingadai zvakaitwa kare kare. Vanoti kuita izvi kunobatsira kubatsira nyika dzevarombo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu riri kumusangano uyu Amai Nyaradzayi Gumbonzvanda vakakurudzira vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rino kuti vaendese mari yakawanda kuzvirongwa zvekubatsira vanhu kwete mukurwisana. No media source currently available

headline: Zambuko reKazungula Rozeyiwa neZvaro
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kupesana pfungwa panyaya yekuti Zimbabwe inowana chouviri here pazambuko reKazungula kana kuti kwete. Zambuko iri riri pakati peZimbabwe, Zambia neBotswana. Zimbabwe iyo yakange yambobuda mumushandirapamwe neBotswana neZambia muna 2010 inoti yakazoona zvakakosha kuti ipindezve muhurongwa uhu. Nemusi weSvondo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakabatana nemutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana, VaIan Khama, uye mutungamiri weZambia, VaEdgar Lungu, kuti vaone zvaitwa pari zvino pakuvakwa kwezambuko reKazungula riri pakati penyika nhatu idzi. Asi nekuda kwekusawirana nevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, zambuko iri riri kuvakwa richinyenyeredza Zimbabwe richienda kuNamibia zvishoma. Izvi zvapa kuti mari yekurivaka iwande sezvo rakazowedzera nemamwe makiromita mazana matatu. VaMnangagwa mushure memusangano naVaKhama vakati vaida kuti Zimbabwe idzoke muhurongwa uhu. Chibvumirano chiripo ndechekuti Zimbabwe ipinde muchikamu chepiri apo ichavakirwa One Stop Border Post kudivi reBotswana. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano re Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa zvinokudzwa zvikuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvehupfumi vari mukuru wezvedzidzo paZimbabwe Ezekiel Gutu University Doctor Gift Mugano vanoti zambuko iri rakakosha kuZimbabwe. Asi Doctor Mugano vatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe isangoti yapinda muchibvumirano asi isingakwanise kushandisa zambuko iri nemazvo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wePeople's Democratic Party, uye vari vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, avo vati zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise mugwagwa weHarare Chirundu sezvo uri iwo ungabatsira mukupundutsa nyika. Doctor Mugano vanoti kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire zvinotoda kuti nyika ive nezvivakwa zvakaita semazambuko aya uye migwagwa. Asi VaJokonya vanoti kunyangwe mugwagwa weHarare kusvika kuBeitbridge wakakosha, zambuko reKazungula harifanire kutarisirwa pasi. Zambuko reKazungula riri kutarisirwa kushandisa mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora uye chikwereti kubva kukambani yekuJapan yeInternational Cooperation, African Development Bank neEU-Africa Infrastructure Trust Fund. Kuvakwa kwezambuko iri kuri muzvikamu zvitatu, chekutanga izambuko rine njanji yakareba makiromita mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nematatu, chikamu chechipiri ndeche One Stop Border Post kuBotswana chekupedzisira kuZambia. Zvose zvinoda kuitwa zvinotarisira kupera muna Zvita gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Tino Kadewere anyora nhoroondo
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neReal Club Deportivo Mallorca yekuSpain — Tinotenda Philana Kadewere — akapemberera kunyora kwaakaita nhoroondo yekuve wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutamba nhabvu muligi reSpanish LaLiga.   Kadewere akatamba mutambo wake wekutanga wemuLaLiga svondo radarika apo chikwata chake chakasangana neGetafe mumutambo uyo Mallorca yakakundwa 2-0.   Mumutambo uyu, Kadewere akatanga ari pabhenji ndokuzopinda kwapera maminitsi 84 achitsiva Lee Kang-In, chizvarwa chekuSouth Korea.   Izvi zvakaona Kadewere achinyora nhoroondo yekuve mutambi wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutambira muLaLiga Santander.   Svondo rino, Kadewere – uyo ari kuMallorca nechikwereti kubva kuOlympique Lyon yekuFrance – akanyora papeji rake repaFacebook kuti: “Nhoroondo yanyorwa, record yekutamba mutambo wekutanga weLaLiga, ndinokutendai RCD Mallorca.”   Paakaenda kuMallorca munaNyamavhuvhu 2020, Kadewere akasvika akakuvara izvo zvakaona achipedza nguva refu achimborapwa zvakamutadzisa kutambira chikwata chake chitsva ichi.   Paakazopora, mutambo waKadewere wekut anga achitambira Mallorca waive weCopa del Rey wakatambwa munaMbudzi uyo Mallorca yakakunda CD Autol 6-0.    Tino Kadewere   Mumutambo uyu, Kadewere akatanga ari pabhenji ndokupinda kwapera maminitsi 46 uye ndokunwisawo.   Akazotambazve mumwe mutambo weCopa del Rey munaZvita 2020 apo Mallorca yakakunda Real Union 1-0. Mumutambo uyu, akatanga ari pabhenji zvekare ndokuzopinda kwapera maminitsi 77 achitsiva Lee Kang-In.   Zvichitevera kunyora kwaakaita nhoroondo svondo radarika, vatsigiri venhabvu vakawanda vakamhanya kukorokotedza Kadewere vachimutumira mashoko papeji rake.   Muimbi Romeo Gasa akanyora achiti: “Makorokoto, ramba uchishanda nesimba uye uchitamba nesimba zvaunokwanisa.”   Panashe Garande anoti: “Tinodada newe! Tinokushuvira zvakanaka chete Tino.”   Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu anonzi Tinaye Gumbati anoti ari kuisa Kadewere muminamato yake kuti akwanise kutamba mitambo yakawanda.   “Makorokoto Tino ndakakuona. Tiri kukunamatira utambe mitambo yakawanda wena,” anodaro Gumbati.   Vamwe vatambi vakanyora nhoroondo vanosanganisira Peter Ndlovu uyo akaita wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe nemuAfrica kutamba nhabvu muEnglish Premier League mugore ra1992 apo aitambira Coventry kuchiti Benjani Mwaruwari akaita wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kutamba nhabvu muFrench Ligue 1 achitambira AJ Auxerre.   Murairidzi weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza, akaita mutambi wekutanga wemuno kutamba kuTurkey uko akatambira Galatasaray kuchiti Knowledge Musona ndiye akaita wekutanga kutambira muGermany Bundesliga apo aitambira TSG Hoffinheim.   Mushakabvu Freddy Mukwesha ndiye akaita wekutanga kubva muno kutambira kuPortugal uko akatambira Sporting de Braga.

headline: Vanhukadzi Vozeya Zvipingaidzo Zvavo Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
text: Apo nyika iri kugadzirira sarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino, vanhukadzi vakawanda vari kuchema nerekuti havasi kuwaniswa mikana inokodzera kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo nepamusana pezvimhinga mupinyi zvakawanda.\n\nMurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uye vachitungamira sangano re #This Constitution, Our Constitution, Muzvare Abigail Mupambi, vanoti vanhukadzi vave kushaya mikana yekupinda mune zevmatongerwo enyika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyanas-siyana. Muzvare Mupambi vanoti vanhukadzi vari kuodzwa moyo nemabatirwo avanoitwa zvikuru nevanhurume, dzimwe nguva vachishungurudzwa. Munyori mukuru weboka reWomen’s Committee musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, avo vari kuda kumirira Bulawayo metropolitan mubato reMDC T pasi pechikamu cheProportional Representation, vanotiwo kushaya mari nderimwe rematambudziko akatarisana nevanhukadzi vanenge vachida kupinda mune zvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Natasha Karimakwenda, avo vari kuda kukwikwidza pachinzvimbo chehukanzura vakazvimirira vega, vanotiwo vanhukadzi vanopinda mune zvematongerwo enyika vanosangana nezvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda, vachiti vakaona zvakanaka kuti vakwikwidze vakazvimirira vega nekuti mapato akawanda haanyatsotsigira vanhukadzi vanoda kupinda pazvigaro zvakasiyana siyana. Asi Muzvare Karimakwenda vanoti havawone kuve nemari chiri chinhu chakakosha pakuve mutungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika. Mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vanoti kunze kwekuvhiringidzwa nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana nevanhurume, rimwe dambudziko revanhukadzi, inyaya yekuvhiringidzana pachavo. Muzvare Majome vanoti sezvo vanhukadzi vakawanda munyika kupfuura vanhurume, vanofanirwa kushandisa mukana uyu vachitsigirana mukupinzana muzvigaro zvematongerwo enyika. Gweta rinoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Women Lawyers Association, Amai Sethule Ncube, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhukadzi vapinde muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri nekuti ndivo vanonyatsonzwisisa matambudziko akasiyana-siyana avanosangana nawo zuva nezuva. Amai Ncube vanoti panofanirwa kuve nemitemo yakajeka inotsigira kupinda kwemadzimai muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika. Asi Amai Tanyanyiwa vanoti mitemo inobatsira kusimudzira vanhukadzi yavepo, asi chinodiwa ndechekuti mitemo iyi iwonekwe kuti yanyatsoshanda. Kune chirevo chekuti ukasimudzira munhukadzi unenge wasimudzira nyika yose. Madzimai anoti zvakakosha kuti pave nematanho akajeka anobatsira kuti vanhukadzi munyika vapinde muzvinzvimbo zvehutungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika. Madzimai akawanda anoti kana izvi zvikasaitwa, kuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi munyika kuchangoramba zviri zviroto. No media source currently available

headline: ‘TAGADZIRIRA LIVERPOOL’. . . tichigara hedu kuStodart: Chipandu
text: MUMAZUVA makumi matanhatu nemana ari kutevera, chikwata chenyika chemutambo wenetball – icho chinozivikanwa nezita rekuti maGems – chichange chotatsurana nedzimwe shasha dzemutambo uyu kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Nyika gumi nenhanhatu dzichakwikwidza munhandare yeEcho Arena kubva musi wa12 kusvika 21 Chikunguru uye gadziriro dzemutambo mukuru uyu dzasvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti ari kushushikana nekugunun’una kuri kuita vamwe vatsigiri vemutambo uyu.   Izvi zvinobva pakuti mazuva mashoma adarika, vamwe vatsigiri vakanyunyuta vachiti sei maGems ari kugara kuMbare munguva yegadziriro dzavo?   Gurukota revechidiki, mitambo nezvekutandara, Dr Kirsty Coventry, vakanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter vachiti, “. . . kubva zvandakagara pasi nevatungamiri venetball gore rakapera muna Mbudzi, gadziriro dziri kufamba negwara chairo.   “Takavavimbisa rutsigiro rwuzere maringe neWorld Cup uye nazvino tiri kuvatsigira uye hatisi kuzosanduka.”   Chipandu anoti Hurumende iri kuvatsigira zvizere pagadziriro dzechikwata ichi.   “Hurumende iri kutsigira zvizere chikwata chemaGems mugadziriro dzeWorld Cup yatatarisana nayo munaChikunguru.   “Pari zvino, (Hurumende) yakatobhadhara imwe yemari inodiwa kuti tikwanise kukwikwidza mumitambo iyi.   “Imwe yemari yasara, Hurumende yakavimbisa kuti ichabhadhara zvizere nenguva inodiwa,” anodaro Chipandu.   Pari zvino chikwata ichi chiri kuUganda uko kwachiri kukwikwidzana necheko cheShe Cranes segadziriro dzeWorld Cup.   Chipandu anoti kuburirira kwerwendo urwu kunoratidza kuti Hurumende iri kutsigira zvizere chikwata ichi.   Panyaya yekugara kwemaGems kuMbare, Chipandu anoti Mbare Stodart Netball Complex ine nhoroondo yakakosha kuvatambi.   “Munhandare yeStodart Netball Complex mune hudzamu hurimo kuvatambi venetball, nhoroondo yatinovimba kuti yakatikoshera patiri kugadzirira World Cup.   “Takakokwa kunzi tiuye kuzogara kuBelvedere Technical Teachers’ College nekuZESA Training Grounds asi nzvimbo idzi takati tichazodzishandisa pane dzimwe gadziriro.   “Stodart zvakare ndiyo nzvimbo inozivikanwa nevatsigiri vedu, naizvozvo takaona zvakakosha kuti tigare ikoko kuitira vatsigiri,” anodaro.   MaGems anotarisirwa kusimuka musi wa7 Chikunguru akananga kuEngland.   Mukuenda mhiri kwemwakungwa, Chipandu anoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vasikana vose vari makumi maviri vari kuita gadziriro vaende.   Pagadziriro idzi, ndipo pachabviswa gumi nevana vachanotamba kuWorld Cup.   “Tinoda kutakura chikwata chose pakuenda kuEngland.   “Aka ndekekutanga kuti Zimbabwe isvike kuWorld Cup naizvozvo tinoda kuti vatambi vedu vaende vaine zvakakwana zvokunotambisa zvichireva kuti isu tinofanira kutsigirana neHurumende mukutsvaga rubatsiro,” anodaro Chipandu.   Patience Kabanda wekuSports and Recreation Commission anotsinhira kuti gadziriro dzechikwata ichi dziri kufamba negwara kwaro.   Anoti ZINA yakatoendesa magwaro ehurongwa hwayo naizvozvo Hurumende iri mubishi kuti igadzirise zvose zvinodiwa.   “Zvinosuwisa chaizvo kuti vamwe vari kutaura zvakasunama maringe negadziriro idzi, asi zvinova zvisiri izvo zviri kuitika.   “Gadziriro dziri mugwara uye seSRC, tiri kuvatsigira zvizere nekuvapa zvose zvinodiwa.   “Tinovimbisa kuti vasikana vachafamba zvakanaka kunomiririra nyika,” anodaro Kabanda.   Kumutambo weWorld Cup uyu, Zimbabwe yakaiswa muchikwata cheGroup A pamwe chete nenyika dzinoti Australia, Northern Ireland neSri Lanka.   Zimbabwe yakabudirira kupinda mumakwishu aya mushure mekunge yakunda mumitambo yemaAfrican Championships akatambirwa kuZambia muna Gunyana gore rakapera.   Uganda, South Africa neMalawi dzichanokwikwidzawo kuWorld Cup.

headline: Ongororo yeHurumende Inoti Goho reMwaka Uno Rishoma
text: Gwaro remamiriro ezvinhu munyika panyaya dzechikafu reCrop Assessment Report rinoratidza kuti nyika inofanira kutenga chibage chinosvika zviuru mazana manomwe zvematani gore rino kuti vanhu vasaziye nenzara. Gwaro iri rinoratidza kuti goho rakadzika nezvikamu makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana zvichikonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemafashamu emvura. Gwaro iri rinoti Masvingo ndiro dunhu rine nzara yakanyanya asi zvinhu zviri nani zvikuru kuMashonaland West ne Mashonaland Central. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, vati varimi vemapurazi makuru kana kuti ma A2, ndivo vakarima chibage chakawanda chinosvika zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana gore rapera. Varimi veminda midiki kana kuti  A1 ndivo havo vane goho rakakura rinosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvipfumbabwe kubva muzana. Asi kwekuwana chibage kuchagona kunetsa nekuti South Africa inoti inogona kusatengesa chibage nekuti naiyo haina goho rakakwana. Zimbabwe ichange ichikwikwidazanawo kutsvaga chibage nenyika dzakaita seMozambique neMalawi. Zimbabwe inogona hayo kuwana chibage kubva kuZambia ndokunge yawana mari yacho yekutenga. Gurukota rezvekurima muZambia, VaGiven Lubinda, vanoti Zambia yakashura mare mwaka uno pakurima chibage uye inokwanisa kutengesa miriyoni imwe chete yematani echibage. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vanzi nedare remakurukota vave sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvechikafu. Mukuru wesangano rinobatsira nechikafu reChristian Care, Reverend Stanlus Chatikobo, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzechikafu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yogunun'una neKurambidzwa Kutengesa Nyanga dzeNzou kuCITES
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri kashiri vari kushora zvikuru nyika dziri kuda kurambidza Zimbabwe kutengesa nyanga dzenzou dziri mudura maro. Amai Muchinguru-Kashiri vataura mashoko aya kumusangano weConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES uri kuitirwa kuJohannesburg, South Africa. Nyika dzakaita seKenya, China neAmerica dzinoti nyanga dzenzou hadzifanire kutengeswa sezvo zvichizokonzera kuti vari kuvhima nzou zvisiri pamutemo varambe vachizviita. Kenya mwedzi yapfuura yakapisa nyanga dzenzou dzayo dzose. Mukuru wesangano reU.S. Fish and Wildlife Service VaDan Ashe vanoti kuti nzou dzisapere dzose nyanga hadzifanire kutombotengeswa zvachose. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe ine nyanga dzenzou dzinopfuura mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe mudura mayo uye inoda kuti dzitengeswe.

headline: Vanhu Vanyoresa kuVhota Vodarika Mamiriyoni Mashanu neZana reZviuru
text: Boka reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vanyoresa kuvhota kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro Svondo Ndira 29 2018, hwakasvika pa 5, 125, 631. Huwandu uhwu hunosanganisira vanhu vakanyoresa kubva pakaparurwa chirongwa ichi muna Gunyana gore rapera. Huwandu uhwu ndehwe vanhu vanotarisirwa kunyoresa kuvhota, vanenge vasvitsa makore gumi nemasere ekuberekwa, vari zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Kunyange hazvo vaimbonzi havakwanisi kunyoresa kuvhota, avo vanonzi vane vabereki vekunze kwenyika, vachinzi vanyorese, zvinonzi pachine huwandu hwevanhu vari kudzorwa nekuda kwekusave nezvinodiwa zvakakwana, zvakaita sehumbowo hwepavanogara, kana zvitupa. Asi ZEC inoti dambudziko iri riri kugadziriswa kuburikidza nedzidziso dziri kupiwa veruzhinji. Boka iri riri kukurudzirawo vanhu kuti vatevere zvinodiwa uye kuti vaunganidze zvinodiwa izvi vasati vaenda kunonyoresa kuvhota. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, Doctor Wangu Mazodze, vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu uhwu hwakakosha nekuti hwadarika paitarisirwa neZEC, pachine matambudziko ari kusanganikwa nawo nevanhu mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vorova Zvikonzi muBanket
text: Vagari vemuBanket varova nekutandanisa zvikonzi zvekanzuru izvo zvanga zvichida kutorera vagari midziyo yavo nemhosva yekutadza kubhadhara mari dzemvura nekutakura marara. Paita bata murefu bata mupfupi apo vagari vemuBanket vaita chirwirangwe chekutandanisa zvikonzi zvekanzuru izvo zvanga zvichifamba nemotokari mbiri vachitora midziyo yevagari vane zvikwereti chekanzuru. Mumwe mugari wekuBanket, VaCanias Tembo, vanoti vacharamba vachidzinga zvikonzi zvekanzuru nekuti kanzuru haina kutaura nevagari kuti ichatumira zvikonzi. VaTembo vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kunzwa matambudzi ari kutadzisa vagari kubhadhara mari dzinodikanwa nekanzuru. VaTembo vanoti kanzuru iri kuda mari asi havasi kutakura marara uye muBanket munogara musina mvura nguva dzakawanda. Mumwe mugari wemumusha unogara veruzhinji weKuwadzana, VaCharles Tom, vanoti kanzuru yaifanirwa kunge yakaendesa vagari kumatare kwete kutumira zvikonzi. Amai Banda vanotiwo kanzuru iri kuda kuti vabhadhare mari inoita madhora makumi mana nemadhora manomwe pamwedzi paimba yavakapihwa muna 1960. Amai Banda vanetsana nezvikonzi pavakumbira chenji pafiriji yavo yanga yoda kutor Amai Banda vanoti vana vavo vari kunyimwa mabasa nekanzuru iyo vanopomera kuti iri kutora vashandi vayo kwaZvimba kumusha kwemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Mumwe mugari wemuBanket ati anonzi Amai Christine, vanoti vanofunga kuti kanzuru iri kuda kuvatorera dzimba dzavakasiirwa nevarume vavo vakafa. Amai Christine vanoti nekuda kwemakore makumi matatu avagara vanofanirwa kupiwa dzimba nekanzuru. Zvikonzi pazvarohwa nekutandaniswa zvaenda kumapurisa emuBanket avo vauya kuzochengetedza mukuru wekanzuru yeBanket, Amai Josephine Chapwati. Studio 7 yatadza kutaura naAmai Chapwati sezvo hofisi yavo yanga yakachengetedzwa nemapurisa. Kanzuru yeBanket yakapa basa kukambani inotevera zvikwereti yeStar Security mushure mukunge yaona kuti vagari vakawanda vainge vasingabhadhare mari yemvura nekutakurwa kwemarara. Vagari vemuBanket vane zvikwereti zvinotangira pamadhora makumi maviri kusvika pazviuru zvishanu. No media source currently available

headline: VaCharumbira Vanoti Democratic Party Iri Kuita Rusarura Pana VaButtigieg naVaSanders
text: Panguva iyo sarudzo dzekutsvaga munhu achamirira bato reDemocratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica dzava kutsiriridza, mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika uye vari sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reNorth America Province, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti sarudzo dzebato iri hadzisi kufamba zvakanaka sezvinotarisirwa nguva dzose nevakawanda. VaCharumbira, avo vanagara kuAberta kuCanada, vanoti zviri kubuda pachena musarudzo idzi ndezvekuti vamwe vakuru vakuru muDemocratic Party havasi kuda vamwe vanhu vari kudiwa neveruzhinji vari kuratidza kuti vari kukwikwidza zvine mutsindo. VaCharumbira vanoti zvakaitika kuIowa zvinoburitsa pachena kuti pane makakatanwa mubato iri sezvo veruzhinji vari kuratidza kuti vanotsigira VaPete Buttigieg naVaBernie Sanders, avo vavanoti vanenge vasiri kufarirwa nevakuru vakuru muDemocratic Party. Zvisineyi nezviri kuitika mubato iri, VaCharumbira vanoti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe ane zvakawanda zvaanogona kudzidza kubva kurunyararo rwunoitika musarudzo dzemuAmerica. Mashoko aVaCharumbira anouya panguva iyo Democratic Party yatarisana nezuva guru rinozovikanwa nekuti Super Tuesday, apo matunhu gumi nemana achange achisarudza munhu anofanirwa kumirira bato iri musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa nemusi weChipiri svondo rinouya, Kurume 3. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vobatwa neZvirwere Zvesiki neZvimwe
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde hwadzikira nezvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvina kubva muzana, mukati memakore gumi nemashanu apfuura, zvirwere izvi zvichakawanda munyika uye zviri kunyanyobata vanhu vane makore makumi maviri nemashanu kusvika pamakore makumi mana nemapfumbamwe. Vachitaura pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvirwere zvepabonde nerurindi, munyika pamwe nezviri kukonzera zvirwere izvi, kukomimiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati munyika mune zvirwere zvapabonde zvakawanda zvakaita seGonorrhea neSyphlis neHIV. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cherurindi hwakadzikiria zvichitevera kudzikira kubatwa kuri kuitwa vanhu nehutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvepaponde mubazi iri, Dr Tsitsi Appolo, vati huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere izvi hwakawandira kumatunhu eMidlands neMashonaland West. Vati mumatunhu aya zvirwere izvi zvakawandira munzvimbo dzinoitwa zvekuchera goridhe uko kune vanhu vakawanda. Dr Appollo vanoti humbowo hunoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete pa vanhu vashanu anenge aine chimwe chirwere chapabonde anenge aine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Vatiwo zvakaonekwa kuti pavanhu gumi vanobatwa nezviwere zvepabonde mumwe chete anenge akambobatwa nechirwere ichi. Vati mekuda kwaizvo vari kuita zvirongwa zvekuona kuti vanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinobatwa vanhu vakakwanda nechirwre ichi vaongororwa kuti havana zvirwere izvi here, kuvakurudzira kushandisa makondomu pamwe nekushandisa nzira dzepabonde dzisingaparadzire zvirwere. Vazhinji vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde, vachairi vemotakari hombe kana kumagonyeti, vanorarama nekutengesa bonde, varume vanorara nevamwe varume pamwe nevanofamba muzvimbodzinocherwa goridhe nezvimwe kana kuti maArtisinal miners. Dr Appollo vati pakaita dambudziko pakuendesa makondomu munzvimbo zhinji munyika muna 2018, 2019 pamwe negore rino izvo zvakaitawo kuti vakawanda vabatwe nezvirwere zvepabonde. Vati bazi ravo rine hurongwa hwekurapa zvirwere zvakaita seSyphilis, pamwe nekuti vana vasatapurirwe hutachiwana hweHIV nanamai vavo. Vatiwo munhu wega wega anenge aine chirwere chepadone aakenda kuchipatara kana kirinika anobva aongororwa kuti haana hutachiwana hweHIV here. Asi vati pari zvino nyika haina mishonga yakakwana yekurapa maSTIs uye zvakakosha kuti paramende ione kuti vapihwa mari inokwana kutenga mishonga iyi. Munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende ikoshese nyaya dzehutano pamwe nekugadzira hupfumi kuti vanhu vawane mabasa vaswera vachikorokoza. Vatiwo mishonga inofanira kuwanikwa muzvipatara kuitira kuti vange vaine zvirwere varapwe. Dr Mangwiro vati pane mimwe mishonga yave kutadza kurapa maSTIs uye vave kuongorora mishonga iyi kuti vaone kuti inokodzera here kuti varambe vachiishandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Masimba eParamende eKutonga Nhengo Dzayo Ovandudzwa
text: Hurongwa hwekuwandudza mitemo yenyika kuti ifambirane nebumbiro idzva remitemo hunonzi hwuri kuratidza kufamba negwara zvichitevera kugazetwa kwebhiri reGeneral Laws Amendment Bill svondo rapera. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti mitemo ingangosvika zana nemakumi mashanu, kusanganisira mutemo uchatapudza masimba edare reparamende mukuranga kwaro nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, ivandudzwe. Bhiri iri rinonzi riri kuda kuti paramende itorerwe masimba ekuendesa kujeri munhu anenge atsautsira, asi kuti abhadhariswe faindi, kana kuti pane dzimwe mhosva, paramende itsvage rubatsiro rwehofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, kwete kuti iyo paramende itonge nhengo iyi. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vaona bhiri iri, vanotsigira pfungwa yekuti matare edzimhosva atore iwo masimba ekuranga nhengo dzinenge dzatsautsira, kwete kuti vadare varangane pachavo. VaGonese vanoti dzimwe nguva vadare muparamende vanotonga mhosva vachitarisa kuti munhu abuda mumba maani kana kuti ane ruvara rwakadii. Nyaya inouya mupfungwa dzevakawanda ndeye vaive mumiriri weChimanimani mudare iri, VaRoy Bennett veMDC-T, avo vakakandwa mujeri mugore ra 2005 vachipomerwa mhosva yekurova vaive gurukota rezvemitemo panguvayo, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Paramende yakakanda VaBennett mujeri kwegore rose, danho rakaonekwa nevakawanda senzira yekupfidzisa vanopikisana nebato reZanu PF. Asi VaGonese vanoti zvanga zvatora nguva yakanyanya kureba pasati pabatanidzwa mitemo iyi, vachiti izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvakaitika kare pakangotambirwa bumbiro remitemo idzva. Bhiri iri rave kutarisirwa kuverengwa muparamende kekutanga risati razeyiwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitemo. No media source currently available

headline: Vorwisa Covid neKarate
text: SHASHA yekarate — Sensei Tyson Mujuru — akavamba chikwata chemutambo uyu kwaNyamweda, kuMhondoro nechinangwa chekusimudzira vechidiki avo hupenyu hwavo hwange hwakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19 pamwe nekuvakurudzira kuti vasiyane nekutora zvinodhaka.   Chikwata ichi chinonzi Mujuru Shukokai Karate Academy chakaumbwa kutanga kwegore rino apo nyika yaive palockdown iyo yakakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Ini semugari wekuno neruzivo rwangu rwemutambo weKarate, ndakaona vechidiki – kusanganisirawo neni – vakagara kudzimba nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Vamwe vakanga vave kutora zvinodhaka zvakaita semutoriro nezvimwe nekuenda kudoro rekachasu nechikokiyana.   Ndakabva ndakumbira kuvakuru vemuno kuti nditange chikwata ichi, zano rangu ndokutambirwa,” anodaro Sensei Mujuru.   Anoti kubva zvaatanga kudzidzisa vechidiki ava, ari kuona shanduko huru muhupenyu hwavo uye anotarisira kuti vamwe vachave shasha dzetsiva mune remangwana.   Kunze kwazvo, Sensei Mujuru anoti ari kuvadzidzisa zvakare kukosha kwekuzvidzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cheCovid-19.   “Tiri kutevedza nzira dzose dzekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 dzinosanganisira kupfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nemvura inochururuka nesipo, kuita daranganwa nezvimwe zvakawanda izvo tinotevedza,” anodaro.   Sensei Mujuru anoenderera mberi achiti, “Denda reCovid-19 machiremba anoti rinoda kuti vanhu vapote vachisimbisa miviri vachibuda dikita zvinova zvatinoita kuburikidza nemutambo wetsiva uyu.” VaRenious Gomba (63) vemumusha waSabhuku Manhanzva kwakare kuMhondoro vanotenda zvikuru chikwata chekarate ichi vachiti chiri kuwanisa vechidiki zvekuita.   “Vana vave kuwana zvekuita vachinosimbisa miviri uko vanotaurirwa kuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka zvinoita kuti vasawane nguva yekumberereka vachinyengerana zvekuba nekuita mimwe misikanzwa,” vanodaro.   Marshal Muzondo anove mumwe ari muchikwata chekarate ichi anoti vari kubatsirikana zvikuru kuburikidza nekudzidziswa kwavari kuitwa.

headline: KuZifa handibve ini: Phidza . . . ndiko kukereke kwangu
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa), Phillip Chiyangwa, anoti kukunda kwaakaita musarudzo dzichangobva kuitwa kuti amirire Zvimba South mudare reNational Assembly hakumukanganise kutungamirira sangano iri sezvo asiri mushandi waro.   Mubvunzo mukuru une vatsigiri vakawanda venhabvu parizvino ndewekuti zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwakaitwa Phidza — sezita remadunhurirwa raChiyangwa — kuve mumiriri weZvimba South uye nemutevedzeri wake Omega Sibanda kuve mumiriri weVungu mudare reNational Assembly hazvichavakanganise here kutungamira Zifa?   Pamusoro pezvo, mitemo yeFederation International de Football Association (FIFA) haitendere kuti nhau dzenhabvu dzinenge dzichinetsa dzinge dzichipindirwa neHurumende.   Kana Hurumende ikapindira munyaya dzenhabvu dzinenge dzichinetsa kumasangano akasiyana, nyika iyoyo inotemerwa zvirango zvakasimba neFIFA.

headline: Vanamazvikokota Votarisa Pachena Vane Dambudziko reMwoyo kuChinhoyi
text: Vamwe vanhu vari kurwara nezvirwere zvemoyo vari kufarira chirongwa chekuvhenekwa pasina muripo navana mazvikokota vezvirwere zvemoyo avo vari kubatsira varwere ava pachipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi. Vanhu vakawanda vari kufara nechirongwa ichi, icho china chiremba vatatu vanobva ku Italy. Vana chiremba ava vari kutarisa zvikonzero zviri kuita kuti vanhu varware nemoyo vachivaendesa kunana chiremba vepamusoro soro kuti vanorapwa mushure mekuvhenekwa dzambudziko rinenge riripo. Mumwe wevatariswa nana chiremba ava, ndiVaPeter Phiri avo vabva kuMasvingo. VaPhiri\nvanoti vanzi moyo wavo unotoda kuvhiyiwa kunze kwenyika sezvo pasina vanachiremba vanogona kuvhiya nekugadzirisa mavharuvhu ari pamoyo pavo ayo anonzi akakanganisika. VaPhiri vanoti vanzi nyika iri pedyo inokwanisa kuvhiya moyo pasina dambudziko iSouth Africa kana kuenda kuIndia kana kuItaly. VaPhiri vanoti iye zvino zvave nani nekuti vave kuziva zviri kudikanwa. Mumwe avhenekwa akawanikwa moyo wake uzere mvura ndiVaCainos Beremauro avo vanzi vaende kuchipatara chikuru chemuHarare cheParirenyatwa kuti vanobviswa mvura yakawandisa mumoyo. VaBeremauro vanoti chirongwa chekutarisa moyo chiri kuyamura sezvo kuvhenekwa kwavayamura kuti vazive dambudziko ravanaro. Vanhu vari kurapwa vari kuita mutsetse wakakura paimba yekuvhekwa havasi kufara nevashandi vepachipatara ichi avo vari kupinza hama dzavo mberi idzo dzinenge dzanonoka kubva kumba. Mumwe murwere anonetsekana nemoyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti huori haupere munyika sezvo hwatekeshera nemuzvipatara. Chirongwa chekuvheneka varwere vemoyo chatanga neMuvhuro uye chichapera neChishanu svondo rino. Mukuru wepachipara chikuru chemuChinhoyi, Supt Collet Mawire, vanoti vari kutarisira kuvhenekwa vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri pazuva vachibatsirwa nana chiremba vatatu. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voudza Dzimwe Nyika Zvinoda Kuitwa muNyaya dzeHutano, Asi Vanamukoti muNyika Vachironga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weMuvhuro vakavhura zviri pamutemo musangano webazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvehutano kana kuti World Health Organization kuVictoria Falls wechimakumi matanhatu nesere kana kuti 67th Session of the WHO Regional Committee for Africa Conference. Asi pabva paita mhute munyika apo vanamukoti vakazivisa kuti vapa hurumende mavhiki maviri ekuti vave kuda kukanda mapadza pasi zvekare nenyaya yekusawirirana panyaya dzemihoro. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaMugabe vati nyika dzemuAfrica dzinofanira kutsvaga mari kuendesa mari kumabasa ezvehutano uye vatiwo Zimbabwe yakaedza kuita izvi nekuumba homwe yeAids levy yave kubatsirawo munyaya yekurapa chirwere chegomarara. Nyika dzemuAfrica dziri kukundikanawo chibvumirano chadzakaita kuAbuja, Nigeria muna 2001 chekuona kuti mari inosvika zvikamu gumi neshanu zvebhajeti yenyika zvaenda kunyaya dzezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti havasi kufara nenya yekuti vamwe vanamukoti vanoita basa rehumaneja nevanodzidzisa vanotambira mari shoma zvichienzaniswa nevari pasi pavo kana vari pasi ava vakashanda maawa akati wandei pane akatarwa kana kuti e"over time". Vanoti vanamukoti vakatoendesa tsamba kuHealth Services Board, bhodhi rinoona nezvemari dzavo vachitaura nezvekuda kuramwa mabasa kwavo. No media source currently available Asi mukuru weHealth Services Board Dr Lovemore Mbengeranwa vanoti vari kuziva dambudziko iri asi pari zvino hurumende haina mari. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Yotumira Nhumwa kuZimbabwe asi Imwe Nyanzvi Inoti Hurumende Haisi Kuzokwereteswa Imwe Mari
text: Chimwe chikwata kubva kubhanga reInternational Monetary Fund chiri kutarisirwa kupinda munyika muna Kurume kuti chizeye nevakuru muhurumende kuti hupfumi hungagadziriswe sei. Uhu hurongwa hunozivikanwa nekuti Article IV Consultations. Vamwe vakuru vehurumende vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanoda kuti IMF ivabatsire nemari imwe yechikwereti. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Godfrey Kanyenze vanoti kana hurumende isina kubhadhara mari dzemitero kana kuti ma arrears pane zvimwe zvikwereti zvinodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana matanhatu kumabhanga akaita seWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vonanga kuNew York Kunopfachura Nyika Isina Mari yeMushonga
text: Hurumende iri kushorwa zvikuru nenyaya yekusafambisa mari dzebhajeti zvakanaka zvopa kuti vanhu vambopota vachishaya mishonga yakaita semaARV, nemishonga yegomarara, uye mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Kunyangwe hazvo bhanga guru renyika riri kutatarika kuburitsa mari dzekutenga zvinhu zvakakosha izvi, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwa kuenda kuNew York, muAmerica nevana vavo, vakuwasha, vamwe vehukama nemakurukota vanosvika makumi manomwe uye vanonzi vari kupihwa mari yakawanda zvikuru. VaMugabe nechikwata chavo ichi vari kutarisirwa kunge vari muNew York musi wa 19 kusvika musi wa 23 Gunyana. Nyanzvi munyaya ndzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvinhu muhomwe yehurumende hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yekutadza kubata bhajeti yenyika zvakanaka. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti pose panobuda VaMugabe munyika vanobuda nemari inosvika mamiriyoni mana emadhora zvinopa kuti nyika izotadza kutenga zvinhu zvakakosha. Va Kanyenze vanoti mari iri kuendeswa kuhofisi yaVaMugabe yakawandisa uye kunyika yakaita seZimbabwe zvinokonzera matambudziko. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inova sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti VaMugabe semutungamiri wenyika vane kodzero yekufamba. Mukuru wesangano reThe AIDS and Arts Foundation Zimbabwe Program iro rinoshanda nevechidiki vanorarama neHIV/AIDS, VaEmmanuel Gasa, vanoti mimwe mishonga iri kumbopota ichishomeka nenyaya yekusakosheswa kwenyaya dzezvehutano. Asi vachitaura paVOA LiveTalk, mazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Elophi Sibanda, vakati mushonga weAbacavir wave kuda kubviswa nekuti uri kukonzera mamwe marwadzo. VaGasa vatendawo izvi asi vakati kuda kutenga mimwe mishonga kuri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. VaGasa vanotiwo kushandisa mari yemabond notes kuri kutopa kuti zvinhu zviome. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Edgar Munatsa, vatiwo mishonga mizhinji iri kushaikwa muzvipatara zvehurumende. Kunyangwe vatenda kuti mari iri kunonoka kuuya kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vati mishonga yange yave kushaikwa yavepo. Mune mamwe madhorobha munonzi muri kumbopotawo muchishaikwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvinonzi nenyanzvi zvichapa kuti hupfumi hutoenda kumawere. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya simba kwemari yayo zvakapa kuti ishandise mari dzekunze dzakawanda muna 2009. Asi nekutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi uye nyaya yehuori, hupfumi hwaenda kumawere. Hurumende inoti zvayo matambudziko ari kukonzerwa nezvirango zvayakatemerwa nenyaya yekutora minda kubva kuvachena. Asi vanopikisa vanoti zvirango zvakakonzerwa nekutonga nedemo. No media source currently available

headline: VaZhanda Vanoti Nhengo dzeZanu PF Dzakazvigarisa paPapurazi Ravo Ngadzibve
text: Nhengo yeZanu PF uye vari mutewedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima vachiona nezvezvipfuyo, VaPaddy Zhanda vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti vakapa mvumo yekugara kuvanhu vakazvigarisa zvisiri pamutemo papurazi ravo reCaledonia riri kumucheto kweguta reHarare. VaZhanda vanoti dai vaida kuti vanhu vakazvipa nzvimbo dzekugara papurazi ravo vagare, dai vasina kutora matanho ekuwana mutongo wedare wekuti vanhu ava vabviswe, uye zvivakwa zvavo zviputswe. Bepanhau reHerald mwedzi wapera rakaburitsa mashoko ekuti mumiriri weHarare East muparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaTerrence Mukupe vakati VaZhanda vakanga vabvuma kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vakazvigarisa papurazi ravo vambogara. Asi VaZhanda vanoti aya manyepo sezvo vasina kumbobvira vaita hurukuro nemunhu akazotaura mashoko avanonzi vakataura aya. Vakati pane vamwe vezvematongerwo enyika vari kunyepera vanhu kuti nzvimbo iyi iri muHarare East, asi iyo iri mudunhu reGoromonzi North iro vanomirira zvekare mudare reparamende risineyi nechekuita neHarare East. “Zviripo ndezvekuti vanhu vakapinda papurazi zvisiri pamutemo, papurazi rinotove nema title deeds, purazi itori private property,”vanodaro VaZhanda. “Vakapindapo dai kuri kunzi vanhu vakapinda vachizvipa dzimba, asi vakapindapo makoronyera, matsotsi anosvikopega otanga kutengesera vanhu, achitorera vanhu, vachitengesa land isiri yavo.” VaZhanda vanoti vamwe vangaita gakava rekuti purazi iri harisi raZhanda, nderemurungu, asika kana dai riri remurungu, handizvo zvingaita kuti munhu angopinda papurazi remurungu iroro otanga kupega nekutengesa masitendi. Purazi reCaledonia rakanga rapindwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaumba mushandirapamwe weNhaka yeMadzitateguru Edu, asi varidzi vepurazi iri vakazoenda kumatare vakawana mutongo wekuti vanhu ava vabviswe. Vamwe vevagari vepapurazi iri vakatombosungwa vakamiswa pamberi pematare zvivakwa zvavo zvakaputswa. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mutewedzeri weMutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, Vanobvisiswa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vabhadhariswa zviuru gumi zvemadhora emuZimbabwe semari yechibatiso kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekurova mumwe mudzimai. VaBiti vari kupomerwa mhosva yekurova Amai Tatiana Aleshina vekuRussia muHarare svondo rapfuura. Mutongi wedare Amai Vongai Muchuchuti vati VaBiti vagare pakero yavakapa kudare uye havafaniri kupindira pakuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi. Vachuchisi panyaya iyi havana kupikisa kuti VaBiti vabhadhare mari yechibatiso uye vanzi vadzoke kudare musi wa18 Ndira gore rinouya apo pachatanga kunzikwa nyaya yavo. Gweta raVaBiti, VaAlec Muchadehama, vaudza dare kuti VaBiti havana mufaro nemasungirwo avakaitwa uyewo vaigona kubatwa neCovid- 19 nekuti pavakasungirwa paHarare Central Police Station hapana kana maSanitiser, ma mask nezvimwe zvinodzivirira denda reCovid 19. Pazvichemo zvavo, VaBiti vanotiwo vakanyimwa chikafu uye segweta, nhengo yeparamende nemhunhu ane mukurumbira, hazvaikodzera kuti vadzikisirwe pasi nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa. Dare rati nyaya yaVaBiti inofanira kuongororwa uye zvinenge zvabuda muongororo iyi zvounzwa kudare musi wa18 Ndira gore rinouya. Zvichakadai, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vati kunyange hazvo VaBiti vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso, havasi kufara nemabatirwo avakaitwa nemapurisa. Mune imwewo nyaya, mumwe mushandi mukuru wekanzuru yeHarare, VaKainos Chingombe, avo vakasungwa nezuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekusashandisa mahofisi avo zvakanaka apo vakatenga motokari yaidhura zvakanyanya, vanzi nedare vadzoke nemuvhuro. Gweta ravo, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati VaChingombe vanoramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Mune imwezve nyaya, mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, varangarira Amai vavo, avo vakashaya nguva pfupi yapfuura. Nyaradzo iyi yaitirwa kumusha kwavo kuGutu South mudunhu reMasvingo. No media source currently available

headline: Hart ave kuBurnley
text: akabva kuManchester City achienda kuBurnley.   Shasha iyi — iyo yaimbove mubati wepagedhi weEngland — akasayina kondirakiti yemakore maviri kuchikwata chaSean Dyche uye ane tarisiro yekuwedzera rimwe gore pamusoro.   Burnley, iyo yagara ina Tom Heaton naNick Pope muchikwata chayo, yakabhadhara mari inosvika £3.5 miriyoni pamwe neimwe ichazotevera yekutenga Hart.   Achitaura pamusoro penguva yake kuEtihad, Hart akaudza CityTV kuti, “Zvange zvichifadza zvikuru, ndakakura zvakanyanya. Ndakauya kuno ndine makore 19 ekuberekwa, ndave kubva ndave ne31 saka inguva ndefu chaiyo uye zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaitika — mhuri, shamwari uye nenhabvu yakawanda!   “Ndinonzwa rudo nekugamuchirwa. Ndaifarira zvikuru rudo rwandaipihwa nevatsigiri veMan City, ndakauya kuno ndiri mutambi weShrewsbury Town, kakomana kaibva kuShrewsbury. Zvainge zvakandikoshera kuve kuchikwata chino chisati chatanga kurwira mikombe uye ndakagamuchirwa kubva pazuva rekutanga. Ndofunga vakaona mandiri mumwe munhu aizoshanda nesimba rake kuti tiende kure.   “Ndaisazokwanisa kuita zvandakaita dai ndange ndisina kugamuchirwa uye ndisina mufaro, saka ndinofara kuti ndakapa vatsigiri nguva yemufaro uye ndinoshuvira kuti ndichagara mundangariro dzavo.”   Sportsmail yakaburitsa svondo radarika kuti mutambi uyu ange ave kusvika pakubva muchikwata ichi icho chaakatambira kwemakore anodarika 12 zvichitevera kuburitswa kwaakaita naPep Guardiola.   Akapedza mwaka wadarika ari kuWest Ham uko akaendeswa nechikwereti, asi haana kutamba zvakagutsa kuti apinde muchikwata chaGareth Southgate chakaenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Mwaka wa2016-17, akaupedza ari kuTorino inokwikwidza muSerie A uko akaenda nechikwereti, ndokutamba ka37 ndokuzodzoka kuEngland. — SportsMail Football

headline: Vakawanda Voteerera Kurudziro yeKugara Kumba muHarare, Masvingo, Chinhoyi neMamwe Madhorobha
text: Veruzhinji muHarare vatevedzera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti vagare kumba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere che coronavirus. Chirwere checovid19, icho chakatangira kuguta reWuhan kuChina. Bazi rezvehutano raudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri vaongororwa kuti vane chirwere ichi here munyika asi vanomwe ndivo vakabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino. Munhu mumwe chete ndiye akashaya. Vamwe vose vanonzi vari nani zvavo uye havasi munjodzi. Sangano reWorld Health Organization rinoti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vave kudarika zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu uye sangano iri rinoti chirwere ichi chiri kupararira nekukasika. Mumwe mugari wemumusha unogara veruzhinji weMbare, VaFarai Mwaera vati danho rakatorwa nehurumende idanho rakanaka zvikuru vachiti danho iri rinobatsira kuti kuti chirwere cheCovid19 chisapararire. Mumwe mushandi wekanzuru yeHarare uyo anga achitsvaira marara pamusika unokwirirwa mabhazi paMbare pakare, VaWonder Chiromba, vati kugara nzvimbo dzese dzakashambidzika kunobatsirawo mukurwisa chirwere ichi.  VaEphraim Dodo vanorarama nekutengesa zvirimwa mumusika weMbare vati nguva yakatarwa nehurumende yakareba zvikuru sezvo vachiti vanotokwanisa kuisa mumuromo zvavanenge vashanda musi iwoyo. Kunyange hazvo zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa zvekudya zvanga zvakavhurwa pakati pedhorobha, mumwe anoshandira mudhorobha, VaTendai Khona, vati zvitoro zvanga zvakavhura zvanga zviri zvishoma uye zvishoma zvanga zvakavhura zvanga zvakwidza mitengo. Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa, VaClemence Sithole, vati vaswera vachiita hwakiti nagonzo nemapurisa pavanga vachitengesera matapiri avo mumotokari yavo vachiti hapana zvavangaite nekuti vana vavo vangaziye nenzara. Izvi zvinouya apo mutungamiri wesangano revezvitoro reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vakurudzira vezvitoro kuti vasakwidze mitengo yezvinhu zvisina mwero. Vamwe vakaita saVaJames Nyazira vachiti vamukira kubhanga kunotora mari kuti vawane kutenga zvokudya kwemazuva ari kutevera asi hapana bhanga ranga rakakvhurwa. Asi gavhuna webhanga guru renyika VaJohn Mangudya vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti veruzhinji vanofanira kushandisa makadhi mukutenga muzvitoro pamwe nemari dzemumafoni vachiti kuti mabhanga avhurwe zvinoita kuti vanhu vaungane izvi zvisiri kukurudzirwa nehurumende. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vafara kuti vanhu vatevedzera kurudziro yehurumende vachiti kusaungana kunoderedza mukana wekuti vanhu vabatire chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi vamwe vanhu vaonekwa vakaungana mune zvimwe zvitoro vari mumitsetse yekutenga zvinhu zvakaita sehupfu. Mabhazi eZupco anga achifambawo achitakura vanhu vakanzi nehurumende vauye kubasa vanosanganisira vashandi vemuzvipatara, mapazi ehurumende, vanoshanda muzvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga nevanoshanda muzvitoro. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vakawanda vateerera kuridziro yekuti vasabude panze munzvimbo dzakaita seChinhoyi, Marondera ne Masvingo uko kwanzi kwange kuine mauto achibatsirana nemapurisa kukurudzira vanhu kuti vabude mumugwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Gweta reMDC-T yaVaChamisa Rinoti MDC-T Chaiyo Iri Pasi paVaChamisa
text: Gweta rinomirira MDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaThabani Mpofu, vanoti zviri pachena kuti bato raVaChamisa ndiro bato reMDC-T chairo. VaMpofu vanoti nyaya yezita pakati pavo neMDC-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe haina kubviswa kumatare asi zuva rekuti inzwikwe richaziviswa mazuva anotevera. VaMpofu vanotiwo mari inobva kuhurumende ichipihwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika iyo yakapiwa bato raVaChamisa, yakaendeswa kubato iri zviri pamutemo nekuti hurumende inoendesa cheki kukero yebato iri mumagwaro ehurumende. Mashoko aVa Mpofu anotevera mashoko emutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, muhurukuro yavakaita neStudio7 neMuvhuro. Panguva iyi Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gweta raVaChamisa. “Nyaya iyi yemari inosetsa zvisingaiti. Mari iyi yakabva kuhurumende ichienda kubato reMDC. Vanhu vese muZimbabwe vanoziva kuti MDC inotungamirwa naVaChamisa; MDC ine mahofisi kuHarvest House; ekuBulawayo chaiwo, ari pasi paVaChamisa.
