Zvese zve MDC zviri pasi paVaChamisa,” VaMpofu vakaudza Studio7. VaMpofu vatiwo mutauriri weNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, vakadzinga Muzvare Khupe muparamende mushure mekuudzwa kuita izvi neMDC-T yaVaChamisa. Vati danho rakatorwa iri rakacherechedza hutungamiri hwaVaChamisa. No media source currently available

headline: Eboue odzoka munhabvu
text: weArsenal, Emaanuel Eboue (35), anogona kudzoka munhabvu achitambira LA Galaxy, makore maviri apedzisira kutamba nhabvu.   Chizvarwa chekuIvory Coast ichi anoshuvira zvikuru kudzoka munhabvu zvichitevera kutemerwa zvirango kwaakaitwa neFIFA kuti asatambire Sunderland mugore ra2019 apo akanzi asatambe kwegore atadza kubhadhara mumiriri wake.   Nyaya dzehutano hwake dzakamutadzisa kuti atengwe nechikwata chekuCyprus, Ocagi Limasol gore radarika.   Mutambi uyu akasiiwa asina kana kobiri zvichitevera kurambana kwaakaita nemudzimai wake izvo zvakamudya chaizvo mupfungwa zvekusvika pakuda kuzviuraya.   Asi chikwata chekuMLS – LA Galaxy – chiri kuedza kuda kumudzora munhabvu, sekutaura kwenhau dziri kubva kuThe Sun.   Chikwata ichi chinoziva kuti ruzivo rwaanarwo rwenhabvu rwakakosha zvikuru.   Eboue ange asiri munhabvu kwemakore maviri, asi nguva yadarika akambotambira chikwata chemaArsenal Legends munaChikumi.   Achitaura neCanal gore rino, akati, “Chandinongoda chete kudzoka munhabvu nekuti ndichiri kukwanisa kutamba.   “Ndinogona kuenda kunzvimbo dzakaita seBaghdad kana Pakistan kuti ndingotamba chete. Handina basa nazvo kuti ndekupi.   “Ndinogara nemabhegi angu akarongedzwa nekuti pane mukana wekuti ndinogona kudzingwa mumba mangu.   “Handina munhu parutivi rwangu ari kundimirira mazuva ano. Ndingori ndega. Ndaimbofara chaizvo nevana vangu nemhuri yangu asi iye zvino ndave ndega.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Vanhu Vana Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,496. Vanhu makumi mana nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 36,424. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana kana kuti 24 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nematatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 33, 996. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 931. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina vasvika zviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 36, 283. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuramba huchidzikira munyika nepasi rose, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu havafanire kurivara. African Union Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana kana kuti 4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zana nemanomwe rezvuiru kana kuti 107, 000. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni rine gumi nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 119 million. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

headline: Tuchel otsiura Mbappe
text: Saint-Germain, Thomas Tuchel, akaramba kutaura pamusoro penhau yekuti chikwata chake chinogona kutenga mutambi weChelsea, N’Golo Kante.   Kante – uyo akapembera kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup neFrance gore rino – ari kunzi ari kudiwa kuzotengwa nechikwata ichi chekuFrance chinove shasha dzeLigue 1 mwaka uno.   Mutambi wePSG, Kylian Mbappe, akabuda pachena kuti akasiya katsamba muhomwe dzaKante achiedza kumukurudzira kuti auye kuzotambira nhabvu yake kuchikwata ichi chekuFrance apo vaive kuWorld Cup kuRussia.   Asi, Tuchel anoti hazvina kunaka kutaura pamusoro pezvevatambi vekune zvimwe zvikwata panyaya yekuda kuvatenga. “Hazvina kunaka uye handizvifarire zvachose, uye handizvifarire kana vamwe varairidzi vachitaura pamusoro pevatambi vari kutambira zvimwe zvikwata,” anodaro Tuchel. Saka hapana nyaya panhau yaKante uye hatisi kufunga nezvazvo mwaka uno.”   Apo Tuchel ari kuramba kutaura nezvevamwe vatambi vari kuuya kuchikwata chake, murairidzi wePSG uyu anoti ane chivimbo chikuru chekuti Edinson Cavani haasi kuzobva achienda kuReal Madrid.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anove chizvarwa chekuUruguay – ari kunzi anodiwa kuti azotsive Cristiano Ronaldo uyo akabva achienda kuJuventus nemari inosvika 100 miriyoni paunzi.   Asi achitaura chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Atletico Madrid 3-2 mumutambo weInternational Champions Cup, Tuchel anoti, “Ndinofunga kuti acharamba ari kuno, hapana ambotaura chinhu kwandiri nezvenyaya yake saka ndinoziva kuti acharamba aripo.   “Hazvina kumbouya mupfungwa dzedu kuti angangoenda, ndakataura naye uye haana kurakidza kuti anoda kubva.” — SportsMail Football

headline: South AfricaYoronga Kubuda muGungano reInternational Criminal Court
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa nemusi weChishanu yakazivisa kuti iri kutarisira kubuda mugungano re International Criminal Court (ICC). Asi danho riri kushoropodzwa nevazhinji sezvo risingazo kurudzire kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika iyi. Gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo muSouth Africa VaMichael Masutha vanoti vari kuunza bhiri kudare reparamende vachikurudzira kuti South Africa isave nhengo yeICC. Vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanoti dare iri rinongosunga vanhu vemuAfrica kwete venyika dzakabudirira. VaDewa Mavhinga vesangano re Human Rights Watch vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzirambe dziri mugungano iri sezvo richibatsira kuti avo vanenge vatyorerwa kodzero dzavo vawane kwekuturira mhosva. "Zviri kufunga kuitwa neSouth Africa izvi hazviyemurike, zvinoratidza kuti nyika iyi haisisiri payange iri munguva yapfuura pakange pane hutongi hwaVaNelson Mandela avo vairemekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Zviri kuitwa neSouth Africa zvinhu zvinoshoreka uye zvichaita kuti chimiro che South Africa chishoreke." Va Mavhinga vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Vapfuura Mazana Mashanu Hurumende Ichiti Ichawedzera Dzidziso muVanhu
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira neMuvhuro kusvika pamazana mashanu negumi nevaviri (512) mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu (23) vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu (535) vakaongororwa nezuro. Huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kudenda iri huchiri pamakumi matanhatu nevana (64), kuchitiwo vashaya vachiri vatanhatu kana kuti 6. Kuwanda kwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uku kwaita kuti bazi rezvehutano riburitse mashoko padandemutande reTwitter richiti rave kuzosimbisa nyaya yekudzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwere ichi pachiteverwa zvisungo zvakatarwa neWorld Health Organisation. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzakawanda dzagara dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere vanhu vari kuongororwa chirwere ichi pazuva, uye kuendesa dzidziso kumaruwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nekukasika zviri kuitika kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vakavarairwa. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni mapfumbamwe nezana rezviuru (9.1 million), America iri iyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru (2.3 million) ichiteverwa neBrazil, iyo yadarikawo miriyoni nezana rezviuru (1.1 million). Mumatunhu akawanda eAmerica chirwere ichi chinonzi chave kukwira zvakare zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Doctor Simbiso Ranga, avo vari muNorth Carolina muno muAmerica, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kukwira, kwete muZimbabwe chete, asi pasi rose, izvo anoti zvinofanirwa kutorerwa matanho nekukasika. Panyaya yekukwira kwehuwandu munyika, Doctor Ranga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuendesa hurongwa hwekuongorora vanhu akaita sekukurudzira vanhu kupfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko, uyewo kuchengetedza vanenge vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi kwavo voga. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yodaidza VaChinamasa Kuti Vajekese Kwakabva Mari yeKubhadhara Chikwereti kuWorld Bank
text: Vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato reMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, uye vari nhengo yekomiti yedare reparamende inoona nezvehupfumi, vanoti komiti yavo ine hurongwa hwekudaidza kudare iri gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuti vataure nezvekubhadhara chikwereti chenyika. VaMashakada vanoti vanoda kuti VaChinamasa vazotsanangure nyaya yemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yavanoti vakawana kubhadhara mari yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zveZimbabwe kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. VaChinamasa havana kutaura kuti mari iyi yainge yabva kupi. Asi bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rakabva raburitsa nyaya yekuti mari iyi yainge yabva kukambani yekuSingapore inonzi Trafigura. Asi mutauriri wekambani iyi, Amai Zohra McDoolley-Aimone, varamba mashoko ekuti kambani yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yekuti ibhadhare chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuStudio7, Amai McDoolley-Aimone vati vainge vanzwa mashoko kubva kumapepanhau ekuti Trafigura yainge yapa Zimbabwe mari asi vakati aya manyepo. Vatiwo vane mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye makambani avo akazvipira kuramba achifambisa basa achishanda nehurumende asi panyaya yekukweretesa Zimbabwe, asi kambani yavo iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.. Kambani yeTrafigura Group yakapinda muZimbabwe muna 2013 kuburikidza nekuisa hupfumi mukambani yePuma Energy iyo yakaisa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani yeRedan Petroleum. Redan ine nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta edzimotokari makumi manomwe nepfumbamwe, uye inopa mafuta endege panhandare ina. VaMashakada vanoti zvinonetsa kuti pawane mabhanga kana makambani angakweretese Zimbabwe mari kana asinawo kusviba. No media source currently available

headline: Mukombe ndewedu: Jere
text: SACHIGARO weCAPS UNITED, Farai Jere, anoti mwaka wa2019 ndewechikwata chake uye chinoda kurakasha zvimwe zvese kuti vagove shasha zvakare dzeCastle Premiership.   Makepekepe, sezita remadunhurirwa reCAPS UNITED, yakapedzisira kusimudza mukombe wePremier Soccer League (PSL) mugore ra2016 uye makore maviri adarika mukombe uyu wange uchitorwa FC Platinum.   Mwaka yadarika, CAPS UNITED yange ichitatarika zvikuru kuti ipedze iri pakati pezvikwata zvina zvepamusoro pelog.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Jere anoti chikwata chavo chicharwa semvumba mwaka uno.   “Gore rino, Makepekepe ichadzirakasha dzese mirai muone uye tiri kuvaka zvakasimba kuti tidzore mukombe wedu weCastle Premiership.   “Mukatarisa vatambi vamwe vataunza kuchikwaa chedu zvinorakidza kuti tiri kuziva zvatiri kuita uye tiri kuda chaizvo kuve shasha,” anodaro Jere.   Anoti CAPS UNITED inoda kutora mukombe wePSL kuitira kuti igowana mukana wekukwikwidza zvakare mumitambo yeCAF Champions League.   Anoti vane vatambi vavatenga mwaka uno vepamusoro vachabatsira zvikuru chikwata chavo mukusimukira panyaya dzenhabvu.   Kusvika parizvino, Makepe-kepe yatenga vatambi vanosanganisira Gabriel Nyoni uyo akabva kuHighlanders, Phineas Bhamusi kubva kuTriangle, Blessing Sarupinda kubva kuBlack Rhinos nevamwe vakasiyana.   “Isu tiri kuda kudzokera muChampions League nekuti mutambo uyu wakakosha zvikuru, zvikwata zvese zvinoda kukwikwidzamo saka isu toda kudzokera.   “Mukatarisa vatambi vatatenga ndeve pamusoro, izvozvo  zvega zvinorakidza kuti basa ratiri kuda kubata iguru,” anodaro Jere.

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vonyunyuta neKudimurwa kweMari dzeBhonasi
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, reApex Council, rinoti ranyora tsamba kugurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa Amai sekai Nzenza, richinyunyuta nekudimurwa kwarinoti kwakaitwa mari dzevashandi vehurumende dzemabhonasi. Hurumende yaburitsa gwaro rinozivisa nezvemazuva achatambirwa mabhonasi aya nevashandi vayo kutanga Chitatu kusvika Chishanu svondo rino, asi ichiti vachapiwa mabhonasi avo pamari dzemihoro yavo yepamwedzi chete, isingasanisiri bhonasi pamari dzekubatsirika. Sachigaro weApex Council Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti sevashandi vari kusangana nemusi weChina kuti vataurirane pamusoro penyaya yebhonasi iyi pamwe nekutsvaga nzira yekutora kuenda mberi. Vanoti vashandi vashungurudzwa zvikuru nedanho rehurumende rekungoita zano ndega isinawo kuvapa mukana wekugara pasi navo kuti vatange vawirirana. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Amai Nzenza kuti inzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Ovhenekwa Chirwere CheGomarara PaChena kuMashonaland West
text: Mamwe madzimai ekuHurungwe mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasi kuwana hutano hwakakwana sezvo vachifamba mitunhu yakareba kuenda kumakiriniki nezvipatara. Vachitaura panzvimbo yeKasimure kuHurungwe, apo panga pachitariswa madzimai kuti vane gomarara repamuromo wechibereko here, Amai Bertha Zhou vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kufa negomarara rechibereko kumamisha sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa kuenda kunorapwa. Amai Zhou, avo vatariswa chibereko chavo icho changa chichivarwadza kwemakore matatu, vanoti zvirongwa zvakadai zvinofanirwa kuenda pazvikoro zviri pedyo nevanhu kwete kunzvimbo dzinokwirwa mabazi. Mumwe mudzimai atariswa nhasi, Amai Talent Katora, vanogara mumusha maVaNyarenda, vanoti vanonzwa kurwadziwa pasi peguvhu ravo izvo zvaita kuti vade kutariswa kuti vane gomarara repamuromo wechibereko here. Amai Katora vanoti vadzidzawo kuti mudzimai akapfeka mishonga yekudzora nhengo yesikarudzi yemudzimai mukana wekubatwa negomarara repamuromo wechibereko unenge wakakura. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Maudi Sengwe, vanoti kunyange vakambotariswa gomarara makore maviri apera vatariswa zvakare nhasi vachiti vanoda kuve nechokwadi kuti havana kubata chirwere ichi mumakore maviri apfuura. Chirongwa chaitwa nhasi chekutarisa kana madzimai anegomarara, chaitwa nebazi rezvehutano, vakabatana nePopulation Services pamwe neNational Aids Council avo vari kuchecheudza varume munzvimbo dzavari kufamba. Parizvino vasvika nzvimbo dzinoti Batwa, Mauya neKasimure, mangwana vanenge vari kuMagunje vozopedzisira neChirundu neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: Vakapotsa Vafa neCovid-19 Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba Nguva Ichiripo
text: Vamwe vanhu vakarwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasina kubayiwa nhomba vari kukurudzira vari kuzengurira kubayiwa kuti vaite izvi nekuti vakapotsa vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Vaimbova mupurisa muZimbabwe Republic Police VaMalvern Mudyiwa mumwe akapona nepaburI retsono mushure mekubatwa nechirwere ichi vasina kunge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMudyiwa vanoti vakatozonoponera kuchipatara cheParktowen uko vakange vopihwa mweya wekufema kwemavhiki matatu sezvo vainge vozarirwa uye vagarawo vaine chirwere cheasthma. VaMudyiwa vaendera mberi vachiti vakashamiswa apo vakapedza kugeza vakatarisa pachiringiro vakaona mufananidzo wavo wairatidza kuti vainge vasara mapfupa chete. Vamwe vakataura neStudio 7 ndiAmai Namatirai Mutemwa vanogara kuZambia vakabatwa neCovid-19 vagara vaine chirwere chemoyo. Vanoti kunyangwe vakaburitswa muchipatara vachiri kunetseka nekufema uye vakanzi nachiremba vavo kana vave nani vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare kuTynwald North VaProvidence Moyo vanoti vakabhadhara mari yakawanda zvikuru kuti varapwe chirwere ichi vari kumba kwavo. Vanoti chirwere chavasiya vasinganyatsogone kumira kwenguva yakareba zvekuti kuti vaende kuri kubayiwa nhomba kune vanhu vakawanda zvinovanetsa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano avo varikuita ongororo yemishonga yeCovid19 Muzvare Miriam Chemhanza vanoti vakabayiwa nhomba vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi havazonyanye kurwara sevasina. Nyanzvi munayay dzezvehutano Dr Tinashe Gede vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid 19 uye kuti vasateerera zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Vaendera mberi vachiti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Pane gwaro rakaburitswawo nehurumende rinonzi “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” riri kutsinhirawo kuti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeCovid-19 iri kutenderera munyika yeDelta variant. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende, Vanopikisa neVakazvimirira Vokurudzirwa Kugara pasi Kuti Vazeye Matambudziko Ari muNyika
text: Panguva iyo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza 2023, zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo munyika munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu hurumende pamwe nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekusatevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Zvimwe zvinonzi zviri kunetsa munyika pari zvino kuparara kwehupfumi hwenyika izvo zvinonzi zviri kuwedzera matambudziko ari munyika. Munyaya dzemihoro inonzi haina zvaichatenga, vashandi vehurumende vakazivisa svondo rino kuti nhaurirano dzavaiita nehurumende pamusoro pemihoro dzakaparara dzisina chabuda vashandi vachipomera hurumende mhosva yekusavimbika uye kuita zanu ndega pakuwedzera vashandi mari. Ukuwo, mubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition pamwe nemamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende vakanga varongawo kuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa neChishanu kuti varatidzire, asi mapurisa anonzi akanyima sangano iri mvumo. Vashandi vehurumende vakavimbisa zvakare kuramwa mabasa kutanga neMuvhuro unouya kana nyaya yemihoro yavo isina kugadziriswa. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF, vagara vanopomera mizinda yenyika dzekunze iri munyika mhosva yekupindira munyaya dzeZimbabwe nekukonzera matambudziko ose anonzi ari kusangana nenyika vachiti mizinda iyi iri kuda kusvibisa hurumende yavo pamberi pesarudzo dza 2023. Nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vari kuBritain, vanotsinhira mashoko eabto ravo pamwe neVaMnangagwa ekuti vari kuda kuratidzira vari kushandiswa nenyika dzekumawirira kuti vabvise hurumende yakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vachitungamira sangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, VaRashid Mahiya, vanoti hapana munhu ari kutmwa nevekunze kuratidzira, vachiti vana veZimbabwe vari kutumwa nematumbu avo ane nzara. VaMahiya vanoti kuti dambudziko iri ripedzwe, vanhu vose vanofanirwa kugara pasi votaurirana, danho riri kutsigirwawo naDoctor Mavaza, vachiti rakanaka asi vachikomekedza vemapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira kuti vatungamidze nyika yavo mberi mune zvose. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weNyika Dzine Nzou Unopetwa kuHwange Nyika Dzine Nzou Dzichikurudzira CITES Kuti Isapindira Muzvirongwa Zvadzo
text: Musangano wemazuva matatu wekutsvaga nzira dzekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzine nzou dzitaure nezwi rimwechete kumusangano weCOP uchaitwa mukupera kwegore rino, uyo wakanga uchiitirwa kuHwange wkapetwa nemusi weChina, makurukota ezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa akapinda mumusangano uyu achiti sangano reConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES haifanirwe kupindira mukutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou nenyika dzakazvimirira. Makurkota emunyika dzemuAfrica aya akati nyika dzakazvimirira dzine kodzero dzadzo dzekushandisa zviwanikwa zvadzo sezviri mumitemo yadzo. Musangano uyu wakabuda nechibvumirano cheHwange Declaration, icho chine zvisungo gumi nezvina, zvinosanganisira chekuti sangano re CITES rinofanirwa kuongorora zvakare zvisungo zvaro panyaya yekutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou. Nyika dzine nzou idzi dzakakurudzirwa kuti dzitambirewo chibvumirano cheHwange Declaration ichi. Zimbabwe iri kuda kuti ibvumidzwe kutengesa nyanga dzayo dzenzou dzainoti dzakawandisa. Hurumende yakambotiwo inogona kubuda mugungano reCITES kana zvido zvayo zvakasatevedzerwa. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu musangano uyu wavive musangano wakakosha zvikuru asi donzvo riri kurwirwa nemakurukota akapinda mumusangano kusanganisira weZimbabwe rakanangana nekuuraya nzou, izvo zviri kurambwa nesangano reCITES. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Bhajeti Raturwa naVaChinamasa
text: Zvakabuda mubhajeti neChina zviri kuratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuramba vachirasikirwa nemabasa zvopa kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo. Kubva muna 2011, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti vanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi mashanu nevashanu varasikirwa nemabasa. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaparura gwaro rezvehupfumi reZimAsset ichivimbisa mabasa mamiriyoni maviri mumakore mashanu anotevera, zvinhu zvichakaita manyama amire nerongo. Asi nenyaya yekusagadzirisa zvematongerwo enyika uye kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, Zimbabwe ichiri kubatwa seyakageza negoka munyama zvopa kuti pashaye vekunze vanoibatsira nemari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe emadhora ekuti chirongwa ichi chishande. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti hurumende inofanira kushanda nevashandi nevashandirwi mukugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Ukuwo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanotiwo VaChinamasa vabaya dede nemukanwa nekunyatsotaura zvinoda kuitwa kuti hupfumi hugadzirike. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yeDivision One yosimudzira
text: HUTUNGAMIRI hweNorthern Region Division One hwazivisa kuti mitambo yenhabvu yange yambomiswa kuitira kuti patambwe Axis Solutions Super 8 Tournament ichasimudzira nemusi wa4 Chikumi.   Pakamiswa mitambo iyi mwedzi wadarika, Golden Eagles ndiyo yange ichitungamira palog iine zvibodzwa 32 kubva pamitambo 16 yakatambwa.   Herentals U20 yaive panhamba yechipiri nezvibodzwa 34 kuchiti pechitatu pakagarwa neSimba Bhora iyo ine zvibodzwa 33 asi yatamba mitambo 15.   Nerimwewo divi, mutambi weSimba Bhora, Tinashe Balakasi, pari zvino ndiye ari kutungamira murwendo rwekurwira mubairo weGolden Boot sezvo akwanisa kunwisa ka18 kubva mumitambo 15 yatambwa nechikwata chake.   Anoteverwa naClaude Mapoka weGolden Eagles uyo anwisa kanomwe kubva mumitambo 16.   Muchinyorwa, icho chakatumirwa kuzvikwata zvose, sachigaro weNorthern Region Division One – Martin Kweza – anoti zvikwata zvinofanirwa kugara zvakagadzirira sezvo mitambo iri kuzosimudzira nemusi wa4 Chikumi.    Tinashe Balakasi   “Mitambo yedu tinotarisira kuti ichasimudzira musi wa4 Chikumi. Tazorangana kuti mitambo isimudzirwe pazuva iri kuti zvitipewo nguva yekupedza kuita hurukuro nevaridzi vepembe pamusoro penyaya yemari yavanozobhadharwa.   “Hatichatange zuva iro taitarisira kuti tichatanga nekukurumidza,” anodaro Kweza.   Zvakadaro, pachasimudzirwa mitambo yeligi iri, ichatambwa kusvika ipere, kochizotambwa fainari yeAxis Solutions Super 8 iyo ichaona Simba Bhora ichibandana neGolden Eagles FC.

headline: Masangano eVarairidzi Onyunyuta neHurongwa hweHurumende Hwekuchengeta paZvikoro vana Vakanyora Bvunzo dzeGrade 7
text: Mamwe masangano anomirira varairidzi munyika ari kunyunyuta nedanho rebazi redzidzo yepasi rekuti vana vakapedza kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade 7 svondo rino varambe vachienda kuchikoro kuitira kuti vadzidziswe nezvavachanosangana nazvo mberi, kana kuti “Life Orientation”. Sangano renhau repadandemutande, reZIMLIVE inoti sangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rakati hurumende haina kunzwawo kubva kwariri payakatora danho iri. Ukuwo, sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, ratiwo kunyange hurongwa hwehurumende hwakanaka, rinoona sekunge hurumende yakaona kuti vana ava vari kukasika kunyora bvunzo zvoita kuti hurumende ide kuramba iinawo vachiwana zvekuita. Mutauriri wesangano iri VaGoodwell Taderera vanoti havaoni vana vachizoramba vachienda kuzvikoro sezviri kutarisirwa nehurumende kana vachinge vatonyora bvunzo dzavo. Mutungamiri weAmalagamated Rural teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanotiwo sangano ravo harina kubatwa naro nebazi redzidzo yepasi pahurongwa uhwu, vachiti danho iri rekudzidzisa vana remangwana ravo rangorohwa zvechibhubhubhu nehurumende sezvo varairidzi vacho vasina kumbudzwa kuti chii chavachange vachiita. No media source currently available VaMasaraure vanoti sesangano vanokurudzira kuti pane vekurongwa kwakakwana. Ukuwo mutungamiri weProfessional Educators Union of Zimbabwe, PEUZ, VaWilson Makanyaire vari kungoimbawo rwiyo rwumwechete rwekuti hurumende yakaita zano ndega isina kugara pasi nevashandi vayo, vanove varairidzi. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa chekuti vana veGrade 7 varambe vari pachikoro kunyange vakapedza kunyora bvunzo dzavo chakanangana nekuti vawane mukana wekudzidziswa nezvavachanosangana nazvo mberi, kana kuti “Life Orientation”. VaNdoro vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwa kunzwisisa kuti hazvirevi kuti kana vana vanyora bvunzo zvikoro zvave kubva zvavharwa.

headline: Amai Mugabe Vanoti Vakazvipira Kushanda Vari Pasi paVaMnangagwa
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vaenderera mberi nemisangano yavo kuMataga Business Center, Mberengwa kuMidlands. Amai Mugabe vati havana chido chekutora chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezviri kutaurwa nevamwe mubato. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti vamwe muZanu-PF, vachitungamirwa nedunhu reMashonland West, vari kuda kuti Amai Mugabe vatore chigaro chekuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Pari zvino Amai Mugabe ndivo mukuru webazi remadzimai reWomens League. Amai Mugabe vatiwo VaMugabe munhu agara achinetsekera nyika uye achirarama hupenyu hwakaoma kubva munguva yechimurenga. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika ashorawo bato reMDC achiti rakaumbwa navanasapurazi vaisafara nekutorerwa minda. Vatiwo mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai,ndivo vakaunza zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti Amai Mugabe havana zvavanoziva pane zvavari kutaura. VaGutu vatiwo bato ravo riri kuenda kumatare kuti amise Amai Mugabe kupa vanhu matarakita ehurumende, sezvo asiri ehurumende. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vashorawo VaRugare Gumbo vePeople First vachiti mutengesi uye vari kufamba vachipa vanhu mari kuti vavatsigire.Asi VaGumbo vati zviri kutaurwa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika hazvina nemusoro wese. No media source currently available Vatevedzeri vose vemutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa naVaPhelekezela Mphoko vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. VaMpoko varatidza kusafara apo vadaidzwa kunzi VaMboko nevakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weMidlands, VaKizito Chivamba. Vati uku kushora uye kunyomba.

headline: Vatsigiri veZimbabwe Warriors Vogunun'una neKubuda muAFCON
text: Vatsigiri venhabvu munyika vanoti havachazive pfumo rovobaya mushure mekubuditswa mumakwikwi eAfrican Cup of Nations kuEgypt nezuro Vamwe vanoti kukundikana kutungamira kweZIFa, vamwe vavhiti vatambi pamwe nevarairidzi vavo. Zvinonzika pose pafa munhu hapashaike muroyi. MaWarriors akadamburwa 4-0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo ndokubuda mumakwikwi e 2019 Africa Cup of Nations munharaunda yekutanga. Asi vakawanda vanoti havaitarisira kuti chikwata ichi chaizorakashwa zvakadai. Zimbabwe haisati yakundwa zvakadai mumakwikwi aya. Asi chirikuvanetsa ndechekuti kutadza here kwemaWarriors kana kuti hutungamiri hweveZifa ndiwo hwakakangaisa matambiro evatambi nenyaya yekusavapa mari yavaive vavimbiswa kuti vachatambidzwa makundano aya asati atanga. Mutsigiri weHighlanders VaSimbai Mahachi vanoti varikushaya kuti chii chaizvo chakaitika. Mumwe mutsigiri wemaWarriors VaPhillip Regede vanoti kukundikana kwechikwata ichi hakuneyi nevatambi asi kuti veZifa vakatadza kusimudza chido chevatambi nekusavapa mari yavo yemuhoro. Vamwewo ndivo vave kutoti aimbove mutungamiri wesangano rinotungamirra nhabvu iri VaPhilip Chiyangwa vaive nani kudarika hutungamiri huripo parizvino, uyo urikutungamirwa naVaFelton Kamambo. Mumwe mutsigiri wemutambo wenhabvu VaNyasha Munyaradzi vanotenderanawo naVaRegede vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi kwave kukanganisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi mutsigiri weDynamos VaTapiwa Chiganze vanoti nyaya dzemari ndedzimwewo vachiti iivo kana vatambi vaenda kumaAfcon inguva yavo yekuzvitengesa kwete kuchemera mari. VaChiganze vanoti panguva inotevera, Zimbabwe inofanira kushandisa vatambi vechidiki vane shungu dzekubudiira muhupenya hwavo munhabvu. Mumwe muteveri wechikwata ichi VaEugene Kuhuni vanoti nguva yemurairidzi wemaWarriors Sunday Chidzambwa yakwana vachitapawo wavanofungira kuti ndiye angatore chikwata ichi. VaSibanda vanobvumiranawo naVaKuhuni vachiti ivo Chidzambwa anofanira kusiiswa basa. Aka kave keechitatu Zimbabwe ichitadza kubudirira kussvika munharaunda yechipiri zvichitevera kutatarika kwavakaita muna 2004, 2006, na 2017. Asi vateveri venhabvu munyika vave kutarisira kuti muna 2021 Zimbabwe ichaitawo zviri nani. No media source currently available

headline: Vasope neVamwe Vasingaone Zvakanaka Vobatsirwa neMagirazi Pachena
text: Mukuru weAlbino Trust of Zimbabwe, VaBrian Nyoni, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu, 300 000, vachawana rubatsiro rwekupiwa magirazi okuverengesa pachena pachirongwa cheSight To the World. Sangano iri riri kushanda nebazi rezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare. VaNyoni vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira vanhu vanemazera ari pakati pemakore makumi mana nemashanu, 45, nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu, 65. Vaendera mberi vachiti chirongwa ichi chichaendawo kumatunhu mashanu enyika kwemakore mashanu anotevera. VaNyoni vatiwo chirongwa ichi hachisi kunangana nevanhu vanorarama nehusope chete. Vaendera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti munhu wese apinde muchirongwa ichi pasina rusarura izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaone kukosha kwemasangano anomirira vanorarama nehusope uye nekunzwisisawo matambudziko avanosangana nawo. Imwe nyanzvi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano isina kudomwa nezita yaudza Studio 7 kuti kune zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti vanhu varware maziso uye vaendera mberi vachiti vanosanganawo nevana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemashanu, 15, vanenge vavhiringidzwa maziso nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Vati rimwe donzvo rechirongwa ichi nderekudzikisa huhwandu hwevanhu vanoita tsaona pamigwagwa nenyaya yekusaona zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Chiripanyanga vatsanangura zvimwe zvezvirwere zvinokonzera kupofomara kwemaziso. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kune vanhu vakawandisa vanoda magirazi okuonesa zvekuti vari kukurudzira varapwi kuti vaende kumakiriniki anosanganisira Sekuru Kaguvi iri paParirenyatwa Hospital, Norton Eye Hospital, Sakubva Clinic kwaMutare ne Richard Morris Hospital kuBulawayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano hwemaziso ine mukurumbira pasi rose Dr Solomon Guramatunhu vanoti zvinorwadza kuona varwere vachishaya rubatsiro munyika, asi dzimwe nyika dzichisimbaradza zvipatara zvehurumende kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kubatsirwa.

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Dhiziri nePeturu Zvizere Munyika
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemhando dzemoto kuti munyika mune mafuta emotokari akawanda uye vanhu vanofanira kuashandisa zvine mwero. Vatiwo mitsetse iri pamagaraji mazhinji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga vachityira kuti achashaikwa zvakare. Vachipa humbowo pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika panyaya dzepeturu nedhiziri nezvimwe, VaMangudya vati nyika yakatenga mafuta akawanda zvekuti vanhu havafaniri kutenga mafuta zvematyira sezvari kuitwa pari zvino. Vati bhanga ravo rine zvirongwa zvekutenga mafuta kubva kumakambani akawanda uye pari zvino makambani emafuta ari kuendesa mafuta aya kumagaraji mazuva ose. Semuenzaniso, vati kambani yeTrafigura inounza munyika mamiriyoni gumi nemana emarita emafuta ayo inoendesa kumakambani ePUMA, Redan, CMED, Trek ne Genesis pasvondo rega rega, panguva imwe cheteyo Total ichiunza mamiriyoni gumi, Engen ichiunzawo mamiriyoni manomwe kozotiwo IPG ichiunza mamiriyoni manomwe. Vatiwo kune mamwe makambani akawanda anopinzawo mafuta munyika achiwana rubatsiro kubva kuRBZ. VaMangudya vati kunyange hazvo nyika iine dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari yekunze, bhanga ravo riri kupa makambani anounza mafuta munyika mari inokwana kutenga mafuta anokwanira nyika yese. Zimbabwe inoda zana nemakumi maviri emamiriyoni emadhora semari yekutenga mafuta mwedzi wega. Vati mitsetse iri kuonekwa zuva nezuva pamagaraji inokonzerwa nekuti vanhu vari kutenga mafuta vachinochengeta nekutengesa pamukoto sezvo vachitya kuti anogona kuzoshaikwa. Vatiwo huwandu hwemotokari hwakwirawo zvakanyanya zvekuti munyika mave nemotokari dzinosvika miriyoni nemazana masere. Mukuru weZimbabwe Engery Regulatory Authority, VaEddington Mazambani, vaudzawo komiti iyi kuti pave kudiwa kutora matanho anopedza dambudziko remafuta aya. Vati panodiwa kumutsiridza hurongwa kwekuti pashandiswe mabhazi nematireni kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanoshandisa motokari. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Dondo Votarisira Kuve kuMusangano weU.S. Leaders' Summit Uchange Uri muWashington, D.C., Svondo Rinouya
text: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai, rePhumulani Minnesota African Women Against Violence, Muzvare Comfort Dondo, vanoti vachange vachizeya nezvematambudziko ari kusangana nemadzimai munyika panyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzavo. Muzvare Dondo vanoti vachaita izvi kumucheto kwemusangano wevatungamiri veAmerica nemuAfrica, weU.S Africa Leaders’ Summit, uyo uchange uri muWashington DC svondo rinouya. Vanoti vachange vari kuita izvi panguva iyo chirongwa chemazuva gumi nematanhatu ekurwisana nemhirizhonga, kana kuti 16 Days of Activism Against Gender-Based Violence chichangopera, vachiti vari kuita izvi senzira yekuti nyaya iyi igare ichizeyiwa, kwete kungomirira mazuva echerechedzo chete. 'Tiri kutarisira kuti pachave nehurukuro dzakadzama dzichange dzichiitwa kumisangano iyi,"Muzvare Dondo vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

headline: Tichiri kuda kuenda kuCHAN: Zifa
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — anoti vakanyorera kuHurumende vachikumbira mvumo yekuti vaende kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrica Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo unofanirwa kutanga nemusi wa16 Ndira.   MaWariors anofanirwa kusimuka musi wa11 akananga kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu sezvo ariwo achavhurira makwikwi egore rino apo achasangana neCameroon iyo inenge iri pamusha. Zvichitevera matanho akatorwa neHurumende ekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 izvo zvakaona mitambo yose ichimbomiswa munyika, Mpandare anoti sangano rinotungamirira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rakabva ranyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo yekuti vatenderwe kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo weCHAN.   “Takanyorera kuHurumende tichikumbira mvumo yekuti tigoenda kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kuCHAN.   Asi kutaura kuno tichiri takamirira kunzwa kuti vachati kudii nenhau yacho. Asi isu tiri kuda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza,” anodaro Mpandare.   Svondo radarika, vatambi vapfumbamwe vemaWarriors vakawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 izvo zvakazotuma murairidzi wechikwata ichi kuti adome vamwe vatambi gumi kuitira kuti kana vakabatwa nedenda iri vakasapora vozovatakura kuenda navo kuCameroon.   Mpandare anoti vatambi vakabatwa neCovid-19 vose vachaongororwa nemusi weChina svondo rino. “Sekuziva kunoitwa, munhu anenge abatwa kuti ane Covid-19 anogara mazuva 10 ari pake oga saka vatambi vedu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vari kwavo voga uye kana zvikasasanduka tine vamwe vatakaudza kuti vagare vakagadziririra.   “Saka nemusi weChina vose vakabatwa kuti vane Covid-19 vachaongororwa zvekare kuti chirwere ichi chichiri mumuviri yavo here kana kuti chakabuda,” anodaro Mpandare.   Kumitambo yeCHAN, maWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Mali neBurkina Faso.

headline: Hurumende Inotadza Kuwirirrana neVashandi Vayo
text: Hurumende yatadza kuwirirana nevashandi vayo panyaya yemari dzemihoro zvichitevera musangangano waitwa nhasi pasi pegungano reNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC. Musangano waitwa uyu hauna chawabuda nacho sezvo vashandi varamba kutambira zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvavanga vapihwa nehurumende vachiti zvikamu izvi idonhwe mugungwa. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru muApex Council, VaGibson Mushangu, vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano uyu kuti paita gakava rakakomba pakati pavo nehurumende mumusangano uyu. VaMushangu vati hurumende yanga yavapawo mari inoita mamiyoni zana nemakumi matanhatu emadhora ekuti vagovane sevashandi kubva muna Kurume kusvika muna Zvita wegore rino. VaMushangu vati vachagara pasi mangwana semasangano ese anomirira vashandi vehurumende voona kuti votora gwara ripi vachiti vacharamwa mabasa kana mazuva akatarwa pamutemo kuti vazivise mushandirwi nezvekuda kuramwa mabasa akwana. Vanga vachitungamira chikwata chehurumende, VaSimon Masanga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti havakwanise kubhadhara vashandi vehurumende nemadhora ekuAmerica sezvavari kuda. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vadzidzisi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende iri kuita dambe nevashandi vayo zvichitevera zvaiswa patafura nehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, VaJuly Moyo, pamwechete negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vanga vasiko kumusangano weNJNC uyu uye nharembozha dzavo dzanga dzsingapindi pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Tunisia Yova Nyika yeKutanga muAfrica Kubuda Mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup22
text: Tunisia yave nyika yekutanga muAfrica kubuda mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup 2022 ari kutambirwa kuQatar. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe Tunisia iyo iri muGroup D yaita zvange zvisingafungidzirwe nevakawanda zvekurova France 1-0. Australia iri kuenderera mberi mumakwikwi aya neFrance yarova Denmark 1-0. Panyika dzimwe dzemuAfrica dziri kumakwikwi aya, Senegal kusvika parizvino ndiyo yabudirira kuenderera mberi muGroup A. Dzimwe nyika dzasara iGhana, Cameroon neMorocco.

headline: Electoral Court Yotarisirwa Kupa Mutongo paNyaya Yekuti Ndiani Akakunda kuChegutu West
text: Dare rinotonga nyaya dzine chekuita nesarudzo, reElectoral Court, riri kutarisirwa neMuvhuro kupa mutongo waro panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nevaimirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemumiriri weChegutu West mudare reparamende, VaGift Konjana, avo vari kupikisa kugadzwa kwaVaDexter Nduna veZanu PF semumiriri wedunhu iri. VaKonjana vari kupikisa danho iri vachiti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru asi Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iyo yakati VaNduna ndivo vakakunda, yakavhiringidza manhamba akabuda musarudzo iyi. ZEC yakazivisa kuti VaNduna vakakunda VaKonjana mushure mekuwana mavhoti anoita 10 932, VaKonjana vachiwana navhoti anoita 10 828. ZEC inonzi yakabvuma kuti yakakanganisa manhamba ayakazvisa, asi yakakurudzira VaKonjana kuti vakwire kudare resarudzo iri kuti nyaya yavo iongororwe. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaNduna kana magweta avo kanawo ZEC kuti tinzwe mativi avo. VaKonjana vanoti vanoda kuti dare ritonge kuti ndivo vakakunda uye kuti vagadzwe senhengo yeparamende inomirira Chegutu West muparamende, kwete VaNduna. Asi VaNduna vanonzi vari kutiwo dare iri harina masimba ekushandura zvinenge zvaitwa neZEC, uye kudoma mumwe munhu kuti ndiye akakunda. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yova Nyika Yekutanga muAfrica Kubaya Vanhu Jekiseni reMushonga weHIV/AIDS
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChina yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza World Aids Day vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vachiti pane zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa kuti Zimbabwe izadzise donzvo rekupedza denda iri panozosvika 2030 . Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yekutanga muAfrica kushandisa mushonga wejekiseni rekudzikisa hukasha hwechirwere cheHIV rinonzi cabotegravir uye nyanzvi dzinoti iri kuita zviri nani kurwisa denda iri kudarika nyika dzakawanda. Dunhu reSADC ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi pasi rose zvikuru muSouth Africa. Vachitaura kumhemberero dzaitwa kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium nhasi mukuru weNational Aids Council, Doctor Bernard Madzima vatiwo zvakakosha kuti munhu wese akwanise kuwana rubatsiro kana ane chirwere cheHIV/AIDS vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinobatsira nyika kuti ikwanise kuzadzikisa chiga chekuderedza nekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vachitaura neStudio 7 Amai Martha Tholanah vave nemakore makumi maviri nerimwe vachirarama nehutachiona hweHIV/ AIDS vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko akadai sehurombo nemhirizhonga yekushungurudzwa kwevana vadIko pabonde mukuedza kuzadzikisa tarisiro yekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Amai Tholanah vatiwo mapiritsi anoshandiswa nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS anogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko nekudaro zvakakosha kuti nyika iise zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehutachiona vaongororwe pachena nguva nenguva zvinhu zvakadai sechiropa neitsvo . Mumwezve anorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Pastor Maxwell Kapachawo vati kupedza dambudziko rekupararira kwehutachiona zvakakosha kuti nyika igadzirise matambudziko arimunyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Olive Thabeni mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS reLife Empowerment Support Organisation vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi vabatsirwe kudzivirira zvimwe zvirwere zvakadai segomarara rechibereko pachena . Zuva reWorld Aids Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa1Zvita gore negore richishandiswa sezuva rekurangarira avo vakashaya ne kuda kwechirwere cheAIDS pamwe nekuyeuchidzana nezvechirwere ichi. Zuva iri rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988 zvakurudzirwa nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation. Dingindira regore rino ririkukurudzira kuti munhu wese anorarama nehutachiona awane kubatsirika zvisinei nechimiro chake. No media source currently available

headline: CZI Yozeya neChina Mamiriro Akaita Hupfumi
text: Sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, iro riri kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri, riri kuita musangano wakakosha svondo rino kuti rione kuti zvinhu zvavandudzwa kuitira kuti makambani atange kushanda zvakanaka. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuCrown Plaza muHarare neChina. Vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu vakamirira mapazi ehurumende vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, gurukota rezvemigodhi, VaWalter Chidhakwa, uye gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaMike Bimha. Mukuru weCZI, VaClifford Siwela, vaudza Studio7 kuti vamwe vari kutarisirwa kuvako vamiriri veInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank vari munyika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda neResources Exploitation, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti CZI inofanira kubuda nezvisungo zvainozoendesa kuhurumende kwete kumirira hurumende kuti iuye nezvisungo nekuti inenge yawandirwa nezvekuita. VaMehlomakulu vanoti basa rehurumende ndere kugadzira migwagwa, magetsi nezvimwe kwete kuronga zvemakambani. No media source currently available Sangano reCZI rinoti makambani emuZimbawe ari kushanda ari pasi pezvikamu zvitatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana izvo zvopa kuti vanhu vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa.

headline: Hurumende Inoti ZEC Ndiyo Inofanira Kuona Kuti ZBC Yapa Mapato Ose Mukana Munguva yeSarudzo
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vanoti munguva yesarudzo sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC ndiyo inofanira kunge yoona kuti ZBC yapa mapato ose mukana wakafanira panguva yesarudzo. VaParadza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vose vanoda kuziva nezvemashandiro eZBC munguva yesarudzo vanofanira kuenda kuZEC kwete kubazi ravo. Izvi zvinotevera, mamwe mapato anopikisa anoti haasi kufara nekambani yenhau yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation nekuburitsa kwairi kuita misangano yeZanu PF chete panguva yainenge ichiitwa asi mapato anopikisa aya asingapihwewo mukana mumwechetewo paanenge achiitawo misangano yawo paari kutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-elections dzakatarisirwa kuitwa musi waKurume 26. Frank Chikowore anotipa nyaya iyi. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vavimbisa kuti vachaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti mapato ose anenge achipihwa mukana sei panhepfenyuro dzemunyika dziri pasi pehurumende idzi. Mamwe mapato anopikisa akaita seCitizens Coalition for Change neMDC Alliance anoti haasi kufara kuti ZBC iri kungoburitsa misangano yeZanu PF chete panguva yainenge ichiitwa iwo asingapihwe mukana mumwechetewo. Mutauriri weCitizens Coalition for Change, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vati zviri kuitwa neZBC zvekuburitsa misangano yeZanu PF chete pachivhitivhiti pamwe nema radio ekambani iyi nguva inenge ichiitwa misangano yebato iri vemapato anopikiswa vasingapihwe mukana wakadai zvinoratidza kuti hapana chati chachinja munyaya dzemafambisirwo esarudzo munyika idzo dzinogara dzichinzi hadzina kufamba zvakanaka nguva dzose. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaWitness Dube, avo vati zviri kuitwa neZBC izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu sezvo ZBC iri kambani inoshandisa mari dzinobva muhomwe dzeveruzhinji uye vati nyaya dzakadai dzinokwanisa kugadziriswa kubudikidza nenhaurirano munyika. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vaudza Studio 7 vari kwaMurehwa kuti bato ravo hariudze ZBC zvekuita. Sachigaro wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa muZimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, vati pavakanyorera tsamba kambani yeZBC vachida kuziva hurongwa kwekambani iyi hwekuti ichazodii nenyaya yekupa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika mikana yakaenzana vakafara kambani iyi payakapindura ichiti yakanga ichiziva zvainotarisirwa kuita nenyaya iyi. Vanoti ZBC yakaratidza sekunge yainge yakazvipira kupa mapato ese mikana yakaenzana uye kambani iyi ikavazivisawo zvakare kuti yakanga yanyorerwawo tsamba nezvenyaya imwecheteyo nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC . VaMaunganidze vati ZEC inofanira kutora matanho akasimba kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe sezvo iriyo inotungamira nyaya dzesarudzo munyika. Mibvunzo yatatumira mukuru weZBC, Muzvare Adelaide Chikunguru, kuti tinzwe divi rekambani yavo panyaya iyi yanga isati yapindurwa pataenda pamhepo uye nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Asi mutsamba yavo kuMisa, Muzvare Chikunguru vakati vakavimbisa kuti vachaita sezvanotarisirwa nebumbiro remitemo kuti vape mikana yakaenzana kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Elections Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vati zvinobuda musarudzo hazvizotambiriki zvakanaka kana mamwe mapato anenge achikwikwidza musarudzo ari kugunun’una kudai uye vakurudzirawo vemapato ane zvichemo kuti varambe vachigogodza pagonhi reZEC. Mapato anopikisa anogara achigunun’una kuti haapihwe mukana wakaenzana nebato riri kutonga panhepfenyuro yeZBC pamwe nemamwe mapepanhau ehurumende akaita seHerald neChronicle izvo zvaanoti zvinobatsiridza kuti sarudzo dzisafambiswe zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Gakava reMapurazi Rosimuka Zvakare paKuchemwa kwaVaChanetsa
text: Gurukota rezveminda nekugariswa kwevanhu kumaruva, VaDouglas Mombeshora, vakayambira vakuru vakuru vebato reZanu PF kuti vasaite hudyire hwekuda kukumba mapurazi vachipa vana vavo nemadzisahwira avo. Gurukota rezveminda nekugariswa kwevanhu kumaruva, VaDouglas Mombeshora, vakayambira vakuru vakuru vebato reZanu PF kuti vasaite hudyire hwekuda kukumba mapurazi vachipa vana vavo nemadzisahwira avo. Vachitaura parufu rwevaimbove gavhuna wedunhu reMashonaland West, VaPeter Chanetsa, neChishanu chapfuura, VaMombeshora vakati nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzinofanirwa kugoverana mapurazi avakatora nemhuri dzavo sezvakaitwa naVa Chanetsa kuitira kuti ivhu rose rishandiswe zvizere kuti nyika iwane zvekudya zvinoikwanira. VaMombeshora vakati VaChanetsa vakakumbira kuti purazi ravo reGreensleeves riri pedyo neguta reChinhoyi ridimurirwe vanakomana vavo vatatu sezvo vaitenda kuti raivakwanira ivo nevana vavo. VaMombeshora vakatenda kuti vakuru vakuru veZanu PF vakatsvagira vana vavo minda veruzhinji vachiishaya. Vachitaura paungano rimwe chete iri, nhengo yeCentral Committee muZanu PF, VaWebster Shamu, vakati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanirwa kuremekedza mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, sezvo vakagadzwa nemidzimu yenyika. VaShamu, avo vakadzoswa mumusangano weZanu PF mushure mekumbomiswa kuva nhengo mugore ra2014 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joyce Mujuru, vakafananidza VaMugabe semukaka une ruwomba hwemhando yeCremora. VaChanetsa, avo vakashaya svondo rapera neMuvhuro, vakapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba renyika vakaradzikwa pamarinda eNational Heroes Acre neMugovera muHarare. Asi VaChanetsa, avo vakafa nekuda kwechirwere cheshuga kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa, vakanga voomerwa nehupenyu sezvo vakanga voendeswa kumatare edzimhosva nebhangi reCBZ mushure mekutadza kudzosera mari yechikwereti inosvika zviuru gumi nezvipfumbamwe zvemadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Vogadzirira kudzoka kwenetball
text: SANGANO reRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL) rinoti ragadzirira kudzoka kwemutambo uyu zvichitevera kuronga kwavakaita mutambo weDry Run svondo radarika uyo wakaona chikwata cheZRP Mambas chichikunda cheGlow Petroleum Queens 27-24 mufainari.   Munyori mukuru weRANL — Moses Gukumure — anoti kugara nguva ndefu vatambi vasingatambe mutambo uyu, zvichikonzereswa nedenda reCovid-19, kwakadzosera kumashure kusimukira kwavo asi vave nemufaro zvichitevera kudzoka kwawakaita.   “Mushure mekunge tapedza nguva ndefu mutambo uyu usiri kutambwa, zvinofadza zvikuru kuti tave kukwanisa kudzokera kuhupenyu hwedu hwekare vasikana vachitamba mutambo uyu unovararamisa. “Mutambo weDry Run wange uri wekuona kuti zvikwata zvave papi mugadziriro yekudzoka kwemutambo uyu. Tazvionera tega kuti zvagadzirira saka isu tagadzirirawo kuti mitambo ichitanga,” anodaro Gukumure.   Zvisinei, anoti vachiri kumbomirira kupihwa mvumo kubva kuZimbabwe Netball Association (ZINA) neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti vachitanga mutambo uyu.   Anoti kusvika pari zvino vanyorera kuZINA kanokwana katanhatu asi havasati vapihwa mhinduro. “Chiri kungotimisa kuti mitambo yedu ichitange kupihwa mvumo uye tinyoreswe neZINA.   Takavanyorera asi havasati vatipindura kusvika pari zvino. Saka tiri kuramba tichigogodza kwavari, tichivanyorera kuti vatipe mvumo titange mitambo yedu,” anodaro.   Zvichitevera kuvambwa kwakaitwawo ligi rePremier Netball League (PNL) nguva yadarika izvo zvakaona zvimwe zvikwata zvichibuda muRANL zvichienda kuPNL, Gukumure anoti maligi akawanda zvinobatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu uye zvichipa vatambi mikana yakasiyana yekukwikwidza. “Tichiri nezvikwata zvedu zvakawanda zvikuru uye isu tinovimba kuti zvapave nemaligi maviri zvichabatsira kukura kwemutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, chikwata cheZRP icho chakahwina mutambo uyu chakaenda kumba neUS$1 350 kuchiti zvimwe zvakakwikwidza zvinosanganisira Lusumbami, Tenax, Ruwa, Correctional Queens neKhami Prisons.

headline: Ishe Charumbira Vanoudzwa neDare Kuti Madzishe Haapindiri Munyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaClement Phiri, vakatura mutongo neChitatu wekuti Ishe Fortune Charumbira vakatyora mutemo apo vakataura mashoko ekuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. Dare iri rakati Ishe Charumbira vanofanirwa kurangwa nemitemo yezvematunhu. VaPhiri vakapawo Ishe Charumbira mazuva manomwe ekuti vaudze vanhu kuburikidza nemapepanhau, nhepfenyuro nepaterevhizheni kuti hapana ishe anofanira kutora divi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Dare iri rakakomekedza kuti Ishe Charumbira vaburitse pachena kuti vakanganisa nekutaura kwavo kuti madzishe anotsigira bato riri kutonga. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinoti madzishe nemasabhuku havafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kunyange hazvo vamwe vavo vachiramba vachiita izvi. Nyaya iyi yakakwidzwa kumatare nesangano reElection Resource Center, ERC. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Ishe Charumbira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembosha yavo. Mukuru weERC, VaTawanda Chimhini, vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo uyu vakati madzishe anofanira kutonga asina divi raanorerekera. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeMureza weNyika Yokonzera Mutauro muDare reParamende
text: Mureza weZimbabwe wakaunza kunetsana mudare reNational Assembly nemusi weChitatu mushure mekunge vange vakabata chinzvimbo chemutauriri wedare iri Amai MArble Chinomona vakaedza kudzinga mudare nhengo mbiri dzeMDC T idzo dzakapinda mudare dzakasungira mureza. Nhengo idzi VaTrevor Saruwaka, naVaGodfrey Sithole dzakaramba kubuda uye dzakabva dzatanga kutambidza vamwe vadzo mureza uyu izvo zvakaita kuti basa rimbomiswa mudare iri. Mureza wenyika wave kufarirwa pamwe nekupfekwa nevakawanda munyika zvichitevera chirongwa chamufundisi Evan Mawarire cheHash Tag This Flag icho chinokurudzira mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuti vaite zvavakavimbisa musarudzo nyika musarudzo dza2013 zvekupa vanhu mabasa, kumisa huori uye kugadzirisa hupfumi. Muchokoto watangwa nenhengo yedare iri yeZanu PF, VaOliver Mandipaka avo vakabvunza kuti sei VaSaruwaka NaVaSithole vainge vakasungira mireza muhuro asi dare iri rakapa mutongo neChipiri wekuti mureza uyu haufaniri kusungirwa mudare. Amai Chinomona vakabva vati nhengo dzeMDC T idzi dzibvise mureza asi vaviri avo vakaramba. Amai Chinomona vakabva vaudza mupurisa wedare iri kana kuti Segeant at Arms kuti vaburitse vaviri ava asi varamba kubva vatanga kutambidza mureza kune vamwe vavo. Mukuru wenhengo dzeMDC T mudare iri VaInnocent Gonese vati kusungira mureza kunoratidza kuti vanhu vari kufarira nyika yavo uye kuburitsa nhengo idzi mudare kunenge kuri kutyora kodzero dzavo. Asi Amai Chinomona vakaramba vakaomesa musoro. Mireza yakazobviswa mushure mekunge Amai Chinomona vati vaizomisa basa nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichiramba kutevedza mutongo wavo. Zvichakadaro, makurukota ese ehurumende akatadza kuuya kuzopindura mibvunzo muparamende izvo zvakaita kuti nhengo dzeMDC dzipopote nekukumbira dare kuti rirange makurukota aya. VaGonese vakati yatova tsika yemakurukota aya yekusauuya kuparamende vakakurudzira kuti varangwe. Asi Amai Chinomona vati vange vaudzwa kuti makurukota aya ainge ari mumusangano wedare remakurukota nekudaro vatevedzeri vavo ndivo vange vakavamiririra. Mune imwewo nyaya, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvevashandi, VaTapiwa Matangaidze, vasveveredzwa nenhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato anopikisa mushure mekunge vataura kuti hurumende ichiri kukwanisa kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Vange vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuna muzvare Jessie Majome veMDC T wekuti sei hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva. VaMatangaidze vanoti vanoshamiswa nekuti mapato anopikisa ari kushushikana nemari dzevashandi vehurumende kudarika vashandi vacho pachavo. Asi Muzvare Majome nevamwe vavo vati zvinokonzera kuti vashushikane nekuti vanomirira vashandi ava munzvimbo dzavo. Mwedzi wapfuura hurumende yakatadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo uye vakatozotambira mihoro yemwedzi wapera mwedzi uno. Mwedzi uno, hurumende haisati yabhadhara vashandi uye haisati yataura kuti vachatambira rini. No media source currently available

headline: America Yobatsira Zimbabwe Kuti VanaChiremba naVanaMukoti Vasatapurirwe Zvirwere
text: Hurumende dzeAmerica neZimbabwe nemusi wenhasi dzakaparura chirongwa chemakore mashanu icho chakanangana nekudzivirira vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano nekuchegetedzwa zvakanaka kweavana nemamwe masangano akaita seveThe Union, Biomedical Research and Training Institute chiri kutsigirwa neveCenters for Disease Control vekuAmerica zvichiburikitsa nemari inopihwa nemutungamiriri wenyika yeAmerica pachirongwa chake chekurwisana neHIV chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weCDC muZimbabwe Amai Laurie Fuller vati vari kutsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakakosha uye zvakawonekwa kuti hapana change chiri kuitwa kuvadzviriri kubva kuchirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Amai Fuller vanoti vachashandisa miriyoni yemadhora nechidimbu pachirongwa ichi mugore rekutanga. Vange vakamirira munyori mubazi rezvehutano pachiitiko chanhasi, Dr Angela Mushavi vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose kuvashandi vezvehutano munyika. Vanoti vashandi vehutano vari padambudziko rekutapurirwa zvirwere vari pababsa uye chirongwa ichi chichaita kuti vagare vachiongororwa nguva nenguva. Mukuru wesangano reThe Union iro rine hunyanzvi mukurwisana nechirwere cherurindi, Dr Christopher Zishiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richabatsira nehunyanzi hwaro mukuronga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vakangazvidzivirire sei kubva kuTB. Vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose nekuti hapana ange ari kutarisa vanachiremba navanamukoti pamwe nekuona kuti vazvidzivirira here kubva kuTB. Chirongwa ichi chinotarisirwa kuitwa muzvipatara nemumakirinika munyika yose. Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzinevanhu vakawanda vanotapurirwa chirwere cherurindi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvevanhu vane chirwere cherurindi vanenge vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kozotiwo vanhu vazhinji vane HIV/AIDS vanofa neTB. No media source currently available

headline: Croatia mu’semi-final’, Bazil kumba
text: Kwayedza

headline: Chin'ono naVaNgarivhume Vanobudiswa Mujeri Mushure Mekubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono pamwe nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare repamusoro mushure mekugara mujeri kwenguva inoda kusvika kusvika kumwedzi miviri. Chin’ono, uyo anga ava nemazuva makumi mana nematatu ari mujeri, abvisiswa zviuru gumi zvemadhora, ukuwo VaNgarivhume, avo vanga vava nemazuva makumi mana nemashanu, vabvisiswa zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora emaRTGS. Vachitura mutongo pachikumbiro chaChin’ono chekuti atongwe achibva kumba, VaTawanda Chitapi vati dare ramejasiriti rakakanganisa pakusaona kuti musi wa31 Chikunguru wakange washevedzerwa kuratidzira wakange wadarika pakaenda Chin’ono kudare iri achiti pane zvashanduka kubva paakambonyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nedare iri. VaChitapi vati Chin’ono abhadhare mari inoita zviuru gumi zvemadhora ari maRTGS uye kuti asiye magwaro emba yake, azvipire kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo, asiye pasipoti yake kudare uye kuti asaende padandemutande rake reTwitter. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaturwa nedare. Mutungamiri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatapi venhau reMisa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati zvanzi nedare Chin’ono asaende paTwitter, zvinotyora kodzero dzake. Vachiturawo mutongo wakanyorwa naVaSiyabona Musithu, VaChitapi vati VaNgarivhume vabhadhare madhora zviuru makumi mashanu kana kuti $50,000 ari maRTGS, vasiye pasipoti yavo kudare ramejasitiriti, vazvipire kumapurisa katatu pasvondo uye vagare kumba yavo yekuWaterfalls kudzamara nyaya iyi yapera. Gweta raVaNgarivhume, VaMoses Nkomo, vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare kunyange hazvo zvakatora nguva yakareba kuti VaNgarivhume vasunungurwe kubva pavakasungwa musi waChikunguru 20. Zvichakadai, mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati mitongo yaturwa nedare nhasi inoratidza kuti matare emunyika anoshanda akazvimirira. Chin’ono naVaNgarivhume vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira veruzhinji munyika kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati musi waChikunguru 31. Vaviri ava vakanyimwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kaviri nedare ramejasitiriti uye kamwe chete nedare repamusoro vasati vapihwa mukana uyu nhasi. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare kuMasvingo, hurumende inonzi yabvisa imwe nyaya panyaya mbiri dzanga dzichipomerwa kanzura weMDC Alliance, Va Godfrey Kurauone, avo vari muchitokisi kwenguva inodarika mwedzi. Nyaya yaraswa ndeyekuimba kwavanonzi vakaita vachizvidza mutungamiri wenyika. Gweta riri kumirira VaKurauone, VaMartin Mureri, vati VaKurauone vari kudzokera zvakare mudare mangwana apo pari kutanga kutongwa nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuvhiringidza kufamba kwevanhu pamwe nedzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: Vaimbove Mutungamiri weHurumende yeJapan, VaShinzo Abe, Vanourayiwa
text: Vaimbove mutungamiri wehurumende yeJapan, VaShinzo Abe, vapfurwa ndokufa apo vanga vachitaura pamusangano wekutsvagira bato ravo rutsigiro kumawirira kweJapan. VaAbe, avo vanga vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemanomwe ekuberekwa, vashaya vari mune chimwe chipatara muNara, umo vanga vachirapwa vari zvichitevera kupfurwa kwavaitwa nepfuti inenge yakagadzirwa kumba. Vanga vachitaura vari panokwirirwa zvitima muguta reNara, kumabvazuva kweOsaka, apo vasvikira nekugotsi kwavo nemurume anga aine pfuti uyo avapfura. Mavhidhiyo ari kutenderera pamadandemutande anoratidza kuti vanga vachiona zvanga zvichiitika vamboedza kuvabatsira. VaAbe vakapinda muhofisi muna 2006 vakatonga kwegore vachizodzoka zvakare muna 2012 kusvika muna 2020 apo vakazosiya chigaro nekuda kwehutano hwavo.

headline: Vamwe Vonyunyuta neMari Dziri kuBhadhariswa Vanoda Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
text: Vanorwira kodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka nekodzero dzevatori venhau vochema- chema nemari yemarezinesi ekutepfenyura yakatarwa nehurumende. Muzviga zvakabudiswa nehurumende pasi pe Statutory Instrument 27 yegore rino nhepfenyuro dzenharaunda vanotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvinezana remadhora kuti vakwanise kungonyorera kuti vanoda rezinesi iyo isingazodzoserwi kunyangwe vakashaya rezinesi iri. Pamusoro pemari iyi vanenge vabudirira vanozobhadharawo mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe pagore rega rega kwemakore makumi erezinesi. Avowo vachange vachida rezinhesi yekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro yenyika yese vanobhadhara mari yekutsvaka rezinesi iri inoita zviuru makumi mana nezviviri zvine mazana mashanu emadhora iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare. Vanozobhadhara zvakare zviuru zana nemakumi maviri anezviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu kuti vakwanise kudaniwa kumusangano unouya veruzhinji kuti vatsanangure pamusoro penhepfenyuro yavo iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare vakasapiwa rezinenesi. Vanoshandisawo madandemutande pakutepfenyura vanotarisirwawo kubhadhara kubhadhara mari inoraudzira miriyoni kana yahwerengedzewa zvese zvinodiwa Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vati mari yakatarwa nehurumende iyi inotyisa zvakanyanya. VaMoyo vati mutengo wakatarwa kunevanotepfenyura pamadandemutande we miriyoni imwechete yemadhora emuno vakadai sanaBus Stop TV vanonakidza veruzhinji, 263 Chat nevamwe vakawanda mucherechedzo wekuti hurumende inoda kuti masangano awa avhare. VaMoyo vashoropodzawo mari dzakatarwa kuneavo vachange vachida marezinesi ekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro dzematunhu. VaMoyo vati havaoni veruzhinji vachikwanisa kubhadhara mari idzi vakati zvobva zvapa hurumende mukana wekuva iyo chete inogona kukokwikwidza kuwana marezinesi awa. Izvi zvatsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi munezvekutepfenyura VaKudzai Kwangwari vati mari irikudiwa kunyanya kune avo vanenge vachizoda rezinesi yenhepfenyuro yenharaunda (Community Radio) yakawandisa. VaKwangwari vanotiwo nekunetsa kurikuita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekudawo kwehurombo munyika havaoni nharaunda dzichizokwanisa kubhadhara marezinesi awa. VaMoyo vatiwo mutemo urikugadzirwa weBroadcasting Services unoti kune avo vachazoda kuita bhizimusi rekutepfenyura munyika vanogona chete kuwana rubatsiro kana rutsigiro kubva kunze kwenyika hwezvikamu zvisingadariki makumi maviri kubva muzana izvo zvinoreva kuti mari zhinji yacho vanofanira kuzvitsvagira. VaMoyo vati izvi zvinosiya veruzhinji vangade kutepfenyura kunze sezv vanenge vasina mari. Kunyangwe zvazvo mumutemo uyu hurumende yakaisa mari yerezinhesi dzenharaunda, parizvino munyika hakuna vakambopihwa rezinesi dzemhando iyi izvo zvopawo vamwe kuti vafungidzire kuti hurumende ingangodaro yoda kuvhura masaisai. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhurumende panyaya iyi asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuudiswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanogaroti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inechido chekuvhura masai sai pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero yenhau munyika yazadzikiswa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yomisa Basa Vashandi Vayo Vose Vasina Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti kutanga neMuvhuro uno vashandi vose vehurumende vasina kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 havasi kuzobvumidzwa kushanda uye havatembire mari. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vashandi vakapihwa nguva yakakwana yekubayiwa nhomba uye vasina vari kuzomiswa basa nekuti vanenge votyora mutemo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti uku kuyedza kuda kumanikidza vari kuzengurira kuti vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 sezvo huwandu hwevari kubayiwa huri kuramba huchidzikira. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kusvika muna Zvita asi nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa pazuva zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Hurumende yakaburitsa mugwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette kuti mushandi wose wehurumende anenge asina kubayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa15 Gumiguru acharangwa. Asi zvinonzi vamwe vanogona kuregererwa ndokunge vapa zvikonzero zvakati tsvikiti zvekuti sei vasina kubayiwa nhomba. Vashandi vehurumende vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 300 000. Masangano evaraitidzi akaita seARTUZ nePTUZ anoti hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vashandi kubayiwa nhomba asi kungovakurudzira nekuvapa dzidziso yakakwana. No media source currently available

headline: VaChari Vanoti Vatumira Vana Chiremba Kunobatsira Vakakuvadzwa neCyclone Idai
text: Mumwe wevanhu vakatanga hurongwa hwekutsvaga mari yekubatsira mudambudziko reCyclone Idai, VaFreeman Chari, vanoti mari yavakwanisa kuunganidza pari zvino yave kudarika zviuru makumi masere nezvina zvemadhora. VaChari vanoti vakatanga hurongwa hwe GoFundMe vaine chinangwa chekuunganidza zviuru zana zvemadhora. VaChari, avo vanogara muAmerica, vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano akazvimirira, pamwe nevanhu vemumatunhu akatarisana nedutumupengo iri. VaChari vanotiwo pane vana chiremba makumi maviri vaendeswa kumatunhu aya kuitira kuti vanobatsira vanhu vanoda rubatsiro zvichitevera kukuvara kwavakaita mutsaona yemvuramupengo. "Tiri kushanda nevanhu vari mumatunhu akabatwa nedambudziko iri. Chishuwo chedu ndechekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi pasina zvekumbomirira kuwana mvumo kumamwe mahofisi. Pari zvino tinofara nevatiri kushanda navo nekuti zvese zvatiri kuita zviri kuitwa pajekerere," VaChari vaudza Studio7. VaChari vanoti rutsigiro rwavari kuwana kubva kunezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri pasi rose rwunodadisa nekuti dambudziko iri neremunhu wese. Vanoti vakatanga chirongwa ichi mazuva apfuura uye vanoshuwira kuti vanhu varambe vachibatsira nepavanokwanisa sezvo dambudziko iri richiri rakakomba. VaChari vanoti kune dzimwe dzvimbo rubatsiro harusati rwasvika sezvo kusiri kufambika asi varikushanda nemasangano akawanikwa vachiwunza zvikopokoko munzvimbo iyi kuti vatakurewo chikafu nemishonga zvichieswa kune avo vakatarisana nedambudziko iri. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Voshanyira Dunhu reOklahoma
text: Mutungamiri we America, VaJoe Biden, nhasi vachashanyira guta re Tulsa, mudunhu re Oklahoma, uko vanoti vanoda kunopemberera kushinga kwevanhu vechitema vakararama mukupondwa kwakaitwa vatema nemhomho yevachena mugore ra 1921. VaBiden vanoti vanhu vatema vakararama havana kuora moyo asi vakashanda nesimba vakaumba hupenyu hwavo patsva. Kupondwa kwevatema uku kwakaitika kwemazuva maviri, anoti 31 Chivabvu ne 1 Chikumi mugore ra 1921, dzimba nemabhizimisi evatema zvichitungidzwa nemoto vanhu vachipfurwa kana kusungirirwa. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitika mushure mekunge umwe musikana wechichena aiva nemakore gumi nemanomwe akapomera mhosva mukomana wechitema aive nemakore gumi nemapfumbamwe achiti akange achida kumubhinya. Zvinonzi pakaurawa vanhu vechitema vanopfuura mazana matatu. VaBiden varikuita rwendo urwu panguva iyo vachieza kudzika mitemo inopedza rusaruraganda mu America. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Muzvinafundo Stan Mukasa, vanodzidzisa paIndiana University of Pennsylvania, vanoti kupondwa kwakaitwa vanhu ava muna 1921 kwaka zivikanwa muna 1995, mushure memurume ainzi Timothy McVeigh akabhomba mahofisi ehurumende muguta reOklahoma City, mudunhu re Oklahoma. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Mary Mubaiwa Voridza Mhere Mushure Mekuendeswa Mujeri Vachirwara
text: Muzvare Marry Mubaiwa, avo vari kunetsana nemurume wavo mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanzi nedare vagare mujeri kwemazuva gumi vachiongororwa kuti vanokodzera kumira pamberi pedare vachitongwa here pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, VaLanzini Ncube, vatura mutongo wekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa, avo vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka, vagare mujeri kwemazuva gumi kuti vaongororwe nanachiremba vehurumende vari mujeri kuti hutano hwavo hunokodzera here kuti vamire mudare vachitongwa. Mutongo uyu wauya apo anachiremba vehurumende vaviri vakapa miwono yakasiyana mudare umwe achiti Muzvare Mubaiwa vanokodzera kuti vamire pamberi pedare asi umwewo achiti izvi hazvikwanisike nekuti vari kukanganwa nekukurumidza uye vari kuratidza kuti vari kushungurudzika mupfungwa nekuda kwekusaona vana vavo avo vavari kunyimwa naVaChiwenga avo vavari kunetsana navo mumatare. Mutongo wedare ati aona zvakakodzera kuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vagare mujeri vaongororwe nevamwe anachiremba vozodzoka kudare mushure memazuva gumi. Mumutongo wavo, VaNcube vatiwo nyaya yekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vadzosererwe pasipoti yavo kuti vanorapwa haisi nyaya iri pamberi pedare zvekuti vangature mutongo wekuti Muzvare Mubaiwa vapihwe pasipoti iyi kuti vanorapwa kunze kwenyika sezvavari kuda. Paturwa mutongo uyu, Muzvare Mubaiwa naamai vavo nedzimwe hama dzanga dziri mudare varidza mhere pamberi pemutongi wedare. Rimwe remagweta aMuzvare Mubaiwa, VaDoug Coltart, vati havasi kufara nemutongo waturwa nedare vachiti izvi zvaratidza kuti pari kushandiswa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kwete mutemo. VaColtart vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro. Mutongo uyu usati waturwa, Muzvare Mubaiwa, avo vanga vachidedera uye kutadza kutaura zvakanaka vachiratidza kuti vari kurwadziwa, vakumbira masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisira United Nations kuti apindire munyaya yavo kuti vakwanise kuti vanorapwa pamwe nekuwaniswa vana vavo. Muzvare Mubaiwa vatiwo dai mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vapindirawo munyaya iyi vakati chinovarwadza ndechekuti murume wavo uyo wavari kunetsana naye ari kushandisa simba rake rezvematongerwo enyika kudzinyirira kodzero dzavo. Muzvare Mubaiwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunzi vaida kuuraya VaChiwenga pavaive mune chimwe chipatara chekuSouth Africa, kufojera mapepa emuchato, kubuditsa mari munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo pamwe nekurova musikana aishanda kumba kwavo.

headline: Breaking...Senegal Yopinda muChikamu Chechipiri Mumakwikwi eFIFA World Cup kuQatar
text: Senegal yave nyika yekutanga muAfrica kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chemakwikwi eWorld Cup kuQatar. Senegal yakunda Ecuador 2-1 muGroup A. Yabudirira kuenda kuchikamu chenyika gumi nenhatu kana kuti Group of 16 pamwe neNetherlands yakunda Qatar 2-0 muGroup A zvekare. No media source currently available

headline: Vanopikisa Vanoti VaMliswa Ndivo Vanofanirwa Kumirira Hurungwe West Kwete VaGuzah
text: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kushorwa zvakanyanya nemabatiro ayakaita sarudzo yemuHurungwe West, uko inoti VaKeith Guzah veZanu-PF vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo kunyange hazvo vange vasiri mugwaro revavhoti. ZEC inoti VaGuzah vakakumbira kuti vabviswe kuMagunje vachienda kuHurungwe West asi pakaita matambudziko pakuita izvi zvakapa kuti izvi zvisaitwe. Asi ZEC inoti kubvumidza kwayakaita VaGuzah kuti vavhoterwe musarudzo yeHurumengwe West zviri pamutemo. ZEC yatendawo kuti VaGuzah havana kukwanisa kuvhota nekuda kwekuti zita ravo rainge risiri mugwaro revavhoti mudunhu iri. VaGuzah vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavangataure panyaya iyi pari zvino. Asi vakakwikwidza musarudzo iyi vakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti VaGuzah havafanire kunge vachimirira Hurungwe West nekuti mapepa avo avakashandisa pasrudzo iyi akange asina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available Mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, uye vari muzvinafundo panyaya yemitemo, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti mashoko eZEC anoshoresa zvikuru. VaMadhuku vanoti kana VaGuzah zita ravorakanga risiri mugwaro revavhoti zvinoreva kuti havana kodzero dzekuvhoterwa mudunhu iri izvo zvinopa kuti VaMliswa vagadzwe semumiriri wedunhu iri muparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikaka neMadzimai Ari Kufa Achisununguka Vana
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chinogona kunge chapa kuti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka huti wedzerei. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvevana reUNICEF muna 2019, inoratidza kuti madzimai mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 462 pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vanofa vachisungunuka muZimbabwe. Huwandu uhu hwange hwakati derere pane madzimai mazana matanhatu negumi nevana kana kuti 624 vaifa vachisungunuka pamadzimai zviuru zana kana kuti 100 000 muna 2017. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai reWomen’s Action Group, Amai Edna Masiiwa, vanoti huwandu hwemadzimai ari kufa achisungunuka hwakaderera asi kufa kwemudzimai kana mumwe chete kunoshungurudza. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kugara kure nezvipatara kunopa kuti hupenyu hwemadzimai huve munjodzi sezvo vachizosvika pakuda kusungunuka vasati vavhenekwa nachiremba sezvinokurudzirwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Tonotenda Michael Simemeza vatiwo zvimwe zvinokonzera kufa kwemadzimai zvinosanganisira denda remoyo uye zvimwe zvirwere zvinotapuriranwa pabonde. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vakurudzirawo zvakanyanya varume kuti vapote vacheperekedzana nemadzimai avo kuenda kumakiriniki kuti vanzwe zvinenge zvichitaurwa navanachiremba zvinozobatsira kuti madzimai asungunuke nyore. Vatiwo nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19, hurumende dzakawanda kusanganisirawo yeZimbabwe hadzichakoshese hutano hwemadzimai akazvitakura nezvimwe zvirwere. Mukuyedza kubatsira madzimai akazvitakura munyika yeZimbabwe, sangano reUnited Nations Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA, rakanyorerana chibvumirano nenyika yeJapan chekubatsira nemari inosvika miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana matatatu emadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti USD1,3 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, vachishanda nesangano reUNFPA, Dr Edwin Mpeta vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira zvipatara nemakiriniki zvemumaguta eHarare neBulawayo sezvo muri imo makaonekwa kuti mune madzimai akawanda ari kufa achisungunuka. Doctor Mpeta vanoti zvipatara nemakiriniki zvichatengerwa zvinoshandiswa pakubatsira madzimai akazvitakura uye nezvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kweCovid 19 pakati pemadzimai akazvitakura nevakoti navanachiremba. UNFPA inoti pagore, madzimai zviuru gumi nezvishanu kana kuti 15, 000 vanosungunuka kuBulawayo ukuwo vamwe zviru makumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 45, 000 vachisungunuka muHarare. Pamadzimai ose aya, zviuru mapfumbamwe kana kuti 19, 000 vanoda kuvhiyiwa uye vachabatsirwa nemari yabva kuJapana iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Haisati Yavhura Mabhodha Ayo?
text: Vamiriri vehurumende kumuganho weBeitbridge neSouth Africa vanonzi nezuro vakazivisa kuti nyika haisi kuzovhura miganho yayo nhasi, zuva riri kuvhurwawo miganho yenyika yeSouth Africa, sezvanga zvakatarisirwa nevakawana. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross-Border Traders Associationa, VaDenis Juru, vanoti vakaudzwa nezvedanho iri nezuro pamusangano wavakaita nevamiriri ava. South Africa inonzi yakazivisa kuti yaizovhura miganho yayo nhasi, izvo zvakapawo vana veZimbabwe tarisiro yekuti nyika yavo yaizoitawo zvimwechete. Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe yakagara yazivisa zvayo kare kuti yaizovhura chete nhandare dzendege musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove nhasi. Miganho pamwe nenhandare dzendege zvakavharwa muna Kurume senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kanawo munyori mubazi ravo, VaNick Mangwana, kunyange hazvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichirira. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vatiwo vanga vasati vanzwa nezvenyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaJuru. No media source currently available

headline: Homwe yeAmerica yePEPFAR Inopa Mari Kune Vanorarama neH-I-V Yekudzivirira COVID-19
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yapa rubatsiro rwemari inoita madhora zana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvemari yekuAmerica kuburikidza nehomwe yePresident’s Emergency Plan for Aids Relief, (PEPFAR), iyo ichabatsira vanorarama nehutachiwana hweH-I-V mukudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19. Mashoko aburitswa nemuzinda weAmerica uri muZimbabwe anoti mari iyi ichashandiswa kutenga zvinhu zvakaita sesipo, migoro, nzvimbo dzekugezera maoko, pamwe nemishonga inouraya hutachiwana yekuzora mumaoko kana kuti sanitizers, zvichapiwa kumasangano agara achibatsirwa nehomwe iyi. Mari iyi inonzi ichashandiswawo zvakare mukudhinda magwaro anopa ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 ichi. Mwedzi wapera America yakapa World Health Organisation mari inoita mazana mana nemakumi manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora yekuti ibatsire Zimbabwe mukurwisana ne COVID-19. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reNational Aids Council, VaRaymond Yekeye, vanoti sesangano vanotenda zvikuru nezvaitwa nehomwe yePEPFAR izvi sezvo Zimbabwe iri kudawo rubatsiro rwekurwisanawo nechirwere cheCOVID-19 senyika dzose pasi rino. Mari iyi inonzi ichasvitswa kumasangano matatu agara anoshanda nePEPFAR anoti OPHID, I-TECH neZACH, ayo achazoita basa rekugovera zvinhu izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Harare Agricultural Show Inovhurwa Iine Vanhu Vashoma Gore Rino
text: Zviratidzwa zveHarare Agricultural Show zvatanga nhasi paine kurudziro yekuti varimi pamwe nevemakambani ezvicherwa, havafaniri kupokana asi kuti vanofanira kushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira mabasa avo nehupfumi hwenyika.
