Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa kuHarare Agricultural Show wazeya kuti varimi nevemakambani ezvicherwa vangashandidzane sei, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima, VaVangelis Peter Haritatos, vati hapafaniri kuve nemakakatamwa pakati pevaviri ava asi kuti vanofanira kushanda pamwe chete. VaHaritatos vatiwo basa rekuchera zvicherwa rinofanira kuitwa pachitevedzwa mitemo yezvekuchengetedza nharaunda vachiti pari zvino pane vamwe vari kungochera pese pese vachiparadza masango nezvimwe zviwanikwa. Mukuru anoona nemabasa ezvemigodhi musangano reChamber of Mines of Zimbabwe, VaDavid Matyanga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyika ine mitemo yakajeka inotaura kuti mabasa ekurima nekuchera zvicherwa anofambiswa sei uye kupoka kuripo kunokonzerwa nekuti mitemo iyi haisi kutevedzwa. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaPolite Kambamura, vatiwo mabasa ekurima pamwe nekuchera zvicherwa akakosha kunyika nekudaro anofanira kudyidzana mukusimbisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vati muzvicherwa munobva zvakawanda zvinoshandiswa pakugadzira zvinhu zvekurimisa nekudaro makambani ezvicherwa anofanira kutsigira mamabasa ekurima zvakasimba. VaKambamura vati zvinofadza kuti pane mamwe makambani ezvicherwa akaita seZimplats ave kutotsigira mabasa ekurima. Mwedzi wapfuura Zimplats yakaisa mamiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica muchirongwa chekuchengeta mombe dzenyama nemukaka munyika yese. Vakambotungamira sangano reConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vati zvakakosha kuti varimi nemakambani ezvicherwa vashande pamwe chete kuitirakuti nyika iwane chikafu chakakwana pamwe nekusimudzira hupfumi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Agricultural Soceity, Dr Andrew Matibiri, vati hurongwa hwavo hwegore rino hwatanga zvakanaka chose. Varimi zana kubva kumativi mana enyika pamwe nemakambani zana nemakumi mashanu nemanomwe ari kuratidzira paShow yegore rino iyo ichavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi weChina. Show yegore rino iri kuitwa pachitevedzwa nzira dzekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 uye vakabaiwa nhomba kana kuvhenekwa ndivo chete vari kubvumidzwa kupinda muShow. VaMatibiri vatiwo veruzhinji vanokwanisa kuona zvinenge zvichiitika kuShow pamadandemutande akaita seZoom nemamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Muchatiguta muPSL: Balakasi
text: MUTAMBI weSimba Bhora – Tinashe Balakasi – oyambira zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League kuti zvichavaguta mwaka unotevera zvichitevera kupinda kwavakaita muPSL.   Balakasi, mwaka uchangopera weRuyamuro Northern Region Division One, akanwisa ka29 ndokunyora nhoroondo yekunwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete.   MuCastle Premiership, pave nemwaka yakawanda pachishaya mutambi anokwanisa kunwisa kanodarika ka20 mwaka mumwe chete izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa naNorman Maroto mugore ra2010 apo aitambira Gunners FC.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Balakasi anotsidza kuti mwaka wa2023, uyo uchange uri wekutanga weSimba Bhora muPSL, zvikwata zvizhinji zvichamuguta sezvo achange achipisa sezvaaiita muNorthern Region.   “Gore rinotevera, ndichange ndichitokwikwidza nevamwe vatambi ndichivarakidza kuti ndinotonwisa sezvavanotoita uye ndinogona kutovadarika.   “Ndinoda kuvarakidza kuti ndiri mutambi wepamusoro saivo,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu asati aenda kuSimba Bhora, akambotambira muPSL kuzvikwata zvinoti Harare City neCAPS United.   Panguva iyi, akangokwanisa kunwisa kana chete paaitambira zvikwata izvi.   Anoti haana kutamba zvinonwisa mvura apo akambotambira muPSL nekuti aisanyatsowana mikana yekutamba kuzvikwata izvi.   “Pandakambotambira muPSL ndaisanyatsowana mikana yakakwana saka handina kunyatsotamba zvinonwisa mvura. Asi, iye zvino ndadzoka nechikwata chinovimba neni nekudaro ndicharakidza zvikwata zvese chipo changu uye ndinoda kunyora imwe nhoroondo,” anodaro.   Balakasi anoti mumakore maviri anotevera, anoshuvira kunge ave kutambira nhabvu yake kunze kwenyika. Anoti mwaka unotevera achashanda nesimba kuitira kuti azoshevedzwa kuzotambira chikwata chenyika asi hunge kana zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFIFA zvabviswa.   “Mutambi wese wenhabvu shuviro yake kutambira kunze kwenyika uye kutambira nyika yake. Saka iniwo ndinotarisira kuti mumakore maviri anotevera, ndinge ndave kutambirawo kunze kwenyika. Ndinoda kutanga kutambira kuSouth Africa uye ndinovimba ndikashanda nesimba zvinoitawo kuti ndigoshevedzwa kuzotambira nyika yangu.   “Izvezvi nekuda kwezvirango zviripo ndinoziva kuti nyika yedu haisi kutamba nhabvu nezvikwata zvekunze. Asi kushanda nesimba kwakanaka nekuti kunoita kuti ndigare ndichitariswa nevarairidzi venyika kuitira panozobviswa zvirango ndinogona kuwanawo mukana,” anodaro Balakasi.   Zvakadaro, Simba Bhora iri mushishi kuita gadziriro yekusangana neGolden Eagles mufainari yeAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament ichatambwa musi wa22 Gumiguru kuRufaro Stadium.   Vaimbi vanoti Sulumani Chimbetu naBaba Harare vanotarisirwa kuzoridza pamutambo uyu vachivaraidza vatsigiri venhabvu.

headline: Zhoya apihwa ‘red card’ neFIFA
text: AIMBOVE munyori mukuru wevaridzi vepembe kuZIFA, Obert Zhoya, akatemerwa zvirango zvekuti asave nechekuita nenhabvu kwemakore mashanu zvichitevera kubatwa kwaakaitwa nemhosva yekushungurudza zvine chekuita nebonde varidzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Akabva aripiswa US$20 400.   Zhoya akasiya chigaro chake muna Kubvumbi gore rino apo FIFA yakatanga kuferefeta nyaya yakaendeswa kwavari nevanhu vaimupomera mhosva.   Zhoya akawanikwa aine mhosva nesangano reFIFA Adjudicatory Independent Ethics Committee. Muchinyorwa, FIFA, iyo isingade kunzwa nyaya dzine chekuita nekushungurudzwa, inoti chikwata chaiferefeta nyaya iyi chakagutsikana nehumboo hwachakawana panyaya yaZhoya.   “Mushure mekunyatsoongorora humboo hwakabva kune vakashungurudzwa zvichitevera kuferefetwa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi, chikwata cheInvestigatory neAdjudicatory Chamber chakagutsikana kuti Zhoya akatyora mutemo weArticle 23 (Protection of physical and mental integrity), Art. 25 (Abuse of position) uye Article 13 (General duties) yeCode of Ethics,” chinodaro chinyorwa cheFIFA.   Zhoya akaziviswa nezvemutongo wake uyu nezuro, zuva iro pakabva patanga zvirango zvaakatemerwa. Aimbove shefu waZhoya, Bryton Malandule ari kupomerwawo mhosva yekushungurudza varidzi vepembe vachidzimai uye nyaya yake iri kuferefetwa.   Nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nenzira yepabonde munhabvu, kubva kuhutungamiri kusvika kuvatsigiri, huri kuwanda muZimbabwe zvekuti vanamazvikokota vanoti nyaya yaZhoya inofanirwa kuve mucherechedzo kune vangade kuzopara mhosva dzakadai mune remangwana.

headline: USAID Yopa Rubatsiro Kune veChidiki Vanorarama neHutachiona hweHIV
text: Vechidiki vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vatambira nemufaro mari yerubatsiro yapiwa kusangano rakazvimiririra reAfricaid Zvandiri nesangano nebazi rehurumende reAmerica reUnited States Agency for International Development. Africaid yapiwa mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora kuti ishandise muzvirongwa zvevechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Mumwe wevechidiki vari kurarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS achishanda neAfricaid, Tanyaradzwa Vinho ati mari yavawana iyi ichavabatsira kupa dzidziso kune vechidiki munyaya dzechirwere ichi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVengai Hadji ane makore makumi maviri nematatu anoraramawo nehutachiona uhu. Hadji ati shuviro yake ndeyekuti vechidiki vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vadzidziswewo mabasa ekuzviraramisa muhupenyu sezvo vamwe vavo vari nherera. Mumwe anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muAfricaid, Amai Martha Maodzeke vaudza Studio 7 kuti vane chivimbo chekuti mari yavapiwa ichavabatsira kuvandudza hupenyu hwevechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Amai Maodzeke vati kubva mumatunhu matanhau avange vachishanda vanenge vawedzera kusvika pamakumi maviri nemaviri. Vanomirira sangano reUnited States Agency for International Development kana kuti USAID muZimbabwe Amai Stephanie Funk vati vanofadzwa nebasa reAfricaid iro ririkupa tarisiro kune vechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Mari yekubatsira vechidiki iyi inouya panguva iyo gwaro reongororo rakabudiswa United Nations Programme on HIV and AIDS kana kuti UNAIDS riri kuburitsa pachena kuti kunyange hazvo ndufu dzine chekuita neHIV/AIDS dziri kuderera kubva mugore ra2005, vechidiki vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakore makumi maviri nemana vari kusarira munyaya dzekuongororwa ropa nekuwana mishonga yeHIV/AIDS.

headline: Zim gymnastics yahwina bhuronzi
text: CHIKWATA chenyika chegymnastics chakahwina menduru yebhuronzi kumakwikwi eAfrican Union Sports Council (AUSC) Region 5 Youth Games ayo akaitirwa kuLilongwe, kuMalawi.   Zimbabwe yakapedza iri pechitatu kumashure kweSouth Africa iyo yakahwina menduru yegoridhe neAngola yakatora nhamba yechipiri ikahwinha yesirivha.   Chikwata cheZim gymnastics chaive nevatambi vanosanganisira Alexandra Chenelle Hencil, Maitaishe Naomi Chikuni, Nontokozo Makanaka Sibanda, Shameela Naida Fazilahmed, Pride Nyagura, Tatenda Kajonde, Tanatswa Clement Mutowo naLennon Kutenda Kagona.   Murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Rodwell Ngadziore – anoti vatambi vake vakadadisa nekupedza vari pechitatu uye anoona chiedza chakanaka mune remangwana zvekuti vanogona kuzokwikwidza mumitambo mikuru yemuAfrica.   Anoti vatambi vazhinji vaive muchikwata chake aka ndiko kekutanga kavo kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.   “Tine mufaro mukuru nekuhwina kwatakaita bhuronzi mumutambo uyu wemagymnastics. Zvinorakidza kuti remangwana rechikwata chedu rakajeka zvikuru nekuti tichitarisa vatambi vari muchikwata chedu, vadiki vanotangira kubva pamakore 13 kusvika pa18 okuberekwa chaiwo.   “Isu sevarairidzi takasarudza kutakura vatambi vane makore mashoma ivavo kuti tiende navo kuMalawi nechinangwa chekuti vakure mumutambo uyu.   “Tinoziva kuti pavachazokera, vanogona kutorwa zvekuzvekutosvika pakuhwina menduru yegoridhe chaiyo,” anodaro Ngadziore.   Zvakadaro, mumitambo yese, chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe chakakwanisa kuhwina menduru dzinodarika 13 kuAUSC Region 5 mumitambo yakasiyana. Mutambi weTaekwondo, Clarity Ndhlovu, akahwina menduru yesirivha kumakwikwi aya.

headline: Danho reSouth Africa reKunyevenutsa Mutemo weKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19 Rotambirwa neMufaro
text: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa vakazivisa neChitatu manheru kuti hurumende yavo yave kuzonyevenutsa mitemo yakasiyanasiyana ine chekuita nekudzivirirwa kwekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 . VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti kubva pakati peusiku hwemusi weSvondo 20 Gunyana nyika inenge yave kuenda pa Level 1 ye lockdown, zvichitevera kudzikira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuvhenekwa vaine chirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisawo kuti kutanga musi wa 01 Gumiguru, South Africa inenge yovhura miganho yayo uye kubvumidza vashanyi vanopinda nendege pamwe nepamiganho yayo vanenge vaine magwaro anoratidza kuti vakavhenekwa Covid-19 mukati memaawa makumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 72 hours. Vakati vanenge vasina magwaro aya vanozoendeswa kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vakamirira kuvhenekwa kuona kana vaine Covid-19, kana kuti quarantine centres. Vashanyi vanobva kunyika dzinozivikanwa kuti dzine dambudziko reCovid-19 vakanzi vanogona kurambidzwa kupinda munyika iyi. Mutungamiri wesangano reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari muSouth Africa vakatambira nemufaro mukuru danho rekunyevenutsa lockdown iri, sezvo vanga vasingawanewo mari yekubatsirika yanga ichipiwa zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa. VaJuru vanotiwo kuvhurwa kwemiganho, zvikuru weBeitbridge kuchatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, izvo zvagara zvichishandisa muganhu uyu kunotenga pamwe nekutengesa zvinhu muSouth Africa Vanoti vanotarisira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe ichazivisawo nezvekuvhurwa kwemuganhu weBeitbrdge kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kiupinda munyika dzose zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voparura Musangano weZvekurima kuVictoria Falls
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnagagwa vakasvika muVictoria Falls nezuro sezvo vari munyarikani pamusangano uri kuitwa mudhorobha iri weSouthern African Confederation of Agicultural Unions. Musangano uyu uri kutarisirwa kutanga nhasi. VaMnangagwa vakaendawo negurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri. Nyika dzinosvika gumi nenhatu dziri kutarisirwa pamusangano uyu dzichizeya nyaya dzekutengeserana mune zvekurima. Masangano anoti Zimbabwe Farmers Union neCommercial Farmers Union ndiwo akaronga musangano uyu. Panopera musangano uyu pari kutarisirwa kuti panenge pave sachigaro mutsva wesangano iri sezvo aripo ikozvino, Doctor Theo de Jager, vanenge voenda pamudyandigere. Muzvinafundo munyaya dzezvekurima VaMandivamba Rukuni vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru kunyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica munyaya dzekutengeserana. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Oyambirwa nezveChirwere CheKusagadzikana Mupfungwa Achongobva Kusunguruka
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira vanhu kuti vagare vakangwarira nyaya yekurwara nepfungwa kunogona kuita madzimai kana achangobva mukusungunuka zvinogona kuti vamwe vagume vatora hupenyu hwavo. Asi chirwere ichi chinorapika munhu akakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro nekukurumidza. Chirwere ichi chinonzi postpartum chinokonzerwa nekusagadzikana mupfungwa kana mudzimai achangobva mukusungunuka. Dr Vongai Munatsi vanoti pavanhu gumi vanoenda kunotsvaga rubatsiro kuzvipatara nekumakiriniki munyika, panowanikwa vanhu vatatu vanezvirwere zvepfungwa. Vakurudzira kuti kana zvaonekwa kuti mukadzi asununguka aakuita zvinhu zvaaisamboita kare zvinenge kusuwa, kutadza kudya zvakanaka kana kutoramba kuyamwisa mwana , zvinenge zvavekuratidza kuti pfungwa dzake dzinenge dzisisina kugadzikana zvakanaka. Dr Munatsi vanoendera mberi vachiri zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinofamba nedzinza remunhu zvokuti kana zvikasaongororwa nemazvo, panogona kuonekwa kuti kune vamwe vemudzinza vakambobatika nedenda repfungwa. Vatiwo zvirwere zvepfungwa hazvikonzerwi nekuroiwa, madhimoni kana mweya yetsvina asi kuti varapwi ava vanenge vachingoda anoda kukurukura navo kuti vataure misengwa yavakatakura. Mugari wekuChitungwiza Amai Grace Chihuri vanoti nyaya yemadzimai anovhiringika pfungwa kana vabatsirwa inyaya isinganyanye kutambirika mumhuri dzakawanda zvokuti havatozive kuti vakadzi ava vanokwanisa kurapwa nemishonga vakatoita zvakanaka. Nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe National Association for Mental Health kana kuti ZimNamh, Dr Ignatius Murambidzi, vakatsinhirawo mashoko akataurwa naDr Munetsi vachiti vanhu vakawanda havanzwisise nezvenyaya deemadzimai anoshungurudzika mushure mokunge vasununguka izvo zvinozoita kuti varware havo muchinyararire. Dr Murambidzi vanoti zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinorapika nemapiritsi zvokuti varapwi ava vanotogona kutorarama kusvikira vakwegura vachinwa mishonga iyoyi. Chero zvazvo zvisingazivikanwe kuti kuti madzimai mangani ane dambidziko repostpartum depression munyika, Dr Murambidzi vanoti denda repfungwa ratove dambudziko guru nokudaro panofanirwa kutsvagwa dzimwe nzira dzokuti vanhu vanedambudziko iri vakurumidze kuwana rubatsiro vasati vasvika pakuda zvokuzotora hupenyu hwavo. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti huhwandu hwevanhu varikuzviuraya kwave kuda kuenzana nevanhu vanofira munjodzi dzepamigwagwa. Vanhu mirioni nemazana matanhatu anemakumi mana, 1 640, vakafa nekuzviuraya uye vanhu vanodarika mirioni nemazana masere anemakumi matatu, 1830, vakafira mutsaona dzepamigwagwa mugore 2017 zvinova zvinhu zvave kuratidza kuti firo mbiri idzi dzatove kukwikwidzana. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti zvakare vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu pasi rose vanorwara nechirwere chekufungisisa kana kuti depression pachirungu, uye vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete, vanozviuraya pasi rose.

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reChirwere cheShuga
text: Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakacherechedzwa nemusi weChitatu, vamwe vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi –pamwe nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe- vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekutadza kuwana mishonga nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakutenga mishonga iyi. Susan Mpofu anochengeta mai vake vakura uye vave nenguva vaine chirwere chediabetes anoti mumasvondo mashoma apfuura, amai vake vakambofenda vakazomuka mushure menguva inosvika awa rimwe chete nekuda kwekuti vaive vave nemazuva maviri vasina kumwa mapiritsi avanofanirwa kumwa nekuda kwekuti vaive vashaya mari yemadhora ekuAmerica anodiwa nezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Amai Charity Ndisengei ndemumwewo wevanhu vakawanda munyika vari kurarama nechirwere chediabetes icho vakabatwa mugore ra1995. Amai Ndisengei vanoti mumakore ose apfuura vange vasina dambudziko rekuwana mapirirtsi avanofanirwa kumwa, asi pari zvino ivo nevamwe vakaita saivo vave panjodzi yekurasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kwekudhurirwa nemishonga. Chirwere chediabetes icho chinoziikanwa nevakawanda chichinzi chirwere cheshuga, chinokonzera kushomeka kana kuwanda kweshuga mumuviri izvo zvinogona kuuraya. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya vanobvuma kuti nekuda kwemariro ezvinhu munyika, vanhu vane zvirwere zvakaita sediabetes vakatarisana nedambudziko guru sezvo vane zvirwere izvi vachifanirwa kuwana mishonga kwehupenyu hwavo hwose. Dr Ngwenya vanotiwo zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rakakosha nekuti rinobatsira kuti vanhu vawane ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kusangano reZimbabwe Diabetics Association pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere chediabetes munyika. Asi gwaro rinonzi World Health Organisation kana kuti WHO Non-communicable Diseases Progress Monitor regore ra2017 rinoratidza kuti vanhu zviuru makumi mana, zvinove zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana, vakafa nekuda kwezvirwere zvisingatapurirranwe kusanganisira diabetes. Gwaro iri rinoratidzawo kuti pamatanho anotarisirwa neWHO kuti atorwe pakudzivirira zvirwere zvisingatapurirane huruemende iri kusarira kumashure pane zvakawanda. Chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti hurumende ine mitemo ine matanho akanaka anoratidza zvose zvinofanirwa kuitwa pakudzivirira diabetes nezvimwe zvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe. Asi vati chinonetsa ndechekuti zvinhu izvi hazvizotevedzerwi. Dr Bonde vanotiwo chirwere chediabetes chikasarapwa chinokonzera zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda vachiti zviri nani kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yakafanira pane kuzoedza kurapa zvimwe zvirwere zvakawanda. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro avo vaimbova sachigaro weZimbabwe Diabetics Association vari kutora hutungamiri hwechikamu cheAfrica cheInternational Diabetes Association kutanga kwegore rinouya. Dr Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti Zimbabwe iri kusarira kumashure panyaya yekurapwa kwediabetese vachiti hurumende yakapedzisira kuita ongororo yemamiriro echirwere ichi munyika mugore ra2005. Asi vati bazi ravo riri kuita zvose zvakafanira kusanganisira kuita kuti zvive nyore kuti vanhu vawane mishonga yavanofanirwa kuwana. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day rinocherechedzwa musi waMbudzi 14 gore rega rega pasi pehurongwa hwesangano reInternational Diabetes Association rakabatana neWHO.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vave Kufa neCovid-19 Hunokwira Panguva Iyo Chirwere Chadzika Midzi Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamakumi masere kana kuti 80, zvichitevera kushaya kwevamwe gumi. Bazi iri rakatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zvina nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 4 075, mushure mekunge vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154 vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vapona kubva ku Covid-19 vanonzi vakanga vasvikawo pachiuru nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 057. Vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vanonzi vagara vari munyika, vasina nhoroondo yekumbobuda munyika. Vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana maviri kana kuti 1 200, vanonzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi muHarare chete, izvo zvaita kuti rive dunhu ringanzi mwoyo wechirwere ichi pari zvino. Pasi rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemasere nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 18,300 000 vabatwa nwechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 694 700. Nyanzvi mume zvehutano vari chiremba kuCharlotte kuNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr. Simbiso Ranga, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pamwe nekufa nacho zvinhu zvinoshungurudza zvikuru. Dr. Ranga vanoti izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhuwo zvavo pamwe nhurumende vanofanirwa kuongorora zvakare nzira dzavari kushandisa mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti vaone kana dziri kushanda sezvinotarisirwa. Vanokurudzirawo vanenge varasikirwa nehama dzavo kuburukidza nechirwere ichi kuti vatore matanho akasimba anoita kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere kubva kumufi, anosanganisira kusageza mufi, uye kupfeka nhumbi dzinodzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashoma Vanonyoresa Zvakare Muchikamu Chechipiri cheBVR
text: Chikamu chechipiri chechirongwa chekunyoresa chapera neMuvhuro, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, ichiti vanhu vanyoresa kusvika musi weSvondo vangoti pfuureyi zvishoma mamirion maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru, pasingatarise vanyoresa neMuvhuro. Zvaburitswa neveZEC zvinoratidza kuti dunhu reBulawayo rine vanhu zviuru makumi masere nezvitatu, kana kuti zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvevanhu vanyoresa. Dunhu reMatabeleland South ranyoresa vanhu zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nezvina, ukuwo dunhu reMatabeleland North riine zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvipfumbamwe. Dunhu reHarare rine vanhu vakawanda vanove zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu, vanove zvikamu makumi maviri nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Dunhu reManicaland ndiro riri panzvimbo yechipiri pahuwandu hwevanhu vanyoresa kuvhota. Dunhu iri rine vanhu zviuru mazana matatu, zvinove zvikamu makumi matatu nezvitatu kubva muzana. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune veZEC kuti vatipe huwandu hwose kusvika papera chirongwa ichi. Asi sachigaro reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika, sangano ravo riri kushushikana nenyaya yekuti vanhu vanyoresa vachiri vashoma. VaMakoni vati vanoshushikana nenyaya yekuti vaongorori vavo pamwe nevamwe vanhu kunyanya kumaruwa, vari kutyisidzirwa nemadzishe kana masabhuku, izvo zvatsinhirwa naAmai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava vanove mukuru weZESN. Kushaya magwaro ekuzvarwa pamwe nekuunza magwaro asiri iwo anodiwa ndizvo zvimwe zvezvikonzero zviri kunzi neveZEC zviri kutadzisa vanhu vakawanda kunyoresa. VaTafadzwa Mujeri, avo vari muchirongwa chevechidiki vebato reMDC T chekukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota chinoziikanwa kunzi “Bereka Mwana Tiende” vaudza Studio 7 kuti ongororo yavo inoratidza kuti kushaikwa kwemagwaro ekuzvarwa ndiro remamwe matambudziko makuru akatarisana nevanhu munzvimbo yeBulilima mudunhu reMatabeleland South. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhofisi yeRegistrar General panyaya iyi. Murongi wemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers’ Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vanoti sangano ravo rine chirongwa chekubatsira vanhu kuti vawane magwaro ekuzvarwa. Chikamu chechitatu chechirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chinotanga musi weChina, Mbudzi 16 chichipera musi waZvita 1. Chikamu chechina chinove chekupedzisira, chinotanga musi waZvita 4 chopera musi was Zvita 19. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVarairidzi, reARTUZ, Rokurudzira Varairidzi Kutora Zororo reKugadzirisa Matambudziko Avo
text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti riri kukurudzira varairidzi vane matambudziko anoda kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi kuti vatore zororo remazuva mashanu ekugadzirisa matambudziko avo kutanga neMuvhuro 16 kusvika Chishanu 20 mwedzi uno, inove svondo inouya. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure vanoti mutemo unobvumidza varairidzi kutora zororo iri, iro rinonzi Compassionate Leave, pasi pechikamu 41 (g) chemutemo yePublic Service kana kuti Public Service Regulations. VaMasaraure vanoti varairidzi vakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda ari kukonzerwa nemari dziri pasi dzavari kutambiriswa anoda kugadziriswa, uye vanoti havaoni vakuru vezvikoro vachinyima varairidzi mukana uyu. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuPublic Service Commission panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Tinorarama: Dynamos
text: MANEJA weDynamos FC, Richard Chihoro, anoti hazvimbofe zvakaitika kunzwa kuti DeMbare yaburitswa muligi reCastle Premiership kunyangwe ikatamba zvakashata sei.   Chikwata ichi mwaka uno hachisi kutamba zvinogutsa izvo zvinove zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvakazotuma aimbove mutungamiri wacho Kenias Mubaiwa kuti asiye chigaro chake.   Parizvino chikwata ichi chakagara pechi13 palog chiine zvibodzwa 22 kubva mumitambo 20 yachatamba uye chakasiiwa nezvibodzwa 27 neFC Platinum iyo iri kutungamira palog.   Mwaka uno, Dynamos yasarirwa nemitambo 14 nekudaro iri kufanirwa kuhwinha mitambo yayo yose kuti irambe iri muPremier Soccer League.

headline: Nhabvu yevechidiki yakanganisika‘ . . . tanzwa nekumirira’
text: AIMBOVE mutambi weMotor Action, Lengthens neShooting Stars, Godfrey Moyo, anoti kusimukira kwenhabvu yevechidiki kuri munjodzi huru zvichitevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo yose nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Moyo vazhinji vanomuziva achitambira maYoung Warriors Under-20 ne23.   Kubva zvaasendeka shangu dzake, Moyo ave kurairidza chikwata chePrime Academy chiri kuRuwa achibika vatambi vemangwana.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Moyo anoti kubvira pakamiswa mitambo mizhinji senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane nedonzvo rekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 vechidiki vari kurasikirwa zvikuru munyaya dzekusimudzirwa mumutambo wenhabvu.   “Ini ndinotyira zvikuru vechidiki vedu nekuti vakasiiwa vari vega vamwe vanofuririka vakapedzisira vave kutora zvinodhaka muviri zvopedzisira zvavakanganisa remangwana ravo.   “Nhabvu yevechidiki yakakosha nekuti ndivo vatambi vemangwana saka vanofanirwa kukosheswa vogara vachibikwa. Asi manje nekuda kwelockdown hatizive kuti vamwe varipi uye vari kuitei, totovatyira nekuti sevana vakasaongororwa remangwana ravo rinoenda mudondo.   “Ndipo paye mutambi anenge achirakidza kuti tarenda riripo uye remangwana rake rakajeka mozongonzwa kuti nhabvu haachatambe, azvisiya zvose afuririka. Isu patinosangana navo tinovadzidzisa nhabvu uye zvehupenyu asi tikaita nguva tisinawo ndipo vanopedzisira vafuririka,” anodaro Moyo.   Sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) nguva yadarika rakazivisa kuti rinoda  kutangisa zvirongwa zvekusimudzira vechidiki mumutambo wenhabvu (junior league) kumapurovhinzi akasiyana enyika asi zvose zvakazoenda mudondo nekuuya kweCovid-19.   Panguva yaakatamba nhabvu, Moyo akakwanisa kuhwina mikombe inosanganisira Banc ABC neLengthens uye neMotor Action izvo zvakazomuona achitamba mumitambo yeConfederations Cup pamwe chete neChampions League neLengthens neMotor Action zvakare.

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, Vanotaura Mudare reCongress
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakatura mashoko kunyika yavo kechitatu kubva zvavasarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wenyika, pahurongwa hwavo hwe 3rd State of The Union Address. VaTrump vakatura mashoko avo kunhengo dzedare re Senate pamwe nedzedare repasi dzose dzakaungana muHouse of Representatives muWashington DC neChipiri manheru. VaTrump vakati vanofara kuti vari kumira pamberi pedare iri vaine mufaro nekuda kwesimukira kweupfumi hwenyika, kwavati kudzoka kune mutsindo kweAmerica, kana kuti “the Great American Comeback.” Vachichingamidza nhengo dzeparamende pamwe nemaseneta vakanga vari mudare, mudzimai wavo, pamwe nezvizvarwa zveAmerica zvose, VaTrump vakati mukati menguva pfupi vakakwanisa kuparadza maonero ekuti America iri kudzikira uye varamba kudzikisirwa kweremangwana reAmerica. “Mukati memakore matatu mapfupi, takwanisa kuputsa pfungwa yekuti America iri kudonha uye taramba kuduputswa kwezviitiko zveAmerica mune remangwana. Tiri kuenda mberi nemafambiro akanga asingafungidzirwi munguva pfupi yadarika, uye hatisi kuzodzokera shure,” vakadaro VaTrump. Mutungamiri weAmerica akatiwo muono wavari kuzoburitsa unoratidza kuti vari kuvaka sei nyika ine budiriro inokunda dzimwe dzose pasi rose uye isina rusarura, yekuti ani nani zvake anokwanisa kupinda mubudiriro yayo isina anoenziswa nayo, uyewo yekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kuve nechekuita mukusimukira kwayo. “Muono wandiri kuzoburitsa manheru ano unoratidza kuti tiri kuvaka sei nyika ine budiriro inokunda dzimwe dzose pasi rose uye isina rusarura, yekuti ani nani zvake anokwanisa kupinda mubudiriro yeAmerica isina wainoenziswa naye, uyewo yekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kuve nechekuita mukusimukira kwayo,” vakadaro VaTrump. Panyaya yeupfumi hwenyika, VaTrump vakati kubva pavakapinda pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, vakashanda zvakasimba kumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika yavo. “Kubva pandakangopinda muhofisi, ndakafamba nekukasika mukumutsiridza hupfumi hweAmerica, kubvisa mitemo ine chitsama inouraya kuwanikwa kwemabasa, kuderedza mitero, uye kurwira kuti pave kutengeserana kwakaenzana kunofadza mativi ose,” VaTrump vakatsanangura. Vakati mumatemu maviri ehurumende yaivepo vanhu vakawanda vaive vachiri mazera ekushanda vakabuda mabasa. VaTrump vakatiwo huwandu vatema vemuAmerica pamwe neverudzi rweHispanic vasingashande hwakaderera kekutanga munhoroondo yeAmerica pasi pehutongi hwavo. “Huwandu hwevatema vemuAmerica, vechiHispanic vemuAmerica pamwe nevechi Asian vemuAmerica hwasvika padanho rakadereresa munhoroond. Vatema vemuAmerica vechidiki vashngashande vaderera zvisati zvamboitika. Hurombo muvatema vemuAmerica hwaderera kusvika pachdanho chisati chambisvikwa,” vakadaro VaTrump. Vakatiwo huwandu hwemadzimai apinda mabasa hwasvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana pasi pehutongi havo. “Mumakore masere ehurumende yaivepo, vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru vakanga vachiri mazera ekuve pamabasa vakabuda kubva muvashandi. Mumakore matatu chete ehurumende yangu, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni matatu nechidimbu vachiri kukwanisa kushanda vakapinda mabasa.” Vakati zvizvarwa zveAmerica zvinodawo hutano hwakanaka, hwunowanikwa: “Hupenyu hwakanaka kumhuri yeAmerica hunodawo kuti hunge huchiwanikwa nyore, uye huri hwepamusoro mupasi rose.” Panyaya yekutengeserana neChina, VaTrump vakati mazuva mashoma adarika vakanyorerana chibvumirano chitsva nenyika iyiicho chichachengetedza vashandi vemuAmerica. “Kwemakore akawanda China yanga ichibatira America, iye zvino tashandura izvozvo asi, panguva imwecheteyo, tave nehukama hwakanaka hwatisati tamboita neChina, kusanganisira mutungamiri wacho VaXi Jingpin,” vakadaro VaTrump Mutungamiri wenyika uyu akati apo vari kudzosera Hutungamiri hweAmerica pasi rose, vari kusimuka zvakare vachirwira rusunungo mudunhu ravo. “Ndizvo saka Hutungamiri hwangu hwakabvisa mitemo yaikundikana yehutumende yakanga iripo panyaya yeCuba. Tiri kutsigira tarisiro yevanhu vekuCuba, Nicaragua, uye Venezuela kuitira kudzora hutongo hwejekerere. America iri kutungamira nyika makumi mmashanu nepfumbamwe kurwisana nehurumende yaVaNicolas Maduro ku Venezuela. Hutongo hwaVaMaduro huchaparadzwa. Nhasi manheru ano tine mutungamiri chaiye weVenezuela, VaJuan Guaido,” vakadaro mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana neshanu. Vakati VaGuaido vanofanirwa kutakura mashoko aya kudzokera nawo kumusha kwavo, uye varangarire kuti rusununguko rwunobatanidza vanhu. VaTrump vakatiwo kuchengetedza rusunguko rweAmerica, vakadira mari yakawanda kumauto enyika yavo kuburikidza nekuumba boka remauto idzva rinorwa hondo dzinosanganisira dzezvitundumuseresere. “Mukuchengetedza rusununguko rweAmerica, takaisa mari yakawandisa inoita madhora 2.2 trillion kumauto eAmerica. Takavhura boka idzva mumauto eAmerica remauto eSpace Force,” vakadaro VaTrump. VaTrump vakati America inofanirwa kuve nzvimbo inogara zvizvarwa zveAmerica zvinochengetedza mutemo, kwete makororo. “Hurumende yangu yakatora matanho asati amboitwa ekudzivirira muganhu wedu neMexico uri kuchamhembe. Hurumende yangu iri kutorawo matanho ekuchengetedza nyika zvakasimba.” Vakati apo vari kudzivirira America, vari kushandawo kupedza hondo dzeAmerica neMiddle East. “Madzitateguru edu akavaka nyika yakasiyana nedzimwe isati yamboonekwa munhoroondo yehupenyu hwevanhu, uye tiri kuramba tichiita kuti ikoshe kudarika zvayaive. Seyave tsika yebato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party yekuti rinodoma nhengo dzinenge dzichiri kusimukira kuti dzipindure mashoko aVaTrump, gore rino bato iri rakadoma gavhuna veMichigan, Amai Gretchen Whitmer, avo vati bato reDemnocratic Party rinongoda kuti pave nehutano hwakanaka.. “Zviri nyore. MaDemocrats ari kuedza kuti hutano hwenyu huve nani. maRepublicans muWashington ari kuedza kuhutora. Amai Whitmer vakatiwo vashandi vemuAmerica vari kurwadzikana.“Vashandi vemuAmerica vari kurwadzikana. Mudunhu rangu ini. Vavakidzanio vedu iWisconsi neOhio nePennsylvania. Nyika yose. Mihoroi yakamira, panguva iyo mihoro yevakuru vemakambani yakakwidzwa zvisati zvamboitika.” Bato iri rakadomawo Amai Veronica Escobar, vanove mumiriri wedunhu reTexas muparamende, kuti vapindurewo mashoko aVaTrump aya mururimi rweSpanish. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachidzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio muno muAmerica, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti VaTrump vatura mashoko akanangana nehurongwa hwavo hwekuti America ive nyika yakakosha zvakare, vachiti zvinogona kunge zviri izvo zvaita kuti vasataure nzvenyika dzakaita seAfrica kana Britain. VaTrump vakapawo mubairo mukuru wenyika wePresidential Medal of Freedom kumushamarari akarerekera kubato reRepublican Party, Rush Limbuagh, uyo ari kurwara negomarara rechiropa. Mudare iri makamboita kunge maive nepwere apo VaTrump vasina kutambira kukwaziswa kwavakaitwa nemutauriri weHouse of Representatives, Amai Nancy Perosi, ukuwo Amai Perosi vakaonekwawo vachibvarura gwaro raive nemashoko aitaurwa naVaTrump. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovimbisa Nhomba yeCovid Mumazuva Mashoma Anotevera
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Robert Mudyirandima, vaudza paramende kuti nyika yakatora danho rekuti yoshandisa nhomba ipi kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 uye pane chiziviso chichaitwa kune veruzhinji pamusoro penyaya iyi mukati memazuva mashonana ari kutevera. Vachipa humbowo maererano nemamiriro akaita denda reCovid-19 munyika nemusi weMuvhuro, Dr Mudyirandima, vanoti pane nhomba dzakawanda dzave kushandiswa nedzimwe nyika uye vange vari kuita ongororo yekuti ndeipi yakanakira nyika. Vati Zimbabwe ichatangawo kushandisa imwe nhomba iyi munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isina kubhajeta mari yenhomba iyi, bazi rezvemari nevamwe vemabhizimisi vakavimbisa kuumba homwe yekutenga nhomba iyi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriramwa mubazi iri, Dr Portia Manangazira, vatiwo kunze kwekutenga nhomba iyi, Zimbabwe ichawana imwe pasi pechirongwa cheWorld Health Organisation cheCOVAX icho chinobatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira pamwe nechirongwa cheAfrican Union iyo ichawana mishonga yePfizer neAstraZeneca ichiuya kuburikidza nemakambani eSeum Institute of India neJohnson and Johnson. Kunyange hazvo nhomba inopihwa vanhu vane denda iri ichibva kunze kwenyika, mimwe mishonga inopihwa vawere vane denda iri yakaita semapiritsi eParacetamol neZINC anogadzirwa muno. Zvichakadaro, Dr Mudyirandima naDr Manangazira, vazivisa kuti zvipatara zveveruzhinji zvinotora varwere veCovid 19 hazvina kuzara asi vakati pane zvipatara zvakazvimirira zvakaita seHealth Point muHarare zvine varwere vakawanda kudarika vazvinokwanisa kuchengeta. Dr Manangazira vati semuenziso chipatara cheWilkins muHarare icho chine mibhedha makumi matatu nemishanu yeCovid-19 hachina kana murwere mumwe pari zvino, Parirenyatwa ine mibhedha makumi mapfumbabwe nemitanhatu asi zvikamu makumi maviri nezvina zvemibhedha iyi ndizvo zvine vanhu chete. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurse Association VaEnock Dongo vati nyaya yekuti zvipatara zveruzhinnji hazvina kuzara inoratidza kuti vanhu havadi kuendako nekuti hakuna zvekushandisa uve vashandi veko havana mufaro nemabatirwe nemashandiro avanoita. Vakuru vakuru kubva kubazi rezvehutano vazivisawo kuti vave kuwana mishonga pamwe nezvimwee zvekushandisa pabasa kana kuti Personal Protective Equipment pasi pechirongwa cherubatsiro rwakabva kuGlobal Fund rweemamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbabwe emadhora ekuAmerica. VaDongo vati zvakanaka chose kuchengetedza vashandi vehutano kubva kuCovid-19. Dr Mudyirandima vazivisawo kuti munyika mune Oxygen yakawana yekushandisa kuvarwere veCovid-19. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira reMedical and Dental Private Practioners Association of Zimbabwe Dr Johannes Marisa avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kana pachavo vari kuwanawo Oxygen yevarwere vavo. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti vanhu zana nevashanu vari muzvipatara nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye vashanu vari mune vari kurwarisa kana kuti Intensive Care Unit. Asi huwandu uhu hunogona kunge hwakakwira kudarika apa sezvo pasina kuziviswa nezvevarwere vari kuMasvingo, Parirenyatwa, Manicaland ne Thongroove. No media source currently available

headline: NDAKARASA MUKANA: CHARLES MANYUCHI
text: SHASHA yetsiva – Charles Manyuchi – anoti akarasa mukana mukuru mugore ra2017 apo akakundwa naQudratillo Abduqaxorov wekuUzbekistan, kuSingapore izvo zvakamuona achitorerwa bhande raaive naro reWorld Boxing Council Silver Tittle asi kudzoka kwaaita ane chishuwo chekurwa nedzimwe shangwiti dzepasi rose dzinosanganisira Floyd Mayweather (Jr).   Kukundwa kwakaitwa Manyuchi mumutambo uyu kwakamudzorera kumashure sezvo akange ave pedyo nekukwanisa kurwira mabhande makuru etsiva akadai seWBC Championship uye nekusangana nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saAmir Khan wekuEngland, Manny Pacquiao wekuPhilippines naShawn Porter wekuAmerica. Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti iye zvino ave munzira kugadzirisa zvakakanganisika kumashure uye achiri nemukana wekudzokera zvakare pamusoro mumutambo uyu.   “Ndakarasa mukana paye pandakakundwa kuSingapore naAbduqaxorov nekuti dai ndakahwina mutambo uyu ndakange ndatosvika pedyo nekutosangana nanaPacquiao uye nedzimwe shasha dzetsiva dzepasi rose. Zvakaitika hazvo asi ndiri kuzvigadzirisa nekuti chishuvo changu kuti ndirwe naManny Pacquaiao, Amir Khan kana naFloyd Mayweather (Jr) chaiye nekuti ndinoti dai adzoka mutsiva nekuti ndiri kuda kumbosangana nayewo,” anodaro.   Manyuchi mwedzi yadarika akahwina mutambo wake weRestoration Fight naPablo Ezequiel Acosta wekuArgentina ndokuhwina mabhande maviri eUBC neGBU izvo zvakamusimudza. Parizvino ave kutarisira kusangana naNordine Orik wekuFrance mwedzi unotevera uye mutambo uyu anofanirwa kuuhwina kuti akwanise kudzokera padanho raaive kare.   Manyuchi anoti mutambo wake naAcosta kudai asina kuuhwina ndipo paibva paperera kutamba kwake tsiva sezvo wainge wakamukoshera mukudzoka kwake.   “Mutambo wangu naAcosta ndiwo wandisvitsa nhasi pandave iye zvino, dai ndakakundwa zvingadai zvakabva zvaperera ipapo asi ndakahwina saka mukana uchiripo uye ndiri kutarisira mutambo uri kutevera naOrik. Ndozviziva kuti ndikauhwina aihwa ndenge ndadzokera pandaive chaipo uye iye zvino ndiri kuvimbisa kuti zvakaitika kare hazvichadzokorodzeke.   “Ndave kumberi chaiko uye ndiri kubata basa sebasa nekuti ndiri kuhwina, handidi kukundwa zvakare,” anodaro.   Muchinda uyu anoti akavamba boka rake iro ari kudzidzisa vatambi vetsiva vari kusimukira rinonzi Charles Manyuchi Boxing Academy.   Vamwe vatambi vari muboka iri vacharwa mitambo yakasiyana apo shasha iyi ichatatsurana naOrik musi wa28 Gunyana kuHarare International Conference Centre.

headline: Napoli yoshuvira Cech
text: kuda kutenga mubati wepagedhi weArsenal, Petr Cech (36), nechikwereti.   Chikwata chekuSerie A ichi chakanyora pasi mazita evabati vepagedhi vachingade kutenga kuti vazotsiva Pepe Reina uyo akabva achienda kunotambira AC Milan.   Cech ari mugore rekupedzisira pakondirakiti yake kuEmirates Stadium uye anogona kubvuma kuenda kuItaly kumbonotambira ikoko zvichitevera mashoko akabuda ekuti murairidzi mutsva weArsenal – Unai Emery – ari kutsvaga mubati wepagedhi mutsva wechidiki.   Sekutaura kwebepanhau rekuItaly, Gazzetta dello Sport, maGunners ane chivimbo chekuti vachakwanisa kutenga mubati wepagedhi weBayer Leverkusen Bernd Leno nemari inosvika 22 miriyoni paunzi, izvo zvichatuma Cech kuti abve achienda kuNapoli.   Maneja mutsva weNapoli, Carlo Ancelotti, anofarira chaizvo Cech zvichitevera kushanda kwavakamboita vese kuchikwata cheChelsea uye zvinozivikanwa kuti ndiye waari kuda kuti auye kuzove mubati wake wepagedhi muchikwata chake. – SportMail Football

headline: Manyama amire nerongo kuCAPS
text: CAPS United ichapinda mune mumwe mutambo isina kugadzirira zvakakwana, zvakare pave nemwedzi mitatu vatambi vechikwata ichi vasiri kutambira.   Vatambi vange vachiramba kuita gadziriro uye ndokumbotyisidzira kusazadzikisa mitambo yavo, asi hakuna chabuda kubva mukuita uku.   Makepekepe ichatamba neHerentals mumutambo weCastle Lager Premiership kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium neMugovera uno, asi inogona kupinda mumutambo uyu isina kunyatsougadzirira zvakakwana.   Vatambi havana kunoita gadziriro dzavo nezuro. Vari kuti vanoda kubhadharwa mari yavo panguva iyo chamangwiza wechikwata ichi, Charlie Jones, anonzi akange avavimbisa kuti vaizobhadharwa musi weChipiri.   Jones aisadaira nhare yake, asi vatambi vakataura neKwayedza nezuro vakati vanogona kumanikidzwa kusatamba mutambo wesvondo rino neHerentals.   “Haisi nyaya diki. Hutungamiri huri kutamba nesu kwenguva refu. Chandinokwanisa kukuudzai ndechekuti vatambi vari kuronga kusatamba mutambo weHerentals.   “Tange tichizvibata tichizvidzora, ndoona sekunge tazvibata zvakanyanyisa kuhutungamiri. Chavanogona inhema uye hapana chavanozoita.   “Nyaya yacho payave hapasisina kunaka. Zviri kwaviri ngavatibhadhare kana kuti hatitambe,” anodaro umwe mutambi.   “Tange tichizvibata senyanzvi. Takavaremekedza, tange tichivaterera kakawanda, saka hatifanirwe kubatwa mabatirwo akadai.   “Takaramba kuita gadziriro. Fungai takasvika muguta na1am musi weMuvhuro tafamba kubva kuBulawayo uko tainge tatamba neHighlanders. Vakati vanoda kutiudza kuti tiite gadziriro dzedu musi weChipiri ivo vasina kutibhadhara . . .”   Vatambi veKepekepe vakaramba kuita gadziriro dzavo svondo radarika apo vainge vakatarisana nemtambo weHighlanders.   Vaisaenda kwavanoitira gadziriro dzavo svondo rose ndokuzooneka musi weChishanu apo vakaita gadziriro. Kutadza kugadzirira zvakakwana kwakaonekwa zvichitevera kukundwa kwavakaitwa neBosso 2-1 svondo radarika.   Svondo rino vari kupinda mune mumwezve mutambo mukuru apo vachasangana nemaStudents ayo ari kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura mazuva ano.   Mitambo yePSL: Nhasi: Yadah v Highlanders (NSS)   Mugovera: Cranborne Bullets v Whahwa (Vengere) Chicken Inn v Ngezi (Luveve) CAPS Utd v Herentals (NSS) FC Platinum v Manica Diamonds (Mandava)   Svondo: Tenax v ZPC Kariba (Vengere) Bulawayo Chiefs vs Black Rhinos (Luveve) Triangle v Bulawayo City (Gibbo) Dynamos v Harare City (NSS)

headline: Vaiva Vashandi veMakambani eMangoda Vononga Svosve neMuromo kwaChiyadzwa
text: Vaimbove vashandi vemakambani anochera mangoda kwaChiadzwa vari kuyaura nenzara uye kudya nhoko dzezvironda mushure makambani aya akatorerwa marezinesi ekuramba achichera nehurumende. Vashandi ava kunyanya vagari venharaunda dzakapoteredza Marange vanoti varohwa nenhamo zvakanyanya. Vazhinji vakamiswa mabasa nechimbichimbi vange vakatadza kuwaniswa mari dzemihoro yavo. Makambani aichera mangoda anosanganisira Anjin, Mbada Diamonds, Kusena, DMC, Marange Resources nemamwe akamiswa kushanda zvikapa kuti vashandi vanopfuura churu vamiswe mabasa. Vamwe vevashandi ava kunyanya vagari venzvimbo iyi vava kuomerwa nehupenyu sezvo nharaunda iyi isina zvizhinji zvinokwaniswa kuitwa zvinopa chouviri uye yave zvakare nzvimbo yakachengetedzwa. VaGodknows Murire mumwe wevaimbove vashandi kukambani yeAnjin Investments yaichera mangoda avo vanoti kupera kwebasa nenguva yavaisatarisira kwakavapidza munyatwa yakaomarara. “Kunzi basa rapera kwakati kanganisa zvakanyanya sezvo hapana aitarisira izvi panguva iyoyo, nekuti tange tisina gadziriro or kuti kupihwa notice chaiyo. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Kungomiswa suddenly kwataitwa kwakakuvadza nemhuri yose nokuti hurongwa hwange husipo wokuti pamwe ndizvo zvichazoitika.” VaMurire vanoti kupera kwakaita basa kwakapa kuti vazhinji vasare vaine zvikwereti kumabhanga, zvitoro, munharaunda nekwakawanda wanda izvo zvikwereti zvacho zvonetsa kubhadharika nekuti basa rakapera. “Panyaya yezvikwereti zvopa kuti tishupike kuzvibvisa kana kudzosera, apawo taingopihwa tumari tushoma tushoma apo takamiswa mabasa. Nekuwanda kwemaneeds sevanhu vaviva pabasa tasara tiri munhamo yekuti tobhadhadhara vanhu vaye seyi iwe wagara.” Vanodaro VaMurire VaCharles Kusena mumwezve mushandi wekuminda yemangoda akamiswa basa, avo kuchemawo nenyaya yezvikwereti izvo vanoti zvakatovapedzera zvipfuyo zvavo votengesa kuitira kudzosera mari yemabhanga neyemuvanhu vonge vonetsa voda kuvaendesa kumatare edzimhosva. Amai Mary Munjoma mugari wekuHot Springs pedyo nenzvimbo yaicherwa mangoda nekambani yeAnjin vane murume akamiswa basa. Amai Munjoma vanoti nhamo yapfunya chisero mumusha wavo izvo zvopa kuti vandosunza kana kuita maricho kunzvimbo dzakavapoteredza kuti vararamise mhuri yavo. “Kubva pakamiswa baba basa hupenyu hwatiomera zvekuti tave kuita marikicho sezvo pachisina chekuita baba vakagara. Mamwe mabasa ekutotiraramisa mhuri kuteza huni nekuita mikando, tave kupfeka mazitye atinopfekedza vana zvemadhora dhora nekuti chekuita chacho hapana.” VaBiggie Vheremu vaishandirawo imwe kambani yaichera mangoda kwaChiadzwa. Vanoti kumira kwavakaita basa mwedzi yodarika makumi maviri yapfuura kwovatemesa musoro nekuti havachazivi kuti zvichemo zvavo zvemari dzisina kupera kubhadharwa vachazviendesa kunaani uye nemari dzemazuva erivhi. “Tiri kuti tiri kushaya kwekuti tinozonanga ani pakuda kuti tinzwe kuti mari tichabhadharwa nani. Vaimbove vakuru vedu vekambani takavabvunza izvozvo asi hatina zvakare kupihwa mhinduro inogutsa saka ipapo pari kutinetsa kusvika parizvino.” Vaimbove vashandi vemakambani emangoda ava pamwechete nemhuri dzavo vari kuronga kuratidzira mumazuva mashoma ari kutevera vachinyunyuta nekusabatwa zvakanaka kwavari kuitwa nemapurisa ari kuchengetedza minda yemangoda iyi pamwechete nemasoja avo anoti ari kushungurudza vagari zvisakafanira. Vagari venzvimbo dzinoti, Hotsprings, Tonhorai, Chakohwa vari kunyunyuta zvakare nekusvibisirwa mvura yemunzizi dzavo zvakare kusapihwa mabasa pakambani yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Mining Company kana ZCDMC. Vagari ava vari kushanda pamwe chete nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinowanikwa zviwanikwa reCentre for Research and Development, CRD. Mukuru weCRD VaJames Mupfumi vanoti ikodzero yevagari vekwaChiadzwa nenyaya yekushungurudzwa kwavo. “Isusu nyaya yedu tiri kuzama kushanda nemaCBOs (Community Based Organisations) ari kuno panyaya yaari kuda kuita ratidziro yavo nenyaya yeharassment yavari kusangano nayo mucommunity, angave maissues e-unemployment evana venyu, abuse yevana zvekare nyaya yewater pollution environmental degradation yemakomba akasiyiwa akadaro nemacompanies. Vanotiwo, "Tiri kunzwa zvakare kuti vana vari kumanikidzwa kufushira makomba aya vachinzi magweja, saka iorced labour iri kuuya kabisira futi.” Vagari venharaunda yeChiadzwa vanoti nenyaya yekusvibisirwa kwemvura murwizi Odzi nemakambani aimbochera mangoda vazhinji varasikirwa nezvipfuyo kunyanya mombe dzinosvika mazana masere, uye mbudzi nehwayi. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Votambura Zvichitevera Kuramwa Mabasa Kuri Kuitwa Muzvipatara
text: Varwere vari kuchema chema zvikuru kuhurumende kuti igadzirise zviri kudiwa nanachiremba kuitira kuti vasarasikirwe nehupenyu hwavo. Varwere vanotiwo kuramwa basa kwavana chiremba kuri kuisa hutano hwavo parumananzombe. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheHarare Hospital nhasi neStudio7 varwere vanorwarisa chete ndivo vange vachibatsirwa vamwe vachinzi vadzokere kumba vozorapwa kana vana chiremba vadzoka kubasa. Amai Sekai Ganyani Mushandu, avo vane mwana ane dambudziko remoyo, vanoti havachaziva zvekuita nemwana wavo uyo anonyorerwa mishonga mwedzi wega wega. Amai Mushandu vati chikumbiro chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa kuitira vanaChiremba vadzokere pamabasa. Amai Previous Sachinda, avo vaenda kunorapwa kuHarare Hospital vakadzokera kumba vasina kuwana rubatsiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti varwadziwa zvikuru kudzorerwa kumba vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Vamwe amai varamba kudomwa nezita vane mwana ane mazuva matanhatu azvarwa, pachishandiswa oparesheni sezvo matumbu ake aive akazvimba, vati vana chiremba havasi kuuya nguva dzese kuzowona vana vari muwadhi mavo izvo zvoitawo kuti vatyire hutano hwemwana wavo Mukuru weHarare Central Hospital, Amai Peggy Zvavamwe, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanachiremba havasati vadzoka kumabasa. Amai Zvavamwe vati vanga vari kupinda mumusangano wekuongorora kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuvhiringa varwere zvakadii. Munyori mubazi rezveutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuramwa basa kwanachiremba uku kuri kukanganisa mabasa ezveutano. VaGwinji vati bazi ravo richiri kukukurukura nehurumende kuti vangagadzirisa sei dambudziko asi vakatiwo chikumbiro chavo kunana Chiremba ndechekuti dai vakwanisa kudzokera kumabasa hurumende ichigadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Zimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association inoti nhengo dzayo dzinodarika chiuru dziri kuramwa mabasa. Zvichemo zvanachiremba ava zvinosanganisira mari shoma pamwe nekusapiwa mukana wekuti vatenge mota pasina kubhadhariswa mutero kubva kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti vafambe nyore vachienda kubasa. No media source currently available

headline: FC Platinum Yokurudzirwa Kukunda Mitambo yepaMusha Kuti Ibudirire muMakwikwi eCaf Champions League
text: Chikwata cheFC Platinum chirikuvhura makundano enhabvu egore rino asi paine mibvunzo. Vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kugutsikana nematambiro arikuita FC Platinum pamusha payo mumitambo yeCaf Champions League vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 1995. Nhoroondo yenhabvu muAfrica inotaura kuti zvikwata zvinokunda nemutsindo pamusha ndizvo zvinowanzoenderera mberi nemakundano asi matambiro eKugona Kunenge Kudada muMandava Stadium asimudza mibvunzo mumukana wavo wekusvika kuma kota fainari. FC Platinum yakatatarika zvinotyisa neCnaps yekuMadagascar ndokuzokunda 1-0 mumutambo uyo vaitarisirwa kukanda zvibodzwa pamadiro, ndokuzoita zvekare mangange 0-0 ne Otoyo Oho yekuCongo. Muteveri wenhabvu VaFrancis Mwendamberi vanoti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inofanira kuwedzera mwando pamatambiro ayo pamusha kana ichida kubudirira mumakwikwi aya. Pamusoro peOrlando Pirates, FC Platinum iri mugungano rimwechete ne Esperance yekuTunisia iyo ine mukombe uyu pamwe ne Horoya yeku Guinea. Zvikwata zviviri zvinopedza zviri pamusoro mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya. Muteveri wechikwata cheDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum isatarise mazita kana mukurumbira une zvikwata zvavari kusangana nazvo. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTatenda Makazhu ndivo vanofunga kuti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inokwanisa kusvika mufainari yemakundano aya. Asi murairidzi wePirates Milutin Sredojevic audza mapepanhau ekuSouth Africa kuti ari kutya kutamba nechikwata cheFC Platinum nenyaya yekuti chikwata chitsva mumakundano aya uye ati anoremekedza murairidzi wacho Norman Mapeza zvakanyanya. Ati sezvo Pirates iri kutamba neFC Platinum mumutambo wekutanga kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, zvinonetsa zvikuru kuenda iko nemugwagwa. Asi Pirates iri kubheja kuti inosimudza mukomb weChampions League kechipiri munhoroondo yayo. Asi FC Platinum ichange isina mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno kana kuti Soccer Star of the Year, Rodwell Chinyengetere, uyo ave kuenda kunotambira Baroka FC ku South Africa naWinston Mhango uyo arikuenda kuSouth Africa zvekare. Kugona Kuenge Kudada irikutarisira kusvika kana kudarika chidanho chakasvikwa neDynamos iyo yakasvika mufainari yeCaf Champions League muna 1998 nemuma semi finari muna 2008. No media source currently available `

headline: Varwere Voburitswa Muzvipatara Sezvo Musina Vashandi
text: Chipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi chavhara mawadhi akawanda nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana mukoti avo vari kuramwa mabasa nyika yose. Mukuru wechipatara ichi, VaCollet Mawire, vanoti vakamanikidzwa kuvhara mawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara, medical ward, pamwe nemawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara nezvinoonekwa, surgical ward nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwana mukoti vanosvika mazana matatu. VaMawire vanoti varwere vose vakaiswa muwadhi yemadzimai ari kutarisira kusununguka sedanho rekuti varapwe nanamukoti vashoma varipo. VaMawire vanoti kunyange zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara vanoti havasati vafirwa nevanhu zvine chekuita nekuramwa basa kwana mukoti. Vamwe varwere vakaburitswa muchipatara vari kushora danho ravana mukoti rekuramwa mabasa vachisiya vanhu vachirwara muchipatara. Mumwe murwere asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti vana mukoti havafanirwe kukoshesa mari kudarika hupenyu hwevanhu. VaGilbert Tsomondo avo vanobva kuMhangura vatora baba vavo vaburitswa muchipatara vasina kunyatsopora. VaTshomomndo vanoti hurumende navana mukoti vanofanirwa kuwirirana nekuti varwere vasina mhosva ndivo vanofa. VaMawire vanoti pari zvino havana huwandu hwavana mukoti vari kudzidzira basa vari kuyamura muwadhi yakasanganiswa varwere. Varwere vakawanda vari kuburitswa vasina kupora vari kudzokera kumba uko vanoti vanogona kufa sezvo vasina mari yekuenda kunorapwa nanachiremba vakazvimirira. Vana mukoti vakatanga kukanda mapadza avo pasi nezuro vachiti hurumende yakavanyepera kuti ichagadzirisa zvinhu, asi iyo pasina chayiri kuita. No media source currently available

headline: OK Zimbabwe Yopa Homwe yaMeya weHarare Rubatsiro Rwekupa Varombo
text: Vamwe vanoshaya muHarare vave kupinda muna 2020 vachinyemwerera mushure mekunge kambani yeOk Zimbabwe yapa masangano anobatsira vanoshaya chikafu nezvimwe pasi pehomwe yeHarare Mayor’s Cheer Fund. Vachituara pane chimwe chitoro chavo muHarare meshure mekutambidza meya weHarare, VaHebert Gomba chikafu nezvimwe zvinhu zvekushandisa, mukuru wekambani yeOK Zimbabwe, VaAlex Siyavora, vati gore negore kambani yavo inoita izvi senzira yeku rerutsira vanoshaya panguva ino apo veruzhiinji vanenge vachifara nekupembeera nehama neshamwari. Vati kambani yavo inoita izvi mumaguta madhorobha nenzvimbo dzese dzainoshandira senzira yekubatsira vaya vasina chekubata panguva ino. VaGomba vatenda zvikuru makambani akaita seOK Zimbabwe ayo vati anobatsira kanzuru nechikafu nezvimwe zvekupa kune vanoshaya pamazuva eKisimusi negorezva. Vatiwo homwe yavo yeMayor’s Cheer Fund haichamirira kimisimusi chete sezvo vanhu vachitambura gore rese. Vachitaura vakamirira musha weBoka reDonhodzo wekuHighfiled uyo unochengeta vakwegura, Amai Emilia Mkaratigwa, vatenda VaGomba neOK Zimbabwe nekuratidza rudo panguva ino vachiti chikafu chavawana chichabatsira zvikuru pamusha wavo. Nhengo yeZimbabwe Albino Association, Emmaculate Paidamoyo Chitsunza, anoti afara nezvaitwa nehomwe yaMayor’s Cheer Fund. Mamwe masangano awana Rubatsiro nhasi anosanganisira Tose Respite Care Centre, Jairos Jiri Southerton, Wheelchair Bound neHarare Children’s Home. Homwe yeMayor’s Cheer Fund, ihomwe inotambira rubatsiro runosanganisira chikafu, mbatya mari nezvimwe kubva kumakambani nemasangano akasiyana uye zvese izvi zvinozopihwa kumasangano anoriritira vanoshaya nameya weguta. Gore rino rino homwe iyi yakatsigirwa nemari inodarika zviuru mazana maviri zvemadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesera Mumigwagwa Vochema Kuti Hurumende Haina Kuvabvumidzawo Kutanga Kushanda
text: Vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vari kuchema-chema zvikuru vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kuvabvumidzawo kuti vadzokere pamabasa avo sezvo vachirarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa uye vanhu ava vakawanda kudarika vanhu vanoenda kumabasa. Masangano anomirira vanhu ava, anoti reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, (VISET) neSurvival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe anoti hurumende yaifanirwawo kuona kuti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava vabvumidzwawo kudzokera kumabasa avo sezvayakaita kubvumidza vemakambani kuti vavhure. Hurumende yakabvumidza vemakambani kuvhura asi vachiita kuti vashandi vavo vaongororwa kuti havana COVID-19 here kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemakambani madiki neepakati, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni kuti tinzwe kana paine hurongwa hwavari kuitira vanozvibatira mabasa emaoko ava. Makanzuru mazhinji munyika ari mushishi kuparadza nzvimbo dzinosishandirwa nevanozvishandira ava, kunyange hazvo dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo richiti mamwe emakanzuru aya akanga atyora mutemo nekuparadza nzvimbo idzi. Asi mukuru weVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vane kunyunyuta uye kushamisika kuti sei hurumende yakasvika padanho iri isinawo kutarisa vanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa, vavanoti ndivo vakabata hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano re Survival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaObey Mwariwangu, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuita zvakawanda mukurerutsa zvinhu yakanangana nechirwere che coronavirus, kune vanotengesera mumigwagwa hapana chinhu chati charerutswa, sezvo vasiri kukwanisa kupinda mumigwagwa, munove mavanogara nekushandira. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Onetsekana Munguva Yaanenge Achitevera kuChimanimani
text: Madzimai ekuChimanimani anoti ari kushaya zvipfeko zvekushandisa kana vachitevera, uye nzvimbo yavanogara haina kuchena izvo zvinogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere zvakawanda. Madzimai ekuChimanimani mazhinji anoti akatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya zvipfeko zvinopfekwa nemadzimai kana achitevera kana kuti ma sanitary pads. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaChinamira kuSkyline, Amai Sarudzai Kubvenyika, vanoti madzimai mazhinji ave kushandisa madhende ayo avari kutyira kuti anogona kuvakonzeresa zvirwere kunhengo dzavo dzakavandika. Izvi zvakatsinhirwa naAmai Locadia Mapetuka vanogara mubhuku rekwaManzou avo vanoti zvitoro zvizhinji zvakapwanywa nemvuramupengo yeCyclone Idai uye zvimwe zvakavharwa nepamusana pekuti nzira zhinji hadzisi kufambika. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaMuusha, Amai Idah Mwandiambira, vanotiwo hapana pekurasira madhende anenge ashandiswa nemadzimai anenge achitevera sezvo zvimbuzi zvavaimboshandisa zvakatorwawo nemvura. Amai Mwandiambira vanoti zvirwere zvemanyoka zvinogona kudzika midzi munharaunda yavo sezvo veruzhinji vave kuzvibatsira kuseri kwemakwenzi uye pasina mvura yekunwa yakachena munvimbo zhinji dziri muChimanimani. Kunyange hazvo bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvemvura reZimbabwe National Water Authority rakaisa matangi emvura mune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri muChimanimani, mvura iyi haisi kutora nguva isati yapera sezvo yakawandirwa. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaMuusha zvakare, VaLiberty Sigauke, vanotiwo vari kufara zvikuru kuti hurumende nevemamwe masangano ari kubatsira vagari vekuno vakavapa mishonga yekuisa mumvura kuti inge yakachena pavanoimwa. Asi VaSigauke vanoti mishonga iyi haizofi yakadzivirira zvachose zvirwere zvemanyoka zvakaita sekorera ne typhoid. Sangano re World Health Organization rinoti vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mana vakabatwa nechirwere chekorera muMozambique, sezvo munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika iyi musina mvura yakachena zvichitevera kurohwawo kwakaitwa nyika iyi neCyclone Idai masvondo maviri apfuura. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rehurumende kuti vanhu vangani vabatwa nekorera zvichitevera kurohwa kwakaitwa matunhu eManicaland neMasvingo nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Zvichakadai, vanhu vakawanda vakaita sasabhuku Charles Manzou vemubhuku rekwaManzou vanoti hurumende inofanira kupira vanhu chikafu munzvimbo dzavanogara senzira yekuderedza mikana yekuti vagari vatapurirane zvirwere. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo, kuti tinzwe matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu vekuChimanimani vachaagadzirisa sei uye riinhi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza vagari vekuChimanimani masvondo maviri adarika kuti hurumende yavo ichaedza napose painogona napo kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu. Kudzamara hurumende yatora matanho nekukasika, veruzhinji muChimanimani vacharamba hupenyu hwavo huri patambo sezvo nyaya yehutsanana iri kuvatemesa misoro zvichitevera mafashamu eCyclone Idai ayo akasiya vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe vafa uye vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu vasiri kuzivikananwa kuti varipi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kushanyira Botswana Kunyangwe Bhodha Ravhurwa neKushaya Tsamba dzeCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo Botswana yavhura zvizere mabhoda ayo mashanu nhasi kusanganisira muganhu waro uri pedyo neguta rePlumtree weRamokgwebana, kwanga kuine motokari nevanhu vashomanana vanga vachipinda nekubuda munyika iyi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 pamuganhu uyu nhasi inoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvanga zvichidzoserwa kumusha nekuti zvanga zvisina chitambi chinoratidza kuti havana chirwere cheCOVID-19. Botswana yakatsidza kuti haina kubvumidza ani zvake anobva kuine imwe nyika kupinda munyika iyi asina gwaro rinoratidza akavhenekerwa COVID-19 akawanikwa asina chirwere ichi chashura mare pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Asi hurongwa hwaitwa neBotswana uhu huri kuita kuti vazhinji vatadze kufamba famba nekuti hazvisi nyore kuti munhu avhenekerwe hutachiwana hweCOVID-19 sezvo vanovheneka vari kubhadharisa makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. Amai Gertrude Maravanzira vaudza Studio7 kuti vakambofunga kujamba bhodha sezvo nyika dzakavharwa murume vavo ari kuGaborone ivo vari kuZimbabwe asi vakatya izvo zvaita kuti vaite nhangemutange. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chisina kuita rombo rakanaka saAmai Maravanzira ndiVaWalter Mukanga avo vaudza Studio7 kuti vava nemazuva maviri vari gere pabhodha reRamokgwebana sezvo vashandi vebazi rehutano munyika iyi vari kuramba gwaro ravo vachiti ndere kunyeba.  VaMukanga pamwe chete nevamwe vavo vaviri vanoti Agrippa Murimba naRaymond Uchena vane chivimbo chekuti vachakunda kuti vano joina chikwata chebhora cheMorupule Wanderers munyika iyi.  VaMurimba, avo vanoti vaitambira chikwata cheHarare City, vanoti chirwere cheCOVID-19 chaunza kusagadzikana kukuru uko chaita kuti vatambi vebhora vave nedambudziko rekutsvaga mafuro manyoro. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana kuti VISET VaSamuel Wadzai vaudza Studio7 kuti mari dziri kudiwa nevanovheneka denda iri dzakawandisa. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti ive nehurongwa hwekubatsira nhengo dzesangano ravo nevamwe vanorarama nekutenga midziyo kuBotswana vachinotengesa kumusha kuitira kuti vasashandire dhongi rakaora. Kunyange hazvo ruzhinji rwuri kuchema chema, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muBotswana VaEdwin Dikoloti vanoti nyika yavo haisi kuzodududza shure panyaya yezvitambi vachiti ndiyo nzira chete ingabatsira kuti hutachiwana uhu husapararire. Botswana ine vanhu zviuru gumi nemazana manomwe ane makumi mana nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi kotiwo makumi matatu nevana vafa nokuda kwedenda iri. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa neMakanzura Voita Huori Hunosemesa kuNyamakate, Hurungwe
text: Chirongwa chekuyamura varimi nembeu nefotireza chePresidential Inputs Scheme chinonzi hachisi kufamba zvakanaka kuNyamakate, Hurungwe mudunhu reMashonaland West nepamusana pehuori huri kuitwa nemakanzura nemapurisa. Vamwe vagari vemubhuku rinonzi Mike mu Ward 7 vanoti havana kuwana mbeu nefotireza izvo zvinopihwa imba yega yega nedonzvo rekupedza nzara munyika. Mumwe mugari wemu Wadhi 7, Muzvare Betty Phiri, vanoti vari kushayiswa mbeu nefotireza mushure mekunyorwa mazita nekuda kwakanzura, VaJealousy Mateesanwa veZanu PF, vavanoti vari kuita zvehuori nevamwe vebato ravo. Muzvare Phiri vanoti kanzura nemunyori wavo vakatora mabhegi makumi masere nemanomwe ndokuaviga. Muzvare Phiri vanoti vakakwidza nyaya yefotireza nembeu kumapurisa epaMakuti nekuti vainge vanyorwa mazita avo asi vasina kupihwa mbeu nefotireza asi mapurisa hapana zvavari kuita. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mugari wemunzvimbo iyi, VaTichaona Sengwe, avo vanoti kunyange vakanomhan’ara nyaya iyi kumapurisa ekuMakuti, hapana chiri kuitwa sezvo vari kutora mbeu dzavo vachiti vari kudya nemapurisa. Mumwe mugari asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti dambudziko riri kuita mapurisa ndere kuti ari kupihwa mbeu nefotireza nakanzura izvo zvinoita kuti vasaferefete nyaya yehuori hwakanzura zvakanaka. Asi kanzura Muteesanwa vanoti mapurisa vanhu vari muwadhi mavo nekudaro zvakakodzera kuti vawane mbeu nefotireza zvinopihwa vamwe. Kanzura Muteesanwa vanoti hapana nyaya sezviri kutaura vamwe vagari sezvo mapurisa anenge aripo pese panopihwa vanhu mbeu nefotireza vakachengetedza motokari dzinenge dzichitakura mbeu. Kanzura Muteesanwa vashoropodza vamwe vagarii vachiti vanopinza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pane zvose zvinenge zvaitika muwadhi vachiti mweya wakaipa. Mupurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya yekubiwa kwembeu nefotireza pamapurisa\nepaMakuti, VaTinashe Shindi, vanoti vachiri pakati pekuferefeta nyaya\niyi. Pasi pechirongwa ichi, imba yega yega inopihwa masaga maviri efotireza nechipaketi chimwe chete chembeu chinorema makirogiramu gumi kubva kumutungamiri wenyika. Fotireza nembeu zvinogoverwa vanhu nebazi redura renyika reGrain Marketing Board, GMB. Kanzura wenzvimbo ndiye anonyora mazita ayo anoendeswa kuGMB kuti munhu agozowana mbeu nefotireza izvi. Vagari vakawanda venzvimbo iyi vanoti mazita avo anonyorwa oendeswa kuGMB asi hapana chavanowana vachiti vakuru vakuru vebato reZanu PF munzvimbo iyi ndivo vanotora mbeu dzinenge dziri dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaKembo Mohadi naAmai Muchinguri-Kashiri Voenda Kunorapwa kuSouth Africa Mushure Mekuputikirwa neGirinedhi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vari kushanya ku Dar es Salaam kuTanzania kwemazuva maviri vanoti mumwe wevatevedzeri vavo VaKembo Mohadi, uye sachigaro webato iri vari gurukota rezvezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri vakaendeswa kunorapwa kuSouth Africa mushure mekukuvara pakaputika girinedhe kuWhite City Stadium nemusi weMugovera. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya kuvatori venhau kumuchteo wemisangano yavo kuTanzania. Vanhu makumi mana nevapfumbamwe vakakuvara vamwe vaviri vakashaya. Pavanhu vaviri vakafa ava, mumwe aichengetedza VaMohadi, VaNelson Dube vakashaya vakavigwa nezuro papurazi ravo reFeatherstone mudunhu reMashonaland East uye vakabva vaitwa gamba rehondo yerusununguko sezvo vakarwa hondo muChimurenga. Amai Muchinguru-Kashiri vanonzi vakakuvara pachipfuva VaMohadi vachikuvara makumbo. Kunyangwe hazvo mapurisa achiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi, VaMnangagwa vakati vanofunga kuti vanhu vanodyidzana nechikwata chavainetsana nacho muZanu-PF chinonzi G40. No media source currently available   Asi vaimbova gurukota uye muzukuru waVaMuugabe, VaPatrick Zhuwao vanonziwo ndeveG40 vanoti havanesi nekuputitswa kwegirinedhi uku. Vamwe vari kushora nyaya yehurumende yekuendesa vatungamiri vehurumende kunorapwa kunze vachitadza kugadzirisa zvipatara zviri munyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaPromise Sande vanoti zvakakosha kuti vakakuvara vakwanise kurapwa vachipora asi hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa zvipatara zvemunyika.

headline: Vakabaiwa Nhomba yeCobvid-19 yeCovaxin Kamwe Chete Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Imwe Mhando
text: Hurumende inoti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakabaiwa kamwe chete nhomba yeCovid-19, yeCovaxin yakabva kuIndia zvinofanira kubaiwa chero imwe mhando yenhomba irti munyika. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekushomeka kwenhomba iyi munyika. Mukutanga kwegore, India yakabatsira Zimbabwe nenhomba yeCovaxin inosvika zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35,000. Asi mamiriro akaita zvinhu muIndia iyo ine dambudziko rechirwere ichi rakomba anoni ave kutadzisa nyika iyi kuti iwane nhomba yekuendesa kune dzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti hapasati pave nehumbowo hunoratidza kuti kuvhenganisa mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 kune njodzi, vachiti parizvino zvinoonekwa sekuti kubaiwa nhomba iyi katatu zvinotobatsira vanhu. No media source currently available Asi ongororo dziri kuitwa muAmerica dziri kuratidza kuti kusanganisa nhomba yeJohnson and Johnson nedzimwe dzakaita sePfizer neModerna.

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti Zimbabwe Ichange Yave neMutungamiri Mutsva Musi weChipiri
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vaita musangano kuChibuku Stadium kuChitungwiza uko vaudza veruzhinji kuti Zimbabwe ichange yave nemutungamiri mutsva svondo rinouya. Vachitaura kumhomho yevanhu vaungana muChibuku Stadium kuChitungwiza, VaChamisa vati yasvika nguva yekuti zvinhu zvishanduke munyika, izvo vati zvichaitika svondo rinouya mushure mesarudzo. VaChamisa vaudza vanhu kuti havana moyo murefu sezvaive zvakaita vaimbove mutungamiri weMDC-T, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, uye vayambira mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti zvekudzvanyirira vanhu zvakapera uye hazvichaitiki zvekare nekuti nguva yekuchinja zvinhu yasvika. “Vana Chiwenga nanaMnangagwa ngavanzwisise nyaya iyi kuti vanhu veZimbabwe havadi zvemhirizhonga. Vanhu ava ndivo vakatidenha. Vakatidenha nekutadza kutongwa kwavo; vakatidenha nekusatevedzera mutemo kwavo; vakatidenha nekubira pasarudzo kwavaiita,” VaChamisa vaudza vanhu. Asi VaChamisa vati vanokudza vakuru vakaita semutungamiriri we Zapu, VaDumiso Davengwa, nekuti ndivo vakarwira rusununguko rwenyika. VaChamisa vatiwo kudzoka kweavo vakange vambobuda muMDC-T vakaita saVaTendai Biti naVaWelshman Ncube, chiratidzo chekuti MDC-T ndiwo musha wevanhu wega. VaChamisa vatsananguriravo vanhu pamusoro pezita rebato ravachashandisa pasarudzo vachiti bato reMDC-T rasimba kubva zvarakange riri parakaumbwa. VaChamisa vati Zanu-PF yange ichida kuti varamwe sarudzo kuitira kuti igosara iri yega musarudzo. Vavimbisa mapurisa nemasoja kuti kana vakakunda musarudzo vachagara zvakanaka kupfuura zvavari pari zvino. Musangano uyu wange uri wechitanhatu wavaita muzuva rimwe, uye uri wechimakumi manomwe nepfumbamwe mumwedzi miviri vachitsvaga rutsigiro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Masere neVavaviri Vourayiwa neDutumupengo Idai
text: Vanhu makumi masere nevaviri vashaya parizvino nenyaya yedutumupengo reTropical Cyclone Idai kuManicaland. Asi huwandu uhu huri kutarisirwa kukwira sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti varipi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vange vamboenda kuUnited Arab Emirates vari kutarisirwa kudzoka kumusha kuti vazoita mubatira pamwe nenyika yawirwa nedutumupengo remvura nemhepo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nevanhuwo zvavo vari kushora VaMnangagwa kuti vakasimuka munyika kunyangwe hazvo zvange zviri pachena kuti nyika yainge yotarisana nedambudziko redutumupengo. Vanhu ava vari kutumira mashoko kuStudio 7 uye kunyora pamadadendemutande akaita seTwitter neFacebook. Asi vamwe vari kuvatsigira vari kuti vaita zvakanaka kudzoka kumusha uye vari kuUnited Arab Emirates ikoko vakatangawo kutsvaga rubatsiro kuRed Crescent yekunyika iyi. Munyori mukuru bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti VaMnangagwa vakaenda vasingazive kuti dambudziko iri raizokura uye havasi kudzika vari maoko chete sezvo vakabva vatanga kutsvaga rubatsiro vari kunze. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro mamwe makurukota mana ehurumende anosanganisira VaJuly Moyo, VaPerence Shiri, Doctor Sekesai Nzenza naVaJoel Biggie Matiza vakamboyedza kushanyira nzvimbo dzakaparadzwa nedutumupengo iri. Asi vanonzi vasangana nematambudziko makukutu sezvo kusiri kufambika. Mukuru weCivil Protection Unit VaNathan Nkomo vanoti mauto ari kuyedza napose paanogona kugadzira migwagwa isiri kufambika. No media source currently available Dutumupengo iri rakatanga kuparadza zvinhu kuMozambique musi wa 14 Kurume risati rapinda muZimbabwe richinorova kuChipinge neChimanimani kunyanya richiuraya vanhu nekuparadza zvivakwa. Dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kutarisirwa kusangana nedambudziko iri dzinoti Mashonaland East, Mashonaland Central, Mashonaland West, Masvingo neMidlands. Asi vebazi rezvemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Metrological Services Department vanoti vari kutarisira muguta reHarare nemamwe matunhu eMatabeleland achasanganawo zvishoma nedambudziko remhepo nemvura.

headline: ‘Munhu wese kumaWarriors’
text: AIMBOVE mutambi wemaWarriors – Tendai Ndoro – anoti ari kutsigira chikwata chenyika chakasarudzwa naNorman Mapeza kuti chinomirira Zimbabwe kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) kuCameroon achiti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vachitsigire kuti chigotamba zvinonwisa mvura. MaWarriors pari zvino ari kuCameroon uko ari kuita gadziriro dzemutambo uyu uchatanga nemusi weSvondo.   Ndoro, uyo akaenda kumutambo uyu mugore ra2017, anoti anoona chikwata chegore rino chichibudirira kubuda muboka racho izvo chaikundikana makore anoti 2004, 2006, 2017 na2019 pachakamboenda kumutambo uyu. Kumutambo wegore rino, maWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup B rine zvikwata zvinoti Senegal, Guinea neMalawi.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera apo chichasangana neSenegal. Aka kachange kari kechitatu maWarriors achisangana neSenegal kuAFCON.   MaWarriors akatanga kutamba nemaLions of Teranga, sezita remadunhurirwa reSenegal, mugore ra2006 kuAFCON kuEgypt apo akakundwa 2-0 uye zvikwata zviviri izvi ndokuzosangana 2017 kuGabon uko maWarriors akakundwa 2-0 zvekare.   Ndoro anoti kutamba kuAFCON chiremerera chikuru icho chinofanirwa kushandiswa nevatambi vanoenda kumutambo uyu kusimudzira mureza wenyika pamwe nekugadzira mazita avo. “Kekutanga munhoroondo yedu yenhabvu, gore rino ndinoona tichibudirira kubuda muboka redu nekuti zvikwata zvatichasangana nazvo tinopedzerana nazvo. Ingangotityisa chete iSenegal asi zvimwe zvese tinopedzerana nazvo, kunyanya Malawi, tagara tichingoirova uye hatizive kuti muNational Sports Stadium takairova kangani,” anodaro.   Ndoro anoti vatambi vemaWarriors vanotofanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe uye vagorwa semvumba mumitambo yavo.   “Kune vakomana vanotambira nhabvu yavo muno, uyu ndiwo mukana wekuti vagadzire mazita avo nekuti mutambo mukuru wakaita seAFCON vakawanda vanoshuvira kuenda asi zvichiramba. Saka ndipo pavanotofanirwa kugadzira mazita avo kuti vagotengwa nezvikwata zvekunze,” anodaro Ndoro.   Ndoro muchikwata chaaive nacho kuAFCON muna2017, vatambi vaaiva navo vanoti Knowledge Musona, Kudakwashe Mahachi, Teenage Hadebe naTino Kadewere varimo zvekare muchikwata chegore rino chiri kumutambo uyu.   “Tikatarisa vatambi vari muchikwata chedu, tine vatambi vane chitsama vakamboenda kuAFCON makore adarika. Saka kuvepo kwavo muchikwata chedu kuchabatsira zvikuru mumatambiro atichaita,” anodaro Ndoro.   Zvakadaro, Ndoro anoti ari kutarisira kudzoka munhabvu uye mwedzi uno anogona kunge ave nechikwata chitsva.   “Ndine zvirongwa zvandiri kumhanyisana nazvo zvakawanda, asi ndichiri munhabvu manhingi zvekuti tarisirai muone mwedzi uno ndichange ndave nechikwata chitsva,” anodaro Ndoro.

headline: Heal Zimbabwe Trust Inoburitsa Gwaro Rinotaridza Kukwira kweKutyorwa kweKodzero Dzevanhu
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, raburitsa gwaro rinotaridza huwandu hwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu mumwedzi uno. Gwaro iri riri kutaridza kuti kwakava nenyaya dzemhando idzi dzinosvika makumi maviri neina, mumatunhu anosvika gumi nemanomwe munyika yose. Mukuru wekufambiswa kwemashoko muHeal Zimbabwe Trust, VaRawlings Magede, vanoti vakaona kumbunyikidzwa kwevanhu mukutyisidzirwa nekurohwa, kunyimwa rubatsiro rwunopiwa vamwe rwakaita sezvekudya, uye kumanikidzwa kuburitsa matsamba anoratidza kuti munhu akanyoresa kuvhota musarudzo dziri kuuya. VaMagede vanoti tsvakurudzo yesangano ravo inotaridza kuti kutyisidzirwa kwevanhu kuchiri kuramba kuchienderera mberi munyika, kunyange hazvo paine kurudziro kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nasachigaro weZanu PF, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri kuti vanhu vasiyane nemhirizhonga. Vanotiwo kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemutowo wekutyisidzirwa uku kuri kutora zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nzira dzekutyorerwa kodzero. No media source currently available

headline: Pakisimusi, VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vari Kuziva Kuti Vakawanda Vari Kunonga Svosve neMuromo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatumira mashoko kumhuri yeZimbabwe pazororo rekisimusi vachiti vari kuziva kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kutambura uye havasi kuisa zvimiti munzeve kana kuita sevasiri kuzviona. Vati pane zvakawanda zvavari kuyedza kuita kuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vari kuyedza kuumba hukama nedzimwe nyika, kurwisa huori uye kuunza hutongo hwejekerere. VaMnangagwa vakurudzira vanhu vose kuti vave nerudo kuvavakidzani vavo nekubatsira varombo sezvo iri nguva yekupembera hupenyu hwaJesu Kristu. Vati kubva zvavakatora mhiko yekutungamira nyika vari kushanda zvakasimba kuzadzikisa zvirevo izvi. VaMnagagwa vati pakisimusi ino vanhu vemuZimbabwe havafanire kutarisa shure asi mberi chete netarisiro yekubatsira mhuri, nharaunda uye nyika.

headline: Mbappe oshuvira Kante
text: Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, anoti akaedza kukurudzira N’Golo Kante weChelsea kuti auye kuzotambira chikwata chekuLigue 1 apo vaviri ava vaive kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Mbappe, uyo ane makore 19 okuberekwa, akaudza muridzi wePSG Nasser Al-Khelaifi kuti atenge mutambi uyu kubva kuchikwata ichi chekuPremier League.   Kante, uyo akahwina mukombe wePremier League kaviri, ange achinzi ari kudiwa kuParc des Princes mwaka uno uye Mbappe ari kutsigira kutengwa kwemutambi uyu.   “Ndakaudza (Al-Khelaifi) zvakare kuti Kante anenge akatinakira mukamutenga auye kuchikwata chedu,” akaudza France Football.   “Ndakataura naN’Golo pataive kuWorld Cup asi ndisingamumanikidze nekuti ndinoziva zvinoitika kana zvikapinda mumusoro wako zvekuda kutengwa nezvimwe zvikwata.   “Pakupedzisira ndakangoisa mashoko mashoma muhomwe dzake zvandakanyora pakapepa, izvo zvandinoziva akazozviona adzokera kumba kwake.”   Mbappe naKante havasati vadzokera kuzvikwata zvavo zvichitevera kuhwina kwavakaita kumutambo weWorld Cup neFrance nguva pfupi ichangodarika. Vaviri ava vakabatsira Les Blues kuhwina mukombe weWorld Cup kechipiri munhorondo yechikwata ichi mushure memakore 20 zvichitevera kukunda kwavakaita Croatia 4-2 mufainari yemutambo uyu. —SportsMail Football

headline: Vakawanda Vochema Shasha yeNhabvu Diego Maradona
text: Mutambi wenhabvu akaita mukurumbira pasi rose akatungamira Argentina mukusimudza mukombe weWorld Cup muna 1986, Diego Maradona ashaya nechirwere chemoyo mavhiki maviri achangobuda muchipatara cheOlivos Clinic munyika iyi paine mashoko ekuti ainge aine ropa rainge ragwamba muhuropi hwake. Vatambi, varairidzi nevatsigiri venhabvu vari kutumira mashoko kudzinhepfenyuro uye madandemutande akasiyana siyana. Nhepfenyuro dzose pasi rose dziri kutaurawo nezverufu urwu. Maradona ange ave nemakore makumi matanhatu ekuberekwa. Diego akatambira zvikwata zvakawanda zvinosanganisira Boca Juniors, Napoli ne Barcelona. Muna 1986, Maradona akanwisa bhora neruko pamutambo neEngland ichibva yabuda mumakwikwi aya. Paakabvunzwa nevatori venhau akati rwainge rwuri ruoko rwaMwari kana kuti “Hand of God.” Diego ainetsekanawo zvakanyanya nenyaya yekuputa nekunwa zvinodhaka zvakaita secocain nedoro.
