Maradona akamborairidzawo nyika yake yeArgentina uye ange ave murairidzi wechikwata cheGimnasia y Esgrima munyika yake.

headline: Sangano reProudly263 Global Robatsira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kutanga Mabhizimusi
text: Sangano reProudly263 Global, iro rakaumbwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa mushure mekunge zvaona kuoma kwakaita kutanga mabhizimusi kana usiri chizvarwa chenyika iyi, riri kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pamwe nezviri munyika nemikana yekutanga mabhizimusi azvo zvega. Vakavamba sangano iri uye vari ivo CEO veProudly263 Global, VaStanley Makwara, vanoti vakaonawo kubatana kwezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, uye kutsigirana kwazvinoita mune zvemabhizimusi, izvo zvakaita kuti vati kana vana veZimbabwe vanozvigonawo. VaMakwara vanoti chinangwa chesangano ravo, iro rave nenhengo dzinodarika zviuru zvitatu, ndechekusimudzira mabhizimusi nemagariro evanhu kuburikidza nekubatana vachizivana. Vanotiwo seProudly263 Global, vakaumbawo bhanga rinonzi Hello Sahwira Mhlobo (HSM Bank), rinove remubatanidzwa wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, mushure mekuona kunetsa kwazvinoita kuti munhu ange achikwanisa kukwereteswa mari nemabhanga emo yekuti atange bhizimusi. VaMakwara vanoti bhanga ravo rinokurudzira kuchengetedza mari uye rinowanisa nhengo dzaro zvikwereti zvine mutengo wakaderera kudarika kumamwe mabhanga. Vanoti remangwana resangano ravo rakajeka zvekuti vanoona vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vachikwanisa kuvaka upfumi hweZimbabwe ivo vari kunyika dzavagere. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotarisana neKudzingwa Munhabvu yePasi Rose?
text: Zimbabwe inogona kudzingwa munhabvu yepasi rose chero nguva zvichitevera kukundikana kweSports and Recreation Commission, SRC, kudzosera bhodhi reZifa rayakadzingwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera. SRC yakadzinga bhodhi iri ichiti rainge rashandisa mari zvisiri pamwero. Asi sangano renhabvu yepasi rose, reFederation of International Football, Fifa, rakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti rakanga risiri kufara nekupindira kwehurumende mukufambiswa kwenhabvu munyika. Sangano iri rakazivisa kuti bhodhi reZifa rikasadzorerwa musi wa Ndira 3, 2022 asati apfuura, Fifa yaizotorera nhabvu yemuZimbabwe matanho akaomarara. Asi SRC inoti haisi kuzodzosera bhodhi reZifa, uye haina kuwana tsamba yakabva kuFifa iri kutaura nezvekudzoserwa kwebhodhi iri. Sachigaro veSRC, VaGerald Mlotshwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti Fifa yakatarira nguva iyi kuZifa, vakati hapana nguva yakatarirwa SRC. VaMlotshwa mukuwasha wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezvo vakaroora mwanasikana wavo, Farai Celine Mnangagwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitambo, VaMathias Tongofa, kuti tinzwe pamire komiti yavo panyaya iyi. Asi imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vanoti hunhinhi huri kuitwa neSRC huchaita kuti Zimbabwe idzingwe munhabvu yepasi rose sezvo mitemo yeFifa isingadi kuti dzihurumende dzipindire mukufambiswa kwenhabvu munyika dzepasi rose. VaSaruwaka vanoti Fifa inotora matanho akaomarara pose panenge patyorwa mitemo yayo. Vanotiwo sezvo zuva rakatarwa rakapfuura madeko, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kunyorera Fifa ichikumbira ruregerero uye kuona kuti bhodhi reZifa radzoserwa kuitira kuti Zimbabwe isadzingwe munhabvu yepasi rose. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemitambo, Kirsty Coventry, sezvo vanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo. VaSaruwaka vanoti pari zvino komiti yavo haisi kuita basa zvichitevera kumiswa kweparamende kuungana ichiita basa rayo kusvika mwedzi unouya nepamusana pedambudziko rechirwere. cheCovid-19. Asi VaSaruwaka vanoti pachavhura paramende, vachada kunzwa kuSRC kuti seyi yakatora danho rinoisa nhabvu yemunyika parumananzombe. Zimbabwe iri kuCameroon kumakwikwi eAfcon, uko inogona kudzingwa kana chero nguva kana Fifa ikatora danho rekudzinga Zimbabwe munhabvu yepasi rose sezvayinoita kunyika dzinenge dzatyora mitemo yayo. No media source currently available

headline: General Electric Yotarisa Nzira dzeKuita Bhizimisi muZimbabwe
text: Vakuru vakuru vekambani yeku America yeGeneral Electric vanonzi vari kushanya muZimbabwe kuzotsvaga kuita mabhizimisi. Mumiriri we America muZimbabwe, VaHarry Thomas, vakataurawo mashoko aya padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti vainge vaita musangano nevakuru veGE. Izvi zvinotevera kuridziro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekuti Zimbabwe yagadzirira kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. General Electric ikambani inokosha madhora anopfuura mabhirioni zana nemakumi maviri nemaviri uye inogadzira zvinhu zvakawanda kubva kune zvemagetsi, mainjini emota nendege kusvika kumafiriji nezvimwe zvinoshandiswa mudzimba. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Elliot Masocha, avo vanodzidzisa kuOhio muno mu America, vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemumwe mukana wekugadzirisa nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachiti vanofara nezvinoda kuitwa neGeneral Electric. No media source currently available

headline: Tine mukana: Antipas
text: Inn — Joey Antipas — anoti mwaka wemutambo weCastle Premiership uchiri wakavhurika zvikuru uye chikwata chake chicharwisa semvumba zvikwata zviri pamusoro zvinoti FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum kusvika kumagumo chichirwira mukombe uyu.   Mutambo uyu uri kusimudzirwa svondo rino mushure mekunge wambomira panguva yemid-season break kwemasvondo maviri adarika.   Zvikwata zvose zvange zvichigadzirira zvakasimba nekuti mitambo 17 yasara ichange yakaomarara sezvo zvimwe zvichange zvichirwira kuti zvisaburistwe muligi iri kozoti zvimwe zvichirwira mukombe.   Pari zvino FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum ndizvo zvikwata zviri pamusoro uye vatsigiri venhabvu vazhinji vari kuona sekuti pakati pezviviri izvi ndipo pane chichatora mukombe mwaka uno.   Asi, Antipas ari kuramba mafungiro akadai aya achiti chikwata chake chicharwa zvekudambuka makumbo segurwe chichirwirawo mukombe uyu.   “Nhabvu inogona kushanduka pamusingafungire muchiti mukombe waenda asi chandinoziva munozopembera pakupedzisira nekuti kutaura kuno hatizive kuti mukombe uri kuenda kupi.   “Isu sechikwata ticharwa kusvika kumagumo, iye zvino hatizive kuti zvichabuda pakupedzisira ndezvipi,” anodaro.   Svondo rino maGamecocks – sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn – ari kusangana neDynamos ‘DeMbare’ musi weSvondo kunhandare yeRufaro Stadium muHarare.   Antipas anoti mutambo uyu mukuru kuchikwata chake uye vari kuugadzirira semagadziriro avanoita mimwe mitambo yese.   “Semazuva ese isu tinogadzirira mitambo nekuuya kwainenge ichiita, saka hatisi kunyanya kufunga zvekumberi asi zvemutambo weDynamos watakatarisana nawo wesvondo rino,” anodaro.   Murairidzi weCAPS UNITED, Lloyd Chitembwe, akatsinhirawo mashoko aAntipas achiti rwendo rwekurwira mukombe weCastle Premiership rwuchiripo uye chikwata chake chiri kushanda zvakasimba kuti chidzore mukombe uyo wachakahwina mugore ra2016.   “Hatimhanye kufunga zvekuhwina mukombe chete, zvinoda zvakawanda uye zvinoda kushanda nesimba muchigadzirisa zviri kudiwa kuti basa rifambe.   “Nyaya hombe kushanda nesimba sechikwata kuti zvatinenge tichida zvigoitika. Tikaramba tichishanda nesimba ndinoziva kuti tinokunda chete hapana zvinomboramba.   “Mujaho uchiripo hausati wapera, hatizive kuti mune ramangwana zvichafamba sei,” anodaro Chitembwe.   Chikwata chaChitembwe svondo rino chiri kusangana neHarare City musi weMugovera kunhandare yeRufaro Stadium.   Mune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino muCastle Premiership, FC Platinum ichange iri pamusha kuMandava apo ichasangana neZPC Kariba.

headline: Chirongwa cheTNF Chinoparurwa VaMnangagwa Vachikurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vasaramwe Mabasa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura neChitatu nhaurirano pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi vachikurudzira kuti vashandi vasaratidzire kusafara kwavo nekuoma kuri kuita zvinhu munyika. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwenhaurirano idzi idzo dzichaitwa pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi pasi peTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF, VaMnangagwa vakurudzira kuti vashandi vasapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika vachiti kuratidzira uku kunoputsa hukama pakati pehurumende nevashandi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vaudzawo musangano uyu vashandi vachapinda mumigwagwa kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve panyaya yemari dzemihoro dziri kunzi nevashandi ngadziwedzerwe. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vati vaitawo musangano naVaMnangagwa pamberi pekuparurwa kweTNF uku apo pavati vasvitsawo nhuna dzavo sevashandi. VaMoyo vati vashamisika kuti VaMnangagwa havasi kutomboziva kuti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasi ari kuwana marii pamwedzi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti Emcoz, VaIsrael Murefu, vaudzawo mutungamiri wenyika kuti vemakambani vari kutadza kubhadhara vashandi kubudikidza nekusagadzikana kwakaita mari yemunyika. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vati nhaurirano pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi ndidzo chete dzinokwanisa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika kana mapandiko matatu aya akazvipira kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Vatiwo sehurumende vari kuvandudza mitemo yakawanda kuitira vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vakwanise kuita mabasa avo pasina zvimhingamipinyi. Kuparurwa kwaitwa nhaurirano dzeTNF kwaitwa naVaMnangagwa kunotevera kupasiswa kwakaitwa bhiri remutemo weTNF neparamende. Mutemo uyu unosungira hurumende kuti isangane nevashandi nevemabhizimusi kaviri pagore. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa Inotsamwisa Komiti yeParamende Inoona Nyaya dzeMitambo
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzashatirwa mushure mekunge sangano reZimbabwe Football Association (ZIFA) nekanzuru yeBulawayo vatadza kunopa humbowo kudare mushure mekunge sangano rezvenhabvu muAfrica reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rati nhandare dzese dzemuZimbabwe hadzikodzeri kutambirwa nhabvu. Nhengo dzekomiti inoona nezvevechidiki nemutambo dzaratidza kusafara nekuita kweZIFA dzichiti hazvishamisi kuti mutambo wenhabvu wasvika pauri munyika nekuti ZIFA haikoshesi basa rayo pamwe nedare reparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Muzvare Tatenda Mavetera veZanu PF, vati danho reCAF rakabata vakawanda nevatsigiri venhabvu munyika uye kana ZIFA isingakoshesi izvi, zvinoreva kuti haina hany’a nenhabvu. VaOmega Sibanda veZanu PF varatidzawo kusafara nekuita kweZIFA nekanzuru yeBulawayo vachiti ndivo vanhu vange vakanyanya kukosha kukomiti yeparamende VaGift Banda veMDC vatiwo zvange zvakakosha kuti ZIFA ive pamusangano wanhasi sezvo iri iyo inotaura neCAF ichizozivisa vamwe vese zvinenge zvabva kuCAF. Vachipa humbowo pamusoro penyaya iyi, vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori mubazi rezvematunhu, VaJoseph Mhakayaora, vati zvose zvinodiwa neCAF zvingadai zvagadzirwa munhandare yeNational Sports Stadium dai vaipihwa mari nehurumende. Vati nhandare iyi yakapedzisira kugadziridzwa makore gumi apfuura nemari yakabva kuChina. Vati gore rapfuura chairo vakaisa bhajeti remamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mana emadhora rekusimudzira National Sports Stadium, asi hapana chakabuda. Asi vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemunyori mubazi revechidiki nemitambo, VaBenson Martins Dube, vaudza paramende kuti hurumende yakataoudza ZIFA kuti inyorere kuCAF ichiikoka kuti izoongorora zvakare National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields sezvo nhandare idzi dziri kugadziriswa. Vati hurumende iri kushandisa mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematatu ekugadzirisa nhandare idzi uye vati vanovimba kuti dzichange dzapera kugadziriswa mukati memazuva gumi nemana ari kuetevera. Zvichakadai, CAF yanyorera ZIFA ichiramba chikumbiro chekuti iongorore zvakare nhandare idzi ikati inoda kuti Zimbabwe idome nhandare iri kunze kweZimbabwe yainoda kutambira mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria. Mutauriri ZIFA, VaXolisani Gwesela, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hongu vatambira gwaro iri kubva kuCAF mushure mekunyorera sangano iri neMuvhuro. VaGwesela vatiwo vatadza kuenda paramende nhasi sezvo vange vakabatikana uye vakanyorera kuparamende neChitatu vachiti musangano wanhasi uendeswe mberi. No media source currently available

headline: “Huyai Titaurirane”  - Hurumende Youdza Vashandi Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Hurumende iri kukurudzira vashandi vayo kuti vambomira zvekuramwa Mabasa zvisinei nemari shoma yavanotambira. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro ranyorwa nemamwe masangano anomiririra vashandi vehurumende vachizivisa kuti kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo mumazuva gumi nemana vachange vachizoramwa mabasa. Masangano anyora tsamba iyi anoti, Public Service Association, the Federation of Educators Unions of Zimbabwe neNurses Federation of Zimbabwe. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi VaPaul Mavhima vatiwo vashandi nevashandirwi vari kuzoita hurukuro nemusi weMuvhuro . VaMavhima vati hurumende inokoshesa hurukuro Asi mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanogara vachiti hurumende haidi zvenhaurirano pachine nguva vati vari kutambiriswa mutero wembwa. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaRaymond Majongwe vanotiwo sevashandi vanodawo mari inokwanisa kuti vararame sezvo vakatodzidzira mabasa avo. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association VaGoodswill Taderera vatiwo vashandi vehurumende vave kuita mushandirapmwe kuti vawedzerwe mari. Asi VaMavhima vatiwo kuramwa mabasa kunokanganisa mabasa akakosha ehurumende. Pave nenguva hurumende nevashandi vayo vasiri kuwirirana panyaya yemihoro. Vashandi vanotiwo vanoda kupiwa mihoro nemari yekunze vachiti zvinhu zvese zvave kungoda kubhadharwa nemari yekuAmerica panguva iyo vashandi vari kutambiriswa madhora emunyika.

headline: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Vanhu Vave Kufa neKuratidzira kwaVanaChiremba
text: Sangano rinomirira ana chiremba vehurumende avo vari kuramwa mabasa parizvino rinoti munyika mungangosara musina anachiremba zvichitevera kudiwa kuri kuitwa madhokotera nezvipatara zviri kunze kwenyika. Mashoko aya anouya apo hurumnde yave kutenda kuti varwere vari kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nekuda kwekutaridzira kwavanachiremba vave nemavhiki matatu vachiratidzira. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChina, mutauriri Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaFrancis Rwodzi, vati kuramwa kwemabasa nana chiremba kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvichitevera kutadza kuwirirana kuri kuita ana chiremba nehurumende panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro. Madhokotera ari kuramwa mabasa anoti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yaari kutambiriswa kubva pamadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemaviri ($282) kusvika pamadhora chiuru nemazana maviri ($1200) asi hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka zvekuti haikwanise kupa ana chiremba ava mari dzavari kuda idzi. Zvichakadai, VaRwodzi vati zvipatara zvekunze kwenyika zvizhinji zvirikukoka ana chiremba vemuZimbabwe kuti vanoshandira kuzvipatara izvi zvavati zvichaita kuti hupenyu huomere veruzhinji. VaRwodzi vati hurumende haina hany’a neraramo yavana chiremba uye vanoti hurumende inokoshesa kupa mari yakawanda kumadzishe asina basa guru raanoita muhupenyu hwevanhu ichisiya kubhadhara madhokotera zvine mwero. Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Gerald Gwinji vanoti vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vanofanira kuti vadzokere kumabasa. Vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald Dr Gwinji vanoti varwere vave kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Dr Gwinji vanoti zvipatara zvehurumende zvinokwanisawo kudaidza vanachiremba kubva kumauto. Asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa nhaurirano dzichiitwa. Mashoko aDr Gwinji anoteverawo kurudziro yakapihwa negurukota rezvehutano Dr david Parirenyatwa yekuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa asi hurukuro dzichienderera mberi. Asi mashoko aya anenge akatowedzera peturu mumoto nekuti vanachiremba muzvipatara zvekumatunhu makuru nemadiki vakabva vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Sangano rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Peace Project raburitsawo mashoko richiti riri kushushikana nekuramwa mabasa kwavanavanachiremba richiti vanhu vave kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Sangano iri riri kuti riri kushushikana nemashoko akabuda mubepanhau reThe Southern Eye Newspaper nezuro ekuti pane varwere vana vakashaya kuMpilo nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Mune imwewo nyaya, sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti Navuz, rinoti harisi kutambira hurongwa hwekanzuru yeHarare hwekuda kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa pakati pedhorobha. Munyori musangano re Navuz, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vati sangano ravo, iro ravati rine nhengo dzinodarika zviuru gumi nezvitatu, riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuruongwa hwekanzuru iyo iri kuda kubvisa vese vanotengesera mumigwagwa mudhorobha. VaWadzayi vati sangano ravo rine nzira dzakawanda dzarichashandisa kurwisana nezviri kurongwa nekanzuru iyo yavati yakaronga kluvadzinga ichishanda pamwechete nemauto. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya we Harare, VaBernard Manyenyeni kana mutauriri wekanzuru VaLeslie Gwindi, kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi asi kanzuru inogara ichimhanyisana nevanotengesera mumigwagwa nguva nenguva. Mune imwewo nyaya zvakare, bhodhi resangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti harisi kuzosuduruka pachisungo charo chekuti mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaMcDonald Lewanika, vasiye basa pakupera kwegore panopera nguva yavakasainira kuti vange vari mutungamiri wesangano iri. Sachigaro webhodhi re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaDewa Mavhinga, vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare neChina kuti nyangwe zvazvo panga paine mukana wekunyorerana patsva kuti VaLewanika vapinde muchibvumirano chitsva, bhodhi ravo rakawona zvakakodzera kuti VaLewanika vasiye basa sezvo pane humbowo hwekuti havana kufambisa zvakanaka mari yesangano iri. Zvichakadaro, VaLewanika vanoti vari kuronga musangano mukuru wemasangano ese anove nhengo dze Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition uchaitwa mwedzi uno uine chinangwa chekuchinja zvakabvumiranwa nebhodhi resangano iri asi VaMavhinga vati musangano uyu hauna zvaunoreva uye vati uri kunze kwemutemo. Mune imwe nyaya nemusi weChina wakare, mapositori gumi neumwechete vakabatwa vaine mhosva yekurova mapurisa nevatori venhau kuBudiriro uye vamwe vavo makumi maviri nevatanhatu vawanikwa vasina mhosva nedare. Vabatwa nemhosva ava vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore mana. Mapurisa nevatori venhau vakarohwa nemapositori aya kuBudiriro mushure mekunge mapositori aya apomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevana zvinosanganisira kurambidza vana kuenda kuchikoro.

headline: Mitengo yeZvinhu Inokwira Izvo Zvoomesera Vakawanda
text: Mitengo yezvinhu munyika inonzi iri kuramba ichikwira izvo zviri kusiya vanhu vakawanda vari parumana nzombe. Gwaro rakaburitswa neZimbabwe National Statistics Agency, Zimstat, rinoratidza kuti mitengo yezvinhu yakakwira nezvikamu zviri pakati, zvinosvika 0,21 kubva muzana kubva mumwedzi waKurume wegore rapera kusvika Kurume wegore rino. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangno reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti zvinhu zvinogona kunge zvakaita kuti mitengo ikwire zvinosanganisira mafuta ekufambisa. Doctor Chitambara vanotiwo imwe nyaya inogona kunge iri yekuparurwa kwakaitwa mari yerudzi rwema bond note nehurumende, izvo zvakaita kuti mari iwande mumisika. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinotiwo kudzikwa kwemutengo weStatutory Instrument 64, uyo unorambidza kupinzwa munyika kwezvigadzirwa zvekunze kunogona kunge kuine chekuita nekukwira kwemitengo uku. Zvekudya zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa zvinonzi ndizvo zvazara muzvitoro zvemunyika, asi mafuta anobva kunze achiri kuwanikwa mumisika mitema sezvo achiri kupinzwa munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi yakakwira kekutanga mukati memwedzi makumi maviri nemipfumbamwe mushure mekunge yadzikira zvakanyanya kutanga muna Kukadzi wegore ra2014. Izvi zvakaita kuti zvinhu zvigare muzvitoro zvisina anotenga sezvo mari yaitenderera munyika yaive shoma, kana kuti deflation. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Hillary Clinton naVaDonald Trump Voita Gakava Ravo Rekupedzisira
text: Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica vaDonald Trump naAmai Hillary Clinton vari kuita gakava ravo rekupedzisira manheru nhasi. Vanopinda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vanoita magakava matatu. Vazhinji vanofunga kuti hondo yegore rino pakati paVaTrump vebato re Republican naAmai Hillary Clinton ve Democratic Party yasvika pasati pambosvikwa munhoroondo yezvematongerwo enyika yamazuvano. VaPishai Muchauraya, mutauriri webato reRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe asi vachitaura vakazvimirira vaudza Studio 7 kuti magakava akadayi akakosha zvikuru sezvo achiratidza pamire vanokwikwidza musarudzo uye shuwiro yavo ndeyekuona zvakadayi zvichiitikawo munyika. "Ndinofarira zviri kuitwa kuAmerica sezvo zviri kuratidza hutongo hwejekerere. Tinoda kuona zvakadayi zvichiitwa muZimbabwe sezvo zviri zvinhu zvakanaka," VaMuchauraya vaudza Studio 7. Sarudzo idzi dzirikutarisirwa kuitwa mwedzi uno uya. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yosimbaradza Mitemo yeCovid-19 Lockdown
text: Hurumende inoti yadzosa mitemo yose yakashandiswa pakatanga kubuda chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuramba vachibatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid 19 huri kuramba huchikwira munyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota ehurumende, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati hurumende yadzosa mirawu yose yekuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera zvose zvinodiwa kuitira kurwisa denda reCovid-19 iro riri kuramba richikura munyika. Vakati vanobatwa nemhosva yekutyora mitemo yakatanga kushandiswa gore rapera, vacharangwa zvakasimba, uye vane mabhizinesi anotyora mitemo iyi, vachatorerwa marezenisi avo. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo pane vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vari muzvipatara zvehurumende, avo vari kushandisa zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana chenzvimbo dzakachengeterwa kuti dzishandiswe nevarwere veCivid-19 muzvipatara zvehuruymende. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati makurukota ehurumende akatenderera nzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana achiona nzvimbo dziri kusangana nematambudziko anosanganisira zvekushandisa, kushomeka kwevashandi vezvehutano, kushomeka kwemweya unobatsira kufema varwere, kana medical oxygen nezvimwe. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo dare remakurukota rakurudzira kuti bazi rezvemari riwanise nechimbi chimbi mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nemasere kana kuti 368 million RTGS kuti ishandiswe mukuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera mitemo yeLockdown Asi munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukorta rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti matambudziko ari kutaurwa nehurumende akagara ariko huye hurumende ingadai yakagadzirisa matambudziko aya. VaMadzorera vanotiwo vanokatyamadzwa nehuwandu hwevarwere veCovid-19 vanonzi vari muzvipatara vachiti zvimwe zvipatara zvakatozara kare nevarwere ava. Zvipatara zvehurumende zvakawanda pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa varwere veCovid-19 dzinonzi hadzina mweya wekubatsira kufema, medical oxygen, varwere veCovid-19 vanenge varwarisa. No media source currently available

headline: Mutambi weFC Platinum, Walter Musona, Anosimudza Mukomwe weSoccer Star of The Year 2022
text: Mutambi wechikwata cheFC Platinum, Walter Musona, ari kunyemwerera akananga kubhanga mushure mekutora mukombe we2022 Castle Lager Soccer Star of the Year pamabiko akaitwa muHarare neChishanu manheru. Musona akatambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$5000.00, mushure mekutora mukombe une chiremera chikuru munhabvu yemunyika weCastle Soccer Star of the Year wemwaka uno. Mari iyi imari yakawandisa zvikuru munyika muno pachitariswa mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaTinashe Museti vanoti Musona anokodzera nekutora mukombe weligi kwaakaita nechikwata chake. William Manhondo we Caps United akatendwa nemari inoita iyo zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$3000.00 mushure mekupedza ari pachinhanho chechipiri. VaMuseti vanoti ndipo paanofanira kuve ari nekuti hapana chaakabuda nacho chinobatika neCaps United kunze kwekurwira nzvimbo yavo mugungano iri. Frank Makarati weDynamos ndiye akatora chinhanho chechitatu ndokutambidzwa mari inoita iyo zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$2500.00. Chiri kushamisa ndechekuti mutambi weHerentals, Tino Benza, ndiye akavhoterwa nechaunga kunzi ndiye mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno. Asi pakasarudzwa ma Soccer Star, veruzhinji vaitonyunyuta kuti Benza aive asingakodzere pamberi paBlessing Majarira uyo vanotamba vese kuchikwata chimwechetecho. No media source currently available

headline: Mutumbi waVaMugabe Wotarisirwa Munyika neChitatu Masikati
text: Mutumbi wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, uchasvika muHarare neChitatu masikati uye ndipo pachaziviswa hurongwa kwekuradzikwa kwavo. Izvi zvaziviswa negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwamashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota. Amai Mutsvangwa vati pane makomiti ehurumende ari kugadzirira hurongwa kwekuradzikwa kwaVaMugabe. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei zviri kutora nguva kutaura kucharadzikwa VaMugabe, Amai Mutsvangwa pamwe nekugurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vati hapana chinoshamisa pane zviri kuitika vachiti hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwavo huchaziviswa mushure mekunge mhuri yaVaMugabe, iyo iri kuSingapore, yasvika munyika. Vati hurumende nemhuri yaVaMugabe zviri kuronga pamwe chete hurongwa uhu. Ukuwo mutauriri wemadzimambo edzinza raVaMugabe, Mambo Katizagombo, avo vanonzi Gibson Jenami, vati hapachisina makakatanwa pamusoro pekuvigwa kwaVaMugabe sezvo hurumende, ichitungamirirwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yave pamberi pezvose zvichaitwa. Ukowo Major General Trust Mugoba, avo vakashayawo svondo rapfuura, vacharadzikwa neChitatu panzvimbo inovigwa magamba yeHeroes Acre muHarare. Mune imwewo nyaya hurumende inoti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zana nemakumi manomwe nezvisere zvakabatwa batwa nemhirizhonga iri kuitika kuSouth Africa uye pane vanhu vaviri vekuZimbabwe vakashaya mumhirizhonga iyi. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kuronga kuunza vanhu ava nemitumbi yevaviri ava kumusha. Hurumende inotiwo vashandi mubazi rezvehutano kusanganisira vana chiremba vakatobhadharwa mari yakawedzerwa neezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana yekuti vabatsirikane uye nhasi dare remakurukota raita chisungo chekuti bazi rezvehutano nemari zvigare pasi kuona kuti vashandi ava vapihwa mari dzinofadza. Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vati vachagara pasi nebazi rezvemari kuona kuti chisungo chedare remakurukota chatevedzwa. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa svondo rapfuura vachitsutsumwa kuti mari dzavo dzemihoro hadzina zvadzichabatsira. No media source currently available

headline: Maonero eHurumende yeAmerica Mukudyidzana neChina.
text: Kwemakore akawanda, hurumende yeAmerica yange ichikumbira China mune zvakanaka kuti imire mabasa ehutsotsi, kumbunyikidza uye kusora muAmerica. Asi kwemakore ose aya China yange ichiramba kuteerera. Nenyaya yekuita hunhinhi uku, America yakazomanikidzwa kuvhara muzinda weChina kuHouston, Texas mushure mekunge China yayedza kutora zvisiri pamutemo hunyanzvi hwezvekugadzia mishonga uye kuda kupa chiokomuhomwe kune vanhu makumi mashanu vanoshanda pamakambani anogadzira mishonga aya kuti vapihwe magwaro akakosha ekugadzira mishonga nehumwe humhizha. China iri kuyedzawo kutyisidzira zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zviri muAmerica zvinopikisa kuti zvidzokere kumusha. Zvakaitwa neChina kuHouston zvakapfurikidza zvakanyanya zvakasiya hurumende yeAmerica isina chimwe chekuita kunze kwekuvhara muzinda uyu. Iri rimwe danho rakaomarara ratorwa neAmerica kudzivisa China iyo yopinda nemwenje mudziva. Kwemakore, vamiriri veChina vange vachibatwa zvakanaka neAmerica asi ivo vachibata vamiriri veAmerica munyika yavo neseri kweruoko. Izvi handi zvinhu zvakanaka. Asi hamusi muAmerica chete umo vamiriri veChina vanozvidza nyika inovaremekedza. Kubiwa kwemagwaro enjere neChina rave dambudziko rakomba pasi rose. Mazuva mashoma adarika matare emuAmerica akawana zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina zviviri Li Xiaoyu naDong Jiazhi zviine mhosva yekusora makambani emuAmerica nekuba zvakakosha pamacomputer. Vaviri ava vakange vapedza makore gumi vachisora nekuba magwaro akakosha ane humhizha hwepamusoro hwemaindustry kunyika dzinosanganisira United States, Australia, Belgium, Germany, Japan, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Spain, South Korea, Sweden, ne United Kingdom. Zvose izvi zvinoratidza kuti China inodya zvevapfupi nekureba mukuda kwayo kuti ive nyika ine hupfumi hwakasimba pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsa kweZvekufambisa Kunonzi Kwave kuKanganisa Nyaya dzeMagariro eVanhu Pamwe neHupfumi hweNyika
text: Dambudiko rezvekufambisa mumadhorobha makuru emunyika rinonzi nevamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevanoongorora zvehupfumi rave kutowedzera zvakanyanya kukanganisa magariro evanhu pamwe nehupfumi hwenyika sezvo vashandi vave kumanikidzwa kunonoka kusvika kumabasa pamwe nekusvika kudzimba. Vazhinji vevanofamba nemabhazi, zvikuru muHarare neBulawayo, vanonzi vari kuzopedzisira vofamba netsoka sezvo kambani yakapiwa mvumo nehurumende yekutakura vezurizhinji, yeZUPCO, iri kunzi yakundikana kuzadzisa chirevo ichi. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kupawo mukana kune vane dzimotokari diki avo vanonzi vave kutakura vanhu vachivachaja miripo iri pamusorosoro, kunyange hazvo ivo vasina marezinesi ekutakura veruzhinji. Mapurisa nemamwe mapazi ehurumende vanonziwo vari kusunga nekurambidza vemotokari vasina marezinesi ava, avo vanozivikanwa nerekuti 'mishikashika', izvo zvinonzi zviri kusvitsa pakuti vamwe varaisikirwe nehupenyu nekuda kwetsaona dziri kuitika apo vatyairi vanenge vachiedza kutiza mapurisa. Nekuda kwedambudziko iri, vamwe vanhu vanonzi vave kutokwira pamusoro pemabhazi nemarhorhi vamwe vachipinda mumabhutu emabhazi kuti vakwanisenkusvitswa kudzimba dzavo, izvo zvave kuvaisa munjodzi. Hurumende neChitatu yakabvuma kuti ZUPCO yakundikana, asi yakavimbisa kuti iri kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuburikidza nekuita kuti mabhazi anofamba pakati pemaguta akaita seharare nemamwe ange achizobatsira kutakura vanhu munguva dzaanenge adzoka muHarare. Asi munyori anoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu mubato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, CCC, vari zvakare mumiriri weMbizo mudare reparamende, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vanoti hurumende yakundikana zvakanyanya uye yapererwa. VaChikwinya vanoti hurumende yakapindira munyaya dzekutakurwa kwevanhu ichihwanda nedenda reCovid-19, asi iyo iine chinangwa chekushandisa vemabhazi kuti vaende pasi peZUPCO isingavabhadhare nenguva uye ichivabhadhara nemadhora emunyika, ayo asina chaachatenga. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, VaChikwinya vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kubvumidza vamwe vedzimotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji kuitawo basa iri,pamwechete neZUPCO yacho, uye kubhadhara vane mabhazi ari kushanda ari pasi peZUPCO nenguva kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kugadzirisa mabhazi avo. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF vari munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mudunhu reHarare DCC 3, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainokwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko rezvekufambisa iri kuburikidza nekutenga mabhazi matsva akawanda kubva kuBelarus. VaDzikiti vanoti dambudziko harisi pahurumende, asi kuti vemabhazi vari pasi peZUPCO, avo vavanoti vari kunyanya kushanda vaine chinangwa chemari yavanoda kubata pazuva zvekuti kana vangosvitsa mari iyoyo vanobva vatomisa mabhazi avo vogara zvavo pamimvuri vanhu vachitambura. VaDzikiti vanoti kuti dambudziko iri rigadziriswe, ZUPCO inofanirwa kugadzirisa mashandiro ayo, vachitiwo dambudziko remabhazi riri kuwedzerwawo nezvirango zvavanoti zviri kutadzisa kupinda munyika kwezvinodiwa kugadzirisa mabhazi anenge afa. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inoudza IMF Kuti Igadzirise Hukama Hwayo neZimbabwe
text: Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvebhajeti nekufambiswa kwemari dzaudza chikwata cheInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, chiri kushanya munyika kuti hadzisi kufara nekuti sangano iri harina zvariri kuita mukubatsira nyika nemari kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri kuita zvese zvayakanzi iite pasi pechirongwa che Staff Monitored Program Chikwata ichi cheIMF chaita musangano nekomiti iyi apo nhengo dzeparamende dziri mukomiti iyi dzati hadzisi kufara kuti IMF haina zvairi kuita kuona kuti Zimbabwe yatanga kuwana ribatsiro rwemari kubva kuIMF neWorld Bank. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaDavid Chapfika, vaudza chikwata ichi chiri kutungamirirwa naVaDomeninco Fanizza kuti chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program chakatanga panguva yehurumende yemunatanidzwa muna 2013 uye kusvika pari zvino chiri kungoenderera mberi. Vati munguva pfupi nyika inenge yave kugadzirira sarudzo uye hapana achazenge ave kutarisa nezvechirongwa ichi kana IMF ikasabatsira nekuti munhu wese anenge ave kuita zvesarudzo. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaSamson Mukanduri, vatiwo IMF inofanira kudzora moyo kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro sezviri kuitawo dzimwe nyika dzinotambura. Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Vatiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hushamwari hwayo nenyika dzayakakwereta mari vachiti nyika idzi inhengo dzeIMF uyewo ndidzo dzinotora danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. Vatiwo nyaya iripo haisi nyaya yechikwereti chete asi kuti dzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise nyaya dzekutorwa kweminda sezvayakatsiidza kuti ichaita mubumbiro remitemo yenyika Vanoti havawoni chingatadzise kuti Zimbabwe ibatsirwe neIMF, World Bank nemamwe masangano kana izvi zvese zvikange zvaitwa. VaMasimba Manyanya avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari vanoti nhengo dzeparamende dzine kodzero yekutsutsumwa neIMF sezvo pasina zvavari kuona zviri kuitika pahupfumi kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo hapana ruzivo rwakanyanya pamusoro pechirongwa ichi uye chinodiwa chete inyaya yekuti nyika igadzirise zvinhu zvayo kuti isapedzesera yave kuenda kumasangano akaita seIMF kuti iwane rubatsiro. Zimbabwe ichekwereti chinodarika mabhiryoni masere kumasangano akaita seIMF, World Bank nedzimwe nyika izvo zvave kuitadzisa kuwana rubatsiro rwemari zvinova zvaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husasimuke. VaFanizza nechikwati chavo vari kuongorora chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program pamwe nekunzwa pfungwa dzehurumende, vemabhizimisi nemasangano akasiyana siyana uye vachandotura gwaro ravo kubhodhi yeIMF muna Kubvumbi apo pachatorwa danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzira VaMugabe Kuvaka Hukama Hwakanaka neAmerica
text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika nevanhuwo zvavo vanoti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanofanira kuregedza nyaya yavo yekushoropodza nyika dzakaita seAmerica nekuda kwezvirango zvehupfumi zvavakatemerwa nenyika idzi vachiti VaMugabe vanofanira kuita zvinodiwa kugadzirisa hukama hwavo nenyika idzi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika nevanhuwo zvavo vanoti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanofanira kuregedza nyaya yavo yekushoropodza nyika dzakaita seAmerica nekuda kwezvirango zvehupfumi zvavakatemerwa nenyika idzi vachiti VaMugabe vanofanira kuita zvinodiwa kugadzirisa hukama hwavo nenyika idzi. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko aVa Mugabe nezuro pamusangano wavakaita nechikwata cheCongress chekuAmerica chiri kushanya munyika. Chikwata ichi, icho chiri kutungamirirwa naSeneta Jeff Flake vekuArizona, chakasangana naVaMugabe chikatanga kuudzwa nezvezvirango kunyange hazvo chiri kuda kuziva maererano nemachengeterwo ari kuitwa mhuka dzemusangno nezviwanikwa uye kuti nyika mbiri idzi dzingadyidzane sei munyaya idzi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaFortune Gwaze, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanira kugadzirisa hukama hwavo neAmerica kuti nyika iwane rubatsiro munyaya dzekuchengetedza mhuka. Vanoti kana izvi zvikaitika zvinosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. VaGwaze vanoti kupopota kwaVaMugabe hakuvashamise nekuti ndozvanogara vachiita kubva pavatemerwa zvirango izvi makore anodarika gumi nemashanu apfuura. VaCassim John, avo vanonyorawo nhau dzekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka nezviwanikwa, vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise hukama nenyika dzepasi rese kuti ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro rwekuchengetedza mhuka. Vanoti zviri kuitika kuzvimbo dzakaita seHwange National Park zvinoratidza kuti nyika inoda mari yakawanda yekurwisana nevanovhima mhuka zviri kunze kwemutemo. Chikwata chekuAmerica chakasangana naVaMugabe apo sangano reEuropean Union raizivisa kuti rainge rawedzera negore zvirango zvarakatemerwa VaMugabe nemudzimai wavo. VaMlondolozi Ndhlovu vanoti kunyange hazvo izvi zviri izvo zvimwe zvinotsamwisa VaMugabe, vanofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nekugarisana nevanhu vemunyika kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. VaGwaze vanotiwo kuwedzerwa negore kwezvirango zvaVaMugabe hakuna kuvashamisa sezvo pasina zvanyanosanduka pamaitiro avo. Kunze kwekusangana naVaMugabe, chikwata cheCongress yekuAmerica chaitawo musangano negurukota rezvekuchengetwa kwemhuka dzesangano pamwe nemasangano ezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa. Chikwata ichi chakashanyirawo Mozambique, Botswana neNamibia nechinangwa chekuda kuona kuti America ingabatsire sei pakuchengetedzwa kwemhuka. No media source currently available

headline: VaMasaraure Vanoti Havasi Kuzorega Kurwira Mihoro Yakakwana yeVarairidzi
text: Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vatanhatu pakati pehusiku, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa, uye vakatorerwa mbatya dzavainge vakapfeka. VaMasaraure vanoti vakakuvadzwa mumusoro, kumusana, maoko nemakumbo, vachiti vamwe vevanhu vakavapamba ndevamwe vechikwata chakambovapamba muna Ndira gore rino, vachiti izvi hazvisi kuzovadzorerwa sure mukurwira kodzero dzevarairiridzi. VaMasaraure vanoti hurumende yave kutora vanorwira kodzero dzevashandi sevavengi vachiti hapana anoda kupidigura hurumende asi kuti vanhu vanoda kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio7 kuti vaudzwa navana chiremba kuti vambozorora kuenda kubasa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwava Masaraure sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voshorwa neMashoko Avo eKushora United Nations
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kushorwa zvakanyanya nevanhu vakawanda munyika nemashoko avo nemusi weMugovera ekuti nyika dzemuAfrica neAsia dzakagadzirira kubuda mugungano reUnited Nations kana Security Council isina kuvandudzwa. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya panhandare yendege yeHarare International mushure mekudzoka kumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly kana kuti UNGA. Security Council ine nhengo shanu dzinoti, Britain, France, China, America neRussia dzine masimba akawanda kudarika dzimwe nyika dzose. Vanopikisa vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti VaMugabe vanoda kuti UN ivandudzwe ivo vachitonga nedemo. Vatiwo United Nations ndiyo iri kuraramisa vana veZimbabwe vari kuziya nenzara sezvo hurumende yaVaMugabe yakundikana kuita zvayakavhoterwa. Gungano reUnited Nations riri kubatsirawo Zimbabwe munyaya dzezvehutano. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika nezvimwe zvakabva kumusha zvakabatana mukuratidzira pamuzinda weUnited Nations svondo rapfura panguva iyo VaMugabe vaitaura kumusangano weUNGA uyu. Mumwe waavo vange vari pakuratidzira uku ndi Dr Patson Dzamara avo vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vange vachiratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nehutongo hwaVaMugabe. VaMugabe vakaudza catsigiri vavo kuti havanawo kufara nekuratidzira uku vachiti kunonyadzisa nyika. Asi VaDzamara vanoti havaone chakaipa pakuratidzira kwavakaita. "Zvinokatyamadza kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vangatuke vana vavo vari kuyedza kuzeya navo zvinetsva zvenyika asi vachiwana nguva yekusangana nekukurukura ne nhengo dze December 12th Movement idzo dzisina kana chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chari mavari," Vanodar VaDzamara. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Tiri kushamiswa kuti vanhu ava vaipihwa mukana wekupinda mumuzinda wenyika yedu uri muNew York asi zvizvarwa zvenyika sesu zvisinga cheukwe," Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, Studio 7 yabatawo nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Makonde, VaKindness Paradza avo vashora vainge vachiratidzira ava. "Tinoshamiswa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingano ratidzira kuNew York uko zvichitadza kutsvaga nzira dzekuona mutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe kumusha kuti vakwanise kuzeya nhunha dzavo pasina bopoto ne mhirizhonga," VaParadza vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoshora Kushandiswa KwePfuti Pakumisa Kuratidzira
text: Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, ZADHR, rashora zvikuru hurumende mukushandiswa kwemabara nemapurisa nemauto mukuedza kumisa vanhu vari kuratidzira. Vanhu muHarare, Epworth, Chitungwiza nedzimwe nzvimbo dzakapoteredza Harare neBulawayo vavhara migwagwa vachipisa matayi emota vachiratidza kutsutsumwa kwavo nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mafuta emotikari mazuva maviri apfuura. Mutauriri ZADHR, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanachiremba vesangano ravo riri kurapa vanhu vazhinji vakuvadzwa mukuratidzira uku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pane vakuvara, pane vamwe gumi nevatatu vanyanya kukuvadzwa kupfuura vamwe uye vari kutovhiyiwa muzvipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vatauriri vemapurisa nemauto kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMagaya Vokonzera Mutauro muNyika neKuti Vawana Mushonga weHIV
text: Muporofita Walter Magaya vechicgi yeProphetic Healing Deliverance kana kuti PHD vakonzera mutauro munyika nezuro mushure mekunge vati ivo nevamwe vavari kushanda kubva kuIndia vachiti vawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheHIV. Aka hakasi kekutanga VaMagaya vachitaura mashoko akadai sezvo muna 2016 vakambotaura kwaMutare kuti mweya mutsvene kuburikidza nemavari unokwanisa kurapa chirwere ichi. Vakambotiwo vanorapa chirwere chegomarara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMagaya kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi vakataura mashoko aya panhepfenyuro yavo yeYadar TV vachiti pane muti wavakawana unosanganiswa nemumwe unowanikwa kuMozambique. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vati vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachinwa mishonga yavo yemaARV kwete kurega vachiti kwaita mushonga unorapa chirwere ichi kusvika vanachiremba vaita ongororo izere.

headline: Dare reConCourt Rinorasa Chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe
text: Dare repamusoro-soro reConstitutional Court rarasa chikumbiro chesangano reMisa Zimbabwe chekuti vatori venhau vapihwe mukana wekutora mifananidzo yemavhidhiyo pachange pachinzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vari kuda kuti zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru zvisendekwe parutivi, vachiti ivo ndivi vakakunda musarudzo iyi, kwete zvakataurwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, zvekuti mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vakakunda. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro ichi mudare, gweta reMisa Zimbabwe, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vatori venhau vanobva kumakambani akasiyana-siyana vanofanirwa kubvumidzwa kutora mifanananidzo yemavhidhiyo mudare vagoibuditsa pamadandemutande nepazvivhitivhiti panguva imwecheteyo inenge ichiitika zvinhu kwete kuti komisheni inoona nezvematare yeJudical Services Commission ibvumidze kambani yeZBC yoga kuita izvi. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo kambani yeZBC haifanirwe kuva iyo yoga inobvumidzwa kutora mifananidzo mudare mangwana sezvo mamwe makambani enhau akazvimrira akangofananawo neZBC ane marezenesi ekutepfenyura. Vati zvakaitwa neJudicial Services Commission zvekupa ZBC chete mvumo yekutepfenyura zvichange zvichiitika mudare zvinoita sekuti kambani yeZBC yakakosha kupfuura mamwe makambani enhau uye vati zvichadhurira mamwe makambani enhau ari kuda kutepfenyura kunzwikwa kwenyaya ichange iri mudare mangwana sezvo kambani yeZBC yati ichange ichibhadharisa mari inoita zviuru gumi nezvitatu zvemadhora pazuva kumakambani achada kushandisa mifananidzo ichange ichitorwa nekambani iyi mudare mangwana. Amai Mtetwa vaenderera mberi vachiti ZBC haibatike kune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika uye ruzhinji rwevanhu rwave kukwanisa kuona zvinenge zvichiitika munyika kubudikidza nekutepfenyurwa kunoitwa nevanoshandisa mbozhanhare vachiisa pamadandemutande panguva inenge ichiitika zvinhu. Vatiwo zvakanaka kuti mamwe makambani akazvimirira abvumidzwe kutepfenyura ari padare riri kunzwikwa nyaya iyi mangwana sezvo achitepfenyurira vanhu vari muZimbabwe pamwe nevari kunze kwenyika vari kuda kuziva zvichange zvichiitika panyaya iyi mangwana. Asi gweta ranga rakamirira VaMnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vati Misa Zimbabwe haina nhepfenyuro yainotepfenyura zvingapa kuti inzwikwe. Gweta ranga rakamirira Judicial Services Commission, VaAddington Chinake, vatiwo mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Busani Bafana, uyo anga achigitsigira chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe ichi achiti anodawo kutora mifananidzo mudare, haana rezenesi rekutepfenyura nokudaro nyaya yake haina kusimba. Magweta anga akamirira ZBC panyaya iyi atiwo ZBC inokwanisa kupa makambani ose mifananidzo yaanoda nemhando yaanenge achida zvisinei nekuti ndeemuno kana kuti ndeekunze sezvo achiti ZBC yave nemichina yechimanjemanje inokwanisa kuita izvi. Mukuru wevatongi munyika, VaLuke Malaba, avo vanzwa nyaya iyi, varasa chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe vachiti Misa Zimbabwe naBafana havana marezenesi ekutepfenyura saka nokudaro havana chavangarwira panyaya iyi. VaChinyoka, vati vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaChinyoka vati zvasvitswa kudare neMisa Zimbabwe hazvina musoro. Zvichakadai, kambani yeZBC yaswera ichiita gadziriro dzekuti igotepfenyura zvinenge zvichiitika mudare mangwana pachanzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare naVaChamisa yekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi sezvo vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro-soro naVaMnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaMnangagwa panyaya iyi, VaPaul Mangwana, vati vagadzirira zvizere kunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi vachiti vane tarisiro yekukunda panyaya iyi. VaJacob Mafume, vanove gweta riri kumirira mumwe wevakakwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNoah Manyika, avo vari kutsigira chikumbiro chaVaChamisa chekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti nyaya yavo iri pachena semhanza zvekuti dare harifanire kutora nguva richinzwa nyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, munyori muJudicial Services Commission, VaWalter Chikwanha, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vatongi vedare reConstitutional Court vachanzwa nyaya iyi neChitatu vachaita basa ravo nemazvo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Magweta aVaChamisa neaVaMnangagwa achange achisvitsa nyaya dzavo zviri pamutemo, ukuwo vatongi vedare iri vachivabvunzurudza. Dare iri rinofanirwa kupa mutongo waro mukati memazuva gumi nemana kubva musi waziviswa nyika nezvesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Matambudziko eMari Akatarisana neChitungwiza Oramba Kupera?
text: Matambudziko emari akatarisana nekanzuru yeChitungwiza anonzi ari kure nekupera kunyange hazvo kanzuru iyi yakamisa vamwe vashandi mabasa. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukanzuru iyi vanoti iri kunetsekana zvakare kuti ibhadhare vamwe vashandi vayakamisa mabasa pamwe nevakaenda pamudyandigere mari dzavo nezvimwe. Vaive mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza, VaEphraim Katsina, avo vakambomiswa basa pari zvino vachipomerwa mhosva yekufurira vamwe vashandi kupinda mukuramwa mabasa, vanoti pane vamwe vashandi vakamiswa mabasa mugore ra2012 vasati vapiwa mari dzavo. VaKatsina vanoti mukutanga kwegore rino kanzuru yakamisa zvakare vamwe vashandi vanodarika zana mabasa asi vasere chete ndivo vati vapiwa dzimwe dzemari dzavo kusvika pari nhasi. VaKatsina vanoti ndivo vari kumirira vashandi vose vari kumiswa mabasa ava munhaurirano dzavari kuita nekanzuru. Meya weChitungwiza, VaPhilip Mutoti, svondo rapera vakazivisa kuti kanzuru yavo ine hurongwa hwekumisa zvakare vamwe vashandi vanoda kusvika kumazana matanhatu mabasa sezvo isiri kukwanisa kuunganidza mari inokwana kuvabhadhara. VaMutoti vakati dambudziko ndere kuti vagari havasi kukwanisa kubhadharawo mitero yavo paine nguva, izvo zviri kuita kuti kanzuru yavo ikundikane kuunganidza mari inoikwanira. Studio 7 yaedza kubata VaMutoti asi nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kupota Ichizivisa Vanhu Nezve Vanofa Kana Kurwara Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti hurumende inofanira kupota ichiburitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanenge varwara kana kufa mushure mekubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati izvi zvinopa vanhu chivimbo chekuti vabayiwe nhomba vaine ruzivo rwakakwana nezvavanofanira kutarisira. No media source currently available Izvi zvinotevera mashoko eMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe kubepanhau reSunday Mail ekuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu vakarwa mushure mekubayiwa nhomba uye vamwe vana vakafa. Pane vakafa ava, vanhu vaviri vanonzi vainge vaine zvimwe zvirwere asi chakauraya vamwe vaviri chichiri kuongororwa. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vati havo vanhu vakawanda vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 havana kubayiwa nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Kutadza Kutonga kwaVaMnangagwa Ndiko Kuri Kuvhiringa Hupfumi hweZimbabwe, Kwete Zvirango
text: America inoti zvirango zvayakatemera vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe hazvisirizvo zviri kukonzera kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika ichiti hurumende yeZimbabwe ndiyo iri kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro rakaburitswa nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, avo vakati zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nehurumende yeAmerica pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa raramo yeveruzhinji munyika. Mumiriri weAmerica kusangano reUnited Nations, Ambassador Linda Thomas Greenfield, vaudza vatori venhau nhasi vari kuNew York kuti kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka kwehurumende yeZimbabwe ndiko kuri kukonzera kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika kwete zvirango zvakaiswa nehurumende yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wesangano reEuropean Union, VaTimo Olkonnen, kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya yezvirango iyi sezvo pataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vapindura mibunzo yavati tivatumire. Asi EU yakataura munguva pfupi yadarika kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika isati yabvisa zvirango. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakaburitsa mashoko padandemutande rawo reTwitter mazuva mashomanana adarika uchiti kutengesera pakati peBritain neZimbabwe kuri kufamba zvakanaka zvisinei nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vari muZanu PF. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati togozovafonera sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana nemusangano weZanu PF wepagore uri kuitirwa kuBindura. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvirango zviri kuonesa pfumvu munhu wese munyika zvisinei nekuti munhu anotsigira baro ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. VaBimha vati Zimbabwe iri kuoneswa ndondo nenyika dzekumavirira nepamusana pekutorwa kwakaitwa minda kubva kuvarimi vechichena ichigoverwa kuvanhu vatema. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzevamatongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati zvirango zviripo hazvisi zvirango zvehupfumi ndokusaka Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kutengeserana nenyika dzacho dzakaisa zvirango izvi uye vati havaone nyika idzi dzichibvisa zvirango izvi kana Zimbabwe isina kugadzirisa zvikonzero zvakaita kuti zvirango izvi zviiswe kubva pakutanga. Kunyange gwaro raAmai Douhan rakakurudzira kuti America irege kushandisa mutemo weZidera kuti irambe yakaisa zvirango izvi vachiti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo sezvo zvisina kubvumidzwa neUnited Nations Security Council, Amai Greenfield vati hurumende yavo haisi kuzodyira huroyi mukunyara vachiti hurumende yavo icharambawo yakatsika madziro panyaya yekuti kodzero dzevanhu dzicherechedzwe muZimbabwe. Amai Douhan, avo vakanga vari munyika kwemazuva gumi adarika vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji zvakadii munyika, vakati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo pamusana pezvirango izvi. Amai Douhan vakakurudzira Zimbabwe kuti iite nhaurirano dzechokwadi nenyika dzakatemera zvirango nechinangwa chekuti zvirango izvi zvigobviswa vakatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe pachayo inofanira kuona kuti munyika maitwa nhaurirano dzemandorokwati munyika pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzakaisa zvirango izvi. Nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinosanganisira America, Australia, Britain, Canada, Switzerland pamwe nesangano renyika dziri mugungano reEuropean Union. Amai Douhan vakatarisirwa kusvitsa gwaro rezvavakawana muongororo yavo kumusangano weUnited Nations Human Rights Council uchaitwa muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: ‘NETBALL IRI MUMHURI’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems, Ursula Ndlovu (25), anoti amai vake ndivo vakamumanikidza kuti atambe mutambo uyu sezvo iye aive nerudo rwemujaho wekumhanya.   Vazhinji vanoziva Ursula – uyo anotambira chikwata cheHarare City Queens zvakare, ari mumwe weshasha dzemaGems dzakanetsa kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika.   Mutambi uyu ange ave nemakore achinetsa mumutambo uyu izvo zvakambomuona achihwina mibairo inosanganisira Moment of the Match mune mumwe mutambo waakanotamba kuSouth Africa.   Ursula anoti achikura akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinosanganisira Nkulumane Primary neMsiteli High School, kuBulawayo uye aikwikwidza mumujaho wekumhanya.   Anoti mugore ra2013 ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball akurudzirwa namai vake – Norah Ndlovu – avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   “Ini mwoyo wangu waive pamujaho wekumhanya, ndizvo ndaida nekuti ndaive ndiri pfuti pakutiza. Asi, amai vangu ndivo vakati ndisiye zvekumhanya nditange kutamba netball.   “Saka mugore ra2013 ndipo ndakatanga kutamba ndikapinda muchikwata chemupurovhinzi tikanokwikwidza kumakwishu emaYouths Games, kubva ipapo handina kuzobvira ndatarira shure.   “Netball ndiyo yave hupenyu hwangu uye yandiendesa kune dzimwe nyika dzandaisafungira kuti ndichazoenda muhupenyu hwangu,” anodaro Ursula.   Anoti amai vake vakatombonetsa vachitambawo netball muchikwata chenyika kare chisati chave kuzivikanwa semaGems uye vairaidzwa naLedwin Dondo uyo anove ave kurairidzawo Ursula zvakare.   Ursula anoti anopa kutenda kuna amai vake vakaita kuti atambe netball sezvo yave kumupa pundutso muhupenyu hwake.   “Amai vangu iGaffa chairo, vaive shasha panetball uye ndivo vakaita kuti ndive nerudo nemutambo uyu. Asi chinondifadza hangu parizvino ndechekuti amai vangu vakarairidzwa naLedwin Dondo vari kuchikwata chenyika uye nhasi Dondo ndiye ave murairidzi wangu.   “Kashoma kuzviona zvichiitika izvozvo kumitambo yakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoenderera achiti, “Nhasi netball yandipa hupenyu hwandaisambofungira. Iye zvino ndave kukwanisa kuchengeta mhuri yekwandinobva kusanganisira ambuya vangu vakandichengeta Gogo Matshabalala, handidi navo. Amai pavaienda kunotamba netball, gogo ndivo vaisara neni vachindichengeta saka nhasi yave nguva yanguwo yekuvachengeta.   “Izvezvi pandinoenda kunze kwenyika kunotamba netball mwanasikana wanguwo ndinomuendesa kwagogo vangu kumusha vanosara naye vachimuchengeta sekundichengeta kwavaiita ini,” anodaro Ursula.   Mutambi uyu akwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvinosanganisira Beta Queens, Connemara neHarare Queens uye akatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2017.   Ursula anoti shuviro yake anoda kuzonotambira zvikwata zvekunze kwenyika dzakaita seAustralia, England neNew Zealand uko kunotambwa netball yepamusoro.

headline: Arsenal yopfeka Adidas
text: kupfeka majezi anogadzirwa neAdidas kutanga gore ra2019 ichibva kune ePuma ayo yange ichipfeka bvira makore adarika.   Chibvumirano nePuma change chichiona chikwata ichi chichipihwa mari inosvika 30 miriyoni paunzi pagore kwemakore mashanu.   Chiri kupera gore rinotevera, uye Arsenal ichaona ichiwedzera mari iyi nekutanga kupfeka Adidas. Dhiri itsva iri richaona chikwata ichi chichipihwa 60 miriyoni paunzi pagore kwemakore mashanu anotevera.   Mari iyi ichabatsira murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Unai Emery – gore rinotevera pakuzotenga vatambi vatsva.   Akamanikidzwa kushanda nemari shoma inovsika 70 miriyoni paunzi zvichitevera kutsiva kwaakaita Arsene Wenger.   Arsenal iri kuzama kushanda kuti igadzirise remangwana raAaron Ramsey (27).   Mutambi uyu kondirakiti yake inopera pakupera kwemwaka uno uye anogona kuenda mahara gore rinotevera.   Chelsea iri kuda kutenga Ramsey uye inogona kubhadhara mari inosvika 30 miriyoni yekuunza chizvarwa chekuWales ichi kuchikwata ichi.   Arsenal inogona kutambira mari iyi sezvayakaita mugore ra2012 apo yakatengesa Robin van Persie kuManchester United apo akange aramba kusaina kondirakiti itsva ndokuetengeswa ne22.5 miriyoni paunzi. — SportsMail Football

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kutevedzera Mitemo Yakaturwa naVaChiwenga yeKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika dzakapinda muzuva repiri neChipiri dzichitevera mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende kuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi kune mamwe madhorobha akaita seKwekwe, Kariba neKaroi, mitemo iriko yakati omei sezvo kuri kunzi kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mitemo mitsva inobata mamwe matunhu ose munyika yakaziviswa kuvatori venhau nemusi weMugovera kuti vave kusimbaradza mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mitemo yehurumende yekuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 cheCovid-19 iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana munyika. Kunzvimbo dzakaita seKaroi mutauriri wemapurisa Chief Superintendent Helena Mahonde vaudza bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe.com kuti vamwe vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vave kunonwira doro kudzimba vakawanda mumashabhini. Superintendent Mahonde vanoti vanhu vakawanda vakasungwa nekutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyath vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinonetsa parizvino kuti vanyatsoziva kuti vanhu vari kutevedzera here kana kuti kwete mitemo mitsva yakaturwa nehurumende vachiti zvinotoda svondo rose. Asi mapurisa akazivisa neMuvhuro kuti achange achifamba famba kuona kuti vanhu havasi kuungana vakawanda. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 neMuvhuro neChipiri inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vachiri kuramba vakaungana zvikuru panzvimbo dzinokwirirwa mabhazi eZUPCO sezvo achiri mashoma. Mutungamiri wesangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati avo vari kuKwekwe vatendawo muhurukuro neStudio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vati vemabhazi havasi kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vatakure vanhu vashoma. KuKariba zvinhu hazvinawo kumira zvakanaka sezvo kirinika yeNyamhunga yakambovharwa kuti ifiritwe mushonga mushure mekunge mumwe anorapa vanhu abatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri wesangano reKariba Urban Residents Association VaSamson Coffee vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kutevedzera mitemo yeCovid-19 kuri kunetsa mudhorobha iri. KuMasvingo hurumende yakazivisa kuti yange isisatendere vanhu kupinda kana kubuda paMorgenster Teachers College pane vari kudzidzira hurairidzi makumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa vakaita saAmai Amber Zhou vemuHarare vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutya kuti vachamanikidzwa kugara kumba kana vanhu vakawanda vakaramba vachibatwa nechirwere ichi. Vachitaurawo neStudio 7 mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaDoubt Phiri vachemachema nekudzokawo zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti zvichakonzera kuti vanhu vatadze zvakare kushandira mhuri dzavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Doctor Tinashe Manzungu vatiwo chirwere cheCovid -19 chiri kuramba chichiomesera vemabhizimisi zvakanyanya. Asiwo vatenda kuti zvakatarwa negurukota rezvehutano vhiki rapera hazvina kunyanyoomera vemabhizimusi sezvo pachine mukana wekuti mabhizimusi anoramba akavhurwa. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association Dr Johannes Marisa vanoti matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekurambidza zvinhu zvakadai semagungano akanaka zvikuru vachiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa huri kuramba huchiwedzera. VaMarisa vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende idzivirire kupararira kwechirwere ichi vakati matanho akatorwa aya anodzivirira ndufu nehurwere hwakanyanya. Pamusoro pekurambidza magungano ese kusara kwerufu panofanira kunge paine vanhu makumi matatu, VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichawedzera kuongororwa kwehutachiona hweCovid-19 kuteverera vavanenge vasangana navo. Vanotengesa zvinhu pamisika yefodya vakanzi vambomira kuita izv. Vose vanopinda nepamiganhu yenyika vachange vachiongororwa zvikuru vanenge vachibva kunyika dzorura chirwere ichi dzakaita seIndia neBrazil.

headline: Tichapedzerana neAlgeria: Darikwa
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neNottingham Forest yekuEngland – Tendayi Darikwa – anoti sechikwata, havasi kutya Algeria iyo yavachasangana nayo mumitambo miviri yekurwira tikiti rekuenda ku2021 Africa Cup of Nations.   MaWarriors nemaDesert Foxes eAlgeria zviri kubandana mumitambo miviri – wekutanga wacho uriko nhasi manheri kuAlgeria kozoti wechipiri uchatambirwa muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weMuvhuro.   MaWarriors ari kufanirwa kuwana zvibodzwa zvakawanda kubva mumitambo miviri iyi kana achida kuzobudiria kuenda kumakwikwi e2021 AFCON kuCameroon.   Achitaura neKwayedza vatarisana nemutambo wekutanga, Darikwa anoti vanozviziva kuti Algeria ndiyo shasha yemuAfrica, asi havasi kuitya nekuti ivo vakagadzirira.   “Isu tiri kuzvitemba, tine vatambi vepamusoro vanogona uye tinoziva kuti tichakonzeresa kuno.   “Chinangwa chedu kuti tibve kuAlgeria tiine mapoinzi matatu uye kana tikakundikana tidzoke taita mangange hedu tozopedzisa basa tauya kumusha.   “Tinoziva kuti zvichange zvisiri nyore hazvo asi isu ticharwa,” anodaro Darikwa.   Anoti kutamba achimirira nyika yake zvine chiremerera.   “Mitambo yenyika iyi yakakosha chaizvo uye ine chiremerera chikuru. Saka isu tinoikoshesa,” anodaro Darikwa.   Zimbabwe neAlgeria zvose zviri muGroup H rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Botswana neZambia.   Pari zvino maWarriors atamba mitambo miviri izvo zvaona achiita mangange 0-0 neBotswana mumutambo wakatambirwa muno ndokuzokunda Zambia 2-1 kuZambia.

headline: Mamwe Masangano eVarairidzi Anonyorera Mutungamiri weNyika Tsamba Achisvitsa Zvichemo zveVarairidzi
text: Nhengo dzerimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, dzapinda mumigwagwa dzichiratidzira pamwe nekusiya gwaro renyunyuto kumahofisi akasiyanasiyana richikurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti gwaro iri, iro ranyorerwa kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, rasiiwa muzvikoro, kubazi redzidzo, kubazi revashandi nemabasa, pamwe nekumahofisi emutungamiri wenyika, uye rine zvinyunyuto zvitatu zvanoda kuti zvikasike kugadziriswa nehurumende. VaMasaraure vanoti zvichemo zvavo zviri pamusoro pemihoro yavo iyo vanoda kuti idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, kuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwevarairidzi nevadzidzi muzvikoro kubva kuCovid-19, uyewo kuti hurumende ibatsire vana vasiri kukwanisa kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kuburikidza nekuvaisa muchirongwa che Basic Education Assistance Module, BEAM. Izvi zviri kuitikawo panguva iyo masangano evarairidzi manomwe ari pasi pemubatanidzwa we Federation of Zimbabwe Education Unions (FOZEU) anyorawo gwaro kuna VaMnangagwa achiti ari kushushikana nekuparara kwaita zvinhu muzvikoro, uye kwaanoti kushaya han;ya kwehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yevarairidzi. VaMasaraure vanoti kana hurumende yakakundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo vacharambawo vachingoratidzira. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima kuti tinzwewo divi ravo. Asi neSvondo VaMavima vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo zvemihoro, vachiti iri kuronga kuvapa zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvishanu kubva muzana kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Chikumi. Vamiriri vevashandi vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions svondo rapera vakaramba kutambira zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana zvakanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti varairidzi havafanirwe zvavo kutya kudzokera kumabasa nekuti bazi ravo rakaisa hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCovid-19 muzvikoro. VaNdoro vanotiwo hurumende yagara ichibatsira vana vanotambura kuburikidza nehomwe yeBEAM saka hazvisi zvinhu zvingatadzisa varairidzi kudzokera kumabasa sezvo paine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanoshaya nechakare. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inobatana neDzimwe Nyika Mukucherechedza ‘World Aids Day’
text: Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekukurudzira vanhu kuti vadzivirire kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kana kuti World AIDS Day. United Nations yakatara musi 1 Zvita gore rega rega semusi wekucherechedza zuva iri. Dingindira reWorld Aids Day gore rinoti “Ending the HIV/AIDS Epidemic: Resilience and Impact”. Vachitaura panhepfenyuro yeZBC neMuvhuro manheru, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati gore rino, kucherechedzwa kwe zuva iri kunokosha nekuti nyika dzepasi pose dzakatarisana nechirwere che Covid-19. VaMnangagwa vakati hazvigoni kuti Zimbabwe inangane nekurwisa AIDS/HIV chete isingatarisi mamiriro akaita zvipatara nezvose zvinoshandiswa mukuunza hutano kuvanhu. Vakati hurumende yavo iri kugadzirisa mamiriro ezvehutano munyika kuti ikwanise kubatsira vanhu nekukurumidza. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kuti hurumende ichabudirira muchirongwa che 90/90/90 sezvo Zimbabwe ichitove mberi muzvizhinji zvezvinangwa izvi. Zvinangwa izvi ndezvekuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vazive vavhenekwe uye kana vavhenekwa vapinde muchirongwa chekupihwa mapiritsi. Zuva reWorld AIDS Day rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988. Rinopa mukana kumasangano nevanhu pasi pose kuti vabatane mukurwisa mukondombera uyu, uye kukurudzira ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere ichi, pamwe chete nekubvisa pfungwa yekusarudza vanenge vabatwa nacho. Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoshanda mudunhu reNorth Carolina, muAmerica, vaudza Studio 7 kuti senyika, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuona kuti chirwere che Covid-19 hachikanganisi basa riri kuitwa mukurwisa HIV/AIDS.  No media source currently available

headline: ARTUZ Inoudza Mapurisa neMasoja Kuti Iri Kuvarwiravo paNyaya dzeMari
text: angano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ, rinoti masoja nemapurisa vanoshandiravo hurumende naizvozvo riri kuvakurudzira kuti vasarove vanhu kana kuvhiringa varairidzi vanenge vachiratidzira nezvenyaya dzemihoro. Mutungamiriri we ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi vari kurwira mihoro yevanhu vese vanoshandira hurumende, kwete varairidzi chete saka vari kukurudzira kuti masoja nemapurisa kuti vafunge zvakadzama kana vatumwa kunomisa kuratidzira kwavanenge vachiita. VaMasaraure vati sangano ravo riri kuronga zvekuratidzira zvine mutsindo rakabatana nemamwe masangano. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri kana gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaCain Mathema sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Vashandi vehurumende vakawanda kusanganisira varairidzi nemadhokotera vave nenguva yakareba vachiratidzira nenyaya yemihoro. Hurumende inoti vashandi ava vanofanira kusimbisa nhaurirano kwete kuratidzira. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza Yozivisa Vane Zvivakwa Zvisiri Pamutemo Kuti Vaputse Zvivakwa Izvi
text: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza nhasi yapa vese vakavaka zvisiri pamutemo panzvimbo yemabhizimisi yeTown Centre kuti vaputse zvivakwa zvavo mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere ari kutevera ichiti kana vakasaita izvi, kanzuru ichaputsa zvivakwa izvi yega. Muchiviso kuvagari, kanzuru yeChitungwiza yati vakavaka vasina mvumo yekanzuru vanofanira kuputsa zvivakwa izvi zvisinei kuti ndivo varidzi venzvimbo here kana kuti kwete. Kanzuru inoti ichashandisa mutemo weRegional, Town and Country Planning Act, zvikamu 32 ne35 kuputsa zvivakwa izvi. Mutaururi wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, VaLovemore Meya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru inotarisira kuvandudza nzvimbo yeTown Centre ndosaka vari kubvisa vanhu vakavaka zvisiri pamutemo. VaMeya vatiwo vamwe vevanhu vari kuvakava zvisina mvumo vanhu vakatopihwa masitendi asi vari kungotadza kutevedza mutemo. Vati zvivakwa zvichaputswa zvinosanganisira zvitoro, maDurawall pamwe nezvimwe. Asi mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Diana Kuvheya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru haina mvumo zvekuti magweta avo eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights atonyorera kukanzuru pamusoro penyaya iyi. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure, vashoropodza hurongwa hwekanzuru yeChitungwiza vachiti kanzuru haifaniri kurega vanhu vachivaka pese pese yozomirira kuputsa chete. Vati kanzuru inofanira kugara pasi nevagari vogadzirisa nyaya iyi kwete kuputsa zvivakwa zvavo. Gore rino kanzuru yeChitungwiza yainge yaronga kuputsa dzimba dzese nemisika zvakavakwa zvisiri pamutemo asi ikamiswa kuita izvi nematare edzimhosva ayo akati inofanira kutanga yapa vanhu ava pekugara pamwe nepekutengesera. Tabvunza VaMeya kuti chirongwa chavo hachisi kuzomiswa sezvakaitwa zvimwe here vakati vanopihwa simba nemutemo weRegional, Town and Country Planning Act. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kubatika. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Zimbabwe inofanira Kusunga Dzisimbe neKubhadhara Zvikweti Kuti Igadzirise Hupfumi
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, rinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuzvipira kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi kana ichida kubuda mumadhaka mairi. IMF inoti nyika inofanira kurwisa huori, kusimbisa dhora remunyika uye kuva nemazano ekuti ingabhadhare sei chikwereti chayo chinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$10 billion kune vekunze chete. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, IMF inotiwo Zimbawe inofanira kuvawo nemazano anokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze uye kugadzirisa nyaya dzemagariro evanhu nehutano munguva ino yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti Zimbabwe iri mugwara zvisinei nezviri kutaurwa neIMF. Vati izvi zviri kuonekwa kuburikidzwa nekuwanikwa kwemari yemunyika mumabhanga, musika wekutenga nekutengserana mari yekunze kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kugadzirwa kwezvivakwa nezvimwe. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hauchadi vekunze vakawanda sezvo vanhu munyika vachirarama nekuzviitira mabasa avo emaoko anongoda kusimudzirwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvepfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanotiwo IMF yarova nemonemo vachitiwo zviri kutaurwa nebhanga iri ndizvo zvagara zvichitaurwa nevana veZimbabwe kuti huori hunofanira kumiswa uye hurumende haifanire kuramba ichikwereta mari ichikundikana kubhadhara. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti kuWorld Bank, Paris Club neAfrican Development Bank izvo iri kutatarika kubhadhara zvopa kuti itadze kuwana zvimwe zvikereti. Zvikwereti izvi zviri kupa kuti nyika itadze kukwereteswa imwe mari. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mukuru wesangano reCEO Africa Roundtable, VaOswill Binha, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kwete kuda kuita kunge chitsuwa. Vatiwo vemabhizimisi vakawanda vekunze vanoteerera zvinotaurwa neIMF nekudaro hurumende haifanire kungoisa zvimiti munzeve ichiita zano ndega. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanotiwo vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,4%. Asi IMF inoti inotarisira kuti hukwire nezvikamu zvinoti darikei zvitatu zvishoma kubva muzana kana kuti 3,1%. Mwedzi unouya, IMF inoti iri kuita musangano padandemutande neZimbabwe mukuyedza kuumba hwaro hwekuti patangwe chimwe chirongwa chekubatsira Zimbabwe neruzivo kana kuti Staff Monitored Programme. Chirongwa chakadai chakaitwa kusvika muna Kukadzi gore rapera asi IMF yakati Zimbabwe yainge yatora gwara risiri iro. No media source currently available

headline: Chibuku Super Cup yadzoka
text: PREMIER Soccer League (PSL) razivisa nezvekudzoka kwemitambo yeChibuku Super Cup iyo ichasimudzira nemusi weChitatu svondo rinouya apo zvikwata zvose zviri mumapoka zvichabandana mumitambo yekurwira mukombe uyu.   Mitambo iyi ichatanga musi weChitatu 29 Gunyana izvo zvichaona Herentals FC neZPC Kariba zvichizarura mutambo wemuboka reGroup 1.   Musi uyu zvekare, kuboka reGroup 3, Cranborne Bullets ichange iri pamba apo ichasangana neManica Diamond kuchiti Triangle United ichitatsurana neNgezi Platinum.   Nenguva dza1 masikati kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa kuBulawayo muboka reGroup 2 uko Chicken Inn ichabandana neBulawayo City iyo yangokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwe chete mumitambo mitatu yayatamba.   Mumitambo yezuva iri yemasikati zvakare, Dynamos FC – iyo iri kutungamira muGroup 1 – ichisangana neYadah FC kuchiti FC Platinum yemuGroup 4 ichabandana neWhawha.   MuGroup 3, Black Rhinos ichisanganawo neTenax.   Mitambo iyi ichazoenderera mberi musi weChina apo Harare City FC ichatatsurana neCAPS United mumutambo wemuGroup 1 kuzoti Highlanders ichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs muGroup 2.

headline: NDAROVERA HOKO: CHIPEZEZE
text: MUBATI wepagedhi weWarriors Elvis Chipezeze anoti atoroverera hoko pagedhi uye acharwa semvumba kuti arambe achibatira chikwata chenyika ichi.   Chipezeze nguva yadarika akapomerwa mhosva nevatsigiri venhabvu vachiti ndiye akadyisa maWarriors apo akazvamburwa 4 – 0 neDemocratic Republic of Congo kumakwishu eAfrcia Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo akaitirwa kuEgypt.   Asi murairidzi wemaWarriors mutsva, Joey Antipas, akamupa mumwe mukana ndokumushevedza kuzotambira chikwata chenyika murwendo rwekurwira kuenda kuQatar 2022 World Cup.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weChipiri chino apo maWarriors ange achangobva kukunda Somalia 3-1, Chipezeze anoti akambobatikana zvikuru nezvakataurwa nevanhu nekuda kwemutambo weAfcon asi akaramba achishanda nesimba.   “Zvakawanda zvakataurwa asi ndakawana rutsigiro kubva kuvanhu vakawanda nemurairidzi wangu uye mhuri yangu. Zvinowanikwa munhabvu asi chikuru kuramba ndichingoshanda nesimba chete,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu – uyo anotambira Baroka FC yekuSouth Africa – anoti chivimbo china Antipas maari anochikoshesa zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwandapihwa nemurairidzi runondikoshera zvikuru saka ini ndinofanirwa kuramba ndichishanda nesimba chete.   “Kundigadza kwaaita kuve mubati wemaWarriors kunorakidza kuti anovimba neni saka iniwo ndicharwa semvumba uye ndichishanda nesimba kuti ndirambe ndiri mubati wemaWarriors,” anodaro Chipezeze.   MaWarriors akabudirira kupinda mumapoka (group stages) ekurwira kuenda kuQatar 2022 World zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita 3 -1 nemusi weChipiri chino.    Vatambi vanoti Marshall Munetsi, Knowx Mutizwa naKhama Billiat ndivo vakanwisa.   Mumutambo wekutanga wakatambirwa kuDjibouti svondo radarika, maWarriors akakundwa neSomalia 1 – 0.

headline: Dzidzo Yodzikira Sezvo Varairidzi Vari Vashoma Munyika?
text: Bazi rezvedzidzo yepasi rinotarisirwa kuwana bhiriyoni remadhora mubhajeti regore rinouya. Asi bazi iri rinoti veruzhinji havafaniri kutarisira dzidzo yemhando yepamusoro sezvo risina varairidzi vakakwana muzvikoro zvemunyika yose. Mashoko aya akataurwa nezuro nemunyori mubazi iri, Dr Slyvia Utete Masangano, kunhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo yepasi, apo vaitaura pamusoro pebhajeti rebazi ravo ra2019. Vakati pari zvino hapachina zvekuronga bhajeti sezvo vave kuudzwa zvekuita nebazi rezvemari. Amai Utete-Masango vakati vakatoudzwa kuti vachapihwa mari inoita bhiriyoni nezana remamiriyoni emadhora nebazi rezvemari. Amai Utete Masango vakati zvikamu zvinodarika makumi manomwe nezvishanhu kubva muzana zvemari iyi zvinoenda kumihoro. Asi vakati kunyange zvakadaro, hapana mukana wekuti bazi iri ripinze vamwe varairidzi basa sezvarinoda kuitira kuti rikwanise kupa vana dzidzo yepamusoro. Vakatiwo izvi zvinoreva kuti murairidzi mumwe chete anodzidzisa vana vakawanda kudarika vanokodzera izvo zvinoderedza mukana wekuti vana vaite zvakanaka padzidzo yavo. Amai Utete-Masango vakati havana zvavangakwanisa kuita nenyaya iyi sezvo hurumende iine chirongwa chekuderedza mari yainoshandisa pamihoro yevashandi vayo. Asi vakati vari munhaurirano nebazi rezvemari pamwe nebazi rinopinza vashandi vehurumende basa reCivil Service Commission kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Vachipawo humbowo pamberi pekomiti iyi, mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaSifiso Ndhlovu, vakati hurumende inofanira kupinza varairidzi vakawanda basa kuitira kuti varairidzi varipo vasafe nebasa. Pari zvino muraidzi mumwe anodzidzisa vana makumi manhatu kana kudarika kunyange hazvo achifanira kudzidzisa vana vane huwandu huri pasi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti pavana vekireshi, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana makumi maviri nevashanu, ku primary, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana makumi mana pakirasi, kozoti kusekondari, murairidzi anofanirwa kudzidzisa vana vasingadarike makumi matatu nevashanu. Zimbabwe inofanirwa kupinza vamwe varairidzi zviuru gumi nezvinomwe kuitira kuti varairidzi vashande sezvavanofanirwa kuita kana zvinhu zvakanaka. Pari zvino Zimbabwe ine zvikoro zvinodarika zviuru zvisere, asi panodiwa zvimwe zvikoro zviuru zviviri nechidimbu kuitira kuti vana vakwanise kudzidza zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Vakapembedza N'anga Neinobata Mai Pakapidigurwa Hurumende yaVaMugabe neMauto
text: Mwedzi waMbudzi unoyeuchidza vazhinji kubviswa kwehurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe nemauto muna 2017 mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vainge vaenda muhupoteri kuSouth Africa vachidzoka kuzotungamira nyika. Asi mubvunzo uri pamuromo wevakawanda ndewekuti pane chachinja here pamararamiro evana veZimbabwe sezvaitarisirwa nevakawanda vachipemberera kuti VaMugabe vainge vamanikidzwa kusiya basa. Musi wa 14 Mbudzi 2017, motokari dzehondo dzakaonekwa kumucheto kweguta reHarare mushure mekunge vaive mutungamiri wemauto VaConstantino Chiwenga vashoropodza kudzingwa basa kwevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Manheru acho pfuti dzakanzwikwa dzichirira muguta reHarare asi vakawanda vasingazive kuti chii chiri kuitika. Mauto ayo akatora nhepfenyuro yeZBC akaramba kuti aipidugura hurumende achiti VaMugabe vainge vakachengegtedzwa asi vaida kubvisa makororo ainge akavakomberedza. Asi musi wa 15 Mbudzi mauto akabva atora zvivakwa zvakawanda mudhorobha vachimanikidza VaMugabe kuti vasiye basa. Kunyangwe vanopikisa vanoti vakapemberera n’anga neinobata mai, veZanu-PF vanoti zvinhu zvachinja sezvo yave hurumende itsva yechipiri uye Zimbabwe yainge yakasungunuka kutambira vemabhizimisi ekunze. Mutungamiriri werimwe sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabawe VaStan Zvorwadza vanoti muna 2017 vakapemberera asi tarisiro yavo haina kubuda.
