Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevanoona nezvemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum VaVaWilbert Mandinde vati mitemo haisi kutevedzwa uye kumbunyikidzwa kwemasangano akazvimirira oga kuri kuenderera mberi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti pane zvishoma zvavandudzwa munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi izvi hazvina kubatsira vakawnada vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. Mutauriri wevechidiki mubato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaStephen Chuma vatiwo vainge vaine chivimbo chekuti kubviswa kwaVaMugabe kuchaunza matongero matsva asi zvinhu zvatoenda kumawere. Asi vakafasanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato reZanu PF VaMike Bimha vanoti VaMnangagwa vaunza shanduko munyika uye varatidza hutungamiri pakurwisa denda reCovid-19. VaBimba vanoti matambudziko evana veZimbabwe achapera nekuda kwezvirongwa zvebudiriro zviri kuitwa nehurumende itsva kusanganisira kusimudzira zvekurima, maindasitiri nezvimwe. Panyaya yehuori hunonzi nevakawanda hwapfunya chisero munyika, VaBimha vati VaMnangagwa vari mugwara kurwisa dambudziko iri. Izvi zvatsinhirwa neimwe nhengo yeZanu-PF vari mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Forum VaTaurai Kundishaya vati VaMnangagwa vari kuzadzikisa zvavakavimbisa. Vachigadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika muna 2017, VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kuunza shanduko kuvana veZimbabwe, kurwisa huori, kuteerera zvinenge zvichidiwa nevanhu munyika, kugadzirisa dambudziko rehurombo, kushaikwa kwemabasa, kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano nezvimwewo. Asi vanopikisa vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi vachiti VaMnangagwa vave kutoita kuti VaMugabe vaite sekunge vaive mutsvena.

headline: ARTUZ neZHDA Dzoronga Kusvitsa Nyunyuto Pamusoro peMihoro kuHurumende
text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinoti neChipiri riri kusvitsa gwaro renyunyuto kuboka rePublic Service Commission richizivisa kuti rinoda kuti nhengo dzaro dzipiwe mazuva mana ekunotora mari dzavo kumabhanga kubva nemusi weMuvhuro pachatambira varairidzi mihoro yavo. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa musangano iri, VaPride Mukono, vanoti vari kukurudzirawo nhengo dzavo kuti dziratidzirewo nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuburikidza nekuburitsa panze homwe nemidhebhe nemarokwe. VaMukono vanoti iyi ndiyo chete nzira yekuratidza nayo hurumende kuti homwe dzavo hadzina mari sezvo mari dzavari kutambiriswa dziri shoma zvikuru. Vanoti mari dziri kutambirwa nevarairidzi dzave shoma nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, asi mihoro isina kwairi kuenda. Vana chiremba vari musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association vari kurongawo kuendesawo gwaro renyunyuto kumakurukota ezvepfumi, hutano, pamwe nekubhodhi rinoona nezvehutano reHealth Services Board. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, Doctor Alloys Muzvaba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kunyunyutawo nekuderera kwemari dzavanotambiriswa zvichienzaniswa nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Sangano ravanachiremba iri rakaburitsawo gwaro rinoti mihoro yavana chiremba vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende yaderera nezvikamu zana kubva muzana kudzika kuenda pamadhora mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu pamwedzi. Sangano iri rinoti riri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya iyi nekukasika kuitira kudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba nyika yose, izvo zvinozokanganisa nyika yose. Doctor Muzvaba vati sangano ravo riri kukwenenzvera gwaro iri, vachiti panosvika kupera kwesvondo vanenge vari svitsa kwarinofanirwa kuenda. No media source currently available

headline: Vorwisa mhirizhonga netsiva
text: Ndooka   SHASHA dzetsiva dzechidzimai dzichamirira Zimbabwe mumutambo uyo vachabandana nevatambi vekune dzimwe nyika wekurwira kodzero dzevanhukadzi unozivikanwa nekunzi Kick Out Girl Child Abuse.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa neDeltaforce Boxing Promotions uye uchaparurwa nemusi weChishanu svondo rino apo vatambi ava vachazotatsurana munaMbudzi.   Shasha yetsiva ine mukurumbira – Patience Mastara – achirwira bhande reWBF Women’s International Super Bantamweight pamutambo uyu apo acharwa naJessica Mfinanga wekuTanzania. Murairidzi waMastara anove zvakare mutungamiri weDeltaforce Boxing – Clyde Musonda – anoti pakatanga kunyuka denda reCovid-19, nhau dzekushungurudzwa kwevanhukadzi dzakawedzera zvikuru nekudaro mutambo uyu vakauronga nechinangwa chekupa chenjedzo pamusoro pekuipa kwemhirizhonga mudzimba pamwe nekusimudzira vanhukadzi vanotamba tsiva.   “Vanhukadzi vakatikoshera uye nyaya dzekushungurudzwa kwavo dzakatanga kuwanda zvikuru munguva yelockdown. Saka chinangwa chedu kuti tisimudzire vanhukadzi vadzidze kuzvimirira kana kodzero dzavo dzave kutyorwa.   “Hatidi kunzwa nezvekushungurudzwa kwevanasikana saka mutambo uyu ndewavo wekuvarakidza kuti vakatikoshera, uchange ungori wemadzimai chete,” anodaro Musonda.   Mimwe mitambo ichatambwa munaMbudzi ichaona Cecilia Pitiseni achitatsurana nechimwe chizvarwa chemunyika muno Chiedza Homakama mumutambo weLightweight kuchitiwo nerimwe divi, Anisha Basheel wekuMalawi achasangana naBridget Mbabi wekuDemocratic Republic of Congo.   Musonda anoti mutambo uyu uchange uchitsigirwa neshasha yetsiva yechidzimai yekuCanada — Olivia Gerula — uyo ari kushanda chaizvo kurwisa nyaya dzemhirizhonga kumadzimai.

headline: VaBiti Vanoti VaChinamasa naVaMangudya Havana Chavanobura kuMisangano yeIMF neWorld Bank kuAmerica
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya vapinda muWashington DC nhasi kumisangano yeWorld Bank ne International Monetary Fund inonzi “Spring meetings.” Misangano iyi inotanga nhasi kusvika musi weSvondo. Vachitaura neStudio 7 VaMangudya vati vachatanga kupinda mumisangano mangwana sezvo vari kusvika muWashington manheru anhasi kubva kuNew York. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi VaTendai Biti vanova nhengo yeMDC Alliance vati havaone paine chinobuda pamisangano iri kupindwa naVaChinamasa naVaMangudya sezvo vari kutatarika kuvandudza hupfumi. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Vopomerwa Dzimwe Mhosva
text: Mumiriri weZengeza West mudare reParamende VaJob Sikhala vakamiswa zvekare pamberi pedare redzimhosv vachipomerwa imwe mhosva itsva. mhosvaVari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kuvhiringidza mapurisa kuferefeta nyaya yekupondwa kwamuzvare MoreBlessing Ali kuNyatsime kuchitungwiza. VaSikhala vanonzi vakati pavhidhiyo muzvare Ali vainge vapondwa nevatsigiri veZanu-PF zviri kunzi nemapurisa aive manyepo. VaSikhala vanova gweta remuhuri yamuzvare Moreblessing Ali vari mutirongo kuChikurubi sezvo vakapomerwa mhosva yekupesvedzera mhirizhonga parufu rwaMuzvare Ali. Magweta anoti mhosva idzi dzakada kungofanana uye kwave kungotsvaga uta nemugate kwemapurisa. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo vaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko kana vanopikisa vakaita saVaSikhala vakada kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika vaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakataurawo mashoko aya nezuro vachiti mapato anopikisa ari kuda kukonzera nyonga nyonga munyika. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reCCC VaGift Ostallos Siziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haidi kuona vanhu vanopokisa bato riri kutonga re ZANU PF, saka vanhu ve bato ravo vari kushungurudzwa. No media source currently available Asi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, ,mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harishungrudze vanopikisa asi haringapete maoko kana paine vanenge vachida kukonzera mhirizhonga munyika. Vanopikisa nevanorwira kodzero dzevnhu vanoti hurumende iri kushandisa mapurisa nematare kuvambunyikidza.

headline: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMasisi, Vanovhura Harare Agricultural Show Vachiti Covid-19 Yakaratidza Zinyenyeke Riri munyika dzeSADC neAfrica
text: Mutungamiriri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vavhura zviri pamutemo Harare Agricultural Show vachiti Covid-19 nehondo yekuUkraine zvakaratidza zinyenyeke riri munyika dzeSADC neAfrica yose panyaya dzekurima. Vati zviviri izvi zvakapinza nzara uye yave nguva yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzishandise michina yechizvinozvino kusimbaradza mabasa ekurima kuti pasave nenzara kunyange pakaita matambudziko akaita seCovid-19. VaMasisi vati Zimbabwe neBotswana dzinofanira kusimbaradza kudyidzana kwadzo panyaya dzekurima vachiti Zimbabwe inyanzvi pakurima zvirimwa zvakaita sechibage, ukuwo nyika yavo ine hunyanzvi panyaya dzekugadzira mishonga yezvipfuyo yakaita seyekurapa zvirwere zvakaita se newcastle ne foot and mouth. Vatiwo Zimbabwe ine nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima uye dzimwe dzacho dzave kutoshanda munyika yavo. VaMasisi vati hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kushanda pamwe kurwisa dambudziko rekubiwa kwezvipfuyo pamuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi iro rakonzera mutauro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima uye vari nhengo yeZimbabwe Agricultural Society, Va Ivan Craig vaudza Studio kuti vanowirira nemashoko aVaMasisi ekuti Covid-19 nehondo yeUkaraine zvakaburitsa zinyekenyeke panyaya dzekurima muAfrica. Vati izvi zvinofanira kusvinudza nyika dzemuAfrica kuti dzinofanirwa kuzvirimira chikafu chakakwana nekuti dzine zvese zvinodiwa kuita izvi. Zvichakadai Zimbabwe National Army ndiyo yatora mubairo wezviratidzwa zvakakunda vese pashowo yegore rino. VaJonathan Musoki ndivo vawana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi yefodya. Vamwe vawana mibairo vanosanganisira Amai Priscillar Marauka, avo vawana wekuve murimi wepamusorosoro, kana kuti Best Agro Produce Farmer, purazi re Zvikomborero richiwana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi vemombe. VaConcern Mutasa vekuZaka ndivo vawana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi vePfumvudza uye vapiwa mubairo wetirakita. VaMutasa vanoti vafara nekukunda kwavaita vachiti kurima nepfumvudza hakurwadzi sezvinofungidzirwa nevakawanda. Aka ndekutanga mukati memakore maviri veruzhinji vachibvumidzwa kupinda mushowo iyi nehuwandu hwavo zvichitevera kurerutswa kwehurongwa kwekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Kunze kwevarimi nemakambani emuno, pane makambani kubva kunyika nhanhatu dzinosanganisira Botswana, South Africa, Malawi neIndia ari kuratidzira pashowo iyi iyo inopera neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi yeHutano Yoyambira Kusimbiswa kweMitemo Inodzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19 Kana Miganhu neSouth Africa Yavhurwa
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano inoti kuderera kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere che Covid-19 munyika pamwe nevari kufa nacho chinhu chakanaka chose, asi izvi hazvifanirwe kuita kuti vanhu vavarairwe vokanganwa kuzvichengetedza. Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, avo vanodzidzisa zvehutano paNottingham Trent University kuBritain, vanotiwo hurongwa hweSouth Africa hwekuvhura miganho yayo hwakanakira vana veZimbabwe vagara vachipinda munyika iyi kunoita mabhindauko avo, asi vanhu vanofanirwa kurangarira kuti nyika iyi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa muAfrica yose vabatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, panofanirwa kutorwa matanho akasimba ekuona kuti vese vachapinda munyika iyi vavhenekwa zvakasimba, uye vakachengetedzeka kuti vasanotapura chirwere ichi vachizodzoka nacho munyika vachizoparadzirawo kune vamwe. Vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuti iwedzere huwandu hwevanhu vanovhenekwa pazuva, uyewo kuti igozodzivirira kuunganidzwa kwevanhu kumiganho vozopedzisira vatapurirana hutachiwana zvakare. South Africa yakazivisa kuti ichavhura miganho yayo musi wa 01 Gumiguru, unove mwedzi unouya kubvumidza vashanyi nevanoda kunoita zvebhizimusi munyika iyi, uye ichavhurawo nhandare nhatu dzichasvikira vanhu. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti nekuda kwekukwira kwehuwandu vave kubatwa zvakare neCovid-19 pasi rose, nyika dzakawanda dzinosanganisira Englad, Germany, France neAmerica dzave kusimbisa zvakare matanho ekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Makerere Oshora Bhiri reKuvandudza Mutemo weMashandiro eMasangano Akazvimirira Oga
text:
Vamwe vemakereke vanoti bhiri rinoona nezvekunyoreswa nemashandiro
emasangano akazvimiririra oga kana kuti Private Voluntary Organisation
Amendment Bill richaderedza rubatsiro rwavanopa kune vanotambura.

Sachigaro wemubatanidzwa wemakereke mudunhu reMashonaland West
reZimbabwe Heads of Christian Denominations-ZHCD-Pastor Tafadzwa
Mafukidze vanga vari pamusangano wemusi weChina vakati bhiri iri rikave
mutemo richakanganisa basa ravanga vachiita rekubatsira
vanhu munyaya dzezvekudya, dzidzo nezvehutano.

Vachipa pfungwa dzekereke kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemabasa
nekugara zvakanaka kwwevanhu VaMafukidze vakati bhiri iri richaitawo kuti kushanda kwemasangano anoshanda akazvimiririra kuome kudarika zviripo parizvino.

Mumwe mudzimai apinda mumusangano wanhasi Muzvare Patricia Chibaya
vakati hurumende inofanirwa kuregedza vemasangano akazvimirira
vachiita basa ravo vakasununguka. Muzvare Chibaya avo vari kukwikwidza kuita kanzura muChinhoyi
musarudzo dzema by-elections kupera kwemwedzi uno vakamirira bato
reCitizens Coalition for Change vanoti vemasangano akazvimiririra
vakabatsira madzimai akawanda kuti vasatye kukwikwidza. Asi mumwe wechidiki wekuMakonde, VaGodknows Muzhandamhuri vanoti bhiri iri rakanaka rakadaro vachiti vemasangano akazvimiririra vanokurudzira
vanhu kuti vapandukire hurumendep.

Vanhu vakawanda vati panyaya yekufambiswa kwemari ingangoshandiswa
munyaya dzezvehutototo pane mitemo yakawanda inodzivirira izvi
yakafanana neweMoney Laundering Act. Vanhu vakaratidza kusafara nemasimba akawanda ari kupihwa kugurukota
rehurumende pabhiri iri, simba ravati rinogona kushandiswa zvisiri
izvo sezviri kuitika. Gurukota rezvemitemo Vaziyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichatanga yanzwa pfungwa dzevanhu isati yavandudza mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inomisa Kanzuru yeGweru Kukwidza Mitero
text: Kanzuru yeguta reGweru yamanikidzwa nehurumende, kuburikidza negurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, kusakwidza mitero sezvo bhajeti rayo risati ratambirwa nebazi rezvematunhu. No media source currently available Kanzuru iyi, iyo yaive yakwidza mitero kubvira pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira, yarambidzwa kuita izvi nebazi rezvematunhu sezvo bazi iri risati rapasisa hurongwa hwekanzuru iyi hwekushandisa mari gore ra2015. Muhurongwa hwayo hwekushandisa mari hwegore rino, kanzuru yaida kukwidza mitero yakasiyana-siyana nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemari mukanzuru yeGweru, VaAlbert Chirau, vanoti vebazi rezvematunhu vakati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana, kusanganisira nyaya yekuti vakuru vakuru vekanzuru vapiwe mari yemihoro inoenderana neyakatarwa nehurumende, uye kuti mari inoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi vekanzuru isapfuure zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari inowanikwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero. VaChirau vanoti kanzuru iri kugadzirisa zvakanzi zvigadziriswe izvi nevebazi rezvematunhu, uye vanotarisira kuti bhajeti rekanzuru richapasiswa munguva pfupi inotevera. Pakupera kwemwedzi waNdira nepakutanga kwaKukadzi vamwe vagari vemuGweru vakaratidzira vachitsutsumwa pamusoro pehurongwa hwekanzuru hwekuda kukwidza mitero, uyewo nyaya yekuti kanzuru iri kuendesa kumagweta vagari vari kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvemitero zvavainazvo kukanzuru. VaChirau vanoti pave nehurongwa hutsva hwekuti kanzuru haichaendesi vagari vane zvikwereti kumagweta pasina kutaurirana. Vanoti kanzuru yakatora danho rekuti kwemwedzi mitanhatu inotevera magweta ekanzuru haafanirwe kubata kana kutengesa midziyo yevagari vari kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo kumagweta aya, uye kuti munguva imwe cheteyo, avo vanobhadhara mitero yavo nenguva vasina zvikwereti, vachabvisirwa zvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana zvemari yavanobhadhara. VaCornelia Selipiwe ndivo sachigaro weGweru Residents and Ratepayers Association rinove sangano rine dzimwe nhengo dzakaratidzira nguva pfupi yapfuura. Va Selipiwe vanoti vanotambira nemufaro mukuru danho rekudzorera mitero payaive isati yakwidzwa pakupera kwaNdira. Vanoti tarisiro yavo ndeye kuti bazi rezvematunhu richapa pfungwa yekuti kanzuru yeGweru isakwidza mitero zvachose sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemari Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kanzura nevagari vanofanirwa kugara pasi votaurirana kuitira vagari vaziviwo kuti zvavanoda kuitirwa nekanzuru zvinoda mari inobva muvagari. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kanzuru inofanirwawo kuisa zvido zvevagari pamberi, uye kutambirisa vashandi vayo mari dzinoenderana nemari inowanwa nekanzuru kubva kumitero.

headline: Chikwereti cheRBZ Chotemesa Hurumende Musoro
text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari yagara neMuvhuro ichikurukura bhiri remutemo rinopa masimba ekuti hurumende itore chikwereti chebhanga guru renyika, kana kuti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe Debt Assumption Bill. Izvi zvaitwa panguva iyo makomiti akasiyana siyana atanga kusangana kekutanga gore rino. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, uye gavhuna vebhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, ndivo vange vari mudare vachibvunzwa nenhengo dzeparamende. RBZ ine chikwereti chinopfuura bhiriyoni rimwe chete remadhora icho yakaita pasi pevaive gavhuna vebhanga iri, VaGideon Gono, avo vaonzi vaiita mamwe mabasa ainge asineyi nezvaifanira kuitwa nebhanga iri. Mabasa aya aisanganisira kutenga matirakita, fotereza nezvimwe zvaipihwa vanhu vari kunzi nehurumende havafanire kuburitswa mazita avo. Asi vachitaura kukomiti yezvemari, VaChinamasa naVaMagudya vati chikwereti ichi wave mutoro kuRBZ zvopa kuti bhanga iri ritadze kushanda zvakanaka. Gore rapera vanhu vazhinji munyika vakati havaida kuti hurumende itore chikwereti ichi uye vakati vanoda kuti vose vakapihwa mari vaburitswe mazita avo. Asi RBZ nehurumende zviri kutsika madziro kuburitsa mazita aya. Dzimwe nyanzvi munya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hazvibatsire kuti hurumende, iyo iri kutatarika nechimwe chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni masere emadhora, izviwedzere mumwe mutoro. Nhengo yekomiti yezvemari, uye vari nhengo yeMDC Renewal Team, VaWillas Madzimure, vanoti vakumbira VaChinamasa naVaMangudya kuti vanogadzirisa zvimwe zvavange vasingatenderane nazvo zvikuru pamitero iri kubhadhariswa nevamwe pazvikwereti. No media source currently available

headline: Afcon: Ngatirongekei
text: VARAIRIDZI nevatsigiri venhabvu votambira nemufaro mukuru draw rekurwira kuenda kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2023 iro rakaona Zimbabwe ichiiswa muboka Group K pamwe chete neMorocco, South Africa neLiberia.   Muboka iri muri kutarisirwa kubuda zvikwata zviviri zvichaenda kumutambo mukuru wenhabvu wemuAfrica uyo uchatambirwa kuIvory Coast gore rinotevera.   Murairidzi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira, Luke ‘Vahombe’ Masomere, anoti maWarriors anogona kukunda chero chikwata chipi chemuAfrica asi hunge kana akarongeka chete.   Anoti gadziriro dzekuenda kuIvory Coast dzinofanirwa kutanga izvezvi kwete kumirira mazuva ekupedzisira.   “Draw takariona rakanaka chose, Zimbabwe tinotokunda zvikwata zvose zviri muboka redu, topedzerana nazvo zvose uye tiri kutoenda kuIvory Coast.   “Chinhu chikuru chatinofanirwa kuita kurongeka chete, totanga kuita gadziriro dzedu pachiri nenguva chete.   Kazhinji tinozvikanyira zvinhu zvedu toga nekusarongeka, saka ngatirongeke tigoenda kuIvory Coast,” anodaro Vahombe. Kuchiti murairidzi weCranborne Bullets, Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera, anoti mazuva ano hakuchina chikwata chinonzi chiri muAfrica sezvo zvose zvichitamba nhabvu yepamusoro.   “Tichitarisa muboka redu, zvikwata zvese zvatichasangana nazvo tinozvikunda, hapana chatinofanirwa kutya. Patichasangana nazvo tinofanirwa kuhwina mitambo yedu yose yemuno tozoenda kwavo kunorwa kuti tibve tiine chibodzwa chete, tikadaro ndinoona tichibuda muboka iri tichienda mberi,” anodaro Yabo.   Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu, Adomsi Mukwasi, anoti Zimbabwe yatove netikiti rekuenda kuIvory Coast gore rinotevera.   “Tichitarisa zvikwata zvese zvatichasangana nazvo, hapana chingativhundutse kubva pane South Africa, Liberia kana iyo Morocco. Tiri kufanirwa kungorongeka chete,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Aimbove sachigaro weBlue Swallows, Public Mpofu, anotiwo draw rakanaka uye chiri kungodiwa kuti gadziriro dzechikwata chenyika dzitange paine nguva kuitira kuti pasawane chinokanganisa mafambiro achaita mitambo yemaWarriors.   “Draw rakanakisa chaizvo asi chinhu chinongodiwa chete kurongeka, toita gadziriro nguva ichiripo. Pasina izvozvo hapana kwatinoenda, ngatigadzirire pachiri nenguva,” anodaro Mpofu.   Zvakadaro, sangano reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rakazivisa kuti riri kupa Zimbabwe masvondo maviri ekuti idzorere vatungamiriri veZifa pabasa zvichitevera kudzingwa kwavakaitwa vachipomerwa kusaita basa ravo zvakanaka uye kana izvi zvikasaitwa maWarriors anobva aburitswa mumutambo weAfcon.   Nekune rimwe divi, gurukota rezvemitambo nevechidiki, Dr Kirsty Coventry, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu zvichitevera zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu pasi rose reFifa achazivikanwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera.

headline: Chivandire ahwina bhandi reWBC kuZambia
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Kudakwashe ‘Take Money’ Chivandire anyoora nhoroondo manheru adarika apo akunda Cathrine Phiri wekuZambia ndokumutorera bhande reWorld Boxing Council Super-bantam weight.   Mukudaro, Chivandire abva aita mutambi wetsiva wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kuhwina bhandi guru reWBC.   Achitaura ari kuZambia, maneja waTake Money arizve murairidzi wake, Clyde Musonda ati chikwata chavo chizere nemufaro zvichitevera kuhwina kwaita Take Money.   “Handisisina izwi kutaura kwatiri kuita kuno nekuti izvozvi tiri pakupembera. Kuda adadisa zvikuru, asimudza mureza wenyika yedu.   “Tinotenda ruzhinji rweZimbabwe nerutsigiro rwavo neminamato yavo yose,” adaro Musonda.   Vasati vaenda kumutambo uyu, Take Money ange akatsidza kuti ari kunounza bhandi iri ndokuudza Phiri vasati vasangana kuti haasi shasha asi iye ndiye nyanzvi itsva ine bhandi iri izvo zvaazozadzikisa apo azomukundira pazvibodzwa.

headline: Chirongwa cheBVR Chinotanga muBulawayo Vanhu Vashoma Vachipinda Machiri
text: Kunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwatanga muguta reBulawayo kuine vanhu vashoma vange vachinyoresa kuvhota, michina yeBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, ichitadza kunyatsoshanda pane zvimwe zvainotarisirwa kuita, ukuwo vamwe vanhu vachiti chirongwa ichi chinofanirwa kushambadzwa zvakasimba sezvo veruzhinji vasina ruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pacho. Vanhu vange vachiuya vari vashoma, asi kunyoreswa kwavo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kwazotanga nguva dzekuma 9 mangwanani pamahofisi eZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, muBulawayo, sezvo vashandi veZEC vambotanga nekuwona kuti muchina wavo unoshanda zvakanaka here. Kunyange hazvo muchina uyu wange uchishanda zvakanaka, wange uchimbotadza kuita zvimwe zvaunotarisirwa kuita zvakadai sekukwanisa kuburitsa mazita enzvimbo dzekuti vanhu vanyoresa vanokwanisa kuzonotarisa kuti mazita avo akanyorwa zvechokwadi here kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kana kuti polling center. Munhu atanga kunyoreswa pahofisi yeBulawayo District, VaAbel Ncube, vati vafara kuti vakwanisa kunyoresa, asi vange vachinyunyuta kuti izvi kwavatorera nguva, izvo zvatsigirwawo naVaWeston Dumba avo vaita munhu wechipiri kunyoresa. VaDumba vati kunyange hazvo zvingave zvinotora nguva, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vose vanokodzera munyika vave vanonyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. VaDumba vatiwo maonero avo ndeekuti veruzhinji havasati vave neruzivo rwakakwana pamusoro pechirongwa chekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mumwezve mugari wemuBulawayo VaAustin Moyo, avo vanogara mumusha weveruzhinji weCowdray Park, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vachitevera nyaya yekunyoreswa kwevanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota saka vaona zvakakosha kuti vauyewo vanyorese. Chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chakaparurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, svondo rapera muHarare asi nekuda kwekuti pari zvino michina yekunyoresa ichiri mishoma, kunyoreswa uku kuri kungoitwa panzvimbo shoma kunyanya pane mahofisi eZEC mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana munyika. Pari zvino pamahofisi eZEC ari kumahombekombe kweguta kwakadziva kumadokero ndipo pari kunyoreswa vanhu vari pasi peBulawayo District pamwe neveUmguza District. Mukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muBulawayo, Amai Sithembiso Khupe, vabvuma kuti muchina wavo wambovanetsa asi vati vari kufara nemafambiro aita chirongwa pakutanga kunyoreswa kwevanhu. Amai Khupe vati hofisi yavo yeBulawayo yakanzi ichapiwa michina zana negumi rimwe chete uye vachave nenzvimbo dzinopfuura mazana mana dzavachange vachinyoresa vanhu. VeZEC vanoti chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu chichasimudzirwa zvakasimba kana vawana mimwe michina iyo vakati vanotarisira kuwana pakati pemwedzi unouya. Kuti munhu ukwanise kunyoresa kuvhota unofanirwa kuve uri chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chine makore gumi nemasere, kana kupfuura, uye unofanirwa kuve nechitupa, cherata kana cheplastic, chine mufananidzo wechiso chako kanawo gwaro rekufambisa richiri kushanda. Rezinesi yemotokari haikwanise kushandiswa pakunyoresa kuvhota. Munhu unozodawo gwaro rinoratidza paunogara ingave tsamba yemvura iri muzita rako kana gwaro raunonyora rosainwa naCommissioner of Oaths, sabhuku kana mumwe munhu akadaro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu (15) Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika neMugovera vamwe mazana masere nenakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mana nemakumu masere nevatatu kana kuti 483. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi maviri nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 20, 499. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru gumi bezviviri zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 12, 439 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu mazana maviri nemamakumi mashanu nevashanu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 7, 577. Kunyangwe muHarare nemuBulawayo muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu ose hwawedzera zvave kutyisa kana nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti svondo rino hurumende iri kutarisira ongororo inobuditsa pachena kuti kufa nekubatwa kwevanhu nechirwere ichi kuri kukonzerwa nekamwe kamhando katsva kechirwere ichi kakabatwa kuSouth Africa neBritain uye kanzoni kanopararira zvakanyanya kana muvana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi manomwe nemaviri zvine zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 72,121. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 89, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 372, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvisere kana kuti 49, 8 million.

headline: Vanhu Gumi Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu gumi vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 1, 666. Vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kti 293 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi mana nechimwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevasere kana kuti 41, 628. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine zana nemakumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 37, 167. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zviviri zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 2, 795. Hurumende inoti nzvimbo dzave kunyanya kupararira chirwere ichi zvekuti dzinogona kuiswa mitemo yakati omei kuti vanhu vasafambe fambe dzinoti Karoi, Chirundu, Magunje, Mhangura, Chinhoyi, Chidamoyo kuMashonaland West, uyeChiredzi mudunhu reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzinoti Nkulumane, Emakhandeni nekunzvimbo dziri kumaodzanyemba kana kuti Northern Surbubs muguta reBulawayo, uye kuMt Darwin kuMashonaland West. Nzvimbo dzakaiswa mitemo yakaomarara kare kuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi dzinoti Kariba, Karoi, Makonde neKwekwe. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu zviuru mazana manomwe nechimwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 701 348 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzvirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu zviuru mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 432, 572 ndivo vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana nhomba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Enoch Mayida avo vaimbotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vanoti vanhu vanofanira kungwaria kubatwa nechirwere ichi vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinopa Mutongo Unoti Vechidiki Vakatora Muzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House neSvondo Vabviswe
text: Dare ramejasitiriti muHarare rakatura neChipiri mutongo wekuti bato reMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe ribvise vechidiki vanonzi ndivo vakabvuta muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House uri muHarare neSvondo vachiti vanobuda chete mumuzinda uyu kana vakuru vemapato eMDC-T neMDC Alliance iri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vatauarirana kuti vashande pamwechete zvakare. Vechidiki ava vanoti vari kutevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court wekuti vaive nezvigaro muna 2014 vafambise mabasa muMDC-T, vachiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro gore iri. Bato reMDC-T pamwe nemunyori mukuru waro, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakakwira dare neMuvhuro vachikwirira bato reMDC Alliance, VaChamisa, VaPaul Gorekore, VaHappymore Chidziva, VaDenford Ngadziore pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reHarare. MDC-T yakatora muzinda uyu kubva kuMDC Alliance muna Chikunguru ichibatsirwa nemapurisa. Mutongi wedare akati vashanu vekutanga vakakwirirwa dare vanofanirwa kudzosera muzinda uyu kuMDC-T, uye vaburitse muhutapwa vanhu vanonzi vakavharirwa mumuzinda uyu. Tabata VaMwonzora kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti vakatoshamiswa nekuona mutongo uyu uchiisawo bato ravo pamwe nemutungamiri wavo VaChamisa mukati sezvo vasineyi nechekuita nezviri kuita pamuzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House. VaHlatywayo vanoti vakangonzwawo kuti muzinda uyu wakatorwa nevechidi vaiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro muna 2014 pakaitwa kongiresi yebato iri. No media source currently available

headline: Chibage Chodhura Kupinda Kutenga Kunze
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinoti danho rehurumende rekurambidza kupinzwa kwechibage munyika uye kumanikidza varimi kutenga chibage muGrain Marketing Board, GMB, chete harina kunyatsofungisiswa nezvaro, sezvo chibage chemunyika chichidhura kudarika changa chichitengwa kunze. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti chibage chemunyika chiri kuita madhora mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe patani, zvichienzaniswa nemadhora zana nemakumi mana ari kutengwa nawo tani rechibage kuSouth Africa nedzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti rimwe dambudziko nderekuti havaoni chibage chiri kunzi maguta ichi chichisvika mwaka unouya, sezvo nyika yakanga isina goho rakanaka kwemakore maviri adarika. Imwe nyanzvi yezveupfumi vachitungamira Employers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vatsinhirawo maonero aDoctor Kanyenze aya vachitiwo mutengo wekurima chibage munyika uri pamusoro kwazvo, izvo zvinozoitawo kuti mutengo wechibage ukwire. Asi mukuru weimwe kambani inogaya upfu, yeBlue Ribbon Foods, VaYusuf Kamau, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira danho rehurumende iri sezvo nyika iine chibage chakakwana, uye rinowanisawo vanhu mabasa munyika. Gurukota rezvekurima, VaJoseph Made, neChitatu vakazivisa kuti hurumende haichabvumidzi kutengwa kwechibage kunze. VaMade vakazivisawo kuti vanogaya upfu vave kusungirwa kutenga chibage kuGMB, asi vachifanirwa kutanga vabhadhara mari kuhurumende vozopiwa matsamba ekuenda nawo kunotora chibage chacho kuGMB. Hurumende inoti iri kutarisira maguta gore rino kuburikidza nechirongwa chekurima chinotsigirwa nehurumende cheCommand Agriculture. No media source currently available

headline: European Union Inopa Zimbabwe Rubatsiro rweMari yeKutenga Chikafu
text: Sangano reEuropean Union nhasi razivisa kuti rapa Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwemari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemasere emadhora ekuAmerica, senzira yekubatsira nayo kurwisana nenzara yakatarisana nenyika. Sangano iri rinoti mari iyi ichabatsira mukuwanira vanhu chikafu, kuwanikwa kwehutano, mvura yakachena, uyewo kubatsira mukudzivirira mamwe matambudziko anokonzerwa nekusawanikwa kwechikafu. Mari iyi inonzi ndeimwe yemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana emadhora ekuAmerica iri kubatsirwa nayo nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica nesangano iri mukuwaniswa kwechikafu nemvura yakachena. Dzimwe nyika dziri kuwanawo rubatsiro dzinoti Zambia, Lesotho, Eswatini pamwe neMadagascar. Nyika dzakawanda dzekumawirira dziri kubatsira Zimbabwe nechikafu, mushure mekunge yazivisa kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni manomwe vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa gore rino nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kuri kuita mvura mumakore adarika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzechikafu uye vakambotungamira sangano reChristian Care, Reverend Forbes Matonga, vanoti idanho rinotendwa zvikuru ratorwa neEuropean Union rekubatsira nyika nechikafu sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda chikafu hwanyanya kukwira zvichienzaniswa nenzara ya2008. Reverend Matonga vanoti kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura nderimwe rematambudziko ari kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda chikafu. Vanoti mumwaka inenge yakanaka, vanhu vanotanga kudya zvirimwa zvemuminda mumwedzi waKukadzi, asi iye zvino hazvichakwanisiki. No media source currently available

headline: America Inobudisa Gwaro Rinoshora Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
text: Bazi re America rionoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, re State Department, rabudisa gwaro pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwarinoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Gwaro iri, kana kuti Zimbabwe 2020 Human Rights Report, rine mapeji makumi mana nemapfumbamwe (49), uye rinobva muongororo yakaitwa muna 2020. Bazi re State Department rinoti hurumende mu Zimbabwe inouraya vanhu pamusoro pezvamatongerwo enyika, inotsakatikisa vanhu, kutocha vanhu nekusabata vasungwa zvakanaka. Gwaro iri rinoshoravo majeri emunyika, pamwe chete nekushora mabatirwo anoitwa ngochani mu Zimbabwe. Tatadza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, uye vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati hurumende ye Zimbabwe haifanirwi kumirira kunzwa zvinobva kunze kwenyika, vachiti kana hurumende ikaterera pose panochema vana ve Zimbabwe, haizotyori kodzero dzavo nekuti inenge yave kuziva zvisingadiwi nevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: VaChinamasa Vanotura Bhajeti re$4,1 Billion Kuti Ritambirwe neParamende
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vaparura neChina bhajeti regore rinouya remabhiriyoni mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora. VaChinamasa vanoti zvikamu makumi masere nezviviri kubva muzana zvemari iyi zvichashandiswa pamihoro yevashandi vehurumende. Vati izvi zvinoreva kuti hurumende inosara isina mari yekawanda yekushandisa kuita mamwe mabasa ayo akakosha. Vachitura muparamende hurongwa hwavari kuda kuti hushandiswe pamari yehurumende gore rinouya, Chinamasa vati hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka uye bhajeti iri harina kunyanyosiyana nere gore rino. Semaonero avo, VaChinamasa vati izvi zvinoreva kuti hupfumi hwenyika hausi kufamba zvakanaka. Vati mari zhinji ichaunganidzwa nehurumende ichaenda kumihoro yevashandi vayo uye izvi zvinoreva kuti hurumende ichange ichibhadhara vashandi vanenge vasingaite basa sezvo pasina mari yekuitisa mabasa anodiwa nehurumende. VaChinamasa vati kunze kwemari yavari kutarisira kuwana kubva kumitero, vanotarisira kuwana mari ingangosvika bhiriyoni remadhora sezvikwereti pamwe nerubatsiro runobva kune dzimwe nyika. Vati sezvo hupfumi hwenyika husiri kufamba zvakanaka, zvakakosha kuti bhajeti ravo rironge hwaro hwekuti makambani avhure uye kuti nyika ikwanise kukwezva makambani ekunze. Vanoti pari zvino nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kubva kunze kudarika zvairi kutengesa. Vatiwo zvizhinji zviri kutengwa kunze zvinogona kugadzirwa munyika. Nekuda kwaizvovo, VaChinamasa vati makambani achange achitengesa zvinhu kunze zvakanyanya achabvisa mitero inenge iri pasi pasi. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vari kushanda nemabhanga ekunze akaita seInternational Monetary Fund mukugadzirisa nyaya yezvikwereti, hurumende yavewo nehwaro hwekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Zimbabwe ine zvikwereti zvekunze zvinosvika mabhiriyoni masere emadhora ekunze. Vatiwo mutemo wekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema vemuno unofanira kujekeswa kuitira kuti vekunze vakwanise kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe. VaChinamasa vanoti vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika vanofanira kutaurirana nebazi rinoona nezvevechidiki nezvekupa masimba ehupfumi kuvatema kuti vajekeserwe kuti mutemo uyu unofamba sei. Vati izvi zvakakosha sezvo makambani emunyika ari kuvhara. Vatiwo kubva muna 2011 kusvika gore rino, makambani anodarika zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu akavhara, ukuwo vashandi vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu nezvishanu, vakarasikirwa nemabasa. VaChinamasa vatiwo vashandi vanotambira mari isingadariki mazana matanhatu emadhora pamwedzi havafanirwe kubatirwa mutero kutanga gore rinouya. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kuda kukwidza mitero wefodya yemudzanga senzira yekuunganidza mari. Vatiwo vari kukumbira paramende kuti idzikewo mutero kuvarimi vefodya vachiti mari ichaunganidzwa kubva pamutero uyu ichashandiswa pamabasa ekudyara miti sezvo varimi vefodya vari kutema miti apo vanenge vave kupisa fodya yavo. VaChinamasa vati vari kudawo kuderedza mitero yehwahwa hwemumabhodhoro kana izvi zvikatambirwa neparamende. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupa hurumende dzematunhu mari asi yakamirira kuti patange pave nemitemo yekushanda kwehurumende dzematunhu idzi. Vatiwo vari kuda kuisawo parutivi mamiriyoni gumi emadhora semari yekusimudzira matunhu kana kuti Constituency Development Fund. Asi vati mari iyi ichapihwa nhengo dzeparamende kana pachinge pave nemutemo wekushandiswa kwemari iyi. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira varimi nembeu nefotireza nezvimwe senzira yekuti nyika iwane goho rakanaka. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hunotarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana gore rinouya. Matare eHouse of Assembly ne Senate ari kutarisirwa kuzeya bhajeti raturwa naVaChinamasa oona kuti oritambira here kana kuti kwete sezvinodiwa nemitemo. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Vodzoserwa Kudzimba Apo Kuramwa Mabasa kweMadhokotera, Vakoti neVamwe Kwoenderera Mberi
text: Varwere vakawanda vanonzi vari kudzoserwa kudzimba apo kuramwa mabasa kwevakoti, vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara kuri kuenderera mberi. Kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuti hurumende yavo vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo, hapana hurukuro dzati dzaitwa kubva zvakatanga kuramwa mabasa vashandi vemuzvipatara ava svondo rapera. Nyaya yekukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro uye zvave kuitwa nevemichovha nevaridzi vedzimba zvekubhadharisa vanhu nemari yekuAmerica, zvave kupa kuti zvinhu zviomere vashandi avo vari kubhadharwa nedhora remunyika iro riri kushaya simba zuva nezuva. Kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuuya panguva yakaoma sezvo Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika pasi rose, iri kurwisa chirwere cheCovid19. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano pamwe nesangano reHealth Service Board kunyangwe hazvo takavatumira mibvunzo paWhatsApp. Asi mutungamiri musangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vanoti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvavakaipa neChina svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votarisira maWarriors Kushura Mare kuAFCON kuGabon
text: Mitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iri kutanga musi wa 14 Ndira kusvika musi wa 5 Kukadzi kuGabon. Zimbabwe iri muGroup B neTunisia, Algeria uye Senegal. Aka ndekechitatu Zimbabwe ichienda kumakwikwi aya mushure nekuenda kuTunisia muna 2004 uye kuEgypt muna 2006. Mutambo wekutanga weZimbabwe uri kutambwa musi wa 15 Ndira neAlgeria kuStade deFanceville. Ichazotambazve musi wa 19 Senegal uye neTunisia musi wa 23. Mitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations iri kutanga musi wa 14 Ndira kusvika musi wa 5 Kukadzi kuGabon. Zimbabwe iri muGroup B neTunisia, Algeria uye Senegal. Zvichakadaro, vatsigiri vemitambo vanotiwo vari kutarisira shanduko mugore ra 2017. Nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association VaJaphet Mhombera vanoti vari kutarisra shanduko mumaitiro ehurumende kuti ipewo mari kumitambo. Hurumende yeZimbabwe haina nhoroondo yekupa vatambi mari asi VaMombera vanoti mari yakakosha pakuti inowedzera mwando muvatambi uyezve inokurudzira budiriro mune vechidiki. VaTakawira Mthombeni avo vanove nhengo yevatsigiri venhabvu yeWarriors Fan Club vanoti varikutarisira kuti maWarriors achapa Zimbabwe matangiro egore akanaka nekutamba zvinofadza muma Africa Cup of Nations finals. VaMthombeni vanoti vari kuona maWarriors achitora mukombe uyu nemhaka yagadziriro yanga ichiitwa. MaWarriors arikutarisirwa kusimuka musi weChishanu vakananga kuCameroon munzira yavo yekuenda kuGabon. Vaimbove mutungamiri weTennis Zimbabwe VaPaul Chingoka vanoti gore rino chikwata chenyika cheDavis Cup chinofanira kuratidza kuti mutambo uyu uchirimo munyika nekukunda muEuro-Africa Zone Group Three. VaChingoka vanoti gadziriro yemakundano ayo arikutanga muna Kurume inofanira kutanga ikozvino. Mukuru weOriental Boxing Promotions VaChris Malunga vanoti varikutarisira mutambo mukuru pakati paCharles Manyuchi naDanny Garcia wekuAmerica vachirwira bhande regoridhe reWorld Boxing Council. Manyuchi anoti akatotanga kare gadziriro yemutambo mukuru uyu. VaMalunga vanoti varikutaurirana nevanotungamira Garcia kuti vaone kuti mutambo uyu ungaitwe rinhi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vana Vanobata Chirwere cheTyphoid muHarare
text: Mukuru webazi rezve hutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti chirwere chetyphoid chadzoka muHarare zvikuru mumisha yevazhinji yeBudiriro neGlenview. Pari zvino pane vanhu vana vari kunzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vamwewo vachinzi vachiri kuongororwa. VaChonzi vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafashaidze mvura yekumwa uye kudziyisa chikafu nekuteedzera kurudziro dzose munyaya dzezvehutano kuti vadzivirire kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Dr Chonzi vanoti vanenge vachifungidzira kuti vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanofanirwa kuenda kukiriniki iri pedyo navo kuitira kuti vawane rubatsiro nguva ichiripo. Vanoti kanzuru iri kuyedza kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvenzira dzekuzvidzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe kana kutapuririrana chirwere ichi. No media source currently available Vamwe vanhu vakawanda muguta reHarare vari kubatwawo nemanyoka nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena, kana kuti kushaikwa kwayo zvachose. Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vanoti vari kuyedza nepavanogona napo pose kugadzirisa dambudziko remvura muguta.

headline: Kukwidzwa kweMafuta eKufambisa Kworwadza Vagari muChinhoyi
text: Vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nemakwidzirwo ari kuita mari dzekufambisa kuenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana apo zvitoro zvakawanda zvainge zvakavharwa neSvondo. Mari dzekufambisa dzakamuka dzakakwidzwa nezuro mangawanani zvichitevera kukwidzwa kwakaitwa mari yemafuta edzimotokari nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera. Dzendo dzose dzemuChinhoyi dzaisiita dhora rimwechete dzave kuita madhora matatu, mari inonzi nevakawanda yakawandisa. Kubva muChinhoyi kuenda kuHarare munhu aimbobhadhara madhora matanhatu, asi iye zvino kwave kubhadharwa madhora gumi nemashanu. Kubva muChinhoyi kuenda kuChegutu kana kuKaroi kwave kuita madhora gumi nemaviri kubva pamadhora matanhatu. Amai Sarudzai Patana vanoti madhora matanhatu pamunhu kuenda kubasa ivo nemurume wavo nemwana wavo anoenda kuchikoro nekombi yakawandisa. Mumwe mudzidzisi, VaItai Mutapa, avo vanoti vainge vave kuenda kubasa kaviri pasvondo, vanoti nhasi havaende kubasa sezvo vasina mari yekufambisa. VaMutapa vanoti pavaenda kunotenga zvekudya zvitoro zvanga zvakavhara zvavapa fungidziro yekuti vezvitoro vari kuda kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu kubva nhasi mangwanani. Asi VaClifford Matambo, avo vanotengesa zvekudya, vanoti mitengo inofanirwa kukwira sezvo mari yekuunza zvinhu zvavanotengesa zvave kuvadhurira nekuda kwemitengo yemafuta yakakwidzwa. Mumwewo mugari wemuChinhoyi anoda kudanwa nezita rekuti Nimrod anoti zvinonyadzisa kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa anozivisa kukwira kwemafuta gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto riripo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kuti dhiziri rave kutengwa nemadhora matatu nemasendi gumi nerimwe ukuwo peturu yave kuita madhora matatu nemasenzi makumi matatu. Kunyange mafuta edzimotokari akakwidzwa achiri kushaikwa munyika.

headline: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kudzivirira Kupinda kweCoronavirus Munyika
text: Hurumende inoti iri kutora matanho ese ainokwanisa kudzivirira kuti vanhu vasabatwe nehutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye vanhu vese vanobva kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu, vave kusungugirwa kuuya nemagwaro anoratidza kuti havana hutachiwana uhwu. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, vati vanouya vasina magwaro aya vacharambidzwa kupinda munyika. Kusvika musi wa1 Kurume, Zimbabwe yange yaongorora vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitanhatu vakawonekwa vasina hutachiwana hweCoronavirus uye ongororo iyi iri kuramba ichitwa panhandare dzese dzendenge munyika pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzekupinda nadzo munyika. VaMoyo vazivisawo kuti pane chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe chaibva kuBahrain nechimwe chekuChina vakaongororwa pachipatara cheWilkins vakawanikwa vasina hutachiwana uhwu. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato guru runopikisa munyika, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vane hutachiwana uhwu vasapinde munyika, hurumende inofanira kusimudzira mabasa ehutano munyika kuitira kuti ikwanise kuongorora zvirwere zvese. Mune imwe nyaya, gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vati majeri emunyika akazarisa uye hurumende iri kuronga kuburitsa vamwe vasungwa mumajeri. Vati pari zvino vave kurongwa kuti vasungwa voburitswa ndevapi. Majeri emuZimbabwe ane vasungwa zviuru makumu maviri nezviviri asi iwo akagadzirirwa kuchengeta vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvinomwe chete. VaZiyambi vati vanoda kuti majeri asare aine vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu. Muneimwewo nyaya vakasanobatachinzvimbo chegurukota remutambo, VaKazembe Kazembe, vatiwo hurumende iri kuedza pese painogona napo kugadzirisa nhandare dzeNational Sports Stadium neBarbourfields kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kutamba mutambo wayo CAF neAlgeria munyika. Nhandare idzi dzakanzi neCAF hadzikodzeri kutambira mitambo yeCAF sezvo dzisina zvimwe zvinhu zvinodiwa mazuvano. VaKazembe vati kana vakapedza kugadzirisa National Sports Stadium neBarbourfields, vachakumbira CAF kuti mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria musi wa29 Kurume utambirwe munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Fury adzoka mudariro
text: ine bhande retsiva reheavyweight – Tyson Fury – akadzoka kuMarbella nemurairidzi wake Ben Davison apo vari kugadzirira mumwe mutambo wemaround 12 uyo uchareva zvakawanda kumutambi uyu anozivikanwa saGypsy King.   Fury ange achimbozorora hake ari pazororo reKirisimasi nemhuri yake zvichitevera mutambo wake naDeontay Wilder uyo wakaitwa musi wa1 Zvita gore radarika.   Muchinda uyu aimbove unified champion kare uye kaviri kese akazvamburwa akadonha pasi naWilder uyo anove shasha ine mabhande eWBC kuLos Angeles, mumutambo uyo wakazopera uri mangange.   Iye zvino Fury adzoka kuMarbella uye zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kutarisirwa kutanga hurukuro dzemumwe mutambo une mari zhinji mwedzi uno.   Pamufananidzo uyo waakaisa paInstagram, Fury akange anaDavison mumwe mutambi wetsiva, Joe McCann naJono Carroll apo ari kuedza kusimudzira kubva paakasira mugore ra2018.   Mushure mekupedza makore maviri asiri kukwikwidza, Fury akadzoka mutsiva gore radarika munaChikunguru akasangana naSefer Seferi ndokuramba achikwikwidza izvo zvakamuona achirwa zvakare naFrancesco Pianeta.   Kunyangwe vamwe vatambi ava vaive vepasi, Fury akazokwidza makata ndokusangana naWilder ndokumisidzana nechizvarwa chekuAmerica ichi kwenguva refu mumutambo wavo muna Zvita. – SportsMail boxing

headline: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Makurukota Avo Kusiyana neHuwori
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakomekedza makurukota ehurumende yavo kuti asiyane nekuita zvehuwori, uye kuti vave vanhu vanokwanisa kumira pachokwadi. VaMnangangwa vataura izvi pamusangano wesvondo yeZAOGA waitirwa muHarare neSvondo. Vachitaura pamusangano wechimakumi mana nepfumbamwe wemafundisi epasi rose echechi yeZAOGA waitirwa muHarare, mutungamiri wesvondo iyi Archbishop Ezekiel Guti vakurudzira mafundisi esvondo yavo kuti vave vanhu vasina huwori uye vanokwanisa kumira muhutsvene kuitira kuti zvavanoparidza zvitambirike kune vavanoparidzira. Mashoko aVaGuti aya atsinhirwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kurwisana nehuwori, uhwo hunonzi hwatekeshera muhurumende. VaMnangagwa vati makurukota ehurumende yavo anofanirawo kusiyana nenyaya dzehuwori. Asi mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa vakaudza vatsigiri vavo muHarare svondo rapera kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa haina kumira pachokwadi panyaya yekurwisa huwori. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo vedzisvondo kuti vanamatire nyika igare iine runyarararo. Mumwe mufundisi wesvondo iyi, Amai Sibongile Mkhize, vati sevedzisvondo havasi kuzoneta kuona kuti nyaya dzekurwisana nehuwori pamwe nehutungamiri hwakanaka zvatevedzerwa nevanenge vari muhurumende. VaNesbert Mhuriyengwe, avo vanga vari mumwe wevafundisi vanga vachipinda musangano uyu, vati zvavadzidza pamusangano uyu zvinhu zvichabatsirawo nyika kubudikidza nekuparidza kwavachange vachiita. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vatenda svondo yeZAOGA nekuvaka zvikoro pamwe nekubatsira kwakaitwa nesvondo iyi nezvekudya nezvekupfeka kune vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu emvura eCyclone Idai gore rapera. Musangano weZAOGA uyu, uyo wapindwa nemafundisi anodarika zviuru zvishanu kubva kunyika dzakasiyana-siyana pasi rose, unoitwa gore rega-rega uye musangano uyu wanga uri wechimakumi mana nepfumbamwe kubva pakavambwa chechi yeZaoga muna 1960. VaMnangagwa vatorawo mukana uyu kukorokotedza chechi iyi nekusvitsa kwayaita makore makumi matanhatu gore rino kubva zvayavambwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMawarire Vodaidzira Kumwe Kuratidzira Svondo Rinouya
text: Pastor Evan Mawarire avo vakatungamira kuramwa mabasa nemusi weChitatu vanoti hurumende ikasatambira zvavari kuda kuti zviitwe vacharonga kumwe kuratidzira svondo rinouya nemusi weChitatu neChina. VaMawarire vakati vari kuda kuti makurukota ehurumende ari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuori vamiswe pamberi pematare, vashandi vatambiriswe mari dzavo nengua, hurumende yobvisa mutemo wekurambidza vanhu kutenga zvekudya kunze kwenyika pamwe nekumira nyaya yekuparura mari dzemabond notes. Hurumende yakamboyedza kudzivisa vanhu kuti vasaratidzire kusanganisa kuvhara dandemutande reWhatsapp asi zvose zvakaramba n'anga murapwa achida. VaMawarire vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuratidzira murunyararo vasingapwanye zvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzotyira Kuti Hutachiwana Hwakatanga kuIndia Hungandai Hwave Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa neCovid-19, uye vamwe makumi maviri nevashanu, vaviri vavo vari vakabva kuIndia, vakawanikwa vaine denda iri. Vamwe vanomwe pavanhu ava vanhu vanonzi vakasangana nevakabva kuIndia ava. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika kubva zvachatanga hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe, kana kuti 38 491 uye vanhu vafa vasvikawo pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu ane makumi masere nevaviri, kana kuti 1 582. Kuwanikwa kwevanhu vakabva kuIndia vaine chirwere ichi kunonzi nenyanzvi yezvehutano uye vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, chinhu chinotyisa zvikuru pachitariswa kuti nyika iyi iri kutambudzwa nehutachiwana hweB.1.617, uhwo hunonzi hwakatanga kuonekwa ikoko uye huri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation, W-H-O, rinoti hutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu hunotapuriranwa nyore kudarika humwe hwose. Pari zvino nyika dzemuAfrica nomwe dzinoti Algeria, D-R-C, Kenya, Uganda, Morocco, Nigeria neSouth Africa dzinonzi neW-H-O dzakatove nehutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana, kana kuti 24 million, vabatwa nedenda reCovid-19 muIndia kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi, uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri, kana kuti 262 000, vafa nacho munyika iyi. Asi Dr. Munatsi vanoti hazvishamisi kuti hutachiwana uhwu hunogona kunge hwave munyika pachionekwa kuti pane vanhu vakatobva kunyika iyi vakabatwa vaine Covid-19. Vanokurudzira kusimbiswa kwenyaya dzekuvhenekwa kwehutachiwana uyewo kuti pateverwe vose vangadai vakasangana nevanhu ava senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana uhwu. No media source currently available Mukuru anoona nezvekurwiswa kweCovid-19 munyika, Dr. Agnes Mahomva vanoti pari zvino vari mubishi kumhanyamhanya kuvheneka zvavainazvo kuti vaone kuti hutachiwana hwekuIndia uhwu hwapinda here muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Dr. Mahomva vanoti zvisineyi nekuti hutachiwana hwabva kuIndia here kana kupi, vanhu vanofanirwa kungoramba vachitora matanho ekugeza maoko nemvura nesipo, kusaungana, vachiti zvese izvozvo zvinobatsira kuvharidzira chirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe kana kuti 21 000 vakabaiwa nhomba nezuro wakare. Vanhu zviuru gumi nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 10 078 vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga, kuchiti vamwe zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 11 577 vachibaiwa nhomba yepiri. Huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi hwakasvika pazviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nezvipfumbamwe zvine mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 559 875. Vanhu zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe nezana nemakumi mana nevashanu, kana kuti 192 145, vakanga vabaiwawo nhomba yepiri kusvika nemusi weChina.

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuti Iwedzere Nzvimbo Dzinobaiwa Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuti Iwedzere Nzvimbo Dzinobaiwa Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19 Imwe yenyanzvi mune zvehutano, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere zvipatara nemakiriniki ari kubairwa vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vanhu vasaungane nehuwandu huri kuonekwa iye zvino munzvimbo shoma dzakadomwa kuti dziite basa iri. Doctor Munatsi vanoti kuungana kuri kuita vanhu uye kutsikirirana vachirwira kuti vakwanise kuwana mukana wekubaiwa nhomba, pavanhu vashoma vanonzi vari kukwanisa kuwana nhomba iyi pazuva, kunogona kuzove dambudziko guru mune ramangwana, sezvo vanhu vachigona kutapurirana Covid-19 ipapo. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichinzi yakawedzera nzvimbo dzekubaira vanhu, kusanganisira makirinikiemakanzuru, vanhu vanonzi vari kuramba vachizara munzvimbo idzi sezvo vave kubuda nehuwandu kudarika zviitika kare. Doctor Munatsi vanotiwo nekuona kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kumaruwa vave kubatwa nedenda iri, zvakakosha zvikuru kuti hurumende ikasike kuvhura nzvimbo dzekubaira vanhu nhomba mumaruwa ose emunyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, kuti tinzwe hurongwa hwehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa. Asi Dr Munatsi vanoti hurumende inofanira kuwedzera nzimbo dzekubaya vanhu nhomba, pamwe chete nekuendesa mushonga uyu kunzvimbo idzi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vosvika muFrance Vachibva kuUganda
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasvika muLyon, France kumusangano wekuyedza kutsvaga mari yehomwe yekubatsira kutenga mishonga yekurapa zvirwere zvakaita seHIV, TB nemalaria pasi pesangano reGlobal Fund. Musangano uyu wakatanga nemusi weChitatu uchipera nhasi nemusi weChina. VaMnangagwa vange vachibva kuUganda kumhemberero dzekusvitsa makore makumi mashanu nemanomwe nyika iyi yawana kuzvitonga kuzere . Mhemberero idzi dzaiitirwa mudunhu riri kumawirira kwenyika iyi reSironko. Vachitaura pamhemberero idzi, VaMnangagwa vakati Uganda imwe yenyika dziri kubatsira Zimbabwe iyo yave nemakore makumi maviri iri pajoko rezvirango. Asi nyika dzakaita seAmerica dzinoti zvirango hazvina kungotemerwa munhu wese nje-e asi vatungamiri vanotonga nedemo chete. VaMnangagwa vatiwo Uganda yakapa Zimbabwe hushingi hwekuda kurwira kuzvitonga kuzere apo yakatanga iyo kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Vakatiwo rwendo rwavo rwakanangana nekusimbisa kudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau, VaMnangagwa vakati zvirango zviri kupa kuti Zimbabwe isakwereteswe mari. Asi America inoti Zimbabwe haisi kukwereteswa mari nenyaya yekutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. Vachitaurawo nevatori venhau, gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muUganda VaSam Kutesa vakati Uganda inokoshesa kudyidzana kwenyika yavo neZimbabwe. VaMuseveni vainge vari muZimbabwe muna Kubvumbi vachivhura zviri pamutemo musika wekutengeserana kana kuti Zimbabwe International Trade Fair muBulawayo. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaEnergy Mutodi vanoti rwendo rwaVaMnangagwa kuUganda rwange rwakakosha zvikuru sezvo ruchibatsira munyaya dzekudyidzana. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, tabatawo vebatawo munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato rinopikisa reMDC Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo avo vashora VaMnangagwa vachiti vange vachipemberera kuUganda uko vanopikisa munyika iyi vakazvimirira VaBobi Wine vange vachishungurudzwa nemapurisa vachirambidzwa kuita mabiko ekuimba. No media source currently available   VaWine vakaenda kuZimbabwe apo MDC yaiita Congress yayo muna Chivabvu.

headline: Tamirira ICC: ZC
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) rinoti riri kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita nyaya yeaimbove kaputeni wemaChevrons — Brendan Taylor — uyo ari kabuda pachena kuti akagamuchira mari yechiokomuhomwe yekutengesa mitambo uye aitora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri.   Svondo rino, pasi rose rakatyamadzwa kunzwa Taylor, uyo aive nemukurumbira pakutamba cricket, achitaura kuti akatambira mari yekutengesa mitambo yakasiyana uye aitora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri zvinosanganisira cocaine.   Asi anoti akatsotswa mukuita izvi uye zvimwe zvacho aiita achityisidzirwa.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZC, mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri, Darlington Majonga anoti vari kuzviziva kuti sangano reInternational Cricket Council riri kuongorora Taylor uye vakamirira kunzwa kubva kuICC zvavanenge vawana mutsvakurudzo yavo.   “Zimbabwe Cricket yanzwa nezvemashoko ari kunzi akaburitswa neaimbove mutambi wemaChevrons, Brendan Taylor, apo zviri kunzi ari kubvuma kuti akatambira mari yechiokomuhomwe yekutengesa mitambo uye nekushandisa zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwi mumuviri.   “Tinozivisa kuti ICC iri kuongorora Taylor maererano nekutyora mitemo inorambidza nyaya dzehuwori mumutambo wecricket.   “Nekudaro kusvika ICC yaburitsa zvainenge yawana mutsvakurudzo dzayo, ZC haisi kuzotaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi,” anodaro Majonga.   Nyaya yaTaylor inotevera imwe yeaimbove kaputeni wemaChevrons zvekare, Heath Streak, uyo gore radarika akatemerwa zvirango zvekuti asawane chekuita nemutambo uyu kwemakore masere neICC zvichitevera tsvakurudzo yakaitwa ndokuonekwa kuti akatambira mari yechiokomuhomwe yekuti atengese mitambo uye haana kumhan’ara paakavingwa nevanhu vachimukurudzira kuti atengese mitambo iyi.

headline: VaCharamba Vonyomba Vamwe muZanu PF Vari Kurwira Chigaro chaVaMugabe
text: Kunetsana uku kwakabuda zvekare neChina apo gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro soro , VaJonathan Moyo, vakakandirana makobvu nematete nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaGeorge Charamba. Makakatanwa, kukandirana makobvu nematete, uye kunyombana kuri kuenderera mberi muZanu PF apo mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kumusangano weAfrican Union uri kuitirwa kuEthiopia. Mubato iri munonzi mune kunetsana pakati pechikwata chinonzi chiri kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, nechimwe chinonzi Generation 40 icho chinonzi chine nhengo dzakaita saAmai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, pamwe nemuzukuru waVaMugabe, Va Patrick Zhuwawo, vanova gurukota rezvevechidiki. No media source currently available VaMugabe vakanzi havo neZanu-PF ndivo vachamirira bato muna 2018 asi nyaya yekuti vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri iri kupa kuti vanhu varwire chigaro chavo. Kunetsana uku kwakabuda zvekare neChina apo gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro soro , VaJonathan Moyo, vakakandirana makobvu nematete nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaGeorge Charamba. VaCharamba vakaita hurukuro nenhenpfenyuro yeZiFM vachirova havo imbwa vakaviga mupini vachiti pane vamwe muZanuPF vanoshandisa dande mutande retwitter kurwa hondo yekuda kutsiva VaMugabe vachinyomba vamwe. VaMoyo havana kutora nguva vakabva vaenda patwiter vachinyomba VaCharamba vachiti VaCharamba vainge voshandisa hofisi yavo zvisizvo vachitsigira chimwe chikwata chezvematongerwo enyika mubato reZanu-PF Asi mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vati havana zvakawanda zvekutaura sezvo dare ravo repolitburo risati ragara, uye vakati havaone havo vachidaidzira musangano wekuzeya nyaya iyi kunze kwekunge mumwe munhu aikwidza kuvakuru vebato. VaKhaya Moyo vanoti vangatotaure havo nezvechirongwa chehurumende chekugadzirisa hupfumi che ZimAsset pane kutaura nezvenyaya yekunetsana mubato ravo panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatsiva VaMugabe kana vachinge vasiya chigaro. Nyanzvi inoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari mubhodhi resangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, zvinhu zvanyanyisa kuita manyama amire nerongo muZanu-PF.

headline: VaMangoma, VaNcube, VaMakoni neVamwe Voita Mushandirapamwe
text: Mapato mashanu anopikisana nehurumende yeZanu PF nemusi weChipiri akanyorerana chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe pamberi pesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 achiti kubatana kunowoedzera mukana wekubvisa hutungamiri hwaVaRobert Mugabe nebato ravo avo vave nemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu vari muhutongi. Mapato mashanu anopikisa anoti MDC yaVa Welshman Ncube, Mavambo Kusile Dawn kana kuti MKD, Zunde, Dare pamwe ne Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe kana kuti RDZ anyorerana chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa achiti kupinda musarudzo akapatsanurana hakuna zvakunobatsira pakukwikwidzana neZanu PF. Mutungamiri weRDZ, VaElton Mangoma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara zvikuru nekunyorerana kwavaita chibvumirano ichi nemamamwe mapato. Kunyangwe hazvo mapato mashanu aya anyorerana chibvumirano ichi, MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe neZimbabwe People First inotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru vanga vasina kumiririrwa asi VaMangoma vati mapato aya angangopinda mumubatanidzwa uyu. Izvi zvatsinhirirwa nemutungamiri weMKD, VaSimba Makoni avo vaimbove gurukota rezvehupfumi. VaTendai Biti, avo vanotungamira bato reProgressive Democratic Party kana kuti PDP, vanga varipowo pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi. VaBiti vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachiri kuda kumbonokumbira mvumo yekusaina gwaro iri kukomiti huru yebato ravo. Mutauriri weZapu, VaMjobiza Noko, vatiwo vakamirira kuenda kukongiresi yebato ravo kuti vazive gwara richatorwa nebato ravo panyaya iyi. Mutauriri weMDCT, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havana kunge vakokwa pakusainwa kwechibvumirano asi sebato vanotsigira nyaya yekuti mapato aite mushandirapamwe. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wePeople First, VaRugare Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havanawo kukokwa kumushandirapamwe uyu uye havana kana kumbotaurwa navo nezvenyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, VaMangoma vati mapato anenge asaina chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe ichi achazogara pasi owirirana kuti ndiyani achakwikwidza pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika akamirira mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa aya paine nguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika munyaya dzenhaurirano idzi vanoti mapato aya amhanyira kuumba mubatanidzwa kuti agokwanisa kuve nemasimba ekuti achatora chigaro chipi ndiyani sezvo variwo vatanga kunyorerana chibvumirano ichi. Zvinonzi nyaya yekuti achataungamira mubatanidzwa uyu ndiyani ndiyo iri kunyanyonetsa kunyangwe zvazvo paine kuwirirana mumapto anopikisa ose kuti panofanira kuve nemubatanidzwa wemapato ose anopikisa uchakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Inoti SADC neAU Ngadzizeye Nyaya yeKusagadzikana muZimbabwe neMozambique
text: Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti richayedza kuita hurukuro nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika vemuSADC kuti vakurudzire vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kuti vazeye matambudziko akatarisana neZimbabwe neMozambique arinoti anogona kukonzera matambudziko kunyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica. Izvi zvakabuda pamisangano yakaitwa nesangano iri kuMozambique yakapetwa nemusi weMugovera. Crisis in Zimbabwe yakaita misangano nebato riri kutonga reFrelimo, vemakereke nevemasangano akazvimirira oga. Kunyangwe hazvo sangano iri riri kuti muZimbabwe hamuna kugadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF rinoti munyika hamuna matambudziko uye rakatoramba kutambira vanamutongi gava kubva kuSouth Africa. Asi vebato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance vanoti munyika mapindwa naPongwe. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaMarvelous Khumalo vanoti hondo iri kuMozambique pakati pehumende nevanopfurikidza mwero vanotsigira chikwata cheIslamic State uye kusagadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muZimbabwe kunofanira kuzeyiwa kumisangano yeSADC neAfrican Union. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoshaya Vanoudza Nhunha Dzavo Mudzimai weMutungamiri eNyika
text: Vamwe vakwegura nevakaremara vanoti vakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda kusanganisira kutadza kurapwa nekuda kwekushaya mari kunyange hazvo vachifanirwa kubatsira nehurumende. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano pakati pemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakwegura nevakaremera muBulawayo. Amai Mnangagwa avo vange vachiperekedzwa negurukota rezvemadzimai Amai Sithembiso Nyoni pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vebazi rinoona nezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, kana kuti social welfare, vati vanoda kubatsira kuti vanhu munyika kusanganisira vakwegura pamwe nevakaremara vagare zvakanaka. Amai Mnangagwa vati vange vauya nevakuru vakuru veku social welfare kuzadzikisa chivimbiso chavakaita pavakasangana nevamwe vevakwegura nevakaremara muBulawayo muna Kubvumbi kuti vaizodzokazve vachisangana nevanhu ava vachipa mhinduro kuzvhichemo zvavo. Amai Mnangagwa vakurudzira vanhukadzi kuti vashandise mukana wekuvhurwa kwakaitwa bhanga remadzimai kuti vawane mari yekuzvisimudzira vachiti bhanga iri hariite zverusarura kuvanhukadzi vanenge vachida kuwana rubatsiro kwariri. Amai Mnanagwa vapa rubatsiro rwunosanganisira magumbeze, shuga pamwe nemupunga kune vakwegura nevakaremara. Mumwe wevakaremara auya pamusangano uyu, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo ati anoona sekuti musangano waitwa naAmai Mnangagwa inzira yekutsvaga nayo rutsigiro kubato reZanu PF pamberi pesarudzo vachibata vanhu kumeso kuti vachagadzirisa matambudziko anosangana nevakaremara pasina zvakati tsvikiti zvinobuda. Muzvare Chipo Matanganyidze vati kunyange hazvo vachinzi vanofanirwa kurapwa vachibatsirwa nehurumende, vakwegura nevakaremara vanotadza kuenda kuzvipatara nekuti vanenge vasina mari yekunyoresa inodiwa. Amai Sylvia Nyakudziwanza vati vafara kuti Amai Mnangagwa vauya kuzosangana nevakwegura nevakaremara. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakwegura vakawanda vari kutarisana nedambudziko rekushaya mari uye vanozonyanya kuomerwa sezvo vasisina simba rekuita mamwe mabasa angavawanise chauviri. Vamwe vevakaremara vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iite kuti zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana zvavanoshandisa zvitengwe kunze kwenyika vasingabhadhariswe mitero yakakura yekuzvipinza munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Oparadza Zvinotengeswa Mumigwagwa
text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vari kurasikirwa nezvinhu zvavo zvinokosha zviuru nezviuru zvemadhora izvo vari kutorerwa nemakanzuru mumaguta zvichetevera mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ekuti makanzuru anofanira kubvisa mumigwagwa vese vari kutengesa zviri kunze kwemutemo. Kunyange hazvo mamwe madhorobha asati atanga kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mumaguta akaita seHarare neMasvingo, mapurisa ekanzuru pamwe neeZimbabwe Republic Police, ZRP, ari kufamba mumigwagwa achitora zvinhu zvevanhu vanonzi vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisangabvumidzwe. KuMasvingo vaye vanenge vatorerwa zvinhu zvavo vanokwanisa kunozvitora kumahofisi ekanzuru kana ZRP kana vachinge vabhadhara faindi. MuHarare kanzuru inoti iri kuparadza mirivo, michero nezvimwe zvinhu zvinosvika matani maviri zuva rega rega. Mutauririri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvinhu izvi, zvinogona kuora, hazvibvumidzwe kudzorerwa mumigwagwa. Asi vanoti vaye vanenge vatorewa zvinhu zvakaita sembatya kana mbozhanhare vanokwanisa kuenda kunotora zvinhu zvavo kumahofisi ekanzuru vabvisa mubhadharo. VaChideme vanoti nyaya yekuparadza chikafu, michero nemiriwo inoitirwa kudzivirira zvirwere zvakaita sekorera sezvo zvinhu izvi zvinenge zvatorwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. VaChideme vati kana zvinhu zvikagarisa zvisina kutorwa, kanzuru inozvitengesa. Zvichakadai, VaChideme varamba mashoko ekuti mapurisa nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru vari kutora zvinhu zvinenge zvatorerwa vanoitengesera mumigwagwa vachiti izvi hazvibvumidzwe nemutemo. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Home Industries Association, Amai Martha Shumba, vati manyepo kuti vese vari kutorerwa zvinhu vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Vati semuenzaniso, kanzuru nemapurisa vari kutora zvinhu zvevanhu vari pane mimwe misika yakavhura kare kare. Zvichetevera mashoko aVaMugabe, gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare, Amai Mirriam Chikukwa, vakaita musangano nekanzuru yeHarare, mapurisa, masoja nemagadhijere vakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa icho chinonzi chicharamba chiripo kusvika guta rachena. Izvi zviri kuitwawo mune mamwe maguta nemadhorobha asi mamwe madhorobha achiri kuronga kuti ofambisa chirongwa ichi sei. Vanhu vakawanda munyika havana mabasa izvo zvave kuita kuti vararame nekutengesa mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kupona kuChirwere cheCOVID-19 Munyika Hwuri Kukwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pazviuru zvishanu zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nevashanu, kana kuti 5,745. Bazi iri rakaisawo huwandu hwevanhu vapona kuchirwere ichi pazviuru zvina zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu, kana kuti 4,525. Vanhu vafa vasvika pazana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 151. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara neCovid-19 munyika yose vave chiuru nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 1,069. Dunhu reMasvingo, iro ranga risati rashaikirwa nemunhu nekuda kwechirwere ichi, nemusi weChina rakazove nemunhu wekutanga kushaya anove munhu mumwe chete akashaya nemusi weChina. Vanhu vari kushaya vanonzi ndevaya vane makore ari pakati pemakumi mana nemakumi masere, vanhurume vachinzi ndivo vari kufa vakawanda nekukwirawo kwemakore. Asi Zvinonziwo pave netarisiro yekuti kudziya kwekunze kuchaderedza kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Portia Manangazira vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti vanotarisira kuti kupera kwechando kuchabatsira kuti vanhu vasarambe vari munzvimbo dzakamanikidzana vachitsvaga kudziirwa, izvo zvichabatsira kuti vasatapurirane chirwere. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kupona kubva kuCovid-19 kune chekuita netsanangudzo itsva yeWorld Health Organisation iyo inoti kana munhu akavhenekwa akawanikwa aine chirwere nekuti anga achinzwa kurwadziwa kana kuti anga aine zviratidzo, akazoita mazuva matatu asisina zviratidzo anobva anzi apora. Chimwe chinonzi naDr. Munatsi chakashandurwa neW-H-O ndechekuti munhu akavhenekwa akawanikwa aine chirwere asi akazoramba asina zviratidzo kwemazuva gumi anotevera anenge ave kutonzi apora. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vabatwa ne covid-19 pasi rose vanonzi neJohns Hopkins University Hospital vadarika pamamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri nezviuru mazana manomwe, kana kuti 22,700 000. Vanhu vashaya vanonzi vadarikawo zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina kana kuti 794 000. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro panyika dzose pavanhu vane Covid-19, iine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 5,576 000, vafa vachidarikawo zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvina kana kuti 174 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvipfumbamwe, kana kuti 599 000, vafa vachidarika zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana matanhatu kana kuti 12,600. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsana muMDC-T Kwotsemurawo Bato Iri Mudunhu reAmerica
text: Makakatanwa akatsemura bato rinopikisa reMDC-T kumusha, ayambukawo nyanza kuenda kuAmerica, uko kwavevo nemakakatanwa ekutungamira bato iri mudunhu reNorth America, zvichitevera kuparadzana kwaMuzvare Thokozani Khupe naVaNelson chamisa. Vatungamiri vaviri ava vaive nemakakatanwa ekurwira kutungamira bato iri, Muzvare Khupe vachiti ndivo vanofanirwa kutungamira sezvo vakasarudzwa kukongiresi yebato iri muna 2014, ukuwo VaChamisa vachiti ndivo vanokodzera, sezvo vakasarudzwa ne National Council yebato kuti vatore chigaro chakasiiwa nemushakabvu, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. NeSvondo manheru, dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri dziri muAmerica, dzakasarudza nhengo dzichafanobata basa kusvika gore rinouya panotarisirwa kuzoitwa kongiresi yebato iri. Nhengo dzakasarudza hutungamiri hutsva idzi dziri kupomera komiti yagara iripo, inotungamirwa naVaDen Moyo, mhosva yekusatambira VaChamisa semutungamiri webato, ichinzi iri kutsigira chikwata chaMuzvare Khupe. Komiti itsva yakasarudzwa iyi ichange ichitungamirirwa naVaZvidzai Ruzvidzo, avo vanove sachigaro, vachiteverwa naVaJoseph Nyamanjiwa, Doctor Wangu Mazodze vari munyori. VaNick Mada ndivo vakasarudzwa kuve munyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano, VaOwen Ndlovu vachive mubati wehomwe. Doctor Stan Mukasa ndivo vakasarudzwa kuve munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, kuchitiwo Amai Dinah Muzirwa, vachisarudzwa sasachigaro weboka remadzimai. VaEdmond Musara ndivo vakasarudzwa kuve sachigaro weboka revechidiki. Doctor Mazodze vanoti vakaumba komiti itsva iyi nemakomborero evakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro webato rose, VaMorgen Komichi, mushure mekuona kuti bato rakanga risisina hutungamiri muAmerica. No media source currently available Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaKomichi panguva yataenda pamhepo. Asi VaDen Moyo vari kuramba kutambira kuti vakabviswa pachigaro, vachiti ivo nekomiti yavo vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo nekongiresi, nekudaro vanofanirwa kubviswawo pachiteverwa bumbiro remitemo yebato. Vanotiwo pagara paine vanhu vari kuda kubvuta masimba kubva pakasarudzwa komiti yavo. No media source currently available

headline: ZOC yoyambira vatambi
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Olympic Committee (ZOC) riri kukurudzira vatambi vakabudirira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yeTokyo 2020 Olympic Games, kuJapan kuti vatevedzere mitemo yose yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mitambo iyi iri kutanga munaChikunguru.   Sangano reInternational Olympic Committee rakaparura “Play Book” iro rine matanho anofanirwa kutevedzerwa nevatambi vose vachakwikwidza kumaOlympics senzira yekudzivirira denda iri.   Matanho ari muPlay Book iri anosanganisira kuvhenekwa Covid-19 vatambi vasati vaenda kuJapan, kukurudzira kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19, kugara vakapfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nemvura ine sipo nguva nenguva kana kushandisa sanitizer uye kuti vasaungane. Chamangwiza weZOC – Stephen Mudawarima – anoti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira chikwata cheTeam Zimbabwe chichaenda kuTokyo kuti chigare chakachengetedzeka uye kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19.   “Kwakauya Playbook remaOlympics iro takatumira kune vose vachaenda kumitambo iyi zvakabva kuInternational Olympic Committee maringe nekuzvichengetedza kubva kuCovid-19. “Tiri kukurudzira vatambi vose kuti ngavatevedzere zviri muPlaybook iri nekuti ndizvo zvichatibatsira patichaenda kuJapan kuti tinge takachengetedzeka kubva kuCovid-19. Matanho arimo anosanganisira kuvhenekwa Covid-19, kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, kugara takapfeka mamasiki, kugeza maoko nguva dzose uye kusaungana.   “Tiri panyaya yekubaiwa nhomba, hazvimanikidzwe munhu, asi isu tiri kuita hurukuro nevatambi vemunyika yedu tichivazivisa zvakanakira kubaiwa nhomba iyi,” anodaro Mudawarima.   Pari zvino muZimbabwe, vatambi vatatu kubva mumitambo inoti rowing nevaviri vanotuhwina ndivo vabudirira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo iyi. Mudawarima anoti pane mumwe mutambi wegorofu achiri pakati pekukwikwidza nekurwira kuenda kumitambo iyi saka vakangobatira hana mumaoko kuti agobudirira.   “Tine mutambi wedu wegorofu iye zvino akagara pa51 kubva pavatambi 60, saka tikasvika musi wa21 Chikumi ari mutop 60 anenge ahwina tikiti rekuendawo kuTokyo,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, sangano reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ) rinoti riri kutarisira kuti shangwiti dzemujaho wekumhanya dzichabudirirawo kuenda kumaOlympics.   Director wecoaching and development kuNAAZ – Phakamile Lisimati – anoti sangano ravo rakaisa tariro pashasha dzemujaho dzinosanganisira Tinotenda Matienda, Ngoni Makusha, Kundai Maguranyanga naChengetai Mapaya avo vachiri pakati pekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo iyi. “Vatambi vedu vekumhanya vamwe vari kuAmerica koita vari kuSouth Africa uko vari kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo iyi.
