Vanomhanya vanofanira kubata nguva dzinotarisirwa kuti vakwikwidze musi wa29 Chikumi saka vari kukwikwidza vari kunyika dzakasiyana.   “Isu kuno tinenge tichikurukura navo tichivaudza zvekuita kuti vagobudirira kuenda kumitambo iyi,” anodaro Lisimati.   Mitambo yemaOlympics yaifanira kuitwa gore radarika asi yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye ichatanga musi wa23 Chikunguru ichipera musi wa8 Nyamavhuvhu.

headline: Global Fund Yobatsira Zimbabwe neMari Kuitira Kuti Irwise Coranavirus
text: Sangano reGlobal Fund ravimbisa kupa Zimbabwe mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kuitira kuti igobatisra mukurwisa hutachiwana hweCoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19. Mukuru wesangano reGlobal Fund, VaPeter Sands, vazivisa nezverubatsiro uhwu pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau vari pamwe chete negurukota rezvehutano, VaObadiah Moyo. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti mari yavavimbisa kupa nyika mukurwisa Covid-19 ichauya riinhi, VaSands vati vakarerutsa zvinodiwa pakuti nyika inoda rubatsiro kubva kwavari iwane mari nekuda kwekuona kuti covid-19 iri kutekeshera pasi rose. Vati vanotarisira kuti mari iyi inogona kuburitswa mukati memazuva mashanu. Asi vati kupa rubatsiro urwu hakurevi kuti sangano reGlobal Fund rave kuzobvisa maziso aro pachinangwa charo chikuru chekurwisa zvirwere zveHIV/Aids, malaria nerurindi. VaSands vazivisawo kuti pamwaka mutsva wechirongwa cherubatsiro rwavanopa kunyika dzakasiyana siyana kurwisa zvirwerere zveHIV/ Aids, Malaria neTuberculosis, Zimbabwe iri kuzowana mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora yekuAmerica vakatiwo vari kufara nebasa riri kuitwa neZimbabwe mukurwisa zvirwere zvitatu izvi. Pamwaka wakapfuura wechirongwa ichi, Zimbabwe yaive yapiwa mazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemanomwe emamiriyoni emadhora yekurwisa zvirwere izvi. VaMoyo vati hurumende inofara zvikuru nerubatsiro rwairi kupiwa neGlobal Fund vachiti kuwedzera kwayaita mari yekurwisa zvirwere zveHIV/Aids malaria nerurindi kunoratidza kuti hurumende iri kushandisa mari inobva kuchirongwa ichi nemazvo. Panyaya yekuti hurumende haina kugadzirira zvakakwana pakurwisa hutachiwana hweCovid-19 kana hukatekeshera munyika uye kuti hurumende haizi kutaura chokwadi pamusoro pekuti pane vanhu vabatwa nehutachiwana uhu here kana kuti kwete, munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Agnes Mahomwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kuvimba nezviri kutaurwa nehurumende. Dr Mahomva vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaite tsika yekuchengetedza hutano senzira yekudzivirira kuti hutachiwana uhu huve munyika. MuZimbabwe hamusati mave nemunhu ati abatwa nehutachiwana hweCovid-19 kusvika pari zvino kubvira pahwakatanga kuzivikanwa nezvaho kuChina pakupera kwegore rapera. South Africa yave nevanhu gumi nevatatu vakabatwa nehutachiwana uhu uye. Hurumende inoti iri kuita zvose zvainogona pakutarisa vose vanopinda munyika panhandare dzendege pamwe nepamiganhu yenyika uye kuzivisawo veruzhinji nezvehutachiwana uhu nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vafa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuongororwa Ropa Kuti Vazive Pavamire paNyaya yeHIV/AIDS
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakatora matanho okuti munhu wese awane rubatsiro rwekuwana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheshuramatongo cheHIV/Aids kune vanhu vakawandisa vasati vave neruzivo maerarano nezvinhu zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Imwe nyanzi munyaya dzehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vanoti chimwe chezvinhu chinonyanya kukonzera chirwere che HIV, kusangana pabonde pasina kushandisa zvekuzvidzivirira zvakaita semakondomu. Vanotiwo kana munhu akabaiwa netsono yambobaiwa munhu ane hutachiwana hweHIV kana kutemwa nyora nereza yambocheka munhu ane HIV/Aids zvinogona kuti munhu atapurirwe chirwere. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere ichi chashungurudza mhuri dzakawanda asi Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuwanira vanhu mushonga zvapa kuti zvinhu zvive nani. Vaenderera mberi vachitiwo zvinofadza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere ichi hwadzikira zvikuru kana zvichienzaniswa nezvaiitika mumakore apfuura. VaEmmanuel Gasa vekusangano reAids and Arts Foundation vakatsigira mashoko akataurwa naDr Chiripanyanga vachiti vanhu vazhinji havazive pavamire maererano nezvehutachiwana hweHIV. Muzvare Maria Munzvandi veku Dzivaresekwa vanove mumwe wevakadzi vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV vanoti munhu wese, zvikuru vari muwanano vanofanira kuvhenekwa kuti vazive pavamire marerano nezveHIV/Aids. Muzvare Munzvandi vanoti pane zvimwe zvinhu zvisingaburitswe pachena zvinokonzera kutapuriranwa kweHIV zvinova zvinhu zvinofanira kujekesera vanhu zvakanyanyisa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyasha Nyamande vanoti Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rehurwere weHIV/Aids kunyangwe hazvo kwave nemishonga inokwanisa kuwedzera makore ekurarama kwevanhu vanorarama nehutachiwana uhwu. Dr Nyamande vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuri kupa kuti hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi hunetse. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwawo nemumwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Muzvare Martha Tholana. Musi wa 1 Zvita ndiro zuva rinoyeuchidzwa vanhu nezvechirwere ichi, hurongwa uhu gore rino hwakairtirwa kuMucheke Stadium, Masvingo. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekukurudzira vanhu munharaudza dzavo kuti vataure nezvechirwere ichi kana kuti “Communities make the Difference.” No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeKuita Amai Mahofa Gamba Yokonzera Mutauro muMasvingo
text: Mudunhu reMasvingo maita kusawirirana kukuru nedanho rakatorwa nePolitburo yeZanu-PF rekupa ruremekedzo rwegamba kugurukota rinoona nezvedunhu iri Amai Shuvai Mahofa avo vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro. Vamwe vagari vekwaGutu ne vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti Amai Mahofa avo vakashaya musi weMuvhuro vange vasinga kodzeri kuti vavigwe panzvimbo yemagamba enyika kuHarare nenyaya yekuti vaikurudzira mhirizhonga yezve matongerwe enyika mudunhu iri. Vanhu vataura ne Studio 7 vanoti kunyangwe hazvo Amai Mahofa vakamirira mira vachibatsira varwi verusungunuko munguva yehondo yechimurenga vari Chimbwido, uye vakazoshandira nyika yave nekuzvitonga kuzere, mhosva dzavari kupomerwa dzekushungurudza vanhu avo vaiva nemaonero akasiyana neavo pane zvematongerwe enyika zvinoita kuti vasakodzere. Amai Mahofa avo vakaita nguva huru vari nhengo ye Paramende ku Gutu South vanopomerwa mhosva yekutuma vechidiki veZanu PF kurova pamwe nekuuraya vemapato anopikisa maGutu ne nzvimbo dzakatenderedza. Vakambopomwerwa zve mhosva yekutuma vana vavo nevatsigiri kuponda murwi werusununguko, VaAmos Maseva, izvo zvakazoita kuti mwana wavo Ben Jnr Mahofa, atongerwe makore mana mujeri ne mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaOnus Omajee muna Chikumi gore ra 2006. VaSilas Gono vanobva kwaMajata kwa Chiwara kumusha kwemushakabvu ndomumwe ane mafungire akadai, “Isu sevanhu veku Gutu South hationi vakakodzera kuitwa Gamba.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Chekutanga hapana development yavakatiria vari MP wedu. Chechipri vaiti munhu anoda kuvakwikwidza kana anofunga zvakasiyana navo vaitumira vanhu vorova. Vakamborova mumwe muwar veteran akafa nenyaya yeimba uye vaitorera vamwe vakadzi varume.” VaJeferyson Chitando mutauriri webato reNPP vari mugari wemuMasvingo vanoti vanhu vakasangana nemhirizhonga yaikonzerwa naMai Mahofa mudunhu rose reMasvingo havasi kufara kuti varadzikwe kunzvimbo yemagamba, “Mai Mahofa vanozivakanwa semunhu akanga arimujibha , akange ari chimbwido achibikira vana mukoma kuti hondo ienderere mberi. Vakasevenza muhurumende, vakaita MP weGutu south kwenguva yakatirebei, vakazoita Senator, vakazoita Gavena asi pose pavawana zvinzvimbo izvi vaishandisa mhirizhonga.” Mai Mahofa vaizivikanwa nezita rekuti Chikoforo mudunhu reMasvingo nenyaya yavaipomerwa yekushandisa chisimba pane zvematongerwe enyika. Asi vamwe vatsigiri ve Zanu PF vakaita saAmai Elizabeth Svinurai vanoti mai Mahofa igamba chairo renyika, “Ndinoona sezvakakodzera nekuti mai Mahofa semudzimai vaikomirimira vachikurudzira madzimai echidiki muZanu PF kuti tiite zvemaooko.” VaLeornard Sungano mumwe wevechidiki weZanu PF vakatenderana naAmai Svinurai vachiti Mai Mahofa vakashandira nyika zvakasimba hupenyu hwao hwose.  Vemapato anopikisa vanoti nzvimbo ye magamba yangova nzvimbo inovigwa vanhu vasina chiremera vachiti magamba chaiwo anonyimwa ruremekedzo nekuti vanenge vapikisa pfungwa dze Zanu PF. Asi vachitaura pazororo remagamba richangopfuura, mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakati vanopikisa ava havangavigwe pamarinda eheroes Acre nekuti vari kupa kuti nyika itemerwe zvirango nevekunze. Sachigaro we Zanu PF muMasvingo VaEzra Chadzamira vaudza vatori venhau kuti mutumbi wa Amai Mahofa ucharara mumba mavo nhasi ku Rhodene vozoendeswa kumba yavo yekwa Mpandawana kwaGutu nemusi weChishanu uko kuchapuwa vagari veko mukana wekuonekana navo kekupedzisira panhandare yebhora yepa Makombo, vozoendeswa kuHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weBato Rinopikisa muDRC, VaTshisekedi, Vanokunda muSarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika
text: Mushure memazuva akawanda akufungidzira kuti ndiani achakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika muDemocratic Republic of Congo, boka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika iyi, reCENI razivisa kuti VaFelix Tshisekedi ndivo vakakunda. Izvi zvinenge zvave kureva kuti masimba anenge ave kuenda kune mumwe nenzira yegutsaruzhinji kekutanga kubva pakawana nyika iyi kuzvitonga kuzere kubva kuBelgium muna 1960. Mashoko aya aziviswa paine mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga akawanda aiswa muguta guru reKinshasa, paine kutyirwa kwemhirizhonga yezvakabuda musarudzo dzemusi wa 30 Zvita idzi, idzo dzainzi nevamwe dzabiridzirwa. Muzinda weAmerica muDemocratic Republic of Congo wakanga wayambira zvizvarwa zvenyika yazvo kuti zvibude munyika iyi, apo vakuru muhurumende yenyika vakanga vachigadzirira kuzivisa zvakabuda musarudzo. Paine nevakakwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri vane chitsama, asi vatatu vaive pamusoro ndaVaEmmanuel Ramazani Shadary, vebato riri kutonga reCommon Front for the Congo, avo vanodyidzana zvakanyanya nehurumende yaVaKabila. VaMartin Fayulu vakasarudzwa nevemapato makuru anopikisa mushure memusangano kuGeneva muna Mbudzi 2018. Kwozotiwo vaTshisekedi, vanotungamira rimwe remapato ave nemakore achipikisa hurumende muDRC, re Union for Democracy and Social Progress. Sarudzo dzemuDRC dzakanga dzave nemakore maviri dzichirongwa nezvadzo, asi dzakambosendekwa parutivi ruviri nebato riri kutonga reCommon Front for the Congo.

headline: Makanzuru Anoti Vagari Ngavabhadhare Mitero Yakakwira Sezvo Mari yemaRTGS Iri Kushaya Simba
text: Makanzuru akawanda munyika ari kuchema chema kuti mitemo yehurumende pagwara rezvehupfumi iri kungovandudzwa nguva nenguva negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, uye gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, yave kukanganisa mashandiro ayo zvekuti vave kuda kuti mari dziri kubhadharwa nevagari semutero pamwedzi dziwedzerwe. Hurumende yakambotanga yati mari yemaRTGS nedhora rekuAmerica zvakayenzana isati yati huremu hupimwe nemabhanga zuva nezuva. Izvi zvinonzi nemakanzuru akawanda zvavhiringidza mabasa avo sezvo mitengo yabva yawedzerwa zvakanyanya. Asi vagari vanoti havana mari iri kutaurwa kuti vawedzere. Meya weguta reHarar, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuda kuti vagari vawedzere mari dzemitero nekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nameya weguta reKweke, Amai Angeline Kasipo, vatendawo kuti kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura nezvimwe zvikwanisiro zvave kuomera kanzuru yavo. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollins Maboke, vanoti zvinhu kukanzuru yavo zvakaita mhidigari zvekuti havachwakwanise kuita mabasa avanotarisirwa nevagari. Mumwe kanzura wekuChitungwiza atiwo kanzuru yaremerwa nemutoro wekutadza kuwana mari. Ko vagari vari kuonawo sei nyaya yekuti mari iwedzerwe? Mukuru weChitungwiza and Manyame Rural Residents' Association, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vanoti zvinhu zvakaomera vagari vazhinji. Mutungamiri weHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vati havatenderana zvachose nezviri kuda kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuti vabhadhare mari yakawanda yemitero. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naVaAnoziva Muguti vanove mukuru weMasvingo Residents and Ratepayers Association. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa mumaguta umu munotanga kupararira zvirwere zvakaita setyphoid nekorera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kana hupfumi hwenyika husina kugadziriswa, makanzuru acharambawo achitatarika. Gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vari mumusangano uye vachapindura mibvunzo yedu panyaya iyi svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inoshora SADC Pakusaita Hurukuro yeZviri Kunetsa muZimbabwe
text: Zvichitevera kupera kwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika dzeSADC pasina zvataurwa pamusoro pezviri kuitika muZimbabwe, bato guru rinopikisa, reMDC Alliance, rinoti zvinorishamisa kuti vatungamiri veSADC vakaregera kukurukura zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakaona zvakakodzera kutuma nhumwa dzavo ku Zimbabwe kunoita hurukuro pamusoro penyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Mugwaro ravatumira kuvatori venhau, vanoona nezvekudyidzana nevekunze mubato reMDC Alliance, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vanoti hurumende yaVaEmerson Mnangagwa iri kushandisa dambudziko re COVID-19 senzira yekudzvanyirira vanhu munyika. Muzvare Hlatywayo vanoti vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vatori venhau, magweta, vanomirira vashandi nevemasangano anomirira vanhu, vemakereke nevemapato anokwikwidza vanoshungurudzwa apo vachiita mabasa avo zviri pasi pemutemo. Muzvare Hlatywayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo richaramba richiedza kuita hurukuro neSADC, pamwe chete nevatungamiri venyika dziri musangano iri nevamwe, kusvika nyaya yeZimbabwe yagadziriswa. No media source currently available  Asi sachigaro vebato re Zanu-PF muNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoramba mashoko ese ataurwa mugwaro reMDC Alliance, vachiti chirwere cheCOVID-19 hachisi chekutamba nacho, naizvozvo hurumende inoisa mirairo inodzikisa mafambiro evanhu kuti ibatsire mukuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu vayo.  VaCharumbira vanoti SADC haina kukurukura pamusoro peZimbabwe nekuti muZimbabwe hamuna dambudziko rinokodzera kukurukurwa. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata zvorwira kupinda muPSL
text: KUCHANGE kusingadanwe anonzwa svondo rino muDivision One kuSouthern Region apo Hwange FC ichasangana neAjax Hotspurs kuchiti ZPC Hwange ichitatsuranawo neIndlovu Iyanyathela.   KuSouthern Region, Hwange FC neZPC Hwange ndizvo zvikwata zviri kurwira kupinda muPremier Soccer League (PSL) gore rinotevera.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvasarirwa nemitambo miviri kuti paonekwe kuti ndechipi chikwata chichatevera Simba Bhora iyo yakabva kuNorthern Region, Green Fuel FC (Eastern Region) neSheasham FC (Central Region) izvo zvakatobudirira kupinda muPSL mwaka unotevera.   Mumitambo yesvondo rino, Hwange FC ikahwina mutambo wayo ukuwo nekune rimwe divi ZPC Hwange yokundwa, Hwange FC ndiyo inobva yahwina tikiti rekupinda muPSL mwaka unotevera.   Zvakadaro, svondo radarika chikwata cheSimba Bhora chakahwina tikiti rekupinda muPSL zvichitevera kukunda kwayakaita Commando Bullets 3-0 kuWadzanai Stadium kuShamva.   Simba Bhora yakakwanisa kuwana mukana uyu pamberi peGolden Eagles neHerentals U-20 izvo zvairwirawo kupinda muPSL gore rinotevera. Achitaura zvichitevera kupinda kwakaita Simba Bhora muPSL, murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Arthur Tutani, anoti mwaka wegore rino weRuyamuro Northern Region wange wakakura nekudaro waida kuti varwe semvumba.   “Mutambo wange wakaoma zvikuru, asi takaramba takangosona vanhu tichiziva kuti mujaho wakareba. Mujaho wacho wange wakareba saka takarwa kubva pekutanga kusvika kumagumo.   “Zvatave kupinda muPremier League seSimba Bhora, tinofanirwa kusimbisa chikwata chedu kuitira kuti chigokwanisa kumisidzana nezvimwe zvikwata zvemuPSL,” anodaro Tutani.

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Orwisa Kuti Avewo neChekuita muZEC
text: Mapato anopikisa ari pasi pemubatanidzwa uri kurwira kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe, weNational Electoral Reform Agenda, NERA, nemamwe akazvimirira neMuvhuro akaita musangano neZEC kuti vajekeserwe nezvemamiriro achange akaita zvinhu panguva yesarudzo dza 2018, uye kuti apewo pfungwa dzawo. Vari kutaura vakamirira NERA, VaDouglas Mwonzora vebato reMDC T vanoti semapato anopikisa, vaive nezvinhu zvitatu zvavanoda kuti ZEC igadzirise, zvinosanganisira kuti semapato vange varipowo panosarudzwa neZEC nzvimbo dzekuvhotera. Vanoti vanodawo kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika apindewo mumakomiti eZEC, ayo vanoti akazara nemauto nevasori, uye vanodawo kuti vange varipowo panodhindwa magwaro ekuvhotesa. VaMwonzora vanoti chikuru chanyanya kuti mapato anopikisa adewo kuve nechekuita nemafambisirwo enyaya dzesarudzo neZEC ndechekuti zvinhu zvose zvairerekera kubato riri kutonga reZanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Mapazi eHurumende Onakurirana Nyoka Mhenyu neSakunda paMabhiriyoni eCommand Agriculture Akatsakatika
text: Grain Marketing Board (GMB) nhasi yaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende yePublic Accounts Committee (PAC) kuti yainge isineyi nechekuita nechirongwa chehurumende cheCommand Agriculture ichiti Sakunda Holdings ndiyo yaitungamira chirongwa ichi. Izvi zvinopokana nezvakataurwa neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, bazi rezvemari nebazi rezvekurima avo vakaudza paramende kuti GMB ndiyo yakapihwa mari yechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture. Komiti yePAC iri kuongorora mashandisirwo akaitwa mabhiriyoni emadhora nehurumende pachirongwa cheCommand Agriculture zvisina mvumo yeparamende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa muGMB, VaClemence Guta, vaudza PAC, kuti basa reGMB raive rekuchengeta nekupa varimi mbeu, fotereza nezvimwe zvaishandiswa pachirongwa icho vati chaitungamirwa neSakunda Holdings. Asi sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vavo varatidza kusafara nemhinduro iyi vachiti semuenzaniso, vaive munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemari, VaRingison Chitsiko, vakaudza komiti yavo kuti vainge vasingazive kuti mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere nemakumi mana nemanomwe yakapihwa nehurumende kutsigira mabasa ekurima muna 2017 yainge yashandiswei vachiti GMB ndiyo yaiziva kuti mari iyi zvakaitika. Asi VaGuta pamwe nevakafanoba chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvemari muGMB, Amai Constansia Dzenga, vati havana chavanoziva pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti ivo vaingo tambira mbeu nefotereza zvaiuyakumatura avo vachizviendesa kuvarimi. Vati havana kana gwaro ravakasaina reCommand Agriculture vachiti Sakunda, nechikamu chaiona nezveCommand Agriculture mubazi rezvekurima ndivo vaiziva zvaitika. Amai Dzenga vati nekuda kwaizvozvo havatomboziva kuti zvinhu zvavaichengeta zvaiita marii sezvo zvange zvisiri zvinhu zvavo. Panyaya yekuti GMB yakapihwa mari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti $1.3 billion muna 2017 na2018 kuti itsigire mabasa ekurima, VaGuta vati pane musiyano pamari dziri kutaurwa idzi pamwe nedzavakawana. Amai Dzenga vatiwo semuenzaniso muna 2018 vakapihwa mamiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti $900 million kwete bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti $1.3 billion iri kutaurwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaMarko Raidza vati zvinonetsa kutambira zvinoitaurwa nevakuru vakuru veGMB pasina humbowo. Asi VaBiti zviri kutika kuGMB ishura chairo uye zviri pachena kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo mukambani iyi. Vati komiti yavo inogona kuti kambani iyi iongororwe zvakanyanya kana kuti Forensic Audit nekuti zvinhu hazvisi fambiswa negwara chairo. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzati kuti nyaya iyi inatsobuda pachena, GMB, RBZ, bazi rezvemari pamwe nerekurima vanofanirwa kubvunzurudzwa pamwe chete kuti pasaite kukandirana nyika mhenyu. Pane mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbabwe emadhora yakashandiswa zvisvina mvumo yeparamende pachirongwa cheCommanda Agriculture uye PAC iri kuita ongororo yekuti marii iyi yakashandiswa sei. Kambani yeSakunda inotarisirwa kumira pamberi pekomiti iyi munguva pfupi inotevera. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vowedzera neMavhiki Maviri Mazuva eKuti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba Kurwisa Coronavirus
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakazivisa kuti vainge vawedzera nemamwe mavhiki maviri mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kusvika musi wa 3 Chivabvu. Izvi zvinotevera kusvika kumagumo kwemavhiki matatu avainge vambotara kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba ayo ange achifanira kupera nhasi. Vachitaura kunyika kuState House, mumashoko apihwa Studio 7 mvumo yekushandisa nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaMnangagwa vakati zviri pachena kuti mumavhiki matatu avainge vambotara huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hutori kuwedzera. Vakati Zimbabwe haisatiwo yazadzikisa zvose zvinoda kunzi zviitwe neWorld Health Organization kuti vanhu vanzi vabude mudzimba. Bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwawedzera kusvika pamakumi maviri nemashanu mushure mekunge mumwe mudzimai abatwa nechirwere ichi kuManicaland. Mudzimai uyu ainge adzoka munyika kubva kuFrance. Asi pane vanhu vaviri vapona kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vatatu ndivo vafa nechirwere ichi. Asi vati vemakambani emigodhi vanofanira kutanga basa mushure mekunge vashandi vose vavhenekwa. Vatiwo vemakambani akakosha vanokwanisawo kuita basa. VaMnangagwa vati bazi rezvemagariro evanhu richabatsira vamwe vave kunonga svosve nemuromo parizvino nenyaya yenzara. Vanhu vakawanda vari kuudza Studio 7 kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere muAfrica reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vave kudarika churu chimwe chete nemakumi masere Vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kusvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora nyaya dzechirwere checornavirus pasi rose inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Vanhu vafa vave kudarika churu zana nemakumi matanhatu. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika zviuru zvina

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, Vanosaina Bhiri Richaita Kuti Vanhu Vapiwe Rubatsiro Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Apo zvinhu zvanga zvoratida sekunge mamwe mapazi ehurumende yeAmerica achambovhara kutanga neChipiri nekuda kwekusavepo kwemari yekushandisa, mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaDonald Trump, neSvondo manheru vakasaina bhiri rinobvumidza kuvepo kwemari $2.3 trillion yekubatsira mapazi aya. Pmari yosei iyi, mazana mapfumbamwe emabhiriyoni emadhora, kana kuti $900 billion, ichabatsira vanhu munguva ino yecoronavirus, kuchiti imwe inoita $1.4 trillion ichashandiswa nemapazi ehurumende kusvika muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. Kunyange hazvo VaTrump vakasaina bhiri iri, vari kugunun’una zvikuru vachiti mari iri kupiwa vanhu kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino ye coronavirus ishoma zvikuru mushure mekunge matare eparamende nekongiresi apasisa bhiri iri svondo rapera. VaTrump vakati vakasaina bhiri iri sedanho rekudzora rubatsiro rwakanga rwuchipiwa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemana vakanga varasikirwa nerubatsiro rwunipowa vasingashande pamwe nemhuri dzakavhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19, uyewo kuitira kupa mukana kune makambani ari kutatarika. Munhu mumwe nemumwe ari kutarisirwa kuwana mari inoita madhora mazana matanhatu kana kuti US$600.00 yekubatsirikana nayo munguva ino ye coronavirus, asi VaTrump vanoti munhu oga oga aifanirwa kupiwa madhora zviuru zviviri zvemadhora. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Carolina muno muAmerica, VaPromise Sande, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaTrump zvakanaka chose sezvo zvichibatsira hurumende pamwe nevanhu vari kutambura. "Zvinhu zvanga zvakatarisirwa uye kusaina kwavo kuchabatsira zvikuru vanhu vemuAmerica," VaSande vanodaro. Vanoti veruzhinji vanogona kutanga kutowana mari idzi mukupera kwemasvondo maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weTNF weKuzeya Mari yeMushandi wePasi Wotadza Kuitwa
text: Musangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF wange uchifanira kuitwa neChina wekuzeya nyaya yekuti mushandi wepasi pasi munyika yose otambira marii hauna kuzoitwa sezvo sachigaro wemusangano uyu, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vange vakabatikana. Asi izvi hazvina kufadza sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti hakuna zvizhinji zvaikwanisa kuitwa kana VaNcube vasipo sezvo vari ivo vakabata homwe yemari. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti zvinenge zvakanakawo kuti vanhu vaudzwe pachine nguva kuti musangano hauchisiri kuitwa. No media source currently available  Mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti vange vasumwa havo nenyaya yekuti VaNcube vanenge vasipo asi vakawedzerawo kuti panoda kuzeyiwa nyaya yekudonha kwedhora remunyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko Voronga Nhaurirano neBritain
text: Vanotungamirira sangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vanoti vari kuronga musangano neBritain nedzimwer nyika dzakabudirira kuti vagadzirise nyaya yemagariro avo sezvo vari kuti hurumende yavarasa. Vesangano re ZLHR ava vakataura mashoko aya apo vakaita musangano nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChina. Munyori mukuru musangano re ZNLWA VaVictor Matemadanda vati kunyangwe hazvo vakazoshorwa kuti vave kuita misangano nevekumawirira havana hany'a nazvo sezvo chinangwa chavo chiri chekuti varwi vehondo yerusununguko vabatsirikane. Vati vane chivimbo chekuti hurukuro dzavachaita idzi dzichabatsira kusimudzira hupenyu hwevarwi verusununguko. VaMatemadanda vashoropodzawo Brigadier General Retired Asher Walter Tapfumaneyi munyori mubazi revakarwa hondo vachiti vanofanira kuregedza kuda kutonga sangano revarwi vehondo yerusununguko. VaTapfumaneyi vanoti hurumende yave kuda vatungamiri vatsva sezvo isingakwanise kushanda nevatungamiri varipo nekuti vakati mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ngavaende pamudyandigere vachitiwo havachavatsvagire rutsigiro. VaMatemadanda vati bato reZanu PF harina kumboita hany'a nevarwi vehondo yerusununguko uye sangano ravo isangano rakazvimirira risinei nebato reZanu PF. Vatiwo vari kushushikana kuti kunyangwe vakarwa hondo, vana veZimbbwe havana rusununguko. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano iri, VaFrancis Nhando vatsigira mashoko aya vachiti vakazvionera pamhuno sefodya apo vange vobvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kuti sei vange vakamira muHarare Gardens vari vana apo vaigadzirira kuita musangano wavo. Vanoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko musangano iri, VaDouglas Mahiya vati vanokatyamadzwa kuti hurumende inoda kupindira munyaya dzesangano revarwi verusunungukonekuyedza kuri putsa. Musangano uyu wange uine vanasachigaro vekumatunhu akasiyana-siyana avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende ichida kuvanganisa, vari kuzoramba vachibatira pamwe nemukuru wavo VaChristopher Mutsvangwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevakarwa hondo VaTshinga Dube kana VaTapfumaneyi sezo vange vasiri kudarira nharembozha dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yogadzirira Kuratidzira neMusi weChitatu muZanu-PF Muine Zinyekenyeke
text: Masangano akawanda munyika akaita seHash Tag This Flag, Tajamuka nemamwe ari kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasaende kumabasa nemusi weChitatu vachiratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika anoti haasi kuzodzokera kumashure nehurongwa uhu. Izvi zvinotevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro vachiti vaneta nenyaya yehuori hwavanoti huri kuitwa nevakuru vehurumende nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu vanofanira kumira tsika yekupisa nekupwanya zvinhu uye kurwisa mapurisa. Asi zvisati zvamboitika munhoroondo yenyika sangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe Liberation National War Veterans Association rati harione chakaipa nevanhu vanoratidzira murunyararo. Vesangano iri vatiwo havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti hurumende haisi kuvapa zvayakavavimbisa. Mutauriri wevakarwa hondo VaDouglas Mahiya vanoti nyaya yekuratidzira iri mubumbiro remitemo rakavhoterwa nevanhu vose munyika. No media source currently available Vanotungamira Hash Tag This Flag Pastor Evan Mawarire vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana kudzokera shure pahurongwa hwavo sezvo zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo munyika. Mutauriri wesangano reTajamuka iro rinova mubatanidzwa wevechidiki mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika uye vemasangano akazvimira oga VaPromise Mkwananzi vanotiwo hurongwa hwavo hwekuratidzira huri kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available VaStan Zvorwadza vesangano reNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe vatiwo naivo vari kutsigira kuratidzira kwemusi weChitatu. No media source currently available KuMasvingo kunonzi hakuna kumira zvakanaka sezvo vagari vari kunzi vange vabuda mudhorobha na 7 manheru emusi weChipiri. Vanhu vane chitsama vemasangano akazvimirira oga vakambosungwa vachinzi vaironga kuratidzira. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reCommunity Tolerance Reconciliation and Development (COTRAD), VaZivanai Muzorodzi vanoti vari kuenderera mberi nekuratidzira kuMasvingo. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro vechidiki muZanu-PF varikushora nyaya yekuratidzira kuri kurongwa nevanhu uku. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvevechidiki mubato iri VaKudzanai Chipanga vakaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vanhu havana fanire kutambira kuridziro yekuratidzira nemusi weChitatu. Vatiwo mapurisa anofanira kuona kuti munyika mune runyararo.

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Zvakarwirwa Hondo Hazvina Kuzadzikiswa Sezvo Nhamo Yatekeshera
text: Apo Zimbabwe iri kucherechedza zuva remagamba vamwe vanoti zvakarwirwa muhondo yerusununguko zviri kuzadzikiswa, asi vamwe vachitiwo kutambura kuri kuita vana veZimbabwe, chiratidzo chekuti nyika haisisiri mugwara raitarisirwa nevakarwira nyika. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti zvimwe zvakarwirwa muhondo yeChimurenga, kutora masimba ezvematongerwo enyika kwakaitwa nevanhu vatema. VaMahiya, avo vanove nhengo yeZanu PF, vanotiwo chimwe chakagonekwa munyika kupihwa kwakaitwa vanhu vatema mapurazi, kunyange hazvo zvakarwirwa muhondo yeChimurenga zvisina kubudirira zvese. VaMahiya vanoti hurumende yaiva yaVaRobert Mugabe yakavhiringa zvinhu nekuisa vanhu muzvinzvimbo asi vasina ruzivo rwezvakaenderwa kuhondo. Mumwe aive murwiri werusununguko, VaShadreck Makombe, vanotiwo chakanyanyobudirira kuwaniswa kuwaniswa minda kwevanhu vatema. Asiwo VaMakombe vanoti vamwe havachakoshesi vaimbove varwiri verusununguko, kunyanya vechidiki, vavanoti havachaoni kubatsira kwekusununguka kwenyika nekuti vanoona zvinhu zvavo zvisingachafambi. VaMakombe vanoti tarisiro yavo huru ndeyekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, varange vese vane huori munyika. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, Dr Tinashe Mawere, vanoti kwavari hapana chakachinja patsika dzehutongi sezvo kuchine hudzvinyiriri. Vanotiwo vanoona sekuti ropa rakadeukira mahara munguva yehondo. Mutauriri webato reMDC, VaDaniel Molekele, vanotiwo zvakarwirwa muhondo yekusunungura nyika zvakasiyana zvikuru nezviri kuitika munyika pari zvino. VaMolekele vanoti Zimbabwe yava kutoda kuvakwa patsva. Asi VaMahiya vanoti kutambura kuri kuitika munyika kwakakonzerwa nehutongi hwaVaMugabe, uhwo husina kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika, izvo vanoti zvava kugadziriswa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Vakawanda vanoti havaoni kukosha kwekuzvitonga kana munyika musina mabasa, kodzero dzevanhu dzichityorwa nehurumende, muzvipatara muchishaikwa mishonga, zvinhu zvichidhura muzvitoro, vanhu vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro asi vachipedzisira votengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa nepamusana pekushaikwa kwemabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeGukurahundi Yonzwikwa neChina Svondo Rinouya
text: Dare reHigh Court muBulawayo rati nyaya yechikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chekuti hurumende imire hurongwa hwekuda kuviga vanhu vakauraiwa panguva yeGukurahundi ichanzwikwa svondo rinouya. Mutongi wedare reHigh Court Justice, Martin Makonese, vati vave kuzonzwa chikumbiro ichi musi weChina svondo rinouya mushure mekunge gweta rehurumende, Rejoice Hove, rakumbira kupiwa nguva yekunyatsogadzirira zvizere. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaCharles Thomas, avo vanoti vakatochwa panguva yeGukurahundi, vachishanda pamwe nesangano reIbhetsu Likazulu, vakaendesa chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi chekuti hurumende imbomira hurongwa hwairi kuda kuita hwekuviga patsva vanhu vakauraiwa panguva iyi. Muchikumbiro ichi VaThomas, avo vari kumiririrwa negweta VaNqobani Sithole, vakadoma mutumgamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe, nasachigaro weNational Peace and Reconciliation VaSelo Nare saivo vanhu vane chekuita nenyaya iyi VaSithole vati nyaya iyi ichinzwikwa svondo rinouya sezvo gweta rehurumende rakumbira nguva, izvo zvatambirwa nedare. Amai Jenni Williams avo vanove mutungamiri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira ega, weMatabeleland Collective, varimowo munyaya iyi vakazvimirira pachavo vega sezvo mubatanidzwa wavo uri iwe wakavamba chirongwa chekutaura nemutungamiri wenyika kuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe. Pane mutemo wekuti kuviga vanhu patsva vakauraiwa nenzira seyeGukurahundi chinhu chinofanirwa kuitwa hurumende ichitungamidzwa pamberi. Pane vanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri vakauraiwa panguva yeGukurahundi pakati pemakore a1983 na1987 mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands nechikwata chemauto chainzi Fifth Brigade. VaMnangagwa vaive gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika panguva iyi mushakabvu Robert Mugabe vari mutungamiri wehurumende. Nyaya yeGukuruhandi inogara ichimutsa mutauro munyika nekuti vamwe vanoiwona seine chekuita nekurwisana kwemarudzi. Vamwe vanoti hurumende inifanirwa kubudisa pachena zvakaitika panguva iyi yokumbira ruregerero uye vakauraya vanhu ava votongwa kuitira kuti munyika muve nerunyararo rwechokwdi. Hurumende haisati yakumbira ruregerero panyaya iyi kusvika pari zvino.

headline: Vashandi veNRZ Vochemachema neKusabhadharwa Mari dzavo
text: Vashandi vekambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ, vanoti vanga vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichabatsirawo kambani yavo mukuona kuti vashandi vayo vawaniswa mihoro yavo, iyo yave nemwedzi inodarika gumi nemishanu vasati vatambiriswa. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi veNRZ, reZimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers Union, VaKamurai Moyo vanoti vashandi veNRZ vari kushupika zvakanyanya zvekuti hurumende iri kuzviona asi hapana matanho airi kutora ekugadzirisa dambudziko ravo. "Tanga tichitarisirawo sevashandi kuti hurumende inofanirwa kubatsira railways kuti vabhadharewo chimwe chikwereti chedu, nekuti iye zvino vanhu vari kufa, vanhu vari kurwara, vamwe vari kusiya mabasa nezira dzakasiyanasiyana, vachingosiya zvikwereti kurailways," VaMoyo vanodaro. Sachigaro vebhodhi reNRZ, VaLarry Mavhima, mwedzi wapera vakatenda kuti kambani yavo iri kukundikana kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzemihoro idzo dzave kudarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe emadhora, nekuda kwekuti haisi kushanda zvakakwana. VaMavhima vakazivisawo kuti dare remakurukota rakavapa mvumo yekuti vatsvage vanoda kubatana navo mumatanho avo ekumutsiridza kambani iyi. Asi VaMoyo vanoti hurongwa hwekuti kambani yeNRZ ibatane nevamwe vane mari hahuna kuipa, kana chete vashandi vasingazorasikirwa nemabasa. No media source currently available Gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti ichokwadi kuti NRZ ine chikwereti chevashandi chemari yakawanda, asi kambani iyi haisi kuita mari. "Mari inotambirwa navashandi inobva pabasa ravanoita. Kana pasina basa ravanoita hapana mari inouya, nokuti inobva kuna ani? havana basa," Doctor Gumbo vanodaro. Vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kutsvaga vanoda kubata neNRZ, asi vanowedzera vachiti pari zvino kambani iyi inotove nevashandi vakawandisa iyo isisina basa. Doctor Gumbo vanoti makambani aisimbopa NRZ basa akaita seemarasha, eshuga neesimende haacha basa raanoipa. No media source currently available

headline: VaPsychology Maziwisa Vanosungwa neNyaya dzeHuwori kuZESA
text: Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inosunga mumiriri weHighfield West muparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaPsychology Maziwisa nenyaya dzine chekuita nehuwori kukambani yemhando dzemoto yeZESA. Mumwe komishina weZACC, VaGoodson Nguni, nezuro usiku vakaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMaziwisa vakasungwa pamwechete nemumwe wavo mukambani yavo yekushambadzana, yeFruitful Communications, uye ari mushandi weZBC, Oscar Pambuka. VaNguni vakati vaviri ava varara kukamba yemapurisa yeAvondale Police Station, uye VaNguni vakati vaviri ava vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukama kambani yemhando dzemoto iyi zviuru zvemadhora kuburikidza nemari dzinonzi dzaibhadharwa kukambani yavo neZESA zvine huwori mukati. Nhengo yesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, VaPromise Sande vanoti vanotambira nerufaro danho riri kutorwa neZACC iri, kunyange hazvo vari kuti panofanirwa kunge pachisungwa munhu wese, kusanganisira vari muhurumende, kwete kungosunga vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeve kuchikwata cheG40 chete. Vaive gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge vakatosungwa vakamiswa pamberi pedare nenyaya dzine chekuita nehuwori hunonzi hwaiitika muZESA. No media source currently available

headline: Xhaka angangodzokera Borussia
text: Granit Xhaka, anoti anogona kudzokera kuBorussia Monchengladbach kana kondirakiti yake yapera.   Chizvarwa chekuSwitzerland ichi chakambotamba mwaka mina kuBundesliga asati ayenda kuArsenal mugore ra2019 uko akatengwa nemari inosvika £35m.   Xhaka iye zvino ane kondirakiti nemaGunners ichapera mugore ra2024 uye anoti angade kudzokera kuMonchengladbach kana chikwata chekuGerman ichi chichimuda.   Achitaura neMit Geredet Podcast anoti, “Handina kubva kuBorussia ndichiuya kuArsenal nekuda kwemari kwete. Chaive chishuvo changu kutamba muEngland.   “Ndichangobva kuwedzera kondirakiti yangu, iyo yasara nemakore maviri kuti ipere. “Ndichabva ndasvitsa makore 32 saka kana Max Eberl (Monchengladbach’s director of sport) achida kundidzosa ndine makore 32, saka ini musuwo wangu wakazarurwa ndinoenda.”   Xhaka achangobva kusaina kondirakiti imwe kuArsenal yegore mwaka uno, zvichitevera kudiwa kwaaiitwa naJose Mourinho murairidzi weRoma. Mutambi uyu (29) pari zvino haasati ave kutamba nhabvu zvichitevera kukuvara kwaakaita gumbo rake mumutambo weNorth Londona Derby apo Arsenal yakakunda Tottenham 3-1. Akakuvara paibvi rake izvo zvichamuona asingatambe nhabvu kwemwedzi mitatu. — SportsMail.

headline: VaDouglas Tapfuma Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mumwe mukuru mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika nedare remakurukota, VaDouglas Tapfuma, vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva nhatu dzehuori. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaCharles Muchemwa, vaudza dare kuti VaTapfuma vakashandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo pavakakonzeresa kutengwa kwemotokari nomwe kubva kuSouth Africa dziri muzita rehurumende asi vakazodzishandisa sedzavo. VaMuchemwa vati motokari dzose idzi dzakakonzera kuti hurumende irasikirwe nemari inoita madhora ekuAmerica zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nenhanhatu (US$11 936) sezvo pasina kubhadharwa mari yekupinza motokari idzi munyika kana kuti import duty. Rimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaEsau Mandipa, vaudza dare pavanga vachikumbira mukana wekuti musungwa abhadhariswe mari yechibatiso kuti VaTapfuma vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa sezvo vachiti motokari idzi ndedzehurumende sezvo mapepa ekuti dzisabhadhare mari yekupinzwa munyika akasainwa nemunyori mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nedare remakurukota, VaMisheck Sibanda. Mupurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi achishanda nekomisheni inorwisa huori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, VaTimothy Guta, vaudzawo dare kuti VaTapfuma havafanire kubuditswa muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vachiri kuvaferefetwe nenyaya yekupinzwa kwedzimwe motokari munyika dzinodarika zana vachishandisa chinzvimbo chavo zvisirizvo. Vati VaTapfuma, avo vave Chief Director Monitoring and Evaluation kuhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi vasina kudomwa mudare uye vanogona kusazomirira kana vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo vachiti humbowo huri kuvaroverera huri fararira. Asi mutongi wedare, VaHosea Mujaya, vatura mutongo wekuti VaTapfuma varambe vari muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi zvisinei nekuti havachashanda kuState House. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaValentine Mutatu. VaMutatu vati vave kukwidza nyaya iyi kumatare epamusoro. VaMujaya vati VaTapfuma vadzoke musi wa15 Nyamavhuvhu pachaenderera nyaya iyi Mberi. VaTapfuma vakambodomwawo munyaya yehuori kukambani yemarasha yeWankie Colliery uko kunonzi kwakashayikwa mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. VaTapfuma ndivo vave musungwa wechipiri anove mukuru muhurumende asungwa nenyaya yehuori kubva pakagadzwa komisheni itsva yeZacc nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa musi waChivabvu 30, 2019. Asi MDC yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti komisheni iyi, iyo inotungamirwa naAmai Loice Matanda Moyo, vanove mudzimai wegurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, haina mazino. VaMoyo, ndivo vakabuda pachivhitivhiti muna Mbudzi 2017 vachizivisa nyika kuti mauto ainge opindira mune zvematongerwo enyika zvakazokonzeresa kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. No media source currently available

headline: Musatore Mativi, Mutongi Anoudza ZBC neZimpapers
text: Bato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democractic Change ratambira mutongo wedare, reHigh Court, wekuti makambani enhau ehurumende, eZimpapers neZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, akatyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika nekuita basa rawo akarerekera kuZanu PF. Vachitaura pamusoro pemutongo wakapihwanaJustice Joseph Mafusire mudare High Court kuMasvingo nemusi weChitatu panyaya yakwakwidza kudare iri ne Fitinne Trust nevamwe vaviri, mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati mutongo uyu unotsinhira zvavagara vachitaura pamusoro peZBC neZimpapers. Asi vati chakakosha pari zvino kuona kuti mitemo yezvekutapwa kwenhau yavandudzwa kuitira kuti makambani akaita seZBC neZimpapers ashande achitevedza bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Gweta musangano reMedia Insitute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe, VaKuda Hove, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara chose nemutongo uyu nekuti ndozvavagara vachitaura nekurwira kuti ZBC ishande isina divi rayakarerekera. VaHove vati mutongo uyu wasimbisa shoko ravo uye vachaushandisa mubasa ravo rekukurudzira kuvandudzwa kwemitemo yezvekutapwa kwenhau kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi vati pachine mutoro kuti pave neshanduko pamashandiro emakambani Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumutauririri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chiramhanzu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sarudzo hadzihwinwe nekutibato rapihwa mukana wekutaura pachivhititi. Vatiwo bato ravo haritevedze mitongo yematare edzimhosva kuti rikunde musarudzo, asi kuti rinotsvaga rutsigiro kune veruzhinji. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaBekezela Gumbo, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo mutongo uyu wakanaka chose hauna zvauchabatsire nekuti sarudzo dzakatopera uye hauna zvauchasandura. Vati mitongo yaakaita seuyu inofanira kuitwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa kuti ive nechekuita nesarudzo dzinenge dzichiitwa munyika VaGumbo vatiwo veruzhinji havafaniri kufara zvakanyanya vachiti hurumende inozikanwa zvikuru nenyaya dzekusatevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. Kunyange hazvo vasina kutaura zvakanyanya kuZBC neZimpapers, mumutongo wavo Justice Mafusire vakati makambani ya anofanira kutevedza zvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Masango mazhinji emuno neekunze akaongorora sarudzo akaburitsawo kuti ZBC neZimpapers dzaita basa dzakarekerera kurimwe bato izvo zvakakanganisa mafambiro nezvakabuda musarudzo. Gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vakatoudza paramende kuti hurumende ichagadzirisa zvimwe zvakataurwa nemasangano aya kuti sarudzo dzinouya dzisaite mutauro. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yorambidza VaVan Hoogstraten Kupa Huchapupu Ichityira Kuti Vangafukura Hapwa paNyaya yeHwange Colliery
text: Nhengo dzeZanu PF nemusi weMuvhuro dzakaramba kuti muzvinabhizinisi, VaNick van Hoogstraten, avo vanove mumwe wevaridzi vekambani yemarasha, yeHwange Colliery, vape humbowo mudare iri. VaVanHoogstraten vaida kupa humbowo maererano nemafambisirwe ebasa mukambani iyi izvo zvisina kufadza sachigaro wekomiti yezvezvicherwa, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vazivisa kuti vanogona kusiya basa ravo. Godwin Mangudya anotipa nyaya inotevera. Kunze kwehurumende, VaVan Hoogstraten, ndivo vane zvikamu zvakawanda muHwange Colliery uye vange vakokwa neparamende kuti vazopa humbowo maerarano nemashandiro ekambani iyi sezvakaita vamwe asi izvi zvarambwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF. Nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaita ruzha dzichiramba kuti VaVanHoogstraten vasape humbowo dzinosanganisira, mumiriri weBuhera West VaSoul Nzuma, mumiriri weChiredzi North, VaRoy Bhila, mumiriri weGutu West VaJohn Paradza. Nhengo idzi dzakapopotedzana nasachigaro wekomiti iyi VaTemba Mliswa avo vakati nhengo dzange dziri kusvibisa zita nechimiro chebato radzo sezvo izvi zvose zvange zviri kuitika mumaziso aVaVan Hoogstraten. VaVan Hoogstraten vakaratidza kusafara nezvange zviri kuitika uye vakati dai zvaibvira nhengo dzainge dziri kuita ruzha dzadzingwa mudare nenyaya yekurizvidza. Asi VaVan Hoogstraten vakaudzwa nenhengo idzi kuti harisi basa ravo kudziudza zvekuita. Mushure meawa rimwe rekukandirana makobvu nematete mabharani wedare reparemende, VaKenneth Chokuda, vakazokwanisa kudzima gakava iri pakatorwa danho rekuti VaVan Hoogstraten vachirega kupa humbowo sezvo nyaya kugadziriswa kana kuti Reconstruction yeHwange Colliery yave kumatare edzimhosva. VaMliswa vakatiwo zvakaitika hazvina kuvafadza zvachose uye vanoona sekuti hazviratidzi chimiro chakanaka chenhengo dzeparamende. VaMliswa avo vanozvimirira vati vakapihwa chigaro ichi neZanu PF uye zvinosuwisa kuti dzimwe nhengi muZanu PF hadzisi kuda kuti vari kuita huwori vasasikwe pachena. VaMliswa vakati vachataura nevakuru uye vachizivisa veruzhinji kuti vacharamba vari sachigaro wekomiti iyi here kana kuti kwete. Zvichakadai, VaVan Hoogstraten vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vachapikisa danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuisa kambani yeHwange paReconstruction. Nyaya iyi yakaiswa kuHigh Court svondo rapfuura sezvinodiwa nemutemo weReconstruction Act, uye ndipo pachapihwa muakana vese vanezvikamu mukambani iyi wekupikisa kana kubvuma danho rakatorwa nehurumende. VaVan Hoogstraten vakati muHwange Colliery mune huwori hunotyisa zvekuti mukambani iyi muri kubuda mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica asi pasina chiri kuuenda kuhurumende kana vamwe varidzi vekambani iyi. Vakati huwori hwakanyanya kukwira mukati memakore matatu apfuura apo gurukota rezvezvicherwa pari zvino VaWinston Chitando vaive sachigaro wekambani iyi. Vakati zvinhu zvakatombonyanya kuipa muHwange zvekuti pane imwe nguva vakatombokurudzira kuti mauto apinde mukambani iyi kuti apedze huwori hunotyisa hwainge hwoitika. VaVan Hoogstraten vakati kambani iyi iri kuita mibatanidzwa nemishandirapamwe nemakambani akawanda kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina uye kunyange ivo vaine zvikamu zvakawanda mukambani iyi havana chavari kuudzwa. Vakati hapana chingamutsiridze kambani iyi kunze kwekubvisa huwori uhwo vanoti hunozivikanwa nevatungamiriri venyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Kugadzikana kweHupfumi Hakuna Zvakuri Kubatsira Varombo
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvairi kuparura ichiti zviri kusimbisa hupfumi hwenyika, zviri kutopa kuti varombo vanyanye kushupika. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, naGavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaparura zvirongwa zvavo zvemafambisirwo emari nehupfumi asi vachivimbisa kuti havasi kubuda mugwara ravari sezvo vachiti rinodzikamisa hupfumi. Zvirongwa izvi zvakatambirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi dzichiyambira kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvakawanda zvinenge zviri kusiya varombo vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti zakaturwa naVaMangudya zvakanaka chose panyaya yekusadhinda mari yakawanda uye kuwanise mari makambani kuburikidza nemusika wemari. Asi vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iwedzere vashandi mari vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vanoti hurumende yakwanisa kudzikamisa mitengo, dhora remunyika nekusimudzira zvigadzirwa kumaindustry asi vachitsinhirawo nyaya yekuti vashandi vabhadharwe mari dzinovakwanira kuti vakwanise kutenga zviri kugadzirwa kumaindasitiri zvacho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatiwo VaNcube vanofanira kuendesa mari kuzvirongwa zvekubatsira varombo munyaya dzedzidzo uye hutano sezvo vakawanda vari kutatarika nekuda kwekunzi vagare mudzimba vasingashande nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura kumarinda eHeroes Acre nezuro, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo chinangwa chavo ndechekuti Zimbabwe inge yave nyika ine vashandi vakati wandei vanotambirawo mari dziri nani kana kuti upper middle-class economy mugore ra2030. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nekuda kwegoho rakanaka regore rino asi nyaya yekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 inonzi inogona kukanganisa zvakanyanya hupfumi sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kuenda kumabasa. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Votatsurana naVaMangudya neNyaya yeMari ye"Command Agriculture"
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, nhasi vaudza komiti yeparamende kuti hapana chavakatadza apo vakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu kutenga zvinhu pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input, Command nezvimwe muna 2017 na2018 vachiti zvese izvi zvakaitwa paine mvumo kubva kuhurumende. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi ndiVaTendai Biti vanova mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC. Komiti iyi yange yakoka VaMangudya kuti vazotsanangura kuti sei RBZ yakashandisa mari inodarika mabhiriyoni matatu emadhora muna 2017 na 2018 zvisina mvumo yeparamende. VaBiti vaudza VaMangudya kuti komiti yavo yaita izvi mushure mekunge hofisi yaAuditor General yaburitsa magwaro anoratidza kuti RBZ yainge yashandisa mari isiri mubhajeti uye pasina mvumo yedare reparamende sezviri mubumbiro remutemo. VaBiti vabvunza VaMangudya kuti chii chakaita kuti vatyore mutemo wenyika. Asi VaMangudya vaudza komiti iyi kuti hapana mutemo wavakatyora vachiti vakatumwa nehurumende kuita zvese zvavakaita. Vati kana paka kanganiswa mutemo, gurukota rezvemari ndiro rinofanira kubvunzwa nekuti ndiro rakavapa mvumo yekubhadhara zvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sezvinhu zvaishandiswa pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme, Command Agriculture pamwe nekubhadhara makambani akaita seZESA, ZISCOSTEEL nemamwe. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube sezvo vari kuRussia kumusangano weRussia Africa Summit. Asi VaBiti nevamwe vavo vati komiti yavo yakabvunzurudza vamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari nerekurima avo vakataura kuti vainge vasingazive kuti mari dzainge dzabhadharwa neRBZ dzaive dzei. Asi VaMangudya vati zviri pachena kuti vakuru vakuru ava vanogona kunge vakanyepera komiti iyi kana kuti vainge vasingazive zveshuwa asi vakati bhanga ravo rine matsamba ese akabva kugurukota rezvemari richivaudza kuti vabhadhare makambani kana kutenga zvinhu zvakatenga. Imwe nyaya isina kufadza komiti iyi ndeyekuti maTreasury Bills akaburitswa neRBZ nebazi rezvemari ainge asina zvese zvinodiwa pamaTreasury Bills. VaMangudya vabvuma kuti apa vakati vachagadzirisa izvi mune remangwana. Pamusangano wanhasi pamboita kukandira makobvu nematete pakati paVaMangudya naVaBiti izvo zvisina kufadza dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi. Mumwe asina kufara nekuita kwaVaMangudya naVaBiti ndiAmai Barbara Rwodzi avo vaudza vaviriri ava kuti varekemekedze dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi kuti ikwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Komiti yaVaBiti iri kushushikana kuti mari dzehurumende dzakashandiswa zviri kunze kwemutemo zvikuru sei pazvirongwa zvakaita sePresidential Input Scheme neCommand Agriculture uye nemusi weMuvhuro unouya ichabvunzurudza zvakare vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvemari pamusoro penyaya iyi. Nhasi komiti iyi yange yakatarisirwa kutura gwaro rayo rekutanga pamusoro pemashandire eRBZ. No media source currently available

headline: Chinhoyi University of Technology Inonzi Yave Kumanikidza Vadzidzisi, Vadzidzi neVashandi Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Chikoro chikuru cheChinhoyi University of Technology -CUT- chiri kurambidza vadzidzi nevashandi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kupinda pachikoro. Vadzidzi avo vanga vauya kuzopedza zvidzidzo zvavo pamwe nekunyora bvunzo nemusi weMuvhuro vakashamisika vachinzi vaburitse kadhi rinoratidza kuti vakabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 kuti vabvumirwe kupinda pachikoro. Mumwe mudzidzi asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti arambidzwa kupinda pachikoro achinzi haana kubayiwa nhomba audza Studio 7 kuti anoti chanyanya kumurwadza ndechekuti havana kunge vayambirwa nezvedanho iri. Munyori anoona nezvemagariro evadzidzi musangano rinomirira vadzidzi pachikoro ichi VaFrancis Nhete vanoti danho ratorwa nechikoro rakanaka sezvo vachiwirirana naro sevatungamiri vevadzidzi. Mutauriri weCUT Dr Tapera Musekiwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira vamwe vadzidzi nevashandi. VaTapera vanoti vabva vaisa nhomba pakiriniki yechikoro kuti zvive nyore kune vanenge vasarudza kubayiwa.Zvikoro zvakawanda zvepamusoro zvakatozivisa kuti vadzidzi vanenge vasina kubayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19 havabvumirwe kudzidza kana kunyora bvunzo nevamwe. Asi danho iri riri kupikisawa nesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinoti kuita izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Gore rapera muna Mbudzi, chikoro cheCUT chakambovharwa mushure mekunge vadzidzi makumi mashanu nevanomwe vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: ZimRights Yoendesa Hurumende kuMatare Ichida Kuti Pajekeswe Hurongwa hweKurwisa Covid-19
text:
Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika reZimbabwe Human Rights
Association, ZimRights, raendesa hurumende kudare repamusoro kuitira kuti imanikidzwe kuzivisa veruzhinji hurongwa hwekubayiwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19 munyika yose. Mukuru weZimRights, VaDzikamai Bere, vanoti vakafunga zvekutora danho rekuendesa hurumende kumatare edzimhosva sezvo veruzhinji vasiri kuziva
nezvehurongwa hwehurumende.

VaBere vanoti ibasa rehurumende kuti vanhu vawane zvose zvinoita kuti
vave nehutano hwakanaka pamwe nekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere zvinogona
kuvauraya.

Patabvunza kuti vave papi nenyaya yavakanyorera hurumende svondo
rapera mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers fir Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti havana mhinduro yavakawana nokudaro magweta avo azoyamura sangano reZimRights kuti risvitse nyaya iyi kumatare edzimhosva. VaMafunda vanoti svondo rakapera vakangonyora tsamba kuhurumende kuti izivise vanhu nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kuti ndeapi matanho airi kutora kuzivisa veruzhinji nemitauro yavanonzwisisa.

Zimbabwe iri kuwana mushonga wenhomba kubva kuChina iyo inoti
mushonga uri kuuya muno wavepo wangomirira kutumirwa kuno. Mimwe mishonga ichapihwa Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheCOVAX iyo ichaona vanoshaya mamiriyoni matanhatu vachibayiwa nhomba iyi. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita seKenya, Botswana, Ghana, Rwanda neSouth Africa dzakatozivisa nhomba dzadzakatenga pamwe nemari dzadzakachengetera kutenga nhomba yechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi Zimbabwe, kuburikidza nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichatengawo mishona nemari inoita zana remamiriyoni emadhora, kunyange hazvo paine mutauro wekuti hurumende haisati yapihwa mvumo yekushandisa mari iyi kutenga nhomba sezvo pasina mari yekuita izvi mubhajeti rayo ra 2021. No media source currently available

headline: Vatungamiri veSADC Votarisirwa Kuparura Gwara reHupfumi
text: Vatungamiri veSADC neChitatu vari kutarisirwa kunyorerana chibvumirano chekuita mushandira pamwe pakugadzirisa maindasitiri kuitira kuti nyika dzavo dziwane pundutso. Chibvumirano ichi chiri kutarisirwa kuti chinge chiri chemakore makumi mana nemanomwe kubva muna 2015 kusvika muna 2063. Munyori weSADC, Dr Stergomena Lawrence Tax, vanoti chibvumirano ichi chikanyoreranwa, nyika dzemuSADC dzichabudirira zvakanyanya munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Hurongwa hwe SADC hwakanangana nekuumba maindasitiri, kuita mushandira pamwe mukutengeserana sezvinoitika mu European Union, pamwe nekukwenenzvera zvinotengeswa neSADC kuitira kuti zviwane mari yakawanda kana zvotengesa. Misangano yemakurukota navana mazvikokota yakatanga neMugovera senzira yekuronga hwaro hwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika idzi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Reserch Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti havaone Zimbabwe ichibuda nechouviri. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti Zimbabwe ichakwanisa kubudirira ikashanda zvakanaka nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yoti Inomira neGwaro reMazita eVanhu Vari Kubira Nyika Mari Vachiburitsa Kunze
text:
Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika Doctor John Mangudya vanoti vanomira negwaro ravakaburitsa revanhu vavanoti vari kubira nyika mari vachiiyendesa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo. Arthur Chigoriwa anotipa nyaya inotevera. Gwaro rakaburitswa iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda vanoti vaitarisira kuona mazita evakuru-vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vakawanda vavo vachinzi vanoendesa mari yehuwori kunze kwenyika. Asi VaMangudya vanoti vanomira negwaro ravo sezvo zviri kuita makabhani aya nevanhu ava zviri kuita kuti vanhu vashaye mari munyika. Panyaya yekuti pane vanhu vari kufungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti vari
kuita zvehuwori vachiburitsa mari, VaMangudya vanoti kana pane anoziva vanhu vacho ngaamhan'are. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaJasper Kawondera, vanoti gwaro rakaburitswa harina mazita evanhu vanofungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti vane mari dzakawandisa kunze kwenyika. VaKawondera vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakatiza munyika
vakaendesa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo iyo yavave kushandisa
pari zvino. Vanoti kune mazita ari pamiromo pevakawanda asiri mugwaro reRBZ iri, zvikuru vakuru-vakuru muhurumende, nemamwe mapoka ezvemabhizimusi, nematongerwo enyika. Mumwe mushandi weimwe kambani anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti
Tambudzai anoti mazita akaburitswa mashoma sezvo kambani yavo iyo
inotengesa nzvimbo dzekuvaka dzimba kuvagari vari kunze kwenyika, asi
vachibhadharira mari yekutenga kuBritain. Mamwe makambani nevanhu vakaburitswa mazita avo vanoti zvakabuda mugwaro reRBZ manyepo sezvo vakapedzerana nebhanga guru renyika iri kare. Kunyange vakuru vemakambani varamba kudomwa nemazita vanoti vakapedzerana nebhangi guru renyika. Mumwe mushandi wekambani yeUnilever asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti zita rekambani yake rakadomwa nekuda kwekusagona basa kwebhangi guru
renyika sezvo vakabhadhara mari yakabuda kare kare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vakaburitswa mugwaro iri vashoma zvichienzaniswa nemari yakambotaurwa iyo inosvika kumabhiriyoni ane chitsama. VaChitambara vanoti hurumende ichine mukana wekuzvichenesa kana ikaita
komishoni inoongorora kuburitswa kwemari munyika nemunhu wese. Kuburitsa mari zvisiri pamutemo kana kuwana mari kunze kwenyika munhu
asingataure kuhurumende mari yaanenge awana kuti abhadhare mutero
imhosva. Vamwe vanoona nezvehupfumi vanoti mitemo yakafanana nekurambidza
vemabhizinisi kudzosera mari yavanenge vashanda kumusha kwavo zvimwe
zvezvinhu zvinodzinga vemabhizinisi vekunze. Mamwe magweta anotiwo zvinonetsa kusunga vakaburitsa mari ava sezvo mutemo wacho usina kujeka. No media source currently available

headline: MaWarriors tichiri nemukana: Mpandare
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors – Wellington Mpandare – anoti Zimbabwe ichiri nemukana mukuru wekubudirira kuenda kumutambo weQatar World Cup zvisinei nekukundwa kwayakaitwa neGhana musi weMugovera. MaWarriors akakundwa 3-1 nemaBlack Stars eGhana neMugovera wadarika mumutambo wakatambirwa kuGhana uye zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kusangana zvekare munyika muno neChipiri chino mumutambo uyo maWarriors anofanirwa kuhwina.   MaWarriors akangokundwa mutambo uyu chete mukana wavo wekuenda kuWorld Cup unobva watopera. Mpandare anoti maWarriors achiri mumujaho wekurwira kuenda kuQatar World Cup uye ari kufanirwa kuhwina mitambo yawo yese yasara, kutanga neweGhana.   “Tichirimo murwendo rwekurwira kuenda kuQatar. Chatinofanirwa kuita kuhwina mitambo yedu yose yasara chete,” anodaro Mpandare.   Kana maWarriors akahwina mitambo yavo yose yasara, anenge ave nezvibodzwa 10 uye achishuvira kuti zvimwe zvikwata zviri muboka reGroup G zvirasikirwe nezvibodzwa mumitambo yazvo yasara.

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa muBulawayo Vowaniswa Mukana weKubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Rimwe sangano rinomiririra vanorarama nekutengesa muBulawayo, reBulawayo Vendors and Traders Association, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro chirongwa chehurumende chekubaya nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuvanhu vanorarama nekutengesa icho chaparurwa muguta iri. Mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano iri, uye vachiraramawo nekutengesa, Muzvare Debra Mukasa, vanoti vanofara nekuti hurumende yakanzwa chikumbiro chavo chekuti vanorarama nekutengesa vange vachibaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vakwanise kuvhura misika. Chirongwa ichi chaparurwa munzvimbo nhatu muBulawayo dzinoti City Hall, Renkini neSokusile, uye hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu zviuru gumi nezvishanu, kana kuti 15 000, mukati memazuva gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Muzvare Mukasa vanoti vanotarisira kuti vamwe vasiri kutengesera mumisika yekanzuru vachabaiwawo nhomba iyi, sezvo kwanga kuchinzi vanhu vatange vaburitsa makadhi anoratidza pavanoshandira kuitira kuti vakwanise kubaiwa. Vanotiwo vanhu zviuru gumi nezvishanu vanonzi nehurumende ichabaya nhomba vashoma zvikuru, asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chatomboparurwa sezvo vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichawedzera huwandu uhwu. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Vatambi rongerai remangwana’
text: ZVIKWATA zvemitambo yakasiyana zvokurudzirwa kuti zvibatsire vatambi kuti vakwanise kuita zvidzidzo zvakadai sezvemabhizimisi nemabhindauko emaoko kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuwana zvinovararamisa mune remangwana apo vanenge vasisatambe mitambo iyi.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nachamangwiza weGlow Petroleum, Aaron Chinhara, apo aive muenzi anoremekedzwa pamusangano mukuru wekuronga mwaka mutsva weRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL) svondo radarika.   Chinhara – uyo anokotsvera RANL kuburikidza nekambani yake – anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi panguva iyo vanenge vachiri kukwikwidza vadzidziswe kuchengetedza mari pamwe nekupihwa chenjedzo yekugadzirira ramangwana ravo.   Anoti zvinosuwisa zvikuru kuona dzaimbove nyanzvi dzemitambo yakasiyana vachikangwaya uye vachisekwa nevanhu asi ivo vaimbounza mufaro mukuru kunyika yose.   “Munoona vatambi vedu panguva yavanotamba, vanenge vachidiwa zvikuru vachiremekedzwa.   Asi pavanozosiya mitambo hapana anenge ave nehanya navo. Zvikangozivikanwa kuti ave kutambura, vanhu vachimuona achizvifambira vanotanga kumuseka.   “Saka tiri kuda kuti izvozvo zvisaitike kuvasikana vedu, ngativadzidzise vazvishandire nemaoko avo kuitira kuti pavanozosiya zvemitambo vawane zvekuita zvinovararamisa nemhuri dzavo, vasatambure. Ipapo ngatipakoshesei,” anodaro Chinhara.   Panguva ino apo nyaya dzekutorwa kwezvinodhakwa dziri kukurumbira, Chinhara anoti zvakakosha kuti vanasikana vemitambo yakasiyana, kusanganisira netball, vagare vachifundiswa kuipa kwetsika yekutora zvinodhaka sezvo zvichikanganisa remangwana ravo.   “Tiri kurarama panguva iyo kutorwa kwezvinodhaka kuri kuwanda mune vechidiki. Ngatisasiye vanasikana vedu vachipinda mazviri sezvo zvichizokanganisa hupenyu hwavo. Ngatiedze nepatinogona kuvapa chenjedzo yekuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka.   “Mune zvemitambo, kutorwa kwezvinodhaka kuri kuwanda izvo zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hwevakawanda. Saka nguva nenguva ngatiite hurukuro nevanasikana tichivadzidzisa kuti vasapinde mukutora zvinodhaka, vasakanganise hupenyu hwavo,” anodaro Chinhara.   Achitaurawo pamusangano uyu, munyori mukuru weRANL – Moses Gukumure – anoti zvikwata zvavo zvagadzirira kutanga kwemwaka mutsva zvisinei nezvimhingamipinyu zvavange vachisangana nazvo.   Anoti mwaka uno muligi reRANL muchange muine zvikwata 15 zvichakwikwidza, kuwedzera kubva pa11 izvo zvaivepo gore radarika.   “Tagadzirira kutanga kwemwaka wegore rino uyo tinovimba uchafamba zvakanaka. Tiri kuenderera mberi nemitambo yedu kunyangwe hazvo pane zvange zvichinetsa. Chikuru kuti mitambo yedu itambwe pasina chinokanganisa.   “Nguva yadarika, mitambo yedu yaimbokanganiswa nezvakawanda kusanganisira iyo Covid-19 chaiyo. Saka izvezvi tiri kutarira zviri mberi,” anodaro Gukumure.   Anoti RANL iri pakati pekuumba chikwata chimwe chete icho vanoda kuzotumira kunokwikwidza kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neScotland uye chichazosarudzwa pamutambo weIndependence Tournament.   “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro neshamwari dzatinodyidzana nadzo dziri kunze kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neScotland kuti tizotumira chikwata chedu kunokwikwidza ikoko. Tichaumba chikwata chedu pamutambo weIndependence Tournament apo pachazosarudzwa vatambi vanenge vadadisa,” anodaro Gukumure

headline: Musangano weBato reRepublican Party Unopinda Muzuva rePiri Mudzimai waVaTrump Achishorwa neVamwe Kuti Akaba Mashoko aMai Obama
text: Pazuva rechipiri remusangano wekudoma shoroma vaDonald Trump semunhu achamirira bato iri musarudzo dzekutsvaga mutungamiri weAmerica dzichaitwa muna Mbudzi gore rino, mudzimai wavo Amai Melania ndivo vari pamiromo yemunhu wese. Izvi zvinotevera kutaura kwavakaita neMuvhuro manheru pamusangano uyu kekutanga apo vanonzi vakatora mamwe mashoko akamboshandiswa nemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, VaBarack Obama, Amai Michelle, muna 2008. Vana vaVaTrump vanoti Tiffany naDonald Junior, vari kutarisirwa kutaurawo pamusangano uyu zvichi sanganisirawo mutauriri wedare reparamende VaPaul Ryan, nevakambokwikwidza musarudzo dzekutsvaga munhu achamirira bato iri VaChris Christie naVaBen Carson. Musangano uyu uri pasi pedingindira rinonzi “Make America Great Again”. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuCleveland, kuOhio kuri kuitirwa musangano weRepublican Party uyu, Doctor Moses Rumano, vanoti zvingadzidzwe nehurumende yeZimbabwe nezvizvarwa zvayo ndezvekuti hapana chakaipa nekuratidzira kwevanhu kana zvichiitwa murunyararo. Dr Rumano vanoti kuCleveland vari kuona veruzhinji vari kutsigira VaTrump neavo vasingavatsigire vachibvumidzwa kuratidzira murunyararo. Doctor Rumano vanoti kupinda kwaVaTrump musarudzo yekutsvaga mutungamiri weAmerica kwakanaka nekuti kunoratidza kuti munhu wese anokwanisa kupinda musarudzo idzi. Doctor Rumano vanoti chiri kunyanya kushungurudza zvizvarwa zvinobva kune dzimwe nyika ndechekuti havazive kuti vachabatwa seyi kana VaTrump vakabudirira kutora chigarO chekutungamiri America. "Chiri kunyanya kutarisirwa neveruzhinji ndechekuti VaTrump vachaita seyi panyaya dze immigration, sezvo vakatyisidzira vanhu nyanye vekuMexico kuti vachava vakira mudhuri wekuti vasarambe vachipinda muAmerica," Dr Rumano vanoudza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Kuratidzira kweVanopikisa Hakuvavhundutsi
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vanga vari kuMatebeleland North uko vapa vagari vemudunhu iri matsiru anodarika chiuru chimwe chete muchirongwa che Command Livestock. VaMnangagwa vaita izvi vasati vaita musangano ku Lupane uko kwapindwa nevatsigiri vebato ravo. VaMnangagwa vaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti hurumende yavo itsva haifi yakakanganwa vakuru vakaunza rusununguko munyika kusanganisira vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyija, Va Robert Mugabe nevamwe vakashaya. VaMnangagwa vati pavakapinda panyanga gore rakapera vakaziva kukosha kwemadzishe nehutungamiri hwemakereke. Vati vakaita misangano nemadzishe ose uye hutungamiriri hwemakereke ose munyika kuti vanzwe kubva kwavari maererano nekufambiswa kwenyika kuenda kumberi. VaMnangagwa vati chikuru chavakaona kuti chinobatsira nyika kubva mumadhaka ayanga yakanyura, kumutsiridza mabhizinesi, izvo zvakaita kuti vaite misangano nevemabhizinesi munyika yese vachisunga zvibvumirano zvekushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kushanda nevanhu vese, mukugadzirisa zvose zvinoda kugadziriswa. VaMnangagwa vapeta musangano wavo nekushoropodza kuratidzira kuri kuitwa nevemapato anopikisa vachiti izvi hazvitadzisi bato ravo kukunda musarudzo nekuti kuratidzira hakusi kuchavhota. Va Mnangagwa vatenda rutsigiro rwevagari vemudunhu reLupane vakavakumbira kuti vagoziva pekuvhotera muzuva resarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Dynamos Yotatsurana neFC Platinum Mumutambo Wakakosha weCastle Premier Soccer League
text: Dyanamos iyo ine gakava mumba mayo iri kutarisirwa kutamba nechikwata chiri kutungamira gungano reCastle Premier Soccer Leagur cheFC Platinum mumutambo wakatarisirwa neveruzhinji munyika neMugovera. Nhengo yeDynamos Supporters Association Muzvare Judith Nyatsanza vanoti vateveri vechikwata ichi vanofanira kubatana vakananga kuZvishavane kuti vanokunda FC Platinum. Chikwata ichi chirikubaka moto nekudzima zvekuti vateveri vavo havasisina chivimbo nechikwata chavo mumitambo mitanhatu yasara. Muongorori wezvemitambo VaDannyboy Muneri vanoti vachitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada iri kukunda. VaMuneri vanofembera zvibodzwa zvavanofunga kuti FC Platinum inokunda nazvo. Chikwata chiri pachidanho chechitatu Highlanders chiri pamusha neMutare City Rovers apo Caps United iri pamusha zvekare neTsholotsho Pirates. Mutare City Rovers irikusangana ne Ngezi Platinum Stars panguva iyo Triangle ine Chapungu. ZPC Kariba ichatamba neHarare City Chicken Inn ichivhara musangano neNgezi Platinum Stars

headline: VaMugabe Vodaidzira Misangano yeKuyedza Kugadzirisa Zvinhu Zvaita Manyama Amire neRongo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vatarisana nematambudziko makukutu zvichikonzerwa nekurwisana mubato ravo uye hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano mitatu yakakosha svondo rino kutanga neChitatu kuyedza kugadzirisa zvinhu. VaMugabe vari kuita misangano yePolitburo, Central Committee uye mumwe neveZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association. Nyaya yekuti VaMugabe vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri pasina kujeka kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo yakonzera kuti mubato ravo nemunyika muiite kunetsana kwakanyanya. Pane vamwe vari kutsigira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vamwe vachitsigira Amai Grace Mugabe vari kuchikwata chinonzi Generation 40. Vaviri ava vanoramba kuti vane zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Vakarwa hondo vari kutsika madziro vachiti VaMugabe vanofanira kudzinga mubato vamwe vechikwata cheG40 vanosanganisa makurukota matatu anoti VaJonathan Moyo, muzukuru wavo VaPatrick Zhuwao uye VaSaviour Kasukuwere. Asi vachitaura mushure mekudzoka kuJapan mushure mekupfuura nekuSingapore nemusi weSvondo, VaMugabe vakati vakarwa hondo havafanire kuudza bato zvekuita asi kuti vanofanira kungotevera gwara rebato. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaDouglas Mahiya vanoti vari kuda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe. Izvi zvinosanganisa nyaya dzehutano, kuendeserwa vana kuzvikoro nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vanga Vasara Vanowana Mabhonasi Avo
text: Hurumende yazokwanisa kupedza kupa vashandi vayo vose mari dzemabhonasi zvichitevera kutambira kwaitwa mari nevashandi vehurumende vose vanga vasara. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende ava, re Public Service Association, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzatanga kuvazivisa kuti dzawana mari idzi kumabhanga kwadzo. Izvi zvinoreva kuti hapachina mushandi wehurumende asati awana bhonasi yake. Hurumende yakanonoka kubhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzemabhonasi idzi kubva muna Mbudzi wegore rapera nekuda kwekunetsekana kwayo mukuunganidza mari. Mwedzi uno hurumende yakakundikana zvakare kubhadhara vashandi vayo paine nguva izvo zvakazoita kuti iendese mberi nesvondo rose mazuva ekutambira aya. Varairidzi vaifanirwa kunge vakatambira mari dzavo neChipiri chesvondo rino vaudzwa kuti vave kuzotambira neChipiri chesvondo rinouya. Amai Alexander vanoti dai hurumende yaonawo kuti vashandi vayo vose vaenzaniswa kwete kuti vamwe ndivo vanogarotanga kutambira nhengo dzavo dzichingoramba dzichipedzisira kutambiriswa.

headline: Maonero Osiyana paMashoko aVaMugabe Anoti Hupfumi Huchasimuka
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakavimbisa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwagadzirira kusimuka kuburikidza nechirongwa cheZIM-ASSET. Vachitaura muparamende pachirongwa cheState of The Nation nemusi weChipiri, VaMugabe vakati hurumende yavo yakabuda nezviga gumi zvaichatevera mukusimudzira kwayo hupfumi hwenyika, uye kukwezva vekunze pamwe nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti vasime mari dzavo munyika. Vakatiwo hurumende yavo iri kuita hurongwa hwekuti itange kudyidzana zvakare nenyika dzekunze, kusanganisira dzekumawirira. Asi mutauriri weMDC Renewal Team, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hapana zvitsva pamashoko aVaMugabe aya, sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzeupfumi. Vanotiwo VaMugabe vanofanirwa kutanga nekuvandudza mitemo iri kutyisidzira vekunze kuti vatadze kusima mari dzavo munyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vachiongororora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGoodson Nguni,vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yagara itori kuita hurukuro nevekunze kuti Zimbabwe itange kudyidzana zvakare nenyika dzekunze. VaNguni vanoti izvi zvakaonekwa kana munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa apo pakaumbwa komiti yemakurukota yaiita hurukuro nenyika dzekumawirira. No media source currently available

headline: Hatizivi pachadzoka nhabvu: PSL
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti harizive kuti nhabvu yemuno ichatanga kutambwa rinhi sezvo pari zvino vari kumbotevedzera mitemo yakatarwa neHurumende yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Kubva pakambomiswa mitambo yose munyika muno muna Kurume gore radarika apo pakatanga kunyuka denda reCovid-19, hakuna kuzombobvira kwatambwa mitambo yePSL.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy ‘Kenny’ Ndebele – anoti pari zvino havasi kumbofunga pamusoro pekuti nhabvu ichadzoka rinhi sezvo nyika iri mushishi yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Tiri kutevedzera mitemo yeHurumende iri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba,  takanzi tishandire kumba saka iye zvino takagara kumba uye tiri kushandira kudzimba dzedu.   “Nyika iye zvino iri palockdown, danho iro rakatorwa neHurumende kuti denda reCovid-19 risarambe richipararira. Saka isu tiri kutevedzera mutemo weHurumende.    Nguva ino, nyaya yekuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu yakakosha zvikuru,” anodaro Ndebele.   Kubva pakanyuka chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera, kune dzimwe nyika dzakadai seSouth Africa, Zambia neTanzania nhabvu yakadzoka ikatanga kutambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   KuTanzania nhabvu ichiri kutambwa pamberi pevatsigiri uye nguva pfupi yadarika chikwata cheFC Platinum chakasangana necheSimba Sports Club kunyika iyi mumutambo weCAF Champions League qualifiers.   Gore radarika, zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPSL zvakange zvambopihwa mvumo yekutanga kuita gadziriro dzazvo.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata chemaWarriors – icho pari zvino chiri kuCameroon uko chiri kukwikwidza mumutambo eCHAN – chiita gadziriro kuburikidza nekutamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvemuno.   Mitambo iyi ndiyo yakashandiswa nemurairidzi wemaWarriors, Zdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic, kusarudza vatambi vekuti vazopinda muchikwata chekuenda nacho kuCHAN.

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kuwirirana neVashandi paMari Dzavanotambira
text: Munyori mukuru musangano reApex Concil, mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumende VaDavid Dzatsunga vanoti mushure memusangano wemaawa mana vatadza kuwirirana nyaya yemari dzavanotambiriswa nehurumende. Pari kutarisirwa kuitwa mumwe musangano nemusi weChitatu. Vashandi vanoti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari kubva pamazana mana negumi nemana kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana manomwe. Vashandi ava vange vati vachatanga kuratidzira nemusi weMuvhuro asi vakazoti vave kuda kumbopa nhaurirano mukana.

headline: Varairidzi Voramba Kudzokera Kunodzidzisa Panovhurwa Zvikoro
text: Varairidzi vari musangano re Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, vanoti havasi kuenda kunodzidzisa panovhurwa zvikoro nemusi weChipiri sezvo vasina mari yekuendesa kubasa. Sangano iri rinoti hupenyu huri kuomera varairidzi zvekuti havachisina mari yekuti vakwanise kuenda kubasa. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaedza kutaura nevashandi vayo nemusi weChishanu, hapana chakabuda nekuti mari yakavimbiswa nehurumende ishoma zvikuru kuti igadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nevashandi vose vehurumende, kusanganisira varairidzi. Sangano re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rinotiwo rakabuda nechisungo pakongiresi yaro chekuti varairidzi havasi kuzoenda kunodzidzisa panovhurwa zvikoro. Sangano iri rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kuomerwawo nehupenyu sezvo mari dziri kutambirwa nevarairidzi dziri shoma. Izvi zviri kutsigirwawo nerimwe sangano re Zimbabwe Teachers Association. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevashandi, Va Paul Mavhima, kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi pamusangano wakaitwa neChishanu, hurumende inonzi yakanga yavimbisa vashandi vayo kuti vaizowedzerwa nezvikamu zvinotangira pazvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana, zvichidzika. Vainge vakamirira hurumende munhaurirano idzi, Va Moses Mhike, vakaramba kutaura neStudio7 vachiti VaMavhima ndivo chete vanotaura nezvenyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yombomira Kupa Magwaro Ekurima Mbanje
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTerrance Mukupe, vanoti hurumende yambomira kupa vanhu marenzenise ekurima mbanje nokuti vanhu vanyorera kuti vanoda marezenisi aya vawandisa. VaMukupe vativo hurumende inoda nguva yekumbotura mafemo ichiona kuti hurongwa uhu hungafambiswa sei. "Tanga tisingatarisiri kuti kuchaita vanhu vakawanda kudaro vanoda marezenisi nekuti vanhu vauya vapfuura mazana matatu vanoda marezenisi. Saka unoona kuti kana wange uchida kupa vanhu vashanu chete, unozosarudza sei pasingaitwe huori," VaMukupe vakaudza Studio 7. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Saka tirikunyatsotarisa kuti tozviita sei. Tinofanira kunyatso kunzwisisa kuti chinofanirwa kuitwa chii uye tinozviita sei. Uyezve tinofanira kuronga kuti kunorimirwa kwacho ndekupi uye kuti kune masoja here anochengeta." No media source currently available

headline: Chelsea yadzinga Tuchel
