text: CHIKWATA cheChelsea nhasi mangwanani chadzinga basa murairidzi wacho Thomas Tuchel.   Izvi zvinotevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kuri kuita chikwata ichi mumwaka mutsva wegore rino.   Chelsea yakakundwa neDinamo Zagreb nezuro manheru mumutambo wavo wekutanga weUEFA Champions League.   Chinyorwa chabva kuChelsea chinoti: “Nhasi Chelsea yapesana nemurairidzi wedu Thomas Tuchel.   “Takamirira munhu wose wekuChelsea FC, chikwata chinoda kutenda Thomas nebasa raakabata panguva yaaive nechikwata chedu.   “Apo vatungamiri vatsva vasvitsa mazuva 100 kubva vatenga chikwata chino uye vachiramba vachishanda vachienda mberi, ino ndiyo nguva yekushandura zvakawanda.   “Vamwe varairidzi veChelsea ndivo vachashanda nechikwata takatarisana nemitambo inotevera apo tiri pakati pekutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wekutsiva Tuchel.”

headline: Vakoti Vari paMudyandigere Votsvagirwa Mari yeKuti Vadzoke Kuzobatsira Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangawana vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vati dare remakutukota nemusi weChipiri rakati richaongorora mari dziri kupihwa vari kubaya nhomba senzira yekukwezva vamwe kuti vaite basa iri. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yakanyora tsamba kubazi rezvemari kuti ipihwe mari yekupa vakoti vari pamudyandigere vari kuda kunzi vabatsire mukubaya vanhu nhomba sezvo bazi rezvehutano riine vashandi vashoma. Dare remakurukota iri rakapawo mvumo makirinika nezvipatara zvakazvimirira kuti zvitange kubaya nhomba pachena zvozopihwa mari yevanenge vaita basa racho chete nehurumende. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevana zvine mazana manomwe negumi kana kuti 1, 677, 710. Vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere nemazama masere nemakumi masere kana kuti 798, 880. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti neChipiri vanhu makumi mashanu nevaviri(52) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera hwave zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 3,635. Vamwe chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 309 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nemusi weChipiri wakare, zvichisiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zana negumi zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemashanu kana kuti 110, 855. Vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nemashanu kana 2 755 zvasiya vapora kubva gore rapera vave zviuru makumi manomwe nemapfumbamwe nemazana mana nemakumi maviri kana kuti 79, 420.

headline: Maitiro eMapurisa Ane Rusarura Otsamwisa MDC-T
text: No media source currently available Mapurisa ekuKaroi, mudunhu reMashonaland West, arambidza MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai kuita musangano nevatsigiri vayo munhandare yeChikangwe. Musangano uyu wanga uchifanirwa kuitwa neMugovera, asi mapurisa anozi apa zvikonzero zvinonzi hazvina kutsanangurwa. Mutauriri weMDC-T, Vaobert Gutu, vanoti musangano uyu, uyo wanga uchitarisirwa kutaurwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, VaNelson Chamisa, wanga wakanangana nekukurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dziende nehuwandu hwadzo kunonyoresa kuitira kuti dzigozokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Izvi zvinoitika panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwawo zvakare kutaura pamusangano wevechidiki veZanu PF uri kuitirwa pamuzinda webato iri muHarare neMugovera. VaGutu vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvinorwadza sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo, uye mapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika achitarisirwa kupinda mumativi mana enyika zvisina dambudziko kuti asangane nevatsigiri vawo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi.

headline: VaCharamba Vokonzera Kugeda Geda KweMeno neMashoko Avo paNyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba vakonzera mutauro wakanyanya pasi rose nemashoko avanonzi vakataura kubepanhau reSunday Mail vari ku Azerbaijan uko vari kushanya nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaCharamba vanoti zviri kuitika munyika umo muri kupomerwa mauto nemapurisa mhosva yekupfura vanhu gumi nevaviri, kukuvadza mazana nemazana uye kusunga vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe inzwisa chete. VaCharamba vanoti mhirizhonga iri kukonzera nebato reMDC nemapato akazvimirira. Mapepa nhau emunyika dzakawanda aratidza kukatyamadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aya. Asi masangano akaita seUnited Nations, nyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain nesangano reEuropean Union ari kushora zvikuru nyaya yekushandisa mauto mukushungurudza vanhu iri kuitwa neZimbabwe. Sangano ravanasorojena rinozivikanwa nekuti The Elder’s rashorawo zviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe zvekushungurudza vanhu uye kudzima masaisai einternet. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaCharamba kuti tinzwe zvizere nezvemashoko avo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Vakawanda vanoti munyika maberekera ingwe. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti zvinhu zvave kuita zviri nani avo vakurudzira vanhu kuti vasaite mhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inotadza Kuzivisa Vashandi Vayo Mazuva eMihoro yaChikunguru
text: Hurumende inonzi yakundikana zvakare kuzivisa vashandi vayo mazuva avachawana mihoro yaChikunguru. Izvi zvinotevera musangano unonzi washevedzerwa negurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa Amai Priscah Mupfumira wapindwa nehutungamiri hwe vashandi, uyo unonzi wapera usina chasungwa. Amai Mupfumira vanonzi vazivisa hutungamiri uhwu kuti musangano uyu wanga wakangonangana nekuvazivisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu panyaya yemihoro yavo, uye nekuti hurumende iri kuedza napose painogona kuti itambirise vashandi vayo paine nguva. Sachigaro weApex Council Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti Amai Mupfumira wavavimbisa kuti vachasangana navo zvakare neChishanu svondo rino kuti vavape mazuva emihoro aya. “Tanosangana na minister, asi kuti hatina kuenda seApex Council, vanga vandidaidza ini semutungamiri wevashandi ndikaendawo ne leadership yedu, vachida kuti vatiudze kuti vasvika papi nema dates eJuly salaries ,” Amai Alexander vanoti vachamirira kunzwa neChishanu ichocho, asi vachazosanganawo sevashandi nemusi weMuvhuro vachizeya zvinenge zvabva kugurukota. Vashandi vehurumende vanositanga kutambira mari vakaita semauto, vasori nemapurisa vanonzi havasati vawana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Hurumende iri kutatarika kuwana mari izvo zvakakonzera kuti ikundikane kubhadhara vashandi vayo nenguva mwedzi wapera. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League Yopfungaira Hutsi Zvekare
text: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League adzoka zvine mutsindo mushure mesvondo rimwe chete rezororo. Nemusu weMugovera masikati nhandare yeRufaro Stadium ichange isingadanwe anonzwa apo pachatambwa mitambo miviri apo Yadah neBlack Rhinos dziri kushandisa nhandare imwechete, zuva rimwe chete, mumitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League yevhiki remakumi maviri nemaviri. Yadah iyo iri kuti nhasi yabaka moto, mangwana wodzima, ndiyo iri kutanga kupinda munhandare yeRufaro Stadium iyi kusangana neChapungu iyo iri kukwikwira zvishoma nezvishoma muhurongwa hwemakundano aya. Yadah, iyo yaimbotungamira makundano aya yave pazvikwata zvina zvakatarisana nekubuda mumakwikwi aya zvekuti inofanira kukunda kuitira kuti isaverengwe pazvikwata zvaingopinda muPremier Soccer League nekubuda gore rimwe chetero. Mutambo uyu ukapera, uri kuteverwa nemutambo mukuru pakati peBlack Rhinos neChicken Inn iyo iri pachidanho chechipiri mumakundano ezvikwata gumi nezvisere aya. Chipembere chadonha zvinotyisa mumakundano aya zvekuti chikwata cheZimbabwe National Army ichi chave pachidanho chechisere mushure mekumbotungamira makundano aya, kwemasvondo akati wandei. Kunyange hazvo varohwa mitambo mina yakataverana murairidzi weChipembere Stanford Stix Mtizwa anoti iyi yave nhoroondo achiti iye varikuda mapoinzi ese matatu vakatarisana nechinangwa chavo chekuramba vari muPremier Soccer League mwaka unotevera. Asi machikichori muRufaro Stadium haasi kutanga nekugumira pamitambo miviri iyi, sezvo nesvondo maGreen Machine eCaps United achange achiedza kupunzira pasi Ngezi Platinum Stars iyo iri pamusoro petafura yeligi. Mushure mekutora poindi imwechete kubva mumitambo mina vabuda mumakundano eCaf Champions League, Makepekepe irikubhebha moto mushure mekutora mapoinzi manomwe kubva mumitambo yavo mitatu ichangopera kusanganisira wemusi weChitatu uyo yakarova FC Platinum 2-1. Mapoinzi manomwe aya asiya Makepekepe ave pachinhanho chegumi neina mumakundano aya asi vaine mitambo mishanu yavasati vatamba nemhaka yekukwikwidza kwavo muCaf Champions League. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda varikuti maGreen Machine haasisimo mukurwira kutora mukombe weligi uyu, mumwe mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaTakunda Mupereki vanoti Makepekepe anokwanisa kudzivirira mukombe uyu, uyo vakatora mwaka wapera. Asi sachigaro weNgezi Platinum Stars VaJeremiah Getiseni vanoti vanonokerwa nemutambo neCaps United uyu vachiti ivo maGreen Machine haasi kumira. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi…  Bulawayo City v Harare City Hwange v Bantu Highlanders v Tsholotsho Pirates Shabanie Mine v ZPC Kariba Triangle v Platinum Dynamos neHighlanders hadzina mitambo svondo rino, sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvaifanira kuve zviri kuBotswana kumakundano ezvikwata zvina aifanira kusanganisirawo Taffic Stars neMochudi Centre Chiefs. Makwikwi eSupa Power Cup aya haasi kuzoenderera mberi mushure mekunge vange vakaronga makundano aya vakundikana kuzadzikisa zvange zvichidiwa nezvikwata izvi. Asi zvikwata izvi hazvichaenda kuFrancistown asi vePremier Soccer League vazivisa kuti hapana nguva yekuti mitambo yavo yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ienderere mberi. Dynamos yanga ichifanira kusangana neHow Mine, Highlanders ichibandana neTsholotsho Pirates. Zvakamira zvakadai, makundano eEnglish Premier League arikupinda mumitambo yechipiri apo chikwata chirikutungamira makwikwi aya cheManchester United chiri munzira kuenda kuWales kunosangana neSwansea. Vanoziva zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti Swansea haisi kumira zvekuti varikutarisira zvekare kunaya kwezvibodzwa sezvakaitika svondo rapera apo maRed Devills akabvarura West Ham 4-0. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mukamba yeChelsea iyo yatarisana nemutambo mukukutu apo varimuguta ravo reLondon as kuWembley uko varikunobandana neTottenham Hotspur iyo isingaroveke roveke pamusha.  Mimwe mitambo mugungano iri ndeiyi… Liverpool v Crystal Palace Southampton v West Ham Burnemouth v Watford Stoke v Arsenal Burnley v West Brom Huddersfield v Newcastle Manchester City v Everton KuSpain, makundano emwaka uno ari kutanga svondo rino apo chikwata chine mukombe weLa Liga che Real Madrid chir ikutanga chiri kunze kwemusha kuDeportivo La Coruna panguva iyo Barcelona iri Nou Camp neReal Betis. Madrid neBarcelona, zvakasangana pakati pesvondo pamutambo wemukomba apo Barceloma yakadamburwa 2-0.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Zvinoreva Sarudzo Dziri Kuitwa muAmerica
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nedzehupfumi dzinoti hadzioni paine chinochinja pakudyidzana pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica zvisinei nei nekuti ndiyani akunda musarudzo idzi. Sachigaro musangano reZimbabwe Editors Forum, VaDumisani Muleya, vanoti vakawanda muZimbabwe neAfrica yose vane tarisiro yekuti vari kumirira Democratic Party musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunde nekuti vari kumirira Republican Party, VaDonald Trump, vanogara vachinyomba vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika uye havadi kuti vanhu ava vagare muAmerica. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour Economic Development Research Institute, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti hapana chichachinja zvakanyanya kunyange VaBiden, avo vakambove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vakakunda. Vanotiwo VaTrump, avo vanova mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, vakakunda, vanogona kutoomesera Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rese. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika vachidzisa paUnversity of Zimbabwe, Dr Prolific Mataruse, vanoti kunyange hazvo VaTrump naVaBiden vakasiyana, vane muonero akafanana paZimbabwe. Asi vanoti zvinhu zvingatorerukira Zimbabwe pasi paVaTrump nekuti munhu anoita zvemabhizimisi uye vakasununguka kushanda nenyika dzakaoma musoro seZimbabwe izvo zvinocherechedzwa nekusangana kwavakaita nemutungamiriri weNorth Korea. Dr Mataruse vanoti America inyika inoomesera hurumende dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu seZimbabwe, zvisineyi kuti ndiyani anenge ari mutungamiri. VaMuleya vanoti kunyange VaBiden vakakunda, zvirango zvinoramba zviripo kudzamara Zimbabwe yagadzirisa zvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wezvirango weZimbabwe Democracy and Recovery Act of 2001. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nekudziyadzana nedzimwe nyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti vanoziva kuti kusanduka kwemutungamiri weAmerica hakusandure zvirango kana mutemo wenyika iyi wekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. Asi vanoti vachataura nehurumende neparamende itsva yekuAmerica kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Gurukota rinoona nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusisio Moyo, vanoti kunyange hazvo pachimboiita kupopotedzana pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe, vari kutaurirana nenyika iyi nechinangwa chekugadzirisa hukama pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Kunyange hazvo paine zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende, America ndiyo nyika inopa rubatsiro rwakanyanya kuZimbabwe munyaya dzehutano, chikafu, dzidzo nezvimwe. Kubva muna 1980, America yapa Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwemabhiriyoni matatu nemazana mashanu ezviru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: NCA, EU neAmerica Dzoshora Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika Munyika
text: Bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, raburitsa gwaro rinoshoropodza mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika iri kuitika munyika. Ukuwo muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe, pamwe nesangano reEuropean Union muZimbabwe, EU, dzashorawo mhirizhonga ingava ichiitika pakati pemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, kanawo mukati mebato rimwe chete. America neEU dzinoti mhirizhonga munyika ine hutongo hwejekerere haitambirike, uye dzinokurudzira kuti vanenge vachikonzera mhirizhonga vatorerwe matanho. Mutauriri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti bato ravo rakanyanya kubatikana nemhirizhonga yakaitika mumusha weSt. Mary’s kuChitungwiza uko nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakarwisana izvo zvakazotora hupenyu hwevanhu vatatu. Bato iri rinoti rinoshamisikawo nekuti munhu anonzi akaponda vamwe vake veZanu PF ava anozonzi akawanikwa akafa ari mumaoko emapurisa muhusungwa. “Isu tinokurudzira kuti vanhu vasashandise mhirizhonga mukugadzirisa makakava avo,” vanodaro VaChivasa. No media source currently available Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaChamu Madiridze, vanotiwo dambudziko rekupedzwa kwemhirizhonga munyika richanetsa sezvo iine midzi kubva munguva yehondo yekurwira rusununguko. “Mukatarisa kubva munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, vanhu vaishandisa mhirizhonga kuti vanzwikwe, kwouya nyika yawana kuzvitonga, hurumende yaishandisa mhirizhonga kunyaradza vanenge vachida kuipikisa,” VaMadiridze vanodaro. VaMadiridze vanoti mhirizhonga iri kuitika iyi inogona kuve munongedzo wezvichaitika musarudzo dza2018, kana kurudziro iri kupiwa nemasangano akaita se EU nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe ikasatambirwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Hurumende Ikasachinja Maitiro Nyika Icharamba Iri kuMawere
text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wehurumende uye vari mutungamiri weMDCT, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti hurumende inofanira kuvandudza nyaya dzekurima pamwe nekuvhura maindasitiri kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Mashoko aya anouyawo apo varimi vazhinji varikuchema nerokuti havasi kuwana zvekushandisa mukurima pasi pechirongwa chehurumende cheCommand Agriculture. Vachitaura neStudio 7 muHarare, VaTsvangirai vati hurumende inofanira kukoshesa nyaya dzekurima sezvo kurima kuriko kwakanyanyobata hupfumi hwenyika. VaTsvangirai vati varimi vanofanira kuwaniswa zvokushandisa mukuita basa ravo paine nguva kuitira kuti vawane goho rakanaka. Vakurudzirawo kuti varimi vakagariswa patsva vapihwe matsamba emapurazi avagere kuitira kuti vakwanise kukwereta mari kumabhanga.. Mashoko aVaTsvangirai aya anouyawo apo varimi vazhinji munyika vari kugunun'una kuti mbeu nefetereza zvavari kupihwa nehurumende pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture zviri kunonoka kusvika kwavari iyo mvura ichingonaya. Mumwe murimi akatarisana nedambudziko iri ndiAmai Getrude Moyo vanorima vari munharaunda yeBeatrtice avo vanoti dambudziko ravakatarisana naro nderekushaya mukana wekuwana mari yekurimisa. VaTsvangirai vanoti hapana chirikubuda mukurima nekuti vanhu vazhinji vanokwanisa kurima havana kupihwa minda asi vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vachingokumba mapurazi avasingagone kushandisa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaJoseph Made kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. VaTsvangirai vakurudzirawo kuti makambani akavharwa avhurwe kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane mabasa. Kurudziro yaVaTsvangirai iyi inouyawo apo sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions richiti pane mazana-nemazana emakambani akavharwa muna 2016 zvichitevera kuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika. Izvi zvinouyawo panguva iyo hurumende iri kutadza kugadzira mabasa mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviyi akavimbiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe pavaitsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2013. No media source currently available

headline: Voruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Veruzhinji vari kukurudzirwa kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti vasateerere zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Brighton Chireka, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kusaungana kundufu panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 uye vateerere zvinotaurwa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vanofanirwa kunge vari parufu. Dr Chireka vanoti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. "Tinokurudzira zveruzhinji kuti vaende kunobayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti vawane kuzvidzivirira ivo nemhuri dzavo sezvo denda iri riri kuuraya vazhinji uye dzimwe dzimba dzave kuto vharwa sezvo vanhu vazhinji vemhuri imwe vari kushaika panguva imwe,"vadaro Dr Chireka. "Tiri kuyambira vanenge vafirwa kuti vasaende nehuwandu kurufu sezvo kuri iko kuri kupararira zvakanyanya denda iri reCovid-19," vadaro Dr Chireka. Denda reCovid-19 rauraya vanhu zviuru zvina nemakumi mana nevanomwe, 4,047, uye kubata vanhu zviuru zana negumi nezvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 118,754 No media source currently available

headline: Asamoah Gyan Ndiye Shasha yeKurova Mambure muAfrica Munhoroondo yeWorld Cup
text: Mutambi weGhana kana kuti Black Stars, Asamoah Gyan ndiye mutambi wemuAfrica akanwisa zvibodzwa zvakawandisa kudarika vamwe vatambi vose munhoroondo yemakwikwi eWorld Cup. Gyan akanwisa zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kumakwikwi aya. Munhoroondo yeGhana, Gyan ndiye akanwisawo zvibodzwa zvakawanda zvinova makumi mashanu nechimwe. Mutambio uyu akaberekwa kuGhana muna 1985 uye ari kutambira chikwata cheLegon Cities FC kuGhana.  Akatambira Ghana muWorld Cup yakaitwa 2006, 2010 na2014. Aakatanga kutambira maBlack Stars aine makore gumi nemanomwe. Zvibodzwa zcake kuWorld Cup akanwisa muna 2010 pamutambo neSerbia, Australia, United States. Muna 2014 kuWorld Cup akanwisa pamutambo neUnited States of America, akanwosawo chimwe chibodzwa pamutambo neGermany achibva aenzana naRoger Milla wekuCameroon pakugohwesa zvibodzwa zvishanu kuWorld Cup. Akazonwisa chibodzwa chechitanhatu pamutambo nePortugal chakamupinza munhoroondo pakunwisa zvibodzwa muAfrica.  Pane shasha dzekurova mambure kuWorld Cup kubva kuAfrica” Asamoah Gyan 6 (Ghana) Roger Milla 5 (Cameroon) Samuel Eto’0 3 (Cameroon) Papa Diop 3 (Senegal)

headline: Varairidzi Vanoita Musangano Pamusoro Pekuramwa Mabasa
text: Rimwe remasangano anomiririra varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti matunhu matanhatu esangano ravo akabvumirana kuti kana pasina mari inemusoro inopamidzirwa varairidzi pakupera kwemwedzi uno, nhengo dzesangano ravo dzirikuzoramwa mabasa. Mutungamiriri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamwe matunhu esangano ravo arikuita misangano mangwana, Chipiri, kuti vakurukure nezve kuramwa mabasa. VaZhou vati, zvinenge zvabuda mumisangano iyi pamwe chete neyakatoitwa ndizvo zvichatevedzerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeGuta reHarare Inotara Nzvimbo dzeKubaira Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare yazivisa kuti ine nzvimbo makumi matatu neimwe, kana kuti 31, dzayakatara dziri mumisha inogara vanhu kuti dzinge dzichibairwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru yavo, ichishanda nebazi rehutano, yakatora danho iri senzira yekurerutsira veruzhinji kuti vasafamba mitunhu yakareba kunobaiwa nhomba, uyewo kuitira kurerutsa dambudziko rekuungana kwevanhu vave kuda kubaiwa nhomba pari zvino. Nzvimbo dzaziviswa nekanzuru dzinoti: Braeside FHS Clinic, Hatfield Satellite Clinic, Sunningdale Satellite Clinic, Waterfalls Satellite Clinic, Tariro Satellite Clinic, Rutsanana Polyclinic, Western Triangle Satellite Clinic, Glenview Satellite Clinic, Glen View Polyclinic, Glen Norah Satellite Clinic, Budiriro Polyclinic. Budiriro Satellite Clinic, Mufakose FHS Clinic, Kambuzuma Polyclinic, Kuwadzana Satellite Clinic, Kuwadzana Polyclinic, Warren Park Polyclinic, Rujeko Polyclinic, Belvedere Satellite Clinic, Mabelreign Satellite Clinic, Marlborough Satellite Clinic, Avondale Satellite Clinic neMt. Pleasant Satellite Clinic. Mbare Polyclinic, Hatcliffe Polyclinic, Borrowdale Satelite Clinic, Highlands FHS Clinic, Eastlea FHS Clinic, Greendale FHS Clinic, Mabvuku Satelite Clinic, pamwe chete neHighfields Polyclinic. VaChideme vazivivasawo kuti zvipatara zviviri zvehurumende zvinoti Parirenyatwa Central Hospital neSally Mugabe Central Hospital, uyewo zvakazvimirira zvoga zvinoti Cimas Borrowdale Clinic ne Health Point zviri kubairwawo nhomba yekudzvirira Covid-19. Panyaya yekuti vamwe vari kutadza kubaiwa nhomba ivo vaswera vari mumitsetse, VaChideme vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti vakoti vaita vashoma zvichienzaniswa nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubuda vachida kubaiwa, asi vanoti vanotarisira kuti dambudziko iri richagadzisirwa nekukasika. Vanovimbisawo kuti makirinika avo ane nhomba inokwanira vanhu vose vachiti vachawaniswa zvakare nehurumende imwe yenhomba mamiriyoni maviri yapinda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reDzimhosva Rinoramba Kuti VaNguwaya Vabhadhariswe Mari yeChibatiso
text: Dare ramejisitireti muHarare rarasa chikumbiro chamuzvinabhimisisi ane mutauro mukuru munyika, VaDelish Nguwaya, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo panyaya mbiri dzavari kupomerwa. VaNguwaya vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekukorovhera hurumende kuti ipinde muchibvumirano chekutenga mishonga kubva kumbani yekunze yavanomirira muZimbabwe, yeDrax Consult SAGL. Mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti, vati VaNguwaya vadzoke kudare musi wa 30 Chikumi, asi pose apa vanenge vari mutirongo. Amai Muchuchuti vati vanobvumirana nevachuchusi panyaya iyi kuti kana VaNguwaya vakabhadhara mari yechibatiso vanogona kuvhiringidza kuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi uye vanogona kutiza munyika sezvo mhaka yavakapara yakakura chose. Vatiwo vamwe vavanonzi vakapara navo mhosva iyi vari kunze kwenyika. VaNguwaya vanonzi vakapara mhosva iyi pamwe nemuridzi wekambani yeDrax Consult, LIir Dedja, uyo anonzi ari kuItaly kana kuti kuti Hungary. Rimwe remagweta aVaNguwaya, VaTafadzwa Hungwe, vanoti dare raona VaNguwaya semunhu asingavimbike sezvo vakomboita dzimwe nyaya dzekukorovhera vanhu nguva yapfuura. Vatiwo havana kufara nemutongo wedare uye vanovimba kuti dare repamusoro richave nemuono wakasiyana panyaya. VaNguwaya, avo vanomirira kambani yeDrax Consult SAGL neDrax International, vakusungwa nemusi weChishanu chapfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsotsa kambani yehurumende inoita zvekutenga mishonga yeNatpharm kuita chibvumirano chekutenga mishonga kukambani yavanomirira inokosha mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. Vachuchusi panyaya iyi vanoti VaNguwaya vakanyepa kuti kambani iyi inogadzira mishonga izvo zvakaita kuti mapazi ehutano, nebazi remari ape NatPharm mvumo yekushanda neDrax. Asi VaNguwaya vari kuramba mhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Magweta avo anoti ivo semumiriri weDrax havana chavakatadza uye vachatura kudare humbowo hunoratidza kuti Dejda uyo akatombuuya munyika akaonana nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndiye ainyora nekusaina matsamba ekutsvaga basa rekutengesa mushonga kubazi rezvehutano. Magweta aya anotiwo ane humbowo hunoratidza kuti Drax yakapihwa basa kuNatpharm mushure mekunge bazi rezvemari raita ongororo rikaona kuti kambani iyi yainge yakachena. VaHungwe vanoti kunyange VaNguwaya vaive ivo vaisaina matsamba ekutsvaga basa kubazi rezvehutano, hapana nhema dzakataurwa mutsamba idzi nekuti kambani yeDrax inoita mabasa akawanda kusanganisira kutengesa mishonga. Vatiwo pachibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm, Drax yakabuda pachena kuti mishonga yainotengesa yaiiwana kupi uye hapana kana nhema dzakataurwa muchibvumirano ichi. Mutitikitiva ari kuita nyaya iyi akaudza dare kuti vakatanga kuferefeta nyaya iyi mushure mekunge bazi rezvehutano, raratidza kusafara nechibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm. Asi magweta aVaNguwaya anoti vane humbowo hunoratidza kuti mapurisa emuno akatanga kufererfeta nyaya iyi mushure mekunge sangano remapurisa pasi rese reInterpol ranyorera kuZimbabwe Republic Police richida rubatsiro pakuongorora kuti mamiriyoni maviri emadhora ekuAmerica aiinge aiswa mubhanga reDrax kuHungary yainge iri yei. Interpol yaifungidzira kuti paive nekusafambiswa kwemari zvakanaka kana kuti money laundering sezvo Drax isina basa rayaiita raizikanwa kuti iwane mari yakawanda kudai. Mushure maizvozvo hurumende yakabva yamisa chibvumirano cheDrax neNatpharm. Svondo rapfuura mapurisa akabvunzurudza vakuru vakuru kuNatpharm, bazi rezvehutano pamwe nebazi rezvemari uye vazhinji vavo vanotarisira kupa humbowo kana kusungwa nekuda kwenyaya iyi. VaNguwaya vakabuda mumifananidzo yakawanda vaine mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa, pamwe nevana vaVaMnangagwa, Shaun na Collins. Mifananidzo iyi yakakonzera mitauro yakawanda mu social media vamwe vachiti zvose zviri kuitwa naVaNguwaya, vari kutsigirwa nemhuri yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhukadzi Votenda Kuwana Kuzvitonga
text: Vanhukadzi vakawanda vanoti kubva mugore ra1980 apo Zimbabwe yakawana kuzvitonga, hupenyu hwavo huri kuenda huchishanduka nguva nenguva nekuda kwematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekuona kuti madzimai nevanhurume vanofanirwa kupihwa mikana yakaenzana. No media source currently available Mugari wemuManicaland, Amai Moreblessing Shinya, murairidzi pachikoro chiri kwaMarange. Amai Shinya vanoti vanonzwa kufara nematanho ari kutorwa nehurumende pari zvinho ekuti madzimai ange anewo zvigaro zvepamusoro mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vanoti mikana yaveko mazuvano yakanaka uye yasiyana neemakore apfuura. Amai Shinya vanoti panguva ino zvinofadza kuona kuti madzimai awandawo muparamende uye nemuzvigaro zvepamusoro muhurumende - kunyange hazvo pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa. Muzvare Pamela Chitima vanoshanda nerimwe sangano rakazvimirira, rePeace Building and Development Foundation maMutare. Muzvare Chitima vanoti nguva yegochanhembe ndiyo yakarashwa nehurumende apo zvaingonzi nzvimbo yemudzimai mumba yokubikira, pamwe neyemusikarudzi. Muzvare Chitima vanoti vanofara zvikuru nematanho akaiswa ekuti vanasikana vawane dzidzo zvakaenderana nevanakomana izvo zviri kupa kuti pave nevanhukadzi vakawanda vanodzidza muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro. Muzvare Mandy Kanyemba mugari wemaMutare vachidzidza paZimbabwe Open University. Muzvare Kanyemba vanoti pane zvichakasarira zvinofanirwa kuitwa nehurumende sezvo kuwanira vanasikana, uye madzimai mikana muzvikoro nemumabasa zvisiri izvo zvega zvinokwaniswa kuitwa mukusimbaradza mudzimai wanhasi, kana mwanasikana wanhasi. Muzvare Kanyemba vanoti chinodiwa kuti madzimai akwanda ange ari pazvigaro zvepamusoro zvinobuda nesungawirirano, uye zvigaro izvi vanofanirwa kuzviwana nehunyanzvi, kwete zvekuitirwa tsvete. Muzvare Perpetual Guwila vanoshanda nesangano re-Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce maMutare. Muzvare Guwila vanoti mikana inonzi iripo yacho yekuti madzimai anowana haisi kunyatsobuda nemazvo. Vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kunyanya kuwanikwa mumabasa anoita basa repasi pasi. Vanoti izvi zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti mabasa akawanda epamusoro, ange achitorwawo nevanhukadzi. Mumwe mugari wemuChikanga maMutare, Amai Tarisai Machipanda, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuedza kusimudzira madzimai, mamwe maitiro uye matauriro anoitwa nevamwe vakuru vari muhurumende, kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, anozvidza vanhukadzi izvo zvinovagumburisa. Amai Machipanda vanoti hurongwa hwekusumudzira madzimai hunofanirwa kuoneka mukuita zvese nemukutaura kwevakuru vemuhurumende kuitira kuti vanhukadzi, avo vakashanda zvakasimba munguva yehondo, vave neramangwana rakanaka munyaya dzose dzehupenyu. Kudzamara izvi zvaitika, vanhukadzi vakawanda vacharamba vachichema muhondo yavo yekuti varemekedzwewo munyaya dzose dzinobata nyika nehupenyu, sezviri kuitika kuvanhurume.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri kuChina Chotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kushanda kuChina chinoti zvinhu hazvisati zvanaka munyika iyi sezvo vanhu vasati vobvumidzwa kufamba pamadiro nepamusoro pechirwere che coronavirus chanetsa munyika iyi. VaTinashe Bare, avo vanodzidzisa chirungu muguta reZhengzhou mudunhu reHenan kuChina kwakare, vanoti vari kubvumidzwa chete kubuda mudzimba kuitira kuti vanotenga chikafu, uye vanoenda kunotenga chikafu ichi vakachengetedzwa nevashandi vehurumende muguta reZhengzhou. VaBare vanoti hapana munhu wekuZimbabwe wavanoziva ati abatwa ne coronavirus, iyo yauraya vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana masere. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa Inoti Vabvakure Vachabaiwavo Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakazivisa kuti vanhu vese vari mu South Africa vachakwanisa kubaiwa mushonga wenhomba, kana kuti vaccine, wekudzivirira chirwere che Covid-19. Izvi zvinotevera gurukota reSouth Africa rinoona nezvehutano, VaZweli Mkhize, vazivisa kuti South Africa ichangobaya mushonga uyu pazvizvarwa zveSouth Africa chete, kwete vabvakure. Mushure mekushorwa zvikuru nenyanzvi dzezvehutano nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti vanhu vakuru vose vari munyika iyi vachabaiywa mushonga uyu zvisinei kuti zvizvarwa zvekunyika ipi. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch, iro rakashoravo zvikuru hurumende yeSouth Africa payakange yataura zvekusarura vabvakure mukudzivirira chirwere ichi, rinoti izvi ndizvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa munyika dzose, kusanganisa muSouth Africa. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti sezvo South Africa ine mbiri yekusarura vabvakure, sangano ravo richange rakatarisisa kuona kuti South Africa inoita here kana kuti kwete, zvayavimbisa kuita izvi. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Siyai maWarriors akadaro’
text: SHASHA dzakambonetsa dzichitambira nhabvu chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata chiripo parizvino chirege kusandurwa sezvo chinogona kusvika kure mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (Afocn) apo chiri kurwira kuenda kuCameroon gore rinotevera.   Svondo radarika, maWarriors akaita mangange 1-1 neCongo Brazzaville mumutambo wavo muGroup G.   MaWarriors ndiwo ari panyanga akatarisana nemutambo inotevera apo paachasangana neDemocratic Republic of Congo mumitambo miviri yakatevedzana musvondo rimwe chete.   Akakwanisa kuhwina mitambo yawo neDRC, maWarriors anenge ave nemukana mukuru wekubudirira kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu izvo akamboita katatu kose asi achikoniwa kutamba zvinogutsa.   Zvakadai, svondo rino Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nedzimwe shasha dzakambotambira maWarriors dzinosanganisira Leo Kurauzvione naHarlington Shereni avo vanoti chikwata ichi ngachirege kusandurwa zvachose.   Vaviri ava vamwe vevaive muchikwata chemaWarriors chekutanga kuenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kuAfcon mugore ra2004 kuTunisia.   Panguva iyi, Kurauzvione aitambira Dynamos FC kozoti Shereni aitambira Guingamp yekuFrance.   Kurauzvione anoti zvakakosha kuti chikwata ichi – icho chine vatambi vakaita saKnowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Kuda Mahachi, George Chigova naEvans Rusike  – chirambe chakangobatana sezvachiri.   “Chikwata chedu chine mukana mukuru wekusvika kure asi hachidi kungoshandurwa-shandurwa zvisina tsarukano. Chiripo ichi ngachisiiwe chakadaro chiite basa racho chovakwa chakadaro, kwete kuti padiki mashandura kwauya vamwe vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvenyika hazvina nguva zhinji zviri zvese saka nguva shoma iyoyo vatambi vakambotamba vese kare vanenge vachizivana matambiro avanoita, manje kana muchivashandura-shandura pese pese zvinodzorera basa kumashure,” anodaro.   Gore rakatanga maWarriors kubudirira kuenda kuAfcon, chikwata chacho chaive nevatambi vashoma vaitambira kunze kwenyika.   Kurauzvione anoti mamiriro ezvinhu parizvino akakosha zvikuru nekuti vatambi vari kutambira kunze kana vauya havafanirwe kutanga kuchema-chema nekuda kwenyaya dzemari nekuti kuzvikwata zvavo zvavanenge vabva vanowaniswa zvese zvavanoda.   “Patori nemusiyano mukuru nechikwata chedu nekuti chikwata chavepo iye zvino chizere nevatambi vari kutambira kunze kwenyika uko kwavanowaniswa zvese zvavanoda, vanochengetedzwa zvakanakisa uye chavo kungofunga zvenhabvu chete. Saka kana vave kuuya kuzotambira maWarriors ngavafunge kusimudzira mureza wenyika kwete zvemari nekuti kwavari kubva kwakanuna kare.   “Chatiri kuda kuona basa richifamba, vakomana ava vane mukana mukuru uye ngavaushandise sezvauri,” anodaro Kurauzvione.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naShereni uyo akatambira zvikwata zvizhinji zvekuFrance achiti maWarriors anofanira kuramba akabatana.   “Isu sevatambi vakambotambira kunze kwenyika uye kumutambo weAfcon uyu tinoda kupihwa mukana wekumbotaura nevatambi variko ava tichivarayira nzira dzavanofanirwa kuzvibata nadzo kana vachida kusvika kure.   “Ngavasati vakangoenda kuSouth Africa votozviona kuti vakatopenga, aiwa kwete. Ngavashingirire kusvika vasvika kuEurope vatambire zvikwata zvikuru uye mumaligi makuru akaita seEnglish Premiership, La Liga, Serie A neFrench Ligue 1,” anodaro.

headline: Vashandi vekuMizinda yeNyika Voyawura neKusatambiriswa Mihoro kweMwedzi Yakawanda
text: Vashandi vekumizinda yeZimbabwe pamwe nevamiriri venyika munyika dzakawanda pasi rose vanonzi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo sezvo vachinzi vamwe vatove nemwedzi inodarika mitanhatu vasati vawaniswa mihoro yavo. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kukonzera kuti vamwe vashandi vaburitswe mudzimba dzavari kugara, vamwe vachikundikana kubhadharira vana vavo mari dzezvikoro munyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzavari kudzidza. Vamwe vashandi vekumizinda iyi vataura neStudio 7 vatisingakwanisi kudoma nemazita sezvo vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau, vati havachamboziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei, sezvo pasina kana tarisiro yekuti vanobhadharwa riini. Vashandi ava vati chiri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti vanoudzwa kunzi nyika haina mari yekunze inodiwa kuti vakwanise kubhadharwa asi vanoona vamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vachiita nzendo dzimwe dzisina kana nekukosha kwese. Mumwe mushandi ati haaonewo njere pakuti hurumende inodoma vamwe vamiriri venyika vatsva iyo ichikundikana kubhadhara vari pamabasa kare. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachangobva kudoma vamiriri venyika gumi nevashanu kutsiva vakaenda pamudyandigere nevamwe vakashaya. Zvinonzi mimwe mizinda yenyika yakatarisana nekuvharwa nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadhara mari dzekushandisa zvivakwa izvi. Kutanga kwegore rino bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe rakazivisawo nezvekuramwa mabasa kwevamwe vashandi vekumuzinda weZimbabwe kuMozambique, vachinyunyuta nekusatambiriswa mihoro yavo kwemakore matatu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Ambassador James Manzou, avo vanga vachinzi vabuda muhofisi mavo, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, vari mumiriri weMakonde, VaKindness Paradza vanoti komiti yavo inoziva nezvematambudziko akatarisana nevari kumizinda yenyika iyi, asi dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika ndere kushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakubhadhara vashandi ava. VaParadza vanoti vave nehurongwa hwekuti vashandi vekumizinda yenyika vese vadzokere pasi pebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti zvigove nyore pakuvabhadhara mihoro yavo. Vanoti pari zvino vashandi ava vari kutambira mihoro yavo pamwechete nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vose, danho ravatenda kuti harisi kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa neVasori Vanosungwawo Munyaya yeGoridhe Yakasungirwa Muzvare Rushwaya
text: Hurumende inoti yasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vane chekuita nenyaya iri kupomerwa vanga vari mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federation, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, avo vakasungwa vachida kubuda negoridhe munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vanoti VaAli Mohamed, VaStephen Chengerai Tserayi, VaGift Karanda, VaRaphios Mufandauya, pamwe nemapurisa maviri anoti Superintendent Shoko pamwe naDetective Chief Inspector Chimhungu. VaTserayi vanga vachishanda vari musori anochengetedza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye VaNyathi vati VaKaranda vainyepera kuzviita musori panguva yavanoti vakapara mhosva. VaNyathi vati VaMohamad, avo vane kambani yeAli Japan 786,iyo inoita zvekutengesa motokari ndivo vakanzi naMuzvare Rushwaya ndivo vaive muridzi wegoridhe. Vati pari zvino havasi kutaura zvakawanda sezvo vachiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi vachiti vasungwa ava vakatarisirwa kumiswa mudare. Muzvare Rushwaya vakatarisirwa kudzoka kudare ramejasitiriti mangwana apo pakatarisirwa kuturwa mutongo naVaNgoni Nduna wekuti zvinokodzera here kuti hurumende ishandure pfungwa dzayo dzekubvuma kwayakange yaita kuti Muzvare Rushwaya vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vachuchisi venyaya iri kupomerwa Muzvare Rushwaya vakaudza dare kuti vakange voda kuchinja mabatiro enyaya iyi sezvo vachiti vakange vazoona kuti nyaya iyi yakakura kwazvo uye ine vanhu vakawanda vari mairi. Goridhe raida kuburitswa munyika zvisiri pamutemo naMuzvare Rushwaya rinokosha mari inodarika mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vari kutevera nyaya iyi vanoti kusungwa kwaitwa mapurisa nevasori panyaya iyi kunoratidza kuti hurumende yadzikisa gejo mukurwisa huori. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati kusungwa kwemapurisa nevasori haisi nyaya yekuti hurumende yakazvipira kurwisana nehuori asi kuti zvikwata zveZanu PF zviri kurwira bhonzo renyama. Asi VaNyathi mapurisa haasi kuzorega kusunga munhu wese ane chekuita nenyaya iyi vachiti vari kuferefeta zvakare kuti goridhe iri rakanga rabvepi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, vanoti kubuda kwemari munyika zvisiri pamutemo kwakafanana nababa vanoba mari mumba vachinonwa doro mhuri ichisara ichiziya nenzara. Zvichakadai, bhodhi reZimbabwe Miners Federation rinoti rambomisa basa Muzvare Rushwaya richiti nyaya yavo inosvibisa zita resangano iri. Vanga vari mutevedzeri waMuzvare Rushwaya, VaMarufu Sithole, ndivo vave kumbofanobata chigaro chemutungamiiri weZimbabwe Miners Federation. No media source currently available

headline: Nera Yokurudzira Kuvandudzwa kweZec
text: Mapato anopikisa aungana zvakare muHarare neChitatu achisimbaradza nyaya yekuti sangano rinowona nezvekufambiswa kwesarudzo rivandudzwe pamberi pesarudzo achiti ave kuita gadziriro yekuratidzira mumigwagwa. Mapato anopikisa ari kushanda ari pasi peboka riri kuzvidaidza kuti National Election Reforms Agenda, kana kuti Nera, aungana panzvimbo yaari kudaidza kuti Freedom Square muHarare apo asimbisa nyaya yekupinda mumigwagwa achiratidzira kusafara nekutadza kufambisa basa kwaanoti kuri kuitwa nekomisheni inowona nezvesarudzo munyika yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti Zec. Mumwe ataura pamusangano uyu uye vari munyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vaudza vanhu vauya pamusangano uyu kuti vabvumirana semapato ari muNera kuti vachapinda mumigwagwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera zvisinei kuti hurumende inoda here kana kuti kwete vachiti zvose zvinoita kuti sarudzo dzemunyika dzisafambe zvakanaka zvinofanira kugadziriswa sarudzo dzemuna 2018 dzisati dzaitwa. Mashoko aVaMwonzora aya anotevera kurambidzwa nemapurisa kwakaitwa Nera kuita musangano waitwa uyu muAfrica Unity Square vachinzi vaitire kuFreedom Square mapurisa achiti pakati pedhorobha panga pachizoitwa musangano wemakurukota ezvekunze kwenyika emunyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe. Mumwe wevanhu vauya pamusangano uyu, VaWarship Dumba, vabvumirana nedanho ratorwa nemapato anopikisa ari muNera. Muzvare Eunice Nyakutsikwa avo vanga vari pamusangano uyu vati hurumende yeZanu PF haifanurwe kuramba ichiregererwa ichityora kodzero dzevanhu. VaMunyaradzi Banda, avo vataura vakamirira Amai Joice Mujuru vanove mutungamiri webato reNational People’s Party, vati bato ravo rakazvipira kushanda nemamwe mapato ari muNera kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzinoremekedza zvido zvevanhu. Vatiwo sebato riri kushanda nevakarwa muhondo uye rakatsemuka kubva muZanu PF, vanoziva chikiribidi chose chaiitwa neZanu PF mukubirira kwavanoti kunoitwa sarudzo neZanu PF. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaElias Mudzuri, avo vataura vakamirira VaTsvangirai, avo vanzi vari kunze kwenyika, vati chinodikanwa nedechekuti ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwutaure nezwi rimwechete kwete kusiya VaMugabe vachiita madiro aJojina nehupenyu hweveruzhinji. Zvichakadai, mapato anopikisa aya ati ave kuda kuti Zec ipwanywe -sarudzo dzofambiswa nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSADC richibatsirana nesangano renyika dzose dziri muAfrica reAfrican Union nesangano renyika dzepasi rose reUnited Nations sezvo achiti hurumende yaVaMugabe ikaregwa ichitungamira sarudzo zvakafanana nekuenda kutsime nemugomo wakabooka. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kubvuma Kuti Zvinhu Zvakaita Manyama Amire neRongo Munyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvinhu zvicharamba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muZimbabwe kana hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ikaramba yakaomesa musoro ichiti munyika hamuna matambudziko. Mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti Zimbabwe haisi kuzofambira mberi kana hurumende ikaramba achiratidza kuti haisi kunzwisisa matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji. Muzvare Mukoko, avo vakambopambwa vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende muna 2008,vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kutonga nyika vasiri kubvuma kuti zvinhu zvakaminama muZimbabwe, veruzhinji munyika vari kugara vari panyanga dzamushore. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo, Reverend Ray Motsi, vanoti kana pasina muonera pamwe unoitwa nrvanhu vemuZimbabwe, hapana chinogadzirisika munyika. VaMotsi vanoti kunyange hurumende iri kuti munyika hamuna dambudziko, chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti veruzhinji vari kutambura zvakanyanya munyika yavo. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vanoti semachechi, maonero avo ndeyekuti nhaurirano ndiyo chete nzira ingagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. VaMtata vanotiwo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pachazvo, kana zvikabatana zvichiita muonera pamwe, ndizvo chete zvinogadzirisa matambudziko akasunga nyika mbiradzakondo. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, Dr Tinashe Mawere, vanotiwo kana pasina kuwirirana kuti munyika mune zviri kunetsa, hapana kufambira mberi kungaite Zimbabwe senyika. Zviri kutaurwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo zvakatsigirwawo nemizinda iri muZimbabwe yenyika huru dzinobatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzakasiyana. Vamiriri vemizinda iyi vakaburitsa gwaro riri kushora zvikuru kutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe pamwe nehuori huri kuitwa munyaya dzezvicherwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, sezvo gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vange vasingabatike panhare mbozha yavo. Asi vachipindura padanho rakatorwa nemizinda iyi, iyo inosanganisira Canada, America, Netherlands nemimwe, mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vakati nyika iyi dzinofanirwawo kuteerera zviri kutaurwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, VaElasto Mugwadi, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuisa misoro pamwe chete vogadzirisa zvinenge zvichinetsa munyika mavo. Komisheni yaVaMugwadi, iyo inovawo boka rakaumbwa nehurumende, rakaburitsawo mashoko enyunyuto pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Komisheni iyi yakakuridzirawo hurumende kuti iferefete nyaya dzose dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Asi hurumende inoti kunze kwedambudziko reCovid-19, hapana matambidziko ari munyika, uye vari kuti munyika mune matambudziko, vanhu vari kushandiswa nevavengi vane chinangwa chibvisa hurumende iripo. No media source currently available

headline: VaKhaya Moyo Vanobvuma Kuti Chabvondoka muZanu PF
text: Bato re Zanu PF rinoti richasangana svondo rinouya kuti rizeya nyaya yekunetsana kuri mubato iri kana paine vanenge vaine zvichemo zvavanenge vatura kuPolitburo. Mashoko aya ataurwa nemutauriri webato iri, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, zvichiteveraa kunetsana nekurovana uye kukandirana makobvu nematete kuri kuenderera mberi mubato iri pamveri pemusangano waro we National Conference uri kutarisira kuitwa kuVictoria Falls muna Zvita. No media source currently available Vanhu vakawanda mubato iri vave makara asionane zvikuru vanonzi vari kutsigira chikwata chinonzi chinotungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nechimwe chinonzi Generation 40 chinosanganisira mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Asi Amai Mugabe naVaMnangagwa vanoti havana zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti chirongwa cheGeneration 40, kana kuti G40, chakauya kuburikidza nepfungwa dzevaimbove gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaJonathan Moyo, vachishanda nemamwe makurukota echidiki muZanu PF Mune kunetsana kunotyisa mumatunhu akawanda muZanu PF kusanganisira Masvingo, Harare, Mashonaland West, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vachiongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti zvava kuitika muZanu PF zvinoratidza kuti bato iri chava chitima chisina musoro

headline: MDC T Yoshora Mashoko eGurukota reDunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Chimene
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rinoti riri kunyorera mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, tsamba yenyunyuto pamusoro pemashoko anonzi akautaurwa negurukota rinoona nedunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Mandiitawepi Chimene, ekuti vachavharisa mabhizimusi everudzi rwechi India kana vakaramba vasingapinde mumisangano yavari kushevedzera. Vachitaura pamashoko avo ekutambira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, mudunhu ravo svondo rapera, Muzvare Chimene vakati vemabhizimusi ava vari kuramba kupinda mumisangano yavari kushevedzera, vakati vari kuvapa mazuva mashanu chete ekuti vasangane navo, kutadza kwavo kuita izvi mabhizimusi avo aizovharwa. Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti mashoko aMuzvare Chimene ane rusarura, uye vanhu ivava ndivo vashoma vevasara vachiri kuwanisa vanhu mabasa munyika zvichitevera kuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda. Studio7 yaedza kubata Muzvare Chimene asi tanzi tivabate neChipiri sezvo vanzi vanga vari mumusangano. VaGutu vanoti aka hakasi kekutanga kuti Muzvare Chimene vatyisidzire vanhu. Vanoti pavakainda muhofisi, Muzvare Chimene vakatyisidzira vemakambani anochera mangoda kwaChiadzwa kuti vasapinze nhengo dzeMDC mabasa, vachinzi vakati vanenge vatsaudzira vaizotorerwa marezinesi avo. VaGutu vanoti gurukota iri rakatyisidzira zvakare vekanzuru yeMutare nemashoko ekuti rinoda kuumba imwe kanzuru inenge iri pasi paro, isina nhengo dzeMDC. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVaviri Vanofa Mutsaona kuTsholotsho
text: Tsaona yakaitika neMugovera ku Tsholotsho ku Matabeleland North inonzi yakatora hupenyu hwevanhu makumi maviri nemumwe pakaitika tsaona, mumwezve ndokufira kuchipatara. Tsaona iyi yakaitika apo vanhu makumi matanhatu vakange vari murhori yehurumende vachiendeswa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kunorwisa chirwere che malaria kwa Sipepa, ku Tsholotsho kwakare. Vari munzira kuenda kubasa, zvinonzi muchairi werhori anonzi akatadza kutyaira zvakanaka rhori iyi kuti irambe iri mumugwagwa payakasvika panomonyoroka mugwagwa, ndokubuda mumugwagwa ichibva yapinda musangano umo yakabheukira. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reMatabeleland North, Doctor Nyasha Masuka, vanoti hurumende iri kubatsira vakashaya mutsaona iyi. Vatiwo munhu akashaya mutsaona iyi ari kuwana mari inoita chiuru chemadhora. Dr Masuka vatiwo pane vanhu vari kurapwa muzvipatara zvinoti Tsholotsho, Mpilo Central Hospital ne United Bulawayo Hospitals zvichitevera tsaona iyi. Studio7 haina kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Muna Chikunguru gore rino, vanhu gumi nevaviri vakafa vazhinji vakakuvara ku Kamativi ku Matebeleland North kwekare. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe neMudzimai Wavo Vobviswa paNzvimbo Yavanonzi Vakapamba
text: Sangano revatendi reReformed Church in Zimbabwe, RCZ, ranyorera tsamba mhuri yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ichivapa mazuva manomwe ekuti vabve pasitendi yavanonzi vakapamba gore rapera. RCZ inoti yakatorerwa nzvimbo iyi iri muGretstone Park kuBorrowdale muHarare nemhuri yaVaMugabe. RCZ inoti Amai Grace Mugabe ndivo vanonzi vakashandisa kambani yemhuri yavo ye Gushungo Holdings pasi pechirongwa chekugoverwa minda patsva kunyange sitendi iyi yange isiri mumapurazi eminda sezvo iri mumisha munogara vanhu vedhorobha reHarare. Mutsamba yanyorwa neChipiri nemagweta eSaratoga Makausi Law Chambers, RCZ inoti mhuri yekwa Mugabe ikasabva mumazuva manomwe inozobviswa nechisimba pachishandiswa matare edzimhosva. RCZ inoti nzvimbo iri panhamba 791 Greystone Park, uye yakapihwa chechi yavo neimwe nhengo yechechi iyi yakabuda munyika kare. RCZ inoti nzvimbo iyi ndeye chimwe chezvikoro zvavo. Gweta reRCZ, VaRodney Makausi, vati ichokwadi kuti vanyorera veGushungo Holdings tsamba iyi sezvinodiwa nemutemo, uye vakasaita zviri mutsamba iyi vanovaendesa kumatare edzimhosva. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muRCZ, Reverend Doctor Rangarirayi Rutoro, vaudza Studio7 kuti vasvitsa tsamba iyi kune vanochengetedza sitendi iyi. Vatiwo nzvimbo iyi yakatorimwa chibage. RCZ yakaenda kumatare ikadzivisa kutorwa kwe sitendi asi mhuri yekwa Mugabe yakaramba kubuda kusvika pari zvino. Mukuru wezvekuchengetedzwa kwezvinhu kuGushungo Holdings, VaMkhululi Nyoni, varamba kutaura ne Stduio7 pavafonerwa. Chechi yeRCZ inobatsira vanhu munyika kubudikidza nedzidzo nehutano. RCZ ine zvikoro zvonoti Pamushana Mission High, Gutu Mission high, Chivi High, Mogenster Mission Hospital, Henry Murray School of the Deaf Kapota School of the Blind pamwe ne Reformed Church University zvose zviri mudunhu reMasvingo uye Egasvale kuHarare nezvimwe zvikoro mumatunhu enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Fury otatsurana naWilder
text: anoti vakanyorerana pasi chibvumirano nevamiriri vaDeontay Wilder kuti vaviri ava vagorwe mumutambo weheavyweight muna Zvita kuLAs Vegas.   Puromota wemutambi uyu, Frank Warren, uyo anozivikanwa saGypsy King akataura svondo rino kuti mapoka maviri aya ange ari muhurukuro uye Fury ane chivimbo chekuti mutambo uyu uchabvumidzwa kuti uenderere mberi asi hunge kana akahwina mutambo wake wechipiri apo achasangana naFrancesco Pianeta mwedzi uno.   “Zvave kuitika manje, hunge ndikakunda Pienata,” Fury akaudza Behind The Gloves.

headline: Zvipingaidzo Zvobuda muChirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19
text:
Bazi rezvehutano rinoti harikwanise kuongorora vanhu vose vari kuda
kubayiwa nhomba vasati vabayiwa nhomba iyi sezvinokurudzirwa nevakagadzira nhomba yeSinopharm. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nezuro mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu
reMashonaland West, Dr Gift Masoja, vakati hurumende haikwanise kuongorora sezvo vasina zvikwanisiro zvinokwanira munhu wese ari kuda kubayiwa nhomba. Dr Masoja vakati chimwe chikonzero ndechekuti nguva yekubayiwa nhomba inozowandisa zvakanyanya sezvo zvichitora maawa maviri kana kudarika munhu akamirira zvichabuda muongororo inenge yaitwa iyi.

Dr Masoja vakati munhu akamborwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 anogona
kubayiwa nhomba sezvo paine mukana wekuti anogona kurwara nechirwere ichi zvakare.

Nyanzvi yezvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende
yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti hurumende yakatadza kare kuti iwongorore vanhu nekudaro vakada kuzviita chirongwa chekubaya nhomba chinodzokera kumashure.

Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kukurudzira vanhu vari kuda
kubayiwa nhomba kuti vataure chokwadi kuti vane hutano hwakasimba
here,kana kuti kwete.

Dunhu reMashonaland West iro rakapihwa majekiseni enhomba anosvika
zviuru gumi rechimwe chete, rabaya vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nezana
nemakumi masere nevasere, kana kuti 1188 mumazuva
mashanu kusvika nezuro. Munyika yose, vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe, 12579, vakange vabayiwa nhomba iyi mukupera kwezuva ranezuro. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vanhu vashanu nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika yose pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, 1463. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemakumi mana nevana, 36044, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu makumi mashanu nechirwere ichi nezuro. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki veMDC Vanga Vari muHusungwa Vanopiwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Vechidiki vaviri veMDC, vanoti VaMakomborero Haruzivishe naVaAllan Moyo, avo vanga vari muhusungwa kubva svondo rapera pavakasungwa vachinzi vakapinda mukuratidzira kusina mvumo, vapiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Vaviri ava vakatanga kupinda mudare neMugovera asi vakanzi vadzoke zvakare mudare neMuvhuro mushure mekunge vachuchisi vapikisa kuti vasapiwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachiti vanogona kupara zvakare mhaka dzavari kupomerwa kana kukundikana kuzodzoka kudare. Gweta ravo, VaObey Shava veZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vanoti vaviri ava vabhadhariswa mari inoita chiuru chemadhora emari yemunyika pamunhu, uye vanzi vasavhiringidza vafakazi, vagare pakero dzavapa kudare, pamwe nekuzviratidza kumapurisa kaviri pasvondo. VaShava vanoti VaHaruzivishe naVaMoyo, avo vari kuramba mhosva iyi, vanzi vagodzoka kudare musi wa 09 Kurume, unove mwedzi unoya. VaHaruzivishe naVaMoyo vakasungwa pamwechete nevamwe vechidiki makumi matatu nevana vachipomerwa mhosva yekupinda mukuratidzira kwakarongwa nevechidiki veMDC neChitatu chapfuura, asi vamwe makumi makumi maviri nevaviri vakazoregwa vachienda vasina mhosva dzavakapomerwa. VaShava vanoti semagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vari kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kusungwa zvisina shumo, vavanoti vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: United Nations Yobatsira Vapoteri veZimbabwe Vodzingwa kuBotswana
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevapoteri pasi rose reUNHCR kumaodzanyemba kweAfrica rinoti riri munhaurirano nehurumende yeBotswana dzekutsvaga nzira yekupedza dambudziko rakasangana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muhupoteri muBotswana. Pane vapoteri mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe kusanganisira vana vadiki vari kutsika madziro munyaya yekuti vazvipire kudzoserwa kumusha muchirongwa chevoluntary repatration vachiti kuZimbabwe kwakaberekera ingwe. Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yeBotswana yaiti bazi rinoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika iyi richavaita musengabere mushure mekudzosera vamwe vavo mazana mana nemakumi maviri kubva munaZvita kusvika pakati kwemwedzi uno, vapoteri ava vari kuramba vakamira semusambangwena. Muzvare Heinn Shin, avo vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko musangano reUNHCR, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari munhaurirano nehurumende yeBotswana senzira yekutsvaga pundutso panyaya iyi. Muzvare Shin vaenderera mberi vachiti vapoteri ava, vane makore anopinda gumi vari muhupoteri pamuzinda weDukwi Refugee Camp muBotswana, vhavasi kufara nekuda kudzoserwa kumusha nechisimba. Sezvo Botswana yakaisa ruoko rwayo pachibvumirano chekuchengetedza kodzero dzevapoteri che1951 UN Refugee Convention, Muzvare Shin vanoti nyika iyi inosungirwa kupa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe hupoteri vachiti kusadaro kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevapoteri nokuti hupenyu hwavo hunogona kupinda munataisireva kana vakadzoserwa kunyika yavo. Vachitsigira mashoko aMuzvare Shin, gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika yeBotswana, VaKagiso Mmusi vanoti hurumende yavo haisikudzosera kumusha avo vasiri kuda nechisimba kumusha. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chiri muhupoteri, Amai Toendepi Mverechena vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakanzwawo nerunyerekupe kuti sangano reUHNCR riri kutaurirana nehurumende yeBotswana kuti vatsvagirwe kwavangaendeswe. Vachitsigira mashoko aAmai Mverechena, mumwe ari muhupoteri achibva kuZimbabwe uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo achitya kubvongodza muto kuseva achada, anoti kupindira kweUNHCR munyaya yavo kwaunza kugadzikana muhana dzevazhinji sezvo hurumende yeBotswana yati dzikamei. Pari zvino, paDukwi Refugee Camp pasara vapoteri zviuru zviviri chete zvinosanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, Somalia, Uganda, Burundi nedzimwewo nyika dzekumabvazuva kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Chigumba Vanoti Vozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yavasina Kudya Pakusaitwa kweSarudzo
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Priscilla Chigumba varamba mashoko ekuti ndivo vari kuramba kuti sarudzo dzema by elections dziitwe vachiti mitemo yeCovid-19 yakadzikwa kuchengetedza vanhu yakapa kuti zvimwe zvinofanira kuitwa pasi pebumbiro remitemo zvimbosendekwa parutivi. Izvi zvinosanganisira sarudzo dzakamiswa kwenguva isina kutarwa nemutemo wechimbi chimbi wakadzikwa nebazi rezvehutano. umashoko avatumira kuStudio 7 vachipindura mibvunzo yedu panyaya yesarudzo dzemaby elections, Amai Chigumba vatiwo mazuva esarudzo anotarwa nemutungamiri wenyika achinzwa kubva kuZEC nekugadzirirawo kwainenge yakaita. Amai Chigumba vatiwo nyaya iyi ichiri kudare repamusoro reHigh Court nekudaro vakasungwa maoko pari zvino. Asi sachigaro wesangano rinoongorora nezvesarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network VaAndrew Makoni vanoti sarudzo idzo dzabe kufanira kuitwa nekuti kune nzvimbo mukanzuru zana nemashanu uye makumi maviri memasere muparamende dzisisina vamiriri kwenguva yakareba nekuda kwekuti vamwe vakadzingwa nebato reMDC-T vachinzi vari kuMDC Alliance, vamwe vakadzingwa neZanu-PF vamwewo vakafa. VaMakoni vati havaone chinotadzisa kupa Zimbabwe kuita sarudzo kana nyika dzakapoteredza dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa dzichiita sarudzo munguva yeCovid-19.

headline: “One World Together At Home” Inowana Mamirioni Mazana Maviri Anemakumi Manomwe Emadhora Kubatsira Kurwisana neCovid-19
text: Muimbi ane mukurumbira, anozivikanwa nezita rekuti ‘Lady Gaga’, achibatsirana neWorld Health Organisation, akaronga mutambo wemimhanzi apo vaimbi vane mukurumbira vaishaura kuvanhu pasi pose vari mudzimba dzavo muAmerica, United Kingdom, kuEurope nekunedzimwe nyika zhinji pasi pose. Mutambo uyu, uyo unonzi ‘One World Together at Home’, wakaona vaimbi vanemukurumbira vachiimbira vanhu, pakabuda mamirioni nemamirioni emadhora ekubatsira mukurwisana nechirwere che Coronavirus, pamwechete nekubatsira avo vanorapa vanhu asi vasina mbatya dzakakwana dzekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu vanoita mamirioni makumi maviri ne mazana manomwe (270 million) vakaona mutambo uyu uchiitwa paInternet, patelevhizhini nepama ‘social media’ akasiyanasiyana. Mutambo uyu wakaitirwa kutsigira avo vanoshanda vachirapa vanhu vanechirwere che Covid-19 uye kuedza kubatsira kumisa kupararira kwe chirwere ichi. Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi pose, reWorld Health Organization, rakabatana naLady Gaga, rakaronga mutambo uyu, uyo wakatora ma awa matanhatu vaimbi vachiyaura. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinofarira zvemimanzi nemafirimu, Tafadzwa Munjanja, anogara mudunhu reOklahoma, muAmerica, anoti mushure memutambo uyu, pakazoita ma awa maviri apo vaimbi, vamwe vatungamiri venyika neavo vanozivikanwa mukubatsira nemari vakarumbidza vashandi mune zvehutano, vanachiremba neavo vese varikurwisana nechirwere che coronavirus pasi pose. No media source currently available

headline: Magweta aChin'ono naVaNgarivhume Odzokera Zvakare kuMatare
text: Magweta ari kumirira mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, pamwe nemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, anoti ari kudzokera zvakare kumatare nemusi weChitatu. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti richakumbira matare nemusi weChitatu kuti ape vaviri ava mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba. Vaviri ava vakanyimwa nedare repamusoro mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso svondo rino. Asi mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti magweta ari kudzokera kumatare sezvo pane zvinhu zvashanduka kubva pakasungwa vaviri ava. VaMafunda vanoti nyaya yekukurudzira kuratidzira musi wa 31 Chukunguru haichave ingarambe vaviri ava vari muhusungwa nokuti zuva iri rakapfuura, uye hapana mhirizhonga yakaitika. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Vatambi vetsiva vodya nhoko dzezvironda’
text: PUROMOTA wetsiva Clyde Musonda anoti vatambi vemuno vane chitsama parizvino vave kudya nhoko dzezvironda sezvo vazhinji vavo vachirarama kuburikidza nemutambo uyu uyo wakambomiswa kutambwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Musonda anoti vatambi vetsiva vazhinji vari panguva yakaoma.   “Coronavirus yatiisa panguva yakaoma zvikuru uye vatambi vedu vetsiva vazhinji vari kushungurudzikana nekuti havana chekubata. Tsiva yafa, yawira pasi uye vatambi kutaura kuno vari kudya nhoko dzezvironda,” anodaro Musonda.   Anoti ari pakati pekuronga mutambo we “Kick-out Coronavirus” uyo uchazoshandiswa kuunganidza mari yekubatsira vatambi vetsiva nemamaneja avo pamwechete nevanhu vakasangana nedambudziko rechirwere ichi.   Musonda — uyo anove mutungamiri weDeltaforce Boxing Academy — anoti ane chivimbo chekuti mutambo uyu uchabudirira.   “Tine zvakawanda zvatiri kuronga izvo tinofungidzira kuti zvinogona kubatsira vatambi vetsiva kuti vasimukire kubva panguva yakaoma ino yatakatarisana nayo.   “Asi chekutanga tinoshuvira kuti mutambo udzoke. Kune dzimwe nyika sekuAmerica mutambo wewrestling wakatenderwa kuti ukwikwidzwe asi pasina vatsigiri uye tinongoshuvirawo kuti izvozvo zvigoitikawo muno,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Vorwisa HIV nenhabvu
text: SANGANO reNational AIDS Council (NAC) rorwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV neAIDS pamwe nekutorwa kwezvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri nevechidiki kuburikidza nemutambo wenhabvu pasi pechirongwa cheBrother to Brother.   Chirongwa ichi, icho chakavambwa mugore ra2019, chiri kuitwa kumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika kusanganisira kuChipinge uko kwakaumbwa zvikwata 40 kubva kumawards 10.   London Makwanya anove District AIDS Coordinator (DAC) weNAC kuChipinge anoti chirongwa cheBrother to Brother chiri kubatsira zvikuru mukudzidzisa vanakomana kuti vasatore zvinodhaka pamwe nekuzvidzivirira kubva kuHIV neAIDS kuburikidza nemutambo wenhabvu.   Anoti kuChipinge kune mawards 10 uye muward yega-yega mune zvikwata zvina zvevanakomana vanosvika 25 muchikwata chimwe nechimwe.   Kana vechidiki ava vapedza kutamba nhabvu, vanowana zvakare mukana wekudzidziswa pamusoro pekukoshesa kuchengetedza utano hwavo uye mamwe emabhindauko anokwanisa kuvararamisa muhupenyu.   “Tiri kushandisa mutambo wenhabvu kupa vanakomana zvidzidzo zvehupenyu zvinosanganisira dzidziso maringe nedenda reHIV/AIDS uye kuita mabindauko akasiyana emaoko anobatsira kuti vawane mari yekuvaramamiswa muhupenyu hwavo.   “Mabhindauko avari kuita anosanganisira kurima miriwo yekutengesa, kupfuya huku uye koita vamwe vanorima mamacademia vanozotengesa vachiwana mari. Izvi zviri kubatsira vakomana ava kurarama hupenyu hwakachena uye vabereki vavo vari kutofara nemararamiro avanoita.   “Pari zvino, tine zvikwata 40 zviri muChipinge uye tiri pakati pekuronga mutambo mukuru uchaunganidza zvikwata zvese kuti zvigouya zvobandana,” anodaro Makwanya.   Mumwe mutungamiriri wezvikwata izvi anove mentor pasi pechirongwa cheBrother to Brother, Samson Mukonya, anoti chiri kubatsira zvikuru vechidiki kuti vasapinde munyaya dzekutora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri.    SAMSON Mukonya achipa zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana kuchikwata chake apo vainge vapedza kuita gadziriro dzavo dzenhabvu   Anoti muchikwata chake mune vatambi venhabvu vanotaridza kuti vane tarenda uye vanogona kuzotambira zvikwata zvikuru mune remangwana.   “Tiri kuona shanduko huru muhupenyu hwevakomana kuburikidza nechirongwa cheBrother to Brother icho chiri kuvadzidzisa kurarama hupenyu hwakachena. Tiri kuvafundisa nhabvu uye kana tapedza kutamba nhabvu, totanga kupangana mazano ekutsvaga mari zviri pamutemo kwete zvechikiribidi.   “Chirongwa ichi chiri kubatsira zvakare kuti vakomana vagone kuzvichengetedza muhupenyu hwavo, vazive nezveHIV/AIDS uye vasiye kutora zvinodhaka zvisingatenderwe mumuviri,” anodaro Mukonya.   “Ini muchikwata changu nditori nevakomana avo ndinotoona kuti vachasvika kure nenhabvu saka tiri kuvabatsira kuti vagoonekwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana mune remangwana.”

headline: Kambani yeHurumende yeFidelity Printers Ndiyo Ichadhinda "Ballot Papers"
text: Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yazivisa makambani achadhinda mapepa ekuvhotesa pamusangano wayaita nevemapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, VaQubani Moyo, vati mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa nemakambani maviri emuno anoti Fidelity Printers nePrintflow. Fidelity ndiyo ichadhinda magwaro ekuvhotera mutungamiri wenyika, uye ekuvhotera nhengo dzedare reparamende. Printflow ichadhinda mapepa ekuvhotera makanzura. Makambani maviri aya ndeehurumende. VaMoyo vatiwo mapato achabvumidzwa kuona kudhindwa kunenge kuchiitwa mapepa aya. Mashoko eZec aya atambirwa nevari kumirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNelson Chamisa, VaJameson Timba. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC-T inoutngamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaNixon Nyikadzino, vati kunyange hazvo Zec yazivisa kuchadhindwa mapepa ekuvhotesa aya, nyaya iyi haiperere ipapa sezvo vachiti pane zvimwe zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mapato aya paapihwa mukana wekubvunza mibvunzo maererano nekomiti yanga ichida kuumbwa neZec pakati pevanhu vari mumapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo ichange ichitarisa nhuna dzinenge dzichibva mumapato pamberi pesarudzo, ye Multi-party Liason Committee, imwe nhengo yebato reFreedom Movement #1980 Chinhu Chedu, VaFrancis Danha, vakonzera zhowe zhowe vachiti sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, nevose vari mukomsheni yavo vanofanira kusiya basa. VaDanha vati Amai Chigumba nevamwe vavo vakatadza kufambisa basa zvakanaka pavakatadza kupa mapato ezvematongerwo gwaro revavhoti pamberi pekugara kwakaita dare raitambira mazita evachakwikwidza musarudzo svondo rapera. VaDanha vati kutadza kuwana gwaro revavhoti kwakakonzera kuti nhengo dzebato ravo zhinji dzitadze kukwikwidza musarudzo vachiti havachavimbi kuti Zec ichakwanisa kufambisa sarudzo munyika. Zvaitwa naVaDanha, avo varambidza VaMoyo nechikwata chavanga vachifamba nacho kuenderera mberi nekutaura kudzamara Amai Chigumba vasiya basa, zvabva zvakaonzera kuti musangano uyu utadze kuenderera mberi uye komiti yanga ichida kuumbwa iyi itadze kuumbwa. Vanga vakamirira Zanu PF pamusangano uyu, VaFortune Chasi, vashora zvaitwa naVaDanha. Asi VaTimba vatiwo zvaitwa naVaDanha zvinoburitsa pachena kurwadziwa kwemapato anopkisa nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa basa neZec Zvichakadai, VaMoyo vati komisheni yavo ichazoshevedzera mumwe musangano kana vagadzirisa nyaya dzekuchengetedzeka kwevanhu nemapurisa kuitira kuti misangano isakanganiswe sezvaitwa naVaDanha. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovandudza Mitemo Kuti Matunhu Awane Imwe yeMari yeZvicherwa Zvawo
text: Hurumende inoti iri kunyora mitemo mitsva inozoona kuti nzvimbo dzine zvicherwa dzigovane nehurumende mari inobva muzvicherwa zvemunzvimbo idzodzo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti hurumende yavo inoona kuti nzvimbo zhinji dzine zvicherwa hadzina mari yadzinowana saka vanoda kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mukuru weCenter For Natural Resources Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti zvingave zvakanaka chose kana hurumende ikaita izvi asi vanotizve matunhu anofanira kupiwa simba rekusarudza zvinoda kuitwa munzvimbo dzawo uye kuti matunhu asarudze vanhu kana makambani anozoita zvemabhizimisi mudunhu iroro. "Nyaya yekunyorwa kwemitemo iyi yakagara ichitaurwa kubva VaMnangagwa vari gurukota rezvemitemo. Kubva kuna 2006, Zimbabwe yatadza kuti inyore mitemo mitsva yezvezvicherwa. Vanga vachiramba vachingoita zvigamba zvigamba. Saka handizivi kuti vave nemaonero matsva here," VaMaguwu vakaudza Studio 7. "Chinhu chekutanga chatinoda kuona, kupa matunhu ese masimba ekuzvitonga, kana kuti 'devolution of power'. Dunhu rimwe nerimwe rinofanira kusarudza vanoita bhizimisi mudunhu raro." No media source currently available

headline: Doctor Manyika veBuild Zimbabwe Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vasakanganwa Kwavakabva
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Doctor Noah Manyika vanogara kuCharlotte, kuNorth Carolina muAmerica vari kuita zvakawanda kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe, vangave kumusha kana kunze kwenyika, kuti vavake nyika yechipikirwa. Doctor Manyika vanoshanda nesangano reBuild Zimbabwe, iro vakavamba vaine chinangwa chekuti vabatsire vana nezvipfeko, mabhuku pamwe nevirongwa zvinorodza pfungwa. Asi vanoti vakazorivhurirawo kune vamwe vana veZimbabwe kuti vaite mubata pamwe semajuru mukuumba nyika. "Build Zimbabwe chirongwa chandaiita makore gumi nemashanu adarika nechinangwa chekuti Zimbabwe ibudirire kana munhu wese akawana chaanoita mukuvaka nyika. Asi ndakazoti, kwete, kwete, regai ndidaidzed vamwe vana veZimbabwe tivake tiri pamwechete," vanodaro Doctor Manyika. Vanoti sangano ravo iri rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvariri kuita mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana enyika, zvinosanganisira kuvaka dzimba dzine mitengo yepasi mumaguta ari munyika senzira yekubatsira vanhu vakawanda kuti vawane pekugara pakakodzera. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Pane Vari Kuronga Kupidigura VaMnangagwa
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika VaCain Mathema vanoti mapurisa ave kugara akadzipakatira sezvo vachiti pane vari kuda kupidigura hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuburikidza nekuratidzira. Vatiwo pane vemasangano ekunze vari kuda kushanda nevemasangano akazvimirira kuronga kuratidzira munyika. VaMathema vaudza vatori venhau muHarare nhasi kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko ichirega vanhu vachiratidzira vachitungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa nevemasangano akazvimirira oga. No media source currently available Gurukota iri raramba kuti hurumende ndiyo iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika nenyaya yemitemo yayo yapa kuti hupfumi huende kumawere. Vati zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika ndizvo zvapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. Vati zvakakokerwa neMDC uye vakayambira bato iri kuti risaratidzire risina mvumo yehurumende. Asi nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinoti zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru venyika vanotonga nedemo. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Yadzokoa/Mayibuye IZimbabwe Doctor Victor Chimhutu vati zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi ndizvo zviri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Nhabvu yadzoka . . . DeMbare, Bosso zvobandana
text: Ndooka   KUNOTSVA demo kugo­sara mupinyi nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muguta reHarare uko makara asionane – Dyna­mos neHighlanders FC – zvi­chatatsurana mumutambo wePresident’s Independence Day Trophy (Uhuru Cup).   Uyu ndiwo mutambo wekutanga wekutambwa nezvikwata zvemuno kub­vira apo mitambo yose yakamiswa munaKurume gore radarika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutambo wekupedzisira pakati peDeMbare neBosso mugore ra2019, Bosso yakahwinha 2-0.   Nemusi weSvondo apo pachatambwa mutambo uyu kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium, kuchange kusina vatsigiri sezvo pachatevedzwa mitemo yose yeWorld Health Organisa­tion (WHO) neyemunyika muno yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Vachitaura nguva pfupi yadarika, gurukota rez­vekuburitswa kwemashoko nenyaya dzenhepfenyuro, Senator Monica Mutsvan­gwa vanoti zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatamba pachiteved­zwa mitemo yose yekurwisa denda iri.   “Zvikwata zviviri zvine mukurumbira, Dynamos neHighlanders, zvicharwira mukombe apo zvichasan­gana mumutambo wePres­ident’s Independence Day Trophy uyo uchatambwa pachitevedzwa matanho akatarwa eWHO neenyika ekudzivirira kupararira kwe­denda reCovid-19,” vanodaro Sen Mutsvangwa.   Munhoroondo yenhabvu yemutambo uyu, DeMbare neBosso zvakasangana ka16 uye zvose zvichik­wanisa kuhwina kanonwe mukombe uyu.   Mutambi weDeMbare – Kudzanai Dhemere – anoti ari kufara chaizvo nekudzoka kwenhabvu uye sechikwata vari kushanda nesimba kuti vagohwina mutambo uyu.   “Mutambo uyu tange tausuwisisa zvikuru, tange tane ngura yekugara nguva ndefu tisingatambe bhora,” anodaro Dhemere.   Murairidzi weBosso, Mandla Mpofu, nguva pfupi yadarika akati anofara chaizvo nekudzoka kwaPeter Muduhwa uyo akange aenda kunotamba kuTanzania nechikwereti kwemwedzi mitanhatu.   “Semurairidzi, ndino­fara chaizvo kuti mutambi wedu Muduhwa adzoka uyo ari kuunza hunyanzvi nehutungamiri muchikwata chedu.   Nd i n o z iva an e zvaakadzidza paange ari kuTanzania uye achapawo ruzivo urwu kune vamwe vake vaanotamba navo,” anodaro. Nhabvu yePre­mier Soccer League (PSL) yakapedzisira kutambwa mugore ra2019.   Mutambo wemusi weSvondo uyu uri kuonekwa nevazhinji segadziriro yekudzoka kwenhabvu yePSL apo mitambo iri kutarisirwa kutanga munaChivabvu.

headline: Go Warriors Go: Vatsigiri
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chinoda minamato yakasimba apo chiri kunanga kuCameroon kunokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrican Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo unotanga nemusi weMugovera.   Rwendo rwemaWarriors rwekuenda kumutambo uyu rwange rusiri nyore sezvo gadziriro dzacho dzakambosvika pakumiswa zvichitevera kubatwa kwainge kwaita vatambi 15, kusanganisira dzimwe nhengo dzechikwata ichi, nechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chikwata chaZdravko ‘Loga’ Logarusic chakasimuka nemusi weChitatu chakananga kuCameroon uko chichanovhurira mutambo weCHAN chichisangana necheIndomitable Lions cheCameroon.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti makwikwi eCHAN egore rino akasiyana neemakore adarika nekuti maWarriors achange asina vatsigiri.   “Tange tiri kuona zvange zvichiitika mune mitambo yakasiyana yakadai seweFC Platinum, kubirirwa kwayange ichiitwa pachishandiswa Covid-19. Saka tiri kuzvityirawo kuti ndizvo zvinogona kuitika kumaWarriors edu paari kuenda kuCameroon. Tinoda kuti anohwina pasina kubirira uye tiri kuda kuona nhabvu inonakidza ichitambwa.   “Saka isu chatichangoita sevatsigiri kungoisa minamato yakasimba kuti vakomana vedu vanotimirira uye rwendo rwavo rwunge rwakajeka rwuchiendeka,” anodaro Chimedza. Chikwata cheFC Platinum masvondo adarika chakaenda kuTanzania uko chakatamba necheSimba Football Club mumutambo wechipiri wekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi eCAF Champions League group stages. Vatambi veFC Platinum vachisvika kuTanzania, vakaongororwa denda reCovid-19 asi havana kuziviswa zvakabuda muongororo iyi pachiri nenguva. Chikwata ichi chakazoziviswa kwasara maawa maviri kuti mutambo uyu uchitanga kuti vatambi vacho vashanu vane denda iri izvo zvakakatyamadza FC Platinum ndokukanganisa hurongwa hwavaive vanaho. FC Platinum yakazokundwa mutambo uyu 4-0 zvakaita kuti ibve yaburitswa mumutambo uyu. Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu Adomsi ‘Admoski’ Mukwasi anoti chikwata chaLoga chakasimba zvikuru uye chichanokonzeresa kumutambo uyu zvekuti chichasvika kuquarter-final chaiko.   Munhorowondo yemaWarriors kuCHAN, mugore ra2014 chikwata ichi chakasvika kusemi-fainari yemutambo uyu uko chakazoburitswa neLibya 5-4 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 0-0.   Adomski anoti maWarriors achanyora nhorowondo zvakare gore rino kuCameroon uye vanoda minamato yenyika yese kuti vanokunda.   “Isu mumutambo weCHAN tagara hedu tinositamba zvinonwisa mvura saka naizvozvo tiri kutarisira kuti Loga nevakomana vake vachanotibatira basa. Tichavaisa mumitamato yedu kuti vatambe zvinonwisa mvura uye vagonobudirira kuCameroon.   “Chikwata chedu chakasimba uye vatambi vacho vane tarenda rinodadisa,” anodaro Adomski. Zvakadaro, maWarriors ari kuenda kumutambo uyu ariwo chikwata choga chiri kubva kunyika isiri kutambwa nhabvu pari zvino nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Gore rapera, nhabvu haina kumbobvira yatambwa munyika muno nekuda kwedenda iri uye pari zvino hazvisati zvave zivikanwa kuti mitambo yePremier Soccer Leage ichatambwa here.

headline: DeMbare yoshandisa Zoom
text: MURAIRIDZI weDynamos FC, Tonderayi “Stanza” Ndiraya anoti chikwata chavo chiri kushandisa dandemutande kuburikidza neZoom kuita gadziriro nevatambi vari kudzimba dzavo.   Nekuda kweCovid-19, nhabvu muno nemimwe mitambo yakasiyana yakambomiswa uye vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kuti vagare kudzimba dzavo senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus hunokonzera chirwere ichi.   Ndiraya anoti DeMbare iri kushandisa Zoom apo vanenge vachiongorora vatambi vachiita gadziriro dzavo dzekuvaka muviri vari kudzimba.   “Nekuda kwecoronavirus hatisi kukwanisa kuungana nevatambi vedu tichiita gadziriro saka tave kuita gadziriro paZoom tichiudza vatambi zvekuita vachitoita. Asi tinoita vari muzvikwata zvakasiyana,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti zvinonetsa hazvo kuongorora vatambi vari kudzimba dzavo kuti vari kuchengetedza miviri yavo here asi vakadzika mutemo wekuti anouzouya kuzotirena muviri wake usina kumira zvakanaka apo dambudziko reCovid-19 rinenge radarika vachamubatira mari.   “Pazvese hapazoshaikwe ny’any’a dzinozviti dzakangwara asi isu takadzika mutemo unovasungirira, anouya muviri wake usina kumira zvakanaka tichamubatira mari. Mwaka uno takatenga vatambi 13 nekudaro vataive navo gore radarika vanoziva kuti zvatoshanduka saka vanofanirwa kurwa kuti vagopinda muchikwata,” anodaro Ndiraya.   Chirongwa chekuti vanhu vagare kudzimba senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19 chisati chatanga, Ndiraya akamboenda kunyika yeBelgium uko ainodzidza zvenhabvu.
