Anoti akadzidza zvakawanda pamusoro pekusimudzira mutambo uyu ari kunyika iyi.   “Ndakadzidza zvakawanda kuBelgium kuti mutambo unogadzirirwa sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuitwa kana mutambo wave kutanga.   “Ndinovimba zvandakadzidza zvichandibatsira kuti tigobudirira mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Ndiraya.

headline: MDC Inoti VaMwonzora Havana Kumiswa Basa
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti tsamba iri kutenderera pa social media ichiti munyori mukuru webato iri, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vambomiswa basa, haisi yechokwadi. Mutauririri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda, vanoti tsamba iyi ndeyemanyepo uye aya mabasa eZanu-PF ekuda kuparadza bato ravo. Doctor Sibanda vati VaChamisa naVaMwonzora vari kushanda vese zvakanaka mukusimbaradza bato ravo. “Zanu-PF ndiyo yakanyora tsamba yenhema iyi nekuti tinoziva kuti ine hurongwa hwayakaisa mari yakawandisa kuti ikuvadze MDC nekuparadzanisa hutungamiri hwayo mumwedzi mitanhatu,” Doctor Sibanda vaudza Studio7. “Uye zvekuti VaChamisa naVaMwonzora vanofarirana here hazvina basa. Chinokosha ndechekuti musangano uri kuenderera mberi,” vadaro VaSibanda Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF kuti tinzwe divi rayo. Mugwaro ranyorerwa kuvatori venhau, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato re MDC Alliance vati bato ravo ibato rakasimba rine mirairo yekuita hurukuro uye yekusvitsa zvichemo kunzeve dzevanotarisa zvichemo zvevatsigiri naizvozvo mabasa ekuparadza akaita setsamba iyi haazombokwanisi kukanganisa bato iri kana kuribudisa mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yozeya Mutemo weSarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bil
text: Dare reNational Assembly riri kuzeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill, uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. No media source currently available Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva

headline: Chess yotambwa padandemudande
text: VATAMBI vechess vemuno vakaremara mitezo vachakwikwidza mumutambo wavo wekutanga weInternational Chess Federation Online Olympiad vachitamba kuburikidza nedandemudande (online).   Mitambo yechess haina kumbobvira yakanganiswa nekumiswa kwakamboitwa mimwe mitambo pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19.   Sangano reWorld Chess Federation rakatanga kufambidzana nenguva kare izvo zvakaona mitambo ichitambwa kuburikidza nedandemutande.   Mutambo uyu uchatanga musi wa27 Mbudzi uye uchatambwa kwemasvondo matatu.   Zvikwata zvichakwikwidza mumutambo uyu zvichabva muAfrica, Europe, Asia nekuAmerica.   Zimbabwe ichange ichimirirwa nevatambi vana vanoti Tapiwa Gora, Chikafu Onai, Natasha Shonhiwa naTafadzwa Mashonganyika.   Mutauriri weZimbabwe Chess Federation, Thabo Elisha anoti mutambo uyu wakakosha zvikuru kune vatambi vemuno sezvo uchavabatsira nekuvawanisa mikana yakasiyana.   MuAfrica, Zimbabwe iri muboka rinonzi Zone 4.5 umo mune zvikwata zvakawanda asi kubva muboka iri nyika ino neZambia chete ndizvo zvakakwanisa kubudirira kuti zvigokwikwidza mumitambo iyi.   “Tiri kutarisira zvikuru kuti vatambi vedu vagokwikwidza mumitambo iyi uye tinoda chaizvo kuti vagohwina.   “Chess yange ichingotambwa zvayo, haina kunyanyokanganiswa nekuda kwelockdown sezvo taikwidza padandemutande nekudaro mutambo uyu uchatotambirwa padandemutande. Ndizvo zvakanakira chess nekuti mumwe anotambira ari kunyika yake mumwe ari kwaari, hapana chikonzero chekuti musangane sezvinoitwa mune mimwe mitambo,” anodaro Elisha.   Vatambi vemuno vachange vachitambira vari pamahofisi eZimbabwe Chess Federation ayo ari paJoina City muguta reHarare.   Shasha dzichahwina pamutambo uyu dzichawana  menduru nemimwe mibairo yakasiyana.

headline: WHO Inoti Haisati Yatambira Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Dziri Kushandiswa muZimbabwe
text: Sangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO,rinoti nhomba dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe dzakagadzirwa kuChina hadzisati dzatambirwa nesangano iri zviri [amuteno kuitira kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji mukudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. WHO inoti ichiri kuongorora nhomba mbiri idzi dzeSinovac neSinopharm. Mumiriri weWHO muZimbabwe, Dr Alex Gasasira, vati nhomba dzekuChina dzeSinovac neSinopharm dzave padanho repamusoro soro mukuongororwa, uye vanotarisira kuti panopera mwedzi uno waKubvumbi, WHO inenge yapedza kuongorora nhomba idzi. Mashoko aVaGasasira anoburitsa pachena kuti nhomba dzeSinovac neSinopharm dziri kushandiswa munyika, hadzisati dzapihwa chitambi neWHO kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji. Vachipindura mubvunzo weStudio7 wekuti zvinhu zvinotarisirwa here kuti nyika dzishandise nhomba dzisati dzakomekedzwa neWHO, VaGasasira vati sesangano vanokurudzira masangano anotarisa mishonga munyika dzakasiyana siyana kuti aongorore nhomba idzi dzisati dzashandiswa kune veruzhinji. VaGasasira vati sangano rinoongorora nekubvumidza mishonga munyika reMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, MCAZ, rakati rakatarisa nhomba idzi rikagutsikana kuti dzakanakira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. VaGasasira vatiwo Zimbabwe hasi iyo yega nyika iri kushandisa nhomba dzekuChina idzi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuMCAZ kuti yakaita ongororo yayo riini, uye kuti zviyi zvakabuda muongororo iyi. Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kushandisa nhomba mbiri dzekuChina, yeSinovac neSinopharm Nhomba dzekuChina idzi dzinonzi dzaita mitauro kune dzimwe nyika kunyanya nhomba yeSinovac inonzi dziviriro yayo yakaderera pane zvaive zvataurwa neChina. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana nhomba ichidzivirira nezvikamu zvinopfuura makumi mashanu, chinhu chakakosha mukudzivirira ndufu nezvikamu izvozvo. VaMarisa vatiwo kana vanhu vakabaiwa pamwe nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa, zvekupfeka mamasiki, kusaungana nekugeza maoko zvinobatsira mukurwisa chirwere ichi. VaMarisa vatiwo mimwe mishonga inodzi ine dziviriro iri pamusoro inonetsa kushandisa nekuda kwezvinodiwa pakuichengetedza. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, VaHenry Madzorera, vati chakanyanyokosha pari zvino kuti Zimbabwe iite tsvagiridzo yayo yekuona kuti nhomba idzi dziri kushanda zvakadii munyika. VaMadzorera vati hapana change chakaipa mukusanobaya vanhu nhomba idzi, vakati vanhu vapiwa nhomba iyi munyika vawanda zvekuti hurumende ine mukana wekuchiongorora kuti iri kushanda zvakanaka here. VaMadzorera vati mashandiro enhomba anosiyana siyana, uye hapana chakaipa mukumira kushandisa nhomba idzi kana zvaonekwa kuti hadzisi kushanda zvakanaka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi rebazi rezvehutano nezvenyaya yenhomba dzekuChina. Asi vachitaura pakasvika nhomba yekutanga munyika, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vakati zvimwe zvinotariswa neZimbabwe panhomba, machengeterwo enhomba idzi vakapa muenzaniso wenhomba yeSinopharm iyo vakati iri nyore kuchengeta munyika sezvo zvikwanisiro zvaidiwa zvakagara zviripo munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzemuSADC dziri pamusoro mukushandisa nhomba dzakagadzirwa kuChina. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vodyira Marasha Kanzuru yeHarare
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti rakaendesa nemusi weChipiri gwaro renyunyuto kukanzuru yeguta reHarare pamusoro pemitero ya 2021, iyo rinoti iri pamusoro uye iri kuremera vagari sezvo vachinzi vaibhadhare ichitangira musi wa 01 Ndira 2021. Gwaro iri, iro rinonzi rakasainwa nevagari vanodarika zviuru zvishanu, avo vari kunyunyuta kuti vazhinji vave kumanikidzwa kubhadhara mari dziri pakati pemadhora emari yekuAmerica makumi mana kuvagari vekumisha yeveruzhinji, nemadhora makumi manomwe kusvika kuzana kuvagarai vari kumisha yevashoma pamwedzi. Mukuru weHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti mitero iri kubhadhariswa vagari nekanzuru yeHarare haikwanisike, haina kukodzera uye inotowedzera matambudziko agara aine vagari ari kukonzerwa neCovid-19 sezvo vazhinji vasati vave kukwanisa kushanda zvizere. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna meya weHarare, VaStewart Mutizwa, sezvo vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu yatavatumira pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaShumba. No media source currently available

headline: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neCovid-19
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwenyaya dzemumatare, yeJudicial Services Commission, yazivisa nhasi kuti kunyange hazvo matare achange akavhurwa pamazuva eLockdown Level Four, matare achange asingaiti mabasa ese anotarisirwa kuti ave achiitwa semazuva ose. Mutauriri weJudicial Services Commission, Muzvare Rumbidzai Takawira, vati kunyange hazvo matare anenge akavhurwa panguva iyi, haakwanisi kuita mabasa awo sezvinotarisirwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe zvipingaidzo. Muzvare Takawira vati nekudaro matare achange achingonzwa nyaya dziri kupinda mumatare kekutanga, nyaya dzechimbichimbi pamwe nenyaya dzeavo vanenge vachida kukumbira mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba chete Muzvare Takawira vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vese vane nyaya dziri mumatare avo vaive vapiwa mazuva ekudzoka ari mumazuva makumi nematatu anotevera, vachazodzokera kumatare mumashure memazuva aya zvichitariswa mitemo inenge yaiswa nehurumende mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid 19. Judicial Services Commission yazivisawo kutiwo vese vachange vachiuya kumatare vanosungirwa kutorwa temperature, kupfeka mamasiki pamwe nekugeza maoko, uye kuona kuti havabatani nevamwe zvakanyanya. Sangano iri ratiwo vanhuwo zvavo vanenge vasingabvumirwi kupinda pamatare mukati memazuva akatarwa eLockdown. Asi rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaObey Shava, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matanho atorwa neJudicial Services Commission aya anotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaShava vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vane nyaya mumatare, nyaya dzavo dzichanzwikwa mushure menguva yakareba zvisinei nebumbiro remitemo yenyika iro rinoti nyaya dzinofanirwa kunzwika nechimbichimbi mumatare. VaShava vatiwo zvinoomeserawo avo vasina kupiwa mikana yekutongwa vachibva kumba vachiti nguva yavo yekugara mutirongo inenge yorebeswa kunyange hazvo vasati vabatwa nemhosva. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nerimwezve gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaMartin Kadzere, vachitiwo kunyange matare ati pane nyaya dzaanenge achinzwa, magweta ari kurambidzwa kuenda kumabasa pamaroadblocks. VaKadzere vati nhasi ivo pachavo vadzorerwa kumba. Kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakanyanya kwakaita kuti hurumende ikurudzire veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba kutanga nhasi, kwemazuva makumi matatu. No media source currently available

headline: Murwiri weKodzero dzeVanhu, VaPatson Dzamara, Vashaya neChirwere cheGomarara
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, uye vari nhengo yeNational Executive yeMDC Alliance, VaPatson Dzamara, vashaya nechirwere chegomarara. VaPatson Dzamara, avo vanga vari munin’ina wemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu akapambwa akatsakatika makore mashanu apfuura, VaItai Dzamara, vashaikira mune chimwe chipatara muHarare uko vanga vakatarisirwa kuvhiyiwa nhasi mushure mekubatwa chirwere chegomarara, kana kuti colon cancer. Munin’ina wavo, VaPardon Dzamara, vati mukoma wavo ashaya neChitatu mangwanani, uye vanhu vakaungana kuGlenview. Imwe nhengo ye Occupy Africa Unity Square, VaCharles Nyoni, avo vairatidzira pamwe naVaItai Dzamara, vati varwadziwa zvikuru nekuti VaPatson Dzamara vashaya vasati vaziva kuti chii chakaitika kumukoma wavo. Imwe shamwari yemufi, VaPride Mukono, vatiwo nyika yarasikirwa negamba munyaya yekurwira kodzero dzevanhu. VaMukono vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti mufi asiya vana vanoda kuchengetwa kusanganisira vana vaVaItai Dzamara. Mutungamiri webato reLabour Economists and Afrikan Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira vatiwo varwadzikana zvikuru nekuti nyika yarasikirwa nemunhu anga akazvipira kufa achirwisa kuti azive kwakaenda mukoma wake. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vatiwo bato ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekurasikirwa nenhengo yeNational Executive yanga iri gamba rekurwira kodzero dzevanu. Mufi akatanga kuzivikanwa zvikuru muna 2015 zvichitevera kupambwa kwakaitwa mukoma wake, VaItai Dzamara, muna Kurume 2015. VaPatson Dzamara vaiga vakatungamira kuratidzira nechinangwa chekuti hurumende iferefete zvakaitika pana mukoma wavo, uyo vashaya vasingazivi kuti vari kupi. Vakambopambwa vakatochwa vari mumaoko emapurisa, uye kusungwa kakawanda vachirwira kodzero dzevanhu. VaDzamara vari kutarisirwa kuvigwa kumusha kwavo kwaMutoko. No media source currently available

headline: America Yovimbisa Kudyidzana neAfrican Union Zvine Pundutso Mukati
text: Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVaJoe Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Mutungamiri weAmerica, Va Joe Biden, vatumira mashoko avo kuvatungamiri vemu Africa, avo vari kuita musangano wemazuva maviri padandemutande senzira yekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere che Covid-19. VaBiden vaudza musangano weAfrican Union wechimakumi matatu nemana uyu kuti America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira wenyika dzemu Africa mukutsigirana, mukubatana pamwe nekuremekedzana. Vati izvi ndizvo zvinopa America kuti ishanda pamwe nemasangano epasi rose akaita se African Union. Vati pasi rose rinofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuzadzisa "shuviro yeremangwana rakanaka, remangwana rine kukura munyaya dzekutengeserana, kunopa pundutso kunyika dzose." VaBiden, avo vakagadzwa pachigaro chemutungamiri weAmerica mwedzi wapera mushure mekukunda VaDonald Trump veRepublican Party, vati nyika yavo "yakazvipira kuvaka zvakare mushandirapamwe pamwe nekubatsira vanhu vemu Africa pazvinhu zvose zvinosanganisira kurwisa chirwere che Covid-19 uye mukushanda neAfrican Union mukupedza mhirizhonga dziri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda muAfrica yose." Mutungamiri weAmerica atiwo America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira we Africa, uye inodavira zvinoitwa nenyika dzemu Africa. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo paine zvipingaidzo zvihombe, “hapana kupokana kuti nyika dzedu, vanhu vedu, pamwe neAfrican Union, vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvipingaidzo zvose.” No media source currently available Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa kwemabhizinesi pasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVa Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane zvemhando yepamusoro soro munyaya dzemabhizinesi, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu chinova chinhu chakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vatemerwe zvirango neAmerica. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti Zimbabwe ikaratidza kuti yava kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu uye mapurisa nemasoja ayo achibata vemuZimbabwe zvine chiremera, Zimbabwe inogona kudyidzana nemabhizinesi ekuAmerica nenzira inoita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe. Asi Zimbabwe inoti iri kuomeserwa nekuti yakatorera varungu mapurazi ichiapa kuvanhu vatema. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Maviri Yaumbwa
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi neMugovera nehurongwa hwavo hwekupemberera kusvitswa kaitwa makore makumi maviri kubva parakaumbwa muna Gunyana 1999. Bato iri rinoburitsa mashoko aya zvichitevera mashoko ari kutumirwa pa social media achiti hurongwa hweMugovera hwakanzurwa. Murongi wemisangano mubato iri, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti hapana chachinja pahurongwa hwavo. VaChibaya vanoti kune vanhu vari kuda kuti musangano wavo usabudirira izvo zviri kupa kuti vanhu ava vati VaChamisa vachange vari kurufu kwaVaMugabe neMugovera. VaChibaya vanoti VaChamisa ndivo vachange vari munyarikani mukuru pahurongwa hwavo, uye vari kutarisira madzisahwira achibva kunze kwenyika kunge ari muRufaro Stadium. Vaimbi vane mukurumbira munyika vachange vachivaraidza vanhu nemumhanzi. MDC yakamisa hurongwa hwayo uhwu musi wa Gunyana 14 ichipa mukana wekuti nyika icheme VaMugabe, avo vakashaya kuSingapore musi waGunyana 6. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reSACP rekuSouth Africa Rinoti muZimbabwe Mune Dambudziko, Kunyange Hazvo Zanu PF iri Kuramba
text: Bato reSouth African Communist Party, SACP, rekuSouth Africa mukupera kwesvondo rakazivisa kuti muZimbabwe mune matambudziko anoda kutariswa nekukasika, ayo rinoti ari kubatawo South Africa. Vachitaura mushure memusangano weCentral Committee yebato ravo muJohannesburg, munyori mukuru webato iri, VaBlade Nsimande, vanove zvakare gurukota rezvedzidzo, vakati kuramba kuti muZimbabwe hamuna matambudziko kuzvinyepera pachitariswa huwandu hwevana veZimbabwe vari kuvaka misasa munyika iyi. Asi vakati vana veZimbabwe ndivo chete vanofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika yavo. Mashoko ebato reSACP aya anouya panguva iyo bato reAfrican National Congress, ANC, rakabva kutumira chikwata kuZimbabwe chaitungamirwa nemunyori mukuru webato iri VaAce Magashule kuti chinonzwisisa nezvematambudziko anonzi akatarisa nezimbabwe. Hurumende pamwe nebato reZanu PF vagara vari kuramba kuti munyika hamuna matambudziko, kunyange hazvo vanopikisa pamwe nemamwe masangano akazvimirira vari kuti munyika mune matambudziko. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa vakaudza vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe harisi dunhu reSouth Africa, nekudaro nyika iyi inofanirwa kusiyana netsika yekuisa mhino dzayo munyaya dzeZimbabwe. VaChinamasa vakapomerawo hurumende yeSouth Africa kuve pasi pevachena. Studio 7 yaedza kunzwa divi reZanu PF pamusoro pemashoko ebato reSouth African Communist party aya, asi sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reSouth Africa, VaKenneth Mandaza vavimbisa kuzopindura mibvunzo yedu nemusi weMuvhuro. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reFastforward Community Development Centre, VaAkson Potera vanoti hazvishamise kuti munyori mukuru weSACP, VaBlade Nsimande vakataura kuti muZimbabwe mune dambudziko nekuti vakaona kuti mune dambudziko. Vanoti VaNsimande munhu akanzvera mabhuku zvakanyanya zvekuti vanogona kuve nemaonero akasiyana kubva kune vamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinopeta Musangano weKuzeya Bhajeti ra2020
text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende dzapeta neSvondo musangano wekuzeya nezvebhajeti regore rinouya wanga uchiitwa kunzvimbo yekushanyira yeVictoria Falls, uko vanonzi vabuda nezvisungo zvakasiyanasiyana. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeZanu PF muparamende uye vari mumiriri weGutu South, VaPupurai Togarepi vanoti zvikuru zvasungwa pamusangano uyu, zvinosanganisira nyaya yekuti hurumende ipundutse raramo yevanochengetedza nyika vakaita semauto, mapurisa pamwe nemamwe mapoka, kuburikidza nekuvapa mihoro inovagutsa, pekugara, pamwe nezvikwanisiro mumabasa avo kuitira kuti vashande vakasununguka. VaTogarepi vanoti mamwe mapazi akomekedzwa kuti gurukota rezvemari ritarisise kana richinge ropa mari gore rinouya anosanganisira rezvehutano nerekurima. Vanoti vadare vakomekedza kwazvo kuti bazi rezvehutano ripiwe mari yakawanda inoita kuti rikwanise kutenga michina nemishonga zvinodiwa muzvipatara, pamwewo nekuti vashandi vehurumende vabhadharwe mari dzinoita kuti vakwanise kurarama Nhengo dzeparamende dzinosvika mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu pamwe nevemamwe mapoka avanoshanda nawo vanga vachisangana kwemazuva mashanu kuVictoria Falls, uko vamwe vanoti kwaive kutambisa mari iyo nyika ichitatarika.

headline: WHO Inoti Iri Kufara neZviri Kuitika Mukurwisa Covid-19 muZimbabwe
text:
Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, Dr
Alex Gasasira, varumbidza zviri kuitwa nehurumende mukurwisa denda
reCovid-19 asi vayambira kuti vanhu havafanirwe kurivara mukuramba
vachitevedzera zvose zvinokurudzirwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano
pakudzivirira denda iri. Vachitaura pagungano rekudzidzisa vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo
nezvekodzero dzavo dzakasiyana-siyana munzvimbo inogara veruzhinji yeSidojiwe, Dr Gasasira vati vanofara zvikuru kuti hapana vanhu vemunzvimbo iyi vati vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, zvisinei nematambudziko akawanda avakatarisana nawo, kusanganisira kugara vakawanda panzvimbo imwe chete.

Dr Gasasira varumbidzawo hurumende nematanho airi kutora pakurwisa
denda reCovid-19 kusanganisira kuunza nhomba munyika. Asi vayambira kuti veruzhinji havafanirwe kuvarairwa pakuramba vachitevedzera zvose zvinotaurwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano pakurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo chichiri kutekeshera pasi rose, vakakurudzirawo kuti vanhu vabaiwe nhomba.

Dr Gasasira vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kubatsirawo
nyika nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kuona kuti vashandi
vezvehutano varamba vachipiwa dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere
cheCovid-19 pamwe nekubatsira kuwana zvipfeko nezvimwe zvinodiwa
pakurwisa chirwere ichi. Vachipawo maonero avo pamabatiro aita hurumende denda reCovid-19
kusvika pari zvino, vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati hurumende ine zvayakagona zvakawanda kusanganisira kuedza kutevedzera matanho anokurudzirwa neveWorld Health Organization pakudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.

Asi VaMadzorera vati hurumende ichine basa guru rekupa vashandi vezvehutano pamwe neveruzhinji dzidziso izere pamusoro pechirwere checovid-19 vachiyambirawo kuti nyika haifanirwe kuvarairwa
pakurwisa chirwere ichi.

Studio7 haina nkukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike.

Gungano raitwa paSidojiwe range riri chikamu chechirongwa chekushanya
kwevakuru vakuru vemapoka esangano reUnited Nations, International Organisation for Migration, International Labour Organisation vachiona
zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana zviri kuitwa nemasangano anoshanda
akazvimirira avanotsigira mukubastira veruzhinji, kunyanya
vanotambura, nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana.

Mumashoko akabudiswa nebazi rezvehutano nezuro, vanhu vashanu
vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ihi pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 1565. Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezvesere nezana nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 38 164. Vanhu vapora kuchirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mana nemakumi masere, 35 480.

Kusvika nezuro munyika mange mave nevanhu mazana matatu
nemakumi manomwe ezviuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe netanhatu nevanomwe, 370 676, vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga, uye pave nevanhu zviuru makumi matanhatu nezvitatu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, kana kuti, 63 263 vabaiwa nhomba yepiri kusvika nezuro. Huwandu uhu huri kutarisira kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa yomirira Hurumende
text: SANGANO rinotungamirira nhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti rakamirira kupihwa mvumo neHurumende kuti mitambo yePremier Soccer League (PSL) ichitanga kutambwa.   Gore rino, nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 hakuna kumbobvira kwatambwa nhabvu yePSL zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaita mitambo pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   Zifa inoti yakanyorera kuHurumende ichikumbira mvumo yekuti mitambo yePSL irongwe uye pari zvino yakatenderwe kuti mitambo yezvikwata zvenyika zvinosanganisira maWarriors, Mighty Warriors nezvevechidiki zvemaUnder-10 itambwe apo zvimwe zvacho zviri kukwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana inosanganisira Cosafa iyo yange ichitambwa kunyika yeSouth Africa.   Panhau yenhabvu yePSL, Zifa inoti yakangopihwa mvumo yekuti zvikwata zvose zvimbotarisa kuti vatambi vazvo havana here denda reCovid-19 uye zvochitanga kuita gadziriro chete.   Competitions manager weZifa — Xolisani Gwesela — uyo anove zvakare mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri, anoti pari zvino vakangopihwa mvumo neHurumende yekuti zvikwata zvePSL zviite gadziriro chete.   “Iye zvino tingori nemvumo yekuti zvikwata zvePSL zvingoita gadziriro chete,” anodaro Gwesela.   Kunyika dzinosanganisira South Africa, Zambia, Malawi neMozambique nhabvu yave kutambwa asi pasina vatsigiri munhandare senzira yekurwisa Covid-19.   Parizvino munyika muno nhabvu yangotambwa ndeyechikwata chemaWarriors icho chakatamba neAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAfrica Cup of Nations 2021 iyo ichatambirwa kuCameroon kozoti yeCAF Champions League iyo yakaona shasha yemuZimbabwe — FC Platinum — ichisangana neCosta dol Sol yekuMozambique.   Gwesela anoti vari kuita zvose zvavanokwanisa kuti nhabvu ichidzoka.   “Sekutaura kwandaita, takangomirira mvumo kubva kuHurumende kuti mitambo yePSL ichitanga,” anodaro.   Gore rino rave kusvika pakupera uye richaita rekutanga munhoroondo yenyika ino kupera nhabvu yePSL isina kumbotambwa izvo zvakonzereswa nechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: MDC Alliance Inozivisa Zvakabuda Muongoro yeMabhuku Ayo eMari
text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti ongororo rayo remabhuku emari egore ra2019 inoratidza kuti mari yakawanikwa inoita mamiriyoni matanhatu nemazana maviri ezviuru zvemadhora emunyika, kana kuti 6.2 million RTGS, yakafambiswa zvakanaka mubato iri. MDC Alliance yati ongororo iyi yakaitwa neimwe kambani ine hunyanzvi mukutarisa mabhuku emari. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, mubati wehomwe, VaDavid Coltart, vati MDC Alliance inoshanda nemari inobva kune veruzhinji, uye sebato, vanokoshesa zvakanyanya kuzivisa kuti mari dzinenge dzakapiwa bato iri dzinenge dzakashandiswa seyi. Munyori mukuru weMDC Alliance, VaChalton Hwende, vati kuongororwa kwemabhuku avo uku kunotevera chibvumirano chavakaita sebato chekuti vaongororwe mashandisirwo anoitwa mari mubato ravo. VaHwende vatiwo aka ndekekutanga bato ravo richibudisa ongororo yakadai. VaHwende vatiwo zvavaita izvi mucherechedzo wekuti vese vanoshandisa mari yeveruzhinji vanofanirwa kubudisa pachena mashandisirwo emari dzavanenge vapihwa kuitira kuti pasave nekufungirana. VaHwende vati ongororo yemabhuku avo iyi yakanonoka kupera nekuda kwechirwere cheCOVID -19 izvo zvakambomisa mabasa ana mazvikokota vanoita basa iri. VaHwende vatiwo kunyange hazvo MDC Alliance isisina mari yainowana kubva kuhurumende inopiwa mapato anopikisa pasi pe Political Parties Finance Act, zvichitevera kusawirirana neMDC T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, bato ravo riri kuwana mari kubva kuvatsigiri varo izvo zviri kuita kuti vakwanise kuenderera mberi nemabasa avo zvinosanganisira kubhadhara vashandi vavo. Vatiwo ongororo iyi inoratidza kuti hapana chakaipa chakawanikwa mukushandiswa kwemari yebato iri. Mumwe mutsigiri weMDC Alliance, VaJeff Chaitezvi, vati vafadzwa nemaitiro ebato ravo anobudisa pajekerere kuti mari dziri kunoshandiswa sei. Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vatiwo zvakanaka kuti mapato ezvematongerwo enyika abudise mafambiro emari dzavo kuitira kuti veruzhinji vave nechivimbo chekuti mari idzi dzinoshandiswa zvakafanira. VaKuchera vatiwo kurudziro yavo ndeyekuti MDC Alliance irambe ichiita izvi gore rega rega. Bato iri rinoti mugore ra 2019 rakawana mari inoita mamiriyoni matanhatu nemazana maviri ezviuru zvemadhora emunyika, kana kuti 6,2 million RTGS. MDC Alliance ine matunhu gumi munyika, uye matunhu matatu akasimba ari kunze kwenyika anoti South Africa, North America Province neUnited Kingdom. No media source currently available

headline: Makwikwi ePSL adzoka
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum – Norman ‘Muchina wemajuzi’ Mapeza – anoti mujaho wekurwira mukombe wePremier Soccer League watanga apo zvikwata zvose zvave kudzoka kuzokwikwidza muchikamu chechipiri chePSL.   Mitambo yePSL yange yakamiswa kwemasvondo maviri adarika senzira yekupa zvikwata mukana wetura befu pamwe nekuti nhandare dzimbovandudzwe.   FC Platium ndiyo yakatora mukombe wePSL gore radarika, Pakamiswa mitambo yePSL, Chicken Inn ndiyo yaitungamira palog iine zvibodzwa 35 kubva pamitambo 17 yayange yatamba. MaGamecocks, sezita remadunhurirwa reChicken Inn, aiteverwa neFC Platinum iyo ine zvibodzwa 34 kubva mumitambo 17 kuchiti Dynamos FC ndiyo iri pechitatu ine zvibodzwa 34 zvekare kubva pamitambo 16.   Achitaura ari kuZvishavane uko ari kuita gadziriro nechikwata chake, Mapeza anoti chikamu chechipiri chePSL icho vatarisana nacho chakaomarara zvikuru.   “Kurwira mukombe wePSL mujaho mukuru wakaoma saka tave kutokunya dzisimbe nekuti kwatave kuenda makata chaiwo. “Zvikwata zvose zviri kurwa semvumba kuti zvisaburitswe muPSL,” anodaro Mapeza.   Apo pari kudzoka mitambo yePSL svondo rino, Pure Platinum Play (FC Platinum) iri kunanga kuBulawayo uko ichanosangana neBulawayo City musi weMugovera kuBabourfields.   Bulawayo City chimwe chezvikwata zviri kutatarika mwaka uno izvo zvaona chichikwanisa kuwana zvibodzwa 12 chete kubva mumitambo 17.   Pari zvino, Bulawayo City yakagara pechi17 palog iri pamusoro peWhawha iyo yakasenga iine zvibodzwa 12. Mapeza anoti zvikwata zvakaita seBulawayo City zvinotyisa kusangana nazvo sezvo zvinenge zvichirwira kuti zvisaburitswe muPSL.   “Zvikwata zvakaita seBulawayo City hazvina kumira zvakanaka nekuti zvinenge zvichitorwira kuti zvisaburitswe muPSL. Saka iyi ndiyo mitambo yekutongwarira nekuti inogona kuenda kwese kwese,” anodaro Mapeza.   Achitaurawo nekudzoka kwePSL svondo rino, murairidzi weCranborne Bullets – Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera – anoti haasi kugutsikana nematambiro ange achiita chikwata chake muchikamu chekutanga chePSL.    Nesbert Saruchera   Asi anoti ari kutarisira kuti vachashanda nesimba kuti vagopinda muTop 8. Pari zvino Cranborne Bullets yakagara pechi15 palog uye yakwanisa kuwana zvibodzwa 15 kubva mumitambo 17.   “Patakapinda muPSL, taitarisira kuvhundutsa vanhu asi handizvo zvakazoitika. Saka tave kutokunya dzisimbe mumitambo yatatarisana nayo muchikamu chepiri kuitira kuti tigosimukira.   “Tichawedzera vatambi vaviri kana vatatu kuti tigadzirise pano neapo panoda kugadziriswa kuitira kuti tinyatsosimba chaizvo. Zvamunongoziva, vakomana vedu ava vazhinji takabva navo kuDivision One saka pari kudiwa vanouya vosimbisa chikwata chedu chonyatsomira zvakasimba,” anodaro Yabo.   Chikwata chaYabo svondo rino chichange chiri pamusha apo chichasangana neChicken Inn musi weMugovera kuSakubva Stadium.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mitambo iriko, Yadah Stars ichasangana neDynamos musi weMugovera kuNational Sports Stadium kuchiti CAPS United ichatsurana neZPC Kariba musi weSvondo panhandare imwe cheteyo.   Highlanders ichasangana neBlack Rhinos musi weSvondo kuBabourfields mumutambo uchange uri wekutanga waBaltemar Jose de Oliveira Brito, chizvarwa chekuPortugal uyo aimbove mutevedzeri waJose Mourinho.

headline: Juventus inotora mukombe: Messi
text: anoti Juventus inogona kuhwina mukombe weChampions League mwaka uno ichitadzisa chikwata chake cheBarcelona zvichitevera kutenga kwayakaita Cristiano Ronaldo uye achiti Real Madrid haichisina mukana.   Achitaura neRadio Catalunya pachirongwa cheTot Costa, Messi anoti, “Real Madrid chimwe chezvikwata chakasimba pasi rese uye ine nevatambi vepamusoro, asi nhau yekuti Ronaldo haasisiko zvichavatadzisa zvakawanda.   “Ronaldo ave kuJuventus saka zvave kutobatsira chikwata ichi kurwira mukombe uyu weChampions League uye nechikwata chavainacho chakasimba zvikuru.”   Messi anobvuma kuti akashamiswa kunzwa kuti Ronaldo aenda kunotambira nhabvu yake kuItaly mwaka uno achiti, “Handina kumbobvira ndazvifunga kuti haachatambire Madrid. Uye handina kumbobvira ndafunga kuti achaenda kuJuventus. Paive nezvikwata zvakwanda zvaimuda asi handina kumbofunga kuti Juventus chingave chimwe chacho. Zvakandishamisa zvikuru.”   Achibvunzwa kuti anogona kufunga kubva achienda kune chimwe chikwata here achisiya Barcelona – shasha iyi iyo yakambonzi inodiwa nezvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Chelsea, Manchester City nemanchester United kare – inoti: “Ndine zvese zvandinoda kuno. Ndaive muchikwata ichi kubvira ndichiri nemakore 13 ekuberekwa chaiwo.   “Ndiri muchikwata chikuru pasi rese, vana vangu vakazvarirwa kuno uye handina chekubvira ndichienda kumwe.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Vamwe Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vakaita Zano Ndega paMitemo yeKudzivirira Covid-19
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti mimwe mitemo yakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChipiri yakananganga nekudzivirira kupararira kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 inonzi omicron inoratidza kuti havana kutanga vataura nevane ruzivo nezvehutano. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa nyika kuti vashanyi vose kusanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe vanofanira kuvhenekwa hutachiona hweCovid-19 panhandare yendege, kuitwa izvi kunoda madhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica. Vanenge vapinda munyika vanonzi vanofanira kugara pavo vega kwemavhiki maviri vachibhadhara mari dzavo. Vanhu vave kunzi vagare mudzimba kubva nenguva dza9 manheru kusvika na 6 mangwanani. VaMnangagwa vanoti izvi vari kuzviitira kuti nyika idzivirire kupararira kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 iyi. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvibatsire vachiti kuungana pavanhu zvikuru mumabhazi neparufu. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvimwe zvakaitwa naVaMnagangagwa zvinoratidza kuti vange vasina kutaura nenyanzvi sezvo zvichinetsa kuzadzikisa. Vati Zimbabwe haina nzvimbo dzakakwana dzekuti vanhu vagare mavhiki maviri vari voga uye vati kuti vanhu vanzi vamire kufamba nenguva dzepfumbamwe manheru zvinonetsa nekuti hakuna mabhazi ekufambisa.. Zvichakadaro, mumashoko kuvatori venhau, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti zvichatora mavhiki akawanda kuti dzizive kuti mhando itsva iyi yakamira sei. Imwe kambani inogadzira nhomba yenstraZeneca inoti yatotumira nyanzvi kuBotswana neEswathini kuti dzitange kuita tsvakiridzo yezvemhando itsva iyi. Mamwe makambani anoti Johnson, Pfizer neModerna anoti atangawo kuita tsvakiridzo dzezvemhando itsva iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Tino Kadewere ava kutambira kuSpain
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Tinotenda Philana Kadewere, aendeswa kuchikwata cheReal Club Deportivo Mallorca chekuSpain nechikwereti uko achatambira nhabvu yake mwaka uno achibva kuOlympic Lyon.   Chibvumirano chiri kuona Kadewere achienda kuMallorca chinosanganisira kuti chikwata ichi chinogona kuzomutenga kuita mutambi wavo zvachose kana akatamba zvinogutsa mwaka uno.   Kadewere abva aita mutambi wekutanga kubva muZimbabwe achinotambira nhabvu yake muligi reSpanish LaLiga.   Kuendeswa kwaaita kuMallorca neLyon kunotevera kushaiswa mukana wekutamba kwaange achiita zvichitevera kudzoka kwaAlexandre Lacazette kuchikwata chekuFrance ichi.   Pamusoro pezvo, kuArsenal kune vamwe vatambi vanoti Karl Toko Ekambi anobva kuCameroon, Mathis Cherki wekuFrance naMoussa Dembele wekuFrance zvakare avo vange vachitambiswa pamberi pake.

headline: VaMutasa Vanobvuma Kutongwa neKomiti yeZanu-PF
text: Nyaya yekusawirirana mubato reZanu-PF yatanga zvakare mushure mekudzoka munyika kwemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe. Kudzoka kwavo nesvondo kwava kureva kuti vaive murongi wemabasa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, vanenge votongwa nekomiti yakaumbwa iri kutungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMutasa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaenda kudare iri. No media source currently available Vamwe vari mukomiti iyi vanosanganisira Amai Mugabe semutungamiri weWomens League, vanoona nezvemabasa ematongwerwo enyika mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, munyori wezvemitemo, VaPatrick Chinamasa, munyori wevechidiki, VaPupurai Togarepi, uye nhengo yePolitburo, VaKembo Mohadi. Mutauriri webato, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti kutongwa kwaVaMutasa kunotanga chete kana Amai Mugabe vadzoka kubva kunyika dzekumawirira.

headline: Baiwai mudzoke kunhandare: Coventry
text: GURUKOTA rezvemitambo, nevechidiki, Kirsty Coventry, ari kukurudzira vatsigiri kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vagobvumidzwa kudzoka kunhandare kunotsigira zvikwata zvavo zvenhabvu.   Achitaura apo kambani yeSakunda Holdings yanga ichiparura rutsigiro rwayo kuzvikwata zvikuru zviviri zvenhabvu muno, cheDynamos necheHighlanders, Coventry anoti, vatsigiri ngavabaiwe nhomba idzi kuitira kuti vagodzoka kunhandare kunoona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba.   “Tinotsigira pfungwa dzekuti vatsigiri vadzoke kuzoona zvikwata zvavo zvichitamba, asi kuti izvi zviitike, ngatingei takabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19.   “Tasuwa kuona nhabvu ichitambwa, saka ngatinobaiwai kuti zviite nyore tigopihwa mvumo yekudzoka munhandare,” anodaro Coventry.   Achitaurawo pachiitiko ichi, sachigaro weDynamos FC, Isaiah Mupfurutsa, anoti sechikwata, vari kushanda kubatsira vatsigiri vavo kuti vabaiwe majekiseni eCovid-19 kuitira kuti zvigovabatsira kuzoona mitambo yechikwata chavo nekukasika. Mupfurutsa anoti sechikwata, vakatanga chirongwa icho vari kukurudzira vatsigiri vavo kuti vanobaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19.   “Dynamos chikwata chikuru uye chine vatsigiri vakawanda muno nepasi rose. Naizvozvo takatanga chirongwa chekuvakurudzira kuti vanobaiwa majekiseni aya.   “Nhabvu inoda pane vatsigiri nesuwo tasuwa vatsigiri vedu. Saka tiri kuvaudza kuti ngavabaiwe nekuchimbidza kuitira kuti vagouya kuzoona mitambo yedu.   “Kana vakabaiwa zvinoita nyore kuti vagouya kuzoona mitambo yedu, isu tiri kukurudzira kuti vanobaiwa uye vari kuenda nehuwandu hwavo,” anodaro Mupfurutsa.   Anoenderera mberi achiti kutsigirwa kwechikwata chavo pamwe necheBosso kuchaona zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichisimukira uye anoti mumakore mashoma chikwata chavo vanoda kuti chidzokere mukukwikwidza mitambo yeCAF Champions League. “Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvikuru uye zvinozivikanwa. Zvichasimukira chaizvo mumatambiro azvo. Mumwaka inotevera tinofanirwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yeCAF Champions League,” anodaro.   Sakunda Holdings yadira mari inosvika US$5,4 miriyoni yemakore matatu. Mwaka woga woga zvikwata izvi zvichawaniswa mari inosvika US$890 000 kwemakore matatu anotevera.

headline: ZESN Inoti Dzimwe Nzvimbo dzeKuvhotera Dzanga Dzisina Zvikwanisiro zveVanorarama neHurema
text: ZESN, iyo iri kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita sarudzo dzema by-election dzaitwa neMugovera yakabatana neElection Resource Centre, inoti vaongorori vavo vesarudzo vari mune mamwe matunhu ari kuitirwa sarudzo akaita seEpworth, Murehwa South, neChivi South manga musina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehurema vavhote zvakanaka kana kutokwanisa kuvhota. Mugwaro raraburitsa, sangano iri rinotiwo raona huwandu hwakanyanya hwevanhu vanga vachibatsirwa kuvhota paMangani Business Centre Tent A kuBinga North. Vaongorori vesarudzo ava vanonziwo vaona kuti masabhuku nemadzishe vaendawo nezvikwata zvevanhu kunovhota vachivakomekedza kuti vati vanoda kubatsirwa kuvhota vachivhotera nhengo yeZanu PF. Sangano iri ratiwo ratambira nyunyuto pamusoro pe ink iri kushandiswa mukuratidza kuti munhu avhota, iyo inonzi yakasiyana-siyana ruvara, uye isiri yemhando yepamusoro, izvo zvinogona kuita kuti munhu abiridzire achivhota kakawanda. ZESN yati yaisa vaongorori vayo vesarudzo vanodarika mazana amana mumatunhu makumi maviri nemasere aitirwa sarudzo dzekutsvaga vamiriri vedare reparamende pamwe nezana nemakumi maviri nemaviri ane sarudzo dzevamiriri vemakanzuru.

headline: Vakawanda Votambira Chibvumirano Pakufamba kweZvitima Pakati peZimbabwe neBotswana
text: Zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe neBotswana zviri kutambira nemufaro chubvumirano chakanyoreranwa pakati penyika mbiri idzi chekudyidzana panyaya dzezvitima chinonzi “Through Working Agreement. Chibvumirano ichi chakanyoreranwa neMuvhuro pakati peNational Railways of Zimbabwe kana kuti NRZ neBotswana Railways chichaona zvitima chekuBotswana neZimbabwe zvichidarika miganhu yenyika mbiri idzi. Vanorarama nekutenga muBotswana vachinotengesa kuZimbabwe, Muzvare Primrose Mandeya vanoti havazivi kuti NRZ yavabvirepi sezvo vange vachirasikirwa nemari yakawanda mukuita basa ravo nenyaya yemabhazi nemichovha. Nekuda kwechibvumirano ichi, zvitima kubva kumakambani aya zvinenge zvokwanisa kusvika kuFrancistown nekuBulawayo. Chibvumirano ichi chisati chaitwa, zvitima zvenyika mbiri dzi zvaigumira kuBotswana paPlumtree. Pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi, mukuru weNRZ Amai Respina Zinyanduko vakati zvainge zvotora mazuva mana kana mashanu kuti zvinhu zvizotakurwa kubva paPlumtreekupinda muZimbabwe sezvo chitima cheNRZ chisingafambe mazuva ose. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemukuru weBotwana Railways Amai Chelesile Malele. Asi kunyangwe vamwe vari kufara, VaAbraham Mangena, avo vanoita zvekutakurira vanhu zvinhu kubva muguta reFrancistown kuenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muZimbabwe vanoti hurongwa uhu huchaita kuti vasare vasisina basa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzataura neStudio 7 dzinoti chibvumirano ichi chichabatsira Botswana zvakanyanya sezvo NRZ isina zvitima zvakakwana uye iine zvikwereti zvakawanda zvairi kutadza kubhadhara. NRZ yamboyedz kuita zvibvumirano nemakambani akaita seTransnet yekuSouth Africa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pasi peDiaspora Infrastructure Development Group asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zimbabwe yakambotiwo iri kutaura neRussia kuti ipihwe zvitima asi hapana chakabuda.

headline: Zimbabwe neGermany Dzoronga Kuumba Komisheni Inoona nezveKusimbaradza Hukama
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakasangana neChipiri negurukota rekuGermany rinoona nezvekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nebudiriro, VaGerd Muller, vakabvumirana kuumba komisheni ichaone nezvekusimbaradza hukama nekudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano wavo, VaChinamasa vakati vafara kushanyirwa naVaMuller. Vakati vatura nyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi, chikwereti cheZimbabwe kuGermany, zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nekuti Zimbabwe itange zvekare kuwana rutsigiro rwemari nehunyanzvi kubva kuGermany. Vakatiwo vakazeya zvimwe zvingaitwe neZimbabwe kuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano epasi rose pamwe nekuti igadziridze hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rose. VaChinaamasa vakati vakabvumiranawo kushanda pamwe chete panyaya yekudzidzisa vanhu zvidzidzo zvemabasa emaoko kana kuti vocational training nechinangwa chekuti vanhu vakwanise kuzvishandira pamwe nekupinza vamwe mabasa. Zimbabwe yakatarirwa zvirango zvehupfumi nenyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica, Australia nenyika dzekuEurope nekuda kwehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri, kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu pamwe nekuita sarudzo dzisina kujeka. VaMuller vakati vakafara kuuya kuZimbabwe mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yagadza mutungamiriri mutsva zvichitevera sarudzo dzemwedzi wapfuura idzo dzakazosimbiswawo nedare repamusororo munyika. Vakati zvakakosha kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaite zvakavimbisa kuita zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisira mapato anopikisa pamwe nekuremekedza nekutevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. VaMuller vakati Germany nedunhu rese reEurope vanoda runyaro muZimbabwe ndosaka vachida kuti VaMnangagwa vaite zvavakavimbisa. Vakatiwo Germany inoda kuona hupenyu nehupfumi hwevanhu vekumaruwa huchisimudzirwa ndosaka iri kuda kushanda neZimbabwe mukusimudzira ruzivo rwevanhu pamabasa emaoko. Vakatiwo Joint Commission yavachaumba neZimbabwe ichazeya zvese zvingaitwe uye kuti Germany ingabatsirei sei vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti vabudirire. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti kunyange hazvo makurukota aVaMnangagwa ari kuramba achiita basa rawo, ari kuita izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mutemo uchiti zvigaro zvavo zvinopera panogadzwa mutungamiri wenyika mushure mesarudzopapera. Izvi zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika pasi paSection 108 (1) (c). VaMnangagwa vakagadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika nesvondo uye havasati vadoma dare remakurukota avo. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira kweMitengo yeZvakawanda Kwosiya Veruzhinji, Varimi, Vaomerwa
text: Kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa vakavimbisa masvondo mashoma adarika kuti hurumende ichadzorera mari muzvitengeswa senzira yekubatsira vanhu, vanhu vari kuti hapana chati chamboshanduka munyaya dzemitengo yezvinhu. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kuchema kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvavanoda zuva nezuva, kusanganisira zvekurimisa zvemwaka uno, iri kukwira zvisina mukare akamboona, izvo zvave kusiya vakawanda vachishaya pekutangira. Mutengo wezvekudya zvinosanganisira upfu nechingwa unonzi uri kungokwirawo pamadiro. Semuenzaniso, mutengo wechingwa unonzi wakakwira kubva pamadhora gumi nemana anemasendi makumi manomwe nemashanu ukaenda pamadhora gumi nemasere ane masendi makumi mana nemashanu parofu. Mutengo weupfu wakakwirawo mwedzi wapera nezvikamu zana kubva muzana. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uku hakufanirwe kukatyamadza vanhu nekuti hurumende yakatozivisa kare kuti mitengo yezvinhu ichafambidzana nemisika yemari, iyo inomirawo nemari yekunze kwenyika, zvikuru nedhora rekuAmerica. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti musika wemari uyu hauna kumira zvakanaka sezvo uri kungoenda nzira imwechete, yekudonha kwehuremu hwemari yemunyika. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru weZImbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaThomas Masvingwe vanoti kukwira kwemutengo wechingwa uku kwaomesera veruzhinji, zvikuru vashandi zvikuru, avo vanga vave kurwisa kuti vangokwanisa kuwana chikafu kaviri pazuva, mangwanani nemanheru. Matambudziko ekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu anonzi haasi kunzwengawo varimi, avo vanonzi vapererwa nemazano nekuda kwekuramba mitengo yezvikwanisiro ichikwira. Mukuru weTobacco Industries and Marketing Board, Doctor Andrew Matibiri vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvekurimisa kuri kubata varimi vose, kusanganisira varimi vefodya, izvo zvinogona kudzikisa ndimo mwaka uno. Doctor Matibiri vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanyonetsa varimi kushaikwa kwemagetsi, ayo ari kudzimwa dzimwa, izvo zviri kukanganisa vaya varimi vakanga vadyara fodya yekudiridzira. Tsaga refotereza yepamusoro rine huremu hwemakirogiramu makumi mashanu rinonzi rave kutengeswa muzvitoro zvakawanda zvinotengesa zvekurimisa nemutengo uri pakati pemadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nemazana matanhatu. Tsaga refotereza yepasi rine huremu hwumwechetehwo rinonzi rave kutengesewawo nemadhora emunyika ari pakati pemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemazana mashanu emadhora, zvichienderana nekuti uri kushandisa nzira dzipi dzekubhadhara. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwemitengo zvakanyanya mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari, uyo wanga uchikwidzwa svondo roga roga. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti dambudziko remunyika iri rinogona kupedzwa chete kana pakaitwa munonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru mune zveupfumi pamwe nezvepatongerwo enyika. Kusvika izvi zvaitika, veruzhinji vanonzi vacharamba vachinonga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hupfumi hweZimbabwe Hwonanga Kumakore eKare Aikwira Mitengo Katatu paZuva
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti isimbaraze mabasa ekusimudzira makambani emunyika kuyedza kudzikisa mutengo wekukwira kwezvinhu kana kuti inflation uyo wananga kumawere zvekare. NeMugovera bazi reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats rakazivisa kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation yakwira kusvika pazvikamu mazana masere nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 837, 53%. Muna Chikumi, mitengo yezvinhu yaive pazvikamu mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 35, 53%.  Izvi zvinorevei? Tabvunza nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanoti kushaya simba kwedhora remunyika kuri kupa kuti mitengo ikwire zvakanyanya. Asi pane zviri kuitwa here nehurumende kuona kuti hupfumi hwagadzirika? VaMuponda vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza kusimudzira mabasa ezvicherwa asi vachiti zvinoda kusimbaradzwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti kutengwa kwemafuta nedhora rekuAmerica kuri kupawo kuti mitengo iite chamurambamhuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Chitambara vanoti mitengo zvikuru pamwedzi ikakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana kwemwezdi yakati wandei Zimbabwe inenge yadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 na2008 apo mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva kana kuti hyperinflation. Munyori mukuru mune rimwe sangano revashandi reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti havana chivimbo neZimstats vachiti kuda kuteerera zvairi kuburitsa kuchengetesa bere chitunha. Vanoti mitengo yezvinhu inogona kunge yakawedzer kudarika zviri kutaurwa nebazi iri. VaMoyo vati Zimbabwe yave kutoteverana neVenezuela panyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Inflation yekuVenezuela parizvino iri pazvikamu zviuru zvina kubva muzana kana kuti 4,000 percent. Nyika iyi neZimbabwe ndidzo dzazezesa pasi rose munyaya dzekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda muNyika Votarisira Makwikwi eWorld Cup kuRussia
text: Vatsigiri vemutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe vanonokerwa nekutanga kwemakundano e 2018 World Cup ayo achaunganidza zvikwata zvine mukurumbira mumutambo uyu pasi rese. Kunyange hazvo chikwata chavo chisiri kuenda kuWorld Cup vateveri venhabvu munyika vanonokerwa nekutanga kwemabiko emakundano enhabvu epasi rese aya, ayo ari kupfungaidza utsi muRussia musi wa 14 Chikumi. Zimbabwe yakadzingwa mumakundano aya mushure mekunge veZifa vatadza kubhadhara, nemazuva aive atarwa neveFifa, murairidzi wekuBrazil, Valinhos, mari yake yemuhoro yemazuva ayo akamborairidza chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors. Asi izvi havina kubvisa manyuku manyuku eWorld Cup muZimbabwe vateveri vemutambo uyu vachiti ivo makundano aya atovanonokera kutanga. Vakawanda kusanganisirira muoongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti kunyange dai Zimbabwe yakakwikwidza mumakwikwi aya hapana kwayaienda sezvo maWarriors aive aisina mongo wekurova zvikwata zvakabudirira kunomiririra Africa. Zvikwata zvichange zvichisimudzira zita reAfrica kumakwikwi aya iEgypt, Morocco, Nigeria, Senegal, ne Tunisia. Vamwewo vakaita saVaOliver Musegede ndivo vanonokerwa neWorld Cup nekuti vaoreswa moyo nenhabvu yemuno yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League iyo vanoti haichanidza nemhaka yekushaikwa kwevatambi vane tarenda. Vateveri venhabvu ava vanoti nguva yeWorld Cup ichavapawo mukana wekupedza gakava rekuti ari pamberi ndiani Christian Ronaldo kana Lionel Messi avo vanga vachitora mikombe kuzvikwata zvavanotambira kuSpain cheReal Madrid neBarcelona. Muteveri weDynamos, VaByron Munyuki, vanoti World Cup ndiyo icharatidza kuti ari pamberi ndiani Christiano Ronald wePortugal kana Messi weArgentina. Chikwata che Germany ndicho chine mukombe uyu mushure mekurova Argentina mufainari yemakundano akapedzisira kuitwa kuBrazil muna 2014. Asi tichitarisa matambiro anga achiita zvikwata munzira yekuenda kuRussia, zviri kuratidza kuti hazvisi kuzove nyore kuti Germany idzivirire mukombe wayo. Brazil ndiyo iri kunzi nevazhinji ndiyo ingangotora mukombe uyu nematambiro ayaiita munzira yekuenda kuRussia. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reMDC-T Rokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Iburitse muMajeri Vakasungirwa Zvematongerwo Enyika
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaElias Mudzuri, vakurudzira hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iburitse mujeri vasungwa vose vakasungirwa zvematongerwo enyika pasi pehurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira jeri reChikurubi, uko kwakachengetwa dzimwe nhengo dze MDC-T dzinoti Yvonne Musarurwa, Last Maengehama naTungamirai Madzokere, VaMudzuri vati vasungwa vazhinji vakasungirwa zvematongerwo enyika pasi pehurumende yaVaMugabe vakaita saMuzvare Musarurwa nevamwe vavo vari kupikira mhosva dzavasina kupara. Nekudaro, VaMudzuri vakurudzira hurumende itsva yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iburitse vasungwa vezvematongerwo enyika mumajeri ose ari munyika. VaMudzuri vanoti sebato vakatosvitsa chikumbiro ichi kubazi rinoona nezvemitemo. Muzvare Musarurwa nevamwe vavo vaviri, avo vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza mumusha weGlen View muna 2011, vakasvitsa chikumbiro kumatare chekuti nyaya yavo iongororwe zvakare vachiti havana mhosva yavakapara, asi nyaya iyi haisati yanzwikwa. Gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo rakatambira chikumbiro cheMDC chekuti vasungwa vezvematongerwo enyika vaburitswe mumajeri asi vachiri kuongorora nyaya iyi sehurumende. Zvichakadai, VaMudzuri vakurudzira komisheni inowona nezvesarudzo kuti inyorese vasungwa vari mumajeri sevavhoti vachiti ikodzero dzavo sezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuti vave nechokutaura mukutongwa kwenyika yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weZEC, VaEmmanuel Magade, kuti tinzwe divi rekomisheni yavo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vachiti vari mumusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Yoshora Mabharani Mukuru weHuumende
text: Mabharani mukuru wehurumende VaClemence Masango, vanoti havasi kufara kuti komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu, yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, yave kutora divi nekuvashora nevashandi vebazi ravo pamwe nekuvapomera mhosva yehuori isati yambonzwawo divi ravo. Komisheni iyi iri kufamba ichinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pekuwaniswa magwaro anosanganisira ekuzvarwa, zvitupa nemapasipoti VaMasangano vatiwo zvimwe zviri kutaurwa zvave kutotyisidzira vashandi vebazi ravo uye vati vanoona sekuti pachinzvimbo chekuongorora zvizere nyaya iyi, komisheni iyi yave kutovaroverera pachipiyaniso isati yave nehumbowo hwekuti chii chiri kuita. VaMasango avo vauuya nemunyori mubazi rezvemukati menyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vaudza komisheni iyi kuti vanogona kuramba kushanda nayo ikada kupindira zvakanyanya mumashandiro ebazi ravo. Asi sachigaro vekomisheni iyi, VaElasto Mugwadi vavimbisa, VaMasango kuti vachaita basa ravo nemazvo uye zviri pachenawo kuti bazi ravo rinodawo zvikwanisiro kuti rikwanise kuita basa raro zvakanaka. VaMasango vati nyaya yekushomeka kwemapasipoti munyika inyaya iri pachena uye inyaya yavagara vachitaura musi nenguva ivo pamwe negurukota rezvemukati menyika. VaMugwadi vati chirongwa chavo icho chave nemwedzi chasvika pachinhanho chekupedzesira vasati vanyorwa gwaro iro vachatura kuparamende. Zvichakadai VaNhepera pamwe naVaMasango vaudza komisheni iyi kuti vachapindura mibvunzo yavapihwa mukupera kwesvondo. Ongororo yakaitwa neZimbabwe Human Rights Commission inoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda mune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika vari kunetseka kuwana magwaro anosanganisira ekuzvarwa, ekufa nekufambisa. Komisheni iyi inoti chinangwa cheongororo yayo ndeche kugadzirisa matambadziko akatarisana nevanhu mukuwana magwaro aya. Ukowo VaMasango vanoti bazi ravo riri kuenda pese parinogona kuvhura mahosifi munzvimbo dzese kuti vanhu vasafambe zvimbo dzakareba kunotora magwaro avonoda. Vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru vanonzi vachiri vakamirira magwaro ekufambisa sezvo hofisi iyi ichiti haina mari yekunze yekutenga zvimwe zvinodiwa zvakaita semichina yakawanda uye bepa rinoshandiswa. Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vanofumobata jongwe muromo kuenda kumahofisi aRegistra General kunotsvaga magwaro ekufambisa uye vamwe vavo vanoti kune chikiribidi chakawanda chinoitwa kuti munhu awane gwaro iri. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inonzi Inogona Kuendeswa kuMatare neKuroverera VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere Mhosva Yavasina Kupara
text: Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu Amai Beatrice Mtetwa avo rakamirirawo nhengo dzeMDC dzakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri VaLast Maingehama naVaTungamirai Madzokere vanoti neMuvhuro vachataura nevatori venhau kuti votora matanho api kuhurumende nekuvakanda mujeri kwemakore vasina mhosva. Amai Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yekuti vaende kumatare iri kuna VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere asi vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuti vachada kuripwa. Vaviri ava vange chipomerwa mhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza paGlen View 3 Shopping Centre muna 2011. VaMaingehama, VaMadzokere naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa vakazobatwa nemhosva yekuponda nemutongi wedare repamusoro VaChinembiri Bhunu muna 2016 ndokuendeswa kujeri reChikurubi. Asi mutongi wedare repamusoro soro Amai Rita Makarau vakati vaviri ava havana mhosva zvakapa kuti vabve vaburitswa muhusungwa. Muzvare Musarurwa vakaburitswa muhusungwa muna 2018 mushure mekupihwa ruregerero nemutungamiri wenyika pakaburitswa vamwe vasungwa. Asi mumwe ainge anziwo ane mhosva Muzvare Rebecca Mafukeni akashaya ari mutirongo akamirira kutongwa. Vana ava vaive pachikwata chevechidiki veMDC makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe vakasungwa muna 2011 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutema nematombo inspector Mutedza vachibva vashaya. Vazhinji vainge vasungwa ava vakabva vasungunurwa vachinzi Havana mhosva. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vari kugara vachiendeswa kumatare nemhosva dzekutyorwa kunenge kwaitwa mutemo nemapurisa. Mwedzi wapera VaKazembe vakapotsa vakandwa mujeri mushure mekunonoka kubhadhara mari inodarika zviuru zana gumi nemakumi pfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe nemazana mashanu kana kuti RTGS 199, 500 kuna VaSimon Mandoza mumwe mudzidzi wekuGweru vainge varohwa nemapurisa muHarare vakangozvimirira havo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna VaKazembe negurukota rezvemitemo vaZiyambi Ziyambi sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira tisati taenda pamhepo. Asi VaKumbirai Mafunda mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights sangano rakashanda naAmai Mtetwa naVaCharles Kwaramba panyaya yenhengo dzeMDC idzi vanotiwo pane mangwana vanotarisira kuti VaMaingehama naVaMadzokere vajekesere vatori venhau matanho avari kuronga kutora. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata zviri kundichemera: Wenger
text: anoti zvikwata zvakawanda zvauya kwaari zvichida kumutenga apo ari kugadzirira kubva kuArsenal iyo yaarairidza kwemakore anodarika 22.   Wenger acharairidza mutambo wake wekupedzisira apo chikwata chake chichasangana neHuddewrsfield musi weSvondo.   Paakabvunzwa kuti pane zvimwe zvikwata here zviri kuuya kwaari zvichida kumutenga kuti agozvirairidze, Wenger anoti, “Hongu, zvakawandisa chaizvo. Asi handisi kumbofunga nezvazvo kana kuzvitarisa. Ndinoda kuramba ndichishanda kuno kusvika zuva rekupedzisira rekondirakiti yangu.   “Zveshuwa ndicharamba ndichishanda. Njere dzangu dzinoda chaizvo kuti ndirambe ndichishanda. Asi chokwadi chaicho handizive. Ndinofanirwa kufunga nezvazvo. Ndinofarira huswa hunyoro uye ndinoda kufamba pahuri mazuva ose. Handizive kana ndikaramba ndichizviita mazuva anotevera, zvinogoneka.   “Ndine ruzivo rwakanyanya munyaya dzenhabvu. Saka ndicharamba ndichishanda, ndichiitei, handizive.”   Achibvunzwa kuti achazoshanda nechimwe chikwata chemuEngland here, Wenger anoti, “Panguva ino zvichiri kundiremera. Handitarise nguva iyoyo. Handidi kufunga nezvazvo panguva ino kana kutaura nezvazvo.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Vanoda Kuva Nhengo dzeZACC Vobvunzwa Mibvunzo Veruzhinji Vachinzwa Mhinduro Dzavo
text: Vamwe vari kupinda musarudzo dzekutsvaga makomishina eZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, (ZACC), vaudza komiti yeparamende iri kuvabvunzurudza kuti mitemo inoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwehuwori inofanira kusimbaradzwa uye komisheni iyi inofanirwa kushanda isina anoiudza zvekuita pamwe nekupihwa mari yakawanda kuti iite basa rayo nemazvo. Vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kukomiti iyi inotungamirirwa nemutauriri, weNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, vakawanda vavo vati komisheni iripo pari zvino haina mazino uye inoshanda nemamwe mapazi ehurumende ane huwori akaita semapurisa, matare nedzimhosva pamwe nemahofisi evachuchusi. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaGabriel Chaibva, vati mitemo yekudzivirira huwori yakaita zinyekenyeke uye inofanirwa kusimbaradzwa. VaChaibva vatiwo panofanira kuve nemutemo unochengetedza vaye vanenge vamhan’ara huwori vachiti pari zvino vanhu ava vanoshungurudzwa mushure mekuita izvi. Vatiwo ZACC haitombozikanwi munyika uye basa rayo rinofanirwa kushambadzwa zvakasimba kuitira kuti vanhu vakwanise kumhan’ara huwori kubva kunzvimbo ipi zvayo munyika. Vamwe vapinda mubvunzo idzi igweta, VaTinomudzishe Chinyoka, vabvumirana naVaChaibva kuti nhengo dzeZACC dzinofanira kubhadharwa mari yepamusoro kuitira kuti dzisaite zvehuwori. Vatiwo nhengo dzeZACC hadzifanirwe kusarudzwa nevezvematongerwo enyika vakaita senhengo dzeparamende sezvo vari ivo vamwe vevanhu vane huwori hunotyisa. Vatiwo ZACC inofanira kumira pachayo yega iine simba rekusunga, kuongorora pamwe nekuchuchisa vanoita zvehuwori uyewo vatiwo kupindira kunoita vezvematongerwo enyika mubasa reZACC, kutadza kuendesa kujeri vanhu vanoonekwa pachena kuti vanoita zvehuwori, kunoita kuti vanhu vasaremekedza komisheni iyi. VaChinyoka vatiwo zvinonyadzisa kuti mumajeri emuno hamuna vanhu vari kupika jeri nenyaya dzehuwori asi imo munyika muine huwori hunosemesa. Mumwe wevabvunzurudzwa, Amai Tsitsi Dhliwayo, vati kana vakadomwa vanoda kuona mabasa eZACC achishambadzwa uye kuti komisheni iyi ivhure mahofisi mumatunhu ese munyika kwete zvekungove muHarare chete. Mumwe ari kudawo kuva nhengo yeZACC, Doctor Mable Hungwe, vatiwo semaonero avo nyaya yekurwisa huwori ibasa remunhu wese munyika kweZACC chete,uye vatiwo kana vakadomwa vacharwisa huwori muhurumende pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akzvimirira. Dr Hungwe vati mari dzese dzinowanikwa nehuwori dzinofanirwa kutorwa nehurumende dzoshandiswa kuvaka mabhiriji kana zvikoro. Gweta, uye vaimbove mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Jessie Majome, avo vari kudawo kuitwa komishina, vatiwo kana hurumende ikabata mari dzose dzinenge dzashandiswa munyaya dzehuori, zvinogona kubatsira kuti veruzhinji vamhan’are huwori kana vanzwa nezvahwo. Vati veruzhinji ndivo vanonyanyo rasikirwa panoitwa huwori uye zvakakosha kuti vaite chido chekumhan’ara huwori. Muzvare Majone vati kuti hondo yekupedza huwori ibudurire, vanhu vanofanirwa kusungwa, kutongwa nekundwa mumajeri pachena zvisinei nekuti ndevebato ripi kana kuti vabva mumba mani. Bunzvo idzi dziri kuenderera mberi uye dzinotarisirwa kupera nhasi. Pane vanhu makumi matatu nevasere vange vachifanira kupinda mubvunzo idzi, asi padzatanga, Advocate Mudenda vazivisa kuti pane vamwe vatatu, VaChritopher Dube-Banda, VaZondi Kumwenda naVaTwanda Matope vabuda mubvunzo idzi. VaBlessing Chebundo veMDC ndemumwewo ange asipo apo pasvika chinhano chekuti vabvunzurudzwe. Paramende ichabuda nemazita evanhu gumi nevaviri ayo ichaendesa kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vadome vanhu vesere vachipinda muZACC. VaMnangagwa vakatodoma mutongi wedare repamusoro, uye vari mudzimai wegurukota rezvekunze kwenyika, Va Sibusiso Moyo, Justice Loice Matanda Moyo, kuve sachigaro weZACC. Pakadomwa Amai Matanda Moyo kuve sachigaro weZACC, masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akashoropodza kudomwa kwavo achiti munhu ane divi raakarerekera zvokuti anogona kutadza kufambisa nyaya dzehuori dzinenge dzichiitwa nebazi remurume wavo. Nhengo dzebhodhi rese reZACC dzakasiya basa zvisina tsarukano mukutanga kwegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: VaJoram Gumbo Vopomerwa Mhosva yeHuori-ZACC Ichiti Haisati Yasumwa
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoram Gumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti kambani yavo yekusona hembe inonzi JMCD yakapihwa basa nekambani yeZinara uye vachinzi vaitorawo mari kubva kukambani iyi yaive pasi pebazi ravo. Asi vachibvunzwa nebepanhau reHerald, VaGumbo vakaramba kuti vanoita zvehuori vachiti kambani yavo inotengeserawo mbatya kuZanu-PF mauto nemamwe mapazi ehurumende. VaGumbo vanonzi vaipihwawo mari kubva kuZINARA dzekuenda kuMalaysia kunoita basa reAir Zimbabwe risinei nekugadzira migwagwa sezvinoshandiswa homwe iyi. Komishina weZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission VaGoodson Nguni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi nekudaro hapana chavangataure parizvino. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira MDC kuKambuzuma VaWillas Madzimure vanove nhengo yeAfrican Parliamentarians Network Against Corruption uye vari mukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandiro emapazi ehurumende avo vanoti zvakakosha kuti makurukota nenhengo dzedare reparamende vabude pachena panyaya yehupfumi hwavo vachangotora mhiko. No media source currently available  .

headline: Vatungamiri muZimbabwe neAfrica Voyambirwa Kuti Vatonge Zvakanaka Kuti Mauto Asarambe Achipidigure Hurumende
text: Nemusi weSvondo mauto emuGuinea achitungamirwa naColonel Mamady Doumbouya akapidigura hurumende yaVaAlpha Conde. VaConde avo vakavandudza bumbiro remutemo kuti varambe vachitungamira nyika iyi vakasarudzwa gore rapera musarudzo dzainge dziine mutauro wakanyanya. Izvi zvave kureva kuti muAfrica mauto apindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica achiyedza kana kutopidigura hurumende kanodarika mazana maviri. Burkina Faso ndiyo ine mauto akapindira zvakanyanya kanosvika gumi ichiteverwa neNigeria kasere. Mauto akapidigurawo hurumende muZimbabwe muna 2017 kanova kekutanga zvichiitika munyika. Panyika dzemuAfrica makumi mashanu nenhatu, nyika makumi mana dzine mauto akapindira mukupidigura hurumende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitika izvi zviri kudzosera Africa kumashure munyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere kunyangwe yange yambopemberera zvakaitika kuZambia uko kwakatambidzanwa masimba murunyararo. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe neAfrica vanofanira kukoshesa zvido zvevanhu kuti mauto asapindire munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF uye vaimbotungamira bato rinopikisa reDare vaGilbert Dzikiti vanoti chakakonzera kupindira kwemauto kuGuinea inyaya yekupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika muAfrica kunoita France. No media source currently available

headline: Mutasa akapotsa atiny’udza: DeMbare
text: MWAKA wenhabvu wa2018 uchagara mundangariro dzevatsigiri veDynamos sezvo gore rino chikwata ichi chakapona nepaburi retsono kuburitswa muCastle Premiership League.   Dynamos mwaka uno haina kutamba nhabvu yainozivikanwa ichitamba makore ese izvo zvakaona chikwata ichi chichisvika pakushandura varairidzi kanokwana kana.   Pekutanga, DeMbare yakadzinga Lloyd Mutasa ndokumutsiva naBiggie Zuze asi ndokuzomudzinga zvakare ichidzosa Samaita – sezita raMutasa remadunhurirwa – uye ndokuzomudzinga kechipiri achitsiviwa naLloyd Chigowe.   Zvese izvi mumaziso amaneja wechikwata ichi Richard Chihoro anoti zvakakonzereswa naMutasa uyo waanoti aive nehumbimbindoga asingade kushanda nevamwe kana kuteerera mazano aaipihwa pamusoro pechikwata ichi.   “Munoziva nhabvu haidi humbimbindoga, kuti ndiwe unoziva kudarika vamwe vese! Kwete, hazvidi kudaro.   “Nhabvu inoda mushandirapamwe, kana muchida kuhwina munofanirwa kushanda semhuri. Manje Lloyd aisada izvozvo aingoda kushanda ari ega,  asingateerere vamwe.   “Takapotsa tanyura nekuda kwake kusateerera achifunga kuti ari kugona iye pasina zvaaiita,” anodaro Chihoro.

headline: Vanorarama neKukumbira Rubatsiro Vovhiringwa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe
text: Vamwe vasingaoni vanorarama nekukumbira mari mumabhazi nemumigwagwa kwaRusape vanoti vari panguva yakaoma sezvo hurumende yakambomisa kufamba kwemabhazi aya senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaTymon Rukuni vekwaRusape, vanoti kubva nemusi weSvondo apo vakapedzisira kupemha mubhazi, ndiwo musi wavakapedzisira kudya rinopisa nevana vavo vatanhatu, sezvo vasingawani kwekupemhera nekuti muguta hamuchina vanhu ukuwo kumabhazi havachadiwiko nekuda kwechirwere che-COVID-19. "Tine mhuri nine dzinorarama nekupemha asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus hapachina kana chichabuda nekuti mumabhazi hakuchina, chikafu hatichina nekuti kumabhazi hatichadiwi kuti tifambe ikoko. Toita seyiwo nhai," vanodaro VaRukuni. Amai Rejoice Chinembiri vekwaRusape vanoti nekusafamba kwemabhazi panguva ino, hakuna kumwe kwavanotarisira kuwana mari kunze kwekufamba nemabhazi iwaya vachikumbira rubatsiro. 'Tinosipinda mumabhazi tikukumbira, towana tumari totenga tuhupfu tuTsunami nemuriwo todya nevana kumba. Zvino izvezvi mabhazi akamiswa hatina kana pekutangira. Tamboenda kwaMP wedu kuti tibatsirwe tikazoenda kuSocial Welfare asi tangonyorwa mazita hatina kupihwa kana chipunu chehupfu chaicho," Amai Chinembiri vanotsanangura. VaNhamo Makusha vanoti sevanhu vanorara nechavawana musi iwoyo, hapana zvazvichareva kana vachirambidzwa kupemha munzvimbo dzemuguta kana mumadutavanhu sezviri kuitika panguva ino yeLockdown. "PaLockdown apa patidhisiadhivhandeja nekuti sevanhu vanotsvaga mumabhazi, nekuti hatina chatinacho, zvichireva kuti takapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo pakaguma kufamba mabhazi acho uye pari zvino hatichabvumirwi kukwira mabhazi acho, takapedzisira kudya musi iwoyo weSunday," vadaro VaMakusha Mumiriri weMakoni Central mudare reparemende, VaDavid Tekeshe, vanoti vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kuti mhuri dzevasingaoni idzi dziwane rubatsiro asi zviri kutora nguva refu. "Ndatouya nemuriwo izvezvi kwavari ndichiti pamwe vangabatsirikana sezvo vange vakanzi vanokwanisa kubatsirwa kumapurisa asi hapana chabuda ikoko vakanzi vaende kuWelfare asi vangonyorwa mazita chete pasina chabuda. Vanhu ava vanoti vakapedzisira kupemha Sunday apo vakakwanisa kutenga katsaona kekudya musi wacho. Vanhu ava vari pa desperate havana chekudya vanotoda rubatsiro," vanodaro VaTekeshe. Dambudziko rakatarisana nevanhu ava idambudziko rakatarisanawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika yose vanga vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro mumigwagwa nemumabhazi. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vangangosvika zviuru mazana mashanu vasingaoni, vazhinji vavo vachipona nekukumbira rubatsiro sezvo munyika musina mabasa akawanda nepamusana pekuparara kwaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti VaNcube Havana Chavavandudza Pane Zvavatura Pakugadzirisa Hupfumi
text:
Gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube nagavhuna weRBZ VaJohn Mandudya nhasi vatura matanho avanoti akanangana nekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika uho huri kunzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi hwananga kumawere. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, Muzvinafundo Ncube vati nyika ichaenderera mberi nekushandisa dhora rayo pamwe nerekuAmerica uye vakatiwo vachabvisa mari yemutero pamafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. VaNcube vati hurumende yave kuzviisa mumutemo kuti dhora remunyika nerekuAmerica acharamba achishandiswa kwemakore mashanu anotevera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti VaNcube havana zvitsva zvavaparura kunze kwekusimbardza kuti nyika icharamba ichishandisa dhora rayo nere kuAmerica. Panyaya yekubvisa mutero pamafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, VaBhoroma vati izvi zvaifanira kunge zvakaitwa kare nekuti sezxvo achidhura kudarika munyika zhinji. Hurumende inotiwo haisi kuzodzika mitengo yezvinhu. Asi VaBhoroma vanoti iri kuhwanda nemunwe sezvo iri kutendera vemabhizimisi kubhadharisa nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica kumabhanga. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Developmenent Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Prosper Chitambara vatiwo havana kuona zvizhinji zvavandudzwa naVaNcube vachiti kana zviripo zvichatora nguva. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaCallisto Jokonya vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuwedzera muripo pakukwereta mari kunogona kuomesera vemabhizimisi zvakanyanya zvinopa kuti vamwe vavhare makambani avo. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti kushandisa mari yekuAmerica munongedzo wekuti hurumende iri kutenda kuti vanhu Havana chivimbo nedhora remunyika. Asi vayambira kuti mitengo haisi kuzodzika. VaNcube vaturawo mamwe matanho avati akanangana nekurerutsira vashandi vehurumende. Asi vamwe vashandi vakatanga kuramwa mabasa svondo rapera vanotiwo hapana chinobatika chataurwa naVaNcube. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe - PTUZ- VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti zvataurwa naVaNcube hazvibatsire mushandi zvakanyanya.

VaZhou vakurudzira kushandiswa kwemari yekuAmerica chete kusvika hupfumi hwenyika hwagadzikana.

Munyori mukuru wesangano rinomiririra vashandi vehurumende munyika reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, iro raimbonzi Apex Council, VaDavid Dzatsunga, vanoti kana mari dziri mbiri idzi dzikashandiswa pamutemo vashandi vehurumende vanofanirwa kutambiriswa mari mbiri dzose.

Izvi zvatsigirwa nenyanzvi yezvemari VaHope Chinyasa vanoshanda neGaleed Consultancy and Accounting Services vanoti mutemo wekushandisa mari dzakawanda unodzvanyirira vashandi vehurumende.

Hurumende iri kuita chipatapata chekuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi mushure mekunge dhora remunyika raramba richishaya simba zvakapawo kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation ikwire zvakanyanya zvekuda kuzvika pamazana maviri kubva muzana kana kuti 200%. No media source currently available

headline: Kucherwa kweGoridhe Zviri Kunze kweMutemo kuPenhalonga Kwokanganisa Magariro eDunhu iri
text: Vamwe vagari vekuPenhalonga mumusha weTsvingwe, kuOld West muMutasa South mudunhu reManicaland vari kuchema-chema nenyaya yekusvibisirwa mweya wavanofema zvichitevera mabasa ekucherwa kwegoridhe ari kuitwa kunharaunda iyi zviri kunze kwemutemo nemakorokoza. Vagari ava vanoti zvakare mvura yavo yemurwizi Mutare haichashandisiki nekuda kwemadhaka ayinawo uye mishonga irimo inoshandiswa pakuchenesa goridhe. Vanotiwo chipfambi chatekeshera zvakare munharaunda yavo pamwe nekuparwa kwedzimhosva. VaWeston Makoni mugari wekuPenhalonga uye vari sachigaro wekomiti yevagari vekunharaunda iyi. VaMakoni vanochema nenyaya yekuti kubva pakamira kambani yeRedwing kuchera goridhe zviri pamutemo, makorokoza ave kuita basa iri ari kukanganisa nharaunda nekusiya makomba, kusvibisa mvura, uye nemweya wekufema. VaMakoni vanotiwo nyaya dzehumbavha nedzechipfambi dzawedzera munzvimbo yavo zvichitevera kuwanda kwaita makorokoza aya uye nevatengi vegoridhe. “Vanhu vose vari kuchera gold vanenge vaine maU.S. dollar, saka vave kuona kuti tave kutowana usiku mari yemaU.S. dollar, saka vose vakumhanyira kuno vachiti kuPenhalonga kune foreign currency saka zvadaro zvakare mbavha dziri kuuya zvakare vachibira avo vane mari muhomwe semaGweja aya vachiba kunyangwe nemudzimba vari kupinda, munguva yapfuura pane vakabatwa vaba mumba vapinda vakaba ma-TV, mibhedha nezvimwe zvakadaro.” VaMakoni vanoti kunyangwe vakaedza kutaura nevesangano rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa nezvakatikomberedza, veEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, hapana chakabuda. VaKingstone Chitombe mukuru weEMA mudunhu reManicaland vange vasiri kudavira runhare rwavo kuti tinzwe divi ravo pamusoro penyaya iyi. Amai Tsverukai Duwa mumwe mugari wenharaunda iyi uye vanoti pavaikura havana kumbosangana nenhamo yavepo pari zvino zvichitevera huruva iri kupwititidzwa zuva nezuva nevacheri vegoridhe ava izvo zvopinza vagari munjodzi yezvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekufema mweya wakasviba. Amai Josephine Musiyazviriyo vanobvumirana navaDuwa panyaya. Vanoti ivo kutangwa kwakaitwa kucherwa kwegoridhe nemakorokoza kwaunza zvakare vanhu vakawandisa munzvimbo yavo nevamwe vekure kure. “Redwing Mine yange iri nzvimbo yakanaka asi iye zvino zvasiyana. Mukatarisa izvezvi paive nemiti uye nema lawn kutenderedza kuitirira kuti dust risasumuka, sakaizvezvi chanyanya kunetsa pamwe inyaya yema resources onetsa kuti vatadze kudzivirira dust riri kusimuka zvopa kuti tifeme mweya une dust totyira zvakare zvirwere, nekuti rinosimuka zvakanyanya kusvika kunana Africa University, even miriwo yedu inenge iri ye brown ne dust irori.” VaGeorge Miti ndivo mukuru anoona nekugara zvakanaka kwevana vepachikoro chepamusorosooro cheAfrica University, icho chiri kukanganiswawo zvakare nekucherwa kuri kuitwa goridhe uku. VaMiti vanoti kucherwa kuri kuitwa chicherwa ichi kwave kukanganisa mafambisirirwo emabasa ekurima pachikoro pavo zvakare nekugara kwakanaka kwevana vavo sezvo vacheri ava vave kutopinda nemuyadhi yechikoro chavo. “Izvezvi nzvimbo inenge ichimainiwa inenge iri nzvimbo yechikoro, inozosara makomba zvokonzera kuti munenge musisiri safe pakuzofamba uye zvokonzera zvakare mavanga munharaunda kana kuti environmental degradation pamwechete nekuti mvura zvakare kana paine ma chemicals anoshandiswa mvura inenge isisiri safe kushandisa isu kuminda yedu yemadiridzo.” Mumiriri weMutasa South mudare reparamende VaRegai Tsunga vanoti vakaudzwa nezvedambudziko iri nevagari uye nemukuru wechikoro cheAfrica University VaMunashe Furusa. Vanoti vachagara pasi nevakuru vehurumende kubazi redzidzo yepamusoro, rekucherwa kwezviwanikwa, naMudzviti vedunhu reMutasa vaGeorge Bandure uye negurukota rinomirira dunhu reManicaland Amai Ellen Gwaradzimba kuti vaone kuti pamwechete vangagadzirisa seyi nyaya iyi. “Vice Chancellor vepaAfrica University vakandinyorera vachinyunyuta nemashandiro ari kuita zve-illegal mining iri kuitika around Africa University vachiti makomba avo ari kukanganisa zvivakwa zvavo sezvo mamwe ma-tunnels ave kuuya kumadziro uyezve makomba aya ane njodzi pakuti ari kusiyiwa akadaro kana vapedza kuchera, so zvichaita kuti vana vechikoro vanogona kukuvara uye kuti mvura payonaya mosquito dzotanga ku-breeder nekuti zvakare ivhu ririkucherwa richakukurwa rwizi rwozara jecha.” Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano VaIsaac Tomu vaudza Studio 7 kuti kazhinji pakucherwa kwegoridhe panoshandiswa mishonga yakaita se Mercury, iyo inoti ikaiswa mumvura inokanganisa hutano hwevanhu uye nezvipfuyo. Vanoti vanhu vanokwanisa kurwara negomarara, uye huruva ichikonzeresa rurindi, kana kuti TB.
