Kudzimara munyika magadzikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanhu vachiwana mabasa mumakambani akanga avharwa, mabasa echikorokoza acharamba achienderera mberi munyika mose sezvo vanhu vanenge vachitsvaga chouviri kuti vararamise mhuri dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanotambira Nyomba yeCovaxin Kubva kuIndia
text: Chikamu chekutanga chenhomba yeCOVAXIN inodzivirira Covid-19 yakapiwa Zimbabwe neIndia serubatsiro chapinda munyika, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachigamuchira mushonga uyu panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport muHarare. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti vachigamuchira rubatsiro urwu, VaMnangagwa vatenda zvikuru mutungamiri weIndia pamwe nehurumende yeIndia, vachiti rubatsiro urwu rwauya panguva yakakodzera. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vati Zimbabwe iri panyika dzekutanga dzakave nehurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba. Vanonzi vakokawo vemabhizimusi vekuIndia vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi munyika kuti vashandise mikana iri kuunzwa nechirongwa cheNational Development Strategy NDS 1. Mumiriri weIndia muZimbabwe VaVijay Khanduja ndivo vasvitsa nhomba iyi kumutungamiri wenyika. VaKhanduja vatiwo rubatsiro urwu mucherechedzo wehukama hwakasimba pakati peZimbabwe nenyika yavo yeIndia. VaMnangagwa vaperekedzwa nemutevedzeri wavo uye vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga pamwe nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. India yakapa Zimbabwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu, 75 000, asi zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, kana kuti 35 000 ndizvo chete zvakwanisa kupinda munyika, zvichireva kuti imwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi mana ichatevera munguva pfupi inotevera. Zimbabwe yakawana zvakare rubatsiro rweimwe nhomba yeSinopharm kubva kuChina mukutanga kwemwedzi uno uye yakatengawo zvakare imwe nhomba yekuChina yeSinovac. Hurumende yakabvumidzawo kushandiswa kwenhomba yekuRussia, yeSputnik V. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani yeBharat Biotech ichishanda pamwechete nesangano rinoona nezvetsvakurudzo dzemishonga muIndia, reIndian Council of Medical Research. Nhomba iyi inobayiwa kaviri, kepiri kachibaiwa mushure memazuva makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 ekunge munhu atora nhomba yekutanga. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN inonzi yakaratidza zvikamu makumi masere nechimwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 81 percent, zvekushanda kwayo kudzvirira Covid-19 pavanhu vanenge vasina nhoroondo yehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi mushure mekunge vabaiwa nhomba yepiri. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa pa Nottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti chinhu chakanaka chose kuti Zimbabwe yawana imwe nhomba kubva kuIndia, asi vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende ichifanodzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro penhomba inenge ichizopinda munyika nhomba iyi isati yapinda. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti izvi zvinozobatsira kuti veruzhinji9 vanenge vave neruzivo nechakare panozopinda mushonga uyu munyika, pane kuti vanhu vatange kudzidziswa nezvawo iwo wazara munyika. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo hurumende inofaniorwa kutenga mushonga wakawanda unenge wafarirwa nevanhu wakawanda kuitira kuti vanhu vasazosanganisirwa mishonga kana vachinge vonobaiwa nhomba dzepiri vachizopiwa unenge wakasiyana nenhomba yekutanga. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Timu dzemuHarare hadzilume’
text: wemutambo wePremier Soccer League wave pakati nepakati, mubvunzo une vatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu ndewekuti kubva kwakaita mukombe uyu uchienda kuZvishavane uchazodzoka here muHarare kana Bulawayo?   Gore radarika, FC Platinum yakanyora nhoroondo nekuve chikwata chekutanga kuhwina mukombe wePSL chisiri chemuHarare kana Bulawayo kubva muna 1980.   Kwemakore akawanda, zvimwe zvikwata zvisiri zvemuHarare zvaikundikana chaizvo kusimudza mukombe uyu apo zvimwe zvacho zvaizokundikana zvave pedyo sezvakaitwa neZPC Kariba iyo yakabvutirwa mukombe uyu zuva rekupedzisira.   Zvikwata zvePlatinum, zvinoti FC Platinum shasha dzePSL iyo iri kutungamirirwa naNorman Mapeza neNgezi Platinum yaTonderayi Ndiraya parizvino zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Shasha yakambonetsa ichitambira maWarriors, Dynamos FC nezvimwe zvekuEurope – Harlington Shereni – anoti zvichatora nguva refu kuti zvikwata zvemuHarare neBulawayo zvitevere matsimba eNgezi Platinum neFC Platinum nekuti zviviri izvi zvakagadzikana uye zvakarongeka.   “Zvichatora nguva refu kuti zvimwe zvikwata zvigotevera FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum nekuti zvakarongeka, zvakarongera vatambi vazvo kuti vatambe nhabvu vakasununguka,” anodaro Shereni.   Mushamarari wenhepfenyuro yeStar FM, Howard Musonza, anoti zvave kunetsa kuti mukombe ugouya kuHarare kana Bulawayo nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu pari zvino.

headline: Handiende: Chiyangwa. . . ‘Ini ndini ndine yese’
text: MUTUNGAMIRI wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) – Phillip Chiyangwa – anoti kunyangwe zviite sei ndiye ari kutonga uye haasi kuzobva pachigaro chinopisa ichi.   Captain Fiasco kana kuti Phidza, semazita emadunhurirwa aChiyangwa, ndiye ega achamira pasarudzo dzichaitwa dzekusarudza mutungamiri mutsva weZifa musi waZvita 1 sezvo vamwe vaida kukwikwidza kupinda pachigaro ichi vakakundikana nekuda kwekuti vaive vasina magwaro akakwana anotarisirwa kuti vange vachikwikwidza.   “Kunyangwe ndikarwara zvekundisunda mubhara chaimo, ndini ndiri kutonga uye ndicharamba ndichitonga.   “Vanoda kundirwisa, asi hapana zvavanoita kana kwavanosvika. Isu ndisu tine yese, musi wa1 kungonzi panyanga ka, tatopinda panyanga,” anodaro Chiyangwa.   Anoenderera mberi achiti kunyangwe vanhu vakataura zvakawanda-wanda, hapana zvazvinoshandura nekuti mutungamiri wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvau pasi rose reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) – Gianni Infantino – anoteerera zvinenge zvataurwa naiye (Chiyangwa) chete kana dziri nyaya dzine chekuita nezvenhabvu yemuno.   “Vanhu kunyangwe vakataura zvavanotaura, hapana zvazvinoshandura, Gianni Infantino anongoteerera zvandinenge ndataura ini chete kwete vamwe vese.   “Munenge muchipedza nguva yenyu kana muchinyora matsamba enyu muchitaura kudii kudii, zvavamunenge muchiita. Ini ndini waanoterera chete nekuti ndini ndiri panyanga,” anodaro.   Chiyangwa anoti kuti nhabvu yemuno inyatsosimba, Hurumende inofanirwa kupindira yotsigira mutambo uyu nemari sezvinoitwa kune dzimwe nyika kuti basa ravo rinyatsofamba zvakanaka uye nekuita zvirongwa zvakasiyana.   Anoti kusapindira kweHurumende kunovadzosera kumashure zvikuru izvo zvinozovaona dzimwe dzenguva vachisvika pakuburitsa mari dzavo dzemuhomwe kuti vakwanise kufambisa basa reZifa rinosanganisira kubhadhara vatambi kana kuvatumira kunze kwenyika kumitambo yakasiyana.   “Zvatinoona kune dzimwe nyika, Hurumende inofanirwa kupindira yodira mari mumutambo uyu kuti zvitibatsire kufambisa basa redu. Dzimwe dzenguva tinosvika pakuburitsa mari dzedu dzemuhomwe kuti tiwane kubatanidza zviendeke titumire vakomana kumitambo yavo izvo zvinove zvisingafanirwe kuitika.   “Tikawana rutsigiro rwemari kubva kuHurumende, zvinhu zvedu zvoshanduka zvotifambira zvakanaka,” anodaro Chiyangwa.

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kubatira Mitero yeHutano
text: Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekuparura chirongwa chekuti vanhu vose vange vachiwana mukana wekurapwa kuburikidza nekubhadharisa mitero vari kushanda nevari kuwana mari kukambani yeNational Social Secutiy Authority, NSSA. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa muHarare neMuvhuro weTripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF. Musangano uyu unounza pamwe chete hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi. Uyu ndiwo musangano wekutanga weTNF kubva mugore ra2010. Misangano yeTNF yakambomiswa nenyaya yekusawirirana pakati pemapoka matatu aya. TNF yakaumbwa paine chinangwa chekuti nhaurirano dzipe kuti pave nechinangwa chimwe chete munyika pakuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vakaparura gwaro reKadoma Declaration muna 2010 iro rinotara zvinangwa zveTNF. Gwaro iri ndiro rine zvibvumirano zvemisangano yeTNF izvi zviri kunetsa kuzadzikisa. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, vanoti hurongwa hwekuona kuti vanhu vawana hutano kuzadzikisa bumbiro remitemo rinoti vanhu vose vanofanira kuwana mukana wekurapwa.. No media source currently available Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, nerevashandirwi re Employers’ Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, anoti anotambira nemufaro kutanga kwemisango yeTripartite Negotiating Forum achiti zvichabatsira mukuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawaere. Asi masangano EMCOZ neZCTU anoti pari zvino haasi kutambira chirongwa chehurumende chekuti NSSA itungamire hurongwa hwekutora mitero kuvanhu semari ichashandiswa munyaya dzehutano hwevanhu. Mutungamiri wesangano reEMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti misangano yeTNF inobatsira asi havatenderane nenyaya yekubhadhara mari yemitero yezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanotiwo vashandi havana chivimbo neNSSA. No media source currently available

headline: Zvirwere zveManyoka Zvotarisirwa Kuwedzera Kunzvimbo Dzakaparadzwa neDutumupengo
text: Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Robert Madyiradima vanoti huwandu wezvirwere zvemanyoka huchawedzera munzvimbo dzakaparadzwa nedambudziko renemafashamu emvura nemhepo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai sezvo kusina mvura yekunwa yakachena kune dzimwe nzvimbo uko kusiri kusvikika parizvino. Dr Madyiradima vanoti chikuru parizvino ndechekuti vanhu vazvichengetedze vakamirira kuwana rubatsiro. Chiremba ava vanoti bazi ravo riri kushanda nebazi reCivil Protection Unit nemamwe mapazi ehurumende mukuyedza kuendesa rubatsiro kune vakakuvara nevarwere. Vanhu vanodarika makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vanonzi vafa kuChipinge, Chimanimani neMasvingo nekuda kwedutumupengo iri. No media source currently available

headline: Mapazi eHurumende neVamwe veParamende Voramba Kutambira Bhajeti ra2022
text: Apo hurukuro dziri kuenderera mberi kuti bhajeti rakaparurwa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube rotambirwa here nedare reparamende kana kuti kwete, pave kubuda mutauro wakanyanya. Mapazi ehurumende akawanda ari kuti mari dzavakapihwa hadzina zvadzinobatsira uye VaNcube vane nhoroondo yekusavapa mari dzavanenge vataura mubhajeti. Bhajeti rakaparurwa naVaNcube rinofanira kutambirwa nematare ose eparamende anoti reHouse of Assembly neSenate kuti ritange kushanda zviri pamutemo. Asi rwendo rwuno dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dziri kuti haiziyiwe. Vamwe vasiri kufara nebhajeti rakaparurwa iri mumiriri weNorton VaTemba Mliswa. Vanoti VaNcube havafanire kuvimbisa mari dzavasingazope mapazi ehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chemubati wehomwe mubazi rezvehutano Amai Lynette Tennis vakaudza dare reparamende kuti mari yakapihwa bazi ravo haikwane uye inotoisa hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi. Bazi iri rakapihwa mari inosvika mabhiriyoni zana negumi nemanomwe kana kuti 117 billion yemunyika mubhajeti regore rinouya. Amai Tennis vakati zvikamu makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana zvemari yekurapa TB, Malaria, hutano hwemadzimai nezvimwe yakabva kumasangano akazvimirira anoti Global Fund nehomwe yemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica yePresident’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief. Asi muzinda weAmerica wakatozivisa hurumende kuti itsvage nzira dzekubatsira vanorarame nehutachiona hweHIV/Aids. Hurumende yaibatsirikana zvikuru nemari yehomwe yeAIDS Levy inobatirwa vashandi asi inonzi yave shoma sezvo vakawanda vari kuzviitira mabasa emaoko vasingabhadhare. Rimwe bazi riri kuti rakapihwa mari ishoma nderedzidzo riri kuti zvirongwa zvakaita sezve Continuous Assessment Learning Activity kana kuti CALA zvichazviringidzwa zvakanyanya nemari shoma yarakapihwa. VaMliswa vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri dai hurumende yaita bhajeti nemari yekuAmerica. VaMliswa vanoti zviri nani hazvo kuti dai VaNcube vakaparura bhajeti iri nemari yekuAmerica. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti mari inoshandiswa haina hayo kunyanya kukosha nekuti. VaNcube vakazivisa havo kuti mapazi ehurumende akanga akumbira mari inoda kusvika matrilion maviri nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 2, 7 trillion yemunyika asi ivo vainge vaine mari inodarika zvishoma mabhiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 927 billion yemunyika. VaNcube vakati chavari kuyedza kuita mubhajeti yavo kubatsira varombo kunyanya.

headline: Dambudziko reMagwaro eKufambisa Rokanganisa Vari Kunze kweNyika
text: Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu rinoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kutyorerwa kodzero dzazvo nekukundikana kwehurumende kuzviwanisa magwaro ekufambisa kana kuti masipoti nenguva inokodzera uye inotarisirwa nemunhu kuti ange awana gwaro rake. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa kodzero kuvana veZimbabwe kuti vawane magwaro ekufambisa kana chero magwaro anokodzera kunge achiwanikwa nechizvarwa chenyika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti hurumende yave kukundikana kudhinda magwaro ekufambisa aya nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga bepa pamwe ne ink zvinodiwa mukugadzirwa kwemagwaro aya. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika kumahofisi amabharani mukuru wenyika kana kuti Registrar-General vanoti pasipoti itsva yave kutora mwedzi inodarika makumi maviri isati yabuda, kuchitiwo kutora pasipoti yechimbichimbi kuchinzi kwave kutora mwedzi gumi nemisere kana kudarika. VaMavhinga vanoti dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi sezvo paine vanhu vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vanoda kumutsiridza magwaro avo, vakaita sevari muSouth Africa vanoda magwaro ekushanda nekugara munyika iyi. Vanoti vamwe vari munyika vari kukanganiswa vanenge vachida kubuda munyika kuenda kunorapwa kunze kwenyika, kuenda kuzvikoro, kana kushanya chaiko. Muna Kubvumbi gore rino gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Mathema, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hofisi yaRegistrar-General yaive iine magwaro anodarika mazana maviri ezviuru akanga akamirira kudhindwa. VaMathema vakati kana hofisi iyi ichishanda ine hudzamu hwekudhinda magwaro zviuru zvisere pazuva. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Vaviri Vofa neCovid-19 kuManicaland
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakwira kusvika pamakumi matatu nevatanhatu zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe murume nemudzimai kuManicaland nechirwere ichi nezuro. Vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika, vamwe vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa mumwe chete kuZambia. Kunyangwe hazvo chirwere checoronavirus chave kupararira zvakanyanya munyika, hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara zvapa kuti vashandi vemo kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vapinde mumwedzi wechipiri vachiramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti nemusi weChina vanenge vatangawo kuramwa mabasa nekuti hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvekuti vawedzerwe mari yemirhoro nekuwana zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kucoronavirus. No media source currently available Gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakamboti hurumende yakagadzirira kuzeya nyaya yemihoro nevashandi asi kusvika parizvino zvienenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana masere ane makumi mana nemana kana kuti 844, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe ne mazana matanhatu anemakumi masere nevaviri kana kuti 17,682. Vapora vadarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi masere nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 489, 000. Pasi rose, Johns Hopkins university inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu ane zviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 16,3 million, kuchiti vafa vadarikawo zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nechimwe kana kuti 651 thousand. America yave nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kana kuti vadarika 4, 2 thousand vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 147,00.

headline: Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java Vanoshaya
text: Mumiriri weGlen View South mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeMDC Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java avo vakaita njodzi yemumugwagwa muna Chivabvu vashaya. Amai Tsvangirai Java mwanasikana wevaive mutungamiri weMDC muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai. Njodzi iyi yakaitikira kuKwekwe vachibva kumusangano weMDC. Dzimwe nhengo mbiri dzebato iri VaPaul Rukannda naVaTafadzwa Mhundwa vakashayao munjodzi iyi. Kunyangwe vainge vari muchipatara, Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java vakasarudzwa mwedzi wapera kuita munyori mukuru wegungano remadzimai muMDC, reWomen’s Assembly. Mutauriri wemhuri vari munin’ina waVaTsvangirai, VaManase Tsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti Amai Vimbai Tsvangirai Java vashaya. Tichakupai zvizere muchirongwa chedu na 7 manheru ano.

headline: Mukana weAfrica kuWC . . . vamwe vanoti Nigeria, Senegal
text: MUMASVONDO mashoma anotevera, pasi rose richange rakatarira kutanga kwemakwishu makuru enhabvu eFifa World Cup 2018 kuRussia apo zvikwata 32 zvichatatsurana mumutambo uyu. Mutambo uyu uchatanga musi wa14 Chikumi uye maziso ose achange ari pazvikwata zvinoti Germany iyo ine mukombe uyu, Brazil, France, Spain, Belgium neArgentina izvo zviri kutarisirwa kubvuta mukombe uyu kubva kuGermany.   Zvakadai, Africa ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pazvikwata zvishanu zvinoti Nigeria, Egypt, Senegal, Tunisia neMorocco. Pazvikwata zviri kumirira Africa izvi, zvitatu zvacho ndezvekuNorth Africa zvinoti Egypt, Tunisia neMorocco kozoti zviviri ndezvekuWest Africa – Nigeria neSenegal. Southern Africa haina kana chikwata chimwe chiri kuimirira kumakwishu aya. Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevaongorori pamwe navariridzi venhabvu vakasiyana avo vanopa maonero avari kuita zvikwata zvemuAfrica zvichanokwikwidza kuRussia.   Murairidzi weChicken Inn, Joey “Mafero” Antipas, anoti ari kuisa mari yake pachikwata cheSenegal iyo iri muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Poland, Japan neColombia muGroup H.   Senegal ine gomo guru rekukwira muboka rayo nekuti mune zvikwata zvakasimba asi Antipas anoti ari kufamba nayo sezvo yakasimba zvikuru.   “Senegal yakasimba zvikuru, vatambi vayo vese vazere kuEurope uye vari kutambira zvikwata zvikuru kusanganisira Sadio Mane uyo achangobva kutamba mufainari yeChampions League umo akanwisa achitambira Liverpool. “Chikwata ichi chakasimba kudarika zvakawanda chaizvo,” anodaro Mafero.   Vatambi veSenegal vanotarisirwa kunetsa kumutambo uyu vanosanganisira Mane, Idrissa Gana Gueye weEverton, Keita Balde Diao weMonaco nakaputeni wacho Cheikhou Kouyate weWest Ham United.   Murairidzi weManica Diamond FC yemuDivision One Eastern Region, Luke Masomere, anotiwo nhabvu yashanduka zvikuru uye ari kuona zvikwata zvemuAfrica zvichikonzera nyaka-nyaka kuWorld Cup.   Muchinda uyu anoti Nigeria ichisvika kusemi-fainari yemutambo uyu. “Kare seAfrica taingotarisirwa pasi tichinzi hatina kwatinosvika asi nhabvu yashanduka zvikuru, hakusisina chinonzi chikwata chidiki nekuti zvidiki zvacho ndizvo zviri kutovava kunyanya.   “Ini ndichange ndichimhanya neNigeria uye ndiri kuitsigira zvakanyanya kuti ibate basa kumutambo uyu. Ndichange ndichigara ndakapfeka zveruvara rwegreen nekuti ndinofarira nhabvu yavo zvikuru.   “Kana kutsanya ndichaitsanyira Nigeria nekuti iri pamwoyo pangu,” anodaro Vahombe sezita remadunhurirwa raMasomere. Nigeria kana kuti maSuper Eagles ari muGroup D umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Argentina, Croatia neIceland.   Chikwata ichi chizere zvakare nevatambi vanotambira kuEurope vanosanganisira Alex Iwobi weArsenal, Victor Moses weChelsea, Kelechi Iheanacho weLeicester City, naAhmed Mussa weCSKA Moscow yekuRussia.   Gore radarika, chikwata ichi chakaumburudza Argentina 4-2 iyo yaichasangana nayo kumakwishu eWorld Cup. Mugore ra2014, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakasangana zvakare muboka rimwe chete kuWorld Cup Brazil apo Argentina yakazohwina 3-2. Partson Ndabambi, uyo aimbove maneja weZPC Kariba uye akarairidza zvikwata zvizhinji zvenhabvu, anoti   Nigeria izere nevatambi vane tarenda vechidiki saka ndiyo yaachange achitsigira kumutambo uyu. “Ini hangu ndichange ndichifamba neGermany ndiyo yangu asi muno muAfrica mari yangu iri paNigeria. Kubva kare, yagara ichienda kumutambo uyu saka gore rino ndinoiona ichiita zvinorova,” anodaro Ndabambi.   Zvakadai, zvimwe zvikwata zviri mumutambo uyu – kunyanya Egypt – ichange yakatariswa nevazhinji nekuda kwemutambi wayo Mohamed Salah weLiverpool uyo akatamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura mumwaka weEnglish Premier League wadarika. MaPharaohs, sezita remadunhurirwa reEgypt, ane vatambi vanotamba zvinodadisa vanosanganisira iye Salah asi hunge akapora bendekete rake iro akakuvara mufainari yeChampions League, Mohamed Elneny weArsenal naAhmed Hegazi weWest Bromwich Albion.   Egypt iri muGroup A umo ichasangana neRussia, Uruguay neSaudi Arabia. Zvimwe zvikwata zviri kumirira Africa, Tunisia iri muGroup G umo ichasangana neBelgium, England nePanama kozoti Morocco iri muGroup A umo ichasangana neIran, Portugal neSpain.   Morocco ine vatambi vakaita saAchraf Hakim weReal Madrid, Medhi Benatia weJuventus naYounes Belhanda weGalatasaray muchikwata chayo.

headline: Choto otaura nezveFIFA ‘ban’
text: Ndooka    SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu — Dickson Choto — anoti nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe neFIFA pamwe neCAF zvekuti isakwikwidze mumitambo mikuru inofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika sezvo yadzosera kumashure zvakanyanya budiriro yemutambo uyu, zvikuru remangwana revechidiki.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors mumakwikwi ekurwira kuenda kumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations 2023 uyo uchatambirwa kuIvory Coast, Choto anoti izvi zvinokanganisa kusimukira kwenhabvu sezvo shuviro yemutambi wese kutambira nyika yake.   Choto aive muchikwata chekutanga chemaWarriors chakakwikwidza kumutambo weAFCON mugore ra2004.   Anoti danho iri richaita kuti zvikwata zvemuno zvisawane mari iyo zvaisiwana kuburikidza nekutengesa vatambi kunze kwenyika sezvo zvimwe zvezvirango izvi zvichaona Zimbabwe ichitadza kudyidzana nezvikwata zvekunze.   “Remangwana renhabvu yedu, kunyanya vechidiki, rakanganiswa zvikuru nezvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF nekuti mutambi wese wenhabvu shuviro yake kuzotambira nyika yake. Manje apa nyika kana isisachatenderwe kutamba mumitambo mukuru yakadai zvadzosera zvinhu zvose kumashure.   “Zvirango izvi hazvina kutombomira zvakanaka nekuti zvikwata zvemuno hazvichakwanise kutengesa vatambi vazvo kunze kwenyika. Mari yekunze iyo vaifanirwa kuwana vatengesa vatambi haichauye izvo zvave kudzorera vatambi vedu venhabvu kumashure.   “Saka nyaya iyi tokumbira ngaigadziriswe nekuchimbidza, nhabvu yedu isimukire ienderere mberi,” anodaro Choto.   Anoti nerimwe divi, zvirango izvi zvinogona kutuma vatambi vari kunze kwenyika avo vaida kuzotambira maWarriors kuti vawore mwoyo nekuda kwekusarongeka kwenhabvu yemuZimbabwe.   “Danho iri rave kutidzingira vatambi venhabvu vakawanda vepamusoro, vamwe vakakurira kunze kwenyika. Hakuna mutambi angade kuuya kuzotamba paanoona kuti hapana kurongeka,” anodaro.   Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango neFIFA uye neCAF zvekuti isakwikwidze mumitambo mikuru zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nesangano rinoona nezvemitambo reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rekumisa basa bhodhi reZifa iro raitungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo vachipomerwa kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo.   Choto mumwe wevatambi venhabvu vakatambira kuEurope kwenguva refu izvo zvakamuona achitambira kunyika yePoland kwemakore anodarika 10 apo akatambira zvikwata zvakadai seGornick Zabrze, Pogon Szczecin neLegia Warsaw.   Anoti vatambi vemazuvaano vanofanirwa kuzvipira mubasa ravo voshanda nesimba zvakanyanya kana vachida kusvika padanho seraakasvika iye.   “Basa redu iri rinoda kuti munhu ashande nesimba azvipire uye agone kuzvibata. Ndizvo zvega zvinongodiwa kana uchida kubudirira.   “Ngakagara makore akawanda ndiri kuPoland kuburikidza nekushanda nesimba uye ndaiziva zvandaida muhupenyu.   Kurudziro yangu kune vechidiki ndeyekuti shandai nesimba muzive zvinangwa zvenyu muhupenyu, munosvika kure mumutambo uyu kana makazvipira chete,” anodaro Choto.   Kubva asendeka shangu dzake dzekutamba nhabvu, Choto ave kuita basa rekurairidza vechidiki kuchikwata chake cheDC Academy.

headline: Vatsigiri venhabvu vodya magaka mambishi
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vari kudya magaka mambishi zvichitevera kukundwa kwaitwa maWarriors neEthiopia mumutambo wechipiri wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar World Cup 2022.    MaWarriors akundwa 1-0 mumutambo uyo watambirwa kuEthiopia, uye iye zvino asarwa negomo guru rekukwira mukurwira tikiti rekuenda kuQatar gore rinotevera sezvo mitambo yechikwata ichi inotevera chichasangana neGhana.    Munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors – Zivanai Muwashu – ati murairidzi wemaWarriors Zdravko Logarusic ave kufanirwa kusiya basa nekuti hapana chaari kubatsira nacho chikwata chedu asi kuchidzorera kumashure.    “Tange tichifanirwa kuhwina mutambo wedu neEthiopia kuti tirambe tiine mukana wekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup.    “Loga apa atirwadzisa, ngaaende nekuti tamupa nguva refu asi chabuda hapana,” anodaro Muwashu.    Achitaurawo, mutsigiri mukuru wemaWarriors, Adomsi Mukwasi anoti tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup rinogona kunge raperera nekukundwa kwataitwa neEthiopia.    “Kukundwa kwataitwa manheru ano, zvinogona zvatidhakirwa ipapa. Tange tichifanira kuhwina mutambo uyu. Iye zvino tisu tabva taenda pasi muboka redu, tave negomo guru rekukwira kuti tikwanise kuenda kuQatar gore rinotevera,” anodaro Mukwasi.    Aimbove mutambi wenhabvu Musset Zengeni anoti maWarriors ange achifanirwa kutora zvibodzwa zvose pamutambo weEthiopia, kukundwa kwataitwa kwavasiya vane gomo guru rekukwira.    “Tange tichifanira kuhwina nhasi, apa tarasa mukana mukuru. Regai tione paGhana tinogona kuwana zvibodzwa zvingani,” anodaro Zengeni.    Vamwe vange vachitenderedza mashoko padandemutande vachiti Loga aremerwa saka zviri nani aende vamwe vachiti #Logaremerwa

headline: Mamwe Mapato Anopikisa Oshoropdzawo MDC Alliance neNyaya yeZvirango
text: Danho rakatorwa nechikwata chaipa humbowo hwemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzimbabwe kudare reSeneti remu America yekuti zvinhu zvirambe zvakamira sezvazviri panyaya dzezvirango zvinonzi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe yasimudza mutauro mukuru muvana veZimbabwe nevamwe vekunze vari kutevera zviri kuitika munyika. Vamwe vanhu vakawanda vari kundokodzera bato reMDC-T nekwavari kuti kukumbira kuti zvirango zvirambe zviripo. Vamwewo ndivo vari kuti chikwata cheMDC Alliance chakatumwa nemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai ichi chaive nekodzero yekuti chiudze America kuti kana zvinhu zvisina kushanduka muZimbabwe zvinhu zvirambe zvakamira sezvazviri. Izvi zvinotevera kupa humbowo kwaVaTendai Biti vakanga vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaDewa Mavhinga vanove gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, pamwe naPeter Godwin, anove mutori wenhau ari muno muAmerica asi ari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe. Kunyange hazvo munhu wese aine kodzero yekutaura pfungwa dzake, vamwe vari kuti zvakaitwa nevana veZimbabwe ava zvinhu zvavakanga vasingatarisire kuti zvingaitike. Vakawanda kusanganisira mapato anopikisa, vari kupomera mhosva vatatu ava yekukumbira kuti America isabvise zvirango, izvo zvinogarochemwa nazvo neZanu PF kuti ndizvo zvakonzeresa matambudziko ari munyika. Rimwe remapato ari kushoropodza danho rakatorwa nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance rekuenda kuAmerica kunomira pamberi pedare rekongiresi, ibato reNCA rinotungamirirwa naProfessor Lovemore Madhuku. Mutairiri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa vanoti sebato rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe haringatsigiri kushupika kwevana veZimbabwe kusvika pakukumbira zvirango, izvo vanoti zviri kuuraya vanhu. VaChivasa vanoti zvaifanirwa kuitwa nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance kutanga yatsvaga nhaurirano nehurumende yavepo, kwete kumhanyira kukwira ndege kuenda kuAmerica. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoramba mashoko ekuti bato ravo rakaenda kunokumbira kuti zvirango zvisabviswa, vachiti naivovo sebato havatodi kuti pakurudzirwe zvirango zvinozonetsa vana veZimbabwe. “Zvirango izvi zvinotambudza varombo nekuti vane mari dzavo vanonorapwa kunanaSingapore. MDC-T haife yakakokera muchetura unourayisa vana veZimabwe,” VaGutu vanodaro VaGutu vanoti vanotonetsekanawo pamusoro pezvirango izvi, vachiti bato ravo harina simba rekubvisa kana kuwedzeresa zvirango sezvo izvi zvichiitwa chete nekongiresi yeAmerica. Asi VaChivasa vanoti vana veZimbabwe havafanirwi kuvhotera vanhu vari kukumbira zvirango izvi, avo vanoti vatengesi. No media source currently available

headline: MaChevrons ofara
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chigere mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita cheBangladesh mumitambo yeTwenty20 International Series (T20) pamwe chete neyeOne Day International (ODI).   MaChevrons ange aine makore anodarika mapfumbamwe asati ambokunda Bangladesh mumitambo yeODI, izvo akazoita svondo radarika apo akahwina mitambo miviri yavakatamba ndokuhwina series iyi vaine mumwe mutambo usati watambwa.   Mumitambo mitatu yeT20 yakatambwa nezvikwata zviviri izvi, maChevrons akahwina miviri, Bangladesh ndokuhwina mumwe chete kuchiti yeODI yatambwa kusvika pari zvino, maChevrons ahwina miviri (wechitatu wakatambwa bepa rino richitodhindwa).   Pamitambo iyi, mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza ange achitamba seakasvikirwa izvo zvakamuona achitamba cricket inonwisa mvura ndokubatsira maChevrons kuhwina. Anotungamira maChevrons, Regis Chakabva anoti kuhwina kwavakaita kwakaunza mufaro mukuru kuchikwata chavo pamwe nevatsigiri sezvo nguva yange yareba vasati vambokunda Bangladesh.   Anoti kushandura kwavakaita matambiro chimwe chezvikonzero zvakabatsira kuti vahwine mutambo uyu. “Nguva yange yareba tichitatarika kukunda Bangladesh asi tadzoka, ndinoona kunge kushandura matambiro kwatakaita ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kuti tinge tiri patiri nhasi, tichitamba mhando yecricket yepamusoro.   “Asi nguva pfupi yadarika tange tichibata mhando yecricket yepamusoro, uye Sikandar Raza semitambo yadarika, ange achitamba cricket zvinonwisa mvura. “Tinovimba kuti tikaramba takadaro tinoenda mberi tichisimukira sechikwata,” akadaro Chakabva.   Vatsigiri vecricket vamwe vange vachiti kudzorwa kwakaita Dave Houghton kuzorairidza maChevrons ndiko kumwe kwakabatsira kushandura matambiro emaChevrons ayo ange achingohwina mitambo yose yaange achitamba kunze kwemumwe weT20i uyo vakakundwa neBangladesh asi vakazohwina mutambo wose sezvo pamitambo mitatu maChevrons akakunda pamiviri.

headline: Kupisa Kwekunze Kotarisirwa Kuenderera Mberi Kunzvimbo Dzakawanda Zvokanganisa Varimi
text: Bazi rezvemamiriro ekunze remeteorological Services Department rinoti kupisa kwekunze kuchaenderera mberi kunzvimbo dzakawanda kunyangwe dzimwe nzvimbo dzichawana mvura pano neapo. Bazi iri rinoti kutanga musi wa 10 mwedzi uno ndipo pari kutarisirwa kuti pachanaya mvura. Vanokokera mabasa muzimbabwe Farmers Union Amai Margaret Hoshiki vanoti kusanaya kwemvura kwave kupa kuti varimi vakawanda vaomerwe sezvo pasina tarisiro yekuti goho remwaka uno rinenge rakanaka. Vakurudzira varimi kuti vasarambe vachidyarurura Mbeu dzinonoka kuibva. "Tino kurudzira kuti varimi varime zvirimwa zvakadayi semamapfunde mapfupi anokurumbidza kuibva, ne mbesa dzinokurumidza kuibva kana kuti ma "small grain" sezvo mwaka usina kumira zvakanaka," Amai Hoshiki vaudza Studio 7. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Tinokurudzira kuti kana mvura yango tanga kunaya varimi ngava kande mbesa dzinokurumbidza kuibva kana chiri chibage ngava kande mbese chechibage chinonzi tsoko icho chinokurumbidza kuibva." No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Voenda kuMatare Vachipikisa Zec Yakati VaMnangagwa Vakakunda Musarudzo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzebumbiro remitemo yenyika dzinoti kana MDC Alliance ikakwidza nyaya yayo kumatare edzimhosva yekuti VaNelson Chamisa vakakunda mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, izvi zvinomisa kugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa. VaChamisa vanoti vari kuronga kuenda mutare kunopikisa zvakaburitswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, vachiti vane humbowo hunoratidza kuti vakakunda VaMnangagwa zvine mutsindo. Bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa vanenge vasina kufara nezvebuda musarudzo mazuva manomwe kubva panozviswa zvabuda musarudzo kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kumatare. Kana izvi zvisina kuitika zvinoreva kuti vanenge vakunda musarudzo vanogadzwa semutungamiriri wenyika mukati memazuva mapfumbamwe kubva pazuva raitwa sarudzo. Vari kuziva zviri kuitika zvakare vari gweta muMDC Alliance, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio 7 kuti MDC Alliance iri kuenda kumatare neMuvhuro kana Chipiri kuitira kuti inopikisa zvakaziviswa neZec. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzebumbiro remitemo yenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vachitaura senyanzvi yemitemo vanoti kuti MDC Alliance ibudirire panyaya iyi, inofanira kuburitsa humbowo hwemagwaro ekuzvivisa zvakubuda musarudzo panzvimbo yega yega yakavhotera vanhu munyika uye magwaro avo anofanira kufanana neeZec pamwe nevamwe vakapinda musarudzo idzi. VaMadhuku vanoti matare anosungirwa kupedza nyaya iyi mukati memasvondo maviri uye panguva iyi VaMnangagwa ndivo vanenge vari mutungamiriri wenyika. Vanoongorora zvematonerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaJoy Mabenge, vaudza Studio7 kuti sekunzwa kwavari kuita, MDC Alliance ine humbowo hwekuti sarudzo idzi dzakabiridzirwa, uye kana humbowoi uhwu hukatambirwa nematare bato iri rinogona kubudirira. Asi vanoti zvinogana kunetsa kana MDC Alliance ikatadza kuburitsa humbowo. Sachigaro veZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vakati VaMnangagwa vakawana 50.8 percent, ukuwo VaChamisa vachiwana 44.3 percent musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika yaikwikwidzwa nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu, kusanganisira VaMadhuku.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vosvika kuBotswana Kunonyorerana Zvibvumirano zveKudyidzana naVaMosisi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasvika kuBotswana kumusangano wekudyidzana unoitwa mukati memakore maviri nenyika iyi kana kuti Bi-National Commission. VaMnangagwa vaenda nemakurukota anosanganisira rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko amai monica mutsvangwa uye rezvehutano dr obadiah moyo. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana vati nhaurirano dzakatanga nemusi weChipiri uye mangwana VaMnangagwa nemumwe wavo VaMokgweetsi Masisi vachava zvapupu pakunyoreranwa kwezvibvumirano zvatenderanwa. Zvibvumirano zviri munyaya dzezvekutengeserana, dzidzo uye nyaya dzezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veChitungwiza Voenderera Mberi Vachiramwa Mabasa, Asi Kanzuru Ichiti Vari Kushanda
text: Vamwe vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vanosanganisira vanamukoti nevari muboka rezvehutano, vari kuramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro zvinovadzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus, kana kuti ma Personal Protective Equipment, uyewo mari dzekubatsirikana munguva ino yeCOVID-19. Vanamukoti mumakiriniki ekanzuru ose vanonzi vari kungogara zvavo pabasa vasingashande vachizongobatsira chete vanenge vaine pamuviri panoda rubatsiro rwechimbi-chimbi. Vamwe vari kuramwa mabasa vanonzi vashandi vekudivi remvura pamwe nevekudivi rinoona nezvekuraswa kwetsvina. Vachipindura mubvunzo wedu, vakafanobata chigaro chamabharani wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, Doctor Tonderai Kasu, vati mashoko avawana nhasi anoratidza kuti vanamukoti vari pamabasa avo uye vari kushanda semazuva ose. Doctor Kasu vatiwo vari kutowana chikumbiro kubva kuvashandi vari kushanda usiku chekuti vawaniswe chekufambisa. Asi vati mamiriro ezvinhu haasati anyatsogadzikana uye vachiri mushishi kugadzirisa zvichemo zvose zvakasimudzwa navamukoti. Asi sachigaro vesangano rinomirira vashandi reChitungwiza Municipality Workers’ Union, Reverend Ephraim Katsina, vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kukoshesa hutano hwevashandi vayo kuitira kuti ivo vapewo vagari hutano hwakakodzera, zvikuru munguva ino yeCOVID-19. Nekudaro, Reverend Katsina vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kuita musangano wechimbi-chimbi nevamiriri vevashandi kuitira kuti dambudziko iri rigadziriswe vashandi vadzokere mumabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Ofa neCovid-19 Hurumende Ichirwisa Kuti muZvikoro Musarambe Muine Dambudziko Iri
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weSvondo zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira hwave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemana kana kuti 4, 604. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri kana kuti 120 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye pavanhu ava zvikamu makumi matatu nemasere kubva muzana vana vechikoro kuManicaland kune gumi, Matabeleland North makumi matatu nemumwe uye vashanu kubva kuBulawayo. Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa denda reCovid-19 munyika Dr Agness Mahova vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushanda neStudio 7 kuona kuti chirwere ichi hachirambe chichipararira muzvikoro. Vati vakatenga zvekuvhenekesa chirwere ichi zvakakwana uye vari kufara kuti vari kukwanisa kuti chisapararire munharaunda kubva kuzvikoro. No media source currently available Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 129, 625. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe vakapora zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemaviri zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 122, 249. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 3 037, 013. Vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 2 197 331.

headline: Upenyu mberi, mitambo kumashure — Musekiwa
text: CHRIS “Romario” Musekiwa — mumwe wevatsigiri vakuru vemutambo wenhabvu muno — ari kukurudzira vatsigiri vemitambo yose zvayo kuti vatevedzere zvose zvinodiwa pakudzivirira nekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 achiti pachazotanga mitambo, vanotarisira kuzoonana vose pasina varasikirwa neupenyu.   Musekiwa (45) anonyanya kuzivikanwa nekutsigira chikwata cheDynamos nechenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors.   Anoti sevatsigiri venhabvu, vari kusimbisana panhare nepadandemutande pakutevedzera zvinodiwa kudzivirira Covid-19.   Musekiwa — uyo anova munyori nemurongi musangano reZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association — anoti kunyangwe vatsigiri vemitambo vagere kudzimba, vari kutevedza zviri kukurudzirwa kuti veruzhinji vaite nemutungamiri wenyika President Mnangagwa neHurumende senzira yekuchengetedza upenyu. Musekiwa, uyo anogara uChitungwiza, anotizve vari kupota vachikurukura sevatsigiri venhabvu apo vanosimbisana pamusoro petarisiro yekuti mitambo ichadzoka kana chirwere ichi chadzikama.   “Sevatsigiri venhabvu nemimwe mitambo, tinoti ngatitsungirirei tichitevedzera zvose zvatinonzi tiite kuti tikunde Covid-19.  Vanhu ngatigarei kudzimba tichigeza maoko edu nesipo nemvura yakachena uye inochururuka. Kana takwanisa, tozorawo maoko edu iwaya masanitiser.   “Isu sevatsigiri, tasuwa mutambo wedu wenhabvu asi tinoti chisingapere chinoshura, chirwere ichi chichadarika. Chakakosha pari zvino upenyu kuti tigotanga mitambo tichikuza vatambi vedu tose tiri vatano.   “Panhabvu ndipo pane upenyu hwedu — tinogara nayo mundangariro dzedu nemudzimba, saka ngatinamatei kuti chirwere ichi chipere, mitambo yemuno neyekunze igotanga.   “Asi zvekuvhakachirana bodo, vanhu garai kudzimba dzenyu tozoonana hondo iyi yapera,” anodaro Romario.   Anoti chirwere cheCovid-19 – icho chinokonzerwa nehutachiona hunodaidzwa kuti coronavirus – chiri chatekeshera pasi rose izvo anoyambira vatsigiri vemitambo yakasiyana kuti vashingirire kusvika zvinhu zvaita nani nechinangwa chekuchengetedza upenyu hwevanhu.   “Zvinorwadza kuguma torwarirwa kana kufirwa nevatsigiri vangava venhabvu kana mimwe mitambo nekuda kweCovid-19. Saka ngatigare mudzimba.   “Izvozvi vasikana vedu venetball vanoda kuzoenda kuEurope, saka nekudaro ngatitevedzei zvinodiwa tigokwanisa kuzotsigira chikwata chedu kana mitambo iyi                                                          yoitwa.”   Romario anoti anoshamiswa zvikuru nevamwe vanhu vari kuita mitambo yekuti vawane mari mumarukisheni achiti uku kuzvipinza mumatambudziko sezvo vanhu ivava vachikwanisa kuzodzokera kudzimba dzavo vava nechirwere.   “Zvose zviri kunzi titevedzere ndizvo zvinokurudzirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation (WHO), saka ngatitsungirirei. Tinoziva vamwe vari kutorota nhabvu nemimwe mitambo asi vari mudzimba dzavo,” anodaro Romario.

headline: GMAZ Yoronga Kuwedzera Mutengo hweHupfu
text: Sangano reGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti riri chiri rakangomirira kunzwa kubva kuhurumende kuti mutengo wehupfu hwowedzerwa kusvika papi. Izvi zvinotevera kuwedzerwa kwemutengo wetani rechibage kubva pazviuru zvina zvemadhora kusvika pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemasere. Mwedzi wapera, hupfu hwakawedzerwa kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu kusvika pamadhora manomwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakti mutengo wechibage wainge wawedzerwa kubatsira varimi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kana gurukota rezvemaIndustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi mutauriri weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaGarikai Chaunza. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inopasisa Bhiri reRBZ Kuti Hurumende Itore Zvikwereti Zvayo Zvose
text: Dare reNational Assembly rapasisa bhiri reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Debt Assumption iro rinopa hurumende mvumo yekutora zvikwereti zvese zvebhanga guru renyika. No media source currently available Banga iri rine zvikwereti zvinosvilka bhiriyoni nemazana matatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Bhiri iri rapasa mushure mekupopotedzana pakati penhengo dzebato reMovement for Democratic Change pamwe nhengo dzeZanu PF, MDC ichiti vose vane zvikwereti kuRBZ havafanirwe kuvhota. Zvichitevera kupopotedzana uku, dare razovhota uye nhengo dzeZanu PF zana negumi neshanu dzatsigira bhiri iri, nhengo makumi matatu nenomwe dze MDC dzapikisa bhiri iri. Vachitaura mushure mekuvhota uku, mumiriri weKuwadzana East, VaNelson Chamisa, vebato reMDC vati zvaitwa nedare zvakashata chose sezvo rabvumidza dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakapihwa zvinhu neRBZ kuti dzivhote. Asi gurukota rezvamari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, avo vakaunza bhiri iri kudare vati kugunununa kwaVaChamisa nebato ravo hakuna maturo ose. Mumiriri weBulawaro Central, Amai Dorcus Sibanda, vati vasuwa nezvaitika sezvo veruzhinji vave kuzobhadhara zvikwereti zvakatorwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF. RBZ yakaita chikwereti ichi mushure mekutengera nhengo dzedare dzeZanu PF nevamwe vatsigiri vebato iri matirakita, motokari nezvimwe. Amai Sibanda vanoti vanhu vemudunhu ravo vanoda kuti wese akapihwa zvinhu neRBZ abhadhare kana kudzora zvinhu zvacho kana asingakwanise kubhadhara. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekutora zvikwereti zveRBZ zvakashata chose uye zvichaita kuti chikwereti chayo chirambe chichikura. Vatiwo izvi zvinokanganisawo mukana wekuti hurumende iwane rubatsiro rwemari kubva kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano anobatsira. Dzimwe nhengo dzeMDC dziri kukurudzira kuti nhengo dzebato dziri mudare reparamende dzibude zvadzo sezvo pasina zvido zve MDC zvadziri kumirira. Asi vamwe vashoma vanoti vacharamba vari muparamende vachimirira zvido zvevanhu vakavavhotera. Bhiri iri rave kuenda kudare reSenate uko rinotarisirwa kupasa nyore nyore sezvo Zanu PF ine nhengo dzakawanda kudarika MDC mudare iri. Kana rabva ikoko rinobva ranosainwa nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti rive mutemo.

headline: VaMugabe Votemesa VaMnangagwa Musoro
text: Bepanhau reStandard nemusi weSvondo rakaburitsa mashoko ekuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakaudza vanhu vakauya pamhembererero yebhavhudhe ravo kumba kwavo kuBorrowdale kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vainge vavakumbira kuti vaite navo musangano. VaMugabe vanonziwo vakati mhuri yavo iri kushungurudzwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa. Vakatiwo vainge vakatorerwa vashandi nedzimotokari uye mudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe vari kugara vachichema. VaMugabe vanotiwo havana kubva nekuda asi vakashandisirwa mauto. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMugabe VaGeorge Charamba kana mutauriri webato reZanu-PF. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaEarnest Mudzengi vanoti VaMnangagwa havadi kuti VaMugabe vafukure hapwa nekuti zvinozopa kuti hutongi hwavo huiite sehwechiuto. No media source currently available

headline: Zvidzidzo zvesoftball zvoitwa
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Softball Association rakapihwa chiremerera chekuitisa zvidzidzo zvekuvandudza ruzivo rwevarairidzi, varidzi vepembe pamwe nevanochetedza zvibodzwa zvemutambo uyu neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation (WBSC).Zvidzidzo izvi zvichange zviri zveLevel One International izvo zvichavabatsira kuti vagokwanisa kuenda kunorairidza nekunoridza pembe kune dzimwe nyika uye zvichaitwa muna Kukadzi.   Varairidzi vanosvika 50 vemutambo uyu, varidzi vepembe 20 uye vanotora zvibodzwa 20 vari kutarisirwa kuzobatsirikana nezvidzidzo izvi.   Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Softball Association, Stonard Mapfumo, anoti sangano reWBSC richatumira nhengo ina idzo dzichauya kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi.   “Takatambira nemufaro mukuru danho iri, takarongerwa neWorld Baseball Softball Confederation kuti tiwedzere magwaro ebasa epamusoro kune varairidzi vesoftball, varidzi vepembe nevanonyora zvibodzwa vemuno.   “Izvi zvichatibatsira mune ramangwana apo tiri kurwisa chaizvo kuti mutambo uyu ukure uye usvike kure. Kuchauya nhengo ina muno dziri kutumirwa neWBSC kuzoitisa zvidzidzo izvi mwedzi unotevera,” anodaro Mapfumo.   Zvidzidzo izvi zvaifanirwa kunge zvichiitwa kutanga musi wa7 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa9 asi zvave kuitwa  musi wa23 Kukadzi zvichizopera musi wa26 sezvo nhengo idzi dzichatanga dzambotenderera kune dzimwe nyika dzichidzidzisako.   Mapfumo anoti zvidzidzo izvi zvauya panguva yakanaka apo sangano ravo riri kuita gadziriro dzechikwata chemadzimai chichanokwikwidza kumutambo weAfrica/Europe Olympic Qualifier uyo uchaitirwa kuPretoria, kuSouth Africa muna Chivabvu.   “Zvabva zvatinakira nekuti tange tiri kugadzirira chikwata chedu icho tinoda kuzotumira kuPretoria muna Chivabvu kunokwikwidza kumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuTokyo, kuJapan kumutambo we2020 Olympic Games.   “Saka varairidzi vedu vakadzidziswa vopihwa ruzivo rwepamusoro rwesoftball ndinoona tichisvika kure,” anodaro Mapfumo.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoparura Hwaro Huchashandiswa Mukurwisa Covid-19
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura hurongwa huchatevedzerwa nenyika pakurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus panguva iyo masangano evadzidzisi ari kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose zvivharwe. Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu kuState House uhwo huri kudaidzwa kuti National Covid-19 Preparedness and Response Plan, VaMnangagwa vati ibasa remunhu wese ari munyika kuti aone kuti paagere pakashambidzika kuitira kuti chirwere che Coronavirus chisarambe chichitapuriranwa kana chichinge chazopinda munyika. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vatiwo vari kufara kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe vachiti izvi hazvifanire kuita kuti Zimbabwe irare nezamu mukanwa. Mumiriri weWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, VaAlex Gasasira, vatiwo chirwere che Coronavirus chiri kupararira nekukasika zvekuti chavakutoda mushandira pamwe pakati pehurumende dzepasi rose pamwe neveruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vakati vanhu vanodarika zana vasaungane seimwe yenzira dzekudzikisa mukana wekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere ichi, mamwe masangano evarairidzi anoti zvikoro zvinofanira kuvharwawo. Muaturiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaNation Mudzitirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose munyika zvivharwe mangwana chaiye vachiti muzvikoro zvizhinji hamuna mvura zvinowedzera mikana yekuti chirwere che Coronavirus chitapuriranwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, avo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare vari kuBulawayo kuti vana vechikoro vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vanogona kunotapurira vamwe kudzimba chirwere ichi chopararira. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati zvikoro zvikasavharwa mangwana vachakurudzira nhengo dzesangano ravo kuti dzisaende kubasa kubva neMuvhuro. Mumwe mubereki ane vana vaviri vanodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri muHarare, Amai Blantina Mukwesha, vati vave kutyirawo hupenyu hwevana vavo izvo zviri kupa kuti vatsigire zviri kutaurwa nemasangano evarairidzi. Gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havataure neStudio7 vachiti havadi kubvunzwa zvinhu zvisina musoro. Asi VaMnangagwa vakaudza vatori venhau kuState House neChipiri svondo rino kuti zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo kwangosara mavhiki matatu chete kuti zvivharwe panopera kotoro yekutanga yegore rino. Sangano reWorld Health Organization rinoti Coronavirus yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere uye vanhu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ezviuru. No media source currently available

headline: Zim yakunda Singapore
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons nhasi chakunda Singapore ne111 runs mumutambo wacho wekutanga wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuICC Twenty20 International Series World Cup uyo watambirwa paQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   MaChevrons ndiwo ange atanga kutamba (bat) izvo zvamaona achiita 236 pachibuda vatambi vashanu kubva pa20 overs yazotadza kuteverwa neSingapore iyo yaita 125 pabuda vatambi vayo vanomwe.   Mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, ndiye ahwina mubairo weMan of Match zvichitevera maruns 87 aaita kubva pamabhora 40 aasangana nawo.   Mumutambo uyu, maChevrons ari kubandana nedzimwe nyika dzisere apo zvose zviri kurwira matikiti maviri ekuenda kuICC Twenty20 International Series World Cup kuAustralia munaGumiguru.   Mutambo uyu wakaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, President Mnangagwa, nezuro kuQueens Sports Club, kuBulawayo.   MaChevrons ari muboka reGroup A uye nemusi weChipiri achasangana neJersey ozopedzisira neUnited States of America musi weChina.   Mune rimwe boka, kune zvikwata zvinoti Netherlands, Hong Kong, Uganda nePapua New Guinea.   Mumapoka maviri aya, muchabuda zvikwata zviviri izvo zvichatamba musemi-final uye zvinenge zvahwina ndizvo zvichabva zvawana matikiti ekuenda kuAustralia.   Fainari yemutambo uyu ichazotambwa musi weSvondo.

headline: Mitambo yePremier Soccer League Yopinda Muvhiki reChinomwe Dynamos Ichinzi Isaite Mhirizhonga
text: Mhuri yenhabvu irikutarisira mitambo isina mhirizhonga apo makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ari kupinda musvondo rechinomwe. Mhuri yenhabvu munyika haisati yakanganwa mhirizhonga yakaitika svondo rapera apo vatsigiri veDynamos vakamuka chibhebhenenga mushure mekunge chikwata chavo chadamburwa 1-0 neFC Platinum vachitarisira kuti izvi hazvidzokororwe apo chikwata ichi chakananga kuBulawayo kunosangana neTsholotsho Pirates. Makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League arikupinda musvondo rechinomwe apo Dynamos yacho iripachinhanho chakaoma chegumi neshanu asi mumwe mutsigiri Dembare VaShepard Manatsa vanoti vamwe vavo vanofanira kubvuma kukundwa kana izvi zvaitika. Asi VaManatsa vanoti chishuwiro chavo nedechekuti vakunde Tsholotsho Pirates kuitira kuti varambe vari muhondo yekukwikwidza kutora mukombe uyu uyo vakatorerwa neChicken Inn gore rapera. Asi vanoongorora zvemutambo wenhabvu vanoti zvirikutarisirwa naVaManatsa angangove maroto sezvo chikwata chavo chiri kutatarika. Dynamos ikakundwa, inosaririra zvikuru pazvikwata zviri kutungamira sezvo FC Platinum iyo iripamusoro soro isiri kutemwa nemusoro nekuti irikusangana neBorder Strikers iyo isina kana poindi imwechete kana chibodzwa zvacho pamitambo mitanhatu yavatamba. Muteveri weFC Platinum VaTerrence Kuhuni vanoti varikufara zvikuru nematambiro arikuita chikwata chavo vachiti ivo vakatarisa zvimwe zvikwata varikuona kunge FC Platinumn iri pamberi mberi zvinotyisa. VaKuhuni vanoti havasi kumbotarisa zvemutambo weBorder Starikers vachiti ivo vakatokunda kare. Asi kugona kunenge Kudada haifanire kudherera Border Strikers sezvo zvikwata zvinenge zviri pakaoma kudai zvinowanzoita mashiripiti anenge asingatarisirwe neveruzhinji. FC Platinum ikakundwa inenge yapa mukana kuHighlanders iyo iripamusha neHarare City. Vemumusha weHarare City varikuzhamba sezvirikuitawo veDynamos zvekuti svondo rapera vaishevedzera kuti murairidzi wavo VaTaurayi Mangwiro vanofanira kusiiswa basa. Izvi zvakaramba kutambirwa nevanoisa mari kuchikwata ichi vekanzuru yeHarare, vatsigiri ava vave kushevedzera kuti chikwata chavo chinofanira kukunda. Mumwe wavo vari kuti Harare City inofanira kukunda ndiVaLawrence Chapata avo varikuchemera mapoinzi matatu. Chikwata chiri pachinhanho chechitatu cheCaps United chiri pamusha asi kwete muNational Sports Stadium. Chiri kunotambira kuRufaro Stadium sezvo nhandare yeNational Sports Stadium yakachengeterwa mutambo uripo pakati pemaYoung Warriors nemaUnder 20 eCameroon nesvondo. MaGreen Machine akadamburwa mumutambo wavo wesvondo rapera 2-1 neHow Mine asi murairidzi wavo VaLloyd Chitembwe vanoti mutambo uyo yatove mvura yakaerera. Mumwe mutambo uripo ne Svondo uri pakati peChapungu neNgezi Platinum Stars Mitambo yese ye muHarare iri kutambwa neMugovera kupa mukana kumutambo wemaYoung Warriors nemaCameroon Cups we2017 Africa Youth Championships. Asi mune mamwe maguta, neSvondo mitambo iri ko ndeiyi. Mutare City Rovers ne Chicken Inn (Sakubva), Hwange ne How Mine (Colliery) and Highlanders v Harare City (Barbourfields) Nhengo yeWarriors Fan Club VaTendai Dzuwa vanoti veruzhinji vanofanira kuenda kuNational Sports Stadium kunokuza maYoung Warriors kuti akunde mumutambo wakakosha uyu. Chikwata chichakunda mumitambo miviri chichasangana neicho chichakundawo pamutambo weLibya neBenin munzira yekuenda kuma 2017 Africa Under 20 Championships. Makwikwi emuAfrica aya achaitirwa muZambia munaKubvumbi gore rinouya. Totarisa mutambo wekiriketi Masemi fainari e 2016 Associate Provincial League ari kubaka moto kuMasvingo neBindura apo zvikwat zvina zvasara mumakwikwi aya zvirikubandana. Chikwata cheSouthern Rocks chirikusangana neWestern Tigers kuMasvindo panguva imwecheteyo Centrals irikuratidzana masimba nePower Turbines kuBindura. Zvikwata zvichakunda mumitambo iyi zvirikusangana mufainari musi wa 28 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: Imwe Nhengo yeKomisheni yeSarudzo muKenya Yopondwa Ukuwo VaOdinga Vachiramba Kutambira Zvakabuda Musarudzo
text: Vakakundwa musarudzo dzekuKenya VaRaila Odinga varamba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzakakundwa naVaWilliam Ruto. VaOdinga vaudza vatori venhau kuti havana kufara nekufambiswa kwakaitwa sarudzo nekomisheni yeIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission. Nhengo ina panomwe dzekomisheni iyi dzakti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Mapurisa emuKenya ati mumwe komishina VaDaniel Musyoka vakawanikwa vakapondwa mushure mekupambwa nemusi weChina. Sachigaro IEBC iyi VaWafuli Chebukati vati nhengo dzekomisheni yavo dziri kushiungurudzwa zvakanayanya. VaOdinga vane mazuva manomwe ekuti vaende kumatare kunopikisa zvakabuda musarudzo. Asi kunyangwe pachine mutauro pakufambiswa kwesarudzo, mutungamiri wenyikaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatotumira mashoko ekukorokotedza VaRuto nekukunda musarudzo. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vati bumbiro remutemo weKenya rinobvumidza VaOdinga kupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kukabatwa neCovid-19 Huri Kuramba Huchikwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kuramba vachibatwa neCovid-19 hwakakwirira zvichitevera kubatwa kwevamwe makumi matatu nevaviri, kana kuti 32, vaine chirwere ichi, pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 929 vakavhenekwa. Vese vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanhu vagara vari munyika vasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze. Aka ndekekutanga mukati memazuva anodarika masvondo maviri kuti huwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere ichi hudarike makumi matatu. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 7 951. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuCovid-19 kusvika nemusi weChina vakanga vave zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana mana ane makumi mana nevatanhatu, kana kuti 6 446, izvo zvakasaiyawo vanhu chiuru nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 276, vachiri kurwara. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 229, sezvo pasina munhu akashaya pazuva iri. Matunhu akawanikwa vanhu vane chirwere ichi anoti Bulawayo iine vapfumbamwe,Harare iine gumi, Mashonaland East iine vatanhatu neMashonaland West iine vanhu vanomwe. Dunhu reMashonaland Central ndiro chete dunhu rakanga risina kana munhu mumwechete airwara nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo dunhu reHarare riri iro rine vanhu vakawandisa vanosvika chiuru nezana nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 1 129 vari kurwara. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa paNottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti kukwira kwehuwanda hwevakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi kunoratidza kuti chirwere chichakadzika midzi munyika. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti hurumende inofarnirwa kusimbisa hurongwa hwekuvheneka vanhu mumatunhu ose, sezvo chirwere ichi chave kukwaisa kupararira kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo wairambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu. Vanotiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera mitemo inodzvirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, yakaita sekugeza maoko, kuvhara miromo nemhino, kusiya mikaha pakati pavo, uyewo kusabatana maoko pamwe nekuungana. Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nezvinomwe, kana kuuti 36,577 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nrzviuru makumi matanhatu nezviviri, kana kuti 1,062 000, vafa nacho. MuAmerica, umo mune vanhu vakawandisa pasi rose vabatwa neCovid-19, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe, kana 7, 609 000 vabatwa nacho, uye vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri negumi nezviviri, kana kuti 212 000, vafa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Haisi nguva yekufunga nhabvu, asi upenyu: PSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League (PSL) inoti ichamirira kuudzwa pamwe nekupihwa mvumo neSport and Recreation Commission (SRC) kuti nhabvu izotanga kutambwa zvekare zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa pamwe chete nemimwe mitambo apo mukombe weChibuku Super Cup wange uri pakati pekutambwa.   Nguva pfupi yadarika apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakatanga kukwira zvekare, SRC yakamisa mitambo yose kunze kweyezvikwata zvichamirira nyika zvinosanganisira maWarriors ayo ari kuSouth Africa uko ari mumitambo yeCosafa Cup kozoita chikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chiri kubandana necheBangladesh mumitambo yeTest match, one day international netwenty20 series. Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy “Kenny” Ndebele – anoti sePSL, vari kukoshesa mitemo yose yeHurumende yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye havasi kufunga nezvekudzoka kwenhabvu pari zvino sezvo chinhu chikuru chavari kukoshesa utano neupenyu hweveruzhinji.   “Utano neupenyu hweruzhinji ndizvo zvakakosha panguva ino, saka ngatimbomire zvekufunga kuti nhabvu inodzoka rinhi kana kuti tichatanga kuitamba rinhi apo vamwe vanhu vari kufa.   “SePSL tiri kutevedzera zvose zvatinenge taudzwa kuti tiite neSRC neHurumende nekuti denda iri riri kuuraya vanhu uye nguva ino yatiri haina kumira zvakanaka zvachose. Kana nguva yekuti nhabvu ichidzoka ikakwana ndine chivimbo kuti SRC ichatizivisa ipapo tobva tasimudzira mutambo weChibuku Super Cup uyo watakambosendeka parutivi kwazvino.   “Ino inguva yekuti tichengetedze upenyu hweveruzhinji,” anodaro Ndebele. Ndebele anoenderera mberi achiti kudzoka kwenhabvu yePSL kuri mumaoko eSRC saka naizvozvo ivo vachangotevedzera gwara ravanenge vaziviswa kuti vagofamba naro.   “Zvinhu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, isu hatikwanise kupikisa mitemo yeHurumende. Covid-19 iriko uye kana zvichinzi mitambo imbomira kuitira kuti vanhu vachengetedzeke, ndizvo zvatinotevedzera izvozvo.   “Saka gwara ratichapihwa maringe nekuzodzoka kwenhabvu zvose zviri mumaoko eSRC, ndiyo inotiudza zvekuti totevedzera saizvozvo,” anodaro. Apo zvimwe zvikwata zvange zvichiendesa vatambi vazvo kunobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, Kwayedza yakaedza kubvunza kuna Ndebele kuti vari kuona sei mafambiro ari kuita nyaya dzekubaiwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19 muzvikwata zvavo uye zvikwata zvose zvati zvaenda here, iye ndokupindura achiti, “Panguva ino hatisati tave kukwanisa kutaura nezvenyaya iyoyo, tichazokuzivisai pamberi apo kuti zvingani zvabaisa vatambi vazvo nhomba yeCovid-19.   “Asi semutemo wenyika wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, zvakakosha kuti munhu wese anobaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19.”

headline: Tinotambira kuhwinha: Ngezi
text: KUBVA gore ra2016 apo Ngezi Platinum Stars yakatanga kukwikwidza muCastle Premiership, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye mwaka uno chiri kurakidza kuti chinogona kuhwina mukombe wePremier Soccer League.   Mumitambo mipfumbamwe yatambwa nechikwata ichi – icho chiri kurairidzwa naTonderai Ndiraya –  kusvika parizvino chakwanisa kuhwina minomwe nekuita mangange miviri chete.   Asi mubvunzo mukuru uri pamiromo yevatsigiri venhabvu vazhinji ndewekuti Ngezi – iyo isati yakundwa mumitambo yayo yayatamba kusvika parizvino – ingakwanisa here kupedza mwaka wese isina kumbokundwa izvo zvisati zvamboitika munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuno.   Zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Zimbabwe Saints mugore ra1988 yakakwanisa kutamba mitambo 22 isina kumbokundwa kozoti ZPC Kariba muna 2014 apo yakapinda muPSL ichirairidzwa naSaul Chaminuka yakakwanisa kutamba mitambo 19 yekutanga isina kumbokundwa.   Chikwata ichi chaive nevatambi vanosanganisira 2014 Soccer Star of the year, Dennis Dauda.   Mukushi wemashoko weNgezi Platinum Stars – Calvin Mavunga – uyo anovezve performance analyst wechikwata ichi, anoti zvinonetsa kuti vapedze mwaka vasina kumbokundwa kunyangwe zvazvo pavanotamba vasingatarisire kukundwa.   “Nhabvu inotambwa nezvikwata zviviri zvese zvichida kuhwina saka zvinonetsa nekuti nhabvu inotenderera pamwe mangwana rinogona kunge risiri zuva renyu.   “Asi chandinoziva ndechekuti hapana chikwata chinotamba nhabvu chichiti chinoda kukundwa, zvese zvikwata zvinenge zvichitoda kuhwina uye isu tinenge tichida kuhwina mitambo yedu yese. Tinotambira kuhwina,” anodaro Mavunga.   Zvakadai, Kwayedza yakazoita hurukuro nevamwe vatsigiri venhabvu avo vanopa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pematambiro ari kuita Ngezi kusvika parizvino.   Muongorori wenhabvu Goodwill Zunidza anoti Ngezi inotofanira kukunya dzisimbe sezvo ichasangana nezvikwata zvikuru zvinoti Highlanders, CAPS UNITED, Dynamos neFC Platinum uye nguva yadarika yange ichingotamba nezvikwata zvidiki chete.   “Zvinonetsa nekuti rwendo rurefu urwu saka kana ichida kufunga nezvazvo ngaitokwidziridze masokisi ayo nekuti pane basa. Mutambo wayo wechipiri neBosso uchange wakabaka sezvakaita wekutanga uyo yakahwina 1-0 kuBaobab saka ndinoziva kuti Bosso ichada kutsividza kumusha kwayo.   “Uye tichaona iyo Ngezi paichasangana nezvimwe zvikwata zvikuru zvinosanganisira CAPS UNITED neFC Platinum kuti inobuda here. Kana ikapabuda ndipo tinoziva kuti inogona kuzviita zveshuwa,” anodaro Zunidza.   Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu, Tendayi Murambiza, anoti nematengero akaita Ngezi vatambi vatsva vepamusoro anoda kuona chikwata ichi chichinyora nhorowondo yekupedza mwaka chisina kumbokundwa.   “Chikwata ichi chiri kutamba nhabvu yepamusoro saka ini hangu ndiri kuchitsigira kuti chinyore nhorowondo. Ikaramba ichifamba negiya yairi kufamba naro hapana chinovatadzisa kupedza mwaka vasina kumbokundwa,” anodaro Murambiza.   Zvakadai, zvimwe zvikwata zvekuEurope zvinosanganisira Arsenal FC yakambopedza mwaka wese wa2003-2004 isina kumbokundwa payakatamba mitambo 49 ndokuhwina mukombe weEngland Premier League apo yakazodanwa zita rekuti “The Invincibles”.

headline: Vogadzirira kupanana zvematsenganzungu
text: VATAMBI vetsiva vane chitsama votarisirwa kubandana mumutambo wePound for pound Knockout Covid Boxing Series uchatambwa nemusi wa5 Chikumi kuHarare Showgrounds.   Mutambo uyu uri kurongwa neDeltaforce Boxing iyo inotungamirirwa naClyde Musonda uye uchaona vatambi 16 vachirwa mumitambo misere.   Mutambo mukuru pazuva iri uchange uri waFreeman Mabvongwe uyo acharwira bhande reZimbabwe Welteright naPeterson Machinjike.   Clyde Musonda, anove zvakare murairidzi wevatambi vetsiva vazhinji, anoti mutambo uyu uchabatsira zvakanyanya sezvo vatambi vange vave nenguva ndefu vasingakwikwidze zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munaKurume gora rapera senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti chishuvo chavo kuona vatambi vari kusimukira vachiwaniswa mikana yekukwikwidza nekugadzira mazita avo kuitira kuti vagonorwira mabhande akasiyana kunze kwenyika.   “Isu chishuwo chedu kuona vatambi vetsiva vachisimukira nekuwana mikana yekugadzira mazita avo. Nekuda kweCovid-19, mitambo yange yakamiswa uye vatambi hupenyu hwavo hwakakanganiswa zvikuru. Saka isu taronga mutambo weKnockout Covid, tinoda kuirwisa kuti ngaiende Covid-19 itisiye tiite mabasa edu atange tajaira hupenyu hwedu hudzokere pahwainge huri kare,” anodaro.   Mutambo wePound for pound knockout Covid boxing series ndewechipiri wetsiva kurongwa muno kubva mitambo payakapihwa mvumo yekunzi ichiitwa munyika.   “Tiri palockdown, taienda nevamwe vatambi kunze kunyika dzakaita seTanzania vachinokwikwidza ikoko, asi vange vari vashoma. Saka iye zvino vatambi vakawanda vave nemukana wekuzoenda kunorwira kunze kwenyika asi hunge vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mitambo yatinovarongera muno,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Hurumende Yomanikidza Vashandi Vayo Kubvisa Mari yeMisangano yaVaMugabe?
text: Sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, riri kutsoropodza hurumende iyo rinoti iri kumanikidza vashandi vayo kuti vabise mari yekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakwanise kuita musangano nevechikidi vebato ravo kuBindura neMugovera, 9 Gunyana. Sangano iri rinoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvisi pamutemo nekuti vanhu havafaniri kumanikidzwa kubvisa mari dzavo kana kuita zvematongerwo enyika kana vasingadi. VaMugabe vari kuenda mumatunhu ose enyika vachisangana nevechidiki vebato ravo. Mutsamba inonzi yakanyorerwa vashandi vehurumende musi wa 4 Gunyana nemumwe mukuru wekwamudzviti kuGuruve, vashandi vanonzi vakaudzwa kuti vabvise dhora rimwe chete pamunhu kuitira kuti Zanu-PF ikwanise kutenga zvokudya uye kutsvaka dzimotikari dzichatakura vanhu vachaenda kuBindura uko kuchaitirwa musangano naVaMugabe. Dr Takavafira Zhou, avo vanotungamira sangano rePTUZ, vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinokanganisa kodzero dzevanhu. Vakatizve vanhu veZanu-PF vanofanira kukumbira vanhu zvakanaka kune vanoda kubvisa, kwete kuita sekuti kana munhu akarega kubhadhara pane zvaachazoona. “Isu tirikuti izvi kutyora kodzero dzavanhu; kutyora kodzero dzevashandi; kumbunyikidza vanhu; kumanikidza vanhu kuti vaite zvavasingadi. Ndinofunga kuti misangano iyi haifaniri kunge ichiitwa nekumanikidza vanhu kuti vabhadhare mari pazvinhu zvavasingade,” VaZhou vakaudza Studio 7. Vapamhidzirawo vachiti, “Takanyora matsamba akawanda zvikuru kwazvo kuMinistry of Education, kune vanoita zvematongerwo enyika, uye kune avo vari mumapato anopikisa neanotonga nekumapurisa asi hationi zvichichinja nekuti tsamba dzinoramba dzichiuya kubva kunana DA nevamwe vemuMinistry of Education.” VaZhou vati chimwe chinonetsa ndechokuti vazhinji vari mubazi rinoona nezvedzidzo vakapiwa mabasa makuru kuri kutendwa kutsigira Zanu-PF kwavanoita saka havazorambidzi Zanu-PF kuita zvairi kuita pazvikoro. Vakapamidzirazve vachiti sangano ravo richaramba richidzidzisa vanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzavo uye kuti vashinge kubuda pachena kuti havasikuzobhadharira mari dzavo pazvinhu zvavasingade. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera muMigwagwa Voita Bhindauko reKutengesa Mireza yeNyika
text: Vamwe vatengesi vemumigwagwa vanoti vatora mukana wekushanduka kwehurumende kutengesa zvinhu zvakadai semireza yeZimbabwe nezvimwe zvipfeko zvine ruvara rwemureza wenyika, sezvo zviri kuvapa pundutso. Mumwe wevatengesi vemumigwagwa ava Amai Enet Mandimika vanoti bhizimusi remireza yeZimbabwe riri kufamba zvikuru uye kubva neMugovera apo pakaitwa kuratidzira muguta reHarare vanga vari kuita mari zvikuru. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo naAmai Esinath Dube avo vanoti vakatosiya zvekuhodha zvinhu zvakadai semadomasi, muriwo nezvimwewo kuti vatengese mireza. Mumwe mutengesi, VaArnold Chapungu vanoti shanduko iri kuitika munyika ndoyakavasunda kutengesa mireza yenyika, makepesi ane mireza yeZimbabwe pamwechete nemabhareta. Vatengesi vemumigwagwa ava vanotiwo vari kutarisira kuti mangwana apo pachange pachigadzwa mutungumariri wenyika mutsva VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachatengesawo zvakanyanya. Gore rapera hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kutengeswa kwemireza yenyika, zvichitevera kushandiswa kwakanga kwoitwa mureza nemamwe masangano anopikisa hurumende senzira yekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo. Chimwe chizvarwa chekuChina chakasungwa gore rapera cvhakamiswa pamberi pematare mushure mekunge chawanikwa chichitengesa mireza. Asi kubva pakatanga kuratidzira kwakamanikidza VaMugabe kusiya basa svondo rapera, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvairatidzira zvaishandisa mureza pasina munhu akasungwa. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yopika Kuti Ichatora Dunhu reMasvingo Urban muSarudzo
text: Nhengo dzebato reMDC Alliance dziri kuvimbisa kubvuta dunhu redhorobha reMasvingo, iro rakatorwa neZanu PF musarudzo dza2013, vachiti chigaro ichi ndechavo kubva pavakatanga musangano weMDC. Vachitaura ne Studio7, vari kumiririra MDC-Alliance musarudzo dzeparamende, VaJacob Nyokanhete, vanoti rwendo runo havasi kuzorega Zanu PF ichivatorera chigaro chavo. VaNyokanhete vanoti pasarudzo dzemwedzi uno ivo nevatsigiri vavo havasi kuvata vachifamba vachipinda mudzimba (door to door) umo vari kutsvaga rutsigiro muvanhu kuti vasatorerwerezve chigaro ichi. VaNyokanhete vanoti kubva musarudzo dzeparamende dza2000, 2005 uye dza2008 MDC yaingokunda Zanu PF mudhorobha reMasvingo asi zvinhu hazvina kufamba mushe musarudzo dza 2013 idzo dzakaona Zanu PF ichikunda. Mumwe wevatsigiri ve MDC-Alliance ange achifamba nevamwe mudzimba mumusha wekwa Majange nhasi, Muzvare Ruth Mapiye, anoti vari kutaura nevanovhota mudzimba vachivavimbisa kugadzirisa nyika nekudaro vanotora dhorobha nemakanzura awo ose gumi. VaVasivenyu Chimombe vari kumirira MDC-Alliance ku Ward 6 musarudzo dzemakanzura vanotiwo vanotarisira kukunda zvine mutsindo vachiti vari kushanda nenhengo yavo iri kukwikwidza musarudzo yeparamende kuti vakunde vose uye nemutungamiriri webato ravo VaNelson Chamisa. Asi vari kumirira Zanu PF muMasvingo Urban, VaBenard Taguma Mazarire vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti chigaro ichi hachichafi chakadzokera kuMDC-T vachiti vanochidzosa kubato ravo. VaMazarire vanoti vari kutsvagawo rutsigiro zvakasimba uye vachishandisawo nzira iri kuitwa neve MDC Alliance yekupinda mudzimba. Asi sachigaro wevechidiki muMDC-Alliance muMasvingo, VaPeacemaker Mapope vanoti Zanu PF yakatora chigaro muna 2013 nekubira nekudaro vechidiki rwendo runo vachachengetedza mavhoti evanhu kuti asabiwe kana kuvhota kwapera. Mubatanidzwa weMDC-Alliance unotiwo mutungamiriri wawo, VaChamisa vachakunda zvine mutsindo muMasvingo uye vanotarisira kuti vachagadzirisa hupenyu hwevanhu hwakange hwawondongwa neZanu PF. Kunyange kune vakwikwidzi makumi maviri nevatatu pasarudzo yemutungamirir wenyika, vazhinji vanoti makwikwi chaiwo ari pakati paVaChamisa nemutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa, Vanosaina Mutemo Mutsva weSarudzo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasaini bhiri reElectoral Amendment Act of 2018 kuti uve mutemo wenyika, izvo zvave kupa mukana wekuti nyika iite sarudzo pachishandiswa mutemo mutsva uyu. Izvi zvaziviswa mugwaro rehurumende reGovernment Gazette, iro raburitswa neChipiri, uye chiziviso ichi chinoti mutemo uyu wakatanga kushanda neMuvhuro. Vachiutaura mushure mekuburitswa kwechiziviso ichi, vanokokera nhengo dzebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC-T inotungamiririrwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaInnocent Gonese, vati havana kufara nekuti VaMnangagwa vasaina mutemo uyu usina zvizhinji zvaidiwa nevemapato anopikisa kuti zvigadziriswe kana kuwedzerwa. Vati semaonero avo nyika haigona kuve nesarudzo dzisina mutauro kana pasina kuwirirana pazvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sekudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot paper. MDC-T yaida kuti kudhindwa nekwema ballot paper kuitwe pachena vese vari kupinda musarudzo varipo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo mutemo mutsva uyu uchirambidza zvemhirizhonga, haupi matare mazino ekuranga vanenge vakonzera mhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara chose nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, vachiti vave kugadzirira sarudzo pasi pemutemo mutsva uyu. Panyaya yekunyunyuta kuri kuita vemapato anopikisa, VaMangwana vati mapato aya aifanira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvawo kuparamende uye mutungamiriri wenyika anoshanda nezveanenge apihwa neparamende. VaMnangagwa vanotarisirwa kudoma zuva richaitwa sarudzo nguva ipi zvayo, uye izvi zvinoteverawo kupera kwechirongwa chekuongororwa kwegwaro revavhoti neveruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: DeMbare ndokuti bhora: Jaure
text: MUTAMBI weDynamos FC nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors – Partson Jaure – anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza zvikuru sezvo mutambo uyu uriwo unounza raramo kuvatambi vazhinji. Jaure, uyo anove kaputeni weDeMbare, anoti hupenyu hwevatambi vakawanda hwange hwakatokanganiswa nekumbomiswa kwakaitwa nhabvu kubvira gore rapera nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti vatambi vaishushikana zvikuru nekungogara sezvo vange vasisina chekubata asi kudzoka kwemutambo uyu kwave kuvabatsira kuti hupenyu hwavo huchiendeka.   “Isu tinoraramiswa nenhabvu, ndicho chingwa chedu chatinodya mangwanani, masikati uye nemanheru. Saka kana nhabvu isipo tinofa nenzara. “Hupenyu hwange huchirwadza kungogara nekuti hapana mari yatange tichiwana, zvange zvichirema. Asi nhabvu zvayadzoka manje, hupenyu hwedu hwave kuchiendeka,” anodaro Jaure. Kudzoka kwenhabvu kuri kuona zvikwata zvemuPremier Soccer League (PSL) zvichikwikwidza mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup.   Jaure anoti mutambo uyu wakaoma zvikuru sezvo zvikwata zvose zviri kurwisana neDeMbare. Anoti DeMbare kubva kare chikwata chihombe zvokuti mitambo yacho inenge isiri nyore sezvo zvikwata zvose zvichitsvaga mbiri pavari.   “Kana uchitambira Dynamos unofanira kunge wakazvipira kuifira nekuti chikwata ichi chihombe uye chikwata chose chinosangana nesu chinenge chichitotsvaga mbiri patiri. Mutambi wese anotoda kunzi akunda Dynamos nekuti kuti DeMbare ndokuti bhora, saka isu totofanira kugara takagadzirira. “Mumitambo yeChibuku yatiri kutamba iye zvino haisi nyore nekuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinenge zvichida kuti tibude kuitira kuti zviwane mukana. Saka isu tiri kutofanira kushanda nesimba tivarakidze kuti tiri shasha panyaya dzenhabvu,” anodaro Jaure.   Jaure abva kure munyaya dzenhabvu izvo zvakambomuona achinotamba kuSouth Africa kuchikwata cheUniversity of Pretoria uye akambonotambira kuZambia zvekare kuchikwata cheBuildcon. MuZimbabwe, akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Ngezi Platinum Stars neManica Diamond ndokuzodzoka kumusha kuDeMbare uko akarerwa akaita mukurumbira.   Achitaura pamusoro pemafambiro aaita munhabvu anoti, “Zvinofadza kumbonotamba kune dzimwe nyika wodzidza zvinoitwa ikoko. Ndakadzidza zvakwanda mukufamba kwandakamboita, asi iye zvino ndadzoka zvandakadzidza kunze kwenyika ndiri kuzvishandisa kubatsira vechidiki vari kusimukira mumutambo uyu vazive kuti zvofambiswa sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuti mutambi abudirire mumutambo uyu.”   Zvakadaro, svondo rino DeMbare ichange iri pamusha apo ichasangana neHarare City mumutambo wechishanu weChibuku Super Cup.   DeMbare ndiyo iri kutungamira muboka rayo umo mune zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti CAPS United, ZPC Kariba neHerentals.

headline: Chinhoyi Yoita Mutauro Pamusoro peBVR
text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nenzvimbo yekunyoresa kuvhota iyo yakaiswa kunze kweguta. Vagari vakawanda vari kuenda kumahofisi eZimbabwe Election Commission, ZEC, ari pakati peguta vachida kunyoresa kuvhota uko vanosvikoudzwa kuti vaende kumahofisi avo ari kunze kweguta pedyo neTraining Center. Vagari ava vanoti kwakaiswa nzvimbo yekunyoresa kure neveruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaMark Munyoro, avo vanoita basa rekutenga nekutengesa, vanoti havasi kufara nenzvimbo yekunyoresa iyo vanoti iri kure nevanhu uye zvinotora nguva yakawanda kufamba kuenda kunonyoresa. VaMunyoro vanoti sevatengesi havafanirwe kunge vasiri pavanotengesere kwenguva yakareba. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Adeline Huchu avo vanoti ZEC inofanirwa kushandisa mahofisi ari pamudzviti mukati meguta Mumwe mugari, VaFarai Chikoore, vanoti mahofisi ari kunyoreswa kuvhota ari kure uye vanhu vakawanda havaazive. Asi mumwe mugari, VaTatenda Chitate, avo vakanyoresa kuvhota, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuziva mahofisi ose eZEC uye kuti anoshandeyi sezvo zvakakosha. VaChitate vanoti ibasa reZEC pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuzivisa vanhu nenhengo dzavo nezvenzvimbo dzekunonyoresa kuvhota kuti munhu wose anoda kunonyoresa, azive kwekuenda kunonyoresa. Kunyange mukuru weZEC muChinhoyi, VaGarnet Matyava, varamba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti havabvumirwe nemutemo webasa ravo, mumwe mushandi asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti mahofisi ari pakati peguta ndeedunhu rose, province, ayo ari kunze kweguta ndeedunhu duku. Sachigaro weZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vati matambudziko ari kuitika aya achagadziriswa nekupindana kwenguva. Kunyoresa kuvhota kwakatanga svondo rapera neChishanu nevanhu vashoma vakange vari nhengo dzinozivikanwa dzezvemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Pari zvino vanhu vashoma vari kuenda pazuva kunonyoresa kuti vazovhota gore rinouya. Kunyoresa kuvhota kunopera gore rinouya musiwa 15 Ndira uye sarudzo dzinotarisirwa kuitwa pakati pemazuva ekubva musiwa 24 Chikunguru kusvika musiwa 22 Nyamavhuvhu gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda muBulawayo Votambira neMufaro Zvaitwa VaMugabe neMauto
text: No media source currently available Vamwe vevanhu vataura neStudio 7 muBulawayo vanoti vanotambira kutora masimba ehurumende kwaitwa nemauto. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Muzvare Abegale Mupambi, vesangano re#This Constitution Our Constitution, vati sesangano ravo rinokurudzira kukosheswa kwebumbiro remutemo wenyika, uye vanotambira zvaitwa nevechiuto. Kunyange hazvo vati kubvuta masimba chinhu chakaipa, vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vemubato ravo vange vave kutonga nyikavachiita madiro aJojina.
