Retired Lieutenant Colonel Brian Mutoti vatiwo havawone pachiitika mhirizhonga kana kudeuka kweropa kuchaitika sezvo vati vanoona vechiuto vari vanhu vakarongeka vanoita basa ravo nemazvo. Mutungamiri weZapu, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vati vaiwona kutorwa kwemasimba nevechiuto chiri chaigona kuitika munyika, uye chichitsigirwa neveruzhinji. Murwi wehondo yerusununguko pasi pevarwi veZipra, VaMax Mkandla, vati vanotsigirawo zvaitwa nevechiuto. Mune imwewo nyaya, dare ramagistrate muBulawayo neChitatu rabvuma kuti VaMagura Charumbira vabhadhare mari yechibatiso pamhosva yavari kupomhera yekukurudzira kukonzerwa kwemhirizhonga pamwe nekutuka kana kuzvidza mukuru wenyika,

headline: ZCTU Yokurudzira Nhaurirano dzeMihoro Kuti Dziitwe Izvozvi
text: Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vari kukurudzira makambani ose kuti atange misangano nemasangano evashandi vachikurukura nyaya dzemihoro. Kurudziro yaVaMoyo inotevera kusawirirana pakati pehurumende, ZCTU nesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Emcoz, panyaya yekuti Tripartite Negotiating Forum itare mari inotambirwa nemushandi wepasi pasi kana kuti minimum wage. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu kwave kupa kuti ZCTU ide kuti paitwe nhaurirano dzechimbi chimbi dzekugadzirisa nyaya dzemari yemihoro. No media source currently available Asi mutungamiri weEmcoz, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti mitengo iri kukwira hongu asi zvinogona kusaramba zvakadaro nekupindana kwenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Bill Antonio atengwa kuBelgium
text: BILL Antonio ari kuramba achinyora nhoroondo mumutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Mutambi wechidiki weDynamos uyu atengwa nechikwata cheKV Mechelen chekuBelgium.   Antonio anotarisirwa kuenda kuchikwata chake chitsva kunosangana nevatambi vaachange achitamba navo kuchikwata chekuEurope ichi.   Ange achitarisirwa kuongororwa utano hwake asati anyorerana chibvumirano nechikwata ichi apo ave kutanga rwendo rwake rwutsva munhabvu aine makore 19 okuberekwa bedzi. Mutambi akadzidza paPrince Edward uyu akaonekana nechikwata chake cheDynamos ndokuudza vatori venhau kuti ari kutarisira kunodzidza zvakawanda kuBelgium.   Antonio akafarirwa neMechelen zvichitevera kutamba kwaakaita masvondo adarika apo aiongororwa. Paimbove nefungidziro yekuti mutambi uyu aigona kuzotengwa gore rinotevera munaNdira, izvo zvaigona kuzomutadzisa kuenda kuchikwata ichi izvozvi.   Asi Antonio ava kutarisirwa kunyora chibvumirano chake mukana wekutenga vatambi kuBelgium usati wavharwa. Audza vatori venhau kuti zvose zvauya kuburikidza nekushanda nesimba uye acharamba achishanda nemwoyo wake wose kuBelgium.   “Zvinhu zvose unofanirwa kutungamidza Mwari. Kuenda kuEurope ndichibva kuDynamos kuita kwaMari kubva pakutanga. Kunamata mazuva ose kunoita kuti zvinhu zviendeke,” akadaro Antonio.   “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichiwana kubva zuva rekutanga handirwukanganwe uye handimbokoshiwa mhuri yeDynamos. Zvaifadza kutamba ndakapfeka jezi ravo, zvinhu zvekuti mutambi wose anongoshuvira. “Iniwo nemakore angu kutambira Dynamos, zvinhu zvekuti handaimbofungira kuti zvichaitika kwandiri, asi unoona kuti naMwari zvose zvinoitika.   “Muupenyu mune zvitsauko zvakawanda, kuenda kwangu kuEurope kutanga kwechimwe chitsauko chitsva uye kuzadzikiswa kwezvishuviro zvemwoyo wangu.   “Ndinovimba kuti ndichabudirira. Mwari haambokurasise, unoziva. Kungoshanda nesimba nekuterera, zvose zvinoita chete.”   Antonio akatanga kutambira Dynamos gore radarika uye angotamba mitambo 28 ndokunwisa kasere achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka10.

headline: Nyanzvi yeZvehupfumi Inoti Haione Makambani eMunyika Achikwanisa Kugadzira zveKudzivirira COVID-19 Zvakakwana
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi inoti nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezveupfumi munyika, haioni makambani emunyika achikwanisa kugadzira zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa mukudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus. Zvinodiwa zvinosanganisira magorovhosi, zvekuvharisa miromo nekumeso (masks), zvekuzora zvinouraya hutachiwana (sanitizers) kanawo mbatya dzinodzivirira (protective suits) izvo zvinodiwa mukudzivirira kutapuriranwa pamwe nekuparadzirwa kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus. VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti makambani akwanda emunyika haasi kushanda zvakakwana, uye vanhu vakawanda vave kuzvishandira izvo zvavanoti zvinoderedza huwandu hwezvinhu zvingagadzirwe munyika nemakambani kana dambudziko rechirwere ichi rakazokura. Nyika dzakawanda dzine dambudziko rechirwere che COVID-19 kusanganisira America, dziri kuchema nekushaya zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi zvakakwana zvekuti mamwe makambani anobika doro muAmerica ave kutobatsirawo kuburukidza nekugadzira hand sanitizer. Nyika zhinji kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe, dziri kutowana rubatsiro kubva kunyika yeChina, iyo iri kutumira zvekushandisa izvi asi zvinonzi nevamwe zvinogona kuzononoka kusvika kwazvinenge zvichidiwa nekukasika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuti yakagadzirira zvakakwana kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Division One yakaoma’
text: MUTAMBI weSimba Stars FC, Hardlife ‘Nairobi’ Zvirekwi, anoti nhabvu inotambwa muDivisione One haina kumbopfava sezvo zvikwata zvose zvichitamba kunge zvichadambuka makumbo nechinangwa chekurwira kupinda muCastle Premiership.   Mushure mekunge atamba kwemakore muPSL, Zvirekwi, mwaka uno akatengwa neSimba Stars iyo iri kurwa semvumba muNorthern Region Division One sezvo iri kuda kupinda muPSL mwaka unotevera.   Mutambi uyu, uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira CAPS United nemaWarriors, anoti mitambo yemuDivision One yakaoma uye inonakidza.   “Division One yakaoma zvikuru ndiko kune bhora rese nekuti zvikwata zvose zvirimo zvine chinangwa chimwe chete – chekurwira kupinda muPSL. Saka hakuna chakanaka, kunenge kuchitomhanyiwa zvakasimba,” anodaro.   Anoti kuSimba Stars FC haasi kungotamba nhabvu chete, asi ari kupota achipakurira ruzivo rwaawana munhabvu kwemakore akawanda kune vatambi vechidiki.   “Kuchikwata chedu, ndini mumwe wevatambi vakuru saka ndiri kutora chikamu chikuru mukupa dzidziso kune vechidiki ndichivarakidzawo gwara rakanaka rekufamba naro. Kuti ndisvike pandave iye zvino, ndakabva kure uye ndakaona zvakawanda. Naizvozvo ndinofanirwa kupa vechidiki mazano kuti vafambire mberi mumutambo uyu vadarike patakasvikawo isu munhabvu,” anodaro.   Gore rino, Zvirekwi ari kusvitsa makore 35 okuberekwa ayo vamwe vanenge vave kutosendeka shangu dzavo dzekutambisa nhabvu.   Asi anoti achiri kuda kutamba nhabvu kwemamwe makore maviri kana matatu.   “Ndega ndichiri kuzvinzwa kuti ndinokwanisa kuramba ndichitamba nhabvu kwemamwe makore maviri kana matatu chaiwo. Handisati ndapera, asi makore andataura akasvika ndinenge ndave kutosiya zvekutamba nhabvu,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, svondo rino Simba Stars iri pamusha kuShamva apo ichasangana neHarare City Cubs musi weMugovera

headline: Gavhuna weRBZ VaMangudya Vanoti Kushandisa Rand Hakupedze Dambudziko reKushomeka kweMari
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari riri munyika haripedzwe nekushandisa mari yerand yekuSouth Africa seviri kutaurwa nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vakataura mashoko aya paUniversity of Zimbabwe muHarare musi weChitaru apo pange pari kuitwa musangano kana kuti symposium wenyanzvi dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vati Zimbabwe ichaenderera mberi ichishandisa mari dzakasiyana siyana nekuti kushandisa rand chete handiko kungagadzirisa dambudziko rakomba munyika rekushomeka kwemari. Doctor Mangudya vati mamwe ematanho anofanirwa kutorwa ekugadzirisa mamiriro ehupfumi haasi kuitwa. Vatiwo kuwondomoka kwemakambani ehurumende kan kuti maparastatals ndokumwe kuri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubve hwaenda kumawere. Gavhuna weRZ atiwo nyika inofanirwawo kugadzirisa zvematongerwo enyika kukwezva vane mari dzekunze. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi yataurawo pamusangano uyu VaNyasha Kaseke vati kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze vemakambani neveruzhinji vanofanirwa kunotengesera zvinhu kunze kwenyika. VaKaseke vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kutarisa kuti vogadzira sei zvinhu zvine mutengo wakaderera kuti vakwanise kuwana vatengi kunze kwenyika. Pamusangano uyu, nyanzvi dzezveupfumi dzakurudzirawo kuti kushandiswa kwemacards ekumabhanga pamwe nEcocash zviitwe kunzvimbo dzese munyika kusanganisira kumaruwa. VaMangudya vati kunyangwe zvazvo vanhu vanenge vachiti vane mari kumabhanga nyika haina mari iyi uri musvo izvo zviri kukonzera kuti kushaikwa kwemari kurambe kuchienderera mberi. Vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafarire kutenga nemacards ekubank nedzimwe nzira dzakadayi seecocash zvisingadi mari chaiyo vakati izvi zvinogona kurerutsa myaya yekushomeka kwemari. Vatiwo kupedza dambudziko rehuori pamwe nekugadzirisa dambudziko rekubudiswa kwemari yekunze zvisiri pamutemo zvinogona kubatsira zvakanyanya dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Vamwe vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisa CZI, ZNCC, veZimbabwe Stock Exchange. No media source currently available

headline: United Nation Population Fund Yokurudzira Zvirongwa Zvekubatsira VeChidiki Kuti Vasatapurirwe HIV
text: Bazi reUnited Nation Population Fund kana kuti UNFPA riri kukurudzira kuti mabasa ekuti vechidiki vasatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV asimbaradzwe kuitira kudzikisa huwandu hwevari kutapurirwa kana kuti prevalence rate huri pazvikamu gumi nezviga zvitanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 14,6%. Vachitaura mushure memusangano nemukuru wenational Aids Council Dr Tapuwa Magure, mukuru weUNFPA munyika Dr Ester Muia vakati kuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi, zvakakosha kuti vose vari mubasa iri vashande nevechidiki. VaMagure vakati hurumende yakazvipira kuzadzikisa kurudziro iyi. Mutauriri weNational Aids Council Amai Tadiwa Nyatanga-Pfupa vati sangano ravo rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekubatsira vechidiki. No media source currently available

headline: Emery oda vamwe vatambi
text: anovimba kuti Arsenal ichamutsigira muna Ndira uno nekumutengera vamwe vatambi, asi akaramba kutaura kuti Denis Suarez achange ari mumwe wacho here.Mutambi weBarcelona uyu ari kunzi ari kudiwa chaizvo nechikwata chekuEmirates ichi uko achasanganiswa zvakare naEmery uyo waakashanda naye kuSevilla.   Chikwata chake chichangobva kukunda Blackpool 3-0 mumutambo weFA Cup third-round.   Emery anoti,” Ndinofunga kuti chikwata chiri kushanda kutsvaga vatambi vanogona kutibatsira mumwedzi mina inotevera. Ndinofunga kuti nguva ino tinogona kubatsirika tikatsvaga mutambi wekumashure. Asi hazvisi nyore nekuti tina Konstantinos Mavropanos uyo ari kudzoka mushure mekumbokuvara. Tinodazve mutambi wekumberi, mumwe chete anokwanisa kutamba kumberi munzvimbo dzakasiyana.”   Paakabvunzwa kuti anoona Suarez achitamba sewinger, murairidzi wemaGunners uyu akawedzera kuti, “Ndipo paaitamba kwese, ndichimurairidza aitamba kurudyi kana kuruboshwe panzvimbo iyoyi.”

headline: Vaimbove Gurukota rezveKutakurwa kweZvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, Vanosungwa neZACC
text: Vaimbove gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, avo vave gurukota muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, vasungwa neZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori pavaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Sachigaro veZACC, Justice Loice Matanda-Moyo, vatenda kuti komisheni yavo yamboshevedza VaGumbo kuti vabvunzurudzwe uye kuti vape divi ravo panyaya dzavari kupomerwa idzi. "Vasungwa zvavo asi vachiri kutorwa ma warned and cautioned statement, vozoendwa navo ku court." Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti VaGumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori kukambani yendege yeAir Zimbabwe kuburikidza nekutengwa kwendege ina dzerudzi rweBoeing 777 kuMalaysia. Ndege idzi dzakatengwa munguva yehutongo hwevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti dzimwe mhosva dziri kupomerwa VaGumbo dzinosanganisira yekudzora pabasa mumwe aive mukuru wekambani yeCMED, kunyange hazvo akanga awanikwa aine mhosva nematare edzimhosva. Dzimwe mhosva dzinosanganisira yekushandisa imba yehama yavo kuyiita muzinda wemahofisi eAir Zimbabwe, pamwe nekusashandisa mari yehurumende zvasina kujeka. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti VaGumbo vanotarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare neChipiri. "Hativaisi mumaoko emapurisa Aiwa. Vanotori mumaoko eZACC, kusvika taenda kudare, tozonovaisa mumaoko ema prosecutor. Kana tichida kuti varare ku police station tinotsvaga police station yatinotaura nayo kuti vararewo vari ku police station iyoyo, asi vanenge vangori mumaoko eZACC," Justice Matanda-Moyo vanodaro. Gweta riri kumirira VaGumbo, VaSelby Hwacha vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vaGumbo Havana kusungwa kwete, asi kuti vangoenda kuZACC kunopa divi ravo panyaya yavari kupomerwa. VaHwacha, avo varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti vanosungwa nemutemo wekudzivirira vavanomirira, vati VaGumbo varegwa vachienda kumba kwavo, uye zvinozotevera Havana ruzivo nazvo. Justice Matanda-Moyo vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kusununguka kumhan'gara huwori hwavanoona kukomisheni yavo, asi vachakasungwa nenyaya yekuti hapasati pave nemutemo unochengetedza vafakazi pamwe nevanoruma nzeve ZACC, izvo vanoti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti vanhu vasununguke kubatsira komisheni inorwisana nehuwori iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuArda Vakabviswa kwaChiyadzwa Votora Dzimba dzeMarange Resources neChisimba
text: Mhuri dzinosvika makumi mashanu nenhatu dzakatamiswa kubva kwaChiadzwa mushure mekuwanikwa kwemangoda dzichiendeswa kunogariswa patsva kunzvimbo yeArda Transau kwaOdzi kumawirira kweguta reMutare nemusi weChina dzakarovera moyo kudombo ndokupinda mudzimba dzakavakwa nekambani yemangoda yeMarange Resources zvechisimba. Mhuri idzi dziri kunyunyuta nerekuti dzaneta kurindira guyo sembwa dzakatarisira kupihwa dzimba idzi kuti dzigare zvakanaka nemhuri dzavo. VaAntony Mwashita mumwe wevagari vakatora dzimba kuArda Transau vanoti nguva yareba pasina chirikufamba. “Zvakangoomawo ini sekuti ndiri baba vane mhuri yakura nevana vatatu, vasikana vaviri nemukomana mumwe uye vabva zera." Amai Euna Mwashita vanoti vamhanyirawo kundotora imba yavo nekuda kwekuti pavaigara vange votatsurana navanatete, hanzvadzi dzemurume wavo apo pange ponetsa kugara. Vanoti chimwe chavapa shungu iyi kunyeperwa kwavanoti vange vachiitwa kwatora makore akawandisa. ”Ini handingarambi ndichigara navanatete mu-one house, vakadzi vatatu vachibikira muimba imwe hazviiti, ndange ndiine imba ini, ndaona zvakakodzera kuti ndigare muimba iyi yakavakwa nemakambani aichera madiamonds akatitamisa kuuya kuno, imba idzi ndedzehurumende." VaPeter Munjoma vanoti havangasaririre segotsi. “Ndabata imba iyi nekuti haa nguva yacho yareba zvisati zvaitwa izvi, mhuri yangu yakura property yangu haichina pokugara nekuti dzimba dzacho dziri kungoparara pasina anogara, saka tati regai titore hedu dzimba dzacho apo takanzi sanai kuenda nevabereki tichakupai imba nepamberi apo.” VaReuben Kusena vanotsinhira mashoko aVaMunjoma maringe nekutora dzimba dziri kuArda Transau. “Chaita kuti titore danho irori rekupinda mudzimba idzi inhau yemakore atatora tisina kupihwa dzimba idzi anosvika six, saka tatoona kuti zvitori nane tipinde hedu nekuti dziri kuparara dziri kungotsva saka tati kubva takaputsirwa dzimba dzedu uku tauya kuno hatina kupihwa imba dzacho tatora dziripo.” Amai Mary Sunguro mumwe wemadzimai ari kuArda Transau vapindawo mudzimba kwaOdzi nhasi. “Tave nenguva tichingoovimbiswa pekugara pakanaka asi hapana chiri kubuda mazviri, muimba idzi mava kugara mbudzi, mombe, nehuku vamwe vave kutoitira mabasa akasarurama mudzimba idzodzo isu vanhhu tisina pekugara pacho" Mudzviti wedunhu reManicaland VaFungai Mbetsa vange vasiri kudavira nharembozha yavo apo Studio 7 yaedza kuvabata kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya. Gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland Muzvare Mandi Mandiitawepi Chimene vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata vakuru vekambani yeMarange Resources vakavakisa dzimba dzapambwa nhasi nevagari vekuArda Transau. No media source currently available

headline: Vakoti Vanoramba Kuti Vakatambira Mari Dziri Kupiwa neHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA, raramba mashoko ari kuti nhengo dzaro dzakatambira zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemari dzemihoro zvakaziviswa nehurumende svondo rino richiti harina kumbobvira raita musangano nehurumende wekuzeya nezvemari idzi. Mutungamiri weZINA, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti havana kumbobvira vagara pasi nehurumende vachipirwa nezvemari idzi kana kuzeya nezvadzo, uye havatozivi kuti zvikamu zviri kutaurwa nezvazvo zvinenge zviri zvikamu zvemihoro yavo yakasangana nemari dzekubatsirika here kana kuti kwete. VaDongo varambawo zvakare mashoko ekuti vakoti vakawanda vadzokera kumabasa, vachiti vagara vachienda kumabasa asi vachishanda mazuva maviri pasvondo avakawirirana nemushandirwi sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa mazuva ose. Vanoti vashandi vari kunzi vadzokera kumabasa kana kuti vari kuonekwa kumabasa kwavo vazhinji vacho vanogona kunge vakadzokera sezvo vakoti vari kutyisidzirwa. Vanoti vakatoenda kumatare vachipikisa nyaya yekumanikidzwa kudzokera kumabasa iyi uye ichapinda mudare neChishanu. Bepanhau reHerald razivisa kuti vakoti vagamuchira zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zviri kuwedzerwa kuvashandi vose vehurumende kutanga mwedzi uno, kunyange hazvo vari kuti hazvisvitsi mihoro yavo pavanotarisira chaipo. Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende anosanganisira evarairidzi akatobuda pachena kare achiramba zvikamu zvakaziviswa nehurumende izvi achiti zvishoma. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzokere pamadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica, iyo vaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaDongo vanoti mashoko ekuti vakatambira zvikamu izvi akanangana nekupesanisa vashandi vehurumende. Vanoti mari dzemihoro dzavanotambira chete imari dzinenge dzawiriranwa kumusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, kwete dzinotaurwa mumapepanhau. Vamiriri vevashandi vehurumende nevamiriri vehurumende vari kutarisirwa kusangana zvakare kumusangano weNational Joint neChishanu uye hurumende yatokoka vashandi kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reBill and Melinda Gates Rowanisa Vanhu Dzimba muHarare
text: Rimwe sangano rekuAmerica, reBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, irapedza chirongwa charo chekuvakira vanotambura dzimba muHarare apo ratambidza dzimba zviri pamutemo kumhuri mazana mana nemakumi masere mumusha weDzivaresekwa Extenstion muHarare. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru anoona bezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, Amai Melanie Walker, vati chirongwa ichi, icho chine mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora, chabudirira chose. Vati ishuviro yavo kuti kanzuro yeHarar,e ichashanda nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro,ichaenderera mberi ichivakira vanoshaya dzimba kuti vagare zvakanaka sezvo sangano ravo rapedza chirongwa charo. Meya veguta reHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vatenda sangano iri uye vati chirongwa ichi chakabudirira chose zvekuti kanzuru yavo yave kutoronga kushandisa chirongwa ichimukugadzirisa dambudziko revanhu vari kugara munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri muguta. Pasi pechirongwa cheBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, kanzuru yakapihwa mari yekugadzira migwagwa, kugadzira pombi dzemvura nesiweji uyewo vanhu vakazopihwa mari dzekuvaka dzimba dzine mipanda miviri miviri. Vazhinji vakawana rubatsiro nedzimba pasi pechirongwa ichi ndevaya vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara apo hurumende yaigadzirira kushanya muZimbabwe kwaMambokadzi wekuEnglanda, Queen Elizabeth, muna 1992 pamwe nevamwe vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo paOperation Murambatsvina muna 2005. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Grace Tagarisa, vanoti vanofara chose kuti vavewo nepekugara zvichitevera rubatsiro rwakabva kuBill and Melinda Gates Foundations. Vanoti kunze kwemba vakadzidziswa kuita mabasa ekuzvibatsira akaita sekusona. Mumwe wevanhu vakawana rubatsiro kubva kusangano iri, Ambuya Netty Mahachi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti vave nepekugara mushure mekutambura kwenguva yakareba. VaManyenyeni vati zvichitevera kufamba zvakanaka kwechirongwa ichi, kanzura ichabvisa mumhuri zana nemakumi maviri neimwe dziri kugara zviri kunze kwemutemo mumusha weGunhill vodzivakira dzimba kuMabvuku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kanzuru yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuti munhu wese awane pekugara muHarare zvisinei nekuti murombo here kana kuti kwete Vati kanzuro yavo ine chinangwa chekuvaka dzimba dzinodarika zana rezviuru kusvika mugore ra2018.

headline: Tsigirai Division 1: Mushonga
text: MUNYORI mukuru weZifa Northern Region Division One, Sweeney Mushonga, anoti makambani akawanda anofanirwa kutsigira nhabvu yeDivision One neTwo sezvo kuriko kunobikwa vatambi. Apo pavasisina mitambo yemikombe inoona zvikwata zvemuPremier League zvichitatsurana nezvemaDivision ari pasi, Mushonga anoti mitambo iyi inofanirwa kudzoswa sezvo ichibatsira kusimudzira nhabvu yemuno. “Mazuva ano zvikwata zviri mumaDivision pazvinowana mukana wekutamba nezvemuCastle Premiership panguva yepre-season chete, hapanazve pamwe pazvinosangana nazvo. “Izvi hazvina kunakira nhabvu yedu nekuti zvikwata zvedu zvinofanirwa kumbomhanyisana nezvemuCastle Premiership sezvatinomboona kune dzimwe nyika. “Zvakatonakira isu nhabvu yedu sezvo zvichibatsira kuti zvikwata zviwane mari uye kusimukira kwevatambi kuti vaonekwe nezvimwe zvikwata zvepamusoro,” anodaro Mushonga. Zvakadai, svondo rino kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa apo zvikwata zvepamusoro zvemuDivision One zvichange zvichitatsurana. Mushowani Stars – iyo iri kutungamira palog mumujaho wekurwira kupinda muPSL – iri kuenda kuMorris Depot uko ichasangana neZRP iyowo yakagara pechitatu palog. Cranborne Bullets, iyo iri kufemera mugotsi meMushowani Stars, ichasangana neHarare City Cubs musi weSvondo kunhandare yeRufaro.

headline: Madzimai emuZimbabwe Ari kuBotswana Anoti Haachangomirira VanaBaba Mukushavira Mhuri
text: Madzimai akawanda anobva kuZimbabwe ari muBotswana anoti ave kuzviitira mabasa emaoko vachiti kushandira vamwe vanhu kana makambani hakuna pundutso. Aya mazwi emamwe madzimai anobva kuZimbabwe anorarama nekugadzira musoro muguta reFrancistown muBotswana vari kushambadzira vari kudarika nenzira kuti vanogadzira musoro. Mumwe wemadzimai aya ndiMuzvare Nomalanga Sibanda, avo vanoti vakadzidzira kutauro mutauro unotaurwa munyika iyi weSetswana nekukurumidza, kuitira kuti vakwanise kutsvaga vanoda kurukwa musoro. Muzvare Sibanda, avo vanobva kuGokwe, vanoti kugadzira bvudzi kwavo kuri kuita kuti vakawanise kuchengeta vana vavo vakasara kuZimbabwe pamwe nemumwe mudiki wavagere naye kuBotswana kunyangwe hazvo vachigara vachiita hwakitsi nagonzo nemapurisa enyika iyi. Vabvakure havabvumidzwe kuita basa kana bhizinesi rekugadzira musoro muBotswana sezvo hurumende yenyika iyi ichiti ibasa rezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa hove, muriwo, shangu nehembe, Amai Florence Manzungu vanoti vakaona kuti kugarira maoko hakuna pundutso vachiti varume vanodawo kubatsirwa Amai Justina Ngwenya, avo vane makore makumi mana nerimwe chete uye vachirima muriwo kumapurazi eGlenn Valley ayo ari pedyo neguta reGaborone, vaudza Studio7 kuti kurima vari kurima asi dambudziko ndekwekutengesera. Amai Tendai Chimombe vakazvarirwa kuBuhera ndookukurira kuMvuma vanoita basa rekusona muguta reFrancistown. Vanoti kushaikwa kwemagwaro akakwana kunoita kuti vasabhadharwe mari inogutsa kwavanoshanda. Kuitira kuti vakwanise kuraramisa mhuri yavo, Amai Chimombe vanotengesawo matemba nedovi zvavanohodha muno senzira yekuwedzera mari yavanowana kubasa. Asi Amai Pauline Marembo vanoti kutsvaga mafuro manyoro uku kwakavaparira sezvo vakabva vaparadzana nemurume ainge asara kumusha. Nzara iri kunzi yapfunya chisero munyika ndiyo iri kutizwa nevanhu vazhinji vachiyenda kunyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe dzinosanganisira Botswana, South Africa, Mozambique, Namibia, Zambia nedzimwewo. No media source currently available

headline: AFCON: ‘Tichine mukana’
text: AIMBOVE murairidzi wemaWarriors – Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas – okurudzira chikwata chenyika ichi kuti chisawore mwoyo asi kuti chigobata basa sebasa nemusi weChishanu apo chichasangana neMalawi mumutambo wechipiri muboka racho reGroup B.   MaWarriors ari kuCameroon uko ari kukwikwidza kumutambo we2021 Total Energy Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).   Mumutambo wekutanga, maWarriors akakundwa 1-0 neSenegal izvo zvakarwadza vatsigiri vose venhabvu sezvo akakundirwa mumiti rekupedzisira apo maLions of Teranga akazopihwa pena iyo akanwisa mutambo ukazopera uri 1-0.   Mumutambo wese uyu, maWarriors aitamba zvinonwisa mvura izvo zvakaona mubati wepagedhi – Petros Mhari – achirwa semvumba achishungurudza vatambi veSenegal vanosanganisira Sadio Mane avo vakatadza kuzunza mambure kusvikira vazoita zvekupihwa pena.   Mafero anoti matambiro akaita chikwata chaNorman Mapeza chemaWarriors nemusi weMugovera anodasisa saka vanofanirwa kuramba vaine matambiro mamwe chete musi weChishanu apo vachasangana neMalawi.   “MaWarriors akadadisa kunyangwe hazvo takazobvutirwa mutambo uyu pekupedzisira, asi takange takaibata Senegal mutambo wese uye chikwata chenyika ichi chaitamba zvinonwisa mvura.   “Ngatichitarire zviri mberi musi weChishanu apo tiri kusangana neThe Flames of Malawi. Tiri kufanira kuhwina mutambo uyu neunozotevera weGuinea kuti tifambire mberi mumutambo weAFCON. Mitambo miviri yasara iyi yakatikoshera saka tinofanirwa kuihwina,” anodaro.   MaWarriors achatamba neThe Flames musi weChishanu nenguva dza6 manheru uye achazobandana neGuinea neChipiri svondo rinotevera.   Musi weChishanu uyu, zvimwe zvikwata zviri kuboka reGroup B izvo zvatotungamira – Senegal neGuinea sezvo zvave nezvibodzwa zvitatu – ndizvo zvichavhurisa mutambo apo zvichatamba na3 masikati. Izvi zvinoreva kuti uyu mutambo wekuti maWarriors achange achiongorora kuti uchafamba sei sezvo vazhinji vave kutarisira kuti Senegal ikunde Guinea apo chikwata chenyika ichi chozokundawo Malawi neGuniea mumitambo miviri yasara.   Mafero anoti anoshuvira kuti kudai Senegal yakunda Guinea.   “Tingade hedu kutarisa kune zvimwe zvikwata kuti zviri kutamba sei, asi chikuru ndechekuti isu mitambo yedu miviri yasara ngatiihwine zvine mutsindo tigobudirira kuenda kuround of 16 uko tisati tamboenda kubva zvatakatanga kukwikwidza kuAFCON,” anodaro Mafero.   MaWarriors paakatanga kurwira kuenda kumutambo weAFCON, aitungamirwa naMafero uyo akarairidza mitambo miviri yekutanga iyo yakaona achiita mangange – 0-0 neBotswana mutambo wekutanga uyo wakatambirwa muno kozoti wechipiri maWarriors akahwina 2-1 kuZambia.

headline: FC Platinum neTraingle Dzosimudza Mureza weZimbabwe muAfrica
text: Chikwata cheTriangle chakashura mare nezuro mumakwikwi eCAF Confederation Cup mushure mekudambura chikwata cheRukinzo chekuBurundi. Asi chikwata cheFC Platinum chakaita mangange mumakwikwi eCaf Champions league neChikwata cheNyasa Big Bullets. Chikwata cheTriangle nezuro chakarova Rukinzo yekuBurundi 5 kwa 0 izvo zvapa chikwata ichi mukana wekuenderera mberi mumakwikwi aya. Mutambo wechipiri uri kutambirwa kuBurundi svondo rino. Mune mumwe mutambo neMugovera, chikwata cheFC Platinum chakaita manganga 0-0 nechikwata chinorairidzwa naCallisto Pasuwa uyu aimborairidza chikwa cheDynamos. Mutambo wechipiri uchatambirwa kuBarbourfields mavhiki maviri anotevera. Castle Premier Soccer League Iko zvino tombotarisa mitambo yeCastle Premier League yakatambwa mukupera kwesvondo. Chikwata cheChicken Inn neBlack Rhinos zvatambisa mukana mukuru wavanga vawana wekuenda panhongonya yeCastle Premier Soccer League mushure mekurohwa mumitambo yazvo, ndokuramba zviine mapoinzi maviri pasi peFC Platinum iyo irikutungamira. Black Rhinos yakarohwa 1-0 neHighlanders musi mumwechete Chicken Inn yakadamburwa 2-1 neZPC Kariba. FC Platinum iyo yaive isina mutambo muZimbabwe irikutamba mutambo wayo wePSL neChitatu apo irikusangana neHarare City. Nechitatu zvekare, Triangle ichatamba ne Ngezi Platinum Stars. Murwendo rwavo rwekuMalawi, mumutambo weCAF Champions League Pure Platinum Boys yakanoita mangange 0-0 ne Nyasa Bullets. Asi Makepekepe eCaps United ari murufaro mushure mekushanya kwaRusape ndokunorova Manica Diamonds 1-0. Izvi zvasiya maGreen Machine afamba nzendo refu ndokuenda pachinhanho chechipiri nemaponzi makumi maviri nerimwechete, poindi imwechete pasi peFC Platinum. Mumwe mutsigiri weCaps United Muzvare Leslie Marufu varikufara zvikuru nezvakaitwa nechikwata chavo vachiti ivo Kepekepe ndizvo. Mumusha weDembare mune rufaro mushure mekunge chikwata ichi charova Mushowani Stars 2-0 nezuro ndokuenda pamapoinzi makumi maviri nemanomwe. Murairidzi wavo Tonderai Ndiraya arikuti chiwata chake chakabatana zvekuti arikutarisira mashiripiti mumitambo inotevera.  Mimwe mitambo yaiveko yakapera seizvi…  Yadah 0 v Hwange 0 TelOne 1 v Herentals. 1  Kwatambwa mitambo gumi nemisre, zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro soro ndeizvi..  FC Platinum 32 points Caps United 31 points Chicken Inn 30 points Black Rhinos 30 points. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reChirwere cheRurindi Pasi Rose
text: Zimbabwe yabatana nedzimwe nyika dzepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rechirwere cherurindi, kana kuti World TB Day, pahurongwa hwaitirwa kuDzivaresekwa muHarare. Vachitaura pahurongwa hweWorld TB Day, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kubatana mukurwisa chirwere cherurindi icho chanetsa munyika. VaParirenyatwa vati nzvimbo dzakaita seMatabeleland North, Matabeland South neguta reBulawayo ndidzo dzinonyanya kuwirwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi. Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chakanyanya mumatunhu aya nokuti ari kumiganhu neSouth Africa, iyo ine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi. Vati Zimbabwe iri kurwisa zvakasimba chirwere ichi kuburikidza nekurapa vanhu pasina mubhadharo. Asi Dr Parirenyatwa vatiwo chirwere ichi chava kuramba kudaira mushonga, zvikuru kuvanhu vasingapedzi kunwa mishonga yavanenge vapihwa apo vanenge vachirapwa chirwere ichi. Dr Wilbert Bara, avo vanoshanda mubazi rehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, vatiwo chirwere cherurinda chinonyanya kubata varume kudarika vakadzi. Vatiwo chirwere ichi chakawanda munzvimbo dzakaita seGlenview, Budiriro, Hopley, Caledonia, Mbare nenzvimbo dziri kuHarare South. Dr Bara vati makiriniki ekanzuru yeHarare ava kushandisa mishina mitsva inokurumidza kubata chirwere cherurindi. Sangano reunited Nations rinoti vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu vanofa pazuva rega rega nechirwere cherurindi pasi rose. Dingindira rezuva iri gore rino rinoti “Wanted: Leaders for a TB-Free World." No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voungana kuMusangano weBuilding For The Future Conference Mudunhu reKansas
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zviri kuungana neChishanu kusvika neSvondo, Chikunguru 01, 2018, apo zvichange zvichipana mazano mumabasa ekusimudzira hupenyu nenharaunda dzavari pari zvino pamwe nekwavakabva. Vanhu ava vari kusangano pasi pesangano rinonzi Building for the Future 2018. Mumwe wevakatanga musangano uyu makore mashanu apfuura, Reverend Jacob Tozoona Maforo, avo vanogara kuKansas muno muAmerica, vanoti vari kufara nekukura nekubudiira kuri kuita sangano ravo gore negore. Kuburikidza nesangano iri vanhu vari kuwana mukana wekupana mazano panyaya dzehupenyu, kuzeya zvimhingamipinyi zvavanosangana nazvo, pamwe nekuyechidzana zvakakoshera kutarisa shure kwavakabva vachibatsirawo vamwe vanodawo kusimudzira hupenyu hwavo. Mufundisi Maforo, avo vanopinda kereke yeUnited Methodist, vanotiwo kumusangano wavo uyu vanokoka vanhu vemakereke ose echiKristu, hausaruri, naizvozvo vanhu vanofanirwa kuuya vakasununguka nekuti vamwe vanogona kutyira kuti zvimwe ndewezvematongerwo enyika. Mufundisi Maforo vanoti havaneyi nekuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika, sezvo chinangwa chiri chekushumira pamwe sevana veZimbabwe. "Kune vasati vanzwa nemusangano uyu tinoti huyai kumusangano weBuilding for the future Conference. Pane vamwe vangava nepfngwa dzekuti zvimwe tinenge tichiita zvematongerwo enyika, kwete, yedu program, ndeyevanhu vane chishuvo chekuti zvavari kuita zvinobatika, zvikurukurwe pamusoro pezvazvo." No media source currently available

headline: Munyori Mukuru weUnited Nations Okurudzira Kupera kweHondo muUkraine
text: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy muguta guru renyika iyi reKyiv vakati kurwiswa kwenyika iyi neRussia kuri kupa kuti vanhuwo zvavo varasikirwe nehupenyu. VaGuterres vashanyira nzvimbo dzakaita seBorodianka, Irpin neBucha uko kwakawanikwa mitumba yevanhu vakaurayiwa pakabuda mauto eRussia munzvimbo idzi. Izvi zvakapa kuti vakawanda vati idzi dzitorwe semhosva dzehondo dzinofanira kuongororwa. VaGuterres vakurudzira Russia kuti ishande neInternational Criminal Court mukuongorororwa kwenyaya iyi. Vatiwo vari kuda kuti vanhu vemuUkraine vapihwe chikafu zvinova zvavati vakataurawo nemutungamiri wenyika yeRussia VaVladimir Putin. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vanotiwo vaendesa kuCongress chikumbiro chekuti vakwanise kutumira zvimwe zvombo nerubatsiro kuUkraine. Vanoongogora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti hondo iyi iri kukukonzera matambudziko makukutu kunyika dzakaita seZimbabwe dzi sezvo kunyika iyi kuchitengwa gorosi, chibage nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: ‘NHABVU INODA PAINE VATSIGIRI’
text: MUTAMBI wechikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors necheYeni Malatyaspor chekuTurkey, Teenage Hadebe, anoti nhabvu hainakidze kutamba munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mwaka wenhabvu weTurkish Super Lig – uko Hadebe ari kutambira – unotarisirwa kudzoka mumasvondo ari kutevera.   Mitambo mizhinji pasi rose yambenge yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chaurauya vanhu vakawandisa. Asi kutanga masvondo achangodarika, kune dzimwe nyika nhabvu yava kuita ichidzoka asi ichitambwa munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Muhurukuro dzange dzichiitwa kuTurkey, pane fungidziro huru yekuti mitambo yenhabvu yeko inogona kusimudzira musi wa12 Chikumi.   Achitaura neKwayedza ari kuTurkey, Hadebe anoti ari kufara kuti nhabvu yave kudzoka asi anoti zvikwata zvinofanirwa kugadzirisa pavanotambira kuti pange pakachena uye pakachengetedzeka panyaya dzeutano.   “Kunyangwe hangu ndiri kufara kuti tave kudzoka kuzotamba nhabvu zvekare, asi zvandaona nekudzidza zvange zvichityisa. Vanhu vari kufa kunze uko, saka tinofanirwa kunge takachengetedzeka uye takangwarira tichitevedzawo mutemo nekurudziro dzeveutano.   “Ndanga ndasuwa nhabvu yangu nekuti ndiyo inondichengeta, saka ndiri kutarisira kutamba zvakanaka zvekare,” anodaro.   Kunyangwe zvazvo achiti ari kutarisira kudzoka kwenhabvu, Hadebe anoti zvichamuremera kutamba munhandare dzisina vatsigiri sezvo iye ange ajaira kutamba pamberi pechaunga chevanhu.   “Tajaira kutamba nhandare dzakazara nevatsigiri vachitikuza. Zvino izvi zvitsva kwandiri, saka zvichandiremera nekuti vatsigiri vanotipa manyuku-nyuku ekutamba zvakanaka.   “Asi totongojaira zviripo nekuti pakupera kwezuva tinofanirwa kubata basa, uye tiine utano,” anodaro muchinda anoti kana achitamba kumashure kwechikwata chemaWarriors uyu anoita zvekusunga chishwe chaicho.   Svondo richangodarika nhabvu yakatanga kutambwa kunyika yeGermany asi munhandare dzisina vatsigiri.   Mimwe yemitemo yakaiswa mitsva ndeyekuti vatambi venhabvu havachatenderwa kukwazisana nemaoko uye kana vakanwisa, pakupembera havabvumidzwe kumbundirana.

headline: Amai Makarau Vanoramwa Kupinda Musangano Vachiti Vaneta neKunyombwa
text: Musangano wange wakarongwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika watadza kuitwa muHarare neChipiri mushure mekunge sachigaro weZEC, Justice Rita Makarau, vabuda mumusangano uyu vachiti vaneta nekubatwa neseri kweruwoko nemapato aya. Amai Makarau, avo vange vakatsamwa zvikuru, vaudza vamiriri vemapato aya, kuti semaonero avo, misangano yavanoita nemapato aya haisi kushanda nekuti nekudaro vachagara pasi seZEC voona kuti voita sei. Vati mapato aya anovashoropodza nekutaura zvisina kunaka pamusoro pavo mumapenhau nyaya dzinofanira kutaurwa mumusangano wakaita sewange uchifanira kuitwa neChipiri. Amai Makarau vapawo mapato muenzaniso wenyaya dzakabuda mumapenhau eThe Daily News pamwe NewsDay uye vati havasi kuzobvuma kuramba vachibatwa neseri kurowoko nemapato aya. Vatiwo musangano wanhasi wange usinei nekuda kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa mangwana nemamwe mapato ange auya kumusangano uyu. Amai Makarua vabva vaudza dzimwe nhengo dzeZEC nevashandi vekomisheni iyi kuti vabude muimba mange muchifanira kuitirwa musangano uyu ndokuenda kuhofisi kwavo vachisiya vamiriri vemapato aya vari vega. Asi izvi hazvina kufadza vamiriri vemapato ange auya kumusangano. Vamwe vamiriri vemapato aya vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naAmai Makarau kuvashora zvakanyanya uye vanofanira kuziva kuti vanobhadharwa nemari yemitero inobhadharwa neveruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi mushure mechinguvana, mapato aya azobvumirana kutuma nhume dzawo kunoita musangano naAmai Makarau muhofisi mavo. Vachitaura apo vapedza musangano naAmai Makarau, munyori mukuru weMDC – T, zvakare vari mutauriri wekomiti yemapato ezvematongerwo enyika panhaurirano neZEC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati vaudza Amai Makarau kuti vakapedzesera vaenda kumapepanhau nekuti ZEC yange isina kupindura tsamba yavo pamusoro pekutengwa kwemichina ye Biometric Voter Registration. Asi VaMwonzora vati vazobvumirana naAmai Makarau kuti vanofanira kuramba vachiita misangano nemapato aya asi panofanira kurongwa kuti hwaro hwekuti misangano iyi ichafamba sei. Asi dzimwe nhengo dzemapato aya dzakaita saVaKudakwashe Bhasikiti vePeople First, vati mapato aya anofanira kuchisiyana neZEC otsvaga imwe nzira yekuti sarudzo dzingafambiswa sei munyika. VaKizito Kuchekwaavo vanoshanda kubazi reCommisariat reZanu PF vati bato ravo haritsigiri zvaitwa nemasangano ari muNational Electoral Reform Agenda pamwe neCoalition for Democracy uye vati semaonero avo danho ratorwa naAmai Makarau rakanaka. Zvichakadai, veNERA vanoti pamvumo yavapihwa yekuratidzira, vanzi panofanira kuungana vanhu vasingadarike zviuru zviviri nemakumi mashanu uye havasi kubvumidzwa kufamba mumigwagwa. Mapurisa anoti vanhu ava vanofanira kuungana panhandareiri kuseri kweHarare International Conference Centre uye vanhu gumi chete ndivo vachabvunmidzwa kunosiya gwaro renyunyuto kuna Amai Makarau. Mapato ari muNERA anoti haasi kufara kuti hurumende yava kuda kutora hurongwa kwekutenga michina yeBVR kubva kuUnited Nations Development Fund sezvo achifungira kuti izvi zvinoita kuti hurumende ipindire mumafambisirwo esarudzo dza2018. No media source currently available

headline: Senegal yapinda muRound of 16
text: CHIKWATA cheSenegal ndicho chaita chekutanga chemuAfrica kuenda kuRound of 16 yemakwikwi eWorld Cup zvichitevera kukunda kwachaita Ecuador 2-1 manheru ano.   Kuhwina uku kwaona Senegal ichipedza iri pechipiri muGroup A iine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kubva mumitambo mitatu yayatamba pari zvino kuQatar.   Mumutambo wawo wekutanga, yakakundwa 2-0 neNetherlands, ndokuzokunda Qatar 3-1 uye 2-1 nhasi apo yakunda Ecuador.   Chikwata chaAliou Cisse chichasangana neEngland muround of 16.

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reKuwanikwa neKukosheswa kweMvura Pasi Pose
text: Nezuro, Zimbabwe yakabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekuwaniswa kwemvura yakachena kumunhu wese pasi rose, re World Water Day, iro rinocherehcedzwa pasi rose kubva muna 1993. Pamusoro pekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena, donzvo rekucherechedza zuva iri nderekupa zivo pamusoro pevanhu vanodarika mabhiriyoni maviri vari kurarama zuva nezuva pasi rose vasina mukana kumvura yakachena. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekuti mvura inoreveyi kuvanhu, kukosha kwayo uye kuti vanhu vangachengetedza sei chiwanikwa ichi. Vanoona nezvebudiriro yevechidiki musangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaMuburwa Allan Murozvi, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende pamwe nemakanzuru ose ekumaruwa nemaguta kuti vakoshese kuwaniswa kwemvura kuvanhu kuburikidza nemari dzebudiriro yematunhu. VaMurozvi vanokurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vadzidze kukohwa mvura kuitira kuzoishandisa munguva dzekushaikwa kwayo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Voyaura Zvichitevera Kupera kweMabasa nePamusana peCovid-19
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19 vanoti vari kutambura zvikuru sezvo vasina chekubata. Mumwe wevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa, Va Luck Moyo, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vave kudya kamwe chete pazuva kubva pavakasiya basa kukambani yavaishandira. VaMoyo vanoti basa ravo rinokwanisa kuraramisa mhuri yavo asi ikozvino havakwanisi kuenda kunoita basa iri sezvo vasina tsamba inovapa mvumo yokuenda kunzvimbo yavanenge vadaidzwa. Mumwe akatarisana nedambudziko iri, Muzvare Melissa Jairosi, avo vane dhigiri reEngineering, vanoti vakapererwa nebasa muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapera pakambani inoita zvokuvaka. Vanoti nekushaya chekuita, vakafunga kuita basa rekutengesa hembe dzemumabhero nemuriwo wavanotenga kuMbare, sezvo vari kushaya basa ravakadzidzira kuEngland. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Mary Makuyana, vanoti vakamiswa basa vachangotanga kupfuya huku kumba kwavo zvokuti ndizvo zvave kuvararamisa. Asi vanoti bhizimisi radzikira nokuti vanhu vavaitengesera huku idzi kum hofisi emuguta vakamiswawo mabasa uye mahofisi makuru akavharwa kubva gore rakapera. Muzvare Dadiso Mudziwepasi vanoti vakadzingwa basa muchitoro chinotengesa zvokudya nembatya zvokuti vave kushanda mumba memumwe mudzimai ane tuckshop pamba pake, asi vanoti mari yavanotambira haisi kuvakwanira nemhuri yavo. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Gift Mutasa, vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa hurukuro nehurumende kuti pawanikwe nzira dzokubatsira vanhu vane mabhizimisi akaparara uye nekubatsira vanhu vakadzingwa mabasa nenyaya yeCovid 19 iyo yakavharisa nyika. VaMutasa vanoti huwori ndihwo hwasvitsa nyika pairi nhasi nokuti zviri pachena kuti mabhizimisi ari kubudirira ane chekuita nevanhu vari kutonga nyika ino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo nekuda kweCovid-19. Gurukota revashandi nemagariro evanhu akanaka, Professor Paul Mavhima, vakaudza Studio7 nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19. Asi masangano anomirira vagari pamwe neevashandi munyika anoti hapana ruyamuro rwuri kupihwa vanhu nehurumende kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino. No media source currently available

headline: Ma’gym’ ngaavhurwe: Musonda
text: PUROMOTA wetsiva — Clyde Musonda, uyo anove maneja zvekare nemurairidzi wemutambo uyu — anoti kuvharwa kwemagym kuri kukanganisa zvikuru vatambi vemuno avo vari kuenda kunorwa kunze kwenyika vasina kunyatsogadzirira.    Svondo radarika, shasha yetsiva — Tinashe ‘Chairman’ Mwadziwana — akakundwa kunyika yeNamibia naNathaniel Kakololo apo vairwira bhande reAfrican Boxing Union Featherweight.    Musonda anoti kuuya kweCovid-19 kwakakanganisa zvizhinji kuvatambi vetsiva sezvo vave kuenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika vasina kugadzirira zvakakwana.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munyika muno muna Kurume gore rapera senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   “Kukundwa kwakaita Chairman kuNamibia, haisi nyaya yekuti mutambi waakarwa naye anogona manhingi, kwete. Asi kuti Chairman haana kuwana nguva ndefu yekunyatsogadzirira. Sekuziva kwemunhu wese, iye zvino magym akavharwa uye mitambo haisi kutenderwa. Saka topedzisira tave kutsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekuti aite gadziriro dzake zvekungoti aende kunozadzikisa mitambo yake,” anodaro.    Musonda anoenderera mberi achiti, “Asi kana mutambi ane ngura akaenda kunorwa zvinogona kurema sezvo anenge ave nenguva ndefu akangogara asiri kukwikwidza, izvo zviri kuitwa nevatambi vedu vari kuenda kunorwa kunze kwenyika.”   Vatambi vazhinji vetsiva vari kuenda kunorwa kunze kunyika dzakaita seNamibia, Tanzania, South Africa neMalawi uko tsiva iri kutenderwa kutambwa.      Musonda anoti dai mutambo uyu wachidzorwa muno sezvawakaitwa kune dzimwe nyika uko uri kutenderwa kutambwa asi pasina vatsigiri.    “Tave kungochema kuti dai mutambo uyu wachidzoswa muno nekuti tinotyira remangwana revatambi vedu kuti ringakanganisike.    “Kune dzimwe nyika uri kutambwa pasina vatsigiri. Saka  tinoona kuti muno ukadzoswa uchinzi utambwe pasina vatsigiri zvinobatsira vatambi vedu vagare vachitamba kuitira apo vakazoenda kunorwira mabhande makuru kunze kwenyika vanenge vasina ngura,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Dare reSeneti Rinotambira Kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett seMukuru Kana Kuti CEO weBoka reNhau reUSAGM
text: Dare reseneti muAmerica nemusi weChina rakatambira kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett semukuru, kana kuti Chief Executive Officer mutsva weboka rehurumende yeAmerica rakazvimirira rinotepfenyura nhau nekuburitsa mashoko, reUnited States Agency for Global Media, kana kuti USAGM. Vachizivisa nezvekudomwa kwaAmai Bennett uku, vakafanobata chigaro chaChief Executive Officer veUSAGM, Amai Kelu Chao, vakati Amai Bennett mutori wenhau ane hunyanzvi hunoratidzwa kuburikidza nekuwana kwavo mubairo wePulitzer Prize kaviri. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti munhu ari kuunza pachigaro ichi ruzivo rwunodarika makore makumi mana rwekuferefetwa kwenhau muAmerica pamwe nekunze kweAmerica, ruzivo rwekutungamira boka remabhizimusi, uye kutungamira muhurumende. Amai Chao vakati chakanyanya kukosha ndechekuti Amai Bennett vanogoverana nevamwe kuzvipira kwakadzama kwekutorwa kwenhau kwepamusoro, chidokwadokwa chekutorwa kwenhau dzechokwadi uye kwakasununguka, kuzvipira kuchengetedzeka kwevatori venhau nevateereri vavo, nekusarerekera mativi pakuzadzisa zvisungo zvemashandiro eboka reUSAGM. Amai Chao vakati kutambirwa kwaAmai Bennett nedare reseneti mucherechedzo wekukosha kweboka reUSAGM mukuwanisa vanhu nhau dzechokwadi uye kutsigira rusununguko nehutongo hwejekerere pasi rose.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanokumikidza Mabhazi Matsva eZupco muBulawayo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakumikidza mabhazi matsva ekambani yeZupco muguta reBulawayo vachiti hurumende yavo yakazvipira kuti veruzhinji vawane zvifambiso zvinowanikwa nguva nenguva zvichifamba zvakanaka uye zvisingadhure. Vachitaura pachiitiko chekukumikidza mabhazi makumi manomwe nematanhatu paCity Hall muBulawayo nhasi mangwanani, VaMnangagwa vati vange vaine mufaro mukuru kuve pachiitiko ichi vachiti mabhazi aya achabatsira kurerutsira veruzhinji panyaya dzekufamba. "Kuvepo kwemabhazi aya kunotarisirwa kubatsira zvikuru mukumutsurudza basa rekufambiswa kweveruzhinji uye kubatsirawo kuderedza mari dzakakwrira dzekufambisa idzo dzange dzave kubhadharwa neveruzhinji kumaruwa nemumadhorobha," vadaro mutungamiri wenyika. Pamabhazi akumukidzwa akawanda acho achaendeswa kumaruwa ekumatunhu eMatabeleland North neMatabeleland South asi VaMnangagwa vati pane mamwe ari munzira achashanda muguta reBulawayo. Vati hurumende yakazvipira kudonzvo rayo rekuti mugore ra2030 Zimbabwe ive yave inoverengwa panyika dzakabudirira vakati zvakakosha kuti nyika ive nezvekyfambisa zveveruzhinji zvakakwana. Vati hurumende yavo yakaona zvakakosha kumutsurudza kambani yeZimbabwe United Passenger Company, Zupco. Vati hurumende iri kutenga mabhazi anopfuura chiuru chimwe nemazana matatu achapiwa kukambani iyi. "Mushure mekuona kuti panguva dzakawanda veruzhinji vange vave kuwomeserwa nevamwe vari mubhizimisi rekutakura vanhu, vachivabhadharisa mari dziri pamusoro-soro, takaona zvakakosha kumutsurudza kambani yehurumende yeZupco. Mabhazi achauya achibva kunyika dzeChina, Belarus neSouth Africa," VaMnangagwa vaudza vanhu. VaMnangagwa vati makanzuru nehurumende zvinofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuti veruzhinji vagokwanisa kuitirwa zvizere mabasa avanotarisira kuitirwa vakashorawo zvikuru nyaya yehuwori. Mutungamiri wenyika vati hurumende yavo yakazvipira kuendesa masimba kumatunhu. "Gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube muhurongwa hwekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende vachawedzera mari ichashandiswa pakuendesa masimba kumatunhu zvichireva kuti pachave nemari yakawedzerwa ichapiwa kumatunhu, kumakanzuru ekumaruwa uye emumadhorobha kuitira kubatsira kuti mukwanise kuita mabasa amunotarisirwa kuita neveruzhinji," vadaro VaMnangagwa Zupco yava nemabhazi matsva anosvika mazana mashanu. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya weBulawayo, VaMalandu Ncube, avo vange varipowo pachiitiko ichi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti ibasa remakanzuru emaguta kuti veruzhinji vawane zvifambiso. Vati vanotambira kuvepo kwemabhazi asi vakati zvakakosha kuti mabasa achamuka muhurongwa uhu apiwe vagari vemunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kuchaendeswa mabhazi aya kwete vekunze. Mumwe mugari, VaFriday Thomas Phiri, vati vanotambira chirongwa chemabhazi ichi asi vakati zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende iwone kuti migwagwa yemunyika yagadzirwa vachiti kana izvi zvikasaitwa, mabhazi aya achapera kufa nekukasika. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende isangotarisa kunyaya yezvifambiso chete asi kuti iwonewo kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji zuva nezuva yadzikiswa. Semamwe makambani ehurumende, kambani yeZupco yakagwadama nekuda kwekusaita basa nemazvo kwevaiyitungamira kambani iyi, pamwe chete nehuwori. Mukutanga kwegore rino, Zupco yanga yasarirwa nemabhazi mazana matatu nemakumi masere, mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nerimwe ari mabhazi emakambani akazvimirira akaendesa mabhazi kuZupco pasi pechibvumirano. Guta reHarare ranga riine mabazi zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemana, Bulawayo iine makumi manomwe nematanhatu, Mutare iine mabhazi makumi matatu nemana, Masvingo gumi nematatu, Gweru iine masere, ukuwo Chinhoyi iine mabhazi maviri chete eZupco. Muna chikumi, mabhazi matsva makumi mana nemanomwe akapihwa Zupco achibva ku China nekuSouth Africa. Hurumende yakanyoreranawo chibvumirano chemabhazi matsva mazana mashanu neBelarus zvichitevera kushanya kwaVaMnangagwa kunyika iyi muna Ndira. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kana hururmende yaVaMnangagwa ikasasunga dzisimbe pakugadzirisa nyaya yehuwori, kumutsurudza kambani iyi nedzimwe dzehurumende, kuchashaya basa. Zupco yakaumbwa muna 1980 pakawana nyika kuzvitonga, asi kambani iyi yaizivikanwa nerekuti Rhodesia Bus Company nyika ichiri pasi pehutongi hwevachena. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yononoka Kubhadhara Vashandi Vanobatwa neCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vazhinji vavo havasati vawana mari dzavanofanirwa kupiwa kana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vashandi ava vanotiwo havasi kufara nekuvatyityidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nehurumende iyo iri kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dzeCovid Allowance. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, Va Enoch Dongo, vati vashandi vezvehutano vakawanda vacho havasati vawana mari dzekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vari pabasa kunyange hazvo vave nenguva yakareba vanyorera kuti vawane mari idzi. VaDongo vati nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzichida mari iyi padzinenge dzichirwara kuitira kuti vdzikwanise kutenga zvikwanisiro. VaDongo vatiwo mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora (75 million) anonzi akasendekwa parutivi kuitira kuti mari iyi ibhadhare vashandi vezvehutano vanobatwa neCovid-19, haikwani sezvo vakabatwa neCovid-19 vadarika zviuru zvina. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Association, VaPrince Butau,avo vakabatwa neCovid-19 gore rapera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakazowana mari muna Kurume gore rino kunyange vakange vanyorera mari iyi gore rapera. Asi VaButau vati hurumende inofanirwa kunge ichipa mari kwehupenyu hwese munhu anobatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa. Mumwe mukoti asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo akabatwa nechirwere ichi kutanga kwegore rino, haasati awana mari kunyange hazvo akanyora mapepa anodiwa. Panyaya yekutyityidzirwa nehurumende kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dziri kupiwa vashandi vese vezvehutano dzeCovid-19 allowance, VaDongo vati zvakaipa zvikuru kumanikidza vanhu kubayiwa nhomba. VaButau vati mari inoita zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri emaRTGS iri kupihwa seCovid-19 allowances ishoma zvakanyanya. Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi vezvehutano yotaurirana navo pamusoro pekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuHealth Services Board asi gurukota rezvekubudiritswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri kuti hurumende iri kubhadhara mushandi anenge abatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa mari inotangira pamazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete chemadhora ekuAmerica. Pamusoro pezvo mushandi wezvehutano anopihwa zviuru zvitanhatu nemazanamaviri emaRTGS semari yekubatsirikana munguva yeCivid-19. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yainge yabhadhara vashandi mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri pavashandi vezvehutano zviuru zvina nemazna mana ane makumi mana nevana vakanyorera kuwana mari iyi. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mari yakaiswa parutivi nehurumemde haikwani kubhadhara vashandi vese vakabatwa neCovid-19 vakati zvinoda kuti hurumende iwedzere mari iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Kubaiwa kweNhomba Munyika Kuri Kuitwa Zvisina Mutsindo
text: Chirongwa chekubaya nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuvashandi vezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo chapinda muzuva retatu, bazi rehutano richiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa nhomba huri kuwedzera kunyange hazvo risina kupa huwandu hwacho. Mukuru webazi rehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vati kunyange hazvo chirongwa ichi chakatanga zvishoma nemusi weMuvhuro, vashandi vakazobaiwa nhomba iyi nezuro nanhasi vawedzera. Dr Shamu vaudza Studio 7 kuti musi wekutanga vashandi vazhinji vaisagutsikana nenhomba iyi asi mushure mekutsanangurirwa, vazhinji vave kubaiwa. Kunyange hazvo Dr Shamu vati hofisi yavo haisati yapuwa huwandu hwevashandi vose vabaiwa pari zvino sezvo vashandi vavo vakabuda vachipinda muzvipatara zvemumaruwa, vanotarisira kubaya vashandi chiuru gumi nechimwe mudunhu rose pamazuva gumi. Asi vamwe vashandi vataura neStudio7 vati vashandi vemubazi rezvehutano vakawanda vari kuramba kubaiwa nhomba iyi, iyo yakabva kuChina. Vashandi vepachipatara cheMasvingo General Hospital vari kubaya vanhu nhomba vange vari pachipatara cheMushagashe neSummetone nhasi. Chipatara ichi chiri kunze kwedhoroba reMasvingo uko kwabaiwa vanhu vashoma vasingapfuuri gumi. Mumwe mushandi aramba kudomwa nezita rake paMushagashi audza Studio 7 kuti haasati ave nechivimbo chekuti nhomba iyi yakanaka. Vashandi vabaiwa nhasi varamba kutaura neStudo 7 iyo yatumirwa mapurisa kuti ibve pavange vachibairwa nhomba. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati havasati vave nehuwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba pamazuva matatu asi musi wekutanga chete vashandi vakabaiwa mudunhu rose vakasvika zana nemakumi matanhatu nevasere. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kutyira nhomba iyi, asi Dr Shamu vakurudzira kuti vanhu ava vabaiwe vachiti nhomba iyi yakanaka sezvo yakatendedza nebazi rezveutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation. Dunhu reMasvingo rakapiwa nhoma yevanhu zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri(22 000) kunyange hazvo iyo iri kuda kubaya vashandi zviurugumi nemumwe(11 000) pachirongwa chekutanga chiri kuitwa mumazuva gumi. Nezuro vanhu vakange vabaiwa nhomba munyika yose vanosvika zviuri zvina nemakumi mana nemumwe chete, (4041) Nezuro vanhumakumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika mose, vanomwe vakashaya. Nyika pari zvino yave nevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mapfumbamwe negumi vabatwa nechirwere ichi, (35 910), uye vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri nemazana maviri ane makumi masere nevasere, (32 288). Vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vave chiuru chimwe nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevasere, (1448). No media source currently available

headline: Murairidzi waZemura aroveswa pasi
text: MURAIRIDZI waJordan Zemura kuchikwata cheAFC Bournemouth, Scott Parker adzingwa basa nhasi zvichitevera kuzvambaradzwa kwavakaitwa neLiverpool 9-0 nemusi weMugovera wadarika.   Kurakashwa kwakaitwa Bouthmouth neLiverpool hakuna kugamuchirwa nevaridzi vechikwata ichi pamwe nevatsigiri venhabvu avo vakakatyamadzwa zvikuru sezvo pange padarika mwaka mizhinji pasati pamboita chikwata chinokundwa 9-0.   Parker abva aita murairidzi wekutanga kudzingwa basa muEnglish Premier League mwaka uno uye adzingwa pangotambwa mitambo mina chete.   Muridzi weBournemouth – Maxim Demin – anyora padandemutande kuti, “Tinoda kutenda zvikuru kuna Scott nechikwata chake panguva yataive tose.   “Kudzoka kwataita muPremier League achirairidza chikwata chedu tichagara tichikurangarira kwemakore akawanda anotevera.   “Asi kuti tirambe tichibudirira sechikwata, tinofanirwa kufamba negwara chairo rebasa redu uye kupanana rukudzo nguva dzose.   “Gadziriro dzekutsvaga murairidzi mutsva anomutsiva dzatotanga.”   Mumitambo yakarairidzwa naParker mwaka uno muPremiership, wekutanga chikwata chake chakakunda Aston Villa 2-0, ndokuzokundwa 4-0 neManchester City, chikazokundwa zvakare 3-0 neArsenal uye 9-0 neLiverpool.

headline: ‘TSIGIRAI LOGA’
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti hapana chinokonesa Zimbabwe kuenda kumakwikwi e2022 Qatar World Cup zvichitevera kugadzwa kwemurairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors, Zdravko Logarusic.   Loga, sezita remadunhurirwa raLogarusic iro raakapihwa nevatsigiri venhabvu, akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi neZifa achitsiva Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa uyo akasiya basa gore rapera.   Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas ndiye ange akafanobata chigaro ichi zvichitevera kubva kwaMhofu.   Chizvarwa chekuCroatia ichi, Loga, akaparurwa zviri pamutemo svondo radarika nesangano reZifa.   Mutungamiri weZifa, Felton Kamambo, akabva azivisa Loga kuti maWarriors anofanirwa kuenda kumakwikwi ese enhabvu anoti African Nations Cup (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2021 neFifa World Cup 2022.   Muhurukuro nevatsigiri venhabvu vakasiyana vanoti remangwana remaWarriors rakajeka zvikuru zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Loga.   Mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of Warriors, Edward Chimedza, anoti kuuya kwaLoga kwaunza chiedza chakanaka uye pane tarisiro huru yekuti achabata basa sebasa.   “Loga auya, tinofanirwa kumupa nguva anyatsobika chikwata chake uye Zifa ngaimutsigire nekumupa zvese zvaanoda kuti agoita basa rake nemazvo. Tine mukana wekuita zvikuru munhabvu naLoga uye tiri kumutemba kuti achabata basa, 2022 ndaona tichienda kuWorld Cup naye. Asi anofanirwa kutanga atidzosera kuAfcon zvekare,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa neshasha inozivikanwa pakutsigira nhabvu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa achiti Loga anofanirwa kuwana rutsigiro ruzere kubva kuZifa, mapoka akasiyana anoona nezvenhabvu pamwechete nevatsigiri.   “Murairidzi wedu mutsva tinaye uye tiri kufamba naye, toda kumuona achibudirira. Anofanirwa kupihwa rutsigiro rwese rwaanoda kuti agobudirira mubasa rake. Kana akataura kuti ane vatambi vaanoda, ngavauye nenguva kuitira kuti ashande navo agozivana navo.   “Tine mitambo mikuru iri kuuya saka tinoziva kuti tikamutsigira zvakasimba tinobudirira chete, kunyanya mumutambo weCHAN uri kuuya munaKubvumbi. Asi mikuru yeAfcon neWorld Cup yatiri kuda ndine chivimbo chekuti ari kuzotiendesa,” anodaro.   Munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors, Zivanai Muwashu anoti kuve nemurairidzi wekunze kunobatsira zvikuru mune zvakasiyana.   “Uku ndiko kubudirira kwatave kuita munhabvu yedu, tave kufamba mugwara chairo naLoga. Tine varairidzi vemuno hapana kwataienda nekuti vamwe vaisarudza vatambi vekuzvikwata zvavo kuti vagouya kumaWarriors, manje naLoga achanyatsoongorora vese osarudza vatambi vaanoda avo vaanoona kuti ndivo vanokodzera kutambira maWarriors.   “ Mumaonero angu, izvi zvichatibatsira kuti vatambi vanogona vachashevedzwa uye vachatamba nhabvu votisvitsa kure,” anodaro Muwashu. Mutambo wekutanga waLoga achirairidza maWarriors uriko musi wa23 Kurume apo achasangana neAlgeria, kuAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAfcon 2021.   Svondo rinotevera racho, maWarriors achange ari pamusha apo achasangana neAlgeria mumutambo weAfcon zvakare.   MunaKubvumbi, Loga ane basa guru rekubata sezvo achatungamirira maWarriors kumakwikwi eCHAN achaitirwa kuCameroon.   MaWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Burkina Faso neMali.

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVatatu (13) Vofa neCovid-19 Mukutanga kweGore ra2022
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mukutanga kwegore ra2022, vanhu gumi nevatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere icho kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2019 vave zviuru zvishanu negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 5 017. Vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 955 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave mazana maviri ezviuru negumi nevana ane mazana maviri negumi nevana kana kuti 214 214. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemaviri kana kuti 4 129 952. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zana nemakumi mana zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 3 140, 345. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu zvikuru vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakwegura nevamwe vane zvirwere zvinovaisa munjodzi yekurwara zvakaipisisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 5, 623. Bazi rezvehutano rine hurongwa hqwekubaya vanhu mamimiriyoni gumi nhomba kuti inyatsoshande zvakanaka. Hurongwa hwaivepo hwaive hwekuti izvi zviitwe mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera asi hazvina kubudirira.

headline: Mhirizhonga Inotyisa Yoitika kuChitungwiza
text: Vechidiki muMDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai vanoti havasi kuzopeta mavoko avo vachirwiswa nevechidiki ve Zanu-PF. Vechidiki ava vanoti yasvika nguva yekuti vadzoserewo zvakasimba pose pavanorwiswa sezvo mapurisa ari kutsigira Zanu-PF pose panoitika zvemhirizhonga, vatsigiri veMDC vari ivo vanosungwa chete. Mashoko aya anotevera kurwiswa kwakaitwa munyori anoona nezvemisangano mu MDC kuChitungwiza, VaDelma Amos Kaliyati, mukupera kwesvondo. VaKaliyati, avo vari muchipatara zvichitevera kukuvara zvakaipisisa kwavakaita, vanonzi vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa sezvo vari muhusungwa zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika neSvondo. Zvichitevera kurwiswa kwakaitwa VaKaliyati nevamwe vavo, vechidiki ve MDC vanonzi vakapindirawo munyaya iyi vachiedza kudzoserawo kurwiswa kwakange kuchiitwa vamwe vavo, izvo zvakaita kuti pakuvare vanhu vakati wandeyi, vamwe vakaendeswa kuchipatara. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakakuvara muchiitiko ichi. VaKaliati vakarwiswa zvakare svondo rapera apo vaibatsira vanhu vanoda kunyoresa kuvhota. Vamwe vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF vakakanda chombo chinoputika pamba paVaKaliyati, mukadzi wavo akakuvara zvakaipisisa muchiitiko icho. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJim Kunaka, vanoramba zvese zvataurwa neveMDC vachiti vanhu vebato ravo havana nguva yokufamba vachirova vanhu sezvo vari mubishi rekukuridzira vanhu kunonyoresa kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuzovhota musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rinouya. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Voramba Kurudziro yeHurumende Yekuti Vadzokere kuMabasa
text: Vanachiremba munyika varamba kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vadzokere kumabasa nhasi vakatiwo vave kuda kubuda musangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reHealth Apex Council. Vanachiremba ava vaungana muHarare vakaratidzira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vachiti hazvibatsiri kuti hurumende ivatyisidzire kuti vadzokere kumabasa vasina mari. Mumwe chiremba anga achiratidzira Dr Learnmore Shoti vati kuda kuvatyisidzira kuti vadzokere kumabasa hakuna zvakunoshanda sezvo vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita atiwo sezvo hurumende iri kukwidzawo zvinhu zvakaita semafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, magetsi nezvimwewo zvichienderana nehuremu hwedhora rekuAmerica (Interbank Exchange Rate), naivo vanodawo kuti mari dzavo dzemihoro dzienderane nerate inenge iripo pavanotambira. Vanachiremba varatidzira vakananga kumahofisi eHealth Services Board uko vanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto vachishora nyaya yekutyisidzirwa uye vachitiwo vari kuda kubuda zviri pamutemo kubva musangano reHealth Apex Council rinomirira vashandi vose vehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Doctor Tawanda Zvakada vati vanachiremba vaona zvakakodzera kubuda mumubatanidzwa wevashandi vari pasi pebazi rezvehutano sezvo risisamirire zvido zvavo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wesangano ravanachiremba reZHDA, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vati vari kuda kuti HSB itsvake imwe nzira yekuti vanzwe zvichemo zvavanachiremba kuitira kuti dambudziko ravo rigadziriswe. Vana chiremba vashoma shoma ndivo vanga varikubatsira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa izvo zvasiyawo varwere vari panyanga dzamushore. Amai Sandra Mushonga avo vane mwana ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa vati mwana wavo haasi kuonekwa nanachiremba nguva dzese. Vati dai hurumende yagadzirisa zviri kudiwa navanachiremba kuitira kudzivirira kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuzvipatara, sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr Paulinus Sikhosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa. Dr Sikhosana vatiwo kuumba rimwe boka rekuti vawane kutaurirana nanachiremba zvinotora nguva. Health Apex Council ine masangano anosvika gumi nemaviri anomirira vashandi vakasiyasiyana vari mubazi rezvehutano kubvira kune vanoita zvekuchenesa muzvipatara. Vana chiremba vanoti kusangana kwevanhu vanoita mabasa akasiyana-siyana kuri kupa kuti vamwe vashandi vabvume mari dzinenge dzataurwa nehurumende chero dziri shoma shoma. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba uku kwakatanga musi wa3 Gunyana. No media source currently available

headline: Basa tapedza: Zifa
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI weZimbabwe Football Association, Felton Kamambo, anoti sangano ravo ragadzirira zvose zvinodiwa apo maWarriors atarisana nemutambo mukuru wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations paachasangana neCongo Brazzaville kuNational Sports Stadium nemusi weSvondo uye chasara chete ndechekuti chikwata chenyika ichi chihwinhe mumutambo uyu.   MaWarriors mumutambo uyu ari kungoda chibodzwa chimwe chete kuti abudirire kuenda kuAfcon kuEgypt gore rino. Makore adarika, paimboita kugunun’una kubva kumaWarriors vachichemera mari dzavo dzebhonasi kubva kuZifa.    Felton Kamambo   Asi, sekutaura kwaKamambo anoti hakusisina matambudziko aya uye sangano ravo riri kushanda zvakasimba kuti zvinhu zvese zvifambe zvakanaka mumutambo wavo uyu.   “Takarongeka isu, ndozvatakanakira, zvese takagadzirira kuti mutambo uyu ufambe zvakanaka.   “Hapana chipingaidzo chatinofunga kuti chichatikanganisa kana mutambo wasvika. Zvese takagadzirira kuti zvifambe zvakanaka, kana vatambi chaivo vari kufara. Chasara kuti tihwine musi wesvondo tiende kuEgypt,” anodaro Kamambo.   MaWarriors – ayo ari kurairidzwa naSunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa – ari kurwira kuti aende kumutambo weAfcon kechina munhorowondo yenhabvu yemuno.   Kamambo anoti zvakakosha kuti vatsigri venhabvu vauye nehuwandu hwavo kuzotsigira maWarriors.   “Vatsigiri vedu tiri kuvada chaizvo musi weSvondo kumutambo uyu, mukuru zvisingaite saka ngavauye nehuwandu hwavo kuzotsigira chikwata chedu.   “Zvamunongoziva vatsigiri venhabvu vane basa guru ravanobata pakutsigira chikwata saka isu tiri kuvada chaizvo svondo rino,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, Kamambo anoti nemusi weSvondo mutambo uyu usati watanga, vachawana nguva yekurangarira vanhu vose  vakarasikirwa nehupenyu (minute of silence) nekuda kwemafashamu emvura aive nedutu guru kumatunhu enyika anosanganisira Manicaland.   “Ticharangarira vose vakarasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo nekuda kwemafashamu ayo akaitika kunzvimbo dzakasiyana dzenyika mutambo usati watanga uye tichabatsirawo vamwe nepatinokwanisa,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, vatsigiri venhabvu vanoti svondo rino vachazadza nhandare yeNational Sports Stadium zvisati zvamboitika munhorowondo yenyika ino.   Mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu Chris “Romario” Musekiwa anoti sevatsigiri vari kuronga kuzadza NSS svondo rino uye masvondo adarika vange vachiita gadziriro yenziyo itsva dzekuimba vachitsigira maWarriors pamutambo uyu.   “Tiri kushanda basa guru rekukurudzira vatsigiri venhabvu kuti ngavauye musi weSvondo kunhandare kuzotsigira chikwata chedu chenyika, ngativapei rutsigiro rwakakwana vabate basa sebasa.   “Kaputeni wedu Knowledge Musona tinovimba naye nechikwata chese. Tinongoti vakomana fambai nebhora uye munwise bhora richangotanga, tatotarisana neEgypt,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu – Hurbert Manyowa wekuKadoma – uyo anove sachigaro weKadoma Warriors Chapter, anoti musi weSvondo hapana munhu anofanirwa kugara kumba kwake asi nzira dzose ngadzinange kuNSS kunotsigira chikwata chenyika.   “Izvi ndezvenyika yedu, chikwata ndechenyika saka ngatibatane senyika kuenda kunotsigira vakomana vedu vachibata basa.   “Gore rino nderedu maWarriors anofanirwa kusvika kure. Iye zvino tinoona kuti hapasisina nyonga-nyonga munhabvu yedu saka vakomana ngavatambe nhabvu vasafunge zvakawanda nekuti zvese zvakagadzirirwa kuti bhora ritsve,” anodaro Manyowa.   Mumutambo uyu, Chidzambwa achange achitarisira kuti vakomana vake vanosanganisira Musona, Khama Billiati, Tinotenda Kadewere, Evans Rusike, Knox Mutizwa naTalent Chawapihwa kuti vabate basa sebasa svondo rino kuNational Sports Stadium.

headline: Varimi vePurazi reWadzanayi kuLalapanzi Vonetsana neKambani yekuChina YeAsia Ferry Yakapinda muPurazi Ravo
text: Varimi vepapurazi remushandirapamwe reWadzanayi Cooperative kuLalapanzi mudunhu reMidlands vanoti vari kushungurudzwa neimwe kambani yekuChina yeAsia Ferry, iyo vari kuti yakatora chidimbu chepurazi ravo uye vashandi vayo vari kugezera chicherwa che chrome mupurazi ravo. Varimi ava vanotiwo zvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi zvatove kuchengeta makwai mupurazi ravo. Munyori wemushandirapamwe uyu, VaDominic Mngwabi, vanoti kambani iyi inonzi yakapinda muchibvumirano nemuridzi wepurazi iri pedyo neyavo chekuti ishandise, asi yakatobvisa muganhu waivepo kare ichipinda mupurazi ravo. Vanotiwo chiitiko ichi chakanganisa mhuri dzinosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere dziri papurazi reWadzanayi iri, kuburikidza nekuisa hutano hwavo pamwe nehwezvipfuwozvavo munjodzi yekukanganiswa nemishonga iri kushandiswa kugeza matombo ari kucherwa nekambani iyi. VaMngwabi vanoti vakamboedza kuti vagare pasi nemukuru wekambani iyi anonzi Tony asi vanoti akaramba kutaura navo, akatovirima achiti vaende kunomhang'ara kwavanoda uye kuganza achiti haana zvavanomuita. Vanoti vakazoperekedzwa negweta ravo neChitatu svondo rino vachinosiya gwaro rine nyunyuto dzavo kuhofisi yekambani iyi iri papurazi ravo, asi havasati vawana mhinduro. Vanotiwo vakaedza kugara pasi nemuridzi wepurazi kuti varatidzane miganho yemapurazi avo iye achiedzawo kutaura vekambani iyi kuti vagarisane zvakanaka nevavakidzani vavo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vekambani yeAsia Ferry kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMngwabi vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzerwa nekambani yezvizvarwa zvekuChina iyi ndeye kuparadzwa kwemigwagwa yavopamwe neguruva ravanoti rave kutadzisa vagari kana kuwacha mbatya vachiyanika pamisha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mudzimai Osungunukira Muchimbuzi muHarare
text: Vagari vemumusha weGlen View nhasi vasvitsa gwaro renyuto kuna meya weguta weHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vachigunun’una mushure mekunge mumwe mudzimai anogara mumusha uyu, Amai Estina Swaba, vazvarira muchimbudzi chekirinika yekanzuru Glen View Polyclinic, mushure mekunge vakoti vepakirinika iyi varamba kuvabatsira vachiti vaifanira kuenda kuchipata cheSally Mugabe. Izvi zvakatika nemusi weChipiri svondo rapfuura izvo zvakatsamwisa vagari vemumusha uyu. Murume waAmai Swaba, VaBlessing Chaodzemoyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nezvakaitika. Mumwe mugari wemusha uyu zvakare vari nhengo weCombined Harare Residents Association, Amai Joylin Nyachuru, vati zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kubatwa neseri kweruwoko muzvipatara zvekanzuru. Mugwaro rakasainwa nevagari vanodarika zchiuru nemazana matanhatu, vagari ava yave nguva yakareba madzimai akazvitakura achishungurudzwa paGlen View Polyclinic Zvinonzi vakoti vakati vainge vasingakwanise kuvabatsira nekuti vaida kuzvara mwana mwana weChishanu vachiti kirinika iyi inobatsira vanhu vanozvara mwana wekutanga kusvika pane wechina chete. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru wevakoti mumakirinika nezvipatara zvekanzuru, Matron Amai Perpetua Kaseke. Meya weHarare VaJacob Mafume vatambira gwaro iri vakati vachaongorora kuti zvakafamba sei uyewo vati vachaona kuti makoti vese vapihwa zvikwangwani zvine mazita avo kuti zvikwanise kuzivikanwa kuti ndiana anenge atadza kuita basa. Vatiwo vachabhadhara mari dzese dziri kudiwa muSally Mugabe kudzamara Amai Swaba nemwana wavo vadzokera kumba. VaMafume vati vano zviziva kuti pamabasa pane vamwe vasingaiite basa ravo nemazvo asi vakati chakakosha ndechekuti kanzuru yatambira zvakaitika uye yave kubatsira mhuri. Vatiwo kanzuru yavo ine dambudziko rekushomeka kwevakoti mumakirinika nezvipatara zvayo zvese uyewo vati vakurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire kanzuru nemari kuti ikwanise kupa vagary hutano hwakanaka. Vagari vakawanda muHarare havasi kufara nebazi rekanzuru rehutano uye madzimai akawanda aka zvitakuura anozvarira panze pemakirinika kana zvipatara mushure mekurambidzwa kupinda muzvipatara izvi zvikuru sei kana huri husiku. Paramende iri kuongorora nyaya iyi uye inotarisira kuburitsa zvakayakwana mutsvakurudzo yayo kunguva ipi zvayo. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Grace Mugabe Votuka Zvakare Amai Mujuru neMDC
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mygabe, vati vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, havazofa vakavigwa pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika nepamusana pekuti vakapandukira mutungamiri wenyika,Va Robert Mugabe. Vachitaura neChitatu nevatsigiri vebato ravo paChimhanda Secondary School ku Rushinga mudunhu reMashonaland Central, munyori muboka remadzimai reZanu PF reWomen’s League, Amai Grace Mugabe, vashora Amai Mujuru nekuda chigaro chaVa Mugabe vachiti Amai Mujuru havazofi vakavigwa pa Heroes Acre nokuti vakazvidza mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vati kunze kunotonhora kana munhu achinge asiri mu Zanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Amai Mugabe vaenderera mberi vachiti mapato anopikisa haafanirwe kubvumidzwa kupinda mudunhu reMashonaland Central vachiti dunhu iri ndere Zanu PF. Amai Mugabe varambawo mashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ekuti ndivo vari kutungamira chipoka chemuZanu PF chiri kudaidzwa kuti G40 kana kuti Generation 40 icho chinonzi chakateya kutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Zvinonzi muZanu PF mune kusawirirana zvakanyanya panyaya yekuti achatora matomhu kubva kuna Va Mugabe ndiyani. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika atorawo zvakare mukana uyu kutsoropodza vaimbova mutungamiri weBritain, Va Tony Blair, pamwe naVa George Bush vaimbova mutungamiri weAmerica vachiti vaviri ava vanofanirwa kutongwa kudare re International Criminal Court. Va Mugabe vanowanzotukawo America ne Britain pese pavanowana mukana wekutaura paruzhinji sezvaitwa nemudzimai wavo nhasi. Kunyange hazvo mhuri yaVa Mugabe ine mapurazi akawanda, mazhinji acho ari pasi pekambani inonzi Gushungo Holdings, Amai Mugabe vashora vakuru vakuru muhurumende vakatora mapurazi akawanda avasiri kushandisa nemhazvo. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vatorawo mukana uyu kutuka vatori venhau vachiti vanonyora manyepo. Mumwe mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika uye vari mupepeti webepanhau re The Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, varatidza kusafara nemashoko aAmai Mugabe aya vachiti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kusiiwa vachiita basa ravo vakasununguk Amai Mugabe vasiya vagovera matarakita, mbatya, shangu, ma computer pamwe nechikafu kuvagari veku Mashonaland Central vachiti havana basa nekuti vemapato anopikisa anoti chii panyaya dzekutenga mavhoti vachiti yatokwana nguva yekuti bato ravo ritsvage rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Amai Mugabe vakatarisirwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo mumatunhu ose enyika kwavanoti vachafamba vachigovera zvinhu vachiti zvavari kuita kuzadzikisa zviri muchirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset.

headline: Khama Billiati Otarisirwa Kutambira Zimbabwe paMutambo neCongo Brazzaville
text: Pane chivimbo chakasimba chekuti mutambi ane mukurumbira. Khama Billiart. achange ari munhandare neSvondo apo Zimbabwe iri kusangana neCongo Brazzaville kunyange hazvo asati apora kubva mukukuvara kwaakaita. Maneja wemaWarriors, VaWellington Mpandare, pamwe nachiremba wechikwata ichi, VaSomani Mudariki, vanoti mutambi uyu, uyo asina kugadzirira nevamwe nemhaka yekukuvara, achange ari munhandare neSvondo apo maWarriors ari kusangana neCondo Brazzaville Billiart, uyo anokanda zvibodzwa pamadiro ari kudikanwa zvikuru mumutambo uyu uyo Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda kuti varambe vane mukana wekuenda kumaAfrica Cup of Nations. VaMpandare vanotitaurira mamiriro akaita zvinhu. VaMpandare vanoti chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kusimuka mangwana chichisvika muBrazzaville musi wemutambo kuitira kutiza kusabatwa zvakanaka kunoitwa zvikwata zvinoshanya kune dzimwe nyika muAfrica. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association, VaPhilip Chiyangwa, vakatora nguva yavo kusangana nemaWarriors vachangobva kugadzwa senhengo yeparamende. VaChiyangwa vanoti hapana chimwe chavari kutarisira kunze kwekukunda. VaChiyangwa vanoti mukamba makabatana vachiwedzera ivo kuti nyaya dzemari dzemaWarriors kana vakakunda dzakagadziriswa. Zimbabwe inofanira kukunda kana kuita mangange kuCongo Brazzaville kuitira kuti irambe iine mukana wekubudirira kuenda kuma fainari eAfrica Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon muna Chikumi gore rinouya. Pari zvino, maWarriors ndiwo ari pamusoro pemakundano aya nezvibodzwa asi vakaenzana pamaponzi neDRC iyo ine mapoinzi matatu zvekare. Asi maWarriors ari kutarisira kuti vacharamba vari pavari apa kunyange hazvo vasina vamwe vatambi vavo vane mbiri vakaita saCosta Nhamoinesu, Nyasha Mushekwi, maMarvelous Nakamba avo vakakuvara. Asi kaputeni wavo, Knowledge Musona, ari mukamba mushure mekusauya kuzotamba muCosafa Cup nemhaka yekuvara zvekare. MaWarriors ari kuda kuenda kuma fainari eAfrica Cup of Nations kechitatu mushure mekuita izvi muna 2004, 2006, na 2017. No media source currently available

headline: Madzishe Otsigira VaMugabe Musarudzo Gore Rinouya
text: Madzishe emunyika mukupera kwesvondo akabuda nechisungo chekuti achatsigira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika gore rinouya. Mutungamiri wesangano remadzishe, Ishe Fortune Charumbira, vakazivisa neMugovera kumusangano wemadzishe wepagore weNational Annual Conference, kuti madzishe akawirirana muna 2014 kuti VaMugabe ndiye munhu avachatsigira musarudzo dza 2018. "Madzimabo anenge achiti pahumambo hwedu, kana mutungamiri anenge aripo omunyika, adiwa navanhu, kana munhu adiwa isu madzimambo tinotsigira munhu iyeyo," vanodaro Ishe Charumbira. Vanoti hurumende yaVaMugabe yakaita zvirongwa zvebudiriro zvakawanda , uyewo mutungamiri wenyika ano remekedza pamwe nekukoshesa madzishe. Panyaya yekuti bumbiro remitemo rinoti madzishe haafanirwi kuita zvematongerwo enyika, Ishe Charumbira vanoti vanhu vanodaro ivavo havana ruzivo rwakakwana. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti madzishe ari kutyora bumbiro remitemo nekutsigira VaMgabe, pachinzvimbo chekuti vatokurudzira kuti munyika muve nemapato akawanda ezvematongerwo enyika.
