VaMafume vanoti hapana chakashata kuti Ishe Charumbira vatsigire VaMugabe, asi kwete kuti vabude vachiti madzishe ose anotsigira mutungamiri wenyika. "Pakutanga madzishe haana kana kumboti vanoda VaMugabe. Charumbira ndiye ati anoda VaMugabe. Saka iye ega kana ane zvaari kupuwa ngaasati madzishe ose ataura kuti anoda VaMugabe," VaMafume vanodaro. Vanoti bato ravo rinotaura nemadzishe siku nesikati, naivowo madzishe ari kunetseka nekushushikana nekutambura kuri kuita rizhinji rweZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust Rosvitsa Makore Makumi Matatu
text: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust, FACT rapemberera kusvitsa kwaro makore makumi matatu raumbwa richipa vagari vekwaMutare mukana wekuvhenekwa pachena zvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana zvinosanganisira gomarara, HIV, kuchecheudzwa nezvimwewo. Vanhu vakawanda vemaMutare vafara zvikuru mushure mekubatsirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pahurongwa hwekucherechedza mabasa anoitwa neFACT. Mumwe wevabatsirwa ndiAmai Bekiwe Mazuru avo vane gomarara. Amai Mazuru vati vafara nekubatsirwa kwavaita sezvo vasina mari yekuti vavhenekwe zvirwere. Studio 7 yataura nevabatsirwa avo vange vachirumbidza zvaitika izvi. Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, VaAleck Matega, vafara zvikuru sezvo ivo nemhuri yavo, vabatsirwa pasina muripo. VaSolomon Makina, avo vanoshanda nesangano reFACT, vanoti chiitiko ichi chimwe chezvironga zvavari kuita mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Sangano reFACT rakatanga kwaMutare ndokuzopinda mumatunhu anoti Masvingo, Midlands, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Chirongwa cheFACT, icho chapoindwa nevanhu vanosvika zviuru zviviri, change chichitsigirwa nemasangano anoti National Aids Council, UK-Aid, US Aid, Eco-Sure, Nyaradzo Funeral Service nemamwe, uye vaimbi, Killer T, Sir Calaz naHwindi President. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kutsigira, Kusimbaradza Mari Itsva
text: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika, pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanodzidzisa zvemabhizimusi paDevry University ku Ohio, vanoti vanhu vanoda mari yavanoshandisa, naizvozvo danho ratorwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe idanho rakanaka kana hurumende ikatevedzera mitemo nemirairo yezvehupfumi hwenyika inotevedzwa nenyika dzepasi pose, kwete zvokuzoramba ichidhinda mari pavanenge vazvifunga. Muzvinafundo Masocha vati hurumende inofanirwa kuratidza vanhu kuti inovimbika kwete kudhinda mari nguva dzese zvinozokonzera kuti mari yacho ishaye huremerera. "Vanhu vanoda kuona mari yavo mumavoko kwete kuudzwa kuti iri mukati mefoni yavanoshandisa, saka kana hurumende ikaunza mari iyi vanhu vangafara nekuti zvema RTGS hazvisi zvinovafadza. Asi hurumende inosungirwavo kuchengetedza chiremera chemari iyi nekurega zvekuzodhindadhinda mari sezvayaimboita makore apfuura," Professor Masocha vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzotaura Pamusoro peLockdown
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuwedzerwa kwaitwa Level 4 Covid-19 Lockdown nemamwe masvondo maviri kusvika musi wa Gunyana 7. Mumwe mutengesi wemumugwagwa audza Studio 7 kuti kuwedzerwa kwelockdown kunoreva kuti hupenyu hwavo hucharamba hwakavaomera sezvo vanhu vanenge vasina kusununguka kuti vafambe vachitenga zvavanoda. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, uye vachishanda ne Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vati vange vari kutarisira kuti lockdown iyi ichisvika kumagumo senzira yokusimudzira makambani. Mutungamiriri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatiwo vatambira kuwedzerwa kwenguva yelockdown senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid 19. Asi vati chikumbiro chavo kuhurumende ndechekuti dai nguva yekuvhurwa kwezvitoro yawedzerwa vachiti vanenge vari kumabasa havana nguva yekupinda muzvitoro. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vatambira danho rekuwedzera lockdown level 4vanoshushukana nekusavapo kwegadziriro yekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Asi nyanzvi munezvehutano huye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vati kupamhidzirwa kwelockdown hakuna zvakuri kubetsera kunyanya vakatarisa nyaya yezvekufambisa. VaMadzorera, avo vanove munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, vati kurambidzwa kwezvekufambisa zvinotakura veruzhinji zvisiri pasi pekambani yeZupco kwasiya vanhu vaine dambudziko izvo zvoita kuti vanhu vamanikidzane mumotokari shoma dziriko izvo zvichawedzera njodzi yekubata chirwere ichi. Gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa nezuro kuti hurumende yawedzera lockdown nemasvondo mavirisenzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. Vakatiwo hurumende icharamba ichitenga nhomba kuti vese vanoda vabayiwe. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi mavirinevanomwe, uye vanhu mazana matatu neguminevapfumbamwe (319) vakabatwa nechirwere ichi Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri(123 320), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemazana matatu nemakumi maviri , (4 320). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi masere nezviviri nemazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe (2 382 359). Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezviuru mazana mashanu nezvitanhatu nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu(1 506 445). Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veForestry Commission Voyaura neNhamo
text: Vashandi veForestry Commission vanoti vanoda rubatsiro nekuti vave nemakore akawanda vasingapiwe mari dzavo dzakakwana. Mumwe wevashandi ava, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita, ati anovimba kuti gurukota idzva rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vachavabata zviri nani pane zvavaiitwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Mushandi uyu anoti VaChinamasa ndivo vakaita kuti Forestry Commission isave pasi pehurumende muna 2015. Munyori mukuru we National Employment Council for Lumber Milling, Timber Processing and Trading Industry, VaZakia Tagwirei, vanoti chimwe chakakonzera izvi ndechokuti vashandi ava havasi pasi pesangano rinomirira vashandi. “Zvave nenguva chaizvo, kusvika kumakore matanhatu vashandi ivava ava vachipihwa mari dziri pasi pedzakatarwa pamutemo,” VaTagwirei vaudza Studio 7. “Havana kumbosvika kwatiri kuzotsvaka rubatsiro. Ndinoona sekuti chinovatadzisa kusvika kusaziva kuti veNational Employment Council inovabatsira kusvika papi…asi tichavabatsira kana vakatiudza.” Vashandi vakawanda vari mudambudziko iri ndivo vanoita basa recheka matanda vachiatengesa. No media source currently available

headline: UNDP Yovimbisa Zimbabwe Zvose Zvainoda Kuitira Sarudzo Dzakachena
text: Mukuru weUnited Nations Development Program, UNDP, VaAchim Steiner, avo vasvika muHarare neChina, vaudza vatori venhau kuti UNDP ichabatsira Zimbabwe nezvese zvainoda kuita sarudzo dzejekerere. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pane imwe hotera muHarare mushure mekusangana negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSteiner vati vachabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yezvese zvingadiwe neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. VaSteiner vati pamusoro pekuzvipira kweUNDP mukuona kuti Zimbabwe yaita sarudzo dzisina mvongamupopoto, vatiwo vakazvipira kushanda neZimbabwe kuti ibude mumatope maiiri munyaya dzehupfumi. VaSteiner vati vachasangana nemapazi ehurumende akasiyana-siyana pamwe nemamwe masangano kuti vaite hurukuro dzekuzeya kuti zvii zvangade kuitwa kuti sarudzo dzegore rino dzive dzakachena. Gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Doctor Sibusiso Moyo, vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti rwendo rwuno hurumende yeZimbabwe yakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzakachena huye dzisina mhirizhonga. VaMoyo vatiwo sarudzo dzakachena dzichabatsira kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane nedzimwe nyika zvakasununguka zvinozobatsira kuunza budiriro munyika. VaSteiner vachasangana nevanhu pamwe nemasangano akasiyasiyana kusvika nemusi weMugovera panopera rwendo rwavo rwekushanyira Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Akapakata Zvombo Anorambidza Musangano weCitizens'Coalition for Change kuMarondera
text: Mapurisa nhasi arambidza mutungamiri weCitizens Coalition for Change, VaNelson Chamisa, kuita musangano nevatsigiri vavo kuMarondera ndokuvapa maminitsi mashomanana ekuti vaudze vatsigiri vavo kuti vaparare. Mapurisa anga akapakatira pfuti nezvamboko uye achifamba nembwa nhasi afumira kunovhara mikova yenhandare yenhabvu yeRudhaka Stadium kuMarondera umo manga muchifanira kuitwa musangano naVaChamisa nevatsigiri vavo. Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri veCCC zvanga zvauya kumusangano uyu zvazoswera zvichiimba zviri panze penhandare iyi zvakamirira hutungamiri hwebato razvo hwanga hwaenda kumatare kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe. Pavazopihwa mukana nemapurisa wekuti vaudze vatsigiri vavo kuti vaparare, VaChamisa vati hapana chabuda kumatare kwavanga vaenda. VaChamisa vati havadi zvemhirizhonga ndosaka vateerera kurambidzwa kwavaitwa nemapurisa vachiti kana bato ravo rikapinda mumasimba hapana mupurisa kana musoja achadzingwa basa vachiti mapurisa nemasoja vanofanira kushanda vasina divi ravakarerekera. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaOstallos Siziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuenderera mberi nemusangano wavo wekuDulibadzimu Stadium kuBeitbridge mangwana zvisineyi nezvaitika nhasi vachiti chinovashamisa ndechekuti Zanu PF iri kungoita misangano yayo pasina kana dambudziko. Mumwe mutsigiri weCCC anga auya kumusangano wanhasi warambidzwa nemapurisa uyu, Amai Jane Chikandwa, vati kunyange hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yarambidza VaChamisa kuita musangano nevatsigiri vavo nhasi hapana chichazovamisa kuvhotera pavanoda. Tamboedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi asi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi mamwe mapurisa anga achirambidza veCCC kuita musangano wavo anga achiti ari kutyira kuti chirwere cheCovid 19 chinogona kupararira kana musangano uyu wakabvumidzwa kuenderera mberi. Asi izvi zvanga zvichipikiswa nevatungamiri veCCC vanosanganisira VaCharlton Hwende naVaAmos Chibaya pavanga vachitaura nemapurisa aya vachiti kana Covid 19 iriko zvechokwadi bato reZanu PF rinofanirwawo kurambidzwa kuita misangano yaro. Vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzema by-elections dzekutsvaga mumiriri weMarondera Central muparamende ndiVaCaston Matewu veCCC, VaIgnatius Mateveke vari kumirira Zanu PF pamwe naVaWitness Muzavazi avo vari kumirira MDC Alliance. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muAmerica Zvawaniswa Mukana Weku Tenga Dzimba ne Steward Bank
text: No media source currently available Bhanga re Steward Bank rinoti rine hurongwa hwekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvikwanise kutenga dzimba pasina kusungirwa kubhadhara zvikamu kubva muzana zvemari yemba inenge ichida kutengwa. ​Mumwe weavo vari kuronga chirongwa ichi muAmerica vakamirira Steward Bank, muzvare Revesayi Nyahasha, vanoti vachange vachiparura chirongwa ichi kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuDallas Texas neMugovera. Izvi zvinotevera chirongwa chekutanga chakaitirwa muWashington DC neChishanu chapfuura. Muzvare Nyahasha vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vawane pekusvikira kana vachinge vashanya kumusha pavanoti pavo, uye vanokwanisawo kuchengeta hama dzavo mudzimba idzi dzinenge dziri mumazita avo. "Chirongwa ichi chirikutambirwa zvakanaka chaizvo muAmerica uye tiri kushandisa chizvino zvino chema Apps mukubatsira vanenge vachida kupinda muchirongwa ichi padandemutande. Vanokwanisa kushandisa app yedu mukuvhura bhuku rekubhangi yedu uye mukuzo tenga imba pasi pechirongwa chedu ichi," Muzvare Nyahasha vaudza Studio 7.

headline: Mumwe weVechidiki Anorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Otyorwa Gumbo Mushure Mekupambwa neVasori
text: Mumwe wevari kutungamira nyaya yekuratidzira kusatambira kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes, VaIshmael Kauzani, vakapambwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakarorwa zvakaipisisa uye kutsikwa gumbo nemotokari richibva ratyoka. VaKauzani vari muchipatara chemuHarare mu “intensive care unit” munorapwa vanenge vachirwarisa. Mukoma wavo, VaGodfrey Kauzani, vakaurayiwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori muna 2008 apo panonzi pakaurayiwa vechidiki vakawanda veMDC-T munguva yesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzechipiri kana kuti run off. Vamwe vechidiki vatanhatu vakasungwawo nemusi weChitatu vachinzi vaikurudzira vanhu kuti vasatambire mabond notes vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zana remadhora. Pane vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso, pane mukomana ane makore gumi nemashanu anonzi Costa Zvokusekwa. NeChina vamwe vechikwata cheTajamuka vatatu vanosanganisira VaPromise Mkwananzi vakasungwa neMuvhuro vakapihwawo mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso inosvika madhora mazana maviri. Vose vari kusungwa vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chechimakumi matatu nenomwe chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act vachinzi vari kukurudzira mhirizhonga uye kuita musarinya. Magweta ari kumirira vanhu ava inhengo dzeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava naVaJeremiah Bamu. VaShava vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe vanhu vakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso vari kushaya mari kumabhanga zvopa kuti vasungwe vagare mujeri kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanoti Vari Kucherechedza Kuzvitonga kweNyika Miromo Yakaoma neNzara
text: Apo nyika iri kupemberera mangwana kusvitsa kwayo makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe kubva payawana kuzvitonga muna 1980, vamwe vanoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchienda kumawere zvisinei kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakavimbisa kugadzirisa zvinhu pavakapinda pachigaro. VaMoses Kumbweya, avo vanorarama nekurima nekutengesa zvirimwa zvakasiyana-siyana, vanoti vanoshushikana nenyaya yekuti hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchiwondomoka; veruzhinji vachiwedzera kutambura, zvisinei nezvinotaurwa nemutungamiri naVaMnangagwa pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende. VaKumbweya vanoti VaMnangagwa vakavimbisa kugadzirisa hupfumi uye kukwezva vekunze kuti vasime mari. Asi vanoti maonero avo ndeekuti mutungamiri wenyika nehurumende yavo havana zano rakati tsvikiti rekubudisa nyika mumatambudziko ayakatarisana nawo. VaKumbweya vanoti nyaya yekuti zvirango zvakatemerwa mamwe makambani pamwe nevamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende nedzimwe nyika dzekumadokero, ndizvo zviri kukonzera kusagadzikana kwehupfumi, kuhwanda nemunwe kwavari kuita. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muBritain uye chiri chipangamazano munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvare Miriam Mutizwa, vanotsigirawo kuti zvirango hazvisi izvo zviri kukonzera matmbudziko ari munyika asi kuti huwori pamwe nekusatevera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri webato reZapu, VaIphithule Maphosa, vanoti zuva rekucherechedza rusununguko rinogona kupfuura veruzhinji vasinganyanyi kuri koshesa nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Vanotiwo kunyange hazvo pakazoitwa sarudzo, mapindiro akaita VaMnangagwa pahutungamiri uye makakatanwa akatevera mushure mesarudzo gore rapera, ndizvo zviri kuita kuti zvinhu munyika zvisagadzikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMaphosa vanotiwo kutaura kwemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nekufamba vachienda kunyika dzakasiyana-siyana vachiedza kukwezva kusimwa kwemari yekunze munyika, hakuna zvinobatika zvakuri kuunza vachitsinhirawo kuti VaMnangagwa nehurumende yavo, vanenge vari kupererwa nemazano. Mukuru weAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMatabeleland, variwo muongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira, VaReginald Shoko, vanoti dambudziko guru nderekuti VaMnangagwa vakatora hutungamiri apo hupfumi hwenyika hwaive hwatowondomoka kare, vachiti kugadzirisa izvi kunotora nguva. Asi VaShoko vanobvumawo kuti nyaya yehuwori ndiro rimwe dambudziko guru rinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuitira kuti zvinhu zvinake. Mutauriri wemadzimai muMDC mudunhu reBulawayo, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, avo vanove zvakare munyori weboka reWomen’s Committee musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, vanotiwo hapana chekupemberera pazuva rerusununguko vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika kunonyanya kubata vanhukadzi sezvo vari ivo vanoona kuti mhuri dzadyei. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo. Asi vachitaura pavakatoreswa mhiko, VaMnangagwa vakati vakanga vakazvipira kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, vachiti hurumende yavo ichavhura mikana yekutanga mabizinesi kuitira kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Mumazuva mashoma apfuura, sangano reZCTU rakakurudzira kuti vashandi munyika vawedzerwe mari dzemihoro. Pavakapinda pachigaro muna Mbudzi wa2017, VaMnangagwa vakati kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika ndicho chimwe chezvinhu zvavaizokoshesa. Asi hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchienda kumawere mitengo yezvinhu ichiramba ichikwira ukuwo mari ichiramba ichishaya simba rekutenga. Zimbabwe yakawana kuzvitonga musi wa 18 Kubvumbi, 1980, VaRobert Mugabe vakagadzwa semutungamiri wehurumende, vakatonga nyika kwemakore makumi matatu nemanomwe. Asi vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto avo muna 2017, VaMnangagwa vachibva vatora chigaro chavo. No media source currently available

headline: Boka reVezvitoro Rinokura muGore Rino Kunyange Paine Zvimhingamipinyi zveCovid-19
text: Vakuru vakati kuipa kwechimwe kunakana kwechimwe. Izvi ndizvo zvinenge zvakaitika muboka rezvekutengeserana revezvitoro, iro rinoti kunyange hazvo rakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nedenda reCovid-19 rakatokura nezvikamu zvishanu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 5.1 precent mugore rino. Izvi zvakaziviswa nemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vezvitoro, reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers VaDenford Mutashu svondo rapera vachiti vanofara kuti boka ravo rakakura nezvikamu zvavakanga vakatarisira gore rino kunyange hazvo rakasangana nezvimhingamipinyi zvakakonzerwa nedenda iri. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa re Nationalists Alliance Party uye vari nhengo ye Polad, VaDivine Hove, vanoti nyaya iyi ine mativi akati kuti kuti munhu anyatsonzwisisa zviri kuitika pasi apa, vachiti zvinenge zvakakosha kuti panzwisiswe kuti kukura kuri kutaurwa uku kuri kubva papi kuchienda papi. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanotsanangura zvinotariswa pakukura kuri kutaurwa uku vachiti vanenge vachitarisa zvigadzirwa zvavanenge vatengesa mugore rino, vachienzanisa nezvavakatengesa mugore rapera. Asi VaHove vanoti kunyange hazvo pachida kunzwisiswa kuti zvinhu zviri kufamba sei, vanoti zvinenge zviri zvinhu zvakanaka chose kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwakakura munguva yezvimhingamipinyi zvedenda reCovid-19. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehupfumi uye vakambotungamira sangano reEmployers’ Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vanotiwo kukura kweboka revezvitoro uku kwakave minana chaiyo pachitariswa matambudziko akawanda akakonzerwa neCovid-19 anosanganisira kuderedwa kwenguva dzekuvhurwa kwezvitoro, uye kumbovharwa kweboka revanozvishandira rinove ndiro rave guru kudarika vakabairwa zvitupa. Imwe nyanzvi vari munyori wezvehupfumi mubato reMDC-T, Doctor Tapiwa Mashakada vane mamwe maonero panyaya iyi, Asi Doctor Mashakada vanoti chinonetsa muboka iri inyaya yemitengo iri kuita chamurambamhuru. Vamwe vanotevera zvehupfumi vanoti kunyange pakaita matambudziko akadii, veruzhinji vanototi vatenge zvekudya nezvekupfeka, izvo zvinogona kunge zvakaita kuti boka iri rikure. Mune dzimwe nyika vanoongorora zvehupfumi vanoti boka iri rakatokura munguva yeCovid-19 ino sezvo vanhu vakawanda vakanga vasina zvekuita kunze kwekutenga zvinhu muzvitoro kana pamadandemitande. Sezvo nyika yatarisana nemwaka wekurima pamwe nezororo reKisimusi, boka rezvekutengesa iri rinogona kuwedzera zvakare kukura kwaro sezvo vanhu vari kuita besanwa muzvitoro. No media source currently available

headline: MUSHEKWI ANE ZVIPO . . . kunze kwebhora anotamba rugby, basketball nemujaho
text: MUNIN’INA waNyasha Mushekwi uyo anove mutambi wemaWarriors nechikwata cheZhejiang Greentown chekuChina – Elvis Mushekwi – anoti mukoma wake munhu ane zvipo zvemitambo yakasiyana izvo zvakamuona achitamba mitambo yakadai serugby nebasketball uye zvenhabvu akaita zvemasanga nazvo.   Mukukura kwake, Nyasha aiitawo zvemutambo wemujaho wekumhanya zvakare. Nhabvu wakange usiri mutambo waaitamba zvakanyanya asi ndiwo wakazomuona achienda kunotambira kunyika dziri kunze dzinosanganisira South Africa, Belgium, Sweden nekuChina uko ari kutambira parizvino.   Elvis anoti Nyasha munhu ane zvipo zvemitambo yakawanda zvekuti dai asina kutamba nhabvu angadai akabudirira mune mimwe mitambo inosanganisira basketball kana rugby.   “Vanhu vanoziva Nyasha achitamba nhabvu asi mukukura kwake aitamba rugby, basketball nemujaho wekumhanya. Basketball yaive shasha manje uye akahwina mibairo yawakanda. Zvenhabvu zvakazongoitikawo asingafungire, akangonozama raki rake ndokupihwa mukana kuCAPS United uye kubva ipapo haana kuzotarira shure,” anodaro Elvis.   Nyasha akatanga kutamba nhabvu mugore ra2008 apo aive kuCAPS United uye ndokuzotengwa neMamelodi Sundowns yekuSouth Africa mushure memakore mashoma ndokugadzira zita rake. Muchinda uyu akazobva achienda kunotambira kuEurope kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira KV Oostende yekuBelgium kozoti Djurgardens yekuSweden uko kwaakanopisa akanwisa ka12 mumitambo 21 yaakatambira chikwata ichi.   Matambiro aakaita kuSweden, ndiwo akamuona achitengwa neDalian Yifang yekuChina iyo yaakatambira kwemakore mana uye ndokubatsira chikwata ichi kubva muDivision One chichizopinda muSuper League umo chiri kutambira parizvino. Ari kuchikwata ichi, Nyasha akambotamba nevatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saYannick Carrasco wekuBelgium uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Monaco yekuFrance uye Atletico Madrid yekuSpain kozoti Marek Hamsik wekuSlovakia akambonetsa achitambira Napoli yekuItaly.   Muchikwata ichi maive zvakare nechizvarwa chekuArgentina Nicolas Gaitan uyo aimbotambira Benfica yekuPortugal neAtletico Madrid. Elvis anoti iye naNyasha pamwe nemumwe mukoma wake – Ishamel – nehanzvadzi yavo vakachengetwa naambuya vavo sezvo amai vavo vachigara kunyika yeEngland.   Anoti ambuya vavo vaisada kuti Nyasha atambe nhabvu asi kuti aite zvemabhuku uye nemimwe mitambo asi iye zvino vanodada naye nekubudirira kwaakazoita mumutambo uyu.   “Takakura tichichengetwa nagogo, amai vedu vaenda kuEngland uko vanogara vachishanda. Saka gogo vaida kuti tiite zvemabhuku asi Nyasha akangoshinga akaenderera mberi nenhabvu. Asi nhasi vanodada nekubudirira kwaakaita nemutambo uyu uye kwaasvika nawo nhasi.   “Kuburikidza nenhabvu, ari kutichengeta uye ari kubatsira vanhu vakawanda,” anodaro.   Mumhuri mavo, Nyasha ndiye akakwanisa kutamba nhabvu zvekusvika kure. Ishmael anonzi akambozama raki rake kuCAPS United asi akazofunga zvekusiya ndokutanga kuita zvemabhizimisi.   Elvis anoti iye ari kuenda kuchikoro chekubika sezvo achida kuzoita basa rehuchef.   “Ini ndine rudo munyaya dzekubika, ndofarira kubika zvikuru saka ndizvo zvandiri kuendera kuchikoro. Nyasha ndiye anotondikurudzira kuti ndienderere mberi nezvandinoda kuita. Nhabvu handina hangu kumboita shungu nayo zvakanyanya, asi mumwe mukoma wangu Ishmael ndiye akamboenda kuCAPS United asi haana kuzosvika kure,” anodaro.   Nyasha aive muzvikwata zviviri zvemaWarriors zvakakwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations mugore ra2017 kuGabon uye negore rino kuEgypt.

headline: Seneta Rejoice Timire, Avo Vakashaya neChirwere cheCovid-19, Varadzikwa Nhasi muHarare
text: Mumwe wevanga vachimirira vakaremara mudare reSenate, Amai Rejoice Timire. avo vakashaya nezuro nedenda reCovid-19, varadzikwa nhasi kumarinda eGlen Forest muHarare. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaAmai Timire, sachigaro veNational Disability Board, Amai Mercy Maunganidze, vati vachaedza nepose pavanogona napo kuti mabasa akanaka aiitwa naAmai Timire, aenderere mberi. Vasara vakamirira vakaremara mudare reSeneti, VaWatson Khupe, vati vakaremara vasiyirwa chisveru chekuti vagare vachishanda zvakasimba sezvaiita Amai Timire. Mukuru weDeaf Zimbabwe Trust,Amai Babra Nyangairi, vatiwo vakaremara vanofanira kufambisa mberi mabasa aibatwa naAmai Timire. Hanzvadzi yaAmai Timire, Bishop Sevenzile Msiza, vati semhuri varasikirwa zvikuru. Muzvare Pamela Timire, avo vaishanda pamwe chete naamai vavo, vatiwo ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwarasikirwa nekushaya kwaita Seneta Timire. Amai Timire, avo vakadomwa kuva nhengo yeSenate muna 2018, vashaya vava nemakore makumi matanhatu nemaviri ekuberekwa, uye vasiya vana vashanu nevazukuru. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaremara Vanoti Hurumende Ngaishanda neMakambani Kuti Ivabatsire neZvikwanisiro
text: Vamwe vakaremara vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ishande pamwechete nemakambani nemasangano akazvimirira mukutsvaga nzira yekuti vawane zvekushandisa zvinoita kuti hupenyu hwavo hureruke. Pastor Thomas Muchadenyika, avo vanogara kuNew Marimba muHarare vakaremara makumbo ese uye vanoshandisa madondoro vanoti kushayikwa kwezvikwanisiro kuri kuita kuti vakaremara vakawanda mumadhorobha nekumaruwa vatadze kushanda mabasa avo akasiyana siyana nekuendawo kuzvikoro. “Pane zvekushandisa zvevakaremara hazvisi kutowanikwa munyika muno.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Hongu hurumende yakanga yati yabvisa mutero kana kuti duty pane zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara zvakaita semadondoro, ma wheel chair nezvinoshandiswa nematsi kana mahearing aids, asi kuti munhu aende kunze kwenyika kunozvitenga mari yacho anenge asina, nekuti haasi kunopihwa mahara.” Mukuru weZimbabwe Albino Association Mai Mercy Maunganidze Chimanga vanoti nyaya yekushayikwa kwezvekushandisa zvevakaremara yave nenguva yakareba isingagadziriswe, “Nyaya yema assistive technologies yakakoshera vanhu vakaremara muhupenyu hwavo,”vanodaro Amai Chimanga. Vanotiwo, “Kubva tichitanga organisation muna 1996 tanga tichichema nehurumende yeZimbabwe kuti dai ma sunscreen lotion aiswa pa essential drugs list sezvo anoshandiswa zuva nezuva. Taitaura takatarisa vanhu vari HIV positive vanotora ma ARVs. Ma assistive devices aya anodhura uye vazhinji vedu havakwanise kuatenga. Uye zvikashayikwa zvinokoresa disability yemunhu.” Mai Chimanga vanoti hurumende inofanira kupa rutsigiro kumakambani kuti zvikwanisiro zvevakaremara zvigadzirwe muZimbabwe. “Iye zvino mukazvitarisa vanhu vane mental health vane mapiritsi avo anoda kutorwa pamwedzi pega pega, ve epilepsy vanoda mishonga yavo zvekare asi havasi kuzokwanisa kuzviita.” Vaenderera mberi vachiti mamwe matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende akanangana nekurerutsira vakaremara haasi kushanda. VaShingirai Nyakupinda vekuSunningdale muHarare vanova nhengo yeTracy Nyakupinda Albino Foundation vanoti zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinofanira kunge zvichiita ongororo netsvagurudzo pamusoro pezvikwanisiro zvevakaremara. “Hakuna chati chaitwa in terms of research pane zvinhu zvinobatsira vanhu, tichizvigadzirira tega tisingamirire kupihwa nema donors,” vanodaro VaNyakupinda. Vanoenderera mberi vachitiwo, Mahigher educational institutions edu pane ma projects avanoita vanokwanisa kugadzira zvakawanda. Tikatarisa ma hearing aids kana ma white cane, zvinhu zvinokwanisa kugadzirwa muno pasina zvekuzombomira pa waiting list. Saka tanga tichitarisira kuti kupera kwegore rino kana kutanga kwerinouya zvinhu zvichashanduka mu Zimbabwe tikwanise kuve ne progress paku addressa zvinhu zvakadai.” VaNyakupinda vanoti masangano evakaremara ndiwo anofanira kutaurirana nezvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vabatsirane nehurumende kugadzira zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara. VaEvans Tarwirei Chigariro vanodzidzisa mechanical engineering paHarare Polytechnic vanoti vakaremara ndivo vanofanira kutungamirira hurongwa hwekugadzirwa kwezvikwanisiro zvavo muno, asi chekutanga vanofanira kupihwa mukana wekuzviita. VaChigariro vanoti chinhu chinobatsira vakaremara chinofanira kugadzirwa naivo varidzi nekuti ndivo vanoziva zvavanoda. “Asingagone kutaura asi achiona anodzidziswa language yacho iyoyo, zvinoita, asingaone anodzidziswa, asinganzwe anotichwa, “ vanodaro VaChigariro. Vatiwo, “ Tiri mubishi rekunyora mapepa ekuti pamwe President akazviona anozvipasisa zvopindawo muma colleges edu. Zvototanga kushanda mugore ratiri kupinda ra2020. Research yatiri kutaura iyi haiitwi nemunhu ari able-bodied nekuti haana disability maari. Zvinoda kuti tidzidzise ari disabled wacho iyeye topedzisira tave nema leaders anoziva zve disability.” Sangano World Health Organisation rinoti munhu mumwechete pagumi rega rega revanhu vakaremara ari kurarama asina zvikwanisiro nekuda kwekudhura kwazvo pamwe nekutadza kunzwisisa nyaya dzevakaremara nevatungamiri venyika dzose zvadzo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Inoti Zimbabwe Inoda Mari Yakawandisa Kuti Ivandudze Hupfumi
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutoda kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari ine chitsama yainopihwa kamwe chete kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe zvine mutsindo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChishanu, munyori anowona nezvehupfumi mu MDC-T, Va Webber Chinyadza, vati hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere nepamusana pekutadza kutonga kuri kuita hurumende ye Zanu PF vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura kusvika pahwakambosvika muna 1972 nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. No media source currently available Kuti zvinhu zvinakire veruzhinji munyika, Va Chinyadza vati pave kutoda mari ine chitsama inopihwa nyika kuti isimudzire kumutsiridzwa kwemaindaisitiri, nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa pamwe nezvimwe zvese zvakabata hupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinyadza vati hurumende haisi kukoshesawo nyaya dzekurima dzinove dzakabata hupfumi vachiti hurumende haisi kuisa mari yakawanda munyaya dzekudiridzira sezvo mamiriro ekunze ari kushanduka. Vati panofanirwa kuiswa mari inoita bhiriyoni rimwe nemazana manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora munyaya dzekurima asi chiri kuvashamisa ndechekuti hurumende yakaisa miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora munyaya dzekudiridzira zvirimwa mumwaka wegore rino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri we Zanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wenyika vari zvakare mutungamiri we Zanu PF, Va Robert Mugabe, vakaudza nyika neChipiri kuti vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimuka kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda vakazvimiria, Va Masimba Manyanya, avo vaimbova mukuru aiwona nezvehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, vaudza Studio7 kuti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Nekune rumwe rutivi, gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, neChina vakakumbira masangano anokweretesa mari akaita se International Monetary Fund ne World Bank kuti abatsire Zimbabwe nekuikweretesa mari kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemakore anodarika makore gumi isati yambowana kana kobiri kubva ku World Bank vachiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nekusapihwa mari kwairi kuitwa nebhanga repasi rose iri. Asi mumiriri we World Bank mu Zimbabwe, Va Guang Zhen Chen, vakaudza Va Chinamasa kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa mitemo yose nezvimwe zvese zviri kutadzisa kuti vekunze vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vauye. Mumiriri weIMF muZimbabwe, VaChristian Beddies, vakaudza Studio7 kutanga kwesvondo rino Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvose kuitira kuti ipihwe chikwereti chitsva. Va Manyanya vati chimwe chinoda kugadziriswa inyaya dzematongerwo enyika kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana mari yairi kuda iyi. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti kunze chemari inoita mabhiriyoni masere nezviuru mazana mana emadhora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kutadza kuri kuita Zimbabwe kubhadhara chikwereti ichi kumasangano anokweretesa mari kuri kuita kuti hurumende isakwanise kupihwa zvimwe zvikwereti zvemiri yairi kuda kusimudzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.

headline: Makakatanwa Ekushandisa Zviri Pamutemo Zita reMDC Atanga
text: Mapato anopikisa maviri, eMDC-T neMDC Alliance, atanga zvekare kukandirana makobvu nematete achirwira zita rekuti MDC Alliance. Mutauriri weMDC-T, inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, VaLlyod Damba, vaudza Studio 7 kuti MDC Alliance yakaumbwa nebato reMDC, apo vaimbove mutungamiri webato iri, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, vakakoka mapato anokwikwidza kuti abatane mukubvisa pachigaro bato reZanu-PF, vachiti naizvozvo, MDC Alliance chizvarwa cheMDC-T. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti izvi ndezvekurota. VaHlatywayo vanoti zviri pachena kuti VaMwonzora vari kutadza kutungamira bato ravo naizvozvo, nguva zhinji , vanotsvaka nzira dzekuba zvirongwa zvaitwa neMDC Alliance pamwe chete nekuvhiringa vanhu vakasarudzwa kupinda mudare reParamende nemumakanzuru vari pasi peMDC Alliance. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaDamba, vanoti zvekushandisa zita rekuti MDC Alliance kwebato raVaChamisa zvave kusvika kwamvura yacheka makumbo. VaDamba vanoti zviri pachena kuti hakuna chinonzi MDC Alliance, vachiti MDC-T yakatora muzinda weMDC, ikadzinga vamiriri veMDC Alliance muparamende nemumakanzuru asi avo vanozviti iMDC Alliance vakatadza kudzivirira kuti zvisaitika nekuti hakuna chinonzi MDC Alliance. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa Yozeya Nzira dzeKuti Zimbabwe Yobuda Sei Mukanwa Mamupere
text: Nhasi bazi rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa raita musangano muPretoria wange wakanangana nekuzeya matambudziko ari muZimbabwe uye kuti angagadziriswe sei. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa Amai Naledi Pandor vanoti South Africa inofunga kuti vana veZimbabwe vakabatana vanokwanisa kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika yavo vavakidzani vozongobatsirawo zvishoma. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemumiriri weZimbabwe kuSouth Africa VaDavid Hamadziripi avo vange vari mumwe munyarikani pagungano vatambirawo mashoko aAmai Pandor ekuti zvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvibviswe. No media source currently available Vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wehurumende yeZimbabwe Muzvinafundo Arthur Mutambara vange vari pamusangano uyu vatiwo zvakakosha kuti zvirango zvibviswe asi Zimbabwe inofanira kutanga yazvichenura nekuita zvido zvevana vayo vose. No media source currently available Vamwe vataura pamusangano uyu vanosanganisiri mukuru wechikoro cheUNISA VaMandla Makhanya uye VaSomadoda Fikeni vepaUNISA zvekare, VaPhilani Mthembu veInstitute for Global Dialogue, VaShingirirai Mutanga veAfrica Institute of South Africa, VaPhilani Mthembu veInstitute for Global Dialogue, VaShingirirai Mutanga veAfrica Institute of South Africa

headline: Knowledge Musona neZimbabwe Vangasimudze Here Mukombe weCOSAFA
text: Chikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors chiri kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wacho wekutanga mumakwikwi eCOSAFA Cup nemusi weSvodo uye chiri kusimuka munyika mangwana. Asi zimbabwe haina vatambi vana vari kutarisirwa kubatana nevamwe muharare nhasi vasati vasimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa vanoti Knowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Tino Kadewere naCosta Nhamoinesu. Zimbabwe yakasimudza mukombe uyu kashanu nekudaro iri kutangira padanho repamusoro re Quarter Final. Ichatamba nenyika inenge yakunda muGroup B mune nyika dzakaita seBotswana, Angola, Malawi ne Mauritius. South Africa inova iri kuitirwa mitambo iyi ichatamba mumaQuarter Finals neanenge akunda mugroup A umo mune Comoros islands, Mozambique, Madagascar ne Seychelles. Mamwe maQuarter Finals anenge ari pakati peZambia yakatora mukombe muna 2015 neNamibia kochizoti Swaziland neLesotho. Gore rapera Zimbabwe ndiyo yakasimudza mukombe uyu.

headline: Mudzimai wekutanga kuridza pembe kuWC
text: wechidzimai wekuFrance — Stephanie Frappart — achanyora nhoroondo nemusi weChina apo achaita mudzimai wekutanga kuridza kumutambo weWorld Cup wevarume.   FIFA yakazivisa kuti Frappart ndiye acharidza pamutambo weCosta Rica neGermany.   Achange ari muchikwata chemadzimai vacharidza mumutambo uyu nevamwe vanosanganisira Neuza Back wekuBrazil naKaren Diaz wekuMexico avo vachange vari vatevedzeri vake. — The African Referees Platform

headline: Nyika Dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe Dzotora Matanho paCoronavirus
text: Nyika dzakakomberedza Zimbabwe mudunhu dziri kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCOVID-19 kana kuti Coronavirus izvo zvoita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvisare zvomerwe pakupinda munyika idzi. Nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe dzinoti Botswana, Zambia, Mozambique neSouth Africa dziri kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupinda kwe Coronavirus munyika idzi kubudikidza nekutora matanho akasimba panzvimbo dzinopinda nevanhu vachibva kune imwe nyika. Botswana yakazivisa kuti yavhara miganhu yayo nemusi weChipiri ukuwo South Africa iri mubushi rekukurudzira kuti vagari vemunyika iyi vasabude mudzimba kutanga neChina, Kurume 26, kwemasvondo matatu. Zambia, Namibia neMozambique dziri kuitawo mushandirapamwe nedzimwe nyika dziri mudungu reSADC mukuvhara zvikoro uye kurambidza kuungana kwevanhu vazhinji senzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere icho chakatanga mudhorobha reWuhan KuChina muna Zvita gore rapera. Asi matanho ari kutorwa nenyika dzakakomberedza Zimbabwe ari kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviomerwe kupinda munyika idzi. Sachigaro wesangano reVendors Initiative and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuvharwa kwemabhodha kuchaita kuti vanhu vadye nhoko dzezvironda sezvo ruzhinji rwuchirarama nekutenga midziyo kuvavakidzani veZimbabwe kuti vatengese munyika. VaWadzai vanoti hurumende yakafanira kuona kuti ingabatsire sei hungwandangwanda hwevanhu vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa sezvo kutengesa ndiko kuri kuwanisa ruzhinji cheuviri. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chinotyaira bhazi rinofamba pakati pedhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana neHarare, VaMicheal Muzondiwa, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu aita kuti vapererwe nebasa. Asi Muzvare Peace Gwatidzo vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinofanirwa kutevedzera yambiro dziri kupihwa nemapazi ezvehutano enyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe nokuti ndiyo nzira chete ingapedze kupararora kweCoronavirus. Hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yakavharawo mabhodha nemusi weMuvhuro mushure mekunge Zororo Makamba ashaika nokuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Nyika iri mudambudziko guru rechirwere cheCoronavirus mudunhu reSADC iSouth Africa iyo ine vanhu mazana manomwe nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC-T Vorohwa paRufu neVatsigiri veZanu-PF kuShamva
text: Vamwe vatsigiri veMovement for Democratic Change vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemusi weChina kuMadziva, Shamva North, Mashonaland Central nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Vanhu ava vakarohwa vachiviga imwe nhengo yebato iri yeWomens Assembly amai Evangalista Kaundikisa. Vamwe vakarwiswa vanosanganisa Senator Lilian Timveos. Asi mumwe mutsigiri weMDC-T Memory Mbondiya anonzi akakuvara akaendeswa kuchipatara. Amai Timveos vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatanga vatyisidzirwa kuti vainge vakapfeka hembe dzeMDC- T vasati vatanga kurwiswa. "Ini ndakapona nepasaka reshumba sezvo ndakapotswa nedanda ndichida kurohwa. Ndakadonha ndokuzobatsirwa nevamwe vebato rangu." Mai Timveos vakadaro. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF vanonzi vainge vasingadi kuti muchakabvu avigwe kumusha kwake uko vange vachiti hakuvigwe vanhu vanobva kubato rinopikisa. Mufi akatozovigwa mushure mekunge kwauya mapurisa kubva kuShamva Police Station. Mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika inende yave kuramba ichiwedzera munyika ichinzi nevakawana iri kukonzerwa nevebato reZanu-PF. Vatsigiri veZanu-PF mumasvondo maviri apfuura vakarwisa vatsigiri veMDC-T kuKambuzuma nemusi weSvondo uye vakarwisawo vatsigiri veZimbabwe People First kuChinhoyi nemusi weChitatu. VaGilbert Kagodora, nhengo yeMDC yange iri parufu urwu vati Zanu-PF inotya kuti MDC ipinde mudunhu iri nekutya kukundwa musarudzo. No media source currently available Mapurisa ekuShamva anonzi akangonyora mazita evanhu vanonzi vainge vaita mhirizhonga vakati vachaaendesa kuLaw and Order. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mapurisa aya kuti tinzwe divi ravo.

headline: IMF Inoti maBond Notes Haangagadzirise Dambudziko reMari muZimbabwe
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund, kana kuti IMF, rinoti kuparurwa kwakaitwa mari yemabond notes neZimbabwe hakupedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Mashoko aya ari kuuya apo Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kutumira matikitivha kuzvitoro kuti isunge vanonzi havasi kuendesa mari kumabhanga nechimbi chimbi zvave kunzi zviri kukonzera dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Asi mukuru weIMF muAfrica, VaAbebe Aemro Selassie, vakaudza vatori venhau muWashington DC kuti kuparura mabaond notes hakungapedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Vanoti Zimbabwe inotofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti igadzirise mitemo inopa kuti hupfumi hugadzikane ikwanise kutanga kutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika yowana mari. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti vanotenderana neIMF asi vachiti Zimbabwe inofanira kumira nyaya dzehuori. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe Doctor Gift Mugano vanotenderanawo nemaonero eIMF. Asi mukuparura mari yemabond notes gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakati anobatsira. VaMangudya vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanya kuita kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinyanye kunetsa inyaya yevemakambani vasiri kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Nekuda kwefungidziro iyi RBZ yave kutumira matikitivha eFinancial Intelligent Unit kunomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Vachitsinhira, gurukota rezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamsa vanoti pasi pemutemo we Bank Use Promotion Act [Chapter 24:24] vemabhizimisi vanofanira kuendesa mari kumabhanga mukari mezuva rimwe chete. VaDenford Mutashu mutungamiri wesangano re Confederation of Zimbabwe Retailers vanoti vanotenderana nedanho raVaMangudya. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vanotiwo vanotenderana neRBZ. VaMoyo vati mari ikasaenda kumabhanga zvinopa kuti vanogadzira zvinhu vatadze kuhodha zvinhu kunze. Asi Doctor Mugano vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaMangudya kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa dhora rekuAmerica nedzimwe mari dzekunze muna 2009 mushure mekunge dhora remunyika ratanga kushaya simba zvisina mukare akamboona. Kusvika parizvino, RBZ inoti yakwanisa kudhinda mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe yemabond notes. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Mitemo yeCovid-19 Haisi Kushanda Kudzivirira kweMhando Itsva yeOmicron.
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi masere nemaviri kana kuti 1082 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 chikauraya munhu mumwe chete. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 709. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemasere zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 138, 523. Mumazuva matatu adarika, vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pazuva. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemanomwe kana kuti 3 867 287 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu zvine makumi mashanu nematanhatu kana kuti 2 876 056. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupera kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Zvichakadaro, apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kukwira zvakanyanya, vaimbova gurukora rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vanoti mimwe mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende kwemavhiki maviri kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi haina zvakawanda zvainobatsira. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakadzika mitemo inosungira vashanyi munyika kumbogara pavo vega kwemazuva gumi uye kuvhenekwa Covid-19 panhandare yendege.

headline: Vamwe Vari Kunze Vokurudzira Kubata Kugadzirisa Zviri Kunetsa Munyika
text: Zvime zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nekukasika matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi, zvichiti matambudziko aya ave kuzviita kuti zviwedzere kuremerwa nemutoro wekuchengeta hama neshamwari kumusha. Mumwe wevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vari kuti kusagadzikana kwezvinyu kumusha kwave kuvaomera, ndaAmai Chenaimwoyo Mutambasere, avo vari kuBritain. Amai Mutambasere vanoti chave kuremedza vakawanda vari kunze inyaya yekuti havachatarisirwa kungobatsira hama neshamwari dzavo chete, asiwo kubatsira veruzhinji kuburikidza nekubatsira mukutsvagwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira mishonga yekushandisa muzvipatara zvinorapa veruzhinji. Vanotiwo vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vagara vaine bandiko guru kwazvo mune zveupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nemari dzavanotumira. Matambudziko ari kutarisana nenyika pari zvino anosanganisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, kushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari, pamwe nekushaikwa kwemari yekunze. Amai Mutambasere vanoti chave kudiwa munyika iye zvino kuvandudzwa kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti vari kunze vave nechivimbo chekudyara mari dzavo munyika. Vanoti chikuru chave kudiwa ndechekuti vana veZimbabwe vese vabatane vatsvage nzira dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko aya kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vagari vemuGweru Vochema Chema neMutengo weMagetsi
text: Vamwe vagari vemuGweru vanoti havasi kunzwisisa nezve mutengo mutsva wemagetsi zvisinei netsananguro yeveZimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, vachitiwo magetsi aya ave kudhura zvakanyanya. Kutsutsumwa kwevamwe vagari ava kwabuda mushure memusangano waitwa nevagari nhasi nevagari nevamwe vakuru vakuru vekambani yeZESA. Mumwe mugari, Amai Patience Musambasi vati havana kugutsikana netsananguro yapihwa neveZESA. Vati magetsi ave kudhura vakatiwo kambani iyi yakaunza matengeserwo emagetsi matsva aya isina kupa vanhu dzidziso yakakwana pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ambuya Winfriedah Chimwango vati vave pamudyandigere vatsinhirawo kuti mutengo mutsva wemagetsi haunzwisisike vachitiwo magetsi ave kudhura zvoomesera varombo. Amai Immaculate Madzimure vati matengesero ave kuita veZesa magetsi ane hukoronyera mukati. Izvi zvatsinhirwavo naVaSimbarashe Chirara avo vati kunyange hazvo munhu akatenga magetsi emari yakawanda aunozowana ekushandisa chaiwo anenge ari mashoma. VaChirara vachema-chemawo nenyaya yekuti magetsi acho anogara asipo nguva zhinji. Mukuru anooona nezvekutengeswa kwemagetsi mudunhu rekuchamhembe kwenyika VaEdward Nyoni ndivo vange vakatungamira chikwata cheveZESA pamusangano uyu. Varamba kutaura neStudio 7 pamhepo sezvo vati havabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau. Mutauriri weZESA vaFullard Gqasira vanoti kambani yavo yakakwidza mutengo wemagetsi mwedzi wapera uye yave nematengesero ekuti munhu ukaramba uchitenga magetsi kakawanda mukati memwedzi mumwe chete, mutengo wemagetsi aya unoramba uchikwira. Nemusi weChishanu veruzhinji vakaungana pamahofisi eZesa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika vachida kunzwisisa nezvemutengo wemagetsi mutsva uyu. Zesa inoti inotarisira kuti mhuri yega yega inoshandisa zvikamu mazana maviri zvemagetsi mukati memwedzi mumwe chete. Magetsi aya anotengeswa nemari inoita mashereni makumi mana pazvikamu makumi mashanu zvekutanga (41 cents for the first 50 units) uye mashereni makumi mapfumbamwe nesendi rimwe chete pazvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu zvinotevera. Kana munhu ukapfuudza zvikamu mazana maviri zvinotarsisirwa kuti ushandise pamwedzi unenge wave kuzotenga chikamu chimwe chete chemagetsi nemadhora matatu mashereni makumi masere nemasendi mapfumbamwe ($3.89 per every unit.) Mune imwewo nyaya vamwe vagari vemuGweru vari kuchema-chema kuti vashandi vekanzuru vari kuvabvisira mametre emvura pamba pavo vachinzi vane zvikwereti. Amai Ruth Dube vati vakabvisirwa mita yavo zvisinei nekuti vaiva vawirirana nekanzuru kuti vaizobhadhara chikwereti chavainacho zvishoma-nezvishoma. Muzvare Tariro Kaseke vati vakabvisirwa mita yemvura yepamba pavo zvisinei nekuti vaive vakabhadhara chiwereti chavainzi vaive nacho kukanzuru. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kukanzuru yeGweru panyaya iyi. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wekanzuru VaDouglas Chikwekwe vakabuda pane imwe nhepfenyuro yemuGweru mazuva mashoma apfuura vachikumbira ruregerero pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti hauzi mutemo wekanzuru kubvisira vagari vane zvikwereti kukanzuru mametre emvura ari padzimba dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yoyambira Vanoda Kuratidzira
text: Zanu PF inoti inomira nemashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wayo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamusangano wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu mudare rePolitburo yebato iri. VaMnangagwa, avo vanove zvakare mutungamiri wenyika, vakayambira masangano evashandi, machechi, nemasangano akazvimirira, kuti anangane nemabasa awo ari pamutemo, kwete kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaMangagwa vakatiwo vanozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kushanda nemapato anopikisa muda kuvhiringidza mashandiro ehurumende yavo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, avo vanoti ichokwadi kuti masangano akazvimirira aya ava kuita zvematongerwo enyika achisiya basa rekuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende inozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kuda kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo, uye mapurisa achange achiita basa rawo nemazvo mukuona kuti hapana anobvumidzwa kutyora mitemo yenyika munguva ino yeCovid-19. VaMugwadi vatiwo sangano guru reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vati mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vakamboyedza kuyananisa vatungamiri veMDC vari kunetsana, izvo zvinoburitsa pachena kuti sangano iri rinodyidzana nemapato anopikisa hurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMutasa kanawo MDC kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sevashandi vane kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMnangagwa. VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo. Asi VaMugwadi vati hurumende inonzwisisa zvikuru zvichemo zvevashandi ndosaka yakawedzera mihoro yevashandi vehurumende nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana, pamusoro pezvo, ikavapa zvakare madhora ekuAmerica makumi manomwe nemashanu semari yekubatsirikana munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Musona asiya kutambira maWarriors
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu Knowledge Musona nhasi asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira chikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors.   Pachinyorwa chaatumira, Musona uyo ange ari mutungamiri wevatambi vemaWarriors ati ave kusiya kuti ape nguva kuchikwata chake cheAl-Tai pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekutambirawo maWarriors.   “Mhuri yeZimbabwe, nhasi ndokuzivisai kuti ndamira kutambira chikwata chedu chenyika chemaWarriors. Danho iri handina kuritora nyore sezvo ndange ndave nemakore 12 ndichimirira nyika yangu, iyo ndakatanga kutambira musi wa3 Kurume 2010, mumutambo uyo takasangana neSouth Africa.   “Ndave kusiya kuti ndipe nguva kuchikwata changu pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekumirira maWarriors.   “Ndichagara ndine ndangariro yekutambira nyika yangu ndichienda kumitambo yakaita seyeAFCON neCOSAFA Cup, nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chimwe chikuru kupihwa chiremerera chekuve kaputeni kwemakore mashanu adarika,” adaro Musona.   Mutambo wekupedzisira waMusona achitambira maWarriors waive wekuAFCON musi wa18 Ndira wekuCameroon apo maWarriors akakunda Guinea 2-1 mumutambo uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga.

headline: Vanhukadzi Vechidiki Vokurudzirwa Kupinda Musarudzo
text: Sangano reInstitute for Young Women’s Development rinoti riri kushanda nemamwe masangano evechidiki mukukurudzira vanhukadzi vechidiki kumaruwa kuti vatore zvigaro zvematongerwo enyika musaruzdzo dza 2018. Mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvare Glanis Changachirere, vanoti vakatanga basa iri zvichetevera musangano wavakaita gore rapfuura uyo wakaratidza kuti madzimai echidiki kumaruwa haana zvigaro mungava mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti madzimai aya anosangana nematambudziko akawanda akaita sekushaiswa mukana, mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika nezvimwe uye ivo vari kuita basa rekuvadzidzisa nezvekodzero panyaya dzesarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti kana madzimai aya akasadaro, anosarira munyaya dzebudiriro nekuti hapana anenge achisumdzira nyaya dzavo mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Vanotiwo kunze kwemuparamende nemumakanzuru, madzimai echidiki anofanira kutora zvigaro zvehutungamiriri munzvimbo dzavanogara. Muzvare Charity Chaturuka vesangano reZimbabwe Young Women for Peace Building vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kubuda pachena kuti madzimai echidiki ekumaruwa haana ruzivo nezvekodzeo dzavo. Vanotiwo rimwe dambudziko rine madzimai nderekushaya mari dzekuti vatsvagise rutsigiro kana vachida kupinda musarudzo. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaKudakwashe Makanda, avo vanoshanda ne Youth Initiative for Community Development Trust, vanotiwo vari kubatsira vechidiki vangave madzimai kana varume kuti vazive kodzero dzavo musarudzo. Vati ichokwadi kuti kunyange vechidiki vakada kumira pasarudzo, nyaya yemari inonetsa uye panofanira kutsvagwa nzira yekuvapa mari dzekuti vapinde musarudzo. Vanoti semamimiriro akaita zvinhu vane mari kana vanobva kumhuri dzakapfuma ndivo chete vane mikana yekupinda musarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti pasi pechirongwa chavo che Her Right of Way Give Way Campaign vari kukuridzira hurumende, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira kuti apewo mukana kune vechidiki kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo dzinotevera. Vanoti vanozviziva kuti izvi zvinogona kutora nguva asi pari zvino vari kuda kuti pazvigaro makumi matanhatu zvinopihwa madzimai zvisingakwikwidze muNational Assembly makumi matatu zvinofanira kupihwa vechidiki. Mamwe masangano ari kushanda neInstitute for Young Women’s Development ndeanoti Zimbabwe Organisation for Youth in Politics, Platform for Youth Development, Plumtree Development Trust pamwe neMission To Live Trust. No media source currently available

headline: Vatambi veZim kuEurope
text: MUMASVONDO anotevera, nhabvu yekuEurope – iyo inoteverwa zvikuru muno – ichange yave kutanga uye vatambi vemaWarriors vari kutarisirwa kutambira zvikwata zvavo zvakasiyana.   Iye zvino vatambi vakaita saMarvelous Nakamba weAston Villa, Tino Kadewere weLyon yekuFrance naMarshall Munetsi weStade de Reims yekuFrance vange vachitamba mitambo yegadziriro kuzvikwata zvavo apo vakatarisana nekutanga kwemwaka mutsva wenhabvu.   Mwaka wekuEngland nekuFrance zvose zvichatanga musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Chikwata chaKadewere ndicho chichavhurira mwaka mutsva wekuLigue 1 apo chichasangana necheAjaccio musi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu.   Kuchiti zuva rinotevera, chikwata chaNakamba chekuEnglish Premier League chichazotamba apo chichasangana nechaJordan Zemura cheAFC Bournemouth.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yevatambi vemaWarriors vanotambira kuEurope pamusoro pekuti gadziriro dzavo dziri kufamba sei panguva ino yepre-season.    Marvelous Nakamba   Nakamba: Mutambi weAston Villa uyu angokwanisa kutamba mutambo mumwe chete wegadziriro dzemwaka mutsva wechikwata chake kubva pamitambo mina yachatamba chiri kuAustralia uko chiri kuita gadziriro dzacho. Akatamba mutambo wechikwata chake neLeeds uyo vakahwina 1-0.   Mumutambo uyu, Nakamba akatanga akagara pabhenji ndokuzopinda muchikamu chechipiri vachibva pahalftime.   Mimwe mitambo yakazotevera, weBrisbane Roar neManchester United, kana pabhenji chaipo aive asipo uye murairidzi wake Steven Gerrard haana kutaura kuti sei asina kumutambisa.   Svondo rino, chikwata chake chichasangana neRennes mumutambo wekupedzisira wegadziriro mwaka wePremier League usati watanga.    Tino Kadewere   Kadewere: Mutambi weLyon uyu mwaka wadarika haana kunyatsotamba sezvaakaita paakatengwa nechikwata ichi paakanwisa ka10 kubva mumitambo 33 yaainge atamba. Mwaka wadarika, akangonwisa kamwe chete kubva mumitambo 15.   Pari zvino chikwata chake chatamba mitambo mishanu yehushamwari uye Kadewere atamba katatu apo vakasangana neBourge en Bresse (France) iyo vakakunda 4-2 uye akazotamba mutambo weAnderlecht (Belgum) apo vakakundwa 3-0.   Akazotamba zvakare mutambo wechikwata chake apo chakazvamburwa 5-0 neWillem II Tilburg (Netherlands).   Lyon iri kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wekupedzisira wehushamwari apo ichasangana neInter Milan musi weMugovera.   Zvakadaro, Kadewere anonzi ari kudiwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana kusanganisira cheReal Valladolid chekuSpain.    Marshall Munetsi   Marshall Munetsi: Mutambi weStade de Reims uyu mwaka uno watatarisana nawo anonzi ange achidiwa neBrighton & Hove yekuEngland.   Pari zvino atamba mutambo mumwe chete hwehushamwari wechikwata chake asi ndokutadza kutamba yaitevera sezvo ainge akuvara.   Ange achitarisira kudzoka svondo rino kuzosimudzira gadziriro dzake apo chikwata chake chakatarisana nemwaka mutsva wemuLigue 1.    Tendayi Darikwa   Darikwa: Tendayi Darikwa ndiye kaputeni weWigan Athletic uye mugadziriro dzavo ange achitamba zvikuru izvo zvinorakidza kuti ari muhurongwa hwechikwata chake mwaka uno. Chikwata chake chichatambira muligi reEnglish Championship chichirwira kuti chigopinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mitambo yeChampionship iri kutanga svondo rino musi weChishanu apo pachaona Huddersfield ichisangana neBurnely.   Chikwata chaDarikwa mutambo wacho wemwaka mutsva chichisangana nePreston North End musi weMugovera.   Pamitambo yehushamwari mishanu yakatambwa neWigan, Darikwa akatamba yese apo chikwata chake chakasangana necheOldham Athletic chikwahwina 3-1, chichakunda Liverpool XI 6-0, chikaita mangange 0-0 neAccrington Stanley uye ndokuzokunda zvekare Bamber Bridge neSheffield Wednesday 5-1 ne4-1.    Jordan Zemura   Jordan Zemura (AFC Bournemouth): Zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kubva kuna Zemura uyo mwaka uno chikwata chake chichange chichitambira muEnglish Premier League.   Mwaka wadarika, Zemura aipisa zvikuru muChampionship izvo zvakamuona achitamba ka33 ndokunwisa katatu apo chikwata chake chakahwina tikiti rekupinda muEnglish Premier League.   Mumitambo mitatu yehushamwari yatambwa nechikwata chake, Zemura akatamba yese izvo zvakaona vachikunda Sheffield Wednesday 2-1, ndokukundwa 2-1 neSporting Braga yekuPortudal uye vakazokundwa zvekare 1-0 neBristol City yekuEngland.   Bournemouth iri kutamba mutambo wayo wekupedzisira hwehushamwari svondo rino musi weMugovera apo ichasangana neReal Sociedad yekuSpain.   Zvakadaro, vamwe vatambi vakaita saAdmiral Muskwe weLuton Town, Macauley Bonne weQueens Park Rangers naBrendon Galloway wePlymouth vose vari pakati pekuita gadziriro nezvikwata zvavo.   Kuchiti David Philani Moyo, uyo aitambira Hamilton Academical yekuScotland, haasati ave kuzivikanwa kuti nhabvu yake achange achiitambira kupi mwaka uno zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuchikwata ichi apo kondirakiti yake yakapera.

headline: Southern African Community USA Yobatana neManna Food Center muKuwanisa Chikafu Kune Vakakanganiswa neCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfirca zviri muAmerica, reSouthern African Community USA, kana kuti SACU, rakabatana nesangano reManna Food Center riri muMontgomery County mudunhu reMaryland mukupa rubatsiro rwechikafu kune zvizvarwa zvemuSADC zvinogara muMontgomery County zvakakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19. Nhengo yeSACU, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sesangano vakaona zvakakosha kuti vabatane neManna Food Center kuitira kubatsira nezvekudya zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica kusanganisira vana vangadai vari kuAmerica kuchikoro asi vakazokanganiswa neCovid-19. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvingadai zvichida rubatsiro rwechikafu pane ino nguva kuti zvisanyare asi kuti zvibude pachena zvononyoresa kuti zviwane rubatsiro urwu, kwete kutambura chinyararire. Vanoti vanhu vari kubuda vachizivisa kuti vanoda rubatsiro kana zvichienzaniswa nekare. "Chirwere ichi cheCorona chavharisa zvinhu saka vanhu havasi kunyanya kutya kana kunyara sezvavaimboita pane dzimwe nguva nekuti vanoziva kuti zviri kuitika mazuvano zviri beyond their control," vanodaro Muzvare Tawonezvi. Vanoti pakunyoresa kuManna Food Center hakubvunzwi munhu paamire panyaya dzemapepa ehugaro hwake kunze kwekungoti aburitse chitupa chinoratidza kuti anogara muMontgomery County, uye pane nzira nhatu dzinosanganisira kunyoresa kuManna kana kushambadza kuri kuitwa neSACU dzekuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa. "Ende uye tine ma outreach workers vari kuita basa rekufamba muma community akasiyanasiyana kutsvaga kuti vanonidha rubatsiro ndivanaani." Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rakaumbwa pamwe nekanyoreswa zviri pamutemo mudunhu reMaryland muna 2013 nechinangwa chekusimudzira tsika nemagariro ezvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zviri muAmerica pamwe nekuzvibatanidza kuburikidza nemitambo yakasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: VaMutodi Vanodzingwa Basa naVaMnangagwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vamisa basa mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi. Muchiziviso chaburitswa nehofisi yaVaMnangagwa, VaMutodi vamiswa basa pasi pechikamu che Section 108 (1a) chebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutemo uyu hautaure zvakawanda kunze kwekuti chigaro chegurukota kana chemutevedzeri wegurukota chinenge chisisina munhu kana mutungamiri wenyika abvisa munhu wacho pachigaro ichi. Kumiswa basa kwaVaMutodi kwatanga neChitatu kunyange hazvo vaswera vari kuHeroes Acre uko kwanga kuchivigwa gamba renyika.. VaMutodi vaswera vachitumira mashoko nemavhidhiyo paTwitter yavo vachirumbidza basa ranga richiitwa naVaMnangagwa pakuradzika nhengo yeZanu PF, Va Absolom Sikhosana, kumarinda eHeroes Acre muHarare. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaMutodi kuti vanoti kudii nekusiyiswa basa kwavaitwa. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa kumunyori webazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, avo vasiri kupindura mibvunzo yeStudio7 mazuva ano. VaMutodi vagara vachinetsana pamwe nekuzvidza gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, pamwe nemurume wavo, VaChris Mutsvangwa.  Svondo rapera, VaMutodi vakaburitsa mashoko pa Twitter vachizvidza VaMutsvangwa vakatiwo nyika ichagara ichitya mushandira pamwe uri pakati pegurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo naVaMutsvangwa. Mashoko aya akatevera mashoko akanga aburitswa neZBC ichitauta zvainge zvataurwa naVaMoyo zvekuti mashoko akanga aburitswa naVaMutodi panyaya yemutungamiri weTanzania, aive asina kumirira hurumende asi kuti aive mashoko epfungwa dzavo VaMutodi. VaMutodi vakabva vatanga kushoropodza ZBC vachiti yaishandiswa naAmai Mutsvangwa nemurume wavo. Asi VaMnangagwa havana kubuda pachena vachitsuura zvakange zvichitaurwa naVaMutodi, avo vakambokonzeresa mutauro munguva yaVaRobert Mugabe, vabuda zvakare pa social media vaina VaMnangagwa vakabata kapu yainge yakanyorwa kuti "I am the boss". VaMnangagwa havasati vazivisa kuti VaMutodi vachatsiviwa nani, uye hazvisati zvajeka kuti chii chapa kuti VaMnangagwa vadzinge munhu anozivikanwa kuti mutsigiri wavo nguva dzose.

headline: Chisora orovana naTakam
text: (34) acharwa naCarlos Takam (37) apo vanenge vachitsigira mutambo waDillian Whyte naJoseph Parker.   Chisora (ari pamufananidzo kurudyi) – uyo anokwikwidza muboka reheavyweight – ari kumhanyidzana nenguva kuti azvirakidze kuti anogona kurwira mabhande makuru zvichitevera kukundwa kwaakaitwa katatu mumitambo yake mitanhatu yadarika.   Takam, anove wekuFrance asi ari chizvarwa chekuCameroon, akarakidza kuti anogona kuzvimirira apo akamisidzana naAnthony Joshua kusvika muround rechi10 muna Gumiguru gore radarika, asi kubva ipapo haana kuzombokwikwidza zvakare.   Akazopinzwa kuti akwikwidze mumutambo uyu pakupedzisira asi akarwa semvumba zvakashamisa vazhinji zvisinei kuti akazorikitwa hake naAJ muround rechi10.   “Kudivi raDel Boy uyu mukana wake wekupedzisira kuti arwe aende pamusoro pevamwe vatambi vetsiva uye kunaTakam mumwe mukana wake wekurwira kuti azorwire mamwe mabhande makuru etsiva zvichitevera kurwa kwaakaita naAJ zvinonwisa mvura,” anodaro puromota wetsiva, Eddie Hearn.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku kuti tave kuronga mutambo uyu weheavyweight uyo ndinoona uchinakidza zvikuru kukunda ngoma kurira mwedzi unotevera, mutambo mukuru uyu.” – SportsMail boxing

headline: Zimbabwe Inonyorerana Chibvumirano neKambani yeKunze Kuti Ishambadze Marasha
text: Hurumende yanyorerana chibvumirano neimwe kambani yekunze kwenyika kuitira kuti ibatsirwe mukutengesa marasha kunyika dzakaita seIndia neJapan. Vachitaura pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano ichi ne Victoria Consulting, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, vati donzvo rehurumende nderekuti nyika iwanirwe kwekutengesera marasha kuIndia uye kuitira kuti iwane mari yekushandisa mukuchera marasha aya. VaChitando vati Zimbabwe inofungidzirwa kuti ine marasha anosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu ematani asi pagore kuri kucherwa matani ari pakati pemamiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni matatu. VaChitando vatiwo India ndiyo inotenga marasha akawanda pagore zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutora mukana wekudyidzana wakanaka uripo pakati payo neIndia. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kuti kambani yeVictoria Consulting yakamboshanda nenyika dzipi, uye kuti vakuru vayo ndivanani. Asi vaimbove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGift Chimanikire, vati havaoni kuti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe itsvage misika yekutengesera marasha kunze kwenyika, ipo pari zvino kusiri kucherwa marasha anokwana munyika. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo havaoni zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itsvake kambani yekunze inonotsvakira Zimbabwe misika yemarasha. VaMuchichwa vatiwo zviri nani kuti kushandiswe hukama hwagara huripo nedzimwe nyika. Dandemudande rebazi rezvezvicherwa rinoti Zimbabwe ine marasha akanaka, uye ine nzvimbo makumi maviri nepfumbamwe dzine marasha. Makambani maviri chete munyika, Hwange Colliery neMakomo Resources, ndiwo ari kunyanyochera marasha. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheKuongorora Mazita Chinotanga neChinono muMasvingo
text: Mudhorobha reMasvingo dzimwe nzvimbo dzanonoka kuvhurwa, mushure mekunge zvikwanisiro zvakita sezvigaro pamwe nemagwaro evavhoti zvanonoka kuendeswako neZEC. Apowo vagari vazhinji vanga vachiuya mumwe mumwe zvichiratidza kuti vazhinji havasi kuziva nezvechirongwa ichi nekuda kwekuti hachina kunyatsoshambadzwa. VaMuranganwa Chanyau, veku Ward 3 muMasvingo vati vaongorora zvinyorwa zvavo, asi basa rambononoka kutanga. “Inspection ndainda ndikaona zita rangu ririmo but patanga process ichifana kutanga na 7 am yanonoka panga pasina ma materials se funirture uye mamwe ma premises anga akavharwa zvichiratidza kuti zvanga zvisina kunyatsorongeka.” Asi vamwe vakaita saVaChrispen Mutyavakuru, vanoti kunyange pambononokwa, chirongwa ichi chakanaka zvikuru uye chazofamba zvakana. “Ndinoona zvinhu zvacho zvakarongeka zvisingambobviri zvekuti dai vanga vashambadzira kuti vanhu vave vanouya vakawanda vachiona mazita akabhukiwa zvakanaka.” VaInnocent Taweni vakurudzira boka reZEC kuti rivandudze zvirongwa zvekushambadza chirongwa ichi vachiti vanga vasingatozivi nezvacho, asi vangosangana nacho vauya pazvitoro kuzobvisa bhabharasi. Zvichakadaro vamwe vanoti chirongwa ichi chatanga chakaneta nekuti vashandi veZEC vakabva kuhurumende vari kuita basa iri vari kushanda vasingafari zvichitevera kudzikiswa kwakaita mari dzavanofanirwa kubhadharwa pazuva. ZEC yakaudza vashandi ava, vazhinji vavo vakaita basa rekunyoresa vavhoti, kuti yave kudzikisa mari kubva pamadhora makumi matatu kusvika pamakumi maviri ichiti yaita izvi nekuda kwekuti hurumende haina mari. Izvi zvinonzi hazvina kufadza vashandi avo vakapika kuti vachashanda zvishoma nezvishona, semumwe mushandi akataura neStudio 7 akaramba kudomwa zita rake. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukuru weZEC muMasvingo, VaZex Pudurai kuti vatipewo pfungwa dzavo pane zvaitika. Asi Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanove sachigaro veZEC, vakabvuma kuti mari yevashandi yakadzikiswa asi hapana zvavaikwanisa kuita nekuti hurumende haina mari. Chirongwa ichi chatanga nhasi nyika yose uye chinopera musi wa 29 Chivabvu. Asi vamwe vanoti chakaramba chichiitwa nechinono uye chisina kuwedzera kushambadzwa, vazhinji vachatadza kuongorora mazita avo kuitira kuti vanenge vasina kunyorwa zvakanaka vakwanise kunyoresa patsva pachirongwa chekunyoresa, icho chakawedzerwawo nzvimbo dzekunyoresera. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Tsika yeZanu-PF Yokuita Misangano kuMamisha Ichapa Kuti Coronavirus Ipararire
text: Apo chirwere checoronavirus chotanga kupararira kumamisha, mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vari kuyambira kuti Zanu-PF ikasamira tsika yekuunganidza vanhu mumaruwa chirwere ichi chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti kune vanhu vana vari kumaruwa vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vatatu kuMhondoro Ngezi uye mumwe chete kwaMurewa. Hurumende ichiri mushishi kuita ongororo yekuti coronavirus yakasvika sei munzvimbo mbiri idzi. VaSaruwaka vari kupomera dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu-PF mudunhu ravo mhosva yekuunganidza vanhu uye kuita zvematongerwo enyika munyaya dzezvekudya mushure memisangan\o yavari kukokera iyi. VaSaruvaka vanoti izvi zvichadzosera kumashure hurongwa hwehurumende hwekurwisa chirwere checoronavirus sezvo paine kurudziro yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba vasingaungane. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, tabata gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, avo vanoti handi chokwadi kuti pane zvematongerwo enyika zviri kuitwa munyaya dzekupa vanhu zvekudya vachiti igudziramukanwa revanhu veMDC. No media source currently available

headline: Nzvimbo yeRujeko Yoshaikwa muBRV kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vazhinji vemumusha weRujeko kuMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nekushaikwa kwenzvimbo yavanofanirwa kunyoresa mumishina yeBiometric Voter Registration, BVR, izvo zviri kuita kuti vatadze kunyoresa. Vagari ava vanoti vari kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa asi vachikundikana kunyoresa sezvo nzvimbo yavanofanirwa kunyoresa isiri kuwanikiwa mumishina yeBVR. Mumwe mugari wemuRujeko, VaZivanai Muzorodzi, vanoti vakatadza kunyoresa kuti vazovhotera muwadhi yavo sezvo yakanga isiri kuwanikwa mumishina, vakazopedzisira vanyoresa kuti vavhotere kumusha kwavo kumaruwa. Vamwewo vakaita sa VaBrighton Ramusi vanoti vari kushamiswa zvikuru kuti sei mumsha wavo weRujeko usiri muBVR uku Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kuti yakagadzirira zvakakwana. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa kuZEC mudunhu reMasvingo, Amai Getrude Murumbi, avo varamba kurekodhwa mashoko avo,vabvuma kuti kuRujeko kwaita dambudziko uye vatombomisa kunyoresa vanhu veikoko. Vatiwo dambudziko iri riri kugadziriswa nana mazvikokota vavo. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti vave kutyira kuti vangangotadza kuvhota uye ZEC haisi kufambisa mashoko akakwana kuvagari ichivaudza zvinodiwa kuti vanyorese. Nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muRujeko, Muzvare Esther Chimanikire, vanoti vave kutyira kodzero dzevanhu dzekuvhota kuti dzichambunyikidzwa. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vagari vemuMasvingo vanoti vashandi veZEC vari kutora nguva yakareba kunyoresa munhu muwe chete, vachiratidza sekuti havasi kugona basa iri nemazvo kunyange hazvo vakadzidziswa kushandisa michina iyi mitsva. Mumwe mugari wemuMasvingo, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vabudirira kunyoresa nhasiasi havana kufara nenguva yatorwa kuti vapedzerwe. Chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota chakaparuwa musi wa 14 Gunyana uye chinopera musi wa 15 Ndira gore rinouya. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yakwidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ZEC, pamwe negurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichiti VaMugabe havana kutevedza zvinodiwa nemutemo pavakatara mazuva aya. MDC-T inotiwo ZEC haina kugadzirira zvakakwana kuitira kuti iite basa iri nemazvo. Nyaya iyi iri kunzwikwa mudare nemusi weChina. Munhu anotairisirwa kunyoresa anofanirwa kunge aine makore gumi nemasere kana kudarika, aine chitupa kana gwaro rekufambisa, gwaro rinoratidza pavanogara muguta, kana kuri kumaruva, tsamba yasabhuku, kanawo affidavit yakasainwa na Commissioner of Oaths, kanawo magweta nevamwe vanhu vanobvumirwa kuita basa iri. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa Pamwe neKufa neCovid-19 Hworamba Hwuchikura
text: Kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, vanhu vakawanda havasi kutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira sezviri kukurudzirwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization, akaita sekupfeka mamasiki kumeso kwavo. Kunyange hazvo zviri pachena kuti veruzhinji vari kutapurirana chirwere ichi munyika, kumisika yemabhazi pamwe nekumabhanga vanhu vanenge vakaungana, kana kumanikidzana, izvo zvinoita kuti kutapurirana kweCovid-19 kuve nyore. Studio7 yaona vanhu vazhinji vange vasina kupfeka mamasiki apo vanga vachisangana neveruzhinji muguta reHarare. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaPaul Majaira, avo vanga vasina kuzvidzivirira vati dzimwe nguva vanombokanganwa kuzvidzivirira. Mumwe murume uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anga akamirira kutora mari pane rimwe bhanga muguta apo vanhu vanga vakatsokodzerana abvuma kuStudio7 kuti ane ruzivo rwekuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 munyika huri kukwira. Asi ati kunyange hazvo achiziva kuti kumira vakapatsanurana kunobatsira, nyaya yekutya kupindirwa ndiyo inoita kuti vanhu vabatane vari mumitsetse. VaSimon Zhou, avo vanga vakamirira bhazi kuti vaende kuMt Pleasant Heights, vati vanga vava nemaawa mana vari panzvimbo imwe chete, izvo zvinogona kuti vabate chirwere ichi. Vatiwo vanhu havasi kutariswa temperature kana kupihwa zvekuzora maoko ava pavanenge vachipinda mumabhazi eZupco sezvaiitika pakatanga kuvhurwa nyika. Munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati vanhu vanofanirwa kuchengetedza hutano hwavo kuburikidza nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa nevehutano. Dr. Madzorera vakurudzirawo kuti munguva ino yechando dai veruzhinji vagara kudzimba. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Va John Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vari kuwedzera kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere ichi pamwe nekuwedzera vanhu vanoongororwa kuitira kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura kumusangano wePolitburo yebato ravo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatiwo kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCOVID-19 kuchaitawo kuti vatarise zvakare nyaya yekuvharwa kwenyika. Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hausi kukwira muZimbabwe chete, sezvo izvi zviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda pasi rose, iro rave nevanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere nemazana maviri ane gumi nevaviri, vari vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Yogadzira Nzvimbo yeKubatsira Vanenge Vabatwa neCoronavirus
text: Kanzuru yeMasvingo inoti iri kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira vagari vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko rechirwere checoronavirus kunyangwe vamwe vagari vari kuti zviri kuitwa hazvina kukwana. Kanzuru yakaisa chipatara chitsva mumusha wevazhinji weRujeko. Muzvare Rumbidzayi Magurupira, wemumusha weRujeko, anoti chipatara ichi chinogona kusakwana kubatsira vanhu kana coronavirus ikapararira zvakanyanya. Vamwewo vagari vakaita saAmai Tinotenda Mazuru, vanoti danho rekuisa chipatara ichi munzvimbo inogara veruzhinji rinogona kuita kuti chirwere ichi chitekeshere mudzimba dzevanhu vamwe varwere vapoya. Asi Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti vakaita danho iri vaita tsvakurudzo uye vapuwa dzidziso nana Chiremba pamwe nenyanzvi dzebazi rezve hutano. Mukuru webasa, musangano rinomirira vagari, reMasvingo Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA) VaAnoziva Muguti, vati kanzuru inofanira kuvandudza chipatara ichi kuti chitakure vanhu vakawanda uye kuti paiswe matanho eku chengetedza vanenge vauya nechirwere kuti vasazotapurire vanhu mudzimba. Meya Maboke vari kururdzira vagari kuti vasatye nekuti vakaisa matanho pamwe chete nenyanzvi dzehutano eku chengetedza vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuti chisatapurirwe mudzimba dzevagari veRujeko. Dhorobha reMasvingo harisati rave nemunhu akabatwa ne chirwere ichi asi vagari vanotyira kuti sezvo riri munzira yemugwagwa inoenda kuSouth Africa chinogona kupararira nevanofamba. VeMurra vanoti kanzuru inofanira kufambisa mashoko neku shambadza kuti vagari vawane ruzivo rwakakwana kuti chirwere ichi chinotapuriranwa sei. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Tsiva haina chibhanzi’
text: MUTAMBI wetsiva wechidzimai Kudakwashe ‘Kudah’ Chivandire anoti mutambo uyu hausi kumubhadhara zvachose zvekuti ari kufunga kumbousiya ozama zvimwe zvekuti araramise mhuri yake.   Kudah – uyo anove shasha yeWomen’s International Boxing Association (WIBA) Inter-Continental Champion – achangobva kukunda Iriya Matoga wekuMalawi mumutambo wehushamwari wakaitirwa kuHarare International Centre (HICC) svondo rapera.   Makwishu aya aive ekutsigira mutambo waCharles Manyuchi uyo akakunda Diego Diaz Gallardo wekuArgentina.   “Chokwadi mutambo uyu hapana zvatiri kuwana, tikapinda mukembi chaimo tichigadzirira kuzorwa hapana chatinopihwa uye tinogaramo kwenguva ndefu chaiyo patinobuda tinopihwa tumari tusingatenge. Ipapo unenge une nguva ndefu wasiya mwana wako uyo anenge achida kuchengetwa.   “Ndinombofunga zvekusiya mutambo uyu uye parizvino nditori pakati pekugadzirisa kuti ndiite zvimwe zvinondipa pundutso muhupenyu hwangu.   “Ndinogona kugadzira musoro wangu, saka ndinogona kutanga bhizimisi rekugadzira musoro ndichiwana mari yekuraramisa ini nemhuri yangu. Pandinenge ndisingarwe ndoziva kuti ndine zvandinenge ndichiita zvinenge zvichindipa mari,” anodaro Kudah.   Kubva achitanga kuita zvetsiva, Kudah akwanisa kurwa mitambo mitanhatu ndokuhwina mina uye akakundwa miviri chete.   “Chishuvo changu kuti ndiraramise mwanasikana wangu uyo ane makore maviri ekuberekwa. Pandinoenda kunotamba tsiva ndotarisira kuti ndigodzoka ndine mari chaiyo inotenga yekuti ndigomutengera zvose zvaanoda.   “Asi manje ndanzwa nekuvimbiswa zvinhu zvakawanda asi hapana kana chiri kumbozadzikiswa pazvose,” anodaro Kudah.   Anoti murume wake – uyo anomutsigira zvikuru mumutambo uyu – ndiye anombosara achichengeta mwana wavo apo paanoenda kunotamba tsiva.   “Ndinotenda murume wangu nerutsigiro rwaanondipa, anoziva kuti ndine chido netsiva uye anonditsigira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, nhengo yeZimbabwe Boxing Board of Control, Thomas Kambuyi, anoti nyaya dzekubhadharana mari pakati pevatambi vetsiva nemamaneja avo dzinonetsa kupindira nekuti ivo sesangano havazive zvinenge zvakavimbisana mativi maviri aya.   “Chandingataure ini ndakazvimirira hangu ndechekuti mutambi uyu anofanirwa kugara pasi nemamaneja ake votaurirana kuti vagodzirisana sei zvavainge vakavimbisana.
