Isu ipapo hatikwanise kupindira sezvo takange tisipo vachiwirirana uye hatizive kuti vakavimbisana zvipi.   “Kutaura chokwadi hupenyu iye zvino hwaoma, mabhizimisi haasi kufamba zvakanaka uye isu vari mune zvemitambo zvakatikakatawo zvakare, mitambo yese iri kuchema kwete tsiva yoga,” anodaro.

headline: ZC yorongera Pakistan
text: CHIKWATA cheZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) chemaChevrons svondo rino chakatanga gadziriro dzekuenda kunokwikwidza nePakistan mumitambo mitanhatu yeOne Day International nemitatu zvekare yeTwenty20 International.   Uyu uchave mutambo wekutanga wechikwata ichi chichienda kunze kwenyika kubva kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yakasiyana pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mwedzi wadarika, ZC yaifanira kusangana neAfghanistan asi mutambo uyu wakazomiswa zvakare nekuda kwedenda iri. Zvisinei, vatambi vechikwata chenyika ichi vakaramba vachiita gadziriro dzavo vari kudzimba. Mukushi wemashoko weZC, Darlington Majonga anoti mutambo uyu uchaona ZC ichitamba mitambo yekutanga yeICC Cricket World Cup Super League.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatatsurana mumitambo mitatu yeODI ichatanga musi wa30 Gumiguru uye mimwe miviri ichizotambwa musi wa1 na3 Nyamavhuvhu.   Kana mitambo iyi yapera, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichatatsurana zvakare musi wa7, 8 na10 Nyamavhuvhu mumitambo yeT20 International Series.   “Gadziriro dzedu dziri kufamba zvakanaka uye tine tarisiro yekuti tichaenda kuPakistan kunotamba mitambo mitanhatu iyi pasina chikoneso.   “Gore rino, takatadza kutamba mitambo mizhinji asi haticheme hedu nekuti chakakosha kuchengetedza hupenyu hweveruzhinji. Saka pari zvino zvinenge zvave kuendeka nekudaro tinotarisira kunosangana nePakistan,” anodaro Majonga.   Mwedzi yadarika, ZC yaifanira kutamba nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Afghanistan, Ireland neAustralia asi mitambo iyi yose yakamiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Misa Zimbabwe Inoshora Zvikuru Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVatori veNhau
text: Sangano rinomirira kodzero dzevatori venhau, reMisa Zimbabwe, rashora zvikuru kutyorwa kwaitwa kodzero dzevatori venhau richiti zvinotyisa kuti zvinhu zvakadai zvinogona kuitwa masikati machena munyika ine rusununguko pasina chinoitwa kuvanhu vanenge vapara mhosva. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti mapurisa emuZimbabwe anofanirwa kuratidza pachena kuti haadi kuona vanhu vachityora mitemo yenyika kubudikidza nekusunga vanenge vapara mhosva. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Inspector Paul Nyathi, havana kubatika kuti tnzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi VaMoyo vati vachasvitsa nyaya iyi kugurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Vanozivisa Kuramwa Mabasa Kana Zvichemo Zvavo Zvisina Kugadziriswa
text: Vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, neChitatu vakapa hurumende mazuva gumi nemana ekuti igadzirise matambudziko ari muzvipatara pamwe nenyaya yemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa zuva rimwero kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 2 612 vakavhenekwa. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Tsamba yakanyorwa nesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iyi, iyo yakanyorerwa kuboka reHealth Services Board, kumunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano pamwe nekuvakuru vezvipatara, kana kuti hospital clinical directors, iri kuda kuti hurumende iise mishonga nezvikwanisiro muzvipatara, iwanise vanachiremba zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19, uye kuti mihoro yavo ive iri mumadhora ekuAmerica ichienzaniswa nemari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Vanachiremba ava vari kudawo kuti zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vemuboka rezvehutano vari pakuramwa mabasa pari zvino zvigadziriswe kuitira kuti vabatsirane mabasa, uyewo kuti nhengo dzavo dzinoshanda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe asi iye zvino dziri kushanda muzvipatara munguva ino, dzinge dzichibhadharwa mari dzekushanda uku. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Pasi rose vanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 vadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 15.5 million, uye vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nezvina kana kuti 584 000. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa zvehutano pa Nottingham Trent University, ku Britain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igare pasi navanachiremba ava vakurukure zvichemo zvavo kuti zvinhu zvisaipa kudarika zvazviri pari nhasi muzvipatara. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti vanachiremba ava vari kuda kuramwa mabasa munguva iyo nyika iri mudambudziko re Covids-19, izvo zvinozoisa varwere vagara vaine zvimwe zvirwere zvinovanetsa munyodzi huru kana vakazobatwa neCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara nekukasika, umo munonzi hamuna mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubata chirwere cheCovid-19 chinhu chinityisa nekuti kana vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanenge vachida kubatwa zvakanaka, uye kuti vabatwe zvakanaka vanofanirwa kunge vachienda kuzvipatara, uko kunofanirwa kunge kuine vanamukoti navanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Musamhanyire kuSA: Bosso
text: VATAMBI venhabvu vemuzvikwata zvakasiyana zvinokwikwidza muno vokurudzirwa kuti vasangomhanye kuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika vasati vaibva nekuti zvinogona kuzovagozhera sezviri kuitika kune vamwe vavo.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nemutevedzeri wasachigaro weHighlanders FC, Modern Ngwenya, muhurukuro yaakaita neKwayedza achiti kune vamwe vatambi vemuno vari kumhanyira kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa uko vanonotatarika zvikuru.   “Chiri kukuvadza vatambi vedu ndechekuti hongu kuenda kunotambira kunze kunodiwa, unogadzira zita rako uye unowana mari yakawanda worarama hupenyu hwakanaka, asi kunze uko kunopisa.   “Isu muno ndisu tinobika vatambi venhabvu, kuSouth Africa hakubikwe vatambi, uko kunodiwa vatambi vakaibva kare chete. Saka vedu vanoenda ikoko vasati vanyatsoibva vosvika votatarika, wozoona mutambi adzoka muno nekuchimbidza bhora rake raurayiwa, vamwe vanobva vatopera zvachose,” anodaro Ngwenya.   Vamwe vevatambi vakamboenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika vakakurumidza kudzoka vanosanganisira Prince Dube weHighlanders uyo akambobva akanotambira kuSouth Africa uko akatatarika zvikuru ndokuzodzoka.   Milton Ncube – uyo aimbotambira Highlanders zvakare – akaenda kuSouth Africa asi haana kumbogara nguva refu ndokudzoka nekuchimbidza akatanga kutambira zvikwata zvemuno.   Denver Mukamba naRodwell Chinyengetere vakambonozama mhanza zvakare kunze kwenyika asi vakadzoka misoro imire.   Ngwenya anoti vakamboyambira Dube – uyo ari kupisa parizvino mumitambo yeCastle Premiership – kuti asamhanye kuenda kuSouth Africa sezvo akange asati anyatsoibva asi haana kuterera.   Dube mugore ra2017 akabva ndokuenda kuSupersport United yekuSouth Africa uko akanotatarika zvikuru ndokumboendeswa kuBlack Leopards nechikwereti asi hapana chakabudako.   Mugore ra2018, akadzoka kuBosso zvakare akatambirwa nemaoko maviri ndokutanga kubikwa patsva.   “Prince takambomuudza kuti usamhanye kuenda chimbomira umbobikwa futi, asi haana kuterera. Akaenda akadzoka semwana wedu takamutambira uye tiri kumuvaka patsva.   “Iye zvino ndiye mutambi ari kupisa muCastle Premiership. Hakuna mumwe anomukunda parizvino, ari muchikwata chedu totoziva kuti tinohwina chete,” anodaro Ngwenya.   Zvakadai, svondo rino Bosso iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup semi-final uyo uchatambirwa kunhandare yeBarbourfields kuBulawayo.

headline: Seke South Clinic Yomboshandiswa Senzvimbo Yekuongorora neKurapa Vane Coronavirus
text: Menisiparati yeChitungwiza inozivisa vagari veguta iri kuti kanzuru yavo yakabvumirana kuti Seke South Clinic imboshandiswa senzvimbo yekuongorora nekurapa vanhu vane chirwere che Coronavirus. Mutauriri wemenisiparari yeChitungwiza, VaLovemore Meya, vati parizvino vagari veChitungwiza vanofanirwa kushandisa mamwe makiriniki eChitungwiza, akaita se St Marys, Zengeza 3 ne Seke North sezvo kiriniki ye Seke South yambomira kutora varwere vesevese, kunze kweavo vari kurapwa kana kuongororwa chirwere che coronavirus. Coronavirus. Izvi zvinotevera kunyunyuta kwesangano rinomirira vagari veChitungwiza, reChitungwiza Residents Trust, iro rinoti madzimai anepamuviri arikudzorerwa kudzimba kana vaenda kunotsvaka rubatsiro paSeke South Clinic. Mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alice Kuvheya, vanoti madzimai arikuda kubatsirwa haagone kuenda kuma kiriniki ari kure nekwavanogara sezvo makombi asiri kufamba zvakanaka pamusoro pehurongwa rwekurwisana neCoronavirus. Muzvare Kuvheya vanoti kanzuru yeChitungwiza inofanirwa kubatsira madzimai aya kuti akwanise kuenda kwavanobatsirwa panguva iyo vave kuita vana. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yokurudzirwa Kufambisa Basa reKunyoresa Vavhoti
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Election Support Network (ZESN) rinoti komisheni yezvesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, rinofanira kudoma kambani ichanyoresa vanhu kuvhota nemhando yeBiometric Voter Registration(BVR). Asi nyanzvi dzinoti ZEC inogona kushandisa nzira yaishandiswa kare nekuda kwechinono chairi kuita. Sangano iri rinoti ZEC inofanira kudoma nechimbi chimbi kambani ichapihwa basa yekunyoresa vavhoti pachishandiswa BVR kuti itange basa sezvo sarudzo dza2018 dzave pedyo. Vachitaura pamusoro peBVR pachirongwa cheQuill Speak muHarare, mukuru weZESN, Amai Rindai Chipfunge –Vava, vakati ZEC inofanirawo kujekesa mitemo yekuti chirongwa ichi chichashandiswa sei, sezvo pasina ruzivo kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe neveruzhinji pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. Vati ongororo yavakaita yemichina yeBVR, yakaitwa nemakambani ari kuda kupihwa neZEC, yakaratidza kuti michina iyi inononaka. Vakatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zec ishandiswe vadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vashande sevanhu vachange vachinyoresa vanhu pachirongwa cheBVR sezvakaitwa kuKenya. Amai Chipfunde- Vava vanoti zviri pachena kuti hurongwa hweBVR huri kufarirwa neveruzhinji uye huchapedza mamwe matambudziko ange achiwanikwa pagwaro revavhoti rekare. Mukuru weElections Resources Centre, VaTawanda Chimhini, vaudza Studio7 kuti zviri pachena kuti chirongwa cheBVR chinenge chiri nani kudarika nzira dzaishandiswa kare. ZEC yatove kumashure pahurongwa hwayo hwekunyoresa vavhoti hwayakatura kuparamende. Pahurongwa uhwu ZEC yaifanira kunge yakatanga kunyoresa vavhoti muna Kubvumbikusvika munaMbudzi. Asi kusvika nhasi haisati yatombodoma kana kambani yaichashanda nayo pabasa iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo uye vachidzisa paKent University kuBritain,VaAlex Magaisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvese zviri kuitika izvi zvinofanira kusuwisa veruzhinji. Vati mutemo hauna kunyatsojeka, uye pane mukana mukuru wekuti vanhu vanogona kunyoreswa pachishandiswa nzira dzakare. VaMagaisa vanotiwo zviri pachena kuti ZEC haikwanisi kuzvimirira uye inotoita zvinodiwa nehurumende. Amai Chipfunde-Vava vanoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti chitange pachine nguva nekuti hapana ruzivo pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. VaChimhini vati sezvo BVR ichishandisa mitezo yemuviri yakaita sezvigunwe maziso nezvimwe pane vanhu vari kuudzwa manyepo nekutyityidzirwa uye izvi zvinogona kukanganisa zvichabuda musarudzo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZEC panyaya iyi. Asi zvichitevera kuongorora kwavakaita michina yeBVR kubva kukambani yekuGermany neChina, veZEC vakatoendesa magwaro ekuti vanoda kushanda nekamabani ipi kune veState Procurement Board avo vane mvumo yekutora danho rekupedzesera panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvitunha Zvoworera muMamochari neKushaya Magetsi kuMasvingo
text: Zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo pachipata chikuru mudunhu reMasvingo cheMasvingo General Hospital sezvo kudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi kwave kupa kuti mitumbi yevanhu iri mumochari iwore. Chipatara ichi chatarisanawo nerimwe rekushomeka zvakanyanya kwemvura zvoomesera vanachiremba kuita basa ravo. Mukuru webasa pachipatara ichi, VaShadreck Zangairai, vaudza Studio 7, kuti dambudziko remagetsi nemvura riri kudzosera kumashure zvakanyanya basa pachipatara ichi. Vanoti pachipatara pari kuswera paine munhuwi wakaipa unobva kumochari nenyaya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi. Vakumbira ZESA kuti isavadzimire magetsi. Vatiwo genareta ravainaro harisi kushanda zvakanaka sezvo rave kuremerwa nekudaro vanoda rubatsiro rwekutenga rimwe rinoti dhonzei. Magetsi ari kudzimwa kunyangwe hazvo gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vakati ZESA hayaizodzima magetsi kunzvimbo dzose dzakakosha kusanganisira zvipatara nekunogayiwa mvura. Panyaya yekushomekwa kwemvura, VaZangairai vatiwo chipatara chiri kutopemha kuti chikwanise kucheresa zvibhorani. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura kuri kuvaomesera. Dzimwe hama dzevarwere dzakaita saVaDreck Mujinga, dzinoti dzanzwa nekukumbira mvura kuvanhu vanogara mumusha weRhodene avo vari kutonetsekawo nekuiwana. Studio 7 yashanyira chipatara ichi ikaona hama dzevarwere dzichipinda pachipatara nezvigubhu uye migomo yemvura. Dhorobha reMasvingo rave nemwedzi yakawanda rakatarisana nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvichikonzerwa nekudzimwa kuri kuitwa magetsi kunocheneswa mvura kuBushemead Water Works. Mvura iyi inenge yadhonzwa kubva kudhamu reMutirikwi. Mumwe murwere, VaKudzai Manatsa vari mu ward yevarume pachipatara apa nechirwere cheshuga vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kuri kupa kuti zvimbuzi zvisashande zvakanaka. Imwewo hama yemurwere , VaThomas Marume vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kwavashaisa mufaro. Mayor weguta reMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vanoti dambudziko remvura riri kukonzerwa nekudzimwa kwe magetsi neZESA vachiti vakambozama kutaura neve bazi iri asi zviri kuramba. Vanachiremba pachipatara cheMasvingo ichi havana havo kuramwa mabasa sezvakaita vamwe muHarare neBulawayo asi vanoti havasi kushanda zvakanaka nematambudziko avasangana nawo aya. No media source currently available

headline: Russia Yoburitsa Spain Mumakwikwi eWorld Cup
text: Russia yakashura mare mumakwikwi eWorld Cup apo yakarova Spain 4-3 mumapenalties mushure mekuita mangange-1-1. Russia yapinda mumaquarter finals emakwikwi aya. Spain yakabatana nedzimwe nyika dzakapinda mumaquarter finals nezuro dzinoti France neUruguay. Nemusi weMuvhuro nenguva dza 4 masikati, Brazil iri kutamba neMexico kochizoti manheru nenguva dza 8, Belgium iri kutamba neJapan.

headline: Vabereki Vane Vana Vane "Autism" Votarisana neMatambudziko Makukutu
text: Vabereki vevana vanoita matambudziko pakutamba nevamwe kana kuita zvinhu zvinotarisirwa pazera ravo kana kuti vane "autism" vanoti vatarisana nedambudziko guru pakuriritira vana ava. Vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwakaomarara nepamusana pekuti vana vane autism havakwanisi kuita zvinhu zvinoitwa nevamwe vechidiki kana kushamwaridzana navo. Baba Luke Pencil veku Malbereign muHarare vane mwana wavo ane makore gumi ane autism. Baba Pencil, avo vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu ekuberekwa vanoti dambudziko guru rinosangana nevabereki ava nderekushaya ruzivo pamusoro pe autism. “Izvi hazvina kunge zvabatwa nana chiremba kunyange mwana akarwara kwenguva refu ndichienda kunana chiremba vakasiyana siyana nekunana mukoti vakasiyana siyana.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Pakashayikwa kana mumwechete akatibatsira chaizvo kuti mwana wenyu condition yake inonzi autism. Aiti akachema zvainzi ah, baba hamuzivi mwana anongochema, zvinoreva kuti haasi kunzwa zvakanaka kana kuti muri kumuitira zvaasingadi. Asi uchiedza kutsanangura kuti aiwa, mwana uyu pane zvaanoita zvandisinganzwisise zvakafanana nekuti dzimwe nguva anoramba kupfeka bhutsu, dzimwe nguva anoramba kugerwa musoro.” Baba Pencil vanoti vabereki vakawanda vanokatyamadzwa nekugumbuka zvikuru pavanoona kuti mwana wavo ari kukura zvakasiyana nevamwe vana. Vanoti ivo vakaita mhanza yekukurumidza kuziva zvaiitika kumwana wavo. “Vana ava vanenge vane ma censory issues anenge akavhiringika, haana kuita seevamwe vana. Saka kana achigerwa ane zvaanonzwa zvisinganzwiwi nevamwe vana vose saka achiita muitiro waanoita iwowo.” Vatiwo, “ Saka izvozvo ndizvo zvakaita kuti tinzwisise kuti ho mwana wedu condition yaaninayo inonzi autism. Izvozvo ndinoda kuti nditsinhire kuti izvi handina kuzviwana kunana chiremba kana kunana mukoti. Ndakatozvinzwawo kune mumwe mubereki akanga ari affected, akatoenda pa radio akanotaura. Ndopatazowana information yakadaro.” Baba Pencil vanoti murume nemudzimai vanofanira kubatana kwete kunongedzerana kana mwana asangana nedambudziko. “Saka izvozvo zvakatipa simba rekuti kuti mwana wedu aite zviri nani, tikwanise kumumaneja, regai tinorisecha.” Vatizve, “ Tikabva taenda pa internet. Iripo information pa internet. Ukaiwana zvinoita kuti umaneje mwana wako zviri nani. Zvinoita kuti kuwadzana kwako naye kuve kuri nani, kuwadzana kwake nenharaunda yakamukomberedza kuve nani.” Amai Emma Muchefa avo vane mwana ane autism, vanoshandira hurumende vari pa Domboshava training centre. Vanoti madzimai mazhinji ane vana vane autism anoshungurudzika zvikuru. “Vazhinji vana baba vanotiza, uye hama hadzizvitambiri. Kazhinji burden inosiyirwa amai, seni as a mother of three, two vari disabled murume akabva aenda ndikasara ndiri a single mother.” Amai Muchefa vatizve, “ Saka dambudziko rinenge rave rekuti unenge uchida kuenda kubasa, uri kuda ku physio nemwana iyeye, uri kuda zvekudya uri kuda zvekupfeka zvevana ivavo, uri kuda medication. Saka kazhinji kacho uri kuda zvekufambisa, hauna kana motor kana wheel-chair.” Amai Tendai Kamutero veku Domboshava vane mwana wavo ane autism. Vakatozozviziva mwana uyu ave nemakore matatu kuti ndizvo zvaari. Amai Kamutero vanoti kuriritira mwana uyu zvinovanetsa semunhu ari pamushando. “Pandinoenda kubasa, munhu anosara naye haanzwisisi zvaanoda nekuti haatauri.” Vatizve, “Sign language haaizivi, haakwanisi ku communicator naye. Asi iye takatozomudzidza kuti kana ave nenzara kana chikafu chiri paanosvikira anotora ega. Kana kuti ukaona akukudhonza, isaini yekuti ane nzara.” Amai Constance Mandishona vane vana vana, uye vaviri vavo vakaremara. Amai Mandishona, avo vanoshanda muhurumende vakapihwa imba yekugara kuMufakose mushure mekunge vakuru vavo vaona kutambura kwavaiita. Vanoti vakaremara vanofanira kusimudzirana. “Ipapo ndisati ndapihwa imba ndakanga ndisina pfungwa dzekuti I can advocate kana kumiririrawo kana kutsigira munhu akaremara.” Amai Mandishona vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Ndakazogara pasi ndikazvibvunza kuti, hongu ndamiririrwa, ko vari kunze uko vasina anovamiririrawo tochiita sei? Nekuti inini pandakabatsirwa nemba, Permanent secretary mai Nhekairo vakandiudza kuti, Cony, dai vana vako wanga wakavachengetesa kumaraini, vachiita kunge musara pavana, I wasn’t going to assist you. But pese patinotaura unotungamidza vana vako kumberi kuti ma’am vangu vazodai nekuti hauna kunyara navo saka tazokudai. Ndakakwanisa kubatsira vamwe vabereki vairi. Mumwe wacho anonzi mai Boora anoshanda ku President’s department. Ane mwana wakewo ane autism. Ndikamuti akoma nyaya yangu yakamira yakadai, inini ndakawanawo imba. Imimi can you not write a letter mukwanisewo kuti mubatsirwe? Vakapihwa flat ku Ardbennie.” Dr Cotilda Mangoma mugari wemuHarare uye vanofamba vachipa dzidziso pamusoro pe autism. Vanoti vabereki vevana vakadai vanofanira kushingaira kutsvaga ruzivo kuitira kuti vana vavo vave nepundutso. “Inini ndiri kuona kuti zvakakosha kuve neruzivo mukati memhuri nemhaka yekuti chinhu chawave kuziva unoziva kuti unochibata sei, unochibata nemutoo upi.” Dr Mangoma vanotizve, “Saka ini ndinoti vana baba nana mai vane vana vavasinganzwisisi kuti ingave autism here kana kwete zviri nani vatsvake rubatsiro kubva ku clinic level. Kana vabva ikoko voudzwa kuti enda ku rehabilitation. Rehabilitation yoferefeta kuti itype ipi ye autism, pamusana pekuti akasiyana siyana, akawanda. Nekuonekwa kunoita mwana, nemaitiro ake unobva waudzwa kuti aiwa ichi ndechakati, then rubatsiro rwobva rwauya. Angave anogona nezvemaoko, angave munhu ari bright kuchikoro, zvese zvinobatsirika along those lines.” VaPardon Gonorashe mushandi wehurumende ane hunyanzvi hwekubatsira veruzhinji, kunyanya vanotambura kuti vave neraramo iri nani. Vanoti vabereki vevana vane autism vanofanira kuve padyo nepavanowana ruzivo pamusoro pe autism.“Saka paida kuti patange pawanikwa centre yekuti vanhu vari kumaruwa, vangadai vari kuBinga, Muzarabani kana kuti kuMberengwa vakaona kuti vane vana vane autism they can refer vana ivavo kuno.” Vatizve,“Tikashevedza ma parents vari kumaruwa vanogona kuuya kuma campaign akaita seaya.” VaGonorashe vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega kuzvirongwa zvakanangana ne autism. “Hakuna zviri kunyanya kuitwa about disability as a whole.” Vatizve, “Then mukazopinda mudisability sector imomo munozoona kuti autism is relegated kuzasizasi kune other forms of disability. Saka ngatitorei disability sector se ine mari shoma mu budget. Then yapihwa mari shoma already, autism iri kuzasizasi zvekuti ikoko kunosvika one cent. Ndosaka kune vanhu vashomanana vari kutari nezve autism as a right.” Sangano guru rezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti pavanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu ega ega mumwechete wavo anenge aine autism. Vamwe vanhu vane autism vanokwanisa kuzviriritira asi vakawanda vavo vanotozoda kuchengetwa hupenyu hwavo hwese. No media source currently available  .

headline: Japan chidzidzo — Makusha
text: SHANGWITI yemujaho wekumhanya — Ngoni Makusha —inoti yakadzidza zvakawanda kumakwikwi emaOlympics ayo pari zvino ari kuitirwa kuJapan uye yave kushanda nesimba kuti igokwanisa kudzokera zvekare kumitambo iyi mumakore mana anotevera.   Makusha mumwe wevatambi vashanu vange vachimirira nyika kumitambo iyi.   Nemusi weMugovera akakwikwidza mumijaho miviri apo wekutanga wakaita kuti azopinda mumujaho mukuru umo akazopedza ari pechinomwe ndokubva aburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura ari kuJapan achigadzirira kudzoka kumusha, Makusha anoti zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru kumirira nyika kumutambo mukuru wakaita semaOlympics uye ave kutotanga kugadzirira kuzoenda kunokwikwidza zvakare kune mimwe inotevera.   “Ndiri kunzwa kufara kuti ndakazadzikisa chishuwo changu chekukwikwidza kumaOlympics. Ndakadzidza zvakawanda zvandichagara nazvo uye iye zvino ndave kutotanga gadziriro dzangu dzekuti ndizodzokera kune mamwe maOlympics anotevera. Gore rinotevera, ndinoda kunokwikwidza kumaWorld Championships,” anodaro Makusha.   Kunyangwe hake ari kudzoka kumusha asina menduru yaakabata, Makusha anoti haasi kutarisira izvozvo nekuti chikuru kwaari kwaive kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu achidzingirirana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rese.   Anoti rutsigiro rwaange achiwana rwuri kumusimudzira zvekuti acharamba achishanda nesimba. “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichipihwa kubva kuvanhu vakawanda rwunosimudzira naizvozvo ini ndicharamba ndichishanda nesimba kuitira kuti mune remangwana ndigounza menduru. “Chikuru chandaitarisira pandakaenda kumutambo uyu kusvika ndokwikwidzawo zita rangu rozivikanwa izvo ndakakwanisa kuita.   Kukwikwidza kumutambo uyu kwakanakisa chose nekuti unoramba uchidzokera, iye zvino ndave kushanda nesimba kuitira kuti ndigoramba ndichidzokera kunokwikwidza kumutambo uyu.”

headline: Vanamukoti Vairamwa Mabasa Votarisirwa Kudzoka paBasa
text: Vanamukoti, avo vanga vave nesvondo vachiramwa mabasa, vari kutarisirwa kudzoka pabasa vose nhasi Muvhuro, zvichitevera kuzivisa kwavakaita neMugovera kuti vakanga vave kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku. Gwaro rakaburitswa nesangano rinomirira vanamukoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association nemusi weMugovera, rinoti zvinosuwisa kuti matanho avanamukoti ekuratidza kunyunyuta kwavo nemabatirwo avo pamabasa akanga ave kuiswa kune zvematongerwo enyika. Sangano ravanamukoti iri rinoti kuitira kuti nhaurirano, idzo dzakanga dzambomira, dzienderere mberi, uyewo kudzivirirawo vashandi kuti vasashungurudzwa, vanamukoti vose vakawirirana kumisa kuramwa mabasa uku kuti uye vave kudzokera kubasa. Sangano iri rinoti vose vanamukoti vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa vari kutarisirwa kudzokera kumabasa kwavo nhasi. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kuti vanamukoti ava vachatambirwa here kana kuti kwete, sezvo hurumende yakanga yazivisa kare kuti vose vakanga vapinda pakuramwa mabasa vakanga vadzingwa mabasa, uye vanoda basa vaifanirwa kutonyorera patsva vachitsvaga basa. Hurumende yakazivisawo zvakare kuti yakanga yatotanga kutambira matsamba kubva kunavanamukoti vaitsvaga mabasa.

headline: MDC-T Yoparura Hurongwa hweKupinda Muvanhu Ichitsvaga Rutsigiro
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti riri kuparura neMugovera chirongwa chekushanyira vanhu mudzimba dzavo mumwe nemumwe, senzira yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rinouya. Bato iri rinoti richashandisa mukana uyu kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti bato ravo rakatora nzira yekutsvaga rutsigiro nayo iyi sezvo rakaona kuti kazhinji parinoita misangano vatsigiri varo vanosara vachishungurudzwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeve Zanu PF. Vanoti Chirongwa chavo ichi, icho chinonzi “Chakachaya”, chichaita kuti vasangane nemadzishe nemasabhuku, vemakereke, pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vari munzvimbo dzavanogara pasina dambudziko rekutyira hupenyu hwavo. Bato reZanu PF masvondo maviri adarika rakaumbawo makomiti achange achitsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
text: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

headline: Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVaviri Vanowanikwa Vaine Chirwere cneCovid-19 muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbabwe nemasere, kana kuti 7 598 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22, vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 21 vagara vari munyika, mumwe chete ari akadzoka munyika kubva kuSouth Africa. Hapana munhu akshaya nechirwere ichi izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vafa varambe vari pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana, kana kuti 224. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuCovid-19 kusvika neChitatu vanonzi vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana masere ane makumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 5 823. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 1 551 vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe nezviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere kana kuti 29 398 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vadarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matata zvine mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 930 900.

headline: Vagari Vodyira Marasha Kanzuru yeMasvingo
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nekanzuru yavo nezuro rekuti itengere vakuru vemapazi nharembozha dzichadya mari inodarika zviuru makumi matanhatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vagari vakawanda vanoti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo zvinoratidza kuti haina shungu nekuita zvinhu zvinobatsira veruzhinji. Maminetsi emusangano wekanzuru wakaitwa nezuro anoratidza kuti kanzuru yakabuda nechisungo chekutenga nharembozha dzemhando yepamusoro soro dzekupa vakuru vemapazi ekanzuru gumi, pamwe nevetevedzeri vavo gumi. Vakuri vemapazi vachatengerwa Iphone7 iyo inoita zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora, vatevedzeri vavo vachitengerwa Samsung Galaxy S9, iyo inoita zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica. Izvi zvichadyira kanzuru mari inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Vagari vataura ne Studio7 vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vatungamiri vekanzuru havana hany'a nehupenyu hwevagari sezvo vachishandisa mari yakawanda kuzvinhu zvenhando, asi ivo vasina mvura yakakwana, migwagwa yakanaka uye marara asiri kutakurwa kanzuru ichiti mari yairi kuwana ishoma. Amai Sandra Muzenda, avo vanogara mumusha weSisk, vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakuru vekanzuru vane humbimbindoga. Mumwe mugari, Muzvare Blessing Chimombo, vanotiwo havaoni chinobatsira nharembozha pakufambiswa kwebasa rekanzuru rakafana nekuti kushomeka kwemvura kupere mudhorobha. Kunyange zvekutengwa kwenharembozha izvi zvisimo mubhajeti rekanzuru ra2019, kanzuru inotarisirwa zvakare kuzobudisa mari yakawanda yekutengera vakuru ava muto wekudzishandisa mwedzi wega wega. Mubhajeti regore rino remari inosvika mamirioni maviri emadhora, kanzuru ichashandisa mari inosvika zviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora gore rose mukugadzirisa migwagwa, zvinoreva kuti mari yenharembozha yose inokwanisa kugadzirisa migwagwa yedhorobha kwemwedzi mumwe chete. Kanzuru inoshandisazve mari inoita zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora kutenga mishonga inochenesa mvura pagore, zvekuti mari yenharembozha inokwanisa kutenga mishonga yekuchenesa mvura kwemwedzi miviri, vanhu vachiwana mvura yakachena muguta rine vanhu vosvika zviuru zana. Mari yenharembozha iyi inokwanisawo kutenga mafuta edzimotokari dzose dzekanzuru nedzekutakurisa marara mudzimba kwemwedzi mitatu, izvo zvinoita kuti zvirwere zvive zvishoma muguta. Naynzvi munyaya dzemari dzinotiwo, kanzuru, iyo iri kunetseka kuwanira musha wega wega bhini rawo, yaikwanisa kutenga mabhini zviuru zvisere zvopihwa vagari kuitira kuti vasarase marara pose pose. Mukuru webasa muMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti kanzuru iri kuita zvekutamba nemari yevagari. Kunyange izvi zvakabuda mumaminitsi emusangano wekupera kwemwedzi unopa mvumo kubasa rose rekanzuru richaitwa mwedzi unotevera, meya weguta, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti izvi hazvisati zvapasiswa. Vagari vanoti kanzuru inofanirwa kusatenga nharembozha idzi yonangana nezvinhu zvinobatsira vagari. No media source currently available

headline: Africa kuWorld Cup
text: NEMUSI wesvondo, pasi rose richange rakatarisa apo pachatanga mutambo weFIFA 2022 World Cup uyo uchaona nyika yeQatar, iyo iri kuronga mutambo wegore rino, ichitatsurana neEcuador.   Mutambo weWorld Cup wadzoka gore rino uyo wakapedzisira kuitwa muna2018 kuRussia apo France yakatora mukombe mushure mekukunda Croatia 4-2 mufainari.   France neCroatia zviriko zvekare kumutambo wegore rino kuQatar.   Asi pachatanga mitambo nemusi weSvondo, Africa ichange yakatarisawo nyika dziri kumirira dunhu iri kumutambo uyu dzinoti Senegal, Ghana, Cameroon, Tunisia neMorocco.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yezvikwata zvishanu izvi ichitarisa vatambi vazvo pamwe nemapoka azvakaiswa.   1.Senegal    Chikwata chaAloiu Cisse, icho chinove shasha yemuAfrica pari zvino, ndicho chiri kutarisirwa nevazhinji kuti chinogona kurwisana nezvimwe zvepasi rese zvekutosvika mufainari yegore rino.   Senegal yakakomborerwa nevatambi vane chitsama vane mukurumbira vanotambira nhabvu yavo kuEurope.   MaLions of Teranga ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana neQatar, Netherlands neEcuador.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko nemusi weMuvhuro apo achasangana neNetherlands, kuchiti wechipiri achasangana neQatar musi wa25 Mbudzi uye wekupedzisira nemusi wa29 Mbudzi neEcuador.   MaLions of Teranga achange achitarira kumutambi wavo ane mukurumbira, Sadio Mane, uyo vari kunamatira kuti ange apora musi weMuvhuro usati wasvika pavachasangana neNertherlands.    Kalidou Koulibaly   Mutambi weBayern Munich uyu akakuvara achitambira chikwata chake chekuGermany asi akadomwa kupinda muchikwata chaCisse icho chine vamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Edouard Mendy weChelsea, Kalidou Koulibaly (Chelsea), Abdou Diallo (RB Leipzig), Idrissa Gueye (Everton) naPape Gueye (Marseille).   2.Tunisia    MaCarthage Eagles ari kunokwikwidza kumutambo weWorld Cup kechitanhatu munhoroondo yawo.   Chimwe chezvikwata zvemuAfrica zvakwanisa kuenda kakawanda kumutambo uyu uye chakasanganiswa vatambi vanotambira kuEurope nevanotambira muAfrica.   Chikwata chaJalel Kadri ichi chiri muboka reGroup D umo chichasangana neDenmark mumutambo wekutanga nemusi wa22 Mbudzi, chozosangana neAustralia nemusi wa26 Mbudzi uye neFrance nemusi wa30 Mbudzi.   Chikwata chaKadri ichi chine vatambi vakaita saWahbi Khazri, Youssef Msanki naHannibal Mejbri weManchester United uyo ari kutambira Birmingham City nechikwereti.   3.Morocco    MaAtlas Lions ari kuenda kuWorld Cup kechitanhatu uye gore rino zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kuchikwata ichi icho chizere vatambi vanotambira kuEurope zvakare.   Chikwata chaWalid Regragui ichi chiri muboka rimwe chete neCroatia, Belgium neCanada muGroup F.   Mutambo wacho wekutanga uriko musi wa23 Mbudzi apo chichasangana neCroatia, chozobandana neBelgium musi wa27 Mbudzi uye chichizopedzisira neCanada musi wa1 Zvita.    Hakim Ziyech   Achraf Hakim wePSG, Hakim Ziyech weChelsea nevamwe vatambi vechikwata ichi vane gomo rekukwira kuti vagobuda muboka ravo iri.   4.Cameroon    MaIndomitable Lions ari kuenda kuWorld Cup kechisere gore rino apo achange achirairidzwa naRigobert Song uyo anove shasha kuCameroon sezvo akatomboenda kumutambo uyu achitambira nyika yake.   Muchikwata chake mune vatambi vakaita saVincent Aboubakar (Al Nassr), Christian Bassogog (Shangai Shenhua), Eric-Maxim Choupo Moting (Bayern Munich) naAndre Onana (Inter Milan) vanotambira kuEurope.    Vincent Aboubakar   Cameroon iri muboka rimwe chete neBrazil, Switzerland neSerbia muGroup G. Mutambo weCameroon wekutanga ichasangana neSwitzerland musi wa24 Mbudzi, yozotamba neSerbia musi wa28 Mbudzi.   Mutambo wekupedzisira muboka iri ichasangana neBrazil musi wa2 Zvita apo vachatatsurana neshasha dzakaita saNeymar Junior, Gabriel Jesus, Vinicius Jnr naCasemiro.   5.Ghana    MaBlack Stars ari kuenda kuWorld Cup kechina munhoroondo yawo uye gore rino akaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Portugal, Korea Republic neUruguay muGroup H.   Chikwata chemaBlack Stars chizerewo nevatambi vanotambira kuEurope vakaita saThomas Partey weArsenal, Jordan Ayew (Crystal Palace), Tariq Lamptey (Brighton & Hove Albion) naInaki Williams (Athletic Bilbao).    Thomas Partey   Chikwata chaOtto Oddo mutambo wacho wekutanga uriko musi wa24 Mbudzi apo chichabandana nePortugal yaCristiano Ronaldo, chozosangana neKorea Republic musi wa28 Mbudzi uye mutambo wekupedzisira muboka iri chichasangana neUrugual musi wa2 Zvita.   Mutambo wavo neUrugual unotarisirwa kunakidza zvikuru sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakambosangana muquarter-final yeWorld Cup ya2010 apo Luis Suarez akabata bhora akatadzisa Ghana kunwisa kuti ifambire mberi kupinda musemi-final.   Ghana yakazopihwa pena asi aive kaputeni wechikwata ichi, Asamoah Gyan, akaibhururutsa mutambo uyu ukapera uri mangange 1-1 apo Ghana yakazoburitswa kumapena.

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vokumbira Kuti Nguva yeKubayiwa Nhomba yeTyphoid Iwedzerwe
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kukumbira hurumende kuti iwedzere nguva yechirongwa chekuti vanhu vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chetyhoid nedzimwe nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere sezvo chisina kushambadzirwa zvakakwana. Guta reHarare ndiro rine dambudziko guru rechirwere chetyphoid munyika yose. Hutachiona hwetyphoid hunopa kuti munhu anzwe kupisa muviri, kuita manyoka uye kurutsa. Chirwere ichi chinokwanisa kutapuriranwa mumvura kana chikafu kana munhu asina kugeza maoko nemvura yakachena. Amai Juliana Musengi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakamborwara neTyphoid katatu kubva zvavakatamira kuHarare vachibva kuMashonaland Central sezvo vachiti vainge vasingazive kuti mvura yemugurta haina kuchena. Vamwe vabereki vanonziwo vari kuramba kubayisa vana nhomba nekushaya ruzivo sezvo pasina kunyatsoshambadzirwa nekupihwa dzidziso yakakwana. Sachigaro weWomens Coalition Harare Chapter, Amai Charity Mandishona vakarudzira vabereki kuti vabayise vana nhomba vachiti kusaita izvi kunoisa hupenyu hwavo munjodzi yekufa kana kuremara. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano inoshanda mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Michael Vere vati chirongwa chekubaya nhomba ichi chinosanganisirawo kubayiwa majekiseni egomarara nezvimwe uye vanoti chirongwa ichi chakatanga musi wa4 Chivabvu chikapera musi wa 4 Chikumi. Doctor Vere vati vari kufara nekutambirwa kuri kuitwa nhomba yeHPV yekudzivirira gomarara repamuromo wechibereko. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa kana kuti Department of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vatiwo kuwandisa kwaita vanhu muHarare nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena ndiko kwave kupa kuti vanhu varware netyphoid. Kubva muna 2010, chirwere cheTyphoid chakatanga kupararira zvakanyanya muZimbabwe uye muna 2018 bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu zviuru zvina kana kuti 4000 kusanganisira vana vakabatwa nechirwere uye vanodarika zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvitatu kubva muzana kana kuti 73% vari muHarare. Rimwe dambudziko range rave rekuti chirwere ichi chainge chisidadavire mimwe mishonga. Asi ikozvino vana ava vari kubayiwa nhomba inonzi inoshanda zvakanaka kudzivirira kuparira kwechirwere ichi inonzi Typhoid Conjugate Vaccine kana kuti TCV. Nhomba yeTVC iyi yakatanga kubayiwa munyika muna 2019, paine chinangwa chekubaya nhomba vana mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 6, 2 million. Vana vari kubayiwa vari pakati pemwedzi mipfumbamwe nemakore gumi nemashanu. Asi chirongwa change chambomiswa sezvo hurumende yange yorwisa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Hurumende iri kushanda nesangano rePATH kuti vanhu vawane nhomba iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Makano Oramba Akabatiranwa muZanu PF
text: Zvinhu mubato reZanu-PF zvinenge zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo kunyanya mudunhu reMidlands rinozivikanwa nekutsigira zvakasimba mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Zvinhu mubato reZanu-PF zvinenge zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo kunyanya mudunhu reMidlands rinozivikanwa nekutsigira zvakasimba mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available Vanotsigira VaMnangagwa zvakasimba inhengo mbiri dzedare reparamende, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena, VaOwen Mada Ncube uye sachigaro wevechidiki, VaEdmore Samambwa, vari kumiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yekutuka uye kutyisidzira gurukota rezvemitambo, VaMakhosini Hlogwani, nevatevedzeri vaviri vemakurukota, VaTapiwa Matangaidze na Amai Anastacia Ndlovu. Vakatyisidzirwa ava vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nekuti vari kunzi vari kuchikwata chinozivikanwa nekuti Generation 40 icho chinonzi chinorerekera kuna Amai Grace Mugabe. Amai Mugabe nemhuri yavo vanonzi vari kuzororo kuDubai pari zvino.Zvikwata izvi zvinonzi zviri kunetsana kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chaVaMugabe avo vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri mwedzi unouya. VaHlongwani vaudza Studio 7 kuti dare riri kugara neMugovera richinzwa nyaya yavo. Vamwe vakuru muZanu-PF vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vatsigiri vaVaMnangagwa ava vakadzingwa zvinosiya VaMnangagwa vazungunuka zvakanyanya. Dare repamusoro reZanu-PF rinotonga mhosva, reNational Disciplinary Committee, riri kumirira kunzwa nyaya dziri kubva kumatunhu anoti Mashonaland East, Mashonaland West, Masvingo, neManicaland dzenhengo dzebato dziri kunzi dzidzingwe. Mutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe, vakamboti nyaya dzekudzingana mubato dzimire sezvo dzainge dzoita kuti bato riite zinyekenyeke. Asi mutauriri webato iri, VaSimon Khaya Moyo vanoti havasi kuzodzora tsvimbo kana paine vanhu vanenge vachityora mutemo webato. Vati vose vanenge vasiri kutevera gwara remusangano vanenge vazvisikira moto muziso. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari chipangamazano musangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti havashamisike kuti muMidlands mave kukamwa mbada.

headline: America Yokurudzira Kuti Vatori veNhau Vasambunyikidzwa Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Mugwaro ravakabudisa, mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa eFederal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), VaWilliam Sweeney, vakati chikwata chinotsigirwa nehurumende yeIran chakaedza kubvuta mutori wenhau anogara muAmerica kuti vamudzorere zvechisimba kuIran. Mutori wenhau uyu ndiMuzvare Masih Alinejad, akazvarirwa kuIran asi ave mugari wemuAmerica. Kwemakore mazhinji, Alinejad akashanda semutori wenhau muIran, izvo zvakakonzera kuti hurumende yeIran ishatirwe naye pamusoro pezvaakange achibudisa pachena. Kubva zvaatiza kubva kuIran muna 2009, Alinejad ave nemukurumbira pa’social media’, paanogara achishora kumanikidzwa kwevanhukadzi muIran kuti vashandise jira rekuvhara misoro yavo, kana kuti hijab. MuAmerica, Alinejad anechirongwa chaanokokera panhephenyuro yeVoice of America. Mutauriri wemuzinda weWhite House, Amai Jen Psaki, vakashora Iran mukuronga kubvuta Alinejad, vachiti Iran inoda kunyaradza manzwi eavo vanoshanda murugare muIran nekune dzimwe nyika. Muongororo inonzi ‘2021 World Press Freedom Index’, yakaitwa nekunyorwa nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau, reReporters Without Borders, Iran iri pachinzvimbo chezana nemakumi manomwe nechina (174) kubva munyika zana nemakumi masere (180) dzinobvumira vatori venhau kushanda vakasununguka. Sangano iri rinoti, mukudzvanyirira vatori venhau, hurumende yeIran inoshandisa nzira dzechisimba, dzinosanganisira kuvabvunzurudza, kuvaisa mumajeri kana kuvauraya. Sekutaura kwakaitwa negurukota reAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaAntony Blinken, Iran haisi iyo nyika yega inoshungurudza nekumbunyikidza vatori venhau. VaBlinken vakati hofisi iri mubazi ravo yakabudisa zvayakawana muongororo yayakaita, inonzi Human Rights Report, inotatidza kuti vatori venhau vazhinji varikumbunyikidzwa nekuurairwa basa ravo. Sangano rinorwira kuchengetedza kwevatori venhau, reCommittee to Protect Journalists, rinoti muna 2020, huwandu wevatori venhau vakaurayirwa kuita basa ravo hwakapetwa kaviri, richiti vatori venhau vazhinji vakaurawa muMexico neAfghanistan. Sangano iri rinotivo huwandu hwevatori venhau vakasungirwa kuita basa ravo mugore ra2020 hwakasvika pahusina kumbosvika kubva zvavatanga kuongorora kunetseka pabasa kwevatori venhau, richiti vazhinji vevatori venhau vakasungwa muPeople’s Republic of China, Turkey, nemuEgypt. Mushure mekuziviswa kuti Iran yakange yaedza kumubvuta muAmerica, Masih Alinejad akataura pfungwa dzevatori venhau pasi pose achiti haazoregi kuita basa rake, sezvo zvese zvirikuitika kwaari zvichimusimbaradza. VaBlinken vanoti chokwadi chinobudiswa nevatori venhau chinobatsira mukuvaka hurumende dzejekerere, vachitizve vanokurudzira hurumende dzepasi pose kuti dzichengetedze vatori venhau uye kuti dzione kuti vatori venhau vanoita basa ravo pasina njodzi. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMwonzora, Votarisirwa Kuita Musangano kuZimbabwe Grounds neVatsigiri Vavo neSvondo
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata che MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vari kutarisirwa neSvondo kuita musangano mukuru munhandare yeZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields wekutsvagira nhengo dzavo rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa mwedzi uno. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vatsigiri vavo vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo kuenda kumusangano uyu, vachiti havatarisire kuti vangarambidzwa nemapurisa kuunga sezvakamboitika kuEpworth. Panyaya yekuti vanotarisira vanhu vakawanda here misangano yanga ichimboitwa naVaMwonzora yaipindwa nevanhu vashomashoma, vadamba vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kufananidza misangano yaiitirwa mudzimba nemuzvikoro nemusangano mukuru we rally, sezvo zvakatosiyana zvachose. No media source currently available

headline: Kuda okunga zvibhakera
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai yeWorld Boxing Council (WBC) Interim Title – Kudakwashe Memory “Take Money” Chiwandire – atanga gadziriro dzake svondo rino dzekuzosangana naYamileth Mercado wekuMexico.   Vatambi vaviri ava vacharwira bhande rina Mercado reWBC Gold mumutambo uchiri pakati pekurongwa.   Kutaura kuno, chikwata chaTake Money naMercado zvakamirira kupihwa gwaro neWBC kuti vachitanga kuita hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu.   Murairidzi waTake Money arizve maneja wake, Clyde Musonda, anoti chikwata chavo chakamirira kunzwa kubva kuWBC kuti vochitanga rinhi kuita hurukuro nechikwata chaMercado.   Anoti apo vakamirira gwaro iri, vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzemutambo uyu sezvo vari kuda kuti Take Money agare akagadzirira.   “Take Money akatanga gadziriro dzake svondo rino takatarisana nemutambo waMercado, kunyangwe zvazvo tichakamirira kunzwa kubva kuWBC nekuti ndivo vanotipa mvumo yekuti chitangai kuita hurukuro mushure mekuita ongororo yavo.   “Isu tiri kuda kugara takagadzirira nekuti patichasangana naMercado, Take Money anenge asiri kumirira Zimbabwe chete, asi Africa yose. Saka tinoda kutorera Mercado bhande rake riuye kuno,” anodaro Musonda.   Anoti kana hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu dzikatanga, shuviro yavo ndeyekuti uitwe gore rinotevera munaKukadzi kana Kurume.   Musonda anoti murwendo rwekugadzirira mutambo uyu, vachaenda kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neNamibia kunoita gadziriro sezvo mutambo wavatarisana nawo uri mukuru.   “Sezvo mutambo wedu wekupedzisira apo takarwa naZulina Munoz waive uri munaGumiguru, tinoda kuti unotevera Kudah agorwa naMercado munaKukadzi kana Kurume.   “Asi, hunge hurukuro dzedu nechikwata chake dzikafamba zvakanaka.   “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro, tichaenda naKudah kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neNamibia tichinosimbaradza gadziriro dzake dzemutambo uyu nekuti nyika idzi dzine magym etsiva ane zvinhu zvose zvakakwana anobatsira kuti gadziriro dzedu dzifambe zvakanaka,” anodaro Musonda.

headline: Zimbabwe Yokumbira Kukanzurirwa Chikwereti neAfrican Development Bank
text: Hurumende yakumbira bhanga re African Development Bank, AfDB, kuti rikanzure chikwereti chine nyika kubhanga iri. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau mu Harare mushure mekusangana nechikwata chevakuru-vakuru chebhanga iri icho chichange chiri munyika kwesvondo, gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, vakumbira kuti Zimbabwe ikanzurirwe chikwereti chainacho kubhanga iri zvavati zvichaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. VaChinamasa vati kana AfDB ikakanzurira Zimbabwe chikwereti chayo chemari inoita mamiroyoni mazana mashanu emadhora, mamwe masangano anokweretesa mari akaita se International Monetary Fund, IMF, neWorld Bank, WB, anogona kuzokanzurawo zvikwereti zvine Zimbabwe kumasangano aya. Asi mutungamiri wechikwata che AfDB ichi, Va Alieu Momodou Ngum, havana kutaura kuti bhanga ravo richakanzura here chikwereti chine hurumende ye Zimbabwe kubhanga iri. Vati bhanga ravo ragara richingobatsira Zimbabwe kunyanwe panga pakawoma zvinhu. Chikwereti chine Zimbabwe kumasangano ekunze anokweretesa mari chava kuvavarira kusvika pamabhiriyoni gumi emadhora uye hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka kuti ibhadhadhare chikwereti ichi. Gore rapera, IMF yakaramba kukanzura chikwereti cheZimbabwe ichiti Zimbabwe haisi nyika ine hurombo hwakanyanya kana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Zambia ndeimwe yenyika dzinonzi dzine hurombo hwakanyanya dzakakanzurirwa zvikwereti zvadzo ne IMF. Chikwata che AfDB chakatarisirwa kushanyira nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika pachichange chiri muno chichiwona kushandiswa kuri kuitwa mari yakaiswa nebhanga iri mumabasa epundutso kana kuti ma projects. AfDB ndiyo yakapa kambani ye Lake Harvest mari inodarika mamiriyoni masere emadhora kusimudzira chirongwa chekuchengetwa kwehove ku Kariba chiri kushandiswa semucherechedzo wezvirongwa zvinosimudzira magariro evanhu mu Africa yese. Chisati chabuda munyika chakananga ku Mozambique, chikwata che AfDB ichi chakatarisirwa kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, nemusi weChishanu.

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chinosarudza Kunoshanda neVarwere Vane Covid-19 MuNew York
text: Dunhu reNew York muAmerica ndiro ririkuona hudzamu hukuru hwechirwere checoronavirus kupfuura mamwe nematunhu ose muAmerica. Kutaura kuno, kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevarwere nevarikufa hwave kudzika, dunhu reNew York rarasikirwa nevanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri nezvisere (28,000) asi vanhu vachingori kubatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi kupfuura mune mamwe matunhu muAmerica. Gavhuna wedunhu reNew York, VaAndrew Cuomo, vakakumbira rubatsiro kubva kune vanamukoti navanachiremba nevamwe vari mubasa rezvehutano, kusanganisa vari pamudyandigere, kuti vaende kuNew York kunobatsira dunhu iri mukurapa nekuchengeta varwere vane Coronavirus. Vazhinji kubva kumatunhu akasiyanasiyana vakazvinzwa vakaenda kuno batsira varwere vane coronavirus mudunhu reNew York. Umwe wevakanzwa chikumbiro chaGavhuna Cuomo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Muzvare Chiwoneso Mpofu, uyo panguva iyo akange achishanda mudunhu re Ohio, muno muAmerica. Muzvare Mpofu anoti panguva yaakange achifanirwa kunyorerana chibvumirano chebasa chitsva nechipatara chaaishandira kuOhio, akaona zvakakodzera kuenda kuNew York, uko kuchakangotarisana nedambudziko rechirwere che coronavirus, achiti ruzivo rwake rwurikudiwa zvakanyanya nevarwere ava kuNew York. Muzvare Mpofu anoti kuve mukoti haisi nyaya yekutsvaka mari asi kuti chinhu chinenge chagara chiri muhana yemunhu. Studio 7 yabata Muzvare Chiwoneso Mpofu kuti vatitsanangurire kuti sei vakafunga zvekupinda munzvimbo irikufiwa nevanhu vazhinji, pamwe chete nevanamukoti. No media source currently available

headline: VaNzuwa Voradzikwa kuHeroes Acre VaMnangagwa Vachivimbisa Kugadzirisa Zvichemo zveVashandi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti hurumende yavo yakazvipira kugadzirisa nyaya dzemari yemihoro yevashandi pamwe nezvose zvinodiwa mukuita basa ravo asi mamwe masangano anomirira vashandi anoti mashoko avo anofanira kuonekwa nebasa kwete kutaura chete. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya pakuradzikwa kwaVaMariyawanda Nzuwa nemusi weSvondo pamarinda anoradzikwa magamba enyika paHeroes Acre Mutungamiri wenyika akati vashandi vehurumende vanofanira kushanda zvakasimba sezvaiitwa naVaNzuwa kuitira kuti mabasa ehurumende afambire mberi. VaMnangagwa vakatwoi hurumende yavo yakazvipira kugadzirisa zvese zviri kunetsa kuvashandi zvikurusei panguva ino yechirwere cheCovid 19. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vadzidzisi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure vati hurumende yave nenguva ichingovimbisa vashandi mari asi pasina chiri kubuda. VaMnangagwa vakati VaNzuwa munhu akashanda zvikuru kutsvaga zvikwanisiro zvaivaida mukurwisa hutongi hwevechichena panguva yavaishanda semudzidisi pane imwe yunivhesiti kuAmerica vasati vadzoka kumusha pakawana nyika kuzvitonga kuzere. Ataura akamirira mhuri yekwa Nzuwa uye ari muzukuru wemufi, Amai Tendai Bare, vakati VaNzuwa munhu aive nerudo nemhuri pamwe nenyika yake uye munhu aida zvekurima zvikuru. VaNzuwa vakaberekwa musi 9 Chivabvu 1941 kuNharira kuChivhu vakadzidza kuDriefontein kwaChirumhanzu nekwaKutamba kwaZvimba vasati vaenda kuAmerica kuzvidzidzo zvavo zvepamusoro kwavakasangana nemudzimai wavo Janice Mary Stevenson. Vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo kuAmerica vakazodzidzisa pane imwe yunivhesiti kunyika iyi vasati vadzoka kuZimbabwe payakawana kuzvitonga kuzere muna 1980 vachishanda mubazi rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Vakazove sachigaro wePublic Service Commission kubva muna 1992 kusvika muna2018 apo pavakazosiya basa iri vave kunorima kupurazi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: VaBarack Obama Vanorumbidza Mabasa aMuchakabvu Nelson Mandela
text: Vaimbove mutungamiri weAmerica, Va Barack Obama, vakarumbidza vaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela, nebasa guru ravakaita rekurwira kuti munhu wese ave nerusununguko. Vachitaura neChipiri kuvanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvina muJohannesburg muhurongwa hwekurangarira VaMandela, VaObama vakarumbidza mabasa akaitwa naVaMandela, avo vaifanirwa kusvitsa makore zana gore rino, dai vakange vachiri vapenyu. VaObama vakati hondo yerusununguko haisati yapera, uye vanhu vanofanira kudzidza kubva kuhunhu hwairatidzwa naVaMandela. VaObama vakaratidzawo kushushikana nerusarura ganda ruchiripo munyika mavo nemuSouth Africa, zvinhu zvavanoti ndizvo zvakarwirwa naVaMandela kuti zvipere pasi rose. Mashoko akataurwa naVaObama ndeemhando yepamusoro zvichitevera kusiya kwavo basa semutungamiri weAmerica muna 2017, mushure mekunge vashanda muWhite House kwemakore masere. VaObama vakasangana naVaMandela muna 2005, makore matatu vasati vasarudzwa kuva mutungamiri weAmerica. Muna 2013, VaObama vakataura mashoko akadzama pahurongwa hwekurangarira VaMandela. VaMandela vakagara muhusungwa kwemakore makumi maviri nemanomwe, vakazoburitswa mujeri muna 1990, vakazoitwa mutungamiri wechitema wekutanga muSouth Africa muna 1994. VaTrust Masieleala, avo vari kuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro pa University of Johannesburg, vakati kurudziro yaVaObama haina kunangana ne South Africa chete, asi kuti ikurudziro kunyika dzose kuti dziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. Chipangamazano musangano re Political Economy Southern Africa, VaGideon Chitanga, vakatiwo mashoko aVaObama aburitsa pachena matambudziko ari kunetsa nyika zhinji pasi rose. VaTerrence Chitapi veAfrican Democracy Forum kuchamhembe kweAfrica, vakatiwo mashoko aVa Obama anoratidza kuti hapana munhu akakosha kupfuura mumwe. Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, Va Cyril Ramaphosa, pamwe nemudzimai waVaMandela, Amai Gracia Machel, vakarumbidza VaMandela vakakurudzira munhu wese kuti azadzikise chido chavo chekuda kuona munhu wese akasununguka. VaObama vasati vapinda muSouth Africa, vakashanyira Kenya kwemazuva maviri, uko kwakaberekerwa baba vavo. VaObama vakaita hurukuro nemutungamiri weKenya, VaUhuru Kenyatta, pamwe nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa, VaRaila Odinga nemusi weSvondo. NeMuvhuro VaObama vakaswera vari muguta rakaberekerwa baba vavo re Kogelo kuKenya kwakare, uko vakavhura muzinda wekudzidzira mitambo, uyo wakatangwa nehanzvadzi yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vapfumbamwe Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu vapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore raopera vave zviuru zvina zvine mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 4, 466. Vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, zvasiya vabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemashanu zvine mazana mana nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 125, 425. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mashanu vakapora kubva kuzchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru negumi nemashanu zvine makumi masere nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 115, 089. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nemaviri kana kuti 2 698, 632 .Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe kqna kuti 1 700, 993. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba yeCovid-19 kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka munyika.

headline: VaMahlangu Voradzikwa neMugovera
text: Mumiriri weNkulumane mudare reparamende VaThamsanqa Mahlangu avo vakashaya neMuvhuro vave kutarisira kuradzikwa muBulawayo neMugovera. VaMahlangu mumwe wevakabatsira kuumba bato reMDC muna 1999.  VaMahlangu vakashaya nechirwere chegomarara. Pakushaya kwavo vange varizve mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa muMDC uye vakambovawo mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki. Mutauriri weMDC VaObert Gutu vanoti vacharadzikwa kumarinda eLady Stanley kuBulawayo. Iyi inzvimbo inoradzikwa magamba emuBulawayo. Mutungamiri webato reMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai nevamwe vatungamiri mubato ravo vari kutarisirwa kunoradzika VaMahlangu. No media source currently available

headline: Simudzirai nhabvu yevechidiki’
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muDivision One kana muPremier League zvokurudzirwa kuti zvikoshese vatambi vechidiki nechinangwa chekusimudzira matarenda avo kuti vagozove vatambi vemangwana.   Kurudziro iyi yakapihwa nasachigaro weNorthern Region Division One, Martin Kweza, achiti kuti nhabvu yemuno ibudirire zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvipe mikana kune vechidiki.   Anoti kuNorthern Region, zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza vakazvitaurira kuti zvinofanirwa kuve zvine vatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa avo vavanoda kuona vachitamba masvondo ese.   Izvi, anodaro Kweza, zvinobatsira kuti nhabvu irambe ichikura pamwe nekuti vatambi ava vagofambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Anoti kuwanza vatambi vechikuru muzvikwata hakubatsire sezvo zvichidzosera nhabvu kumashure uye nekushaisa vechidiki mikana yekusimukira mumutambo uyu.   “Donzvo redu isu kuvaka vatambi vechidiki kuti vasimukire vagotimirira vachienda kunotambira kunze kwenyika kune zvikwata zvakasiyana. Ndiko kusaka isu tichikurudzira zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muNorthern Region kuti ngazvive nevatambi vashanu kana kudarika vane makore ari pasi pe18 ekuberekwa nekuti chatinoda kuona vechidiki vachivakwa tarenda ravo.   “Kungowanza madhara ega hakubatsire uye hakuna kwamunosvika nechikwata nekuti madhara anenge achembera. Ndiko kusaka muchiona kuti zvikwata zvinobva muNorthern Region pazvinopinda muPSL zvinosvika zvichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura nekuti chikwata chinenge chakaumbwa chine vechidiki vakawanda.   “Tinoona kuti madhara mazhinji kana apera anouya kuzopedzera nguva yavo muDivision One voshaisa vechidiki mukana. Asi tinoti ipai mukana kune vechidiki uye madhara musamarase zvachose nekuti vanodiwa kudzikamisa vechidiki nekubatsira kuvaumba,” anodaro Kweza.   Pari zvino pazvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPremier League, zvitatu zvinoti Ngezi Platinum Stars, Harare City neHerentals ndizvo zvine vechidiki vanokwikwidza muNorthern Region Division One.   Zvikwata zvevechidiki izvi zvnoti Ngezi Platinum Under-19, Harare City Curbs neHerentals U-20.   Kuchitiwo Highlanders ndiyo yega ine chikwata chinokwikwidza muSouthern Region Division One.   Kweza anoti kana zvikwata zvakawanda zvemuPSL zvikave nevatambi vanokwikwidza muDivision One zvinobatsirikana kuburikidza nekubika vatambi uye hazvizombonetsekane nekutenga vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvose zvemuPSL zvikaita vechidiki vanokwikwidza muDivision One, zvinobatsira kubika vatambi vakawanda uye hakuna chikwata chinozombonetsekana nekutenga vatambi nekuti vanenge varipo vakawanda.   “Saka kurudziro iri kuzvikwata zvose kuti itaiwo zvikwata zvenyu zvevechidiki zviri muDivision One uye koshesai kubika vatambi vechidiki,” anodaro Kweza.

headline: Makusha otarisira kuenda kumaOlympics
text: SHASHA yemujaho wekumhanya — Ngoni Makusha — anoti chishuvo chake chegore rino kuhwina menduru mumijaho yakasiyana uye nekubudirira kuenda kumakwishu eParis 2023 Olympics ayo achaitirwa kuFrance gore rinotevera.   Makusha mwaka wake wekumhanya uri kutanga svondo rino apo ari kunokwikwidza kuBotswana mumujaho uyo anoti uchamurakidza kuti ari papi pagadziriro dzake.   Mujaho uyu mumwe uyo Makusha ari kushandisa mukurwira tikiti rekuenda kunokwikwidza kuOlympics uye World Athletics Championship iyo ichaitwa gore rino kuBudapest, kuHungary.   Asati aenda kuHungary, Makusha achaenda kunomirira nyika kumakwishu eAfrican Games ayo achaitirwa kuGhana munaNyamavhuvhu.   “Mwaka wangu wegore rino uri kutanga svondo rino apo ndiri kuenda kuBotswana kunokwikwidza mumujaho wangu wekutanga uyo ndichaushandisa kuona kuti ndiri papi pakugadzirira uye kuti chii chandinoda mugadziriro dzangu nekuti mwaka wangu wegore rino mukuru.   “Ndine mujaho weAfrican Games uri kuuya mwaka uno uye ndinoda kunohwina menduru ikoko. Ndinoda zvakare kurwira kuenda kumujaho weWorld Championships nekudzokera kumaOlympics ayo ariko gore rinotevera kuParis, kuFrance,” anodaro.   Makusha aive kumujaho wemaOlympics uyo wakapedzisira kuitirwa kuTokyo, kuJapan 2021 uko akakundikana kusvika kumasemi-final kunyangwe zvazvo ainge ambohwina mujaho wake wekutanga.   Mujaho wechipiri akazopedza ari pechinomwe izvo zvakamutadzisa kuenda kumasemi-final ndokubva adzoka kumusha.   Gore rino, mujaho wemaAfrican Games uchatanga nemusi wa4 Nyamavhuvhu uye uchizopera nemusi wa19 Nyamavhuvhu.   Nerimwewo divi, mujaho weWorld Championship wekuHungary uchatanga nemusi wa19 Nyamavhuvhu uchizopera nemusi wa27 Nyamavhuvhu.

headline: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kugutsikana neChirongwa Chayo Chakangana neKubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vanhu Mamiriyoni Gumi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huri kufamba zvakanaka chose munyika asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzichiti pane zvimwe zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba chiri kufamba mugwara rakanaka, uye vanotarissira kuti hurumende ichagona kuzadzikisa shuviro yekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu munyika yose. VaMujiri vatiwo mangwana hurumende iri kutambira nhomba dzeCovid-19 mamiriyoni maviri dzakatengwa kuChina. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, Dr Johannes Marisa, vatsigirawo kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba chiri kufamba zvakanaka kana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. VaMarisa varumbidzawo danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti zvipatara, nemakirinika akazvimirira zvitange kubayawo nhomba yeCovid-19. Asi VaMarisa vatiwo vana chiremba vakazvimiririra ava vanoda kubatsirwawo nemabhokisi anochengeta chando sezvo nhomba idzi dzine matemperature adzinofanirwa kugara dziri. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati chirongwa ichi hachisati chanyatsopinda mugwara. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kusimba mukupinza nhomba munyika kuitirakuti ikwanise kubaya nhomba vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. VaMadzorera vatiwo kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzichiri kuita mitsetse mirefu yevanhu vanenge vachida kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kutivanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, izvo zvakasvitsahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pazviuru zana negumi nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe,kana kuti 114,489. Vanhu makumi mana nevatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro izvo zvakasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana 3,754 Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mmasere nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nemumwe chete 1, 780, 541vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira Covid-19. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave maza mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri ezviuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nevana,kana kuti 920,554. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi. kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe hichpararira. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoyambira Vashandi Vayo Vasati Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kuti Havapindi paBasa
text: Hurumende inoti vashandi vayo vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 kusvika mukupera kwezuva ranhasi havachabvumidzwe kuuya kubasa uye vasina kubaiwa nhomba idzi vacharangwa zvakaomarara. Asi vashandi vehurumende vanoti zviri kutaurwa nehurumende izvi hazvina musoro. Text: Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vazivisa padandemutande ravo reTwitter nhasi kuti hurumende haisi kudzokera kumashure nedanho rayo rayakatora rekuti vashandi vayo vose vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19 havachazobvumidzwa kuenda kubasa kubva mangwana zvichienda mberi.  VaMangwana vati vashandi vehurumende vose vacharamba kubaiwa nhomba idzi vacharangwa zvakawomarara uye vati panguva yavanenge vasiri kuenda kubasa vashandi ava havasi kuzobhadharwa mihoro yemazuva iwayo.  Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vari kuDubai pari zvino uye mutevedzeri wavo VaJohn Mangwiro vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe kuti matanho api ari kutorwa nebazi ravo kuona kuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanisa kuwana nhomba idzi nekukasika.  Zvichakadai gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vatenda kuti vashandi vese vehurumende vanofanira kuti vabaiwe nhomba idzi uye vati vazhinji vevashandi vehurumende vakatobaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 kare.  ///////act 1-------mavima/////  VaMavima vati vashandi vehurumende vanofanira kuziva kuti kusabayiwa nhomba idzi kune mubayiro wacho kubva pakataurwa nyaya iyi nehurumende.  /////////act 2------mavima/////  Asi mutevedzeri wemuyori mukuru musangano revashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vati danho rehurumende iri harina zvarinoreva kwavari nekuti havana kutambira tsamba kubva kuhurumende kubva zvakatorwa danho iri nedare remakurukota ehurumende.  ///////act 3------mushangu/////////  Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamted Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende haifaniri kuedza kutsvaga nzira dzekusabhadhara vashandi vayo kubudikidza nekudzinga mabasa vashandi vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19. VaMasaraure vati hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yevashandi vayo kwete kuswera ichidzinganisana nezvinhu zvisina musoro.  ///////act 4----masaraure////////  Zvichakadai, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vakamboshanda sachipangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vashandi vayo kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 vachiti izvi zvinotyora kodzero dzevashandi. VaManyanya vati kana hurumende ikaenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo uhwu zvichakanganisawo hupfumi hwenyika sezvo vashandi vehurumende vane basa rakakura kwazvo mukusimudzirwa kwehupfumi hwenyika.  /////////act 5-------manyanya///////  Hurumende iri kukurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba dzeCovid-19 idzo dziri kubaiwa pachena muzvipatara zvehurumende nemakanzuru senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika. Zvipatara zvinoshanda zvakazvimirira zviri kubhadharisawo mari shomanana kubaya nhomba idzi.  Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mariyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana pakupera kwegore rino senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19.

headline: VaMwonzora Voronga Nhaurirano naVaMnangagwa Asi CCC Inoti Inoda Sarudzo Dzakachena Chete Muna 2023
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata cheMDC-T uye vachitungamira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance musarudzo VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vari kuda kuita nhaurirano nemutungamiri wenyika uye vari mutungamiri webato reZanu-PF VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachiti zviri kuitwa nePolad parizvino hazvina zvazvinonyatsobatsira. Tayedza kubata mutauriri webato rezanu-pf VaChris Mutsvangwa asi vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mutauriri werimwe bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change Muzvare Fadzai Mahere vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo parizvino rakangotarisa zvakanyanya nyaya yesarudzo dza2023 uye kana paine nhaurirano dzinoda kuti dziitwe, dzinofanira kunangana nekuona kuti sarudzo dzaitwa zvakachena. Vati izvi zvikaitika vanokunda sarudzo zvine mutsindo zvekuti panenge pasina chinangwa chekuti paitwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaDabengwa Voradzikwa kuNtabazinduna neMugovera
text: Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvaungana muWhite City Stadium muBulawayo zvichionekana nemutumbi wegamba renyika, VaDumiso Dabengwa, avo vachavingwa kuNtabazinduma neMugovera. Vanhu vakawanda kubva kumapato ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana, kusanganisira mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vaungana muBulawayo vachirangarira mabasa akaitwa naVaDabengwa vachiri vapenyu. Hama neshamwari dzaVaDabengwa, kusanganisirawo vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika kubva kuSouth Africa, vanosanganisira VaJacob Zuma, vataura pagungano iri vachirumbidza mufi serimwe ramagamba makuru akarwira kuti nyika iwane kuzvitonga. Vanhu ava vatsanangura VaDabengwa vemunhu akaramba akazvipira mukurwira muhutongi hwejekerere kusvika mukufa. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havana kuenda kugungano iri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, kuti seyi vanga vasipo sezvo vanga vasingabatike parunhare rwavo. Munin’ina waVaDabengwa, VaSijabuliso Dabengwa, vati mukoma wavo aive munhu aisadududza pane zvinhu zvaavnenge azvipira kuita zvisinei nekuti izvi zvaigona kuzomupinza munjodzi. Imwe yeshamwari dzaVaDabengwa, Muzvinafundo Regis Austin vatsinhira zvimwe chetezvo vakatiwo VaDabengwa vaive munhu aisatya kutaura paanenge awona kuti pakanganiswa chero nevakuru vakuru mune zvematongerwo enyika. Vati vanoyeuka kuti VaDabengwa ndiye mumwe wevanhu vekutanga kupokana nedanho rekuda kuunza hutongi hwebato rimwe chete munyika kana kuti one-party state. Mumwe wevaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko pasi pemauto eZipra, VaJeremy Brickhill, vati VaDabengwa vakapira hupenyu hwavo kurwira rusununguko nehutongi hwejekerere vachiri vadiki. Vati mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika pari zvino anoratidza kuti hamusati mave nerusunguko ruzere vakakurudzira vechidiki kuti vatore muenzaniso waVaDabengwa vaenderere mberi nehondo iyi. Vachitaurawo pagungano iri, mumwe murwiri wehondo yerusununguko, VaBaster Magwizi, vati kudomwa kwakaita hurumende VaDabengwa segamba renyika, kungozadzisa chirevo sezvo zviri pachena kune veruzhinji kuti VaDabengwa nderimwe remagamba makuru enyika. VaMagwizi vati VaDabebgwa vanga vari mushishi yekuedza kuti midziyo kusanganisira zvivakwa pamwe nemagwaro enhoroondo yehondo zvebato reZapu zvakatorwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe zvidzorwe kubato iri. Vatiwo VaDabengwa vange vaine shungu yekuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe nemazvo vakati VaDabengwa vangazorora murugare kana hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ikagadzirisa zvose izvi nekukasika. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZapu, VaIsaac Mabuka, vashora zvakaitwa nevamwe vamiriri veparamende vebato reZanu PF vakaramba kupa ruremekedzo kuna VaDabengwa vachiti vakawanda vevavnhu ava vanofanirwa kutenda vanhu vakaita saVaDabengwa nebasa guru ravakaita kurwira rusununguko. Vaimbove nhengo yepolitburo yebato reZanu PF, avo vakadzingwa mubato iri, VaRugare Gumbo, vati nhoroondo yehondo yerusununguko haingave yakakwana kana kusina kutaurwa nebasa guru rakaitwa naVaDabengwa. VaGumbo vati zvinorwadza kuti VaDabengwa vakafira kunze kwenyika nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muzvipatara zvemunyika. VaDabengwa, avo vaizivikanwa nerekuti The Black Russian, vakashaya nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera muNairobi guta guru reKenya vachibva kuIndia uko kwavairapwa. VaDabengwa vari kuvigwa neMugovera kumusha kwavo kuNtabazinduna kunze kweBulawayo muri mudunhu reMatabeleland North. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Lawyers For Human Rights Inoudza Dare ReSenate Kuti Kodzero dzeVanhu Dziri Kutyorwa muNyika.
text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR nemusi weChitatu rakaudza dare reSenate kuti kutyorwa kwedzoro dzevanhu kuri kuwedzera zvakanyanya nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi uye mapazi ehurumende ndiwo ari pamberi pekutyora kodzero idzi. Vakuru vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZLHR VaDzimbabwe Chimbga namuzvare Roselyn Hanzi vakaudza komiti yeSenate inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziri kunyanyotyorwa munyaya dzine chekuita nedzidzo, pekugara, hutano pamwe nechikafu. Vaviri ava vati sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remutemo richiti hurumende inosungirwa kuwanisa vanhu pekugara, zvekudya, dzidzo pamwe nehutano, vanhu vakawanda vari kuputsirwa dzimba dzavo mumaguta. Vatiwo vana vari kudzingwa muzvikoro uye madzimai anotadza kubhadhara mari kuzvipatara vari kuvhariwa muzvipatara mushure mekusununguka vachinzi vanofanira kutanga vabhadhara mari. Vatiwo apo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa, vamwe vanhu vari kunyimwa chikafu nekuda kwekuti havasi nhengo dzebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF. VaChimbga vati zviri pachena kuti bumbiro nekodzero dzevanhu zvirikutyora zviri pachena uye mapazi ehurumende ndomamwe ari kuita izvi. Vatiwo imwe nyaya inovasuwisa inyaya yekunyangarika kwemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaItai Dzamara pamwe nekuti hurumende inenge isiri kutora matanho ekuvatsvaga. Asi Senator Judith Mawire vanomiririra Mutare Central vari nhengo yeZanu-PF vati vanoshamisika kuti sei pari kungotaurwa nyaya yaVaDzamara ipo paine vamwe vakatsakatika munyika vakawanda. Asi muzvare Hanzi vati sangano ravo rinobatsira munhu wese munyika risingatarise kuti wabuda mumba maani. VaChimbga vatsinhirawo mashoko amuzvare Hanzi vachiti vese vane nyaya dzavo vakasununguka kudzitaura kusangano ravo uye vanobatsira kana vachikwanisa. Ishe Daster Chisunga vekuMbire, vanove nhengo yekomiti iyi, vati kubva kuhumbowo hwapihwa nemagweta eZLHR zviri pachena kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziri kutyorwa munyika uye komiti yavo inofananira kuongorora kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nechinangwa chekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. VaChimbga vati vanofara nechido charatidzwa nekomiti iyi vakatiwo hurumende inofanira kutora matanho ekutevedzera bumbiro remutemo iro rinopa vanhu kodzero dzavo dzose.

headline: Kushomeka kweMari kuMabhanga Kotadzisa Varairidzi Kutora Mari Dzavanoda
text: Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti varairidzi vakawanda vaenda kumahofisi avo vachi nyunyuta kuti vari kutadza kutora mari dzavanoda kumabhanga. Vanoti varairidzi ava vanga vachiti mabhanga mazhinji anga achingovapa mari inoita madhora makumi mashanu chete pamunhu, inove shoma kune zvavanenge vachida. “Varairidzi vanenge vakatarisira kuti mari idzi ndidzo dzavachashandisa kutenga zvavanoda uyewo kubhadharira vana vavo school fees sezvo zvikoro zvave kuvhurwa. Asi zvose izvi zvapinda musango,” VaZhou vanodaro. Mumwe anoshanda kune rimwe bhanga asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau audza Studio7 kuti mabhanga haasi kukwanisa kuwana mari yaanoda kubva kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, izvo zvave kuita kuti mabhanga amirire kuwana mari kubva kune vanenge vachida kuchengetesa mari dzavo. Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gavhuna veRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vakaudza paramende kuti mabhanga emunyika akapinza mari inodarika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kubva kutanga kwegore rino kusvika mwedzi uno, asi mari iyi ichiri kutadza kugutsa misika. VaMangudya vakati bhanga ravo riri kutora matanho akawanda anosanganisira kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga pakutenga nekubhadhara zvinhu. Vakatendawo kuti vanhu vakawanda havachada kuchengetera mari dzavo kumabhanga nekuda kwemitero yakakwira yekumabhanga pamwe nekuderera kwemari dzinoberekwa. Asi VaZhou vanoti vakuru vehurumende vanofanirwa kumbosendeka kusawirirana kwavo nevemamwe mapato vogara pasi kuti vagadzirise zvinhu munyika. “Inini ndinoona sekuti vakuru venyika, eeh, VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe, nevakuru vema opposition ngavambogara pasi vataurirane vachitaurirana chokwadi kuti nyika ingafamba ichienda mberi sei,” VaZhou vanowedzera. Panya yemabhonasi evarairidzi, vanoti hurumende yakavazivisa varairidzi kuti vachawana mari idzi musi wa 30 Kubvumbi. Asi vanoti kukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara varairidzi mabhonasi avo, ayo vatarisira kwenguva ndefu, kucharevawo kuti zvikoro zvichangovhurwa zvakavharwa, zvichireva kuti varairidzi havasi kuzoenda kubasa pachavhurwa zvikoro musi wa 3 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurukurwa kuMusangano weAfrican Commission on Human Rights
text: Zimbabwe yange iri mugango kumusangano weAfrican Union unoona nezve kuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kana kuti African Commission on Human and People’s Rights uyo uri kupembererawo makore makumi matatu Africa yatanga boka rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu iri. Nyaya dzakazeyiwa pane zviri kuitika muZimbabwe inyaya yehurumende yekudzinga vanhu papurazi reManzou kuMazowe kuti ripihwe mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, uye nyaya yekudzingwa basa zvisina kujeka kwemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende, VaRay Goba. Mumakore apfuura Zimbabwe ndiyo inonzi yaigara iri mudariro ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu asi zvinonzi zvave nanu. Nyaya yekudzingwa basa kwaVaGoba yange ichinzwikwawo mudare repamusoro nhasi muHarare mushure mekunge sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR raendesa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, neJudiciary Servces Commission vachiti vakatyora bumbiro remutemo. Masangano akawanda ekuZimbabwe anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, kusanganisa ZLHR, ari kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Inodzika Mutemo Unoti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba Dzavo kweMwedzi Mitanhatu
text: Hurumende yeBotswana yadzika mutemo we State of Emergency uyo uchange uchishanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutemo uyu, uyo wasainwa nemutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, unosungira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemwedzi mitanhatu, uye kuti makambani ape vanhu zvikwanisiro zvekuti vashande vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Mutemo we Emergency Covid-19 Amendment Number 2 Regulations of 2020, watanga kushanda zviri pamutemo mushure mekunge wapasiswa nedare raparamende, uye kusainwa naVaMasisi. Mutemo uyu unorambidza makambani kudzinga vashandi munguva iyo unenge uchishanda, uye wapawo mutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, masimba ekutara zvinofanirwa kuitwa nematare edzimhosva munguva yeLockdown iyi. Mutemo mutsva uyu wadzikwa panguva iyo hutungamiri hweBotswana, kusanganisira nhengo dzeparamende, makurukota ehurumende pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, hwange hwatotanga kare kuita hurongwa hwekumbogara kudzimba, kana kuti self quarantine, kwemazuva gumi nemana zvichitevera kusangana kwahwakaita nemushandi wezvehutano ane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Asi chiitiko ichi chichaita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana zviomerwe nehupenyu sezvo pasisina achabvumirwa kuenda kubasa panguva iyi. Muzvare Sandra Sondelelo, avo vanoshanda mumba, vanoti dai zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvabvumirwa kuti zvidzokere kumusha nokuti hakuchina chavachagarira muBotswana kwemwedzi yose iyi. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Amai Pesilah Tarisai, vati vabereki nehama dzavanga vachibatsira vachadya nhoko dzezvironda sezvo vasingakwanise kutumira zvekudya. Botswana yaita nyika yekutanga mudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica kutora danho rakadai, iro rine nguva yakareba vanhu vachinzi vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chauraya munhu mumwe chete muBotswana, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevatatu munyika iyi.
