Asi zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana zvinoti zviri kubatsira vamwe vavo vasina zvekudya uye pekugara panguva iyo nyika iyi inenge yakavharwa. Muzvare Faith Musesekedzi avo vanogara mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana vanoti vari kuchengeta zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitatu izvo zvakapererwa nemabasa mushure mekuparurwa kwechirongwa chekugara mudzimba. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kubatsira vamwe nezvekudya uye kuvabhadharira mari epavanogara, VaMorgan Tambaoga, vanoti vakazvipira kuita izvi kusvikira zvinhu zvanaka. Mumwe wevari kubatsirwa nechikafu uye kubhadharirwa mari yepamba pavanogara, Muzvare Primrose Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotenda zvikuru nerubatsiro rwavari kuwana. Ongorororo yaitwa neStudio7 inotaridza kuti ruzhinji rwevana veZimbabwe vari muBotswana vari kugara vari muzvikwata zvavanhu vatanhatu kana vanomwe senzira yekuti vaite muonera pamwe netwushoma twavainatwo. Asi nyanzwi munyaya dzezvehutano, VaChristopher Mbewe, vanoti kugara vanhu vakaungana mukanzvimbo kadiki kunoita kuti cherwere cheCOVID-19 chipararire nekukurumidza. Chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chakatangira mudhorobha reWuhan kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mashanu ezviuru, uye chauraya vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuongororwa Hutachiwana hweCoronavirus Munyika Hunoramba Huchikwira
text: Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vazivisa kuti munyika mave nevanhu vanosvika makumi manomwe nemakumi mana nemumwe vari kuongororwa kana vaine hutachiwana hwe coronavirus vanonzi vakabva kunyika dzine dambudziko rechirwere ichi. Dandemutande reTwitter rebazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti VaMoyo vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wemapazi akasiyanasiyana wekutarisa nezvegadziriro iripo pakudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi kuti chisapararira munyika. Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inonzi yasarudzawo zvipatara zviviri zvinoti Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Disease Hospital senzvimbo dzichashandiswa mukudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi. Coronavirus inonzi yauraya vanhu vanosvika mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevanomwe muChina chete, kuchitiwo mumwe chete kunze kweChina, kunove kuPhilippines. Vamwe zviuru makumi maviri nemazana manomwe nevana vanonzi vabatwawo nechirwere ichi muChina chete. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvehuutano Doctor Moyo kuti tinzwe zvizhinji panyaya iyi. Asi gurukota iri rakaudza Studio7 mukupera kwesvondo kuti bazi raro rakagadzirira kurwisana nehutachiwana uhwu. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, havaone sekunge hurumende yakagadzirira zvakakwana mukudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu sezvo vasati vambonzwa kana pave nevashandi vakadzidziswa kurwisana nedambudziko iri. Doctor Madzorera vanoti panofanirwa kutorwawo matanho akasimba ekuongorora vanopinda vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi, pachiitwawo zvakare matanho ekuvarambidza kupinda muvanhu sezvo chirwere ichi chiri nyore kuparadzirwa muvanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Ndinotamba mitambo yekare: Ndlovu
text: MUTAMBI wenetball weGlow Petroleum Queens nechikwata chenyika chemaGems — Ursula Ndlovu — anoti mukukura kwake aifarira zvikuru mitambo yakasiyana kusanganisira yechinyakare yakaita semaflau nearawuru uye nanhasi achiri kuitamba.   Ndlovu anoti paanenge asiri kubasa kwake kwaanoshanda achiita zvekudira mafuta edzimotokari kana kutamba netball, anotombotamba maflau nearawuru nemwana wake uye neshamwari dzemwana wake. “Ndichikura, pamitambo yechinyakare inozivikanwa ini ndaifarira zvikuru maflau nearawuru, iyo ndaigona nekuti mitambo yandaidisisa.   “Nanhasi chaiye ndikaona mwana wangu, Mitchell, achitamba neshamwari dzake mitambo iyi, ndinototanga kutamba navo uye vanotozvifarira,” anodaro Ndlovu.   Anoti kutamba kwaanenge achiita nevana inzira yekukurudzira mwana wake neshamwari dzake kuti vakoshese mitambo iyi sezvo ichizogona kuvabatsira mune remangwana.   Ndlovu anoti achikura, paaitamba maflau nearawuru ndipo paakatanga kuona kuti ane chipo chekumhanya zvikuru izvo zvakazomuona achikwikwidza mumijaho yekumhanya yakasiyana. Anoti kutamba nemwana wake neshamwari dzake zvaitawo kuti aone kuti Mitchell ane chipo chekumhanya saiye.   “Pandave iye zvino haisisiri nyaya yekuti ndinofarira manhingi kutamba maflau nearawuru asi ndinenge ndichitodzidzisa mwana wangu neshamwari dzake kuti zvemitambo zvine pundutso muhupenyu. “Ini kukura kwangu dai ndisina kutamba mitambo iyi ndisina kusvika pandave nhasi. Ndakwanisa kufamba kuenda kune nyika dzakawanda nekuda kwekutamba netball.   “Asi zvakatangira pakutamba maflau nearawuru,” anodaro Ndlovu.   Veruzhinji vanoziva Ndlovu ari mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakanyora nhorowondo kuve chikwata chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kumutambo weVitality World Cup kuLiverpool, England mugore ra2018.   Kumutambo uyu, Ndlovu mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura.

headline: Vofarira kuuya kweWC muZim
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Cricket rinoti riri kugutsikana nekusimukira kuri kuita mutambo uyu munyika zvichitevera kupihwa kwakaita Zimbabwe chiremerera chekuronga mutambo we2027 International Cricket Council World Cup ichibatsirana neSouth Africa neNamibia.   Chiremerera ichi chine chirevo chikuru kuZimbabwe pamwe nemutambo uyu sezvo zvinorakidza kuti nyika ino iri kufamba mugwara chairo panhau yecricket. Pari zvino, chikwata chemadzimai chemaLady Chevrons chiri pakati pekutatsurana nezvimwe zvipfumbamwe mumitambo yekurwira kuenda ku2023 ICC World Cup kuIndia. Kubva pamitambo iyi, panofanirwa kubuda zvikwata zvitatu chete uye malady Chevrons ari kutarisira kunge ari pakati pezvikwata izvi.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, managing director weZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) – Givemore Makoni – anoti ZC iri kuita basa guru mukusimudzira mutambo uyu.   Anoti sangano ravo riri kugutsikana nemafambiro ari kuita mutambo wecricket izvo zviri kuona zvekare malady Chevrons achikwikwidza mumitambo yekurwira kuenda ku2023 India World Cup.   “Kutaura kwatiri kuita kuno tine zvikwata zvipfumbamwe zvemadzimai zviri munyika yedu zvinosanganisira Pakistan, Sri Lanka, West Indies, Ireland, Netherlands neBangladesh izvo zviri kurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup gore rinotevera. Saka tinotarisira kuti chikwata chedu chemadzimai chibate basa gore remangwana chigoenda kuWorld Cup kuIndia.   “Zvinorakidza kuti tiri kusimukira panyaya dzecricket kana tichipihwa chiremerera chekuronga mitambo mikuru yakaita seiyi,” anodaro Makoni.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Nyika yose takapihwa chiremerera nekuti mukana wekuronga World Cup unounza mufaro uye zvinobatsira kana kusimudzira nyika chaiko sezvo kuchange kune zvizvarwa zvichabva kunze zvakasiyana-siyana zvichauya zvichizoona mitambo iyi.”   Aka ndekechipiri Zimbabwe ichitambirwa mitambo yeWorld Cup sezvakamboitika mugore ra2003 apo mitambo iyi yakatambirwa munyika muno nekuSouth Africa pamwe nekuKenya.   Makoni anoti Zimbabwe ikaramba ichisimukira ine mukana mukuru wekuzohwina mutambo uyu. “Aka ndekechipiri tichironga mutambo uyu, tine chivimbo chekuti nekusimukira kwatiri kuita mumutambo uyu tinogona kuhwina World Cup yacho ya2027,” anodaro Makoni.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvoronga Kuratidzira Pamberi peMusangano weUNGA
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kuronga kunoratidzira kuNew York, panguva ichaitwa musangano weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA, wechimakumi manomwe nembiri, uyo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutarisirwa kupinda svondo rinouya. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, Muzvare Savanna Madamombe vanoti vane zvakawanda zvavari kunyunyuta nazvo zvinosanganisira kurambidzwa kuvhota kwevari kunze kwenyika uye kuti hurumende haisi kuzvipa mukana wekutaura nhuna dzavo. Muzvare Madamombe vanoti zvimwe zviri kuvashungurudza kushandiswa kwemari kwavanoti kusina kutsarukana munzendo dzaVaMugabe, avo vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kusimuka nechikwata chevanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe. Zvinonzi mumwe nemumwe wevanhu ava, avo vanonzi vanosanganisira mhuri yavo, anonzi achange achipiwa mari inoita chiuru nemazana mashanu emadhora semari yekushandisa pazuva. Gore roga roga zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoungana muNew York zvichiratidzira panoitwa musangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Mauto Vachiti Kune Vavengi Vari Kurwisa Zimbabwe
text: Zimbabwe yacherechedza zuva remauto, kana kuti Defence Forces Day, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti Zimbabwe iri kurwiswa nevavengi pachishandiswa zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nemadandemutande eSocial Media. Mumashoko avo ekupemberera Defence Forces Day, VaMnangagwa varumbidza mauto vachiti ari kuita basa guru mukudzivirira nyika kubva kuvavangi. VaMnangagwa vatenda mauto nekuramba akabatana pamwe nekumisa kuratidzira zvine mhirizhonga kwainge kwarongwa nemapato anopikisa nemasangano akazvimirira achishanda nevavati vavengi vemuno nekunze. VaMnangagwa vatiwo mauto anobatsira zvikuru mumatambudziko vakapa semuenzaniso rubatsiro rwakapihwa nemauto apo pakaita dutumupengo reCylone Idai apo mauto akabatsira kupa vanhu chikafu, kuvaka migwagwa nemabhiriji zvainge dzaparadzwa nedutumupengo iri. VaMnangagwa vati vari muchiuto vari kubatwawo neCovid-19 vakati vakambove mukuru wemauto emuchadenga kwenguva yakareba, VaPerence Shiri, pamwe nevaive mutauriri wemauto, Colonel Overson Mugwisi, nevamwe, vakashaya nedenda iri. Bato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, ratiwo rinoyemura basa guru range riri kuitwa nemauto mukati memakore makumi mana apfuura, munyika, muSADC neAfrica. Mutauriri webato iri, Advocate Fadzayi Mahare, varumbidza basa guru rakaitwa nemauto paCyclone Idai. Mutevedzeri waAdvocate Mahere, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo mauto achiita basa guru rekuchengetedza runyararo, pane pamwe paanoshandiswa kurova vanhu izvo zviri kunze kwebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mauto agare zvakanaka achitambirawo mari dzinofadza. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJohnstone Chirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanobvumirana kuti mauto anoita basa guru asi vakati havafari kuti mauto emuZimbabwe ave kushanda akarerekera kune rimwe bato. Asi muhurukuro yavakaita nenhepfenyuro yeZBC TV pamusoro peDefence Forces Day neMuvhuro manheru, mukuru weZimbabwe Defence Force, General Philip Valerio Sibanda, vakati mauto ndeevanhu uye aripo pakudzvirira nyika nevanhu vese. Vakati hazvifadzi kuti pane vamwe vanoshora nekutuka mauto vachiti izvi zvinokonzerwa nevanhu vanonyora manyepo nezvimwe zvisina kunaka pamamusoro pemauto paSocial Media. Mhemberero dzanhasi dzaitwa vanhu vari mudzimba nekuda kweCovid-19 pasi pedingindira rekuti: “The ZDF: Celeberating 40 Years of Excellent Service to the People.” No media source currently available

headline: Trafigura Yoramba Kuti Yakapa Zimbabwe Mari yeKubhadhara Chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrica Development Bank
text: Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mukambani yekuSingapore yeTrafigura, Zohra McDoolley-Aimone, aramba mashoko ekuti kambani yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yekuti ibhadhare chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Achipindura mubvunzo kubva kuStudio7, McDoolley-Aimone ati vainge vanzwa mashoko kubva kumapepanhau ekuti Trafigura yainge yapa Zimbabwe mari asi akati aya manyepo. Atiwo vane mabhizimisi muZimbabwe ayo akazvipira kuramba achifambisa basa achishanda nehurumende asi panyaya yekukweretesa Zimbabwe, kambani yavo iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakazivisa mazuva mashoma apfuura kuti vainge vawana chikwereti chekuti vabhadhare mari yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zvayo. Asi havana kutaura kuti mari iyi yainge yabva kupi. Kambani yeTrafigura Group inoshanda yakapinda muZimbabwe muna 2013 kuburikidza nekuisa hupfumi mukambani Puma Energy iyo yakaisa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani ye Redan Petroleum. Redan ine nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta edzimotokari makumi manomwe nepfumbamwe, uye inopa mafuta endege panhandare ina. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kambani yePuma Energy ndiyo inoshandiswa kubhadhara mari kuZimbabwe. Kambani yeTrafigura muna 2010 yakabatwa nemhosva yekurasa muchetura kubva kumakambani ekumawirira kunyika yeIvory Coast. Izvi zvakashorwa zvikuru nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akaita seAmnesty International. Kambani iyi inonziwo yakaita zvehuwori kuIraq pachirongwa chainzi Oil for Food icho chaipa vanhu vemuIraq zvekudya mafuta edzimotokari munyika iyi achitengeswa zvisina kujeka. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yakamboyedza kubhadhara chikwereti ichi ichishanda nekambani yemuNew York inonzi Lazard. Lazard yaishanda nebhanga reStandard Chartered Bank rekuBritain kuunganidza mari iyi asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Asi rwendo rwuno VaChinamasa vanoti vakawana mari kukambani yeTrafigura iri kunzi nevamwe vakaita semutungamiri webato rePeople's Democratic Party, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti, haina kujeka. VaBiti vanotiwo zvakaitwa naVaChinamasa kutyora mutemo wePublic Debt Management Act unoti kana hurumende ichida kukwereta mari yakawanda zvakadai inofanira kutanga yaenda kudare reparamende. VaBiti vashorawo bhanga reWorld Bank nekutendera VaChinamasa kuti vatyore bumbiro remitemo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevanokokera bato reMDC-T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese. Asi gweta rinombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, munyaya dzakawanda VaTerrence Hussein vanoti VaChinamasa havana mutemo wavakatyora. Ko zvinobatsira here kana Zimbabwe ikabhashara zvikwereti zvayo? VaBiti vanoti kuteya nzou neriva nekuti kana pasina kuvandudza mabatirwo ehupfumi, hakuna chinobuda. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvinobatsira kunyange hazvo zvichinetsa kuzowana zvikwereti kubva kuIMF neWorld Bank. VaMugano vanoti vemakambani emuZimbabwe ndivo vachawana chouviri kubva mukubhadhara chikwereti ichi. Nyaya yehuowori nekutadza kufambisa zvakanaka hupfumi zviri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvapa kuti hupfumi huende kuamwere. Asi hurumende inoti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika ndizvo zvapa kuti itatarike. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa muMigwagwa Vanoti Havasi Kuzovhunduka Masoja
text: Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana kuti (VISET) VaSamuel Wadzai Mangoma vanoti havasi kuzovhunduka mashoko egurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo ekuti vakumbira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Retired General Constantino Chiwenga kuti mauto abatsirane nemapurisa mekanzuru kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa. VaMoyo vakapa vanotengesa mumigwagwa ava mazuva maviri ekuti vange vabuda mumigwagwa. Asi VaWadzi Mangoma vanoti hurumende haina kana kumboyedza kugara navo pasi kuti vaone kuti dambudziko iri ringagadziriswe sei. Nyaya yekushandisa mauto yakamboitwawo panguva yeOperation Restore Legacy asi zvakakona n'anga murapwa achida. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehupfumi husina kumira zvakanaka iri kupa kuti vanhu vakawamda vagume vaenda kunotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: ‘dembare hainyure’
text: MUTAMBI weDynamos FC, Kudzanayi Dhemere, anotsidza kuti iye pamwe nevamwe vatambi vechikwata ichi vachasunga dzisimbe kuti DeMbare “isanyure” mwaka uno.   Masvondo adarika chikwata ichi change chichinyombwa nevatsigiri vezvimwe zvikwata nekudzikira kwachaita zvasvika pakuchiona chichirwira kuti chisaburitswe muligi reCastle Premiership.   Mwaka uno, tariro huru yaive kuDeMbare iyo yakapedza iri pechiri gore radarika asi zvakaenda nepamwe sezvo chikwata ichi chiri kutatarika zvikuru nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana.   DeMbare parizvino yasarirwa nemitambo minomwe uye iri kufanirwa kuhwina yese kana ichida kuramba iri muCastle Premiership asi mitambo yacho haina kumbochipa sezvo vhiki rino ichasangana neFC Platinum kuMandava Stadium, kuZvishavane.   Asi sekutaura kwaDhemere anoti hakuna gomo risingakwirike.   “Zvinhu zvinoenda nepamwe asi tiri kuramba takashinga, tichirwa semvumba kuti tirambe tiri muCastle Premiership.   “Tiri Dynamos isu chikwata chikuru munhabvu yemuno uye chine nhoroondo huru panyaya dzenhabvu. Saka hatimbosiye chikwata chedu chichinyura, kwete tinoramba. Kunyangwe zviome sei tinoramba tichishanda nesimba kuti tifadze vatsigiri vedu,” anodaro Dhemere.    Pakutanga kwemwaka uno, zvikuru zvaitarisirwa kubva kuna Dhemere uyo akambotamba nhabvu yainwisa mvura izvo zvakamuona achibatsira DeMbare kuhwina mukombe weZNA Charity Shield apo yakakunda CAPS UNITED kusemi-fainari uye neHighlanders mufainari yemutambo uyu.    Mumitambo miviri iyi, Dhemere aitamba nhabvu kunge akasvikirwa sezvo akanwisa mune yese.   Asi, mumwaka wegore rino mutambi uyu akwanisa kunwisa kaviri chete.    “Ini hangu handisi kufara nematambiro andaita, ndinoziva kuti ndogona kutamba zvepamusoro kudarika zvandaita mwaka uno asi ndichiri kukura uye ndichiri kudzidza.   “Asi ndikaramba ndichishanda nesimba pamwe nechikwata changu tinoziva kuti tinosimuka zvakare,” anodaro Dhemere.   Maneja weDeMbare, Richard Chihoro, svondo rapera akabuda pachena kuti chikwata chake chiri kutatarika mwaka uno zvichitevera kubva kwakaita Christian ‘Ntouba’ Epoupa uyo aichitungamira mukurwira mukombe uye ndiye aive top goal scorer kuDynamos apo akanwisa ka12.   Kubva kwaEpoupa kuri kuonekwa mwaka uno sezvo mutambi ari kutungamira pakunwisa kuDeMbare ndiQuality Kadzange uyo angokwanisa kunwisa katanhatu chete mumitambo yePSL.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuti Isabate Mutero paMari Inotambirwa neVashandi iri Pasi pePoverty Datum Line
text: Vashandi pamwe nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vari kutambira zvakasiyanasiyana hurongwa hwakaziviswa svondo rapera negurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, hwekuti hurumende yakakwidza mari isingabatwe mutero kubva paZWL$75 000.00 pamwedzi kuenda paZWL$91 700.00 pamwedzi, kana kuti kubva paZWL$900 000.00 kuenda paZWL$1.1 million pagore. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti iri idanho rakanakira vashandi chose, kunyange hazvo sesangano, vakanga vakurudzira Muzvinafundo Ncube kuti vashandi vanotambira mari iri pasi pemihoro yepasi pasi, kana kuti minimum wage, vasabatirwa mitero. Munyori mukuru wemubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vehurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions (ZCPSTU) VaDavid Dzatsunga, vanoti sevashandi vanotambira chero danho rinotorwa nemushandirwi rekuona kuti mushandi asara aine mari muhomwe dzake. Asi VaDzatsunga vanoti sevashandi vehurumende havasi kufadzwa nekudzikira kwakaita mihoro yavo zvekuti vanototadza kubhadhara mitero sevamwe vashandi. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti sesangano vanga vachitarisira kuti mari isingabatirwe mushandi mutero inge iri pasi peinodiwa nemhuri yevanhu vashanu pamwedzi kuti irarame, kana kuti pasi pePoverty Datum Line. VaMoyo vanoti pamire sangano ravo ndepekuti mari isingakwanise kuchengeta mhuri haifanirwe kunge ichibatirwa mutero. Ukuwo, Doctor Chitambara vanodzoka vachiti kusara kunoita vashandi vaine mari muhomwe dzavo kunoita kuti vaende kunotenga zvinhu kuzvitoro uko hurumende inozowana zvakare mari yakawanda kubva kune mimwe mitero yakaita seValue Added Tax, kana kuti VAT. Muna Gumiguru munhu mumwechete anonzi aida mari inoita ZWL$$28 144.00 pamwedzi kuti ararame, zvichireva kuti mhuri ine vanhu vashanu yaida mari inoita ZWL$140 720.00 pamwedzi kuti irarame. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvehupfumi vanoti nekuda kwekukwira kunomboita inflation munyika, mari iyi painozotambirwa nevashandi gore rinouya inogona kunge isisina simba zvekuti inenge yangove yechirango. Muzvinafundo Ncube vakaudza paramende svondo rapera kuti hurumende yave kukwidza mari isingabatirwe mutero iyi mushure mekunge nhengo dzeparamende dzachema chema kwavari kuti vaone zvekuita sezvo vashandi vakanga vasisina chekusara nacho mushure mekubatirwa mitero. No media source currently available

headline: Vari Kubheja paMitambo yeWorld Cup Vodyiwa Mari Zhinji neKuda kweNyika Dziri Kushura Mare
text: Vanoita zvekubheja mitambo yenhabvu vari kuchema chema nekudyiwa mari kwavari kuitwa nemakwikwi e2022 World Cup ayo arikubura zvishamiso muQatar. Vanoita zvekubheja mitambo ava vari kuchema nekudyiwa kwavari kuitwa mari dzavo nezvishamiso zviri kuitika mumakwikwi arikuitwa e2022 World Cup. Zvikwata zvine mukurumbira izvo vane chivimbo nazvo zviri kurohwa nezvikwata zvavasingafungire muhondo yekurwira mukombe mukuru uyu. Nezuro chaiye Senegal yakapunzira pasi Ecuador 2-1 ndokuita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kupinda munharaunda yechipiri kumakwikwi aya. Mimwe mitambo iri pedyo ndeiyo inoti Morocco 2 Belgium 0, Argentina 1 Saudi Arabia 2, Japan 1 Germany 2, Costa Rica 1 Japan 0, neTunisia 0 Denmark 0. Vamwewo havasi kukanganwa mutambo wemuvhuto uyo Cameroon yakadzora kubva 3-1 pasi ndokuzoita mangange 3-3 neSerbia. Vanoita zvekubheja mitambo yenhabvu VaOliver Musongoro vanoti vanzwa nekurohwa kwavari kuitwa mari yavo iyo irikutsvedza sesipo. Mutsigiri wenhabvu VaJustice Muzanenhamo vanoti varikunzwira tsitsi avo vaive vakanda mari dzavo paJapan iyo yakarohwa neCosta Rica 1-0. Kubheja mitambo yenhabvu ratove basa rema zuva ese revazhinji kwete muZimbabwe kana muAfrica chete asi pasi rese. Asi kune vamwe vasiri kushamiswa ne zviri kubuda kuWorld Cup izvi vachiti mumutambo wenhabvu hamuna zvakanyorwa kunzi anofanira kukunda ndiani. Aimboridza pembe muPremier Soccer League VaSam Hamandawana vanoti nhabvu yekare neyemazuva ano zvasiyana zvikuru nekuti hapasisina chikwata chinonzi chinokunda mutambo usati watambwa. Aimbove murairidzi weCaps United Darlington Dodo anoti zvakaitwa neSaudi Arabi neJapan uyezve zvaitwa neMorocco zvinoratidza kuti nhabvu yasanduka zvekuti nyika dzaitarisirwa pasi pasi dzasimukawo. Asi Argentina yakakwanisa kukwakukwa kubva mukurohwa neSaudi Arabia ndokurovawo Mexico 2-0. Aimbobatira Zimbabwe neHighlanders Tapuwa Kapini anofunga kuti Argentina iyi ndiyo yezvimwe zvikwata zvinokwanisa kutora mukombe. Zvimwe zvikwata zvirikutarisirwa kurwira zvakasimba kutora mukombe uyu iBrazil, Spain, neFrance iyo yakatora mukombe wacho muna 2018. France yatove munharaunda yechipiri mushure mekukunda mumitambo yayo yese miviri neAustralia neDenmark. No media source currently available

headline: Platform for Youth Development Yorwisa Kuti Mhuri Dzisabviswa kuMunyokowere, kuChipinge
text: Sangano revechidiki rePlatform for Youth Development rinoti rave kushanda nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights mukuedza kumisa kubviswa kwemhuri dzinodarika mazana mashanu dzigere Munyokowere kuChipangayi, mudunhu reChipinge kuManicaland. Mhuri idzi dzinonzi dzakatopiwa tsamba dzekudzizivisa kuti dzinge dzabva panzvimbo iyi mukati memazuva manomwe, kukundikana kwadzo dzinozobviswa nechisimba. Mutungamiri wePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti mhuri idzi dzakatambira matsamba aya, ayo anonzi akanyorwa musi wa 27 mwedzi wapera, dzichiziviswa kuti dzinge dzabva munzvimbo iyi panopera zuva nemusi wa 05 mwedzi uno. VaMadhuku vanoti matsamba aya akabva kuhofisi yebazi rezveminda nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu, kunyange hazvo mhuri idzi dzagara panzvimbo iyi kubva muna 1992 padzakagariswa zviri pamutemo nevaive mudzviti wedunhu iri. Vanoti chakaita kuti mhuri idzi dzigariswe panzvimbo iyi chaive chikumbiro chevarimi vachena vaiveko vaida kuti vabatsirwe nemasvikiro kuchenesa nzvimbo yavo., Asi vanoti chiri kunyanya kurwadza mhuri idzi ndechekuti hurumende haina kutanga yagara navo pasi isati yavapa matsamba ekuti vabviswe aya. Vanoti hapana kana hurongwa huripo hwekuti vana vechikoro vachaita sei, uye hapana nzvimbo yavati varatidzwa yekunzi ndiko kwavachaendeswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvekurima nekugariswa patsva kwevanhu pamusoro penyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vangwarire Covid-19
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vakangwarira kurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo chiri kuramba chichitekeshera pasi rose. Vachitaura semunyarikani pakuparura chirongwa Covid-19 Charity Cycling Campaign muBulawayo, VaChiwenga vati veruzhinji munyika havachakoshesi kutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa kuitwa nevehutano pakudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus uho hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. VaChiwenga, avo vanovewo gurukota rezvehutano, vati Covid-19 iri kudzoka nehukasha kunyanya kunyika dzekumadokero vakayambira veruzhinji kuti vasaite sekuti chirwere ichi hachisisiko. VaChiwenga vati zviri kubuda pakuongorora chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika zvinoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kukwira kupfuura huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi vabva kunze kwenyika. Vati muAfrica, South Africa ndeimwe yenyika dziri kubatwawo nechirwere ichi vakatiwo sezvo zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muSouth Africa, zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vangwarirewo chirwere ichi. VaChiwenga vati muBulawayo kunyanya dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura rinoisa vanhu panjodzi yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vati hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri asi havana kutsanangura zvizere. Vanhu gumi nevanomwe vachachovha mabhasikoro kubva muBulawayo vachienda kuHarare senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Mukuru wesangano reRotary Club International muBulawayo, VaAlbert Mkandla, avo vakabatsira kuronga chirongwa ichi vaudza Studio7 kuti vaona iyi iri nzira inogona kubatsira kuti vanhu varambe vachikoshesa kudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rezvemitambo, Muzvare Kirsty Coventry, pamwe nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaRaj Modi, vabatana naVaChiwenga mukusangana nevachachovha mabhasikoro ava mushure mekunge mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vaparura chirongwa ichi. Mumwe wevachovhi vemabhasikoro ari muchirongwa ichi, Nqobani Gatsheni, ati ari kufara zvikuru kuve muchirongwa ichi chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varambe vachirwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachovhi ava vachabva muguta reBulawayo mangwana mangwanani uye vanotarisirwa kusvika muHarare mushure memazuva matanhatu. Zimbabwe yave nevanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Igadzirise Dambudziko reMari Munyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira hurumende kuti ikasarovanisa misoro nevashandi nevashandirwi, Zimbabwe ichadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 uko mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva. Nemusi weMuvhuro, Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats yakazivisa kuti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20,85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu ichikwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kupesana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vainge vati inflation mukupera kwegore yaizopera iri pazvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25%. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muAmerica ichidzidzisa paJohns Hopkins University, Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke, vanoti inflation yemuZimbabwe yakatodarika zana kare kare uye yananga kumakore ekuma2008 apo vanhu vakaomerwa nehupenyu zvisina mukare akamboona. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, Doctorr Simba Makoni, vanoti zvainge zviri pachena kuti inflation ichakwira zvakanyanya nenyaya yemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari munyika zvikuru kuda kuenzanisa dhora rekuAmerica nemari yemaRTGS nemabond. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwao nenyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya sezvo zvinhu zvaramba zvichiita chamurambamhuru. Ko zviri kunzi naVaNcube vakwanisa kuisa mari parutivi inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe emadhora mukushanda kwavo? Vachipindura, Dr Makoni vati chiri kunetsera hurumende inyaya yekungoita gudziramukanwa. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vasiyane nemari dzebond notes nemaRTGs uye kumutsiridza nyaya dzekurima kuti nyika isarasikirwe nemari yekunze. Vamwe vari kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende igadzirise hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika kunyanya America nenyika dziri muEU kuti isabatwe seyakageza negoka munyama. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neHutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vogunun'una Nekunonoka Kupihwa Mumwe Mushonga Wakakosha
text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Network of People Living with HIV, kana kuti ZNNP+, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru kuti nhengo dzaro dzakawanda hadzisati dzava kushandisa mushonga unonzi unodzikisa hukasha pamwe nekupararira kweHIV/AIDS mumuviri wemunhu anorarama neHIV/AIDS. Mumwe mukuru mukuru musangano reZNNP+, VaClarence Mademutsa, vanoti mushonga mutsva weDolutegravir, kana kuti DTG, uyo wakaparurwa muZimbabwe gore rakapfuura, hausati wava kupihwa vanhu vakawanda vanorarama neHIV/AIDS munyika. VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu vanorarama neHIV/Aids vakawanda vaifanirwa kunge vakatanga kunwa mushonga weDTG gore ra 2019 risati rapera. VaMademutsa vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kuramba vakamirira mushonga weDTG, sezvo wakanakira kuvanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. VaMademutsa vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzanga dzichinetseka pakushandisa mushonga we Efavirenz, nokudaro chinhu chinenge chakanaka kuti vanhu vakawanda vashandise DTG sezvo mushonga uyu usina hukasha hunovhiringa hutano hwevanhu vanorarama neHIV/AIDS.. VaMademutsa vanoti havasati vave neruzivo rwekuti vanhu vangani vanofanirwa kunge vachipihwa DTG. Asi mumwe mudzimai asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti vanhu havafanire kumanikidzwa kuti vapinde muchirongwa cheDTG, sezvo vamwe vanhu, vakaita saivo, vasina dambudziko nemishonga yavari kunwa pari zvino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kugurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kuti zvii zvakanakira mushonga mutsva uyu, uye kuti seyi vanhu vakawanda vasati vava pahurongwa hweDTG sezviri kutaurwa naVaMademutsa. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Clorata Gwanzura, vanoti mushonga weDTG mushonga mutsva unobatsira kudzikisa hukasha hweHIV. Dr Gwanzura vanoti bazi rehutano rinogara richiita ongororo dzekuona kuti ndeupi mushonga ungave nani pakubatsira vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. Dr Gwanzura vanoti ongororo yakaitwa inoratidza kuti DTG inobatsira zvikuru mukudzikisa hukasha hweHIV munguva pfupi mushure mekunge munhu atanga kunwa mushonga uyu. Zimbabwe imwe yenyika shoma dzemuAfrica dzava kushandisa mushonga weDTG uyo wakatambirwa zviri pamutemo muAmerica mugore ra 2013, mushure mokunge nyanzvi dzehutano dzaona kuti mushonga uyu waibatsira zvikuru kudzikisa hukasha hweHIV/Aids. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzeHutano hwePfungwa, Doctor Nzuzu, Vobatsira Vane Matambudziko eZvinodhaka Vari kuZimbabwe
text: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muJacksonville mudunhu reFlorida muAmerica, Doctor Emmanuel Nzuzu, avo vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwepfungwa pamwe nezvekubatsira vane dambudziko nezvinodhaka, vanoti vakazvipira kubatsira vane dambudziko rezvinodhaka vari kumusha. Doctor Nzuzu pari vari zvino vari kumusha kuZimbabwe uko vari kushanda nevanhu vane matambudziko ekutadza kusiya zvinodhaka zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbanje, mapiritsi nedoro, kuburikidza nekuita misangano. Doctor Nzuzu, avo vave nemakore anodarika gumi nemanomwe vachiita basa rekudzidzisa vane matambudziko nezvinodhaka kuburikidza nekushanda muzvipatara zvakasiyanasiyana pamwe nedandemutande ravo, vanoti vakaenda kuZimbabwe nekuona kukura kwedambudziko nezvinodhaka ravanoti rabata nyika. Vanoti kubva pavasvika kuZimbabwe muna Mbudzi, vaita misangano miviri muHarare, uye vane tarisiro yekuti vachange vachiita mimwe misangano kunze kweHarare. Doctor Nzuzu vanoti kune vanoda kubatsirwa vanokwanisa kuvabata panharembozha yavo yavari kushandisa muZimbabwe inoti + 263 776 505 052, kanawo kutsvaga bhuku ravo rakanangana nekubatsira vanenge vaine matambudziko ekukundikana kusiya zvinodhaka rinonzi, “How to Stay Sober”. Vanoda rubatsiro vanokwanisawo zvakare kuenda padandemutande ravo rinoti https://www.howtostaysober.info, apo vanhu vanogona kuenda vachiwana zvidzidzo zvekuti vangakwanise sei kusiya zvinodhaka. Doctor Nzuzu vakaberekerwa kuChipinge vakazoenda kuAmerica muna 2003. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakachengetedzwa kuBulawayo Vachiongororwa Covid-19 Vanoti Hurumende Iri Kuvabata neKuseri kweRuoko
text: Vamwe vevanhu vakachengetedzwa nehurumende kuBulawayo vachiongororwa kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete, vanoti havasi kufara kuti vari kuramba vakaiswa mu quarantine iwo mazuva avo anobvumirwa nemutemo kunge vakachengetedzwa, akapera. Vanhu vataura neStudio7 vanoti vava nemazuva makumi maviri nematatu vari mu quarantine, asi hurumende haisi kuvaudza kuti vachanzi vaende kudzimba dzavo riini. Vanhu ava vanotiwo vari kushungurudzwa nemapurisa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. MuBulawayo munonzi mune vanhu vari kugara paBulawayo Polytechnic, nepaUnited College of Education vakabva kuBotswana mushure mekunge nyika iyi yadzosera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kumusha kwazvo pakatanga kunetsa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vevanhu ava vanoti vakamanikidzwa kubuda muBotswana, vamwe vakasiya midziyo yavo. Pavakabviswa kuBotswana, vanhu ava vakatanga vambogariswa paPlumtree High School, uye vanonzi vaisvika zana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu. Asi vakazoendeswa kuBulawayo senzira yekudzikisa kumanikidzana kwavanga vakaita kuPlumtree. Mumwe wevanhu vakabva ku Botswana vachiita zvekumanikidzwa musi wa 7 Kubvumbi, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, anoti hurumende iri kuvabata nekuseri kweruoko. No media source currently available Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Va Nick Mangwana, vati hurumende yakamirira kuona zvakabuda muongororo yekuti vanhu ava vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. VaMangwana vatiwo vanhu ava vanotarisirwa kuenda kumisha yavo munguva pfupi inotevera kana zvakabuda muongororo zvichiratifdza kuti havana hutachiwona hweCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yava nevanhu makumi mana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu vana, vakatoshaya nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: ZVICHANGOITIKA . . . Pitso aenda kuSaudi Arabia
text: wenhabvu wekuSouth Africa ane mukurumbira, Pitso Mosimane, aziviswa kuti ndiye ava kuzorairidza chikwata chikuru chekuSaudi Arabia, cheAl Ahli Saudi kutanga izvozvi.

headline: Zvikwata zveNhabvu Zvokweshana Mukupera kweSvondo
text: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ari kupinda munharaunda yechipiri muine mitambo yakawandisa muHarare. MuHarare chete muchange muine mitambo mishanu, mitatu yacho mangwana sezvo zvimwe zvikwata zvekunze kweHarare zviri kutambira muguta iri mushure mekunge nhandare dzavo dzakanzi hadzikodzere kutambirwa nhabvu yepamusoro. Mutare City Rovers iri kubva kwaMutare kuzotamba neChapungu muNational Sports Stadium muHarare. Svondo rapera, zvikwata zvakaita seNitchrut ne Shabanie Mine zvakatambirawo kunze kwemusha asi zvikakunda izvo muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaInnocent Mutena, vatsinhira kuti nhabvu hainei kuti muri kutambira kupi. Mutambo pakati peMutare City Rovers neChapungu uri kutambwa nguva dzekudya dzemasikati sezvo nhandare iyi iri kushandiswa zvekare zuva rimwechetero nechikwata cheBlack Rhinos icho chiri kusangana neZPC Kariba. Harare City ichange iri muRufaro Stadium neBulawayo City. Herentals iri kutamba Highlanders muNational Sports Stadium neSvondo. Ukuwo Dynamos iri pamusha neShabanie. Dembare yakarohwa 1-0 neChicken Inn svondo rapera. Murairdzi weDembare, Lloyd Mutasa, anoti ane tarisiro huru gore rino. FC Platinum iri pamusha muMandava Stadium neYadah. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi: Triangle United v Ngezi Platinum Stars - Gibbo Bulawayo Chiefs v Caps United - Luveve Zvichakadaro, chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chiri kupinda munhandare yeLevy Mwanawasa Stadium muNdola, Zambia, neSvondo, chichiedza kutanda nyadzi apo chiri kusangana neAngola mumutambo wekugumisira mumakwikwi ezvikwata zvina. Zimbabwe yakadamburwa neZambia mumutambo wavo wekutanga zvekuti iri kutarisira kukunda mumutambo uyu kuti isapedze iri pachinhanho chekugumisira mumakwikwi ayo, ari kusangana Zambia neSouth Africa mufainari. Murairdzi wemaWarriors, Sunday Chidzambwa, ari kushandisa makundano aya kutarisa vatambi vaachada kushandisa mumakundano e2019 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers umo Zimbabwe iri mugungano rimwechete neCongo DR, Congo Brazzaville, neLiberia. Chikwata chimwe chete kubva mugungano iri ndicho chichaenda kumafainari ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon muna 2019. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anosunga Hutungamiri hweZCTU muHarare neDzimwe Nzvimbo
text: Mapurisa asunga nhengo dzesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions muHarare pamberi pekuratidzira kwangu kwarongwa nesangano iri richinyunyuta nekuoma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupenyu kunonzi neZCTU kwakonzerwa nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mitero nehurumende. Kuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa neZCTU kwatadza kuenderera mberi muHarare sezvo mapurisa akomberedza muzinda wesangano revashandi iri akasunga hutungamiri hwesangano iri. Mutauriri weZCTU, VaLast Tarabuku, vaudza Studio7 kuti vasungwa ava vanomwe avo vanosanganisira mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, munyori mukuru musangano iri VaJaphet Moyo nevamwe. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vasungwa uye vari vesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaLizwe Jamela, vati vasungwa ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvinhu zvisina maturo. VaJamela vatiwo pane vashandi veZCTU pamwe nedzimwe nhengo dzesangano iri vari kutadza kubuda mumahofisi esangano iri sezvo mapurisa akapakatira zvombo akakomberedza muzinda weZCTU kubva mangwanani. Zvichitevera kusungwa kwaitwa hutungamiri hweZCTU uku, hapana kuratidzira kwazoitwa muHarare. Zvichakadai, mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Lanzini Ncube, vatura mutongo wekurambidza ZCTU kuratidzira vachiti muHarare muchine chirwere chekorera chichakadzika midzi vachiti kuratidzira kwanga kuchida kuitwa uku kwaizokonzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi. ZCTU yanga yakwidza nyaya iyi kumatare mushure mekunge mapurisa arambidza sangano iri kuratidzira nhasi nepamusana pechirwere chekorera icho chauraya vanhu makumi mana nevapfumbamwe kusvika parizvino. Kunyange hazvo dare nemapurisa ari kurambidza ZCTU kuratidzira, mitambo yenhabvu iri kuitwa muHarare, uye Zanu PF yakaita musangano wayo nguva pfupi yapfuura pasina kurambidzwa nemapurisa. MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yakarambidzwawo kuita musangano wayo zvichinzi munyika mune chirwere chekorera. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwata chaZemura charakashwa
text: CHIKWATA chaJordan Zemura, mutambi wemaWarriors, cheAFC Bournemouth, nhasi charakashwa 9-0 necheLiverpool mumutambo weEnglish Premier League.   Zemura atamba mutambo uyu apo chikwata chake chakwapaidzwa 9-0 izvo zvaona Bournemouth ichiita chikwata chekutanga mwaka uno kunwisa kanodarika kashanu mumutambo mumwe chete.   Mumitambo yatambwa neBournemouth mwaka uno wekutanga yakakunda Aston Villa 2-0, ndokuzokundwa 4-0 neManchester City, 3-0 neArsenal uye 9-0 newanhasi apo Liverpool yakanda kanokwana ka9 kwa”nya”.

headline: Vanachiremba Voramba Nyaya yeHurumende yeKugumura Vashandi Mabasa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvehupfumi dzichiri kuzeya mashoko egurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa ekuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye vave kuda kugumura vamwe vashandi nekuwedzera mitero yavanobatirwa nehurumende. Nemusi weChipiri, sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rakabatanawo nevamwe vashandi kushora danho iri. Vanachiremba mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vakati vari kushanda vari vashoma uye vari kushanda kwenguva yakareba. Vanotiwo vari kuda kuwedzerwa mari yavanopihwa kana vadaidzwa kubasa kana kuti on call allowance kubva padhora nemakumi mashanu paawa kusvika pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri pamwedzi. Vanachiremba vanoti zvichemo zvavo zvikasagadziriswa uye vakanyimwa bhonasi muna zvita vachazotora matanho akaomarara avasina kutaura. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti zvinhu muzvipatara hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye vati hurumende inofanira kubvisa pabasa vechidiki vebato iri vari mumatunhu ose vari kungopihwa mari dzehurumende vasina zvavari kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Kusasununguka kweUpfumi Kwodzikisa Chimiro cheZimbabwe
text: Kusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzeupfumi munyika kunonzi kwaita kuti Zimbabwe ive imwe yenyika nhatu dziri pasi dzinonzi hadzina rusununguko munyaya dzezveupfumi. Izvi zvakaburitswa netsvakurudzo yakaitwa nemakambani maviri avana chipangamazano anoti Heritage Foundation ne Wall Street Journal akabatana pamwechete. Tsvakurudzo iyi, iyo inonzi 2015 Index of Economic Freedom, inoratidza kuti Ziri pachinzvimbo chezana nemakumi manomwe neshanu, kubva munyika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere, iine zvibodzwa makumi matatu nezvinomwe. Masangano makuru maviri aya aitarisa zvinhu zvinobata rusununguko rweupfumi zvakaita semitemo yenyika, mitemo yezvemabhizimusi, kuvhurika kwemisika nezvimwe zvakadaro. Nyika nhatu dziri kumashure kweZimbabwe dzinoti Venezuela, Cuba neNorth Korea. Nyika gumi dziri pamusoro dzinoti Hong Kong, Singapore, New Zealand Austria, Canada, Switzerland, Chile, Ireland, Estonia neMauritius. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yaive pachinhambo chezana nemakumi manomwe nenhanhatu, zvichireva kuti gore rino yakakwira nechinzvimbo chimwe chete chete. Kutseketuka kweZimbabwe uku kunonzi kwakakonzerwa nekubatwa zvakanaka kwenyaya dzinosanganisira kushandiswa kwemari nehurumende. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamsa, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa zvikuru kukwira kubva pachinhambo chinonyadzisa chayagara iri ichi kana chete ikabvuma kushandura mitemo yayo inobata zvemabhizimusi. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yozeya Bhiri reNhaurirano Pakati peVashandi neVashandirwi
text: Dare reparamende richiri kuzeya bhiri rekuyedza kudzika mutemo wenhaurirano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi ne hurumende kana kuti Tripartite Negotiating Forum Bill. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemutemo yakatozeya bhiri iri ikati hapana chiri mariri chinganzi chinotyora bumbiro remutemo. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvevashandi iri kutarisirwawo kuti mumwedzi uno inge ichitaura nevanhu mumatunhu akasiyana siyana nezvavanodawo kuti zvinge zviri mubhiri iri. Gurukota rezvevashandi Doctor Sekai Nzenza vari kutarisirwa kupira bhiri iri kudare musi wa 5 Kurume. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Nzenza kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union VaJaphet Moyo vanoti hurumende iri kudya manonoko pakut bhiri iri rive mutemo uye vanovimba kuti kana rikapasiswa richabatsira kuunza kuyanana munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Celtic musha wangu: Rodgers
text: Brendan Rodgers, anoti anoshuvira kuzoshanda muEnglish Premier League rimwe zuva asi kwete iye zvino.   Rodgers – uyo ari kunzi anodiwa neArsenal kuti azorairidze chikwata ichi uye achitsiva Arsene Wenger zvichitevera kubuda pachena kwaakaita kuti ari kubva kuchikwata ichi pachapera mwaka uno – anoti anoda kubhadhara rutsigiro rwaakapihwa nebhodhi reCeltic nekuramba achitungamira chikwata ichi kuenda kumberi.   Shasha iyi yasarirwa nemutambo mumwe chete kuti chikwata chake chihwine mukombe wechitatu wegore rino zvichitevera kukunda kwachakaita Rangers 5-0 ndokuhwina mukombe weLadbrokes Premiership Title.   Rodgers asarirwa nemakore matatu pakondirakiti yake uye akabuda pachena kuti haadi kushanda kumwe kunze kwekuCeltic.   Aimbove murairidzi weLiverpool uyu anoti, “Ndakamuka nemusi weMuvhuro kuno mangwanani ndiri maneja weCeltic, zvizivei kuti kuGlasgow kuno kunonakidza.   “Ndiri kurairidza chikwata chandinoda chikuru pasi rose. Ndinoda basa randiri kuita kuno.” – SportsMail Football

headline: Zimbabwe Yosangana neChishanu neSouth Africa Murwendo rweMakwikwi e2022 World Cup
text: Chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chinoti chinovimba zvikuru kuti chichakunda South Africa mangwana mumutambo we2022 World Cup kunyange hazvo chasangana nematambudziko makukutu munzira yemutambo uyu. Chikwata chemaWarriors, icho chiri kupinda munhandare mangwana chisina vatambi vacho vanomwe vari kutambira kuEngland, chinoti chine mukana mukuru wekubuda nemapoinzi ose ari matatu apo chichasangana neSouth Africa muNational Sports Stadium. azvo vasina vamwe vatambi. Vatambi vanomwe vanotamba kuEngland kusanganisira Marvelous Nakamba weAston Villa havana kuuya kumutambo uyu nemhaka yemitemo yeCovid 19 iri munyika iyi. Vamwe vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa, Knox Mutizwa naButholezwe Ncube, havasi kutamba zvekare mushure mekunge vaonekwa vaine chirwere cheCovid 19 pakaitwa ongororo yechirwere ichi pagadziriro yavo. Asi vatambi varipo havasi kutarisa zvese izvi mubati wepagedhe, Washington Arubi, achiti vakatomirira kupinda munhandare. Arubi anoti zvakakosha kuti vabude nemapoinzi ese matatu mumutambo uyu. Maneja wechikwata cheZimbabwe,VaWellington Mpandate, vanoti hapana chimwechavari kutarisira kunze kwekukunda mumutambo uyu. South Africa, iyo ine murairidzi mutsva, Hugo Broos wekuBelgium, ine vatambi vaviri vamiswawo zvekare kutamba mutambo uyu nemhaka ye Covid 19 iyi. Asi Zimbabwe yaunganidza vamwe vatambi vayo vane mukurumbira kusanganisira Knowledge Musona, Tino Kadewere, Marshall Munetsi, naKhama Billiat. Godknows Murwira, uyo akashevedzwa mushure mekunge vatambi vekuEngland vatadza kuuya, anoti mukamba meZimbabwe mune tarenda nekubatana zvekuti Bafana Bafana haimire. Kunze kweSouth Africa neZimbabwe zvimwe zvikwata zviri mugungano iri iGhana neEthiopia idzo dziri kusangana muAccra mangwana zvekare. Chikwata chinopedza chiri pamusoro soro mugungano iri ndicho chinoenderera mberi nemakundano aya. MaWarriors ari kusangana neEthiopia muAddis Ababa neMuvhuro. No media source currently available

headline: VanaMukoti muZvipatara zveKanzuru Vobatana naVanaChiremba Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehutano zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatanga kuramwa mabasa ukuwo hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba muzvipatara zvehurumende vapedza mwedzi miviri vachiratidzira. Studio 7 yashanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa nhasi ikaona kuine varwere vashoma shoma. Vakuru pachipatara ichi vange vachienderera mberi nekutonga vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Matare aya akatanga nemusi weChishanu uye vamwe vanachiremba vachatongwa nemusi weChitatu. Sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti nemusi weChishanu vanachiremba havana kuuya kumatare avainge vadanwa kuti vapindure kuti sei vari kuramba kudzoka kubasa sezvakaturwa nedare reLabour Court. Pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti pane vati vadzingwa here, VaSikosana vati kupindura mubvunzo uyu kungava kufukura hapwa. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano wavaita nenhengo dzavo nhasi kuti dai hurumende yatsvaga nzira dzekuita hurukuro navo kwete kuramba vachitora nzira dzisingagadzirisi dambudziko riripo. Asi Doctor Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakagadzirira kuita hurukuro navanachiremba ava chero nguva. Vati svondo rapera vakatomboita hurukuro asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaMichael Chideme vatenda kuti vanamukoti vatanga kuramwa mabasa uye vati vari kuyedza kutaurirana navo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vekanzuru reHarare Municipality Workers Union VaCosmas Bungu sezvo vanzi vange vabuda muhofisi vachisiya nharembozha yavo. Makirinika akawanda muguta reHarare ndeekanzuru uye kuramwa mabasa kwavanamukoti kuchapa kuti zvinhu zvitonyanye kuipa muguta rinomboita zvirwere zvakaita setyphoid necholera uye ikozvino mwaka wekunaya. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano uye vari nhengo yeMDC Doctor Henry Madzorera vashora hurumende nekupedza mwedzi miviri isina kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. VaMadzorera vatiwo idambudziko rehurumende kuda kunenedzera nekusvora vamwe kunyange vari ivo varikukanganisa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisawo kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezveutano VaObadiah Moyo asi mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa svondo rapera vakaudza vechidiki vebato reZanuPF kuti pane vari kunyengedza vana chiremba kuti vasadzokera kumabasa kuti hurumende yavo igoshorwa izvo vanachiremba vari kuramba. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 Yoramba Ichiuraya Vanhu Vakawanda Munyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira mazuva ose, izvo nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti mucherechedzo mukuru wekukomba kwaita chirwere ichi munyika. Izvi zvinotevera kufakwevanhu makumi matatu nevatatu nezuro nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere ichi kwevanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevaviri, 1 442, nezuro wakare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa,Dr Henry Madzorera, vati kukwira kwehuwandu nekufa kwevanhu mucherechedzo mukuru wekudzika kwemidzi kwaita chirwere cheCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati chitsvambe chave kumumhu wese kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Imwe nyanzvi munya dzezvehutano uye vari mumiririri weChinhoyi mudare reNational Assembly, VaPeter Mataruse, vatiwo zvinoshungurudza kuti vanhu vari kuzara kundufu izvo zvinoita kuti vatapurirane chirwere ichi. VaMataruse vati veruzhinji vanofanirwa kutevedzera mitemo inobata Covid-19, uye vagare mudzimba. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, Va Donald Mujiri, vati bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. VaMujiri vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vanobaiwa nhomba pamwe nekutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira kupfeka mamasiki vakavhara mhuno nemuromo, kugeza maoko nguva dzose, kusaungana uye kumira mumitsetse vanhu vakatarangana. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana masere nemakumi mana nemumwe(1841), uye vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru makumi mashanu nezviviri nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, 52, 663. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vakanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nezvisere nevana, 788,004, uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezvina nemazana manomwe negumi nevana, 564,714. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichizivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti pachine mutoro mukuru wekuti hurumende ibaye vanhu nhomba nehuwandu hwairi kutaura pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba kusvika pari zvino. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVarimi reIntegrated Commercial Farmers Union Rokurudzira Kuti Mitengo yeZvirimwa Itarwe neMari yeKunze
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varimi, reIntegrated Commercial Farmers’ Union, rinoti mitengo mitsva yezvirimwa yemwaka uno yakaziviswa nehurumende svondo rino yakanaka chose asi dambudziko rinozosangana nemurimi nderekuti vezvitoro vanobva vakwidzawo zvakanyanya mitengo yezvinodiwa nemurimi mumwaka unotevera. Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti mwaka uno Grain Marketing Board ichange ichitenga chibage nemadhora zviuru gumu nezviviri nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe, kuchitiwo mbeu diki dzchitengwa nemadhora zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nemashanupatani. Soya bhinzi dzinonzi dzinenge dzchitengwa nemadhora zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana maviri negumi nerimwe patani. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weIntegratedCommercial Farmers’ Union, Amai Maiwepi Jiti, vanoti pari zvino mari iyi inoonekwa seyakawanda zvikuru asi panozosvika nguva yekugadzirira mwaka unouya inenge isisakwanire varimi kuti vakwanise kutenga zvavanoda. "Hongu mitengo yema inputs inokwira panotaurwa mitengo yembesa. Ndinokurudzira kuti dai hurumende yataura mutengo vachishandisa mari yekunze, sokuti chibage chonzi US$260.00. Then panguva ayekuti murimi ave kubhadharwa opiwa zvake maRTGs vachishandisa rate inenge iripo musi iwoyo," vanodaro Amai Jiti. Vanoti izvi zvinobatsirawo murimi kumudzivirira kubva kumitengo yezvikwanisiro zvekuti kana mitengo yakanzi yakwidzwazve haufe haanetseke kudzokera mumunda mwaka unotevera. Amai Jiti vanokurudzira hurumende kuti ipindirewo nekuona kuti mitengo yezvikwanisiro zvinodiwa nemurimi haizokwidzwi pasina mvumo inobva kwairi. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anokomekedzwa Kutsvaga VaDzamara Zvakasimbisisa
text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro re High Court, Va David Mangota, vatura neChishanu mutongo wekuti mapurisa ashande nesimba kutsvaga mutungamiri wesangano re Occupy Africa Unity Square, Va Itai Dzamara, avo vanonzi vakapambwa neMuvhuro mumusha we Glen View muno muHarare. No media source currently available Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira Va Dzamara muchikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare iri naAmai Sheffra Dzamara, vanove mudzimai waVa Dzamara, Va Charles Kwaramba, vati hurumende yasungirwa kuti ishambadzire zvakasimba kushayikwa kwaVa Dzamara. Asi Va Kwaramba vati dare raramba kuti mahofisi evasori pamwe nekumasoja kusechwe sezvanga zvakumbirwa nemudzimai waVa Dzamara. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ataurwa na Muzvare Fortune Chimbaru vanove gweta ranga rakamirira gurukota rinowona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, Va Kembo Mohadi, mukuru wemapurisa, Va Augustine Chihuri, pamwe nemukuru wevasori, Va Happyton Bonyongwe, ekuti hurumende haizivi kuti Va Dzamara vakaiswa kupi nevakavapamba avo vasati vave kuzivikanwa. Mapepa ari kumapurisa pamwe nekudare anoti Va Dzamara vakapambwa nevarume vashanu vaifamba nemotokari chena yemhando yeIsuzu. Va Mangota vakurudzirawo hurumende yakamirirwa nemapurisa kuti idzoke kudare repamusoro mushure memasvondo maviri ega-ega kuti izoudza dare painenge yasvika nekutsvaga Va Dzamara. Mutungamiri we MDCT, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vakapomera hurumende yaVa Mugabe pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF mhosva yekupamba Va Dzamara. Asi mutauriri we Zanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, vanoti bato ravo harina charinoziva nekupambwa kwaVa Dzamara. Mukuru wemapurisa, Va Augustine Chihuri, nezuro vakakurudzirawo mapurisa kuti ashande nesimba mukutsvaga Va Dzamara uye mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vakapamba Va Dzamara vacharangwa zvakawomarara kana vakabatwa. Va Dzamara nesangano ravo reOccupy Africa Unity Square vari kukurudzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, vasiye basa vachivapomera mhosva yekutadza kutonga nyika mujekerere uye kuwisira hupfumi hwenyika pasi. Kupambwa kwaVaDzamara kwakonzera mutauro munyika kubva kumasangano akazvimirira pamwe nenyika dzekunze idzo dziri kuti kodzero dzaVa Dzamara dzinofanirwa kuchengetedzwa. VaDzamara mutori wenhau akambosiya basa rake achiti anoda kurwira kodzero dzevanhu kudzamara VaMugabe vasiya basa.

headline: Vamwe Varimi Votsigira Kurambidzwa kweZvirimwa Zvekunze Munyika
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers Union, ZCFU, rinoti rinotsigira zvakanyanya danho rakaziviswa nehurumende rekuti yave kumisa kupinzwa munyika kwezvirimwa zvakaita sehanyanisi, matomati, nechibage pamwe neupfu. Asi sangano iri rinoti panyaya yechibage hurumende yaifanirwa kutanga yaona kuti goho remwaka uno rakamira sei, yozoti yoona kuti chibage chingadiwa kubva kunze kwenyika chakawanda zvakadii. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima vachiona nezvezvirimwa nemadiridziro, VaDavis Mharapira, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende pari zvino yambomira kupa marezinesi ekupinzwa kwehanyanisi nemadomasi, uye kubva musi wa 30 Kubvumbi gore rino inenge isisabvumidzi kupinzwa kwechibage neupfu munyika. VaMharapira vakati hurumende yatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira varimi vemunyika kubva kuzvirimwa zvekunze izvo zvine mitengo yakaderera. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reZCFU, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti ongororo yezvirimwa iri kuitwa nebazi reAgritex inoratidza kuti matunhu ari kuchamhembe kwenyika atotarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura, izvo zvichaita kuti nyika ide chibage chakawanda kubva kunze. VaChabikwa vanoti kunyange hazvo goho remwaka wapera rakanga riri nani pane mamwe makore adarika, harikwanisi zvakare kuyambutsa nyika kusvika pakukohwa kwemwaka uno. Vanotiwo ongororo yeAgritex ndiyo ichabatsira kuti paonekwe kuti goho rawanikwa rakadii, chikafu chingada kuwedzerwa chakadii, izvo zvichaita kuti hurumende itange zvakare kubvumidza kupinzwa kwechibage munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Ari muMubatanidzwa weNERA Anobuda muMusangano neZEC
text: Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anopikisa hurumende yeZanu PF ari pasi peNERA abuda mumusangano wanga wakokerwa neZEC kuti vazeye zvinyunyuto zviri kugunun’unwa nevanopikisa hurumende pamusoro pesarudzo munyika. Sachigaro wezvekurongwa kwemabasa muNERA, uye vari munyori mukuru webato reAfrican Democratic Party, VaJoelson Mugari vanoti mapato ari pasi peNERA aya ashamisika zvikuru nekupinda mumusangano uyu vachiwana muine vamiriri vemamwe mapato asingatombozivikanwi munyika. “Patapinda isusu mumusangano uyu tanzi isu each party inofanirwa kupinza munhu mumwechete. Tapinda mukati imomo taona muine mamwe ma political parties which have never existed. Can I tell you kuti taona one political party inonzi Okay Mart? Tikawana imwe political party inonzi Vanhu, tikawana imwe political paryy inonzi ZHOC. We had a number of unkown political parties dzanga dzirimo,” VaMugari vanodaro. Vanoti izvi nzvakavanetsa kwazvo kuti zvavari kuita musangano neZEC, vari kupiwa Seiko mapato avasati vamboona. VaMugari vanoti semapato anopikisa hurumende, havarambidzi kuti kuve nemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anoumbwa, asi chavatsamwiswa ndechekuti mapato aya haana kumbobvira anyoresa neZEC. “Tanga tichiita zvekuzovhota, saka mukuvhota umu, nekuda kwekuti ZEC yanga iine vanhu vayo ivavo vanaVanhu, vanga vachingovhotera kudivi reZEC. Saka nekuda kwezviri kuitwa neZEC izvi tadaidzana isu veNERA takati aiwa, regai tiende.” VaMugari vanoti kunyange hazvo vakundikana kukurukura zvinetswa zvavo neZEC, NERA iri kuronga kumwe kuratidzira kune mutsindo munyika yose mukupera kwesvondo ichida kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi reZEC panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: McGregor, Nurmagomedoc votatsurana
text: mutambo weMMA, Robin Black, anoti anofunga kuti Conor McGregor achasendeka kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu, asi hunge akakundwa naKhabib Nurmagomedoc kumutambo weUFC 229.   McGregor ari kutarisirwa kuti ndiye achakundwa mutambo uyu sekutaura kwevanobhejesa mitambo.   Mari iri kuiswa panaMcGregor yakawandisa pane iri kubhejwa panaNurmagomedov wekuRussia uyo waachasangana naye kuLas vegas muna Gumiguru.   Black anoti anofunga kuti mutambo uyu uchave mukuru kuvatambi vese nekuti hapana anoda kukundwa.   “Kunyangwe pane zvakawanda zvekuhwina mumutambo uyu, zvakawanda zvavacharuzawo zvakare. Nekuti kana McGregor akakundwa, mumaonero angu, achasendeka kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu. Kana McGregor akakundwa chete, hatichamuone mumutambo uyu zvakare.   “Kana Khabib akakundwa mutambo uyu, haangorase nhorowondo yake yekusakundwa kwete, asi kukundwa nemunhu akaita saMcGregor hakumbomufadze, apo morari yange yakasimudzwa yemutambo uyu. Kukundwa uku hakumbomuitire zvakanaka kunoshandura zvakawanda,” akadaro. – Sportsmail MMA

headline: MDC Inoti Kushungurudzwa kweNhengo Dzayo neMauto Kwakapa Kuti Itadze Kutsvaga Rutsigiro kuBulawayo
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti rakatambira zvinyunyuto zvakawanda zvine chekuita nesarudzo yarakakundwa neZanu PF kuCowdry park muguta reBulawayo mukupera kwesvondo, uye richatora matanho kugadzirisa mhosho dzakakonzera kuti rikundwe. Mutauriri webato iri vaJacob Mafume vanoti chikuru chakasimudzwa muzvinyunyuto izvi kukundwa kwebato ravo mudunhu ragara richihwinhwa sarudzo neMDC, izvo vanoti vatsigiri vavo vakawanda vanoti zvinhu zvisingafanirwe kudzokororwa. Asi VaMafume vanoti pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kukundikana kwebato ravo kutsvaga rutsigiro kudunhu iri nekuda kwesungwa pamwe nekushungurudzwa kwaiitwa nhengo dzavo nemapurisa. Vanoti zvimwe zvakaita kuti vasabudirire kutengwa kwemavhoti kuburikidza nekupiwa kwechikafu kuvanhu, pamwewo nenyaya yekuti vakawanda havana han’ya nekunovhota kusarudzo dze by-election nepfungwa yekungoti mapato anopikisa anokundwa neZanu PF. Bato reMDC rakawanikwa riine vanhu vaviri vaikwikwidza, izvo zvakawedzera kukundwa kwaro nevaimirira Zanu PF, VaKidwell Mujuru. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votadza Kutora Mari Dzavo kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vekuMasvingo vatadza kutora mari dzavo mumabhanga nhasi, izvo vakawanda vanoti zvichavhiringa hurongwa hwavo hwezororo rekisimusi. Muguta reMasvingo manga musina mufaro nhasi zvichitevera kutadza kutora mari kumabhanga kwaitwa nevagari vakawanda. Mumwe wevanhu vasiri kufara, uye ari mutori wenhau, Energy Bara, anoti atadza kutora mari kubhanga rake reCBZ. "Zvinhu zvacho zviri kuita zvichitoshata pakapinda mutungamiri mutsva takafunga kuti zvichaita nani but zvavakutoshata ike zvino nhasi ndatouya kubank handina kana kuwana kana cent, pa bank hapana vanhu nhasi not nekuti pane mari asi hapana kana mari saka hapana kana shanduko yatati taoona sevana veZimbabwe," Bara anotsanangura. Mitsetse inogara iri mumabhanga mazuva ose, yange isiko, sezvo mabhanga asiri kupa vanhu mari. VaPilani Ngoniye vanoti kushaikwa kwemari panguva ino kunorwadza zvikuru uye zvinhu zviri kutowedzera kushata chero hazvo pava nehurumende tsva. “Tashaiwa mari kana cent tatodzoserwa kumusha totoshaya kuti tofamba neyi kudzokera kumusha uyezve handifungi kuti kisimusi yedu ichanakidza sezvo muMasvingo muno hamuna kana bank riri kupa vanhu mari, haa hurumende tsva iyi yakangofana neyaivapo sharu, yaivapo ikange nani, vakangoita recycle vanhu asi system ndoimwe, it’s from bad to worse,” vadaro VaNgoniye. Muzvare Esther Chimanikire vati kushaikwa kwemari kunovhiringa mufaro wevanhu pazororo rekisimusi rinofanira kufarwa. “Isu hatitozivi kuti krisimasi yedu inenge yakamirasei, izvezvi ndatodzosewa kubanka hanzi hatina mari apa ndinoda kuenda kumusha hakuna eco cash, kana swipe hakushandiswi card saka mbudzi dzacho tinouraya sei, zvakatotiomera kana vanobva joni vanochinjisa sei ma rands avo,” vadaro VaChimanikire. Mumwe mushandi wemubhanga aramba kudomwa zita rake anoti kushaikwa kwemari muMasvingo kwakatanga nemusi weMugovera. Vanhu vakambopembera apo vemabhanga vakawedzera mari yavaipa vanhu svondo ragadzwa mutungamiri wenyika asi iye zvino zvadzokera pazvaiva. Mabanga emuMasvingo akaita seZB ne NMB ari kupa vanhu makumi maviri emadhora pazuva, ukuwo mabhanga eCBZ, Standrad Charted neBarclays achipa makumi mashanu emadhora pasvondo rose. No media source currently available

headline: VeMDC Vanoti Pane Nhaurirano dzeMapato Ose Asi Zanu-PF Yotsika Madziro
text: Mapato anopikisa reMDC rinotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nerimwe rinotungamirwa naVaWelsman Ncube anoti ichokwadi kuti pane nhaurirano dziri kuitwa nemapato ose emunyika. Bepanhau reNewsday rinoti mapato aya akasangana kuGhana nekuKenya kuti paitwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Asi mapato matatu aya anoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo vatsika madziro vachiti hakuna musangano wakadai wakaitwa. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zanu-PF haina chekutaura nevanopikisa. Asi mutungamiri weMDC VaWelshman Ncube vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhaurirano idzi dzirikuitwa asi hadzinei nechekuita nekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Muzvinafundo Ncube vati pane zvinhu zvinoda kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi zvakaita sebumbiro remitemo nemitemo yesarudzo. Mashoko aVaNcube atsinhirwawo naVaObert Gutu mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaTsvangirai. No media source currently available Kubva zvakabuda nyaya iyi, kukandirana makobvu nematete kunenge kwanyanya zvotyirwa kuti musangano wange wakarongwa kuitwa musi weChina, 24 Gunyana kuVictoria Falls unogona kutadza kuitwa. Muna 2009, Zimbabwe yakaita hurumende yemubatanidzwa zvichitevera mhirizhonga inotyisa yakaitika muna 2008 musarudzo dzechipiri dze mutungamiri wenyika. African Union neUnited Nations ndiwo masangano aiona kuti chibvumierano chemubatanidzwa chatevedzerwa here. Muyananisi mukuru panyaya iyi akatanga ari vaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa VaThabo Mbeki vachizotorerwa naVaJacob Zuma avo vakavatsiva.

headline: Mabhizimisi Orasikirwa neMamiriyoni Mashanu eMadhora paZuva neNyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, rinoti mumazuva maviri ekuratidzira nyika yarasikirwa nemari inodarika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora. Mari iyi haisanganisiri mari yezvitoro zvakavharwa kana kupwanya mukuratidzira uku. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChris Mugaga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune vemabhizimisi. VaMugaga vakurudzira hurumende kuti itaurirane nevashandi senzira yekuyedza kupedza kunetsana uku. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, vanoti hurumende iri kuzopa vashandi vayo mari iri pakati pezvikamu nemakumi maviri nezvitatu kubva muzana kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Kurume nhaurirano dzemuhoro dzichienderera mberi. Vatiwo vari kuda kutanga kuita nhaurirano nevashandi kuburikidza nemisangano yeTripartite Negotiating Forum. Munyori mukuru muZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hurumende yange yave nemakore akawanda ichiramba kuita nhaurirano nevashandi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumushandi muZimbabwe zvokonzera kuratidzira. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pari zvino vari kuRussia uye vachashanyira dzimwe nyika shanu vachiyedza kukwezva vekuze vanouchika mari munyika. Asi Doctor Kanyenze vati kuti zvishande, zvinonetsa kana munyika musina kugadzikana. Vashandi vakatanga kuratidzira musi weMuvhuro vachigunun’una nekukwira kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana. Mitengo yezvinhu zvekudya yakabva yatangawo kuita chamurambamhuru ichikwira izvo vakawanda vanoti vava kuomerwa nehupenyu. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikwata zveNhabvu Zvotsvaga Vatambi Vatsva
text: Zvikwata zvenhavu yepamusoro yeCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvapinda mubishi rekutsvaga vatambi vatsva vakatarisana nekusimbisa zvikwata zvavo zvemwaka unotevera. Chiri kunyanyonakidza ndechekuti vatambi vane zvikwata zvakabuda muPremier Soccer League nemhaka yekukundikana ndivo vaita mukurumbira wekurwirwa nezvikwata izvi mushure mekuita zvidavado apo zvikwata zvavo zvaive muPSL. Vatambi vakaita saKing Nadolo weTelOne, Denver Mukamba weChapungu,Nomore Chinyerere weHwange naClive Dzingai weMushowani Stars, ndivo vari pamuromo pezvikwata zvizhinji, Nadolo achinzi arikudiwa neDynamos, FC Platinum, pamwe neNgezi Platinum Stars. Asi Ngezi haiisi kugumira panaNadolo chete zvichinzi izvo irikuedza zvekare kuraura Denver Mukamba kubva kuChapungu. Murairidzi weMadamburo, Rodwell Dhlakama haana kuvanza kuti anofarira matambiro aMukamba asi achiwedzera iye kuti mutambi uyu anofanira kushandura maitiro ake kana achida kutambira chikwata ichi. Mukamba ane mbiri yekudhakwa uyezve yekurovha basa kuzvikwata zvese zvaatambira zvinosanganisirawo Caps United ne Dynamos. Dynamos yacho yapindawo mumusha weTriangle umo varikuita hurukuro nechikwata ichi kuti vatenge Donald Dzingayi pamusoro paRalph Matema uyo varikuda kutora kuYadah. Mubati wehomwe weDembare VaWebster Marechera vanoti vapa murairidzi wavo Tonderai Ndiraya cheki yakavhurika kuti atenge vatambi vaanoda kuti chikwata chake chisimbe. Ndiraya pachake arikubvuma kuti chikwata ichi chinoda kugadziriswa zvakasimba achiti iye arikuda vatambi vanokodzera kutambira chikwata chinonzi Dembare. Kunyange hazvo FC Platinum yakatora mukombe weligi, chikwata ichi hachisi kumira mukutsvaga vamwe vatambi. Arikurairidza FC Platinum parizvino Lizwe Sweswe anoti hapana zvakawanda zvirikuda kugadziriswa paKugona Kunenge Kudada kunze kwevatambi vashoma shoma. Mashoko arikufamba achiti iwo Kugona Kunenge Kudada yatobvumirana naRalph Kawondera kuti asiye basa kuTriangle anange kuZvishavane. Muchato pakati paKawondera neTriangle wekutambire maSugar Sugar Boys uikupera musi wa 31 Zvita. Pamusoro pezvo, Kugona Kunenge Kudada irikunakidzwa nevatambi vekuHwange uko varikuita hurukuro yekuda kutenga Nomore Chinyere mushure mekuraurako Gift Bweti mukupewa kwemwaka wa 2018. Asi Platinum haisati yabudirira pana Chinyere uyo arikudiwawo zvekare neChicken Inn, iyo irikuda mukombe weligi uyu mushure mekupedza iri pachinhanho chechipiri mwaka uno. MaGame Cocks arikuedza zvekare kuti vatore Clive Dzingayi uyo airura mumusha weMushowani Stars. Asi mumusha weCaps United mune runyararo zvichinzi izvo Makepekepe arikufarira vatambi vari munhabvu yepasi yeDivision One pane vatambi vemuPremier Soccer League, vakawanda vacho vanotsvaga zvikwata zvitswa pese panopera mwaka. Asi Highlanders ndiyo yarasikirwa zvakanyanya panguva ino mushure mekunge murairidzi wavo Henrik Piete De Jong asiya basa akananga kuFC Platinum. Izvi zvauya pamusoro pemutambi Prince Dube uyo arikuChina uko arikutsvaga chikwata chitsva chekutambira mwaka unotevera. Makwikwi eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League arikutanga muna Kurume nemutambo weChampion of Champions pakati peFC Platinum neHighlanders. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa eZRP Anoparura Chirongwa cheKudzivirira Kuraraira kweHIV/Aids
text: Zimbabwe Republic Police neChitatu yakaparura hurongwa hwehwaro hwekuyedza kudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kwamutare. Hwaro uhu hwakananganga nekubatsira mapurisa ari pabasa uye vari pamudyandigere. Hurongwa uhu hwave nenguva yakareba huchikwenenzverwa paine chinangwa chekuti panosvika gore ra2020 pange pasisina vanoshaya nekuda kwechirongwa ichi. Vanenge vaine chirwere ichi vanenge vachitarisirwa kuwana mapiritsi zviri nyore. Mukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reManicaland, Assistant Commissioner Dorothy Kupara, avo vakaparura chirongwa ichi, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mapurisa ose aremekedze hwaro hwavapo kuitira kuderedza kuparira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Kupara vanoti hapana chinonyadzisa pakunoongororwa chirwere cheHIV uye pamwechete nekutora mishonga yacho sezvinodiwa. “Chirwere ichi chakangofananawo neshuga, kana zvakubata gadziriswa, so my officer will ensure kuti zvashandiswa sezvinotarisirwa, uye my officer handifungi kuti pane vachange vachiramba kuzotestwa, uye basa richatowanda kune ma medical officers vachitesitwa.” Mukuru wemapurisa uyu anotiwo hwaro huripo uhu hunobudisa pachena kuti vanenge vaine chirwere havaizotadziswa kusimudzirwa pabasa. Hwaro uhu hunotiwo vanenge varwara vanokwanisa kumbonozorora zvavo vachipora vachizongodzokera pabasa kana vave kunzwa zviri nani. Mumashoko avo ekuvhara chiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru wemapurisa Superintendant Kamanda vanoti hwaro hwavapo uhu huchabatsira mukufambisa basa ravo zvakanaka kunyanya kuvatungamiriri vemakamba kumatunhu ose emunyika. “Ndinoti kumaDispols (District Police Officers) ose kana masangana nechinhu chiri medical chingakunetsai munongoti ko policy inoti chii? Endai munotitoreraiwo ende rinonzi rakatsetseka rinosuppotwa nePolice Act uye ne the current Labour Laws, tinoiti chii zviya, iSimbi yebasa!” Mumwe wechipurisa anorarama nehurwere Sergeant Tawanda Mugeri vachipa huchapupu vanoti zvakakosha kuti munhu wega wega, kunyanya kuchipurisa, ararame achiziva paamire mushure mekuvhenekwa ropa. “Panhau yekuudza vamwe vekubasa, inonzi chii zviya, inonzi disclosure, zviri nani inini ndavakuziva zvandiri zvitori right, ndikaenda kuhospital vave kutondishevedza nefirst name nekuti ndikanzwa parwadza ndotomhanya kuti ndizive kuti chii.” Hwaro hwekubudisa HIV/AIDS Policy hwakaitwa pachidyidzanwa nemasangano akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira reNational Aids Council, NAC, Population Services International, PSI nemamwewo. Mukuru weNational Aids Council muManicaland, VaEvans Makoni, vanoti vari kushanda nemapurisa kuti vazadzikise zviri muhwaro mavo. “Chatiunganidza pano inyaya yeZRP AIDS Policy launch iyi, chirongwa chiripo pakuti National Aids Council yakapuhwa mutoro wekuti irwisane nedenda reHIV. Saka mukuita izvozvo tinoti vanhu vari pamabasa kuti vawanirwe nguva yekuitirwa ma programmes inoita shoma saka kambani ikaita policy yaino implemenda zvinobata vazhinji vanenge vari kumabasa toderedza huwandu hwemari yatinoshandisa pakurapa nekuti vanhu vanenge vadzivirira.” Vakuru vechipurisa havana kuda kuburitsa pachena kuti chirwere ichi chakapararira zvakanyanya seyi muZRP, kunyangwe hazvo ongororo ichitaridza kuti kuchipurisa kumwe kwemamwe mapoka emabasa kwakatekeshera chirwere ichi kusanganisira kuchiuto, nekuvatyairi vedzimotokari dzinofamba mitunhu mirefu. Hwaro hwakaparurwa uhwu hucharamba huchiongororwa nekugadzirisa kuti hukwanise kufambidzana neshanduko inenge iriko uye nenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa Zviri Kunze Zvokwira Matare neNyaya yeKuvhota
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika svondo rapera zvakakwira kudare zvichida kuti rirase zvikamu zvemutemo une chekuita nesarudzo unorambidza kuti vari kunze kwenyika vavhote vari munyika dzavagere. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa neUnited Kingdom zvakamirirwa nemagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu zvakaenda kudare repamusorosoro, reConstitutional Court, zvichipikisa mutemo wesarudzo uyu, zvichiti bumbiro remitemo idzva ravepo rinozvipa mukana wekuti zvivhote musarudzo dzinoitwa munyika. Vanhu ava vari kumirirwa neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, Pari zvino vari kunze kwenyika vachiita mabasa ehurumende kana kushandira masangano makuru akazvimirira ndivo chete vanobvumidzwa kuvhota vari munyika dzavagere. Muna Chikunguru wegore rino dare rimwechetero rakarasa imwe nyaya yakadai yakanga yakwidzwa nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa muna 2013, richiti hurumende haimanikidzwe pamutemo kuisa nzvimbo dzekuvhotera kunze kwenyika. Mutongi wedare repamusoro soro, Chief Justice Luke Malaba, vakati zvizvarwa zvose zvakasarudza kugara kunze kwenyika zvakasununguka kudzoka kumusha kunovhota munguva dzesarudzo. Hurumende yakazvisawo zvakare kuti haina zvikwanisiro zvekuti iise nzvimbo dzekuti vari kunze vavhotere, danho rinoonekwa nevanopikisa senzira yekurambidza vazhinji vevari kunze, avo vanoonekwa nehurumende sevanoipikisa, kuvhota. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzeavnhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti danho rakatorwa nezvizvarwa zviri kunze kwenyika iri rakakosha zvikuru sezvo bumbiro remitemo idzva richipa munhu wese kodzero dzekuvhota. VaMavhinga vanoti kunyange hazvo mutongo wakapiwa muna Chikunguru wakarambidza kuti vanhu vavhote vari kunze kwenyika, nyaya iyoyo yakanga yakwidzwa kudare pachipikiswa mutemo waive mubumbiro rakare. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anonetsana Zvakare neVanotengesera muMigwagwa muGuta reHarare
text: Sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, vanotengesera mumigwagwa yemuguta reHarare nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vaswera zvakare vachitandanisana, izvo zvinonzi zvaita kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekushandisa hutsi hunokachidza mukuedza kudzikamisa zvinhu. Mumwe wevanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa aona zvichiitika, uyo ati anoda kunzi VaTodzidambura Mhandu, vanoti vashamisika panguva dzemasikati kuona mapurisa achienda pavanoshandira panosangana migwagwa Kwame Nkrumah Avenue naAngwa Street, pedyo nechitoro chinotengesa mishonga cheQV Pharmacy. VaMhandu vanoti mapurisa aya, ayo anga achitungamirwa nemukuru wemapurisa muHarare, azoedza kusunga mumwe mukomana anotengesa mbatya vasina kana kumbotanga vamuudza mhosva yaapara, izvo zvazoita kuti mukomana uyu arambe kusungwa. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zvazoita kuti paite mhirizhonga yaunganidza vanhu, zvazoitawo kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekukanda utsi hunokachidza. Vanotiwo mapurisa aya aenda nembatya dzanga dzichitengeswa nemukomana uyu, dzinosanganisira midhebhe neshangu. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vanoti manyepo kuti mapurisa aridzira vanhu pfuti, vachiti mapurisa anga achitokanganiswa kuita basa ravo mushure mekunge aedza kuferefeta nyaya yekupambwa kwemumwe murume anogadzira pamwe nekutengesa nharembozha nevanhu vana. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vanoti mushure mekunge vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vaungana, mumwe wevanhu ava abva apwanya fafitera rechitoro cheQV uye kuita ruzha nekutuka mapurisa izvo zvazoita kuti mumwe mupurisa azoburidza pfuti yake yebasa achiedza kuvatyisidzira achimirirawo kusvika kwemamwe mapurisa, ayo azodira utsi hunokachidza. Mutauriri wemapurisa uyu ati mapurisa anga achiri kuferefeta nezvenyaya iyi, sezvo vanhu vapamba murume wemafoni uyu vamumanikidza kuti avabhadhare mari, iyo vanoti yatobva kumba nemudzimai wake. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasiyane netsika yekuvhiringidza mapurisa paanenge achiita basa rawo. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Vovimbisa Kusimudzira Nzvimbo yeArcadia Vachiti Yakasarira Zvikuru
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanoti hurumende iri kuronga zvekudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe senzira yekuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vachitaura nevatsigiri veZanu PF pamusangano waitirwa paArcadia Community Hall muno muHarare, VaChiwenga vati hurumende ine hurongwa hwekudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe senzira yekuedza kupedza dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari. VaChiwenga vakurudzirawo vezvitoro kuti vabvume kutambira mhando dzemari yakaita seEcocash pamwe nekuti vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga. VaChiwenga vati kudzoswa kwedhora remuZimbabwe kuchaitwa zvichienderana nekusimuka kunenge kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika vakati zvinhu zvese zvinofanira kunge zvanakira veruzhinji muna 2025. Mumwe mutsigiri weZanu PF anga pamusangano uyu, Muzvare Susan Mapisa, vati pfungwa dzaVaChiwenga dzakanaka zvikuru sezvo mari yave kungowanikwa pamukoto. Asi mumwe mutsigiri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Rebecca Masukume, vanogara muArcadia makare umo maitirwa musangano uyu, vati zvataurwa naVaChiwenga izvi hazvina musoro. VaChiwenga vavimbisa kuti hurumende ichaita kuti vanhu vose vanogara muArcadia vatariswe zvakafanana nevamwe veganda dema vachiti makaradhi mazhinji ari kuonekwa sema alien vakati vachaita kuti vapihwe zvitupa zvisina kunzi alien.
