Vatiwo nharaunda yeArcadia inofanira kusimudzirwa munyaya dzemigwagwa, nzvimbo dzekutandarira pamwe nekuita kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro kana kuti secondary zviwande munzvimbo iyi sezvo mune zviviri chete. Mumwe mugari wemuArcadia, Amai Anne Downward, vati hupenyu hwakavaomera zvekuti vari kuswera vachipemha. Asi VaChiwenga vati kana veruzhinji vakavhotera Zanu PF musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru, zvinhu zvichavanakira. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Vashandi Vari Kutora Nguva Refu Kuti Vasvike Kumba Vapedza Basa
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vari kunetsekana zvakanyanya nezvekufambisa zvopa kuti vamwe vasungwe vatadza kubata nguva iri kunzi vanhu vange vave mudzimba. Izvi zviri kuitirwa kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau padandemutande reTwitter, mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistance Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vakati mapurisa ari kuzosimbaradza kuona kuti mitemo yakaturwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pakurwisa denda reCovid-19 yatevedzerwa. Vakatiwo vanhu vanofanira kunge vave mudzimba nenguva dza6:30 manheru kusvika na6:30 mangwanani. VaMnangagwa vakati vanofamba zvisina maturo vachasungwa. VaMoyo vanoti zvave kutorera vamwe vashandi maawa mana kuti vasvike kudzimba dzavo mushure mekupedza basa. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi veKumaruwa Voyambira Kuramwa Kwavo Mabasa
text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, razivisa hurumende neMuvhuro nezvenhengo dzaro dziri kuda kuramwa mabasa pamusoro pekukundikana kwePublic Service Commission kuzivisa mazuva achabhadharwa vashandi vehurumende mabhonasi egore rapera. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaRobson Chere, vanoti vasvitsa gwaro rinopa mazuva gumi nemana kumahofisi emukuru wePublic Service Commission, kugurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi pamwe nekugurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi. VaChere vanoti kukundikana kwavo kunzwa kubva kuhurumende mukati memazuva gumi nemana aya nhengo dzavo dzinozoramwa mabasa. Zvinonziwo masangano anomirira vashandi haasi kuwiriranawo pamatanho ekutora pamusoro pekuti vawedzerwe mihoro, vamwe vachinzi vari kuti hazvibatsire kutora matanho iyo hurumende yacho iri kutotadza kuvabhadhara mabhonasi avo uye mihoro yavo paine nguva. Musangano wakaitwa svondo rapera pakati pevamiriri vevashandi nevamiriri vehurumende pamusoro pemari dzemabhonasi unonzi hauna chawakaburitsa sezvo vashandi vakaramba kutambira zvose zvaive zvaiswa patafura nehurumende. Hurumende inonzi yakati ichadzoka nemhinduro musi wa20 mwedzi unouya, asi mamwe masangano evashandi anoti uku kudakutenga nguva chete kuri kuitwa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T yaVaMwonzora neMDC-T yaMuzvare Khupe Dzopesana paNyaya yeMari Inopiwa Mapato ane Nhengo muParamende
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti dzinoona pachiita makakatanwa pakati peMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora neimwe inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe pamusoro pemari inopiwa mapato ane nhengo muparamende. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nehurumende kuburikidza negwaro reGovernment Gazzette kuti mapato eMDC neZanu PF achawana mari iyi pasi pemutemo wePolitical Finance Act. Gwaro iri, iro rakaburitswa nemusi weChipiri, rinoratidza kuti MDC ichawana mari inoita ZWL$ 149 850 000, 00, kuchitiwo Zanu PF ichiwana ZWL$350 150 000, 00. Asi vamwe vane ruzivo nezvinoitika muMDC vanoti havaoni paine makakatanwa sezvo hurumende ichitumira mari iyi kukero inenge yakanyoreswa nebato, zvichireva kuti kuMDC inenge ichienda kumuzinda wayo weHarvest House sezvagara zvichiitika makore ose. Asi chipangamazano chaMuzvare Khupe, VaNtando Ndlovu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vakanzwa kuti bazi rezvemitemo rakazivisa nezvemari idzi, havana kuziviswa zviri pamutemo. VaNdlovu vanoti tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti mari iyi igovanwe nepakati nemapato eMDC-T ose ari maviri, vachiti vanofunga kuti bato rinotungamirirwa naMuzvare Khupe ndiro chairo MDC-T iri pamutemo nekuti Vamwonzora vakazivisa kuti vakaumba bato idzva rinonzi MDC Alliance. VaNdlovu vanoti hapana zvitsva pahurongwa hwekuti pamato anogonavana mari iyi sezvo izvi zvakamboitika muna 2014 apo yakagovanwa pakati paVaTendai Biti namushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaMwonzora, VaWitness Dube, vanoti bato ravo ndiro rinokodzera kupiwa mari iyi, haingokandwi sechibage chinokandirwa huku chichinzi yanhonga yanhonga. VaDube vanoti panotove nehurongwa hunopiwa nahwo mari iyi, vachiti Muzvare Khupe vanotove nebato ravo idzva ravakaumba kuBulawayo svondo rapera, iro rakanga risipo pasarudzo dza 2018. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti nemamiriro akaita gakava remapoka maviri eMDC-T aya, Muzvare Khupe ndivo vavanoona vachikodzera kupiwa mari iyi nekuti VaMwonzora vakabuda pachena kuti vave veMDC Alliance, bato rakatodzingiswa muparamende muparamende naivo VaMwonzora. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Engineer Mudzuri veBato reMDC-T Vanozivisa Kuti Vakabatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Mutewedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thozane Khupe, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti vakabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter, Engineer Mudzuri vakazivisa vana veZimbabwe kuti vakanga vavhenekwa vachiwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, uye vakanga vatove kune chimwe chipatara uko vakanga vachibatsirwa nevashandi vaive vakazvipira, chinove chinhu chaivapa kugadzikana. Vakatiwo nekuzvipira kwavo pamwe neminamato yevamwe vose vaizokwanisa kukunda chirwere ichi.

headline: VaZuma Voendeswa kuMatare
text: Masangano maviri ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe aendesa kudare repamusoro muSouth Africa mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma, achida kuti vadzike mutemo wechimbichimbi nekutonga nemauto kana kuti State of Emmergency munzvimbo dzaberekera ingwe muSouth Africa. Nzvimbo idzi, Durban neJohannesburg dzanga dziine mhirizhonga iri kuitwa kune zvizvarwa zvekunze nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Masangano eZimbabwe Exiles Forum neBlack Business Forum Zimbabwe akakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro muSouth Africa sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika iyi. Masangano aya anoda kuti hurumende yeSouth Africa isungewo mambo wevanhu verudzi rweZulu, Goodwill Zwelithini, nemwanakomana waVaZuma, Edward, avo vanonzi vakapesvedzera mhirizhonga. Asi muzvinafundo munyaya dzemitemo, uye vari mutungamiri we National Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti zvinonetsa zvikuru panyaya yakadai kuti matare ati VaZuma vasungirwe kuita zviri kudiwa nemasangano aya. VaMadhuku vanoti masangano aya anofanira kuva nehumbowo hwakasimba nekuti matare kazhinji haadi kuonekwa achipindira munyaya dzekutongwa kwenyika. Mashoko aVaMadhuku atsinhirwawo nerimwe gweta, VaTerrence Hussein, avo vati matare anowanzoita pfungwa dzekuti kana vanhu vasarudza mutungamiri wenyika, vanenge vaine chivimbo nematanho aanotora munguva dzakaoma nekudaro vanowanzogeza maoko sapirato panyaya dzine chekuita nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari chipangamazano musangano re Human Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti masangano aya anogona kubudirira nekuti VaZuma vakaita hwakamba vachinonoka kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Munyori musangano reBlack Business Forum Zimbabwe, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti hurumende yeSouth Africa haisi kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo mukupedza mhirizhonga iri munyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaona maWarriors mahara
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vane chitsama nemusi weChishanu chadarika vakaona bhora remaWarriors neBotswana reAfcon Qualifier kuNational Sports Stadium “mahara’’ sezvo vaingosvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi apo mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police aive akayeva.   Mubhadharo wekupinda munhandare yeNSS waive $20 kubhombera, kugara paBay 15 kusvika ku18 kwaiita $50 kozoti kuVIP kwaita $120.   Asi kune vamwe – vanhurume nevanhukadzi –  vakapinda mahara apo vaisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda mukati menhandare.   Kwayedza yakazvionera vamwe vatsigiri venhabvu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi uye mamwe mapurisa aitonzwikwa achikurudzira vatsigiri ava achiti, “Svetukai nekuchimbidza”.   Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vanoti imhosva huru kana mapurisa akatyora mutemo nekusaita basa ravo nemazvo zvakadai sekupihwa chiokomuhomwe vachisiya munhu achipara mhosva.   Vanoti pachaferefetwa nyaya yemapurisa ari kupomerwa kuti aisiya vanhu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare yeNSS nenzira dzechitsotsi.   “Imhosva huru iyoyo uye hatitombozvitendere, kana paine vaizviita tichavatsvaga uye vakabatwa mutongo wavanopihwa wakakura zvekusvika pakudzingwa basa.   “Hatitarisire mapurisa edu kuita izvozvo zvekupinza vanhu munhandare mahara ivo vachifanirwa kuchengetedza kuona kuti vanhu havasi kupinda mahara uye hatitode kunzwa kuti pane vari kutambira chiokomuhomwe kuti vanhu vatyore mutemo. Isu semapurisa, hatidi hunhu ihoho,” vanodaro Asst Comm Nyathi.   Mutauriri wesangano reZifa uyo anovazve competitions manager, Xolisani Gwesela, paakaziviswa nezvenyaya iyi neKwayedza musi watambwa mutambo uyu akangoti anoda kurakidzwa mifananidzo yacho iyo akarakidzwa nemutori wenhau uno asi ndokungoridza tsamwa achirakidza kushamisika nazvo.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakazomutumira mibvunzo paWhatsApp ichibvumunzisisa kuti Zifa yakawana marii kubva pamutambo weZimbabwe neBotswana, Gwesela ndokuti vachiri kumboongorora kuti vakawana marii.   Paakabvunzwa nezvenyaya yemapurisa ayo aisiya vanhu vachipinda munhandare mahara, Gwesela anoti akange asina kuona mifananidzo yacho zvakanaka saka anoda kuti munyori uno amutumire.   “Tichiri kuongorora kuti tione kuti zvakafamba sei.   “Mubvunzo wechipiri, tangai manditumira mifananidzo yacho, handinda kuiona zvakanaka,” anodaro Gwesela.   Mumutambo uyu, Zimbabwe neBotswana zvakaita mangange 0-0 izvo zvakasiya vatsigiri vazhinji vemaWarriors vachigunun’una zvikuru.   Zvakadai, mumutambo wakatambirwa kuLusaka, kuZambia nemusi weChipiri chino, Zimbabwe yakakunda Zambia 2 – 1.   MaWarriors ari muGroup H umo mune zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Algeria, Zambia neBotswana.

headline: Madzimai Anoshanyira South Africa Onyunyuta neKurambidzwa Kupinda neMapiritsi eKuronga Mhuri
text: Madzimai ari kushanya kuSouth Africa haasi kufara nekutorerwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kwaari kuitwa nevashandi vanoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevashanyi muSouth Africa. Madzimai aya anoti ari kubvumirwa kupinda nepakiti imwechete iyo inenge iyine mapiritsi anokwana mwedzi mumwechete. Madzimai aya anoti izvi zvinoita kuti azopedzesera oshandisa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa ayo vakawanda vanoti anovarwarisa zvinosanganisira kubuda ropa kwenguva yakareba. Amai Getrude Tarumbwa, avo vanodzidzisa kuPretoria, vanoti kurambidzwa mapiritsi akawanda anovakwanira kunozovamanikidza kunwa mapiritsi ekuSouth Africa ayo anovarwarisa, uye kubuda ropa rakawanda. Amai Tarumbwa vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubvumirwa mapiritsi anoenderana nenguva yaanenge abvumirwa kugara muSouth Africa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Patricia Zuze, avo vanoenda kunotengesa zvinhu zvakaita semidziyo yemumba yakagadzirwa nemiti kuSouth Africa. Amai Zuze, avo vanogara mwedzi miviri kana mitatu vachitengesa, vanoti kutorerwa mapiritsi kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo uye vanozomanikidzwa kunwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa avanoti anovarwarisa. Nekuda kwekurambidzwa kwemapiritsi akawanda pabhodha, mamwe madzimai ave kuita bhizinisi rekuenda nemapiritsi achinotengesera zvizvarwa zvemunyika zviri kuSouth Africa. Pakiti rimwe chete, iro rinopihwa pachena munyika rinotengeswa nemari iri pakati pemaRands zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana maviri zvichienderana nekuti munhu ari kuatengesera kunzvimbo ipi muSouth Africa. Amai Roselyne Chitani mumwe wemadzimai anotengesa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kuSouth Africa. Vatyairi vemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa vanoyambirawo vanhu vavanenge vakatakura zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe kupinda munyika iyi kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vachinzi vari kutakura vanhu vanopinda nezvinhu zvisingabvumirwe. Mutyairi webhazi reFirst Class, VaFrank Muguti, vachiyambira vashanyi vechidzimai kuti vasatakure mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri akawanda. Zvinhu zvakaita semufushwa, manhanga, nzimbe muriwo hazvibvumirwe kupinda nazvo pabhodha. Munhu anowanikwa nazvo anotorerwa uye haazobvumirwa kupinda munyika iyi musi waanenge abatwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Brg Gerald Gwinji, vanoti vachaongorora nyaya iyi vachiti hazvisi pamutemo kuti vanhu varambidzwe kana kuita zvinotadzisa kuti munhu atore mushonga wake sezvinenge zvataura chiremba. Hatina kunzwa divi reSouth Africa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvekumhanya zvakabva kuna tezvara: Muzhingi
text: SHASHA yemujaho wemarathon, Stephen Muzhingi, anoti akatanga zvekumhanya mushure mekunge aona tezvara vake, baba vakabereka mudzimai wake, vachimhanya uye nehupenyu hwavairarama uho hwainge hwakanaka zvikuru.   Muzhingi — uyo akazvarwa mugore ra1980 kwaGutu — anoti tezvara vake, Esau Magwaza, vaive shasha yemumujaho wemarathon vachikwikwidza nekuhwinha mijaho yakasiyana uye vachirarama hupenyu hunoyemurika izvo zvakamukwezva mwoyo.   Tezvara vake ndivo vakave murairidzi wake wekutanga avo vaida chaizvo kumuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu.   Asi, vakazoshaika Muzhingi achangotanga zvekukwikwidza mumarathon.   “Ndaigaroona tezvara vangu yaive shasha panyaya dzemarathon uye vaive nemukurumbira zvekuti ini ndivo vandaitarisira kwavari nevamwe vanosanganisira anaAbel Chimukoko.   “Ndaingonzwa kuti ukaita zvekumhanya unogona kurarama hupenyu hwakanaka uye ndakazvionera ndega nekuti ndichitarisa Magwaza uye nanaChimukoko vairarama hupenyu hwakanaka,  vachifamba nemota kuburikidza nemarathon. Saka ini ndikati ndizvo ndinoda kuitawo.   “Handina kuzotarira shure, asi tezvara vangu vakazoshaika havo vasina kuzonyatsoona kubudirira kwangu kwandakazoita,” anodaro Muzhingi.   Muzhingi akakwikwidza mijaho yakasiyana muno nekunze kwenyika, asi zita rake rakazonyatsoita mukurumbira apo akahwina mujaho weComrades Marathon katatu kakatevedzana kuSouth Africa.   Haana kugumira ipapo sezvo akaenderera mberi ndokunohwina mimwe mijaho inosanganisira Two Oceans Marathon iyo yaakahwina kaviri kuSouth Africa zvekare.   Panguva yaaipisa chaizvo, shasha iyi yakabuda yega pachena rimwe gore kuti kune zvizvarwa zvekuSouth Africa zvakauya kwaari zvikamuti arambe nyika yake azviti chizvarwa cheSouth African kuitira kuti nyika iyi ipembedzwe izvo akaramba sezvo aida kusimudza mureza weZimbabwe.   Pakumhanya kwese kwaakaita muno nekunze kwenyika, Muzhingi anoti mijaho yeComrades Marathon uye neTwo Oceans Marathon icharamba iri mundangariro dzake pamwechete newekutanga waakaenda kunokwikwidza kuNew York, kuAmerica.   “Mijaho mitatu iyi ichagara iri mundangariro dzangu kusvika muguva nekuti ndakadadisa ndikasimudza mureza wenyika yangu, zvinhu zvinofadza chose,” anodaro.   Kuhwina kwaakaita mijaho yakasiyana muno uye nekunze, Muzhingi anoti akashandisa mari yake yaaihwina zvine musoro izvo zvakamuona achitenga dzimba nhatu – mbiri dziri muHarare uye neimwechete iri kuChitungwiza.   Anoti vanhu vanofanirwa kurongera remangwana ravo vachishandisa mari yavanenge vawana vachiita zvisvinu pane kunakidzwa nekudya mari vasingagadzire remangwana revana vavo.   “Gadzirai remangwana renyu uye nerevana, ini mari yese yandaihwina ndaitenga dzimba iye zvino ndine dzimba nhatu. Ndakange ndisingade kuti mune remangwana rangu vana vozobvunza kuti baba zvamaive nemukurumbira chii chamakaita, tisisina pekugara, izvo ndakaramba,” anodaro.   Muzhingi anoti gore ra2019 harina kumufambira zvakanaka sezvo akatadza kukwikwidza kumijaho yakasiyana apo ainge akakuvara.   Asi iye zvino anoti ari kushanda nesimba kuti gore rino agokwikwidza kumijaho mikuru inosanganisira yeOld Mutual munaKukadzi kozoti Comrades Marathon neTwo Oceans Marathon.   Shasha iyi yakakomborerwa nevanakomana vatatu uye mukuru wacho — Methane (10) — ari kutevera matsimba ababa vake achiita zvemujaho wekumhanya kozoti mumwe wacho ari kuita zvemutambo wekarate.

headline: Ndiyani Achatora Mukombe weCastle Premier Soccer League Pakati peCaps ne FC Platinum
text: Mhemberero yekutora mukombe weligi yanga yakarongwa nevatsigiri veCaps United yambomiswa kwete nekuda kwavo. Kunyange hazvo Caps United neMugovera yakarova Ngezi Platinum Stars 1-0, mhemberero yavo yakakanganiswa neFC Platinum iyo yakadambura Highlanders 3-0 ndokuramba ichikwikwidza nemaGreen Machine pamukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League. MaGreen Machine aitarisira kutora mukombe nekurova Ngezi Platinum Stars, vachitarisirawo panguva imwecheteyo kuti FC Platinum yaiita mangange kana kurohwa neHighlanders, izvo zvakaramba kuitika. Kwasara mutambo mumwe chete, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvasiyana nemaponzi maviri chete, Caps United iine mapoinzi makumi matanhanhu, FC Platinum ichitevera nemaponzi makumi mashanu nemasere. Makundano aya ari kupera svondo rino apo Caps United iri kusangana neChapungu kuAscot Stadium panguva imwecheteyo Kugona Kunenge Kudada iri kutamba neTsholotsho Pirates kuLuveve. Mitambo iyi yakaoma zvikuru sezvo Chapungu neTsholotsho Pirates dziri kurwira kuramba dziri muPremier Soccer League mwaka unotevera. Murairidzi weNgezi Platinum Stars Tonderayi Ndiraya anoti makundano aya asvika pakaoma asi semaonero ake, Caps United iri pamberi zvishoma mukuenda mumitambo wekupedzisira. Mutambi weCaps United Ronald Pfumbidzai anoti mumitambo yekugumisira iyi havasi kuzotarisa kuti FC Platinum yatamba sei asi vachaona kuti vaita zvavanotarisirwa zvekurova Chapungu. Mumwe mutambi wemaKepekepe Phineas Bamusi anoti mukombe uri mumaoko avo asi vanofanira kuurwira zvakasimba. Mimwe mitambo yemuPSL yakapera seizvi….  Triangle 0 Dynamos 1 Tsholotso 1 Byo City 2 Mutare City 2 Harare City 2 Chicken Inn 1 Border Strikers 0 Hwange 0 Chapungu 0 ZPC Kariba 0 How Mine 0  Mighty Warriors Chikwata chenyika chevanhukadzi chemaMighty Warriors chakatanga makundano acho eAfrica Women’s Cup of Nations zvakanaka mushure mekuita mangange 0-0 neSouth Africa. MaMighty Warriors anofanira kukunda Egypt nemusi weChipiri kuti vasimbise mukana wavo wekusvika muma semi fainari emakundano aya. Mutambo weZimbabwe wekugumisira mugungano iri uriko musi weChishanu neCameroon. Sachigaro weCAPS Omiswa Basa Mune imwewo nyaya. VeZIFA vamisa basa sachigaro weCaps United VaLewis Uriri avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekushevedzera musangano wezvikwata zvePSL usina kutenderwa neveZifa. VaUriri vanonzi vakashevedzera musangano uyu musi wa 29 Gumiguru apo vanonzi vakafurira zvikwata zvenhabvu yepamusoro izvi kuramba chisungo cheZIFA Assembly chekuti muPSL mubude zvikwata zvina. Gwaro rakabva kuZifa rinoti kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro uno VaUriri havachatenderwi kuve nechekuitita nezvemutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Studio Seven haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaUriri kuti vanoti chii nezvenyaya iyi. Svondo rapera, veZifa vakamisa basa sachigaro wePSL VaPeter Dube pamwe naChief Executive Officer weHighlanders VaNdumiso Gumede vachipomerwa mhosva dzakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo kumaruwa yosimudzirwa
text: SANGANO rakazvimirira reFunani Foundation rosimudzira vechidiki vekumaruwa vane matarenda mumitambo yakaita secricket, rugby, nhabvu, tenesi nehockey kuburikidza nekuvapa zvekushandisa pamwe nekuvadzidzisa.   Mitambo yakaita secricket, hockey kana tenesi kazhinji inozivikanwa ichinzi ndeyevana vanodzidza kuzvikoro zvakasimukira.   Mutungamiri weFunani Foundation, Ray Funani, anoti chishuwo chesangano ravo kupa mikana kune vana vari kumaruwa kuti varakidze matarenda avo mumitambo iyi.   “Kune vana vakawanda vanogara kunze kweHarare vane matarenda anonwisa mvura mumitambo yakaita serugby, cricket, hockey netenesi asi kuzvikoro zvavo kana kunharaunda hakuna kwekuitambira. Saka isu tiri kuda kuvawanisa mukana wekuti vaidzidzire uye varakidze nyika nepasi rese tarenda ravo.   “Chimwe chikonzero ndechekuti takaona kuti kunze ikoko ndiko kune vanhu vakawanda saka tikashanda navo tinowana vatambi vane tarenda tovabatsira kuti ribikwe,” anodaro Funani.   Anoti parizvino sangano ravo riri kubatsira zvikwata zviri kunzvimbo dzakadai seHwedza, Mhondoro neGoromonzi uko riri kushanda nevarairidzi vemitambo iyi kudzidzisa vechidiki.   Anoti vari kushandawo nevamwe vemasangano akadai seClasswave Investments avo vari kuvabatsira nezvekushandisa zvemitambo yakasiyana.   Svondo radarika, Funani Foundation – kuburikidza neClasswave Investments – yakabatsira chikwata cheRamah Sports Academy nekuchipa zvekushandisa mumutambo wecricket.

headline: Vane Makadhi emaATM Vorasikirwa neMari
text: Dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rave kupa vamwe vanhu vafambe namakadhi emaATM vachipihwa mari nevanenge vachida kutenga muzvitoro zvikuru vobhadhara kamutero kadiki. Kuita uku kwatekeshera muzvitoro zvose zvinokurudzira kushandiswa kwemakadhi ekubangi kudarika mari sezvo mari iri kushayikwa kumabhanga munyika kunyangwe bhanga guru renyika rainge rati kuuya kwemabond notes kwaizobatsira kupedza dambudziko iri. Vanhu vanenge vaine makadhi vanofamba vachibvunza vatengi kuti vari kutenga nemari here kana kuti vari kuzoshandisa kadhi. Vanokwezva vatengi vanenge vachida kushandisa mari kuti vashandise kadhi ravo vozovapa imwe mari pamusoro peyavanenge vavapa. Munhu anenge aine mari anopihwa masendi makumu mashanu pamadhora gumi. VaOnisimo Zemura mumwe weavo vatenga nekadhi vakapihwa mari. VaZemura vanoti kutengerana uku kune kachitsotsi sezvo paine mari inobviswa pamusoro asi vanoti hapana zvekuita sezvo vanga vachida mari yekufambisa kuenda kubasa mangwana. Asi VaEdmore Mazarure vekuAlaska vanoti kushaikwa kwemari ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti mari itengeswe. VaMazarure vanoti izvi hazvishamise sezvo zvichitika pane chinhu chose chinenge chichishayikwa munyika. VaMazarure vanoti dambudziko remari ratekeshera munyika richaramba rakadaro nekuda kwezvizvarwa zvekuChina izvo vanoti hazvidi kutambira makadhi muzvitoro zvavo. VaMazarure vanofungidzirawo kuti zvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi hazviise mari kumabhangi. Zvitoro zvinokurudzira kushandisa makadhi zvakaita seOK neTM zvinopa munhu mari inosvika madhora makumi mashanu ($50) kana munhu atenga zvinhu zvemari inosvika madhora makumi maviri ($20). Chitoro cheOK mugwaro racho rinoratidza mamiriro akaita kambani iyi chinoti chakaita mari yakawanda kana kuti profit inosvika mamiriyoni maviri gore rino kubva muna Ndira kusvika muna Chikumi (June) nekuda kwevanhu vaitenga zvinhu nemakadhi kuti vazopihwa mari.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanosvika kuMusangano weWorld Economic Forum kuSouth Africa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasvika muSouth Africa kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum on Africa uri kuitirwa kuCape Town. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kubatana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica nevamwe venyika dzakabudirira. Musangano uyu uri kutanga neChitatu uchipera nemusi weChishanu kuCape Town International Convention Center. Ko Zimbabwe pane chainobura here pamisangano yakadai sezvo VaMnangagwa vachangobva kumuysangano we Tokyo International Conference on African Development kuJapan vamwe vachiti vakafambira dhongi rakaora? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti misangano yakadai yakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo namuzvinabhizimisi ari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vati musangano uyu unopa Zimbabwe mukana wekuumba hushamwari nenyika dzakaitemere zvirango. VaJokonya vati Zimbabwe inofanira kunyatsouya nemazano akajeka kuti iwane chouviri pamisangano yakadai. Asi mumwe wevatevedzeri vebato rinopikisa reMDC, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti misangano iyi kuteya nzou neriva. Vati VaMnangagwa vanongoenda kumisangano pasina chinobuda nekuti hapana vekunze vanoda kudyidzana neZimbabwe nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. VaBiti vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanira kutanga vabatana, asi vakati havaone VaMnangagwa vari ivo vangatungamire hurongwa uhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vemunyika vatange vataurirana vasati vaenda kunze kunotsvaga vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mutauriri wemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, Muzvare Khusela Diko, vati mutungamiri wenyika iyi achatungamira chikwata chemakurukota avo. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukurudzira kudyidzana munyaya dzezvekutengeserana kuburikidza nehumhizha hwechizvino zvino. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoramba Kuti Pane Vanhu Vari Kupambwa Kana Kushungurudzwa Munyika
text: Hurumende inoti munyika hamuna dambudziko rekutyorwa kwedzokero dzevanhu ichi vanoti pane dambudziko iri ndevaya vasingazive zviri kuitika munyika pamwe nevanopikisa hurumende neshamwari dzavo dziri kunze kwenyika. Asi mapato anopikisa nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti pane humbowo hwakawandisa hunoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati manyepo kuti munyika mune dambudziko rekutyorwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu vachiti mashoko aya ari kubva kuvavengi veZimbabwe vanozivikanwa mukati nekunze kwenyika. Vati hurumende iri kuchengetedza runyararo munyika nekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. VaMangwana vati hurumende haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiratidzira panguva ino yeCovid-19 kuti vaparadzire chirwere sezvainge zvarongwa svondo rapfuura. Vati vanhu vari kutaurisa pamusoro peZimbabwe ngavanyarare vachiti kunyika dzakaita seIndia neSouth Africa kwakatofa vanhu vakawanda hurumende dzeko dzichiedza kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid. VaMangwana vati dzimwe nyika dzepasi rese dzapindira kutaura zvisina maturo pamusoro peZimbabwe nekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe ndizvo zvakatanga kurova bembera zvichitaura manyepo pamusoro penyika yazvo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vaudza Studio 7 ichokwadi kuti mauto nemapurisa ari kurova, kutora zvinhu zvevanhu pamwe netyora kodzero dzavo achivanda nekuti ari kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vati hapana munhu angataura kuti munyika hamuna mhirizhonga ivo vanhu vari kusungwa, kubhinywa, kurohwa pasina chikonzero zuva zuva.  VaBiti vatiwo veruzhinji vane humbowo hwekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero nehurumende uhwo vari kutora vachishandisa mbozhanhare dzavo mazuva ose. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vati mashoko ehurumende ndeekuda kuramba zvinhu zviri kuitika munyika asi vakati hazvishamisa nekuti hurumende yagara isingakoshesi kodzero dzevanhu. Vatiwo kana makomisheni ehurumende anoti Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission neNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission akataura nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti munyika muri kuitika zvinhu zvisina kunaka panyaya yekodzero dzevanhu. VaKika vati vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kuramba vachitaura zvichemo zvavo kudzamara hurumende yatevedza mitemo nezviga zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu zvayakabvuma kutevedza pasi pemasangano eSouthern African Development Community, African Union neUnited Nations. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti dzimwe nyika nemasangano akasiyana siyana pasi rese vave kutoudza hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti irege kumbunyikidza vanhu. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, iro riri kumirira vanhu vakawanda vari kusungwa pamwe nekurowa, rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vakasungirwa kana kuroverwa nyaya ine chekuita nekuratidzira kwainge kwakarongwa kuitwa musi wa 31 Chikunguru.  Bato riri kutonga kuSouth Africa reAfrican National Congress pamwe nehurumende yenyika iyi, United Nations nevanyarikani pasi rese, vakatotaura kuti zviri kuitika muZimbabwe hazvina kunaka uye vari kuedza kutaura nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuti isiyane nezvairi kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKubatwa neCovid-19 Hwowedzera Zvakare muZimbabwe
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwatanga kukwira zvekare mushure mekumbodzika kwemavhiki apera. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 1,538. Asi mukati memazuva manomwe adarika kusvika Mugovera, vanhu gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13 vashaya nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nevanhu vashanu vakafa vhiki rapera. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 126 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 37, 273. Mumazuva manomqwe kusvika Mugovera chete vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 350 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvachienzaniswa nevanhu zana nemumwe kana kuti 101 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mumazuva manomwe svondo rapera. izvi zviri kuwedzerwao nekusamira zvakanaka kwaita zvinhu muzvikoro. Zvikoro gumi nezvishanu zvine vana nevarairidzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Bazi rezvedzidzo rinoti vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132 vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi pachikoro cheSacred Heart Primary neSacred Heart Girls Gigh kuEsigodini, Matabeleland South. Zvikoro zve Girls College ne Mzilikazi Primary zvine vana vabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti vabereki havafanire kutya hazo nekuti hurumende iri kuita zvose zvakakodzera kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakanyanya vakati hapana munhu ari kubvumidzwa kupinda pachoikoro cheSacred Heart kusvika dambudziko riripo ragadziriswa. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 31 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nemana nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 34, 862 vapora kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 873. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19 vave zana rezviuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu kana kuti 193, 936. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri zviuru makumi maviri nemasere nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 28, 797.

headline: Mbappe haasi kuzouya: Guardiola
text: anoramba mashoko ekuti chikwata chake chiri kuda kubhadhara mari inosvika 200 miriyoni paunzi kuti chitenge mutambi weParis Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe, muna Ndira wegore rinotevera.   Zvakabuda mumapepanhau kuti City ichada kuendera mutambi uyu wekuFrance, uye PSG ichidawo kutengesa vatambi kuti mabhuku ayo azadzikise zvinodiwa nemitemo yefinancial fair play.   Asi, zviri kunzi Guardiola kuti atenge mutambi uyu, chikwata chake chinofanirwa kutanga chatengesa mumwe mutambi nekuda kwemitemo iyi uye Raheem Sterling ndiye ari kutaurwa kunzi anogona kutengeswa.   Achitaura svondo rino – vasati vasangana neHoffenheim mumutambo weChampions League – Guardiola akaudza vatori venhau kuti hapana apo chikwata chake pachichaendera mutambi uyu uyo akahwina mukombe weWorld Cup.   “Hazvisi kuzoitika,” anodaro.   “Dzimwe dzenguva handinzwisise kuti nyaya idzi dziri kubva kupi chaizvo.” – Sportsmail Football

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Hurongwa hweKudzora Dhora Munyika
text: Hurumende yakazivisanemusi weMuvhuro kuti vanhu vanenge vave kusungirwa kuti vashandise mari yemunyika chete yemaRTGS. Izvi zvakonzera kusawirirana munyika vamwe vachiti zvakanaka asi vamwe vachiti kwave kuita kwewashaya kutsvaga uta nemugate. Vachitaura kuVictoria Falls kumusangano wemhuka dzemusango kana kuti Africa World Summit, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaudza vanhu kuti Zimbabwe yave nyika yagadzikana sezvo yave nemari yayo. Vati vanofanira kuroverwa maoko kuti vakwanisa kudzora dhora remunyika. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvezvehupfum, VaTendai Biti, vanova mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende harishandi zvachose. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMavambo Kusile Dawn, Dr Simba Makoni, avo vakambovewo gurukota rezvemari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vatiwo zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvinapundutso. VaMakoni vanoti zviri pachena kuti chiriporipocho chakaitwa nehurumende munongedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka vachiti nyaya yevashandi vehurumende vainge vati vanoda mari yekuAmerica yemuhoro ndizvo zvapa kuti hurumende ibve yachinja mutemo. Dr Makoni vanotiwo zvakaitwa nehurumende hazvisi pamutemo sezvo yaifanira kutanga yaenda kudare reparamende kunovandudza mutemo wakadzikwa muna 2009 kuti mari dzose dzishandiswe munyika kusanganisira yeAmerica, South Africa, Botswana nedzimwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naVaBiti avo vati vambosimudza nyaya iyi mudare reparamende. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende hazvina kuipa. Mashoko aVaJokonya atsinhirwawo namuzvinabhizimisi VaGilbert Muponda, avo vanova nhengo yeZanu PF yakakwikwidza ikakundikana musarudzo yekutsvaga mumiriri weWarren Park muparamende. Asi Dr Makoni vanoti zvinoshamisawo kuti sei gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vari kuchinja chinja. Muzvinafundo Mugano vanotiwo zvaitwa izvi zvikasabudirira VaNcube vanenge vazvikanda mukanwa mamupere. Zimbabwe yakapedzisira kushandisa mari yayo chete muna 2009 sezvo dhora range ranyanyaya kushaya simba. Ko zvaitwa zvingashande here? Vanopikisa vanoti kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Asi vehurumende vanoti imbwa hora haifunidzi nhando. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vofuratira VaMutasa?
text: Vaimbova munyori wemabasa muZanu PF, VaDidymus Mutasa, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kuramba kuita musangano navo. VaMutasa vanoti vanyorera tsamba dzakawanda VaMugabe semutungamiri webato ravo vachida kuti vataurirane pagakava riripo rakakonzera kuti pave nekupesana mubato. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMugabe VaGeorge Charamba kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. VaMutasa vari kuramba kutambira zvakabuda mukongiresi yebato ravo yakaitwa muna Zvita vachiti zvakaitwa pakongiresi iyi zviri kunze kwebumbiro rebato. VaMugabe vakadzinga muhurumende VaMutasa nevaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, nevamwe vakuru mubato, vachivapomera mhosva yekuda kuvapandukira mubato. VaMutasa naVaMugabe vashanda vose muZanu PF kwemakore anodarika makumi mana. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, kanawo kumutauriri waVaMugabe muhurumende, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzanga dzisingadairwe. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzotyira Kuti Kuungana kweVanhu paMabhazi eZUPCO Kuchakonzera Kuparadzirwa kweCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirisa nechimbichimbi dambudziko rechekufambisa vachiti kukundikana kwekambani yeZUPCO kutakura vanhu kuri kukonzera kuungana nekutsikirirana kwevanhu pamisika yemabhazi. VaRusike vanoti izvi zviri kuzoisa vanhu vakawanda munjodzi huru yekutapurirana hutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera mabhazi eZUPCO, kana kudzosera mumigwagwa makombi aimbotakura vanhu, poonekwa kuti atevera mutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Svondo rapera mapurisa akazivisa kuti achange achisunga vedzimotokari dzisiri pasi peZUPCO, uye vafambi vanowanikwa vakakwira motokari idzi vachabhadhariswa madhora zviuru zviviri pamunhu sefaindi. VaRusike vanotiwo nekuda kwekuwanikwa kwehutachiwana hutsva hunokonzera Covid-19 hwe C.1.2 munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa nyaya dzedzidziso pamusoro pedenda iri. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu (16) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe zana nemakumi maviri nevashanu (125) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana mana ane makumi masere nevaviri, (4,482). Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga vakasvikawo pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvishanu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu (125,550). Vanhu vapora vave zviuru zana negumi nezvitanhatu zvine mazana mana nemumwe, (116,401). Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neSvondo, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamirioni maviri ane zviuru mazana manomwe negumi nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu ane makumi mana nevasere (2 million 713 548). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri sezvinokurudzirwa vakanga vave miriyoni imwechete ine zviuru mazana manomwe negumi nezvinomwe zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu kana kuti (1 million 717 430). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe Zvoratidzira Kutsigira Mauto eZimbabwe
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muWashington DC nematunhu akapoteredza zvakaungana neMugovera pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri mu Washington DC zvichitsigira zviitiko zviri kuitika kumusha, zvichitevera kupindira kwemauto mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye kumanikidzwa kwaVaMugabe nebato ravo re Zanu PF, kuti vasiye chigaro, izvo zviri kutsigirwawo neveruzhinji. Mumwe wevakaronga kufora uku, Muzvare Shingi Mangwiro, vanoti vashamiswa nekubuda kwakaita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, kunyange hazvo kwaitonhora zvekukwidza hamba mumuti. No media source currently available Ukuwo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinonzi zvakabva kumatunhu ari kure akaita se Pennsylvania, New Jersey, New York, Virginia ne Maryland Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe nevamwe vanofarira Zimbabwe vanogara ku Texas, vaunganawo paCity Hall muDallas vachiratidzira kutsigira kwavo zviri kuitika kuZimbabwe. Mumwe wevakaratidzira Dr. Prisca Ngondo, vanoti vanotarisira kuti Zimbabwe itange patsva uye vanotarisira kuti dzimwe nyika hadzipindire munyaya yekupindira kwemauto mukutongwa kwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weShuga Unokwira Zvakapetwa Ruviri
text: Kambani inogadzira shuga yeTongaat Hulett inonzi yakwidza mutengo weshuga nezvikamu zvingada kusvika kuzana kubva muzana kutanga neMuvhuro uno. Gwaro raburitswa nekambani iyi rinoratidza kuti mutengo wepakiti yeshuga ye brown ine huremu hwekirogiramu imwechete wakwira kubva pamadhora mana ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kuenda pamadhora masere ane masendi makumi matanhatu nerimwe emaRTGS. Makirogiramu maviri eshuga imwecheteyo akwirawo kuenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi maviri nemaviri kubva pamadhora mapfumbamwe ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe nemasere. Kukwira kwemutengo weshuga uku kunotevera kumboshaikwa kwayo mune zvimwe zvitoro mumazuva mashoma adarika. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti hausi mutengo weshuga chete wakwira, asi kuti zvakawanda zviri kukwirawo mitengo, zvichikonzerwa nekukwira kwemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari. Panyaya yekushaikwa kwechingwa, Doctor Citambara vanoti vamwe vanobika chingwa vanogona kunge vakamira kuita izvi nekuda kwekupindira kwehurumende mukutarwa kwemitengo yechingwa. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga reCBZ Rinofaindiswa $385m neAmerica
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti America ichabvisa mari yezvirango iri kunzi ibhadharwe nebhanga reCBZ iro rinonzi rakatyora mutemo weAmerica une chekuita nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende muna 2003 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Hofisi yeUnited States Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control kana kuti OFAC inoti CBZ yakatyora mutemo sezvo yaibatsira vanhu vebhanga reZB iro rainge rakatemerwa zvirango. OFAC yakatanga yati CBZ ibhadhare mari inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere zvemadhora asi mari iyi ikazodzikiswa kusvika pamamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemashanu emadhora mushure mekuchema chema kwakaita CBZ. Doctor Mangudya vati vane chivimbo chekuti mari iyi ichabviswa yose asi vashora zvikuru nyaya yekutemerwa zvirango kwevamwe muhurumende pamwe nemakambani anodyidza nehurumende yeZimbabwe vachiti zvinokanganisa nyaya yemabhizimisi. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe haingaudze America zvekuita maererano nekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Vati zviri kuAmerica kuona kuti zvirango zvobviswa here ichionawo nyaya yekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji vonyunyuta neKukwidzwa kweMutengo weMafuta eKufambisa
text: Veruzhinji vanoti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mngangagwa neMugovera vachiti izvi zvhichaita kuti hupenyu huomere veruzhinji munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera vakazisivisa kuti peturu yave kutengwa nemadhora matatu nemasendi makumi matatu nerimwe parita, ukuwo dhiziri rave kutengwa nemadhora matatu ane masendi gumi nerimwe chete parita. VaMnangagwa vakati vezvitoro havafanire kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvichitevera kukwidza kwakaitwa mafuta edzimotokari. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revanofamba nemotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji VaTafadzwa Goliati, vanoti veruzhinji vachadhurirwa nekufamba sezvo vemakombi nemabhazi vatokwidza mari dzekufamba. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Nester Mutikani, vanoti zvichaomera hurumende sezvo vachiti hurumende icharamba ichipinza ruoko muhomwe mayo kuti ikwanise kutenga mafuta aya. Zvichakadaro, muutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti vashandi ndivo vachanyanyoomerwa sezvo hurumende isina kuwedzera vashandi vayo mari dzemihoro, uku ichikwidza mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari. VaMnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo iri kutarisira kuwedzera vashandi vayo mihoro muna Kubvumbi wegore rino. Mutauriri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHashatag Tajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vanoti chave kudiwa ndechekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitaure nezwi rimwe chete vachiti zvave pachena hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kumhanya nemakarimwa. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakawedzera mitengo yemafuta edzimotokari, veruzhinji vaswera vari mumitsetse yekutsvaga mafuta aya sezvo vemagaraji mazhinji vanga vachiti havana mafuta acho. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveKugara Kwakanaka kweVanhu Rinoti Vakaremara Vari Kubatsirwa muNguva Ino yeCovid-19 Lockdown
text: Gurukota rezvemabasa, vashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara vakarasikirwa nemihoro munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, kuburikidza nechirongwa chavakaparura chakanangana nekubatsira vanotambura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuCongo Brazzaville, uko vari kumusangano wechinomwe webudiriro mudunhu reAfrica, kana kuti "Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development", uyo wakapetwa nemusi weChina, Professor Mavima vanoti bazi ravo rakakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu negumi, kana kuti 310 000, pasi pechirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo vave nemakore maviri vaumba bazi rinomirira vakaremara, iro riri kutungamirwa naDoctor Christine Peta. Professor Mavima vanoti munguva ino bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara kuburikidza nehomwe yemari yavakaisa parutivi yekubatsira vanoda kutanga zvirongwa zvekuzvibatsira, uye ivo segurukota vari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vanyorese kumahofisi ebazi ravo ari nyika yose kuti vabatsirwe. No media source currently available

headline: Murwiri weKodzero dzeVanasikana Muzvare Betty Makoni Vobatwa neCovid-19 keChipiri
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanasikana uye vakavamba sangano reGirl Child Network muZimbabwe, Muzvare Betty Makoni vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kechipiri gore rino. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuBritain, Muzvare Makoni vati vave kunzwa zviri nani uye vanachiremba vatovapa tsamba yekuratidza kuti vapora. Muzvare Makoni vanoti nyaya yekuti vanomboshanda vachipinda muzvipatara nedzimwe nzvimbo dzine vanhu vakawanda inopa kuti vapindewo munjodzi yekutapurirwa chirwere ichi. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti munhu paanobatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kekutanga anokwanisa kungopedza mwedzi mitatu chete masoja emuviri wake akamudzivirira. Ana chiremba vachiri kuzeya nyaya nyaya dzevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kaviri sezvo vachiri vashoma. Nyika dzine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kechipiri dzinosanganirsira America, Britain, Hong Kong, Belgium, the Netherlands ne Ecuador. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Mark Pandori vanova mukuru paNevada State Public Health Laboratory muAmerica vanoti kubatwa nechirwere ichi kechipiri kwevanhu ava munongedzo wekuti kunyangwe ukapora kubva kuCovid-19 unofanira kugara wakazvichengetedza kunyangwe wambopora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanokurudzira vanhu kuti vapfeke mamamask, kugeza maoko uye kusangoita magungano. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Zimbabwe Haisi Kujekesa Mashandisirwo eMari dzeHurumende neKupihwa kweMarezinesi eZvicherwa
text: Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rehurumende yeAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kana kuti State Department rinoratidza kuti hurumende dzinoshandisa mari yeruzhinji zviri pachena here pamwe nekuti dzinopa sei marezinesi ezvicherwa rinoratidza kuti kunyangwe zvazvo Zimbabwe ichinzi yakaedza zvichienzaniswa negore rapera, haisati yasvika panotarisirwa. Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rehurumende yeAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, kana kuti State Department iri rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe iri panyika makumi matanhatu nepfumbamwe dzinonzi hadzisati dzoratidza pachena mashandisirwo emari yehurumende . Asi panyika idziwo Zimbabwe iripanyika makumi maviri nenomwe dzinonzi zvichienzaniswa negore rapera dzirikuvavarira kuita zvinhu zvavo pachena. Kuti nyika inzi inoshandisa mari pachena inenge ichizivisa veruzhinji hurongwa hwemari kusanganisira mashandisirwo nekuwana mari kunoita mapazi nemakambani ehurumende. Nyika inonziwo yakachena kana hurumende ichibudisa pachena magwaro anechekuita nekupiwa kwemarezinesi ezvicherwa pamwe nekuti vanenge vawana marezinesi awa vaawana sei. Vachitaura nezvegwaro iri, Amai Megg Riggs vanoshanda kumuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe vati gwaro ravo regore rino rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yakaedzesera zvichienzaniswa negore rapera kuratidza mashandisirwo emari munyika asi vachiti izvi hazvina kukwana. Amai Riggs vati Zimbabwe yakabudisa pachena hurongwa hwebhajeti pamwe nekushandiswa kwemari. Vatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe yakakwanisawo kuwanisa ruzivo rwezvekushandiswa kwemari kuneveruzhinji pamwe nekuzivisawo zvimwe zvezvikwereti zvinenyika. Asi Amai Riggs vati Zimbabwe yakakundikanawo kuzivisa zvikwereti zvine makambani ehurumende pamwe nemari inowanikwa nemakambani awa. Amai Riggs vatiwo Zimbabwe haisiwo kuzivisa pachena veruzhinji kuwaniswa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvezvicherwa kuti tinzwe maonero avo nezvekupiwa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa sezvo tatadza kubata gurukota rebazi iri VaWinston Chitando. Patafonera mutevedzeri waVaChitando Va Polite Kambamura vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vachazotaura nesu kana vasununguka asi vanga vasati vatibata pataenda pamhepo. Tatadzawo kubata gurukota rinoona nezvemari VaMthuli Ncube. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko kubato reZANU PF vanga vasatiwo vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Asi mukuru wesangano rinorwira kuchengetedzwa kwezvivanikwa munyika, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFari Maguwu vati nyaya yezvezvicherwa muZimbabwe haibudiswi pachena vachiti kurudziro yavo kuhurumende kuti ibudise ruzivo urwu pachena. Gwaro iri rakaongorora nyika dzinosvika zana nemakumi mana neimwe idzo dzinowana mari yerubatsiro kubva kuhurumende yeAmerica. Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakadai se Algeria , Angola, Lesotho, Liberia ,Malawi Mozambique nedzimwewo hadzisati dzasadzikisa zvinotarisirwa. Gwaro iri rinotiwo dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakadai se Botswana, The Gambia, Ghana, Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya nedzimwewo dzakachena panyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari. No media source currently available

headline: Chikumbiro chaHopewell Chin'ono Chinoramba Kutambirwa neDare
text: Dare ramajisitireti rarasa nhasi chikumbiro chemutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika, Hopewell Chin’ono, chekuti mhosva yaari kupomerwa iraswe. Dare iri rati mhosva yake achatanga kutongwa musi wa12 kusvika musi 14 Chikunguru. Vachipa mutongo wavo nhasi, mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guwuriro, vati kunyange hazvo nyaya iri kupomerwa Chin’ono isina kujeka, ichajekeswa apo paachatongwa. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vati dare ichokwadi kuti dare harina kutambira chikumbiro chavo richiti huchapupu hwenyaya huchabuda paichatongwa nyaya iyi. VaMtisi vati vabvumirana nevachuchusi kuti nyaya iyi itongwe muna Chikunguru. Chin’ono, uyo achatongwa achibva kumba kwake mushure mekubhadhara mari yechibatiso, ari kuramba nyaya iyi achiti ikodzero yake semutapi wenhau kufambisa mashoko. Chin’ono anonzi akakurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira zvine mhirizhonga musi wa31 Chikunguru gore raperaachishandisa dandemutande rake reTwitter. Anonzi akaita izvi pamwe naVaJacob Ngarivhume nevamwe vakaita semumiriri weZengeza West, uye vari mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, avo vari kumatarewo nemhosva imwe cheteyo. Mapurisa arambidza zvakare magweta aChin’ono kutaura nevatori venhau pasina chikonzero. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti Chin’ono ava kutongwa nekuda kwebasa rake. Zvichakadai, mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Jeffrey Moyo, asungwa nemapurisa uye pari zvino ari mumaoko emapurisa paHarare Central Police Station. Moyo ari kubatsirwa nemagweta, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa naVaDougie Coltart, uye VaColart vaudza Studio7 kuti hazvisati zvajeka kuti Moyo asungirwei. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati tivabate mangwana panyaya iyi. Zvichakadai VaMoyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kusiya vatapi venhau vachishanda vakasununguka. Pataenda pamhepo Jeffrey Moyo ange achiri kukamba yemapurisa paHarare Central. No media source currently available

headline: Mari Yoshomeka Munyika Zvokatyamadza Nyanzvi Dzakawanda
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti nyika yananga kumawere uye zvinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika sezvo mari mumabhanga iri kuramba ichishaikwa kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakati Zimbabwe yainge yawana mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko remari asi vakawanda vanoti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuita manyama amire nerongo. Kunyange hazvo huremu hwemabond notes hwaderera, vemabhizimisi makuru vanoti vari kumanikidzwa kutengesa zvinhu nemutemo wakafanana pamabond notes nemadhora ekuAmerica. Mamwe mabhangi akaita seSteward Bank neStandard Bank ange achibvumidza kuti vanhu vatore mari pamaATM cards kana vari kunze kwenyika mumazuva mashoma apfuura, amira kuita izvi achiti mumabhanga hamuchina mari kunyange hazvo vanhu ava vakaisa mari dzavo mumabhanga acho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vemabhizimisi makuru ndivo vave kunyanya kuomerwa nezvinhu sezvo vachisungwa vakasatevera mitemo yeReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, avo vati havana zvavangaite kunze kwekutevedzera mutemo. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti mari mumabhanga hamuchina sezvo hurumende ichiramba ichikwereta mari kumabhanga isingadzosere. Nyaya yekushomeka kwemari iyi yakambopawo kuti mafuta ekubikisa ashaikwe munyika. Asi ikozvino mukuru wesangano reOil Expressers Association, VaBusisa Moyo, vanoti zvave nani. Ko dambudziko iri ringagadziriswe sei chaizvo? VaJokonya vanoti panoda kuti Zimbabwe ikwezve vemabhizimisi vekunze. VaChitambara vanotiwo aya ndiwo maonero avo. Nekuona kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvainge zvaenda kumawere, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakadoma gurukota idzva rezvemari, VaIgnatius Chombo, vachibvisa VaPatrick Chinamasa. Asi VaChitambara vanoti havaone VaChombo vachikwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kunetsana mubato reZanu-PF, uye sarudzo dziriko gore rinouya, zviri kupawo kuti zvinhu zvinetse kugadzirisa sezvo pasina ari kunyatsotarisa zvingabatsira nyika. Kudzamara vakuru muZanu PF nemuhurumende vaisa zvido zvenyika pamberi pezvido zvavo, matambudziko akadai acharamba achiwanda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vari kuMaruwa Vokurudzirwa Kuzvidzivirira kuCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo denda reCovid-19 richiri munyika vanhu vakawanda kumaruwa ekuMashonaland East anosanganisira Murehwa vari kufamba vasina kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi izvo zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano zvinogona kukonzora kuparararira kwechirwere ichi. Vanhu vakawanda vekumaruwa vanoona sekuti vanhu vemumadhorobha ndivo vanonyanyobatwa neCovid-19. VaIrimai Chakaza, avo vanogara kuMurehwa West, vanoti vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo yavo havakosheshi zvekupfeka mamasiki munguva ino yekurwisa chirwere che Covid-19. VaChakaza vanoti vanozviza kuti chirwere ichi chinouraya asi havasati vaona pachakauraya izvo vati zviri kukonzera veruzhinji kuti vasatora matanho anokurudzirwa kupararira kwacho. Mumwe mugari, VaTakunda Mabaya, vanoti hapana kurudziro yakanyanya iri kuitwa kumaruwa sezvinoitwa kumadhorobha. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zviri kuita kuti vasaite hany’a nekutora matanho ekuzvidzivirira. Asi vachitaura nevatsigiri vebato ravo muzvimbo iyi, murongi wemisangano muMDC Alliance, VaAmos Chibaya, vakayambira vagari ava kuti vakoshese zvavanoudzwa nenyanzvi pamusoro pechirwere ichi vachiti chinouraya. Imwe nhengo yerimwe sangano rinoshandira kumaruwa eChipinge neChimanimani, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti dambudziko rekusapfeka mamasiki ririko kwavanoshandira uye vanorwisana naro zuva nezuva. Vatiwo zvinoburitswa muongororo dziri kuitwa pamusoro pechirwere ichi zuva nezuva zvinoratiddza kuti chirwere ichi chakawandira kumaguta akaita seHarare neBulawayo izvo zvave kuita kuti vanhu varivare kumaruwa. Vaombove gurukota rezvehutano panguya yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Stduio7 kuti zviri kuitika kumaruwa zvine ngozi yakakura. Dr Madzorera vanoti dambudziko iri rinowanikwawo mumisha inogara veruzhinji mumaguta uye chirwere ichi chinogona kuputika zvakare kana vanhu vakarega kutevedza zvakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation pakudzivirira Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Tatarisa caf: Mapeza
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum, Norman Mapeza, anoti pachine basa guru kuti chikwata chake chibudirire kukunda mumutambo weCAF Champions League sezvo izvi zvichida makore akawanda ekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro.   Mashoko aMapeza anotevera kuhwinha kwakaita FC Platinum mukombe weCastle Premiership kechipiri mwaka uno zvichireva kuti kuti chikwata ichi ndicho chichange chichimirira Zimbabwe kuChampions League.   Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, iri kudzokera mumutambo uyu mugore rechipiri rakatevedzana asi mumakwishu egore rino haina kunyatsotamba zvakanaka sezvo yakaburitswa kumapreliminary round nePrimero de Agosto yekuAngola.   Nguva pfupi yadarika, mukushi wemashoko wechikwata ichi – Chido Chizondo – akati shuviro yavo kuve chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru muAfrica panyaya dzenhabvu uye kurongeka pazvese zvavanoita.   Mapeza – uyo achiri akagara mudenga rechinomwe zvichitevera kuhwina kwavakaita mukombe weCastle Premiership – anoti, “Dai pasina Mwari zvisina kumbogoneka, tinomutenda nekumutungamira kwaakatiita.”   Muchina wemajuzi, sezita remadunhurirwa raMapeza, anoti shuviro yechikwata chake kuti chihwine mitambo yese yachinokwikwidza muno kuti chigowana mukana wekumisidzana nezvikwata zvikuru zvemuAfrica.   “Isu chatinoda kuti tihwine mikombe yese inokwikwidzwa muno kuti tigowaniswa mukana wekukwikwidza muAfrica nekuti ndimo mune zvese, vatambi vedu vanokwanisa kuonekwa nezvimwe zvikwata uye zvinounza mari kuchikwata chedu,” anodaro Mapeza.   Kunyangwe hazvo Mapeza achiti anofara nekudzokera kwavari kuitwa kumutambo weChampions League, muchinda uyu anoti pachiri nendima refu inoda kusakurwa kuti FC Platinum ikwanise kuzohwinawo mutambo uyu.   “Hazvingoitike nyore, zvinoda makore akawanda muchitamba nhabvu yepamusoro muchivaka kuti mugoverengwa pane zvimwe zvikwata zvikuru zvemuAfrica,” anodaro.   Munhorowondo yake yekurairidza nhabvu, Mapeza akwanisa kuhwina mikombe mitatu yepremiership ari murairidzi – miviri yacho iyo yaahwina neFC Platinum kozoti umwe waakahwina neMonomotapa mugore ra2008.   Pavarairidzi vese vari kurairidza nhabvu muno parizvino, Mapeza ndiye zvakare ane mikombe yakawanda yePremier League achiteverawa naLloyd Chitembwe naJoey Antipas avo vakahwina kamwe chete nezvikwata zvavo zvinoti CAPS United uye neChicken Inn.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti achakwanisa kuita zvakaitwa naKalisto Pasuwa here paakahwinha mukombe wePremier League makore mana akatevedzana apo airairidza Dynamos, Mapeza anoti, “Isu tinongotenda Mwari nekuhwina kwatakaita chete.”

headline: Vadzidzi Gumi neVana Vosungwa Vachiratidzira paUniversity of Zimbabwe
text: Vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vanoti vacharamba vachienderera mberi nekuratidzira kunyangwe vamwe vavo gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro vachinyunyuta nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzedzidzo. Vachitaura neStudio 7, rimwe remagweta arikumiririra vadzidzi ava vaPaidamoyo Saurombe vanoshanda nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vati vadzidzi gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro havasati vaudzwa mhosva yavari kupomerwa VaSaurombe vanoti pavadzidzi vakasungwa apa pane vamwe vakakuvara. Studio 7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare vanomiririra vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vati mari dzechikoro dzirikudiwa dzinokatyamadza sezvo vazhinji vavo vasiri kukwanisa kuzounganidza mari dzirikudiwa idzi. Mutungamiriri we Student Representative Council yepaUZ vaAllan Chipoyi vanoti mari irikudiwa iyi ichasiya vana vevarombo vasingawani dzidzo University of Zimbabwe yakakwidza mari dzechikoro izvo zvichasiya vaibhadhara mari shoma pachikoro ichi vobhadhara mari inosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvishanu kana kuti 340 000 kubva pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvinomwe 55 000. Avo vanoda kuita zvidzidzo zveMasters varikutarisirwa kubhadhara mari inodarika miriyoni yemadhora emuno. Munyori mukuru muSRC , VaMunashe Cuthbert Masiyiwa vatsigirawo vachiti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti vadzidzi vazhinji vari pachikoro ichi vanobva kumhuri dzisingawani mari yakawanda. VaMasiyiwa vatiwo vanoda kuti mapurisa asungunure vadzidzi vakasungwa. Vadzidzi ava vanyorawo tsamba yenyunyuto iyo vanoti yasainwa nevadzidzi vanodarika zviuru zvishanu. Vati vachanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto iyi kudare reparamende, kubazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro pamwe nekuZimbabwe Human Rights Commission. Vadzidzi ava vanotiwo kana mari ikasadzikiswa vachange vachizoendawo kumatare. Muzvare Everjoy Chidindi vebato rinopikisa reLabour Economists and Afrikan Democrats vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti mari dzinodiwa nehurumende hadzienderani nemari irikutambiriswa veruzhinji. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira kana vakuru vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe. Asi vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter , munyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko vaNick Mangwana vanoti vasingakwanisi kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kumauniversity kune zvirongwa zvakadai sekubhadhara mari padiki padiki pamwe nekupiwa zvikwereti. Vatiwo pane varikuda kupinza zvematongerwo enyika munyaya dzekukwidza kwemari dzechikoro asi izvi zvarambwa nevamiririri vevadzidzi avo vatiwo hazviiti kuti vanzi vabhadhare mari iyi zvishoma zvishoma nekuti yakawandisa. Zvimwe zvikoro zvedzidzo yepamusoro zvakwidzawo mari zvakanyanya zvinosanganisira Masvingo Polytechnic iyo yakakwidza mari dzeNational Certificate kubva pazviuru makumi maviri nezvina zvemadhora emuno 24 000 kuenda pazviuru zana nezvishanu (105 000). Gweru Polytechnic neLupane State University ndovamwewo zvakare vakakwidza mari dzechikoro.

headline: Chirwere cheMapapu muVana Vadiki Chinonzi Chabata Guta reHarare
text: Bepanhau reHerald rinoti muHarare maita chirwere chemapapu chiri kubata vana vadiki, pachibudawo mashoko ekuti chipatara chevana vadiki chemunyika cheHarare Children's Hospital, icho chiri paHarare Central Hospital, chiri kukundikana kubatsira vana vose vari kuendeswa pachipatara ichi. Chipatara ichi chinonzi hachina michina inodiwa mukubatsira kuti vana ava vakwanise kufema. Bepanhau iri rinoti nezuro vana vanosvika zana nemakumi mana vaive vatambirwa pachipatara ichi vachinetsekana nechirwere ichi. Mazuva mashoma adarika, hurumende yakazivisawo kuti zvipatara zvayo hazvichina oxygen, izvo zvinonzi zvakaita kuti chipatara chevana cheHarare Children’s Hospital chimbovhara zvimwe zvikamu zvacho. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti kushaikwa kwe oxygen munyika kuchatowedzera dambudziko rechirwere chemapapu chanetsa muguta guru renyika ichi, zvichizoita kuti chirwere ichi chipararire kune mamwe matunhu. Doctor Nyamande vanoti chirwere chemapapu ichi chinonyanyobata vana vane makore mashanu zvichidzika, uye vanenge vachinetseka kufema. Vanoti vabereki vanokwanisa kudzivirira vana vavo kubva kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuita hutsanana, zvikuru pamweya wakavapoteredza. No media source currently available

headline: Jongwe oshuvira Boston Marathon
text: SHANGWITI yemujaho wemarathon wewiricheya iri kusimukira — Stellah Jongwe — anoshuvira kuenda kunokwikwidza kumujaho mukuru une mukurumbira weBoston Marathon uyo unoitirwa kunyika yeUnited States of America.   Mujaho uyu unoitwa gore rega-rega munaKubvumbi uye unomhanywa neshasha dzakawanda dzinobva kunyika dzakasiyana. Shangwiti dzemarathon pasi rese dzakatotanga kunyoresa kuti dzigoenda kunokwikwidza kumujaho uyu wegore rinotevera.   Murairidzi waJongwe, Wilson Nyakoko, anoti chikwata chavo chiri kushanda zvakasimba kuti chikwanise kutumira Jongwe kunokwikwidza kuBoston Marathon.   Anoti Jongwe ane tarenda rinonwisa mvura saka vanoda kumuona achikwikwidza mumujaho mukuru uyu uyo uchabatsira kuti zita rake risimukire pasi rese.   “Jongwe musikana ari kusimukira zvakanyanya munyaya dzekukwikwidza mumujaho wemarathon wewiricheya uye sechikwata tiri kutarisira zvikuru kubva kwaari.   “Mwedzi yadarika, akahwina menduru yegoridhe kuSouth Africa saka tine chivimbo chekuti tikamutumira kuBoston Marathon anonodzoka negoridhe zvekare.   “Iye zvino tiri kushanda siku nesikati tichimhanya-mhanya kuona kuti tawana vakotsveri vanotibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu naJongwe rufambe zvakanaka kuenda kuBoston. Saka tiri kufamba tichigogodza kwakasiyana,” anodaro Nyakoko.   Jongwe akabudirira kuenda kumujaho uyu, anobva aita mumwe wevashoma vakwanisa kuenda kumakwikwi aya ayo anopindwa neshasha dzinodarika 27 000 dzinobva kunyika dzakasiyana.   Gore rino, range riri raJongwe sezvo akakwanisa kuhwina mijaho inosanganisira weOteniqua Wheelchair Challenge unoitirwa kuGeorge kuSouth Africa, Tanganda Half Marathon neCBZ Half Marathon.

headline: Nhengo Pfumbamwe dzeWar Veterans Pressure Group Dzorara Dzakachengetedzwa kuHarare Central.
text: Sachigaro vesangano rakazvimirira rinomirira kodzero dzevaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko re War Veterans Pressure Group, Va Amos Sigauke, vanoti vari kushushikana nekusungwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzavo pfumbamwe nezuro uye dzichiri dzakachengetedzwa kuHarare Central pari zvino dzisina mhosva yadzapomerwa. VaSigauke vaudza Studio7 kuti nhengo dzavo idzi dzakange dzaenda kumahofisi ebazi rezve mari nezuro vachida kutaura nezve kusafara kwavo nemari dzavari kuphihwa pamwedzi wega wega dzavanoti ishoma sezvo dziri mumadhora emabhondi ayo asina huremu. VaSigauke vanoti nengo idzi dzakaenda kumahofisi uku neMuvhuro vakanzi vadzoke neChitatu asi pavakasvika pamahofisi aya nezuro vakabva vasungwa uye vachiri vakachengetedzwa pari zvino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa munyaya iyi. "Nhengo dzedu dzichiri dzakachengetedzwa kuHarare Central uye mapurisa ari kurama kuti tidzipe mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro izvo zviri kuti shungurudza zvikuru," vadaro VaSigauke. Vaenderera mberi vachiti nhengo dzavo dzange dzisati dzapomerwa mhosva uye dziri kutarisirwa kurara muchizarira dzozo miswa pamberi pedare mangwana.  "Tiri kushaya kuti mhosva yaparwa nenhengo dzedu ndeyeyi sezvo parizvino kodzero dzavo munyaya yezve hutano hwavo dziri kutyorwa nekuti hatisi kubvumidzwa kuvapa mishonga yavo. Vazhinji vane miviri inorwa kubva kune zvavakasangana nazvo kuhondo," VaSigauke vatsinhira. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Makarau Vobvuma Kuti Chirongwa cheBVR Chine Zvinetswa
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu vari kuvhota vange vakaatarisira sezvo chirongwa chavo chekunyoresa vavhoti chichiri kutanga. ZEC yakatanga kunyoresa vanhu kuvhota nemusi weMuvhuro kunyange hazvo vamwe vari kuchema chema kuti havana ruzivo rwakakwana nezvechirongwa ichi. Mimwe michina inonzi yange ichimboramba kushanda zvakanaka kumatunhu makumi matanhatu nematatu munyika yose. Amai Makarau vasimbisawo kuti vanhu vanokwanisa kunyoresa nezvitupa zvesimbi uye vanofanira kuuya netsamba dzinoratidza kwavanogara kuti vakwanise kukurumidza kunyoreswa. ZEC inoti inotarisira kuti muchina mumwe chete unge uchinyoresa vanhu makumi masere pazuva. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, Vanovhura ZITF Vachikurudzira Kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neNamibia
text: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, vanoti kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe munyaya dzemabhizimisi kwakaderera vachiti kudyidzana uku kunofanirwa kukwira. Vachivhura ZITF yegore rino zviri pamutemo, VaGeingob vati mugore rapfuura Namibia yakatenga kubva kuZimbabwe zvinhu zvemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana emadhora. Vati kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe uye pakati penyika dzemuAfrica kunofanirwa kukwira vachiti kuita izvi kunobatsirawo kusimudzira hupfumi henyika idzi. VaGeingob vati Namibia ichiri yakatarisana nedambudziko munyaya yekugovewa kweivhu vakati nyika yavo inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva mukugadziriswa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi muZimbabwe vachiti kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kunobatsira kurwisa hurombo hune veruzhinji. Vati hurmende yavo yakatanga chirongwa chavakati "Harambe" senzira yekurwisa hurombo uye kusimudzira hupenyu hweveruzhinji munyika mavo. VaGeingob vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kuita zvemabhizimisi vasina kungonangana nekuwana mari chete, asi kubatsirawo kurwisa hurombo. Vasati vatura mashoko avo, VaGeingob vamboshanyira nzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muZITF pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiona zviri kuratidzwa pachirongwa ichi. Nyika gumi neina chete ndidzo dzange dziine makambani adzo achiratidza zvigadzirwa paZITF yegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: VaMushowe Vanokundikana Zvakare Kumira Pamberi peKomiti yeParamende
text: Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChristopher Mushowe, neChina vatadza zvekare kuuya kukomiti yeparamende kuti vazotaura matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau pamwe nekusunungura masai sai ematerevhizheni. Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kubato rinopikisa pamwe nemasangano anomirira vatori venhau varatidza kutsamwa kukuru nenamaitiro aVaMushowe avo vakatadza kuuya kudare iri svondo rapera mushure mekunge vakokwa nekomiti yeparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, uye vachimirira Mabvuku, VaJames Maridadi veMDC-T, vati kuita kwaVaMushowe kuri kudzorera shure nyaya dzekugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau. Mukuru wesangano rinomiriria nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu, reZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, Muzvare Vivian Marara, vatiwo zvinoratidza kuti VaMushowe havana chido chekusandura mutemo yekutapwa kwenhau munyika. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni veMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe vashorawo kuita kwaVaMushowe. Vatiwo komiti yeparamende iyi haifaniri kurega VaMushowe vachiita madiro aJojina uye inofanira kutora matanho akaoma kuti VaMushowe vauye kudare iri. Vanoona nzvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano Media Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro aVaMushowe, vanoonawo sekuti komiti yeparamende iyi haisi kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Pavabvunzwa kuti vachaita sei naVaMushowe, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaWilliam Dhewa, vati VaMushowe vabatikana uye vanofanira kupihwa nguva. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMushowe kuti tinzwe kuti sei vari kutadza kuuya kuparamende. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kuunza mabhiri kuparamande kuti mitemo iri pasi pawo isaundurwe kuti ifambirane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, bazi raVaMushowe harina kana bhiri rarakaunza kudare kubva muna 2013 pakagadzwa bumbiro idzva. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwa kuti taura kuti mitemo yakaita seAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Broadcasting Services Act nemimwe ichasandurwa riini. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwawo kutsanangura kuti sei marezenezi eCapitalk neNyaminyami ayo akapihwa kukambani yeKingstons ave kushandiswa nekambani yeZimpapers. Masangano anomiriria vatori venhau azivisa kuti achaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti aronge kuti angaite sei naVaMushowe. Zvichakadai, komiti iyi svondo rinouya ichashanyira nhepfenyuro dzose ichiona kuti dziri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: VaPromise Mkwananzi veTajamuka Vogariswa Mujeri
text: Mutauriri weTajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi avo vakazvipira kumapurisa nemusi weChishanu vave kugara mutirongo mushure mekunge mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare ati haasi kunzwa zvakanaka akati nyaya iyi izonzwikwa neMuvhuro. VaMkwananzi vakaenda kunozvipira kumapurisa negweta ravo VaTrust Maanda vanova nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR. Rimwe rinova nhengo yeZLHR, VaJerremiah Bamu vakaudza Studio 7 kuti pavakaenda kumapurisa ekuHarare Central neimwe nyaya yavanhu vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwemusi weChitatu, vakaudzwa kuti mapurisa ari kutsvaga VaMkwananzi uye Pastor Evan Mawarire veHash Tag This Flag. Mapurisa ainge ambobvunzurudzawo VaStern Zvorwadza avo vari kutungamirawo kuratidzira munyika. VaMkwananzi vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vakazvipira kuenda kumapursa nekuti kuratidzira kwavari kuita kunotenderwa nebumbiro remutemo. Pastor Mawarire vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti pane vanhu vari kuvafonera vachiva tyisidzira uye kuvatevera nekuuya kuhofisi yavo. Mapuria akasunga vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu uye ari kutsvaga kusunga vamwe nekuyedza kudzisiva kumwe kuratidzira kwadaidzirwa nemusi weChitatu nemusi wechina svondo rinouya. Vari kuratidziora vanoda kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaferefete vari kuita zvehuori zvikuru makurukota avo, kutambirisa vashandi vehurumende mari dzavo dzemihoro nenguva uye kubvisa mutemo uri kurambidza kupinda kwezvinhu munyika zvakaita sezvekuduya zviri kutengeswa nevanhu kuti vararame. Vamwe vari kutiwo VaMugabe ngavasiye basa nekuti vakundikana. Asi VaMugabe nemusi weChishanu vakave nemukana wekutaura nezvezvichemo izvi apo vakaita musangano kunhandare yeChipadze kuBindura asi vakangoti zvinhu zvaoma nekuti Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango nevekunze.

headline: Vadzidzi Vakawanda Vovhiringirwa Dzidzo neCoronavirus muZimbabwe
text:
Vamwe vabereki vane vana vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzakakosha
gore rino vanoti vari kutyira kuti vana vavo vacharasikirwa nenguva
yakakosha yekudzidza nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanwe vadzidzi vari kuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo nerekuti havana mari yekuti vaite zvidzidzo zvavo zvepaiundaneti sezviri kukurudzirwa nehurumende.

Vamwe vabereki vataura neStudio7 vati hurumende inofanirwa kubuda
pachena panyaya yekuti dzidzo yevana vekuprimary nesecondary
ichaenderera mberi sei uye kuti vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo vachaita
sei.

Mumwe mubereki ane mwana ari kufanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade7 gore rino, Amai Rudo Makamure, vati vanofunga kuti dai bvumzo dzaendeswa mberi.

Muzvare Tafadzwa Musika avo vanochengeta vana vemukoma wavo vari
muGrade 7 neForm 4, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vana vachigona kuverenga vari kumba, maverengero aya anosiyana nepavanenge vari kuchikoro. Vati dai bvunzo, kunyanya dzemuna Chikumi dzaendeswa mberi kuitira kuti vadzidzi vawane nguva yekugadzirira yakakwana.

Zvimwe zvikoro zviri kukurudzira kuti vabereki vatengere vana vavo nharembozha kana makombiyuta kuitira kuti vakwanise kudzidza vari kumba vachishandisa indaneti.

Mumwe mubereki, Amai Oster Magqoka, vati havazi vose vabereki
vanokwanisa kuwana mari yekutenga zvinhu zvakadai, uye kubhadhara mari
inodiwa pakushandisa indaneti. Amai Magqoka vatiti hurumende inofanirwa kupindira ichitaura pachena kuti nderipi gwara rinofanirwa kutorwa panyaya iyi.

Murongi wemabasa mumubatanidzwa weNational Association of School
Development Associations and Committees, NASDAC, VaBanny Manokora, vati hurumende inofanirwa kuenzanisa kukosha kwehupenyu hwevana uye kukoshakwedzidzo.

Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vatiwo hurumende haifanirwe kuda kumhanyira kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe kana chirwere chichiri kutekeshera. VaZhou vati pane vadzidzisi vari kudzidzisa vana nenzira dzakadai seWhatsApp vakati zvakakosha kuti hurumende itsigire nekuvandudza hurongwa uhu.

Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema,
panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Asi VaMathema vanogara havo vakaudza Studio7 kuti havafi vakataura nayo nepamusana pezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa hurumende yavo neAmerica. Asi vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti ndeapi matanho ari kutorwa mune zvedzidzo kwakatariswa chirwere cheCoronavirus, munyori mubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati hurumende iri kugadzira hurongwa hwakazara hwekuona kuti dzidzo ingaenderere mberi sei. VaMangwana vabvuma kuti vadzidzi vakawanda, kusanganisira vekumaruwa, havakwanise kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti vakati hurumende ichabudisa hurongwa hwainahwo panyaya iyi uyewo pakuti zvikoro zvichavhurwa riinhi.

Zvichakadaro, vamwe vaddzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo
nerekuti havazi kukwanisa kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti nekuda
kwekudhura kunoita nzira iyi.

Mumwe mudzidzi uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Tafadzwa ati vabereki
vakawanda havakwanise kubhadharira vana vavo mari yeindaneti nekuda
kwekuoma kwakaita zvinhu munyaya ndzemari munyika.

Mumwezve mudzidzi, Tabeth Magigwana, ati dai vemakambani enharembozha neindaneti achipa vadzidzi mutengo wepasi.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vari
muongorori akazvimirira ega, VaFelix Chari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
kushandiswa kweindaneti mukuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro hakusati
kwasvika padanho rakakura muZimbabwe nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana-siyana.

Pari zvino zvikoro zvepamusoro zvemunyika zvakavharwawo senzira
yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus icho
chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira vanhu vana vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Ndamirira: Manyuchi
text: Ndooka   SHASHA yetsiva, Charles manyuchi, anoti ari kugadzirira kusangana naMuhamad Sebyala wekuUganda munaNyamavhuvhu apo vacharwira bhande reWorld Boxing Federation uye reWorld Africa Boxing Association Supreme Middleweight.   Vaviri ava vaifanirwa kusangana munaChivabvu asi mutambo wavo wakakanzurwa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Manyuchi anoti chikwata chake chakakumbira kuHurumende kuti mutambo uyu uitwe ndokutenderwa saka chasara ndechekuti Sebyala atenderwe nenyika yake kuti auye kuZimbabwe kuzosangana naye.   “Takapihwa mvumo yekuti mutambo wedu uenderere mberi saka tamirira kunzwa kunyika yaSebyala kuti vanomutendera here kuuya kuno, kana akanzi auye anosvika otombotanga agara mu’quarantine’ kwemasvondo maviri ari muno,” anodaro.   Mutambo wevaviri ava ukabudirira unogona kutambwa munhandare isina vatsigiri sezvo mutemo usiri kutendera kuungana kwevanhu pari zvino.   “Zvevatsigiri pari zvino hazvina basa, chinongodiwa chete kuti iye Sebyala auye topedzerana tiri vaviri. Ndiye wandiri kuda uye pakati pedu tinofanira kurakidzana mukuru.   “Ini ndinenge ndiri munyika yangu uye handifanire kushoresa nyika saka ndiri kushanda nesimba kuti ndimubike zvakasimba,” anodaro Manyuchi.

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kubatsira Vakaremara kuMasvingo
text: Apo hurumende yakawedzerazve mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kana kuti lockdown, kuitira kurwisa kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19, vamwe vakaremara mudunhu reMasvingo vave kuchema chema kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevakarema vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kunonga svosve nemuromo munguva ino yelockdown sezvo dzisisina kana nzira dzekutsvaga raramo dziri mudzimba. Vakawanda vakaremara ava vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa uye nekupemha asi nenyaya yekunzi vagare mudzimba havachakwanisi kuita izvi nekudaro mari yekutenga chikafu yakapera kare. VaHenry Chivhanga, veSangano reDisability Amalgamated Community Trust(DACT) vanoti nenyaya yekushaikwa kwechikafu kune vakaremara, kodzero dzavo dziri kumbunyikidzwa. Vamwe vakaremara ava vanoti vari kusanganawo nemamwe matambudziko akaita sekushaiwa mvura munguva ino, iyo inouya kwenguva pfupi pfupi mudzimba dzavo. Muzvare Nyaradzo Mutande, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reInstitute of Community Development Trust, vanoti vakaremara nevanovabatsira vari kushaya zvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwee checoronavirus. Vamwe vemasangano aya vanoti rubatsiro ruri kupuwa vamwe nehurumende harusati rwasvika mudunhu reMasvingo nekudaro vari panguva yakaoma. Hurumende yakavimbisa kupa vanhu rubatsiro rwemari inosvika mazana matatu emadhora emabond pamwedzi asi haisati yauya. Gurukota rinoona nezvemagariro akanaka evanhu Muzvinafundo, Paul Mavhima, avo vanga vari mumusangano pavabatwa ne Studio 7 vati vari kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino uye hurongwa uhu hwagara huripo. Mutauriri we Covid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRogers Irimayi, vatsigira Muzvinafundo Mavhima, vachiti komiti yavo iri kushanda nebazi iri kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino. Asi, Pastor Cover Mugwadi, vesangano, reZimbabwe Disability Advocacy, Empowerment, Rehabilitation and Technology, vanoti hurumende haisi kutaura chokwadi nekuti hapana chavarikuwana mudunhu reMasvingo. Vamwe vazhinji vevakaremara vanoti vari kushushikana kuwana matsamba ekuti vakwanise kufamba kuti vaitewo mabasa vawane chekudya sezvo hurumende yave kutendera vanhu kuti vaitewo mamwe mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: America Yovhota Musarudzo dza2020
text: Mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni evanhu ari kuvhota musarudzo dzemuAmerica dzemutungamiri wenyika, pamwe nedzenhengo dzeparamende.
