Asi maziso evakawanda akatarisira zvichabuta pakati pemumiriri weRepublican Party musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump pamwe nemumiriri weDemocratic Party musarudzo iyi, VaJoe Biden. Nzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzavhurwa mangwanani mumatunhu ose emuAmerica.  VaBiden vatanga zuva ravo nekupinda muchechi mudunhu ravo reDelaware uye vazopinda munzvimbo mbiri dziri mudunhu re Pennsylvania vachiona vanhu vari kuvhota, vasati vadzokera kudunhu ravo reDelaware. VaTrump, avo vanova mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, vatanga hurongwa hwavo nekutaura pachirongwa che Fox & Friends vachiti vachazivisa veruzhinji kana vachinge vakunda musarudzo.  Va Trump vashanyira muzinda wavo wesarudzo uri kunze kweguta reWashington, ndokubva vazodzokera kumba kwavo kumuzinda wemutungamiri weAmerica, we White House. VaBiden vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa masangano enhau kuti vawana mavhoti anoita kuti vave mutungamiri wenyika. Sarudzo dzemuAmerica dziri kuitika panguva iyo nyika iyi yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere che Covid-19, icho chauraya vanhu banodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nechimwe, kana kuti vanodarika 231,000. Zvisineyi nedenda iri, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu vari kutarisirwa kuvhota musarudzo yegore rino. Asi zvichabuda musarudzo idzi zvichaburitswa pachitevedza mitemo yematunhu akasiyana siyana. Matunhu achatanga kuzivisa zvabuda musarudzo anosanganisira Florida, Georgia, Maryland, Pennsylvania, Delaware, Virginia, New York, Connecticut nemamwe. Kuti munhu adomwe semutungamiri wenyika akunda musarudzo, anofanirwa kunge awana mavhoti eElectoral College anodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe.

headline: VaAcie Lumumba Voparura Bato rezveMatongerwo eNyika
text: Vaimbova nhengo yeZanu-PF VaAcie Lumumba vaparura bato ravo rinonzi VIVA party muHarare nemusi weChina. VaLumumba avo vati ndivo sachigaro webato iri vanonzi vange vachitukurira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaZhuwawo vakabuda mubato reZanu-PF mushure mekunge vanetsana negurukota rezvekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema VaPatrick Zhuwao. VaZhuwao vainge vasarudza VaLumumba kuita sachigaro weZimbabwe Youth Empowerment Council asi vakazovadzinga izvo zvakapa kuti vaviri ava vakandirane makobvu nematete. VaLumumba vanonzi vane makore makumi maviri nemanomwe ekuberekwa uye pasi pebumbiro remutemo havakwanise kupinda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika sezvo zvichida munhu ane makore makumi mana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzataura neStudio 7 dzati zvinonetsa kuti VaLumumba vaite mutsindo mushure mekubatwa mumambure enyaya dzehuori uye kufumurwa apo vakaburitsirwa vhidhiyo vachiita zvepabonde nemumwe musikana.

headline: Inflation Yokwira Zvisati Zvamboonekwa Mumakore Gumi Apfuura
text: Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats inoti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20, 85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu kukwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa Dzinonyorerana Zvibvumirano Munyaya dzezveUpfumi
text: Zimbabwe neSouth Africa nemusi weChina dzanyorerana zvibvumirano zvakawanda zvakanangana nekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika mbiri idzi. Nyika mbiri idzi dzanyoreranawo chibvumirano chezvemuchadenga chichaita kuti ndege dzekuSouth Africa dzakawanda dzikwanise kumhara muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinotevera musangano waitwa pakati pemakurukota emapazi akasiyana-siyana ehurumende idzi wanga uchidaidzwa kuti bi-national commission unove wekutanga wakadai kuitwa nenyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakurudzira vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti vauye kuzosima mari dzavo muZimbabwe vachiti mabhizimusi avo haana chinoawana. "Ndinoda kusimbaradza vemabhizimusi vekuSouth Africa kuti mabhizimusi avo akachengetedzeka muno uye tinodawo kuona vemabhizimusi vemuZimbabwe vachivhurawo mabhizimusi avo kuSouth Africa," VaMugabe vadaro. Mashoko aVaMugabe aya anouyawo apa vekunze vazhinji vari kubatwa nenhetemwa panyaya yekusima mari yavo muno pamusana pemutemo wakaiswa nehurumende wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. Kunyange hazvo VaMugabe vasina chavataura pamusoro pekutya kuri kuita vekunze vakawanda kusima mari yavo muZimbabwe, vati chirongwa chekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema chazvara anamuzvinabhizimusi vatsva vanogona kuita kuti hupfumi hweZimbabwe neSouth Africa husimukire. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaJacob Zuma, vakurudzira kuti pawumbwe hwaro hunoita kuti vemabhizimusi vakwanise kushanda zvakanaka. "Patinoita izvi tinofanira kutarisa nyaya yekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi. Nokudaro tinofanira kuona kuti vemabhizimusi havana zvibingamupinyi zvavanosangana nazvo mukuita mabhizimusi avo. Tinofanirawo kuona kuti pavakwa muganhu mumwe chete pakati penyika dzedu kuitira kuti vanhu vafambe vakasununguka," VaZuma vadarowo. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rinowona nezve kunze kwenyika, VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi vati zvimwe zvibvumirano pakati penyika mbiri idzi zvichiri pakati pekuzeyewa uye zvichasainwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaMbengegwi vati nhaurirano dziri kuitwa dzakanangana nekuchengetedzeka hukama kwenyika mbiri idzi, zvekushanyirwa kwenyika nezvimwe zvakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Nhomba yeCovid-19 Iri Kubva kuChina Ichapihwa Vanhu Isina Kuongororwa muZimbabwe
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti mushonga wekudzivirira Covid-19 uyo uri kutanga kusvika nemusi weMuvhuru ichibva China, unofanira kutevedza gwara rinoshandiswa pamishonga yese inopinda munyika rekuti unotanga waongoororwa kuti unoshanda sei muZimbabwe zvichienderana nemhando yehutachiwana huri muno usati wapihwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti mushonga usati watengwa, Zimbabwe, kuburikidza nebazi rehutano, inotanga yaongorora kuti mushonga uyu wakagadzirwa sei kunyika kwaunobva, uye kuti zvawakashatira ndezvipi veruzhinji vasati vapihwa mushonga uyu. Vati panopinda mushonga uyu munyika, unofanira kutanga waongororwa sezvo wakagadzirwa kudunhu repasi rino rakasiyana neZimbabwe. VaMadzorera vati ongororo iyi inogona kuitwa mukati meguva pfupi sezvo denda reCovid-19 riri kupararira nekusaika. VaMadzorera vati pari zvino havana ruzivo kuti izvi zvakaitwa here kana kuti kwete sezvo hurumende isiri kubuda pachena nehurongwa hwayo. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Peter Mataruse, vatiwo tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe, ichaongorora mishonga yeCovid-19 sezvainoita pamishonga yese inopinda munyika sezvinodiwa nemitemo yakaita kuti bazi iri riumbwe munyika. Vati ongororo idzi dzinogona kuitwa kunyange hazvo mushonga watove munyika. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatsinhira mashoko emamwe machiremba, vachiti paramende inotarisira kuti bazi rehutano richavapakurira zvizere nemusi weChipiri pavanotanga kugara dare reNational Assembly. Mukuru weMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, VaRichard Rukwata, vatiwo vakapa hurumende mvumo yekuunza mishonga yeCovid-19 munyika mushure mekunge yatevedza zvese zvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yenyika. Pasi pechibvumirano cheZimbabwe Covid-19 National Development and Vacccination Strategy, Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe inopa mvumo yekuunza nekushandisa mishonga iyi mukati memazuva mashanu ichinge yapihwa humbowo hunoratidza kuti mishonga iyi yakanyoreswa munyika dzayakagadzirwa, uye kuti yakanyoreswawo nesangano reWorld Health Organisation here kana kuti kwete. Vati panofanirawo kuitwa ongororo yekuona kuti mishonga iyi haikanganise here vanhu munyika yose. Vati kunyange hazvo ongororo dzakadai dzichikwanisa kutora nguva yakareba, dzinokwanisa kuitwa mukati memazuva manomwe sezvo mishonga iyi iri kushandiswa zvechimbichimbi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati hurumende yakatevedza zvese zvinodiwa uye vari kutevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi pamatanho ese avari kutora. Gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vati zvinhu zose zviri mugwara uye mushonga uri kusvika munyika, uchabva wapihwa vanhu vari muchikamu chekutanga kuwana nhomba iyi. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira vana chiremba, vakoti, vashandi vemuzvipatara nevose vanoita mabasa anonzi akakosha zvikuru. Izvi zvinoburitsa pachena kuti hurumende haina hurongwa hwekutanga yaongorora nhomba iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Mutangamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanotarisira kugamuchira mishonga yeSinopharm inosvika mazana maviri ezviuru nemusi weMuvhuro painosvika munyika ichibva kuChina. No media source currently available

headline: ‘UPENYU PAMBERI, BHORA MUSHURE’
text: MUTAMBI weZimbabwe Warriors nechikwata cheStade de Reims chekuFrance, Marshall Munetsi, anoti panguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chatekeshera pasi rose, upenyu hwevanhu hunofanirwa kukosheswa kudarika mutambo wenhabvu.   Achitaura svondo rino ari kuFrance uko anotambira achitambira nhabvu yake, Munetsi anoti kumiswa kwakaita mitambo yenhabvu kunyika iyi pamwe nepasi rose kwakakosha sezvo matanho akatorwa aya ari kubatsira kurwisa kupararira kwecoronavirus.   “Ini semutambi wenhabvu, mutambo uyu hauna kunyanya kukosha kukunda upenyu hwevanhu. Ndinotsigira kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yenhabvu sezvo uku kuri kubatsira kurwisa kupararira kwecoronavirus.   Kana chirwere ichi chapera hacho, tochidzokera kunotamba hedu nhabvu.   “Zvose ngatingozviisai mumaoko aMwari, zvichadarika hazvo todzokera kuupenyu hwedu hwemazuva ose,” anodaro.   Munetsi akatanga kutambira chikwata cheStade de Reims mwaka uno achibva kuchikwata cheOrlando Pirates chekuSouth Africa.   Kusvika pazomiswa mitambo yose, Munetsi ange achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kuStade de Reims izvo zvakambomuona achimaka shasha Neymar Jnr mune umwe mutambo wechikwata chake necheParis St Germain (PSG) uyo chikwata chaje chakahwina 2-0. Mumutambo uyu, Munetsi akarumbidzwa zvikuru sezvo PSG ichizivikanwa pasi rose nevatambi vanoita “kuruka” bhora vachisanganisira iye Neymar Jnr, Kylian Mbappe, Edinson Cavani asi musi uyu shasha idzi dzakashaiswa mukana.   Munetsi anoti agere zvakanaka kuchikwata chaari kutambira cheReims achiti kana mumwe mukana wekuenda kune chimwe chikwata ukaiuya, achatarisa zvinomunakira.   “Ndiri kugutsikana nepandiri iye zvino, asi ndinoda kusvika kumusoro-soro nenhabvu. Ndichatungamirirwa naMwari murwendo rwangu uye kwose kwandinoenda ndiye anoziva kwandichasvika.   “Ingori nyaya yekuona zuva nezuva kuti zvinenge zvichifamba sei. Kana mukana wauya ndinoushandisa ndofambira mberi nemutambo,” anodaro Munetsi.   Nemusi weChipiri svondo rino, vanhu 18 vange vabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 muZimbabwe apo vatatu vacho vakatoshaya.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushaikwa kweMagetsi Pave neKutyira Kuti Mitengo yeZvigadzirwa zveMunyika iChakwira
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, vashandi, vashandirwi pamwe nevezvitoro vari kuyambira kuti kana dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemagetsi rakatarisana nenyika rakasagadziriswa nekukurumidza richakonzera matambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvigadzirwa zvemunyika, izvo zvichazoomesera veruzhinji. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandirwi, reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, VaKurai Matsheza, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemagetsi munyika riri kuvabata zvakanyanya zvekuti vanga vakatarisira kuti hurumende neZESA vachakasika kurigadzirisa. VaMatsheza vanoti nekuda kwedambudziko iri, vemakambani vave kumanikidzwa kutsvaga nzira dzekuti varambe vachigadzira zvigadzirwa zvavo dzinosanganisira kushanda usiku nemukupera kwesvondo panenge pauya magetsi. VaMatsheza vanoti vemakambani vanenge vachikwanisa ndivo vari kuisawo magwetsi anoshanda nezuva kana kushandisa majenareta, zvinhu zvavanoti zvinenge zvave kuvadhurira, zvinozoita kuti vasiire mutoro uyu kuvatengi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti kushandiswa kwemajenareta nevemakambani kunowedzera mutengo wezvinhu, izvo zvinozodhurisirwa vatengi. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti hurumende pamwe nekambani yeZESA havasi kukoshesa zvine basa zvekuwanisa nyika magetsi. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa magwenya emarasha mumaguta ose kuitira kuti zvinhu zviitire nyore vashandi nevashandirwi. Saka dambudziko iri ringagadziriswa sei? VaKuchera vanotiwo zvinotoda kuti nyika itange kugadzira magetsi akawanda vachiti kuKariba nekuHwange hakusi kubva magetsi akawanda uye ekutengawo acho mashoma. Vanoti panenge pachitoda hurongwa hwekuti pabikwe magetsi akawanda pachishandiswa zuva, mvura, uye marasha, vachiti munyika zuva rakawanda kwazvo zvekuti magetsi anokwanisa kugadzirika nyore. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, kuti tinzwe kana paine matanho avari kutora sehurumende asi nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Dambudziko rekudzimwadzimwa kwemagetsi rinonzi riri kukonzerwa nekuderera zvakanyanya kwaita mvura mudhamu reKariba uko kunogaiwa magetsi. Zvinonziwo hurongwa hwekuti nyika itenge magetsi kuSouth Africa huri kuvhiringidzwa nekuti kambani yemagetsi munyika iyi yeEskom ine matambudziko ayowo, uyewo Zimbabwe inonzi haina nhoroondo yakanaka pakubhadhara magetsi kumakambani ekunze anomboibatsira. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vari kukurudzira kuti hurumende ivake magwenya emoto wezuva akawanda, vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti izvi zvinokanganiswa nehuwori sezvakaonekwa mune mamwe makambani akambopiwa basa iri nehurumende mumashure ayo akakundikana kupedza basa iri. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzezveMatongerwo eNyika Dzinoti VaMnangagwa Vanogona Kudzingwa muZanu-PF
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vanoonekwa sevane mukana wekutora matomu ekutungamira bato reZanu PF kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, vanogona kudzingwa kubva mubato iri sezvakaitika kuna Amai Joice Mujuru. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo hazvisi pachena kuti ndiyani achatora masimba mubato iri. Zvichitevera kudzingwa kwevaiva mutevedzeri waVaMugabe mubato nemuhurumende, Amai Joice Mujuru, vamwe vakuru vakuru mubato reZanu PF kusanganisira mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakatanga kutaura mashoko ekushora nekuderedzera VaMnangagwa pasi. VaMnangagwa avo vanonzi vanotungamira chikwata cheTeam Lacoste vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuda kutora masimba kubva kunaVaMugabe vachiita zvekukambira. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti hapana chitsva pane zviri kuitika kuna VaMnangagwa vachiti itsika yaVaMugabe yekutuma vamwe mubato ravo kushungurudza pamwe nekunyomba avo vanofunga kuti vanenge vave nesimba. VaVivid Gwede avo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chitsva pane zviri kuitika kuna VaMnangagwa. VaGwede vakaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMugabe vari kurwisanisa chikwata chaVaMnangagwa necheG40 senzira yekuramba vari pachigaro dzamara vapinda muguva. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vanoti hapana chingatadzise VaMugabe kutandanisa VaMnangagwa mubato sezvo vakabvira kuita izvi kare. VaRuhanya vanoti pane vamwe vakuru vakaita sanaVa Edgar Tekere vakatombotandaniswa mubato iri. Kunyange hazvo vachibvuma kuti VaMnangagwa vanogona kudzingwa mubato, mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vanoti hazvisi nyore kuvadzinga panguva ino zvikuru sei nyika yatarisana nesarudzo. Mashoko aVaMudzengi anooenderanawo nemashoko akataurwa kubepanhau reThe Standard apo vakati VaMnagagwa vanerutsigiro rwakasimba kubva kuvakuru vechiuto nevakarwa hondo yerusununguko zvinopa kuti tsoro yekuvabvisa inetse kuronga. Nyanzvi idzi dzino bvumirana kuti vanhu vangangotaura kuti VaMnangagwa kana ani ane mukana wekutora matomu kubva kuna VaMugabe asi hazvisi nyore. VaMudzengi vanotiwo hazvina kujekawo mubato iri kuti kunyange VaMnangagwa vakadzingwa mubato ndiyani achatora matomu. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona sekuti kudzingwa kwaMai Mujuru pamwe nezviri kuitika kunaVaMnangagwa zvine chekuita nemudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Vanoti vanoona sekuti Amai ava vave kuda chigaro chepamusoro. Asi vatsigiri vaAmai Mugabe vakaita segurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland Amai Mandi Chimene vanoti Amai Mugabe havana chido chekutungamira nyika. VaRuhanya vanoti kunyange hazvo Amai Mugabe vaine simba pari zvino nekuda kwekuti murume wavo achipo simba iri rinopera musi unofa VaMugabe. Nyanzvi idzi dzakaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana kana mumwe muZanu PF anokwanisa kupikisa VaMugabe uye zvese zviri kuitika kunaVaMnangagwa zviri kuitwa nekuti VaMugabe vanozvifarira. Dzakatiwo kana ivo VaMnangagwa pachavo vanozviziva kuti vanogona kudzingwa mubato iri sezvo vakashandiswa kana kuona vamwe vakuru vakuru mubato iri vachidzingwa naVaMugabe. Bumbiro remutemo wenyika rinoti kana mutungamiriri wenyika akafa kana kusiya basa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana, mutevedzeri anenge apedzesera kubata chinzvimbo chemutungamiriri wenyika ndiye anobva atungamira hurumende kwemwedzi mitatu kupa bato mukana wekudoma munhu anozopedzesa nguva yemutungamiriri anenge afa. Bumbiro reZanu PF rinoti kana izvi zvikaitika panoitwa musangano wekongiresi wechimbi chimbi unozodoma anotungamira bato. No media source currently available

headline: MaChevrons osangana neIreland
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chichatanga goredzva ra2023 nekusangana neIreland mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeTwenty20 International Games (T20).   Zvichitevera kudzoka kwakaita maChevrons kubva kuAustralia nguva yadarika kuWorld Cup uko akadadisa nekusvika kuSuper 12, uyu ndiwo uchaita mutambo wavo wekutanga gore rinotevera.   Zimbabwe Cricket yakazivisa kuti mitambo yemaChevrons neIreland yese yeODI neT20 ichatambirwa kunhandare yeHarare Sports Club.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichitanga kubandana mumitambo yeT20 mazuva anoti 12, 14 na15 Ndira. Mitambo yeT20 painongopera, yeODI inobva yatanga uye ichatambwa nemusi wa18, 20 na23 Ndira.   Chikwata chaDave Houghton ichi chiri kutarisira kutanga goredzva nekuhwina mutambo uyu sezvo kubva pakadzoka murairidzi uyu, chakatanga kutamba cricket inonwisa mvura.

headline: Vanhu Mamiriyoni Matatu Vofa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
text: Pasi rose, huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwadarika mamiriyoni matatu. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi inoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika zana nemakumi mana nezviuru mazana masere zvemamiriyoni kana kuti, 140, 800 million. MuAfrica mune vadarika mamiriyoni mana vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vapora pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere kana kuti 80, million. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weMugovera kuti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuManicaland zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparaira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nevaviri kana kuti 1, 552. Vanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 165 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera zvasiya huwandu hwevabatwa nacho hwave pazviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 37, 699. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana kana kuti 24 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ich zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu nevashanu kana kuti 35, 005. Vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga vave zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 276, 095. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa nenyanzvi vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu zvine mazana masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 35, 806. Zvichakadaro bazi rezvedzidzo raburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau richiti rave kusimbaradza zvirongwa zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vati zvakakosha kuti paitwe mushandirapamwe pakati pevabereki, varairidzi uye vadzidzi uye bazi rezvedzidzo richange roshanda nebazi rezvehutano kuona kuti patevedzerwa zviri kukurudzirwa kuti chirwere chisapararire. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano riri kuyambira kuti zvikoro zvisingatevedzere mitemo iyi zvinogona kuvharwa. Munyori mukuru musangano werimwe sangano rinomiririra vararaidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ VaRobson Chere vanoti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kuwanisira zvikoro zvikwanisiro zvekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Madomerwo Anoitwa Magamba muZimbabwe Osimudza Zvakare Mutauro
text: Zvichitevera kuziviswa nehurumende kuti yapa vaimbove gurukota reZimbabwe rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, chiremekedzo chehugamba, vazhinji vari vashora masarudzirwo anoitwa magamba munyika. Mugwaro rakanyorwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, rikaendeswa kumhuri ya VaMoyo neChitatu manheru negurukota rekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, hurumende yakati VaMoyo igamba renyika. VaMoyo vakashaya nemusi weChitatu nechirwere che Covid-19, kunyange hazvo hutano hwavo hwange huchivanetsa nguva nenguva. PaTwitter, vanhu vari kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vamwe vachiti magamba mazhinji akachengetwa paHero’s Acre haana kodzero yekuva magamba sezvo pasina zvavakaita zvinobatsira vanhu. Vamwe vanovarumbidza vachiti VaMoyo vane kodzero iyi, vazhinji vachiyeuka mashoko avo paZBC TV vachiudza vanhu munyika kuti musi wa Mbudzi 15, 2017 mauto akange apindira mune zvwmatongerwo enyika aine chinangwa chekubvisa matsotsi akakomberedza vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Vamwe vakapinda chikoro paManama High School naVaMoyo vanovarumbidza zvikuru vachitaura nhorooondo dzaVaMoyo dzekuhondo. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vachiti VaMoyo vane kodzera yekupiwa chiremekedzo chegamba renyika, vamwewo vanoti VaMoyo havana chikuru chavakaita kuhondo kana munyika chinokonzera kuti vapiwe chiremekedzo ichi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti panofanirwa kuve nekomishini kana sangano rakazvimirira rinoona nezvekupihwa hugamba kwevanhu veZimbabwe, asi richibatsirwa nevanhu vemunyika, kwete kuti bato rimwe chete rezvematongerwo enyika riudze nyika yose kuti nhingi nanhingi igamba renyika asi pasina zvinozivikanwa zvakaitwa nemunhu uyu kunze kwekuti ange ari webato reZanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotsika Madziro PaNyaya yeKumisa Zvimwe Zvinogadzirwa Kunze Kuti Zvisapinde muNyika
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemaindustry VaMike Bimha vanoti kutanga muna Chikunguru, ZIMRA inenge yotevedzera mutemo wakadzikwa hwekumiswa kwekupinda kwezvimwe zvinhu munyika nevanhu vasina marezinesi. Hurumende yakaparura mutemo unonzi Statutory Instrument Number 64 uyo uchapa kuti zvinhu zvakatarwa mumutemo uyu zvisabvumidzwe kupinda munyika. Zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisa masalad creams, mukaka, mafuta ekubikisa, zvekuvakiusa, mafotereza, matayi edzimotokari, cheese nezvimwe. VaBimha vanoti masangano akaita saana Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce ndiwo akakumbira kuti vambomisa kupinda kwezvinhu izvi munyika. Vanotiwo hurumende inokwanika kuwana mari yemitero yakawanda kana vemunyika vakwanisa kugadzira zvinhu zvakawanda. Vatiwo izvi zvinopa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana mabasa. Hurumende mavhiki apera yakamboyedza kurambidza zvinhu munyika asi pakaita mhirizhonga pabhodha reBeitbridge vangu vachiramba kutambira hurongwa uhu. Asi rwendo rwuno hurumende inonzi ichaendesa mapurisa akawanda mumabhazi nekusunga vemabhazi vanenge vabatsira kupinza zvinhu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVaimbove Varwiri veHondo yeRusununguko Ropatsanuka?
text: Chimwe chikamu cheZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association mudunhu reHarare, chashora vamwe vaive varwiri verusununguko vari kuti hutungamiriri wesangano iri hubviswe. Chikwata ichi chatiwo chinotsigira hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuripa varimi vachena vakatorerwa minda yavo sezvo hurongwa uhwu huri kuitwa pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Sachigaro wesangano iri muHarare, VaSamuel Bhila, vati vanotsigira hutungamiriri hwaVaChris Mutsvangwa musangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, uye havabvumirane nechikwata chaVaEthan Matibela icho chakati VaMutsvangwa nevamwe vavo vabviswe. VaBhila vati VaMatibela nechikwata chavo havasi nhengo dzeZNLWA uye havafaniri kunge vachitaura pamusoro pesangano iri. VaMatibela nechikwata chavo avo vanoti ndevamwe vaivepo pakaumbwa sangano rinomirira vaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChitau kuti sangano iri rakaumbwa kuti rigadzirise matambaudziko avo kuti vagare zvakanaka asi vakati izvi hazvisi kuitika nekuti hutungamiriri huripo hauna hany’a navo. Pamashoko aVaBhila, VaMatibela vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaive varwiri vehondo yerusunguko vave kurwisaniswa nevamwe vanhu pachinhambo chekuti vashande pamwe kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. VaBhila vatiwo havasi kufara neimwe nhengo yesangano ravo yechikadzi iyo yakabuda pamadandemutande svondo rino ichinyomba mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichiti vatadza kutonga nyika. VaBhila vati vanoziva mudzimai uyu asi varamba kumudoma nezita vachiti havabvumirani nezvaanotaura. Vatiwo vanotsigira chirongwa chehurumende chekuripa varimi vachena vakorerwa minda yavo sezvo chiri kuitwa pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi chikwata chaVaMatibela hachisi kufara nechirongwa chekuripa varungu ichi cheGlobal Compensation Deed. Pane chimwewo chikwata chinomirira vamwe vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko che War Veterans Pressure Group, icho chakatokwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro chichida kuti chirongwa ichi chimiswe sezvo chichiti chinosarura kubhadhara vachena chichisiya vatema vemuno. Patavabvunza pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pemutauro wasimudzwa nenyaya iyi munyika, mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varimivachena munyika reCommercial Farmers Union, VaAndrew Pascoe, vati vanofara kuti hurumende yakabvuma kuvabhadhara uye vari kuedza napose pavanogona kuona kuti mari yacho yawanikwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMutsvangwa, kanaeo munyori mukuru wesangano ravo, VaVictor Matemadanda, kuti vanoti kudii nekudhonzerana masimba kwava kuitika musangano ravo. No media source currently available

headline: VaNick Mangwana Vovimbisa Nhepfenyuro Dzakawanda paHurukuro yeVOA neZimbabwe Television Network
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNdabaningi Nick Mangwana, vanoti hurumende ichavandudza mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau uye mashandiro avo zvekuti vari kutarisira kuti mukupera kwegore kunenge kwave nedzimwe nhepfunyuro makumi maviri nena. VaMangwana vakataura mashoko aya pachirongwa che Zimbabwe Television Network ichishanda neVoice of America chinonzi Fourth Estate chaive nedingindira rekuti, Mapping Zimbabwe’ Media Landscape nezuro manheru. Vakatiwo vanoda kuti mabasa ekutapwa nekuburitswa kwenhau avandudzwe kuti pave nemakambani akawanda nemaredhiyo, materevhizheni nemapenhau vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti vana vakawanda vanobva muzvikoro zvepamusoro vawane mabasa. Vakatiwo vanoda kuona nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu dzichivhurwa vachiti izvi zvichabatsirawo kana vasiri mumabasa enhau. VaMangwana vakatiwo izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru mukushambadza nyika pasi rese. Mupepeti wenhau weZim Fact Platform, VaChris Chinaka, vakatiwo vanotambira mashoko ehurumende aya nemufaro. Vachitaurawo pachirongwa ichi, VaChinaka vakati chimwe chave kunetsa munyika inyaya yekuti munhau mave kufambiswa mashoko asiri echokwandi akawanda. Vakati zvino suwisa kuti vazhinji munyika havachina chivimbo nezvinobuda mumapenhau. VaChinaka vakati chakakosha kuti vatapi venhau vanyore nhau sekutaurwa kwadzinenge dzaitwa kwete kuisa pfungwa dzavo. Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Muzvare Grace Mutandwa, akatiwo haafari nemashandire ari kuita vatori venhu munyika achiti mihoro yavo iri pasi izvo ati zvinokanganisa mashandire avo. Vamwe vakataurawo pachirongwa ichi, ndiVaJeoff Nyarota, vakamboita mupepeti wemapepanhau akaita seChronicle neDaily News avo vakati vanoona sekuti mabasa ekutapa nhau aderera munyika uye kuti pane kupokana pakati pevatapi venhau vanoshandira mapepanhau ehurumende neavo vanoshanda vakazvimirira. Mumwe mupepeti mukuru mukambani yeZimpapers, varidzi veZTN, VaWilliam Chikoto, vakati mukaha uyu wakawedzera muna2000 zvichitevera kuumbwa kwebato guru rinopikisa reMDC muna 1999 asi vakati kambani yavo inoedza napose painogona kuita basa nemazvo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano reMedia Instutitute of Southern Africa, VaNyasha Nyakunu, vakati chikuru chavakatarisira kuona hurumende ichashandura mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Chirongwa ichi chakatepfenyurwawo panhepfuro dzeVoice of America uye VaChinaka vakati mushandirapamwe weVOA neZimpapers wakanaka chose uye unokurudzirwa sezvo uchiratidza pachena kuti Zimbabwe yazvipira kushanda nedzimwe nyika. Aka hakasi kekutanga makambani aya achishanda pamwe sezvo muna Nyamavhuvhu akaita chimwe chirongwa zvakare ichi chakaburitswa pasi rese kusanganisira paVOA nedzimwe nhepfenyuro dzainoshanda nadzo apo pakaitwa gakava rekutanga munyika musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika kunyangwe vamwe vatungamiri vakaita saVaEmmerson Mnangagwa veZanu-PF naVaNelson Chamisa vasina kupinda muhurongwa uhu. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rorasa Chikumbiro ChaVaSikhala Chekuti Vabhadhare Mari yeChibatiso, Repasi Richimira Kupa Mutongo
text: Nhasi matare maviri anoti ramejastiriri nedare repamusoro ange achinzwa zvikumbiro zvemumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamemde VaJob Sikhala zvekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Dare reHigh Court raramba kutambira chikumbiro chaVaSikhala chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kukanganisa mapurisa kuferefeta nyaya yekupondwa kwaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali nhengo yebato ravo reCitizens Coalition for Change. Rimwe gweta raVaSikhala Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vanove nhengo yesangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights ndivo vange vachimiririra VaSikhala. Rimwe gweta riri muchikwata chinomirira VaSikhala vachishanda nesangano reZLHR zvekare VaJeremiah Bamu vati vamirira VaSikhala kudare ramejastiriti uko mutongo wasendekwa parutivi. Masangano emagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose ari kushora kusungwa kwaVaSikhala, mumiriri weChitungwiza West VaGodfrey Sithole nevamwe vasingapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. No media source currently available

headline: Cosafa Cup gore rinouya
text: SANGANO reCouncil of Southern Africa Football Association rinoti mutambo weCOSAFA Cup uchatambwa muna Chivabvu gore rinouya.   Mutambo uyu waifanirwa kutambwa muna Chivabvu kuDurban, kuSouth Africa gore rino asi wakambomiswa zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Achitaura ari kuSouth Africa uko anogara, munyori mukuru weCOSAFA, Sue Destombes — anoti gore rino hazvichakwanisika kuti Cosafa Cup ichiitwa.   “Gore rino hazvichakwanisika kuti Cosafa Cup yevarume ichitambwa, asi ticharonga kuti igotambwe gore rinotevera muna Chivabvu,” anodaro Destombes.   Kunyangwe zvazvo mutambo wevarume usiri kuzotambwa gore rino, Destombes anoti mitambo mina yemadzimai iriko gore rino.   “Tiri kuronga mitambo mina inoti yeCosafa Cup yemadzimai vakuru neUnder-17 kozoti maUnder-17 ne20 vachatamba mitambo yekurwira kuenda kuAFCON 2021,” anodaro.   Kumitambo yevarume, Zambia ndiyo ine mukombe weCosafa Cup uyo wayakahwina gore rapera.   Zvakadaro, chikwata chemaMighty Warriors chiri kuPort Elizabeth, kuSouth Africa uko chiri kukwikwidza mumutambo weWomen’s COSAFA Cup Tournament. Chikwata ichi chiri muboka rine zvimwe zvinoti Tanzania neBotswana muGroup C.   Chikwata chinopedza chiri pamusoro muboka iri chinobva chananga kusemi-fainari yemutambo uyu.    Mitambo yezvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Under-17 ichatanga musi wa19 Mbudzi uye ichitarisirwa kuzopera musi wa29 Mbudzi. Kozoti yeUnder-20, ichatambwa  kutanga nemusi wa3 Zvita ichizopera 13 Zvita.

headline: Amai Mliswa Chikoka Vokurudzira Kusungwa kweVanhu Vanoita Huori Munyaya dzeKutengeswa kweMasitendi
text:
Imwe nhengo huru muhurumende yabvuma nhasi kuti vashandi vehurumende pamwe nevamwe vanhu muZanu PF vari kutengesa nzvimbo dzekuvakira zvisiri pamutemo, nokudaro vanofanirwa kusungwa nemitemo yenyika. Vachitaura paCooksey Hall muChinhoyi pamusangano wavaita
nevakuru vemapazi ehurumende, gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Mliswa-Chikoka, vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havasi kufara negwaro reongororo yezvekushandiswa kwenzvimbo dzehurumende iro rakaburitsa pachena kuti nhengo dzebato reZanu PF nevashandi vehurumende vari kuita zvehuori munyaya dzekuwanisana pekugara. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vaudza mapurisa kuti vave nebasa rekusunga wose
ari kuita kana akaita zvehuori pasina kutarisa kumeso. Amai Mliswa Chikoka vakurudzira vematare kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo kuitira kuti mutemo ubate wose akaita zvehuori. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vati vose vakawana nzvimbo kubva kuhurumende kana kumakanzuru dzekuvakira dzimba zvechitsotsi, vanofanirwa
kusungwa. VaMnangagwa vakaumba komisheni yakaongorora kupihwa kwaiyitwa nzvimbo dzehurumende mumakanzuru pamwe nekutambira zvichemo zvevanhu vainge vatenga nzvimbo dzekugara asi votadza kudziwana. Konisheni iyi yaive nemutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Tendai Uchena, sasachigaro wayo. Ongororo yaVaUchena inoti muChinhoyi pane nzvimbo yeDestiny iyo
yakapihwa VaObediah Musindo vanotsigira bato reZanu PF avo
vakatengesera vanhu nzvimbo dzekugara asi kusvika nanhasi vanhu ava
havasati vapihwa pekugara kunyange vakabhadhara mari yavainge vanzi
vabhadhare. Imwe nhengo yevechidiki yeZanu PF, VaMike Chimombe, vakapihwa nzvimbo yekuvakira dzimba asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chakavakwa asi vanhu vachiti vakabhadhara mari dzavo. Asi VaChimombe vati vakapedza kubhadhara nzvimbo iyi vangomirira
kuvaka dzimba dzavo. KuChitungwiza, imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, Dr Fredrick Mabamba, vemushandira pamwe wedzimba weUnited Westand Housing Cooperative, vakasungwa nebazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwehuori masvondo matatu apfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekupa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvaka dzimba zvisiri pamutemo. Muguta reNorton, kambani yeBeyond Reality yenhengo yeZanu PF
yeConsultative Assembly, VaJimayi Muduvuri, iri kunetsanawo nevechidiki
pamusoro penzvimbo inosvika mahekita mazana maviri inofanirwa kuvakirwa dzimba iyo iri mumatare edzimhosva. Vechidiki ava, avo vakabhadhara mari asi havana kuzopihwa nzvimbo
dzekuvakira dzimba, vave kunzi mari inofanirwa kuwedzerwa. Mashoko aAmai Mliswa-Chikoka anouya apo vaimbove gurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, vari kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva vachipomherwa mhosvo yekusashandisa hofisi yavo zvakanaka vachiita zvehuori munyaya dzekupa vanhu nzvimbo dzekugara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata munyori wezvematunhu mubato reMDC Alliance, VaSesil Zvidzai, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutevedzeri mumutauriri webato iri, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti Zanu PF haikwanise kugadzirisa nyaya yevanhu vakawana nzvimbo dzekuvakira zvisiri pamutemo kana kuti ma Land Barons sezvo nhengo dzayo dziri idzo ma land barons. Gwaro rekomisheni yaVaUchena rinoti pane huori hwemhando yepamusoro hwakaitika pakupihwa kwenzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba mumaguta akawanda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Harare Agricultural Show yeGore Rino Zviri paMutemo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura zviri pamutemo Harare Agricultural Show vachiti hurumende yavo icharamba ichidzika mitemo nekuita zvirongwa zvinoita kuti munyika muve nechikafu chakakwana. Vachitaura pakuvhurwa zviri pamutemo kweHarare Agricultural Show, mutungamiri wenyika ati vanhu havafaniri kungorima chete asi kuti vanofanira kutora kurima sebhizinesi vachiti kana izvi zvikaitika nyika ichabudirira. Vati hurumende yavo ichadzika mitemo nekuita zvirongwa zvinoita kuti mabasa ekurima abudirire munyika. VaMnangagwa vati zvirongwa zvePfumvudza/ Intwasa, Presidential Input Scheme, Jonh Deree neBelarus ndezvimwe zvezvirongwa zvakanangana nekupedza dambudziko renzara munyika. Vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzira migwagwa kuitira kuti varimi vasanetseke kuwana mbeu pamwe nekuendzesa zvirimwa kumisika. Vatenda Zimbabwe Agricultural Society nekuronga showo kunyange hazvo kuine denda reCovid -19 vachiti izvi zvakakosha nekuti mwaka unotevera unotarisirwa kunge wakanaka. VaTawanda Mangisi vekambani yeSygenta iyo yapa mimwe mibairo nhasi, vati zvakakosha kuti varimi vatambire kana kupinda muzvironga zvehurumende sezvo zviine chinangwa chekuti nyika iwane chikafu chinokwanira munhu wese. Kanzuru yeHarare ndiyo yawana mubairo wekutanga pakurwisa denda reCovid 19. Mutauriri wekanzuru iyi, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti uyu mucherechedzo mukuru webasa guru riri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo. VaEdson Kulungwe vekuGokwe North avo vakawana mbeu yedonje pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Input Scheme vakaburitsa mabhero mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemana akavawanisa zviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica ndivo vatora mubairo wekutanga pavairimi vedonje. Vapihwa mubairo wetarakita. Showo yegore rino iri kupinda vanhu vashoma nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19 uye ichapera nemusi weMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: New England Patriots Yosimudza Mukombe weSuper Bowl muAmerica
text: Nhasi muAmerica matambwa mutambo mukuru weSuper Bowl mumakwikwi eAmerican Football League pakati peLos Angeles Rams neNew England Patriots. New England yakunda LA Rams 13 kwa 3 zvichireva kuti yahwina mukombe uyu kechitanhatu zvisati zvamboitika munhoroondo yemutambo uyu. Mutambo uyu watambirwa kunhandare yeMercedes-Benz kuAtlanta Georgia. Mutambo weSuper Bowl mutambo unenge wakatarisirwa zvikuru muAmerica gore roga roga sezvo NFL iine mukurumbira wakanyanyisa. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe vari mugari wemuAtlanta Muzvinafundo Davison Saungweme vanoti mutambo uyu waunza mari yakawanda munhararunda mavo sezvo vanhu vabva kumativi mana ose enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Matanhatu neVapfumbamwe Vofa neCovid-19 muNyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vashaya vari muzvipatara kuBulawayo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vasvika zviuru makumi matanhatu nevapfumbabwe kana kuti 69. Nemusi weMugovera kwakaita huwandu hunotyisa hwevanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi apo vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 490 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mushure mekunge vavhenekwa. Pavanhu vose ava kunze kwevashanu chete, vamwe vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vanoti zviri pachena kuti chirwere chadzika midzi munyika. No media source currently available Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132, 000. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vasvika zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 3,659. Pavanhu vashaya, Harare ndiyo ine vakawandisa vanosvka makumi matatu nemumwe ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine makumi maviri. Pamatunhu ose emunyika, Masvingo chete ndiro dunhu risina kana munhu mumwe chete ashaya. Tichiri panyaya iyi, kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvasvika pakaipisisa panyaya yerkupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus, kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba kwave mumwedzi weChipiri kuri kuenderera mberi. Nemusi weChishanu mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachitaura kumarinda eHeroes Acre pakuvigwa kwegamba renyika VaPerrance Shiri vakakumbira vanachiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa sevanhu vane chido chenyika yavo pamoyo. Vakati hurumende iri kuteerera zvichemo zvavo asi hazvifanire kugadziriswa vanhu vachifa. Asi mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti hurumende haina kana kubvira yataura navo kubva zvavatangawo kuramwa mabasa nemusi weChina. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanotiwo kuramwa mabasa kuri kuendera mberi nekuti zvichemo zvavo hazvisi kugadziriswa. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo asi ivo negurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube vakambovimbisa kugadzirisa nyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mana nevana kana kuti 944, 000 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru gumi nezvipfumbamwe zvine mazana mapfumbamawe nemakumi maviri kana kuti 19, 920. Vapora vadarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nezviviri kana kuti 602, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi memanomwe ane zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 17, 5 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi shanu nenomwe kana kuti 154, 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti 685,000.  Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 10,5 million.

headline: Hurumende Inodzikisa Mutengo wePasipoti yeChimbichimbi
text: Hurumende yazivisa kuti yadzikisa mari inobhadharwa pakutora mapasipoti zvechichimbi asi yawedzera mari inobhadharwa pamapasipoti anononoka kubuda. Gurukota rinoona nezvinotika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, vazivisa kubudikidza nemutemo weStatutory Instrument 16 of 2022, kuti mapasipoti echimbichimbi kana kuti emergence passports, ayo anga achitorwa nemadhora ekuAmerica mazana matatu ane gumi nemasere ($318), ave kutorwa nemadhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica. Muchiziviso ichi, hurumende yakwidza mari yepasipoti inononoka kubuda, kana normal passport, kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu nematatu kusvika pazana rimwechete remadhora ekuAmerica. Mari iyi ndiyo imwecheteyo ichange ichibhadharwa kana munhu achida kutora pasipoti yechizvinozvino, kana kuti e-passport, yakaparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mwedzi wapera. Pamusoro pemari iyi, VaKazembe vatiwo veruzhinji vachange vachisungirwa kubhadhara mari inoita madhora makumi maviri ekuAmerica kuti vawane iri kudaidzwa kuti Quick Response Code inoita kuti ma e-passport akwanise kuverengeka pamichina yechimanjemanje yave kushandiswa nedzimwe nyika. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Tabeth Madziva, vati vafara zvikuru nekudzikiswa kwemari yekutora mapasipoti echimbichimbi vachiti mari yanga ichibhadhariswa nehurumende pakutora mapasipoti aya yanga yakawandisa. Asi umwe mugari wekuEpworth, VaKennedy Mazivanhanga, vati havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwaitwa mari yekutora pasipoti isiri yechimbichimbi nemadhora makumi mana nemanomwe ekuAmerica. Mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende inofanira kutora matanho ekuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana magwaro ose zviri nyore kubva kumagwaro ekuzvarwa, zvitupa kusvika kumapasipoti. VaMasaraure vatiwo veruzhinji vari kurasikirwa nemikana yakawanda kunze kwenyika nekuti vanenge vasina magwaro ekufambisa sezvo vazhinji vasina magwaro ekufambisa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaKazembe sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nhare dzavo pamwe nevekumahofisi amabharani mukuru, kana kuti Registrar General, kuti tinzwe kuti vachadzikisa here mutengo wemapaspipoti zvakare uye kuti matanho api avachatora pane avo vane mapasipoti asati abuda vave nenguva vakamirira mapasipoti avo. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vakanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti michina yekudhinda mapasipoti echizvinozvino inokwanisa kudhinda mapasipoti zviuru makumi matatu (30 000) pazuva zvichireva kuti michina iyi ikatanga kushandiswa Zimbabwe inokwanisa kudhindira vanhu vose vakamirira mapasipoti avo vanofungidzirwa kuti vanosvika zviuru mazana maviri mukati memavhiki maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Tanganda Half Marathon yadzoka
text: SHANGWITI dzemujaho wekumhanya dzemuZimbabwe nepasi rose dziri kutarisirwa kukwikwidza mumujaho weTanganda Half Marathon uyo uchaitwa svondo rinotevera.   Mujaho uyu wadzoka gore rino zvichitevera kumiswa kwawainge wambaoitwa makore maviri adarika nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakaona mitambo yose ichimbomiswa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   Mutungamiri wesangano reNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe – Tendai Tagara – anoti mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon wakakosha zvikuru munyika sezvo uriwo wavanoshandisa kusarudza vamhanyi vanozonomirira nyika kumijaho mikuru yakaita seWorld Half Marathon.   Mujaho weWorld Half Marathon gore rino uchaitirwa kunyika yeChina munaGumiguru uye shasha dzinohwina paTanganda Half Mara[1]thon dzinobva dzawana tikiti rekuenda kumujaho mukuru uyu.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza kuti mumwe wemijaho mikuru munyika medu weTanganda Half Marathon wadzoka. Uyu mujaho mukuru wataigara tichitarisira makore ose sezvo uriwo watinoshandisa kusarudza vamhanyi vanozonomirira nyika kuWorld Half Marathon.   “Saka tinotenda vakotsveri vedu veTanganda nekutirongera mujaho uyu uyo wakatikoshera pamwe nevamhanyi vedu vakasiyana.   “Vachahwina mumujaho uyu vachangobva vawana tikiti rekuenda kuChina munaGumiguru kunomirira nyika kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon,” anodaro Tagara.   Farai Garai anove operations manager kuTanganda Tea Company anoti vanonzwa manyukunyuku nekudzoka kwemujaho uyu.   “Tatarisira kudzoka kwemujaho wedu uyo tange tave nemakore maviri tisiri kuronga nekuda kweCovid-19 sezvo inguva iyo taifanira kumbochengetedza hupenyu hwedu.   “Tiri kutarisira shangwiti dzinomhanya dzinodarika 1 000 kuuya kuzokwikwidza nekuti kune vakawanda vari kugara vachiridza nhare vachida kunzwa nekunyoresa mujaho uyu,” anodaro Garai.   Shasha dzekumhanya marathon dzinoti Misheck Sithole naOlivia Chitate ndivo vakapedzisira kuhwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon mugore ra2019.

headline: Vatambi vetsiva votambira kunze
text: VATAMBI vetsiva vanonzi vave kuenda kune dzimwe nyika uko mutambo uyu wave kutenderwa kutambwa vachinotsvaga raramo.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakamboitwa mitambo pasi rose kubvira muna Kurume gore rino nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mamiriro ezvinhu aya akaona vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana vachikwangwaya sezvo vange vajaira kurarama kuburikidza nemitambo iyi.   Asi, pari zvino mitambo yakasiyana yakatanga kuitwa kune dzimwe nyika zvichitevera kunyevenutswa kwematanho ekurwisa kupararira kwedenda iri. MuZimbabwe, mitambo yakawanda haisati yave kutenderwa kutambwa izvo zvinonzi zviri kuona vamwe vatambi vetsiva vachienda kunyika dzinosanganisira South Africa, Tanzania neMalawi.   Miganhu yakasiyana yenyika ichakavharwa kune veruzhinji uye nhandare dzinosvikira ndege kubva kunze kwenyika dzakavhurwa nguva pfupi yadarika zvichitevera kuvharwa kwadzange dzakaita zvakare nechinangwa chekumisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Clyde Musonda anove puromota wetsiva anoti chirwere cheCovid-19 chakanganisa zvakawanda sezvo vave kurasikirwa nevatambi vachienda kune dzimwe nyika.   “Hatisi kuziva kuti tiri kuenda kupi nekuti hatisati tapihwa mvumo yekuti tichironga mitambo yetsiva, kune dzimwe nyika vave kutoronga uye mitambo iri kutambwa. Vatambi vazhinji muno vanotoraramiswa nemari inobva kutsiva saka vave kutiza vachienda kune dzimwe nyika kuzozama raki ravo                                                                     ikoko.   “Isu hatina zvatinokwanisa kuita kana kuvaudza kuti musaende, zvinotiremera nekuti hatina chekuvapa pari zvino. Zvinhu zvose zvakamira nekuda kweCovid-19 saka vave kutoenda kune dzimwe nyika kunotsvaga kurarama nekutamba mutambo uyu,” anodaro Musonda.   Musonda anoti vatambi vetsiva vari kutambudzika zvikuru nekuda kwekushaiwa zvokuita munguva ino yeCovid-19.   “Havasi vatambi vese vakabatsirika nemari yeRelief Fund yakauya uye vakaiwana vacho imwe yakatopera.   Saka kuti varambe vakagara kuine mimwe mikana kunze kwenyika zvinonetsa, ndizvo zvave kuvatuma kuti vaende. Tiri kuita zvekuzonzwa kuti vatoenda hameno kuti vanenge vaenda sei,” anodaro Musonda.   Pane mimwe mitambo yakamiswa nguva yadarika nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 munyika muno.   Mitambo iyi inosanganisira waCharles Manyuchi uyo aifanira kusangana naMuhamad Sebyala wekuUganda vachirwira bhande reWorld Boxing Federation Association Supreme Middleweight newaTinashe Mwadziwana aitarisirwa kusangana naPaulus “The Rock” Ambunda wekuNamibia.

headline: Barcelona yotenga Martial
text: kugadzirira mari inosvika 60 miriyoni paunzi yekutenga mutambi weManchester United, Anthony Martial.   Martial zvinonzi haasi kufara kuOld Trafford uye hurukuro dzekuwedzera imwe kondirakiti yake hadzisi kufamba nekuda kwekushaya mikana yekutamba yakawanda muchikwata chaJose Mourinho. Kondirakiti yake yaanayo parizvino ichapera mugore ra2019, asi ine chimwe chibvumirano chekuti inogona kuwedzerwa rimwe gore pamusoro.   Kubva Alexis Sanchez auya kuchikwata ichi muna Ndira, Martial haasati ambonwisa, angotamba mitambo mina chete inosanganisira uyo vakakundwa neTootenham pamwe neNewcastle uye akazoburitswa angotamba maminitsi 64 chete apo vakasangana neChelsea. Martial anonzi haana kufara paakaudzwa kuti ave kuchinja nzvimbo yekutambira zvichitevera kuuya kwakaita Senchez kuchikwata ichi.   Barcelona yaida kutenga Martial mwaka uno  ndokuzosarudza kutenga Ousmane Dembele kubva kuBorrusia Dortmund, asi inogona kuzodzokera mutambi uyu panopera mwaka uno.   Barcelona ine chivimbo chekuti inogona kutenga mutambi weFrance – Antoine Griezmann – kubva kuAtletci Madrid uye inonzi iri kuongorora Ryan Sessgnon weFulham. – SportsMail Football

headline: Vakawanda Votyira Kudeuka kweRopa Munyika
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti vave kutyira kuti munyika munogona kudeuka ropa kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakasagadzirisa nyaya yekunetsana kunotyisa kuri kuitika mubato reZanu-PF. NeChina mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakati murume wavo anofanira kubuda pachena kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chake kuitira kuti kurwisana kunotyisa kwoitika mubato iri kumire. VaMugabe mbune vakatendawo kuti mubato mavo mune kunetsana kunotyisa uye vakati mauto ave kunyanya kupindira mukurwisana kuri mubato ravo. Mumwe ari kutevera zviri kuitika muZanu PF, VaWhisper Makuni, vanoti kunetsana kuri muZanu-PF kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika uye vashora VaMugabe nekusagadzirisa nyaya dziri munyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa, VaNhamo Goronga. VaJoseph Dhliwayo, avo vari kuSouth Africa zvekare, vanotiwo VaMugabe ndivo vakazvisikira moto muziso nekugarisa pachigaro vachirambidza vanhu kutaura nezvemunhu achatora chigaro chavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paLummumbashi University kuZambia, VaShakespera Hamauswa, vanobumawo kuti nyika yananga kuna taisireva. Mubato reZanu-PF mune kunetsana kukuru pakati pezvikwata zviri kuzivikanwa nerekuti Team Lacoste, iyo inonzi inotungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye Generation 40, iyo inonzi yave kuda kuti gurukota rinoona nezvemauto, VaSydney Sekeramai, vatore chigaro chaVaMugabe. Vaimbova mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaRugare Gumbo, vanoti VaMugabe vagara vachifarira havo VaSekeramai. Vamwe veTeam Lacoste vataura neStudio 7 vati mubato ravo matanga kurwisana kunotyisa pakati pemaKaranga ayo anonzi ari kuti Mazezuru neMaNdebele vabatana kuti Makaranga asatore hutungamiri. Asi nyanzvi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, varamba mashoko aya. VaMavhinga vashorawo VaMugabe nekuregerera mauto achipindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachiti zvapa kuti muve nekusagadzikana munyika. Vamwe muZanu-PF vanonzi vari kukurudzira VaMugabe kuti vamise basa mukuru wemauto,General Constantino Chiwenga, nevamwe vakuru vemauto vari kupomerwa mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaGumbo vatiwo nyaya yekutadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi nekutukana iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvirambe zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyika, izvo zvave kukonzera kusagadzikana. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vari kuti VaMugabe vadome achatora chigaro chavo, mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvemutemo mubato iri, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti vatungamira vanosarudzwa nevanhu pakongiresi. Bato reZanu-PF rakatozivisa gore rapera kuti VaMugabe ndivo vachakwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rinouya vakamirira Zanu-PF. Vakadzingwa muZanu PF uye vari mutauriri weZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kuziva kuti nyika ndeye vanhu vemuZimbabwe, kwete yaivo VaMugabe nemudzimai wavo chete.  Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti makore avo uye hutano hwavo zvinopa kuti vakawanda vasave nekugadzikana. VaMugabe vakapinda musarudzo idzi vanenge vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemana. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Batsirai Dynamos’ . . . zvave kuda Mwari: Romario
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vezvikwata zvakasiyana vokurudzirwa kuti vabatane nezvikwata zvavo mukuzvibatsira kupedza matambudziko azvinenge zvichisangana nawo kwete kukonzera nyonga-nyonga nekupindira munyaya dzine chekuita nezvehutungamiriri.   Mashoko aya akataurwa nemutungamiri wevatsigiri veDynamos, Benjamin Munzira, achiti harisi basa revatsigiri kutaura kuti hutungamiri hwechikwata ngaushandurwe asi kutsigira vatambi nhabvu.   Mwaka uno Dynamos haisi kunyatsotamba zvinonwisa mvura izvo zvaiona ichihwina mitambo mitatu chete kubva pa12 yayatamba ndokuita mangange mitatu zvakare uye ikarakashwa mitanhatu.   Svondo radarika, chikwata ichi chakakundwa neFC Platinum 2-0 apo murairidzi wacho – Biggie Zuze – akashoropodza vatungamiriri veDeMbare achiti vanofanirwa kupa vatambi mari kuti vatambe zvemhando yepamusoro.   “Chandinoziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu harisi basa ravo kuti vataure kuti hutangamiri ngaubve, kwete izvozvo hatizvitambire. Hutungamiri ngausiiwe hwakadaro, chedu kutsigira zvikwata chete zvakadaro,” anodaro Munzira.   Nguva yadarika, rimwe bandiko revatsigiri veDynamos rakakurudzira vatsigiri vechikwata ichi kuti vasaende kunochitsigira kusvikira hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi hwashandurwa.   Asi Munzira anoti nzira yakatorwa nevatsigiri ava handiyo uye inotaridza kurasikwa kwavo gwara.   “Vatsigiri hatifanirwe kurasika kudaro, harisi basa redu kutaura mashoko akadai aya. Isu ngatitsigire chikwata sezvachiri kwete kuda kukonzera nyonga-nyonga, kwete.   “Dai tiri kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira zvikwata zvedu chete. Zvikwata zvese zvakaomerwa, zvingori zviviri chete zvine mari FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum ndiko saka zvichigara zvichihwina nekuti morarari yevatambi vavo inenge yakasimuka,” anodaro.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa nemutungamiri weDynamos Kadoma Chapter, Hurbet Manyowa, achiti nehuwandu hwevatsigiri vezvikwata zvakasiyana – kunyanya Dynamos – vanogona kubatsira nezvakasiyana kusanganisira mari izvo zvinobvisa mutoro unenge une hutungamiri hwezvikwata izvi.   “Isu Dynamos tinoziva kuti tine vatsigiri vakawanda chaizvo, nehuwandu hwedu kana tikati munhu wega abvise $1 kana $0,50c pamwe tinounganidza mari yakawanda chaizvo yoenda kunobatsira vatambi vechikwata chedu.   “Zvino vamwe ndivo vanongona kutaura chete asi tikasvika pakuti ngatibatsirei chikwata havawanikwe ipapo. Basa kukurudzira vamwe kuti vasauye kunhandare kuzotsigira chikwata, zvino zvinobatsirei zvamunenge maita?   “Zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti seDynamos chaiyo inotorarama nemari yapagedhi saka mukasaenda kubhora kwacho zvino hapana chaichawana, vave kukuvara vatambi manje ivo vatiri kuda kubatsira,” anodaro Manyowa.   Zvakadaro, mumwe mutsigiri mukuru weDynamos, Chris “Romario” Musekiwa, anoti kudzikira kuri kuita chikwata ichi kwave kuda nyasha dzaMwari chaidzo.   “Zviri kuitika izvi zvinowanikwa, zvichadarika, asi zviri kurwadza hazvo wena. Zvave kuda nyasha dzaMwari chaidzo. Hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi ngavape murairidzi wacho Biggie Zuze mari atenge vatambi chaivo uye ngavapewo vatambi mari vafare,” anodaro Musekiwa.
